voiceline.line: Tee hee, what should I knock out first? Their bow? Turret? Engine?
It's so much fun to fire my gun~!
Roberts-class monitor – Abercrombie.
Target spotted, calculating trajectory... Bugger, it's just the commission team. Laaaame...
Tee hee~ Commander, did you know you can use the Mark I as a blunt weapon? I'll show you! (Pow!)
Tee hee~ How do you like my habanero curry? – Huh...? W-wait, Nelson! I didn't know that one was yours! – Don't hurt meeee!
Oh, Commander~! Com-man-der! Coooommaaaandeeeer! What? It was nothing. I just wanted to see your face~ Tee hee~
Feeling stressed out? Then try out my Mark I! Fire a shot for every worry you have to make them disappear with a bang! You'll get hooked on it!
I wonder if I can combine you and my Mark I... Commander, for the next sortie, how about you sit atop it while issuing commands?
Hey, Commander~ Brought back anything gander-worthy? Like a piece of wreckage or parts from a crashed aircraft or something?
Whuaaah! My armour!
That loud bang? Tee hee~ You were gone for so long I was getting bored, so I let a shot loose~
Tsk. Lame.
Oh, have I hidden your mail~? Want it back? Then get some snacks and bar-ter for it! Bar-ter for it!
My hobby's collecting shell casings~! Hey, don't you think shell casings are super cool?|Top of the mornin', granny Hood!|Whuaah! Hey, Wales! Granny Hood is giving me creepy looks~!
Commander, there are new missions! Tee hee~ What'll we be sinking this time? I can't wait~
Commander, is the next mission gonna be as fun as the last one?
I'm the Monitor Abercrombie. My sister and I used to help with shore bombardment around the Mediterranean Sea. Tee hee~ It's way more fun to shoot stationary targets~
W-wow! Thanks! I'll never take it off! I-in exchange, take my Mark I! Roberts told me you're supposed to give your partner your dearest possession at times like these!
Be torn to shreds by my shells!
Commander, want some crisps? Here you go! ... Roberts, come here! I found the crook who ate your crisps!
Whuaaah!
Take THIS! – Oh, Commander? Tee hee~ I'm Abercrombie! Lovely weather today, eh~?
Tee hee~ I might be loading a teensy bit too much gunpowder~
Kaboom! Ahaha~ You can't beat the Mark I!
Trick or treat! Give me candy, or you'll taste one of my pranks! Although, even if you give me some... well, you'll see for yourself! Tee hee~
Kabooom! You thought it was a pumpkin, but it was me, Abercrombie, with my Mark I! Commander, did I scare you senseless? Muahaha!
I wonder how people would react if they got my custom-made horseradish candy~ Tee hee~!
Tee hee~ Who knows where I've planted my pumpkin surprise~

Take a gander at my Halloween Mark I! Looks cracking, doesn't it!|Nelson's wearing a Halloween costume?! Really?! Let me have a look at it, Commander!|If only we had more holidays where you could cause mischief and get away with it scot-free~
Shake hands with my Halloween Mark I! Come on, Mark I, show the Commander your special trick~!
Taste the retribution of my Mark I! (Pow!)
Kabooom! You thought it was a pumpkin, but it was me, Abercrombie, with my Mark I! Commander, did I scare you senseless? Muahaha!
Carrot juice has just the perfect consistency. You can put anything you like in the glass, and nobody'll know!
Now for a ghost pepper while nobody's looking... Tee hee! Perfect! I wonder who'll be the lucky one to sip– C-Commander?! You didn't see anything suspicious... Right? Tee hee~
Bring our customers their drinks, Manjuus! And be careful so you don't drop them!
ello there! How about a glass of delicious and nutritious carrot juice? ...Wait, stop, not that one! THIS one's for you! Phew... Disaster averted...

Shaking the bottle? Pfft, that's the oldest trick in the book. I'll teach you a newer one, Commander!|Oh bollocks! It's Nelson! Quick, Commander, I need a place to hide!|You're silly, Erebus. All I asked for was a little inspiration, not the full recipe for some kind of magic potion!
Bottoms up, like adults do! Drink up, Mark I!
Now for a ghost pepper while nobody's looking... Tee hee! Perfect! I wonder who'll be the lucky one to sip– C-Commander?! You didn't see anything suspicious... Right? Tee hee~
First Torpedo Squadron, Abukuma, Moving out!
Don't push yourself too much, Commander!
Sixth ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers, Abukuma.
Commander, shall we return to port and do some fishing? The girls seem to be back from their commission as well.
Don't touch me...
What's wrong? If it's nothing then stay quiet, Commander.
I look trigger happy? I actually prefer being an escort more than I do engaging in combat...
Commander, should we go fishing today? Oh, there's work to do? I'll wait for you to finish then... Oh? No, it's fine! I'm more than happy to stay with you, Commander.
I'm just a normal Abukuma... no one has ever cursed me to become a demon. If someone tries to hurt you though, Commander, I might just turn right into a demon!
Did everyone make it back in one piece?
Don't panic... wait for the right moment to strike!
Welcome back. Want to try some fresh torpedoes?
Everyone, prepare to retreat... I'll cover the rear!
You've got new mail!

Commander, shall we go fishing? How about a game of chess?|My name seems a bit complicated, but it's actually easy to read. Why don't you try it?|Dress up? Oh... these socks are actually pretty easy to take off. Want to try yourself?
We're starting a new mission. Got it?
These rewards aren't so bad...

Nagara-class light cruiser, Abukuma. I've spent most of my time in the First Torpedo Squadron. Although I look aggressive, I actually prefer other things like fishing and just cruising around... just like when I was at Kiska. Perhaps protecting others is a more suitable job for me.

It's not for the other sisters in First torpedo squadron, but for me? Is that really alright? Ahh, this makes me happier than that one miraculous victory......thank you, Commander, I shall treat it as my most precious treasure.
Everyone.... Gangway
Be quiet, Commander.
Want to have a taste of my torpedoes, Commander?
Hi, Commander... I'm Abukuma. What are you looking at? My horns? Don't mistake me for Kitakami or Ooi...
This isn't a bad feeling at all...
I'm number one? Hm... I don't feel anything special...
Combat retrofit complete! First Torpedo Squadron flagship, Abukuma, ready to sortie any time!
I've prepared snacks for everyone. Commander, there's some for you too! Come dig in!
nil|Have you finally memorized my name? Just read it out. You can give it a few tries~|My expression seems a bit softer now? It's because I like the fleet and the Commander more than I did before~!
I brought back the rewards, Commander!
Commander, did you call for me?
Hey! Commander, you're going to be eating torpedoes if you keep this up!
Combat retrofit complete! First Torpedo Squadron flagship, Abukuma, ready to sortie any time!
The most important thing is that everyone stays safe.
Everyone... calm down. Seize the chance and hit the enemy where it hurts.
Is there something on my face?
A-class destroyer – Acasta, Hull Number H09.
Zzzzzz... Hmm? Commander, shouldn't that commission be done by now?
Keep it down, will you...
I just can't be bothered... Maybe I should go to sleep...
I know just the place to take a nap... You wanna come along and play hooky with me, Commander?
Commander... give this some thought: isn't it boring, being with me...?
I'm not all that talkative... but we don't even need words to understand each other... do we?
Welcome back... *Yawn*... Guess I'm a little sleepy...
Zzzz... Ah, Commander. Welcome back
I figure this outcome isn't something to celebrate...
Got some mail... Wonder if it's for you.

Hmm? Not very talkative...? *Yawn*... I guess it's because I'm always so sleepy...|Wha...? Guess I fell asleep. With weather this fine, I couldn't help it...|You don't talk much, just like me, Commander. How nice...
Maybe you should take a look at the mission log?
*Yawn*... Maybe the rewards are here now...
I'm Acasta... part of the A-class. Calling me "brave" would be flattery. I was just doing my job... I'm not all that strong, but I'll do my best if you need me to.
... Sorry... I'm just so happy that I don't even know what to say... I'll take good care of this...
Guess I should put in a little more effort...?
Zzzzz... Ugh... I'm trying to sleep... don't poke me like that...
Uhh... if anyone sees us, you'll get arrested.
Right... I'm Acasta. Good day.
I've gotten stronger... I'll work harder, so look forward to that.
We won. Well, at least I didn't make a fool of myself, I guess.
Even I go on these "fashionable outings"... They do wear me out, though...
Hm? Guess we're both about to head out... Don't stare at me like that... Even I go outdoors sometimes... Since we're both, uh, headed the same way... maybe we could... walk there together?

I always bring some weapons with me, in case I'm needed for a sudden sortie, I guess.|Recently, I've gotten a lot of compliments like "see, a little fashion could make you cute after all"... *Sigh*, it feels kinda odd, I guess...|Commander, think I could take a nap if you're busy with that stuff...?
*Sigh*... Maybe I should swap back to my old clothes...
Uhh... something might blow up if you poke me so casually.
Hm? Guess we're both about to head out... Don't stare at me like that... Even I go outdoors sometimes... Since we're both, uh, headed the same way... maybe we could... walk there together?
It was no easy feat hanging up all these lanterns... Make sure to take it all in, okay...?
I heard you're supposed to hang lanterns up everywhere during the Spring Festival... so Ardent and I gave it a try! What do you think? Pretty cute, right? Um... I was talking about the lanterns...

I've only been able to work so hard because of you, Commander... Everything's so pretty, so you'd say it's a job well done, right...? Th-thanks... But next year, I'm going to make you do the hard work... probably...
What a gentle glow... I think I'm... getting sleepy...

These red strips hanging from the lanterns? ...They're probably riddles of some sort? The Dragon Empery sure knows how to put on some interesting events... |Zzzz... Shoot, I dozed off... *sigh*... It's already this late... |I wonder if this outfit... brings out my girlish side...
Commander, just hush and enjoy the lanterns. I'm totally... not dozing off...
I heard you're supposed to hang lanterns up everywhere during the Spring Festival... so Ardent and I gave it a try! What do you think? Pretty cute, right? Um... I was talking about the lanterns...
Looking after rabbits is a lot more enjoyable than running around doing errands... There might be something therapeutic about looking after these cuties...
Come on, stop running around and behave already... Ah, Commander? Umm, I'm currently looking after these rabbits... Hm, you're thirsty? Um, give me a moment and I'll whip something up for you...
Glorious was shooting strange glances at me just earlier...
Commander, the tea's not ready yet... Hm, you're just here to watch me? Hrmm...

If you don't get out of that teacup, I won't be able to pour the tea...|As soon as I touch these cute little bunny ears... Haau, it's cuteness overload...|Ardent, stop! You can't feed our snacks to the bunnies...
Zzz... Hnn... Oh! It seemed like I was taking a nap with the rabbits, huh...
Come on, stop running around and behave already... Ah, Commander? Umm, I'm currently looking after these rabbits... Hm, you're thirsty? Um, give me a moment and I'll whip something up for you...
I'm dressing differently, but you're still just as nice to me... Thank goodness...
Ardent told me I "gotta stop looking so tired" and I "gotta be more girly," so I did it while I was retrofitting... Do you recognise me, Commander? ... Umm, I'm Acasta, okay?
Wonder if that commission's done yet... Um, Commander, let's... let's head to the harbour together.
Nice work, Commander. Now, how about getting some sleep?
I just can't be bothered even after retrofitting...

*Yawn*... Nobody'll see me yawning... if I cover it up with my turret... I think...|Zzz... Oh, shoot! I almost fell asleep... I hope the Commander didn't notice...|Commander, do you wish I'd be even girlier than this...? Or am I fine the way I am now...?
Ardent warned me about my sweetheart growing to dislike me if I'm too passive... Huh?! Commander? Jeez... I hope you didn't hear that...
Ardent told me I "gotta stop looking so tired" and I "gotta be more girly," so I did it while I was retrofitting... Do you recognise me, Commander? ... Umm, I'm Acasta, okay?
Hope this'll be enough to satisfy the Commander...
Wahaha! Let's go! It's action time!
Eh? Me liking potatoes... does not match with my image?!
Leander-class light cruiser – Achilles, Hull Number 70!
A happy report~ from Peppy Achilles~! The commissions are done!
Commander, work hard and aim to become a ☆magician☆
Did you know, men who are virgins until 30 years old become wizards!
Living a real, normal life... Aaah, I'm doomed~ (mumbling to herself)...
Say, Commander... Want to try it with me? I mean... that! Let's go out and play! I'll make a picknic for us~☆
Ehehe, I never thought that cooking for people I like would be this fun... Just leave it to me, Achilles, from here on~☆
Commander, good job~!
Commander, Commander, don't pronounce my name wrong again~ I'm Achilles - remember that? Remember that? It's A-chil-les~☆
Ooo... Maybe my talent has yet to bloom?
New mails~
Com~man~der! What is that delicious looking thing?|Al~right~ Then I'm eating the butter~|Oww-- I cannot move my head or body anymore~ I don't want to do anything for a month~
No problem whatsoever! No matter how many missions there are, just bring them on!
Remember your rewards too~☆
I'm the second ship of Leander class ships, Achilles. My name is from the war god Achilles who fought in Troy~ That~ is~ why~, I'm gonna kick my enemies' butts no matter who they are~☆
Commander, you understand that you cannot live without me, Achilles, right? Hmm hmm~ Don't worry. I will never leave you~ It's a promise~☆
Achilles, attack!
OK, I got it now~ Commander is an idiot!
Hey, hey, wha~t are you looking for?
Leander class light cruiser number 2, A~chil~les~ is here~ Commander, want to buy snacks in New Zealand?
Since I've become stronger, my feet are more resilient now~
If I'm praised by Commander, I'd be even happier~☆
Target: enemy at 12 o'clock~! Shooooot!
Look, Commander! There's a gorgeous sheila in the sky! ... Really? You believed that?
The cute and charming Achilles is Super☆Retro☆Fitted! Even my heel won't give me any problems now! Well, not like it really ever did before, ahaha~☆
Commander, want some honey? It's heckin' yummy~!
nil|Being here now, I can chat with anyone whenever! Stoked as a stove, I am!☆|You trying to hide some good chow from me? C'mon, let me have a taste!☆
Let's go and sail off into the sunset! Strewth, this is what being a teeny's all about, eh~
The cute and charming Achilles is Super☆Retro☆Fitted! Even my heel won't give me any problems now! Well, not like it really ever did before, ahaha~☆
For the honor and prosperity of Iron Blood, and for even greater glory!
No matter how poor the odds are, I will always head for the battlefield. ...That way people will admire me.
Deutschland-class armored cruiser number three – Admiral Graf Spee.
A commission has been completed? That means they weren't ambushed. Thank goodness.
No matter how you treat me, Commander, I will obey you...
I sailed alone, fought alone, and sunk alone... Although I am who I am, didn't I still contribute to Iron Blood's cause?
These hands are for grasping victory... Even though I will never again be able to hug the people important to me, what's done is done.
Commander, rather than sink all alone, will I be able to face my final moments together with you this time?
No matter how much I fight, I can't fill the void in my heart... And being away from you is the reason why...
Commander, could you not ruffle up my hair like that...?
Commander, you've confirmed the port isn't being blockaded, right?
I have to hold out just a little longer...!
I will fight for you till the very end.
We've lost... But I'm not giving up! It's not over yet!
This letter... Thank goodness, it has nothing to do with Renown.

Wars don't exist for mindless slaughter, they exist for victory.|One's first battle being their last... That sort of thing isn't all that unusual for us Iron Blood ships.|Give talking to people... a try? I've always been alone, so what am I supposed to talk about...
Once we've been assigned a mission, we must complete it, no matter what it is.
I see that, unlike me in the past, you actually finished your mission.

Admiral Graf Spee, Deutschland-class armored cruiser number 3 of the Iron Blood Navy. I was attacked by Royal Navy cruisers and then took refuge in Montevideo, but in the end I scuttled myself... Commander, this time I'm going to fight! To the very end!
Although I cannot hug you, you can hug me... Hey, Commander, just for a little longer... hold me tight like this...
In the name of all that is dear to me!
It's sunny today? Yeah... just like it was back on the Río de la Plata.
Commander, may I hug you, even though my hands are like this?
No matter where I go, the war never ends... Deutschland-class armored ship number 3, Admiral Graf Spee, reporting for duty.
So this is... power...
How long will this victory actually last...
Don't go around disturbing the girls at the academy.
I'm trying hard to learn about everyday things. Living a normal life is not so simple, compared to fighting...

I sailed alone, fought alone, and then I was sunk while being alone. Now I found a new beginning... Hmm? Commander, you've been staring and laughing at me since the beginning… do you want to eat this?
Does getting a hug from me like this cheer you up a little, Commander?
Eugen taught me how to use makeup, but... does it actually make me look pretty...?
Can I... count on you...?
This mail... it's not another one of Ajax's pranks, is it?!

My pantyhose? Ajax gave me them as an enrollment gift... I examined them very thoroughly and didn't find anything weird, but I doubt they're just a normal pair of stockings...|Viersechs doesn't like picture books? I see... Everyone else in the Z-class seems to like them, though...|Hipper? Want some snacks? I get it. "Not really" means "yes" in your dictionary. Okay, say "aah."
Deutschland? Could you stop using your megaphone to shout "people who harass the girl with my phone will be expelled"... It's embarrassing, and more importantly, it's really distracting...
...You're making me angry.

I sailed alone, fought alone, and then I was sunk while being alone. Now I found a new beginning... Hmm? Commander, you've been staring and laughing at me since the beginning… do you want to eat this?
To protect everyone who has shown me so much kindness... I won't let you take a step closer!
I'm so glad that I can finally practice cooking! I want to give something back to all the kindhearted people here!
I never dreamt that I'd be able to don this outfit and live a normal, peaceful life... Thank you, Commander...
Welcome back! Cellphones are totally amazing, aren't they? No matter where we are, we can contact each other with the press of a button!
Welcome back, Commander! Um... I heard from Ajax that you have a very "special" hobby... but what kind of hobby is it?
I knew it... this totally reduces my fighting capabilities...
Prinz Eugen is surprisingly clumsy with this kind of stuff. She's still chicken-pecking with one finger.

Ajax... You're not pulling my leg this time, are you?|Hipper is a totally different person on the internet compared to how she is in real life. Maybe she just has trouble expressing herself around people she cares about...|Miss Illustrious, could you teach me how to make tea? Admiral Hipper invited me to a tea party between the Royal Navy and Iron Blood, but I've never brewed tea before...
Thanks to Juustagram, even people like me who aren't very sociable can still chat with everyone... Oh look, Graf Zeppelin just made a new post!
Commander, I want to give you a hug too~
I never dreamt that I'd be able to don this outfit and live a normal, peaceful life... Thank you, Commander...
Commander, can you take a picture to celebrate me getting MVP? I want to show it to my friends!
I will not let you disrupt the party for everyone else!
A ballroom dance...? Sorry, but I don't really know how to... I just need to follow your steps? O-okay, then I could... give it a try.
It's so fancy, so formal... Is this a "party"? I'm not sure I'll be able to fit in... But if you'll go with me, Commander, I'll give it a try!
Thanks to all the friends I have now, I don't feel lonely anymore. And my encounter with you might be the happiest moment of my life. Ahahah~
Not everyone in the Royal Navy is like Ajax. I can actually have a productive conversation with most of them...
So this is where you were. There are so many people in the hall, and I was worried about what I'd do if I'd lost you...
I know the party is still going on, but you still have to check your new mail.

Ajax... She's not planning something weird for the party, is she?|Everyone here is having so much fun... I could never even imagine my past self being at a place like this.|Commander, my friends are calling for me. Could you excuse me for a bit?
Commander, am I in time with your steps?
Commander, people are staring at us.
It's so fancy, so formal... Is this a "party"? I'm not sure I'll be able to fit in... But if you'll go with me, Commander, I'll give it a try!
We're not done with the lesson yet...
My sister's always pushing this "for the glory of Iron Blood" stuff onto me. Can't she do this idol stuff herself...?
My sister just wouldn't stop bugging me, so I finally caved and agreed to do this... Anyways, all I have to do is get up on stage and sing, right?

There was a time when I wanted nothing more than to break these claws off my hand. But now, I feel pretty good about all this "idol" stuff... Commander, I never thought it could ever live like this. Hehe.
"Commander, you did so well...! Commander, keep at it...!" That should be idolish enough, right?
Commander, do you mind if I practice here?
Have we been spending too much time on idol lessons...?
Commander, I got a new offer. Should I take it?

Um... Maybe it's because I'm so used to working with everyone, but I feel like it's actually pretty easy being onstage.|Commander, do you think you can stop my sister from getting everyone to hold up those "World's♡Cutest" signs when I go on? It's really embarrassing...|Idols are there to make people smile... I never thought I could do something like that.
These hands are no longer weapons of war, but for returning the admiration of my fans. Right, I can do this...!
Commander, have you forgotten what my hands can do?
My sister just wouldn't stop bugging me, so I finally caved and agreed to do this... Anyways, all I have to do is get up on stage and sing, right?
Commander, can we go home now?
Compared to Jutland, a battle like this is mere child’s play.
What are you looking at, idiot? Get out of my room!
Admiral Hipper-class Heavy Cruiser, Admiral Hipper
You idiot! You still haven’t remembered what you forgot about yet?
You piece of trash! I told you to stay out of my sight!
Huh? You can’t even do something like that? Are you an idiot?
Huh? Worried about me? Having an idiot like you worry about me doesn’t make me happy at all.
Huh? Who would ever have a crush on you? I’m only tagging along because Eugen wanted to have dinner with you. Don’t get the wrong idea, idiot!
Huh? Who would ever fall in love with you? I’m only here to drop off something I found during sortie, per regulations. Huh?! A ring? Who would wear something like that?!
Idiot! If you had already returned, why didn’t you come to see me? Hah? Who would be worried about you?
Idiot, so you rolled out of bed? Haah? What are you fantasizing about? I only happened to bump into you while patrolling the port.
C-c-c-curses! I can’t stand this, ahh!
Are you too stupid to realize that you have new mail?

Blücher, I will definitely protect you this time.|Hah? A novice like you wants to challenge my cruiser-commanding skills?|Hah? Are the Schweinshaxe and beer ready yet? How many servings do we need? Idiot! Is your brain just an ornament?
Don’t get distracted in the middle of a mission, you idiot!
Idiot! Hurry up and collect your rewards! Why are you showing it off to me?

I am Admiral Hipper, the Iron Blood heavy cruiser named after the undefeated Admiral Franz von Hipper. I have participated in countless battles and given them my all. The Barents Sea? That only happened because Admiral Kummetz was even dumber than you.
Huh? Why must I wear something like this? Whatever... I’m in a good mood for a change. You’re going to take care of me forever? Hmph! Isn’t that what you’re supposed to do?
Huh? Who gave you permission to resist?
Huh? Did I give you permission to touch me?
Huh?! You stupid, moronic, block-headed idiot! Go die! Sink yourself in the Kiel Bay right now!
Huh? You are the commander? Is the war effort going so poorly these days that they’re letting anyone become a commander?
Hah? Did you think something like this would impress me?
Hmph. Just today, I shall allow you to praise me a little.
Thanks for making me work up a sweat!
I can feel your gaze, you know... Would you stop ogling me like a painting? ...Huh?! "You can't take your eyes off me"? You say the stupidest damn things!
W-well? Does this kimono look good on me? ...R-really? Duh, I know it looks GREAT on me! Who really cares what you think... C-can't be me... No, I didn't say anything!
Let me guess, you still haven't realized what's escaped your memory? ...Wrong! It's the commission, not which stores I want to visit!

For the record, I never wanted to go here. This trip is for you – to reward all your hard work and give you a break... Huh? Me, enjoying my time with you? Wh-who decided it's got anything to do with you? I have the right to enjoy my visit irrespective of you!
Whew, we're back. Time to dig in to some food before heading back to the onsen. You're worn out, and I'm just as worn out as you are!
Which onsen do you want to go to today? I'd like to visit as many as possible so I can tell Eugen and the others all about the fancy places we've been to.
This isn't much of a story to tell the others... Ugh...!
There's a letter for you. Wow, that's a nice postcard... Never mind that, just read what it says already!

I've heard this type of kimono is famous. Makes sense, considering how much skill an artisan needs to create patterns and colors this complex.|It's wonderful feeling the breeze on your skin after getting out of the hot spring. It's so soothing, so cooling. You know what I mean, right?|Hmph! Eugen can poke fun at me all she wants – this is NOT a date! She's not gonna be so smug when I gloat about how great the hot springs were. "It was sooo good! I left feeling like a new person," and so on!
I don't care what spots you want to check out, focus on your damn missions! You're keeping ME waiting too, remember?!
Whoop-de-doo, you finished a mission. Good for you. Stop dawdling and go collect the rewards!
Huh?! Grabbing a girl's hand without warning is a great way to startle her! At least tell me first!
Yeah, I figured you'd like the pattern of– What the–?!
W-well? Does this kimono look good on me? ...R-really? Duh, I know it looks GREAT on me! Who really cares what you think... C-can't be me... No, I didn't say anything!
Isn't this much to be expected?
We won. Heh, I'm willing to give you the credit for the victory today.
I'm gonna show you what I'm made of!
...My guitar sounds a bit off today... Huh, try tuning it? Nah, that's not it, I just have to warm up a bit more...
Huh? Why are you staring at me like I'm some weirdo? I'll have you know, it's not like I wanted to do this or anything!
What are you spacing out for? The commission fleet is back, and you're coming with me!
Huh? There's no way I'd be able to work with an imbecile like you!
I'm just laying this out there - if we're going to do it, then we're going to do it properly! I don't want a half-baked job... Hey, pay attention!
Here, my schedule... Huh?! Look, anyone can do this kind of simple bookkeeping. It's not like I need you or anything!
Ahh, ahh... I'm doing pretty good today... H-huh?! Who gave you permission to watch me?! I just happened to have some free time, that's all! Go away and take care of your own work!
So, what's next on the agenda? You should already know, right? ...If you know, then hurry up and spit it out! Screw you! Stop teasing me already...!
Haah?! You big idiot, you took so long to come back that I was getting worr... Wait, what the heck am I saying?!
I'm not done yet!
Lessons are finally done for the day. Good grief, why'd I ever agree to do this...!
Gaaah! I'll remember this!!
Huh? Shouldn't you be in charge of vetting the fanmail?!

Hey idiot, tell me what's next on my schedule! How long do you intend to keep me waiting? |Deutschland, it's fine to be proud of your sister, but have some self-control! ...Jeez, you're so lucky to have such a reliable sister... Meanwhile, look what I'm stuck with... |Huh? Who asked you to be my publicist? I'll earn my own fans!
Mission or offer, it's all the same to me. Let's just get it out of the way!
Rewards, huh... It'd be better if Eugen wasn't constantly trying to get on my nerves...
I'm the mightiest heavy cruiser in the world, Admiral Hipper of the Iron Blood. It's not like I wanted to do this or anything, I just had no say in the matter.
H-huh?! Who would want a ring like this... Guh...! F-fine, you can p-put it on... Happy now? Let's wrap this up already. The stage we're aiming to be on is much loftier than this!
I'll have you pay close attention to my performance!
Haah? Who gave you permission to touch me?!
H-haah?! You did that on purpose, didn't you?!
Huh? Why are you staring at me like I'm some weirdo? I'll have you know, it's not like I wanted to do this or anything!
Eugen, just you wait! I'll show you what I'm capable of!
If that's the best you can do, I should've just stayed home!
Let's give it everything we have.
Ah, if it isn't you, Commander. I was just making a snack. Could you taste it for pois... I mean, taste to see if it's done?
Agano-class light cruiser number one – Agano.
Commander, the girls that went on a commission have returned. If you keep twiddling your thumbs, you'll miss your chance to welcome them back...
Even breathing the same air as you do is unpleasant, Commander~
I wonder what will happen today... *Giggle*, I'm looking forward to finding out.
Commander, why don't we have a chat? Yes, I'm curious as to what kind of person you are.
Me? I'm fond of interesting things. Such as... the act of toying with you, Commander... *Giggle*, you'll have to excuse me for that~
Someone who toys with the person they like... Are you familiar with anyone like that, Commander? *Giggle*, perhaps it's me~
Commander, fantastic work on the last sortie. May I offer you some hot tea?
Dear me, it seems things have gotten rather serious.
Commander, it's not yet time for work. Are you confident you didn't get the time wrong?
How careless of me... I will undergo special training when we've returned. *Giggle*.
Are you sure this isn't a love letter from that girl you know? *Giggle*♪

Commander, if you're tired, why not play a game of leapfrog and jump around in the office? It'll help improve your blood circulation~|Though supporting from behind the lines is easy, doing so for long periods makes me grow tired of it...|Commander, are you in need of some rest? Hm? *Giggle*, I just felt like asking. Stay focused and continue your work~
I went ahead and sorted out the new mission documents.
Commander, if you keep tasking your secretary with collecting the mission rewards, your brain will eventually turn to mush. Although, it might be interesting if that happened... *Giggle*♪
I am Agano, the lead ship of the Agano-class. My abilities as a light cruiser are first-rate, though my birth was just a tad bit late... Commander, it is a pleasure to be in your service.

You have feelings for me, Commander? You wish to be with me forever? ... Why am I asking the questions here? *Giggle*, because, even for someone like me, wouldn't it be humiliating to have someone else take the initiative at moments like these...?
They don't call me "state of the art" for nothing~
These documents are for me... Hm? That's unusual? I like to keep business and pleasure separate, you see.
Oh, Commander~ *Grin*
Are you the Commander? My name is Agano. The pleasure is all mine, *giggle*... Never mind that, it was nothing. I'm eager to assume my position within your fleet.
Please, have faith in the skill of this Agano-class light cruiser.
Did you witness my performance?
Is this a satisfactory pose for the occasion, Commander? Or would it suit you better if I stuck out my chest slightly more?
Even though I'm not really into this whole "Christmas" thing, if it means I get to toy around with your heart by wearing this cute outfit of mine, then I suppose I would be interested. Hehe~
I'd like to offer you a reward for working so diligently, even on a day as special as this.
Oh, aren't you back early? May I suggest starting with a review of today's schedule?

Commander, would you please stand over there for a moment? I need an accurate reference for the snow sculpture I'm making~|You've done well, Commander. Please get yourself some hard-earned sleep tonight. Ah, you thought I was teasing you with that request? *Giggle*~|Commander, what are you wishing for this Christmas? Ah, you don't need to consider your options at length. I picked out your present long ago, you see♪
*Giggle*, while I do enjoy a bit of teasing, being on good terms with you is more important. Commander, how about we set some time aside to watch the snowfall later?
Oh my, it appears my costume has caused an unintended development♪
Even though I'm not really into this whole "Christmas" thing, if it means I get to toy around with your heart by wearing this cute outfit of mine, then I suppose I would be interested. Hehe~
This super-cute girl was sitting on a bench all by herself while looking a little lonely~ But too bad this scaredy-Commander won't even pounce on the opportunity~
"Oh my, you're also out for a stroll? Hehe, my name's Agano. And what might yours be?" ...Jeez, Commander, take this more seriously. According to the setting, we just met for the first time.

Why'd I ask you to play a dating game? Well, if I teased you too much, wouldn't that only make you dislike me? But since I can't help it, I decided to make it up to you this way~ Do you think better of me now, Commander?
You must be tired, right? Here, if you'd like, you can come lie down over here.
"Hey, are you here by yourself? Hehe. Why don't we... have a little chat, then?"
More mail, huh... You're quite the popular one. Hmph~

You haven't had anything to eat? If you'd like, you can have some of my crepe~ |"Um... do you mind if I shift a bit closer to you? It's a bit chilly out here..." What am I after? Jeez, way to spoil the mood... |"Would you mind telling me more about yourself? I feel like... we have a lot in common~" ...Hehe, in other words, I want to learn a lot more about you!
All done with the mission? Did you also pick up a crepe for me? Thanks a lot~♪
"Want to take a stroll with me?" *sigh*... It took me five minutes just to get you to ask me out. Commander, you have to take the initiative next time, got it?
Manhandling a girl who you barely just met... Heeh~ Commander, I didn't know you were that kind of person~
"Oh my, you're also out for a stroll? Hehe, my name's Agano. And what might yours be?" ...Jeez, Commander, take this more seriously. According to the setting, we just met for the first time.
Commander, it's more fun to play around this way~

The blunt approach is not my style, but I cannot have Noshiro think I only inch my way to success... Oh, I was just talking to myself, Commander. Hehe, so anyway, would you mind being my partner for tonight's party?
nil|nil|nil
Oh my~ If you prostrate yourselves before me, I might show you mercy
voiceline.oath: Hehehe, my heel has your name on it~

voiceline.line: Commander, do you want to know more about my secrets...?
voiceline.oath: Shall I tease this little piggy today by loving it gently? Hehehe~

voiceline.line: Leander-class light cruiser – Ajax, Hull Number 22!
Commander, I'll count to 5. If you don't greet the girls out for commissions by the time I'm done... *giggles*
voiceline.oath: Aren't you going to welcome back the girls in the commission fleet? I'll go with you, hehe~

voiceline.line: So you broke... Oh well. Time to find a new toy, I guess
You have good eyes... Alright. Then you will become my new little piggy. You don't have the right to refuse.
*giggles* I'm liking you more and more. I wonder if you can amuse me further, my cute little piggy~?
Do not worry. You are the only one who made me want to abuse you this much. That's right, you are like the fated person for me, Ajax~ Aren't you happy about that~
I'm not a bad girl, you know? It's just I've never been serious before I met you. I've said this much, so now you're going to stick around, alright? You~ little~ piggy~?
*giggles* Little piggies that have exercised look so tasty, don't they.
voiceline.oath: Good work, my little piggy. The repairs and resupplying have already been arranged, so go ahead and rest for now.

voiceline.line: Hehe. I'll be having your care again for today, Com~man~der!
voiceline.oath: Hehe, take good care of me today as well, my cute little piggy~

voiceline.line: Tsk... I'll pay you back for this next time!
voiceline.oath: I mustn't let my little piggy... see me in such an unsightly state...!

voiceline.line: A mail. The contents? You'll tell me, right? Com~man~der
voiceline.oath: Your mail. Let's take a look... Hehe, of course I trust you, my little piggy~

voiceline.line: Do you want to have a meal first, or a bath? Or do you want... *giggles*...|I'll tell you a secret... Lend me your ear... Pfft! Did that tickle?|When I see you daydreaming, I have this insatiable urge to step on your face...
voiceline.oath: Just for you, my little piggy, I won't "put it back on" until you're done with work. Hehe, you know what I'm talking about, right...?|I never get tired of seeing that dumb face of yours. Hehe, you cute little piggy~♡|Perhaps that Leander is also... No, she's not like Neptune, she doesn't even understand the nature of "teasing"...

voiceline.line: I'll give you a special reward once you finish this mission!
Reward? Of course it refers to the mission reward, doesn't it? Now take it. Or are you expecting something special?
I am Ajax of the Leander class ships. Commander, have you been to Plata river before? I have some wonderful memories there. Hehehe...
This is... Looks like I have to prepare a new 'menu' of things. Please look forward to it, my lovely - little - piggy~
*giggles* Oh cute little piggies...
Alright. If you make me feel good, I might 'allow' you something~
When I think about perverts who touch 'that' spot, I want to step on them!
Commander, I am the 3rd ship of Leander class light cruisers, Ajax. I'm quite famous despite how I look... Commander,
*giggles* I will thank you af-ter this~
Commander, good work out there. You did well...
voiceline.oath: I simply must reward my little piggy here. Hehe, what shall I do for you?

voiceline.line: You are not to stray from my side at the party. Don't tell me you forgot the rules?
Ahaha, that slovenly expression on your face proves I made the right wardrobe choice♪ Now then, Commander, can I offer you some wine?
You've gotten so attached to me, have you, little piggy? Ahaha. Come now... Under such a lovely moon, and with such fine wine, I am your one and only Ajax, and you are my one and only piggy♪
You soiled my dress. How bold...
Commander, you're late. Don't you know the party already started?

Commander, have you forgotten you promised me a dance? Now watch your feet, unless you want to be punished♪|Life is like this glass of wine. One may indulge in it... or one can spill it away. Which do you choose, Commander?|Oh? Is that Exeter over there? Ahaha, I have a few words for her.
Reward...? Aha, well... How about a dance?
You want to see me drink? Ahaha! What an odd fetish... Here, have a goood look♪
Did I not say you were only allowed to touch my waist?
Ahaha, that slovenly expression on your face proves I made the right wardrobe choice♪ Now then, Commander, can I offer you some wine?
Of course I'm going to spill out such inferior wine.
Am I so petty as to say you can't accept chocolate from other girls? Rather, I'd say the more chocolate you get, the more popular you are, and the more adorable I find you... Hehehe♪
I have some special chocolate right here, just~ for~ you. Hehe, if you want it so badly... then come and get it~
I have to give a special "reward" when my piggy is very, very good♡

If you're so exhausted, I could always give you a massage? You need only lie down here like a good pig... Hehehe♪|The chocolate's going to melt if you don't take it soon. Or do you prefer it this way? What peculiar hobbies my piggy has~|Now, what do we do after we take chocolate from a girl? You don't need me to teach you again, do you, piggy?
You want me to feed you myself? How could I refuse? Hehehe♪
You can't wait for me to step on you...?
I have some special chocolate right here, just~ for~ you. Hehe, if you want it so badly... then come and get it~
Commander, how shall we 'play' today?
I'll allow you to lick my feet since I'm in such a good mood today. What? I can't believe you'd turn down such a great opportunity!
What? You want me to step on you that badly?|When I see you, Commander, I yearn to abuse you. Perhaps this is a form of love|nil
Are you unable to endure that much? Yes yes, lie down over there... Hmm? You want to be stepped on... is that what you're trying to say?
Commander, are you looking for punishment again? Tonight I'll make you feel like you are in heaven and hell at the same time!
I'm in a good mood today, so I'm giving you special permission to lick my feet. Come on, show sincere thanks to my reward!
Are you girls also trying to get close to Commander? Ahahaha!
Commander, are you keeping Akagi in your most secret of thoughts? Mmm, how delightful~.
Aircraft carrier, Akagi.
I was hoping that they wouldn’t have come back at all... Commander, I’ve already confirmed the completion of the commission. No more than a glance should be needed from you.
If Commander was cut up into little pieces, he would never be able to leave Akagi’s side or break her heart ever again... Ahahaha!
We were destined to meet. I knew at first sight that you were the one I’ve been looking for my whole life.
You belong to me, and me only, Commander! That's something you should never forget, even if you are in charge of an entire fleet... Or else...
Commander, why were you talking to that girl? Weren’t you coming to see Akagi? She was tempting you? Then... Akagi is going to make her disappear.
Commander... With this, nothing will get between us ever again... Your embrace, your smile, your scent... all belong to me.
Five Minutes of Fate? You mean every five minutes that we spend together?
Ahahaha! I’m getting excited!
Ah, welcome back... Commander, if you had taken any more of your sweet time, I would have turned this place into a sea of fire~
This wound is nothing compared to the thought of you abandoning me, Commander!
Commander, who sent you this letter? A girl? Who is she?

Commander, you’re so cute when you are hard at work. Just watching you makes me feel like I’ll overheat~|Don’t make fun of me for being slow-footed. See? I’ve~ caught~ you~|You smell like... that girl! Commander, Akagi needs to step out for a bit~
A new mission... is another opportunity to deepen our bonds. *giggles*
Rewards? Being together with you, Commander, is all the reward I need.

I am the glorious Akagi, the pride of the peerless First Carrier Division. With my famed air wing, I shall overcome any battle as long as you are with me. Yes, Commander, as long as we are together...
I have waited an eternity for this day to come. No one shall be able to separate us ever again! My mind, body, and soul belong to you, as yours all belong to me. Haha... ahahahaha!
My love is invincible! Ahaha... ahahaha!
Akagi loves you so, Commander~
If you so desire, I would not mind if you partake of me in front of all the others.
We finally meet, Commander. However, there appear be too many eyesores here. Please allow me to "clean up" a bit before we deepen our relationship. Hehehe~
Commander, your love is filling up Akagi's chest...
I will do anything for Commander’s sake, even if I must slay a god.
Akagi picked this swimsuit out just for you, Commander~! Are you falling in love with me even more deeply?
"When you gaze long into the abyss, the abyss also gazes into you". Commander, please do not forget that when you gaze at Akagi~ *giggles*
Has the commission fleet returned? If you're going, won't you take Akagi with you?
Ahh... Welcome back, my dear Commander. I wonder where you've been. Take your clothes off so I may know if the smell of vixens lingers on you~

Commander, it's dangerous to be separated at sea. Please hold my hand tightly~|Relax, Kaga. You're my only friend. You'll always have a place by my side.|Wait until tonight, Commander. Kaga and I shall use our planes to hold a most spectacular fireworks show for you!
Commander, what were you doing with that "Rodney" girl?
Commander, won't you come teach me how to swim? Oh? What did you just say~?
"When you gaze long into the abyss, the abyss also gazes into you." Commander, please do not forget that when you gaze at Akagi~ *giggles*
Commander will always remain by Akagi's side... Right, "Gods?" Of course... Akagi will deal with the pests.... Ahaha...
Welcome back, Commander. Would you like to have dinner, a bath or... ahh, forget about that and eat me up first~

Commander, we'll always be together, this year as well~ |Commander, I've finished this batch of paperwork. Is there anything else you'd like me to attend to? Of course, if you're tired, please tell me~

Commander, you just spoke with that girl, didn't you? Just an "ordinary greeting?" Akagi understands... but if you get even an inch more "ordinary" with her, Akagi can't guarantee what will happen... Ahaha...
Ahaha... Akagi is always ready and willing~
Commander will always remain by Akagi's side... Right, "Gods?" Of course... Akagi will deal with the pests.... Ahaha...
1st CarDiv, Akagi, sallying forth~
Commander, I knew you'd be busy at the party, so I waited until the very end for you. Now, your full and undivided attention shall belong to Akagi alone~ Hehe~♡
Commander, I've been waiting for you~ What a sinful one you are, to tempt Akagi like this for so long... But at long last, nobody will ever get between us again...♡
Who will you send to greet the commission fleet?
Ah?! Commander...?!
A toast to your victorious return, Commander... Hehehe~
Have you awoken, Commander? Akagi will always be at your side~
At least... protect my friends and compatriots...!
A letter, huh? ...Hey, Commander? Just what kind of uncouth person would go out of their way to get between us at a time like this...?

I will not do anything that would tarnish your reputation, but... if any meddlesome pests insisted on getting in your way... Ehehe...|Indeed. While you were socializing, I made sure to strengthen our bonds with the other factions. At events like these, Shinano is horribly out of place, and if I may say so, the burden may be a bit too great for Nagato.|Commander, why won't you get drunk with me already... Haah, even though Akagi has been so lonely for so long...
Commander, there's a vacant seat right next to me~ Wouldn't you like to come a bit closer~?
It's just the two of us here... Yes, Commander, feel free to do whatever your heart so desires~
Commander, I've been waiting for you~ What a sinful one you are, to tempt Akagi like this for so long... But at long last, nobody will ever get between us again...♡
My love shall burn everything away~ Ahahahaha!!
I shall burn everything away!
Tonight, you are not allowed to meet with anyone other than me. Exchanging pleasantries...? Oh, are you not satisfied with "exchanging pleasantries" with Akagi alone? Hehehe~
This banquet is my present to you... and your attendance is the greatest reward I could hope for~ Indeed, I shall not grant you leave tonight until you pass out. Ehehe... Ahahaha~♡
The commission team has returned...? Excellent. You may go now.
A toast to your splendid victory, Commander... Hehe~
Commander, are you enjoying Akagi's banquet? If it is entertainment you desire... Ehehe. You can ask me for anything, you know?

What's the matter, Commander? Hehe, worry not. Kaga will eliminate any pests that seek to squirm into our banquet tonight~|Oh, would you look who showed up... Do remember to be on your best behavior tonight, 5th~ Car~ Div~♪|Hiryuu, you're going to get tired from sitting in a kneeling position all night... As the Commander is perfectly relaxed here, you should also do likewise and enjoy yourself~
This reward... shall serve as an exquisite dessert to the banquet~
Let us partake of each other's drink, Commander~
Ah, Commander... Ahahaha~♡
This banquet is my present to you... and your attendance is the greatest reward I could hope for~ Indeed, I shall not grant you leave tonight until you pass out. Ehehe... Ahahaha~♡
Nothing brings me more joy than being a cornerstone of the Commander's glory! Ahahahaha!
Commander, we must be together at all times.You definitely cannot leave my side~
We should send out even more invites... This is the best way to rid ourselves of those pesky vixens all at once!
Looks like those troublesome nymphs have returned. Commander, Akagi will be right back~
Ahh, Commander, you’re finally awake? Hm? Akagi didn’t do anything~ except lock you in so that we can stay together forever.
Commander, won’t you try some of Akagi’s hand-crafted tea? I added a little ingredient to make our love even sweeter~!
Commander, why do you smell like another woman? Oh, so it was her? Hehe... Akagi understands!
Oh my, mail has arrived. Mm... it would seem that our superiors don’t suspect a thing.

It would be great if Commander and Akagi were the only people left in the world~|Commander, stop struggling. Akagi made this special chain, just for you~|It’s human nature to want to possess something so special to you, Commander~ Ahaha~
As long as we can be together, those commissions and tasks don’t really matter, right? You agree with me, don’t you?
Akagi knows that Commander wants to stay with her forever and ever, but the top brass will get suspicious if nothing ever gets done~
Are you hungry, Commander? Akagi is going to cook now. Don’t even try to run away~!
Commander, you can’t resist any longer, right? Akagi feels the same way~
We should send out even more invites... This is the best way to rid ourselves of those pesky vixens all at once!
Give my concert your full attention~ Ahahaha!
I would do anything for you, my Commander. Yes, including this "idol" business... Hehehe.
With the magicks of the Sakura Empire, changing my form like this is a trifle... Hehehe, Commander? Does this Akagi please you?
The meddlesome pests are back... Commander, please excuse me for a moment?
My Commander's apologetic screams are truly music to my ears... hehehe.
Commander, did I hear you want to come see my show? I'm delighted~ Kaga, can you prepare a front row seat?
Commander, if you wish it, I would perform forever for your eyes alone~ Indeed, this stage would belong only to my Commander for the rest of time♡
We're at the point now that this group doesn't need any other girls... And I think I need to do a bit of "cleaning" for my Commander... Hehehehe...
You want to get to know the other members? Hmm, if that is what my Commander wishes, I suppose I could accept it... But in return, Commander, you are only allowed to look at me♡
Commander, what would you say to a performance in your honor? Naturally, only Akagi would participate...
My love is far stronger than this!
Commander, I wonder what's on the schedule for today? Hehehe.
Gah... that was close. I can't let the Commander see me like this...
A letter... Oh, Commander? It couldn't possibly be that you sent a fan letter to another girl...?

I would like to know~ which girl you cheer for, Commander... I would really, REALLY like to know...|This "idol" business is a little different, but it's no matter. Whatever my Commander wishes of me, I can do...|Kaga, please cancel all of our lessons for the rest of the day. My time with my Commander is so precious, I refuse to waste a single second.
Commander, is there a mission I might help you with?
Mission complete. But I do hope that doesn't mean you will leave my side...?

Sakura Empire Aircraft Carrier, Akagi, reporting in with a special equipment refit! Commander, things are a little different this time. I'm trying a little "idol" style for you. Won't you please be gentle with me? Hehehehe...

Ahahahaha... all that I am now belongs to my Commander, and everything of my Commander now belongs to me... It will be just like my concerts: your eyes, your ears, even your heart is bound to me... Commander, I will never let you go...
Ahaha, like dust in the wind.
Commander, what are you waiting for? I'm ready for you, anytime, anyplace.
Don't mind the stares of the spectators in the stands. Take me however you please, my Commander... Hehehe♡
With the magicks of the Sakura Empire, changing my form like this is a trifle... Hehehe, Commander? Does this Akagi please you?
Why, this is the strength of my love. Hehehe...
Oh my, did I incinerate all those fans clamoring for an encore?
I'm the only one allowed to bully this slave!
It's truly marvelous to be so loved and treasured by this slave. *giggle*
Aircraft carrier Akagi.
Slave, the commission's complete... You want to go with me? Oh all right. I can't say no to that face.
It seems I've been too lenient with you...
Haha, aren't we proud! From the moment I saw you, I knew you would be my slave!
You're rather popular for a mere slave, aren't you? Hrrmm... what's this anxious feeling I have...?
Hrmmm... he's my slave, but those women won't stop throwing themselves at him... even though he's my slave... and clearly mine alone.....
Slave, you know you can always come to me if there's anything wrong. I'll gladly help you ....so don't go to anyone else. Don't talk to anyone else. Just be my slave, okay?
Ah what a fantastic job you've done today, slave. Bravo! Bravo!
Heheheh... how stimulating....!
If you sneak off without telling me one more time, I might just have to turn this place into a sea of fire.
Hmph... You better not misunderstand, slave! I let them win!
New mail... what's this? It's not for me!?

With Amagi at my side, there is nothing we cannot do~ You are blessed indeed, my number one slave.|Your profile is quite striking when you're working so diligently. Truly worthy of being my slave!|Slave, while I don't mind you playing with your underlings, you must never forget to whom you answer.
In the name of the eight million gods, hurry up and polish off a few more missions!
Mmmhmm, so many rewards, just as I would expect from my slave~
I'm a battlecruiser... eh? Now that I mention it, am I no longer a warship? Hm, never mind. I am Akagi, and that's all that matters. Hehe. You must feel so honored to be my slave, hmm?
This means you totally belong to me, and I shall give everything to you, right? Aha... hahahahaha! ...Slave.... I never would have imagined that owning you would make me so happy... Ahahahahahaaaa!
How dare you harm my slave!
Aren't you a clingy slave. Very well, I'll play with you~
*giggle* Seems I'll have to shackle you...

So you're the best this fleet has to offer? Well then, to please Amagi I'm going to have to start by dominating you. Hehehe.... How blessed you are. From this day forward, you're Akagi's number one slave.
What a well-behaved slave you are~
Hmph. You insects have no right to bully my slave!
I wonder what kind of enemy we'll get to fight today~?
voiceline.oath: Hanging out with you all is kinda fun.

voiceline.line: Kaijus are freakin' awesome. I love their moves and personalities... and I love sculpting them. Are you a fellow kaiju enjoyer, Commander?
voiceline.oath: Check it out! I made a new figure! I put extra effort into the details on this one. Feel like praising me, Commander?

voiceline.line: Hey there, the name's Akane Shinjo. This rigging looks super cool, like it's right out of a mecha. Now if only there were some kaiju around, that'd be the best...
The girls are back in port, huh? Go say hi to them, would you?
Ahaha... Wow, you really are worthless.
Oops! Sorry, I didn't mean to– Oh, hi Commander. Hey, don't sweat it, we only bumped into each other. Still, I'm glad you're all polite and stuff.
There you are, Commander. Want to tag along with me to the store? I need to restock my sculpting materials and all that~
An apple a day keeps the Sirens at bay, Commander. C'mon, you need some breakfast in your system. Let's get you to the cafeteria.
Y'know, I'm glad I got the chance to experience this universe and make a bunch of new friends. Especially you, my more-than-just-friends friend... Or are we~? Hehehe~
voiceline.oath: You hold a pretty special place in my heart, Commander... Huh? Is that a blush I see~?

voiceline.line: Hmm... Did you need something, Commander?
Look who's back. Maybe I oughta reward you for your efforts out there... Yeah, nah.
It'll take more than that to get rid of me~
Oh, hey. About time you showed up, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Oh, if it isn't the Commander~ Good timing too. I was starting to get bored.

voiceline.line: The hell? How are these guys so strong? Doesn't make any damn sense...
Your mail's still sitting there. If you're not going to read 'em, then I will~

I'm totally loving how sweet these shipgirl riggings look. I wonder how they'd look in action.|The store sells like, a hundred different kinds of tomato juice. They all look so good, so I went and bought them all~|Come to think of it, this rigging reminds me of an old friend. What kind of person were they? Mm... I dunno if "person" is the right word~
voiceline.extra: Zzz... Heheh... Caught you reachin', Commander. If you admit it, I might let you keep going~ Or maybe not, hehe.|Commander, are you working hard, or hardly working? ...The former? Really? All you've been doing is staring off into space though.|Good on you for keeping your office nice and tidy... How's my room in comparison? Sorry, that's top-secret.

voiceline.line: You know we're not done yet, right, Commander? Get back in the game.
voiceline.oath: Look at that. Unfinished missions. I'll be here for moral support if you need it.

voiceline.line: Hey, not too shabby, Commander~
voiceline.oath: Whoa, you finished a mission. Real nice work.

voiceline.line: The name's Akane Shinjo. Apparently I'm a battleship in this universe? I'm not much of a fighter, so don't be surprised if I get done in... Juuust kidding~
It's so nice having people I can count on. People who readily wanted to get to know me. It's changed my perspective on life, honestly. Thank you, Commander.
Take aim and... fireeeee!
The store's got books for sale, right? Let's go check it out.
Jeez, you shouldn't do that~
voiceline.oath: Ah, you're what they call a hands-on person, eh?

voiceline.line: Hey there, the name's Akane Shinjo. This rigging looks super cool, like it's right out of a mecha. Now if only there were some kaiju around, that'd be the best...
Ooh, feelin' pretty good. Thanks, Commander.
Ahahah! Piece of cake!
voiceline.oath: Aw yeah! We got 'em!

voiceline.line: I hardly let anyone inside my room. You're a big exception, y'know~ ...Huh, what's behind my cushion? Is THAT what you want to know~?
Welcome back, Commander. You sure brought a lot of goodies back for me, huh? Now then, don't just keep standing there, hurry and come to me~
Welcome back, Commander. I've got some snacks for you, a little reward for working so hard!
Huuh? ...Oh, come on in, Commander...

What's in the bag? Stuff I bought at the store just earlier. Paper, kaiju figs, et cetera et cetera.|This cushion is super comfy. Go on, give it a feel, Commander.|What'cha doing, sitting across the room like that? C'mon, there's space right here. I don't bite.
Oh man, I'm starving. We should get some home delivery.
Ahaha... Only 'cause we're alone, all right?
Welcome back, Commander. You sure brought a lot of goodies back for me, huh? Now then, don't just keep standing there, hurry and come to me~
Charge forward without hesitation! I’ll fix you if you break.
Commander, want a check up?

Repair ship Akashi
Can be built after unlocking
The girls from the commission fleet have returned~ Akashi will check to see if they're injured, nya~!
Nya?! (Akashi, completely frightened, escapes and observes you from behind a wall)
Commander... do you need Akashi to repair you, nya?
Commander... Akashi is sleepy... (Akashi ignores your reaction, curls up on your lap, and falls asleep)
Hey Commander, hurry up and take off your clothes and let Akashi inspect your body in case you need repairs in the future, nya~!
You treat Akashi so well... Is Akashi your goddess, nya~?
...n...nya? Nnnh.... zzzZZ...
If you are broken anywhere, Akashi can fix you up.
Akashi is serious now, nya~!
Commander~ good meowning~ *yawns*
Nyooo~! Just wait until next time!
*stares*... New mail has arrived~
...n...nya? Nnnh... zzzZZ...|Commander, what’s the matter? Can it be that you broke?|Commander, care for a beverage? Freshly squeezed from another ship nya~!
Commander, Commander~! You've got a new mission!
Rewards are here~! Anything tasty... nya...?
Nya! I am the one and only repair ship, Akashi. I supported the front lines until the destruction of the Truk naval base. If you get all scratched up, just leave it to me nya!
What's this, Commander?  Does it need fixing? I don't really get it but, I'll keep it safe, nya~!
Nya~?! Akashi is here to rescue you, nya~!
Akashi isn't malfunctioning, right?
Nn? What's this feeling? It's as if I've been damaged.
I am the only repair ship in the entire Sakura Empire, Akashi nya~! There is no injury that I cannot fix. Having that said, you should not take your life too lightly.
Nya?! What a nice and warm feeling...
There’s always some nice stuff among the litter.
Commander, you've come to buy something, nya?!

Commander, how does Akashi's new outfit look, nya? Isn't it cute? If you like it, then put a ring on it. I mean, everyone's gone out to play... if you don't help empty my inventory, I'll go broke, nya!
Commander, are there problems with anybody's equipment? Do you need replacements, nya?
I have to work hard today as well to sell as much equipment as I can, nya!
Uugh... the equipment isn't selling... Commander, buy it all, nya... just buy a little bit, nya... |nil|Happy New Year! Want to buy something from Akashi's store?
*yawns* ... Commander, stop moving around so much... I'm still sleepy, nya...
Nya?! Akashi is not for sale, nya!

Commander, how does Akashi's new outfit look, nya? Isn't it cute? If you like it, then put a ring on it. I mean, everyone's gone out to play... if you don't help empty my inventory, I'll go broke, nya!
Nya...aah?! This outfit... puts me way over budget! I'm going to have to think of some new promotions, nya... Commander?! H-how can I help you, nya?
Heheh, this is what I've been saving up for, nya~♪ A special dress that combines Gothic fashion with Sakura charm! Commander, how about those gems, nya?
Commander, Akashi wants a lap pillow, nya! ...The other way around? No way, nya! Akashi wants to curl up in your lap, nya!
While everyone was hard at work outside, Akashi helped to set up the party, nya~
Commander, how can I help you, nya~

There sure are a lot of people at this party, nya. Maybe I should open up a booth here, nya. |Since this celebration is such a special occasion, maybe I could afford to cut you a little discount, nya~ |Commander, would you like some gems? Or maybe some wisdom cubes, nya? Or... maybe a generous bit of both, nya?
Akashi earned all these gems here through hard work! Commander, I'm just letting you see them to motivate you, nya~♪
This place is locked behind a paywall, nya! Um... fifty gems per time, nya!
Heheh, this is what I've been saving up for, nya~♪ A special dress that combines Gothic fashion with Sakura charm! Commander, how about those gems, nya?
D-Don't run in the sea corridors!
I'm drawing... ack, the stylus nib is getting worn out, nya. I'll have to get Shiranui to order some new ones, nya.
Ohh, it's Commander, nya. Have you come to buy Akashi's new work, nya? Today's a holiday, so go ahead and enjoy yourself, nya~
I'm worn out from running the booth all day, nya... The book signing will have to wait until next time, nya...
Mail has arrived, nya! My booth application results... I guess it's not here yet, nya...

Today, I'm not a shopkeeper - I'm an author! I won't accept your gems today, nya! |St. Louis is a poster girl, nya?! Arghh... Next time, I'll need to get her to sit at my booth, nya... Wait, no, the genre might be a bit too different, nya... |Nya? If I sold my art digitally, I wouldn't have to sit here all day at the booth...? H-how convenient, nya...
Nya?! This... this kind of stuff is only allowed in the thin books, nya!
Ohh, it's Commander, nya. Have you come to buy Akashi's new work, nya? Today's a holiday, so go ahead and enjoy yourself, nya~
Hehehe, we broke our sales record today, nya! See, I can do anything if I set my mind to it, nya! You deserve thanks too, Commander♪
Hehehe, come on in, nya! Can I help you find something, nya? Your genial and knowledgeable staff, Akashi, will gladly provide her detailed recommendations, nya!
Welcome back, nya. Are you interested in this Manjuu, nya? I can add some to the Munition shop's stock, nya.
Welcome, nya! Has Akashi convinced you to visit the store, nya?

I have an onboard factory that can produce as much energy as Yamato herself, nya. It's only natural I'd be an expert with consumer electronics, nya.|Let me guess: you're looking to buy some nyasty games, Commander? I'll wrap and bag it for you so nobody gives you weird looks, nya~|Nya? Are you looking for a particular item, nya? Then take a ticket and go right for the register, nya.
Check to see if you any point-exchange missions, nya.
Hmm? Do you wanna use our well-known photography hall, nya?
Nya?! I-I'm going to report this, nya!
Hehehe, come on in, nya! Can I help you find something, nya? Your genial and knowledgeable staff, Akashi, will gladly provide her detailed recommendations, nya!
We'll buy your parts for a good price, nya!

Not more than one pair of these super-premium clothes exist in this world, and they belong to the Commander, nya! ...If you're looking for some other, even more premium clothing, check out my store, nya♪

Commander, because of your continued patronage of my shop, I have no choice but to return the favor with my body, nya~! ...Just kidding, nya. Having that said, I really do love you, Commander. Even more than I love gems, nya~
As long as I'm here, you can go full steam ahead toward the future without having to worry about supplies, nya! I will support you as your partner, nya!
Commander, you look like you're in need of some comforting, nya. I guess I'll need to do it, nya~ Come here, and I'll give you a nice headpat, nya~
Commander, let's work hard today to make a pile of gems, nya~

I know you love me, but sometimes you see me only as a shopkeeper, nya! You can't keep treating me like this, nya!|Commander, if anything in my shop catches your eye, feel free to claim it, nya~ I'll deduct the cost from my wallet, nya! Because what's yours is mine, so your wallet is mine too, nya♪ Don't worry, I'll give you some discounts from time to time! ...Probably, nya!|Commander, help me out at my store, nya! In exchange, I'll do my best as a secretary, nya! I'd say that's a good deal, nya!
Commander, I think this mission has a huge payout, nya!
Nyahaha~ Just as I expected from you, Commander. I'll put the mission rewards to good use, nya~
Mrrr... Commander, I'm getting sleepy, nya... Give me a lap pillow, nya...
Nyahaha? Did you remember just how charming I am, nya?

Commander, because of your continued patronage of my shop, I have no choice but to return the favor with my body, nya~! ...Just kidding, nya. Having that said, I really do love you, Commander. Even more than I love gems, nya~
Destroyer Division Six, embark!
T-the reason I sleep with the lights on is because... i-it is not because I am afraid!
Type III Akatsuki-class destroyer number one - Akatsuki.
We may use my searchlight to find our way home! Huh? ... You have no need of it? R-really...?
Commander, you must cheer up!
I am a little worried... about Ikazuchi and Inazuma...
Commander, do you perhaps wish to see my true right eye?
I cannot sleep well without my sisters by my side... T-that is not to say I am lonely! I-it is because I am concerned about them!
We Division Six destroyers have always been together! And... um, surely you will be together with me forever as well, Commander?
Commander~ Did you bring back any shiny items? ... Hm?! N-not at all, I am not asking simply because I want such things!
My name is Akatsuki, I am the ninja who will banish all the darkness in the world! ... Whoa! Commander, w-when did you get here?!
Damn... I-I shall get you next time...
New mail for you! Uh... I will read it out loud for you!

Sometimes I do not understand what Ikazuchi and Inazuma are trying to say...|Can Hibiki find her way here on her own? It has me somewhat worried...|W-w-what! Anyone would be shocked from suddenly seeing a person's shadow cast in the light in the middle of the night!
voiceline.oath: nil|Hibiki, I won't let myself get lost over something like that ever again!|nil

voiceline.line: The ocean at night is a little scary... N-nay, I am not scared! B-but may I propose we do missions during daytime? You must agree, right?!
Rewards~ rewards~!

I am Akatsuki, a special-type destroyer! Destroyer Division Six consisted of me and my sisters! I was the first to be built and the first to be sunk! The Battle of Guadalcanal? I-I was trying to cast my light on the enemy! I was by no means scared of them! ... Ahem, you shall witness how strong I truly am... that you will!
A promise that binds us for eternity... I understand! Then I shall show you my true right eye, right this mo... T-there is no need for it? All I need to do is close my eyes instead? Re... really...?
O darkness, be gone!
Hibiki... I really miss her...
voiceline.oath: Hibiki? Oh, it's just you, Commander...

voiceline.line: S-should you touch me there again... then I will not be able to restrain myself!

I am Akatsuki, the oldest ship of Destroyer Division Six! Well met, Commander. I sincerely hope you will let me rebuild Division Six! ... Huh?! You do not permit the formation of destroyer divisions?!
As the oldest of my siblings, I must work even harder!
This is the true power of a ninja!
I made friends of these bears on my journey! I suggest you try befriend them too, Commander... Er, forsooth!

Is this the place called the Northern Parliament?! It is colder than I thought... Th-thank goodness I brought gear for extreme environments! Hibiki, please wait a bit longer! Your sister is coming to see you!
To one day find Hibiki – that is the reason I set out upon this journey!
Being fully prepared is the key to going in the right direction! Say that again? The East lies *that* way?

I've still not found Hibiki... I really do wonder when we'll meet again.|It is thanks to my compass that I have arrived at the Northern Parliament! Huh? How long has the needle been frozen in place?!|I'm curious as to how Ikazuchi and Inazuma are faring...
Would you care to harken to one of my tales of valor?
Oooh, I feel myself warming up! I don't know why, though... Something about it feels strange.

Is this the place called the Northern Parliament?! It is colder than I thought... Th-thank goodness I brought gear for extreme environments! Hibiki, please wait a bit longer! Your sister is coming to see you!
My companion and I have shared so many miles together... Hm, maybe next time I should call my cohorts to take her for a spin together!
What do you think, Commander? I have a brand new outfit and a brand new companion! I am no longer a plain old ninja... I am now a motoninja!
My bond with my companion has grown even deeper!
Motoninja Akatsuki, reporting in! Commander, your orders please!

My companion's lights are strong indeed, but I still find these night roads rather difficult...|Back before I had broken her in, my companion here gave me a lot of trouble. But these days? We move as one and the same!|Inazuma and Ikazuchi are going to be impressed with my companion!
I'm afraid you can't ride her, Commander...
Wooooaaaahh!! I'm losing control!
What do you think, Commander? I have a brand new outfit and a brand new companion! I am no longer a plain old ninja... I am now a motoninja!
No ambushes! Let us fight face to face!
This obstacle will be child's play if I'm able to leverage my ninja skills... I-I'm going the right way this time, I'm sure of it!
Look out! Move, Commander! ...Phew. To explain, I am helping Santa give out Christmas presents! Now excuse me, I cannot tarry here or I'll be late... Wait, have I come to the wrong place? WHAT?!
The commission team has returned! Speaking of... Where did my presents for them go?
I could've sworn we met here just a minute ago... Wait, a-am I going in circles?!
These presents must all be delivered before the end of today... Commander, we should depart at once!
I m-must maintain my posture...!

I'm well acquainted with how to use a grappling hook! ...What? Oh no! The presents!|Hmgh! Oh goodness... That's a long way down. C-Commander, how did we end up ascending so high?!|Hibiki will deliver the remaining presents? Phew, that's good to know...
The sp-spirits of Christmas roam the port at night? C-C-C-Commander! It takes more than that to perturb me, I'll have you know!
Umm, C-Commander... You will stop my fall, won't you?!
C-careful, lest the rope come loose!
Look out! Move, Commander! ...Phew. To explain, I am helping Santa give out Christmas presents! Now excuse me, I cannot tarry here or I'll be late... Wait, have I come to the wrong place? WHAT?!
I shall dance around our foes!
Inazuma's elephant is quite the clever fellow. Heehee, let us see if it can catch this ball!
Welcome, Commander, to DesDiv 6's tent of entertainment! For our first act, I shall perform for you my most stunning ninjutsu! ..."Circus"? I've never heard of this word before!
The commission team has– Oh no, oh no! ...That was close... Thank you for breaking my fall, Commander...
You've returned, Commander! Let us continue the performance! Hi-yaaah! Behold! Jutsu of Concealment!
I see... So it's called a performance, not an exhibition... Be that as it may, the show must go on!

Ikazuchi, are you all right?! ...Phew... Don't make your sister worry like that!|Behold! Jutsu of Flame Escape! ...*cough cough*! This darned pyrotechnic device is needlessly complicated!|Don't just stand there, Hibiki – come and assist! ...Your anchor really contains a hidden camera?! ...You just made that up? Aghh! Hibikiiii!
A mission, you say? It shall serve as a fine side act!
Watch and be amazed, Commander!
H-hands off!
Welcome, Commander, to DesDiv 6's tent of entertainment! For our first act, I shall perform for you my most stunning ninjutsu! ..."Circus"? I've never heard of this word before!
My ninjutsu is no mere acrobatic act, it's authentic! ...At least I'm fairly sure it is!
I won't let y'all leave until I've had my fun!
Commander, I'm hungry. Think you could get me a roast turkey?
South Dakota-class battleship – Alabama, Hull Number BB-60.
I can see the commission fleet comin' back over the horizon. Mhm, I'm real proud of my eyesight!
......Who the hell are you?
Commander, can you call Tirpitz out here? I've always wanted to see which one of us is stronger, but she always ignores me.
I've been gettin' along pretty well with the Sakura Empire girls. I thought they'd hold a grudge against me, but turns out that wasn't the case at all. Mhm, they're an interestin' bunch!
Commander, let me give you a hug... This feels really nice and puts my mind at ease. Mhm, I like it.
Commander, can you come to my room tonight? Um, I've always hugged a stuffed animal to help me sleep, but I was thinkin'... maybe you'd be even better...
Commander, come sit in my lap. Huh? Isn't everyone doing this nowadays?
Well well, aren't you the frisky bunch... Ahaha!
Oh, it's you, Commander. I almost mistook you for a shady person and sent you flyin'.
Time to retreat? Fine...
What's up, Commander? Oh, the mail? Ah, um, I forgot to bring it over. Give me a sec.

Commander. Com-man-der. Commanderrrr~ Oh, I didn't need anythin'. Just felt like callin' for you. |I'd like to have a Turkey Shoot. Makes me wish I could fly... |Sure is nice outside. Commander, wanna go lie in the grass under the sun? I could stay like that all day...
Commander, what's this big ol' stack of papers? Oh, I see... so those are the missions...
Commander, I'll go fetch the mission rewards. I'm big and strong, after all!

I'm Alabama, fourth ship of the South Dakota-class, also known as Lucky A... What else? Uhh... I received some honors while fighting in Norway, the Marshall Islands, and the Marianas. Then, there was Leyte and the trip to the Sakura Empire... Since then, I've just been taking it easy in the Mobile Bay.
Is this a promise to become my personal hugging' pillow? Will you let me cling to you as I fall asleep every night? Mm... that makes me happy. Commander, can I start huggin' you now?
Don't die on me just yet!
You're interested in my abs? Go ahead and feel 'em.
Huh......? Commander, the hell are you doing?
I'm Alabama. You need somethin'? ... Prepare for duty? Oh, sure. Got nothin' better to do, so might as well. Let's go!
I feel like I could beat someone up right now... Mmh!
Kickin' the enemy's ass is all in a day's work for me. What are you praisin' me for?
Who's it gonna be next~? Teehee♪
Hohoh, I must've caught your attention~ Let me guess... you like 'em young, don't you, Commander?
Gato-class submarine – Albacore, Hull Number SS-218.
Commission complete! C'mon, let's go! We can't just sit here and keep 'em waiting forever!
Jeeeeeeerk!
You wonder what'd happen if you tick me off? I'd host something like a public exhibit of your greatest blunders!
My shoulders are so stiff after a long day of swimming... Oh, I have an idea! If a certain someone gives me a massage, I might just forget that really embarrassing thing they did!
It's mean to mess with you all the time, so today, you'll get a nice, relaxing massage! ... *Phew*... Hey, you feeling something inside your ears? It's your fault for blindly trusting me like that!
H-hey, listen... If some day I don't come back from the battlefield, would you... Ahahaha! Like that's ever happening! C'mere! I'm gonna tickle you senseless!
Weeelcome back! ... Why's the paperwork been stacked into a pyramid? Gee, a strong wind must've done it~!
Huh? Have they spotted me or something?
The Commander's back? Sweet, today's gonna be jam-packed with mischie... Err, I mean, time for work!
Time to get outta heeeere!
You've got mail! Say "pretty please" and I'll give it to you~
