So, who are you into, Commander? Come on, tell me~ It'll be a secret between us... At least for a while!|I'm SOOOOOO tireeeeed~! Lemme sit on your lap, Commander! ... Sweet! Thanks, friendo!|This? This is how I've always looked. Do ya like it? Let me guess... you're having naughty thoughts, aren'tcha~?
Give me a massage and I'll keep quiet about that time you slacked off~
Sweet mission rewards! So, when am I getting my share?
My achievements? Let's see... Oh, right! I sank Taihou! She shouldn't have sunk so easily, though... Actually, why DID she sink?

Just claiming my ring. If that's all then I'm gonna get going now... What? You're not gonna stop me? I-I'm telling ya, I really will walk outta here! ... Fiiiine, you win! I admit it, I just can't be without you anymore!
Surpriiiiiiiise!
Oh, my! Not even submarines are safe from the Commander's evil clutches!
I wonder what'd happen to you if I were to scream for help right now... Wanna find out? Heheheh~
Tadaaah! I'm Albacore, from the Eagle Union! Oh, did I jump out and scare you? Sorry 'bout that~! I'll be a member of the fleet from now on, so let's get along!
Ooh! That's good!
Hah hah! Easy peasy!

You wanna warn people about my firecrackers? Hehehe~ By all means, go ahead~ But how exactly are you gonna explain knowing that I had 'em hidden under my dress~? You get where I'm going with this, don'tcha? Hehehe~
Oopsie! I totally just dropped something by mistake~! I'd better pick it up quick! Hmm? Saw something you shouldn't have, Commander? Hehehe~ That makes you my partner in crime now!

L-listen, I'm really grateful that you hang out and let me mess around with you! I've got something important to say... Come here so I can whisper... C'mon, a little closer... *smooch*♡ Hah, got 'em! Expect much more teasing to come~
Time to spice up Cavalla's drink with a little... Darnit, you caught me in the act, Commander... All I wanted to do was give it a more mature but alcohol-free taste!
How about a... KAPOW! Gave you a real scare, didn't I? Teehee~ Turned out pretty good, if I say so myself~

Commander, you seen Taihou anywhere? I've got an explosive surprise for her!|Which do you like more: this dress, or my ordinary getup? Why do I even ask? Hehehe~ C'mon, don't be shy and answer the question~|Over here, Commander! You agreed to be my accomplice right when you caught wind of my plan, so you've gotta follow me around the whole day~
You're gonna dig up location info under the guise of dancing with someone? Hey, pretty good idea! Huh? You just wanna dance? With me?
I wonder how people would look at you if I set off a firecracker right now... Wanna find out? Heheheh~
Oopsie! I totally just dropped something by mistake~! I'd better pick it up quick! Hmm? Saw something you shouldn't have, Commander? Hehehe~ That makes you my partner in crime now!
Maybe I'll get Archerfish to hop in a box too. We can handle the wait, but can you handle that many surprises~? Hehehe~
Surpriiiise! I was in the box all along! ...Did I really freak you out that much? Heehee~ Here, have this voucher as an apology. Come see me later to use it~♪
The commission team is back? The next time you visit me, bring some friends along!

By the way! I've got a secret discount menu. If you wanna know the code phrase for it, come closer so I can whisper it to you. Closeeer... Mwah!♡ That was all a lie! Thanks for being so easy to trick~
Meow nice to see you! Teehee~ Popping outta the box never fails to get a reaction from you~♪
C'meown in! What can I get mew? The meows and mews are part of the theme, mew see!

Soooo~ Among all the kitties here, who's your favorite, Commander~?|I don't prank people while I'm on duty~ That is, unless they're someone I like~♪|The reason I'm just lounging around right meow is 'cause I've already taken everyone's orders~♪
You like me so much you'll skip work just to see me? Heehee~ Golly, look how these missions are piling up~♪
For every prank you fall for, you get a minute of one-on-one chat time with me! Pretty sweet deal, am I right?
I wonder what'd happen if you touched other girls like you touch me... Wanna find out? Heheheh~
Surpriiiise! I was in the box all along! ...Did I really freak you out that much? Heehee~ Here, have this voucher as an apology. Come see me later to use it~♪
Trap set! Let's goooo!
My new gig must leave me with little time to play pranks? Haha, my friend, a true idol can perform AND play pranks, too! If you want an example, look no further than Sara!
Lights! Camera! Albacore! Ahaha, don't worry about it, I'm just getting fired up over here! Oh, did you come up with a better idea? Tell me, tell me~
Teehee! I get this feeling like the commission team is about to enjoy a surprise concert!
You're really ruining it for the other members, you know that?
Being an idol's pretty good! I get to sing, dance, and smile for a massive audience! ...That sounds nothing like what I'd enjoy? Really, huh?
Hey, is that for me, Commander? Aww, how nice of you~ In return, I'll keep quiet about how you were ogling us while we practiced~

Oh, Commander! Morniiing! Did you see the note I left about a date? It's your job as the producer to see to our personal needs, y'know~ I'll write down whoever else wants one, so be sure to give it a look~
I want to be your center-stage idol that dazzles the audience, Commander! Heh, just kidding! Our WHOLE unit has to reach stardom together, after all. Hehehe~
Your next line is, "Why is Albacore prompting me to speak?"
Oh shoot, I screwed up!
Morning there, P! Let's make the most of today!
Welp... I've got one final ace up my sleeve!
Uh, Tashkent, where's the Commander's mail? ...Oh, hi, Commander! No, just talking to myself!

Surprise! How's my new stage prop look?|Most of the stuff we're wearing was brilliantly handmade by Dido! Curious about that doll she's got, though. What's it represent?|I wanna see Taihou's concern in person! We should totally set some time aside for that!
We've got new job offerinos!
Job donesy-done! Whew, I'm pooped.
Here comes Albacore, submarine-slash-idol! I'm unique, I'm in the groove, so make some noise as I perform for you! Vocals, dancing, you name it, I can do it!
Say what? Idols aren't allowed to be in relationships? Yeah, well, I was a shipgirl before I became an idol, so it's all fine! This pretty little ring is mine now~ As are you, Commander~
Let's make some noooooise!
I wouldn't be here without your support!
I wonder what'd happen to you if I were to scream "I'm being molested!" right now... Wanna find out? Heheheh~
Lights! Camera! Albacore! Ahaha, don't worry about it, I'm just getting fired up over here! Oh, did you come up with a better idea? Tell me, tell me~
My idol rank has gone up!
Encore! Encore until our next encounter!
It'd be nice if the battle goes the way we want it to.
When it comes to history, relying on second-hand accounts is not enough to sift fact from fiction. You must conduct your own research.
voiceline.oath: Oh, Commander. ...Next time I'm off duty, I'm planning on checking out a sushi train with Dunkerque. Of course, you're welcome to join me. Hehehe.

voiceline.line: Algérie-class heavy cruiser – Algérie.
The girls from the commission team have come back. I wonder if I can guess which girl's carrying the most important goods?
Oh, Commander. I've been looking into the documents that need to be prepared for your formal retirement. Are you ready to start the process?
Are you a bit scared of me? Hehe, don't worry, Commander. I wouldn't harm an ally.

Commander, won't you drink a little with me? Are you perhaps bad at holding your alcohol? That's alright. Just take a little sip, like this... and try slowly tasting it with your throat... That's it... Don't you taste it?... The cool, rich flavor of maturity.
You know, I actually really, really like cute things. Those trinkets, those squishy furballs, making sweets... Hehe, don't you think it's nice for an adult to enjoy cute things?

Commander... would you like to rely on me? ...If it's you, I'd be happy to let you rely on me, and I'd always be supporting you from your side. Hehe, in exchange... I hope you'll show me just how much you can achieve, with me by your side.
voiceline.oath: Love, how are the plans for our next date looking? Oh, I know that the destination's basically decided upon. More than that, I was thinking things like... where we'll eat dinner, or where we'll stay. We have to plan out everything carefully so we can enjoy the date that much more!

voiceline.line: Are you trying to see if I have a fever...?
voiceline.oath: My my, do you want to be pampered like a child today?

voiceline.line: Good work planning out the operation, Commander. How would you like some freshly brewed coffee?
voiceline.oath: You look really tired... Darling, you shouldn't push yourself too hard. Please, leave this to me and go lie down for a bit.

voiceline.line: I'm telling you, the constraints of the treaty are still too suffocatingly restrictive...
We're on great terms after all. I would've been fine waiting a bit longer.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, dear. What will you start working on first?

voiceline.line: It seems that I lost... But don't worry, Commander. Let's prepare carefully and try again.
voiceline.oath: Oh no, I lost... I'm sorry for letting you down...

voiceline.line: Reading a letter allows you to peek into the hidden heart of the person who sent it... Hehehe, how exciting! Here, Commander, some new mail's come in for you.
voiceline.oath: Dear, you've got some new mail. I wonder if I should try my hand at writing some love letters myself. Hehehe.

voiceline.line: Even if I don’t have any honors or decorations, my strength can speak for itself. | Oh, Commander. How about enjoying some wine with me later? Hehe, only after you finish up the rest of your work though, alright? | Gold...? Oh, were you interested in that story? Hehehe. At that time, the Iris were... | My hobby is touring cat cafés, but this port doesn't... Oh, that's right. Even at this port, there are plenty of adorable creatures... Yes, how lovely! | The Royal Navy are now allies who fight together with us. Furthermore... even yesterday's enemies are today's allies. What an interesting life this has been... Hehehe.
voiceline.oath: nil|Commander, is there anything you'd like for dinner today? Something other than dinner...? Oh my, how bold~ ...That's something you can look forward to later♪|Whether it's during work or in your daily life, it's no good to be too strict on yourself. Make sure you rest properly when you have the time, alright?|Hmm~ How is this one thiiiis cute... That's right. I'll have to show this to Miss Richelieu next time. Hehehe~. |nil

voiceline.line: We've just received a new directive from the higher-ups. Oh? It seems that you're just as busy as always... As much as I'd like to do some of this work in your stead, I suppose I wouldn't be able to?
voiceline.oath: We've just received a new directive from the higher-ups. Oh? It seems that you're just as busy as always... As much as I'd like to do some of this work in your stead, I suppose I wouldn't be able to?

voiceline.line: Have you finished the mission? Good work. Please leave the report to me and go get some rest.

I'm the flagship of the Vichya's First Cruiser Fleet, Algérie of the Templar Knights. In my history as a ship... I was called the best-designed treaty cruiser. Accordingly, I've been through plenty of interesting escapades... Hehehe. How do you feel about me, Commander?
Thank you. Henceforth, I vow to dedicate my whole heart and body to you. Together, let us enjoy - slowly and surely - just how sweet our future will be. My partner, my beloved...
It's too late to run~
Oh my, did you want to slack off for a bit? Hehe, I won't tell anyone else, so take some time off, okay?
Commander~? No matter how nice the other person may be, you shouldn't get too carried away. Hehe.
voiceline.oath: There's no reason to be so impatient, right? Hehehe♡

voiceline.line: Bonjour. From today, this heavy cruiser of the Vichya Dominion shall now be serving at this port. It's a pleasure to meet you, hehe. If it's not too much to ask, I hope that we can get along well.
Shattering the confines of the treaty... is rather pleasurable. Hehehe~
If only you realized the situation you were in a little sooner, you might've been able to avoid this outcome... but what can you do at this point?
Hehehe. Commander, it seemed like you enjoyed being surrounded by so many cute girls. Who caught your attention the most?
Oh my, hehe... Are you enjoying the warmth of the sunlight here? I'm glad that you're finding some time to relax here, but wouldn't you rather come play with everyone else?
Commander, if I buried you in the sand neck-down, you wouldn't be able to move, and I'd be able to do whatever I want to you~ Hehehe, I'm joking. Or, would you like to do that to me? Hehehehe.
Wine... would be a little bit out of place here. Hehe. Commander, will some tropical juice suffice?
Even if you've already applied some sunscreen, you still need to take care to not get sunburns.

Here, a sun cap. If you want to play out on the beach, please make the proper preparations against the sun's rays first.|A beach volleyball match between the Vichya and Royal Navy... Sounds fun. How about watching it together?|nil|Writing words on the beach and waiting for the waves to wash them away... Hehe, seems like it'd be fun~ What shall we write?|Sigh... It's seriously quite hot... Commander, don't push yourself, you hear? Please let me know if you start to feel worse.
You want some coconut juice...? Alright, wait there for now. I'll bring some over.
Huh?! I wonder, do these clothes make the Commander more impertinent...?
Oh my, hehe... Are you enjoying the warmth of the sunlight here? I'm glad that you're finding some time to relax here, but wouldn't you rather come play with everyone else?
Let's do this thing!
voiceline.oath: I'm givin' it one-hundo percent!

voiceline.line: So Commander, do you like being the one cuddling, or the one being cuddled? Just wonderin'!
voiceline.oath: You could go for some cuddling? Don't mind if I do! We're gonna cuddle 'till dawn breaks!

voiceline.line: Allen M. Sumner-class destroyer – Allen M. Sumner, Hull Number DD-692.
Commission completezo! Check it out, I categorized the rewards with some stickers!
Okay, okay, calm yourself and I'll indulge you with a nice, heartwarming hug.
My rigging's in tip-top condition! Counting on you to keep it that way, Commander! Hehe!

I've finished all my combat drills, so I'm gonna use my break time to run down to the store! Oh, before I forget, here's a special sticker for you! It's all good if you wanna trade it with someone later.
So, you doing anything special on your next day off? No? Perfect! Then mark that date your calendar. I'll bring the vidya and we can game all day!
Zzz... Hmm? Commander? *yawn*... Guess I dozed off, whoops. Could you gimme a ride to the couch? ...No? Aww, why not?! We're buds, so what's the big deal? Zzz...
Hmm?
Whoa! Hel-looo! The couch is all yours if you want it.
Owch! I'm not outta the game yet, though!
You're still in dreamland, huh? Hm... *blows*... Oh, hey! So you are awake!
voiceline.oath: Hwuh?! Wait, did I fall asleep? *yawn*... I might just call in sick today. Too lazy.

voiceline.line: Oh crap, I really whiffed this one... Thank god for that near miss back there... Umm, I'll do better next time.
New mail's come in! Gonna read it later? Gotcha, I'll put a sticker on it then.

Okay, hear me out! Why don't we spruce up the office with some stickers? These here would look great on the walls and your desk!|Man, it's crazy how much Fletcher cares for her sisters. Who, me? I, uhh, prefer a hands-off approach with my sisters!|So this is what you do all day... You don't think I could become a commander too if I studied enough? Yeeeah, me neither. Heheh. Feel a little less tense now?|You just yawned, didn't you, Commander? Just be honest and admit it~
voiceline.extra: What do you mean "please help"? I'm your secretary, just tell me "get this done" like a commander would! ...Right, I'm on it.

voiceline.line: Beep boop, this is an automated deadpan mission reminder. Uncompleted missions detected. Do your job. Beep boop.
voiceline.oath: A new mission? I could help, if you want. I'll get it done in a jiffy!

voiceline.line: Mission completed! ...Wait a sec, this thing says I had zero involvement in it!
voiceline.oath: Beep boop, this is an automated deadpan mission reminder. Mission rewards detected. Go claim them. Beep boop.

voiceline.line: I'm Allen M. Sumner, nameship of the class that succeeded the Fletcher class. We may not be as numerous as the Fletchers, but we've got a teensy edge over 'em in firepower and AA! Hell, I think it's no exaggeration to say we were the Eagle Union's strongest destroyers back in the war!
One mystery remains: did I charm you, or did you charm me? Meh, don't really matter... All that's important is now we'll live happily ever after! Hehe~ I love you so much, Commander♡
Welp, time to go ham!
What's that? You cuddle with me? Go on, try it!
Hahaahh! Too slippery for you! Can't catch me!
I'm Eagle Union destroyer Allen M. Sumner! Just call me Allen! It's a pleasure, Commander! Anyway, I've heard you've got yummy food and cushy work here at this port. That true?
Sweet! Burst of energy like this make me wanna do stretches!
Easy-breezy! That's another star on my record!
voiceline.oath: This victory's for me and you, Commander! Ahaha!

voiceline.line: Thanks for popping in! By the way... I'll pay you back for the OJ later.
Welcome, Commander! I would fetch you our menu, but I've had a teensy accident here... Don't worry, I'll fix this somehow!
Hey, Commander, order a glass of OJ! ...No, it's for me! Staff can't just order drinks for themselves, y'know? That's weird.
Welcome, Commander! Uh, watch your step!

Turns out North Carolina is like, a bunny girl expert! I never knew that.|No, Cooper! No adult drinks, got it? Ask the commander to order you some juice instead! Hehehe~|Sooo... You like bunny girls, Commander? Asking for a friend.
You know what, it's comfier to sit and take it easy, so I'm gonna stay put for now.
Hey! You can't grope a staff member!
Welcome, Commander! I would fetch you our menu, but I've had a teensy accident here... Don't worry, I'll fix this somehow!
All right, let's proceed as planned.
Don't let anyone get injured? Commander, that's quite the tall order, but I'm up for the challenge.
1st Ship of the Amagi-class Battlecruisers, Amagi
Commander, a commission has been completed. Also, I have some suggestions for potential candidates to send on the next-
Swineherds like you are quite hard to find these days.
Information is a tactician's most valuable asset. Knowing more than your enemy is already half the battle.
Superior tactics can only make up for differences in strength to a limited extent... *cough* *cough* ...That is why becoming stronger is still of paramount importance, Commander.
*cough* *cough*... Commander, you've already earned my acknowledgment. Why not have a little more confidence in yourself?
Commander, if you truly care about me, *cough* then please keep moving forward with all your might. Your gallant victories and smiling face are the best medicine for me.
Commander, were you able to make use of my strategic plans?
Perhaps a change of plans is in order...
Commander, I've left today's combat operation plans on the table. Please take a look.
Did I... make a miscalculation...?
Commander, you have new mail. Might it be new intel?

The road ahead of us is perilous, but I believe that is also what makes the journey worthwhile. |Commander, there is no need to fear failure. As long as I am here, all setbacks are but fodder for our victories. |Akagi turned out... a bit differently from what I expected.
The next mission is...
Mission rewards... we should think of the most efficient way to utilize them.

I am the nameship of the Amagi-class battlecruisers, Amagi. Along with Akagi, I was originally supposed to be converted into an aircraft carrier, but that plan was scrapped after a certain natural disaster. *cough* *cough* ... As you can see, my body is not in a great condition, but please do not worry about me too much.
Commander... so you've chosen me, then? Hehe... From the beginning, I was prepared to lay my life down for your ambitions. But with this being the case, perhaps I should take better care of my body.
Ahahaha...
Ehehe... Oh, Commander, I was just thinking about what snacks I'd like to eat.
Oh, Commander... I was contemplating some other things...
*cough* *cough* Battlecruiser Amagi, reporting in. It looks like I should be able to fully utilize my abilities here. Commander, would you please brief me on our enemies?
My health... seems to have improved a bit.
Now then, how can we make further use of this victory?
First, let us assemble our formation.

Is there anything I would like to tell Akagi? Of course, I have many things I would like to impart with her, but perhaps it would be more appropriate that she hears those words from you, Commander. And perhaps, that would be the more interesting way of doing things... Don't you agree? Hehe~
Commander, are you here to pay me a visit? ...Ah, there is no need to be concerned about me. I made a promise to both you and Akagi that I would be mindful of my health.
Commander, a commission has been completed. Shall I summon the returnees here once they are finished with their preparations?
Oh my, what's this...?
Thank goodness you're back. Everyone here at port was waiting for your safe return, Commander.
Commander, are you not going to head down to the ocean? There is no need to worry about me, so please enjoy your time with the others.
*cough* *cough*... I wonder if I am coming down with a cold...
New mail has arrived — yes, it's good news. You need not be concerned.

Kaga's younger sister is quite skilled at drawing... As for my sister, well... Akagi has her own charming points~|I'm sorry for the trouble I've caused you due to my less than ideal health, but I would like to say... Commander, you have my deepest gratitude for looking after me all this time.|Would a light meal be to your liking, Commander? Kaga, Akagi, and I worked together to make this. We chose our dishes assuming that you would also be here to partake in our cooking. Hehe~
Please entrust this assignment to Amagi.
The mission rewards have arrived. Please look over them.
I'm not going anywhere, Commander. That's what you and Akagi wished for, after all.
Commander, I would advise you to pay closer attention to your surroundings before doing things like this...
Commander, are you here to pay me a visit? ...Ah, there is no need to be concerned about me. I made a promise to both you and Akagi that I would be mindful of my health.
Let's proceed as planned.
*cough*... *sniffle*... Ugh... I, I'm okay... I just ate too many sweets, and now I'm not feeling so good... *cough* *cough*... *sniffle*...
voiceline.oath: Commander, say "ahhn"~ Now, it's my turn. Mm, delicious! Now it's your turn again~

voiceline.line: 1st Ship of the Amagi-class Battlecruisers, Amagi
Commander, a commission has been completed. Should you be willing, may I propose a suggestion for our next task?
Commander, are you going insane because of my recent poor health...?
I shall do anything to protect Akagi, the Sakura Empire, and my friends here at this port. Commander, please give me your orders.
You want to see me grow up healthy and strong? Umm... I understand the importance of this as your subordinate and ship, but... should I be doing anything special?
*Nom*... Shoooo yummy... Oh, Commander, my apologies, I was just eating this bit of mochi... Hm, it's okay to finish it first? If, if you say so...
Commander, it's time to take a break. Though you're always looking out for my health, your words wouldn't be persuasive if you didn't also take care of yourself. Here, I've prepared the bed for you~
voiceline.oath: Commander, would you like to rest on my lap? Thanks to you, I've been able to hold on for a lot longer~ Ehehe... Please make sure to go sleep in your regular bed before Akagi gets mad~

voiceline.line: Nngh... Commander, p-please stop...
Welcome back, Commander. Would you like to try some of our traditional sweets? ...If you'd like, I could also eat them with you.
voiceline.oath: Commander, Hiei taught me how to make three-colored mochi. Would you like to try some? Akagi and her friends all said it was delicious~

voiceline.line: Was there an error in my calculations...?
Commander, I've put today's itinerary here as well as all the documents that need to be looked over. Hm...? I'm perfectly capable of handling this kind of workload by myself.
voiceline.oath: Commander, I've put today's itinerary on your desk. Please look over it when you have time.

voiceline.line: *cough* *cough*... I can't show something so unsightly to Akagi and the others...
I wonder if there's any candy inside... Oh, it's just a regular letter...

As expected of the head of the Royal Maids... Even I must stop to admire such an excellent cup of black tea... Mm~ hmm~|Akagi, Commander is your superior, not your subordinate. ...Jeez, if you end up causing even more trouble, you're going to get an earful!|Oops, I mistook the manjuus for dango again... It must be because I'm so hungry...
voiceline.extra: Commander, can you play Go with Kaga? She keeps saying "I'll beat you next time"...|I'm not good at physical activities, but a little bit of light exercise... Yes, if you'll be accompanying me, I'll also put forward my best effort.|nil

voiceline.line: Unfinished missions still remain. We must make efficient use of our earnings...
Mission complete, Commander. When can I confirm our next mission?

I am Amagi, battlecruiser from the Sakura Empire. Commander, I hope to grow up big and strong here at this port so that I may protect you and Akagi. In other words... I'll do my best to eat properly and sleep properly.

You musn't, Commander... If you give this ring to me, then Akagi will... Huh, she's fine with it? ...I see, Akagi is all grown up as well... Wait, sorry, I should be focusing on giving you an answer first... But yes, it'd be an honor to accept this!
Heh heh...
It's not that my clothes are slipping off, but... Oh, you don't want me catching a cold? Yes, I shall be mindful of that.
voiceline.oath: Do you like rubbing Akagi's tails the same way...?

voiceline.line: Hm? Commander, I am currently busy thinking.
voiceline.oath: Should I call Akagi here as well? Hehehe~

voiceline.line: Battlecruiser Amagi offers you her humble greetings, Commander. *cough* *cough* ...Ah, I'm fine, I just seem to have caught a little cold... *achoo!* Aww...
I must also become stronger, so that I can protect Akagi.
Now then... how shall we press the advantage? Hehehe...
voiceline.oath: It would appear that my tactics proved successful once again... Hehehe...

voiceline.line: Hmph! Can't help it. I'm going to personally show you what to learn!
Well, I'm in a good mood today... I'll let you praise me...
A-class prototype destroyer ー Amazon, Hull Number D39!
It's about time you learned when commissions end!
You're the biggest perv in the entire universe!
I just happen to have time on my hands and you look so sorry being so alone, so I've come to talk to you! Don't get it wrong!
I may look like this but I'm an adult! --I said stop patting my head! Don't carry me in your hands! --I'm gonna get mad now! Like really, really mad! R-Roar!
I-I made a noble sacrifice in order to prevent you from laying your hands on other girls! --Whaaat? It's fine if it's me?! Wait a min- Ugh!
I- It can't be helped then, if you're that fond of me. I'll make an exception and let you pat my head! Don't misunderstand! You're the only one who I'm allowing to do this! Only you!
You worked hard, so... I j-just have to let you rest on my lap!
Oy, Commander! I wanted to go outside but I couldn't find anyone to tag along. You, come with me!
S-sometimes I botch something up as well! ... Shut up, shut up, shut u~p!
I brought your mail for you, so be thankful!

You're useless most of the time, but when the time comes, you seem to do alright|Stupid younger ones... They should quickly grow to stop making me worried for them!|Is there something you don't understand? I'll teach you, so be grateful
If you aren't done with your missions, you are just slacking!
Take your rewards from the missions, I say. Seriously, to think I have to be worried about such a thing...
Are you listening? Fleet education is important, and I am an old timer in charge of this glorious duty! ...I'm small like a squirt?! That's it! ... Give me ten laps!
You are aware of what you're doing, right! ...I-Is that so? Then I accept... Don't misunderstand! This isn't for you, but for the fleet!
Don't look down on me!
I- I say, you... why are you like this...
Aaah! ... You... nose-bleeding pervert in heat!
I am the A-class prototype destroyer, Amazon. As much as I don't want to deal with an idiot like you... I have no choice. I'm gonna look after you!
Don't look at me with those 'Ah, I raised her well~' eyes!
I did well, didn't I? ...I-It's not like I want to be complimented or anything!
This is how it's done, everyone~!
Commander, did you come to watch our rehearsal?
No ball is complete without its orchestra! Here, as the leader of the Royal Destroyers Philharmonic, I'll be sure to liven up the night! Now to begin... woaaah! I stepped on my mantle?!
Commander, just for today, I'll do any one thing you ask of me! Anything is fine, you know...?
Great timing, Commander! The ball is about to begin!
Commander, though you've still got to get your work done, feel free to enjoy the ball tonight~!

I'm in a good mood today? Of course, it's a party, after all! Hehe~! |My sisters snuck off to the party the moment I took my eyes off them. Oh well, I suppose I can overlook it tonight~ |Commander, is something on your mind? I'm in a good mood today, so I wouldn't mind helping you~
Woah! Hey, what are you doing?! Oh, I was about to step on my mantle? Ah, um, th-thanks...
Commander, control yourself~ I'm in a good mood today, so I won't hurt you too badly~!
No ball is complete without its orchestra! Here, as the leader of the Royal Destroyers Philharmonic, I'll be sure to liven up the night! Now to begin... woaaah! I stepped on my mantle?!
Everyone, one last push! There's a party waiting for us tonight!
Heheh! Now with my retrofit, you'll see my true potential!
Hmm? Does my post-retrofit appearance interest you *that* much? How hopeless you are! Fine, gaze upon me!
Selecting me for a retrofit proves that you are a Commander of culture! Heheh, you'd better prepare yourself! From now on, I'll make sure to "take care" of you even more thoroughly!
Stop sleeping on the job already! Straighten your back, eyes ahead! Sort yourself out!

Stop looking at me like I only got this far thanks to you!|I just *have* to look after everyone, don't I! Both the rookies and you, Commander!|I-in all fairness, the Commander does a pretty good job most of the time... Ahem! N-never mind that! You just misheard me!
U-unannounced intimacy is forbidden, you hear?!
Who would've thought I'd get to use my new weapon so soon... Oh, Commander? I hope you've said your prayers!
Selecting me for a retrofit proves that you are a Commander of culture! Heheh, you'd better prepare yourself! From now on, I'll make sure to "take care" of you even more thoroughly!
Who's next on the chopping block~?
voiceline.oath: Everyone! Follow Captain Ami's lead~!

voiceline.line: Are you that curious about me? Well, you'll have to beat me in a game first~
voiceline.oath: Nihihi~♪ Commander, you're quite the gamer yourself, aren'tcha~

voiceline.line: Nihihi! I'm the idol, Ami Futami! This place seems awfully lively, just perfect for pranking~! See you around, Commander!
Everyone did a good job returning safely! I should go and praise them!
It's hopeless... We can't clear the stage like this, Commander~ ...Please work a bit harder, Commander~
Oh, Commander! Have you seen Mami around? Hmm. We had promised to play games together though...
Let's see... Let's put a blackboard eraser above the door to the office, and a toy rat on the chair... Woaoh! You're already back, Commander?! Tsk. Foiled again~
Yeah yeah. Commander, I'm going to mimic your expression right now! ...Huh, it's not similar at all? That's strange~ When I showed my impression to everyone else, they said it was super similar~
Nihihi~ Who do you think this is! ...Eh, Ami? You're correct~! As expected of the Commander! As a prize, I'll share some of my sweets with you~
voiceline.oath: Hey hey, I'll be playing games with Mami on my next day off. Won'tcha join us, Commander? Make sure you bring some pudding with you when you come~! We'll make sure to bring some candy to munch on as well!

voiceline.line: You planning on pranking me?...Interesting, bring it on~!
Good job beating'em, Commander! I'm beat, too~ Let's have a snack break~
The legend of Ami Futami has only just begun!
Still asleep~? Nihihi~ Practically begging to be pranked...
voiceline.oath: Good mornin', Commander! What should we do for fun today!?

voiceline.line: Uh oh! My HP gauge is red!!! Retreaaat!
It seems like there's some new mail~ You listening, Commander~?

There are so many people at the port~! I wonder who I should prank next~♪|Yay!!! I pulled an SSR!!! I feel crazy lucky today~☆|Hey hey, Commander~ ...Hmm? What am I going to be doing with this broom? Fufufu~ That's a secret, of course♪
voiceline.extra: So this is the Commander's office? Unexpected stylish... Nihihi~♪ Wonder if there are any dirty books... at the edge of this bookcase over here...|The store here carries so, so many kinds of candy! Hmm... It's a real struggle trying to pick what to buy, isn't it, Mami?|Commander, are ya slackin' off? If so, let's play some games together! I've been struggling with the last boss for a while~

voiceline.line: By any chance, is there still work left? If you don't hurry up and finish... Boss, the day's going to be over.
voiceline.oath: Looks like you've still got some work to take care of. Right now, I'll do you a suuuper special favor, and give you a hand~♪

voiceline.line: Mission complete~! Don't you think I worked pretty hard too?
voiceline.oath: We're finally done, Commander! Well then, it's time for a well-deserved pudding break...

voiceline.line: The name's Ami Futami. Mami's my twin. Sometimes, I swap places with her for the day~ To tell you the truth, I might not be Ami, but actually Mami... Teehee~♪
You know, showing up here, and playing with you and the others has been super fun for me~♪ I'll be relying on you to keep me entertained in the future as well, Commander!
Tremble in the face of my power!
What's that? You're going to play with me? What a boss!
Ohoho~ So you're that kind of person after all~?
voiceline.oath: Oh, Commander~ No matter how irresistible you might find me to be, that's not allowed~

voiceline.line: Nihihi! I'm the idol, Ami Futami! This place seems awfully lively, just perfect for pranking~! See you around, Commander!
Level~up! Thanks, Commander!
Did you catch that? My shiny performance?
voiceline.oath: Vic~to~ry~! Hmm~ I'll take a special milk pudding as my reward♪

voiceline.line: Did you see my mad drumming skills~? I'll work hard to make sure everyone else feels as hyped for the festival as I am~☆
Summer's all about the festivals, and Ami Futami's the queen of festivals! Even the fireworks soaring through the sky can't hold a candle to how brilliant Ami is, so keep your eyes on me, Commander~♪
It's break time~ I sure would like to go around the carts and eat a bunch of tasty stuff~ *Glance*
Oh, Commander! Have you come to gaze upon my gallant figure?

I can see the festival grounds clearly from here! Now now, I wonder where the Commander might be~?|Aren't these clothes like, super fashionable~?|Commander, let's compete in some festival games! Cork gun shooting, yo-yo fishing, goldfish scooping... Nihihi~ Just letting you know, I'm not going to lose~!
Commander, do you want to try drumming on the taiko? Nihihi, I wonder if you really can drum better than I can~
Whoa there! My sash is going to come undone~!
Summer's all about the festivals, and Ami Futami's the queen of festivals! Even the fireworks soaring through the sky can't hold a candle to how brilliant Ami is, so keep your eyes on me, Commander~♪
What are you all fighting for?
Commander, what would you like to know?
An Shan-class destroyer, No. 1 - Anshan (101)
Great, everyone returned home safely!
Commander, it's bloomring season for the hawthorne I grew around the Bohai Gulf. Can we go back and take a look?
Commander, we have to fight to protect the things we care about. This isn't really a question of personal preference.
Even if the day comes when I am no longer needed on the battlefield, I still want to watch over the Bohai Sea. I want to always be able to see the waters, dyed a shimmering vermillion in the sunset.
Commander, rest assured that wherever you go, I will be there to protect you. Huh? Isn't it obvious, you're mine after all...

I'm so blessed to have met you, Commander. I've made so many friends and so many memories... Hey, Commander, once I complete my duty as one of the "Four Unbreakables," let's go travel around the world together!
Why don't you take a break? It's not good to be too stressed out.
Commander, concentrate and be extra careful!
Wow! Today's schedule looks packed. Let's work hard today!
Everyone, regroup. We can't retreat like this!
Commander, you have new mail. Should I unseal it for you?

Woah, this is my first time seeing a battleship! |Where did Fu Shun run off to? Would it really kill her to do as I say every now and then? |My sisters - Fu Shun, Chang Chun, and Tai Yuan - are all my pride and joy!
Protecting the peace isn't just about fighting - you'll have to do these missions too.
Keep up the effort, don't slack off just yet!

I am the nameship of the An Shan-class destroyers, and one of the Dragon Empery's first-generation "Four Unbreakables." As the flagship, I participated in many naval exercises, carried out surveillance, and engaged in confrontations, leaving behind lasting achievements that I can be proud of. Though I never participated in live combat, I am the destroyer with the most miles under her belt in the entire world!
Commander, my body and soul, all of my life, belongs to you from now on. Make sure to take responsibility properly.
Let the protection of heaven surround the brave!
Commander... Hehe~ doing this occasionally is not all that bad.
Hey-! My sisters are going to see us...
Destroyer, An Shan, reporting for duty! I shall protect my sisters and you, Commander!
Now I'll be better equipped to deal with ruffians like De Haven...
Commander, being able to help you out is the greatest!
Onward to a new battlefield!
You put salty toppings into your milk tea? Even spicy things too? Th-that's heresy! You mustn't put anything into boba that would tarnish its flavor!

"Boundless is the beauty of evening's glow, but alas––" ...Oh, that doesn't have any special meaning, I've just been hanging around Hai Tien too much. (*whispers*) But, it's true... Our time together is far too short, just like the evening light...
Who's over there? ...Oh, it's the commission fleet! They're back!
Commander, this time, can we take... a more scenic route back? It's okay? Ehehe, I thought you'd have some free time until the next thing on your schedule~

I wonder how my sisters are doing... Oh, right... I've got to set that stuff aside when I'm with you.|Commander, are you awake? Hehe, you look just like Gremyashchy when you're sleeping~♪|Are you done with your drink already? Well, you can have some of mine– Wait, oh... Um, don't worry about it though! I'd hate for you to go thirsty! ...S-seriously, I don't mind...
You'll have to stay tuned if you want to see what the rewards are, Commander!
The sunset sure is beautiful, huh? Ahaha~

"Boundless is the beauty of evening's glow, but alas––" ...Oh, that doesn't have any special meaning, I've just been hanging around Hai Tien too much. (*whispers*) But, it's true... Our time together is far too short, just like the evening light...
Seize victory from the evening's light!
I'll show you what an all-rounder is capable of!

You want to know more about the four of us, huh? Fu Shun's a bit of a daredevil, Chang Chun has too many "great ideas," and Tai Yuan should really put herself out there a bit more. ...Hm? Me? Well... What do you think about me? Hehe~
An Shan, retrofitting complete! With this new power, Commander, I'll protect both you and my sisters! But first... Umm, I need to double-check how these missiles work...!
Commander, if you're feeling run down, you've got to tell me.
There's a lot of work to get through today, but it's nothing the two of us together can't handle!
nil|Talking to the Gnevny-class girls really brings back old memories~|Fu Shun isn't up to some mischief again, is she... Hmm, do you think I'm worrying a bit too much about my sisters?
Ehehe~♪ Urk... No, no more of that! I'm gonna float off to cloud nine!
Eek! ...Th-this is going to be a bad influence on my sisters if they see us...
An Shan, retrofitting complete! With this new power, Commander, I'll protect both you and my sisters! But first... Umm, I need to double-check how these missiles work...!
S-sometimes, even I want to look cool in front of my sisters... Ahem! Forget I said that!
It's the bad guys... Teacher, everyone... Let's go together!
"Teacher" is better than "Commander"... Anchorage likes "Teacher"... Teacher, I like you lots!
Heavy cruiser – Anchorage.
"Commissions"...? Where is everyone...? Anchorage wants to know... Is that okay?
Patpat. Teacher, it's okay, don't cry... Anchorage... won't cry either... Smile like this, okay?
So many strangers... Teacher, Anchorage is scared...
Teacher~! I'll give you this bunny rabbit! ...Here!
Teacher is a special person to me... Anchorage loves Teacher very much! Anchorage is also a special person to Teacher? Yay!
Teacher... Will you be together with Anchorage? ...Yay! Anchorage with Teacher, girl with her prince... Together, forever...
You like... my hair? Lemme touch Teacher's too...
Teacher, where are you...? Anchorage hates being alone...
Owie... It hurts...
Teacher~ Anchorage has been waiting for you...
Oh no, I lost... Bad guys are scary...
"Mail"... It's too hard, I can't read it... Teacher, do you know what it says?

Put on the jacket... Take off the jacket... Put it back on... Ehehe~|In this picture, the girl, the prince... are very comfy... I like it!|Teacher, are you busy...? Can you stay by Anchorage's side? ...Yay!
"Mission... incomplete?" Anchorage wants to help...!
"Mission... complete?" Teacher, that's great!
Anchorage is... a Union "Heavy Cruiser"...? Baltimore and the others are my friends! You're my best friend though, Teacher...!
A promise...? Pinky promise! ...A "ring"? You'll put it on my finger? Yay! Anchorage also made a ring! Teacher, gimme your hand!
Anchorage... will take a shot!
Anchorage likes Teacher's warm touch... Does Teacher like it too?
Squishy squish... Teacher, do you like it...?
Com...mander? No... Teacher? Teachy-teacher. I'm Anchorage. Woohoo! Teacher! My favoritest person! Teacheeer!
Anchorage... will become stronger!
Yay, I won! Anchorage is a good girl...!
Let's build some hype for this battle!
What type of music do you listen to, Commander? I have a great artist recommendation for you! Her name's Kizuna AI... Oh wait, that's me!
Kizuna AI here, wearing a dress, coming at you! Be it concert or combat, I'll give it my all!
Those commission girls are back now! We should give them a welcoming song! C'mon, sing with me, Commander!
Relax, I'm not inviting you to my concert anyway.
I wanna host a concert here at the port! Could you collab with me on it, Commander?
I need to practice my singing, dancing, and talking skills for my concert! Then I'll have to prepare a stage... Aaahhh, there's so fakking much I need to do!
Hey, Commandeeeer! What's up? Huh? You've already prepared a stage and everything?! Holy cow! I just gotta focus on practicing my skills? ... W-wow, you seem like a super capable guy, Commander!
We totally nailed that concert! I'm so glad you were there to help. Oh, right! I've got a special song just for you. Please lend me your ear!
Well done, Commander! I was just about to have a dance lesson with Cygnet and her friends. We've got time before the next sortie, so come along!
I'll see this through all the way to the end!
Welcome back! I got some singing lessons from Saratoga in preparation for my next concert. Give me your ear for a sec!
... I'll make up for it at my next concert!
Oh, look, mail! Maybe it's from one of my fans!

That was great, Z35! Oh, hi, Commander! I just got to hear Z35 practice her singing!|Check it out, this thing is so flappy! You want me to jump? Too bad for you this isn't a skirt.|Huh? You think I'm cute? Uh-huh! I already knew that, but thanks!
Alrighty, looks like we've got a new message notification. Let's get it done, right away!
Let's go get those mission rewards! Do you think we'll get anything good?
This is the costume I wear for my concerts! I hope one day this port will be able to host a concert, too!

Moving in synch with the others, singing, dancing, and smiling! That's what a concert's about. That's the image in my mind... Thank you so much, Commander! But, of course, this doesn't mean the end! Let's go, Commander! I'm counting on you!
Listen to my song!
Oh, are you requesting a song? Sure thing, what do you wanna hear? I'll sing it for you!
You want a high five? Let's do it! Yeeeaahhh!
Kizuna AI here, wearing a dress, coming at you! Be it concert or combat, I'll give it my all!
Strengthening complete! ♪ You know, concerts and battles both take a lot of strength!
Per-fect vic-tory! But of course! I'm a genius!
You're far too naive if you think  you can escape Aoba's eyes!
What's up? You know I charge for intel.
First ship of the Aoba-class heavy cruisers, Aoba.
"Come see a magnificent view of girls hard at work!" ...Okay! Commander, let's pack some snacks and head to port to conduct some interviews!
Maybe I should go conduct some interviews overseas...
Commander, could you tell me how it feels to have such a large har- I mean, fleet?

It's been a while since since I've been stationed here, so I've managed to get some good information from everyone. At first they thought you were a shady person, but you seemed to have earned their trust. Good for you!

I've made my fair share of mistakes, so I thought I could help by leaving something to commemorate everyone's hard work. Sorry for saying something so unlike me... but, you made me drop my guard. Now, you have to answer my questions!
Alright, I've decided. For all my precious friends here, I will record their lives! Does that include you? Oh you, don't you already know the answer to that?
Commander~ of the girls out on commission right now... who's your favorite?
It's not very funny when I'm the one on the news.
Hehe~ Commander, I saw that~!
I... Aoba... shouldn't be getting upset over this!
Commander, you're way to careless with information... Take it, it's your mail!

I believe that hard work pays off, you know. Eh? Why was I following you yesterday? I don't ever recall doing anything like that~|Say, Commander. If you let me interview you, I'll share some juicy gossip with you. Like... which girls might be looking your way~|It's sure hard getting a scoop... Maybe... I should make some news myself!
Missions? I'm just here to record your heroic image, Commander. Oh? I need to go too?
Commander, stop lazing around. Go get your rewards and let me take a picture!

Hai hai! The name's Aoba! I spent most of my days in the 6th Fleet, took part in many battles with my sisters, and did my best to survive until the end. Let's drop this boring topic, shall we? I was a writer for the Navy once, so I've picked up a thing or two. Commander, anything juicy going on around you lately?
Just to be clear, I'm not good at this kind of stuff... so don't expect me to say anything romantic... ever! Well, maybe just once... Um... I... l-l-love... you!
Ah, a good idea, finally! This will definitely make the front page!
Commander... It's not wise to mess with reporters.
Hmm, hmm... I can smell it. This fleet is going to make the headlines! So you're the Commander, huh? Just let me, Aoba, gather all the information without holding back!
I think I'm getting closer to my next big scoop. Thanks, Commander~!
Okay, time to get a quick word from the losing side. Eh? Leaving already?
Mm, hmm! Yes, this is how it's supposed to be... Fly, my aircraft, fly!
voiceline.oath: Friends, heed my call – Begin our advance!

voiceline.line: So this is how you're supposed to launch carrier-based planes... I think I've got the hang of it... Hyah! ...Oh no, I guess it really is nothing like launching seaplanes...
voiceline.oath: Let's give this another try... Are you sure it's supposed to work like this? ...Hyah! ...Ohmygosh! It worked! My Commander, Miss Illustrious!

voiceline.line: Aircraft carrier – Aquila.
A commission has been successfully completed! Good work, everyone! My Commander, make sure to offer them words of praise as well!
My Commander, are you still alive? ...Well, if I keep doing this, I'm sure you will come back to your senses...! *thwack*!
My Commander, have you already completed today's missions? And did you finish checking off the documents? This is just a friendly reminder from Aquila~ Mhm, no need to thank me~
Miss Graf Zeppelin? In terms of our history, I'm quite similar to her, right? In that case, "I shall hope that we may forge the bonds of camaraderie"... Eheh~
My Commander, look out! ...Phew, thank goodness. By the way, why did you come visit me in the middle of my aircraft training? Did you... perhaps want to see me at my most vulnerable?!
There's been something on my mind recently... "Just how should I make myself more appealing to you, My Commander?" ...What do you think? Please, teach me all sorts of things~♪
My Commander, should I assist you in turning down any troublesome requests?
voiceline.oath: My Commander, if you receive any troublesome requests, will you delegate them to me?

voiceline.line: I'm not some frail young miss who'll go down in a single blow...!
We're going to have a busy day. Thanks in advance, my Commander.
voiceline.oath: Please look after me today as well, my Commander~

voiceline.line: Ugh... Did I make a mistake somewhere...?
There's new mail, my Commander. Please choose your words carefully when replying.

Sleeping on the job is not something that an excellent commander would do. My Commander... *poke* *poke*... Care to wake up?|My Commander, you should try using gentle words to get an emphatic point across. You'll find the results quite remarkable.|My Commander, will you allow me to organize the warehouse with the help of my planes? ...The previous accident? Well, that was just a one-off thing~ Ahaha...
voiceline.oath: Zzzzz... Ahhn, you mustn't~ Hwuh? My Commander? Hehe~ I wonder why you didn't directly wake me up?
voiceline.extra: This is your favorite food, isn't it~ ...Oh, it's not? But that's what Miss Junyou told me. She's your childhood friend, isn't she...?

voiceline.line: We've got a mission direct from the Naval HQ... It might be pretty tough...
voiceline.oath: Let me handle this task... Oh, are you worried that I won't be able to handle it, my Commander...?

voiceline.line: My Commander, I just knew you'd complete your missions without a hitch! Thank goodness~
voiceline.oath: Thank you very much, my Commander! I did a good job, didn't I?

voiceline.line: My "history"...? Hmm... I do feel a longing for something like that. If only I had been finished a little sooner during that war... My Commander, don't you think I would've had an enviable service history?
I've prepared many, many words for today's occasion, but first, I'd like to hear your words of love, my Commander~♪ After all, you're the one who proposed to me. Hehe, what do you think I should do?
I do believe it is time to say goodbye~
My Commander, did you need me for something?
My Commander, I do apologize, but... may I refuse this kind of behavior...?
voiceline.oath: Oh my... Just what am I going to do with you, my Commander...

voiceline.line: Good day to you, my Commander. I'm Aquila, aircraft carrier from the Sardegna Empire. Our meeting today is no mere coincidence. No, it must be a gift from Fortuna herself, I'm sure of it.
I feel more experienced now... As long as I do as I practiced in battle, I'm sure everything will be fine!
Oh my, I won! Hehe, was this victory to your satisfaction, my Commander?
Oh my, Commander~ If you stare so much at a young signorina's swimsuit, you're going to give others a bad impression~
Good day, my Commander. We have the day off to enjoy the sea breeze and the ocean waves~ Hehe, would you like to help yourself to some fruit?
I've already tidied up your schedule. Hehe, though it's your day off, I can still handle these small details~
My Commander, would you like a floaty ring or a life jacket? ...You don't need either? I'll be taking them then~

A swimsuit contest? My my, that sounds like one of Littorio's concoctions~ Don't worry, I'm not interested in entering.|Graf Zeppelin, huh... I don't think we have much in common after all...|I'd like to fly my planes around, but... No, I've got to practice some self-restraint...!
My Commander, would you like some fruit?
My Commander, after we get back, I'll need to lecture you on how to treat a signorina.
Good day, my Commander. We have the day off to enjoy the sea breeze and the ocean waves~ Hehe, would you like to help yourself to some fruit?
Take flight, with great elegance!
Did you enjoy my black tea? I've worked very, very hard so that I may meet your every demand~♪
Oh, my Commander? I didn't expect to meet you here! Fortune smiles upon me today. Hehe~ If you have a minute to spare, would you care to join me for a cup of tea?
Commander, would you like some Amaretti? I thought some sugar would be nice to help you replenish after leading a battle~♪
Mm, yes, that's just perfect... Oh my, Commander, how are you doing today? –Hmm, I added too much sugar...?

Yummy treat~ Become sweet and replete~♪ Commander, I've prepared a little magic spell to make your tea that much tastier~♪|Shall we invite Carabiniere as well next time? I'm sure she'll be quite surprised~♪
Nngh–– Commander, I think this might be a little too naughty?
Oh, my Commander? I didn't expect to meet you here! Fortune smiles upon me today. Hehe~ If you have a minute to spare, would you care to join me for a cup of tea?
Everyone, try to avoid getting hurt if you can...
I feel a little sad when I see planes in the air... But it's okay, that's all in the past. What's more important is keeping my chin up and smiling. Right, Commander?
Asashio-class destroyer number four – Arashio.
Commander, I believe the commission team has returned. Let us head over to receive them.
Oh, Asashio? There there, there's nothing to be afraid of... You'll have to excuse me, I need to stay with Asashio.
I'd like to get to know you, Commander. *Giggle*, what should we start with?
Did you have another nightmare? Aww, relax, Commander, everything will be okay.
It's gotten quite late... But I really enjoyed chatting with you! Say, don't your shoulders get stiff from sitting down all day? Would you like a massage?
We're all to ourselves now. My heart's been thumping for some time now... Commander, could we huddle up next to each other, just for a little while?
Stellar work, Commander. Would you like to rest your head in my lap?
You must remain calm in the face of danger. Don't worry about me.
You don't find my appearance odd? I feel the best way to greet someone is with a smile!
There's no need to worry, we'll win the next time!
You've received mail. Shall we go see what it is, Commander?

Asashio and I have always been together. Yup, we even sleep in the same bed. She's so quiet when she's sleeping.|We might not always be able to stick together, but we'd never leave anyone behind... That's why this place feels like home to me.|I've made you some tea. Take your time to savor it. By the way, is my tea-making ability to your liking?
New missions have appeared. I'll gladly help you with them, Commander.
A mission has been completed. You did a great job, Commander!
I am Arashio, the fourth Asashio-class destroyer. I was part of Destroyer Division 8 along with Ooshio, Michishio, and of course Asashio. Lastly... I hope I can stay with everyone this time around.
Commander, I won't say anything indecent, but there's one thing I want to tell you... Umm... I'll always be there to support you. Your side is the place where I truly belong.
I'll keep everyone out of harm's way.
Mmh... I try not to think about why we all got separated. Besides, we got to reunite here, so let's instead live our lives happily ever after.
Eeeeek! ... Is this truly necessary to become an adult?
Destroyer Arashio, here to join your fleet. I'll provide everyone with the support they need~
Now it'll be easier for me to avoid getting hurt. Thank you, Commander.
Why, I'm the MVP...? Hmm, this might not be so bad.
The shimmering of fireworks reflected across the water's surface... How enchanting and ephemeral...
Looks like you found me, Commander. Hehe, want to light some fireworks with me? Spending time together should be more fun than being alone, right?
Is this... a new sparkler? Thanks, Commander~
Commander, do you like fireworks? In that case, I'll help you light some~

Sparklers might not be as gorgeous as the fireworks that blossom in the sky, but it's nice to be able to have something you can enjoy at your own pace.|Asashio, will you be able to remember this place? Try not to get lost, okay?|It's so quiet along the river bank... You can even hear the soft crackling of fireworks.
Commander, I'm really glad I get to enjoy fireworks with you and the others~
Eek... Are you doing this because there are no people nearby...?
Looks like you found me, Commander. Hehe, want to light some fireworks with me? Spending time together should be more fun than being alone, right?
Heh-heh! Prepare to get served!
A submarine's gotta take care of her skin if she goes diving a lot. Not much you can do about the tan, though!
Balao-class submarine – Archerfish, Hull Number SS-311.
Commission goodies, coming in! If I bring them to you, will you gimme YOUR goodies? Ahaha~♪
There are tons of reasons nobody thinks you're hot. Cough up some dough, and I'll give you a crash course on why~ Ahaha~
Got plans to go anywhere today? I might tag along and keep you company.
It feels soooo good to sneak between that sleeping fox's tails and floof them~ Though I'll admit, it's not cool to disturb someone's sleep like that. Ahaha~
Here's some yummy soup for you, made with lots of love! Teehee~ Wanna taste test it? All righty, but what do you say we skip the spoon... and have you lick it from my finger instead~?
Well, well, finally able to keep up with me, huh? But now's where the real fun begins! Grab my hand and let's go on a date!
All I get is a headpat? I was expecting something more... Hehehe~
Welcome back home, daaaarlin'~ Ahah! Look at you blushing again! Hahahaha!
What a pain in the ass...
Wake up, Commander! It's time to get to work! If you slack off, that's gonna be a paddling~
They beat me once, so what? I'll get 'em next time!
New mail? Could I have a look at it? I'll have to get real, real close to do it~

You've gotta focus when you're working, Commander! ...Let me guess, you can't focus with me around, right? Hahaha~|Start paying attention to me, or I'll leave to take a trip around the world. Okay, I'm exaggerating. I'd just go gather data on the areas around the port.|Y'know, Commander... A voyage is a lot more fun with a hot girl within arm's reach.
Skilled and sexy commanders don't keep girls waiting... for mission results, that is~
Mission complete! Aren't you glad I have both brains and good looks~?
I'm part of the Balao class, plus I hold the record for the biggest ship ever sunk by a submarine! I doubt anyone's ever gonna beat it.
I knew this was coming when you called for me outta nowhere~ Don't be nervous now, just hold still and close your eyes. We're gonna do some hot stuff, you and I ♡
Once you commit, there's no pulling out~ Ahaha~!
Hm? What's up? Did something neat happen? Come on, tell me!
Nuh-uh, you have to earn it~ No more groping like this, got it? Hahaha~
Mm hmm~ So you're the Commander? Teehee. You're a total hottie, so wanna go out with me? Like right now? ...Heh, just kidding~ You should see how red your face is~ Ahaha, you're a funny one~!
Don't you think I'm even hotter now? Hahaha~
This is just par for the course when you sortie me~
Albacore's been teasing you? Give me specifics, so I know what to do for future reference... Err, so we can work out a way to deny her, I mean! Yeah, that's it!
You're our lucky guest today, Commander~ You get a taste of my secret concoction... Excuse me, I meant to say "cocktail!" Relax, it won't do anything weird to you~ Probably. Ahaha~
What's this drink... "Bluest Blue?" Ah. The name alone makes it obvious Bluegill came up with it. It's just carbonated water on the rocks.
Welcome to a paradise of relaxation and recreation! Where you can get skip a little work and nobody'll find out~

What happens when you give a Meowfficer bunny ears? It gets promoted to a hare admiral! Hahaha~|Shinano's not coming? That sucks. I already mixed a special cocktail for her and everything!|You deserve a super special reward for all your hard work, Commander~ What kind of reward? Hahaha~ Well, what do you want?
Hm? Got something on your mind? Just say it, I promise I won't poke fun of you for it~
Don't you start making excuses now! The drinks I served you were alcohol-free!
You're our lucky guest today, Commander~ You get a taste of my secret concoction... Excuse me, I meant to say "cocktail!" Relax, it won't do anything weird to you~ Probably. Ahaha~
Would you look at that – we're sat next to each other in class. Looking forward to doing some "extracurricular activities" with you this term. Hehehe~
nil|nil|nil
The enemy is here! Be careful of fire hazards!
Um... even though I've been living here, I'm still not used to being watched by you... Am I... weird? Ahaha...
A-class destroyer – Ardent, Hull Number H41.
Commander, I can see the girls who have finished the commissions. Let's go greet them, shall we?
I was mistaken for being so friendly with you... I'm sorry...
Say, Commander, do you think we get along with each other very well? Yes, yes! I too, think that you are very much like a close friend!
Commander, wanna eat something? I'll make it for you~ Don't worry, I know every food you like
For me, being old and grey together is fine... but... are you really fine with living such mild days yourself, Commander?
This is probably what daily life feels like, I think... Nothing too intense, just living on normally. So Commander, shall we continue to live our days just like this?
Huh... You're back as well, Commander
Want some snacks, Commander? I saved some for you.
Wha! Hurry and retreat, or else we'll get heatstroke!
Ah, you were just gone. A letter came by– Here.

Are you hungry, Commander? Let's have a lunch together?|Uh, C-Commander, are there spare parts? I want to do a bit of periodic checking~|Uh, have you heard about it? Ugh... so you've gotten bored of me... Just kidding~
You have a mission, you know? Good timing. I'm now letting you know what it is.
The reward is here, you know? Can I take it?

I am Ardent, the third ship of the A class destroyers. Hmm... I don't have much to say other than things about Glorious. But I worked during that time, you know? Well, with that out of the way, I'm happy that I got you meet you, Commander! I hope we can get along from now on, ok?
Even though we're married, we still have long times ahead... But even in days where things don't happen, as long as you are here, Commander, things won't get boring. Ehehe~
Just a little more...!
Umm... if we walk so close together, people might misunderstand...
Whaa! This kind of thing... At least wait until you're at home!
I'm moving over to your place today, Commander~ Take good care of me~
I feel happy to have been given your attention, Commander.
That was a good battle, cost performance wise~
Glorious and Acasta seem to have their lunchboxes... Good, I'm glad they didn't forget today. Commander, did you remember to bring yours as well?
Ehehe~ What do you think, Commander? If you're just going to say "cute," I won't know if you're talking about my school uniform or the chocolate I made...
Would you like some chocolate, Commander? Ehehe, there's no hard and fast rule that you can only give chocolate one day of the year!
Good day, Commander. Let's go have lunch on the rooftop today?
Woah! The chocolate's going to melt!
I put everything in the drawer. Both the mail and the love letters.

Acasta, when you're giving out chocolate, you have to lean up against the other person and whisper in their ear. Don't you think it's more heart-pounding that way?|Ark Royal gave me some chocolate! Unlike Glorious, she seems to be pretty good with her hands... Ahaha|I'll study hard for the glory of the Royal— Who am I kidding~♪ I just want to be with you today, Commander~
Did you want some chocolate? Mm, okay. I'll go make some for you.
Ehehe~ What do you think, Commander? If you're just going to say "cute," I won't know if you're talking about my school uniform or the chocolate I made...
I'm the Dungeon Master Bunny! Ehehe, it's a refreshing twist on a classic theme, right?
Welcome to Ardent's game house~! I'm here to provide fun and excitement for everyone as the GM– ...Ehehe, actually, I'm still learning as a play~♪
I brought juice for everyone! No need to be shy, Commander~♪
Welcome, Commander. What would you like to play today? A casual party game, or something more strategic?
There's going to be a penalty round for sure now...

Mmhmm, Glorious, all you have to do is toss this D20.|Err, wait a sec, what does the rulebook say...? ...Sorry, there's still a lot I need to learn.|Um... Commander, it's your turn. Goodness, please stop spacing out already~!
Do you have a question about the rules? Heheh~ Allow me to teach you what you need to know~
Hauuu?! Y-you didn't do that on purpose... did you?
Welcome to Ardent's game house~! I'm here to provide fun and excitement for everyone as the GM– ...Ehehe, actually, I'm still learning as a play~♪
Commander, don't you also think that these clothes are way cuter?
New outfit, new rigging, same ardent spirit! Ahaha, I'm serious~! Commander, thanks a lot~!
Good work out there, Commander! What culinary creation did Ardent come up with today? You'll find out soon enough!
Commander, did you miss my cooking? Hold on just a second~ it's coming right up!

Commander, I've found some hot date spots, wanna come with me some time?|Commander, what kind of lunch would you like me to pack you for tomorrow?|Hey, Commander, don't you think Acasta would be super cute if she got dolled up a bit?
I've finished organising the new missions. Don't forget to check them~!
Commander, just being around you has taught me a lot about how the fleet works. That's right~ you can just sit back and leave it to me~!
New outfit, new rigging, same ardent spirit! Ahaha, I'm serious~! Commander, thanks a lot~!
Listen up! Our pride rides on this battle! Let's take this seriously!
...Idiot! Did no one teach you that it's rude to stare at a girl?!
Arethusa-class light cruiser – Arethusa, Hull Number 26!
The commission team is back. Hurry up and check the results from them, you idiot!
I cannot acknowledge a commander like you!
I do not acknowledge a Commander like you! Hmph!
Don't get carried away! I came here because of a tasty cake! It's still too early for me to acknowledge you!
You do have some positive qualities... Hmph! My opinion of you is slightly improved! There's still a lot for you to do!
Umm... Good work... I mean, it's nothing! I just made some snacks since I felt like it, so hurry up and eat them!
You're so lacking at work that you're only good at returning here!
Commander, I'm gonna get angry if you don't take this seriously!
Ugh... How could I fall here... of all places...
It's your mail so hurry up and get it. ...It's not like I'm concerned about who it's from! Hmph!

Even if they are allies, I will not show mercy to any threat towards  my comrades!|...Leaving me alone like this... I-I'm not feeling lonely or anything!|Hmph! You suck, Commander, so stop making me worry about you!
Idiot! Stop sleeping! There's a new mission!
Doesn't the reward suit you just fine? Hurry up and get it!
I am the Arethusa class treaty cruiser, Arethusa: the first cruiser in the world designed with vertical armor! --Hmph! The fact that I'm amazing was decided from the beginning!
You dummy. You're making this too formal! This... should've been done a while ago...
If we keep doing this dillgently, it will all work out!
I-it's not like I'm fond of being touched by an idiot like you! ...I just feel sorry for you since you're so lonely!
Aaah! Pervert! Molester! Lewd! Go and die!
You can be at ease now that I, Arethusa, have come. If anything, Commander, don't you dare become my hindrance!
Commander, don't get in my way!
Hmph! I will not acknowledge you just because you complimented me!
Everyone, be on the lookout for enemy airstrikes!
Though I sometimes wish Yuugure would be a little more independent, thinking about that... feels a bit lonely.
Hatsuharu-class destroyer no. 5 - Ariake
Commander, while you were spacing out, the commission has already finished~
Do all commanders go through a rebellious phase?
Ariake-class? Ah! There was something like that at some point but it was changed back later, not that I mind. What about Yuugure? Well...
Although Yuugure is sometimes a bit clingy, that's part of what makes her cute. Hey Commander, if I was to cling to you, would you be happy?
Having taken care of Yuugure, Shiratsuyu, and sometimes even Shigure for such a long time, I can't just flip the switch so easily and become clingy and dependent myself...
Hmm, hmm. Yeah, it might not be a bad idea to become Commander's little sister. What do you think? My domestic skills are of the charts, you know?
Good work, Commander.
Things are getting... a little messy...
Commander, did you sleep well? We might get a bit busy today~
I wouldn't mind resting up in the docks if not for this whole getting beat up thing...
Commander, I left your mail in a pretty visible place, so go take a look later.

Commander, did you know that Shiratsuyu and Shigure technically are my sisters, considering that they were Ariake-class? |Commander, if you don't develop good lifestyle habits now, it'll come back to bite you in the rear later. |Commander, want a bento? I'll make your portion along with Yuugure's this evening.
Looks like we've got new missions. Any transport operations? Those are my specialty~
Come to think about it, Yuugure always has to tell me whenever she finishes a mission...

I formed the 27th DesDiv along with Yuugure, Shiratsuyu, and Shigure. Since I was the eldest, I suppose that made me the big sister... We got along well and worked hard throughout various campaigns, but in the end, Shigure was the only one left... Well, that's war for you~
See, super-domestic little sisters are in high demand right now! But... I will admit it's a little embarrassing~♪ Hehe... From now on, you can depend on me even more. I'm very confident in my skills~
Now's our chance.
Jeez, Yuugure, don't pull on my... Wh-what? I mistook Commander for Yuugure?
Jeez, Commander, you're not a child anymore, so please have some tact.
I'm Ariake of the Hatsuharu class. Commander, pleased to meet you... Ah right, I just remembered! Is Yuugure posted here? If so, she hasn't been causing any trouble for you, has she?
Take care of your anti-air~!
MVP, huh? I'm satisifed as long as I was able to help~
Parties are "a world of adult pleasures...?" Hmm, who's been putting weird ideas into Yuugure's head? ...Could it be you, Commander?
Hope everyone enjoys the oodles of balloons I made for this party! Yeah, I'm sure the little girls will love 'em!
As promised, I'll now be your doting little sister~ Mmhmm, take good care of me, Commander~
Phew... Time for a little break...
Commander, want a balloon? I have all kinds here!

Yuugure, it's not every day we get to attend a party like this, so you should show off your stuff! Besides, you look super cute in your dress. Right? See~?|If we tied a balloon to Shiratsuyu, she wouldn't get lost easily, right? After all, we'd be able to see it from anywhere.|Who's been going around telling kids that you can fly if you tie a bunch of balloons together? ...Hatsushimo, can you stop giving them strange ideas?
You want to be my dance partner? Ah, um! Sure, if you're fine with that.
Woah?! Ah, Commander, you made my balloon fly off...
Hope everyone enjoys the oodles of balloons I made for this party! Yeah, I'm sure the little girls will love 'em!
Yuugure has come a long way. She's no longer the little girl constantly tugging at my sleeves asking for help.
Ah... So this is what it feels like to be retrofitted. I'll work harder for your sake, and for everyone in the 27th Destroyer Division~
Good work~ Here's your tea~
You seem pretty busy today too. But don't worry, I'll help you out~

Yuugure's all grown up now. When I stand next to her, you can't even tell who's the older sister anymore! Ehehe...|Wish I got as big an upgrade to my ability to take care of people as I did to my firepower. It's not just Yuugure, it's practically the entire 27th Destroyer Division... I just can't keep up with all of them.|Here Commander, your lunchbox. I made a portion for Yuugure as well.
Jeez, Commander, why are you tugging on my sleeve like Yuugure now?
Ah... So this is what it feels like to be retrofitted. I'll work harder for your sake, and for everyone in the 27th Destroyer Division~
This time, I will protect all that I want...!
Even me? ... Thank you very much!
Pennsylvania-class Battleship –  Arizona, Hull Number BB-39!
The wind... A sign of the girls' return
I wonder where I truly belong?
Ahh... Apologies. I was thinking about something sad again...
...Thank you for always listening to me... I've been feeling much better now...
I feel safe around you, Commander... I feel as if I'm not afraid to look ahead after thinking about what happened back then...
I'm sorry... Ah, no, I'm just a little afraid... 'What if Commander doesn't come back after this mission?'... I can't stop my tears just thinking about it...
It's great to be back, safe and sound.
I can't cry!... I have to cry for happy times...!
Commander, do you understand my feelings for wanting to protect my friends?
No more... Just this once, please let me have it my way...
Commander, there's a mail for you. Interpersonal relationships are important.
As long as I'm in Commander's memory, I'll never be alone|In order to not forget about them... they... have always been with me|Commander, did my facial expression bother you? I'm sorry...
Commander... the... the missions. They're not done, you know?
Here's the list, but... Are the physical rewards really that important...?

I am the second ship of the Pennsylvania class battleships, born during summer, Arizona. 
Yes... the 'Tears of Arizona' is referring to me, but it's a little sad to call them tears... you see...
I won't let that day happen again' you say? ...Thank you. Those are the words that resonated with my heart the most in my life... I believe in you!
This time, I'll protect everyone!
I've become calmer now...
Uh- Let's pretend that it didn't happen, alright?
I am the second ship of the Pennsylvania class, born during summer, Arizona. This time, I won't let that tragedy repeat itself...
I will protect everyone...!
This feels great... It would be good if the nightmares go away at this rate...
I'll give it my best shot...!
Both in the past and present, being able to help your friends in various ways outside of battle is something to be happy about. Hm? You feel happy just from being with me...?

I heard these clothes are from the Dragon Empery, but they're a bit... Umm, it's not that I dislike them, but the thought of you seeing me in them is rather embarrassing... B-but it's not like I'm going to start crying...
The girls seem to be back from their commissions. Good tidings arrive on the wind.

I left the handkerchief I use to wipe my tears back at home. ...I had some trouble finding a good place to stow it away, and moreover, I don't feel like I'll be crying all that much. There's no need for you to worry, Commander.
Pennsylvania? Oh, it's...
My desire to protect my friends... has been made possible here. Hehe, of course I'll continue to give it my all.
Time to evacuate? Understood!

If wearing this outfit means I can help my friends make wonderful memories, I don't mind doing it.|Do you think I should try to learn some dance steps from a real dancer? Would it be okay if I asked California for help?|Oh, Commander... there's something on your cheek. Let me wipe it off... and done.
The mission rewards have arrived. It's always nice to have extra supplies.
Stay calm, Arizona...
Please keep this a secret from my sister...

I heard these clothes are from the Dragon Empery, but they're a bit... Umm, it's not that I dislike them, but the thought of you seeing me in them is rather embarrassing... B-but it's not like I'm going to start crying...
Dancing might not be my strong suit, but I know how to fight!
Is that it? Hah! Swordfish squadron, prepare for battle!
voiceline.oath: Fulmar squadron, Swordfish squadron, prepare to launch!

voiceline.line: Ark Royal, ready for inspection!
voiceline.oath: Commander, I'll take care of the destroyers... Err, WE'LL take care of the destroyers! As long as we're around, no one can do them harm!

voiceline.line: Aircraft carrier – Ark Royal, Hull Number 91!
Commissions have been completed, Commander. If there are any cute destroyers in the fleet, allow me to welcome them back myself.
You can't compare with the destroyers, Commander...
I... I'm going to say this in advance, but... those destroyer girls... u-um... I kid of... I mean... I kind of hold them dear... I know how to mind my manners... It's not... it's not a crime!
I thought you were finally going to have me Court Martialed, Commander! I'm grateful to finally be recognized by you. It's nothing to be ashamed of? Commander, I, Ark Royal, will follow you forever!
G-good grief... If you were the same size as those destroyers, Commander, I wouldn't be so embarrassed... I was fine with doing this with the little ones... but with you...

If I were closer to you, Commander, I could get closer with the destroyers too... Of... of course, that can only happen with your approval. I'm more than happy to help you with destroyer inspections! Is that all right, commander?
Is it time for a break? I'm going to see my destroyer sisters then!
If only a destroyer would give me a hug!
Ready for orders, Commander. I am confident in any kind of battle!
voiceline.oath: Commander, I am ready to act. I mean ready to fight, of course! Let us show the enemy the might of a Royal Navy aircraft carrier!

voiceline.line: Damn, trapped!
Do you need to me read out your mail, Commander?
