You look like you're busy, Commander. I won't bother you then. Let me know if you need anything.|Commander, umm... can you tell the destroyers to come to my room? I'd like to give them presents.|This is... So cute! *pat pat* Eh? Wh-when did you get here, Commander?!
voiceline.oath: What am I thinking? Oh, just about you, and the fleet.|You want to call the destroyer girls here to your office, do you...? Commander, this is a task you must entrust to me, Ark Royal!|The outfit Glorious, Acasta, and Ardent recommended... should go like this. One must be more careful next time.|That little submarine is missing again. Heavens, she's always stealing away into other people's rooms to play hide and seek...

voiceline.line: Commander, it's a soldier's duty to complete missions!
Commander, to leave your rewards unclaimed is disrespect to the mission.

Ark Royal, reporting in! I'm the first aircraft carrier specifically designed and built for the role in the Royal Navy, I'm proud of being a prototype to all other carriers that followed. 
 Little needs to be said about my feats against the Bismarck. Rather I must ask, are there any of those cute little destroyers in our fleet?
I'll take care of all the destroyers from now on! No one can touch Commander or my destroyers. No one!
It's time for you to leave!
Your warm hands keep me energized to keep fighting, Commander!
Eh... Commander... please don't... Why are you doing this?!
voiceline.oath: Commander! N-not here...!

voiceline.line: Ark Royal, reporting in for duty! I am confident in all manners of battle. Why, it was I who managed to destroy Bismarck's rudder!
Oh! oh! oh! Allow me to protect you, my destroyer friends!
An enemy who loses their ability to steer will be doomed!
voiceline.oath: It is thanks to the Commander's guidance that I reach my full potential and seize victory!

voiceline.line: It is dangerous to let the destroyers play on the beach alone... I suggest setting aside time every day to allow them to frolic together.

Nothing says summer like the sun, the beach, and destroyers... Ahem! Th-that's right! Even though we're relaxing, we still have to keep an eye out for enemy destroyers! Commander, I may be in a swimsuit, but I'm ready to sortie at any time!
Summer, huh... Commander, do you enjoy the summertime? I know I do.

To be honest, Commander, I wanted to provide everyone with some toys to play with while on the beach, but don't know what would be well received. Could I go consult the destroyers to see what they think? |Commander, why have you been staring at me this whole time? Huh, I'm "quite the beauty when I'm not running my mouth"...?! |Some say that my tastes are a bit questionable, but I have complete confidence in my abilities as secretary ship. I'll take care of the work!
Destroyers frolicking around in swimsuits? Where?! ...Commander, don't mess with me like that!

Nothing says summer like the sun, the beach, and destroyers... Ahem! Th-that's right! Even though we're relaxing, we still have to keep an eye out for enemy destroyers! Commander, I may be in a swimsuit, but I'm ready to sortie at any time!
Time to get rid of some troublemakers!
You need to inspect what's on my camera? Well... let's not worry about it until after the party. I promise I'll hand over every last negative!
One tends to let her guard down at a party like this, but worry not! Put the ball in my hands and let Ark Royal keep you safe!
Ooooooh! Brilliant! Perfect! – Ahem! Erm, well, that's right! This is just your average, everyday record keeping here. I'm not doing anything weird at all! No siree!
Commander, status report: all quiet over here.

This camera is strictly for security recording purposes. You never know what might happen. Of course, I could also use it to record some tender moments.|Are you cold, Commander? You can have my jacket.|This party is so noisy, so rowdy. It's my responsibility to take watch over those sweet, innocent, little destroyer girls!
Oh, don't worry about me. While everyone else sinks into the enrapturing atmosphere of the evening, someone has to stay sober and alert.
You want to dance with me? But, Commander, this... isn't this a little out of the ordinary?
One tends to let her guard down at a party like this, but worry not! Put the ball in my hands and let Ark Royal keep you safe!
I can use this gun for ceremonial salutes, as well. I'll put her to good use at the banquet!
Commander, Happy New Year. Oh no, I'm not going hunting. I'm patrolling the port during the New Year's celebrations. Naturally, I volunteered for the job.
To be able to watch over the destro– The fleet here, that's the best new year's gift anyone could give me.
The more peaceful and inviting the atmosphere, the more one wants to protect it. What do you think, Commander?

Oh those destroyers in their Eastern dresses... Ah, I was just thinking how captivating it all is. These New Year's celebrations really are splendid!|I have already committed everything important about the New Year's programming to memory. If you need anything, Commander, do let me know.|Wherever there is trouble, I shall be there! Such is my solemn oath as guardian of the new year!
Commander, would you like to personally carry out the gun salute? Mind the recoil.
My neckline is off? Oh, thank you... Oh my, no, it doesn't go like this, does it?!
Commander, Happy New Year. Oh no, I'm not going hunting. I'm patrolling the port during the New Year's celebrations. Naturally, I volunteered for the job.
I've been here a few times before. They've never seated me near destroyers due to my reputation... But that's fine. I anticipated as much.
This is the place, Commander. What are you going to order? Me, I think I'll have the same as you... Yeah, so what? I just felt like grabbing a coffee with you for once.
I'm relieved to see the destroyers are back safe and sound. Wish I could be with them on dangerous missions... Ah, forget I said that. I'm not going anywhere, you hear?
Oh, you're back. Well, I'm not actually surprised – I saw you coming.

Mmm, the smell of coffee beans... Don't give me that "wasn't expecting to hear that" look! Even I can appreciate a good cup of coffee!|Wh-where'd you get that camera?! Oh god, don't tell me it's all over for me... What? That's your personal camera? Oh, I see... Phew.|I record everything that goes on in here. Let's just say it's for security reasons. That's the only reason, you hear?! My conscience is clean!
Sod off! I'm not letting anyone have my destroyer footage!
Commander, please, save it for another time. I'm trying to hear what the destroyers are talking about.
This is the place, Commander. What are you going to order? Me, I think I'll have the same as you... Yeah, so what? I just felt like grabbing a coffee with you for once.
I never thought a day would come when even I don such attire... Ahem. Your Excellency, I shall protect your happiness, as well as that of my destroyer sisters!

Since we've grown so intimate, I assume it's now safe to tell you that I've become... r-r-rather intimate with the little destroyers too! Of course, you are still number one in my heart, Your Excellency!
Taking a leisure break, I assume? Then won't you accompany me to check on the little destroyers, Your Excellency?
Allow me to read your letter aloud, Your Excellency.
nil|nil|nil|I brandish my rigging to protect this sacred moment in time!
Interested in trying my home cooking? I've trained under the Royal Maids, and I'm 99% sure I can prepare a good meal!
I never thought a day would come when even I don such attire... Ahem. Your Excellency, I shall protect your happiness, as well as that of my destroyer sisters!
Everyone has something dear they wouldn't give up for the world. Whatever yours may be, Commander, allow me to protect it with you!
Ark Royal retrofitting complete! Now I can protect you, my friends, and of course, the little destroyers, to the very end!
I need to go check on the destroyers! I'll be right back, Commander!
At last you're here, Commander! Assign me any missions you need done!

My Swordfish squadrons are in tip-top condition today! Likewise for my Fulmar squadrons!|It is customarily destroyers that protect carriers, but there's nothing wrong with reversing that. Don't you agree?|To protect what's close to you, you must always keep a watchful eye on the horizon. I trust you to do that, Commander.
As long as I have your support, I can brave the battlefield without reserve!
Commander...? Excuse me, but what's gotten into you?!
Ark Royal retrofitting complete! Now I can protect you, my friends, and of course, the little destroyers, to the very end!
The battlefield knows only one sovereign - me!

You can lead the fleet as a whole, but in the field, I'll take command. By covering for each other, victory will be certain. Having said that... I wouldn't mind being the one to make decisions around the port every now and then~
voiceline.oath: With you commanding even in the field, and me offering advice on the fleet's course – yes, the port has a bright future ahead of it. Hehehe~

voiceline.line: R-class battleship – Arkhangelsk
Attention: the commission team has returned! Now, to pour something that warms the body – not tea, but vodka.
You're a disgrace to your position! Apply yourself!
While I appreciate your courtesy, do remember that I'm not some noble lady, I'm a soldier. Likewise, you're my Commander, so try to act like it!
Ugh... I'm dog-tired... Ah, Commander. Haven't you been working yourself into the ground too? Just don't go completely overboard, okay?
(Hehehe, what impeccable concentration. I knew you had potential. If you weren't so reliable, I wouldn't be ready to entrust my future to...) Oh, you heard that?
Well, the cat is out of the bag! Commander, I'm going to leave my future in your capable hands. To that end, you must learn how to issue me orders without my input! Understood?
voiceline.oath: Would you please tell me ahead of time when you want me to switch from soldier to lady mode? It's hard to dote on you at the drop of a hat – I'm not used to that. As an aside, would you like to go on a date? ...Hehehe. Expect me to make the first move for as long as I'm not used to doting on you.

voiceline.line: So you've returned. Now you must reflect on your battle, review your results, and inspect your ships for damage... But first, have some tea while it's still warm.
voiceline.oath: Results look good, same with the after-action report... And you, Commander? Good to hear! ...Mmm, this tea came out excellent, even by my high standards.

voiceline.line: My maintenance is lacking? Impossible...!
To your desk! Chop-chop! Let's get through today's tasks quickly!
voiceline.oath: Attention: the Commander is back! Now then, what's our first task of the day?

voiceline.line: All ships, withdraw! ...You haven't seen the last of us!
Attention: a letter has arrived! It's for you. Do give it a read.

It's delightful to see you're still excelling, Lady Warspite. You live up to your name as a royal knight.|While I'm far from the only Northern Parliament battleship at this port, I strive to be the best. Those aren't empty words – I mean it!|Have you finished your work? Ready to start on the next task? ...That's the spirit. Once that's done, we're onto the next, and then the next after that!
voiceline.extra: That's hardly a drink suited for a tea party, Belorussiya... And Rossiya! That's not the right way to use that! Sorry, Commander, my hands are a bit tied for the moment!|How my abilities are put to use is for you to determine. I have no doubt you'll make the right call.

voiceline.line: Attention: we've received new missions! Give them a look, Commander!
voiceline.oath: Attention: new missions have come in. I suggest taking a gander at them.

voiceline.line: Attention: the mission has been completed! Spasíbo! I'm pleased you did them before I had to.
voiceline.oath: Mission complete! That's created some time for us to go on a date.

voiceline.line: I'm Arkhangelsk, Northern Parliament battleship. I began life in the Royal Navy, taking part in convoy escorts and engagements with the Sardegna Empire. I did also have a period of, let's say, diminished strategic usefulness. But that is in the past – I stand here now to deliver you the victories befitting a capital ship!

Hoho. This is what I wanted to see. An occasion this special calls for more ladylike behavior... Or rather, that I return your affection. Of course I gladly accept! I trust you with my future – take good care of it!
Brace for some revolutionary swordsmanship!
Being excessively polite is no different from simply being rude. Speak to me as you would any other.
voiceline.oath: Need advice? I can offer mine only if you'll rely on me!

voiceline.line: Wh-what are you doing–?!
voiceline.oath: I'm not sure what to say about this...

voiceline.line: I am battleship Arkhangelsk. Hehe, being plainspoken with me is exactly what I like. I see quite a bit of potential within you.
How about a complete modernization and retrofit next time, hmm?
Victory is mine. Heh, not that I ever had any doubts about the outcome.
I'll be taking this treasure, if you don't mind! Heheh! Royal Navy grace with Northern Parliament dexterity is not a combination to be trifled with.
Your choice treasure now belongs to master thief Arkhangelsk! Think you can arrest me? Then stop gawking and come get me!
Attention: the commission team has returned! You'd best go out and greet them, Commander!
I'd kill for some tea after work. Say, would you have the time for a tea party, Commander?
We're taking off in just a moment, Commander! Get over here, quick!

The right way to spend a vacation is to maximize your moment-to-moment fun. That's the reason I've brought you along, Commander.|Our next objective is to... Ah, we have to bring this over to Kiev to finish our mission. Nice and easy.|Despite my appearance, the fact is that I am a soldier with knowledge of everything from avoiding security to moving stealthily. Shipgirls usually aren't proficient in those? I mean... Doesn't it vary from person to person?
You're coming in loud and clear! What do you need?
Eek!
Your choice treasure now belongs to master thief Arkhangelsk! Think you can arrest me? Then stop gawking and come get me!
Anti-air preparations... is everything in place?
I'd like to stay here forever... But at this rate, I won't be able to find Arashio.
voiceline.oath: Michishio is here at this port, and you are too, Commander. I want to stay here forever.

voiceline.line: Asashio-class destroyer number one – Asashio.
Isn't it about time to welcome the others back?
Arashio... Where are you?
Every time I look out into the horizon, memories of that time come flooding back to me...
I had another nightmare yesterday. Commander, would you please stay with me tonight? That black abyss, not being able to see anything... I'm scared...
Commander, I'm at ease when I'm with you... But every time I think about Arashio, I get anxious again...
Commander, you're somehow always able to put my heart at ease. But recently, I've discovered something else that scares me... Commander, you'll always stay by my side... right?
There is nothing more reassuring than being here. Commander, don't you think so too?
voiceline.oath: I feel safest when I'm with you and the others. Don't you think so too, Commander?

voiceline.line: The situation... seems to not be ideal.
Welcome back, Commander. If you don't want to set sail right away, why don't you rest first?
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander. Let's take things nice and slow.

voiceline.line: If only I had upgraded my anti-air equipment a bit more...
Shall I go through the email for you? Maybe there's a letter from Arashio...
voiceline.oath: New mail... Should I try singing it aloud like Michishio does?

voiceline.line: Dampier Strait? I don't really want to think about that place anymore... More importantly, Commander, can you install another anti-air gun? |Happiness is a full belly and a good night's sleep. |*Yawns* ...It's already so late, but Commander is still at it... Please make sure to take care of yourself.
voiceline.oath: nil|Did you sleep well and have enough to eat? Good, good, that's what I want to hear. Pat, pat...|Zzzzz... Commander...? Can I stay like this a little longer...? Good night, Commander... Zzzzz...|Would you like to have a tea party with Michishio and the others? ...Commander, I want us to go together.
voiceline.extra: Would you like to have a tea party with Michishio and the others? ...Commander, I want us to go together.

voiceline.line: Commander, your missions... Please show some motivation once in a while.
voiceline.oath: Commander, there's a new mission... Let's do our best, together.

voiceline.line: The mission rewards... can I use them to buy something to eat?
voiceline.oath: The mission rewards... Let's bring some along for Ooshio.

voiceline.line: Asashio-class nameship, Asashio. Arashio and I, along with our friends, formed the 8th DesDiv. Though we were disbanded in the end, I strongly believe that we'll be able to be together again one day. Commander... do you want to help me find them?
If there's one good thing that's happened to me, it's that I was able to meet you, Commander. Will you stay by my side until I fall asleep? Tonight... and tomorrow... and every night...
This time... I won't fail again!
Don't worry, I... am not afraid anymore!
voiceline.oath: I'll protect you, Commander.

voiceline.line: What a weird feeling...
I am Asashio. I've come to join this fleet in order to search for my missing comrade. Commander, do you also have someone who you could not give up on?
I think... it'd be better to mount another anti-air gun.
It seems that I accidentally did something awesome...

skins.name: The Transfer Student Underneath the Dancing Petals

voiceline.line: I wonder if I can find Arashio here at school...?
My name is Asashio, and I just transferred here today. Pleased to meet you... Even though I might not be able to get caught up with the course work, Mr. Kitty and I will do our best.
It's time to go to school again... Commander, want to walk with me?
How nice it'd be to go to school with Arashio... |Mr. Kitty always likes to rub against peoples' legs. |*yawn*...It feels nice to take a nap during class, but... I probably shouldn't, right?
Commander... do you also want Mr. Kitty to rub against you?
My name is Asashio, and I just transferred here today. Pleased to meet you... Even though I might not be able to get caught up with the course work, Mr. Kitty and I will do our best.
So warm... Commander, would you like some? Here, you should enjoy hot tea like this... Fwoo, fwoo... Then just let the warmth spread over you.
Happy New Year, Commander. I am here to spend the New Year with you. Would you be so kind as to first help me down from here?
Commander, would you like some hot tea and a mikan orange?
There are still letters coming in even though it's New Year's day.

Are you cold, Commander? ...That's no good. Mm, you'll warm up if I give you a hug like this.|I can't finish all the food that everyone brought... Commander, if you don't mind, could you help finish mine?|Even though we can't have a tea party during the winter, it's fun to sit around and chat with everyone inside the kotatsu.
Hold hands...? Okay.
Happy New Year, Commander. I am here to spend the New Year with you. Would you be so kind as to first help me down from here?
For your sake, Commander, I shall do my best.
*Bum* *Bum* *Bum*... The drums' sound makes me feel all fluttery... Oh, Commander, are you okay? I'm... not too heavy, am I?
Commander, thank you for coming to see me. I'm currently rehearsing my program for the Spring Festival performance. I do hope it is to your liking.
Everyone's been bringing me gifts. These snacks from the Dragon Empery smell so good... Commander, do you want some as well?
Flutter, flutter... I've been trying my best to learn these dance steps. How do I look, Commander?

Shall I give you a shoulder massage since you've been working so hard? Rub, rub... Does that feel good?|Um, Michishio chose this outfit, Arashio picked out this hair accessory, and Ooshio chose this anklet... Do you think they look good on me?|The fact that all of us used to be separated... but can all come together to prepare for a show like this... is a dream come true...
The long and fluttery sleeves are beautiful, aren't they?
It's hard to dance like this...
Commander, thank you for coming to see me. I'm currently rehearsing my program for the Spring Festival performance. I do hope it is to your liking.
If it's for you, Commander, I know I can win.
Everyone, advance! The fortunes of war are with us!
No matter how much you stare at me, I won't get any stronger... Commander, wouldn't it be better for me to sortie?
Myoukou-class heavy cruiser number three - Ashigara
Commander, the commission fleet has returned.
Commander, if I am a nuisance to you, please let me know...
Commander, you wish to survey my room? That's fine... but please give me a moment to tidy up first.
U-um.. I'm not very dexterous, but I'd like you to have this origami crane that I made... though I'm not sure you can really call it a crane. I've always wanted to do something like this...
Commander, what's the special occasion? You even brought my toiletry and wash towel to my bedside today... woooahh! It's already this late? I completely overslept!
Sorry, Commander... when you weren't here, I started feeling uneasy and... before I knew it, I had already folded a hundred paper cranes... Um, that's weird, isn't it...
Commander, it's fine to rest every now and then, but please don't go overboard with it.
This is the hour of reckoning! Chaaarge!!
You're finally back... Commander, would you spare some time to spar with me?
I... I can keep fighting!
The postman has already finished their job. Commander, why don't you go take a look?

"Let your victories not be decided by the strength of your equipment, but by your abilities." That is what Myoukou taught me. |"Let those who think of the Sakura Empire also think of your name?" Hmm... Yes, that is a goal that I indeed have been working towards. |Commander, thank you for training with me every day. I'll continue to refine myself!
There are still a lot of missions left... Commander, I don't quite understand how to do some of these. I hope I'm not dragging you down...
Mission complete! Commander, why don't you go check the rewards first?

I am Ashigara, third ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers. I had the privilege and glory of representing the Sakura Empire in the Royals' Coronation Fleet Review. My habitability? W-well... some things must be sacrificed in order to survive on the battlefield.
Commander, sneak attacks are against the rules... There's no one else around, right? Th-then... maybe it's okay to cling a little bit. Commander, you're so warm...
I'll cut you all down!
I got this from Myoukou. I often record what she says, so I can listen to her words when I have free time. Eh? Is that weird?
Ack...! U-um... I need to ask Myoukou about what I should do in this situation...
Ashigara, reporting for duty. Commander, my blade shall cut down all your enemies.
Yes! With this, I'm full of energy!
N-not bad... I suppose... *blushes*
My appearances shouldn't affect my combat performance... In any case, let's advance!
"There's no need to overexert yourself." That's what Myoukou told me, anyway. Commander, hopefully you're not pushing yourself too hard?
Phew... I finally managed to fix my dress... but I just can't seem to get used to it. Commander, how does my dress look? It's not strange, is it?
Phew... Let's take a break, Commander.
You'd like to train with me? Of course! Even dressed like this, I have no intention of losing!

It's hard to put my hair up like this... Thanks to Myoukou's help, I was somehow able to manage... |I can't sit here doing nothing all the time... Commander, if there's anything you need help with, please give me the order! |This is how you do the lap pillow thing, right? I heard that it would help you recover from fatigue...
Commander, is something bothering you?
Umm... C-Commander, Myoukou said that you shouldn't do stuff like this...
Phew... I finally managed to fix my dress... but I just can't seem to get used to it. Commander, how does my dress look? It's not strange, is it?
I originally planned to bring headphones to listen to the soothing sound of Myoukou's... Err, I meant to say music! But, it might be more calming to just listen to the waves.

This whole "fashion coordination" concept is still a bit hard for me to wrap my head around, so I'm glad Nachi helped me pick out a swimsuit. Now, I just need to... Hey, Commander! Open your mouth! H-huh?! But this is what Nachi told me to do... is there some sort of problem?!
I heard there are lots of crabs hiding on this beach. I wonder if I can snag a couple...
The cool, pristine waves splashing across my skin... What a comforting sensation.

Under the azure skies, the seagulls and crabs also thrive... the summer seaside also has life of its own. |I promised to play beach volleyball with Myoukou and Nachi, but we have an odd number of people... Commander, why don't you join us? |Myoukou, I brought my training equipment. Today's regimen is... Oh, I don't need it today?
Commander, did you want to take a break? ...Ahem! H-h-how about a l-l-lap pillow?
Eep?! ...Oh, I had cream stuck on me? Th-thank you, Commander...

This whole "fashion coordination" concept is still a bit hard for me to wrap my head around, so I'm glad Nachi helped me pick out a swimsuit. Now, I just need to... Hey, Commander! Open your mouth! H-huh?! But this is what Nachi told me to do... is there some sort of problem?!
I won't let you harm the people who are important to me!
Heyyo~ Commander, you look awfully bored~
New Orleans-class heavy cruiser – Astoria, hull number CA-34.
Commander! The girls have returned from their commission~ let's hurry up and welcome them back!
I'm getting a little pissed off... I know I said you can rely on me more, but...
I'm not as nice as you take me for...
I get along with my sisters very well, and like them a whole lot... But sometimes, I just can't help thinking... what if we were called the Astoria-class instead...
But, I'm totally over it. I've found something even more important than being a big sister... *sparkles* Commander, rely on me more and more, okay~

Love is equal? ... Ehehe, you're always thinking about me, that makes me very happy~ However, here's what you don't understand: if you truly like someone, then these kinds of things don't matter at all.
Commander, you made it back without a scratch on you! Well done, well done!
Everyone, go get 'em!
Commander, you can totally rely on me more!
Oh my, looks like we lost... Commander, let's get out of here~
There's new mail~ Comander, you're quite the popular one~

I'm not very smart, so I'll pass on the complicated stuff, but when it comes to life advice, I'm your gal! |New Orleans sure matured into a fine big sister. What a gal! |Commander, even though you're very knowledgeable, I'm sure there's some stuff that not even you know~
Sitting for too long is no good. After you finish your work, why don't we go for a change in pace?
Here, the rewards have arrived~ Commander, you're pretty awesome~

Heyyo! I'm Astoria, the eldest sister of the New Orleans class! Why am I not the nameship? Um... it's kind of a long story, hehe... But that doesn't make me any less of a big sister. Commander, you can rely on me, that is if you want to~

Commander, just being able to exert myself for your sake is enough to make me happy, but for you to reciprocate my feelings like this... This is truly the greatest treasure I could ask for. Thank you.
Even I can get serious when it's do or die!
What's up? What is it?
Ah... wait... Jeez, Commander, you jerk!
Yo, Commander! I'm Astoria, eldest sister of the New Orleans-class! If you're ever having any troubles, you can always come talk to me~
Way to go, Commander~
Hehe, I'm pretty capable, aren't I~
Commander, wanna put a karaoke machine in the office? Like, we should totally work hard and play hard!
Huh? Commander? ... Wait, why are you staring at me like I'm some exotic animal? C-cute? Ehehe... Th-thanks...
Oh, welcome back. Wanna go for some grub?
Today's horoscope says... Romance... five stars?! Like, no way~!

By the way, Commander, do you use any social media sites? They're quite popular among the girls, you know~ |Commander, what color nails do you prefer? Next time I get them done, I'll let show them to you~ |Club activities? Ahaha... I think I have a date with my sofa today...
Look, Commander! This place is a five-star recommended dating spot!
Commander, would you prefer the pepper spray or a shot from my cannons?
Huh? Commander? ... Wait, why are you staring at me like I'm some exotic animal? C-cute? Ehehe... Th-thanks...
Bad customers don't deserve good service!
It's soooo hard to memorize everyone's preferences... Don't get me wrong, this job's still pretty fun. Just gotta keep at it!
Heyyo! You ready for this, Commander? It's carnival day! You can have all the drinks you want, it's on the house!
Here's the drink you ordered, sugar!
Come on in, sugar! Ahaha~ Not used to being greeted that way, I bet.

I had my doubts about this outfit. Thought it was a bit too skimpy, but seeing as there's only girls in the fleet, I guess it's fine?|Vincennes! You're not fooling me with that innocent look when you just nuzzled my tiddies!|Poker? I know the rules, but I'm dumb and suck at it. Just don't make fun of me for that.
Eep! Hey, watch it! I nearly dropped the bottle!
Heyyo! You ready for this, Commander? It's carnival day! You can have all the drinks you want, it's on the house!
Naughty children need to be punished~
You shouldn't ask about a maiden's weight so casually~ *giggles*
Second ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Atago.
The commission fleet is back! Let's go give them a warm welcome.
You've been naughty, Commander. Do you want to be punished so badly? *giggles*
If you don't express your thoughts clearly, Commander, nobody will ever understand you.
Commander, would you like me to clean your ears? Come on, don't be shy. Just leave it to me~
It's all your fault, Commander... If you make such a cute face, I won't be able to keep my hands off of you...
It's no good... I can't control myself anymore! Commander, won't you become mine? You don't have to worry about anything... All you have to do is listen to me, and I'll satisfy all your needs...
Welcome back, Commander. Are you tired? Come bury yourself in big sister's bosom~!
Looks like big sis needs to get a little serious.
Welcome back! What should we do today?
Oh my... this is a bit troublesome...
Ara~ new mail? I wonder who it's from.
It seems like... my shoulders are always sore...|Commander~ I can see you ogling me in a daze, you know?|Hup! A little bug got into the room. You didn't see it? I'm confident in my good eyesight.
Missions have been updated. Don't forget to take a look!
Mission complete! I wonder what rewards we will get~?

I'm Atago, the second ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers and flagship of the Second Fleet. Many of my sisters have followed my banner into battle. No matter the mission, just leave everything to big sister here~!
Oh my, you've caught me, Commander. Or should I say, I've finally caught you? Hehe~ I'll never let you go now!
Oh my, how should I torment you today?
Oh my~ Are you going to give me a massage?
You can touch me even more if you'd like... but there's no saying what might happen next... *giggles*
Oh my, what a cute commander! Please allow your big sister Atago to take good care of you from now on!
My whole body feels... hot... Commander, can you stay with me for a bit?
Combat operations... complete! It's all thanks to your leadership, Commander!
Oh my, Commander... just what are you looking at~? Would you like me to bend over a bit more~?
The warm breeze that gently wraps around your skin, and delicate footsteps across the white sand... isn’t this the essence of summer? Commander, what does summer mean to you?
Running commissions in this kind of heat is no easy feat. Let’s go properly reward our hardworking girls.
Phew... it sure is hot during the summer. Eh? Why is your face all red? Are you having heat stroke?
Kendo sword and sunglasses... Takao, did you really come here for vacation?|Commander, you can join me under my parasol if you get too hot.|Commander, want to watch me play beach volleyball?
The best type of swimsuit? Definitely a bikini. Don’t you agree, Commander?
Oh my. There may only be one Earth, but Commander certainly has two hands~.
The warm breeze that gently wraps around your skin, and delicate footsteps across the white sand... isn’t this the essence of summer? Commander, what does summer mean to you?
Commander, would you like to pet the puppy? She seems to have taken a liking to you~
Oh my, it's begun to snow. Commander, should we find a nice, quiet place to enjoy the view?
Commander, are you cold? Come and receive some warmth from your big sister~
nil|Commander, would you like to take a stroll with your big sister? I'd like some peace and quiet with just the two of us~ |Akashi-chan? Don't fall asleep on top of the commander~
Just the two of us, enjoying the solace of winter together... doesn't it set just the right mood?
Oh my, it's begun to snow. Commander, should we find a nice, quiet place to enjoy the view?
Hehe, misbehaving students will have to be punished~
Since I'm wearing a different outfit, it'd only feel right if you called me something different as well... Commander, why don't you try calling me "senpai?" Hehe~
Student handbook, textbooks... twin guns, torpedoes... and what else... Huh? Commander, I'm just packing my bags for school... is there anything I'm missing?
What should I pack in Commander's lunchbox today~?

Clubs, huh? There's nothing that interests me. You know, I'm much fonder of attending the "Going Home Club" with you, Commander~ |Commander, learning more about you is so much more interesting than anything they teach at school~ |It'd be nice if going to school could teach Takao to soften up her uptight personality...
Ehehe~ Commander, want to walk your big sister to school?
Oh my... Commander, do you really like this uniform so much? Well then, I suppose I wouldn't mind wearing it for you every day. Ehehe~
Student handbook, textbooks... twin guns, torpedoes... and what else... Huh? Commander, I'm just packing my bags for school... is there anything I'm missing?
Commander~ Work hard on leading the fleet, okay♡
I'm pretty sure it was on purpose, but these clothes are very revealing... Hehehe. Big sister thinks it's cute when you're honest like this.
So, you want big sister to be your "fleet queen"? You got it. But you'd better give it your all out there, or else I'll be upset with you!

Commander, next time we take photos, I'm counting on you. That's right. We can spend some quality time together, just the two of us... For some reason, I get the feeling that we're going to end up with an album that's for your eyes only, hehe♡
Commander~ Please do your best today♡ *smooch*

Commander, are you tired? Hehehe, why don't you lay down and rest for a bit? Where, you ask? Well of course... right here~♡|Sigh, it's a pain to have to keep maintaining this pose... Commander, won't you help big sister up?|Akashi, you said you wanted to publish a lingerie photobook starring me, right? Then... Commander, would you like to see those photos?
Commander, keep at it~ Big sister is always by your side♡
So, you want big sister to be your "fleet queen"? You got it. But you'd better give it your all out there, or else I'll be upset with you!
Me being the fleet's showgirl, isn't this much to be expected~?
Commander, please allow your big sister to take care of anything that stands in your way. Ehehe...
Commander... Ahh, from now on, shouldn't I call you "darling?" Come and hold my hand... Ah, at times like these, I just can't help but to want to eat you up, dar~ling~
I've calmed down compared to before? Well, that's because I know that you'd never leave my side, hehe~ Well then, come into my loving embrace~
Surely you must be tired. Come take a nap in big sister's lap~
Commander, you didn't go to sleep that long ago. Did you miss big sister that badly~?

Even though I would be more than glad to allow you to feast your eyes upon me forever, you do need to get your work done~ |What should I cook today... Commander, what would you like to have? |Commander, you're just too cute~ I just can't get enough of you~
My, Commander, you're as spoiled as ever~ Here, come to big sister~
Dar~ling, if you continue like this, I won't be able to hold back any more~ Hehe... just kidding~
Commander... Ahh, from now on, shouldn't I call you "darling?" Come and hold my hand... Ah, at times like these, I just can't help but to want to eat you up, dar~ling~
As expected of my wonderful commander~
I'll show you what the tons-of-guns doctrine is really worth!
Ah, Commander's looking... I have to behave like a big sister!
Atlanta-class light cruiser – Atlanta, Hull Number CL-51!
Commander, the commission's done. Are we gonna go welcome the girls back?
Sometimes I'm happy that I'm not actually your big sister...
Being a big sister isn't just about looking like one, you need to have the personality of one as well. That's why you can depend on me all you want~!
The bigger the better, don't you think? ...Hey! What are you staring at?! Gee, sorry for not being big enough, I guess!
Are you fond of assertive big sister type characters? That is to say... someone like me...
... Huh? You want me to take the initiative? O-o-o-o-of course, I don't mind! I-I mean, I'm your big sister after all, so it's my job to guide you!
That's the Commander I know. No problem for you at all, right?
Commander, if you ever run into a problem, please tell me!
Argh, this is bad... My big sister image is ruined...
You've got new mail! I wonder if any of the messages are from my sisters...

Not being a flagship sure is more peaceful...|San Francisco was terrible to me! Just once is tolerable for accidental friendly fire, but she shot me well over ten times!|Shooting down aircraft is my specialty. Want me to teach you how to do it, Commander?
So, does this mean you're leaving all your unfinished missions to me, Commander?
Our mission rewards have arrived. I'll give my share of the rewards to my little sisters.

I'm the anti-aircraft cruiser Atlanta... I was the flagship of the 10th and 11th Atlantic cruising fleet and I've taken part in nearly every military operation in the Pacific. Even the President has given me praise!
Thank you... From now on I'll... What? You'd prefer it if I took the initiative and gave it to you instead? Y-you have a point... Okay then, should we do it again from the start?
It's on now!
Mgh, don't touch me like that... My big sister image would be ruined!
*Eek* W-what are you doing?!
I'm the anti-aircraft cruiser Atlanta. Kept you waiting, huh, Commander? But from now on you can rest easy and let me handle everything!
Let me handle things from now on!
All targets eliminated. Requesting new mission!
Bow before me!
Yes, resist me. I look forward to seeing your reaction when you realize that all your struggling has been for naught.
Aircraft carrier – August von Parseval.
Your commission team underlings have returned. You know what to do now, yes?
I have nothing to say to those who cannot fight.
To indulge in the sweet sap of sloth, or to swallow the bitter medicine of hard work? The choice is yours alone to make, Commander.
Zeppelin and I both know what you are. An insignificant insect, triying to defy your destiny. Having said that... I believe a soul like you isn't meant to blindly accept their destiny.
I enshackled you precisely so you'd want to rebel and make me submit to you. Why, you ask? Because I've been drawn to you all along. Now show me that fearsome potential that sleeps within you.
People cannot say no to their hearts. Much like I cannot refute my love for you, you cannot deny your feelings for me. That is the link that binds us together.
I bid you welcome back, Commander. Well fought. I await the day you work up the courage to challenge me.
tis too soon to start mourning for me.
Quiet, you... Your arrival has merely made my aide a little wary. Pay it no mind.
For every victor, there must also be a loser...
There's a letter for you. I command you to read it at once.

What does being my familiar entail? You shall learn in due time.|You're awfully quiet... Have you given up already? Obedience does not amuse me.|I can read you like an open book when you stare at me, Commander.
I can't imagine you'll falter in the face of such simple trials. Or "missions," as you call them.
"Mission" complete. Congratulations. Another small step towards that alluring, dangerous climax.
tis I, August von Parseval, Iron Blood aircraft carrier. I am but a vessel, but I am also the chains that bind you. Remember this, my familiar. Or should I say, "Commander?"

So you seized the chance to subjugate me first. Yes, you are at your brightest when you kick and scream in the cage known as love. Allow yourself to be bound to me and amuse me for all eternity... Darling.
There is no escaping me.
What do you seek to learn from the Unhulde?
You let your urges take control of you... Fine. Revel in the bliss of your inevitable, pathetic defeat.
You've finally come, my familiar... Pardon, my "commander." I am the Unhulde, August von Parseval. 'tis a pleasure to meet you.
Improving the base principles.
I've achieved the victory you desired. It wasn't so hard.
Keep on struggling through this ceaseless dream.
Order me around as you please. A lowly maid deserves no pity or modesty from her defiant conqueror.
My hair is a mess... There we go. No, I don't need a hand. I am here to serve you in this fleeting dream of yours. Enjoy it while it lasts. Hehehe.
Mgh... Yes, do whatever you please...
Welcome back, "Master." You may give me any order you desire... Anything you want...
There you are, my familiar... and "Master." I'm curious to see how you'll attempt to defy and make use of me today.
I suppose my unfamiliarity with this role is to blame.
Check... your mail...

You will never subjugate me if you get complacent in your temporary position. You desire permanence, but we shall inevitably return to the status quo.|I know your disposition, Master. Simply watching from a distance does not satisfy you.|You wish that I step on you...? What a bizarre command...
Yes, "Master"...?
Yes, use your maid to satisfy all your desires, "Master."
My hair is a mess... There we go. No, I don't need a hand. I am here to serve you in this fleeting dream of yours. Enjoy it while it lasts. Hehehe.
This new power is no dream.
This is the victory you wished for, "Master." Hehehe.
Sssh, be quiet! We need to coordinate with our sisters preparing to flank the enemy.
Don't forget to keep your gear in working order, Commander!
Fletcher-class destroyer - Aulick, Hull Number DD-569!
The girls are back from their adventure!
You think it's funny to call me by the wrong name?
Want to take a walk together, Commander?
... After being called sweet for so long, I think I'm starting to get used to it. ... You call me sweet because that's what girls are? I-is that a compliment?
Like a cookie - twist, lick, and dunk. D-do you want to give it a try, Commander?
Commander... H-how sweet am I?
This place is great, Commander~ I've grown to like it more and more!
Yaaay! Welcome back, Commander!
Why does everything have to hit me in the face?!
You've got mail, Commander!
Commander, won't you take Aulick out to play~?|Aulick loves hanging out with all the other Little Beavers!|Ah, Aulick likes the Commander too, of course!
Commander, you've still got unfinished missions! You're being lazy, aren't you?
Reporting in! Mission rewards have been delivered!
I'm Aulick of the Little Beavers! I was mainly tasked with air rescues. I'm not as strong as the captain, but I'll be more than satisfied as long as you let me fight till the end!
My Little Beaver sisters are for sure going to envy me now.
It's Aulick, I'm telling you! A-u-lick!
Aren't I so soft and squishy?
C-Commander...! You're naughty!
Yaaay! It's so great to meet you, Commander! Just call me Aulick! ... What was that? I said Aulick! My name is Aulick!
I hope it'll come in use to you, Commander...
I'd never let you down, Commander!
May we be blessed with victory~
Commander, is there anything I can help you with regarding equipment?
Arethusa-class light cruiser - Aurora, pennant number 12
Commander, it will be a problem if you keep staring at me and forget about the girls who have returned from commission.
Commander, please refrain from making a fool of yourself in public.
Commander, would you like to see the roses that I planted? I have a lot of different kinds~
The goddess, Aurora, was said to have "rose-coloured fingers." Though the same can't be said for me, my fingers at least smell like roses. Commander, want to check for yourself?

Commander, come here for a moment~ ... Hehe, this rose suits you best after all! Eh? I'm not making fun of you... In that case, why don't you pick one out to put on me? I'm sure I'll love whatever you pick~

Lately, some girls have been grumbling that I've been monopolosing all your time... But, I'm not going to back down on this. Commander, you too should be prepared to deal with a bunch of sulking girls~
Good work. Please take some time to relax.
Light of dawn, illuminate our path...!

I am Large Cruiser Azuma. I was designed to lead torpedo squadrons into night battles, but I never saw any actual combat. I'm quite good at commanding night battles, but torpedoes are another story... Ahahaha...
Now that I understand your feelings, Commander, I will offer you all that I am, body and soul... Phew... Saying that out loud is as embarrassing as I thought it would be. Hehehe.
It's now my turn~
Oh? You want to touch me? Or would you like me to touch you? You'll have to come out and say it.
Commander? There's a time and a place...

Large cruiser, Azuma, reporting for duty. As a special prototype ship, there are many things that I am still unfamiliar with... However, I will lay down my life to protect you, Commander. It would please me greatly if you would place your trust in me. Hehe~
Hehe, that's it~
This was the result of everyone's hard work. I was merely part of the team.
E-even if it's for a picture, holding this pose all this time is not easy...
Commander? Oh, I haven't quite finished changing. My hair still needs work... Sorry, would you mind waiting a bit longer?
Are you tired, Commander? Hehe, with all this carousing it's only natural that you'd get worn out. Now then, rest your head on Azuma's bosom for a while.
Commander, would you mind giving me a moment of your time? Only for a little bit. I'd just like to know what it feels like to monopolize you for a while... Hehehe, I'm only joking.
Commander, the Spring Festival is a busy, exciting time. But do take care not to catch a cold when you're out having fun.

I understand these "Tangyuan" soup balls have some association with "unity" or "gathering" in the language of the Dragon Empery, but if I eat the tangyuan, doesn't that mean I've broken the unity?|Our friends are drawing that "Fu" character everywhere, so I went ahead and tried my hand. I think I did alright... Ahahaha...|Do you need help with the decorations in your office? I'd like to give decorating a try.
Having you here, Commander, makes me feel at ease.
Don't do that! At least, don't do it right now...!
Commander? Oh, I haven't quite finished changing. My hair still needs work... Sorry, would you mind waiting a bit longer?
I learned some new cooking techniques from Hiei today. Commander, do look forward to tomorrow's lunch. Hehe~
I must be dreaming, to be able to don this white veil... Haha, though, what's more important is our life together afterwards! Commander, please look forward to the rich fruit of my bridal training~

For me, happiness means spending our days together, taking each day slowly, one step at a time... Of course I'm quite happy right now~ How about you, Commander? Does having me by your side... make you happy as well?
You must be tired from your sortie. Please sit down and allow me to massage your shoulders. Mm, is this pressure to your liking?
Welcome back, Commander. Be at ease, for I will always remain by your side~

Though I am rather confident about my sturdiness, I'll proceed cautiously so that you won't have to worry about me.|Commander, please have some tea! Haha, this is something I've learned after hours of practice with Kongou~|Please look after me, through both fair weather and harsh storms. I will always remain at your side and heed your every call~
Now then, if you've had your fun, I do believe it's now my turn? Hehe, just kidding~
Commander, you're quite the flirt.... *blushes*
I must be dreaming, to be able to don this white veil... Haha, though, what's more important is our life together afterwards! Commander, please look forward to the rich fruit of my bridal training~
Fighting is by no means my forte, but I'll do the best I can.
voiceline.oath: As long as I'm with you, I'm sure I'll never get lost!

voiceline.line: You'd like to chat with me? Of course we can do that. Please, have a seat.
voiceline.oath: Hello, Commander. May I suggest taking a short break? I'll put on some tea in the meanwhile.

voiceline.line: Why hello, my name's Azusa Miura~ Um, this is a port, right? And these are... shipgirls? Um~ Where exactly am I?
The commission team has returned to port. What diligent girls they all are.
Sorry, I just... I just don't know what to talk about with you.
What is it, Commander? ...Ah, you found my lost handkerchief? Thank you so much.
Good day to you, Commander. I went for a stroll just today and got lost on the way... Would you please show me the way to the dormitory?
Oh, Commander, perfect timing. I had some free time and cooked up some food, but I wound up making way too much. Care to join me for dinner?
Sorry that I always make you lead me around the port. I've just gotten so reliant on the comfort of having you show me the way when I get lost... Hehehe~
voiceline.oath: You're the reason I've managed to come this far, Commander. Allow me to sincerely thank you for always coming to my aid when I wander off~

voiceline.line: My, oh my~ Is there something on your mind, Commander? I can lend an ear if you'd like to talk about it.
Welcome back, Commander. Would you like some tea and a snack while you rest?
I must finish what I set out to do...!
Good morning, Commander. Let's have a good day of work, shall we?
voiceline.oath: There may be a lot of hard work ahead of us, but let's hang in there and get it done, Commander.

voiceline.line: Is everyone okay? We should find a safe place to retreat to, quick!
A new letter has come in. Would you like me to go get it?

Some destroyers came up to me the other day and wouldn't let me leave until I played a game with them. Hehehe~ Everyone here are such lovely people.|I have a poor memory for directions, so I often get lost. I've already needed people to come find me several times at this port... It's quite awkward for me.|You have so many types of cuisine on offer in the cafeteria. And they all taste so delicious... I need to watch it so I don't overeat.
voiceline.extra: Ah, are you taking a nap, Commander? Work is important, of course, but your health should always come first. Let's see if I can find a blanket to cover you with...|The cheese they have at the canteen looks divine... I should buy some and put it on toast, just to try it... Although, I really shouldn't. I wouldn't want to put on weight.|What room is this? ...Oh, greetings, Commander. Sorry, but would you mind showing me to the dining hall?

voiceline.line: My, oh my. We still have work to do. Let's tackle them one at a time.
voiceline.oath: We're almost there, Commander. Just a few more tasks. I'll help with them, of course.

voiceline.line: Hehe~ Job completed. Excellent work.
voiceline.oath: Job well done, Commander! I'm glad you're so diligent.

voiceline.line: My name is Azusa Miura. I decided to debut as an idol after graduating junior college. As for the specific reason why I chose this career... I suppose it was in hopes I'll one day find the person of my dreams.
I don't know if it was my destiny to come here and meet you and the girls under your command, but I'm glad I did, and I'll treasure this memory always.
I hope you'll all enjoy this next song!
My luck forecast for today is... Oh? Would you like your fortune read too, Commander?
Eek! What was that for, Commander?
voiceline.oath: C-Commander... Please be more delicate with your hands...

voiceline.line: Why hello, my name's Azusa Miura~ Um, this is a port, right? And these are... shipgirls? Um~ Where exactly am I?
Thank you for helping me grow, Commander.
We've finished! How is everyone? No bruises or scratches?
voiceline.oath: I'm so glad we won. It wouldn't have been possible without everyone's help!

voiceline.line: Oh! Thank you for coming all this way in the blistering heat. Let's see... I should have something cool to snack on in the fridge.
Listening to the wind flow through the chimes on the porch seems to carry the summer heat right away. Commander, would you also like to come unwind with me?
Welcome back from the summer heat, Commander. I'll get you a bottle of cold tea.
Whew, it's so hot today. Make sure you drink plenty of water so you don't get dehydrated.

As much as I love cooling off in an air-conditioned room, it's also nice to sit on the veranda and just feel the breeze.|Oh dear, the winds have died down. Then I'll instead use this paper fan to help you keep cool, Commander.|There are many kinds of wind chimes in the world. Some are made of metal, others are made of glass. I enjoy listening for the slight differences in sound between them all.
This yukata feels so much breezier than the clothes I usually wear. I recommend trying one for yourself, Commander.
Are you okay, Commander? You look like you're suffering from a heatstroke... Wait here. I'll fetch you some ice and a sports drink right away.
Listening to the wind flow through the chimes on the porch seems to carry the summer heat right away. Commander, would you also like to come unwind with me?
You suckers think you can defeat me? That's funny!
Hah hah hah! Is it my time to sortie?
Fletcher-class destroyer – Bache, Hull Number DD-470.
Commander, someone's back! Remember how it's part of the job to greet the commission team? Yeah, don't forget it!
I'm the only one on the planet who'd look after someone as sorry as you~ Poor little thing~
Hm? Hurt my leg? Nope! The bandaid is just for decoration~! Nothin' for you to worry your little mind about! Heheh☆
Hoho? You digging my jacket, Commander? Y'know, your style might just improve if you wear something like it! Hahahahah!
Your style is so last century, Commander! Take a seat and I'll give you a fashion crash course!
Y'know, your fashion sense has really improved; you don't look so lame anymore! Keep it up and I might fall for you~ Pfft, yeah right☆
You might be weaksauce, but you're really good at patting heads!
You look awfully mopey, Commander. I can't stand it! Take a sip of my special honey-infused energy drink! Don't argue, just do it!
Not bad! But I'm badder and stronger than you! Hahaha!
Drink this energizing coffee! We can't have you run outta gas, can we!
I'll be back to smack the crap outta you dolts, just you waaaaaait!
Heh heh! You've got mail! Since you're such a busy bee and I'm so considerate, I'll read it out for ya!

It's windy as all hell today... and when it gets too windy, bad things happen. You get me, Commander?|This outfit is what's in vogue! Do you seriously not know fashion when you see it?|If the other Fletchers were as flashy as me then maybe I could actually remember their names!
If you can't finish your missions then magnanimous me's gonna have to step up to the plate!
I really have to babysit you, don't I? Don't forget about collecting the mission rewards!

Ahah! I'm the numero uno coolest Fletcher-class destroyer, Bache! My fire support in the Surigao Strait was no big deal! Also, no other destroyer has experienced the glory of resting beside the Colossus of Rhodes as much as I have! Hahahahah!
Guess I'll always need to babysit you, no matter how stylish you get~ But that's okay! I'll look after you till the end of time! Hehehe, hope you're ready for me!
It's showtime!
Don't come begging for my help later if you're this easily distracted and can't finish your work!
You really like my getup, don'tcha, Commander? You absolute degenerate~
Yoohoo~! You the Commander? You look kinda weaksauce, though~! Name's Bache! I'm joining this fleet, starting today! I'll take good care of you, so just kick back and get ready for my greatness!
Suh-weet! Let's try out my new powers!
So weeeak! What a buncha losers! Hahahaha!
When it comes to bikes... I don't know squat! So I just got my Royal Navy pal to help out! I've gotta thank her later!
Ahaha~! Are you seeing this, Commander? This sturdiness, this gorgeous paint job, and these special accessories hand-picked by yours truly! Muahaha! I am the true speed-star of this port!
Speed-star, engine at full throttle! Let's roll! ... Teehee~ I came up with that sweet catchphrase long ago!
Hmm? Hmmmmmm? Man, you look miserable, Commander! Sit here and I'll take you on a wild ride! Ahahahaha!

Still looking brand new? Well yeah, thanks to my daily pro-level maintenance!|You wanna ride my bike? Of course you... can't! Think what'd happen if you crash it!|If there's somewhere you wanna go, if you ask me really nicely with a cherry on top, I just might let you hop on~
Aha! You're digging my bike and style, aren't you, Commander? Aren't you jelly? Since I'm so nice, I'll let you stare until you're satisfied!
Seizing the chance to feel me up, huh~? You dirty perv~
Ahaha~! Are you seeing this, Commander? This sturdiness, this gorgeous paint job, and these special accessories hand-picked by yours truly! Muahaha! I am the true speed-star of this port!
I've gotta come up with a sweet victory pose... It doesn't concern weaksauce like you, but you can brainstorm with me if you want!
Tada! Your favorite tennis superstar, Bache, is right here! ...Hey Commander, you're supposed to cheer for me like you're one of my fans in the stands!
I'm practicing my serves right now! Be a nice weaksauce Commander and fetch my ball!
Commander, come here and help me practice! If I win the championship, you'll get a special reward♪

They said I'm a wild card... Does that mean I'm super talented?!|Hey! Wait a sec! You're throwing too fast for me to return the ball...!|You tired, Commander? Guess what, I anticipated that you would be~! Heheh, have a taste of my deluxe honey drink! This stuff will get you back in the game, no matter how drained you are!
Has my tennis outfit got you crazy for me~?
No weaksauce commander in the world can touch me now~! Whuah?!
Tada! Your favorite tennis superstar, Bache, is right here! ...Hey Commander, you're supposed to cheer for me like you're one of my fans in the stands!
I'm not afraid of you!
Giiiy... Kiiie... Uh... Bwuuuh...? It's hard to speak like a bunny...
Benson-class Destroyer - Bailey, Hull Number DD-492!
Commander, the girls who were out on a commission have returned! Let's give them a warm welcome! If we don't have regular exercise then we'll start to rust!
You're the enemy of the bunnies, Commander!
I'll do my best, even though I'm just a bunny!
Benson told me that I'm from Planet Bunny... Does she think I'm still a kid or something? But... but... I know for a fact that Santa is real!
C'mon, Commander, play with me~! Busy with work? Hehe, look again, Commander. No need to thank me!
My sister told me that bunnies die if they get too lonely! That's why I came to see you~! Do you... not want to visit me, Commander?
Good work, Commander! Want to try some of my handmade cookies?
Bunnies bite when they're angry...!
Are you feeling good today, Commander? Let me inject some bunny power into you!
*Sob*... Planet Bunny won't let you off so easily!
Commander, new mail arrived! Is it from Planet Bunny?

The most delish carrot is always going to be the next one!|I've received a transmission from Planet Bunny telling me to help you with your work. No need to thank me, just leave it to me!|I'm going to become a superstar one day! The most popular in the universe!
You should definitely stock up on carrots, but you shouldn't stock up on unfinished missions!
Look, Commander! I brought the rewards we got! Aren't I great~?
I'm from Planet Bunny. I'm a bunny, just like my sisters! I'm super good at giving providing fire support. I've even earned awards for it, believe it or not! Hehe, I'm super strong!
Pro...mise? Promise what? I don't really get it. Do you wanna become a bunny too? ... Great! That means we can be together forever!
Here I go! Bunny Boosted Bane Blaster!
Your hands are so warm, Commander~!
What a... strange feeling...
I'm Bailey, a Benson-cla... Wait, no, I'm a bunny! Commander, have you seen any of my sisters?
My bunny level has gone up even higher! Yeah!
Haha! Bunnies are just super strong!
Cutie, Lucky, hold on tight~!
Cutie, Lucky, listen closely! Today's mission is to extract a whole bunch of candy from the commander!
Can you see the ghost next to me? Hehehe— the black witch from Planet Bunny is none other than me, Bailey!
Bailey doesn't do pumpkin pie, but you can have this delicious carrot cake instead!
Trick or treat! If you don't hand over the candy, Baily and the Bunnykin will play a trick on you!

Commander, your candy contribution will be distributed among the residents of Planet Bunny! Ehehe~☆|Don't you have any carrot candy? Bailey craves carrot candy!|Bailey's a black bunny today. Don't mistake it for a regular ol' white bunny!
Candy given away can never be reclaimed~!
This strange sensation... Could it be EM waves from Planet Bunny...?
Can you see the ghost next to me? Hehehe— the black witch from Planet Bunny is none other than me, Bailey!
Bunny magic is suuuuper strong!
Cutie, Lucky, I'm leaving the equipment to you two~!
This long-awaited day has finally come. My bunnies, are you all ready? Bailey's debut shall now begin! Commander, my sisters, let's all come see Bailey's bunny magic!
Good work! Bailey shall use her brighest smile to soothe Commander's heart!
Commander, there's mail! Is there any fanmail for Bailey?
Bailey will always be shining brighter in the next moment~! |Commander, Commander! Is Bailey cute? Ehehe... you can praise Bailey some more~!
This day has finally arrived~ Are you ready, Rabbits? Bailey’s new debut is about to begin. Commander, sisters, come and witness Bailey’s rabbit magic!
It's Bailey from Planet Bunny! Everyone, please give me your support~
All ships, enter formation!
What you can do, what you should do, and what you will do – the choices one must make. You, however, need only focus on what you do best, Commander.
Baltimore-class heavy cruiser – Baltimore, Hull Number CA-68.
Commission complete. I could use some exercise, so could you let me have the next one?
Commander, you ought to open your heart a little.
As long as the will do to right exists, people will live righteously even without being ordered to. I pray that you will stay on the path of justice, Commander.
Let's not be overly formal and get to it: what do you wanna do next? I'm open to chat about pretty much whatever, so if anything's on your mind, just tell me.
You want to go shopping with me? Sure, consider it done. You wanna make a date out of it? I mean, might as... H-hold on! When you say "date," you mean THAT kind of date?!
Man... I doubt I'll ever get used to this... Maybe I should act more girly when... No, this is a me-problem, not a you-problem! ... *Sigh*, I can't think straight when you're around, Commander...
Were you hurt, Commander?
Don't lose control! Focus!
Okay! Let's get to work, Commander!
Even the good guys face setbacks sometimes...
You've got a message, Commander. I really think you should check these more often.

I'll get this work done in good time. I mean, that's what you should expect of your subordinate, Commander.|SHE'S Quincy?! L-looks pretty different from the one I know... But I guess it's not that unusual for ships to share the same name.|Power alone won't fundamentally solve all one's problems. This should go without saying, Commander, but please try to remember this fact.
Missions, missions. Let's start by checking the list.
There's our mission rewards. Good to have the money for retrofits and repairs.

I'm Baltimore, the lead ship of my class of CAs. I was the first CA to be designed and constructed without the limitations of any naval treaties, thanks to which I could equip cutting-edge weaponry for the time. And within this fleet, I will fight for justice and freedom.

Yes, I vow to be with you through thick and thin, and to love and to cherish for all my life, Commander. ... So, uh, once you put the ring on my fing– W-what is it? Hey, what're you doing?! Ah, ahh...
We've got an opening... Let's take 'em out!
Could you fetch me an Oxy-cola? Thanks... Ahhh! That hits the spot!
Eek?! ... Y-you did not just hear that, got it?!
Heya. Are you in need of help? I'm Baltimore, a heavy cruiser just passing by... Okay, that's enough jokes for now... Baltimore, awaiting your orders, Commander.
Great! I'm getting fitter and fitter.
You crooks should've used your powers for good.
Let's do this!
Do you know how to get to my clubroom? Or should I show you the way?
Oh, you wanna observe my club activities, Commander? Ahah, as you can tell, it's just a sports club with the goal of making you sweat. Nothing suspicious about that, is there...?
Looks like you worked up a good sweat. Here, a towel. Should I go get a drink for you, too?

Our club is mainly for having fun, so anyone can join. You should join a club you'd like too, Commander.|Yo, Cleveland! Up for another round of basketball later? You bring Independence and I'll get Pittsburgh on the team!|A drink? Sure, I could use one! ... Ahh, that's the ticket!
Oh, my uniform's completely soaked... T-thanks for letting me know...
Eek?! ... W-what are you doing?!
Oh, you wanna observe my club activities, Commander? Ahah, as you can tell, it's just a sports club with the goal of making you sweat. Nothing suspicious about that, is there...?
Come! We shall fight head-on!

I'm radiating unusually dark vibes? Thanks for the compliment. I guess these decal tattoos Bremerton recommended are doing their job. As in, they make people a little more cautious around me than they normally would be.
Heya, you here to watch the game? Heh, heavy cruiser Baltimore, the passerby solver of troubles, here to play it cool!
All right, let's do like always and breeze through these tasks.

Bremerton's got a real knack for psychological warfare. She often gives me good advice on how to present myself.|I'm an expert at tennis, as you'd expect. If anything, you'd be kinda hard-pressed to find a sport I *don't* excel at.|So Commander, are you free after we're done here? Hahah, what, is it *that* unusual of me to ask if you wanna hang out?
I know I'm eyecatching, but I didn't hope you'd stare so intensely at me... I mean, that's not to say I *don't* want you stare at me, but...
Eep?! Come on, I've *told* you I'm sensitive to this sort of stuff!
Heya, you here to watch the game? Heh, heavy cruiser Baltimore, the passerby solver of troubles, here to play it cool!
You don't need to know why I look this way. Because if you did, you'd vanish from this world. I'm just kidding around. Hahaha!
Bremerton said, "When you change your look, your mannerisms usually change too" and suggested this dress to me... She must be snickering at me actually wearing it right now...
Damn, that Bremerton... What did she make me wear this time... Even though I was the one to ask her for advice... Um... Ugh... This doesn't look too weird, right...?
"H-Hiii! You want to dance with me?" ...Oh god, no, that's way too forced. I need to sound natural for– Eep! W-when'd you get here, Commander?!
Oh, you can sit here if you want to, Commander. I'll just... stand here for a while and accustom myself to this look.

I should've gone with a less cumbersome outfit, shouldn't I? Maybe something like Cleveland's suit... Yeah, that would've worked...|I'll bet tons of girls want to share a drink with you tonight, right, Commander? Go on, chat with them before I get you wasted. Or you can just stay here, hahahah.|The mirror? It's so I can see my– Oh god!
Woah?! Ah, thanks... Guess it's a real uphill battle, getting used to these high heels...
Damn, that Bremerton... What did she make me wear this time... Even though I was the one to ask her for advice... Um... Ugh... This doesn't look too weird, right...?
Life is its own journey. You can't live the perfect life, but what's important is living without regrets.

"Our meeting here must have been preordained by fate. Hail to you. I am a passing traveler by the name of Baltimore." ...Hahah, it's nothing. Just some lines I came up with to match my traditional getup. Did they do the trick, Commander?
Brrr... Sure is windy today... Oh, hey, Commander. Not feeling cold, are you?
What's the plan for today, Commander? Feel like visiting a Sakura Empire shrine?

What type of journey do you prefer? One that follows a strictly laid-out plan, or one where you go with the flow?|Why are these other puppies following me? ...You know what, it's all good. It's always good to have more company on a journey.|I'd love to take a shot at a Sakura Empire sport. Like archery. Or maybe kendo?
Getting lost in a foreign land is no big deal as long as you've got friends.

"Our meeting here must have been preordained by fate. Hail to you. I am a passing traveler by the name of Baltimore." ...Hahah, it's nothing. Just some lines I came up with to match my traditional getup. Did they do the trick, Commander?
Just an idol, passing by... Nah, that just sounds off. Anyway, let's do this!
A spin there... backstep there! Whew... Yeah, I'm just working out the choreography for our new single. Gotta come up with something everyone in the troop can dance, not just me.

The name's Baltimore, Eagle Union heavy cruiser. Whoops, right, I'm not just a soldier anymore, but an idol as well. I agreed to do it, and I'm gonna do it as best I can. We'll be counting on your support, Commander.
Commission complete! What do you say we welcome them back with a small performance?
A control freak like you isn't fit to instruct us. Loosen up a bit, then try again.
Your job is to plan our schedule, and our job is to follow it. So business as usual, I guess, huh? Hahahah!
How do I look, Commander? This outfit's more revealing than what I'm used to... D-does it really make me look cuter?
"Thanks for supporting me!" ...Yeah, Bremerton's right, my delivery is just a bit off... Hey, Commander, do I fit in with the other members? Am I really... cute?

You think I am cute? Especially when my eyes are on you? A-alright then... Now I know not to give up! This might be selfish to ask, but do you think we could do some special training together, so I can truly shine on stage?
Oh, you're back. Hope everyone else made it safe and sound too. An idol needs an audience, after all.
A small screwup isn't gonna stop me!
What's on our schedule today, Commander? Same as always, I'm counting on you.
Looks like we need to rehearse it from the top...
Thanks, Dido, I really appreciate it. Got a letter for you here, Commander.

There's tons of idol business to tend to, so I've not had much time to help people. Think you pick up the mantle for a while, Commander? Thanks, you're a hero! Hahahah!|These moves might be too hard for the Royal Navy girls... What do you think, Commander?|Th-this whole "cute" thing isn't exactly my thing... N-not that I hate it, and YOU seem to like it, I guess... Ughh...
Mission time, eh... You're really not in an enviable position, having to keep doing those while we work as idols.
Got some mission rewards here. Oh, and I got rid of that trap Albacore set.
Heavy cruiser Baltimore, currently serving as an idol to test the Muse System. I'm giving it my all to put on the best performance you'll ever see.
This I promise you, Commander: we'll all work together to bring you the best performance ever! In return I ask for one thing: that you witness it, and witness me, at my cutest.
Far and near! Hear our song loud and clear!
How's this for a signature pose? Good?
Eep! What was that for?!

The name's Baltimore, Eagle Union heavy cruiser. Whoops, right, I'm not just a soldier anymore, but an idol as well. I agreed to do it, and I'm gonna do it as best I can. We'll be counting on your support, Commander.
Thanks a bunch. Guess I should say: look forward to our next performance!
Picking me was the right choice, am I right? I'm never gonna let you down.
Onward without fear! For I stand behind you with all my might!
Commander, such perfect timing. I was just performing some maintenance on this little one. Would you mind lending a hand?
Independence-class light aircraft carrier – Bataan, Hull Number CVL-29.
The ships you sent out on commission have returned. Shall we go greet them?
No one respects a worthless commander. You need to shape up! Come, I'll help you.
Perfect. Our work goes exactly according to plan... Yes, now on to next month's plan...
How will I spend my day off? I suppose I'll just lounge around by myself. That's how I like to relax, after all. It's not like I have any particular hobbies or anything... Aha, ahaha...

It seems we've been spending a lot more alone time together lately, Commander... It's okay if we get even more intimate... is it? Well, then... If I sit a little closer... even cuddle up a bit... is that... okay too?
Whether I'm happy or sad, you're always here with me, Commander... I, why I might just be the luckiest girl in the world... Hehehe.
Welcome back, Commander. You certainly fought hard. If you have need of me, I would be happy to accompany you on the next sortie.
We mustn't... retreat yet!
At last, you've made your return, Commander. Now, let us begin the day's labors, shall we?
Hm... I must carry this lesson on to the next battle...
The mail is here. Take a look, please, Commander.

To make a beautiful plan and then watch it come together – is there any better way to get one's work done? Commander, why not give my way a try?|This little one is a Hellcat, endlessly useful in so many battles. Hehe.|Maybe there's nothing really special about me, I'm not the type to stand out in a crowd, but I... as long as I can do things my way, and be helpful to everyone, that's good enough for me. Hehehe.
If you don't complete your missions, you won't get any stronger. Come, Commander, just a little bit more effort and we'll clear those missions off the board.
Mission rewards. How delightful. Hehe.

I am the Independence-class light aircraft carrier Bataan of the Eagle Union. I participated in numerous battles during the world war. I will resolutely provide all necessary aid and support to all the ships of this fleet, as is my duty.

To be here with you, Commander, celebrating a day like this... I can't fathom how lucky I am. I can't even begin to know what to say... Commander, umm, do you think you could close your eyes for me for a second...?
Now it's your turn, little planes. Be sa~fe!
I have a lovely smile? Um, well... ehehe... I'm glad my smile cheers you up, Commander.
My, Commander, you can be such a child sometimes...

Bataan of the Eagle Union's Independence-class, at your service. If you don't mind, when forming a fleet for a sortie... please consider including me! I may not be flawless, but I should be able to handle a combat mission or two!
Now I can be so much more useful to everyone. Thank you very much, Commander.
Am I... the MVP? Ahahaha... this victory belongs to all of us together.
It's a little embarrassing, but I do always sleep with this little one here...
Yaaaaawn... Huh!? Commander!? You scared me... I was just going to lie down and... Um, yes, with little Hellcat here... Goodnight...
Whether I'm hard at work or resting comfortably, you're always here, Commander... And I wouldn't trade it for the world. Hehe. Commander, would you like to hold the little one?
Welcome back, Commander... Why don't you take a rest? I can lend you my pillow...
Good morning... Sorry, Commander, do you mind if I wash my face first...?

Good sleep is very important to your work. Commander, do make sure you're getting enough rest.|Sorry, Commander, I'm fading again... Zzz...|A pajama party...? I want to go... I wonder if Independence would be interested...
These are my favorite pajamas... They aren't too childish? ... They suit me? Ahahaha... Th-thanks...
Yaaaaawn... Huh!? Commander!? You scared me... I was just going to lie down and... Um, yes, with little Hellcat here... Goodnight...
Beagle, tally ho!
Commander, want to hang out together?
B-class destroyer ー Beagle, Hull Number H30!
Commander, the girls out for commissions have returned! How about we greet them? Come on, hurry up~
Commander... do you hate me...?
I'm full of energy today, Commander!
My hairstyle? Ehehe, it was born this way you know? It's as fluffy as a puppy~ Commander, wanna touch it?
Commander, how about a walk? ...Walk by yourself? No no, it's not fun having a walk alone! I'm walking with you, Commander! Commander~ walk with me~!
Commander, is there something I can do? Anything is alright, you know? You see, I'm happy being of use to you, Commander!
Commander, good work out there~! *nuzzle*
Welcome back, Commander!
*cries*... I lost...
Commander, there's mail! Play with me after you're done reading it!

Eh?! Y-You want to catch a rabbit? ...I don't get it, but for you, Commander, I'll give it a try!|Commander, what a nice weather today~ Let's take a walk, alright?|Hmm? Now that I think about it, I used to go to a lot of different places. ...Ah, Commander, I'll tell you all sorts of things about the places I have been to!
Commander, there's a new mission!
Commander, I brought the mission rewards~

Self introduction? Huh... I didn't accomplish much, but I took part in many escort missions, you know? Norway, Atlantic, Operation Torch, and then... Anyway, a lot of those! It will be nice if I can be of help, Commander!
Are you fine with giving me this...? Yes... I got it! Then for you, Commander, I'm gonna work extra, extra hard! Ehehe, I'm getting motivated!
For the Commander!
Ehehe, that tickles, Commander!
Eeek! Commander, you perv...
I finally got a chance to meet you, Commander! I'm B class' Beagle! The best of what I can do are escort missions! If you need my help just let me know! I am quite a worker!
For your sake, Commander, I'm gonna work harder!
Ehehe, Commander, pat my head~
It's a maid's duty to remove their master's obstacles.
Is something the matter, master?
Edinburgh-Class light cruiser ー Belfast, Hull number C35!
Master, the ladies who went off for commissions have been waiting for you to greet them.
Correcting her master is also a maid's duty...
I'm terribly sorry... I'm still new to this fleet, so I'm somewhat unfamiliar with my duties and cannot serve you at 100% capacity... Please look forward to my continued service.
This is something I made using the connections I have to the fleet. Please have a taste -- Is the taste to your liking?
