It is important to observe your intentions sensitively. Especially intentions that you yourself are not aware of, master... I'm mean, you say? Hehe. Recently I've come to enjoy your troubled look a little. By all means, please forgive me.
Are you awake? ...Hehe, your sleeping face was so cute, I couldn't bear waking you up... How did it feel, resting on my lap? You are free to enjoy it to your heart's content
Welcome back, master. I've readied some light snacks over here.
Everyone, the main dish has yet to come!
Welcome back, master. I've prepared the tea. Furthermore, I've sorted the documents over here. Please work at your leisure.
Please retreat first, master. I still have some matters to attend to.
There's a new letter. Shall I read it for you, master?

In order to become an excellent master, you must start from self confidence. Please do your best to turn your will into action, master.|Do you want some tea? Ah... if you want something else, I'll prepare some coffee or whiskey.|Sunbathing on Thames river wasn't bad. But this current life of mine is better...
A new mission has been given to us, master. Please confirm it.
Your rewards have been delivered, Master.

Good day to you. I am Belfast, the second ship of the Edinburgh class. I have duties as the head maid while being the Royal Navy's greatest cruiser. I had taken part in many battles, and borne witness to lady Scharnhorst's fall... Those are but the past for a maid. Please say something should you have a need for me.

Now this is a little troubling... I'm fine with simply protecting you, my master, as well as occassionally enjoying your troubled look... But with such an important bond being formed, I've become wanting to serve you even more, as well as receiving more of your attention, master...
Dear enemies, this is going to be a little bit painful
Aimlessly touching a lady is not a gentlemanly behaviour. Please behave yourself around others.
It's a maid's duty to dedicate her all to her master. Would you like to see, master?
Are you my master? Pleasure to meet you. I am Belfast the maid. From now on, I dedicate myself to you.
I won't let you down.
Oh my, I didn't spend as much effort as cleaning up a stain in a tablecloth.
The outfits of the Dragon Empery do have a certain charm. Perhaps I can give them a little recommendation to the rest of the maid team. What do you think?
Hehe... Master, why are you so stunned from seeing me? I thought you perhaps wanted to see me in a qipao... was I mistaken?
Master, what do you think about handing some red envelopes to the hardworking girls still out on commissions?

Did you know, Master... all I can do for you is to learn from the cultures of the other camps in order to provide you with better service. But all this pales in comparison to all that you do for us on a daily basis, yet you take yourself for granted... What a lovable but also hateable person.
I baked this pastry for a certain Master who is so absorbed in work to the point of forgetting to eat. Please enjoy it.
Welcome back, Master. I specially procured some different teas from the Dragon Empery. Which one would you like to try first?

A variety of culinary techniques and seasoning methods... the food culture of the Dragon Empery is truly eye-opening. |It's customary in the Dragon Empery for everyone to get together on New Year's to have a banquet? Ahh, so many people to serve... my maid's soul is trembling! |Only a few girls from the Dragon Empery have joined our fleet. Because of that, I can't afford to let them feel lonely.
Despite the fact that it is a holiday, I am still ready to sortie.
I see, Master. The biggest drawback of this qipao is its ability to rob you of your self-control.
Hehe... Master, why are you so stunned from seeing me? I thought you perhaps wanted to see me in a qipao... was I mistaken?

It is only by maintaining a well-regulated lifestyle that one may keep a cool head and act appropriately when backed into a corner... It is with this in mind that I, Belfast, serve my Master as a maid.

This is special cold-weather equipment inspired by Eagle Union designs. It was made for practical purposes such as special operations in frigid climates, and as such, was not designed with appearances in mind. Please do forgive me, Master.
Welcome home, Master. You may rest easy knowing the Royal Maids are here to protect you.
Welcome home, Master. Your coffee is ready. Please, enjoy it at your leisure.

Madam Enterprise's cooking has improved noticeably. This is certainly thanks to Madam Vestal's lessons, but no doubt the Master is another important reason.|Such a willful appearance... a maid uniform is of course the appropriate dress for a maid, is it not?|It would be nice if I spent more time with my sister, hm...? I must agree with you, Master. I beg your pardon for making you worry so.
Do let us know if you have any needs that the Royal Maids might service.
I'm afraid this battle dress may not adequately satisfy you, Master. I beg your pardon.

This is special cold-weather equipment inspired by Eagle Union designs. It was made for practical purposes such as special operations in frigid climates, and as such, was not designed with appearances in mind. Please do forgive me, Master.
This power, it certainly is not just for the sake of destruction.
A victory for the Master...
Belfast of the Royal Maids, reporting in.
It is a maid's duty, in service to her master and Her Majesty, to uphold the elegance of the banquet and safeguard it from disgrace.

Good evening. The Royal Maids will be chaperoning this event. It is my hope to prevent any inappropriate behaviour that might interfere with the enjoyment of the attendees. Please pardon any inconveniences this may cause.
Please continue to enjoy the banquet, Master.
Master, are you pleased with the festivities?

Master, the arrangements for the venue's security have already been made. Indeed, Madam Ark Royal graciously offered her assistance. Be at ease.|Dear Sister, let me handle the patrols. You go relax with your colleagues... I just want Master all to myself...? Goodness, as if that has anything to do with it...|Have a drink...? Very well, if you wish to drink, I can certainly accompany you... But I'm afraid these Sakura Empire wines are the only ones that... No matter, let us have that drink.
Master...? Please, have some self-respect. We are in public.

Good evening. The Royal Maids will be chaperoning this event. It is my hope to prevent any inappropriate behaviour that might interfere with the enjoyment of the attendees. Please pardon any inconveniences this may cause.
Master, what would you like for lunch? I prepared some... Hmm? You're fine with just that? Master, you can't have snacks as a meal.
Hehe~ Judging from your expression, Master, my outfit has not fallen short of your expectations. As time is precious, allow me to serve you to the utmost on this "date."
Master, if you don't know where you'd like to go next, why don't we just wander around for a while? Sometimes, the most serendipitous sights are the most memorable of all.

I am accustomed to being the one who makes the arrangements, but occasionally letting others make plans for me has merits of its own. Master, our next location is for you to decide. Hehe~ I'm looking forward to it.

This snack seems to be quite popular these days. Master, would you like some? Here, say "ahhn~" Hehe, so this must be a part of the reason why it's popular. |As a maid, it is my duty to serve you. However, so that you may leave a positive impression of yourself upon others, I will entrust the duty of carrying these bags to you, Master. |I should pick out some outfits for the other maids as well, not just for me... Of course, I'll be doing the same for you, Master. Hehe~
Holding hands? ... Master, there's something nostalgic about this feeling.
Even on a date, one ought not be too impatient. Understood, Master?
Hehe~ Judging from your expression, Master, my outfit has not fallen short of your expectations. As time is precious, allow me to serve you to the utmost on this "date."
Whether serving my master or managing a restaurant, it is my responsibility as a Royal Maid to handle it promptly and efficiently. Now then, are you satisfied with my performance?
Welcome, table for one? Of course, right this way. Oh? What is it? Ah... I'm filling in for the manager at the moment, so that makes you my customer rather than my master, no?
Here is the pizza you ordered. Do take your time and enjoy it.
Your menu. I would recommend our new offerings here. There is also a promotional campaign of which you might take advantage.

Miss Fubuki is rather excitable, but she is a clever and hardworking girl. Just give her a bit of direction and she'll figure it all right out.|While the customer is free to order anything she wants, as a maid I feel it is my responsibility to offer healthier suggestions. Particularly to the Union girls who order litres and litres of cola...|Leading customers to their tables, organising shifts, management... all of this would make a fine training program for the Royal Maids.
Yes, what can I get for you?
While it is indeed a maid's duty to offer everything to her master... Not to be presumptuous, but you could consider the time and place.
Welcome, table for one? Of course, right this way. Oh? What is it? Ah... I'm filling in for the manager at the moment, so that makes you my customer rather than my master, no?
Master, is there something I can do for you? Holiday or no, I am here to serve your every wish.
It took me quite some time to prepare a suitable traditional Sakura Empire outfit. Terribly sorry. Master, won't you please allow this Belfast to serve you for another year?
You want me to join you for a shrine visit...? I'd be delighted. Your Belfast will gladly accompany you.
Happy New Year, Master. The maids have prepared you some New Year's dishes from the Sakura Empire. Please, enjoy.

An elegant fan emphasizes its holder's poise. Would you like to hold one, Master? Hehehe.|I was concerned that traditional Sakura Empire attire might hinder my maid work, but rather, it's easier to move than I thought.|Madam Hiei instructed me in the ways of Sakura Empire cuisine. In exchange, the Royal Maids will assist her with her next banquet. Do look forward to it, Master.
Master, if you're tired, please take a rest here.
Everything has its time and place, Master.
It took me quite some time to prepare a suitable traditional Sakura Empire outfit. Terribly sorry. Master, won't you please allow this Belfast to serve you for another year?
I'm not going to give up being your maid. Besides, who could understand you better than me?
Are you destined for me? Greetings Belfast, from this moment onwards, I will always be with you.
Am I getting used to my new role? You really asked me a tough question, but...there's no sweeter question in the world.
Anything interesting today? Tell me while we enjoy some dessert.
Is today the same as usual?

Master, dear, darling...some hard choices to make. Or do you have other ideas? |Just do according to your own plans, in my heart you will always be the best. |Wearing this makes it a little inconvenient to do things...but if you like it so much, then just be a bit more patient...
In comparison to standing behind you, I can see more when standing beside you.
W-wait a moment...honestly, I'm cleaning right now..
Are you destined for me? Greetings. Belfast, from this moment onwards, I will always be with you.
A one-on-one battle shall have to wait for another day.

My liege, would you like to have a bout with me? Of course, not a serious match, but just something to deepen our bonds... Next time, since you've got other work to focus on, you say? Understood. Whenever you're ready, please let me know.
Bellona-class light cruiser – Bellona.
The commission team has returned. To be rewarded for one's toils is precious indeed.
Only those with pride have the privilege to wield a sword in a duel. My liege, you still have much work to do to earn it.
Though I was christened after a goddess of war, I'm not particularly fond of it. The only value I find in wielding a sword is in the pure enjoyment of the world of duels.
Once I grasp my blade, the only thing in my sight is my enemy. In that moment, the sole thought in my head is to devote my all to defeating them.

It's unfair to judge victory or defeat based solely on swordsmanship unless those involved are experienced. What I'm saying is, what is your area of expertise, my liege? Of course I'm curious, but I was also wanting to try something that doesn't involve a sword.

If you're interested in learning more about me, how about we spar for a bit to our hearts' content? There's nothing that brings closer than that. Hehe, I'll show up on time, but I'll leave the time and place to you. I'm sure you wouldn't play dirty with me, my liege. Would you?
Is this how you show your gratitude toward your subordinates? Duly noted.
My liege, good work out there... Um, your cuff and collar are all ragged... How about changing out first?
voiceline.oath: My liege, good work out there. Here you go. I brought you a change of clothes so you can continue to maintain your appearance while you work on your documents.

voiceline.line: Purge all distractions. I'll fight with a level head!
My liege, I've been waiting for you. Have you prepared to face your toughest enemy today – your work?
voiceline.oath: Welcome back. While I do not enjoy being outnumbered, it would be quite boorish of me to mouth off when there is a mountain of work to take care of. Let us do our best together.

voiceline.line: While we may look past our failures, we must not ignore what led to them...
Mail? Is it a challenge to a duel? Please prepare... Huh? That's not the case?

I much prefer fighting one-on-one compared to the disorder of a melee. There's a huge difference between focusing on one enemy versus taking stock of the big picture, after all.|Hm? There are marks of wear on these gloves? How careless of me. I shall prepare a new set right away.|My liege, your expression... Did something bad happen? If you need someone to give you a push, I'd love to be of assistance.
voiceline.extra: You don't have to put in so much effort into maintaining your appearance to look nice, but... putting in some effort to straighten things out makes you look much cooler. Alright, I feel great standing here by your side. Hehe.

voiceline.line: If you think of your missions as a duel with an invisible enemy, your efficiency will go up.
These are the rewards for your completed missions. Please accept them as the spoils of the victor.

I am Bellona, a member of the improved Dido-class, the Bellona-class. As a member of the Royal Knights, I participated as an escort during transport missions as well as participating in the raid on Tirpitz. After that war, various things happened... Anyway, please feel free to entrust me with any mission you see fit.

It is the destiny of man to wither away with the passage of time. ...However, even if my passions wither with the passing of time, I find that my emotions only mellow and become more robust, as if a fine vintage. You are the first person I've desired something more than swinging swords with, so... Please, don't let me down.
Come, we'll settle this with a duel!
Well then, I shall accept this duel... Oh, um, you were just giving me some work to do?
voiceline.oath: If you are planning on going far away, please allow me to escort you, my liege. Hm? No need to ask for permission, you say?

voiceline.line: Shall I take this as a provocation?
voiceline.oath: Quite a strange way of asking someone on a date, if you ask me.

voiceline.line: I am Bellona, improved Dido-class light cruiser of the Royal Navy. If I am not mistaken, you are the Lord-Commander? I have stated my name and title as per our code. I hope you will do so as well, my liege.
The stronger I get, the greater my odds of victory.
I present this victory to you with pleasure, my liege. Of course, it shan't be my last victory either.
voiceline.oath: Even this victory shan't be my last. I've already told you, haven't I? Hehe.

voiceline.line: I have always been curious about the kinds of work that Dido and the others always do. I had always thought that the work the maids did was not very difficult, but actually, it's quite comparable to fighting in a melee.

My liege... No, excuse me, I should be calling you Master, right? Bellona of the Royal Maids, reporting in. My, you seem quite lost for words... I'll explain the situation to you later, so don't worry about it.
Were you encouraging me? Please do not fret. My studies regarding the duties of a maid have been going quite swimmingly.
Welcome back, dear Master. Please take a nice rest until our next battle begins. Allow me to take your soiled clothes from you.
Good day to you, dear Master. Please give me your orders, whatever they may be. I am always ready to use my blade... Ahem, I am at your beck and call.

When I think of the dust as my enemy in a duel... it's like fighting a phantom enemy that refuses to fight you face-to-face. I can only hope that there aren't that many.|Hmm... These windows with bump marks are hard to remove, so they should be dealt with as an emergency... As for the furniture, let's just replace them.|Looking at a room after a deep cleaning makes you feel a sense of accomplishment. The feeling of not even seeing a speck of dust feels as good as beating a very strong enemy in a duel.
Let us clean up any unnecessary trash there might be.
You shouldn't underestimate the power of the Royal Maids.

My liege... No, excuse me, I should be calling you Master, right? Bellona of the Royal Maids, reporting in. My, you seem quite lost for words... I'll explain the situation to you later, so don't worry about it.
It won't be as simple as going back to the title screen if we get a game over~
Stop touching my ears! I told you already, they're real! I-I'll bite you!
Benson-class Destroyer - Benson, Hull Number DD-421!
Commander, the commission's been completed! I'm going to have to punish you if you forget about those girls!
Oh evil being who conspires against cuties... in the name of the moon, I will punish you!
Ahah! What's that tasty-looking snack you've got there?
I am cuteness, and cuteness is me. Don't you agree, Commander? Yay!
Commander, you keep telling me I'm stupid, but you actually like me, don't you?

Commander! Cutie Benson has come again! I've been stopping by too often lately? That's because you haven't been paying this super duper cutie Benson a visit, so you left me no choice~ I'm not lonely at all, I swear!

Were you thinking about how badly you wanted to come back and meet me~? Come here, I'll give a positively explosive hug! ... Hm? Fine... I'm sorry, I'll put away the dynamite... J-just hold on a minute~
Let's hear your excuse for making the strongest and cutest cutie in the world wait for so long, Commander!
Oh nooo! You didn't see anything, Commander! Got it?! *Sob*... I failed...
Mail for you, Commander! I didn't want to anyone else to peek, so I went ahead and took a look myself first!

I'm so cute! The cutest in the universe!|I'm telling you, Commander, Fletcher's house next door is full of people! Us girls need to help her out every now and then~.|If you don't talk to me enough then I'll stop being a bunny! Woof woof!
A mission? No problem! Easy peasy! Bring it on, whatever it may be!
Come on, come on! Give me a reward!
Here comes Benson! I'm way cooler than Anderson. I'm a capital destroyer, and can move at speeds up to 35 knots! My anti-air defenses are just as impressive. I can't wait for you to see me in battle!

Hehe, so you've finally noticed how important I am? Have you? Do you understand that I'm irreplaceable and that just a glance of me makes your heart skip a beat? ... Commander, why are you touching my forehead?
Benson is... invincible!
Whoa! I actually fell asleep! Could this be because of that fabled super hypnosis thing?!
Ah, I feel so hot... I'm burning inside!
Yahoo! Commander! Aren't you charmed by how cute and risqué I am? Huh? W-who am I? ... Hahaha... My name is Benson... It's a pleasure to meet you...
My cuteness level has gone up even higher!
Hoho! Even the most cunning fox couldn't best a rabbit like me!
Fighting for love and peace this Halloween night, it's none other than the pumpkin-style Planet Bunny cutie pie, Benson!
nil|nil|nil
Victory will come to us nice and easy!
Yeah? If you need any help, just say the word. My schedule's pretty packed too, but I can always squeeze in some time to take on your orders.
Cleveland-class light cruiser – Biloxi, Hull Number CL-80.
Those commission team girls are back. Let's go check what rewards they've brought. They might have a surprise for us.
Look, if you wanna do nothing all day, do it without involving me.
Whew... I'm still gonna be busy for a long time, but right now I need a break. You up for chatting about stuff, Commander?

I sometimes enjoy talking with people about what we do on our off days... What? What's so weird about me bringing up people's hobbies? When I have time off, I enjoy myself. I'm no workaholic, you hear?
Guess it's just the two of us again. Heheh, let's forget about work and have a fun chat. You know, just relax. You wanna get some drinks and snacks? It's on me.
Zooming around from sea to sea can even get me feeling tired sometimes. But lately I've been having this thought... This thought that here, where you are, is my home.
Well done on that sortie. From this point on, I'm gonna assume you'll always return triumphant.
Tsk... This is nothing!
Mission status: all green. Eyes on the progress, Commander.
Argh... This isn't over yet, you hear?!
You've got mail, Commander. Better check it ASAP. Might be good news, after all!

"Big sis"? Who, me? Ahh, you mean the lead ship. I respect Cleve just as a sister ship. Hahahah!|We *are* an improved model, but we didn't end up as carriers like Bataan, and our improvements aren't extensive enough to call us part of a subclass. The differences are more obvious through our looks and personalities, though.|A friend always deserves help, even if you yourself are in a tough spot. That's what "no man left behind" is all about. Ain't that right?
These missions just keep piling up. Laziness will not be tolerated, Commander.
Reward recovery complete. Time to see what fruits you've earned for your labor, Commander.

I'm Eagle Union light cruiser Biloxi. I fought in heaps of battles and carried out many carrier escort missions. Sure, the Cleveland class has its hallmark anti-air fire, but everyone's gotta work together to win. So let's do just that, Commander.
I used to think prestige meant dashing gallantly onto the battlefield... But now I see how being by your side is just as... No, it's *more* prestigious than that idea.
No aircraft shall evade my sights!
Check out my gear. Nobody's got better AA than I do. You bet your butt it'll shoot down bogeys like back in the Turkey Shoot.
One without manners is one garnering contempt. Is that really how you wanna be, Commander?
I'm Biloxi. I hope we can work together and seize victory as fellow fleet members. Anyway, that's all for introductions. Nice meeting you.
With great power comes great responsibility. That couldn't be more true.
Thanks for the backup, guys.
A friend told me this look would totally steal your heart. So, has it? Are you head over heels for me? Hahahah! I'm just kidding with you.
We're celebrating an overseas holiday, hence my not-so-casual outfit today. Heheh, what do you think? Looking slick?
I came up with something that could make our trip more interesting. How about we give the Manjuu a break and *you* pull the cart to our next destination? Hahahah! I'm just joking around.
Where do you wanna go today, Commander? Don't worry, we don't have to rush it. I've got plenty of time to spare.

These Dragon Empery signs are really unique, in a good way. I think they're fascinating.|The seat on this Manjuu cart is pretty small. I'd offer to share if there was more room.|I was just about to go procure some souvenirs. What would you buy if you were me, Commander?
Getting tired? Then let's catch a breather. Oh yeah, could you pour me some wine? Let's have a toast. To a wonderful day!
We're celebrating an overseas holiday, hence my not-so-casual outfit today. Heheh, what do you think? Looking slick?
My feelings for you haven't changed, but yeah, these clothes make me act really intimidating... Maybe I'm getting into my role too much.
"Hehe... Now that you've finally fallen into my hands, why don't we take the day to get to know each other real well, Commander?" Oh my, was my acting a bit too realistic~?

I came here intent on enjoying the party, but I wound up slipping into acting instead... Although, there's fun to be had in that, too. Listen, Commander, I'm sorry to ask, but I wanna know: are you... enjoying yourself?
How's it going, Commander? It might be unprofessional of me to ask, but... Is something up?
Argh! Interesting...!

Let's take a ride to the party. Don't worry about the Manjuu, I've seen how well he can drive... What, that wasn't your concern?|You oughta take today off at the very least. No need to be a busy bee and work day in, day out.|Mental clarity is the key to keeping your cool on the battlefield. My sisters, they all have the fortitude it takes.
"Looks like someone here doesn't know proper manners."
"Hehe... Now that you've finally fallen into my hands, why don't we take the day to get to know each other real well, Commander?" Oh my, was my acting a bit too realistic~?
"Clear out the rest of these fools, will you?" Hahah, guess there'll be no need for that.
Beauty is fleeting. Look away for one moment, and you'll miss it forever... It's not exclusive to fireworks, either. When you see a thing of beauty, keep your eyes on it, Commander.

I heard that this place is famous for its festivals with beautiful fireworks, so I made sure to come dressed for the occasion... What do you think? ...I'm even more beautiful? Well, I couldn't let the fireworks be the only things leaving an impression upo
There you are, Commander! They're putting on a fireworks display tonight. Come with me and we'll check it out.

Even in the cold winter, the thrill of watching fireworks with your friends warms you up. Ahahahah!|Being here with my sisters, us all watching the fireworks together... It's actually pretty nice.|Seeing these stunning fireworks makes me hope next year will go smoothly. Fingers crossed, Commander!
Fancy my dress? You can have a closer look at it all you want later.
...You wanna make like a firework and go bang, or what?

I heard that this place is famous for its festivals with beautiful fireworks, so I made sure to come dressed for the occasion... What do you think? ...I'm even more beautiful? Well, I couldn't let the fireworks be the only things leaving an impression upon you tonight! Ahaha, just kidding~
Time is money, so let's strike quickly! I will lead the way!
Someday I hope to see the sea return to its peaceful former state...
Cleveland-class light cruiser – Birmingham, Hull Number CL-62.
Every little bit counts in the end. The worth of this commission will become clear one day.
Commander, you should reflect on your actions thoroughly.
Being a light cruiser, I can't markedly affect the war... However, I firmly believe that the power to protect the sea rests within me.
You think I'm overly stoic...? True, but I must be in order to repel the darkness that envelops the sea.
Commander, it feels as though you have the peculiar power of calming people. Just like a peaceful sea would...
A smile? Like this? That is an unusual order to issue. That is not to say I dislike it... *Giggle*
It is good to see you unscathed. I suggest taking a break.
They have superior firepower! This may be bad...!
Sortie preparations complete. Your orders, Commander?
What could I have done differently...
Mail for you. My intuition tells me it's good news. If it's bad news, I will help you digest it.

Princeton... please be okay. If I had fought harder back then, things wouldn't have...|Sometimes people ridicule me for being unlucky, but having survived that hellish battle, I feel quite lucky.|I feel at ease when I'm with Cleve and my sisters. I believe this is what's known as a "bond."
New mission from HQ. Let's complete it right at once, Commander.
Mission rewards have arrived. Perhaps there is ice cream in... Oh, um, never mind that.

I am Birmingham, the eighth Cleveland-class light cruiser. Born during the war, I fought to its end alongside my many sisters and earned 9 battle stars. As a Knight of the Sea, my duty continues, and I will now fight for the sea's future.

This must be an oath... Have we already spent this much time together, Commander...? No, I'm not displeased at all. It's just... in this case, it's... *Ahem*! Now, then... Commander, will you watch the sunrise over the horizon of the sea together with me?
Full speed ahead!
What is it, Commander? Was that your sortie order?
Is this amusing to you?
Starting today, Cleveland-class light cruiser Birmingham is on active duty. I will not rest until the future of the sea is secure. Commander, grant me your guidance and support.
This enhancement was necessary for me to keep advancing.
The next battleground awaits. I will stay on my guard.
A bicycle must be maintained regularly, so I asked U-47 for advice and help. One day I need to offer her a favor in return.
Good morning, Commander. Unfortunately, this bicycle only seats one person, but I could dismount and lead it along as we walk together.
Is it time to sortie? Please wait. I must park my ride somewhere first.

It seems the academy has no bicycling club... Perhaps I should petition to create one... Hmm...|A new dessert shop opened, and their specialty is ice cream...? ... C-Commander, do you mind if I leave for a moment?|U-47, how about we go on a bicycling trip the next time you're off duty?
Bicycling is an excellent way to train the body. Prepare your bicycle and we can go for a ride, Commander.
Good morning, Commander. Unfortunately, this bicycle only seats one person, but I could dismount and lead it along as we walk together.

skins.name: Fruitful Snow of an Auspicious Year

voiceline.line: When snow falls over the farmlands, it kills off crop-eating insects and keeps the soil at a stable temperature. Then when the snow melts, it waters the earth... Now I can see why they call it "fruitful snow."

Happy Lunar New Year, Commander. I'm trying out Dragon Empery fashion for a change, though this dress will some getting used to. Hey, uh, do you want to join me under the umbrella? For cover against the snowfall, I mean.
Apparently tying your hair up into buns like this is the norm in the Dragon Empery... Huh? It's not?
Welcome back, Commander. There's snow on my umbrella? Oh, darn it. I got so absorbed in the wintry landscape that I forgot to shake the snow off.

Princeton, I'm pretty sure that aerial maneuver you learned from Saratoga is only good for pranking people...|Ice cream doesn't melt so easily when the temperature drops. Is it weird to talk about ice cream in the middle of winter? ...Oh. Now I know...|The family all gathering to make dumplings while they chit-chat... I like the sound of this Dragon Empery tradition. It warms the heart.
You want to... hold hands? My hands are a bit chilly, but if you don't mind that, then sure.

Happy Lunar New Year, Commander. I'm trying out Dragon Empery fashion for a change, though this dress will some getting used to. Hey, uh, do you want to join me under the umbrella? For cover against the snowfall, I mean.
Follow me, not Eugen. Come – we shall face our opponents, no matter how numerous they may be!
Is there something on my face?
Bismarck-class battleship – Bismarck.
... The commission team has returned. I'll go greet them first.
Stay out of my sight.
I am not so easily impressed.
You're not a bad commander... What? Is it so strange for me to give compliments? ... You're simply overreacting.
Why are you staring at me? Do I have something on my face? I'm pretty, you say...? Um, thank you...
I... know that I'm not the best with words, but.. I want you to know that... I enjoy being at your side...
You've done well. You've earned your rest.
Everyone, get behind me.
I look forward to working with you.
For tarnishing my pride... next time, you will pay with your lives.
Be diligent about checking your mail.

Is there a problem? Perhaps my combat experience could prove useful? |"Operation Rheinübung?" I don't have fond memories of it... |Such a slovenly expression, Commander. Now! Lift your chin, puff out your chest, and let me see those eyes! Hut!
Those who cannot finish their missions have no right to stand on the battleground.
I'm leaving the mission rewards over here...
I am the Iron Blood battleship entrusted with the name Bismarck. Allow me to prove that Iron Blood engineering is the finest in the world, no matter the battlefield. Eager to see for yourself?
... Commander, what kind of expression should I have at a time like this? I should... just smile?
Truth can only be found within our range!
Keep your hands to yourself.
I... am not good at expressing myself. Please do not tease me on purpose...
Guten Tag, I am Bismarck. I have fought many foes on many fronts. You may call upon me whenever there is a problem.
Danke.
Such honors may please a weakling, but I am strong.
Apologies, Commander. Am I acting differently from usual? At times, I don't even know which is the real me...

My sincerest apologies for the delay, Commander. Ah, excuse me... as the fleet leader of the Iron Blood, I'm expected to wear this outfit to various formal occasions. Just putting it on seems to make me inadvertently change the way I speak...
Once the commission fleet has finished dropping off their supplies, let's invite them to the banquet as well.

In front of my compatriots, I always had to be adamant, solemnly spearheading the march of the Iron Blood. To be the leader of the Iron Blood's indomitable fleet, I had to lock away the Bismarck that struggled to express herself... But when I'm with you, Commander, I can set aside that burden, just for a little bit...
Let us raise our glasses to the heroes who have returned from battle.
How's your work coming along, Commander?
Even at the most lavish banquet, it is your responsibility as commander to be well-informed should the situation change.

Commander, would you invite Tirpitz for me? Apologies, I'm... still not sure how to ask her myself. |I can keep a lot of people satisfied merely by sitting here with a smile... but only because of my status as the fleet leader of the Iron Blood. |As a leader, I must sometimes say and do things that I do not believe in. Commander, I hope you never lose sight of who you are.
Having unfinished work will turn even the finest wine into vinegar. Isn't that right, Commander?
A decoration for the banquet? Splendid work.
A dance...? Oh, no, I wouldn't turn one down, I just haven't been asked until now...
C-Commander... don't tease me like that...

My sincerest apologies for the delay, Commander. Ah, excuse me... as the fleet leader of the Iron Blood, I'm expected to wear this outfit to various formal occasions. Just putting it on seems to make me inadvertently change the way I speak...
I can take on any number of them!
I feel far more at ease here than when I'm busy with research or the Iron Blood. I really hope that you feel the same way that I do.
Welcome, what would you like to order? ...If you want, we can drop this charade. I'm not used to being a waiter anyway, so I prefer it this way. Hehe.
Looks like the fleet has returned from their commissions... Thiele, I'll leave them to you.

I never thought I'd be standing in front of you in this outfit like this. Still, whether it was fated or not, I'm glad that you were able to see a different side of me... Hm. This cup's on me. Please, enjoy yourself, hehe.
This cup is a prize for the hero who has graciously returned from the battlefield.
Oops, I almost wrote down "the usual" for your order... Ahem, what would you like?
Here's your mail. I... hope it's not an order of coffee from Mainz...

Truthfully speaking, this outfit feels more like that of a waitress than that of a maid... Though, I've been told there's not really much of a difference...|Tirpitz, compile today's sales data and send it to Friedrich. Figuring out what to do with the data we've collected is her specialty.
A new mission... I wonder who would be the best fit for it.
The remunerations for the missions we've completed are here. I'm sure Graf and the others will be ecstatic to hear.
Eugen did tell me she wanted me to try this "physical contact" thing with you.
Welcome, what would you like to order? ...If you want, we can drop this charade. I'm not used to being a waiter anyway, so I prefer it this way. Hehe.
Data collection is complete. Take solace in the fact that you'll be useful after your demise.
Let's give it our all from the very start!
Hey... Don't you think you're a bit too close?
I'm the CPU of Lastation, Black Heart. I've rushed here all the way from Gamindustri to lend you my aid. Be grateful.
Looks like a commission's been completed. Hurry and take a look.
You should know what will happen if you try to get any closer.
Hey... do you have any friends? Hmm... as a special service, I wouldn't object to becoming your friend.
Looks like you've been hard at work. Since I happen to be free right now, why don't I help you out?
It seems like we understand each other a lot better now. At first, I thought you'd give up halfway, but you've certainly changed a little. Let's work hard together and continue to grow from now.

Even though I'm often harsh with you, I don't really mean it that way... But even then, I might have already hurt you. This time, though, I'd like you to scold me... If it's you, I might be able to change for the better.
I've safely returned to port. Now then, let's report the battle results and begin debriefing.
N-not bad...
I'll show you how a CPU fights! I'm ready whenever you are.
So this is the bitterness of defeat? However.... next time, I'll win for sure.
Looks like you have some new mail. If you're busy, I wouldn't object to getting it for you...

Commander, isn't that enough training? From now on, let me prove my worth in actual combat.|I was just thinking... the ocean sure is beautiful, isn't it? Why don't we go for a swim to clear our minds?|You sure are spaced out. I wouldn't be opposed to helping lift your spirits, you know.
It seems that new missions have been posted. Let's hurry up and knock these out.
Seems that a mission has been completed. It's only natural to get rewarded for one's hard work.
I am Black Heart, the CPU and guardian of Lastation. Be sure to properly learn from my refined combat techniques.

Are you sure about choosing me? This is the only time you'll get to change your mind... I see... so your answer is still the same. Well, it's not like I particularly like you that much or anything, but if you're this serious, I'll have to give you an equally serious reply. But... if you're going to cop out on me, I won't forgive you!
I'll end you with this!
W-wait... suddenly touching me like that... of course I'd be shocked!
Even if you're the commander... I won't allow you to go any further.
I'm the CPU of Lastation, Black Heart. I've rushed here all the way from Gamindustri to lend you my aid. Be grateful.
Don't think that I'd be satisfied with just this achievement.
Is that all? How boring.

It's good to take it easy and celebrate once in a while, but especially in moments like these, you can't afford to let your guard down. Commander, why don't we spar for a bit? Don't even think about holding back - come at me!
nil|nil|nil
Show them neither mercy nor pity...
I am the Longbow of Crécy, and the Shield of the Realm... By your will, I am at your disposal.
Bellona-class light cruiser – Black Prince.
Ah! Commander, I think the commission team is back.
Commander, are you my... enemy?
Commander, do you have something for me? I'm sure I can handle it.
Commander, why are you laughing? Did something funny happen? Won't you please tell me too?
You like sweet girls, do you, Commander? Well... hrrmm... What if I were to hug you like this? Would that make me seem sweeter?
I'm very important to you, am I, Commander? ... Now what am I supposed to do with that? Treat you even sweeter than I do now?
Welcome back, Commander. Did you have a good fight?
Do I carry on? Or do I retreat?
Commander, back again same time as always, eh?
I failed... No, it can't be...
Mail call? I wonder what it is? Could it be your dismissal?

A Maid? Me? Certainly not... But I do know how to make some simple dishes, and I suppose I could bring you some tea.|I can see the water from here. Commander, do you like the ocean?|Commander, are you daydreaming? What say... I join you and we daydream together?
Dereliction of duty is grounds for court-martial... Maybe you should see to those missions?
I sorted through the mission rewards, but I'm not sure I did it right...
I am a modified Dido-class... rather was it Bellona-class? ... Right then, you could say I'm quite well-travelled. Will you be sending me all over the world too?
The way you treasure me gives me such warmth and solace... This is what true happiness is, isn't it? Commander, please, I beg you, let us share in even more happiness...
Wipe them out.
Commander? Something about my body caught your attention, did it?
Commander, does that feel nice to... touch?
Err, you're... the Commander, yes? You don't know who I am? Ah, right, I've yet to introduce myself... I'm Black Prince of the Royal Navy... Will that suffice?
Commander, have I really grown stronger?
They're a fleet of smouldering hulks... Not a single one left afloat.
You dare disturb the Commander's vacation? You won't get away with that.
Oh, is it that time already? I've prepared a few simple dishes. Commander, shall we invite the others to join us?

Sorry to keep you waiting, Commander. Thank you very much for taking me on vacation. Standing in front of you like this... is a little embarrassing... Nevertheless, what do you think of... my swimsuit?
What's wrong, Commander? Are you still preoccupied with work?
I didn't think this swimsuit stood out, so I was surprised when you still found me right away...
It's the mail? Don't tell me our vacation is over already...

The sea is a tempestuous battlefield, and yet the beach is a relaxing Eden. What an incredible duality.|Beach volleyball? I've heard it's quite fun. Do you think I could give it a try?|The sand is so soft, so fine. It feels so pleasant between my toes...
Are you tired, Commander?
Commander, the others are still here.

Sorry to keep you waiting, Commander. Thank you very much for taking me on vacation. Standing in front of you like this... is a little embarrassing... Nevertheless, what do you think of... my swimsuit?
Too much sitting wears out one's legs. Stretching out like this... Aahhh, yes, that's much better.
A "qipao," is it? This legendary dress from the Dragon Empery... Putting it on and enjoying some nostalgic music, makes me... Ahhh... Commander, might we relax like this a bit longer...?
The kitchen sure seems busy. What's going on... in there?
Commander, welcome home. Ooh, I just realized. I should probably be saying "Happy Lunar New Year," shouldn't I?
Mail call... Must be some festival greetings? You're quite popular, Commander.

Commander... Do you enjoy such nostalgic music?|Hah... How should I spend this holiday? I think listening to music like this is quite nice... Aahh...|It's a holiday. No need to move, no need to fight... Now why not make every day a holiday?
Mmm... why not stretch out with me, Commander?
Is this... a festival custom?
A "qipao," is it? So this legendary dress from the Dragon Empery... Putting it on and enjoying some nostalgic music, makes me... Ahhh... Commander, might we relax like this a bit longer...?
Disappear, like a fleeting bubble...!
Um, sorry I got champagne all over you. I really feel bad about it... Next time, I'll be more careful.
You can't have a party without champagne, right? Now, if I remember right, you're meant to give it a good shake before popping the cork... Oh no! Look out, Commander!
The way to treat those important to you... is to cherish them, and share all your joys and sorrows with them, right? Mm, I'm glad to be sharing all my joy with you right now.
Another victory? Mm, then another bottle is in order... Huh, what do you mean I don't need to pop so many?
Commander... Would you like some champagne? Don't worry, I know how much strength to put into it this time.
Mail? Is it... a party invite? We're already at the party though...

Dido and Sirius seem to be busy with something... Should I go help out too?|If every day was a party and there was no fighting to be seen... that would be a pretty nice world.|You're not supposed to shake the champagne bottle if you're trying to drink from it normally, huh... I see...
What do you think the punishment for forgetting about your missions should be... One glass, or one bottle?
Want another glass? Mm, coming right up~
Commander, are you drunk? What's the matter? Your hand's all hot.
You can't have a party without champagne, right? Now, if I remember right, you're meant to give it a good shake before popping the cork... Oh no! Look out, Commander!
Shall I uncork a bottle to celebrate the victory?
Um, want to talk about something? Uh... I'm not exactly a great conversation starter, but... Huh, just go with the flow?
Oh... Welcome, Commander. Can I take your order...? Or maybe, you just wanted to kick back and relax? ...Either way is fine with me.
Commander, why don't you put your head down on the counter and take a nap?
I had Hermione prepare some hot tea beforehand. Feel free to have some if you're feeling worn out.

You'd like me to mix a drink? ...I'm not sure I can do that... but I can serve pre-made stuff...|You're not the only one who comes to unwind. Sometimes other shipgirls stop by, and if memory serves me properly, there are some real heavyweights who can down an entire mug like it's nothing...|What's it like... to get sloshed? Do your eyes get all spinny? ...It's like, you're in a waking dream...?
Want something to drink, Commander? I can only do the pre-made stuff though...
Are you sloshed? Maybe you should get in touch with Dido and the others...?
Oh... Welcome, Commander. Can I take your order...? Or maybe, you just wanted to kick back and relax? ...Either way is fine with me.
As long as you stay calm nothing can go wrong.
Would you like to read a book too?
I'm Blanc. Nice to meet you. Maybe you could introduce some intriguing books from this world to me...
A commission's done.
...Who are you?
I'm writing a novel right now, would you like to give it a read?
Oh, what a coincidence. I was just thinking I should come see you. Anyway, today I've got this novel for you to read...
Did you enjoy that book I gave you? You did? I'm glad to hear that... Hm...? No, it's just that nobody's ever said they enjoyed my books before, so I don't know how I should react...
You're the only one who seems to enjoy reading my novels... Nothing makes me happier than that. I hope you'll continue reading them, too.
Great, now I can get back to reading my book.
I'm getting a little ticked off...
Welcome back. Not much happened while you were gone.
I'm astonished they've cornered us like this...
You've got mail.

I could recommend you a book I like. Hm? There's no need for that? I see... That's a shame.|It's really windy today... Let's hurry up then, before it dies down...|Perhaps I should write about this world and make a book about it when I return to Lowee.
Have you checked out today's missions?
How about we go retrieve those mission rewards?
I'm Blanc, the CPU of Lowee. I guess my hobbies are to read and write novels. I'm currently working on a new one.
...! I never thought I'd hear you say those words. Maybe it was fate all along for me to come to this world and meet you. Of course I hope we'll always be together from now on.
I'm doing it...!
Hahah... I'm pretty ticklish there...
What were you hoping for?
I'm Blanc. Nice to meet you. Maybe you could introduce some intriguing books from your world to me...
A level is just a number... Let me demonstrate how strong I really am.
That was great for a warm-up.
Bluegill, setting out!
I wonder if there's a way to become friends with Yuubari, that girl cooped up in the science department...
Gato-class submarine – Bluegill, Hull Number SS-242.
Commander, the rewards from that commission have arrived!
It's okay! You just need to bask in the sunshine for a bit, and your troubles will surely all go away!
Bluegills are, in fact, a type of sunfish! ...You knew that? Welp, and here I was hoping to tell you a surprising fact.
There you are, Commander! Come here! ...What's wrong with me hugging you? Am I holding you too tight? That's not it? Then what is it?
I figured out why my hugs bother you! It's because it feels embarrassing, right? Well, don't worry about that! I asked around, and nobody thinks less of you for it! ...W-was I wrong?

So my hugs really put you in a pickle, huh, Commander... I'm sorry for that! I can't help it, I just feel super, *super* happy when I hug you! Hey, what if I wait with my hugs until you say you're ready? Okey-dokey! Just tell me whenever you want one!
Good job, Commander! Come here!
Oh dang, oh shoot!
Welcome back, Commander! Let's part these curtains, like... This! Hehe, now the sun's gleam reaches in here too!
They nearly got us... But it won't go the same way next time!
Is this mail for Bluegill? Oh, it's addressed to the Commander...

Sunny days are always good swimming days!|Hey, that's not a blank sheet, that's Bluegill's personal file on the back! Look! I wrote the whole thing myself!|How long are you gonna have a staredown with your desk, Commander? C'mon, let's catch a break!
Commander, if you're heading out for a patrol, why not take Bluegill with you? It might be good to have me!
Mission complete! Now it's time for a swim! ...Huh? Too early for a swim? But why?
I'm Bluegill, Gato-class submarine. I saw action all over the sea and gave my enemies a real scare. Hehe, I'll shine on at this port, too!
Can I hug you now, Commander?! Yay! Sharing a hug with you just feels like total bliss~ Hehehe~ Stay put, I wanna enjoy our embrace a little longer!
Bluegill, comin' at ya!
You want a fight with me? You asked for it! Take *this*! Blue knockout punch!
Whoa, whoa! Commander! You've kinda crossed a line here!
I've finally found one! My own commander! ...Hehehe, from now on, you're Bluegill's commander!
Wooo! Wow, I've really gotten nimbler!
I hereby name this victory "The Battle of Bluegill"!
I've heard I can throw the ball faster if I have my feet raised, like a pitcher! ...It doesn't work like that?
Look out for Bluegill's ultra-reliable defense, Intrepid! Hehehe, Commander, stay here and see the results of Bluegill's special training!
Bluegill catches, Bluegill throws! Oh no! Look out! Sorry, Commander, I didn't mean to throw it at you! Hehehe...
I wish baseball was as easy as diving... I'll still give it my best shot, though! Bluegill's a go-getter!

With you and Coach Bogue helping me, I'm destined to become a pro player!|I'll stun everyone with my skills when the next baseball league rolls around!|Intrepid! Bluegill's by your back! Don't forget that!
Is... this the proper throwing stance? I'll memorize it!
Stop playing dirty!
Look out for Bluegill's ultra-reliable defense, Intrepid! Hehehe, Commander, stay here and see the results of Bluegill's special training!
Go, curveball!
Please keep my stats in mind!
Bogue-class escort carrier — Bogue, Hull Number CVE-9!
Curveball~! Oh crap I broke the window... Ah, Commander, the commission squad is back!
Can you really make me stronger, Commander? ...I'm really worried...
Someday, I hope to stand on the podium of the sea with your lead!
You always give me the right ideas, Commander! As expected of a great coach! I, Bogue the pitcher, will follow you for life!
Commander! I, Bogue, am requesting special training! The reason is, whenever I hear your voice, I lose my strength so I want to know how to prevent that... That's all!
Co-Commander. If I win in the next league, I- I'll tell you something important! S- So please wait for it! I will become stronger. Stronger than anyone!
Commander, you are a real veteran! That was a learning experience!
The best pitchers are always training. Yep!
Is this the end of the tournament...?
Commander, it's a mail! Which championship is it from?
With this ball, I can sink a submarine!|Commander, can you polish the B-25s?|Boring... You look tired anyway, Commander, so let's go and sink some subs?
A new goal? I will not back down!
It's satisfying to be rewarded for achieving the objective! Commander, check out the rewards!
I am pro baseballer, Bogue! Yep, my greatest record is 12 strikeouts in a single match! I wish to sharpen my skills by your side, and become the shining star of the Major League!
...Now I understand! You noticed my feelings, Commander, and you want me to continue my journey without regrets! I, Bogue, am truly happy to have met you!
Fly, my fastball!
What's this? Training to resist against attacks?
Waah!! Commander, that's mean!
*inhale*...HAA! Nice one... Oh, apologies. You're the Commander, I see. Fast pitcher, Bogue, here for duty!
My balls have become even faster!
Hmhmm~ As I thought, I am the best pitcher.
Commander, there's no need to be so afraid. There are only two things my balls hit-- Enemies, and victory! Ah, sometimes they do hit the windows too, ahaha...

My goal is the Major Le... I mean, submarine fighting, a three strike finish!|Rest assured, Commander! While I'm doing escort duty, no ships sink under my watch!|I am here today because of Yorkie and Lady Lex. I have to give them my thanks!
Yes! Thanks for getting my ball!
Haha, I'm used to this type of interference now!
Commander, there's no need to be so afraid. There are only two things my balls hit-- Enemies, and victory! Ah, sometimes they do hit the windows too, ahaha...
Take a deep breath. The battle is starting...!
I can go underwater, but... I'm no submarine. I can't stay submerged for long...
voiceline.oath: They're antennas, not rabbit ears... Would rabbit ears have been better...?

voiceline.line: Brooklyn-class light cruiser – Boise, Hull Number CL-47.
Here are the results from the commission... Please look over them.
Commander, I don't get you at all...
There's nothing in particular that needs doing right now. Commander... why don't you relax for a bit...?
When life knocks you down, get back up on your feet. These are words I try to live by... Commander, why don't you give it a try as well?
I'm not as straightforward as someone like Phoenix, but... Commander, I want to look after you more... E-even if I have to start with the finer details.
Even if you can't see my face directly, I want you to know that as long as I'm by your side, I'll always be smiling from the bottom of my heart.
You want to know more... about my mask...?
I'll look after the place while you're gone, so... don't worry.
voiceline.oath: Oh, there's some paper stuck on your clothes. Let me wipe it off... It should be okay now... I think?

voiceline.line: Minimize... the damage...!
Huff... Puff... It's time for work.
voiceline.oath: Huff... Puff... Huff... Puff... Welcome back, Commander.

voiceline.line: We've no choice but to retreat... I'm sorry, Commander!
Commander, there's new mail waiting for you. Please don't forget to read it...
voiceline.oath: "I bet you haven't read the mail from last time yet." That's what I wrote in my log last time...

voiceline.line: July 9th... It's an important date for me.|Huff... Puff... Huff... Puff... Yes, let's try to relax...|Phoenix is a really hot-blooded girl, isn't she...? Compared to her... I might be pretty cold...
voiceline.extra: I don't really mind showing you my face, but, umm, that means...|San Francisco, it's best if you don't tease the Commander too much... I-I'll get mad at you, you know...?|Huff... Puff... Huff... Puff... Breathe in, breathe out... That feels nice... Phew...

voiceline.line: Commander, there are still missions to finish. It'd be best to not forget about them...
Umm, Commander, I reminded you earlier, but... please collect the mission rewards at some point.

You'd like to learn more about what I did during that war? Well, I provided support for many landing invasions... The most memorable one? That'd be the one at Cape Esperance... Helena saved me back then.
Whether through my battles or my everyday duties, I always want to do something extra for you... If y-you're fine with that side of me, then... Huff... Puff... Y-yes! Commander, I'll be in your care!
Pick out the biggest one... Mhm!
Mm... I'm listening.
voiceline.oath: Umm, is there anything you need from me...?

voiceline.line: What exactly... is this...?
voiceline.oath: (Deep breaths... Deep breaths...!!!)

voiceline.line: Huff... Puff... I'm Boise of the Brooklyn class... Umm... Is there something I can help you with?
Strengthening complete. Preliminary inspection in progress...
Battle completed. Safely.
voiceline.oath: Huff... another smooth victory... Commander, thank you for your guidance.

voiceline.line: Huff...... Puff...... (It looks like Boise has fallen asleep)
Huff... Puff... Deep breaths... I, I'll never get used to wearing this outfit in front of others... I think...
Is something wrong... with my rabbit ears...?
Commander, would you like something to drink...? If you don't want something alcoholic, how about some of the juice that New Jersey recommended...?
Huff... I guess I'll be able to relax for the time being–– Huh? C-Commander?!
Honolulu, you don't like standing out either...? T-then, how about relaxing over here with me?|I'm not very good at singing... sorry, Commander...|The music is a bit too loud for me...
My handkerchief? Ah, umm, thank you...
I, I don't think you should be doing this... *blush*
Huff... Puff... Deep breaths... I'll never get used to wearing this outfit in front of others... I think...
A long, long time ago, in a castle far away from here, there once was a witch who could grant people's wishes... Um, I'll tell you the rest of the story later. It's quite a long story.
Um, I decided to try on a costume, since it's Halloween and all... Do you think I got that witchy look down...?
What do you think... about this witch's hat...?
W-was that a will-o'-wisp just now...?
Huff... Puff... Commander, these pumpkin lanterns are so nice and warm... Would you like to come sit by me...?

Witches won't stand out much compared to zombies and Frankenstein's monsters... or so I thought.|Phoenix, um... I'm planning on watching the parade from here, so I can't really participate in it with you...|Commander, why don't you try putting on this pumpkin mask? Pfft... I-I'm sorry... I just couldn't hold it in...
Commander, would you like to try trick-or-treating? I've still got a fair bit of candy left, if you'd like...
(Huff... Puff... Huff... Puff...) Y-You scared me...!
Um, I decided to try on a costume, since it's Halloween and all... Do you think I got that witchy look down...?
Huff... Puff... (Boise seems to be fanning herself with her hands to try to cool down.)
Huff... Puff... These Dragon Empery clothes look good on me? It's rather revealing and breezy, and makes me feel self-conscious... but if you like it, I suppose it's fine...
Commander, are you comfortable with crowded places? I can't really handle stuff like parties or festivals...
Huff... Puff... The fragrance of herbs makes me feel great... Maybe they really do have healing properties...
We'll be fine... Commander, we'll be able to withdraw soon.

Hiding one's face behind a fan is an established custom here... Huff...|I didn't expect Marblehead to be so familiar with Dragon Empery customs... She really knows her stuff... H-huh, she's just trying to sound smart?|Huff... Puff... The food sure smells amazing... Man, I'm totally starving... Oh, um, it's n-nothing!
Commander, are you also running a bit hot...?
Nn... Mmgh...
Huff... Puff... These Dragon Empery clothes look good on me? It's rather revealing and breezy, and makes me feel self-conscious... but if you like it, I suppose it's fine...
Phew... I-is the battle over now...?
All right! Let's do this!

One sec, gotta finish this message... There we go! You see, I offer this like, counseling service thing, so sometimes I get people messaging me like this. You need any counseling, Commander? Typing all the time's a chore, so just hit me up in-person.
voiceline.oath: Oh, you here to help out with my counseling corner, Commander? Sorry, but you can't. I appreciate the thought, but girly problems require girly solutions.

voiceline.line: Baltimore-class heavy cruiser – Bremerton, Hull Number CA-130.
That commission team's come back! This is your chance to charm 'em, Commander!
Come back to your normal self already, Commander... If you really need it, you can cry into my chest and let it all out.
Welcome to Bremerton's counseling corner! So, whatcha got on your mind? ...Hang on, what? You just wanna chat? So... you want counseling on how to find a chat buddy, basically?

Things I like besides fighting? I chat people up all the time and give counseling over social media, sooo... I guess I like hanging out with people? Oh, hang on, gotta check this Juustagram message. One sec...
I know you're used to listening to everyone else's troubles, but you can talk to me about whatever's on your mind. Oh, if you wanna talk through text instead, you can always DM me over Juustagram.

Did you read my DM, Commander? Don't go ghosting me; it says you've seen it~ I'm waiting for your reply with, like... Butterflies in my stomach, I guess? You know how to write a good reply, don't you? Hehehe~
voiceline.oath: Commander, you wanna go hang after we're done with work? Where? You decide♪ Hehehe~ Don't let me down now. Pick a good place and take me there~

voiceline.line: Phew... Hey, Commander, you're thinking about skippin' work, aren't you? Hah, I'm fine with that. It'll just be you and me taking a short break, nobody'll notice.
voiceline.oath: *sigh*... I always ask myself if you have to go into battle every time I see you leave, but at the same time, I wish I could be styling with you on the battlefield... Guess my feelings are pretty mixed on this.

voiceline.line: I mighta been a bit too careless...
Nice seeing ya, Commander! I'll list off today's mission objectives... but first, I've gotta make a post to my Juustagram!
voiceline.oath: Mornin', Commander. Let's see what's new on Juustagram... Wait, no. First, it's time to hear your orders!

voiceline.line: Oops... Uhh, I think I messed up somewhere...
Got a letter for you here. If it's nothing important, I could read it for ya.

You look kinda moody... Wait, is that my cue to like, go buy you a drink?|What are you like when you're not working, Commander? Maybe you're one of those serious-on-the-outside, klutz-on-the-inside people?|Is my outfit tickling your fancy, Commander? Heheh, if you wanna get a closer look, go ahead.
voiceline.oath: Here ya go! A drink, a small packed lunch, and some snacks from a bunch of peeps. Might be a bit much all in all, but think of it as proof of how much people love you!|nil|I see Baltimore's out there being a hero, like always... She should take a break sometime to focus more on fashion and other stuff girls do.

voiceline.line: Are these missions tough stuff? Hmm... Maybe I'll take a look, see if there's anything I can help with.
Mission's been completed. We haven't claimed the rewards yet, though. Come on, head out and get 'em!

We Baltimore-class girls, me included, hardly got any chances to shine in combat since we were built near the end of the war. This time 'round, though, we're always on standby! You need somethin' done, hit me up!
Okay, now keep your eyes closed, Commander. "Why"? Come on, I'm not gonna mess with you, so just relax and do it~ I wanna remember this feeling every morning I wake up for the rest of my life♪
Say goodnight!
Oof... My shoulders are killing me! Yo, Commander, mind giving me a massage?
Do that again and you'll regret it real bad, you hear?
voiceline.oath: Hohoh! You like that, huh~ You wanted to feel it for youself, am I right?

voiceline.line: Here! I! Am! I'm Bremerton, the Eagle Union heavy cruiser! The pleasure's mine! Oh, by the way, mind telling me your name, birthday, and favorite thing?
Hooray! It feels like I've grown in some way! Or somewhere, but I dunno where that'd be...
Heheh! Lookit or not, I'm a Baltimore-class, so these chumps were easy-peasy!
Gah, it's freakin' hot... I just wanna hit the showers and then flop around in bed until it's time to sleep... Oh, gotta update my Juustagram... Ehh, forget it, I'm not gonna bother today.
*pant*... *pant*... Man, it's so sunny today... Commander, or should I say, "Coach," could ya lend me your parasol? I'm starting to feel my brains melting away...
That commission team's come back! This is your chance to charm 'em, Coach!
*pant* *pant*...Unlike Baltimore, I guess I'm really not built for this kind of exercise...
*gulp* *gulp* Phew... I'm coming back to life! Coach, thanks for practicing with me all this time!
Got a letter for you, Coach. If it's nothing important, I could read it for ya.

Coach, if you're thirsty, you can take a sip from my water bottle. Don't sweat the small stuff, go for it! |Seems like Cooper is having a match with some Sakura Empire girls over on the next court. Coach, wanna go take some sports drinks over to them in a bit? |Wanna have a friendly match? Er, actually, scrap that. There's no way I'd be able to beat you, Coach.
Now that I'm all sweaty and gross, I can't just ask to lean on your shoulder, can I? Ahaha...
I was an idiot for thinkin' you wouldn't try something when my guard is down...
*pant*... *pant*... Man, it's so sunny today... Commander, or should I say, "Coach," could ya lend me your parasol? I'm starting to feel my brains melting away...
C'mon, show me what ya got!
Bremerton's counseling corner's still open, like always! Got somethin' you wanna talk about, Commander?
"Stop right there, evildoers! You've managed to evade justice all this time, but the hour of judgment is finally upon you!" ...Hmm, making the perfect flashy debut is pretty tough, isn't it?
Commission team just got back. You know what that means: we gotta give 'em a true kung-fu hero welcome!
I know hairbuns are cliché, but I wanted to change up my style, y'know?
Hoo! Hi-yaaah! Whew... 'sup, Commander? Came to watch? Cool, cool. Never mind me though, check out this ballin' backdrop Akashi hooked me up with!

Have you seen Ning and Ping's mad acrobatic skills? The stuff they can do legit blows my mind...|Hi-yaaah! Oh yeah, frickin' nailed it! Aw, hang on, Juustagram DM just came in!|"My final move! Spinning Bird: Thunder Whip!" ...Ow, ow, ow! Lesson learned: this move's too advanced for my lacking motor skills...
Mission donezo! Got another scene coming up, so we'd better go get those rewards now.
Ooh, that's good... Your muscles get real stiff after so much action.
Heheh, you really wanna taste my kung-fu fury that badly?
"Stop right there, evildoers! You've managed to evade justice all this time, but the hour of judgment is finally upon you!" ...Hmm, making the perfect flashy debut is pretty tough, isn't it?
You're worried about my counseling service? Don't worry, I put up a sign saying it's closed for the day. Hehe, now that you know, focus on our date~
I reckon we've done enough shopping for the moment. Let's stop and chill here for a bit, then have another look around~♪
What a fun day~ Should probably write about it in my diary later... Hmm, since this was just our first date, I wonder what we should do for the second and third ones... Got any ideas, Commander?
One boba milk tea, no ice and half the sugar please! Oh wait, let me get one more for the poor Commander who's carrying my luggage!
Hey Commander, on a scale from 1 to 10, how do I look today? And no wishy-washy answers like saying I look "cute" or "pretty," got it?

Affection's somethin' that goes up bit by bit, so don't underestimate the power of dates!|You want a taste? Ah... No need to get all flustered about it, go ahead! Take a sip!|Obviously we're gonna walk all around town when we're on a date! Let's head over to that store next!
You wanna rest up a bit more? Haha, I guess I am the one who invited you out~ Hmm, all right. Let's stay here for a bit longer.
What's your endgame here?
I reckon we've done enough shopping for the moment. Let's stop and chill here for a bit, then have another look around~♪
Bristol Investigation Team, setting off!
Curious about my little helper? Hehehe. Well, Ingraham built it to assist me in exploration. Its name is Data 857!
Allen M. Sumner-class destroyer – Bristol, Hull Number DD-857.
A commission's been completed! Data 857, go see if the girls brought back any strange goodies. And watch out for k-kelp!
Hmph... Our adventure went so badly all because you went and got the kelp curse put on you!
The Dragon Empery's a land teeming with folklore and myths... Next time I see my Empery friends, I wanna hear all about them!
If that'll be all, do you mind if I go for a stroll around port? ...Awesome! Come along, Data 857!
Are you scared of the dark, Commander? Then just stick close to me, and my lantern will shoo the dark away! You've nothing to fear – I've trained for this!
There are more mysteries in the world than Data 857 and I can ever hope to solve... It's a good thing I have you, Commander! We might never solve EVERY mystery, but together, we can solve a lot more!
Sure, praise me for my investigator skills all you want~
voiceline.oath: Feels like you just charged me up with energy! Your touch is like magic, Commander~

voiceline.line: Now's the perfect opportunity to look into the Commander, one of the port's many myster– Oh! Welcome back! Err, I'm not up to anything at all! Not yet, at least!
voiceline.oath: Nice going out there, Commander! Did you come across any places warranting an investigation?

voiceline.line: Zoinks! Don't put out my light!
Weapons check complete – I'm ready to go on an adventure! Get your mystery-solving gear on, Commander!
voiceline.oath: Investigation complete! Nothing seems out of order in the office. Welcome back, Commander!

voiceline.line: Fiddlesticks! Agghh... No regrets...
voiceline.oath: There's... kelp on my head... Agghh... No regrets...

voiceline.line: New mail? Could it be... a request to look into a paranormal case?

Show the Commander what an awesome robot you are, Data 857! Let's start with your best feature – replay mode! List the results of our last investigation!|I was told your desk can transform and your bookshelf has a secret mechanism... I'm disappointed neither of those are true.|The forecast saaays... Awesome! It'll be sunny tomorrow! Can't go mystery-solving in the rain, you know!
voiceline.extra: Kelp is really gross to me... Never mind eating it, I can't even touch the stuff!|Data 857 and I are ready to go, just give us the word! ...It's not time just yet? Fine... I'll check my gear again in the meanwhile!

voiceline.line: New missions are in, Commander! Maybe one of them involves investigating something!
Mission complete! I'll write up a report of my findings right away!

My history? Eh, it's honestly pretty unremarkable... Anyway, lemme tell you a story! Deep under the sea, there once lived a legendary monster that was as long as several school buses. When a ship sailed over it, the monster would open its jaws and swallow it whole...
Hehehe! Now we're mystery-solving partners! We'll go wherever there are clues to be found, be they at sea, in the skies, or on land!
Your biggest mistake was underestimating this investigator!
My uniform looks pretty, doesn't it?
voiceline.oath: My tie's all crooked? Thanks for telling me!

voiceline.line: Are you possessed by an evil entity?! Then I have no choice... I've got to subdue you for everyone's safety!
voiceline.oath: S-so that's your favorite part of me, huh...

voiceline.line: The name is Bristol, Eagle Union destroyer! Well met, Commander! This port must be home to many mysteries... I will make it my duty to solve each and every one! Heheheh!
Firepower upgrade complete! New depths to explore are now within my reach!
Crushing victory! Heheh! Now we can keep investigating in peace!
Sorry for dropping in unannounced, Tai Yuan. I was just wondering, could I borrow some books from you again? Cool, thanks a bunch!

Happy Lunar New Year, Commander! The time's finally come to look into the age-old legends from the Dragon Empery! The truth behind these legends is bound to be as fascinating as the legends themselves!
Cooper, I could use more soap liquid! ...Thanks! Come blow bubbles with me! Hehehe~
Investigator task for today: gather anecdotes about Dragon Empery legends and folklore! But that's for after I've enjoyed the festivities.

Assuming a legend is a story embellished by people from many generations ago, then what is the kernel of truth that inspired it all?|Where's Data 857? Ingraham's doing maintenance on it. The little bot deserves a break too once in a while.|If the legends are true, then that makes this fish – the Kun – the biggest aquatic monster to ever exist!
Allen picked these clothes out for me! Hehehe~ How do I look in them?
Whoa! Hey! Don't startle me like that!

Happy Lunar New Year, Commander! The time's finally come to look into the age-old legends from the Dragon Empery! The truth behind these legends is bound to be as fascinating as the legends themselves!
Fire at will! I have you covered!
This information is confidential, so please keep it a closely guarded secret.
Brooklyn-class Light Cruiser – Brooklyn, Hull Number CL-40!
Though it may be tough for everyone, completing commissions like this will help raise our reputation. Let's start another one as soon as possible.
Commander, I'm thinking of resigning because you just don't seem like you're worth the effort.
Commander, my responsibility is to ensure that you have the upper hand in foreign affairs. Rest assured, I am an expert in that area.
It feels like I've been managing your personal affairs more than foreign affairs lately, Commander... Surely this isn't on purpose, is it?
Commander, a diplomat doesn't usually take on the role of a secretary... but I personally wish to deepen my relationship with you.
I wish to fight only for you, to give you the upper hand... Maybe I am no longer suited to be the entire fleet's diplomat.
Good work, Commander. I will make sure that the results of your last battle come to good use.
You came just in time. A few files need your signature.
Now we won't have an advantage during the negotiations...
There's mail for you, Commander... Hm? Where was this sent from?
It's important to communicate with other nations.|Please don't stare at me in such a weird way.|I may be a diplomat, but don't even think about underestimating my power.
Completing missions is a good way to demonstrate our capabilities. Please take a look at some of the new missions.
Here is a summary of the rewards. Your confirmation, please, Commander.
As the representative of the then newly constructed pre-war cruisers, I was put in charge of foreign diplomacy. That said, my firepower is never to be underestimated, so please put your mind at ease.
Thank you, now I have more confidence in managing the fleet's affairs. Hm? I may act on your behalf for a little? What a pleasant joke. ... At any rate, I will not let you down.
Deterrence is also a part of diplomacy...
Are you interested in my tanned skin, Commander?
A diplomat is not the same thing as a secretary... Please, restrain yourself, Commander!
I am Brooklyn. I am an elite cruiser, so you may let me handle all foreign diplomacy matters.
Power is the foundation of gunboat diplomacies. Thank you.
Now then, let us talk about reparations.
Commander, we're fighting. Please concentrate.
I'm happy that I'm so treasured by you, Commander, but please don't have any weird expectations. Yes, weird expectations.
B-class destroyer ー Bulldog, Hull Number H91!
Commander, have you forgotten when you took the commissions?
The fleet? Hmm... I can't say that I like it, but I don't hate it either...
There used to be 4 Single Barrels. Lil' A and Lil Y were retired because of submarine fighting, so now I'm left with Lil' B and Lil' X... I feel... a little bit lonely
I don't mean to boast, but I'm good at concealing my emotions. Are you saying you don't dislike emotionless girls? ...I see. You are a pervert, Commander.
Commander, you are an idiot and a pervert, but I've never said that I hated people like them before, you know? ...But to make someone smaller than you say such things, you are truly a dumb pervert.
Commander, looking at me with eyes full of expectations will not cause me to give you candies, you know? You're an adult as well, aren't you?
I was thinking you'd be back soon since you think about the fleet...
Sometimes we win, sometimes we lose. It's not such a big deal. ... Tsk...
You are low on [communication power] but please, read your mails properly
Are you an idiot, Commander?|The best thing I can do is submarine subjugation|Commander, if your hand is on my head for more than 3 seconds, I'll bite down on it, you hear?
If you need the secretary to even notice the progress of your missions, then you are truly an idiot.
Are you so lazy that you don't even want to collect the rewards?

I, Bulldog, am the youngest of the B class. My accomplishments were the acquisition of encoded transmission machines, codebooks, and the witnessing of the signing of the surrender treaty. If you are not an idiot, Commander, you should know the worth of such accomplishments.

Commander, are you getting ready to head outside? ... What are you worried about? You think we're heading to the police station? What an undependable adult. Hah... There's a more important place to go, isn't there?
Lil B, Lil X, I'm counting on you
What is it? If it's your personal needs, Commander, I'll have to refuse.
Lil' B! Lil' X! Target the Commander!

Good day. I'm B class' Bulldog. ...I'm an adult so please do not judge me by my looks. I hope you aren't an adult who does that, Commander. 
I'll be in your care.
You do have strange expectations of me, don't you Commander?
This was a given. Please don't touch my head like I'm a child.
Why did they choose to become our enemy...?!
Commander, why are you staring at me...?
Essex-class aircraft carrier – Bunker Hill, Hull Number CV-17.
Pardon, but I'll go greet the girls who are coming back from their commission. Just wait here until I report back.
I'd rather not talk to you right now.
There is no beauty in warfare. There is only ugliness in the suffering and loss of life we inflict upon each other.
Don't think I'm upset just because I have little to say. If anything, I'm probably thinking about something, or about how to express myself.
Something strange has been going on with my thoughts recently. Whenever I start thinking about things, your face pops up in my head and makes it hard for me to stay calm...
We were born as weapons of warfare, and I thought that is all we would ever be. But having spent time with you, I'm beginning to think... that there's more to our lives than war.
You've returned? ...Very well. Why don't we prepare for the next sortie?
Why now of all times...?!
