We're in a state of emergency. Be prepared to run the Holiday Express, even if it's a holiday.
Their power... surpasses even the "Dragon's Jaws"...?
The mail's here... Wonder if there's any new intel?

Right now, another place out there is being engulfed by the flames of war...|Eldridge's ability? I'm not exactly sure, but... I feel like I've seen it somewhere... |All resistance is meaningless before the Essex-class's attack formation.
Missions... should best be completed in a timely manner.
There are a ton of rewards? Of course.

Essex-class, Bunker Hill. My name comes from a battlefield in the Revolutionary War. I've seen my fair share of battles... and know that war brings nothing but sorrow and pain. Let's not talk about it any more.
Sorry... My mind has gone completely blank... I'm lost for words... Oh, that's right! "I pledge loyalty and love to you until the end of time." ...How does that sound?
Resistance is futile!
...Don't think I'm upset just because I have little to say. Just let me know if you need anything.
By the looks of things, you won't learn your lesson without some harder-hitting "experience."
Bunker Hill, one of the Essex-class carriers, is joining the fleet under your command. Don't worry, you'll see the extent of my abilities soon enough.
I grow stronger... yet again...
So this is the end that you all chose...
Just completed another game. Might be time to go ask the ghost for more recommendations.
Mission complete. Next up, a new recommendation from Long Island... Oh, Commander? Come make yourself comfortable.
The commission team's back? I'll see to them in a minute. I need to get to a save point first.
Dammit... I'd better wrap this up...
Relax, Commander. The Holiday Express is always ready to depart, no matter the time or occasion.

Calm down, Intrepid! You'll break the controller!|Ugh, so many achievements left... This game has too many damn things to do!|Nothing complements a gaming session like a refreshing Oxy-cola. Georgia was right all along.
You wanna play? The other controller's over there. You go first, and if you can't beat the boss, I'll help.
Mission complete. Next up, a new recommendation from Long Island... Oh, Commander? Come make yourself comfortable.
This is the end you yourselves chose...
I'll fight with all I've got!
What is it? Do you want something from me?
Fletcher-class destroyer – Bush, Hull Number DD-529.
Oh, it's time to go welcome the commission team back!
You need to learn to smile, Commander...
Whuah! A-a plane came flying towards me! ... What? Th-that was just a beetle...?
You know, I'm actually quite athletic! Check it out, I could hop side to side all day! ... *Pant*, *pant*... This is exhausting... I can't hop anymore...
Gotcha! ... Well, how do you like the prank Thatcher taught me, Commander? ... Huh? But I thought you liked pranks, or at least Thatcher said that you do...
For whatever reason, I don't feel that scared of planes anymore. It's got to be because we love each other, Commander! ... At least that's what Thatcher told me. She's not wrong, is she?
Whoa! Everyone's back home!
I-I'm not giving up yet!
Umm... What are we doing today, again?
Nooo! Get those planes away from meee!
I've brought your mail along! What does it say?

If I stay out of sight, the Commander probably won't notice I'm neglecting my work...|Uughh... Following a schedule is so boooring! I say we do stuff when we see it needs doing! ... What? That's not gonna fly?|I've got a bunch of sisters, both younger and older than me! I forget their names all the time, though...
You've got some missions left to do. Commander, you're not... slacking off again, are you?
Mission complete! ... Did I do it right?
I'm the Fletcher-class destroyer Bush. Like my sisters, I fought in the Pacific Ocean and took on tons of missions! ... Planes? I-I don't wanna talk about those scary things!
Does this mean you love me more than anyone else? If so, will you do anything I ask you to? Okay! I want some snacks from that store that jus opened, so let's go there right now!
Where is the enemy at?
Yep, what is it?
It's not okay to touch me like that!
I'm Bush, from the Fletcher class! I'll be staying here from now on!
Huh? Will this make me stronger?
Hehehe! That was super easy!
North Carolina asked me to paint a portrait of Washington smiling, but Washington didn't really wanna do it... I think I know why! Maybe smiling is embarrassing for her?
Tadaaah! All done! How does it look? I think I'm pretty talented as an artist!
*gasp*! You spooked me... You almost made my hand slip and mess up my painting!
Aww, do we really have to work? I'm not done painting yet...
Just give me a minute! I'm just finishing up my painting!|This is my sketchbook I use for drawing practice! And no looking inside, okay?|I'm gonna draw portraits of everyone at the port! Heehee!
Hm? Do you want me to paint something for you, Commander?
Oh no! I got paint on my clothes because of that!
Tadaaah! All done! How does it look? I think I'm pretty talented as an artist!
Now, as outlined in our briefing, prepare for combat!
An improvement in operational code and tactical variables... This sequence should be useful. I shall write this down in my notebook.
Aircraft carrier – Béarn.
Transport commissions and cargo escorts are vital, of course, but let's not forget the important safety of our docks.
"You are the most outstanding, exceptional commander I have ever met." – You can only hope to hear me say these words in your most outlandish dreams.
Are you curious about this book? It is just a notepad, more or less. Rest assured, there is nothing remarkable about it. And it is certainly not something you need look at.
A "grimoire"? Hmm... And you say L'Opiniâtre told you this? It's certainly an amusing allegory. Now, I'm afraid I must take my leave for a while, as I have business to attend to.

This "grimoire" topic again? I do not appreciate your insistence on it. "A sacrament from the Iris Libre can perform all sorts of miracles"... Assuming that were even true, how would you utilize such great power, Commander?
Commander, all of today's clerical tasks have been completed right on schedule. This is a good opportunity to... Indeed, as you've requested, I will teach you about the so-called "sacrament of love."
You would like something sugary in preparation for your mental labor? It so happens I have a list of our stock of confectionaries. Please have a look.
I have sustained damage, but it is under control...
Here is today's schedule, Commander. Read it at your leisure.
I sincerely apologize, Commander. I take full responsibility for this defeat.
Reporting in. I have a newly arrived letter for you, Commander.

If I may be so blunt, Commander, it would be very unwise of you to read my book. I am not exaggerating or joking about this.|Are you daydreaming, Commander? You may continue to fantasize if you so wish; we have enough free time in today's schedule to accommodate for it.|I shall attend to our official business and schedule management. You need only focus on the work on your desk, Commander.
Commander, I have received word of new mission directives from headquarters. I shall go and make some arrangements.
A mission has been completed. That's one burden off our minds.

My name is Béarn, I am the Iris Libre's first aircraft carrier, converted from the unfinished 5th Normandie-class dreadnought. I lived to see the end of the strife between Iris and Vichya... A tragedy I pray will never happen again.

If there are sacraments that can emotionally move and unite people, then this so-called "marriage" must be the most powerful of its kind. Ah, this bliss, this feeling of butterflies in my stomach... Now I understand how it feels to take an oath. It's quite enjoyable, actually. Hehehe~
Let's proceed as planned.
I am right here, Commander. Do not hesitate to give me your orders.
Do you lack the knowledge of what being a decent person entails, or are you simply unable to control yourself, Commander?
Béarn, Iris Libre's very first aircraft carrier, reporting for duty. It is an honor to fight by your side. I eagerly await your orders, Commander.
Your kindness will not go unrewarded, Commander.
How would you say I did? Was my performance satisfactory?
Everyone seems to be enjoying themselves at the beach. What do you say about playing beach volleyball, or building a sandcastle, Commander? Me, I would rather remain here and observe.
Are you perhaps feeling unwell, Commander? Oh, I see, you're just looking for a shaded place to rest? Acknowledged. In that case, you may sit here if you'd like.
You were out at sea? Here, have a towel.
Would you like a swim ring, Commander? It could be useful if you plan on playing with the girls by the beach.

One can seek cover from the sun, but cannot escape the heat. As I'm on lifeguard duty, perhaps I should've brought an electric fan with me.|This ice cream is going to melt if nobody eats it. Say, Commander, would you like a taste?|Both Vichya and Iris girls enjoying the summer on the same beach... A lovely sight, in my opinion.
Your praise honors me, but I can easily imagine that you praise everyone here for their swimsuits.
I suspected you would engage in obscene behavior as soon as you distanced yourself from onlookers, Commander...
Are you perhaps feeling unwell, Commander? Oh, I see, you're just looking for a shaded place to rest? Acknowledged. In that case, you may sit here if you'd like.
Don't panic...Calm down... Let's go!
Commander, I will do my best to meet everyone's expectations
Tennessee-class battleship –  California, Hull Number BB-44!
Commander, the girls from the commissions have returned. Let me do one next time, please~
Commander, I'll go play on my own now~
You don't know if you can be friends with someone unless you tried to make them. Commander, wanna hang out together?
*humming* Ah, Commander~ Just who I was looking for. I was thinking about taking you some place to have fun!
We've already had fun throughout the docks. How about we go some place farther? Just the two of us... Heh heh heh...
Tennesee said to me, 'You must be careful who you choose as a partner.' 'Once you do, tell me', she also said. Well, if it's you, Commander, she won't say a word, I think...
You looked great just now, Commander!
Weather, check. Wind, check. A fine sailing day, Commander.
Oof... Big sis will lecture me for sure!
It's new mail. Wanna open it up right away?
I feel different from big sister? That's not true. She might not look it but she's actually kind|Ah~ Big sis didn't say much today... Wha! N-nothing at all!|Ah, where did my undies go? Eheh
Commander, don't forget to do your missions!
Hahaha, this is good!

Hello. I am the second of the Tennessee class battleships, California. I was once the flagship of the Pacific fleet, and was part of the Atlantic fleet as well. How about it? Bet you didn't expect that I was a popular one, did you? Hehe~
Commander, where are we going to play today? ...WHA! ...Seriously, I don't... I'm happy and all, but please don't pull this again. You surprised me...
This is comfy. Every time big sis scolds me, she comforts me with this afterwards as well.
Wait-... Commander! Where are you touching? Big sis wouldn't do this!
Hello, Commander. I am California. It's not good to brag, but I'm quite strong you know. Do look forward to it~
Now I can reach for further waters~
Aaah... that was a great workout
In Commander's name, I sortie!
Commander, I'm currently on patrol. Do you have any new instructions for me?
Soldati-class destroyer – Carabiniere.
The commission team has returned! I'm so glad that everyone came back safely.
Commander, I don't think that... Nevermind, your subordinate shall follow your order.
Rest assured, Commander. This subordinate shall always be loyal to you.
Commander, if you plan on going out, please let me be your bodyguard!
Commander, I'm really flattered that you treat me so well... You feel safe when I'm by your side? Understood. Your subordinate shall work harder in that regard!

Commander, are you heading out? Do you need a bodyguard... Oh, it's just a civilian errand? N-no! Even if it's just across the street, y-you never know what hazards lie in wait... S-so, let's go together!
Commander, an inquiry arrived while you were gone. Do you want to look it over?
This isn't how it was supposed to be...
Salutations! Carabiniere welcomes you, Commander!
Ugh... th-this subordinate will accept any punishment!
Commander, the mailbox seems to be filling up.

Royal submarines have always been elusive and mercurial. They've gotten the better of me in the past... |My gun? I'm telling you, it's real! I just don't have it loaded. |"Don't disturb during work hours." I put this sign up so you can have your peace of mind!
Commander, there are still tasks that need to be finished. Do you require anything of me?
The missions are done, and we have quite the rewards to show for it. If there were some non-material rewards though...

As a member of the Soldati-class destroyers, I served as the leader of the 12th Destroyer Squadron and led my compatriots through many battles. No matter when or where, I shall give it my all to complete any mission!
From now on, this subordinate shall serve you for life! ...That's not what it means? Um, then... I see! B-but, can someone like me really be your partner?
Locked on!
Sì!
P-please don't tease your subordinates like that!
Flagship Veneto's escort, Carabiniere of the Sardegna Empire, reporting for duty! As your subordinate, I will carry out your orders and complete any mission!
I shall definitely become a better subordinate!
Victory is ours!
I can't help but to feel a little different when I put on these clothes. I know it's supposed to feel light and refreshing, but instead I feel defenseless and nervous...
Lady Veneto advised me to enjoy my time off by changing into something befitting the occasion... Um, Commander, I d-don't look strange, do I?

I once said I wanted to be your bodyguard, but when we're walking together like this, it feels like you're guarding me instead. Would this be dereliction of duty...? Ah! I wasn't saying that I disapproved of it! *sigh*...
Welcome back, Commander. W-would you like to accompany me on a walk while we both have some time off? S-sorry, I hope I'm not being pushy...
Ugh... I s-suppose I'm not cut out for this after all...

If you're thirsty, I brought some water. Here you go! |The warm sunlight, the gentle breeze, and an ice pop to beat the heat! That's the spirit of midsummer! |Commander, I heard from a friend that all girls have multiple facets... When I changed into this outfit that I'd absolutely never wear normally... it, it was as if something awakened within me...
Wouldn't it be better to finish the missions first...
Commander! Err, I mean, good day?
Lady Veneto advised me to enjoy my time off by changing into something befitting the occasion... Um, Commander, I d-don't look strange, do I?
A head-on battle, huh... All right, leave the air support to me!
voiceline.oath: If the Commander wants a victory... then I won't allow defeat!

voiceline.line: Although fighting on the front lines is not my specialty, I'll give it my all if needed!
voiceline.oath: A bar located in a town on the border between the desert and the sea; the nostalgic Iris Libre countryside; memories passing by as the time flows. A beautiful scene, wouldn't you agree, Commander?

voiceline.line: Casablanca-class escort carrier – Casablanca, Hull Number CVE-55.
I've finished checking the resources from the commission. Please confirm.
So... you were the greatest obstacle to the development of the fleet...
First Ameer, then Alazon Bay, and finally Casablanca. Isn't it nice when your name bodes good fortune? Hehe~
I like movies and books. I adore stories with high and low points and emotionally touching scenes. As for my favorite genre, that would be... Umm, it's a secret!
Oh, Ilsa... You poor thing, you can only choose one person... I wouldn't be able to do that... I am so happy that I don't have to face such a dilemma on m– C-Commander?! When did you get here?!
Would you like to go watch a movie with me, Commander? My favorite kind, of course... A story of love and romance. Together with you...
Welcome back, Commander. The combat report is... Wh-what book?! *cough* *cough*... It's nothing, forget you saw anything.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander. I returned the movie we finished the other day. Hehe~ It's okay if you forget; I always remember it.

voiceline.line: Gah... This is starting to look impossible...
Time is of the essence. Let us quickly begin the day's work.
voiceline.oath: This is Casablanca. Proceeding to aid the Commander. Hehe~ Let's give it our all today.

voiceline.line: There's only so much I can do on the front lines as an escort carrier...
I wonder if this message is from the Naval Headquarters... Commander, I think it'd be wise to check just in case.

Commander, shall I help assess the state of the fleet's logistics? |Commander, where would you rather be, the thrilling, constantly-shifting front lines, or the humble, but critically important rear lines? |If possible, I'd like to hear about what happened at the Battle of Casablanca from Massachusetts.
voiceline.oath: Commander, have you made sure that our supply lines are secure?|Commander, what do you say we spectate Bogue's next baseball game?|"The Port's Carrier Weekly"? It's featuring one of my sister ships? Th-that's a little embarrassing for me...

voiceline.line: You will surely be rewarded for your hard work. Please do your best, Commander!
Mission complete! All right, with these supplies, your fleet operations should be even smoother.

Back then, roughly fifty other Casablanca-class sisters entered service over the course of just over a year. Although most of us saw our missions come to an end shortly after the war, I will do my best to fulfill my duties to this fleet, whether as an escort, air support, or a transport. It's a pleasure to work with you, Commander.

Although love stories, with all their twists and turns, have a unique appeal, I personally would rather live a life of simple happiness. Do you think the same way, Commander? Then let us join in an embrace after you put the ring on my finger.
I will do everything in my power to protect everyone!
Commander, what's the matter... Oh, is my necktie crooked?
voiceline.oath: Commander, your tie is loose. Hehe~ This time, I noticed it before you did.

voiceline.line: Eek?! I... I've never read about stuff like this in my books before...!
voiceline.oath: C-Commander... Things of this nature are inappropriate here. We should relocate to somewhere else, like... Ahh, I can't believe what I'm saying!

voiceline.line: Good morning to you. Escort carrier Casablanca, reporting in. I shall support the fleet to the best of my abilities, so you may rest assured.
Thank you very much, Commander!
First place... me? Hmph. Fighting on the front lines might be easier than I expected.
Getting the choreography down isn't the hard part. It's being able to cheer so enthusiastically like Reno... It's a bit too embarrassing if you ask me...
Phew... Can't train hard if you don't stay hydrated! Oh, Commander, good day! Did you come to watch us practice?
The actual meet is coming up... I've got to practice even harder!
Cheerleaders raise the morale of the players. It doesn't seem much different from the role of an escort carrier, supporting those who are working hard on the battlefield.

Captain Reno, I think your enthusiasm is nothing but commendable, but wouldn't it be better to take a break now to conserve our energy? |Commander, I brought some water and sports drinks. Feel free to take whatever you want. |Even though this squad was thrown together last minute, thanks to the support of you and Craven, I don't want to lose to the other factions!
Is this towel for me? Ah, thank you very much, Commander.
Commander, you seem to be quite good at taking advantage of these situations...
Phew... Can't train hard if you don't stay hydrated! Oh, Commander, good day! Did you come to watch us practice?
Well... you're keeping me from my time off... I need to teach you some manners!
I don't have anything you'd be interested in...
Mahan-class destroyer - Cassin, Hull Number DD-372!
Work is finished...
Can't you just let me sleep for a while?
What is it, Commander? If you wanna have a chat with me then I doubt you'll have anything interesting to say...
Hmm, how should I say this... If you're free, would you like to take a nap together?
Commander, you don't seem like you've been sleeping well recently... Huh? It's because I keep moving over to your side of the bed?
You're a real gentleman, Commander... but it's actually making me a little angry. Am I really... that unattractive to you?
My sister said I'd die from boredom if I always stay in my room... But we all die eventually anyway, so what's the big deal?
Even you can't make me leave my room, Commander...
What a pain... Might as well head back.
New mail... Aren't you going to take a look?
Don't you have anything to say? I'm not great at starting conversations...|Oh, you want to know about my eyes? One of them is fake... Can you guess which?|Everyone is back! That's good...
Hm... We have some uncompleted missions, is that really fine?
Rewards have arrived... Looks like we did well...
Mahan-class destroyer, Cassin. I get picked on for being top heavy and not being great at defending the skies... My left eye has nothing to do with the Solomon Islands, alright? Just leave it.
Commander, you've been preparing this in secret this whole time? I'd have been fine with any kind of gift, but... thank you. I'm as happy as I can be.
I wanna go home...
Mmm... I don't hate this feeling...
Are you interested in shut-in girls?
How do you do? I'm Cassin... If you have no business with me, I'd like to stay in the docks...
Even if I get stronger... I'd rather stay in my room...
What? That was it?
Huh? Is there something... weird about me sitting in the shopping cart?
I know I said we'd go shopping after school, but walking is so exhausting... I'll just hitch a ride in this cart. Looks sturdy enough...
Anything interesting happen late– Aahh! For the love of... Watch it where you put those ice-cold drinks!
I'm beat. Don't wanna move a muscle... Hey, Commander? Could you push the cart around?

Do you drink a lot of coffee, Commander? I don't. Staying up all night is not my thing...|I think Downes works here part-time. Just hope she doesn't kerplode anything...|You could stock up on instant noodles so you won't have to go shopping for food for a good while. I think it's a good idea.
Yeah? What? I'm not exactly hogging the entire cart to myself, am I?
There's security cams in here, you know...
I know I said we'd go shopping after school, but walking is so exhausting... I'll just hitch a ride in this cart. Looks sturdy enough...
Fwaah... Commander, I need to take another nap, so I'm leaving the rest to you...

Commander... I've been cocoooned up in my room for so long that I've started to metamorphize... Eh? It's because of the retrofit? Phew... thank goodness. Well then, guess it's time to go back to my room.
Mmh... just staying together quietly like this... might be pretty nice too.|Wear my clothes properly? Eh...? Don't wanna~ More importantly, care for an Oxy Cola, Commander?

Commander... I've been cocoooned up in my room for so long that I've started to metamorphize... Eh? It's because of the retrofit? Phew... thank goodness. Well then, guess it's time to go back to my room.
Give me strength, my friends!
I'm no fish out of water that can't fight on the surface! It's no problem for me!
Gato-class submarine – Cavalla, Hull Number SS-244.
The commission team has returned safely!
I hate you!
Fear of failure can be overcome by showing your courage!
Sometimes, courage alone isn't enough... And that's when I need your strength, Commander! With your instructions, we can overcome anything!
I've been feeling sick lately... I can't fight with the same flair as I used to when I think about you... That's it, it's gotta be your fault, Commander! ... Actually, I'm not so sure...
I had a dream where you carried me and walked around the port... It was really weird! But for some strange reason, it makes me feel happy... I wonder why...
voiceline.oath: I-I wasn't expecting you to actually carry me around the port... I'm stunned... Listen, I don't mind being with you, but stop treating me like baby!

voiceline.line: Commander, if you need the expertise of a submarine, just call on Cavalla!
I won't give up, no matter how bad it gets!
Morning! You're right on time today!
Bah... This happened just cause the sea is so salty...
A new message has arrived! Wonder if it's from one of my submarine friends!

Could we make submarines stronger? By, for example... giving them stronger, better weapons or something?|It's so boring to just sit here and twiddle my thumbs... Give me something to do, Commander!|Whew! The breeze feels almost as good on land as it does at sea!
Do we get a boatload of rewards if we do these missions?
Ooh! A boatload of rewards! Let's treat ourselves, Commander!

I was given a golden opportunity during my maiden voyage and sank a carrier! ... It was a pretty risky move, and it wasn't easy! But in the end, I came out on top! If you wanna hear the whole story, just ask!
Whuah! Hold on a sec! Why are you hugging me out of the blue?! What are you doing?! You call this "weight training"? A-are you kidding me?! Everyone's staring at us, so let go already!
I've been waiting for this chance!
Ahahaha~! Stop! Ahahah~! That tickles– ahahaha!
I-I'll have you arrested!
I'm Cavalla, the Eagle Union submarine! I'll make this fleet famous through glorious victories, so just you wait, Commander!
I feel stronger! Heheh!
You can thank Cavalla for this victory! Hehehe~
Some snacks for Albacore and a torpedo model kit for Dace... These convenience stores really have everything, don't they!
You're late, Commander! ... What's all this? Heheh, it's loot I got from the stop n' rob's bargain bin! Here, have some bread!
A-are they the fabled Fantastic Forty Percent Off?! ... Oh, it's just the commission team.
Commander, hotdogs are 50% off today!
I've been waiting for you, Commander!

IT'S A SUPER RARE! Holy mackerel! Commander, look! Hehehe~ See what I just got?!|I snagged myself a limited-edition Sara plushie! Aren't you jealous~? ... Y-you already own one? D-did they scam me?!|School life is a lot more fun than I expected! I might just be a natural scholar!
A mission? Is that my homework?
No, Commander! You can't have my precious discounted chips!
I bet you waited for me to leave school just to do that!
You're late, Commander! ... What's all this? Heheh, it's loot I got from the stop n' rob's bargain bin! Here, have some bread!
Here, Commander! A bouquet for you! I heard from Shoukaku that you like these!
Look at all the cute balloons and flowers, and the delicious food as well! Hehe! Parties are the best!
Hey Gridley, come take a pic of me and the Commander! Thanksies!
Oh! I've been waiting for you, Commander! I was seriously worried that you'd gotten yourself lost!

I'll gather up tons of balloons then take off into the sky! Yeah, as if! Hehehe~|Hrrmm, still not old enough to drink, huh... I'm not a kid anymore, so what's the big deal?!|Teach me how to dance, Commander! I wanna do it with you like everyone else does!
A toast to the party! Hehehe~ That's how you do it, right?
I'm gonna tell on you for that!
Look at all the cute balloons and flowers, and the delicious food as well! Hehe! Parties are the best!
Elders, let us strive together for victory!
My... appearance? Right, well, my name derives from a mythological creature, so that's why I look rather... fantastical?
Centaur-class light aircraft carrier – Centaur.
I can hear it. A whisper on the wind... Hehe, just kidding. Huh? The commission team has returned.
How could my beloved fleet turn out like this...
Commander, would you mind introducing me to some of the fleet Elders? I don't much like being alone...
It, it isn't really that shocking that I use polite language with the destroyer Elders... is it? B- but to me, those girls are also my Elders, worthy of respect!

Spending so much time with the Commander and my Elders has shown me a side of you I never expected to see. For example... Admirable person though you are, Commander, you do sneak away from your duties from time to time. Hehehe.
I understand now that the others are ordinary people, just like me. But it's still not wrong to treat them with respect. ...Not only as their Childe, but also as their sister-in-arms.
I'm learning a lot from how you and the Elders fight, Commander.
Just as the Elders do, I shall hold fast!
Commander, I swear to follow the examples of my Elders and strive for greatness once more today!
Forgive me, Elders...
Commander, some new mail has come in. I'll go fetch it for you.

By the way, supposing I really was a "Centaur," like a half-man, half-horse? Wouldn't that be funny...? What do you think, Commander?|Peaceful, carefree days certainly are lovely, and yet I can't help but wonder from time to time, why was I even born?|Serving as your secretary ship gives me so many chances to interact with the Elders. I can learn so much from them. Thank you, Commander!
Commander, shouldn't you head out to complete this mission? I'll accompany you.
Commander, how should we handle the mission rewards?

I am called Centaur, name ship of the Centaur-class aircraft carriers. As I was constructed only after the Second Great War, I lived a peaceful life, in spite of it all. And so to me, all the ships of the fleet, even the little destroyer girls, are my Elders. I am at your disposal.
Having been born into a world of peace, I certainly can't say I am glad to fight... But to meet you, Commander, and to be assigned to your fleet, these are the things that truly make me glad.
I've learnt from the Elders, I'll show you their courage!
You want to try pulling my bowstring? Hehe, it's harder than it looks, huh?
Commander, you're embarrassing me...
So this is the place where all my Elders who fought in the Second Great War gather... Greetings, Commander, I am Centaur, at your service.
Thank you, Commander. I continue to strive toward the examples of my Elders.
Commander, I think I'm catching up to the Elders, maybe, just a bit...?
The Elders haven't been shy about complimenting my figure, though I can't help but feel a little bit embarrassed...
Even though I see the ocean every day, changing into this swimsuit gives me a totally new outlook on it. How about you, Commander? Don't you feel at ease?
Commander, let's go to the beach together after sunset and watch the stars. I'll show you my constellation. And then we'll have... a chat.... sound good?
Commander, what would you say to a stroll on the beach?

Taking in the ocean, feeling the sea breeze, letting the sounds of the waves lap against my ears... I feel completely at peace here.|Coming to the beach with my Elders, and of course with the Commander, to spend a day off is so delightful.|Commander, Elder Hermes has been talking about this "Summer Duel Tournament" that's about to begin. Why don't we go watch together?
Commander, is this pose okay? How about my expression? Hehe, all right then, make sure you get my good side.
Even though I see the ocean every day, changing into this swimsuit gives me a totally new outlook on it. How about you, Commander? Don't you feel at ease?
You want to see me dance...? W-well, I'm not very practiced, but if that's what my Commander wants...
I never imagined you would give me such a splendid dress, Commander... I think it's called a "qipao..." is it? I'll try it, revealing though it is. Wh-what do you think...? Do I look... nice?
It really looks like the whole fleet is having a good time and getting along so well... This season is truly delightful.
Looks like everyone from the Dragon Empery is in the midst of preparing their Spring Festival celebrations, but I'm not sure there's anything I could help with...

In the coming year, I'll be trying even harder to learn from my Elders!|I learned a special dance from the Elders of the Dragon Empery, I do hope it pleases the Commander and the other Elders.|Commander, if you're feeling stressed, I could massage your back for you, help you relax a little?
These fans and my shawl are so soft to the touch~ Commander, would you like to feel?
Th-the Elders are all watching...
I never imagined you would give me such a splendid dress, Commander... I think it's called a "qipao..." is it? I'll try it, revealing though it is. Wh-what do you think...? Do I look... nice?
Devote thyself not to the fleet― for that is my solemn charge.

Whether your ambitions leads you into the wilderness of unparalleled achievements, the lofty spires of world domination, or the gardens of peaceful sanctuary, command me as would best serve your will.
Battleship – Champagne.
The birds' clarion call... It seems that our comrades have returned to us.
The hope you brought was but a false light. Why, Commander, must you torment me so?
This world is the surface of a calm lake— Disturbances may mar the waters with ripples, but peace must return in time.

Trees bury their roots deep into the ground to avoid being blown away, and fish swim upstream to propagate their kind. Though they know they are fated to return to nothingness, living things defy their circumstances to the best of their ability.
Commander, there is no way for you to wear the rigging—armor, main guns, and torpedoes—that is required to defend the fleet. As I am a ship, I will take on the mission to protect you.

If those who are powerless resist fate, those with power cannot stand by and do nothing. Commander, your radiance, warmth, and affection—in order to protect all of this, I offer up my body and swear my love.
Immerse yourself in the liberating quintessence of wine, for the mind requires reprieve. Man is naught without repose.
These scars will become my aegis.
Your orders, Commander. Whatever your will may be, I shall usher into reality.
Our true destination still awaits.
A notice has arrived. Is it a joyous one, or is it a tragic one? Is it a desirable one, or a hateful one?

Commander, art thou pondering the meaning of life? Or perhaps...|The ebb and flow of tides are natural phenomena, and so are the flowing fates of humankind.|"Live, together with the fleet." Understood. I have received my newest directive from the Commander.
The falcon that spreads not its wings cannot reach the sky. The ship that rows not its oars cannot not reach the other shore.
Only for the gardener whose blood nurtures the soil can the iris bloom in triumphant beauty.
Never have I received orders, nor have I ever accomplished anything. I am merely a blank slate—existing simply to become the delectable champagne presented to thee, the victor.

Even if words stop existing, I will still listen to your voice. Even if the world loses its radiance, I will still look into your eyes. There is nothing in this world that can erase your existence from my heart. The warmth I've received from you, I shall repay with my eternal protection... These are my true feelings.
Sleep in the blue depths of the ocean...
The warmth and sensation of being touched... How exceedingly difficult to forget.
Though your transgression may be slight, such conduct may turn others away from you.
I am the personification of Champagne, part of the Iris Libre. Commander, please give me an order—a reason to exist.
Even the most polished blade must eventually rot. That is to say, there is no point in chasing power.
I ensure that missions sown shall bear rich fruit.
Reliving one's childhood by enjoying games is one way to enjoy festivities. That being the case, I lack knowledge of the rules designated for these games...
It is not against the teachings to halt one's pursuit of destiny and to surrender to the warm draft of festivities. It is mankind's prerogative to seek out auspicious portents.
Hm...? Did you want to know about my dreams...?
Please enlighten me. The significance of this festive garb, and the things I must do.
What I desire on the first day of the new year... a peaceful night's sleep, and a rainbow-colored dream that reflects my wishes.

Mountains, birds, fruits. All wonderful signs of a dream in which spring blooms forth.|Our connected memories spread out, like freshly-fallen powder snow, as our affected emotions are as if blown by the spring breeze. ...May these peaceful festivities spread much joy.|The Cardinal's favorite book was one recommended by me. Humans and ships alike desire to satisfy their curiosity...
Animals attempt to break their fetters in order to satiate their desires, whereas humans challenge taboos to satiate their curiosity.
It is not against the teachings to halt one's pursuit of destiny and to surrender to the warm draft of festivities. It is mankind's prerogative to seek out auspicious portents.
Why must we... fight each other?
I definitely am not hiding the stuff that Fu Shun secretly bought.
An Shan-class destroyer No. 3 - Chang Chun (103)
Commisson complete! Looks like someone has snacks for me!
Commander... that's unacceptable...

I heard that Prince Rupert's drops can be used to ward off the evil monsters that come out at night, so I told Fu Shun. The windows at the academy are gone? I-I have no idea what you're talking about~
Hey Commander, how'd you get in here? Secret base? Ehehe~ I have no idea what you're talking about~ Oh, by the way, have you seen my snacks? W-wait, you can't eat that!

Commander, the beach behind the academy is perfect for swimming. Uh, I wasn't making plans or anything! I was just playing around with my binoculars when I saw the swim ring that Commander had bought, ehehe~
You want me to take off my cosplay? Ehehe~ I suppose I can, but you'll have to do what I say!
I'll help give everyone a massage! Pain, pain, fly away~
Now things are getting interesting~
Good morning, Commander~ Ehehe, looks like it's not even morning anymore though~
Wow, I think I goofed up~
New mail, huh? Seems like the perfect thickness to stick under this wobbly table.

The four of us are authentic noblewomen, you know~ |During the summer, Tai Yuan will make a breezier version for me, so there's no problem. |Fu Shun, I heard that terrifying monsters appear in the academy after the sun goes down.
Missions... are also very important.
Next up is... Ehh? What's that burning smell coming from the warehouse? Ah, my snack...

I am Chang Chun, the third ship of the Dragon Empery's An Shan-class destroyers, and one of the "Four Unbreakables." As one of the pillars of the Empery's navy, I played a pivotal role in the training of personnel. Eh? Fu Shun is getting into trouble again? An Shan is going to be worried...
If you never leave my side, I can consider your request~ Just kidding! Your gullibility is a good thing though~
Let the seven heavenly mansions align for the coming of the white tiger!
Commander, if you like this outfit, I'll ask Tai Yuan to make a set for you as well.
Commander, is this the type of person that you are?
Destroyer Chang Chun has arrived~ No, I'm not afraid of the cold~ I just like being warm and cozy~
When do I get missiles?
Clear skies and calm waters today as well~
Fu Shun said she's planning to blast apart an underwater volcano to turn the entire ocean into a hot spring... Thankfully, I don't think the water is getting any warmer~

Ta-da! My pajamas are finally finished! Now to snuggle up until I'm all warm! Eh~ Ehhh? But sis, I don't want to get out! Ack, did Tai Yuan purposely make this tail big and thick to make it easier for you?
A day's plan starts in the morning, a year's plan starts in the spring, and a life's plan with diligence. Commander, make sure to work hard, okay? I'll be cheering you on quietly from my dreams~

Commander, An Shan and Fu Shun are making dumplings tonight. What kind of filling would you like? |Commander, let me massage your shoulders~ |Fu Shun, do you still not have enough firecrackers? How would I know if this is enough to boil the entire sea?
Tai Yuan has recently taken a liking to resting against me while reading. Commander, would you like to try it as well?

Ta-da! My pajamas are finally finished! Now to snuggle up until I'm all warm! Eh~ Ehhh? But sis, I don't want to get out! Ack, did Tai Yuan purposely make this tail big and thick to make it easier for you?
If we were to put this into video game terms... It's like I just got epic SSR gear! That's why you can count on me even more, Commander!

All done with my retrofit~ Now, time to test out my new toys... Err, I mean, time to test the firepower of my new armaments! Oh, watch your head, Commander! Wouldn't want one of the missiles to lock onto you.
Good job out there, Commander. Need me to do that "pain, pain, fly away" thing again?
Commander, y'know what they say about a day's plans starting in the morning, but that adage is probably true even if it isn't morning.

Fu Shun, if An Shan finds out that you're making micromissiles, she's gonna be so pissed.|Hmm... It does feel rather breezy behind my head without my hood...|Missiles versus naval guns? Eh, there's no point comparing things from two different eras~
My gear's not the only thing different about me! I've got a new look too! Heh~
Y'know, Commander... I always knew this was the kind of person you are...

All done with my retrofit~ Now, time to test out my new toys... Err, I mean, time to test the firepower of my new armaments! Oh, watch your head, Commander! Wouldn't want one of the missiles to lock onto you.
Missiles, huh... I wonder if I'm stronger now.
P-purge all evil... Ah, screw it, will you die already?!
Why do people think Ying Swei is the big sister?! ...Am I that immature in comparison?! Commander, what's your take on this?
voiceline.oath: Who's the big sister of the Chao Ho class? That's right! I'm Ying Swei's big sister~♪ I'm glad you understand now!

voiceline.line: Chao Ho-class protected cruiser – Chao Ho.
The commission fleet's back? Y-yeah, we did send one out earlier, huh... Wh-what, I didn't forget about that!
Don't talk to me like you know me!
voiceline.oath: H-hey, you're not comparing me to Ying Swei, are you...

voiceline.line: I still haven't practiced my dance today... Commander?! I, I won't let you peek!
Commander! Ying Swei... Ying Swei... she threatened to not share Ning Hai's steamed buns with me! And said I have to clean the room today! H-hurry up and do something about her!
Um, Ying Swei said you don't like short-tempered girls, so I'll try to act a bit mellower! So, um, please don't hate me... Hey, wh-what are you laughing for?! Don't get all uppity with me!

About my new dance, um... I want you to name it, since you'll be the first person who gets to see it. So... how about it? Y-you don't have to come if you don't want to! ...Ugh! I mean, you have to come! No matter what! Even if you don't want to! Jeez!
voiceline.oath: Commander, um, I'm not just your partner, but I'm also your big sister... or, at least I want to be! S-so, if I want to be pampered a bit... Yeah, pamper me! J-j-just a little!

voiceline.line: Ahhhh!! You're gonna mess it up, so stop touching already!
All right, nobody's here, right? Maybe I'll practice my dance steps a little... Ehh?! Huh... Wh-when'd you get back?!
It's time to get serious! I'll make them pay for underestimating me!
H-hey, you're late! I was worried about you, darn it!
voiceline.oath: What took you so long?! Are you trying to make me worry on purpose, you dolt...

voiceline.line: Guh... Am I still not strong enough yet...?
Commander, hurry up and check your mail before it starts growing moss!
voiceline.oath: That mission was a piece of cake, wouldn't you agree?

voiceline.line: Let Ying Swei handle the public side of things! I, uh, I'll support her from the sidelines! ...Wait, wouldn't that make me seem like the little sister then?!|H-how long are you going to keep dawdling around in front of me? Can you just sit down and get your work done?! Eh? ...What the heck are you saying?! It's not like I really care what you're doing or anything...!|Only through perseverance can we reach our desired outcome! ...Th-those are Ying Swei's words, not mine!
voiceline.oath: You're leaving this assignment to me? G-got it! I'll show you what a capable big sis I am!|.........You haven't moved a muscle for quite some time now! S-say something to me every now and then! ...O-otherwise, I'll get worried...|nil
voiceline.extra: Mm, fish and chips~♪ Even the Royal Navy has some pretty good food~

voiceline.line: We've got new missions! Hurry up and take a look! Otherwise, Ying Swei is going to complain about me nagging again!
voiceline.oath: We've got new missions! ...Wh-what is it? Are you not gonna do anything unless I nag like your mother?

voiceline.line: That mission was a piece of cake! ...W-well, I suppose your efforts helped!
voiceline.oath: That mission was a piece of cake, wouldn't you agree?

voiceline.line: I'm the name ship of the Chao Ho-class protected cruisers, Chao Ho! As for my history... who the heck knows! Specs? Dunno about that either! Stop asking about this stuff already!

At a time like this, I'm supposed to say "may we hold hands and hope to live forever with one another" or something like that, right... Ahh, I can't remember this stuff! A-anyway, you have to take good care of me from now on! Got it?!
Be captivated by my song and dance!
...What are you trying to do?!
Eeek?! Y-y-y-y-you pervert! Degenerate!
voiceline.oath: H-hey, you're not comparing me to Ying Swei, are you...

voiceline.line: I'm Chao Ho, lead ship of the Chao Ho-class cruisers! Don't you forget it! Oh, and no matter what Ying Swei says, don't let her trick you into thinking I'm the little sister!
H-hey, I look a bit more reliable now, don't I?
Hmph! I'll say this again! Don't you dare violate our oceans!

That Ying Swei... Even though she knows I'm not good with the literary stuff, she still made me think up spring couplets... If it wasn't for her sake... Commander, come here and help me think of lines as well!
Happy New Year, Commander! This red envelope is my gift to you... after all, that's my responsibility as a big sister! Anyway, hurry up and take it!
Don't worry, this tree is real sturdy and won't break with just one person on it... Hey, wait, are you calling me fat?!
You're late, Commander! Jeez, we're all supposed to get together for the New Year, so stop running around!

My performance for the Spring Festival banquet? ...I-i-it's not like I'm nervous or anything! I've practiced over and over!|I wish my sister was as demure and well-behaved as Tai Yuan... Yeah, Ying Swei, I'm talking about you! Stop laughing!|Commander, it's really cold tonight around the time of the banquet. If you catch a cold, um, I'm going to have to take care of you, and that would be a hassle... So, um, yeah!
...D-don't scare me like that!
Y-you're gonna get eaten up by the Nian beast!
Happy New Year, Commander! This red envelope is my gift to you... after all, that's my responsibility as a big sister! Anyway, hurry up and take it!
I can handle these girls just fine! Hiyah!
voiceline.oath: Полный ход!

voiceline.line: Commander, let's chat a bit? It's important that we get to know each other... don't you think?
voiceline.oath: Commander, are you hungry? Well, you'll just have to wait. Once I say 'okay,' then you can eat.

voiceline.line: Chapayev-class cruiser – Chapayev.
Commander, the girls you sent out on commission are back. Are you ready?
You may need some stricter training. Hm. Worrying...
Commander, did you have something to talk about? Or are you just here for a little chat? With this fleet, we could go on and on. Hehehe.

Fraternizing with subordinates...? Yes, these among comrades who put our lives in each other's hands, trust is the most important thing. I hope you trust in me, Commander, the same way I trust in you.
A pet? I wonder... I've never had one before. The one I love and cherish is always right here with me, after all. Say, Commander... Do you need more affection?
Oh my... that looks serious. You really do need someone you love and cherish by your side... Commander, let me be here for you. I'll take care of all your worries for you.
voiceline.oath: Still feeling a little uneasy? Just wait a bit longer. You need to stay bound to me like this for now, but sooner or later you won't have to think anymore, you won't have to worry, and you can forget all that pain.

voiceline.line: What do you think of my food? Is this the kind of thing you like to eat?
voiceline.oath: You did so well on that sortie... Now you just let me take care of everything.

voiceline.line: Gah... was I unprepared...?
Welcome, Commander. So this is your office...? Aha, of course, it's OUR office, isn't it?
voiceline.oath: Welcome, Commander. Time for another day of hard work. By the way... Have you been wearing your bridle like we talked about?

voiceline.line: Hah... I can do better.
I sorted the mail for you. Don't forget to look it over.

Are you jealous of my little friend here, Commander...? Oh, you're not? Hmm.|I'm actually very strong... Or at least, I was designed to be. I guess I would need you to check and make sure I actually turned out that way, Commander.|If you're worried those you trust will betray you, you just have to keep them close. Either rope or chains will do the trick... right?
voiceline.oath: Commander, what's wrong? I'm here, and I'm not going anywhere.|It's a big responsibility to have someone trust you so much. But don't worry, I'm holding your reins tightly.|Just let me know when you'd like to talk to another girl. You'd be very embarrassed to be seen like this, hm? Hehe, I think it's fine if somebody sees, actually.

voiceline.line: All these unfinished tasks... Wouldn't it be better if I helped you take care of them?
Wow, you completed that mission all by yourself! Hehe, were you hoping I'd give you a reward?

I am the name ship of Project 68-K, also known as the Chapayev-class. I was meant to participate in the war, but due to a series of delays, I was not completed in time. I didn't really do anything. Too bad. Hehehe.

To get such a ring... such a beautiful gift, it's wonderful. So let me give you this bridle in return... Hehe, it fits perfectly. Now it's like we're always connected, wherever we might be... Don't you love it?
Scorched earth!
You want to feel? Ah, not this little guy. I mean me. Hehehe.
voiceline.oath: Hehe, I think I want to touch you too, Commander.

voiceline.line: Hehehe... Commander, naughty naughty~
voiceline.oath: Hehe, I'll join you in a minute, okay?

voiceline.line: So you're the Commander? Hehe, I like what I see... Ah, excuse me. I'm Chapayev, a light cruiser from the Northern Parliament. Let's get along~
Keep strengthening my equipment. I know you can do it.
Hah... that seems about right.
voiceline.oath: Hehehe, I'm happy if you are.

voiceline.line: I fight with all my heart!
I could leave whenever I want, so why do I stay... Commander? N- nothing, it's nothing...
Commander, what's going on? Did I... do something wrong...? This was all just... meant to be an exercise, right?
The commission girls just got back. You have to get out there and bring them in...
I think you need some training in this area, Commander...
I get that you wanted to be alone with me, and that's fine, but I just think we're missing something... If only we could... hold each other's hands tightly or... Ahhn?! D- don't pull on that!
I really wish there was a kitchen in here. Are you going to feed me, Commander...?
*Pant*... *pant*... Commander, what should we start with today?
Commander, I'm sorry...
Mail's here... I think you should read it...

You know, this room might rub some people the wrong way...|Commander, are you okay? Please answer me if you're okay. You can't keep me waiting...|If I'm here too long, you know Tashkent will start to worry...
There's an unfinished mission. I have all the details here.
Mission complete. What should we do now...?
I- I have to keep this around my neck?
Hyah?! Commander, that's not what I meant...!
Commander, what's going on? Did I... do something wrong...? This was all just... meant to be an exercise, right?
I have to try harder, right?
I guess I can relax a little...
I'll disrupt the enemy line!
Phew... Oh my, Commander, I'm sorry I didn't welcome you at the door. You don't have to be so tense - I already know not to try doing anything weird with you. Hehe~
You must be tired. How about a sweet refreshment to clear away the fatigue? Here you are, sweetheart. Just don't have too much, now.
Welcome, Commander. Working today, like always? Well, keep at it.

Mmmgh~ You ought to stretch a little, Commander. Sitting down all the time leads to back and shoulder problems, and all other sorts of bad things.|This book? I picked it up on Belorussiya's recommendation. It might be a bit too hard for you, though. ...Unlikely, you say? Read me a few pages, then.|There we go... This lotion is sticky, but it's good for the skin. You should get into the habit of using skincare products too, Commander.
Do you want me to oil you up?
Heehee, I might have used too much lotion.
Phew... Oh my, Commander, I'm sorry I didn't welcome you at the door. You don't have to be so tense - I already know not to try doing anything weird with you. Hehe~
You've been looking for me? Heehee, sorry if I made you worry, I just had to feel the night breeze in my hair for a bit. Why don't you stay and enjoy it with me?

You've no reason to worry. The bond between us is so strong that no matter which of us pulls the reins, our feelings are clear to us both. Like this – if I just pull your hand towards me... you can hear the beating of my heart, no?
Why don't we go watch how artisans dye clothes blue?
Ooh, this water is nice and cold... Heehee. Perfect for cooling off in.

I hope Soyuz will pay this place a visit someday. Lord knows she deserves a good refresher.|This yukata feels lovely on my skin. It's like I'm dressed tip to toe in silk.|Doesn't vacationing make you feel like the leash has come off? ...You don't get the analogy? Hmm, well, fair enough...
Hey, great job on that mission. Heehee, how does a hot bath sound for a reward?
We can hold hands if you're scared of getting separated. Unless... you'd rather be led along by a pair of reins?
Heehee. Doesn't that feel nice?
You've been looking for me? Heehee, sorry if I made you worry, I just had to feel the night breeze in my hair for a bit. Why don't you stay and enjoy it with me?
I suppose this is one way to de-stress.
Little Beavers, full speed ahead at 31 knots! Keep an eye on your sides!
Weapons and gear are the iron fists of justice!
Fletcher-class destroyer - Charles Ausburne, Hull Number DD-570!
A commission of justice has just been completed!
You're the embodiment of evil itself, Commander!
Commander, there's still much injustice in this world, so we can't just stand around and do nothing!
Being partners in justice is never easy. But you've got Ausburne by your side, so I'm sure we'll be fine!
The path of justice is a lonely one. It's rare to have a partner on such a difficult path... What I mean is... I... D-do you want to read some stories about justice with me?
In the stories I read, the hero always goes back to his normal life after defeating evil with his partners. I have to say, I feel a bit sad reading an ending like this...
Good work, everyone!
Justice will prevail!
Good day, Commander. Charles Ausburne, Captain of the Little Beavers, reporting in! Are there any naughty kids who need to be disciplined today?
I'll be back! Justice will prevail! *Sob*...
Your mail? Of course! We need help from others if we want to make this world a just one. Reply as soon as you can!
Become a friend of justice with me!|Justice is justice~!|My sonar shows... it looks like your heart is beating extra fast, Commander!
Commander, let's finish it in one go! Now is the chance to deliver swift justice!
Your rewards have arrived. It's always nice to be rewarded for your hard work, don't you think?
I'm Charles Ausburne of the Fletcher-class, and the world famous Captain of the Little Beavers! I showed my true colors at the Cape of St. George. Want to be my partner in justice, Commander?
... Are you sure you want to give this... to me? You've really chosen me? Then I'll follow you until the end!
Accept your punishment in the name of justice!
Mmm, I feel the justice coming from you!
!!... Uh oh... You're evil, Commander!
Nice to meet you, Commander! I'm Charles Ausburne, Captain of the Little Beavers. Whoever picks on the hopeless and defenseless will receive their punishment in due time!
This is the power of justice!
See? This is the real strength of the Little Beavers!
Anti-air combat, commence! Master, please lower your head!
Master, is there anything new you'd like to wear when you head out on missions? ...If that's what you'd like, please leave it to me! It so happens sewing is one of my specialties♪
voiceline.oath: Master, does it feel good~? Heehee, since we're fine on time, I'll keep on pampering you more and more~

voiceline.line: Dido-class light cruiser – Charybdis.
A commission has been completed. I wonder how it went?
I... Master, do you throw everyone to the wolves like this...?
Hm-hmm~♪ Whenever, wherever, I'll be there to serve you as your maid. A-and please don't remind me of how I mess up sometimes...
It may be an exaggeration to say "whenever, wherever," but... I simply wish to be there to serve you whenever you might need me... I'm sorry...
If I do everything for you, you'll become incapable of doing anything for yourself? Am I that powerful of an existence...?
I-I'll do everything for you, but in moderation... Wait! I'll just do my best to relieve some of your fatigue~ Roger! I'll make sure to exercise restraint!
voiceline.oath: Thank you for waiting, my dear Master. Heehee, you seem pretty tired... Hah! I'll pet you on the head today. Good work, good work~ I'm not going anywhere, so just sit tight and let my affection warm you up~!

voiceline.line: Welcome back, Master! Let's make sure you don't overdo things and take a short break first~
voiceline.oath: Master, allow me to take your coat~ Here's a towel, a warm cup of coffee, and a hug from me~

voiceline.line: Wh-where's the enemy?
Good morning to you, Master. Will you be starting off the day with some work?
voiceline.oath: Heehee, it's adorable how devoted you are to your job, Master~ Sorry, I'll go and prepare the documents right away.

voiceline.line: Redouble our rescue efforts! Master, please retreat and leave the others to me!
voiceline.oath: I won't let you be swallowed up by the sea! Grab my hand!

voiceline.line: I'm here to deliver this mail to you, Master.

Fair winds and a following sea~ Master, if it's fine with you, please take me along in your next mission as well.|There's nothing for me to do right now...? N-no way... Master, how could you do this to me...|Master~ If you'd please change into– Y-you can't see the documents you're working on...? Ahh, I'm sorry!
voiceline.oath: May your mission today be successful, and may you return safe and sound... All right, Master. Everything is bound to go swimmingly!|I-is there really nothing I can do to help...? I can't believe you'd just leave me with nothing to do like this... There's no way this should be allowed... Masterrrr...|Master, let's check on this report together... You can't see the report because my chest is in the way? Oh goodness... I'm sorry...

voiceline.line: Master, there's a new mission for you! Y-you already knew about it? Oh...
voiceline.oath: Master, I've received word that there's a new mission for you. Though, it looks like you were already aware of it... I-it was Dido who informed you about it?!

voiceline.line: Here are your rewards. Please check on them.

I am the Dido-class anti-aircraft cruiser, Charybdis. With the motto, "Any task – anywhere," I performed my duties in different oceans across the world during the war. Master, whenever or wherever you need anything, just leave it to me!

What's this, Master...? Y-you really weren't satisfied just having your fatigue relieved?! *sigh*... I-I mean, even without this ring... Oh! Is this a symbol of your permission for me to pamper you lots and lots more~? Heehee, my dear Master, of course I love you lots~
Stay calm, it's time for our counterattack!
Just leave it to me~♪
voiceline.oath: Master? Whenever, wherever, please leave everything to me~!

voiceline.line: Master, is something wrong?
voiceline.oath: Oh Master, you~ Heehee♡

voiceline.line: Dido-class light cruiser, Charybdis at your service. 'tis an honour to meet you in person, Master. May your everyday life be bathed in the warm sunlight, in the peaceful days that come.
Behold my true power! Heehee.
An elegant victory, the way us Royal Maids do it... Ow! A-an undetonated shell...?
voiceline.oath: I'll say it once again. Ahem... An elegant victory, just the way your maid does it!

voiceline.line: There's no pampering in store for you bunch, only punishment!
This room is brimming with Dragon Empery style. Hmm... I'm not exactly sure how to explain it, but it sure is nice and relaxing.
*Pats thighs* Master, you poor thing~ Look how hard you've been working~ Hehe, hurry and come here so that I can pamper you~
*Pats thighs* Master, I'm right over here~ Heehee, you must be exhausted, right~
Goodness, what a troublesome master you are. Where have you been? I've been waiting to continue cleaning your ears~
Your mail's here~ Please make sure you check it afterwards~♪

Umm... Hmm... Oh no, I still haven't finished sewing the outfit Aurora requested... Dear me...|My, someone is at the door... Oh, Master?! Please don't move, I'm not done working on your ears yet...|Alright, Master~ I'll be cleaning your other ear now, so please turn around... Eek?!
The rewards have arrived without any issues. That's a relief~
Ah, Master, please don't move around so much.
Ahhn...♡
*Pats thighs* Master, you poor thing~ Look how hard you've been working~ Hehe, hurry and come here so that I can pamper you~
Now, please allow me to continue pampering you once we return~
If I'm chasing you, don't think you'll get away so easily, haha~
Commander, adding milk to your black tea is a fine way of enjoying it as well~ If you get a chance, be sure to give it a try.
Attacker-class escort carrier - Chaser (D32)
The girls on commission have returned. I wonder if they managed to pick up any tea leaves along the way.
Commander, you've been in pretty rough shape recently. If there's something bothering you, it wouldn't hurt to let me know~
Even though I was born in the Eagle Union, I was treated very warmly in the Royal Navy. Belfast even taught me how to make a proper cuppa~
Every time I set sail, some seagulls will be flying overhead. Legend has it that this signifies a safe journey~ Every time I see these little guys, I always feel at ease.
Commander, it is important for you to develop a refined taste in a timely manner~ Would you like to try some of my freshly-brewed tea? I have the utmost confidence in this particular skill, hehe~
Commander, when I'm alone with you, I feel like the taste of tea becomes even more mellow and sweet~ Could this be... what love tastes like?
Commander, you're back! Let me take a look... Great, you won without even a scratch~
My flight deck's on fire! Hurry and put it out!
G'day, Commander. For beauty and health, start your morning with a cuppa~!
Drats, my flight deck caught on fire again...
Commander, your air express mail is here.

Launching and landing carrier-based planes is a bit of a sensitive topic. You'll end up in hot water if you're not careful. |Commander, have you seen an aurora before? The dazzling, ever shifting bands of light illuminating the night sky... I'd really like you to see for yourself. |I'm really worried about the escort destroyers. As soon as they see submarines, they immediate charge forward. Please remind them to stay in escort formation.
Commander, new missions have been posted. Don't get lazy on me now~
That's quite a nice haul from the mission rewards. As expected of Commander, ever so hardworking.

I am a member of the Royal Navy's Attacker-class escort carriers. Although I served in the Royal Navy, I was originally born in the Eagle Union and even stayed in the Dragon Empery for some time. I really dislike submarines, but I should be fine as long as we deal with them carefully~

Commander, are you confessing to me? Hehe~ I'm very impressed that you're being so straightforward and brave~ But before I can reciprocate, can I propose something? Just for the two of us... a secret tea party...
816 Squadron, scramble!
Commander, my aircraft are in ace condition, ready to deploy at any time!
This is no way to treat a lady~

Greetings, Commander. Escort carrier Chaser, reporting for duty. Rumour has it that the tea and refreshments prepared here are simply delicious. Of course, I look forward to meeting friends here who share my refined taste, hehe~
My my, at this rate, I'm might even catch up to those regular carriers.
Even though I'm an escort carrier, I won't lose to the regular aircraft carriers when it comes to ability~

skins.name: The Way of the Dragon Empery

voiceline.line: After spending some time in the Empery, I started to realise that, in addition to black tea, I sometimes wanted to enjoy the fragrance of green tea as well.

Does this dress from the Dragon Empery not suit me well? Though I was born in the Eagle Union and raised by the Royal Navy, my time in the Dragon Empery also left a deep impression upon me. Why don't we have a chat about their profound culture and tea? Hehe~
I have a commander who is as bitter as oversteeped green tea that has been left out and forgotten.
Hm? Commander, you're back~ Is there a story you'd like to hear from me today?
Ugh... there's this saying that "for soldiers, both victory and defeat are standard issue."

The Dragon Empery's traditional dances seem difficult to learn... Eh, you'd like to learn them with me? In that case, we should be able to learn them in no time~ |Eh, fireworks display? Um, I think I'll pass... I'm... not good around fire. |(yawns) ... Ahh, I stayed up too late last night exchanging stories with the Empery girls, so I'm really sleepy...
Mhm! As expected, Commander, you've finished the mission! Hurry and see if we were rewarded with any tea~
I see you~ Don't think you can run from me!
Commander, do you like my qipao? Don't you think blonde hair matches the aesthetic of the dress quite well? Ehehe~
Oh dear... Commander, flirting is fine but please don't go overboard~

Does this dress from the Dragon Empery not suit me well? Though I was born in the Eagle Union and raised by the Royal Navy, my time in the Dragon Empery also left a deep impression upon me. Why don't we have a chat about their profound culture and tea? Hehe~
Our work takes us to the far corners of the world. Keeping a game console on hand to stave off boredom is a good idea, isn't it?

Heck yeah! Another achievement down! ...Huh? Good day, Commander. Is there something wrong with my appearance? Hehe, I'm from the Eagle Union after all, of course I'd know a thing or two about entertainment~♪
Commander? It wouldn't hurt to go outside and do something else every now and then, all right?
All right, time for me to grab that high score!
C'mon, Commander! Which stage are we gonna clear today?

Long Island, down to host another raid next time? I want to get some new equipment~♪|Bogue's pitches are way too overpowered... No matter how hard I try, I can only hit two or three out of ten... |Listen to this, Commander! I learned how to cook from Mullany! ...Eh, I learned the wrong thing...?
Jeez... games aren't enough for you?

Heck yeah! Another achievement down! ...Huh? Good day, Commander. Is there something wrong with my appearance? Hehe, I'm from the Eagle Union after all, of course I'd know a thing or two about entertainment~♪
The moment the enemies let their guard down–– is the moment you strike!
If you're not busy, then... come here, let's play a match of Go? No need to have a turn timer or keep track of winners and losers. Let's just kill some time, hehe.
Seaplane carrier - Chen Hai.
The commission fleet is back, huh... Increasing our stockpiles, replenishing our forces, adding another card to our hand. A good play indeed.
Seems like I set the bar too high for you.
The more you win, the harder it'll be for you to review your own moves objectively. Even if you're winning, never forget to continue studying your past experiences.
War isn't fair. Backstab your enemy. Think two or three steps ahead of them, read their every move. Then... BAM! Victory comes just like that. Hehe.
I'm starting to get bored of our regular old sessions of Go. Let's spice things up a little bit... I know just the thing. How about, if you can take a game off me, I'll grant you one wish.
Oh my, how could a seasoned strategist like me make such a silly blunder... Hehe, in any case, congratulations on your win. As promised, I'll grant you your one wish. Anything goes. Hehehe...
voiceline.oath: You'd like to challenge me to another match today? Very well, but let's up the ante this time. The loser is responsible for deciding how the two of us will spend our time together after the match. I also would like to take my hands off the reins every now and then, so I'll try my best to win. Hehe~

voiceline.line: I must say... this behavior is rather unexpected.
Good job on making it back in one piece. I went over your last battle, and while it was excellent overall, there are many areas that can still be improved... So let's review those right now?
Nothing ventured, nothing gained...!
How's the port supposed to run when the decisionmaker's seat is vacant? C'mon, sit down already.
voiceline.oath: Oh my, you seem to be quite energetic today. I was hoping to be able to bemuse myself with your sleepy expression, but alas, it was not to be. Hehe~

voiceline.line: Ugh, just one move behind... While I hate conceding defeat, there won't be a next time. Hehe...
A competent commander should never neglect potentially important information.

Are you deep in thought about something? Or... just spacing out? Oh, I see. You're trying to look cute, hehe.|My eyes look a bit scary when I'm thinking about something? ...How do you know that isn't just one of my many faces?|Feign strength if you must, feign weakness if you must. Whatever the case, do not ever let your enemy see through your trump card.
voiceline.extra: The game of Go has already spread far beyond the Dragon Empery. It is a pity, however, that regional variations in rules make it difficult to thoroughly enjoy a session.|Not all surprise attacks must be executed from behind. For example, if I suddenly get right up to your face like this –– doesn't that get your heart racing? Hehe~

voiceline.line: Don't forget to finish up your missions. When it comes back to bite you in the ass, it'll already be too late.
voiceline.oath: Even divine beings are not omnipotent... For example, look, you've forgotten to finish a mission.

voiceline.line: Mission complete. Now that you've removed another obstacle in front of you, what will your next move be?

I am the Dragon Empery's first seaplane carrier, Chen Hai. I've received many other "firsts," but those aren't exactly honors. I still have a long way to go before I can match up to real aircraft carriers.

What's this? ...Hehe, I didn't expect this sneak attack from you... Or rather, you're the only person who could pull something like this off. Looking at it that way, maybe I had predicted this all along... right?
Exploit their weaknesses, and catch them by surprise!
What's the matter? ...You're not here just to have a little chat, are you?
voiceline.oath: Even if we're just making small talk, the most mundane of moments can become splashed with brilliant colors.

voiceline.line: You certainly have guts.
voiceline.oath: It appears you are in need of some "special discipline."

voiceline.line: So you're the brains behind the operation here, huh? ...Hehe, I finally get to meet the legendary Commander face-to-face. It's an honor to be able to work with you. I trust you'll live up to your lofty expectations?
I prefer being the one pulling the strings, but fine.
The enemy has lost their will to fight. Heh, guess that's all they had to show.
Did my collection catch your eye? Hehe, very well, there's a lot more of that in the back room. I wouldn't mind showing you around if you'd like~
You're here, Commander, just as promised. How do you like the atmosphere in here? Hehe, take a seat and enjoy the tea slowly. After all, we have plenty of time~
Do you know what I value most of everything inside this room? It's not the luxurious interior or my opulent collections – Indeed, it is none other than you, Commander~♪
Do be mindful of who the host is, and who the guest is~
"Yes, excellent. Just stick to the plan, just as I told you." Oh, welcome back. That phone call...? It's a secret~
Now that you're here, please make yourself at home. Don't worry, Commander, this one's on me.
A letter arriving at a time like this? Talk about spoiling the mood...

I already have a worthy opponent in front of me, but too bad we don't have a Go board and some pieces to play with... Ah, but worry not, I'll fetch them later.|Commander, what's your favorite collection here? Porcelain? Jade? Calligraphy? Or perhaps... this entire estate? Hehe~|Hai Chi's flower spear and Chao Ho's solo dance... Tonight's performance will be spectacular indeed. It would be nice to have someone accompanying me who has a fine eye for the arts... Do you understand what I'm getting at, Commander?
Commander, you're currently my guest. The fact that you're still preoccupied with work does not impress me.
Oh my, when did you complete your missions? Not too shabby, Commander.
Would you like to try this rotary dial phone? You might not be used to operating something like it, so try to be careful not to make mistakes.
It would appear that you need a reminder as to who the host is here.
You're here, Commander, just as promised. How do you like the atmosphere in here? Hehe, take a seat and enjoy the tea slowly. After all, we have plenty of time~
What'll it be for dinner today? A plate of torpedoes, or a bowl of cannonfire?

The reason I adore you is because animals take the first person they see to be their lover... Uhh, I mean, their parent! Not that that's got to do with anything! You're my owner just because, and I love you just because! It's as simple as that!
Heavy cruiser – Cheshire.
A commission team's back! Let's head over there and give 'em something to play with!
Hrmph... Why'd the first love of my life have to be such a disappointment?
Where've you been, Owner? If you went to do fun stuff without inviting me then I'm gonna be a pouty tabby!

Hey, Owner! I was playing with this Sakura Empire girl earlier, and I got to touch her cat ears! REAL cat ears! Aren't you jealous? ...What? You did that ages ago? Hrmph, well there goes my brief moment of triumph!
Is there a chance you'll get fed up with my displays of affection, Owner? If so, I need to double down to make sure that never happens! Lemme give you a hug~♡

If it weren't for you, I'd never have materialized in this incredible world, never made so many adorable friends, and worst of all, I never would have gotten to experience being in love with you, Owner! You're just perfect, y'know that~? Cuddly wuddly~ I love you so, so much~♡
voiceline.oath: Oh, Owner~! Anywhere you wanna go today? Anything particular you want for dinner? Maybe there's something you wanna say? Ask me, and I'll tell you: I wanna go wherever you're going, I wanna have dinner with and most importantly, I love you, Owner~♡

voiceline.line: My kitty ears are a detachable hair accessory! You try 'em on too, Owner! Just for a quick moment, please, c'mon!
voiceline.oath: I got my hands on a new set of ears! Try 'em on for size, Owner! Aww, don't be like that! You'd look adorable in them!

voiceline.line: Weeelcome back, Owner! Are you okay? Gave the baddies a good beating? Didn't develop a crush on anyone else? Alrighty, then everything's all good!
voiceline.oath: Weeelcome back, Owner! Are you okay? Did you have any lovey-dovey thoughts about me? Don't be shy to say it, I want to know!

voiceline.line: Meowch! It hurts, but I'm not about to let my owner down!
Owneeeeer! Glomp! Squeeze! Cuddle! Sniff! What, I'm "overenthusiastic?" Well, that's just how excited I get when I see you, Owner~♡
voiceline.oath: Owneeeeeer! Glomp! Squeeze! Cuddle! Sniff! Alright, that should do it for now! Cuddling you has become a part of my daily routine at this point♡

voiceline.line: Why don't we slink away before they notice?
The mail's here! I wanna see what's inside! Pretty pleaseeee?

Hey, Owner, know any funny stories about the Royal Navy? Or any other faction, that's fine! I wanna learn stuff!|I'm not a cat, okay? I might be as cuddly as a kitten, but I'm not an actual cat!|Oh, Master, would you care for some tea~? Hehehe, that was my Royal Maid impression! How was it, Owner?
voiceline.oath: nil|Me, spacing out? Nuh-uh! ...Well, I guess I do sometimes when I think about you, my perfect Owner~♡|Do you want tea or some juice, Owner? I personally like the orange juice they sell in vending machines! ...H-hey, just because I like premade stuff doesn't mean I'm lazy!

voiceline.line: There's no mission we can't accomplish with our combined pawers, Owner!
Mission complete! Don't you think these tasks are a little too easy for us?
voiceline.oath: Mission complete! Total walk in the park for the two of us!

voiceline.line: I'm Cheshire, a heavy cruiser from the Royal Navy! Until I met you, I was just a stray in the sea of people's imagination! Which is to say, both my body and soul belong to you, Owner! Squeeeze~♡

Now that you've made it clear how precious I am to you, I need to respond by saying, "I love you, Owner!" a hundred times or more! Starting right now! Stay right where you are until I'm finished! Here we go! I love you, Owner!!!
Feel the power of love!
Ahah~♡ What is it, Owner? Come on, I know you want something just from looking at your face~
No more surprise touchies! At least tell me when you're gonna do it!
voiceline.oath: Owneeeer! Hm? No, I didn't need anything, why? Can't I just touch you outta nowhere if I feel like it?

voiceline.line: Meeeoooow! I haven't slept like that in forever! Hrm? Are you the one who woke me from my sleep? Woohoo, that makes you my owner! "Why?" Because I've totally fallen for you, duh!
Thank you, Owner!
We won! See that, Owner? We wooooon! Meoww~!
Don't think I didn't notice you earlier, Owner! You left to play with someone while I wasn't looking, didn't you? Not that I mind, really! But you could've at least let me known first!

Cheer up, Owner! Jeez, why are you so bummed out when we're at the beach... Because it's just a normal playdate instead of a romantic date? What's the difference anyway? C'mon, let's go head down to where the others are~!
Wow, there are so many cuties here besides me! But, heheh, I'm the top cat when it comes to being cute and sexy! Isn't that right, Owner?
Are you feeling good, Owner? Yay, then it's time to start our seaside date!

There's only one reclining chair? So what~ We'll just share it, silly Owner~ I'm pawsitively fine with doing it that way♡|I'm all thirsty! Time to chuggy-chug a nice, cool drink! ...Mmhh! I feel like a new person!|Fishing? Nuh-uh, I don't wanna. Time spent fishing could be time spent playing games with you, Owner!
