Need to lie down, Owner? Okey-dokey! Which headrest do you want: my thighs, or my soft tummy? Hehehe♡

Cheer up, Owner! Jeez, why are you so bummed out when we're at the beach... Because it's just a normal playdate instead of a romantic date? What's the difference anyway? C'mon, let's go head down to where the others are~!
Welcome, welcome, Owner~ If you've got any requests, don't be shy, don't hesitate, I'll try my best and sing a song that's really great~♡
Welcome, welcome, Owner~ If you've got any requests, don't be shy, don't hesitate, I'll try my best and sing a song that's really great~♡
The girls just came back from that commission! I wonder if Drake was with them?
Hey Owner, what do you think of everyone's dresses? Are there any outfits you want to see me in? ...I look gorgeous in my current one? Squeeee! I love you, Owneeeeer~♡
Owneeeeeer! ...Oopsies, that was improper of me! I'm dressed like a refined Dragon Empery lady, so I need to act the part!

My beloved Owner~♡ Squeeze, cuddle, sniiiiff~ I love being with you so much~♡|Sexy cleavage, trendy fashion, and obligatory kitty ears: the perfect package of cuteness~ How do you like it, Owner?|Relax and get cozy, Owner~ Now's not the time for work, it's time to hang out with me!
Mission complete! Let's claim those rewards right meow, Owner~
Is there something I can do for you, Owner?
I'm always okay with getting intimate with you, Owner~
I'll sing a song for you, Owner~ Ahem... Wait, I'm not sure I know any Dragon Empery songs, actually...
Nicely commanded, Owner!

skins.name: The Cat and the White Steed

voiceline.line: If I were a princess, I bet you'd come to my house, sat atop a white horse and ready to pick me up~ Right, Owner?
"Owner~ I've come to take you to the ball~" ...That's exactly what you were going to do? Eh, doesn't matter who does it~ All that matters is we'll be there together~♪
Owner, could you lift my dress's train for me? It'll drag along the ground otherwise... Aww, thank you~♪
We'd better get going soon, Owner! My horse here is starting to get restless~

Think we'll meet any magical creatures out in this forest, Owner? You know... Like fairies? I once read a nursery tale about those!|Owner! Lookie! I found a twelve-sided snowflake! Aww, it melted...|Offer you my hand...? I don't get it. I'm happy just to take your hand and cuddle like we always do! Rubrub~ Squeeze~
Myeh-heh♪ Your eyes are just glued to me, aren't they, Owner? Ahem... "You may feast your eyes; gaze all you wish"~♪
You're silly, Owner~ You know what I think about surprise touchies~
"Owner~ I've come to take you to the ball~" ...That's exactly what you were going to do? Eh, doesn't matter who does it~ All that matters is we'll be there together~♪
What a pleasant breeze~
Don't just stare at boring numbers all day... how about staring at something with more meat to it for a change?
Northampton-class Heavy Cruiser – Chicago, Hull Number CA-29!
Looks like the girls who went out on a commission have returned. How about we do something fun before we go greet them?
You still have a lot to learn about women, Commander...
The night is still young, Commander. Why don't we have some adult fun together? ... Just kidding~!
Most people aren't very good at dealing with me. You have a peculiar taste in women, Commander...
I've been a little more moderate lately? Indeed. That's because, for the first time in my life, I've met someone dear to me. That's why I need to behave myself~
Oh dear, you don't look too good. Too much pent-up stress, perhaps? ... Then let me do the cooking. I have some responsibility of you too, after all~!
Well done out there. Come here and use my body to recover your energy~
Don't get too into ignoring me, okay, Commander~?
Oh no, my clothes are torn~!
You've got new mail, but it seems to be stuck here... Come~ take~ it~!
Women can change as quickly as the wind in Chicago, Commander~|At this distance, nobody else can hear us~|Your shoulders are so stiff. How about a massage to help you relax?
I put your new missions in order... Even I can actually do my job sometimes.
Our rewards are here. You're always out there pulling off great stunts, aren't you, Commander?

I'm Chicago, fourth ship of the Northampton-class. I've never really done anything noteworthy in battle, and I've never been particularly lucky. But I'll do my best for you, Commander. So be nice to me~ *Kiss*

I've restrained myself for so long waiting for you to give me this. But now that I have it, there's no need for self-restraint, is there? That being the case... you should brace yourself, Commander. Cause you won't be getting away from me~
Oh my, you're not getting away from me!
I'll show you how to have a good time~
Aahh~ You're a naughty boy, Commander~
So you're the commander? You're looking at me almost like you want me to feel you up. Things will get fun starting tomorrow.
People are counting on me, so I'll need to work hard too~
I'm expecting some juicy rewards when we get back~
I'm all done warming up and ready to sing!
voiceline.oath: I... can soar even higher!

voiceline.line: Is there something you need me for? I was just about to start practicing singing though...
voiceline.oath: Commander, if you're free, could you accompany me for singing practice?

voiceline.line: Pleased to meet you. My name is Chihaya Kisaragi. Are you the one in charge of this port? I look forward to working with you.
Commander, it seems like people are back from commissions. Shouldn't we go and greet them?
Did you need something?
Lalala~♪ Oh, Commander. I was just warming up my voice.
An idol's work isn't limited to only singing. However, improving your singing skills will aid in any job... That's what I think.
There are a lot of children here at the port. You know, I've been teaching some of them how to sing at their request. Hehe, everyone has such pretty singing voices.
Um, Commander, would you mind accompanying me for a little bit? I've been practicing a new song, but I've been stuck on a part. I was hoping to get your opinion.
voiceline.oath: When I first arrived in port, there were so many things I didn't understand, but thanks to the help you and the others have given me, I've come to really enjoy my time here. I'm truly grateful for all you've done for me.

voiceline.line: Is something wrong?
Good work, Commander. Will... you be taking a short break? Understood.
It's... not over yet!
Good morning to you, Commander. I'd like to go over today's schedule with you, if you don't mind.
voiceline.oath: Good morning, Commander. I'm in tip-top condition today! I feel like I can sing without a worry...!

voiceline.line: ...Ugh! If only I had practiced singing a bit more...
Commander, we've received some mail. I think it's a good idea to go check it soon.

If there's nothing you need me to do, can I read some sheet music to pass the time? I'd like to practice the songs I'm singing at my next performance.|The people at this port all operate such huge machinery... It's very impressive. I'm not very good with machines, you see.|Lalala~♪ No, I need to put a bit more emotion into this part... Oh, Commander. I'm sorry, I'm having a hard time understanding this song...
voiceline.extra: Commander, I'm sorry for calling you over when you're so busy, but I don't really understand how to operate this equipment. I'm supposed to press this and do that? Um, it's not moving at all now...|Excuse me Commander, could I go and take some pictures of the port? I wanted to have something to remember my time at this place by.|Are you feeling tired? How about playing some classical music over at the office? I've heard that it helps you feel more relaxed...

voiceline.line: It looks like there's still work left to be done.
voiceline.oath: Looks like you've still got some work left to finish.

voiceline.line: It looks like you've finished up the rest of your work. Well, I'll be getting back to practicing singing.
voiceline.oath: Good job wrapping everything up, Commander. Please allow me to help next time as well.

voiceline.line: My name is Chihaya Kisaragi. I aim to become a singer that's on a higher level than anyone else. You... want me to sing for you? Well... just one song then.

Having come here and been able to sing for many people... I consider this a very valuable experience. To express my feelings for the Commander who gave me this opportunity... I'd like to sing you a song!
Let this song... reach the hearts of everyone!
I'm sorry... I'd like to do some vocal exercises to warm up my voice...
P-please stop. Where do you think you're touching me!
voiceline.oath: Eek...!!! Please, stop it...!!! What are you doing all of a sudden...?!

voiceline.line: Pleased to meet you. My name is Chihaya Kisaragi. Are you the one in charge of this port? I look forward to working with you.
Thank you very much. This has been an invaluable experience for me.
It's a victory. But I'm still a long way from reaching the top...
voiceline.oath: Looks like we've won. This experience is sure to be a catalyst for my further growth.

voiceline.line: How does this yukata look? ...It looks pretty on me? I'd be happy if that were the case...
Oh, the fireworks display is starting. I'm planning to meet up with the others after this, but... Why don't we spend some time enjoying the view here first?
In the summer, it's so hot, even in the evening... I'm going to go buy something cool to drink.
Good afternoon, Commander. Huh...? How long have I been waiting? There's nothing to worry about, I just got here myself.

There's a flower pattern on the inside of this umbrella. I love to look up whenever I use it because it looks as if flowers are blooming above my head, and that's so pretty.|The fireworks exploding above our heads and the fireworks reflected on the surface of the water... they're both very pretty.|Watching fireworks next to the other people really feels exciting and festive, but I also like the relaxed atmosphere of watching fireworks from afar like this.
This stone is so slippery, it's hard to stand on... Eek! T-thank you, Commander... That was a close one.
Eeek! ...Don't do something like that all of a sudden! I almost tripped!
Oh, the fireworks display is starting. I'm planning to meet up with the others after this, but... Why don't we spend some time enjoying the view here first?
I've already seen through your tricks, hehe.
Knowledge is power. Not only in battle, but for everything else as well... right?
voiceline.oath: Hm~? Are you curious about what I was doing? I was collecting info, of course. You unexpectedly have a lot of openings. Hehe~♡

voiceline.line: Tone-class heavy cruiser number two – Chikuma.
Hm... According to my seaplanes, it seems like the commissions team is almost here.
I'm sorry. I'm not sure I can deal with someone like you...
Let's see what my seaplanes' eyes have captured for me this time.
Oh, are you curious about the intel I've gathered? Mm, like how everyone at the port feels about you? Just kidding, of course♪

Mm... Even if there's something you really want to know, I can't just tell you... Right, how about this? You listen to one of my requests, and I'll tell you one thing you want to know in exchange. Hehehe♪
Hehe. As payment for the secret I told you, you'll be taking me out on a date♪ ...No refunds allowed, of course.
voiceline.oath: Oh, are you asking me on a date? Mm~ What should I tell you in return... Hehehe, how about... the place I'd like to go today~?

voiceline.line: Are you trying to get my ears to spring up? Hehe~
Good work out there. Why don't you get started on the combat report? This experience will become the foundation for your next victory, after all.
voiceline.oath: Good work out there. Leave the combat report to me. You... should relax for a bit. Hehe.

voiceline.line: This is nothing... This won't make me fall behind...!
Let's see... Well, it looks like you're right on time. Welcome back, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Oh, it looks like you're up early today... Very praiseworthy of you, Commander.

voiceline.line: It's because I wasn't able to get enough info on them...
There's some new mail for you. Please make sure not to look over any new information.

You want to know what people are saying about you? ...You know, if you're that curious, I suggest that you dig around a bit yourself.|This is some juicy info here... Hm, I bet Aoba would love to hear about this~|Just like the "eyes" on my seaplanes need maintenance, our eyes should be maintained properly as well. That way, we can make sure they work well when they need to.
voiceline.extra: Calm down, Commander. If there were rumors any floating around about you, I'd tell them off. You're even more worried now? My my...|So, about those affection points... Mm, well, I'm maxed out, but... would you like to find out about some of the other girls? Hehehe.

voiceline.line: Commander, I don't think it's a good habit to neglect your duties.
voiceline.oath: Well, whatever you might be worried about, let's focus on knocking that mission out together.

voiceline.line: Mission rewards... Lots of things here, so I'll leave the accounting to you♪
voiceline.oath: Mission rewards? Well... Hehe, let's check on them together.

voiceline.line: I'm the Tone-class heavy cruiser, Chikuma. I can carry more seaplanes than my heavy cruiser counterparts—you could say I've got plenty of eyes in the sky. I'm good at the art of knowing things, don't you think so? Hehehe.
Are you disappointed that I'm not surprised at all? Don't be, I really am, you know? It's just that I'm so happy, it far exceeds any surprise I might've felt~♡ Hehehe~♪
Knowledge is the key to victory♪
If you want some help, you should organize the information first.
voiceline.oath: My, what am I going to do with you... So, what is it that you'd like~?

voiceline.line: Looks like I've grasped another weakness of yours, Commander♪
voiceline.oath: Your tastes... Hehehe, there's no way I wouldn't know by now, right~

voiceline.line: I am Chikuma. Pleased to make your acquaintance. Well, that might be the case, but I already know a bit about you... My, are you curious? You'll find out before long, hehe.
My reconnaissance abilities have grown even sharper~
As long as the intel is correct, victory is guaranteed... Ehe♪
voiceline.oath: As long as I'm able to gather information with my seaplanes, this should be the expected result. Hehe.

voiceline.line: I can fight too, you know!
voiceline.oath: Everyone, let's go get'em~!

voiceline.line: Oh, if it isn't the Commander~! I'm in the middle of playing a game, did you need something?
voiceline.oath: Commander! Take me somewhere fun~! I'm so sick and tired of watching TV in this room.

voiceline.line: Woahhh, I somehow ended up in a totally unknown place... Oh, um, my name's Chise Asukagawa! Since I might be here for a while, thanks for looking after me!
Oh, it looks like they're back! I wonder if they brought back any souvenirs~?
Commander, you're the exact type of person that I don't want to become when I grow up.
You want to know what's under this arm sleeve? Of course, it's a secret~! Oh, and if you try to take a peek when I'm asleep, I'll get really mad at you!
When I look at this rigging, I can't help but think of you. I wonder what you're up to, my friend, the coolest one in the world...
Looks like you're busy as usual, Commander... Oh, right. Would you mind if I tried helping you with your work? I think I could help you out with some stuff, at least.
Commander, you were my first friend in this world! Thanks for bringing me along to all of the cool places here!
voiceline.oath: Huh? Commander? What's with your expression? ...Is there something you're worrying about? If you'd like, I'd be willing to lend an ear. We're friends, after all.

voiceline.line: I-I don't know why, but it's a bit embarrassing...
Good work on your mission, Commander! Take me with you next time! I don't mind even if it's just as an extra!
The real battle starts now!
Commander, you seem like you didn't get enough sleep? It's time to start working though, so please waaake up!
voiceline.oath: Hey, looks like you're all chipper this morning. Good ol' Commander, you~!

voiceline.line: Ehhhh, no way, no way! I've actually been useless this whole time?!
Commander, there's a letter for you~! I wonder if it's from your lover~?

Hmm, so there's a school here as well. Huh, you're asking me if I want to attend? No way, I'd rather not if I don't have to!|Sit! Lay down! Paw! Oh, Commander, these Meowfficers are so dang smart! I'm taking a walk with them for a bit!|Hey, Commander! Huh, you look a bit tired... Here, I bought some candy earlier, so you can have one.
voiceline.extra: Even the Commander dozes off from time to time, huh. Well, I guess I can slack off for a bit. I wonder if there's anything interesting here...|This office is so clean, even though there are so many things here. Who's in charge of cleaning it?|This place is surrounded by the sea, right? Does that mean that I could swim every day when it's hot out if I wanted to?!

voiceline.line: You want me to handle the remaining missions for you?! ......Heh, as if I'd ever get to say that...
voiceline.oath: Chop chop, hurry and wrap up those missions, so we can go somewhere together~

voiceline.line: Mission complete~! By the way, how much am I getting paid per hour?
voiceline.oath: Commander~! A bunch of stuff arrived because you finished those missions~!

voiceline.line: I'm Chise Asukagawa, and I'm currently an aircraft carrier at this port! It's a completely new experience fighting at sea, but it's pretty fun! I'm so glad that my arm sleeve from my former world is waterproof~
Coming to this world, fighting together with everyone else, I've had tons of fun! This is all thanks to you, Commander... I'm really, truly grateful for all you've done for me!
This is my time to shine!|Burn to ashes! Goldburn!
Y'know~ It's pretty amazing how hard you work every day. Is this what it's like to be a professional?
Uegh. Is that what you're into...
voiceline.oath: Wha, Commander! I'll call the police on you!

voiceline.line: Woahhh, I somehow ended up in a totally unknown place... Oh, um, my name's Chise Asukagawa! Since I might be here for a while, thanks for looking after me!
Chise, powering up! Thankies, Commander!
Ohmygawd, ohmygawd! Did you see that! I won!
voiceline.oath: Commander~! Were you watching~!

voiceline.line: It's still raining a bit... Huh, don't you have an umbrella, Commander? Well, would you like to share this one then?
Woaah, the sun's coming out! It feels so great outside after the rain... Oh, Commander! Let's take a stroll through the sky together!
Welcome back... Wait, Commander, you're soaked from the rain! Let me bring a towel for you!
Today's weather forecast said the sky would clear up after some rain... It's been raining since earlier, so it should be sunny for the rest of the day!

Ahaha, look at me, I'm flying! Oh, isn't that where we were deployed last time?|Mmn... I don't see a rainbow... Commander, you should help me look for one too!|Commander, come on, jump a bit higher! ...Yay, you're on! Well then, let's head out!
Commander, do you want some candy as well? I think I still have one last one in my pocket...
Eek! I-I could fall, you know!
Woaah, the sun's coming out! It feels so great outside after the rain... Oh, Commander! Let's take a stroll through the sky together!
I have to make sure to be careful...
Chiyoda and I are partners in carrying out shrine duties. Even though Chiyoda can be pretty annoying at times, there are still times she's fun to be around.
Zuihou-class aircraft carrier – Chitose.
The commission team has returned safely. What a relief.
Commander. Get away from Chiyoda. As far as you possibly can.
The one thing I hope I never have to see again is the formation of a "decoy fleet"...
I don't dislike having to pamper Chiyoda... If anything, I might actually find it quite endearing...
Cooking, cleaning, even taking care of my things... Chiyoda takes care of it all. ... Basically, it's not that I can't do these tasks. If I put my mind to it, I can do it... I totally can...
Commander, won't you rely on me some more? I'm actually pretty good at spoiling people, you know... Oh I know... would you like me to give you a lap pillow, or something...?
Do you like touching my bangs like Chiyoda does?
I'm glad you're safe... I made a protective charm for you, and also one for Chiyoda. Please keep it safely inside your clothes.
This is bad... I hope Chiyoda... is alright...
Oh, you're here. There's some red bean jelly from Chiyoda on your desk. Feel free to take some.
We're pulling back. Chiyoda, please be safe...
There's a letter addressed to you. Please check it out.

Isuzu... is quite a scaredy cat, but she's a good girl. But even that side of her is cute.|Chiyoda always insists on doing my hair this way, so I let her. However, I always feel a bit apologetic for making her do so much...|I'm at least confident in my Kagura dancing skills. If you get the chance, please come and watch.
Here are some more missions. Isn't it bad to let them pile up like this?
The mission is... complete. That's good.

Though Chiyoda and I were originally designed as seaplane tenders, during a certain war, we were remodeled into aircraft carriers. Whether it's due to my lack of skill or my inability to oppose the passing of time... I wasn't able to be of much use until the end.

If that's how you feel about me, I'll gladly accept your feelings... I'll pray for your safety every day, and be your refuge from your daily hardships. I hope... you'll come look for me whenever you're feeling troubled, because I want to pamper you like I do with Chiyoda...
Attack force, surround them...!
Who?! ... Oh, it's you. I thought it was a prank from that pink-haired Union girl.
Hah?! Wait, no...!
I am Chitose, light carrier of the Sakura Empire. Commander, I look forward to receiving your guidance. By the way, is it true that Chiyoda is also here? ...Don't worry, I was merely inquiring.
For the time being, thanks, Commander.
I'm glad... that I was able to be a help to everyone else.
Everyone becomes so rowdy when they get to the beach... I hope nothing bad happens today. Please, may enemy aircraft and volleyballs not come flying our way...
An order of coconut milk... and grilled sausage. Mm, that should do it. ...Hm? Commander? Are you here to place an order, or to get away from the heat?
Commander, you're sweating so profusely. Are you okay? ...Here's a towel. Let me wipe you down.
The sun's rays are so harsh... I should go look for some awning to hide under...

Isuzu, who told you that...? There aren't any ghosts here, don't worry. Go out and play.|Chiyoda's quite the sore loser... She's like that even when it comes to building sand castles, so I can't even imagine how worked up she'd get over beach volleyball... If that pink-haired union girl is our opponent, I think I'll just sit out...|The weather forecast says... it'll be clear until the evening... Mmn...
That shaved ice looks really good... I guess there's a good reason cold treats are popular in the summer.
An order of coconut milk... and grilled sausage. Mm, that should do it. ...Hm? Commander? Are you here to place an order, or to get away from the heat?
I'm so looking forward to seeing what Chiyoda's going to wear... I wanna take a picture with her... Yeah, we're definitely going to do that.
I had this outfit custom-made just for today... Do you like it, Commander? Um, that's good then... (*whispers*) Booyah.
Are you tired? We still have a banquet to go to tonight, so you should rest while you still can... Oh, don't worry about me, I can get some rest right here... (*blushes*)
Did I keep you waiting? It took me an awfully long time to get ready... This always happens when Chiyoda isn't around...

Are you busy, Commander? Ph-photo. I really want to take a photo with you...|Up at the shrine, I use a fan to help out with Yamashiro and Fusou. With enough practice, you can do stuff... like this! H-how'd that look?|Flying cranes are a symbol of good luck... Yeah, I'm sure that's true! Zuikaku said the same thing.
Phew... It's sure hard to walk around with these long hems.
D-did you want to take a photo...?
I had this outfit custom-made just for today... Do you like it, Commander? Um, that's good then... (*whispers*) Booyah.
Even if I'm alone... No, Chiyoda and the Commander are waiting for me...!
Let's kick some fine enemy butt on this wonderful day!
I help Chitose out with her Shinto duties sometimes. You know, as a shrine maiden. ...Huh? You think I'd be more of a hindrance...?
Zuihou-class aircraft carrier – Chiyoda.
Commander, the Commissions Team is back.
Commander. Get away from Chitose. As far as you possibly can.
I went to give Chitose some red bean jellies, but I ended up getting spoiled senseless by her instead... Oh, here's some for you. Please go ahead and try some.
Commander, don't you want to try touching Chitose's hair too? Even though she prefers to keep her distance from others, if you ask, she absolutely won't be able to turn you down.

Oh, the things I'd do for a lap pillow from Chitose right now♡. Seeing she isn't around right now, I guess I'll need a temporary replacement... Hm, maybe the Commander who's slacking off right now. Hey, if you don't want the others to find out you're slacking off, give up your lap to me~ Hehehe... Mmn~

Y-yeah, I, I guess I've gotten pretty close to you... What would Chitose say if she saw you pampering me like this? Hm... If she saw us like this, she'd probably say, "I love both of you, so it's fine." or something. Yeah, she'd definitely say something like that! Hahaha!
Hehehe~ Commander, do you prefer them long or short?
Looks like you didn't run into any trouble while I was gone. Hehe, it must be thanks to the protective charm I slipped inside your clothes~
Chitose, save me...
Today's another great day to show off my amazing prowess! Commander, let's get pumped!
Ugh... I want to bury my face in Chitose's jugs...
There's a letter addressed to you, Commander.

Taaake that! ...Hmm? No reaction... Commander, sometimes you're so much like Chitose, it's honestly quite a letdown...|Doesn't Chitose have really silky hair that smells just divine? Actually, I'm the one who takes care of it everyday.|Whenever we rehearse the dance with Yamashiro and Fusou, some kind of trouble always occurs... Like something falling, or flying off somewhere. But really? I find it find it all to be pretty funny!
You know, I think it's better to take care of missions as they come in. Yes?
You took care of the missions? Alright. While you take a break, I'm going to go check up on how Chitose's doing.

Even though Chitose and I were seaplane tenders, after a loss in a certain battle, we were both remodeled into aircraft carriers. ...Even so, neither of us were able to be of much use until the end... Ahahaha....
Now that you've given me this, you're going to be stuck pampering me senseless! You already are? I-I guess that's true... Well, feel free to request whatever you want from me in exchange!
It's my grand entrance!
Am I so beautiful that I caught your eye? I'm flattered, but you should focus on your work for now~
Yikes?! If you had done this to Chitose instead, she'd have turned bright red from embarrassment!
Hehe, looks like I've kept you waiting! I am the renowned seaplane carrier– err, I mean, aircraft carrier, Chiyoda! In any case, I'll be staying here! Right, right, is my sister Chitose here as well?
Oooh~ I really want to show the new and improved Chiyoda off to Chitose♡
Did you see that? Did you see how amazing I was?
Heehee... Commander, take this! A direct hit from my water gun! Oh, you got some saltwater in your mouth? I'm terribly sorry... So, Commander... tell me, how did it taste? Hahaha~
Hehe~ If you don't have any other plans, then your only task... is to enjoy a holiday by the sea! Commander, have you switched into vacation mode yet?

It's not like I was aiming for your face, you know? My hand just happened to slip, and the ball just happened to make contact with your face... C'mon, get over it. It's just an inflatable ball anyway!
Since we're here anyway, we've gotta enjoy the day to the fullest! We can start by playing with some balls. Catch, Commander!

Hmm, beach volleyball? ... I'll use my powers to turn Saratoga into a holey woman! Ain't that right, Chitose?|The summer sun, the sparkling sea... Stop lazing around and come play with me already, Chitose~|Oh, Yamashiro and her sister came too. Wouldn't it be a good idea to team up with them? Well?
The glamorous Chiyoda in a swimsuit~! No matter how breathtaking I might look, don't just stand there and stare like an idiot. C'mon, let's go and play~
If you're looking for something nice and round, I can throw this ball at your face, you know...?
Hehe~ If you don't have any other plans, then your only task... is to enjoy a holiday by the sea! Commander, have you switched into vacation mode yet?
Fleet status confirmed... prepare to open fire!
Um, do I ever get bored...? Not particularly. Even if I'm not really doing anything, I enjoy getting to spend time with you, Commander.
Takao-class heavy cruiser number four – Choukai.
Military commission, complete. Rewards, received... Aye! I've recorded everything!
Commander, let's try to do our best?
Commander, why don't you rest for a bit? Um, you'd like to hear me sing? Hmm, in that case...
Commander, what would you like to have tonight? Um, you'd like me to decide? In that case, would you like vegetable cream stew or pork cutlets?
Commander, there is nothing that makes me happier than being able to satisfy you.
Commander, I'd do anything for you. Um, you'd do the same for me? Ehehe... that makes me really happy~
Good work out there on your sortie. I'll handle the reports, so please take this time to get some rest.
I can... still keep going!
Welcome back, Commander. I've taken the liberties of preparing your documents. Um... would you also like to have some refreshments?
I can... still fight! I don't want to lose anyone ever again...!
Commander, allow me to read the content of this letter to you.

Commander, you're truly a kind person... |Commander, you should pick a day when you're not too busy to come look at the dandelions with me. |Commander, are you not well rested? As a matter of fact, I've actually been hard at work learning how to give massages, just to prepare for this moment! Here, don't be shy~
Commander, I've finished sorting the list of new missions.
We've done it, Commander! That's another mission done without a hitch!
I am the fourth ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Choukai. As the former flagship of the 8th Fleet, I took part in many campaigns. Commander, you can entrust any task to me!

Um, Commander, I never dreamt that you'd reciprocate my feelings, but... if this is your sincere desire, then I shall accept it. Commander, would you please seal our vows by helping me put this ring on?
My kindness... is reserved for my friends only!
Shall we go for a stroll before the sun goes down?
C-Commander, if that is what you so desire, then...
I'm Maya's sister, Choukai. I'm so glad to meet you. Um, by the way, we seem to have met before somewhere...
Thank you very much, Commander. I shall use this power for your sake.
Let's triumphantly return home in high spirits!
Focus... Give it your all!

Lalala~♪ I feel so motivated just from having you by my side! ...Um, I'm not really sure if the extra motivation affects the quality of my work but... it's fine as long as you're pleased with my work~♪
There, that's it for the entrance... Oh welcome, Commander! I've been cleaning, so give me a moment... I'll be right with you!
The list of bounty we received from commissions? Sure! I'll bring it along with the menu!
Eep?!
Please leave your paperwork on the counter, I'll take care of it later. I'd like for you to make yourself at home, Commander.
There's no need to worry about you, just focus on what I'm doing...? Alright! Then... please watch your feet♪

You're even avoiding walking on the floor that I just finished wiping... My, how courteous of you, Commander~ Huh? It's because the floor's slippery...?|Astoria's outfit's design is a bit out there... but is that the kind of outfit you prefer?|Commander, how would you like a massage? It's special service for you, on the house!
The mission rewards have arrived! I wonder if I should leave them for Maya to take, but... I am a bit concerned...
If you're done with work, I'll see you off to the room.
Watch out for the floor? Did something happen? ...Wah?!
There, that's it for the entrance... Oh welcome, Commander! I've been cleaning, so give me a moment... I'll be right with you!
Maya, Takao, Atago! Look, we did it!
I'll take you all on! I ain't scared!
I eat so much every day, but I'm not growing at all... Why...?
Cleveland-class light cruiser – Cleveland (CL-55)
Race you to the pier, Commander! Winner gets a prize!
Everybody's waiting for me! See ya, Commander!
Hey, Commander, me and some of the girls are forming a Port Explorers' Team! You wanna come with us?
I know how busy you are, Commander, and you still make time to come along with us... All right, from this day forward, I'm making the Commander an honorary member of our Explorers' Team!
C-Commander, lemme ask you something. Helena said if I eat too much chocolate, I'll get fat and you won't wanna be with me anymore ... Is... is that true?
Heh... I was right to ask you, Commander! You always help me out. That's why I love you! From now on, I'm gonna come to you anytime I don't understand something. Sound good?
Need a little pick-me-up, Commander? I got all kinds of snacks on me!
Don't stop now!
Morning, Commander! How about a chocolate bar?
Commander, this is looking kinda bad...?
New mail's here. Hey, you're as popular as me, Commander!

I've got lots of little sisters, and I love each and every one of 'em! Lemme introduce you someday!|Hey, Commander, is there a blue-haired girl in the fleet, about yea big, always staring at herself in the mirror? You mind if I go play with her?|Being this small is kind of inconvenient sometimes. ... Like when? Like when I'm trying to help somebody with something...?
Commander, go bang out that mission!
Hey, the rewards are here! I got lots of tasty snacks to trade. Whaddya say, Commander?

I'm the big sister of the Cleveland-class... but I guess that's obvious from my name alone. I may be a light cruiser, but I can match a heavy cruiser no problem! I am gonna dominate the seas, after all!
This means we're best friends forever? I'll take good care of it! Hehee, if you ever get into trouble, Commander, just let me know. I'll take good care of you!
Can't stop me!
It's important to keep your energy up, Commander! Here, have a chocolate bar!
Huh? You wanna rub my belly?
Hello, my name is Cleveland! My dream is to one day join the Solomon Knights! I'm working hard towards that goal every day!
Hehe, that feels good!
Hahaa! I train every day!
I'm in a hurry... just come at me all at once, alright?
I'm confident in myself!
Cleveland-class Light Cruiser – Cleveland, Hull Number CL-55!
Hehe, it's about time we reap the rewards of that commission, Commander!
Sorry, my sisters are waiting for me. I don't have time to deal with you.
What is, Commander? Something troubling you? I've got lots of little sisters, so I'm used to giving them my shoulder to lean on. So if anything's got you down, just tell me.
Mm... I'm not trying to make myself look stronger than I am or anything, but honestly, I think there aren't many people like you who I can speak to like an equal...
Before I realized it, I'm the one who's leaning on your shoulder instead... but hey, that's fine. We can always just rely on each other.
I feel like I've told you everything about myself... Time sure flies, doesn't it... I doubt someone who understands me the way you do will ever show up again. That's why I've...
Ah, Commander, let me give you a massage... Just bear with me!
Hey, Commander! You seem to be in a good mood today!
Ahaha... this isn't so good...
Some new mail just arrived. You sure are popular, Commander!
Never regret the choices you make!|Why do you call me "Clevebro"?! I'm a girl, just like the others!|You know, I like trees. Let's grow a bonsai, Commander!
We've got a new mission! Let's finish it in one go!
Nice! We got some mission rewards!

I'm the big sister of the Cleveland-class... but I guess that's obvious from my name alone. I fought through the Battle of Renelle Island, the Battle of Empress Augusta Bay, plus many others, and I earned around 13 battle stars, so I'm pretty strong!
Heh, I had a feeling this would happen! From now on, you can tell me anything. I'll take excellent care of you!
Onward!
Wanna exercise for a bit?
You can't do this sorta stuff in public, Commander...
Pleasure meeting you, Commander! I'm Cleveland, a knight of the sea! Come on, time is money! We can't afford to take a break!
Hehe, that feels good!
Hehe, now this is what I'd call the fruits of my hard labor!
There's room for two on this pumpkin. C'mon, hurry and get on... Ah, that reminds me! I've got some pumpkin pie as well. Wanna try some, Commander?

Heheh~ Gimme some candy!|Time is money, Commander! ... Or so I would say, but even I want to spend some of it every now and then.|If we the plow the fields now and add some fertilizer... then by next year's Halloween we can eat some homegrown pumpkins! Let's do it!
Do you wanna try some of the pumpkin pie that Helena made?
Well made, don't you think? Heh, I've heard this thing can even harvest souls.
There's room for two on this pumpkin. C'mon, hurry and get on... Ah, that reminds me! I've got some pumpkin pie as well. Wanna try some, Commander?
Let's finish this in a flash!
Ah, don't you worry, Commander. Your invitation's got top priority to me.

Why am I stuck with this tuxedo when everyone else is wearing a dress?! ... Though it does feel slick, so I guess it's pretty nice. So, weren't we gonna go to the party, Commander? Then it's about time we head out!
Honestly, what with how people treat me when I wear this tuxedo, for a moment I considered acting more like a boy... But nah! In the end, it's obvious nothing beats being with you, Commander!
Let me join for the next sortie, Commander. It's not my style to just sit on my butt and wait around!
Ready yet, Commander? It's time to go to the party!
Hm? You brought the Commander's mail, Knight? Aren't you a clever dog! Good boy!

You wanna come to the party too, Knight? All right... you're coming, too!|Quite a few people have asked me for a dance, but I'm not a great dancer... Commander, could ya help me learn the basics of dancing?|*Phew*... You wanna go for something to eat when the party's over, Commander? I'll treat you, so don't be shy! I mean come on, we're friends~
Commander, let's wrap up those missions pronto before the party starts!
Here's a present for you party poopers!
What's up, Knight? ... A rose...? Just what I needed! Here, Commander. A little gift from me to you, darling.

Why am I stuck with this tuxedo when everyone else is wearing a dress?! ... Though it does feel slick, so I guess it's pretty nice. So, weren't we gonna go to the party, Commander? Then it's about time we head out!
What kind of music do you like, Commander? I've gotta have the stuff that gets you pumped up.
Good timing! I was just about to take my little buddy here out for a road trip! Commander, there's room for two if you want to come!
Let's go outside and get some stretching in, Commander~
Ready to go, Commander? We're about to go chase the wind!

I did this guy's paint job myself. Pretty sweet, huh? Hehe~ |Don't let the size fool you. This little guy has some serious kick! |Even when we're out for a spin, we have to observe the traffic rules. Safety first, after all~
Commander, you should pick out a bike too! Just leave the paint job to me, hehe!
Good timing! I was just about to take my little buddy here out for a road trip! Commander, there's room for two if you want to come!
Woahh... In the Sakura Empire, if you lose at a game of hanetsuki, they draw all over your face with a marker... Never knew that...
Happy New Year's, Commander! I heard everyone from the Sakura Empire was dressing like this, so... Hehehe, think this looks good on me? I thought I'd ask for your impression first, Commander.
Ahh, Denver, wait up! Didn't we agree that the loser has to do the winner's bidding...?!
Hehe, Commander, how about a hanetsuki match?

Next time, I won't lose to the Sendai sisters! That's why, hehe... Commander, glad you're going to be my practice partner! |The bonsai tree I planted last year doesn't seem to have grown much... I'll have to tend to it better this year. |It's hard to move around in this outfit... how do the Sakura girls make it look so effortless?
Helena was the one who drew the design on this paddle. Hehe, isn't it sweet?
C-Commander... even if it's the New Year's, people are going to stare...
Happy New Year's, Commander! I heard everyone from the Sakura Empire was dressing like this, so... Hehehe, think this looks good on me? I thought I'd ask for your impression first, Commander.
This time, I fight for the commander!
Anything I worry about? Nothing at all. ...Actually, I shouldn't keep things secret from you! Not that I could even if I wanted to. Hahahah!
Man, this is so embarrassing... C-Commander, w-w-what do you, umm, like, think of my d-d-d-dress...?
To think I'd ever get to put on these clothes and spend my joyful time with the person I love... (Hug) I guess being a girl really is pretty sweet. Hehehe~
Okay, just leave everything to me! I know just how much force to put into my grip to make you feel good!
I was just thinking you'd be back soon, and here you are! Maybe we share a telepathic link through our hearts! Hehehe~♪
Here's your mail. Give it a look later.

Anything you wanna do, or anything on your mind? You can tell me anything♪|How happy you make me feel? Hmm, I feel as happy as the ocean feels big, I guess? Hehehe~|You're worried about people meddling with us? Hehe, there's no point worrying about that stuff when we have each other!
I've never cuddled with someone like this before... It might take some getting used to, but I still like it. Hehehe~
N-no probs! I'm ready for this! So just go ahead and, umm, y-you know...
Man, this is so embarrassing... C-Commander, w-w-what do you, umm, like, think of my d-d-d-dress...?
Lights, on! Let's get this battle started!
What's important for concerts is having confidence! If you believe you're a star, then you are! Really! Hey, that actually sounded like a pretty cool one-liner.
Light cruiser Cleveland, right here! I'm new to this whole idol biz, but I'll go with the flow and give it my all! Oh, and I'm counting on your support, Commander!
Commission complete! Don't forget everyone's got a schedule to follow, all right?
Sorry, I've got more important stuff to do. I don't have time for you.
I'm Cleveland, one of the fleet's idols! Nice meeting you, Commander!
Maybe saying I grow bonsai as a hobby sounds too basic... Maybe it is... Gah, I'm at my wit's end! Commander, what do I write to make a decent self-introduction?

Dammit, Columbia... She's an expert at this stuff so I asked her to help. I'm shocked she wrote a bio for me that's half lies... Thank goodness you fixed it, Commander, or else I would've died of shame on stage...

Whew... You've really helped me out tons, Commander... I'm not the greatest when it comes to this stuff, and I never thought I could be a star on stage like you've made me... We really were meant to be together, Commander!
Oh, you tired? The dressing room is free right now. You could use that if it's too exhausting to walk to the office.
I will keep drumming till the end!
Hey! You all having a good time? ...All right, that should do it! Oh, hey, Commander! Heheh, I was just doing some practice!
I can't show myself to my sisters like this...
New mail's come in! I've already told you: it's for you, not for me! Come on already!

Hehe~ It's time to break it down! Can you keep up? Just kidding~ Downes is a bit of a class act, isn't she? |Well, I'm not nervous at all because I've had a few chances to sing in front of everyone. Also, it helps that I'm not the lead vocalist, hehe. |Montpelier, Denver, what the heck are you wearing? That's embarrassing...! And Birmingham, you don't have to go waving that thing around!
We've got job offers... I mean, commissions! Let's get 'em done!
Mission complete! Phew... We oughta start looking over our job offers.

I'm Cleveland, the light cruiser. My sisters and I took part in the World War and... Well, let's just say we did pretty good for ourselves. This time around I'm wearing this special uniform, and I'm gonna fight with the power of song!
I heard that in some places, idols aren't allowed to be in relationships. Well, I'm sure we'll be fine! Anyway, Commander... Hehe, please continue to take good care of me!
Let's get hyped!
I've gotta train for the handshake meet-and-greet. Think you could "give me a hand," Commander?
Commander?! I'm trying to get by as an idol here! Th-Think of my image...
Light cruiser Cleveland, right here! I'm new to this whole idol biz, but I'll go with the flow and give it my all! Oh, and I'm counting on your support, Commander!
All those lessons are paying off!
Whew! So who's our next target?
I will not allow you to misbehave anymore... All guns, ready to fire a volley!
Commander... Can you take your eyes off me?
Colorado class battleship— Colorado, hull number BB-45
A lot of oil and supplies have been shipped in. Looks like we got plenty of both for the next mission.
Commander, please… don’t come any closer.
I’m proud of my BIG SEVEN title. Unfortunately the battleship era is closing, and a new wave of ships are arriving...
Commander, why do you care about me so much? Many people are afraid of me and keep their distance from me. Perhaps I've been too used to this. But recently, I’ve suddenly felt... so lonely.
The Commander is willing to talk to someone as bad-tempered as me. Such a weirdo... I don't hate talking to the Commander, though.
The Commander's compliment after the end of each battle is something which I crave for. Commander, can you... praise me a little more?
Making sure everyone returns home safely is also one of my duties.
The bridge was hit? Damage control, now!
Commander, you’ve rested long enough. When shall we weigh anchor?
This is not the end of the line...
You’ve got new mail. There may be news from my sisters...

Commander, although aircraft carriers are really powerful, but battleships are not obsolete. They are indispensable! |Amelia... She was a great woman, though she still cannot be found. Perhaps she is flying freely in another world... |My poor sisters were hurt on that humiliating day. One day, I will have those invaders pay for what they have done!
Whether you need fire support or fleet battle, please give the order Commander.
Commander, mission reward has been delivered.

A fly? Don't worry, they'll disappear after a few moments~ |To have a junior as exceptional as Belfast... I have to redouble my efforts~ |I have already cleaned the office, Commander. I would imagine that having a comfortable work environment is of great importance to you.
It's not good to let missions pile up. Should I plan them out for you?
Commander, we should arrange to collect the mission rewards.
I am Curacoa, light cruiser of the Royal Navy. I've served in several wars, so my combat experience is fairly rich. I hope that I'll be able to train some children to carry on our duty.
Right now, I am convinced that there is nothing happier than being in your arms, Commander. Please take care of me from now on, my beloved Master~
Please be at ease. I shall always be here~
If there is anything you need, please call for me right away~
Are you trying to flirt with me? Perhaps... there might be a better place for that.

Though this is the first I'm meeting you, I can't help but to feel a sense of familiarity from the bottom of my heart... I am Curacoa - from now on, allow me handle the various affairs around port. Please look forward to it!
My anti-air capabilities have been upgraded. Great~!
To think that I'd get MVP... sorry about that~
This outfit's design is rather bold... I'm more accustomed to my maid uniform...
As I am but a maid, it is a great honor to be able to wear such a gorgeous outfit… How do I look, Commander? "Not sure where to start feasting your eyes?" Oh my... Commander...
Holidays in the Dragon Empery seem to have a lot of complicated customs. Perhaps they are comparable with a Royal maid's code of etiquette? Hehe~
Commander, it's been a long time since you've been able to enjoy a moment of rest, hasn't it?

My obligations as a maid do not end when I am not in my uniform. If you need anything, just let me know. |Everyone is busy with Spring Festival preparations... but I'd like to take this opportunity to slack off a little~ |You'd like to know if there are any secrets behind the Dragon Empery's culinary and artistic crafts? Hehe, stay tuned~
Commander, you want to rest in my lap? If you'd like, go ahead~
Commander, I see that you've also become quite bold.
As I am but a maid, it is a great honor to be able to wear such a gorgeous outfit… How do I look, Commander? "Not sure where to start feasting your eyes?" Oh my... Commander...
Curley is always walking around with that stony expression... Maybe she and I have a different understanding of "how a maid ought to present herself?"
It is my honour to be of everyone's service. Light cruiser Curacoa takes it upon herself to continue serving you, Master.
If you're still agonizing over today's itinerary, why not have have a cup of tea and reset yourself?

Seeing everyone's growth and maturity... somehow puts my mind at ease. |My abilities as an anti-air escort? Why, it's my next best thing, after being a maid of course. |Being in a room that has been cleaned properly will also clean your mind of distractions.
You may give me orders at any time, Master.
Why don't we save these kinds of things for... after work?
It is my honour to be of everyone's service. Light cruiser Curacoa takes it upon herself to continue serving you, Master.
Let's show our enemies what a Royal maid is capable of.
No matter the time or place, as a maid or as a soldier, one must always remember to observe proper etiquette.
Ceres-class light cruiser - Curlew (D42)
Commander, a commission has returned. Please follow me to greet everyone who is returning. It's proper etiquette, after all.
To think that there would be people who cannot comprehend Royal etiquette at all...
The details make up the difference between success and failure, whether in etiquette or in battle. Commander, please remember to always be attentive to details.
Please do not blame me for being too strict. Royal etiquette is not something can be easily mastered.

Just like libations, there is a time and place for drinking black tea. What, you want to have tea right now...? F-fine.. since it's been so long since you've had a break, I suppose there's no harm to it...

Being with you reminds me of the time I used to live with my sister. She'd always instruct me on how to be a prim and proper maid. I wonder if I've managed to become... an excellent maid just like her...
Good work, Commander. I've prepared tea today according to your instructions from earlier. Please enjoy.
T-trigger the anti-air defence alarm!
Welcome back, Commander. Your tie is crooked... let me fix it for you. Your otherwise refined attire cannot be taken seriously with such a flaw.
It appears that I need to have higher expectations of myself.
This mail is for you. Don't worry, I'll be sure to leave when you are ready to check it.

Royal etiquette is steeped in social and life philosophy. Please keep that in mind at all times. |I already am a perfect maid? Surely you jest... have you not met my elder sister yet? |Lately, your etiquette has improved greatly. However, don't get too proud, Commander.
A new mission has been posted. Please complete it as soon as possible - it's rude to keep others waiting.
A mission has been completed, but don't over-celebrate in an undignified manner, Commander.
I am Curlew, one of the Royal Navy's Ceres-class light cruisers. C-class light cruiser? N-no, that's not the correct classification, please don't use that term anymore...

Since I have already made my oath with you, it would be improper if I was the only one instructing you. What would I like you to teach me? ...Master, can you please... teach me the etiquette of "love"?
I shall correct your perversion!
Please be mindful of your posture. Be confident and stand tall so that you can earn the respect of others.
C-Commander... what is the meaning of this...

Greetings, I am your Royal maid, Curlew. The responsibility of supervising the master’s daily routine falls on the maid. I will help you become a Royal gentleman through and through, so please pay attention and work hard.
I am one step closer to becoming a perfect Royal maid. Thank you, Commander.
As long as you strive for excellence, victory will naturally follow.

You can feel the profound heritage and culture of the Dragon Empery from all these customs and outfits for the Lunar New Year's Festival… It seems to be ever more necessary to study the traditions and etiquette of this wondrous culture.
Good work, Commander. Today, would you like to try some tea from the Dragon Empery?
Welcome back, Commander. Today, I'll be visiting the girls from the Dragon Empery to learn a bit more about their customs. Would you like to come with me?

Commander, even if you're just eating a pork bun, please make sure to use a serviette. |Etiquette is closely linked to culture, so it's no surprise that there are many differences between the Royal Navy and the Dragon Empery. |The girls from the Empery said that they'd be willing to teach me a few New Year's greetings. Once I've learned them, I'll be able to give you some blessings!
For a Royal maid like myself to don the attire of the Dragon Empery... isn't this what cultural exchange is all about?

You can feel the profound heritage and culture of the Dragon Empery from all these customs and outfits for the Lunar New Year's Festival… It seems to be ever more necessary to study the traditions and etiquette of this wondrous culture.
You've noticed my new fittings? Don't worry, they will not impact the execution of my duties as a maid.

I am now more capable than ever of demonstrating the Royal Maids' style. Though I am not as talented as my sister Curacoa, I sincerely hope you will find my service satisfactory. It is a great honour to work for you.
You must be exhausted. I have prepared today's tea with your comfort in mind. A maid must always be aware of her master's condition, as well as mood. Relax, and enjoy. Hehehe.

"To improve is to change. To be perfect is to change often..." One should bear this quotation in mind.|Maintaining this new equipment takes significantly more time. I suppose that's the price of strength.|To study etiquette is to pursue knowledge. "Only in properly managing oneself is one fit to lead others..." Let's move forward together, Master.
I've made some adjustments to my outfit as suggested by the others. What do you think, Master?
M- Master, what are you... Aie?!

I am now more capable than ever of demonstrating the Royal Maids' style. Though I am not as talented as my sister, Curacoa, I sincerely hope you will find my service satisfactory. It is a great honour to work for you.
Nnnggh... This is so scary~ But... there's fish and chips if we win! I'm gonna do it!
Uwee~ This is so embarrassing... Why do I have strike such a pose...
voiceline.oath: Next I've got... Eh, hey! Righto, what a pose that was! Eheheh~

voiceline.line: C-class destroyer ー Cygnet, Hull Number H83!
Co-Commander... the commissions are done. Ca- Can I greet them together with you?
Com-commander is scary... I wanna go home...
Huh... Whaaaa~! Commander, why are you staring at me while I'm eating?...
Did I... say something embarrassing...?
I was lonely when I left the countryside, but with you, Commander, every day has been fun. That's why this is my second home... It would be better if you can hold back on teasing me, though...
Every day I am well-fed, and I enjoy watching you, Commander. ...Something more enjoyable? I've never thought about it... What? You'll show me something important next time?
voiceline.oath: ♪ Fish and chips ♪ with salt or with mayonnaise? I'll feed 'em to ya, Commander! Eheheh... open up~

voiceline.line: Ehehe... Getting on the bed, rolling around~~ Eeeh! Commander~ Did you see that?! Awww...
voiceline.oath: Eheheh... Now I got the bed to mysel– Huh?! Commander! What're ya doin' here?! Th-this ain't my room? It's yours? Waah... I'm so sorry...

voiceline.line: C-Commander... you've finally come~ This place is huge... I was lost...
voiceline.oath: C-Commander... I've been waitin' for ya~ Ah, um, I'm a tad peckish...

voiceline.line: *cries* Daddy... it's dangerous here... I want to go home...
voiceline.oath: Waaaaahhhh~ Commander... let's get out of heeere...

voiceline.line: Wha! Something rang... Mail? ...W-what's that?

You're always so quiet, Commander. I'm sleepy. ZZZZ... Huh? I... I-I'm not sleeping!|What do I like...? I'm too embarrassed to say it... Eh? I-It's an order? I... I like to eat delicious meals|That girl's clothes are so beautiful... Eh? No no no! I-I'm just complimenting, s-s-so I don't think those clothes will suit me!
voiceline.oath: nil|Just like that time I went fishing with Minneapolis... Ahey! Like that... Heh heh. That's my "St. Lawrence River" technique. Wh-what do you think?|Y-you think I'm cute? Hehehe... the Commander thinks I'm cute... eheheh...

voiceline.line: Commander, it will be bad if you don't do your m-missions~
Blah~ So many rewards~
I-I'm the C-class's Cygnet... Before I went abroad, I had always been in the Home Fleet... I may not look like it but... I'm good at fishing! Uh... I... I'll do my best!
... Eh, eeeeeeeh!!!! ...Ugh ...You're mean, Commander... N-no, it's not like there's anything worth getting happier than this! I-I'm about to cry
I-I'm not weak too!
It's so warm...
Commander... I don't understand... Why am I getting hotter?
voiceline.oath: Commnader, y-ya know I'm an idol? W-w-w-we can't do that... but... um...

voiceline.line: I am... I'm the C-class destroyer Cygnet... yes! For the sake of getting fish and chips, I will do my best!
Even though I've become stronger... I-I'm gonna hide behind my sisters...
D-Did I win? Eh? Eeeh?! I'm first place?!
voiceline.oath: Cy-Cyget is victorious~! Saratoga, I don't think I'm cut out for this!

voiceline.line: Hood gave this swimwear to me as a present but, how is it?... It's not inappropriate for me, right?
Well, the swimsuit that Hood gave to me is a little tight, don't you think? Want to play beach volleyball? Do you think... can we win?
Commissions are done, and so is the grilled fish~ Here you go, Commander. How about it?
C-Commander, welcome back~ Haa... Air conditioners are such wonderful inventions... Phew... This feels nice...

Ah Hood, you are the most beautiful thing in the world! I feel a bit ashamed.... Hwe... This punishment is so embarrassing...|The barbecue party happens after sunset... Ehehe, I'm looking forward to that as well~|Sara's face darkened when she saw me... Do you think she dislikes me?...
Commander, are you going to take a picture of me?
Wah! Commander, my... my swimwear is tight, so... please don't touch it, ok?
Ooh... the swimwear that Hood gave me is a little tight... Huh? Play beace volleyball with Sara...? Am I... gonna win...?
H-happy Christmas! A-after that... umm... I have this present for ya, Commander...

Christmas feast! I-it's a real Christmas feast! Haah... I wanna stuff mahself silly♪ |Hawawa... for some reason, I'm not gettin' full no matter how much I eat today... |Uuu... Hood? I'm not a real cygnet... even if I don't eat this much, I'm still not flyin'...
My tummy is sticking out? N-no way that's true... Ugh... startin' tomorrow, I'm gonna go on a diet... Startin' tomorrow...
Ah, um... Please... don't do that... Uuuu...
H-happy Christmas! A-after that... umm... I have this present for ya, Commander...
Comet and Crescent picked this outfit for me, but... ain't it a bit too showy? Erm... it's too much, innit? Um... n-never mind!
Aww... it took me a while to get changed... Commander, did I keep you waiting long? Hehe... th-that's good. Let's get going, then~

My New Year's wish? Oh, I got lots... Let's see... I hope everyone in the fleet stays safe. And I hope I can become a big, famous idol... And, Commander, I hope you'll be there with me the whole way...
Here, Commander, I got ya some fish and chips... Oh, was I supposed to give ya mochi for New Year's instead?
There you are, Commander! I was worried ya lost me...

It's so cold I'd rather stay inside and eat fish and chips come wintertime... But goin' out with you's pretty nice too!|Commander, I heard there's gonna be one of them fireworks shows for New Year's! What say we go together?|Commander, umm... what do ya think of me, Comet, and Crescent doin' like a New Year's concert for ya all dressed up like this in Sakura Empire clothes?
Hold your hand so I don't get lost?! Erm, um, uh, I think holdin' your sleeve's good enough, Commandeeer...!
Aww... it took me a while to get changed... Hope I didn't keep ya waitin' too long, Commander? Hehe... th-that's good. Let's get goin', then~
I thought I'd understand if I tried for myself but, the Maid Team really amazing... Compared to them, I'm just... Uuu...
G-Good day, Master... C-Commander, please don't stare at me so much... Uuu... Saratoga told me that this was part of marketin' yourself as an idol...
Being a maid is hard work... but if I do this, I get to wear this cute outfit, and also get to stay by Commander's side... Hauu... What should I do...
G-g-good work, M-Master... Ah, umm, would you like some fish and chips?
Welcome back, Comm... Um, M-Master!

Commander is looking at me... Uu... I don't think these frilly clothes suit me after all... |Eek! ...S-sorry, Commander, I knocked over the bucket again... Uuu... |"Do your best, Cygnet! I know you'll be able to do it" ...That's what Saratoga told me, so I'll have to work harder...!
Sorry, Commander... I was trying to water the garden, but I got water all over the commission rewards...
Umm... "Thank you for all your support!" ...Speak up, and b-bend forward a bit...? I, I don't think I can do that...
Eeep?! .......S-Sorry, Commander! I wasn't trying to hit you with the mop on purpose...
G-Good day, Master... C-Commander, please don't stare at me so much... Uuu... Saratoga told me that this was part of marketin' yourself as an idol...
If I cock this up, it'll make Hood and the whole Royal Navy look bad... You believe in me, Commander? I-I'll do my best then!
C-Commander? Erm... They picked me to be a cheerleader for the Royal Navy team at the sports thing, so I'm practicin' my cheers... D-don't stare at me like that... I'm shy enough... Already...
Fish and chips...! No, no, a cheerleader's gotta watch her figure... Maybe just a little's okay? J-just a little! Thanks, Commander!
I heard it was Hood who said I should be a cheerleader... So I won't let her down...! But these moves ain't easy... Maybe it shouldn't be me...

Craven did her best to teach me how to cheer, but I'm still not very good...|Ships of the Royal Navy! And everyone on the field! Umm, gooooooooo...! I need to be louder?! I really don't think I can...|Saratoga says idols have to be "multi-talented"! S-so I have to do this! I will!
Aiieee...?! That was close... If you didn't catch me, Commander, I would've fallen right over...
I'm feelin' kinda funny... M-must be I'm too tired is all?
C-Commander? Erm... They picked me to be a cheerleader for the Royal Navy team at the sports thing, so I'm practicin' my cheers... D-don't stare at me like that... I'm shy enough... Already...
This outfit is a little tight... Yes, really? I understand. I've got to work harder for the Royal Navy!

I'm relaxed when I'm next to you, Commander... Eh? I-I haven't said anything! You must've heard something!|Commander... umm... that... we've run out of fish and chips... Can we... go buy them?|I'm cute? I-I-I-I'm totally not cute! Ugh... You're making fun of me, Commander!
E-even I... am not oblivious to all things! ...B-but if it's you, Commander...
These clothes are tight after all... I-Is that so? I see! For the sake of having the royal cuisine, I will work harder!
Torpedoes locked, loaded, and ready to go~!
The gleam of the metal, the coolness to the touch, the distinctive splash, and of course, the explosion... Ahh, Commander, torpedoes are simply the best!
Gato-class submarine - Dace (SS-247)
The commission fleet has returned! How nice, I'd love to go out and shoot some... Ah, no no, this is commissions that we're talking about! Commander? Heey~ Commander!
You're banned from the Torpedo Lovers Club!
Today's a good day to shoot a bunch of torpedoes!
Maya really packs a punch... I suppose she just got careless that time. Well, it is the job of a submarine to catch people off guard.
Commander, won't you come see my torpedo show next time? If you're not there, I can't get hyped at all... so, promise you'll be there!
Hmm... if I had to choose between Commander and my torpedoes... Urgh, there are a lot of torpedoes out there but only one Commander, so I suppose I'll pick Commander! Mmhmm, that's right!
Good work out there, Commander! Here's a torpedo for you! Huh, what's it for? For hugging of course - it'll help you sleep comfortably when you're tired!
Um... did they find our hiding place...?
Ah, Commander, good timing! Mind helping me pick up those torpedoes next to your feet~?
Let... Lemme shoot off a few more at least!
Commander! Mail's here! Check if my torpedoes are here~!

"Dace's Torpedo Circus." It's always been a dream of mine to make that happen one day! |Commander, I'm going to give you a crash course on torpedoes! Trust me, you'll be fascinated! |Commander, wanna have some torpedo chocolate or torpedo bread? Here, have some, I made 'em myself!
Commander! Ah, um, do you have any missions that require some serious torpedo launching?
Mission rewards-attached torpedoes, laaaaunch~! Commander, I'm not sure you'll be able to catch this one~!

The name's Dace! My three favorite things are torpedoes, torpedo launchers, and uh, more torpedoes! My class? Oh right, I'm a Gato-class... If I remember properly, one of my achievements included taking out that Maya fellow... wonder if she's around.

This is for me? Really? Ehehe~ I'm so happy! Commander, it's a promise, okay? In return, I promise that if you order me to shoot a torpedo in one direction, I won't also shoot them in every other direction!
Torpedoes, laaaunch! Let 'em have it!
Commander, have you ever seen a dozen torpedoes go off at once? Don't you think it'd make for an awesome light show?
Torpedo volley! Locked on to Commander~!
Hi~ are you my new commander? I'm Dace from the Eagle Union, reporting for duty. I believe in shooting torpedoes first, and asking questions later~
Commander, did you remember to prioritize upgrading the torpedoes first?
Heheh~ how do ya like them torpedoes!
All the stars in the sky are our enemies! Everyone, fiiiiire!
Commander, what do you do for your own training? Why don't you come join us down here every now and then?
Cleveland-class light cruiser - Denver (CL-58)
Let's load up some extra supplies. In a battle of attrition, we can't let supplies run out before our spirits do.
Commander, where's your dignity!?
Before I met you, Commander, I felt like I was always trapped within Cleveland's shadow.
I've relentlessly honed my skills in order to defeat all our enemies, but... is that really all there is to life?
Even though I don't think I can ever truly grasp the kind of future that you are envisioning, if it is something that you can stand by firmly, it must be very dazzling and beautiful.
Commander, you are the one who I admire and look up to the most... so if one day, you ever decide to turn your back on the person you are now, I will make sure... to drag you back!
Welcome back! I prepared some refreshments, but... Sorry, this isn't exactly my forte.
Scars are the only battle honors I need!
Welcome back, Commander! Today's a fine day to sortie!
I'm still not... mature enough?
Commander, check your mail!

I want to fight alongside my sisters again, just like at Augusta Bay. |I want to be able to dominate the battlefield with swagger, just like Cleveland. |Even though many of my younger sisters were converted into light aircraft carriers, I'm not jealous of them at all. After all, it's best to be yourself.
Rain or shine, hell or high water, I'm always ready to sortie!
We were able to complete our mission without a hitch because of everyone's superb teamwork!

I am Denver, fourth ship of the Cleveland-class light cruisers. I fought hard alongside my sisters in the Battle of Empress Augusta Bay. Though I still lack experience, I won't let you down, Commander!

Commander, your ideals and morals are loftier and purer than anyone else's... From now on, can I have the privilege of being your sword so that I may cut aside everything barring you from your future?
Your weak point... is here!
How strange, Commander, you're also a fan of the "bro fist?" I thought we were the only ones who used that greeting.
Commander, what are you trying to feel for?
Hello! I'm Denver, 4th Cleveland-class cruiser and Knight of the sea! Before I officially start working for you, I've got one question: what is the future you want to see?
I'll make sure to put this power to good use!
Let's seize the day! And the next!
I'm going to enjoy mopping you all up~
It's times like these... where I simply must punish you.
Deutschland-class armored cruiser, Deutschland.
Hmph, so our little lambs managed to complete their commission. What a pleasant surprise.
I have no interest in you anymore... I should find myself a new pet.
There is no thrill like waging war with a grin on your face! There's no way a lowly animal like you could ever understand that! Ahahahaha!
Lowly animal, root around for all you are worth to find something worthy of my attention. Ahahahaha~
A lion doesn't concern itself with the bleating of sheep. But... I do find you interesting for a lowly animal. If you amuse me some more, maybe I will listen to your wishes.
For keeping me amused this long, I shall grant you the privilege of holding me. Why are you still standing there? Have you never heard of a princess carry? Princess~ carry!
Pay attention, you idiot! Just because we're back at port doesn't mean that you're done.
Do not underestimate the great Deutschland!
You sure took your sweet time. Just where were you rooting around?
I'd sink to the bottom of the ocean before surrending to you animals!
You've received a letter in that lowly animal language of yours. Fetch~

It seems like I must speak in a way that even lowly animals can understand.|Hahaha! I didn't even need to fire my gun to scare off those cruisers~|If you insist on standing around like an idiot, I'm just going to leave.
Mission! There's no entry for "incomplete" in my dictionary!
Hurry up and fetch the rewards for me~

Hmph! I'm Deutschland, the first ship of the Deutschland-class! A prestigious individual such as myself wouldn't be sent into smaller battles. As such, it's only natural that I don't have many of these petty achievements. It's called spiritual leadership! Hmph! Lützow? ...Shut up! Like I'd care about that!

I never thought the day would come when I pledge myself to a lowly animal. I've never felt anything like this before... but it's unexpectedly fun. Ahahaha~! From now on, you're my vehicle number two! You should be grateful!
Cruel and lovely, ahaha...
You just never learn, do you? Do you want to taste my whip again that badly~?
Hmm? It seems like you're enjoying yourself... do you get off to this kind of stuff?
From now on, you are Deutschland's servant! You should feel honored. Also, don't answer me with "mhm." You will answer me with "yes, ma'am" from now on. Are we clear?
Aren't you the obedient animal~
Even though the enemies were no big deal... what a pompous affair.
I shall engrave my name into your bones!
Slave, come here... Do not fear, these little bats won't hurt you.

For such a lowly animal, your taste is not bad... That's right, I am Deutschland, Demon Princess of the Iron Blood and Mistress of the Night! Plebeians, no, my slaves, I shall grant you an opportunity to swear fealty to me with a kiss!
You've done well for a slave. Come forth, I shall give you a little reward.

Imbecile! I only wore this costume as a hobby. Who gave you permission to serve me such a repulsive beverage? |nil|Slave, help me get off my throne. Shorty? You imbecilic swine, do you think this is funny?
Slave, offer your neck to me so that I may feed... Ahahaha! Imbecile, surely you didn't take me seriously!

For such a lowly animal, your taste is not bad... That's right, I am Deutschland, Demon Princess of the Iron Blood and Mistress of the Night! Plebeians, no, my slaves, I shall grant you an opportunity to swear fealty to me with a kiss!
Scream in agony! Tremble in fear! Kneel before me! Ahahaha!
Lazy swine, don't cut corners. Anything less than a perfectly uniform application of sunscreen is unacceptable!

One must not neglect sunscreen during the summer... Plebeian, if you wish to serve your master, prostrate yourself and yell "I beg of you, Queen Deutschland" three times, and I might consider giving you an opportunity. Ahahaha~
What's with that lax expression of yours as soon as you get back... Ho ho, do you need your master to "tighten up" those loose morals of yours?
Way! Too! Slow! Are you trying to get my pristine skin sunburnt?

Plebeian, fetch those two towels over there and wipe my body dry. |If your eyes wander any lower, they will get detached from their sockets. I say, there is no remedy for being uncultured swine~ |A lifebuoy? What would I use that for? Plebeian, were you not going to carry me on your back while swimming?
To think that a plebeian would look at me with such a hungry, bestial expression. A lewd beast like this needs a thorough flogging.
Ho ho, it looks like this lowly swine cannot even control its basest desires.

One must not neglect sunscreen during the summer... Plebeian, if you wish to serve your master, prostrate yourself and yell "I beg of you, Queen Deutschland" three times, and I might consider giving you an opportunity. Ahahaha~
What belongs to my lowly animal also belongs to me. Therefore, the stronger my lowly animal's fleet is, the clearer the proof of my excellence is.
I seem pleased? Of course I am. Why wouldn't I be when my sweet little sister will be joining us at the party? Now shape up and entertain your master, you lowly animal! Ahahahaha!
Let's be clear here, I was not waiting for you. I simply can't show off the full extent of my grandeur as a master without the presence of my lowly animal.
Still sluggish as always. But because I'm in a pretty decent mood today, I'll forgive you!
I have a banquet to attend, so I have no time to let myself get dragged through the mud by you lot~
Getting mail right now sure spoils the mood. Let me see those!

Lowly animal, you may offer your opinion about me and Graf Spee's dresses. Hmph, I bet your vocabulary doesn't include anything beyond "cute," ahahaha! |Ehh? Graf Spee is actually talking to people from other factions...? I hope she's not being bullied... I'll have to give them a stern warning just in case... |Tell me, lowly animal, why does everyone greet me instead of cowering in fear? ...Because they like me? R-really... Hmph. As a spiritual leader, it's only natural to be respected by all!
Missions? What mission could possibly be more important than accompanying your master to the banquet?
Hmph... After seeing these rewards, I'll let you live.
Dancing? Aha~ I just knew you'd come to me with this request, so I prac... err, prepared beforehand!
I seem pleased? Of course I am. Why wouldn't I be when my sweet little sister will be joining us at the party? Now shape up and entertain your master, you lowly animal! Ahahahaha!
You should feel honored to have the privilege of being ravaged by the one-and-only Deutschland while she is in a good mood!
The decor in here is truly sumptuous... Hahahah! It further raises the pedestal of eminence atop which I sit! Isn't that right, lowly animal? Ahahahaha!
Why are so many people out and about during a holiday? ...That's it! Lowly animal, was it your idea to prepare all this to surprise me...?! Heh... Hehe, that's right, don't you dare disappoint me!
You lowly animal! For how long do you intend to ignore me?!
There you are, lowly animal. Now help me take off these heels! Strolling around in these things is so tiresome...

If Spee wasn't so dear to me, I would've never even *considered* building a snowman!|Oh lowly animal, your master is hungry. I've heard that the Dragon Empery's cuisine is very delectable... You know what to do now, yes? Ahahahahah!|So much noise... Oh lowly animal, go outside and check what happened!
Are you trying to touch my stole? I have no memory of granting a lowly animal permission to do that!
Hahah, do you yearn for my punishment that badly, lowly animal?
Why are so many people out and about during a holiday? ...That's it! Lowly animal, was it your idea to prepare all this to surprise me...?! Heh... Hehe, that's right, don't you dare disappoint me!
I'll do the best I can for everyone's sake!
Is there something on your mind, Commander? Something you need my help for...?
Farragut-class destroyer – Dewey, Hull Number DD-349.
The commission team has returned! They've brought with them exactly what we needed, so let's put it to good use!
You're scarier than any storm, Commander...
Are you hungry, Commander? Then would you like me to cook some curry and rice for you? Just so you know, I can't guarantee you'll like it.
Commander, I cleaned your office earlier. Wouldn't you say it looks more orderly now? I could clean your bedroom too, if you'd like!
Did you lose something, Commander? Then I'll search your room and try to find it!
Commander, does your freshly dried futon feel comfy? Keeping your living environment clean is good for your health. But I'll look after you if you should ever fall sick, so don't worry about that!
Well done on the last mission! Allow me to take care of the after-combat report, and you can get some rest in the meanwhile.
I've taken significant damage... but I'm still in the fight!
Welcome back, Commander. Could we inspect the port's emergency relief supplies? You never know when disaster might strike.
I-I messed up...
Commander, please check your new intel regularly. By staying up-to-date, you can prevent disaster from striking.

I love listening to music. My favorite song is made by Lexington!|Eep! S-Sorry, Commander! Typhoons and thunder are just too scary for me...|The caring Yorktown, the cool Enterprise, the peppy Saratoga... The Eagle Union has good people left and right.
If missions feel like a chore to you, let me take care of them!
Isn't it wasteful to simply leave the mission rewards sitting there?

I'm the Farragut-class destroyer, Dewey. I took part in many carrier convoys and support missions. I pride myself on my service history! Although... I sadly couldn't save two of my sister ships who were in trouble... Typhoons can be frighteningly strong...
