Is this... for me? Am I really your most beloved...? Okay! I can't promise I'll be perfect, but I will support you in any way I can, be it at work or in private!
I'll handle this!
My hair is a little messy? Oh, thank you for pointing it out! Please let me return the favor by giving you a massage later!
Hm...? My chest doesn't hurt, so why'd you do that?
I'm Dewey, I'm a destroyer. If there's anything I can help with, please just say the word. Whatever I'm tasked with, I'll give it my all!
No matter how tough the going gets, I will not let anyone down!
I did only what was expected of me. Everyone else deserves the rewards!

What's in this notebook? Well, um... It's a story about a girl chasing after the person she longs for the most in her dream... Y-you want to read it? Fine... Ah, um! Please promise to keep it a secret from Miss Lexington!
Saratoga went over there, and Lexington is... Oh, Commander, good morning! Are you here to play with us, or were you just out for some fresh air...?
Commander, if you're tired, let me give you a massage.
According to the weather forecast, it's gonna be real sunny today.
There's a new announcement. Hopefully it's not a storm warning...!

If you want to know where Saratoga is, I think I saw her playing beach volleyball with the others?|I seem to be a bit too tired to swim... so I'll just enjoy the feeling of rocking around in this floaty ring...|Does anyone need any help? ...Thank goodness, looks like everyone is doing well...
C-Commander, please don't play with my floaty ring. You're going to get my notebook wet...
Eek?! I-I'm gonna flip over...!
Saratoga went over there, and Lexington is... Oh, Commander, good morning! Are you here to play with us, or were you just out for some fresh air...?
I'd like to give Lexington a very special present for Christmas... What would you suggest, Commander?
Lexington gave me this Christmas costume as a thank-you for always supporting her. Commander, do you think I look... pretty in it?
Commander, have you bought Christmas presents yet? I'm just making sure...
Merry Christmas, Commander. Umm, may you have a happy holy night.

The star at the top of the Christmas tree... I wonder what it could mean? | Commander, don't forget to greet everyone on Christmas. Everyone's looking forward to seeing you. | Gridley took lots of pictures of Lexington for me. I ought to thank her later.
E-Ever since I put on this costume, Benson has been really staring me down...
Pl-Please don't play around with the bells!
Lexington gave me this Christmas costume as a thank-you for always supporting her. Commander, do you think I look... pretty in it?
Hard work is how I'll be of use to Master! Here I come!
Master, you won't abandon me, will you? Can you promise not to? Can I place my faith in you, Master? You are trustworthy, are you not? Ahh... I hope it wasn't a mistake to place my faith in you...
Dido-class light cruiser – Dido (HMS Dido.)
Master, the rewards from the commission are here. Have a look, won't you?
Ahh... I beg you, Master, spare this pitiable maid your mistreatment...
As a Royal Maid, I will serve my master with duty and conviction. Should you need anything of me, do not hesitate to ask.

There are many klutzes among the Royal Maids, yet Master looks after them and treats them with care... I, meanwhile, am just... Oh, I'm terribly sorry! No honourable maid should be openly jealous of her companions! But still... those klutzes are such cowards...
And so it's because I'm so competent that no one worries about me... B-but you worry about me, Master? I'm unworthy of such attentions from you! I just... When I think of you, I... Aaahhh...
Wh-what was that? How could you possibly love a lowly maid like me...? R-really? Truly? Honestly...? The Master likes me. The Master really likes me... Ahhh.. Help, I can't stop smiling...
Uwaaa...
Master, are you all right...? Phew, glad to hear it.
I won't give up so easily...!
Welcome home, Master. I am doing well, of course! Oh... m-my master is worried about me...
I beg your forgiveness, Master! Please do not discard me like this broken doll...!
I have mail for you, Master. Do look it over soon.

Master never abandoned anyone else before, correct? Or have you just not done so *yet*? In other words, Master cares more about them than me? Blast it... I can do better than that!|Have you any work for me to do? Please, it can be anything, no matter how unimportant. Yes, that is my purpose in life, as Master's loyal maid.|It is a pleasure to see you, beloved Master. Please allow me to serve and soothe you with all my mind and body. After all, I am your personal maid, and that is my duty.
Thank goodness... For as long as there are unfinished missions, I have a purpose.
Congratulations, Master. The rewards from that mission look spectacular.
I am Dido, name ship of the Dido-class. I served as an anti-aircraft cruiser in the Mediterranean during the war. By the way, I hope Sirius hasn't given you too much trouble...?
My... to think you could fall in love with a worthless maid... Master, I implore you! Love me forever... forever and ever and never let go...!
For the glory of the master!
I did a good job, did I? Masterrrrr... Ah! It was nothing! J-j-j-just doing my job!
M-Master... I am honored to receive your affections, but... this is most unorthodox...
Good day, Master. I am the light cruiser Dido. I am in your service as a Royal Maid.
I cannot thank you enough, Master! But thank you very much...!
Victory! Brilliant, isn't it, Master!
Master, what do you think of my dress....? Oh, it looks good? Does that perhaps mean I am unworthy of it? And you want to cast me out...?! But... Masterrrrrrr...
It is so audacious for a lowly maid to dress herself in such finery and stand at her master's side... Still, I will go to my master and... M-M-Master...?!

The party is about to begin and here you are, Master, standing by my side waiting for me... That can only mean you don't want to toss me away. That you care about me... Ooh... If only we could stay like this forever...
I cannot believe you are here and I am still getting dressed. What a worthless maid I am. Forgive me...!
Master, am I wasting your precious time...? Please forgive me! I am almost ready!

Master, might I accompany you to the party this evening...? I swear I won't be a bother! I only ask that you occasionally acknowledge me...|Rest assured, no matter how I dress, I am ever your most loyal maid! You may ask anything of me and I will do my utmost!|Serving as your bodyguard is also one of my duties, Master! Indeed, I am here to guard you with my very life!
Wha...?! You want to help me get ready? B-b-but to do something so mundane... And, and to do it for me... Aahh...
Master, m-my clothes are a mess... We, now... We can't...
It is so audacious for a lowly maid to dress herself in such finery and stand at her master's side... Still, I will go to my master and... M-M-Master...?!
Now, to steal Master's heart... with my dance!
Between my idol lessons and shows, training and my maid duties, all to be useful to you, Master... It's a lot of work? You want to reduce my workload...? P- please don't throw me away...!

I am the light cruiser, Dido, currently taking part in idol activities as part of the experimental Muse System. I learned more or less what idols are supposed to do from the others, so p-please... keep a close eye on me!
Tashkent tells me the commission team is back.
Did I let you down, Master? What a despicable maid I am...
No longer a maid serving her master, I'm now an idol.I've learned so much from the other maids, but I'm still not sure if I can do this right...
I look good in my idol outfit? Thank you so much, Master...! Oh, does that mean I'm not a maid anymore?! Master, you aren't going to abandon me, are you...?!
You mean you're excited to see me as a maid, and as an idol...? Sorry, I misunderstood...
I'm doing well as a maid, and as an idol...? I'm honoured by your praise! I'll keep working hard as an idol... No, I'll keep working hard in everything I do for you, Master!
Master, are you hurt? Do you feel okay? I may be an idol for now, but if you need me, I can still service you anytime...
I can't let the Master throw me away...!
Master, what would you have me do today? Idol things or maid things, I'll do anything you want!
I can't sing as well as the Head Maid...
Looks like some important mail, Master.

Singing is more about conveying one's feelings than it is skill... So I will keep singing for you, Master...|Madam Illustrious focuses so much on her footwork during dance practice... is it because of the mirror?|My fellow maids, and the girls from the different camps come together to make a proper idol unit. It's truly amazing that you can bring all of us together, Master.
We have a gig offer, Master. Won't you take a look?
Master, here are the rewards. It's all thanks to their hard work.
I'm Dido, Royal Navy Light Cruiser. I'm but a lowly maid, and I never expected to be chosen to be an idol... But I'll do what I can!
It's unthinkable that a lowly maid could shine onstage with all of you... But I will redouble my efforts to be worthy of the honour! All for the sake of my dearest Master!
As an idol, for the Master...!
You need only ask and I'll be happy to shake your hand, or whatever you may want!
Nnng...

I am the light cruiser, Dido, currently taking part in idol activities as part of the experimental Muse System. I learned more or less what idols are supposed to do from the others, so p-please... keep a close eye on me!
I wonder if Albacore's idea could actually work...
I know I can do it if I work hard. I'll become an idol you can be proud of!
I'll do my best to not embarrass my sister!
My big sister is definitely cuter, at least compared to me.

Norfolk-class heavy cruiser, Dorsetshire, Hull Number 40
Unlock build after receiving
Ah, the commission team is back~! Commander, could you let me go on a commission with my sister next time?
I really can't compare to my sister...
It's not an exaggeration to say my sister is a world treasure, a gift from the heavens. It's an honor for me to have a sister like her.
I'm fine the way I am? Aha, you really know how to give compliments, Commander. Compared to my sister though, I'm still but an ugly duckling.
Ah, could it be that you've developed feelings beyond friendship for me? In that case I must properly respond to them.
Though we speak of it, I've never thought I would such a day would come... How should I react?... Commander, can you teach me?
Good work, Commander! Come, sit and have some tea. I will tell you some things about my sister~
This is a bit of a struggle...
Welcome back~ What are we going to do today?
Guh...! I can't fall here!
Commander, there's mail for you~

Is it not common knowledge that my big sister is the cutest in the world?| For allowing me to use the intel my sister gave me, Bismarck is such a generous person.|If it's about my sister, I could speak for three days and three nights and still not be done.
Missions, huh? Makes me think of all the time I spent with my sister.
Here are your rewards! Please take good care of them.

The offshoot of the County-class, the Norfolk-class, includes me and my sisters. My proudest achievement was giving chase to Bismarck and not letting my sister's intel go to waste. I am still far from matching her, so I must become a sister she can be proud of!

You sure are a weird person, Commander. To chase after me who is but a tiny star to the bright moon that is my sister. But I too am attracted to you, if you are okay with someone like me then I would be happy to accept.
Sister, please lend me your strength!
So, Commander, you think I'm actually a bit too big?
You sure are weird, Commander.
Hello, I'm Norfolk's little sister, Dorsetshire~! I look more mature than my sister? Surely you jest! She's my role model!
I'll continue to do my best, with my big sister as my goal~
This gets me one step closer to my big sister~
Let's go, girls! Show them what we've got!
Oh? Do you fancy girls with a bit of muscle? Girls like me?
Mahan-class destroyer - Downes, Hull Number DD-375!
A commission has been completed... Hey, are there any commissions where we can blow stuff up?
There's nothing I hate more than the listless!
Hey, Commander, don't be such a slouch! How about going blast fishing with me?
My body? Don't pay it any attention. I've only had half of it replaced. I can still eat and sleep just fine. Nothing's wrong!
Although I really shouldn't care... I still worry if my love will accept me like this... Huh?! Commander! When did you get here? No, it's nothing. I was just... t-t... talking to myself!
Commander, um... what should I say... I... my body may... be full of holes... but my heart is whole... and I give it all... to you...
Everyone is back! When are we taking off again?
Yo~! Commander, the wind is nice today. Want to go with me and feed our enemies some torpedoes?
Ow ow ow... My magazine's been...
Yo! You've got mail!

Tsk! I'm so bored~ I wanna blow something up!|My magazine's too easy to hit? It's fine, one day or another it'll blow up anyway!|Oh, Commander, what do you think of the phrase, "I'm only half the person I used to be"? Sounds kinda philosophical, doesn't it?
Looks like you've got some unfinished missions!
Alright, let's go fetch those rewards!

Yahoo! I'm the Mahan-class destroyer Downes! I've had to undergo some pretty serious repairs, and have had to replace half my body! I'm stronger than I ever was now! I promise, you won't be disappointed!

...... I never thought I would see the day when I would receive this from you... It's not that I don't believe in you, Commander, it's that I don't believe... in myself. But now I can live without worries! Thank you, Commander!
Eat this!
Ah, that's the spot, right there~
You looking to get bitten?
Hey! Are you the commander? I'm Downes. Nice meeting you!
Hey, I really want to make something violently explode right now!
Weaklings, do you know Downes' power now?
Hahahah! Whaddya think of my little creation here? Oh, and don't tell Akashi about it!
I heard another person was coming to help out at the store, but I never thought it'd be you, Commander! What am I doing here? Ahaha, well uh, I had a little bit of free time on my hands... right~♪
And this bottle goes ri– Oh crap! ...Phew! Nice catch, Commander! That was a real close one...
Yo! Talk about being early! C'mere and gimme a hand stocking these shelves.

Hey, Commander, pass me that triangular can! Cool, thanks!|I reckon I can make an explosive out of stuff lying around the store! ...Look, I'm just saying it's possible!|This fella's almost past its expiration date... Heheh. Should we ask Akashi for permission to do an inventory sweep?
What'd I tell you – two heads are more productive than one!
I heard another person was coming to help out at the store, but I never thought it'd be you, Commander! What am I doing here? Ahaha, well uh, I had a little bit of free time on my hands... right~♪
Roar! I'm the tiger, Downes! Hehe, Commander, how do you like me now? I feel super fired up right now, so hurry up and let me at 'em!
Commander, let me give you a massage! I promise, I'll make all your all your fatigue go away, hehe~
Yo! Commander, let's work hard today as well! If you get tired, I'll raise your spirits with a bang!
Shall we go light things up on the seas? Well, just when you're free, Commander. I'm not that bored yet~
Roar! I'm the tiger, Downes! Hehe, Commander, how do you like me now? I feel super fired up right now, so hurry up and let me at 'em!
Alright, let's do this with fanfare!
All great odysseys must begin somewhere, but true glory only awaits those who reach their destination... That's why you ought to stay your course until the very end!
Heavy cruiser – Drake.
Instead of collecting supplies like this, wouldn't it be better to just raid the enemy for... Actually, never mind.
I am willing to turn a blind eye to a few accidents, but if you keep doing this intentionally, don't expect any mercy from me.
Everything goes on the battlefield. Whether you fight fair-and-square or use backhanded methods, it matters not. History is written by the victors.
Oh right, Commander. Did you have any interest in navigation... or rather, adventure? I've been recruiting mates. If you're interested, let's go look for treasure or uninhabited islands or something!

Sure, it's great to travel together and all, but aren't all these places too close by? Port, the surrounding areas, and the nearby ocean... Sigh. Honestly, going to these places doesn't make me excited at all. Next time, I'm taking you somewhere farther away.
I see. So what you're telling me is that it's not the place that matters, but that if I'm with you, anywhere is fine? ... Haha... W-Wait... are you saying...
voiceline.oath: Hm, I see. This is what it feels like to be loved by someone you love. Not wanting to snatch someone away or wanting to monopolize them, but feeling excited and safe... It feels a bit strange...

voiceline.line: Nice job, Commander. How would you like some fresh... grapes? Hehe, come on~ don't drop 'em!
Ugh, they got me!
You've finally come. What should we start with today? It's great to think about battle plans and all, but how about sending me on a sortie first?
How humiliating... I'll get you back for this! Just you wait!
Here, a letter for you. Anybody find information on some treasure?

Basically, ships arm themselves with armor and equipment—in other words, with artillery and torpedoes. Meanwhile, humans arm themselves with courage and intelligence—in other words, with perception and wisdom.|While I don't hate customs and ceremony, I do prefer the simpler things.|The dew-kissed fruit of the morning makes for the best juice. Don't you agree?
voiceline.oath: I mean, yes, of course I wanted to improve my artillery and torpedoes, get thicker plating, and improve my engines—but it's too expensive to do so.|nil|How'd you like some lime juice? Yes, I do think fresh juice is the best, and you're gonna need to get used to it when you're sailing the high seas. Hehe~

voiceline.line: Doing mundane tasks is totally not my style. Um... Why don't we check the rewards first?
Can't complain about the bounty, but I just feel like there's "something" missing.
I'm the Royal Navy heavy cruiser, Drake. If you weren't aware of my existence before, I'll make sure you know now by showing you the power of my 9.2 inch guns!

Don't you think it's strange too? This feeling that's not quite 'having my heart stolen' or 'feeling vexed,' but more just... 'feeling embarrassed'? ...Gosh, it's all your fault that I'm not acting like myself! ... But I don't quite hate this feeling either... Well? Do you get what I mean?
You won't find any mercy here!
I tend to get along better with people who are straightforward. If there's something you want to say to me, say it clearly.
Huuh? You sure have some guts.
voiceline.oath: Hey... What do you think you're doing while the sun's still up...

voiceline.line: So you're the Commander? Seems you've got some backbone. I'm the Royal Navy heavy cruiser, Drake, and I'll be joining your fleet. Just making sure, you will deploy me, right?
Now that's the kind of sound I want to hear from my main guns! Ahahaha!
Victory always leaves you feeling nice and refreshed!
Artificial waves? Hmm, this might be more fun than I thought. Time to show off my swimming skills!
Phew... Swimming like this doesn't feel all that refreshing... Hey, how about you stop staring and come join me?
Good exercise followed by some exquisitely cool watermelon, man, it's just the best! Hey, you'd better get over here and have a bite, or I'll finish this whole thing by myself!
I heard this is a nice place to swim. Imagine my surprise to learn it wasn't a beach, but an outdoor pool... Still, I guess if we're just killing time, this is as good a place as any...

C-could you stop staring at me like that? You're starting to weird me out...|Hahah, seems like this manjuu needs some more practice if it's struggling with these meager waves!|*sigh*... I'm not feeling satisfied yet. Guess I'll go for another swim...
Ooh, my shoulders were starting to get a little stiff. You're not half-bad, eh~
Phew... Swimming like this doesn't feel all that refreshing... Hey, how about you stop staring and come join me?
To battle! My splendor shall be proven!
I am the final development from a class of treaty cruiser. With the performance enhancements I recieved, victory is but guaranteed in any battle I partake in.
voiceline.oath: I truly do hope to see you at Le Triomphant's tea party. Feel free to ask if you want suggestions on what gifts you should bring.

voiceline.line: Duca degli Abruzzi-class light cruiser – Luigi di Savoia Duca degli Abruzzi.
The commission team has returned to port. It is part of your job to acknowledge their efforts, is it not, Commander?
You've proven yourself a spineless imbecile. Get out of my sight!
My name is Luigi di Savoia Duca degli Abruzzi. You find that too hard to memorize? Then you may shorten it to Duca degli Abruzzi, but no less than that. My dignity won't allow it.
Don't fret over each and every obstacle you face, Commaner. Your subordinates will do all in their power to help.
I am not just a soldier at your disposal, Commander. I am someone with a desire to understand and support you to my utmost. This desire has nothing to do with rank or status.

What do you want to discuss today, Commander? One cannot do much without the aid of loyal supporters, and I strive to be your biggest one. Hahah. It's the least I can do to return the recognition you've given me.
If you need rest, now is the time to get it, Commander. We will have much to do afterwards.
As long as I can still fight, I will!
Greetings, Commander. The Empire's splendor radiates as brightly as ever.
voiceline.oath: Care for some tea before work? I'll put the kettle on.

voiceline.line: Alas, we must shamefully turn our backs on our foes...
You have a letter. Whoever wrote it is brutishly uncourteous... It's what? From Naval HQ? I see.

How can you sit idly like this, Commander? We dignitaries must set an example for others to follow.|It matters not how strong your adversary is as long as you are stronger. That is what war boils down to.|Hmm. Climb Mount Niitaka? I see I'm not alone in the desire to mountaineer... What? That's not what the message means?
voiceline.oath: You're not procrastinating, but rather taking a break? I wish you would've said so sooner. Forgive me if I've been excessively strict. Let us both work on our undesirable quirks.
voiceline.extra: Your presence has lifted a great burden from my shoulders. The energy it has freed up I will use to better myself.

voiceline.line: Say the word, and I will complete these missions for you.
Mission complete. It's time you looked over the rewards.

I am the Condottieri-class light cruiser Luigi di Savoia Duca degli Abruzzi, from the Sardegna Empire. I fought valiantly alongside my esteemed allies during the war. My ambition now is to achieve lustrous feats as the Empire's splendorous flagbearer!
This ring could only mean one thing. You want my support till death do us apart, no? Then I will oblige. After all, there is no greater joy than knowing you want me by your side forever. Hahaha.
Witness my full potential!
What do you need, Commander? I can perform some of your duties in an official capacity.
voiceline.oath: Yes, Commander? Whatever it is you need done, just say the word, and I'll see to it.

voiceline.line: What has gotten into you?!
voiceline.oath: I don't blame you for losing control, but you must consider the impact on your public image.

voiceline.line: I am light cruiser Luigi di Savoia Duca degli Abruzzi, Sardegna's splendorous dignitary. I've waited for the day to fight under your banner, Commander.
Now the question is, how to make the best use of my new abilities?
I am the Empire's splendor – Duca degli Abruzzi! Etch this name into your memories!
voiceline.oath: You have been defeated by the one and only Luigi di Savoia Duca degli Abruzzi! Remember this fact!

voiceline.line: Fixated on my younger sister, hmm? You lend credibility to the adage that heroism breeds virility. Hahah!
Good evening, Commander. Here to unwind after a day's work, I take it? Even dignitaries desire a bit of luxury sometimes. Hahaha.
Is the water temperature satisfactory? You must not come here much, so make the most of your visit. If you want something, just ask for it.

What do you think of this neon-lit cityscape? It doesn't start to compare to the idyllic vistas of Sardegna, but it has its own merits.|You truly are dependable to the utmost, obliging my younger sister with your company like this.|Valiant? I'm not sure where she is. Which is concerning, as I don't believe she's a good swimmer...
Enjoy your time here. Let others take care of any bothersome chores in the meantime.
Good evening, Commander. Here to unwind after a day's work, I take it? Even dignitaries desire a bit of luxury sometimes. Hahaha.
Sinful roses of blood, bloom around me! Bloom!
voiceline.oath: May these eyes sink into deep crimson...

voiceline.line: Dost thy heart cry restlessly in my absence?
King George V-class battleship - HMS Duke of York.
O mesmerising Narcissus, do remember my warning when greeting those who return. Be misled not by the illusions swirling in the water.
It would appear... that I must get a little more violent...
What a nice gaze. Through thy pupils, I can see another world.
How thy visage tempts me so with each passing moment... I must ask of thee, just how sweet is thy blood?
How unfathomable... looking at thy sleeping visage hast made me replete with calmness... Now, pray that thou dost not wake, for I know not what I would do to thee...
O ignorant snake, hast thou only realised now, how long I have hopelessly been in love with thee? Therefore... would thou give thy everything to me?
voiceline.oath: O sinful serpent, thou hast chosen to entwine thyself around me. Dedicate thy love to me for all of eternity— and in return, accept my love, and the right to embrace me.

voiceline.line: Oh, triumphant nightingale that has overcome death itself, what plagues thee enough to silence thy song?
Perhaps I have indulged myself too much...
O unclean snake, who is it thee lusts after today?
voiceline.oath: O, Commander who hath earned my adoration, what is thy desire?

voiceline.line: Ahh... why dost thou obstinately refuse to obey me...
Thy visage when reading and concentrating, unbudging and focused, resembles one of Michelangelo's sculptures. I do not dislike such determination.

The secret behind my battle prowess? Hehe, I sink deeply into visions of the enemy torn from limb to limb. What follows is only natural. |Wales, dost thou intend to hunt the same prey as me? |Please be at ease and close thine eyes. Sink into my embrace, and let thy thoughts flow away.
voiceline.oath: Thy existence has greatly influenced my fighting style — Yes, it resonates with thy passionate eyes, and my pupils also become stained with thy blood-red colour. |I shalt not giveth thee to Wales, George, Anson, or Howe. Thou art my trophy, and the proof of my conquest.|Pitiable Scharnhorst, who knows not the value of thy skin, thy eyes, thy very body... Yes, Commander, thou art the world to me.

voiceline.line: Such fair weather is rare indeed. 'twould be a pity to return to port so soon.
Only the moon and sweet liquor fail to disappoint. We shall share the most unforgettable of nights.

I am King George V-class' Duke of York. Scharnhorst? An interesting one indeed, but now, thou art the one who captures my interest the most... My... if thou displays such an expression to me, I won't be able to contain myself...

Even the most ingenious poet cannot describe the beauty of this moment. Hehe, close thy eyes, feel my warmth, and listen to the beating of my heart. This is the one who shall be thy lifelong partner...
All ye, weep at your own demise!
The night is both lengthy and brief. Come, blow out the light burning within thee, and accompany me into the dark.
Ahh, how beautiful... thy eyes, normally placid, burning with the fires of lust...
voiceline.oath: Melt into one, be it thou or myself, be it anything in existence—

voiceline.line: I see. So the scent that has been driving me crazy... emanates from thy soul. O sinful Commander who tempts me so, engrave my name upon thine heart - Duke of York, of the Royal Navy.
Did thou hear? A sound that makes my blood boil, like wind passing through the forest in the dead of night.
There exists no living being that can resist the embrace of death.
voiceline.oath: Melt before the crimson apocalypse. Merely tearing thy husks apart is no longer enough to sate me.

voiceline.line: Ahaha... I can hear the beating of thy heart. Yes, throb, throb... Ahh, what an enrapturing sound...
This luscious scent... doth emanate from thee. What dost thou feel when gazing upon my new dress? Hehe... thy lips may lie, but thy eyes do not.
Become intoxicated with me. Then, giveth me thy purity, thy, devotion, and thy love. In return... I shall pledge thee an eternity of comfort within my bosom.
Dost thou wish to try this blood... coloured fruity beverage?

Thou need not be nervous. This attire is but a temporary one... Perhaps thou believed to have escaped from my usual self? Ahaha... |Even though a night eternal may be out of the question, dost thou not wish... to sink into the embrace of night with me? |Following thy ideals are akin to swimming endlessly against the current... However, the way thou refuseth to bow thy head before fate gives me ample reason to remain by thee. Hehe...
Dost thou intend to spend the night alone, or perhaps... wouldst thou like to partake of a drink with me?
Art thou able... to entertain me a bit longer?
This luscious scent... doth emanate from thee. What dost thou feel when gazing upon my new dress? Hehe... thy lips may lie, but thy eyes do not.
Come, now... shall we commence our waltz upon the battlefield?
Love that can be robbed away holds no value. Only by becoming mine entirely will thou be worthy of my absolute attention.
My beautiful Adonis, why dost thou refuseth to take refuge in the trove of everlasting love... Perhaps my outfit can finally pierce thy heart? Hehe~

Wales, thou shalt not take my Adonis from me... Hehehe, but out of compassion, I shall allow you to have a third of our precious time together.|Yes, thy gaze... So full of resistance, yet also ready to give in at any time... How thine eyes can keep me entertained for all eternity... |Thou canst not win, be it in the heated environment of this sport, or in the sweetness of my absolute existence...
Beautiful, is it not? This outfit thou hath bestowed upon me is perfect for inspiring thy adoration... Is that difficult to understand?
The snake devours the fruit — thy desires, thy true nature... I have grasped it all. Hehehe~
My beautiful Adonis, why dost thou refuseth to take refuge in the trove of everlasting love... Perhaps my outfit can finally pierce thy heart? Hehe~
I prefer wine over champagne... But very well. We shall celebrate as thou so desires.
Apologies. I have no mercy to spare for my enemies.
What should I make... Macarons, or Mont-Blanc? Oh my, Commander, you came at just the right time. Why don't you help me decide what confection to make?
Dunkerque-class battlecruiser – Dunkerque.
Oh my, it looks like the commission fleet has returned. Perfect timing - I'll invite them to try my new confections.
Ça faisait longtemps, Commander. There's no need to worry about me; I've been doing fine.
Glad you could make it, Commander. One moment please - the dessert is ready, I just have to make tea. Today, let's unwind and chat a little.
Back then, none of us had a choice... so I don't blame the Royal Navy for what happened. Quite the contrary - if it wasn't for them, we might not be fighting together now.
Commander, you're quite the conversationist. Do you find me interesting to talk to? Hehe, I make sure to remember all your preferences. Sit tight for a moment, and I'll bring some cake out for you.

True strength is not measured by our capacity to suffer in silence, but by our courage to open up to others. Commander, that's why... if you ever feel like crying, my bosom is always available for you.
Commander, would you like to try my freshly baked gâteau?
I'm only getting warmed up...
Commander, did you get enough rest?
T'en fais pas... a defeat here is not the end.
Commander, I've finished sorting your mail, so don't forget to take a look.

There are things in this world that you might never be able to accomplish, but that is no reason to give up hope.|It's not nice to sit around idly in port, but... Strasbourg, who took my place in leading the fleet, must feel even worse about what happened... if only the Army was able to hold out a little longer... *sigh* |Ahh~ Sweets can really take a girl to heaven... C-Commander?! How long have you been here?!
There's no shortage of new missions for us to get through... Hard work is important and all, but let's not overwork ourselves.
Hm? I see, the mission rewards are here. Commander, I'll go get them.

I am Dunkerque, 1st Division of the Line of the Vichya Dominion. As you already know, there is no glory in my service history - there is no hiding this fact. However, if you are still willing to use me, I will not let you down.

If I only was able to meet you in the present because of my suffering in the past, I won't say things like "I wish I had met you sooner." However, I do hope that in the future, I will always be able to find solace in your embrace. Commander, can I stay by your side forever?
Let's do it just like we practiced...!
Commander, shall we make some confections together? My home country is world-famous for our sweets, you know?
What am I going to do with you...
The day when we can all stand together has come at last... It's an honor to be here, Commander. I am Dunkerque - please allow me to become a part of this magnificent fleet.
Every little bit matters.
Let's keep up this pace.
Enemies...? Way to spoil the scenery...
Everyone looks like they're having so much fun... I couldn't ask for anything more.
I've been waiting so long for summer... and it's so worth it - the sun, the sand, the waves, and everyone's laughter. Commander, why don't we take this opportunity to enjoy some crullers together?
Commander, would you like some ice cream? I brought several different flavors of syrup.
Commander, are you done changing into your swimwear~?

Ice-cream based desserts are delicious, but they melt too easily... I might have to bring a cooler with me next time...|It's been a long time since I last was able to enjoy scenery like this without any worries...|Commander, are you done changing? The others are calling for us, let's go play with them!
Want to try gazing into the ocean horizon together? It always puts my mind at ease.
I've been waiting so long for summer... and it's so worth it - the sun, the sand, the waves, and everyone's laughter. Commander, why don't we take this opportunity to enjoy some crullers together?
Who wants to have some crullers? I made more than enough for everyone~
What's your favorite dessert? I can make it for you, Commander.
Don't you simply adore the atmosphere in this place? It's one of my favorites. The desserts here are to die for. Would you like a taste?
Commander, the commission is complete... Hehe, no matter the time or place, I suppose I'm still your secretary ship.
The warm sunlight, the peaceful atmosphere, the soothing music, all embracing me as I relax and chat with one so dear to me. If this is a dream, I hope to never wake up...
No need to rush, Commander, I don't mind waiting for you.
Here you are, Commander. Oh? Don't worry, I've only just arrived myself.
We have new intelligence? Well, don't worry about me. Please, check it at once.

......der, Commander! Look at you, staring at me and spacing out again, am I really so captivating? Did the ice in your drink melt?|Commander, shall we go for a stroll? How often do we get to go out on a date? Let's not waste this one sitting around chatting.|When I sit here like this, I sometimes forget I'm a warship... But, to fight for these little moments, that's not such a bad motivation, is it, Commander?
Is it a very important mission? Well then, I'll go with you.
Commander, some mission rewards are available. Shall we head back to the office?
Just relax, Commander, we still have plenty of time.
Don't you simply adore the atmosphere in this place? It's one of my favorites. The desserts here are to die for. Would you like a taste?
The battlefield... Heh, I'm getting all fired up!
There are many Royal Navy ships named "Eagle," and I will go great lengths to maintain its honourable reputation.
Eagle-class light aircraft carrier – Eagle (HMS Eagle.)
Commission complete. Let's go and offer the returning team some biscuits. Don't worry about me, I can do without.
You're betraying everyone's trust in you by acting like this. Pull yourself together, for god's sake!
People say I'm not great at socializing, a fact that I begrudge. But my social skills aside, I do know my manners.

I'm not a frequent attendee at Royal Navy tea parties... Which isn't to say I don't want to, it's just... they bring out snacks at tea parties... What do you think I mean, Commander?! I'd gain weight, that's the problem! ...Sorry, I lost my cool for a sec there.

Despite my low-calorie diet and daily rigorous exercise, my weight stays the same... *sigh*, I guess my past status as a battleship defines me more than I think... But why?! How does everyone else manage to lose weight just fine?!
You are irreplaceable to me. Whatever becomes of me... Scratch that. I'll stay the way I am now, just for you. Because I think this is what made me equally irreplaceable to you. Am I right?
voiceline.oath: Weight and appearances don't bother me as much anymore. We, as ships, can't physically change much anyway, and you're happy with me no matter how I look. We are both irreplaceable to one another, after all.

voiceline.line: My body weight's still the same as it w– Oh! Commander! Didn't think you'd be back so soon. A-anyway, you'd better give our next mission plan a look!
voiceline.oath: My body weight's still the same as it w– Oh, you're back, Commander. Yeah, it's been business as usual in here.

voiceline.line: A warrior of the Royal Navy won't back down so easily!
Great to see you! Based upon your punctuality, I can already tell that you're a responsible commander.
voiceline.oath: Commander, if you're tired, you could've just stayed in bed, or arrived late if you wanted. All you need do is let me know about it.

voiceline.line: Tsk, I've taken damage after fighting for so long... I'll need repairs when we return.
There's mail for you. Don't forget to give it a look.

Let's see what's on the menu today... Fruits and a vegetable salad. Ideal for a low-calorie diet.|How much do I weigh? Ahem, you'd better drop this topic, or else...! Okay, I'm just exaggerating. But I hope you understand that it's a sensitive topic for me.|A band of Iron Blood submarines ran away before I could as much as say hello. Again... Guess I'll have to come up with a good way of approaching them.
voiceline.oath: Low-calorie diets are a healthy habit, Commander. You should give one a try sometime.|I don't really mind showing you my physical exam report. Just to you, Commander.|I've gotten better at talking to all the submarines. Knowing you for so long has helped me substantially improve my social skills.

voiceline.line: There's still unfinished missions, Commander. We should get them done sooner rather than later.
Now that's the face of an accomplished commander. Good job.

After having been converted from a battleship into an aircraft carrier, I provided much early experience for the Royal Navy's carrier forces, and my final moments were spent fighting on the battlefield. Though I met a noble warrior's end, I do wish I'd been done in by a cannon or an airstrike, rather than a submarine.
I once met my final obstacle in the Suez Canal... But if you ever need saving, I will overcome any obstacle to get to you, Commander. This is my promise not just as a warrior, but as your lover.
You're mine!
What is it? An invitation to get lunch? Hmm... Sorry, but could you go in my place?
voiceline.oath: An invitation for lunch, eh? With you watching over me, I think I can do it. Let's go.

voiceline.line: You see, this is the reason why we have to teach people proper etiquette.
voiceline.oath: Despite my weight, I have little meat on my– Wh-what are you doing?!

voiceline.line: The name is Eagle. I intend to serve your fleet to the utmost of my abilities as a proud warrior of the Royal Navy.
Enhancements, huh... I just wish they wouldn't affect my weight...
voiceline.oath: That really hit the spot, thank you. No matter how hard the going may get, I will always keep advancing for you.

voiceline.line: To show compassion to your foe is to put the safety of your allies at risk.
I've come well prepared in hopes of learning the ropes of our infirmary.
This may be an exercise, but even so I will give it my all. Right now, I am not just a Royal Navy warrior, but a medical resident as well. If you ever feel ill, come see me, Commander.
"Weight Loss and Health Care Metholody," eh... Oh, ahem! Good to see you again, Commander. I-I was just reading medical literature, that's all!
Debrief me on your symptoms. Oh, that doesn't sound like what a doctor would say? Then how about... Do you feel ill?

I've come up with a new, healthy diet that improves your physical stamina. Care to give it a try?|Treating wounds and saving lives – being a doctor comes with great responsibility, but also great pride.|Are you scared of needles, Commander? I understand. Then as part of this training, we should give you a shot, just so– Oh, okay, maybe we shouldn't.
Let's take your temperature, just to be sure. Mind if I assist with that?
Umm... Are you feeling lightheaded, Commander? Do you need a thorough examination?
This may be an exercise, but even so I will give it my all. Right now, I am not just a Royal Navy warrior, but a medical resident as well. If you ever feel ill, come see me, Commander.
Chaaarge! Ehehe, don't I sound like a flagship?
Wales, someone can be small and still have a lot of potential, you know! Ehehe, Echo doesn't know what that means, but maybe they're words of praise~?
E-class destroyer – Echo.
The commission girls are back~♪ Echo will go check if they brought any yummy snacks with them~

Commander, people have said you've become a deadbeat, but what is a deadbeat even...? Hmm, in any event, Echo will do everything possible to make you more productive~ Let's begin by having you greet me properly~
Commander, please be positive. Be like Echo: smile, and be happy~ Ehehe♪
Commander, you can't give up so easily. You must get into shape~ Come on, take a stroll around the port with Echo~♪
Echo made cookies~ Have a bite, Commander! ... It's too sweet for you? Ehehe, Hood said they have the signature "Echo flavor"~♪
Commander, can we go someplace far away... *Yawn*, I must've been sleeptalking... Hm? So you're okay with going somewhere with Echo? Hooray! Let's go somewhere, then!
Would you like to eat snacks with Echo~? ... You aren't hungry? In that case... you can just watch me while I eat.
I need to hold out just a little longer... Edinburgh will come save me, I'm sure of it!
Ah, Commander~♪ Ehehe, you're back! You know, Echo was reaaaally lonely~ Hurry up and come play with me~
Ugh... don't bully meee...
Mail has arrived~♪ Maybe there are yummy snacks enclosed within it~ Ehehe~

I made a promise to Edinburgh: I must return to port now and then, no matter how far away I go~♪|Be it with my E-class sisters or strangers, I can make friends with anyone I have fun with, so don't worry about me!|Echo is by your side, Commander! And if you give Echo a high-five, you might feel more motivated!
Commander, we should finish our missions! It's not good to be negligent~♪ Aha, don't you agree that Echo's suuuuuper duper reliable~?
Mission complete~♪ Echo will bring you the rewards, Commander!

I'm Echo, an E-class destroyer of the Royal Navy. I was in the Battle of the Denmark Strait along with Hood and Wales, after which I brought Wales safely back to port~ Ehehe, it's a memory I cherish! Oh, also, Edinburgh is really precious to me!
What are we here for? I don't quite get what this is for... Okay, if you give me candy, then I will stay with you to the end! Okie dokie, I'll open my mouth, so please feed me candy~♪
Here I come! Witness Echo's might!
Commander, carry me like a princess! Echo's quite lightweight! ... Ahahaha~ Commander, that tickles~♪
Wha...? Hood said I shouldn't let people touch me there...
Hello, Commander~! Echo, reporting in! So, after I finish checking in, can I have a reward? Ehehe~♪ I loooove candy, you see~
Ehehe~♪ I don't know if I've gotten stronger, but I'm grateful, Commander~♪
Wowee~♪ Echo got MVP? Ehehe~ So, you're basically praising me?
Wh-Wh-What to do?? First let's retre... I mean, intercept them!
I'm not going to give these to you no matter how much you stare at me.
Edinburgh-Class light cruiser ー Edinburgh, Hull number 16!
When it comes to military commissions, I'm a pro!
Since it's Commander, I have to be even more careful... *stare*...
Everything goes well when 'that girl' does it, so it should be fine if I'm a little clumsy, shouldn't it?
I've been lectured by Bel again... Forgetting to lock doors when going out, and turning off the tap... What the heck! She's totally not like a little sister!
Phew... I've finally found you, Commander. Actually... Aaaah-- Who the heck! Who left the banana peel here!
Commander, want to have a walk together before it gets dark? Yes, don't worry. The lights were switched off, and the windows were shut. Everything's OK! ... W-what? ...Wh-Where did the keys go?!
Thanks! I'm feeling a bit more energized.
I made cookies! Please have a taste... They taste the same as Bel's? Well, we're sisters, after all!
Gh... At least let me protect the gold...!
Ah! I'm not doing anything weird! I'm just transporting gold bars into the room!
Gh... the bullion...
Commander, there's a new ma... Wh-What? Where's the mail? Where did I leave it... ??
I want to be as elegant as Hood but, well...|Eeeh! ...Bel, where are you? I forgot my keys again...|Hmhmm~ Even Scharnhorst had to turn tail and run away when she saw me!
You have to finish your missions properly!
I seem to have forgotten about something... Well, whatever!

I am the lead ship of Edinburgh class of the Royal Navy. Sometimes it is stressful having an overly capable little sister... I took part in the pursuit of Bismarck and Scharnhorst, as well as many patrol missions in Atlantic, North sea and Mediterranean. In the end, I sunk with all my gold due to Ironblood torpedoes...
Hmhm, I'm fine with sharing some of my money-luck with you. ...The gold? No! That belongs to the Belfast Foundation!
No matter how thick the armor is, it can't win against the power of gold!
Hey!! Don't touch that! It's gonna fall!
Commander, a lady would never hide her gold bars there!
This is my turn, you might say! I am 'her' older sister, Edinburgh! In a sense, I am the 'most accomplished' light cruiser!
It seems like I've become luckier!
Crushing the enemies with elegance... That, is the elegant Ediburgh of the royal family!
Tsk tsk, we don’t need her here. In any case, Belfast will always be by my side. Fleet, prepare for interception!
Hmm...this Alchemy is really mysterious, but once I mastered it, then Belfast’s trust fund will...
Why doesn't she have to go to school with me...she says she’s a maid for the Queen? Well, me too! You can be a maid and school girl at the same time...tsk tsk---
Belfast, before you go to greet the girls returning from commission, could you brush my hair? It's a mess...
This pendant is so cute, right?! I copied from that girl. Let's call her “Belfast”.
M-my Belfast, are you ok?!

Belfast, wake me up before you wake up Elizabeth. Otherwise, she will criticize me for getting up late again... |Do I look like a child who’s so easily bullied? Hehe, but as elegant as I am, no wonder I am called a fairy. |Victory, let me rub your cheeks again, doing so always brings me good luck.
Commander, wanna try my snacks? Ah~~
Commander! C’mon out now will ya. I can't study this way…
Why doesn't she have to go to school with me...she says she’s a maid for the Queen? Well, me too! You can be a maid and school girl at the same time...tsk tsk---
I'm a Royal Maid, I'm certainly not afraid of any- Hyaaaaah!? Wh-wh-where did that come from!? ... Phew... D- don't scare me like that now!
Ahem! I made this special candy just for Halloween! Here, Commander, take some! Wooaaooah! Wh-who put this pumpkin here? It, it was me?!
Bel, are you really turning down the Halloween event because you're too busy with Head Maid duties? Gosh, you really ought to make time for your sister~
Ah! I'm just transporting the Queen's bullion in the pumpkin! It's not what you think!

They're saying I've got spicy candy mixed in here...? That's odd... I hand picked them all myself... Now where did that rumor come from?|Ta-daaah! It's a special Halloween Maid uniform! Lovely, innit? Heheee, I'd say bits of me even outshine Bel!|Gneisenau's costume there, it's a bit... Um, it's something...
Halloween candy delivery! You there, Commander, how would you like a treat endorsed by the Queen herself?
Oi there! Don't be doing that when I'm busy!
Ahem! I made this special candy just for Halloween! Here, Commander, take some! Wooaaooah! Wh-who put this pumpkin here? It, it was me?!
I'm coming to beat you up!
Hmph. It upsets me that you're a boorish Commander with no knowledge of common etiquette. Y-you think I'm well-bred? ...You're sorely mistaken! I'm a bad girl! Bad to the bone!
voiceline.oath: I've been thinking... Isn't it pretty unusual for you to be the one who always makes coffee for me? I mean, even if I'm a bad girl, you're still my superior, and... you can't leave out my sugar on purpose like that!

voiceline.line: Jade-class aircraft carrier – Elbe
The girls have come back from their commissions. It almost feels like I'm not the only one being worked to the bone by you.
It turns out you really were an inferior creature, all along...
Hehe, how should I toy with the Commander today... It's fun, how am I supposed to hold myself back? I'll show you how we do it in the Iron Blood!
If I give this kind of work to you, you'll surely be... very troubled! I-it's fine for me to trouble you...?
I'm a very bad girl, so I'll keep finding new ways to trouble you more and more! Now, brace yourself~♪ Y-you're busy today, so I shouldn't? Oh... Okay then...

Today is finally the day I'll trouble you to my heart's content! Will I trouble you to my heart's content or will you...? N-no, bad Commander! I'll be the one troubling you! Because I really want to be with you!
voiceline.oath: I always thought that being a bad girl would keep you interested in me, but... sometimes, I just want to be a good girl who clings to your side... O-only every once in a while though, got it...?

voiceline.line: Y-you little...
You're finally back! Yep, these should suffice as your refreshments! How are they? ...Ah, no comments on how it tastes though!
voiceline.oath: Great work out there, Commander. Hehe, did you expect to come back to a nice meal? Too bad for you, I left one of the side dishes out today♪ Ahahaha~

voiceline.line: I, I haven't even gotten serious yet...!
Good morning, Commander. Where are we headed to today? Come on, tell me already~♪
voiceline.oath: Good morning, Commander. Where shall we head to today? Hehehe.

voiceline.line: Grr, how frustrating! Commander, Commander~!
Here's a letter for you. When are you going to read it?

Commander~ Might you be looking for your pen? Hehehe, I hid it right over here! T-Thanks for finding it for you, you've been looking for it for days...?|I should invite Hiyou and Junyou over for tea sometime... Huh, I can't? Why not?|Y-You inferior creature, prostrate thyself in front of the great Elbe... Ahaha, there's no way I would actually say that to you, Commander!
voiceline.extra: Hehehe, I went and swapped around some of the forms you're supposed to work on. Will you finally admit that I'm a bad girl now?|Once this war is over, maybe I can go back to being a good girl... B-but, that's only if you promise that you'll always stay with me!|As your secretary ship, I'll make sure that I work myself to the bone! Now now, leave all of your work to me, and wallow in your pangs of guilt~♪

voiceline.line: Look what we have here~ A form for you to reflect on your inability to complete your missions on time♪ Think long and hard about how you want to write it~
voiceline.oath: If they make you fill out a reflection form for not completing your missions on time, leave it to me! Ehehe♪

voiceline.line: The rewards for the missions you completed are here! ...I-it's not like I was trying to report them late on purpose... You'll fill the reflection form out? You're the best!
voiceline.oath: Here are the mission rewards. Your beaming face is enough to make it worthwhile.

voiceline.line: I'm the Iron Blood's remodeled aircraft carrier, Elbe! Just like my sister who fought for the Sakura Empire during a certain war, I was converted into an aircraft carrier and performed many great feats... or at least, that's how it should've been! Sorry, I shouldn't be telling lies...

Wow... So this is the fabled promise ring?! N-no way, the Commander really confessed to me...??? W-wait, don't hang your head, I'm not turning you down, really! I truly love you, from the bottom of my heart! Commander, I love you, so, so much~!
It's time for your punishment!
You can't just touch me as you please~♪ Come on, beg for my permission!
voiceline.oath: My gorgeous body can even withstand battles! Hehe, you can keep admiring me♪

voiceline.line: Wh-wh-wh-whaaaaa?!
voiceline.oath: A-aren't you too enthusiastic about this?!

voiceline.line: I am the Jade-class carrier, Elbe. And you're the Commander of this fleet? Hmm, you must be quite sure of yourself to make the one who will bring you victory come to you♪
Heehee~! I'm even stronger now!
Kneel in front of me! Pretty please♪
voiceline.oath: We did it, Commander! ...A-aren't you going to praise me?!

voiceline.line: You can't find your steak knife...? He, hehe... that's right! It was all me! Now you're going to make me get on my knees before scolding me, right? Wait... you're just going to leave me here?!
Thank you all for waiting! Large mugs of Iron Blood beer, just as ord–– W-waaah?! Nnngh...! Phew, somehow managed to not spill anything... Wh-what's your deal?!
You want to bring the girls some refreshments? Sure, hold on for a moment then♪
Master, what would you like to order today? Hehehe.

Let's change the Commander's order up a bit... Huh, Bismarck?! I-I'm terribly sorry!|It's not good for you to drink so much... A-After all, I don't know what kind of wild things you might do to me when you're inebriated...|I can't seem to find a chance to talk to the Commander because I'm too busy taking everyone's orders... What should I do...
Eeeeek?!
Thank you all for waiting! Large mugs of Iron Blood beer, just as ord–– W-waaah?! Nnngh...! Phew, somehow managed to not spill anything... Wh-what's your deal?!
We won! My time to shine is here!
I'll take care to stay out of collision range!
Commander? Are you hurt? Not even a scratch? I just got worried you might have h-had an accident on the way here...
voiceline.oath: Oh gosh! I'm so sorry! I shouldn't have thrown the door open! I thought there's no way you're in here, but lo and behold, you were standing right at the entrance...

voiceline.line: Pillau-class light cruiser – Elbing.
The commission team is back. I'd better not retrieve the rewards, or some will magically disappear...
voiceline.oath: Are you sure you want me to fetch the commission rewards? Items on the list might get lost somehow if I do it...

voiceline.line: This is all my fault for wishing for a good Commander...
I'll state this upfront: I'm feeble, clumsy, cursed with terrible luck, and I doubt I'll be much of any use to you...
None of my shells ever land. Even when I take another shot, it just misses. All I do is waste ammunition... *sigh*...
You've been kind to me this whole time not because I'm useful, but because you pity me, isn't that right? I only wish I could do anything in return...
Nothing I've sincerely wished for has ever come true. All I can do for you is this... I wish to be miserable! I wish to go through sorrows with you, Commander! ...This should bring you happiness.
voiceline.oath: I'm going to have an awful day today. It's going to rain, the restaurant I booked a table at will close early, same for the movie theater after that, and you'll receive urgent work that keeps you busy all night... That should do it! Thanks for waiting while I recited all that.

voiceline.line: Ahh...
Welcome back. You came home safe and sound because I wished that you'd get battered and bruised. My wishes never, ever come true, you see...
voiceline.oath: Of course your wellbeing is important to me, but I try not to think about it. I mean, wishing for your safety only puts you in danger. Simply not worrying about you is the best way to ensure nothing bad happens...

voiceline.line: W-we're gonna collide!
No rain today, I assume? I see... So there was no point in me bringing an umbrella.
voiceline.oath: You think it's going to rain today? I see... I brought my umbrella, hoping the weather would clear up. H-hopefully this will be a sunny day.

voiceline.line: Sure enough, all battles I partake in end in defeat...
I hope this letter has good news for you, and bad news for me...

It could rain today. You see, when I say it's going to rain, the weather always turns sunny...|My rigging is so intimidating... Strong though it may be, it's no good in the hands of someone helpless like me.|After all my efforts, there's no less work than when I started... But if I give up, your workload might increase instead... Ughhh...
voiceline.extra: We should go on a date since it's sunny? Um, sure! I'll bring my umbrella to ensure this nice weather sticks around for the whole day!|Destroyers usually have cute little riggings... Something like what they have would suit me better. Heehee.|Is there any way I can help? As long as it's something I can handle and will make your job easier...

voiceline.line: Commander, here is the mission list. Whew...
Mission rewards have come in. You should verify them, Commander. Making me do it is a bad idea...
voiceline.oath: New mission rewards! I wonder wh-what we've received.

voiceline.line: I'm Elbing, Pillau-class cruiser of the Iron Blood. I'm on the small side for a cruiser, and my service history is a disappointment. My armor is paper and my firepower is pathetic. My only redeeming traits are my speed and range...

A promise ring?! B-but that'd make us both happy, when I explicitly... I see now. The wish must've come true because I wished for your happiness, not my own. Thank goodness... *sniffle*... I'm so glad it came true!
It won't matter if I can't hit them...!
Maybe I could help with... No, I'm good for absolutely nothing.
voiceline.oath: If there's any way I can help, I'll try.

voiceline.line: Y-you flatter me...
voiceline.oath: Ahh...

voiceline.line: I'm Elbing, Iron Blood cruiser. I know you're going to shun me since I'm worthless in a battle... You're not going to do that? Ah, right... The only thing I have going for me is how disposable I am...
Why strengthen me of all people...?
I... I'm the MVP? You don't have to hold back for my sake... I just don't have what it takes to be the MVP...
voiceline.oath: You really don't need to work so hard to make me the MVP, Commander. Because if I'm the top performer, that's a bad sign...

voiceline.line: I'm better suited for a role like... a messenger of misfortune who puts a curse on you. Don't you think so too, Commander?
As the mistress of this manor, I c-command thee to kneel... No, of course. I mean, what authority do I have to issue commands? I'm better suited to be a maid than a mistress...
Eek! Oww... I tore my pantyhose again... Sorry for how terrible I look, Commander. You hate to see this, don't you...?
You should be on this throne, not me, Commander. Let me get up so we can swap– Aahh!

This is what happens when you stretch your clothes past their limit... It's not my fault? Yes it is, because I'm a bad fit for this role...|I'd be helpless even in the role of a maid. All I would do is mess up constantly and be a burden to you...|At the risk of sounding rude... Emden should be doing this, not a trainwreck like me.
What is your bidding, Commander?
Mmh... Ahh...
As the mistress of this manor, I c-command thee to kneel... No, of course. I mean, what authority do I have to issue commands? I'm better suited to be a maid than a mistress...
Don't like it, but will try my best.
... Commander, cute?
Cannon-class Destroyer Escort - Eldridge, Hull Number DE-173!
(Eldridge's hair is pointing at the door. It seems the girls who went on a commission have returned.)
... Commander, hate! (Eldridge is emitting sparks from her body to prevent you from approaching her.)
...Commander, lap. (Eldridge is trying to sit on your lap... while she's emitting sparks!)
... Commander, fly. (Eldridge is looking at you like she wants you to pick her up, but she's emitting sparks!)
... Commander, like. (Eldridge jumps onto you the moment she sees you. Let's just accept this display of straight-up affection!)
Commander, hug. (Eldridge is coming to you with her arms open. She's not emitting sparks.)
Commander, hug...
... I'll try.
Hungry, Commander? Have this.
... I want to go home...
(A newly arrived letter is floating beside Eldridge) Brought mail!
Commander, hungry. Want food.|Commander, look! I can emit sparks!|Commander, fly. (Eldridge raises her arms up towards you.)
Mission...! (Eldridge's hair sticking out from the top of her head forms an exclamation mark.)
Commander... Rewards, edible? (Eldridge's eyes are sparkling with excitement.)

Eldridge, Cannon-class destroyer escort.
Love snacks. Emit sparks.
Can't teleport...
Whoa... Commander, amazing...
Enemy, hate.
... (Eldridge's expression hasn't changed, but her hair is charging up to shock you.)
Commander, Eldridge reporting in.
Eldridge... powered up...
Merry Christmas... Commander, Eldridge's outfit... cute?
Commander, eat together... Christmas feast! |Commander, present? (Eldridge's hair twirls in anticipation)
Commander... love...
Merry Christmas... Commander, Eldridge's outfit... cute?
Is this today's...homework?
Commander...won't you be joining Eldridge for class?
Commander, do you like Eldridge...this way? Meow~...look what I've done to my books...
Commander, want to listen to music...with Eldridge?
Not being by the Commander’s side while at school, interesting... |Everyone at school gets charmed by Eldridge’s cute gaze...Eldridge is elated! |nil
Commander, carry me!
Commander, do you like Eldridge...this way? Meow~...look what I've done to my books...
Holiday, don't ruin.
These clothes, pretty. But hard to hug. Sad...
Commander, Sakura Empire's New Year looks fun... Go together...? (Eldridge is looking at you expectantly.)
Commander, hold hand. With you, go together to... (Eldridge's lock of hair is forming a heart.)
Commander, snack. For you.
Commander, let's play.
Commander, hair bun, big... Want to touch it?|Commander, glasses, cute?|Commander, cherry flower. Watch. (Eldridge's lock of hair is taking the form of a cherry flower petal.)
Stress...? Eldridge can't emit stress.
Commander, Sakura Empire's New Year looks fun... Go together...? (Eldridge is looking at you expectantly.)
Eldridge... supercharged idol... (the sparks around Eldridge shift regularly)
Eldridge and the kitties... are in idol mode... Commander, do you like...?
Watch... Eldridge's performance?
Commander, Eldridge... has become a kitty...
Kitties... don't listen...|Commander... don't forget to... support Eldridge...?|Kitty gloves... Want to feel...?
...Commander, meow?
Commander, bad. (Eldridge flicks your forehead with her cowlick)
Eldridge and the kitties... are in idol mode... Commander, do you like...?
Commander, want mooncake?
Eldridge, arriving at designated altitude... Moon, mooncake, and Manjuus spotted...
Back... (The look in Eldridge's eyes indicates the commission team has returned to port.)
Commander, hug. (Eldridge floats in from nowhere with her arms stretched out.)
Whooa... (Eldridge is floating around weightlessly in the air.)
Dragon Empery festival... Mooncake... Eldridge wants a bite...|Using sparks, bad... Eldridge knows...|This moon, not the real moon... Simply a prop... Only Eldridge is weightless...
Missions...
Eldridge, arriving at designated altitude... Moon, mooncake, and Manjuus spotted...
Hmm...?
Eldridge, arriving at designated altitude... Moon, mooncake, and Manjuus spotted...
Peace sign, from the moon.
Please, everyone take care as to not be injured.
Please, feel at ease. Although my elegant uniform may steal your attention, I am still very much the intelligent super A.I. Kizuna AI I have always been.
Well met. I'm Kizuna AI, the new addition to your base. I will do all in my power to be at least of some use. It is a pleasure meeting you, Commander.
I have pressing information. The commission team has returned. Let us swiftly head out to receive them!
Can I just drop the act now?
I make strenuous efforts each day to be a mature A.I. so I may relate to everyone.
As I thought, there are more things I must learn in order to relate to everyone...! Commander, please grant me your guidance and support!
I can simply learn things instantly with a plugin? Oh, please, it isn't that simple! Even an A.I. must work hard!
It is thanks to you that I have matured so much! I sincerely believe it would not have been possible without your help! ... Thank you so much!
Phew... Kinda tiring to act refined and all... Huh?! Commander?! H-how long have you been here...? My tone of voice sounded odd? No, not all, you must be imagining things! Ohohoho!
Something as trivial as this... will not defeat an intelligent super A.I.!
Welcome back, Commander. Soon it will be time for our scheduled meeting. Let's get a lot of work done today.
How could an intelligent super A.I. like myself lose...
Mail has arrived. It may be of urgent importance, so please do read it immediately.

Commander, Hood invited me to a tea party. Would you perhaps like to attend it as well?|Formal attire certainly aids one's composure... Belfast, if you don't mind, would you kindly teach me the Royal Navy's etiquette?|Commander, would it be agreeable with you if I uploaded videos from this base? I am quite talented at video making, you see.
Commander, a new mission has appeared. Let us begin on our preparations at once!
A mission has been completed. Let us go and collect our rewards now!
I am the embodyment of cuteness and etiquette! Please, enjoy the splendor of this smarter and more refined Kizuna AI!
I am who I am now because of you... I believe I can relate to more people if I am with you. So... may I stay by your side for the foreseeable future, Commander?
I shall end this gorgeously!
Please, do you not know uncouth it is to touch a lady nonchalantly?
You are guilty. There is no room for alternate interpretations. You are guilty.
Well met. I'm Kizuna AI, the new addition to your base. I will do all in my power to be at least of some use. It is a pleasure meeting you, Commander.
Installation complete! Pardon, I meant to proclaim that I have become smarter.
Gotta hand it to myself: I'm perfectly suited for combat, too!
An entertaining battle awaits us♡
"Don't assume I'm fond of you, pitiable human." You have the sweet scent of a bud that wishes to blossom, dear human. The kind of scent that Emden adores.
voiceline.oath: Yees? What does my beloved, darling human need of Emden? Based on that lonely look... I assume you yearn for my lips♡ "Or maybe what you want is to be held in Emden's embrace? Heehee~"

voiceline.line: Dresden-class light cruiser – Emden.
New supplies have arrived. A traveling swan needs sustenance – when her stomach growls, she has little choice but to "borrow" food from a passerby.
Oh dear. It seems Emden got carried away. Such a pity... Her only darling human, broken by her own hands.
A lovable pet should not be unwaveringly obedient, but rather a source of continued delight to its master. "Fawn on me in a way I enjoy, my sweet human♪"
Insistent on being a disobedient little human, aren't you? "I like seeing a sweet human struggle so. Heehee."
"In truth, Emden has wanted to shackle you down from the outset, human." Obedience gained by force is worthless. I shall patiently wait for you to submit to me of your own accord, my darling human.

One finds the world's greatest comfort not in a cage of steel, but in a cradle of love and submission. Have no fear, my darling human. Give your body and soul to Emden, and your woes and troubles will all disappear in due time♡
Why do you stroke my head? That is something a master does to her pet. Perhaps what you did was the inverse of this idea?
voiceline.oath: "You're starting to like your own subordinacy, aren't you? Heehee~"

voiceline.line: You've returned to safety, now won't you close your eyes and rest? It's important that you get your beauty sleep, my darling human.
voiceline.oath: Oh, I wonder how I shall nurse my dear tired human♡ "Only Emden may decide – you have no say in this matter, human♥"

voiceline.line: If you wish to defeat Emden, you must use your every drop of strength♪
Welcome home, my darling human. Where shall your conquest take you today, and what foes shall you smite?
voiceline.oath: "You're late, human. How are you going to make it up to Emden, hmm?" Emden hopes for an apology through your words and actions, darling. Heehee♡

voiceline.line: One can hardly call this a desired outcome, dear human. "I get the impression you ordered a sortie without a moment of preparation."
voiceline.oath: I had high hopes for you... Alas, it seems your charm is your only merit, my dear human.

voiceline.line: You have a letter, dear human. Would you be good and read it aloud to Emden?

Trying to make a human submit through force only gains you its resentment. Only by breaking the human's spirit can you make its whole being your own.|"When you're at a loss, how about you get up and move instead of just sitting in your chair?" Emden cannot bear to see you rack your brains all day, dear human. Heehee.|You, my dear hardworking human, deserve a reward. You are hereby granted the privilege of massaging Emden's shoulders. Use neither too little nor too much force, and henceforth, kindly do it without me telling you to first.
voiceline.extra: The smell of guilt is in the air... Emden can read your mind like an open book, human." Emden graciously accepts the fact that you're procrastinating, darling♡|Come hither, my darling human. Heehee♪ I see you're still reluctant to receive a headpatting♡|"Hard at work, I see. You must be dying to experience Emden's punishment. Heehee~ You do find such joy in it, after all♥"

voiceline.line: New orders from your superiors. Supposing that someday no one is left to give you orders, where will you go then, dear human?
voiceline.oath: "Nobody can impede your progress... but Emden is a different case. Now go and finish your missions, wretched human♥"

voiceline.line: Ah, mission rewards. Emden need not tell you how best to use them, right, my darling human?
I am the Swan of the East, also known as Emden, the Dresden-class light cruiser. "And I am Emden of the Königsberg class – member of the High Seas Fleet. We are Emden. Remember our name."

Have you at long last learned your place? Heehee, as much as I enjoy seeing your cute struggling, you're more lovely when you submit♡ Now, lie in my cradle of love and embrace an eternal slumber. "Emden will cuddle you forever and ever. You won't want to leave♥"
Heeheehee♪
You would use force to subjugate a defenseless girl? Heehee, unfortunately for you, Emden stands on top, and you crawl down below, dear human. This is an unchangeable fact.
voiceline.oath: Have you forgotten, my dear human? The use of force will not change your standing in relation to Emden. "Or are you implying you've come to enjoy this arrangement?"

voiceline.line: Is this your way of saying that you long to be put in a cage? "Do you wish to be flayed 'til your skin gives way to bone?"
voiceline.oath: "You're just begging to be spoiled, human♥" Emden shall caress you until you're whisked away to sleep♡

voiceline.line: Heehee, it is you that summoned Emden, isn't it, my darling human? I shall make real your every desire if only you surrender yourself. "Heehee. Submit to Emden. Submit to us."
Thank you for this strength, my darling human. "You make good decisions sometimes! Heeheehee♪"
The battle is over. All you who are out of Emden's range may now take your leave.
voiceline.oath: "Nothing beats reducing an eyesore of an opponent to dust♥" Your sinking shall further my dear human's and my glory♡

voiceline.line: What you see is not theatrics, my darling human. Emden has merely adopted a more suitable form for handling a vassal. Vampirism has nothing to do with it. Heehee♡
Raise your head, my darling human. O lost soul, you have three options – become Emden's meal, become Emden's prisoner... "Or become Emden's vassal. Our vassal♥"
The errand girls have returned. Let us see what they've brought... "Well, well. These aren't half-bad spoils."
"You have some gall, human." Emden can tolerate a dash of self-indulgence♡
It matters not whither you flee, for you will inevitably return hither, my dear human♡ "After all, a human that's wholeheartedly submitted to Emden can never truly escape. Heehee♥"
"You're late, human." How will you make recompense for the time you kept Emden waiting, hmm? My darling human♡
There is a letter for you. Emden shall read it first, then you may take it after, my darling human.

Vampire hunters... A rather barbarous kind, aren't they? "They will learn who truly rules the night."|You may borrow my human if you wish, Yorck. Please do keep in mind, though, that you are only BORROWING my human.|By all means, use your holy artifacts as a means of meager resistance. "I will savor every moment as I slowly crush your rebellious spirit♥"
A new mission has come in. Have no fear, my darling human. The night shall show you the way.
Mission completed. You have done well, my darling human. You are hereby given the privilege of sharing a toast with Emden.
Embrace the night, and the night shall embrace you. "Now, are you ready to offer yourself?"
Close your eyes and let Emden show you a dream. A rapturous dream wherein all is possible. "A paradise of perpetual night."
Raise your head, my darling human. O lost soul, you have three options – become Emden's meal, become Emden's prisoner... "Or become Emden's vassal. Our vassal♥"
Venture forth!
Want to look at my medal collection?
Yorktown-class aircraft carrier ー Enterprise, Hull Number CV-6!
I've been on the battlefield for a long time, so I know about the importance of logistics. Commander, let's greet the girls who work hard behind the scenes.
...Commander, you don't seem to have enough courage
It is my wish to live honestly and sincerely. That's why I'll speak my mind if I have something to say. You too should do the same without holding back.
All the lights in the sky are stars, just as all the lights on the seas are enemies... Commander, will there be a day where there's no more fighting?
There's no meaning in being peerless. As long as you are here, Commander, I can draw upon all of my strength. Let us end this war.
What do you want to do after the war? --Me? I'll probably stick with you. I feel the safest out of battle when I'm with you. Will you... take me along with you?
It's one battle after another, huh...
Interesting...!
You've come. If it's fighting, I'm ready for it any time.
I've lost after giving my all. I'm not regretting this...
Commander, it's a new mail.

Is it you, Commander? ...Recently, I'm thinking about whether or not I can engage in anti-submarine actions...|Luck is also a part of strength? Then if possible, I'd like to impart some of it to my older sister.|So long as we live, there are things that will never go our way. When we die, it must happen in a way that carries no regrets.
Commander, your missions are not yet completed.  Hurry up and set off!
Commander, the rewards are here.

I am the Yorktown class aircraft carrier, Enterprise. "Grey Ghost" is one of the many nicknames I have. My smoke-covered and bloodstained battle record is a reminder of my mission. I will continue to be victorious until the war ends.

I carry with me the hopes and wills of the countless battlefields and goodbyes that I have experienced. Commander, are you prepared to shoulder them all? …I see. Then let us walk together until the end of our lives.
It's over!
What is it? Sortie time?
What the...?!
Second ship of the Yorktown class, Enterprise, reporting for duty. I will neither sympathize nor hold back with my enemies, and instead, I go all out. Such is my way.
I will show you... what lies at the end of power
Commander, tell me. How many more do I have to sink?
Be thankful for the past, have dreams for the future, and live life in the present!
Merry Christmas, Commander! I shall be Santa Claus tonight, so make sure to hang up your stockings on the fireplace before going to sleep!

Merry Christmas! Is there anything you'd like as a present? |Of course Santa Claus is real. Hmm? Right in front of you. |A white Christmas, how beautiful... Eh? W-wait, Vestal, don't drag me back in! I'm not cold... I swear, I'm really not cold!
Celebrate to your heart's content! These wonderful memories shall light your way during the darkest battles.
Merry Christmas, Commander! I shall be Santa Claus tonight, so make sure to hang up your stockings on the fireplace before going to sleep!
Being able to enjoy this peaceful, festive holiday atmosphere is only possible because of everyone's continued hard work... Right, Commander?
So this is the traditional attire of the Dragon Empery? Hmm... it fits quite well. Oh? Custom-made bow and arrows… Interesting, let's see how far these arrows can fly.
There's no harm in taking a little break before the next battle, Commander.

Lanterns... should be hung up like this, right? Ah, Commander, you're here. I heard that they hang lanterns up to celebrate Lunar New Year in the Dragon Empery, so I gave it a try... You think it's fine? Festive, isn't it?

My flight deck is also decorated with a theme from the Dragon Empery. Its colors represent joy and happiness. Not bad, huh. |According to legend, a mythical beast called the "Nian" comes out during the Lunar New Year. It can be warded off by setting off a lot of firecrackers. |I heard that it's customary in the Dragon Empery to hand out "red envelopes" during the New Year. Should I prepare some for the Union girls?
Commander, it seems that this coat is big enough to accommodate two people. It's super warm - want to see for yourself?
So this is the traditional attire of the Dragon Empery? Hmm... it fits quite well. Oh? Custom-made bow and arrows… Interesting, let's see how far these arrows can fly.
Enterprise, engage!
Commander, are you doing well? Live long and prosper!
Happy Anniversary! Commander, celebrate to your heart's content today! I'll be praying for our continued victories!
