Maybe I should just hit the road and never look back...
Would you like to come with me, Commander? We can go anywhere in the world. Think of all the new people and cultures we could discover together on our trek!
Good work out there! Go ahead and take a break while the others are being inspected.
Ah, you're here. I'm ready to go whenever you are. Oh, can't be forgetting my helmet!
Sometimes there really is a no-win scenario...
Commander, there's an incoming message from fleet command.

Commander? Recently... I've been thinking about how it would feel to be able to soar through the skies and stars... but that's not really possible. Sorry for making you listen to my idle thoughts. |Vacation, huh... To be honest, I've been deployed in so many places during my lengthy service that sometimes even vacations feel like yet another mission... |Recently, Essex has picked up biking as well. It'd be great to go out with everyone else next time.
Would you also like to see my trusty steed?
Happy Anniversary! Commander, celebrate to your heart's content today! I'll be praying for our continued victories!
For the sake of freedom and the Azur Lane, I'll keep on winning!
Enterprise, sallying forth! Let us crush our enemies!
I do not believe that it is correct to wantonly resort to violence, even in the name of justice.
There is no doubt in my mind that I was born to fight. For the azure lanes of liberty, Enterprise, engaging!
Would you like to greet the commission fleet? It's a good idea to get some exercise. Otherwise, Hornet's going to make fun of you.
Commander, thank you for your hard work. Let's get ready for the next operation.
Good day, Commander. There's still some time until the strategy meeting, so you should rest up while you still have the opportunity to.
So I've... overstepped my limits...?

I'm quite impressed by the Royal Maids. Aside from their combat prowess, they're also very good at a wide variety of other things. |Vestal, what's the matter? ...No, I've been making sure to eat! Commander has been making all sorts... I mean, I cook from time to time as well! |My eagle is quite attached to you, Commander. We should all get along just like you two. Hehe.
We still have missions that haven't been completed. You should check on their progress.
Commander, do you need me for something?
You wouldn't do this to Yorktown, would you...
There is no doubt in my mind that I was born to fight. For the azure lanes of liberty, Enterprise, engaging!
Our slight advantage seems to have given us the victory here.
Right, I didn't get to ask you earlier since you were in a hurry, but what do you think about my outfit? I value your input just as much as I value that of Hornet and the others.
My ballgown? I don't normally get to wear clothes like these, so it took me a while to change. Ah, let's hurry to the venue. We shouldn't keep everyone else waiting.
The girls in the commission fleet have returned? The formalities will have to wait then. I'll go welcome them back first.
Commander, you shouldn't overexert yourself... Hm, you should be the one saying that to me? I understand.
I'm Enterprise of the Eagle Union. Let's proceed to the event venue.

I see, so this is how it's done. Next time, I'll have to learn how to make... Hm? Ahh, I was talking about ice cream. Do you want some, Commander? |I'm used to emergency sorties. Even if I'm at a banquet, just give me the order and I'll scramble my planes.|What about Independence? Ahh, she's a nice and adorable girl, just like Eagle. Good friends who heal my heart from the weariness of battle.
My ballgown? I don't normally get to wear clothes like these, so it took me a while to change. Ah, let's hurry to the venue. We shouldn't keep everyone else waiting.
May this victory serve as the ornament to a fine celebration.
Come, spread your wings and fly!
Ah, Commander, there's something I wanted to ask you about... What do you think about this pose? I want to do what I can so I don't sully your reputation.

Commander, did you come to watch the race? You know... I'd rather be down there competing than standing around over here. That feeling of being able to seize the wind... Don't you think that racing and sailing share the same essence?
The commission fleet has returned. Sorry, but could you welcome them back in my place?
Good work, Commander. Go ahead and take a break, I'll handle the follow-up work for the others.
Let's do our best today. I'll be cheering you on.

Is that... Zuikaku? That's a pretty showy outfit... though I'm not exactly in a position to talk myself.|Essex, be careful when you're charging ahead! ...Oh, um, I didn't mean to patronize, I just can't help but get a bit worried...|You'd like to help me with the maintenance? Sure. To be honest, you might be better suited for this job. Ahaha~
A photo op? Sure, but what kind of pose should I make?
That's against the rules, Commander.

Commander, did you come to watch the race? You know... I'd rather be down there competing than standing around over here. That feeling of being able to seize the wind... Don't you think that racing and sailing share the same essence?
First place, huh? Normally not much of a reason to celebrate, but since we're at a race, let's uncork the champagne.
No matter where my foes appear, I'll take them down all the same!
Thank you for letting me experience the stillness you can only find away from the battlefield, Commander. It's shown me... what's really worth protecting.
It feels odd taking an extended leave just to go on vacation... but I guess you need breaks to stay on top of your game. With that in mind, let's make every minute count, Commander!
Commission team's come back. Let's go say hi and give them some souvenirs while we're at it.

I've been all over the world on missions before, but this is my first time visiting another country as a tourist. Everything just feels so novel... I think now I get the appeal of vacationing. Here's hoping we'll see many more new places and people in future journeys to come, Commander!
Solid performance, Commander. You can go lie down for a bit while I work out our next plan.
There you are. I'm good to go whenever you are.
This is why you never pop the champagne early...

With so many museums and iconic buildings, it's no wonder this city is called the Capital of Art. I'd love to come here again with you at some later point.|I asked Vestal about places to visit, and she suggested this village where lavenders bloom en masse. Said we "should definitely check it out."|After visiting all these places with you, I've realized something – the sights themselves aren't super important to me, what matters is seeing them together with someone dear to me.
Commander, be sure to check your mission progress before we head to the next tourist destination.
Can we check out a gift shop now that you've claimed these rewards? I want to get something for my sisters that'll really make them smile.
What's up? Our tickets are all in order, if that's what you're wondering.
It feels odd taking an extended leave just to go on vacation... but I guess you need breaks to stay on top of your game. With that in mind, let's make every minute count, Commander!
Guess we're celebrating this victory with a full course dinner. I can't wait.
As long as you are around, no matter how tough a battle I endure or how great the pain I suffer from being separated from you, I’ll go on with hope that I’ll finally be with you.
How, how does it look? Do I look a bit strange... no, of course I like it. I'd say every girl dreams about this day, just that...

Would you like to try my cooking tonight? Vestal said that I've already mastered her cooking skills...I am not that kind of girl who solely exists on the battlefield |nil| Because of you, I started to believe that one day this war will past and people will smile happily again.
Hmm, I like you the same way that you like me.
How, how does it look? Do I look a bit strange... no, of course I like it. I'd say every girl dreams about this day, just that...
Please remain calm. The darkness will only make the stars shine brighter.
I am not the harbinger of death... I am just..... guiding them after their times are up
Erebus-class monitor – Erebus, Hull Number I02!
I'm not particularly interested in embarking on commissions... The other girls always say I see weird stuff. I suppose it can't be helped... Anyway, your girls are back!
Commander, if you fall into darkness, know that it will be me hunting your soul...
It was hard to take care of my sister at the beginning, but I got used to it... used to being alone? I'm just used to the fear of it.
Whenever I'm afraid, all I have to do is think of my little sister. It gives me the strength to push on. Even though my sister can't be without me, I can't be without her either.
I'm afraid no longer. Being next to you, I'm willing to become the darkness to your light; And if that light were to swallow me... No, even if I was to be devoured, that would be fine too.

Where there's light, there's darkness. Wherever you are, I'll be near. This isn't fate but the law of this world... It's nothing, it's just something that I've wanted to say for a long time, if I ever found someone who I truly liked.
The silence after a battle is divine. Take your time and rest.
The darkness is with us.
Commander, I'm always here, awaiting for your summons...
Even if you manage to defeat me, you'll never escape the infinite darkness.
Letters are what connect humans. Hold them dear.
Did you just have an out-of-body experience?|I'll always protect my little sisters.|I have to say, this warmth, I don't dislike it.
You'll experience an eternity of restlessness if you die with incomplete missions.
Rewards are but worldly possessions. It makes no difference to me whether you collect them or not.

Erebus, my name, sounds surreal?
My predecessor was a ship which carried explorers to the North Pole and never returned... like a journey into the abyss.
Please pay more attention to my sisters!
Shadows chase after light, and light embraces the shadows. I've heard of foolish lovers who erase each other, but who can judge another's love? Isn't that right, Commander?
Want a taste of death?
Allow me to channel forth the whispers of the dead...
... ... uh... ... I'm sorry, it seems like I was having an out-of-body experience.
Commander, is that you? I'm Erebus. I followed your voice and have come from afar.
The purer the darkness, the calmer my mind.
Allow me to harvest the souls of our enemies.
I am still but a shadow. The only difference is, I've found a small, small thing to strive for.
Those who embrace the shadows will find only an illusory happiness... But for me, that much is sufficient.
Commander, would you like some sweets to replenish your energy?
Commander, there's no need to be reserved. I still have a lot of chocolate. |nil|Commander, just being able to watch you like this, and give you chocolate, is enough to make me happy.
I'm here, as always.
Were you able to touch happiness, Commander?
Those who embrace the shadows will find only an illusory happiness... But for me, that much is sufficient.
No matter how long the night, the dawn will come again...
Terror really wanted to go to the Halloween party with me, but... I...
"I am the witch of Hallow's Eve, here to guide your soul into the ever darkness"... that's what the concept of the Halloween witch is about, right?

Forming a contract with a witch will allow one of your wishes to come true. In return, your souls will forever be bound, unable to separate from one another... Commander, tell me... what is your wish?
I can hear the wailing of souls passing through the ever darkness... You want to know what they're saying...?
The Halloween event has started. But, I'm supposed to wait here until it's my time to come out.

Legend has it that real monsters come out on Hallow's Eve... Shall we search for them? |These festivities have diluted the ever darkness with noise and light... but it's not such a bad thing. |T-trick or treat...? Oh, right, you can have this special bewitched candy.
Commander, have you been possessed by a perverted ghost?
"I am the witch of Hallow's Eve, here to guide your soul into the ever darkness"... that's what the concept of the Halloween witch is about, right?
Lemme at 'em!
I was just looking for you, Commander! Let's do something fun.
Tribal-class destroyer – Eskimo.
The commission team's back? I'll go get them!
You're no fun at all, Commander...
My outfit? It's different because I served in some pretty frigid waters back in the day~ Heheh, it's pretty cool though, huh? What do you think?
Y-you saw my room? Well, when I get too bored, I end up taking apart the furniture... and then I don't know how to put it back together. But why, though?
Too noisy? Hmm, well, I'm just trying to get your attention. Everyone's really... Oh no, could I be bothering someone? I'd better go apologize!
I've been good? Eheheh, that's all thanks to you, Commander. Since you've been giving me so much attention, I don't need to bother anyone else. I can just wait until you have time for me. Riiight?
voiceline.oath: ....... Why am I not saying anything? Oh, did you want me to? I was trying to keep quiet so I wouldn't bother you, Commander. Buuut, if you insist... I'll flirt with you all I want~! Ehehe, remember, you were the one who asked~!

voiceline.line: I finished all the work you left here for me.
It's not time to retreat yet!
Commander, you kept me waiting so long I got mad and took apart your chair! Wh-what if I can't put it back together...?
voiceline.oath: Patience, patience... Ah, Commander, it's about time! I've missed you!

voiceline.line: Oh noes... Sorry, Commander...
Commander, I got the mail for you~ Heh heh. It was nothing. Don't mention it.

Commander, let's build an igloo when it snows! I'm pretty good at those!|Yippeeee! Yahoooo! Ah, Commander, errr~ Why am I horsing around like this? Just bored, I guess.|All right, target acquired: daydreaming Commander. Eskimo head smasher! GO!
voiceline.oath: Commander, wanna go adventuring in the Northern Parliament's tundras when we get some time off? Don't worry about it, you'll be fine with me at your side!|Commander, is there anything I can help you with? All right, I'll just wait in this corner here and not bother you...|Target acquired: Commander's lap! Commencing tactical dive bombing!

voiceline.line: A new mission? All right, a new mission!
Commander, here's all the mission rewards. Take a look at them already!

I'm Tribal-class Destroyer Eskimo! During the war, I mostly served in the Home Fleet. I defeated Z19 at the Battle of Narvik, but then Z2 struck back at me... After that, I did good work in the Mediterranean.
All right, I promise, Commander. I'll work hard, and be good. I won't cause any more trouble! Just keep on giving me more attention! Eheheh!
All right! Have a taste of this!
What's up, Commander? Time I get to work? All right, time I get to work!
voiceline.oath: Commander, I've actually been waiting for you to call me! So, what do you need done?

voiceline.line: Oh? Something on my coat?
Eskimo, Tribal-class Destroyer, is here! Oi, this fleet's not half bad! Nice to meet you, Commander!
Yes! Now I'm feeling it!
Yes! I'm the MVP! Now cheer for me!
Oh woe, nobody wants to play with me because they're all too busy~ ...Oh, hello little Manjuu... Heheh, maybe I'll play a prank on you instead!
Woohoo, Commander's back! All right, let's go swim or something!
Commander, shhhh!

Ehehe... You have no choice but to play with me! ...Commander! Oh, it's nothing!|Miss Belfast and Dunkerque? You brought ice cream for me? Thanks a ton! Ah, got any for the Manjuu? Huh, what do you mean you're not falling for that?|Commander, you done with work yet? You're not? Aw, I wanted to play...
Oww! All right, please stop bonking me... I just got bored because you wouldn't play with me... Okay, okay, I won't bully the Manjuu anymore...
Oh woe, nobody wants to play with me because they're all too busy~ ...Oh, hello little Manjuu... Heheh, maybe I'll play a prank on you instead!
All carrier-based aircraft in position, anti-air defense preparations complete. All forces, full speed ahead!
What would you like to know, Commander? I'll answer to the best of my abilities.
Essex-class aircraft carrier – Essex, Hull Number CV-9.
The birth of the Essex-class would not have been possible without the hard work of the logistics teams. I have to show my gratitude to everyone.
I wonder how Enterprise puts up with someone like you...
I witnessed the end of the era of battleships with my own eyes. Will carriers share the same fate some day...?
Jealousy? No, that's not the case. Enterprise is a true hero worthy of all the respect she gets. However, compared to her dazzling aura, I'm just...
I won't lose to anyone, not even to Enterprise. But how do I get everyone to acknowledge this? Commander, if you were in my shoes, what would you do?
I might never be able to become a hero like Enterprise... But when I'm with you, I feel like I can do so much more than just that...
The fleet has safely returned. Commander, I've prepared the battle report for you. Time is of the essence, so please review it right away.
There you are. I've already finished preparing everything. Commander, give us your orders!
I won't let it end like this... I swear it!
There's new mail for you. Here you go.

Everyone knows that the Essex class is strong, but still, Enterprise is all they ever talk about... *sigh*... |There are a lot of ships in my class. As the nameship, I have to do everything I can to be a good role model... |Musashi and Yamato? They were... yes, formidable rivals worthy of respect. I hope I can meet them again one day.
There are still unfinished missions? Mind letting me handle things this time...?
The mission rewards have arrived. Are you sure you don't need me to go get it?
I am the nameship of the Essex-class carriers. Although I was built with great expectations, I was always overshadowed by Enterprise's success. If only I could have been deployed sooner...

Once you've experienced the happiness of two people supporting each other, it becomes something you can't live without. Thank you, Commander. I no longer have to walk alone in my quest to prove my worth. I promise to always be at your side, wherever you go.
Spread your wings and soar!
Time to sortie?! Just leave it to me! Oh... you just wanted to chat...?
Wh-what is this?! I, I...
So this is where Enterprise is... A-ahem! I am Essex, one of the Union's state-of-the-art aircraft carriers. Commander, you can expect great things from me! I swear that I won't disappoint you!
When will I be able to get jets...
Enterprise, did you see my feat?
Even being able to see a small portion of these 2448 miles has been an eye-opening experience. Though I wasn't able to ride from sea to shining sea, what an unforgettable journey it's been!
I'm not trying to go anywhere in particular; I just want to enjoy the scenery along the way. Commander, let's go experience the thrills of the road together.
Did you want to rest for a bit? That's fine, take your time.
Commander, have you put on your helmet yet? We're about to get going!

Enterprise advised me to pursue some hobbies that aren't related to combat... This should count as one of those. |Combat is something that must be done at full throttle. It'd be dangerous to do that while riding though... |You followed us the entire way? What an incredible eagle!
Phew... Hm? This bottle of water is for me? Thank you very much! I'll help myself then.
Commander, could you be... too tired to know what you're doing? I knew we should have stopped to rest...
I'm not trying to go anywhere in particular; I just want to enjoy the scenery along the way. Commander, let's go experience the thrills of the road together.

By the way, Commander, there's nobody else around, right? *sigh*... Thank god... If Enterprise or Shangri-La saw me like this, I'd die of— ...Eh?! Shangri-La?! Wait, no, stop! Please, no photossssss!!
Commander?! Ah, um, no, I'm not drunk! ...I, uh, just had a bit too much to drink... just a bit! Please don't tell the others though!
Wh-why is a commission fleet coming back now of all times? ...Commander, I'll— *hic*...! I don't think I should go like this after all...

The princess and the prince snuggled up to one another and sailed into the sea of stars above the castle~ ...Did you hear that?! Ah, forget it... Just write it off as me being drunk... and let me cling to you already! Hehe, ehehehe...
Everyone was greeting me one after another at the party, and there I was basking in their attention, so... I started toasting everyone, and... Ugh! Why am I so childish...?!
Sorry, Commander, but could you give me a hand? ...Ugh, why is the hem of this dress so long...

I even got Mr. Eagle here all decked out~ Looks pretty sharp and spiffy, right?|Hey... Commander, um... Yeah, so... have you ever seen Enterprise get drunk before? Ah, no, I was just asking out of curiosity... I mean, it's almost impossible to picture that happening to her, right?|Commander, don't worry about me. Don't you think you should head back to the venue before the others start to wonder where you went?
We've got new work? Um, I really hope my head clears up soon... Ugh, everything's still spinning...
Did the mission rewards already get here? Th-thank god...
One more cup... Just one more! Commander, here! Cheers! Thanks for everything you're always doing for us. This is... a token of gratitude from me... *hic*!
Commander! Jeez, what are you doing... Did you also have a bit too much to drink? What am I going to do...
Commander?! Ah, um, no, I'm not drunk! ...I, uh, just had a bit too much to drink... just a bit! Please don't tell the others though!
Attack squadron, ready to scramble! Just like an eagle soaring through the sky!
One, don't be blinded by the pursuit of perfection; two, seek harmony in the spacing between ink and paper... Hmm... Does this look right? No, there's something off still... Man, this is hard...

The Dragon Empery's attire and tools of calligraphy... I see, just wearing this outfit makes me feel more scholarly and artistic! I shall put forth my best effort to prepare for the port's Spring Festival!
The longer the transport distance, the greater the logistical difficulty. I must extend my gratitude to everyone who works so hard to maintain our supply lines.
Happy Lunar New Year! I'll be waiting for your orders!

This is a special technique to maneuver the flight deck... Fantastic! At this rate, I'll catch up to Enterprise in no time!|What are those girls doing... Eh? Is that how big brushes normally are?!|Intrepid, see that star right there? That's Mercury, but the Dragon Empery used to call it the "Chenxing." Heheh~
Am I supposed to add another stroke here? I understand. Um... right... here?
Am I supposed to add another stroke here? ...Eek?! Commander?!

The Dragon Empery's attire and tools of calligraphy... I see, just wearing this outfit makes me feel more scholarly and artistic! I shall put forth my best effort to prepare for the port's Spring Festival!
How'd you like that! Commander, Enterprise, see that?
I swear upon the honour of the Crown that I, Exeter, shall fulfill my duties and my destiny!
I'm counting on you for the inspection, Commander.
York-class heavy cruiser - Exeter, Hull Number 68!
The girls who went out on a commissions have returned. It is my duty to at least receive them properly, Commander.
Please do not bring shame upon the royal family.
Commander, don't be blinded by romance.
Living with the royal family means I cannot decide my own fate. It is great to have met someone as excellent as you, Commander.
Commander... actually... I was thinking, if you were a normal person and not a commander, would I come to like you as well...?
What's important is the present. If there is such a thing as fate in this world... I believe we were destined to meet.
Exeter has returned to port! I will prepare the after-action reports right away!
May honour protect us!
As a royal elite, I shall not disappoint you, Commander!
Curses... I shall have my revenge!
Mail for you, Commander. I hope it is good news!

I can feel the honour of being in the Royal Navy no matter where I am!|York is talking nonsense yet again...|My skirt gets wet all the time... Should I change into something a bit more suitable for battle?
Please make sure to fulfill your duties - in the name of the Crown!
Honours and rewards have been delivered.

Exeter, York-class heavy cruiser number two, reporting in! I took part in chasing down Admiral Graf Spee. No matter how numerous the opposition, I shall never back down when fighting for the honour of the Royal Navy!
For better for worse, for richer for poorer, in sickness and in health, to love and to cherish, till death us do part, according to God's holy ordinance; and there to I give thee my troth, Commander.
For the glory of the royal family!
Even though I'm a member of the royal family... you still treat me as an equal, Commander. I'm touched.
...!! T-this kind of... please, don't... As a member of the royal family... if someone saw us like this...
Exeter, York-class heavy cruiser number two, reporting in! In the name of the Royal Navy, I swear that I shall contribute to your cause, Commander!
For the honour of the royal family, I shall not be humiliated!
I am the successor of a long line of royals, and shall embrace my destiny with countless victories to come!
York took a look at the roses earlier and went off about them being "Bloody Roses" or something. Just more of the usual, huh?
Cheers, Commander. I'm glad that the party is a success. Well, I should take care as well to not sully the honour of the royal family with my actions.
The lovely smell of roses makes for a wonderful atmosphere. Please relax for a bit, Commander.
Sorry for the wait. Well then, let us head to the party. I, on behalf of the Royal Navy, would like to give you a warm welcome.

I'd really like for my sister to stay silent around the others so as to not sully the glory and dignity of the Royal family, but...|The parties Her Highness hosts are always fantastic. Everything about them is just so perfect!|I can't stop worrying about the off chance that I'll spill some wine on this dress...
Eek! I almost got some wine on the dress!
Aah! Don't surprise me like that! I ended up spilling some wine on my dress...
Cheers, Commander. I'm glad that the party is a success. Well, I should take care as well to not sully the honour of the royal family with my actions.
Commander, what do you think? I look more mature than I did before... right?
Good work, Commander. Would you like to take a little break?
As a royal elite... Ah, um... Welcome back, Commander.

Even though I said I had become more mature, there are things that can't be changed overnight... |nil|My clothes won't hang down into the water now, but don't you think this is a bit too revealing...?
Eek! Commander... P-please pay attention to the time and place...
Commander, what do you think? I look more mature than I did before... right?
Battle time! Eyes ahead, everyone!
What's up, Commander? Missed me, have you? Hah, alright, have a seat and I'll get you some tea.
Fiji-class light cruiser – Fiji.
Commission team's come back. Don't forget to go greet them! Or else you'll hurt their feelings.
You need something, Commander? I'm kind of unavailable, really.
All combat, all makeup, all the time, that's me!
Oh yeah, anyone in the fleet you fancy? Want me to assist you with them? Come on now, don't get your knickers in a twist~ I can keep a secret~
Oh, hey, Commander. I was just about to head out. Getting dressed right now, you see~ Ah, don't be shy, you can look~ Later, I wanna get a look at you, too~

Slow to catch on, aren't you~ Right, question! Could you believe there's a girl out there who's always talking about love with you, isn't afraid to undress before your eyes, and has grown quite fond of you?
What're you staring into space for? Is that your way of saying "I want a hug"?
It's like back in Crete... Sod that! I'm not letting that happen again!
Had supper yet, Commander? If not, I could cook you something up.
Commander, take everyone with you and retreat! Leg it...!
Mail's here, Commander. I'll leave it here, so check it when you've got the time.

Jamaica? Ah, yeah, proper oddball, that girl~ But it's all good as long as she's having fun, innit?|What's up? You look knackered... Fancy a nap in my lap, maybe?|Hey, take a gander at this, Commander! Fancy what I've done with my hair? How about my nails?
You can't just go leaving missions unfinished, Commander~ Let's go finish them. Remember: I'm right with you.
Mission rewards, hooray~! Done your job proper, I'd say, Commander.

Name's Fiji, I'm pretty much the nameship of my class. Things I fancy include... What? Spare the details? Then, if you're asking about my service record, all I did was fight in the Battle of Crete. Pretty rubbish record, innit... ahaha. Just gonna have to live with it and work on it, you know?
Hey, is my makeup looking decent? What about my outfit? Reckon I look as pretty as it gets? ...Good~ I've never dressed for this occasion before, so I want to look as good as possible~
I'm in the groove!
Feeling lonely, Commander? I'm always here for you.
If you wanna know my three sizes, can't you just ask? I mean, if you do, I'll tell you~ Hahaha~♪
Heeey! Fiji's here~! Are you the Commander? Hmmm...? Pfft... Hahaha! You don't look too shabby! Nice seeing you, Com~man~der~♪
I'll do my part on the battlefield all proper like, so you can rest easy, Commander.
Just doing my part on the battlefield, really!
Hehe, what do you think about my outfit, Commander? Pretty nice, isn't it? ...You don't know where you should be looking? Haha, you cheeky little...
Did I keep you waiting, Commander? Ahaha... A girl's gotta take her time before stepping out onto the streets, remember? Come on, take my hand, and let's get going! Hehe~
Welcome back! Hmm, how are we gonna celebrate your hard work? Ahaha, what do you think about a candle-lit dinner?
Commander, we've talked about the importance of being punctual before, right...? As compensation for making me wait, we're gonna shop 'til we drop! Ahaha!

The joy of going shopping is knowing that every time you go out, there's something new to be discovered. Commander, I'll let you handle the "spoils" of our shopping trip. |You've gotta try on some new clothes during your downtime every now and then! Hehe, want me to help you pick out some clothes, Commander? |Girls need to do a lot of preparation before going out, you know? Hair, makeup, clothes, you name it... So, if you want to see us at our cutest, you've got to be patient~
When we're on a date, it's only natural to lock arms and lean against you like this~ Ahaha, are you embarrassed, Commander?
Did I keep you waiting, Commander? Ahaha... A girl's gotta take her time before stepping out onto the streets, remember? Come on, take my hand, and let's get going! Hehe~
There's only a handful of enemies. Let's beat them with sheer numbers!
I can move quickly, so I probably won't get hit. Well... even if I do, I'll... probably be fine.
Fletcher-class destroyer - Fletcher, Hull Number DD-445!
A commission has been completed! Let's see what's next... Wow, there's so many! Almost one for each of my little sisters...
S-sorry, I have to go check up on my little sisters...
Whew... I need to take care of my sisters so much that I don't really have time to think about anything else...
Commander, can you help me a little bit? Thank you... You're stronger than me, after all... I'm a little jealous.
Out of all of us in the fleet... Who do you personally like the most, Commander? ... Counting me as well?
Hm? You want to help me take care of my little sisters? There's a lot of them, and I could use the help, but... Are you really, REALLY sure? In that case... Can I think about it for a bit first...?
I'm back~ Wait, huh? Did another one of my little sisters join the fleet while I was gone?
Can you recognize me today, Commander? My sisters don't look like this!
*Sob*... You bullies... My sisters will hurt you if they find out about this!
Who has been writing so many letters to you, Commander? I'm a bit curious...

Last time someone tried to impersonate me, one of my little sisters told them to name EVERY Fletcher-class ship. That's when they gave up the act~|When I look at my little sisters, it makes me wonder... Maybe our parents were rabbits?|... Commander? Really... Are you thinking about one of my sisters again?
I can go on missions with my sisters again. Give the order whenever you're ready, Commander!
I wonder if all my sisters can get an equal share of the rewards...
I'm Fletcher, the big sister of all 175 Fletcher-class destroyers! As the main force of the destroyer fleet, I participated in all the important naval battles~
A family, huh? ... I already have so many sisters, but you're special to me after all, Commander!
My sisters, give me strength...!
My little sisters would probably like doing this too. Huh? Your hand would get sore from it?
C-Commander, please stop! What if my sisters see this...
Hm? You think we've met before? I get it... You know, I have over 100 sisters who look like me! I'll be following your orders from now on, Commander.
Now I can take better care of my sisters!
I've heard that if you collect fifteen stars then one of your wishes will come true~!
Victory can only be attained with the will to conquer! Foch, heading out!
Commander, mind playing along with one of my whims? Stay still while I put this apple on top of your head... Wait, I'm just messing with you~ You don't have to run away♪
Suffren-class Heavy Cruiser—Foch
We've gotten a new shipment of supplies. Are you going to check on them yourself?
voiceline.oath: Our supplies have arrived. Don't worry, I've already checked up on them myself!

voiceline.line: If you're truly planning on leading everyone to victory, you'll need to put more heart into it, instead of being this tepid.
The knife-thrower who never misses, Foch! ...at least, I wish I were that skilled.
Don't tense up like that, Commander, relax! ...And quietly accept your fate... Letting yourself be taken care of is for your own benefit, you know~♪
Commander... did you stay up all night again? It doesn't look like you've been eating properly, either... This is unacceptable... I guess it's time for me to look after you!

Commander, you did remember our dinner date tonight, right? You know, back when I told you I would look after you? I mean, I won't force you, but... you're not cruel enough to refuse me, right? Ahaha...
voiceline.oath: Commander, did you have any plans for the evening? Ahaha, it's nothing special. I was just thinking that I'd like to eat dinner with you tonight. The reason is... Well, isn't wanting to spend more time with you reason enough? Haha~♪

voiceline.line: My hair's ruined now! ...Just kidding, I'm not angry at all~♪
Oh Commander, welcome back! Now now, don't focus so hard on your work that you forget to eat! I can even whip something up for you if you'd like!
voiceline.oath: Do you need some help with the reports? Leave them to me, and go take a break. I'll find you if I need anything from you.

voiceline.line: There's nothing to fear! I'm still here!
Commander, I've placed your work for the day on your desk. ...Don't look at me like that, I'm here for you too!
voiceline.oath: Commander, the documents for you to take care of today are on your desk. ...No need to look so down, Commander~ I'll help you with anything!

voiceline.line: Even with these enhancements, I'm still not strong enough...
voiceline.oath: What a miscalculation... I'm sorry, Commander...

voiceline.line: You've got some mail... Would you like me to cut the seal off for you, Commander?

It's important to keep your guard up while doing work. To put it as a strategist would, "This is not peace. It is an armistice for a long while."|Maintaining a regular schedule is the key to efficiency, so no pulling all-nighters, okay?|How to get along with Algérie...? Well, for starters, she'll open up to you naturally if you have a cat with you.
voiceline.extra: Algérie invited you to a cat café? Haha, then let's go there after we're done with work.|I'll help you out so you don't need to work extra hours.|If someone wants to disturb the peace that we've built... Well, it's our job to stop them, isn't it?

voiceline.line: An indicator of a commander's capability is being able to take care of things in a timely manner. You should try a bit harder in that regard.
Commander, I've collected the mission rewards for you. I guess you owe me one now~
voiceline.oath: I've gone and collected the mission rewards for you. This favor's on the house~♪

voiceline.line: I'm the third ship of the Suffren class, Foch. My design was different enough from those of my sister ships that I've even been called a member of the Foch class. As for what I'm good at... Nothing in particular, because I'm good at just about everything!
Well, of course I'm nervous, but... when I look at your face, all of my worries just melt away~ Ahaha, well, I guess I'll reveal my true feelings to you... "Sure, I'd love to♪"
You're not getting away! Main guns, fire!
Is there something you're concerned about? Aha, well, if you don't mind opening up to me, an extra head can't hurt.
voiceline.oath: If you want me to pamper you, just say the word~♪

voiceline.line: Eek?! ...Jeez, I didn't know you were into this kind of thing.
voiceline.oath: Commander? What might you be thinking about?

voiceline.line: Hey there~ So you're the Commander? I'm Foch, from the Suffren class. I consider myself quite an experienced strategist, so I hope you'll find me useful~ Ahaha, anyway, it's a pleasure to meet you~
Feel free to make me even stronger~♪
How was that! The true power of the Foch class! Ahaha, feel free to depend on me as much as you'd like~♪
voiceline.oath: Yep~ Feel free to keep relying on me~♪

voiceline.line: Of course I like to dress up in pretty clothes. Did you never see me as a lady? Hmph. ...Ahaha, don't be down on yourself, I was just toying with you♪
Yo, Commander, did I keep you waiting? Sorry 'bout that. You know how it goes, sometimes it's really hard for a girl to pick out the right thing to wear. Anyway, let's get going~♪
You've kept me waiting for a while, Commander! Just kidding~ good work on your mission♪ Do you want to take a short break somewhere before we head out?
You're letting me plan out our date? ...What a mistake on my part... I was hoping you would escort me to your heart's content...

In exchange for having made you wait, I promise that today will be a super fun day, Commander~♪|I had Algérie tell me what stores to go to, so I'll lead the way! I guarantee that you'll have a good time as well!|I've got one for self-defense. Hehe, sorry about that! Guess you won't have a chance to look cool in front of me.
Hmm... What do you think about the scenery over here?
Aren't... you in too much of a rush...?
Yo, Commander, did I keep you waiting? Sorry 'bout that. You know how it goes, sometimes it's really hard for a girl to pick out the right thing to wear. Anyway, let's get going~♪
What are you planning on presenting me with as a reward?
You want me to be the flagship? That's too much work...
Come on, hurry up. It's exhausting to hold this pose!
Fletcher-class destroyer - Foote, Hull Number DD-511!
I love not having to go out on commissions... but it's annoying that I have to report back to you every time one of the girls come back...
*Tsk* Could you just stop bothering me?
Who would ever be interested in me... You're a real pain in the neck...
You're being surprisingly quiet, Commander. I'll keep you company for a while longer then.
Isn't it annoying to have to call me over all the time? I think I'll just move into your room instead...
I feel like... I want to help you with stuff... Even though that's a bother... I'm so annoyed...
Being your secretary is so bothersome... I'm getting tired... Zzz...
It's so annoying having to greet you every day...
*Tsk* Too much trouble. I don't wanna play with these guys anymore.
Mail's here. There, I told you.
*Tsk* Is the food ready yet?|Commander... this doesn't go... oh forget it. It's too much trouble to fix.|Thatcher and Spence are always fighting. Can't they just quiet down?
Can't you just finish these missions already?
*Sigh* Do I really need to remind you every time you need to collect your rewards?
I'm Foote, one of the Fletcher-class Little Beavers. You think you have family issues? Try remembering the names of your thirty older sisters and nearly a hundred younger sisters...
This is annoying... But if it's for your sake then I have no choice...
*Sigh* This is so annoying...
C-Commander... Could you stop touching me for a while?! I'm getting sore...
Being shy... is also pretty annoying...
*Tsk* Greetings... I hate greetings. But I suppose it's a formality... Hello, Commander. I'm Foote...
I'm stronger now...? How annoying...
You don't need to praise me for something this easy.
All right! I'll surely be able to win in this condition!
Hooh! Haah! Oh, great timing, Commander! Let's practice some swordplay!
L'Adroit-class destroyer – Forbin.
Commission complete! Next time, let me go as well. I swear I'll do better!
If the knights found out that I had sworn fealty to a person like you... I don't know if they'd blame me or pity me...
There are all kinds of amazing people gathered here. There's just so much to learn... Ahh, I've gotta work even harder!

Why do I spend so much time training with the sword? Well, it's true that I don't plan on using it during sorties, but being able to keep myself sharp and in shape is surely an asset on the battlefield!

Commander, did you know that I've always had two dreams? The first was to become a worthy knight like my seniors. The second was to find someone worthy of swearing fealty to... I never expected that my second dream would come true first~
Commander, please believe in me. The only time someone will be able to hurt you is when the last shell has been spent and I am no longer able to lift my sword.
Welcome back, Commander. Don't worry, nothing happened when you were gone.
This fight's not decided yet!
Hooo! Haah! Oh, Commander, let's do our warm-up exercises together!
I swear... to take this defeat to heart!
A letter...? Wonder if someone's challenging you to a duel...

Iron Blood or Royal Navy, I don't care who it is, I just want to learn more about them! |When will I become as strong and cool as the knights? |I don't want my life to end without having accomplished anything... so this time, I'll give it my all!
Commander, I believe that it is your duty to complete these missions.
Don't let these mission rewards go to waste, Commander.

I'm Forbin, a L'Adroit-class destroyer from Iris Libre. For various reasons, I was stuck in port for two years, but after returning to service, I was able to get a lot done and make up for some of that lost time on the battlefield.
This I do swear - my sword shall be your shield, Commander. In return, please promise to guide me down the correct path... I don't ever want to experience that ever again...!
How's this?
Commander, did you know that there are many different kinds of swords? For example, there are rapiers, sabres, flamberges, and so on...
I didn't mean to draw my sword upon someone unarmed... I am very sorry.
I am Forbin, a squire from Iris Libre. I may not match up to the stature of my seniors, but please offer me your guidance!
My odds of victory have improved!
I'm one step closer to becoming a knight!
I hope... I don't get these clothes dirty...
Would you like some fresh fruit, Commander?
It's good to be able to stop and smell the roses every now and then. Um, Commander, would you be able to accompany me a bit longer?
If only this peace could last forever... Nay, as long as we work together, this won't merely be a dream. Right, Commander? Hehe~

We don't usually get such fresh apples and tomatoes, so how about a mixed juice? It's good for your health! |No more fighting, no more wars... That's the peace that we're fighting to reclaim. |Commander, I heard that aromatherapy can help you recover from fatigue. Why don't you try growing some flowers?
I know the other knights went out of their way to pick this dress for me... but I'm not used to all the frills and whatnot...
Eep! N-next time, I won't hold back!
It's good to be able to stop and smell the roses every now and then. Um, Commander, would you be able to accompany me a bit longer?
I joined the Kendo Club. I'm thinking it'll be good to hone my swordsmanship skills against my peers and build up my streng— Huh? What do you mean it's a different kind of sword!?
Even though I'm an Iris Libre squire, I'm currently working hard to have a rich student life. Um... maybe this is a bit too laid back?
Commander, what do you say we have lunch together, if you have time?

Commander, have you seen Le Mars? If she's slacking off again, I don't know how she thinks she's going to pass the exam...|Study is much like swordsmanship, you have to take it seriously if you want to improve.|Commander, your collar's all twisted. Hold still, I'll get it— There, that's better!
In study as in war, we must always remember the mission. Isn't that right, Commander?
Aie! The wind! ...Erm!? Commander!? You, you didn't see anything, did you?
S- such filthy, immoral behavior... You can't do this, Commander!
Even though I'm an Iris Libre squire, I'm currently working hard to have a rich student life. Um... maybe this is a bit too laid back?
Where's Le Mars? Good grief, she ran out without finishing her homework again. I'm going to have to go give her an earful... Come on, Commander, come with me as well... H-huh?
Good evening, Commander. I am currently enjoying the party in the company of my friends, as my duties as a squire entail. Um... I've had a bit too much to drink? R-really...?
The commission team has returned. I'll go greet them now... Huh, I'm not allowed to go right now?
Woahhh... H-huh? Commander, when did you... Oh, I looked like I was about to fall over? I see...
Would you like some too, Commander? It's really good, you know? Ehe, ehehe...
A letter... Um, what kind of letter was it...

Oh, some water to help me clear my head? Thank you very much! I'm so sorry for making you see that! |Miss Algérie looks like she knows how to hold her liquor... But everyone in the Vichya Dominion seems like that... except Le Mars, I guess...|Commander, are you enjoying the party? I won't permit you to order me to have fun while you continue to bury your head in work, all right...?
Commander, how about another cup?
Ugh... How could this happen to a knight...
Good evening, Commander. I am currently enjoying the party in the company of my friends, as my duties as a squire entail. Um... I've had a bit too much to drink? R-really...?
You'll have to try harder than that to stop an Iris knight!
In order to protect everything that we cherish!
My hard work has finally paid off! Commander, thank you for your guidance all this time! I'll return the favor by bringing you even more honors in battle!

Looks like there are plenty of folks in the Sakura Empire who understand the way of the sword. I'd love to meet with them sometime. |I still fall short compared to the other knights, but I'm in no rush. Slowly but surely, I know I'll be able to catch up to them. |Hnn! Haah! Oh... I started swinging my sword again without even realizing it...
Commander, are you trying to see what's different about me?
Hey, there's nothing different about that place... Are you doing this on purpose?!
My hard work has finally paid off! Commander, thank you for your guidance all this time! I'll return the favor by bringing you even more honors in battle!
I'll say it again. I won't let Commander's efforts go to waste!
Ladies of the Royal Navy have many virtues, but mercy to enemies is not one of them!
?! ... Ah, I was just doing a bit of tidying up. Please, come right in.
voiceline.oath: The posters on the walls are all my favourite rock stars. I don't usually let anyone see them. You're a special exception, Commander~

voiceline.line: Illustrious-class aircraft carrier – Formidable.
Commander, the commission is complete. Shall we go to the harbour and greet the team?
voiceline.oath: Ding dong ding dong ♪, incoming message from Formidable: Commission complete. Repeat. Commission complete.

voiceline.line: I'm afraid I've contracted a disease that gives me a dreadful headache when you're nearby. Would you mind going someplace else?
Commander, is there something required of me? If you have a moment, why not join me for a cup of tea?

My big sisters Illustrious and Victorious, like so many other ships you've gathered here, vouch for what a great commander you are. Now come, let this cake be a symbol of our new friendship. Take a bite, won't you?

Truthfully, even though I'm a Lady of the Royal Navy, I sometimes want to have a bit of fun too. A side of me that I can't normally show except to people close to me like Illustrious... Doesn't that make you want to get closer with me?

Commander, good day to you ♪ Shall we share another cake today? The maids have prepared a dreadfully sweet treat for us! Hmm...? I decided to let my hair down a bit more for you, Commander. Hehehe, I wonder if you'll find me just as captivating a Formidable as I was before?
Hmm~♪ Hmm~♪ C-Commander! I am p-pleased that you have returned!
voiceline.oath: Commander, I'm going to catch a few winks on the sofa here. Wake me up if anyone comes calling.

voiceline.line: You are all to redouble your efforts!
Commander, you're uncharacteristically punctual today.
voiceline.oath: You're late, Commander. I've been waiting for ages!

voiceline.line: Why you miserab- Ahem! You are truly worthy adversaries, but next time victory will be mine!
Commander, I'm leaving the mail right here. Please don't forget to review it.
voiceline.oath: Commander, the mail is here. Would you mind getting it yourself?

voiceline.line: Commander, if you're not making any progress on your work, why not take a break? I've prepared tea and crumpets.|No harm in taking a rest while the Commander's dist– Heavens! Victorious! G-good day. Do you have some business with the Commander?|On the day of my launch, hmm... What a shame... though I didn't do it on purpose... Well! All water under the bridge now, isn't it?
voiceline.oath: That Ajax, she saw straight through me right away... And yet, I think we get along rather well. I've learned a lot from her.|Haah... I'm back. Those tea parties have some delicious snacks, sure, but they're so dreadfully uptight about bearing and deportment.... Hehehe, Commander, would you mind helping me with my shoes?|Commander, which of my sisters is more your type? The sweet and gentle Illustrious, or the passionate Victorious?

voiceline.line: Commander, please don't forget to review the mission list I prepared for you.
voiceline.oath: Big Brother, I finished organizing your mission list ♪ ... Hehe, is that your type, Commander?

voiceline.line: Commander, please don't forget to review the list of mission rewards.
voiceline.oath: Commander, do you want your mission rewards or do you want me? You have to choose! ... Hehe, just kidding~

voiceline.line: I am Formidable, third ship of the Illustrious class. I operated in the Mediterranean for a time, crossing swords with a certain Veneto. Thereafter, I found myself all across the Seven Seas. While my service record is not particularly impressive, I feel I made a small contribution to the war effort.

I, Formidable, hereby dedicate my life to the love of my Commander, through good times and bad, rich times and poor... This is quite long, so I'll omit the rest~ Now then, Commander, it's your turn. I know it's a long vow but you are not to skip a single word ♪
The curtain falls.
I must admit, Tirpitz is quite the hard nut to crack.
voiceline.oath: Commander, don't you think Veneto looks a bit dim, cool as she might be?

voiceline.line: Commander, is this the appropriate way for one to behave?
voiceline.oath: Commander, should I be angry? Positively inconsolable?

voiceline.line: Good day, Commander. I am Formidable, third ship of the Illustrious class. Pleased to make your acquaintance.
Formidable shall not disappoint.
What a magnificent victory! Let us press the advantage.
Are you done warming up, Commander? Right then, into the water with you♪
A Lady of the Royal Navy exudes elegance even when wearing her swimsuit. Huh...? Y-you're not seeing it? Really... that's weird...
I was simply waiting here for you. Don't think too much on it, Commander.

Don't you find the atmosphere rather dreary...? What if we put on some rock... Er, something a little more stimulating?|Hmm, that would be Hood. Even in a swimsuit she's the picture of nobility. Of course, that's nothing I'm not incapable of...|Don't fret, Warspite. I wouldn't be able to swim without the Commander's help either!
Huh? Illustrious?! Grr... You tricked me, Commander. Now you're in for it!
Okay, I see how it is. The salty sea air has gotten you all frisky, Commander. Hehehe...
A Lady of the Royal Navy exudes elegance even when wearing her swimsuit. Huh...? Y-you're not seeing it? Really... that's weird...
What do you think of my outfit? I was only able to wear it with the help of Dido and the others...
voiceline.oath: Would you please describe how gorgeous my dress is? Yes, and kindly don't stop until I feel I've heard enough ♪

voiceline.line: Yes, this will do wonderfully! Thank you, ladies. Phew... Getting dressed is so dreadfully time-consuming... Ahem! How silly of me. I must not whine in the presence of others.
Commander, are you still busy? I appreciate the work you've put in to prepare tonight's party.
voiceline.oath: Commander, are you still busy? I'm afraid I can't be of much assistance, but I can give you a wink to keep your spirits up. Best of luck ♪

voiceline.line: Ahem. I see you are as punctual as ever. Thank you for attending the party.
voiceline.oath: Hehe~ I've waited for you all this time, Commander. I would've preferred it if you'd come a little sooner, though. Hehehe~

voiceline.line: Sirius made a few errors at the beginning, but thanks to Dido, they were finally able to get me changed safely...|Commander, your collar is all crooked. Here, come have a look in the mirror.|I wonder what kind of dresses my sisters will wear... Ahem. I have no doubt that they will be splendrous indeed.
voiceline.oath: Has my hair gotten entangled? How?! I'm always going to such lengths to prevent it! What if Sirius is trying to– Oh, it's all right now? Th-thank you.|Come here for a moment, Commander! Let's straighten out your uniform... There! Perfect!|Commander, I'm sure my sisters all have splendrous dresses, but do not forget about your dear Formidable.

voiceline.line: You'd like a dance? Very well, Formidable shall be your partner.
voiceline.oath: You'd like a dance? Certainly. Allow me to be your first, and hopefully, your favourite partner.

voiceline.line: Commander?! Th-the maids are still here!
voiceline.oath: Commander! I urge you to pat my head at once! Or else I will ignore you for the rest of the party!

voiceline.line: Yes, this will do wonderfully! Thank you, ladies. Phew... Getting dressed is so dreadfully time-consuming... Ahem! How silly of me. I must not whine in the presence of others.
Bear witness to the Wrath of GOD!
Commander... I worked hard but... am I still not good?
F-class destroyer ー Fortune, Hull Number H70!
Commander... Umm, it looks like the commission team is back...
Fortune is tearing us apart...
...I-I'm nervous... Ugh...
I-I have also wanted to talk to the Commander... Umm...
Commander, I... I've always watched you-- Am I troubling you... with such a sudden remark?
I finally have the courage to can say this... The goddess of fortune has allowed us to meet each other...
Umm... Good work! ><
Just as guided by fortune...
Commander, d-did I make you wait? ...I-I'm... *cries*
Has God... given up on me?
A new mail... Is it the will of God...?
Fortune... means 'wealth' in a way...|If I'm with my sister, I can go anywhere...|Saskatchewan... a new name bestowed by God...
T-there are... still unfinished missions...
Praise be to God for blessing us with such wealth! *gets on knees and prays*
Royal Navy's F-class destroyer, Fortune. ...I was transferred to the navy of the Maple Monarchy along with my younger sister Foxhound. ...As an F-class destroyer, I have worked hard...

To think that we've gotten to this point together, Commander... W-well, fortune has guided us... but it's also due to you guiding my hand as well. I will continue to believe in my own fortune... Thank you very much...
Uh, umm, you are all fated to be destroyed >.< !
I... I'm causing trouble... aren't I...?
Uh... mmm.... *sobs*
Greetings, Commander. I-I'm Fortune... As an F-class destroyer, I'll do my best...
Fate... is coming closer...
Victory... is a blessing from God...
Am I just imagining things... or... can you see through this dress...?
The weather is so nice and sunny, I'm sure whatever I do today will be a success. May everyone else have a good day today as well... Awauh! Little manjuu, are you okay? I can't believe I tripped...
Y-you made it back without a hitch... This place is so big, I feel like I'm going to get lost...
The manjuus came bearing some food. Please help yourself, if you'd like...

This garden is pretty big! Foxhound seems to be having a good time running around, too.|Being able to come to a special place like this... could be considered fortuitous in its own way...|Ooh, I think Echo would enjoy those sweets. I should ask the manjuus to set some aside for her...!
Did you need something from me...?
Eek! The drink went all over my dress! You can see through it now...
The weather is so nice and sunny, I'm sure whatever I do today will be a success. May everyone else have a good day today as well... Awauh! Little Manjuu, are you okay? I can't believe I tripped...
Is this really going to help you, Commander? Ah? I doubt our destiny will change with this... Just kidding, Commander! Anything for you.
Fortune...means 'wealth' in a way. It would be great if I can enrich our fleet.|Ugh... Commander, please let me rest...|Oh God, is such a trial truly necessary...
Can I really be of use with this... Eeeeh?! N-No way! I can't get off the rails! Ugh... Was that... a joke?
Let me see your tricks!
Big sis said that... I seem to be bigger than her... What is she talking about?
F-class destroyer ー Foxhound, Hull Number H69!
*Sniff* I think... I think the girls have finished their commissions~!
Commander, you have a weird smell!
*Sniff* ... ... Commander, you smell kind of nice for once...
Commander, there's something on your face... *lick* Eh? ....Why did I lick you? Well, my body moved on its own and....
Commander! Ehehe... It feels so good to be held by you... *Whew*... zzz...
I like the Commander... *rubs* I really like the Commander... *Rubs* I like Commander the most *RUBS*...
Awooo.... *woof*! Did you hear that?
Commander~ Hehe, what interesting things shall we do today?
Whew! I'm glad we were quick to escape!
You've got new mail!
I don't want to go to such a cold place...|Commander, if you want to treat me like an animal, I'm a dog, not a fox, alright? Actually, I'm just a girl!|Throw a bone at me and I'll bite you instead!
There are still unfinished missions!
Remember to claim your rewards!
I'm Foxhound, the F-class destroyer of the Royal Navy. Compared to my sisters, I'm the first to get special enlarged designs, so I'm a little better developed! Hehe...
Commander, what's that? It doesn't look like a collar... Oh? It's for me? I want it, I want it! I'll treasure whatever you give me forever, Commander!
I'm not a fox, but a doggy!
Mmm... stop touching me... Your hand is so hot...
HEY! What are you thinking? Stop touching me like that!
Foxhound answering your call, Commander! Eh? Why don't I have nine tails? Because I'm not actually a fox... Anyways, I'll be in your care from now on!
Hmm... *sniffs* My reconnaissance capabilities are improved!
Hehehe, can the most cunning fox beat an old hound like me?
Commander, listen to my bell~ It sounds super sweet!
I've grown so much that I can't jump like I used to... Commander, are you surprised by my post-retrofit appearance? *Giggle*
Commander~! *Giggle*... *A-ahem*! Don't forget to give it your all today...

It feels like you haven't patted me much since I got retrofitted... Commander, pat my head, c'mon~!|By the way, Commander, some call me "Qu'Appelle"~ What do you think? Does it sound cool?|It might be hard to quit my old habits, in spite of my growth... *Sniff sniff*

I'm the Royal Navy F-class destroyer, Foxhound! I started in the Home Fleet, got reassigned to the Mediterranean Fleet, then the Eastern Fleet, then lastly I was sent abroad! We F-class and E-class destroyers were the first to receive an enlarged design, so we have some pretty good growth! *Giggle*~
Commander, I can help! Show me~ Hmm... change this here... and maybe here...
I've grown so much that I can't jump like I used to... Commander, are you surprised by my post-retrofit appearance? *Giggle*
Let us play a requiem! Resound, o hatred, fear, and despair—!
My child, if you desire absolute victory, you must maintain absolute rationality.
Battleship – Friedrich der Große.
We must properly praise the girls who have returned from their commissions.
I wonder if you’re properly repenting yet...?
I never should have come to exist in this world... But since I am here, there must be a higher principle behind it...
Things such as courage have no value on the battlefield. Only those who approach Laplace’s demon shall approach victory.
I do prefer this to fighting. Here, my child. Open your mouth~ ahhn~
Please dote upon me more. Yes, more... more...!
Welcome back. Whether it’s good news or bad news, I’d be glad to hear you out.
I shall persevere yet.
The performers can wait no longer! Hurry, let us raise the curtains of battle!
Please await our next performance...
Shall I sing the contents of this message for you?

All those emotions that you’ve bottled up through all those conflicts... Listen to my concert, and let it all out. |My appearance upon the battlefield gives off an air of cruelty? Hehe... I’ll take that as a compliment. |Even should you anger me, I’ll forgive you as long as you properly apologize.
My child, no matter what it is that you desire, I can help you obtain it.
Now then, what kind of reward would you like?
I am Friedrich der Große, prototype H-class battleship of the Iron Blood Navy. Come, my child... If you are unable to sleep, allow me to play you a lullaby.
From now on, I shall share everything with you - your sorrow, your joy, your pain, and your pleasure. My child, I will always, always welcome you into my embrace...
The 9th Symphony... in unison!
If you are ever afraid, come hide behind my back.
Just like a baby... how sweet.
You've returned to my side once more, my child. Tell me, what is it that you wish for? Wealth? Glory? Or perhaps eternal youth?
I feel as if I can bring out even more beautiful music.
What a pity. The encore had only just begun...
Turn into nothingness, along with the symphony of the void!
Mankind's ambitions know no limits. Indeed, just like these riggings of mine... they strive to expand, to become more powerful... to command more cannons, and to seize greater glory...
I see, so this is a "kimono" from the Sakura Empire. Exquisitely crafted, comfortable to the touch, and elegantly designed... How to wear it? ...My child, what are you talking about?
Shouldn't I be the one doing this to you instead, my child?
Welcome back. I've prepared a beverage for you. Come warm yourself as I read the report to you.
Aren't you cold standing over there? Come to me, my child.

Sakura Empire's classical "gagaku" is said to elicit profound and mysterious emotions... I'm quite curious about it. |The release of repressed emotions can be both medicine and poison. The effect depends on how well you can control your state of being. |My child, could you help me with putting on this outfit?
The sensation of this embrace is the warmth of human contact... Do you understand, my child?
Do you like it here, my child? Hehehe~
I see, so this is a "kimono" from the Sakura Empire. Exquisitely crafted, comfortable to the touch, and elegantly designed... How to wear it? ...My child, what are you talking about?
What I hope to get from you? Hehe... For me, the most important thing in the world... what I hope for the most - is you, my child.
Ahh, the dreamlike beauty of this variation... let us write down this movement so that it may continue forever, my sweet child.
My child, I will accept you unconditionally, and lay low anything that attempts to stand in your way. Come, allow me to pamper you more. Yes, more... more... give me more...
You can leave the report for later. Let me see your face, my child... Hehe, there's nothing amiss... Is there anything you'd like to talk to me about, my child?
What would you like to listen to today, my child?

Is there something giving you difficulty? Please tell me about it. I shall take care of everything for you.|Save your cold rationality for your enemies on the battlefield. Before me, however, you need not hold back. Just indulge yourself to your heart's desire, my child.|If you are tired, lie down right here... I will bring you pleasant dreams... Good, sweet child... I'll always be watching over you.
Do you wish to touch your beloved more intimately? Come closer, my dear child.
What a selfish child... But no matter, I shall accept you unconditionally.
Ahh, the dreamlike beauty of this variation... let us write down this movement so that it may continue forever, my sweet child.
Sis', it's not a drill this time!
Commander, if there's something you want to find out, I'd be glad to investigate with you~
An Shan-class destroyer No.2 - Fu Shun (102)
All the stuff that I wanted? I brought them back with me. Uhh, this doesn't count as smuggling, right?
Yikes! Chang Chun, Tai Yuan, Commander is coming!
What's up, Commander? No no, I didn't break anything... Eh, all the windows in the academy broke? Uh... I think it's the doing of one of those evil spirits... probably?
*slaps rocket* Commander, this bad boy will take you all the way over the sky. Isn't it a beaut? I made it myself. Coming down? Don't worry about that, Chang Chun and I will be there to catch you.

Commander, good morning! Ehh, what was I doing last night? Why are you asking me? I didn't do anything bad! Your office looks like a werewolf got loose in it? No, no, it wasn't me. It was probably, uh, a werewolf!
My secret base lies right over yonder. Pretty, huh? This is my most important secret! Eh? I just happened to tell you on a whim! I definitely wasn't planning anything.
Well then, let's continue investigating the mysteries of the port~ Chang Chun, you coming?
Tsk... Looks like I'll have to show them my final form!
Today's Fu Shun is all fired up and ready to go!
Ugh... Sis'... where are you?
It doesn't look important, so I won't bother Commander.

If I give this to Tai Yuan, I'm sure she will be very happy! |A ghost ship that emerges from the frozen waters of the Arctic at midnight? Certainly, I've heard this rumor before. |Although Chang Chun is my younger sister, she has taught me a lot!
Go forth and complete those quests!
Quest complete! There's a black smoke coming from the port? Are you sure, Commander? I don't see anything~

The name's Fu Shun, second ship of the An Shan-class destroyers and one of the first-generation "Four Unbreakables." Rezkiy? That was my birth name. Even though I accomplished a lot, I unfortunately never experienced actual combat. The closest I got was that one time, when An Shan and I almost opened fire! Anyway, please let me fight to my heart's content on the battlefield!
Commander, so we're a family now... Well then, can I borrow the keys to the warehouse? I'm begging you! Just for one day!
Let the flames of heaven dazzle all in our way!
Woah! Um... I just happened to be, uh, scratching my back! Yeah, I'm definitely not hiding anything!
Woah! Commander, are you frisking me? I'm not hiding anything!
Destroyer Fu Shun, reporting in! Uhh... where's Chang Chun? She was clearly behind me just a minute ago...
My power level can keep going up!
Hehe~ this isn't even my final form!
Good weather, even better mood~ Let’s go!
Hehe, are you that lonely Commander?~
Special type I Fubuki Destroyer Class— Fubuki
Hey~ The Commission fleet is back, stop sleeping!
I thought the Commander would understand me...
What’s in my hands? I think it’s called “Gohei” or something like that. It looks so pretty when swung back and forth, so I thought to grab it with me~
Not sure how my sisters are faring… Although, since they are my sisters, I’m sure they’re prospering wherever they are!
What type of girls do you like, Commander? Hmm? I’m just curious. Ha~ perhaps you’ve misunderstood me?
I was implying something before? Regardless, no matter what type of girls you like, as long as you will like me in the future, then that’ll be just fine~ Hehehe.
First, you do this, then this....?! C-Commander, welcome back~ Hahaha, I wasn’t up to anything!
Looks like this isn’t the time to joke around...
Commander, how are ya feeling today?~
That hurts so much… Commander, let’s run away!
Here’s some mail~ ah… So it’s for the Commander...

The weather today sure is beautiful, don’t you think, Commander? |Listen up Inazuma, even if the Commander is a total loser, but I am totally (probably) reliable! |Even if the Commander praises 100 times, that still won’t be too much... hmm, or perhaps 100 praises will be a bit tiresome to listen to.
Commander, there are so many uncleared missions—— ahhh~!!! Were you being lazy again?
Commander, the mission rewards are here~ With me being here, perhaps there are more rewards now? Hehe.

Yoohoo~ I am the destroyer who recently made the world tremble, call me Fubuki! Sorry, I’m not trying to be complacent, in fact, I was in many battles… although none of them are worth writing home about… I will continue to do better!
Even though I said that the Commander would like me “in the future”, but it seems that “future” has become unexpectedly sooner~ Were you a bit shy when I asked you?~ Hehehe.
Hmph, taste the power of the Special type Destroyers!
Help with work? O right… Looking at the Commander being so idle, I almost forgot about work~
Wow! You scared me to death!
Yoohoo~ yours truly Fubuki class has arrived, so you’re the Commander? I'm looking forward to your guidance~
Wow?! Excellent condition!
Uh-huh, I’m good right~
Let's finish this so I can make it to school!
I didn't oversleep! I was just doing stuff I like and ended up losing track of time...
Oh no! I-I'm gonna be late for school! Y-you need to speed up too, doggy! *Pant*... *pant*... Why'd none of my sisters wake me up before they left?!
Fight or run away to fight another day!

nil|The Fencing Club, the Reading Society, the Economics Association, the UFO Research Organization... Dang it, I wanna join them all!|Belfast's going to hang out with Edinburgh after school... Maaan, I wish my sisters would come see me, too...
Commander, you got any more work you need help with? I've gotta go walk the doggy in 15 minutes!
Oh no! I-I'm gonna be late for school! Y-you need to speed up too, doggy! *Pant*... *pant*... Why'd none of my sisters wake me up before they left?!
It's so hot... Let's mop up the enemies quickly so we can go home...
I-I feel my consciousness... flapping away...

"C-come on in! We've got special offers for you!" ... W-wait, is this really what a "sexy mascot" would wear? It feels pretty different from what I was expecting... And boy, is it stuffy in this thing...
N-nicely done!
C-come on in! ... Oops, I mean, welcome back, Commander!

I did promise Akashi I'd be the mascot... but it kind of feels like she tricked me...|Could you help me pick these up, Commander? Wearing this makes them... mmrgh... impossible to reach, you see...|What? The forecast warned about high temperatures? ... That's no biggie, I've already gotten used to it being really hot...
C-Commander, don't touch me... I'm going to lose my balance...
Wh-what? What the heck are you doing, Commander?

"C-come on in! We've got special offers for you!" ... W-wait, is this really what a "sexy mascot" would wear? It feels pretty different from what I was expecting... And boy, is it stuffy in this thing...
Heheh! Wearing this costume... doesn't impact my performance at aaaall!
Maybe my tuba... is useful in battle after all...?
Didn't think an instrument could be so fun! I have to teach others about the joy of music!
Check it out, Commander! What do you think? ... No, not my dress! I'm talking about the tuba! Want me to play a tune for you~?
Tooooot! The commission team has come back, Commander! ... No surprise: this tuba's reminding potential is totally next-level♪
If I ever perform on stage, will you be there to listen, Commander? Actually, it'd be even better if you could be my maestro~
Did my pre-sortie motivational song serve you well, Commander?
My marching solo will wake you up, Commander!

Let me play you a motivational song, Commander! Tooooot! ... Wh-what? That's annoying...? Sorry!|You should learn an instrument so we can play a song together, Commander!|Oh yeah, what do you think about my dress, Commander? Does it suit me? I absolutely adore it, it's all fluffy and stuff!
Do you wanna hear a song, Commander? You got it! Manjuus, you all ready to go?
Whuah! ... Don't expect me to feel bad if I smack you with this thing, Commander!
Check it out, Commander! What do you think? ... No, not my dress! I'm talking about the tuba! Want me to play a tune for you~?
Okay, let's play a victory march to celebrate... H-hey! Wait for meeee!
The whole world's going to feel the tremors from my debut! I'm Fubuki, the Special-type idol!
nil|nil|nil
If my sisters saw me working hard... would they say something like "Fubuki's such a hard-working role model?" Ehe... ehehe... Ah, I'm so so sorry, I just spaced out for a bit!
Welcome, welcome! Oh, Commander! I've actually started working here part-time, but I'm still learning— Wooah?! Phew... Th-that was a close one...
This Oxy-cola goes to this table, and uhh, a few more minutes on this pizza, and umm... Ahhh! This would be so much easier with a clone of me here!
Commander... Err, I mean, welcome! What would you like to order~?

Sigh... When will I be able to handle this job as easily as Miss Belfast does?|You want to chat with me? Sure, as soon as I get finished with all this stuff... Ughh...|Did someone call for me? Excuse me, I'll be right there! Oh hey, it's Akatsuki and the others!
Commander, this bell is just for decoration...
Eep?! It's hard to keep my balance, so stop with that already!
Welcome, welcome! Oh, Commander! I've actually started working here part-time, but I'm still learning— Wooah?! Phew... Th-that was a close one...
Huh? We're about to start our attack?
D-Did I mess up again...?
Mutsuki-class Destroyer number seven – Fumizuki.
Commander, how are the commissions going... Huh? You've already collected the rewards?
Everyone warned me... not to get close to the commander...
Commander, I'm returning the candy that Mutsuki swiped from your office... Huh? You gave it to her?
Commander, please consort with me... Huh? That doesn't mean let's be friends?
Recently, my sisters have started whispering things when they see us together... Huh? They're saying I must have a rough time working so hard? But, I'm pretty relaxed...
Commander, please consort with me... Huh? That doesn't mean "I like you" either?
Huh? Didn't you guys leave just a minute ago...?
Huh? Am I in a pickle?
Huh? Commander, when'd you get here?
Huh? Already retreating?
Commander, there's a love letter for you... Huh? It's not real? Just one of Minazuki's pranks?

Mutsuki is always munching on candy every day, won't she get cavities...? |Uzuki lost something again, so I'd like to help her find it... Huh? It's already been found? |If... If you need my help with anything, I'll give it my best shot...
Commander, um... about those rewards... Huh? I have to finish the mission first?
Commander, about the mission... Huh? You're already done?
I'm Fumizuki, of the Mutsuki class. Like my sisters, I specialize in long-range transport and escort missions. Um, I'm Fumizuki, of the... Huh? Oh wait, I already said that...
Huh? Why is everyone here? Didn't you all already know that Commander and I get along the best... so why?
Huh? It's my turn?
Huh? Are you going to help me brush my hair?
Huh? Is this... a symbol of friendship?
Commander? Oh, right... I'm looking for the commander here... Huh? You're the one?
I feel about the same-ish...
Huh? Already over?
Huh...? Where am I...? What time is it...?
Zzzzz... Zzzz... Huh? Commander? When'd you get back?
Commander, good afternoon... Huh? It's not...?
Minazuki... keep it down... |Lemme sleep... a bit longer... Zzzzz... |If I bring a pillow with me, I'll be able to sleep on the go... Huh? I can't?
Commander's leg... so comfy...
Ughh... can't fall asleep...
Huh...? Where am I...? What time is it...?
I have to do well in this battle!
I'm a bit bored...
First ship of the Furutaka-class heavy cruisers, Furutaka.
Commander! Ah... that hurts! I'm fine... I just wanted to tell you that commissions have been completed.
(Furutaka ignores you as she passes by)
Kako acts like that because she holds herself as the role model for heavy cruisers, but she's actually very gentle.
Commander~ Oww! ...Ehehe... Thanks, I almost fell again. I'm trying to pay more attention so that I don't trip as much, but I was so happy that I let my guard down.
Yeah... Being able to live with Kako and seeing my sisters from the Mikawa and 6th Fleet was always a dream of mine. Commander, you've made my dream come true. That's why... I'll do anything for you!
If you're okay with this... then I don't mind, Commander. But... I've never been in a relationship before, so I don't know what it's like. Can you teach me?
Commander, I tripped again... Do you have a band-aid somewhere?
Commander, please be more careful when you open the door...
We lost... Too bad...
Sorry, Commander... I tripped and fell while getting the mail and now it's all wrinkled...

Commander, Kako doesn't really hate you, so don't take it too personally.|Um... because I'm not very smart, maybe Kako should take my place at meetings instead...|Ouch...! Ahh, I'm fine... I just nodded off and bumped my head.
A new mission, huh? Seems like it might be a bit tricky.
I bumped into something while getting the rewards... Oww...

I'm the Furutaka-class heavy... Err, just call me Furutaka! I may not look it, but I participated in the First Battle of the Solomon Sea! I also helped my sister Aoba out a lot! In the end though, I rushed too far ahead and didn't make it back myself... Ehehe...
I've never felt like this in my life before... But as long as I'm with you, I'll be able to feel this way more and more, right? I can't wait!
All right, here I come!
What's up?
I never thought you'd take an interest in me, Commander... Frankly, I'm a bit happy~
Ah! Sorry for bumping into you... Huh? You're the Commander?! F-Furutaka, first ship of the Furutaka class, reporting for duty! Can you please forget what just happened? Ehehe...
Thanks, Commander!
Eh? I'm the MVP?
I'm much stronger than before!
What's wrong, Commander? Why are you staring at me like that? My body? Yes, some things seem to have gotten bigger... Want to take a look?
