It sure is nice weather, isn't it? I feel like taking a nap. Oh? The girls are back from commission~!
Commander, did you have a good rest? Me? Umm... I slept very well.
I might have changed, but I'm still the same Furutaka, Commander!|Ouch! Ah... I just bumped my head again...|My hair feels a bit messy... maybe Kako can teach me how to tie it up.
Commander~! Want to take a nap together?
Since you like me so much... I suppose it's okay~
What's wrong, Commander? Why are you staring at me like that? My body? Yes, some things seem to have gotten bigger... Want to take a look?
Milord, those who stand in your way shall find no mercy by my hand.
Milord, shall we have tea together?
First ship of the Fusou-class battleships, Fusou.
Milord, your girls have returned from commission. Shall we welcome them back together?
Milord, might you be the reincarnation of a god of calamity?
Milord, are you interested in the eight million gods of the Sakura Empire? It is fine if you aren't... I shall offer them your share of prayers.
Milord, you seem exhausted as of late. Too much work is bad for your health. Please come with me, and allow me to purify you of your fatigue.
Kagura? That is a dance dedicated to the gods... Ah, why don't I perform just for you, milord? I would be embarrassed if others found out, so please keep it a secret between us, all right?

Milord, did you know that although a miko of the Sakura Empire must dedicate herself to the gods, she is not actually forbidden from romance? As a matter of fact, she is encouraged to find a husband in order to pass down traditions. Milord, what do you think about me?
You've worked hard, Milord. Why don't you come to me and take a rest?
Gods, please protect us…!
Welcome back, Milord. Would you like to have your fortune told?
Oh no... has my ammunition storage been cursed again?
You have a new letter, milord. Please give it a look.

I believe that we can change our misfortunes, as long as we work hard and pray...|I'll be happy as long as Yamashiro has a chance to grow up.|My main gun specializes in heavy firepower, but is enough to shake my entire body! It can cause me some trouble, every now and then...
Milord, a new mission is available. Please take a look.
Milord, not claiming your rewards is a bad habit.

I am the Sakura Empire's first super-dreadnought, Fusou. In order to cleanse ourselves of the misfortune we were born with, my sister and I offer prayers to the gods every day. We will do whatever it takes to prevent another tragedy like Leyte Gulf from befalling us again. Milord, we would be most grateful should you lend us your aid.

May our love last as long as the Great Pines in Takasago and the eternal Tsubaki. May we bring glory to our family, our name heard across the land. These words are said with my highest respect. With this, Milord, you and I become one. Though I may be inexperienced, let us care for and love each other for the rest of eternity.
Grant them peace and purity!
Milord, please rest your head here and allow me to clean your ears.
M-milord... this is improper...

It is an honor to meet you. Milord, you must be the commander. I, Fusou, have been waiting a long time for you. Surely, this is also the guidance of the gods. From now on, please allow me to serve youI
Now, I can be of greater service to Milord.
May thy lost souls return home in peace.
Commander, would you like to accompany me for a stroll?
Yamashiro's always saying that I would look better in more trendy clothing, so she went out of her way to pick this out for me. Jeez, that girl... Oh, Commander? Does this outfit... suit me?
Commander, your luck has been very good recently. Surely, it must be because the gods are also happy.

Commander, if it begins to snow, please take cover under my umbrella~ |Perhaps I should return the favor and make something for Yamashiro to wear... Commander, what kind of outfit do you think is best? |The happiness we can enjoy right now is surely a blessing from the gods... No, it's because of your hard work, Commander.
Commander, please accept this present. It was prepared specially for you.
Commander? Even though it's a holiday, this kind of thing is...!
Yamashiro's always saying that I would look better in more trendy clothing, so she went out of her way to pick this out for me. Jeez, that girl... Oh, Commander? Does this outfit... suit me?
Milord, I feel my bad luck melting away when I am with you... Thank you very much.
Being able to wait for my beloved in this homely attire... Milord, my life has changed so much since meeting you. *giggles*
Milord, have you grown tired of me...?
"Dating" is such an incredible word. Milord, even though I've become accustomed to living with you, my heart skips a beat every time I hear that word...

Milord, I have a small request... but please promise not to laugh. I've always been jealous of the way Akashi jumps into your arms like a spoiled child, but... it's a bit embarrassing to ask... so, um...
Milord, being able to spend every day with you like this makes it almost feel like we're a married couple... Ah, um, please forget I said anything!
Milord, the last battle must have been very strenuous, yes? In that case, please come lie down and rest for a while.
Milord, I just made some snacks. Would you like to try some?
Milord, I have brought the mail.

Ah... oh no, look at the time... Milord, time passes so quickly when I'm with you. I forgot that I was supposed to take Yamashiro shopping... |Milord, do you know how to play Hanafuda cards? Ah, was it Souryuu who taught you how to play? Um, in that case... shall we play together? |Milord, the freshly washed blankets sure smell nice. Surely, they'll also be very comfortable to sleep on.
Milord, I believe it's time to complete your missions. I shall accompany you.
You'd like to take me out? Are you sure? Um, in that case... there are a lot of places I'd like to go with you. Ehehe~
M-Milord...
Being able to wait for my beloved in this homely attire... Milord, my life has changed so much since meeting you. *giggle*
Milord, I treasure the time I spend with you above all else.
I actually got a lot of things that I want to try, such as be as lively as Yamashiro... hmm, is that too much?
Milord! Thank you~ Not just for the retrofit, but for many many things. Hehe, it was the greatest of fortune for me and Yamashiro to meet you.
Milord, please wait, I’ve made really delicious treats meant especially for you.
Milord, welcome back~ The profits show that today good things will happen~
Oh... no, we can’t blame all failures on our curse.

Becoming more… lively? Hehe, that must be merrited by Milord. |I feel… that bad luck still exists, but being together with you, Milord, has washed away all my bad luck. |Yamashiro always tells me to look for my own happiness, and I think I’ve finally found it~
Milord, can I also join you on this new mission?
Milord, do you like the dignified Fusou or the livelier Fusou?
Milord! Thank you~ Not just for the retrofit, but for many many things. Hehe, it was the greatest of fortune for me and Yamashiro to meet you.
Is this the only way to cleanse their impurities? Then so be it.
Conflict throws all souls into chaos... I pray the gods may guide them to peace...
I am battleship Fusou. I have come to bring peace to this world's tormented souls. Commander, do you seek blessings... or redemption?
You command a whole fleet of shipgirls who'll fight with all their might for you, Commander... Please, do cherish them.
There is nothing more I can do for you at this point, Commander...
How may I be of use to you, Commander?
Are you... concerned about me, Commander? You have no reason to be. I pray to the gods each day so that they bestow us all with their blessings and protection.
I've seen far too many lost souls stricken with grief and remorse. Commander, when one day you look back upon your whole life, I want you to be able to smile, and say your life was a good one.

Before I met you and everyone else here, all I could do was pray. I had lost all motivation to sing hymns or even lead lost souls to the light. But now, seeing all your smiles, I feel I've... rediscovered my purpose in life.
You cannot let your duty come before sleep, lest it ultimately consume you, Commander. Please, care for your own well-being.
I have already offered so many prayers... but is it still not enough...?
Commander, I have been waiting for you.
This curse cannot be lifted... Then so be it.
You've received a letter, Commander. I urge you to read it at the earliest convenience.

Commander, do you ever wish you could return home? Do you have anyone in your heart who you are unable to let go of?|Until we have finished our respective duties... May we not pry excessively into each others' affairs.|I will keep praying to the gods, for as long as it takes, until the curse placed on Yamashiro and me can be permanently lifted.
A mission, you say? I shall pray for the fulfillment of your wishes, no matter how small.
A mission has been completed. The gods have heard our prayers.
The missteps and misfortunes of the past are now all but forgotten phantoms... Only by guiding these drifting souls towards the light can I accomplish my mission.
If this is what you desire... then I shall accept. I know not whether this ritual will ultimately bring us blessings or misfortune, but I will continue praying for your happiness, Commander.
Slumber eternally.
I pray for you, Commander, and hope that the gods are listening.
Commander...? Has something strange possessed you?
I am battleship Fusou. I have come to bring peace to this world's tormented souls. Commander, do you seek blessings... or redemption?
So many catastrophe-stricken souls still await their salvation.
May you slumber eternally and find solace, far from the turmoil of the sea...
Such disobedient kids~~ They must be punished~
Geez~ If you keep on looking at me like that, I'll be reporting you to the authorities~
Arethusa-class light cruiser – Galatea, Hull Number 71!
Commander~ *arms folded* let's head to the docks and greet the girls who went off for commissions
Do you understand? Even the red string of fate is not absolute. I no longer think about anything concerning you anymore, Commander~
It takes a long time for the bond to form after you tie the red string of fate. Do try hard, Commander~
I like you Commander, but it's important for all of us to be together. I'm troubled~
Commander, let me have your ear... *kiss*. I like you~ ... Yep. Such a thing would have to be done in reality, right~
The red string of fate was what made me grow from a seed, and you, Commander, were the one who made me bloom~ You're so great~ *kiss*
Aaaah cease your attacks! I'm on your side!
I'm going to do this and that again today. Please take care of it~
Hmph! ...I curse you to be destroyed by my allies!
Mail time~ I wonder what reward I'll get for bringing it to you~?

Commander, I'm wearing new clothes today! --Hmm? I didn't say I'm heading out!|Commander, are you free? How about taking a walk together? I want to link our arms and be seen by the other girls|Hmm? Did you not hear that? ...There's no helping it. Lie down over here and let me check your ears
Yes, let's see what today's missions are about~
I'm gonna take your share of the rewards too, Commander.
I am Galatea, the second ship of the Arethusa class. I may not look like it, but in my service in the Mediterranean, I achieved some results~ You'll regret it if you underestimate me~
With this, the bond of fate has been formed~ There's still a long way ahead of us, so let's take care of each other, darling~
This has nothing to do with my fate~
Hehe~ Commander, you really like to engage in skinship, don't you? Well, just this once, I'm allowing you to continue a bit more~
Ah... You're daring, Commander --Well then, do you want to hear my wishes?
I am Galatea, the 2nd of the Arethusa class~ Do you believe in fate, Commander? It is fate that I meet with you~
This too is fate~
You cannot escape from me! Be good, and accept~ your~ punishment~
Show me your mettle!!

Know this, comrade. Even if I am battered and bruised, muddied by defeat, I will rise each time to reclaim the glory of mankind! Yes, that is the революция I desire, the only heaven that exists for me!
Gangut-class battleship – Gangut.
Hopefully our comrades will return bearing good news, unlike that bitter Ice Cruise. Come on, let's go welcome them back.
There is no future for those who mistake recklessness with courage, comrade.
I am Battleship Gangut, also known as Oktyabrskaya Revolyutsiya. However, my name is less important the what I've achieved. Don't dwell too much on it and just call me what you want.
I hope you don't take this the wrong way, comrade, but this fight is not just for all of us. It's also yours. Never settle with the status quo, and always seek to keep improving.

Ahahahaha! Well done, comrade! No matter how strong the enemies we may face, we now join each other courageously, prepared to give everything in pursuit of greater challenges! What could be more revolutionary than that?
Let's get to the point! Comrade, I was struck by your brilliance, and thus I fell for you! And now, I face the challenge of how to express my feelings for you! Here, comrade, accept my embrace!
O comrade, do you return bearing news of glorious victory? Ah, but it matters not, for the thing that matters most is that you fought with all your strength!
Ahahahaha! At last, this is a battlefield that I am meant for!
Comrade, what sort of strong enemy will we face today? I, Gangut, shall stand with you!
Comrade, consider this not a defeat, but rather a warning. A sign that we are losing sight of our revolutionary spirit.
You have a letter, comrade. It would be best to open it soon.

Comrade, how about a few drinks? ...What? Don't tell me you can't even handle a swig of vodka! |O comrade, aren't those stories about the exploits of sailors absolutely riveting? You see, that is the very spirit of revolution, humanity in all its glory! |An easy victory? What a stupid thing to say, comrade! How are you supposed to draw out your full power if you have nothing worthwhile to fight? Send me to a more dangerous battle next time!
voiceline.oath: Comrade~ have a bit more to drink~ That Marat can't keep up with me~ C'mon, keep me company until dawn.|nil|No strong enemies around? I feel your frustration, comrade... Well then, come at me. Let's make life worth living!

voiceline.line: Missions exist for the sake of preserving the order. We should complete them as soon as possible.
Excellently done! This reward will help pave the next step of our revolution!

I am Gangut, a dreadnought from the Northern Parliament. My equipment may be outdated, but don't underestimate me. Both humans and ships are alike in their quest for greater power, to protect what they otherwise would not be able to. That is революция, the revolution I strive for! From the Bering Sea to Leningrad, only by rising up in the face of humiliation was I able to become a beacon for the light of glory!
A pledge, huh? While this act is symbolic in nature, it is also undeniable proof of the bonds we've formed. A toast, comrade. Please continue to guide me in the future.
The revolution blesses you!
What about my rigging? Isn't fully utilizing everything at your disposal a wonderful and pragmatic ideal? Why would I consign myself to weakness for the sake of showmanship?
voiceline.oath: I see, I see, so you want to fully grasp the extent of my rigging. Very well! I have no objections, for your courage is commendable as well!

voiceline.line: What are you doing, comrade? Are you not aware of how we handle lawbreakers in the Northern Parliament?
voiceline.oath: You are forgiven, comrade! Such courage deserves to be rewarded! Come, put your hands all over me until you've had your fill!

voiceline.line: Hahaha! Not bad, comrade! Come, let us fight for the safety of these azure lanes! Fight until your last breath!
Comrades! You are also strong! Let our souls shine out brilliantly!
Rejoice, for we have earned this privilege! May this celebration become the bread that sustains us until our next victory!
Comrade, it is too soon to confess to your sins! Struggle for your freedom, and resist until you are about to break! That is the true path to growth!
You have my thanks for this exercise, comrade! I shall gladly carry out the important duty of judge, jury, and rehabilitator!
Commander, did you come to inspect the exercise? Hahaha! Feel free to ask away!

This outfit resembles something that you'd wear in the Eagle Union or Iron Blood, right? If I chose something more imposing, I'd scare off the kids! |"This is Gangut... Everything's fine over here, so stay on patrol."|Care for a drink, comrade? Come on, it's good stuff. I just happen to have a little bit of free time.
Having trouble with your missions? If you need to conduct an investigation, I'll help you out.
Are you curious about this medal? You can make as many replicas as you'd like!
You have my thanks for this exercise, comrade! I shall gladly carry out the important duty of judge, jury, and rehabilitator!
Have you read the article in this magazine, comrade? It's a great piece on how the working class is the reason for our ever-improving quality of life.
...Bwahaah! I've had all kinds of liquor, but nothing beats the stuff back home! Comrade, let's have a toast to the coming off-duty days!
My room is a total mess, you say? I suppose it is, yes. If I am to clean it, the question becomes, where do I start? The bottles? The magazines?
I take it you've come to share a drink with me, comrade? Ahahaha! What a coincidence, I just received this bottle of vodka from Avrora. Two shots, coming right up!

Comrade, you must always be ready to fight, even in times of peace. If you get complacent with the status quo, then who else will stand up in the event of a crisis?|The Sakura Empire is home to a few drinkers too, I've learned. Ise and Hyuuga, I think their names were? I'll invite them over the next time I'm enjoying some liquor!|Ugh! I've had enough of this! Get up, comrade! We'll round up some more comrades and go for some target practice!
Drink, comrade! Have another shot! You'll have to do much better than that to get me plastered!
You're drunk out of your mind, aren't you, comrade? No worries, you may use the couch! Go on, lie down!
...Bwahaah! I've had all kinds of liquor, but nothing beats the stuff back home! Comrade, let's have a toast to the coming off-duty days!
Targets identified. Commencing destruction.
Analyzing armaments... Condition: satisfactory. Gascogne is able to execute orders.
voiceline.oath: Analyzing armaments... Condition: satisfactory. Please inform me if you have any orders, Master.

voiceline.line: Battleship – Gascogne.
Attention: confirmation required for commission team's return.
voiceline.oath: Attention: confirmation required for commission team's return. Whew...

voiceline.line: Gascogne is a weapon and a warship. No other definitions are applicable.
Numerous requests for Gascogne's participation in activities without strategic significance received from members of the fleet. Requesting Master's assessment.
Phenomena known as "emotions" and "impulses" occur when interacting with members of the fleet. Requesting instructions for achieving satisfactory interaction.
"Emotions" generated from physical contact were analyzed and interpreted as "comfort" and "happiness." Concluding that this holds strategic significance if this is Master's intention.

Phenomena known as "worries" and "hopes" were observed and successfully classified during routine "emotion" cache analysis. System can be updated with permissions to access and act upon "emotions" if Master so wishes. Thank you, Master.
voiceline.oath: I've studied many emotions, worries, and hopes during my time in this fleet... Now I finally understand what you expect of me, Master. Thank you so, so much, Master...

voiceline.line: A glass of armagnac has been prepared.
voiceline.oath: Here is a glass of armagnac, if you'd like.

voiceline.line: Combat execution systems failing, requesting support.
Identification complete. Welcome back, Master.
voiceline.oath: Identification complete. Welcome back, Master!

voiceline.line: Failure is intolerable. Proposal: improve Gascogne's capabilities, or terminate system.
Attention: confirmation required for new mail.
voiceline.oath: Attention: confirmation required for new mail. A-ahem!

voiceline.line: "Raise the corners of your lips"... Unable to determine significance of said action.|Analysis complete. Master identified to be in a state of "slacking off." State evaluated as an impediment to productivity.|"Do whatever you want"... Analysis of strategic significance of order deemed impossible.|Discrepancy detected in the frequency of "smiles" recorded between members of the fleet, Gascogne's recollection, and expression identification database.
voiceline.oath: "Raise the corners of your lips"... Executing order. L-like this...? I may be doing it wrong...|Analysis complete. Master is in a state of "slacking off." Slacking off is not good.|"Do whatever you want"... Master, how am I meant to do "whatever"...?|Discrepancy detected between the information in my core and the members of the fleet. Why does everyone smile?

voiceline.line: Attention: confirmation required for incomplete missions.
voiceline.oath: Attention: confirmation required for incomplete missions. Master...?

voiceline.line: Attention: confirmation required for mission rewards.
voiceline.oath: Attention: confirmation required for mission rewards. Wow...!

voiceline.line: Gascogne, Richelieu-class battleship number 4, construction canceled due to wartime conditions. Purpose: engage in battle and destroy Master's enemies.

I now understand the emotion known as love. It is the throbbing of one's heart; the gratitude, longing, warmth, and light one feels for a person who does not seek recompense. This ring is the greatest gift I could ask for. I love you, Master.
Armaments activated. Engaging at maximum output.
Awaiting Master's orders.
voiceline.oath: I'm waiting for any order you may have, Master.

voiceline.line: Body temperature abnormality detected. Requesting thorough physical examination.
voiceline.oath: Body temperature abnormality detected. Master, what's happening to me...?

voiceline.line: Gascogne activation process complete. Directive assigned: secure liberty and victory for Master. Gascogne commencing active service.
Ability enhancements... Confirmed.
voiceline.oath: Ability enhancements confirmed... Nice!

voiceline.line: Report: destruction of targets confirmed. Combat mission complete.
Permission to inspect Gascogne granted.
voiceline.oath: Permission to inspect me...? R-right now...?

voiceline.line: Gascogne uniform change complete. Directive assigned: have fun on the beach with Master. Requesting detailed instructions for how to "have fun on the beach."
Gascogne has procured water and energizing edibles. Requesting confirmation of Master's need of aforementioned items.
voiceline.oath: I have prepared us some water and food... Would you like some, Master?

voiceline.line: Welcome back, Master. Gascogne is currently executing routine database definition update of the phrase "doing whatever."
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Master. I'm attempting to do "whatever I want"...

voiceline.line: Analyzed and compared wind speeds, temperature, and weather readings with mean values of previously recorded data. Assessment: navigation at sea is unaffected.|Contact with unharmful lifeform detected. Requesting instructions for satisfactory interaction.|"Let's go for a swim" – Instructions received. Need for swim ring detected. ...Assertion that swim ring is "unnecessary" to swim contradicts existing information in database.
voiceline.oath: The summer winds... Master, is this what "relaxation" feels like...?|This crab seems to be saying "hello, I'm a crab!" ...Does what I said work as a "joke"?|"Let's go for a swim" – I'll go get a swimg ring... Master, are you sure I "don't need one"?

voiceline.line: Unable to determine strategic purpose of Master's gaze.
voiceline.oath: Your gaze makes me feel odd, Master...

voiceline.line: Master, Gascogne has detected body temperature abnormality during self-diagnosis operation.
voiceline.oath: I'm sorry, Master... My body feels strangely warm...

voiceline.line: Gascogne uniform change complete. Directive assigned: have fun on the beach with Master. Requesting detailed instructions for how to "have fun on the beach."
voiceline.oath: Gascogne uniform change complete. Directive assigned: have fun on the beach with Master. Master, what things do you do to "have fun on the beach"...?

voiceline.line: Activating idol version protocol.
Information request: what is Master's favorite song?
voiceline.oath: Information request: Master, how do you like my singing?

voiceline.line: Gascogne module change process complete. New directive: sing for the world. Master's order is my will.
Gascogne proposes greeting commission team with a singing performance.
voiceline.oath: Would you mind if I headed to the harbor and sang a song for the commission team?

voiceline.line: Master evaluated as unbeneficial to the improvement of Gascogne's idol talents. Activating autonomous learning module. Please step away from Gascogne.
Gascogne has finished compiling idol data sets and has developed a new definition of an idol's capabilities. Assessment: an idol stops wars by singing. This holds strategic significance.
Emotional activity was detected during musical performance on stage. Requesting investigation into origin of this phenomenon.
Idol career evaluated as holding strategic significance. Requesting permission to proceed with idol work after today's operations have been completed.
Gascogne understands the meaning of being an idol and requests system alteration to uninhibit emotions. "I am counting on you, Master."
voiceline.oath: I completely understand what it means to be an idol now. It's about using my abilities to their fullest to sing brilliant, emotionally touching songs to the world. "Thank you," Master.

voiceline.line: Report: Gascogne has completed a lesson. Requesting reviewal of results.
voiceline.oath: Master, I just finished a lesson, and... was wondering if we could enjoy a little chat?

voiceline.line: Combat protocol engaged.
To do: vocals, dancing, band aesthetics. Requesting establishment of Gascogne's schedule for today, Master.
voiceline.oath: To do: vocals, dancing, and band aesthetics. Master, what I should I focus on today...?

voiceline.line: Gascogne requesting immediate termination of current protocol and enabling of default combat mode.
Requesting Master's response to received invitation of competition.
voiceline.oath: Master, I'd like your opinion on my participation in this contest...

voiceline.line: Concept in database detailed as "saving the world by singing" was analyzed and logically equated to Gascogne's ultimate goal.|"Emotion-packed singing can truly touch people's hearts"... Unable to infer meaning of said statement. Requesting assessment of Gascogne's singing ability.|Detecting factual conflict between promotional materials' claim of Gascogne being "inexpressive" and existence of installed emotion module.
voiceline.oath: Concept in memory detailed as "saving the world by singing" detected. Is such a thing possible, even for me, Master?|Emotion-packed singing was assessed to be effective at touching Master's heart... Master, won't you... listen to my song?|Promotional materials' claim of me being "inexpressive" are... likely not accurate. I am like everyone else; I want to sing with a bright smile.

voiceline.line: Requesting approval for Gascogne's undertaking of photoshoot, performance, or radio show.
voiceline.oath: Between a photoshoot, performance, or radio show, which should I focus on today, Master?

voiceline.line: Report: working as an idol has improved Gascogne's capabilities.
voiceline.oath: Report: working as an idol has improved my capabilities. Nice!

voiceline.line: Gascogne has received an alternate functionality mode and undergone minor rigging upgrades to allow for singing in combat. Numerous incorrect parametric values caused by current mode have been detected. Referring to Gascogne's default form for basic information is advised.
Being an idol means to have hope for tomorrow, an unfading smile, vigor, and passion. Now I see how much fun can be had beyond the battlefield... Thank you so much, Master.
Please listen to my song!
Gascogne is currently practicing.
voiceline.oath: I'm practicing at the moment... Do you need something, Master?

voiceline.line: Warning: unsolicited physical contact with idols is unnecessary. Likelihood of others interpreting said contact as sexual harassment is high.
voiceline.oath: Comet told me that people shouldn't readily get to touch idols... Master, does this qualify as sexual harassment?

voiceline.line: Gascogne module change process complete. New directive: sing for the world. Master's order is my will.
Action has no observable beneficial effect on idol abilities.
Assessing version protocol as effective. Gascogne will continue engaging in singing.
Who am I up against this time? I hope they're up to the task!
It's a good idea to look over your weapons and keep it all working. You want to help?
Battleship – Georgia.
Commission team's back. Hey, how about we serve them up some Oxy-cola? An officer has to reward her subordinates for a job well done, you know.
You are unworthy of my power...
Peaches are great. Tasty and nutritious. Want one, Commander?
Sorties and battles really get my blood pumping, but every once in a while it's nice to relax.
Why don't we go on a trip together next time? I think we'd have a lot of fun together.
So we head out from the Eagle Union... Drop in on the Royal Navy and Iris, then head over to the Dragon Empery... Oh! I was just planning our world tour. Don't tell me you can't go?
GEORGIA BEEAAAAM! ... Just playing around! Hahaha!
Yo. Good work out there. Nothing like an ice cold Cola after work, huh?
Ack... you scratched my armor?! You'll pay for that!
Oh, perfect timing. I just finished warming up. Time to exercise? Or sortie?
All we can do... is fall back?
Commander, mail here for you. Would it be okay if I kept the stamp?

I have a dream. A dream where the seas are free of the stink of gunpowder, and all the people of the world live in peace.|Cola sure is the best drink, isn't it? Oh, but you can't drink Oxy-cola, Commander...|If I had the chance, I'd love to travel all around the world. The Sakura Empire, the Dragon Empery, the Royal Navy... Hmm, some kind of world tour sounds nice, doesn't it?
A mission...? If it's a combat mission, we're good to go. Hahaha!
A job's not done until a report's submitted. Commander, don't forget to double check everything.
I am the Eagle Union Battleship Georgia. My main guns are bigger than those of my distant cousins. Yes indeedy, these guns of mine take all the bad guys in front of me... and blast 'em all to hell!
Ahem... I never thought you'd attack me head on, Commander... Well, I guess I'm glad I get my world tour sooner than I expected. Hahaha!
The sound of these massive guns is your funeral march!
Oooh? You find my guns so appealing, Commander? Enjoy them to your heart's content~
Oooh? Hey Commander, did you want me to use you for target practice...?
I am Georgia from the Eagle Union. Fear not, for my cannons shall bring victory in your name.
You'll see how strong I am next time I fight.
No matter how thick the armor... these guns can pierce it!
My dress? Oh, Seattle helped me with it. We all know I couldn't get it looking like this myself...
Oh? Commander, did you need to get some fresh air as well? Me? Ahaha... It's a bit too stiff inside that venue, so I came out for a change of pace. Why don't we take a little stroll together?
I love being with you under the moonlight, Commander... Err, not like that. Unless...? I mean, I could maybe mean it like that... Sorry, I'm making it weird... This is so awkward...
Commander, the air out here is delightful. Come take a breather.
It's so much easier to relax when we're alone... Don't you think, Commander?

Whew, now this is a fine place to enjoy a cola. You want one, Commander? I brought extra.|Don't you have to hurry back to the party, Commander? Lots of girls waiting for you, no?|Don't worry about it, Commander. I love the fleet. I'll head back inside in a bit.
Woah!! That was close... Thanks, Commander. Getting around in high heels isn't exactly my forte.
Oh? Commander, did you need to get some fresh air as well? Me? Ahaha... It's a bit too stiff inside that venue, so I came out for a change of pace. Why don't we take a little stroll together?
Seattle picked out this lace coverup for me. She's good with this kind of thing...
Heh heh, the warm sun and the sea breeze really hit the spot, don't they? Alright, let's get out there and enjoy ourselves! That's what you've been waiting for, right, Commander?
Ooh, nice work on that sortie. Did you want an ice cream? I still have some here.
Ooh, you're just in time. Commander, mind helping me set up this parasol?

What do you think of my sunglasses? I dig them, personally. Hahaha!|Nothing beats an ice cold Oxy Cola on a summer day! Here, take one, Commander... Oh right, you can't drink these. This one's for you.|We've still got some summer left, so why not try to plan a "Beach World Tour" for us?
Commander, it's really funny watching you try to figure out where it's safe to look. Hahaha!
Ah haah? Commander, you've really gotten into the spirit of the beach now. Maybe I should give you a bit more "stimulation." Like a whooping with this parasol, for instance.
Heh heh, the warm sun and the sea breeze really hit the spot, don't they? Alright, let's get out there and enjoy ourselves! That's what you've been waiting for, right, Commander?
The Sakura Empire's tea is good stuff! But I still feel like I want an Oxy-cola sometimes... Huh? It wouldn't look right? I can't help it if I want one.
Happy New Year, Commander! I guess you dress up all flashy like this for the Sakura New Year. Would you escort me...? What are you gawking like that for...? Haha, am I so dazzling? Hahaha!
And just where are you escorting me today? I'm dying to find out.

So this "Momotarou" pops out of a peach! What an amazing little guy!|Seattle, I got an invite to this party or something. Any idea for a talent show? It has to be something better than the "Georgia Beam"!|Commander, I just finished my new drink - mixing cola with tea! Come on, try it!
Ready to be a proper escort?
Hey now, you're going to mess up my outfit.
Happy New Year, Commander! I guess you dress up all flashy like this for the Sakura New Year. Would you escort me...? What are you gawking like that for...? Haha, am I so dazzling? Hahaha!
As per the Commander's orders, we depart for the front!
At last I can have a rematch with Warspite on equal terms. I've been waiting for this!
Conte di Cavour-class battleship – Giulio Cesare.
Isn't that the commission team? Why not go say hello to them, Commander?
Seems you lack the mindset to be a worthy commander.
Cavour always stresses the importance of courtesy and diplomatic discourse, but I believe in simply speaking one's mind. Doesn't it sound dreadful to obsess over some idea of formality?
A little bit of harsh discipline is the right medicine for slouches who can't obey orders. "It's not that simple"? Well, I thought I was making a good suggestion...
A little bird told me you're free, and I've got two tickets to the opera, so what do you say? I'd say you're due for something you haven't experienced before.
You can rest easy, Commander. For as long as I have your back, you can keep your eyes on the path ahead and continue moving forward. I'll take care of everything else for you!
Triumphant once again, yes? It's written all over your face.
You won't break my spirit so easily!
You're right on time... Naturally. I'll admit your timeliness is the one thing I could learn from.
Am I out of my depth...?!
There's a letter for you. Assuming it's no private matter, you don't mind if I open it, do you?

Office work? Cavour is better at it than me... but I'll still do it. As any secretary should.|Commander, be decisive. Hesitation wastes time, and wasted time is gone forever.|A good leader doesn't micromanage or mediate, they issue clear orders and make firm decisions. Isn't that right, Commander?|Cavour, don't be so overly formal around the Commander! No one wants to be treated like an old-timer!
You can honestly skip missions you'd rather not take on.
On the topic of completing missions, does it even affect the war situation?

Memories that haunt me? None but that dreaded battle. I had to retreat from the Battle of Punto Stilo after taking a single hit... Things would've gone differently, had I only gotten to strike first...!

*Sigh*... The romantic vacation I booked was all for nothing... "With who"? With you, shouldn't that be obvious?! ... "Just ask me next time"? But I booked it just for you in the first place... F-fine, I will...
All shall bow before my might!
Mh... Mm? Sorry, I zoned out for a bit... Were you worried about me, Commander?
If you plan on toying around with me, don't blame me when you get burned.
I'm Giulio Cesare, battleship of the Sardegna Empire. Prove to me your talent in commanding a fleet!
I've yet to hit my own limits!
Veni, vidi, vici.
Want me to make a training plan for you? ... "Cesare's training methods send nutrients to your muscles and away from the brain"? Did Cavour really say that?!
Both exercise and war are at their core about willpower! Now, get ready, Commander! We're not finished until you're dripping with sweat!
Here, take this! Don't forget to rehydrate.
The treadmill is free right now. Do use it if you plan to work out.

"Inaction saps the vigor of the mind"... Who said that, again?|Jogging courses, fat-burning courses, rolling hills courses... Is it really this complicated? I'll just start with whichever seems the toughest.|If you feel stressed out, just let it all out on that sandbag over there. I can attest that it does wonders for the mood.
Are you out of breath already? You've still got a long way to go, Commander.
What was that for?! Don't ignore me, answer!
Both exercise and war are at their core about willpower! Now, get ready, Commander! We're not finished until you're dripping with sweat!
Tired already? For goodness' sake, I thought you'd be more reliable than this. Don't go burning all your energy at once, we still have a whole day of recreation ahead of us.
Want some ice with your Sardegnian liqueur? It's best downed in one gulp when it's this cold.
Hey, Commander. I hope you're not tired already, or else you'll be branded as unreliable.

Warspite's taking part in the beach volleyball tournament? You should've told me so sooner!|Trento and Pola are out for you, so you came here to lie low, didn't you? ...No?|This is not a playground, Cavour! Take your watergun fight elsewhere! ...I'll be right back, Commander. I'm going to have a word with that wannabe commando!
I do like this bikini, though it doesn't quite match up to Veneto's.
Surely you know what consequences await you for doing that.
Tired already? For goodness' sake, I thought you'd be more reliable than this. Don't go burning all your energy at once, we still have a whole day of recreation ahead of us.
Are you charmed by my prowess in battle, or just me? Haha~
Flagship... is it? I, I can do this!
Never thought the story would turn out like this! Cannot wait for next week's issue... Huh?! M-Master! Ahem! How may I help you?
Southampton-class light cruiser - Glasgow (C-21)
The commission fleet has returned. Please remember to welcome them back.
Would you please be so kind as to maintain a distance of at least three metres from my person so that I may properly carry out my duties as a maid, "Master?"
You should rest if you're feeling tired... Th-think about those of us working for you.
Master, I've brought you a change of fresh white linens... You'd prefer green, like the color of my eyes? I, I see...
You'd like to see me in my casual attire? D-didn't you say I'd look cute in anything? I'll leave it to your imagination then~
I made your bed, warmed your sheets, and ye ended up working all night anyway... Oh no, I'm not mad in the slightest. Hard work is to be praised, after all~
That'll do. Take a rest now.
tha...that's it?
Welcome back, Master. I've prepared tea.
Have to think on that one... Don't wanna lose again.
Looks like we got new mail. I'll grab it.

Newcastle, ye ask? She's like a big sister and that's all I have to say to you... nothing else!|Sheffy's got a sharp tongue, but really she's a sweet lassie.|You wouldn't happen to like manga or...? N-never mind. Forget I asked.
A new mission is here. Please check it soon.
The rewards are here. I'll put 'em away for ye.

I'm Glasgow, Southampton-class light cruiser of the Royal Navy. I fought in the Norwegian Campaign, escorted our ships through the Arctic, and participated in various other operations... B- but my eyes aren't that great. I oughta apologise to Imogen...
And so I thank God for bestowing upon me the gift of our meeting... And we're done, eh? Time to go home...? Huh? S-seal the vow with a k-kiss?! B-but... I...!
Be composed, and be graceful...!
You have something for me?
Ah?! I-I must be going...!
I'm Glasgow, light cruiser part of the Southampton subclass of the Town class. I am honoured to be part of your fleet, Commander. I am at your service.
Aye. I shall redouble my efforts.
Phew... That'd be enough for ye now, eh?
Enterprise? I know her. We fought together at the Bay of Biscay, eh? Huh? There's another Enterprise...? I-I knew that!
Y-ye said ye wanted ta see me wear something different, so... But this is not "cosplay" or somesuch! I do actually go to school...! D-do ye like it?
Commission team's back. I'll go get 'em.
Good to see you back. I've only just got home from school meself. Oh... erm... the tea... just a moment.

What's for lunch? How's this lunchbox here sound to ye? Just a little something I made meself...|That Z23 from the Iron Blood's got a talent for teaching. Teacher or no. Not that I need the help.|Borrowed this one from Ranger. Gotta finish it soon. It's the sequel to a story I've been waiting for.
Ye want ta watch me doing my club work? Um, well, ye could say I'm in the "Go Home Club..."
Y-ye said ye wanted ta see me wear something different, so... But this is not "cosplay" or somesuch! I do actually go to school...! D-do ye like it?
Search and destroy!
Expect great things for me, for I am Glorious! Of... of course! I'll be your glory forever!
Courageous-class aircraft carrier – Glorious, Hull Number 77.
Commander, after your commissions are complete, you should... uh... hm... collect your rewards!
Commander, you're making me feel uncomfortable.
You can't be too careful in war... That being said...
The kids in the sky have been working very hard. Can't they rest with me for a while? ... ... Commander, in times of war, is there no room for warmth?
Commander, it's quite late. Why not rest a bit? I've made some black tea... Mail? It's in your tea, of course... *Zzzzz*
Commander, if you are tired you can always rest in my embrace. Eh? Didn't you say yesterday that was the best way for you to recover?
You need to always keep your guard up, Commander.
Sm- smokescreen!
Today is a good day. Good weather puts you in a good mood to get work done!
Next time, I'll scout out the enemy before we attack!
I'll put the tea here... Mail? Ah, yes! There's new mail for you!

Ardent and Acasta did the best they could, but I...|I'll be more prudent in the future. Only then can I avoid meeting disaster again!|Commander, glory and courage go hand in hand. However, Courage isn't the same thing as recklessness.
Rest up and then finish your missions in one go!
I won't forget this time... *ahem* Commander, collect your rewards!
I'm the Royal Navy's heavy crui... *ahem* ex-cruiser, now aircraft carrier, Glorious! I was just being careless when I was sunk by Scharnhorst and Gneisenau, not because they're better than me!
If we face it together, there is nothing we can't overcome, Commander. Are you ready to accept your Glory?
May victory and glory be ours... hopefully!
Any guidance?
Commander, you're holding the glory of the Royal Navy
Royal Navy large crui– *ahem* aircraft carrier Glorious, reporting in! Commander, stand up straight, for your glory has arrived!
Thank you, but power alone is not enough to win...
A glorious triumph!
You're saying... that failures are just learning opportunities? Thanks, Commander, I do feel a lot better now.
Being able to occasionally have a peaceful school life... is something I could get used to. Commander, look at the markings on this butterfly - aren't they lovely?
Commander, remember to not let your guard down on your way home.
When I put on this uniform, my mood seems to lighten up compared to usual...

Commander, Ardent told me about some fascinating places. Want to go check them out after the operation is over? |Commander, what would you consider an ideal school life? |Even though I still have much to learn... I swear to bring you true glory one day, Commander.
Hey!! Commander, you scared the butterfly away...
Being able to occasionally have a peaceful school life... is something I could get used to. Commander, look at the markings on this butterfly - aren't they lovely?
I shall strive to always be your beacon of glory, Commander! ...B-but, that doesn't sound convincing at all while I'm wearing this dress, does it...?
I heard that the Sakura Empire's traditional attire was really hard to put on... but the Dragon's Empery's outfits are even more... Huh?! Commander, p-please look away!
Commander, if you're tired, feel free to rest in my lap. Not only is it ideal for you to replenish your energy, but it is also my duty to provide you succor.
Commander, don't let your guard down... Huh? I'm the one who looks more vulnerable right now?!
Commander, the glory of... the glory of the Royal Navy will...! F-forget it!
I must gain a better grasp of the situation on the battlefield.
The hot water is over here... Oh, the mail! Um... I'm so sorry, I could've sworn the mail was right there...

Are you talking about Ark Royal...? Do you not think that it is appropriate for us adults to monitor the growth of our Destroyer sisters, even off the battlefield?|I bought this outfit because I thought it looked gorgeous, but... then this happened... Wh-what do you mean I can just leave it like this?|The scent of plums wafting upon the evening breeze is so calming... Oh no, I still have to finish my secretary duties!
You don't want me catching a cold, is it? I appreciate your concern.
B-but, the glory of the Royal Navy... (blushes)
I heard that the Sakura Empire's traditional attire was really hard to put on... but the Dragon's Empery's outfits are even more... Huh?! Commander, p-please look away!
To Glorious goes the victory! Commander, thank you for your support!
Please check your remaining ammunition stocks.
If you have the time to gape at working maids, you have the time to do your own work. Master.
Gloucester-class light cruiser – Gloucester (HMS Gloucester.)
You should check on the commission team, Master. Do consider how it may affect their assessment of you.
I do not speak to things.
Everyone makes mistakes. But I will use my experience to reduce the opportunities my master has to make such mistakes. Do be aware.
Master, you must keep a healthy, balanced diet. If you find it troublesome, I can cook your meals for you. Such is a maid's duty, after all.
Master, you must be mindful of your comportment around women, particularly the way you touch and handle them... If you find this challenging, I am willing to practice with you. Ahem, now then...
Master, we must improve your daily habits if we are to raise your work efficiency... If you would like, Master, I could take care of- Rather, I would be happy to stay with you.
voiceline.oath: Master, you are already the paragon of excellence, for which I am extremely proud. But worry not, Master, in order to ensure that you are not at risk of making any mistakes... please allow me to handle *all* your affairs.

voiceline.line: Welcome home, Master. Have some tea. Now then, I must ask, you were fully committed to your duties during the sortie, yes?
This is not going according... to plan!
Punctuality is not a virtue, it is rather a duty. Master, do bear that in mind.
I beg your pardon, Master. I have failed you.
Do check your mail... If you would prefer I not remind you, you need only check it sooner.

More trouble from the Royal Maids today... Belfast, do look after this troop of clumsy louts.|That Fiji is always buying cosmetics, clothes and the like... You must not learn from her, Master. Life is to be lived in moderation.|A maid has a maid's work, the master has the master's. The maids serve the master, while the master serves everyone. This is the way of the world.
You have as yet uncompleted tasks... I will continue to remind you until all of your missions have been completed.
You have uncollected mission rewards. If you would rather I collect them for you, simply direct me to do so.

I participated in a number of operations as a member of the Royal Navy. And while I was prepared to face my own sinking, I never would have imagined it would come thanks to a shortage of ammunition... Master, I swear to you that such a fatal mistake will absolutely never happen again.
Master, you need not resort to such methods to keep me by your side... But if this is indeed your wish, I, Gloucester, am happy to oblige...!
All for our master.
Do you need something of me? As your maid, Master, I will do what I can to satisfy your requests above and beyond our typical responsibilities.
Take a seat over there. I am going to educate you on the proper way to treat a lady.
Gloucester, light cruiser of the Royal Maids, at your service, Master. It is my honor and my duty to assist you in becoming a most magnificent commander.
Excellent choice. Now, if you could also strengthen some of the other girls as well, I'd be delighted.
This is but a trifling victory. Master, should you be satisfied with such triviality... I would find that rather troubling.
It was a terrible mistake letting Fiji handle this festival costuming... "Spice up this bit and the Commander'll love it," and such. It's all a game to that girl...

Gloucester, light cruiser of the Royal Maids, at your service for the Spring Festival... You say I look displeased? I beg your pardon, it's just... Such holidays are in fact quite busy for the Maids. We have much on our minds. It is none of your concern.
The port is all done up for the festival. But I get a headache when I think about having to put it back as it was...
Master, how is your work coming along? Let's avoid having you at the office for the holiday.

The floor is filthy again...? Oh those girls... I told them a thousand times to wipe their dirty shoes before coming inside...|Master, you should find a bit of time to spend with the girls. Don't forget those packets of New Year money.|The Royal Maids are preparing tonight's banquet. As long as Belfast is there, I don't think they will have any issues... Actually, I think I will go take a look after all...
Master, it's impolite to stare at a lady, maid or otherwise.
We'll have to shackle the master until the end of the festival, I'm afraid...

Gloucester, light cruiser of the Royal Maids, at your service for the Spring Festival... You say I look displeased? I beg your pardon, it's just... Such holidays are in fact quite busy for the Maids. We have much on our minds. It is none of your concern.
Let's ram~! The first one to fall will play the punishment game later~
Commander, watch me, watch me! I don't become dizzy no matter how many times I spin myself! Amazing, right? Praise me, praise me~!
G-class destroyer ー Glowworm, Hull Number H92!
I, Glowworm, have received tribute from the commission team!
Even as the magnanimous Glowworm, I will not be giving any quarter to idiots!
The great Glowworm is the strongest!
I'm not gonna be 'cleared' by you Commander. Stupid, stu-pid!
Recently the Commander has been popping up in my dreams... I can't let him find out about this...
I give up! I like you lots and lots! I don't care if I'm made fun of (Glowworm headbutts you), so be thankful!
Tadaa! Now, give me a big hug!
No choice but to ram!
Commander, Commander, you're so slow! What took you so long? Hurry up, let's go have some fun!
Ah~! W-wait a minute! My fighting has just begun! I shall return!
Commander, catch! Mail mail mail!

Hey there, you defenseless commander, eat my Glowworm CQC! Unya! Ah, I stubbed my toe...|Stay still, the cola is going to overflow. I'm gonna drink it before it makes a mess! *chugs*|Commander, do you think we can make a whirlpool if we spin on the water fast enough?
Ohoho, Commander! Mission, mission, mission!
Yahoo! So many rewards! Don't mind if we do!
I am G class' Glowworm! People say it's hard getting near me, but I actually like skinship engagements~! Commander, Commander, I am always energetic! W-whaa!
You won't regret this, right? It's too late if you want to! ... Ehehe, hehehe. Then, say 'Glowworm is the cutest'! ...Say it. Say it even more!
Eat these Million Headbutts!
Hehe... That tickles! I'm going to tickle you back, Commander!
Nnngggh! Damn you, perverted Commander! I'm gonna headbutt you! *donk*
Hello! I am the Royal Navy's G-class destroyer, Glowworm! Commander, want to play with me today? I'm pretty good at hide and seek!
I, Glowworm, have become even stronger!
The enemies were idiots~ My courage is second to none, after all!
Commander, you did something bad, didn't you~ Confess your crimes! Or else... Eh? You'll spend the day with me? Hmm, well then~ I guess I'll let you off the hook!
Ahahaha! It is I, Glowworm, the impartial and absolute judge! Any wrongdoers will have me to answer to! Guilty verdicts will result in headbutts!
Hrrm, you have kept Her Honour Judge Glowworm waiting... guilty Commander! Your sentence is to hang out with me more!

Omaha! San Diego! Bring the bad guys to me! First up is... the Commander!|Hipper! Come play with meee! Or I sentence you to a headbutting!|Behold my headbutt of justice! ...Oof, I hit the wall. Waahh...
Where are the naughty girls?! Huh? Phrasing?
Augh?! C-Commander! Don't you know, crime doesn't pay!
Ahahaha! It is I, Glowworm, the impartial and absolute judge! Any wrongdoers will have me to answer to! Guilty verdicts will result in headbutts!
Truth only exists within the guns' range.
My duty is to support my big sister who is always charging too far ahead. Admittedly, it gets a little irritating at times.
Scharnhorst-class battlecruiser, Gneisenau.
A commission has been completed! Care to inspect the results?
I assumed you were more intelligent, Commander...
Is it urgent? I prefer simple and effective forms of communication.
"The Ugly Sisters..." Though we were given that epithet for our achievements, it still hurts a little. Commander, do you think I'm ugly?
Without realizing it, I've come to enjoy supporting both my sister and you, Commander.
The present flies by like an arrow, but the future always arrives too late. I hope that one day, I will be able to see the future that you and I create.
Welcome back. Please take it easy for a while.
All ships, remember to stay alert!
Welcome back. Ready to get back to work? I've prepared everything you need, Commander.
I let my guard down...
Commander, there's mail for you. I'll leave it here.

You mustn't put off until tomorrow what you can do today. Please take that to heart.|One forgets the cruelty of war after being at peace for too long. The opposite... is true as well, isn't it?|Looking back at it, it's unbelievable that I would mistake that prideful princess as an old-fashioned knight.
A mission? Let me do some planning for you...
Rewards distributed. Please accept them when you have a moment.

I'm Gneisenau. Though I'm not as bellicose as my sister, I'm still confident about my combat capabilities. As some of the best ships the Iron Blood has to offer, we hold the record of being the only battlecruisers to sink a standard aircraft carrier. Your faith in us will not be misplaced.
A promise, huh? Long ago, I would have despised the notion of being tied down to emotions... but it doesn't seem so bad now.
... Now you're in range!
Isn't it amazing how different people can come to different conclusions about the same topic?
Commander, Anton is locked on, you can't escape now.
Hello, Commander, I'm Gneisenau. Though my big sister is a bit reckless, we're actually an invincible team. I hope I will be able to sail with her as often as possible!
It's fine as long as you haven't let power cloud your judgement...
Sorry, this is war. There's no room for mercy.
Everyone wants to be a witch for Halloween, so I chose something a little bit different. After seeing your reaction, Commander, I think I chose correctly. Hehehe...
These Halloween festivities are quite interesting, in a good way. Getting dressed up in these costumes isn't such a bad experience either. Commander, what do you think of my costume?
You say you see ghosts and goblins all around me? ... I think you need a break. Getting into the Halloween spirit is all well and good, but you can't overdo it.
At first I was too embarrassed to wear something like this, but I went along with it and after wearing it for a while, I must say I'm starting to see things in a different light...

If only my sister were here... Now if we had some sort of pumpkin-smashing gunnery competition, that would have gotten her attention.|This holiday certainly is well suited to us "Ugly Sisters," isn't it?|My tail? Oh it just came with the costume... Still, I'd prefer if you didn't touch it.
While I haven't prepared any candy, I do have a "treat" for you to enjoy. Would you like to try? I'm afraid there may be some pain involved... Hehehe...
Eek?! Commander, does someone want to be "punished?"
These Halloween festivities are quite interesting, in a good way. Getting dressed up in these costumes isn't such a bad experience either. Commander, what do you think of my costume?
To fight... is to fulfill this life's purpose.
The more you suppress your emotions, the more rationally you can fight. Let the battlefield wash over you, and immerse yourself in the scent of steel.

You're... the Commander, right? In other words, the one with the authority to control me. Though I have no interest in you as an individual, I will still obey your orders... At least for the time being.
The commission rewards? Ahh, what an enviable logistics department you have.
These were the only "commands" you could come up with? What a joke.
A machine's efficiency comes from its accuracy, lack of hesitation, and tirelessness. As ships, we must be the same.
You seem to be quite drawn to me. I'm not sure what about me would warrant your fancy, so I don't know if you're stubborn or just a simpleton.
You're commanding me... to take a break? Do you even know what you're asking me to do? ...Very well. I did say I'll obey your orders.

You are quite an interesting person, trying to treat me as an ordinary human and integrate me into life at this port. I suppose I ought to try saying "thank you." ...I wonder if this is the first time I've uttered those words.
What... is the meaning of this?
Rest is for the dead. I'll do the rest myself if you so desire.
Pain... is nothing more than a catalyst for madness...
So you came after all. Not that it matters to me either way.
Withdraw? Haha... Ahahaha! ...It hasn't ended yet, so why are we to withdraw?
Just a friendly reminder: you still have unopened mail.

Only with exacting precision can you eliminate your enemies in a single fatal blow, thus ending the battle quickly.|...Leave me to my own devices, and your job will be much smoother... Though it doesn't seem like you're interested.|It may take some time... until I am used to an ocean devoid of war.
Cumbersome paperwork will only hinder your ability to fight.
Your duties end here. Mine, on the other hand, persist eternally...
I am the Iron Blood battleship, Gneisenau. I've heard that you are an excellent commander, so surely you know how to operate a precise and efficient instrument of war?

If you're prepared to go to these great lengths for me, then I shall accompany you to the very end. I'm becoming more and more curious – just how far will you be able to go by my side? ...Yes, I cannot allow you to leave until we've traversed the very bowels of hell. Are you ready?
Everything is as planned.
What's wrong? Can't make up your mind?
Such a crass hobby... But whatever makes you happy.

You're... the Commander, right? In other words, the one with the authority to control me. Though I have no interest in you as an individual, I will still obey your orders... At least for the time being.
Now that my armament has been strengthened, the next step is... Ahahaha!
Indeed, it is wreckage and ruins that put my heart at ease.
Let us begin our symphony of destruction.
If gods truly exist in this world, let us begin our slaughter with them.
Aircraft carrier, Graf Zeppelin.
Ah, so they have returned... Just seeing those faces filled with joy...
You again...?
Ahh, so sweet. Sweet things cannot last for long. The only thing that endures forever is ice-cold hatred.
Does prayer really work? Will God ever respond? Nein. Gods are called as such because they are merciless.

I have never been one to believe in fate, but if meeting you was also predestined... Hmm... How ironic. For the gods to have given me the worst past but also the best future... what purpose does my hatred then serve?

As long as you are here, the world does not feel so insipid and detestable. Rest easy; even if the world was to become your enemy, I would happily fight by your side. As a matter of fact, I eagerly await this day.
All your fights, all your struggles, are nothing more than fodder for the End.
The smell of steel and blood...
The black goat's horn has already sounded. Quell your anxiety and wait at ease.
Next time, I shall grant you despair even worse than death.
Treasure the time you have to speak with your loved ones, for that time is about to draw to an end.

I prefer the high ground, because I can see everything... everything that shall be destroyed...|Easy come, easy go... Aren't things like that better off not existing in the first place? |Life is akin to playing cards with a stacked deck. Doesn't it make you want to smash the entire table?
Is the person who gave you this mission really who you want to fight for?
Rewards... take them away.

I am Graf Zeppelin. Though this name is worth little, you may call me by it if you wish. My only desire? To end the world. I shall not ask for your help though... as you are already a part of my plans.
Oh? Have you finally decided to make the entire world your enemy? What? You just want to be with me? Hmph, very well. Eradicating everything that stands in our way doesn't sound bad either.
Die... Funebre!
I despise everything.
Quite brave, aren't you? As expected of the one I chose.
You're my Commander? I am Graf Zeppelin. Since it appears that all the conditions have been met, let the final movement begin.
Ah, if only strength alone was enough to determine everything.
My enemies belong in their graves.
Now that I think about it, other than forcing me to wear this skimpy bit of fabric, what else is this summer season even for?
So the Second Movement is a Lento of the summer and the sea? So be it... Since we will arrive at the Finale eventually, I suppose I can enjoy this moment of fleeting peace with you.
Didn't we agree to go to the beach? Where were you?

Is there a nice vantage point on the beach to sit at? ...There isn't? Oh well... |I only wore this... "clothing" because you told me to. If you didn't come to the beach with me, I'd be... rather upset. |Eugen, don't rush me, the commander is still working. What am I going to do on the beach by myself...
Is it time to depart? Wait a moment, these shoes are a bit hard to put on... Come help me out for a second...
Hmph... Commander, do you also wish to become food for this child here?
So the Second Movement is a Lento of the summer and the sea? So be it... Since we will arrive at the Finale eventually, I suppose I can enjoy this moment of fleeting peace with you.
Let's deal with our enemies full-force from the start.
It seems like someone has been captivated by my beauty.
I am the CPU of Leanbox, Green Heart. No matter who the enemy is, I will not hold back. Are you ready?
It appears that a commission has been completed. You should thank your girls for their hard work.
I have nothing to say to you.
If you are fine with me, you can ask me for advice at any time.
Haven't you been relying on me a bit too much recently? No, it doesn't bother me... but if this continues, one can't help but to be concerned about your abilities as a commander.
I have some free time tonight, so I would be glad to help you with work. Afterwards, I'd like you to give me... U-um... forget I said anything.
Commander...? Are you bogged down with work again? ... Guess it can't be helped. Let's go on a date after you're done. I'll make some special red tea for you.
Rest is important, too.
I won't let you off the hook so easily!
You sure took your time. Black tea is best enjoyed hot, you know?
To think I would make such a mistake... I won't lose next time.
New mail has arrived.
Size is justice, don't you agree?|... Oh dear, my apologies. I was just thinking about the next guild battle.|Shall we have some tea?
If you require my assistance at any time, just let me know.
What a tease... I want to see the rewards.
I am the CPU of Leanbox, Green Heart. I have come from the world of Gamindustri. There's no need to be shy, you can come as close as you'd like.
I've finally noticed my true feelings. Even if the battle here ends and I have to return to my original world... Commander, I... I want to hear what you have to say.
I'll end you in an instant!
This processing unit can't be taken off, you know. Ehehe, just kidding.
It's not a good idea to keep playing these distasteful pranks.
I am the CPU of Leanbox, Green Heart. No matter who the enemy is, I will not hold back. Are you ready?
My beauty has been sculpted even more.
Enemies like these are not enough to be my opponent.
Commander, are you having a good time? Ehehe, I certainly am. It's not often that we get to relax like this. Why don't we head out and enjoy the breeze?
nil|nil|nil
I'm good on fuel. Only thing left to do is dispatch the enemy!
What are you ogling me for? Are you some sort of creep?
voiceline.oath: What are you ogling me for? I don't see what you get out of this...

voiceline.line: Gnevny-class destroyer - Gremyashchy
Commission team's come back. I kind of expected that you knew that already.
...Why exactly are you still here?
I've always got my eyes on you. Mm, that's all.
You might fool Gromky, but you can't fool me. If I catch you doing anything questionable, I won't hesitate to whack you with this thing. Mm, that'll be all.
You're awfully good at putting on faces. Unless... you're actually an honest, decent person after all? I guess I'll give you the benefit of the doubt for now. Mm, that'll be all.
All right, you're a decent person, I'll give you that. Huh? You want me to... be with you, forever? Ummmm... I-I need to think about, that's all...
Cut it out. My hat's gonna fall off.
Here, some cookies Gromky made. As your reward for a job well done.
voiceline.oath: You've earned three cookies for today's sorties. Mm, that'll be all. Now say "aah."

voiceline.line: I've been hurt. Mm, that's all...
You've got lots of work to do. Like, that huge stack of papers on your desk.
voiceline.oath: You've got all this work to do before the end of the day? ...I guess we just have to make a miracle happen...

voiceline.line: Ugh... That was a pretty garbage battle...
voiceline.oath: Next time, do your job and command properly.

voiceline.line: Check your mail, yadda yadda. If you don't, I'll just throw it away. Mm, that's all.

One whack with this thing dispatches any and all bugs and creeps. Mm, that's all.|Bad things happen to people who anger Gromky. Watch yourself, Commander.|Slacking on the job, huh... Maybe I'll tell Gromky about this.
voiceline.oath: nil|nil|Hmh. Just so you know, Gromky, the Commander isn't slacking on the job. Mhm, that's all.
voiceline.extra: You always drink tea with me, so why do you leave all the cookies to me? ...You'd rather I eat all I want? Huh, I see...

voiceline.line: That's a whole lot of unfinished missions...
voiceline.oath: Are you ignoring all these missions, hoping they'll go away? Yikes...

voiceline.line: Mission complete. You know the drill, claim the rewards. Mm, that's all.

I'm Gremyashchy, Grozny-class destroyer. I didn't just do escort missions, I squared off with enemy destroyers and rescued allies too. I've done almost everything, save for dealing with aircraft carriers, so I'm fit for pretty much any mission. Mm, that's all.
I've sailed through bad weather and finished countless tough escort missions. If I can do that, then I can promise to follow you anywhere you go, Commander. Mm, that'll be all.
...Out of my way.
...You need something?
Th-that confirms it, you're a creep...
voiceline.oath: Uhh, woaaaahhhhh...

voiceline.line: Gremyashchy, Northern Parliament destroyer. I'll do what I need to do, so don't bother me for the other stuff. Mm, that's all.
Thanks for making me stronger. Yeah, that's all.
That takes care of the enemies. I guess that's all.

skins.name: A Daytime Delight is in a Book

voiceline.line: Gromky's looking for me? Ugh... I don't wanna go outside. But I'd feel bad about telling her to buzz off, and pretending to be sick would worry her... Hrmmm...
Wh-who gave you the right to just barge in? ...I did? Huh. Well, seeing as you're here, I guess we could read a book together. Mm, that's all.
Wanna read this book with me, Commander? This one. It's called "The Happy Lovebirds." If we read it together, I might just be able to figure out what it's about. Mm, that's all.
So many books lying around... Oh, Commander, I could use your help returning these books to the shelf when you come back.
I got up to this part just the other day. Time to read the rest. Mm, that's all.
There's a letter for you. Can I keep the stamp? Mm, thanks.

If you wanna lounge around, do it over there. Mm, that's all.|Mmmh... *yaaaaawn*... Huh?! Oh no, don't tell me I dozed off... You didn't see anything, got it? I mean, of course you didn't!|Retivy... I mean, Tai Yuan, and I shared our recommended book lists. It turns out we've got pretty similar tastes. Heheh.
You could fill a whole book with all these unfinished mission drafts...
Want me to read aloud for you, or...?
I-I knew it! You are a creep...!
Wh-who gave you the right to just barge in? ...I did? Huh. Well, seeing as you're here, I guess we could read a book together. Mm, that's all.
Let's show our opponents how awesome we are!
Commander, I steeped tea according to Miss Hood's instructions. Care to try? Huh...? It's too sweet...? Ahaha... I suppose that big ol' scoop of honey was a bit overkill...
G-class Destroyer - Grenville (H03)
Everyone's back from commissions! I sure want to be able to play with them too... Ahem, you heard me wrong~ I said, I wanted to be able to sortie with them!
Commander, if you don't perk up, I won't pay pay attention to you anymore! Juuuust kidding~ of course that's a lie! Although, you still shouldn't disappoint me~
There are a lot more interesting friends to meet around port, right? Commander, if you have the opportunity, why don't you introduce me to them? I want to learn a lot more about everyone else~
There is still much that I must learn, but as long as you're by my side, Commander, I'll be super motivated~!

In order to prove myself as a fine Royal lady, I must be able to satiate your appetite with my delicious cooking! Commander, would you care to try my Royal-style cuisine? Eh...? I burnt all the fish heads to a crisp? ...Ahaha~

Commander, I... like you a lot! Ehehe... Um... is it that unusual for girls to confess to you? Uhh... please don't stare at me like that, it's embarrassing... Huh? You'd like to hear it again? Really? I like you, a lot! I love you~!
Commander, you're finally back! Hey, come and see the results of my training- I-I mean, pardon me! You must be tired from battle! Here, have some juice! Anyway, feel better soon, okay?
Don't underestimate the power of a lead ship!
Commander, welcome back! Did you sleep well? If so, let's get started with today's work!
Ugh... are my abilities still lacking...?
The mail's here! Hehe~ need my help opening them?

Hehe, Commander, would you like to study etiquette with me~? For example, take this fine lady's hand gracefully like this~ |As a lead ship, it's only right that I become a pillar of strength! Hehe~ Because of that, I'll continue to work hard! |Even though I may be inexperienced, I have nothing to fear! What matters is the ability to overcome any adversity in the future... Hehe, sounds like I'm beginning to boast~
Commander, there are a lot of tasks left still, so don't slack off~ Let's keep at it and finish up together!
Let's hurry up and claim the mission rewards~

I'm Grenville, Royal G-class Destroyer. I served as the lead ship and flagship of a destroyer squadron! However, it's a darn shame that I didn't leave behind much of a legacy because of my short service. If there's anything special I'd like you to know, um, I'm not fond of naval mines...
Commander, I originally just wanted to be useful to you, and never expected for you to give me a ring... Commander, it's fine to let go of things like etiquette and manners, and just embrace me~
You're about to bear witness to our greatness! Take this!
Ahh... If only I could become an elegant lady like Miss Hood~
Woah?! Gosh... I'm going to get angry! Commander, you have to conduct yourself appropriately!

Heyyo~ Good morning, Commander! G-class Destroyer, Grenville, reporting for duty! Now that I'm here, you can leave everything to me and take a nap! Hehe, just kidding~ Let's get along well, all right?
With this, I'll be added to the sortie fleet more often, right~? Hehe, Commander, thank you!
Expect nothing less from a lead destroyer~♪
You over there! Strike a pose! I'm about to shoot~!
Wow, look at that cutie! No, not me! The one over there!
Gridley-class destroyer - Gridley, Hull Number DD-380!
The girls who went out on a commission are back. I wonder how the photos I asked for turned out?
You don't get to look at pictures of Sara anymore!
So, Commander, don't you wanna see some awesome photos of Saratoga? Fine, fine, I'll show you! Aren't I nice~
Commander, didn't you promise we'd go see Sara together? What are we waiting for? Let's go!
Look at this one. It's great, right? This one, too. I'm confident about this one. ...Commander, why are you looking at me instead of the photos?
Ah... You don't want to hear about Sara? You want... to know more about... me? Eh... um.... Ah! This is so embarrassing!
I need to develop these photos~
Hey, Commander~ So listen, Sara's just soooo cute!
Dammit~ I lost focus!
Commander~ You've got mail~!
I've got plenty of pictures of Sara. 800 bucks a print!|Mississippi will bring me back home just fine if I get lost!|Commander, have you seen Sara? I want to try my new camera!
The mission area is so pretty~ C'mon, let's go take some photos!
The rewards are here~! Now we can buy new some film!
I'm the first ship of the Gridley-class, and I was very active in the Pacific theater. But never mind that now, Commander. Want to look at photos of Sara?
Commander, Commander! Strike a pose! 1... 2... 3! Cheese! ...That was a great shot! We'll get a copy each after we develop the film~
This is for Sara! Haiyah!
Aaah, that tickles~! I can't keep the camera straight~
Commander! If you do that again, I'll photograph it and report it to the police~
Nice to meet you, Commander! I'm Gridley. I once escorted Saratoga~ She's such a cutie!
Now I can snap even more photos of Sara!
Ten out of ten! Commander, Commander! Take a photo of me too!
Commander, Merry Christmas! Guhehe~ Won't you attend my "Super Special Sexy Sara (tentative)" photoshoot event?

Christmas special edition Saratoga photos, one thousand dollars each! Guhehe~ my fangirl power level increases during the holiday season! |Commander, can you take some photos of me with Saratoga? |Thanks for the waterproof camera, Commander! I'll be sure to take good care of it!
What's in this bag? Guhehe~ an album of premium Saratoga photos! As long as I have this, she will always be at my side!
Uwaah! Don't take any pictures!
Commander, Merry Christmas! Guhehe~ Won't you attend my "Super Special Sexy Sara (tentative)" photoshoot event?
All our powers, combined into one!
Eh? What's wrong, Comrade? Why are you staring at me like that... Did I do something weird?
voiceline.oath: Why are you staring at me like that? ...Ah! Did you want me to pat your head! ...Huh? That's not it?

voiceline.line: Gnevny-class destroyer—Gromky.
They're coming back with some precious supplies over there!
Comrade Commander... Are you a bad person...?
Comrade Commander, how were you able to build such a cohesive fleet? Please teach me your ways!

Have you been getting along with Gremyashchy? She's a bit rough to get along with at first, but if you're patient enough with her, I'm sure you'll be able to get along with her just fine in the future! I believe in you, Comrade Commander!

Comrade Commander! Do you prefer food when it has a deeper taste, or do you prefer it if it's lighter? Mmn, alright. I'll try to make sure the borscht I make next time is just to your tastes, Comrade Commander!
Comrade Commander, great work today! Here's a piping hot drink... along with some bliny... and... hehe, a warm hug from me!
Hehe, Comrade, did you also want to play with my little buddy?
Nothing's better than some blini to fill up your weary and hungry belly! Which would you like, honey or jam?
voiceline.oath: Comrade Commander, your reward for today's battle is... you can have as many blini as you'd like! Ehehe~

voiceline.line: T-There's a crack in the rigging?!
Woah! Comrade, you sure are early today! You know, you can get a bit more rest if you'd like...
voiceline.oath: Heyy! You can't get up yet! Didn't I tell you to get more rest?

voiceline.line: Owww... I didn't think the enemy would be this organized...
Here are some letters! Is there anything you were looking forward to?

Comrade Commander, you musn't slack off! I swear, I'll get mad at you!|For troublesome issues, let us all gather to face it together! That's the way we do it at the Northern Parliament, after all!|Comrade Commander, if your hands are cold, feel free to use my sleeves! They're nice and warm, aren't they~
voiceline.oath: Comrade Commander, you mustn't slack off! ...Huh? You want me to come relax with you? I, I guess I can't get mad at that... Wait, hey! Get back to work!|nil|nil

voiceline.line: Let's start with the easier missions! Here, I'll help out too!
Mission complete! Unity is strength!

Just so you know, I've done missions with ships from both the Northern Parliament and the Royal Navy! I've also escorted icebreaker ships, and rescued ships along with Gremyashchy! Yep, may we always have fair winds and following seas!
