I can feel the warmth of happiness radiating from the ring...! Ehehe~ Comrade Commander, thank you very much! I'll continue to be by your side from here on out!
Take this! Unity is strength!
There there, what a good commander you are~ Hmm? Isn't this what you wanted?
I swear, I'll get mad at you, Comrade Commander!
Goooood morning, Comrade! I'm the Northern Parliament destroyer, Gromky! It's an honor to serve alongside everyone in this fleet!
As long as I can be of more use to everyone...!
It's all thanks to everyone's hard work!
voiceline.oath: You've worked real hard, haven't you? Good job, good job~!

voiceline.line: Comrade Commander, what did you do to make the paper airplane go so fast? That's so cool!
Comrade! The morning is already here! Look how high the sun is in the sky!! C'mon, a wonderful day is calling to us~!!
I don't hate it when you stroke my hair so... Hold on, you're doing it too roughly!
Comrade Commander! You musn't fall back asleep! Don't. Fall. Back. Asleep. You. Stupid. Commander!!!
Good morning, Comrade Commander! Hehe, my little friend here is greeting you too!
Here are some letters! Comrade Commander, hurry up and take a look at them!

Hey, Snezhok! Don't just sit there in the room and play games all day! Come on, get a move on it, will you?|This paper crane is supposed to be Reshitelny... Chang Chun was the one who taught me how to make these! Hehe~|When I'm standing here, I can reach your head, Commander! Good job, Comrade Commander! Ehehe~
Comrade Commander, let's do our best to take care of these missions! Yay!
You want to know if I'm cold right now? I'm totally fine! Look, the weather's so nice right now!
Comrade Commander~ Take a seat! Don't you dare try to run away! Stay still, right over there, until I finish talking to you!
Comrade! The morning is already here! Look how high the sun is in the sky!! C'mon, a wonderful day is calling to us~!!
I dunno what to say. Let's go with... Ураааа!
Lifting my lovely кролик really does make comrade Commander behave. Just as Chapayev said.
Gnevny-class destroyer – Grozny.
Comrade Commander, I will go to the pier ahead of you. I'm eager to meet everyone who's returned.
You're strange, comrade Commander. Everyone tells me not to talk to strange people, but wouldn't you be lonely then...?
Everyone tells me that is getting food from strange people is one thing, but making strangers *into* food is not okay.
Always I get told to stay away from strange people, but you're not strange, comrade Commander. Meaning it should be fine to accept food from you.
It's not decent to ask you to share your food all the time, comrade Commander. That's why I'm going to start sharing mine with you. Here, want a drink?
*burp*... We've drunk all there is, comrade Commander. It feels like my drinks taste better when we enjoy them together. Let's have some more another time... *yawn*... But now, I need some sleep...
Comrade Commander, want some borscht and hot cocoa?
I haven't had enough to drink...
*burp*... Hello, comrade Commander. You followed my scent? Then how about a drink?
Blahh... I've had a few drinks too many...
There's nothing odd about me delivering your mail, comrade Commander. We all take turns doing it, after all.

*burp*... Say, comrade Commander, do you know anyone else who drinks this? One with bunny ears? Interesting...|Those "Four Unbreakables" are a cool bunch. I wish I could join them, but that's not possible 'cause that would ruin the naming convention. Very unfortunate.|I don't like foxes or invaders, 'cause they both try to take my home from me. Once they show up, you must drive them away.
"She who does not work, neither shall she eat," seems to be the rule here. With that in mind, we should finish these missions now so we may drink tomorrow.
Well done, comrade Commander. Now we have all the ingredients for tonight's soup.

I am Gnevny-class destroyer Grozny. I was part of convoys, laid mines, and provided shore firing support at one point. Call for me if you have orders, comrade Commander. And if you'll let me indulge in some drinks, I'll be delighted.
I think I like me a drink more than a ring. Here, drink this, and we'll become family, comrade Commander. Hm? You might be right; aren't we already like family...?
кролик, грызть! (Sic' em, Królik!)
Comrade Commander, is this snack my reward for my hard labor...?
кролик bites when it gets angry. Well, not so much bite as slice... I guess.

здра́вствуйте, comrade Commander. I am Gnevny-class destroyer Grozny, reporting for duty... What is the matter, comrade Commander? The item in my right hand? This is my lovely кролик. It's a cute убийца.
I much prefer the Northern Parliament's drinks! *burp*!
хорошо. Now I'm getting warmed up... Huh? It's over already?
Hold on a second. Humph... Alright, I welcome you to my abode... The Manjuu looks nervous? Why's that?
Comrade Commander, are you here to see my room? Hm? That Шутки isn't funny? Then how about... did my room come to see you, comrade Commander?
It's warm here compared to my motherland's waters. I can drink while wearing little clothing and still be fine. *glug glug*
No need to drop off my rations today, comrade Commander. I'm not sleepy yet.

*burp*... Drinking from a can doesn't feel the same...|Comrade Commander, this exercise is surprisingly fun since I don't need to do any thinking. You should try it too.|The ball and chain? It doesn't weigh much. See? Oh, sorry for startling you...
I don't have my кролик, so I'll have to use this ball and chain.
Comrade Commander, are you here to see my room? Hm? That Шутки isn't funny? Then how about... did my room come to see you, comrade Commander?
Królik is taking the day off. It'll be stronger the next time you see it. Trust me.
Hmm... If I tweak Królik around a bit like this... But, it'll probably be a problem if I don't finish this in one go... Guess I'll think about it while I eat. Mhm.
Comrade Commander, there's hot cocoa and coffee. Want some?
Let's add a little sugar... Nom. Yummy. Comrade Commander, care to try a blini?

*burp*... Warm drinks are nice.|I want to make Królik look cuter. Any good ideas how to do that, Comrade Commander?|Laffey, give me your rabbit ears for a second. Let's see how this looks... Hmm... It sort of fits, but not really...
Nice work, Comrade Commander. Now we're good on snacks for a long time ahead.
Eat as many blini as you want.
Do you want to give Królik a swing?
Hmm... If I tweak Królik around a bit like this... But, it'll probably be a problem if I don't finish this in one go... Guess I'll think about it while I eat. Mhm.
Time for action! Uraaaa!
Akashi made these Manjuu combat robots? Mwahahah. I guess even the bourgeois cat has her useful moments... I appreciate the sponsorship.
Our shift starts now. Królik, Pirožkí, Manjuus – form up! Let us realize our Manjuu comrades' dreams!
Avrora? Never mind – it's the commission team. They're back.
Mwahahah... The port is mine now, Comrade Commander. Not really, just joking.
Time to get to work, Pirožkí. Roar!
Here's your mail, Comrade Commander. Mwahahah...

Nobody's getting through us, not even you, Comrade Commander... Hot chocolate? For me? Thanks. The entrance is over there.|Kent's scones are so good... I'll take those as today's payment, please.|Show me what you can do, Porta-Królik.
Here, Pirožkí. Food.
Don't tempt fate, or you'll see Królik's bad side. Mwahahah...
Our shift starts now. Królik, Pirožkí, Manjuus – form up! Let us realize our Manjuu comrades' dreams!
*burp*... I can keep this up a while longer.
Chang Chun styled my hair to complement this dress. Do you think it looks good, Comrade Commander?
*burp*... Now I think I get the appeal of tea. Why is the cup so small, though? Do you have a bigger one on hand, Comrade Commander?
You don't feel hot, Comrade Commander? All this tea is starting to make me sweat... I think I'm going to fan myself for a bit...
Drink your tea while it's still hot, Comrade Commander.

Strong green tea is almost as good as hot chocolate. It sucks I can't chug it since this cup is so tiny.|Gremyashchy and I left our weapons at Gromky's place for safekeeping. She said it's dangerous to walk around with them out.|This fake plant looks nice... Hm? It's not fake, it's real?
Whew. Could you give me a refill, Comrade Commander? Thanks.
Comrade Commander, stop doing that before I go fetch Królik.
*burp*... Now I think I get the appeal of tea. Why is the cup so small, though? Do you have a bigger one on hand, Comrade Commander?
Forward in formation! "Let not a single scrap of armor remain of our enemies!"
Are you a cat person, Commander? Cats are actually quite clever. If you're ever struggling to choose between two things, just let a cat decide. The results may surprise you!
Hai Tien-class protected cruiser – Hai Chi.
Those girls you sent out have returned! I've readied a small meal for them. An army can't march on an empty stomach, you know!
Hmph. Everything you've done and said, I'll hold against you forever!
I wonder what gift I should buy for Hai Tien on my next trip... Wait, I've got it! The same as usual – a yummy snack!
If I'll ever have to make a tough life decision, I'll face it with solemn courage and thrust forward, like a river current cleaving through land! ....Hoo! Haah!

We have a saying in the Dragon Empery, "the time spent sharpening your axe is made back multifold on the job." In other words, taking some time to rest makes you more productive in the end! So, with that in mind... How about we go on a journey right now?
If I've put you off with my habit to say whatever pops into my mind, then... sorry! Then again, you've known me for so long you must be used to it by now. Right? Hehehe~
You like my hair ornament? Thanks, but no touching, please.
Welcome back, Commander! Did the sortie take you far from home? Did anything interesting happen? Come on, I wanna know!
voiceline.oath: Where'd you go this time, Commander? The stories about your journeys are as interesting to me as dramatic operas!

voiceline.line: Gah... Don't you dare underestimate me!
"A sharp mind is honed through diligence and dulled by indolence." Commander, you'd better get ready to give it your all today!
voiceline.oath: Let's get to work, Commander! The faster we get it done, the sooner we can do other stuff! It's as easy as that!

voiceline.line: Bweh... I'll get you for this!
Commander! A horseback messenger brought this – a letter for you!

Do you have any interest in Dragon Empery's traditional opera? In that case, I'd be glad to show you an example. What sort of piece would you want me to perform?|My sister's pretty reserved, but I don't shy away from speaking my mind. Comes as naturally to me as breathing!|The Dragon Empery has a proverb that goes, "it is never too late for the noble to take revenge," but personally, I disagree! If you don't set wrongdoers straight right away, they'll only be emboldened!
voiceline.extra: Commander! You should definitely come watch my next spear dance performance! I guarantee your jaw will drop when you see it! Hehehe~|"Reward the righteous and punish the wicked, and you will live neither indebted nor in regret." That's my motto! You can't go easy on wrongdoers – they'll only keep pushing the boundary of what they can get away with!

voiceline.line: You've got new missions! I'll do the navigating!
Mission complete! Might I interest you in a dramatic performance during breaktime?

I'm Hai Chi, Hai Tien-class protected cruiser number two. With how different we are, you almost wouldn't believe Hai Tien and I are sisters. She likes staying indoors and reading, while I prefer getting out and going places! "Wiser is she who travels ten thousand miles than she who reads ten thousand books," after all!

Oh my gosh! Is this for me? Hehehe~ Know that you're in safe hands with me. I promise you're not gonna regret this decision! If you didn't know, I'm the world's best housewife, bar none! Now, with our vows made, let's get started packing our belongings and go on a productivity-boosting honeymoon!
Hi-yah! We'll scatter you like petals in the current!
Commander, if there's anything on your mind, just say it to me straight away!
Oh, you are so gonna get an earful from my sister for this!
voiceline.oath: Being upfront about your feelings is good, b-but I'd appreciate at least a little restraint!

voiceline.line: You're the Commander? Hahah, I've heard all about you! Oh right, I forgot to introduce myself! I'm Hai Chi, Hai Tien-class cruiser. My two favorite things are traditional opera and going on trips! ...But, let's cut the chit-chat. You'll learn more about me soon enough anyway!
"Spare no expense. Even a dull blade can shine bright," right?
"When I take the reins, none may stand before me!"
For this part, I guess I should pose like... this? Ah, you're back, Commander? Perfect! Could you watch for a sec and tell me if my moves are on-point?
Look, Commander! I've become a goddess from the Dragon Empery's folklore! Hehehe! Let me perform for you a song and dance number I just learned!
"Clouds of fog sail the air as pond lotuses bloom. The mountain recluse descends from the sky to play a melody." My sis composed this little poem on the spur of the moment and I wrote it down!
Welcome, Commander! I'll be performing a Dragon Empery dance at the port later today. Wanna come watch?

This act – known as the "behind-back pipa" – takes serious skill. You can't pull it off with half-baked effort!|Allow me to play you a song on my pipa! Full disclosure though: I only started learning it a while ago. If something sounds off, don't be afraid to point it out!|Struggling with poetic rhymes? Ask my sis, she can produce ten verses without even thinking about it! No, seriously!
You've fallen for my goddess-like looks, haven't you~? Hehehe, it's okay to come out and admit it~
Ugh, Commander! This is NOT how you treat a goddess!
Look, Commander! I've become a goddess from the Dragon Empery's folklore! Hehehe! Let me perform for you a song and dance number I just learned!
Is the only way to end war... through more war?
"It is easier to relate with the despair of a wilting flower than the beauty of a blooming flower." ...Do you think I'm being too sentimental?
Hai Tien-class protected cruiser – Hai Tien.
It looks like the girls have returned from their commissions. Make sure you show them your gratitude.
Please do not talk to me. I wish to be alone.
The beautiful part about poems is not only their rhymes and coupling, but also the many thoughts hidden between the lines... Do you have an interest in the path of poetry, Commander?
There are many forms of poetry, including the bold and uninhibited "Boundless Waves" style, as well as the gentle and reserved "Country Jade" style. Which do you prefer, Commander?
*Sigh*... Oh, my apologies, Commander. I'm perfectly fine. It's just that... I recently read some excellently-composed poems about "reminiscence." I suppose I found them to be... extremely relatable.
As a commander, the winds of war may one day take you far, far away... But no matter where you are, please remember –– we will always be together under the same night sky.
voiceline.oath: It is quite natural for me to be in high spirits. After all, my beloved is by my side, your warmth imbuing me with a happiness that overflows without cessation. What cause could I possibly have to be displeased? And just like me, I hope that as long as I remain by your side, your precious smile will never fade away~♪

voiceline.line: Hm? I feel perfectly fine though?
voiceline.oath: Hmph... I'm not a child anymore...

voiceline.line: Commander, good work in your operation. I have prepared some nutritious tremella lotus soup for you. Please dig in... Um, did I make it too sweet...?
The fog's rolling in...?!
"Time is worth its measure in gold." Commander, if you don't start your work by now, you'll end up wasting the entire day.
voiceline.oath: Let what should be done today not burden you tomorrow. Commander, let's both strive to reject procrastination.

voiceline.line: I see... "Even horses can stumble."
Every word and letter written on this paper is a deep thought from far away...

Looks like Hai Chi is just as energetic as always. Oh... Is she a bother to you, Commander?|I left a manuscript of poetry on your desk, Commander. If you would please peruse it when you have the time.|What shall we do for dinner? Hmm... How about some mapo tofu?
voiceline.extra: The Dragon Empery has produced countless beautiful works that evoke the imagery of love, such as red beans symbolizing fidelity, and the ever-famous mandarin ducks... Hehe, maybe we should recite some love poem together, Commander?

voiceline.line: Commander, please make sure you remember to complete all your missions today.
Good work completing your missions. I'm sure the rewards will be great as well.
I am Hai Tien, a Hai Tien-class protected cruiser from the Dragon Empery. There's not much to say about my past except perhaps... that fate was unkind to me.

"Being able to find one's soulmate in the flowing river of time is the greatest blessing in life." Wait, um, that means we're more than just good friends.... Err, umm, I'm okay with that too... I mean, wait, give me a second to sort out my thoughts... P-please, just a moment!
"Even mountains will move before an unbreakable spirit!"
Oh, my apologies... I was thinking about the book of poems I was reading earlier. What can I do for you?
voiceline.oath: Whether you'd like to discuss some poetry or simply chat for a bit, I'd love to spend some time with you.

voiceline.line: H-how shameless of you...!
voiceline.oath: Ah, um, at least let me prepare myself...

voiceline.line: Pleased to meet you, Commander. I am Hai Tien of the Dragon Empery. As a newcomer who knows not the customs of this place, please bear with me should I make any blunders.
"To do a good job, a craftman must first have the right tools." Thank you very much, Commander.
"War stains the land for a thousand miles, bullets salting the earth in its wake." ...When will the flames of war finally be snuffed out?
voiceline.oath: It would appear that the winds of fortune favor us today. Hehe~

voiceline.line: What a serendipitous meeting this is, Commander. I was simply searching for a place where I could leisurely enjoy my poetry manuscript. Since fate has brought both of us here, why don't we accompany each other for a while?

"Lotus flowers blooming in a clear pond, clouds flowing through the air, a sage descends from their dwelling, playing music and dancing about." ...Hehe, Hai Chi's dance is something worth appreciating. If that sounds interesting to you, why don't we go watch her together?
Good morning, Commander. It's still early in the morning; why not rest a bit more?

Just looking at all the carp in the pool, full of vigor and vitality, seems to uplift my spirit as well.|I finished writing my couplet for the Lunar New Year, and Ying Swei is preparing to transcribe it. She even said, "We made it through without relying on Chao Ho." Looks like the two get along well.|I've prepared some splendid dishes for the upcoming Spring Festival banquet. Sweet and sour fish, braised pork feet, and dongpo pork... Yep, they all look good!
You'll hold this for me? Why, thank you very much.
My, it looks like this drunkard has set their sights on something other than alcohol.

What a serendipitous meeting this is, Commander. I was simply searching for a place where I could leisurely enjoy my poetry manuscript. Since fate has brought both of us here, why don't we accompany each other for a while?
Show me the fool that dares challenge the mighty Hakuryuu!
My room's a bit messy, you say? So what? There's no problem as long as I can find everything I need.
voiceline.oath: What a pain... Cleaning is such a chore... Hey, Commander, since you're here, mind helping me tidy up?

voiceline.line: Aircraft carrier – Hakuryuu.
Did the commission fleet come back while I was sidetracked? Oh, you're going to go greet them? See you in a bit.
voiceline.oath: Wh-what is it? Oh, the commission fleet is back? ...W, wait, don't pull on me! At least let me grab my katana... Ahem. Anyway, let's get going.

voiceline.line: Scum. Stay away from me.
Praise me if I do well. Berate me if I do poorly. That's just how work goes. There's no need to concern yourself over me.
Not too bad. You might actually be able to keep pace with me... Hmph. But if you become complacent or regress, I'll cast you aside faster than anyone else.
Umm, have you seen my katana...? I swear I left it here, but it's nowhere to be found... Ahem! A-a-anyways, if I don't find it soon, um... it's a really big deal, so please help me...!

Now that you've seen my secret, I can no longer afford to let you out of my sight! Hmph, from now on, we shall do everything together! ...Of course that includes going outside to play... W-wait, this kind of feels like I'm getting taken advantage of...!
How dare you pat me without permission. Have you no fear of being cut down?
voiceline.oath: Wh-what are you doing?! Stop! Please stop that already!

voiceline.line: M-my katana... Phew... Ahh, I really don't feel complete without it. ...Hey, why are you still here? Do you really have the free time to stand around in a daze?
voiceline.oath: Y-yes?! I'm here! P-please don't eat me...?! D-don't sneak up on me when I don't have my weapon...

voiceline.line: How could the great Hakuryuu be damaged?!
So you've come. Color me surprised. I assumed you had overslept, but that seems to not be the case.
voiceline.oath: Oh, it's you. What are we going to do today– G-give my katana back! Y-you're training me to get used to not having it...? Whyyy?!

voiceline.line: L-let's get out of here! ....H-has anyone seen my katana?!
A new missive? ...Oh, it's not a duel challenge. Boring.

It is great to have access to such a wide variety of sparring opponents here... Friends? Hmph, just having one or two is sufficient.|My katana is my soul. Should it leave my side, I... Never mind, forget I said anything.|I had the opportunity to roll some rice balls during my free time. You may have them if you're hungry.
voiceline.oath: If it's about that fight earlier, we could've just slugged it out. What's the point of dragging the issue back to the dinner table? Ugh...|I think I should leave this backup sword with you... I mean, just in case... Just in case I drop mine, it'll be a huge help to have you around...|It's time to make rice balls! You should have some too! Do I love white rice so much because of my name?! ...What are you, stupid?

voiceline.line: Missions? I have no desire to waste my time on such trifling chores. I'll leave that to you.
See, I knew you had it in you. The ability to handle trifling chores is quite commendable.
I am Hakuryuu, aircraft carrier of the Sakura Empire. Let any who dares question my might face me head-on. I shall teach them the meaning of overwhelming power.

You think I'd just sit there and listen to your sentimental... M-my katana?! When'd you get your hands on that?! Give it back! Please, I'll do anything you say! ...Fine, I admit defeat... Ughh, but... this somehow doesn't feel all that bad...
Divine retribution befalls you!
What is it? If you require something of me, speak your mind.
What, are you trying to imitate me? ...Hey, knock it off already!
voiceline.oath: F-fine, it's not like I can beat you anyway... Hyaah?!

voiceline.line: So, this brat is supposed to be the commander? My name is Hakuryuu. Listen well – try to control me, and you will make a laughingstock of yourself. Remember this!
Hmph. The distance between me and the rest grows ever greater.
Hmph! They sent lowly scum to try to stop the mighty Hakuryuu? How laughable!
Thanks to my little friends here, the kitchen is nice and tidy. Well, not that I mind if things are a little messy. Ahaha!

All righty, one freshly-sliced plate of sashimi coming right up! ...Huh? I'm coming across too aggressive? Even after I went through all this trouble for you, you still have something to nitpick about? ...Well, whatever. Enjoy your meal!
*grumble*... Oh, hey you, perfect timing! C'mere and help me think up some new recipes!
Uhhh, oh no... This tingling, anxious feeling... Eek? Oh, my katana... Thanks for that... Ahem! Commander, let's hurry up and get to work!
A new letter? ...No way, are we getting challenged to a cooking duel?

Huh? You got a problem with the great Hakuryuu's cooking, you scallywag? ...Oh, you ran out of sashimi? Got it. I'll serve you right up.|Huh? My blade isn't cut out for kitchen work? You, stop that snickering this instant! Your jaw's gonna hit the floor when you see my magnificent bladework!|Oi, you plan on watching all day or are you gonna come help me? Knowing you, I'm sure you've got what it takes!
Did another order come in just now? Heh. I'll take care of it.
All done with your missions? Good timing, I just finished prepping the order.
NOBODY TOUCHES THE KATANA!! ...Oh, sorry. Got a little carried away there. Did I scare you?
Do you want this blade of mine to turn you into fine filets?

All righty, one freshly-sliced plate of sashimi coming right up! ...Huh? I'm coming across too aggressive? Even after I went through all this trouble for you, you still have something to nitpick about? ...Well, whatever. Enjoy your meal!
I, Halsey Powell, shall lead this fleet to victory!
Ehehe~ See, Commander, you're totally into me after all, aren't you~?
Fletcher-class destroyer – Halsey Powell, Hull Number DD-686.
The commission fleet is returning? I'll go greet them! ...That's right, the more you put yourself out there, the quicker you can make a name for yourself!
Just you wait! When I become the most famous person at the port...!
All right! I'm going to put my best foot forward for everyone to see!
It might be hard to stand out from the rest of the Fletchers, but... Commander, I know you'll be able to come up with something!
It's going to be hard to capture everyone's attention here, but... but... Yeah, I'll start by making sure I have your undivided attention!

I like it when you shower me with attention, Commander~ Ehehe... However! At this rate, I'm going to end up as some simple-minded girl who can throw away her dreams as long as she gets to cling to you! ...Though that doesn't sound half bad... But, forget it! Ehehe!
Gah! Commander, I bet you took advantage of the fact that I wouldn't be around to go somewhere fun!
Am I really in a pinch...?
Staaaaaare... Commander doesn't look any different today!
Awww... P-please don't look at meeee...
Don't you forget, I'm the one who brought you the mail!

Bad little submarines, come out, come out, wherever you are~ |I'm a bit jealous of the Little Beavers... If only I had the same legendary feats as them... |Jeez, Commander, you have such a cute and capable Destroyer right next to you, but you're so absorbed in your work!
Commander, it seems like you'll need a capable assistant after all... Ehehe, you need my talents, don't you~!
Don't forget that I helped you with that mission! Ehehe, vanilla ice cream is waiting for me~!
There are a lot of us Fletchers, but nobody's done a better job of supporting than Halsey Powell! Whether it's anti-air or anti-sub, nobody out there can match me!
With this ring, I'm totally going to capture everyone's attention! Hehe... my dreams are finally coming true... Huh? Commander, you want me to only capture your attention? Why's that?
Keep your eyes on me!

Commander, are you in a pickle? Do you need my help? Hehe, I'd be glad to give you a hand, but the cute little Halsey Powell won't work for free... Hmm, if you treat me to lots of tasty snacks, we have a deal!
Y-You can't do that...!
There you are, Commander! Ehehe~ Huh? You've never heard of me? Jeez, I'm Halsey Powell! Don't you forget it!
I have to get stronger, and shine even brighter!
Mhmhm! Do bask in the heroic visage of your MVP, Halsey Powell!
The Dragon Empery's lucky star is an old geezer? I see... W-wait! I don't want to be the lucky star anymore!
Halsey Powell is making her debut as your lucky star for the Spring Festival! Commander, if you show me a fun time, you'll be blessed with good luck this year!
I've finished hanging up all the paper lanterns around the port! Hehe, now when everyone sees them, they'll praise the hardworking maiden who put them up - that's right, me!
Commander, Happy Spring Festival! Um, hey, where's my red envelope?

I want to eat something sweet and fluffy... |The Zodiac is really neat! But... why is there a dog and a rat on there but no cat? |Commander, why don't we make a huge paper lantern? One that stands out from the rest!
If you're ever in trouble, just leave it to your lucky star, Halsey Powell!
Commander, bad luck unto you!
Halsey Powell is making her debut as your lucky star for the Spring Festival! Commander, if you show me a fun time, you'll be blessed with good luck this year!
This wind... is perfect for battle!
This time too... I swear to protect my friends!
Kagerou-class destroyer number thirteen – Hamakaze.
Well done... Commissions are hardly a big deal compared to Rat Transports, right?
Stupid meatheaded Commander...
Commander, history surely won't repeat itself... right?
I hope one day... Destroyer Division 17 can reunite here...
The breeze feels really nice today... But we can't afford to rest yet! Yamato... wait for me...
For as long as the wind blows, I will always be by your side.
Great job. Did everyone do their job during the sortie?
Now's not the time to lose focus, Commander.
I have to rescue the survivors...
Reading through these reports should be your top priority.

Tanikaze, until you finish your training, don't expect to get much beauty sleep!|Though I may be but a single destroyer, I'll still do all I can to protect everyone.|Bou-no-misaki... where it all came to an end...|
Our next mission is...
Your grades are going up, Commander.

I'm Hamakaze, 13th Kagerou-class destroyer. Although I took part in quite a few battles, it feels like I spent more time rescuing friends than sinking foes... And now, I fight once more to protect my friends.
M-maybe we should wait until it's all over... Th-that said, I'd feel bad if I rejected you now, so I'll have to accept it... Hey, stop laughing!
I see an opening!
Hm? What are you looking at, Commander?
Eek! ... Commander, just where do you think you're touching?
Hamakaze, 13th ship of the Kagerou-class destroyers, reporting for duty. Commander, try not to get my name wrong.
The wind grows stronger.
Heheh! This is nothing spectacular for me!
Hm, hm... at this range, with these forces... we can win!
Learning is exciting. The joy of acquiring new knowledge, the sense of achievement from solving difficult problems... you'll understand once you try it. So, shall we study together, Commander?
Commander, were you able to solve that question from yesterday?

Urakaze, Isokaze, Tanikaze, have you all taken your seats? Then let's review the essentials of the last formula we studied.|Improve yourself so that you can better protect those you care about. That's why I study as hard as I do.|Here we'll use this equation, then do this... Hah, a trivial question like this is no issue for me.
Commander, you won't find the answer underneath my skirt.
Commander, take your reading more seriously!
Learning is exciting. The joy of acquiring new knowledge, the sense of achievement from solving difficult problems... you'll understand once you try it. So, shall we study together, Commander?
That parabola... was beautiful...
Commander, have you been having more fun since I arrived? ... I see, that's great! Ehehe... Hamakaze, getting hyped!
Could you stop poking my cheek, Tanikaze... Hey, stop! No poking there, especially!|I love seeing my friends smile. That's why...|It's not over yet... This time, I'll triumph... at Bou-no-misaki.
Commander, I think you can see further if you do it like this.
Eek! ... Commander, this is unacceptable!
Commander, have you been having more fun since I arrived? ... I see, that's great! Ehehe... Hamakaze, getting hyped!
I'm going to crush all of you weaklings!
You pervert! What are you staring at?!
Sims-class Destroyer - Hammann, Hull Number DD-412!
A commission has been completed, idiot!
I don't even feel like getting angry anymore...
Just what are you staring at?! You pervert!
You're totally wrong if you think you've improved your relationship with me! ... I guess I'll admit it's improved.... But just a little!
Why am I always so angry? Because a certain commander just won't learn! And I'm angry at myself for not getting angry at him!

If you're not looking at me, then at whom?! You just don't understand girls at all because you're so stupid! Just because I'm not being proactive doesn't mean you... Wha?! Don't hug me all of a sudden... I-I'll call the police!
Good work... I-I didn't say anything! Get back to work, now!
How long were you going to keep me waiting?! Being alone feels so... Hmph!
*Sob*... Commander, you big idiot!
I brought your mail, Commander... Where's my "thanks"?!
Get ready for punishment if you open the window!|I-168's been here, hasn't she? I'll teach her a lesson!|Why won't you talk to me?
Go finish your missions already!
Are you actually going to have me open the rewards for you?

What are you looking at? Hammann is Hammann! 
Yorktown? I've never regretted trying to save her! I don't need your pity! Hmph! ... But... thank you...
You've finally learned, haven't you? I'll gratefully accept it... B-b-but I'm not happy about it in the slightest!
I'm not doing it just for you or anything like that!
I don't want you touching me, you pervert!
(Picks up phone) Hello, is this Military Police? Yes, this Commander is a pervert and he...
Hey! Don't stare at me like such an idiot, you pervert! ... I'm cute? Did you really think just complimenting me would make me happy? You moron!
Hmph, flattering me won't get you anywhere!
Hmph, did you really think this would be enough to make me happy?
A-are you staring at my swimsuit...? Hmph! J-just for today I'll let you worship me!
I'm not really happy at all! But since you're bonding with me for once, I have to say... thank y... H-hmph! I didn't say anything!

I never said it was okay to just ignore me!|If you like beach volleyball so much then go play with Cygnet instead of me! Hmph!|Hey, stupid Commander, who are you looking at?! Y-you should be looking at me...
Y-you pervert! I'll shoot you!
*Eek* ... Yorktown, I-I can't hold the commander back anymore...
I'm not really happy at all! But since you're bonding with me for once, I have to say... thank y... H-hmph! I didn't say anything!
How long do you plan to keep staring... The party's going to end at this rate! You dummy!

Hmph! I'm only here because you pleaded so desperately for me to come! Don't get any funny ideas! ...Why did I take so long to pick out my clothes? It... it's not like I was trying to impress anyone! I definitely wasn't looking forward to this party or anything!

W-well, since you were on such good behavior during the party, you do deserve some praise. What should I do next... H-hey! Don't suddenly hug me...! Ugh... Jeez... Wh-what am I going to do with you...
Good work... wh-what's your deal! Even I know when someone deserves praise!
Commander, how long do you plan to keep me waiting?! Um... It, it's not like I went out of my way to show up early or anything!

Woah... This is the first time I've seen Yorktown like that... Is she going to be okay?|That Sims... I bet she's hiding somewhere waiting to pull a prank on me... Commander, m-make sure to protect me!|Iroha is here as well?! ...Wh-whatever! Since I'm here with the commander, I'll let her slide this time!
E-even if we're dancing, I won't forgive you if you touch any weird places!
Hello, naval police? Yes, it's that commander again, this time at the party...

Hmph! I'm only here because you pleaded so desperately for me to come! Don't get any funny ideas! ...Why did I take so long to pick out my clothes? It... it's not like I was trying to impress anyone! I definitely wasn't looking forward to this party or anything!
I-I'm going into battle wearing THIS?!
Stop staring at me already, stupid Commander! ...You need to, or you can't evaluate my dancing? Well... stop staring anyway!
Ughh... These gloves are so heavy and the dress is too revealing. Why on earth did I decide to put these on... I can't show myself to Yorktown like this!
Hey, dummy, commission complete... No! There's no way in hell I'm going out wearing this!
Well done and all that... Wait, what do you mean "Sims took pictures?!" Why didn't you tell me that sooner?!
Dang it... I told you I can't fight like this!

This attachable tail can move? Really, huh... And why do you know that?!|Hah, aren't these cat ears just the cutest? I thought so.|Eldridge's costume looks easier to move about in... N-no, I don't wanna try it, you stupid perv!
Go review our job offers! Now!
Here, the rewards. That Chesh-something girl came and delivered it earlier.
You want me to shake fans' hands? With these bulky paws?
Eek! You shameless pervert!
Ughh... These gloves are so heavy and the dress is too revealing. Why on earth did I decide to put these on... I can't show myself to Yorktown like this!
Hmph! That's what happens when you poke fun at me!
Finally, I'm free again... Now you're going to feel my wrath!
Wh-what do you think?! Like I'd ever agree to be turned into a present! It's just... I didn't know what else to give you for Christmas...
I-I'm nobody's surprise! Ugh, I should've never listened to Sims... Stop staring already and undo these ribbons around my arms!
Do you think it's funny to leave me stuck in this box?!
I'll do it myself! Hngghh! *pant*... I-I can't do it after all... Stop being useless and help me out!

Just how long are you gonna keep me like this, you half-witted commander?!|Hmph! You're not gonna get any work done without me helping you!|I haven't given Yorktown my present yet... I can't just be stuck like this all day!
G-give me some space, you idiot! ...N-no, that doesn't mean I'm telling you to stay away!
You're really exploiting the fact that I can't move... I'm never, ever forgiving you for this!
I-I'm nobody's surprise! Ugh, I should've never listened to Sims... Stop staring already and undo these ribbons around my arms!
How long are you going to keep looking... I want to go see how Yorktown is doing...
I'm just wearing new clothes, so why should I have to raise my skirt like this? Huh? You want me to look more upset? You... you pervert!
Good work out there... W-what! I'll give a decent compliment to someone who works hard, even if they're stupid!
You're a full-blown pervert beyond saving if just seeing these clothes makes you so excited!
nil|As long as you promise to work hard, I'll stay with you for just a little longer... I guess?|nil
I'm just wearing new clothes, so why should I have to raise my skirt like this? Huh? You want me to look more upset? You... you pervert!
Be careful, everyone. Watch out for the submarines...!

I love the way countless flowers bloom vividly during the spring, but even so, I wouldn't want it to be spring all year long - that would be unfair to the flowers that only bloom in other seasons. Mhm, I'm sure the four seasons exist so that all flowers have a chance to bloom. Hehe~
voiceline.oath: This month's flower... and to combine that with some seasonal picks... but I can't just slap them all together like this. I'll have to narrow it down a bit more... Commander, wh-what do you think about this?

voiceline.line: Akizuki-class destroyer number thirteen – Hanazuki.
The commission fleet has returned. Commander, should I bring some herbal tea with me to welcome them back?
Commander, I do not wish to see you ostracized by anyone... But at this rate, I may not be able to do anything for you...
The sun is shining brightly, and it's another beautiful day outside. Commander, if you aren't busy, would you like to view the flowers with me?

It's embarrassing to admit it, but... I tried to pick up gardening several times but kept getting stuck because I couldn't decide what I wanted to grow... Commander, do you have any flowers that you're partial towards? I want to make up my mind this time!

Some flowers bloom all year long while others are fleeting and ephemeral. Some are purely ornamental, while others have therapeutic uses... Commander, do you like flowers that bloom dazzlingly, or those that bloom silently and out of view? ...Ah, sorry, I'm not making any sense...

Commander, I hope this is not too presumptuous of me, but may I decorate your office with some fresh flowers? I want to give you something that reminds you of me, even when I am absent... It's just a little selfish whim of mine, hehe~
voiceline.oath: Commander, have you been watering the flowers in the office? ...It's important to me, because it gives me something to remember you by when you aren't here.

voiceline.line: Welcome back, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander. I followed Oyashio's advice and changed my ornamental flowers around a little. Is it to your liking?

voiceline.line: Ngh... As long as the others are safe...
Welcome back, Commander. Shall we continue our work? Should you have any concerns, please feel free to consult me. I shall do all I can to assist you.
voiceline.oath: You've been working hard, Commander. The next thing I should be doing is... Ah, um, first, let's start by organizing the resources!

voiceline.line: I see, because of my indecisiveness... I am terribly sorry for dragging everyone down...
New mail seems to have arrived. If you need me to sort it for you, please let me know.

Commander, do you prefer herbal tea, or black tea? |Commander, Harutsuki seems to have gotten herself in some trouble. I'd like to check on her, so would you mind if I left you for a bit? |"The sun in the west, the moon in the east, canola blossoms inbetween." I'd love to see this scenery myself.
voiceline.oath: Commander, I prepared something special for you today... Umm, it's jasmine tea! I chose it because it's supposed to bring good luck, but...|Niizuki is fun to talk to, but... why does she act that way when around people who aren't her relatives...?|nil

voiceline.line: So many unfinished tasks... Commander, wh-where should we start?
voiceline.oath: Commander, the next task is... H-how about this one?

voiceline.line: Congratulations! As expected Commander, you've completed our missions with flying colors!

I entered service during the tail end of the War as an Akizuki-class specialized for anti-air and anti-submarine capabilities... Err, I guess it was the Fuyutsuki-class... Or was it the Michitsuki-class... Err... S-sorry, I still have a lot to learn, so I'd greatly appreciate your guidance!

I see that while my heart was still wavering, you've already made up yours. Then, I won't hesitate to reciprocate your feelings either... Hanazuki will gladly accept this ring. I'm so glad that I can be someone who is important to you...
Hanazuki is here to offer support!
Anything you need me to do, as long as it is within my abilities, I would gladly do for you.
Eek?! Um, if I may be so bold... this sort of behavior is... It would be best not to do this to the other girls...
voiceline.oath: Ah...! Commander, um... It's not that you can't, but... at least give me some time to mentally prepare myself...

voiceline.line: I, destroyer Hanazuki from the Sakura Empire, would like to extend my humble greetings to you. As a member of the Akizuki class, I specialize in anti-air and anti-sub warfare, but please do not hesitate to call upon me where I am needed.
I see, I see. That was quite educational.
It's only right that I offer my gratitude to everyone who fought alongside me.
Even though it's the same sea as always, watching the clouds with you while wearing this unusual outfit is filling me with novel sensations I've never felt before...
I've heard some say that summer is the season of cherry blossoms, lotus petals, and sunflowers, but... If you ask me, being able to leisurely enjoy the breeze with you feels pretty good too. Hehe~
Are you weary, Commander? If so, why not try some of my lavender honey tea? It's great for recovering from fatigue.
Today may be my day off, but if there is anything I can do for you, please do not hesitate to call upon me.

Look, Commander, that coral reef... Hehehe, the "flowers" in the sea are quite beautiful as well, aren't they? |This swimsuit... took a lot of agonizing over, but I eventually made my decision... Commander, what do you think? Does it look good on me? |Gah...! ...Ah, s-sorry! I was just looking at the ocean... and suddenly shifted into anti-submarine mode... I know I shouldn't be so uptight during time off!
Do you need me to lend you a swim ring?
Eek?! Ehh?! S-sorry! Ah, um, Commander, the strap is...
I've heard some say that summer is the season of cherry blossoms, lotus petals, and sunflowers, but... If you ask me, being able to leisurely enjoy the breeze with you feels pretty good too. Hehe~
Let us ring in the new year with a splendid victory!
The floral patterns on the Dragon Empery's dresses are so pretty... How should I thank Miss Aurora for picking out such a wonderful selection?
What kinds of flowers should I decorate the office with for the Lunar New Year...? Ugh, I just can't decide! Um, Commander, will you be inspecting the interior? I'll show you around! Phew...
Everyone in the commission fleet has returned. I've prepared some gifts for them... Oh, should I set off some firerackers first?
Commander... *blushes*
Zzz... Nnh... Hwah?! C-Commander? I'm so sorry, I must've fallen asleep while waiting for you...
Please tell me which tasks you'd like to start with, and which events you'd like to attend.

The entire port is filled with the gentle aroma of fresh flowers~ Even though it's not quite spring yet, doesn't this holiday carry a bit of that longing for the early arrival of spring?|Hibiki, and Kasumi? Wh-what's the matter...? Recommended events? Um, um... errr... C-Commander, help me...|nil
Commander, um... N-nevermind! It's nothing...!
What kinds of flowers should I decorate the office with for the Lunar New Year...? Ugh, I just can't decide! Um, Commander, will you be inspecting the interior? I'll show you around! Phew...
Look alive! Don't give the enemies an opening!
Nothing can be achieved without repeated practice. Your Excellency, you should know this quite well, yes?
H-class destroyer – Hardy (H87)
As a leader, if you have the right to give orders to others, then you must also cherish their contributions.
I abhor slovenly people!
...Ugh! Um, Your Excellency... My apologies, but when I feel an unfamiliar presence approach me... Ahem! In any case, it's my policy to not let my guard down.
A tea party...? Thank you for your consideration, but I still have to finish my training... B-but, I'd appreciate it if you could bring me a slice of cake...
Overthinking can have unintended consequences...? I see, I'll keep that in mind.
Your Excellence, even if you try to sneak up on me, I've already memorized your aura... Eek?! Wh-why are you hugging me? Ahaha... It t-tickles, it tickles!
Your Excellency, is there anything we should reflect upon regarding this previous battle?
I've got to hang in there...!
You seem to be running a little late. Your Excellent, please begin your work soon.
Don't stay here! Please withdraw immediately!
Your Excellency, don't assume I'll be getting the mail for you every time!

There's something relaxing about this office, hmm... W-woah?! I, I'm not nodding off!|I may be a flotilla leader, but that's because I've earned the trust of my sister ships. It's not like I have a higher rank than them.|Hunter, I bet you ate my cake again! ...Oh, sorry, Your Excellency, did I disturb you?
Your Excellency, let's begin the mission after reviewing the documents.
Look, Your Excellency! We've gotten so many rewards!

I am Hardy, flotilla leader of the Royal Navy's H-class. At the Battle of Narvik, I led an assault on an Iron Blood port. We were able to land a heavy blow, but the enemy reinforcements... If only I had more time back then...

I know! I know you're going to tell me to not overthink things! But, I have to tell you as well... Your Excellency, you're too slovenly at times! I'll be watching your every move from now on, so prepare yourself!
I won't give you an opening!
Eek?! ...Your Excellency? Please don't suddenly touch me like that!
This rapier may be decorative, but the business end still hurts!
It's an honour to meet you, Your Excellency. Hardy, destroyer of the Royal Navy, reporting for duty.
Phew... Though I've become stronger, I can't afford to lapse in my training...
Everyone, this victory is even more reason to not let your guard down.
All righty, time to get fired up!
voiceline.oath: All right! Let's get 'em!

voiceline.line: You want to get to know me? Uhh, sure... To start with, what do you want to talk about?
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commande– Oh shoot, look ooooout! Ow, oww... Whoopsie, I did it again...

voiceline.line: Hello, Commander! I'm the idol, Haruka Amami! I'll do my best to share my dreams with everyone in port! Let's all have a great time together!
Well done on that errand, everyone! Glad to see you made it back in one piece!
Oops, sorry, I was busy reading the script. What were you saying?
I've loved singing since I was a kid. I especially love singing together with a group of friends!
Ow, oww... Oh, hi, Commander. It's nothing serious, I just tripped in the corridor... A bandaid? Aww, thank you so much!
That's enough rehearsing for one day, I think... Are you taking a break too, Commander? Then we could sit and relax together! What do you say?
Commander! I made some cookies today! They came out pretty good, I'd say. Listen, I was hoping you could... have a taste and tell me what you think?
voiceline.oath: I forgot to ask, but how'd you like that cake I made the other day? ...You loved it? Hehehe~ I get all giddy when people give me their feedback. If you want to, I could make another one for you~

voiceline.line: You like how my ribbon looks? Hehehe~ Thank you! It's my signature accessory!
Welcome back, Commander! I made snacks while you were out. Do you want some while you take a break?
The show is far from over!
Good morning, Commander! Let's roll up our sleeves and get to work!
voiceline.oath: Hey, Commander! What job are we starting the day with? Whatever it is, I'll give it my all!

voiceline.line: Urgh... Sorry for tripping up... I'll work on it so we win next time!
I think there's mail for you, Commander! Maybe it's a new job offer?

What were those little kitty creatures called again? "Meowfficers"? I bet our resident animal lover, Hibiki, would love to meet one!|I'm glad to see fellow idols at the port! They're all so cute, and so pretty to boot... I hope one day we can all go up on stage together.|I've played a villain character before, and I actually really got into the role! Didn't think it would be so fun!
voiceline.extra: Owww... I tripped again just earlier. But don't worry, I'm not hurt or anything. I trip all the time, so I'm used to it.|Commander, I was wondering if I could... Oh, you're sleeping? Hehehe~ Then I'll get you a blanket and let you get some rest.|I've learned about so many new pastries and snacks since I came here! There's this one cake recipe someone told me of a while ago that I'm dying to make for myself!

voiceline.line: There's still a few tasks we need to do. If you need my help with any of them, just say the word!
voiceline.oath: We're almost done! I'll help you with these tasks as best as I can!

voiceline.line: Job completed! Way to go, Commander!
voiceline.oath: And that's a wrap! Let's keep up this pace for the rest of today!

voiceline.line: I'm Haruka Amami! I've loved singing ever since I was little, and always dreamed of becoming an idol. It's a tough job, but I know I can overcome any challenge as long as I have my friends! Hehehe~
It's thanks to you and all the wonderful people here that I've managed to get this far and work with a smile. I want to bring a smile to your faces, just as you have for me!
Here's a smile for all my fans!
Do you need something, Commander? Oh! I'm guessing you need a hand with something.
Eeeek! Wh-what are you doing?!
voiceline.oath: Eeeeek! Please, don't do that to me all of a sudden, Commander!

voiceline.line: Hello, Commander! I'm the idol, Haruka Amami! I'll do my best to share my dreams with everyone in port! Let's all have a great time together!
I'll try to be the best, brightest-shining idol I can!
We woooon! Girls, you're awesome!
voiceline.oath: Victory! It's all thanks to you, Commander!

voiceline.line: I've tried to replicate the takoyaki and yakisoba they sell here, but I just can't get the flavor right for some reason. Isn't that weird?
Good evening, Commander! Are you also taking a break? If so, let's go get some candied apples and have a little chat~♪
Wow, you've really been out and about! Should we take a break and sit on that bench over there?
Oh, hi! I'm glad you came to the festival too, Commander! Do you want to take a look around?

What's wrong? Why are you hanging over there, Commander? Are you tired from wading through the crowds?|It's kind of annoying to walk around in a yukata. I've got to pay extra attention so I don't trip ov– Oh, shoot!|You came at just the perfect time, Commander! I just bought ramune and they gave me an extra bottle. Here, let's enjoy them!
Hehehe~ Don't you love festivals? Anyway, where should we go next?
C-Commander! Please stop, or you'll open my yukata's bottom!
Good evening, Commander! Are you also taking a break? If so, let's go get some candied apples and have a little chat~♪
Let us begin!
I wish I was as popular as Kirishima... Well, kind of...
Kongou-class fast battleship number four – Haruna.
All right, I should head out and... Huh...? Not yet...?
I've lost all hope in you.
Kongou, allow me to give you a shoulder massage.
After a tough battle, I feel like eating a whole bucket full of rice.
Can you dance, Commander? You see, um... I was wondering if you could teach me how to do it...
Commander, could I please be your dance partner for the next banquet Hiei is hosting...?
Well done out there. Did you run into any enemies?
It's not over yet!
Nice weather today. We should head out so we don't miss our chance to enjoy it. Don't you agree, Commander?
Gah... I'm sorry, but... a loss is a loss...
I like your voice, Commander. So... could you read this letter out loud for me?

At last... At long last, I will have my battle with Wales...!|When you've got bravery and willpower, no enemy is insurmountable. Isn't that right, Commander?|Joushuu beef is some of the best around. Care to try some?
Hiei, what do you say we get some exercise?
Kongou, I'm basically already an adult now.
I'm Haruna, the Sakura Empire's speediest fast battleship. I fought hard till the very end. Once more, I will fight with all my heart, holding nothing back!
T-this feels a little odd... From now on, you'll be my most beloved... H-how you "compare to my big sisters"? T-that's not at all what I was talking about!
Unleash more firepower!
Do you like Hiei's handmade sweets, too?
Hah!!!... I'll keep my gloves on next time so I can strike you without getting my hands dirty.
Hello. I'm the Sakura Empire's latest fast battleship, Haruna. I prefer to use my fists over my blade, but I hope that won't be an issue.
I've become faster!
Kongou! Please reward me!
Shoot... No time... Let's finish them, quick!
I think people will gawk at us if Kirishima and I walk around looking like this... *Sigh*... It's tough being popular...
I think it's fine to enjoy school life once in a while... Hm? You wanna know what I'm listening to? Sure, if you're okay with just one earbud.

I think I prefer working up a sweat in the sports field over reading in the classroom.|Gotta join a club... There's the karate club... Maybe that'll work?|I'm free all week after school. Why don't we hang out a bit, Commander?
I always look forward to the lunch box Hiei makes for me every day.
... Do you want me to beat you over the head with my bag?
I think it's fine to enjoy school life once in a while... Hm? You wanna know what I'm listening to? Sure, if you're okay with just one earbud.
To no surprise, Kirishima is the life of the party. Everyone wants to dance with her... I-I'll pass, though...
I guess that looks right... Since Kongou chose this for me, I must trust her judgment... Um, C-Commander, would you mind helping me out? ...It's a bit hard to walk in this outfit...
Nicely done. Let's get back to the party, shall we?
Hey, you're late. The party's already started. Oh well, let's get you a drink to whet your appetite.

If I remember Wales's wine tasting advice right... First breathe in its aroma, swirl the wine in the glass, then take another breath... Wait... So when do you drink it?|Hiei always gets real busy when a banquet or party is coming up. Commander, don't forget to praise her work next time you talk to her.|Wow, this steak is really good! Heheh, see what I told you about Joushuu beef?
A dance? You're on! I've been practicing tons just for this! Oops, give me a minute to get my bearings straight...
...I'm warning you: the turrets aren't purely decorative.
I guess that looks right... Since Kongou chose this for me, I must trust her judgment... Um, C-Commander, would you mind helping me out? ...It's a bit hard to walk in this outfit...
I knew this kimono looked good, but your approval is what really sealed the deal, Commander. It might not be the best kimono ever, but I'll gladly take a better-than-passing grade from you!
"My dear Commander, is this dress that my sisters tailored for me to your liking?" ...Okay, no, I can't do polite Hiei-speak like she can... So, anyway, h-how do I look?
Hold the umbrella like this... then turn around and slightly loosen the kimono... Hmm, no, this isn't really my style... How does Hiei pull it off so– Commander?! You're back?!
Commander, you should get to work before Kongou gets mad at you.

Getting dressed was easier than you might think, because I practiced it! See, you start from the bottom and... Oh geez!|When I say I'll do something, I'll do it right! I'll prove that even I can conduct myself elegantly, as one of Kongou's sisters!|I need to go over there, so come give me a hand, Commander... Nice, thanks. I'd rather not get my kimono soaked if I can avoid it.
You'd best stay focused on completing missions, Commander.
This isn't so easy to move in, but bringing the rewards here was easy as pie.
Watch this, I've got a stylish move for you!
What? Huh?!
My dear Commander, is this dress that my sisters tailored for me to your liking? ...Okay, no, I can't do polite Hiei-speak like she can... So, anyway, h-how do I look?
How's THAT, Kirishima?! I can battle even in a kimono!
My s-skirt is gonna get blown away!
Hyaa! C-Commander, when did you get here?
Akizuki-class destroyer number nine – Harutsuki.
Commander! E-Everyone has come home safely!
Commander, I wonder if you've been cursed...
Back then, my sisters and I were all scattered to the winds... But, we are finally reunited again. It's a miracle...
Aww.... m-my hair's all messed... Fusou's not here either, what should I do... Hm? You'd help me comb my hair? Thank you very much, Commander!
Y-You'd like to watch my kagura dance? B-but, I still have a lot of practicing to do... Fusou said that rehearsals are just as important as practice...? I see! I... I'll do my best!
C-Commander, please accept this! This is a protective good luck charm! "Marriage tie?" What do you mean...? C-Commander... you're a big bully...
Commander, you're safe! Thank goodness... my prayers were heard...
O gods, please give me guidance...!
Commander, w-welcome back!
O gods, please save us!
Commander, h-here... your letters...
O gods, please bless this port so that everyone may come home safely. |Yoizuki may seem cold, but she's very nice and is always thinking of everyone else! |Good luck! I'll... be supporting you!
C-Commander, umm... there are still missions left...
Commander, I've received the rewards!
I am the ninth ship of the Akizuki-class destroyers, Harutsuki. Due to various circumstances, I wasn't able to do much, but... I'll make up for it this time, Commander!
O gods, thank you very much for allowing me to meet Commander. I truly am blessed right now! So, um, Commander... though I'm still inexperienced, please take care of me!
O gods, please watch over us!
Commander? Would you like to try the sakura mochi that I made?
C-Commander! P-Please stop doing that... *sniffles*
I was guided here by the gods... Ah! M-My name is Harutsuki! Pleased to meet you!
C-Can I truly become stronger like this?
Surely this must have been the gods' blessings.

skins.name: A Dance for the Coming Spring

voiceline.line: Happy New Year, Commander! I am currently on my way to give a Kagura dance at the shrine. If you have time... would you like to come see it?
nil|nil|nil
Wonder if I can record this in secret...
voiceline.oath: Follow my lead, guys.

voiceline.line: Huh, you want to know more about me? Well, you'll have to bribe me with some donuts first.
voiceline.oath: Huh, Commander? You brought gifts... Wait, are those the super popular sweets that everyone's talking about?! Yay! Come on in and share the goods!

voiceline.line: Hello, I'm Hass. I was suddenly blown away to this strange place... But, I guess it seems interesting enough here. By the way, is it okay to shoot some videos here?
Good work, everyone. Find anything interesting while you were out?
Sigh... Looks like you were just another of those guys in the end...
Commander, are there any cafés around here? I was looking to snack on some sweets. Wait, you'll go with me? What a gent.
Hold up, why have you been staring at my face for so long... Eh, you want to know why I wear this mask? Well, there are a few reasons...
Commander~? What might you have been doing with that girl last night~? ...Huh? I'm mistaken? There's no way! C'mon, just tell me already~
Looks like I'm finally used to this place. Y'know, at first I was wondering what the heck I was supposed to do here. But these days, I've been having a pretty good time.
voiceline.oath: Yo, Commander. I'm about to head out to hang out with my friends, wanna tag along? No need to worry, I'm sure everyone would love to see you there.

voiceline.line: Hmm? If you want something, say it to my face~
Oh, welcome back. Perfect timing, c'mere and take a look at this video.
This is where I say... the battle starts now!
Look who's here. Well then, guess we'll get started now.
voiceline.oath: Yo, morning. I'm amazed you even manage to get up in the morning~

voiceline.line: Wait, nobody told me they were this strong. I can't believe they wouldn't pull their punches against a weak girl like me!
Commander, you've got mail, you know. I'd suggest you take a look at it before it disappears under some more mail.

Wow, this is such a nice spot~ I can't stop taking pictures.|Namiko and Rikka sure are late. We're supposed to be meeting here at the central garden... Well, I guess they don't know their way around yet, so it can't be helped.|Heh, so these cat-like things are called Meowfficers. How adorable... Super fluffy too~ I just bought some sweet potato sticks, here, take one!
voiceline.extra: Commander! The menu here at the cafeteria is pretty impressive! There are so many dishes I've never even heard of... I bet I'll get a bunch of likes if I upload these pictures to my socials.|Eh? Huh?? Were you... asleep? Sleeping even though the deadline is right around the corner... you've got nerves of steel...|Commander, your office might look nice and tidy, but when I open your shelf, I bet your documents are totally going to... not rain down everywhere? Welp, what was I expecting...

voiceline.line: Oh, looks like you've still got work left to do. I know you want to hang out, but... take care of your work first.
voiceline.oath: You're at the final stretch with your work, aren't ya? I'll put some music on, so let's focus and wrap things up~

voiceline.line: You get some pretty nice things for completing your work, don't ya. Feeling kinda jealous here, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Good work. Well then, let's go and feast on some sweets~

voiceline.line: Full-time high schooler and part-time light cruiser, Hass, reporting for duty. In my original world, I used to stream for fun as well. Is that a thing here? Let me know if there are any legendary streamers around these parts.
I've somehow managed to make it this far in this world thanks to you and your guidance. Well, I'll keep doing my best to live up to your expectations... Let's get'em, Commander.
All ready to go live~
Oh, nice timing, Commander. I was just starting to feel a bit listless. Why don't you take me around to some hidden gems around the port?
Hey, officer, over here.
voiceline.oath: Hey Commander, your pranks are going a bit overboard.

voiceline.line: Hello, I'm Hass. I was suddenly blown away to this strange place... But, I guess it seems interesting enough here. By the way, is it okay to shoot some videos here?
Hmm, this is what leveling up feels like? It's true that I do feel a bit stronger.
See, that's what you get for messing with me.
voiceline.oath: I'm invincible with my friends around~

voiceline.line: Sigh... I'm so tired of editing. Commander, wanna head out for some tea?
Hass here. Tonight, we're going to take a walk around the port at night. Aaaand, we even have a special guest– the Commander! ...Psst, hey, look at the camera real quick!
Where do we head first... to this super popular café, or to that restaurant that's about to be the next big thing... Mmn, help me think this through, Commander~
You're finally here. Well, let me start explaining how today's shoot is supposed to go...

The next shop should be the last one... After we're done, let's go on a date, just you and me... Just kidding, of course. What are you getting all flustered for?|Oh, you're lending me your jacket? You're good, aren't ya.|You think I look taller than usual? Nah, I'm telling you, you're just imagining things... Oh no, wait, don't look down at my feet!
Jeez, hey. Your eyes have been glued down there for some time now. You surely wouldn't mind telling me what you've been looking at, right, Commander?
Wait, I'll get banned from streaming...
Hass here. Tonight, we're going to take a walk around the port at night. Aaaand, we even have a special guest– the Commander! ...Psst, hey, look at the camera real quick!
Don't think too hard, just do your part and we'll win. Let's go!
Oh, also, did you know my original name was "Destroyer No. 9"? ... I suppose it's a good thing they decided to change it.
Kamikaze-class destroyer number five – Hatakaze.
Before you go collect those mission rewards, remember to give thanks to those who worked so hard for them.
Could you acknowledge the error of your ways before other girls start thinking poorly of you?
If you'd like, perhaps I could give you a wise lady's advice on how to interact with others?
Different people must be treated in their own unique way. This is no secret to social success, but it will help make you more sociable.
Ah, you should also take this amulet. It will make you more sociable. But beware: if you use it to hurt someone, you will be too.
If something's on your mind, tell me. I may be old, but my experience has been useful for solving many problems. Besides, why would you hide anything from your partner? Ahah.
Admirable work out there. Have some tea and reflect on your tactics.
Agh... So this is why they say you can't flee from pain...
A commander should at the very least be on time. But considering your achievements up till now, you at least deserve some praise.
It seems I have not kept up with the times...
Check the new mail you received. Oh, also, I have a copy of it as well.

I think Matsukaze feels compelled to worry about us so much, and sometimes we don't even know how we should respond...|If you want to slack off all day, just resign. Oh, also, you have much work left to do.|Kamikaze, could you stop teasing the Commander?
Those with talent work a lot. Do not leave missions incomplete.
Well... I wasn't expecting this big of a reward.

I'm Hatakaze, a Kamikaze-class destroyer. Oh, also, though my class might make me seem experienced, not only did I mainly engage in escort missions and achieve nothing spectacular, my story ends with my wish to fight the bitter end, like Kamikaze did, going unfulfilled. For someone like me, that's rather deplorable.

It's me you want? But I'm not attractive, I'm just a bother who likes nagging about you... You're really not joking? I-if so... *Ahem*, then till the oceans of the world dry up, I will remain by your side.
It seems to be my turn.
Anti-air is crucial. Oh, also, the price one pays for negligence is much higher than you think.
... Now if you'd just use that bravery for something else, my view of you might actually change.
You must be the Commander. I see... No, I'm not looking disgruntled. I'm Hatakaze of Destroyer Division 5. Oh, also, be ready. I will watch over you as your superior from now on.
You needn't go so far for the likes of me... But I'm still grateful.
A victory is merely a victory. Garishness and applause are needless.
I-I'll give it all I've got!
C-Commander, um... I-I'm glad you're c-checking in on me, but...
Hatsuharu-class destroyer number one – Hatsuharu.
Commander, um, the commission team is back... I-I should go greet them? N-n-n-no, there's no way!
C-Commander, i-if you get any closer then I'll s-shoot you!
C-Commander, do you think it's possible for me to get over my fear of s-strangers...?
Umm, C-Commander... C-can I ask you to be my... conversation practice partner...? I-I... want to make friends with everyone in the fleet...
*Sob*... I can't, I-I can't do it! ... B-but maybe I can hold a conversation with you, Commander...
C-Commander! I-I just managed to have a normal conversation with someone else! I'm so relieved... I-it's all thanks to you, Commander...
C-C-Commander, g-g-great work...! I-I finally managed to say it!
*Cries*... I can't possibly be a secretary...
*Cries*... I really am not suited for combat...
Commander... Y-you have mail...
I miss my sisters so much...|C-Commander... p-please don't stare at me so much...|I-I'm quite timid, b-but I'll work really hard! ... I hope...
C-Commander! Um, well... you shouldn't ignore your m-missions!
C-Commander, our rewards ha... Huh?! N-no, I don't need any!
I-I'm Hatsuharu, first ship of t-the Hatsuharu-class... I-I served in the north, together with my s-sisters from Destroyer Division 21... I didn't achieve much, b-b-but I tried my best...
O-overcoming my timid nature is going to take a lot of time, but I'm not anxious anymore... Because I know you'll always be with me, Commander...
P-please get out of the way, everyone...!
I need to talk with you more oft... Eek?!
...!! (It seems Hatsuharu has fainted.)
I-i-it's nice to meet you, I-I'm Hatsuha... U-um... P-please don't stare at me so much...!
I hope I can be of service to everyone...
Did we... win?
This is... a rabbit made of snow... I-It's still not done! ... But... making various things out of snow... i-is fun...
Everyone's playing together...? I-I think I'll pass... Y-you want me to join them? Ugh, well, if you say so, then I-I-I'll try to socialize with them...!
B-Being with the Commander, is so warm... it seems that it makes even the cold of the snow f-fine... I-I feel like I'll also be able to talk properly with everyone else...
A snowman... Somehow, I was able to finish it...
U-Um! ... I-I've already gotten u-used to Commander's gaze, so I'm okay! But... b-being stared at... I-I really can't...
Eyes, eyebrows, and a nose... Just a little bit more... | W-Wakaba? T-The snow at home port isn't c-covered in pine nuts... | S-Snowball fight?! It's im-impossible for me! ...Hau...
If it's with the Commander, this time... this time for sure... with everyone...!
Wah?! Th-This is... unhh... (It looks like Hatsuharu fainted again)
Everyone's playing together...? I-I think I'll pass... Y-you want me to join them? Ugh, well, if you say so, then I-I-I'll try to socialize with them...!
J-just getting changed already makes the world seem a little brighter... It, it's amazing...
C-Commander, I will be your partner for the party tonight. Let's see, umm... I believe this is proper Royal Navy etiquette... D-did I do it correctly?
G-g-good job! W-would you like to rest for a bit?
C-Commander, welcome back...! Phew, Yuugure, Ariake, and Wakaba too... everyone is waiting for us...

Ariake is really good at looking after our sisters... I, I have to make sure to also pull my weight...|There are so many people to greet...! As your p-p-partner, I have to make sure to keep it together...!|Wakaba, should I grab a slice of the cake for you...?
I, I know I can be a proper dance partner...! Eek, my tail... P-please try to be careful...
Hauuu... (Hatsuharu seems on the verge of fainting)
C-Commander, I will be your partner for the party tonight. Let's see, umm... I believe this is proper Royal Navy etiquette... D-did I do it correctly?
Hatsuharu, retrofit complete... H-hopefully I'm a little bit stronger now...
I was told you'd get a new outfit when you retrofit, b-but this a little too... Ughh...
I've grown now and should be able to handle secretary work! I-I'll be just fine... I think...

Now that I've grown, I need to act as a role model for my sisters... Um, never mind, that's impossible...|I-I thought I'd gained some courage, but when you stare at me like that, I... I lose it all...|Entrust me with sorties, commissions, or work! I-I'll tackle them as best I can!
A-after my retrofit, I should now be someone you and my friends can depend on...
Eek! Pl-please...! Don't do that...!
Hatsuharu, retrofit complete... H-hopefully I'm a little bit stronger now...
Let's hurry up and get this done!
Excellent. You seem to have remembered our appointment~
Hatsuharu-class Destroyer, number 4 - Hatsushimo
I can't wait to see the icy faces of the girls who you stood up~
What a pity... You're not even worth making fun of anymore~
You wouldn't happen to have feelings for me, would you? Save your breath, there's not a chance in hell~
Oh, so you plan to "capture" me? Give up already, it's no use~
What a stubborn fellow... Fine, I suppose I can give you a little reward. Here, this is the great Hatsushimo's lap pillow. Enjoy it while you can.
Fine, fine, it's my loss~ I'll allow you to date me from now on. ... Don't tell me you don't even know how to date...?
Good work, everyone... Huh, don't get me wrong, I didn't say you~
Tsk... things didn't quite go as planned...
Did you only just realize that you still have work to do?
Ugh... I'll show you!
There's mail for you. Shall I open it for you? Hehe, don't worry, I won't charge you a cent♪

Are you more concerned with your popularity among the girls than with your actual work? |Yukikaze? I must admit, she is the luckier one... |Huh? Right now... could you not space out while we still have work to do?
Eeeh? Not even kids would leave those missions unfinished~ How lame!
Looks like nobody has noticed that the task rewards haven't been collected yet... Hehe, in that case...
I am Hatsushimo of the Hatsuharu-class destroyers. I fought in many battles alongside the 21st Destroyer Division. Although I didn't really sustain many injuries, in the end, you know how it went...
A ring? Hmph, are you trying to get back at me for all those times I mocked you? Too bad, I won't fall for that... Eh, seriously? W-w-wait, this isn't how the script is supposed to go... *blushes*
I'm being underestimated, whatever shall I do~?
You want to touch my tail? Well, I can't promise you what happens next~
Ehehe... Commander, such a brave soul...
Oh my, what's with that scared expression? I won't bite~ I am Hatsushimo of the Hatsuharu class. I hope we can get along, ahaha~
I suppose that will do~
MVP? It's only fitting~
Commander, please be mindful of the girls who tend to get lonely easily. Like Kasumi, for example... Hmm? She's perfectly fine? ...Was I misunderstanding something?
Cheers, Commander~ C'mere, you've got to enjoy the party too! If you're thinking of doing something tactless like running off to go back to work, people are going to get upset with you~
Good work, everyone~ You've also been working hard today, Commander. Accept my gratitude and be thankful! Hehe~

I see, I see. So this is one of Ikazuchi's "creative dishes!" ...I have no freakin' clue what this is! Hey, Salt Lake City, how about you?|I wonder what that stuff is that the Northern Parliament girls are always drinking... Feels like something I shouldn't look too deeply into.|Russian Roulette with candy? Hmm, count me in. I don't lose at this kind of stuff.
Yeah, yeah~ Still have unfinished work~? Nothing wrong with saving it for another day~
You know that you still haven't picked up the rewards, right?
Though I don't quite stack up compared to Wakaba and Naganami, I've got plenty of confidence when it comes to the size~ of my tail, of course. Heehee~
Cheers, Commander~ C'mere, you've got to enjoy the party too! If you're thinking of doing something tactless like running off to go back to work, people are going to get upset with you~
Being able to come to this port, and now even receiving a retrofit... Looks like my luck's not too bad, hehe~

Hatsushimo's retrofitting is complete. You don't think I look all that different? Oh, Commander, you're still as simple as ever~ I've changed in tons of ways beyond what's just on the surface. Heheheh~
Good job~ But... there's still a lot of work left to do. Hehe, do your best~
Oh, you're on time today.

Hatsuharu doesn't seem to be as scared of strangers anymore. Heh, looks like you've been taking good care of her~ |Hmm, what are you staring at? Naughty Commander~ |*staaaare*... Oh, I'm just carrying out my secretary duties of observing you, Commander~ Don't let your mind wander so easily~
Interested in my tail? Well, I guess I'll let you touch it. You'd better be grateful~
Do you want to experience for yourself... the less visible parts of me that have changed? Commander~?

Hatsushimo's retrofitting is complete. You don't think I look all that different? Oh, Commander, you're still as simple as ever~ I've changed in tons of ways beyond what's just on the surface. Heheheh~
All righty! Let's set sail, everyone!
Phew! That feels great! The warm sunshine feels amazing today!
Fletcher-class destroyer – Hazelwood, Hull Number DD-531.
A commission has finished? I'll be right back!
Everyone's saying to stay away from the commander... I wonder why?
There are lots of girls here who like to run fast. That's why I'd like to race them!
There's nothing more relaxing than soaking in the sunlight! Commander, you come with me too~!
The sun isn't coming out today... But no matter, hehe! As long as I stick with you, I won't get mopey at all~!
I see you, Commander! Heheh~♪ Are you gonna get in trouble if I cling to you too much? But it feels so good... so can I keep doing it a bit more? Yaay~!
Are you tired? Should I help you get comfortable?
I... I'm not scared!
Right on time~! I just finished warming up~ Let's get going!
I can't hold out any longer!
Whaddya think? Nobody gets the mail faster than me, right!

These sunburns are battle scars from my active lifestyle! |Hey Bush, stop loafing around and come jog with me! |If only we could host a port-wide sports meet... I know I'd be the fastest one out of all my sisters!
Don't back down, no matter how intimidating your pile of work looks!
Woo! That's one more checked off the list! Way to go, Commander!
