I have a lot of experience on the battlefield, so I guess I'm a bit of a veteran! Oh right, I also served as a "reserve aviation command ship" for a while! What's that, you ask? Well, that'd be a ship that helps carriers guide their planes! Something like that~
From now on, I'll cling to you even more, Commander! ...Hehe, Commander, you're nice and warm... rub against me more~
Take aim...!
How about it? I've got a super healthy tan, right? Commander, show me ours~
Eek! Don't go peeking under there!
Gotcha! Hehe, I'm Hazelwood, from the Fletcher class! Pleased to meet you!
Faster, stronger!
I'm number one? Now that's what I call unexpected, ehehe...
The enemy can't hide from me.
I can't rely on this thing alone...
Brooklyn-class Light Cruiser – Helena, Hull Number CL-50!
Hey, Commander, could I lend my SG radar to my sisters this time?
SG, protect me...
If only my recon could help the others...
My expression? Ah... it's because I left while we were on the losing end of the war... I might just not be so used to peace and happiness. But don't worry, I'll be fine!
I think I've been more at ease lately... No, I was just too tense up until now. It's all thanks to the courage you've given me by being beside me.
I believe that you will bring us hope, Commander. This time, I'll fight to the end... Just the thought of saying goodbye to the person I love makes me feel like my heart will tear in half...
Did everyone make it back safe and sound? Good. But there's spare parts lying around in the docks now... I wonder why...
SG, lock on the enemy position!
... Ah, welcome back, Commander. Sorry, I was just brooding over something.
... Please, save me... Ignore the enemy, just let them go...
You've got new mail. It's important to stay in touch with your loved ones.
Are you trying to hide, Commander? No matter where you hide, I know where you are.|Commander, what should we do after the war?|If only my guns could be as strong as my radar...
Bit by bit we'll build the foundation for victory. We'll start by doing missions.
Resources are no good if they just pile up. We should make use of them.
I was designed to be on par with heavy cruisers, but just my power alone isn't enough to save everyone... Commander, can you help me?
A promise... from you, Commander? I see... I'm so happy...
SG, give me your power!
Hm? I'm fine. I'm just... a little distracted.
If this makes you feel good, then... I'm fine with it.
Nice to meet you, Commander. I'm Helena. My strong suit is enemy reconnaissance. Please... guide us towards victory.
I'll use this power to protect everyone!
... We actually won?
I... want to win!
St. Louis must've had a lot of fun making me try out so many clothes... Do you really think I look cute this way, Commander?
I... want to be part of the new year festivities too. Oh, you don't have to worry about me. I'm no longer the fledgling I once was.
Commander? You don't have to worry about me. I was just thinking about how I now have friends and a sweetheart who I can celebrate the new year together with, and how unbelievably happy it makes me.
Let me be part of the mission, Commander. My SG would surely be good to have.
It seems the New Year's spirit has swept over the entire fleet.
It's okay, there's always the next time...!

My New Year's wish is... that I'll be more courageous and positive, and that no harm will come to any of my friends...|For this year's shrine visit, the whole Brooklyn-class, Cleveland, and her Knights of The Sea all went there together as one big family.|It's snowing... I never realized how peaceful and beautiful snow can be.
Huh? I was just thinking about what I should do during New Year's... There are so many things I want to do.
C-Commander, please stop...
I... want to be part of the new year festivities too. Oh, you don't have to worry about me. I'm no longer the fledgling I once was.
That's right...! You did a great job, me!
I... want to win!
In preparation for today, I got St. Louis to teach me how to dance. She laughed a lot at me, telling me I'm "such a klutz"... Ahah.
Um, Commander, could we... share a dance? I have things I want to tell you...
Commander, let's extend an invitation to the commission team to join us for the party.

You and my friends have always taken care of, looked after, and protected me. But that can't go on forever. I want to stand beside you and become someone people can count on... So, could you wait for me just a little longer... please?
Commander, before we leave for the party, do you have any unfinished business?
Commander, the party is about to start.
It's okay, there's always next time...!
It seems you've got an invitation to another dance party... Hahah, you really are a superstar, Commander.

Commander, you know something? It's thanks to you that I've become as cheerful as I am now. Ahah~|I'm not going to be scared or hesitate ever again because you and my friends are always with me.|My dance partner will be... No, it'll just be you, Commander. I have so many things I want to tell you.
Commander, please go complete your missions. Don't worry, I'll be here waiting for you.
You really are incredible, Commander.
I'm all ready, Commander. Shall we dance?
Eek?! ... Ah, sorry, did I step on your foot, Commander?
Um, Commander, could we... share a dance? I have things I want to tell you...
Yeah, that's right...! You're awesome, Helena!
I'm... going to win!
St. Louis always praises me like, "my, how you've grown" whenever I do anything... It's kind of embarrassing...
This new equipment... might take some time to get used to... N-no, I'm sure I can handle it now! Commander, Helena will... meet your expectations!
SG receiving message... A commission team has returned to port.

I feel a bit more confident in myself when I'm with you, Commander. But I want more; I want to be the girl you rely on so I can be the center of your attention... It might be selfish to ask, but... will you love me?
Welcome back, Commander. Let's get to work and do our best.
It's okay, Helena. There's always next time...!

You want to know what my new and improved SG is capable of? All right... Find a place to hide that nobody knows about. Hehehe~|I think everyone would be better off living in the present without regrets than spend every day anxious about the future.|It's not enough to focus only on improving my equipment. I need to become stronger to use it properly, too.
You really can't go around doing this, Commander!
This new equipment... might take some time to get used to... N-no, I'm sure I can handle it now! Commander, Helena will... meet your expectations!
Don't get complacent, Helena... You've got to get even stronger!
SG, tell me where my enemies are hiding this time.
My SG tells me exactly where you are, but I wish it also told me what you're thinking...
Were you looking for me? I am willing to lend you my power – provided that you promise not to hide anything from me.
SG has informed me that your friends will be returning soon. Let us prepare to greet them, Commander.
If you intend to close your heart to me, then what happens to you is no longer of any concern to me.
Of course I like to smile. As long as you can maintain a smile on your face, your heart will always remain opaque to others.
Even if I can see everything, too often I cannot grasp any of it... I never wish to experience that sorrow again. Commander, I'm sure you'll be able to succeed where I failed.
Even though I have all the information I could ever want at my disposal, why does my heart waver so... I see now... What I know the most, is also what I least understand... and that is you.
Only your gentle voice can wash away my anxiety and distrust... How would I be able to live without you... Never go anywhere, Commander, stay by my side.
Where did you go, Commander? I'll know whether or not you're lying~
Don't resist. I know exactly where you are!
I knew exactly when you'd come back, Commander.
How could I have overlooked something? I don't understand... Very well, so be it.
You have new mail. Let me help you open it.

Commander, call out for me, bare your heart to me, quell my turmoil, erase everything that I cannot comprehend...|Commander, looking for someone? I know much more than just what happens around the office. I see everything that happens at this port.|Knowing too much can also be a curse, if you only know but are powerless to act.
Commander, your missions will not disappear just by simply leaving them alone. Do finish them diligently.
These are the mission rewards? ...Seems rather lackluster.
Brooklyn-class light cruiser, Helena. As for what I'm good at, let's just say it's knowing a little more about you than the other girls.
This symbol represents that we will never be separated, or betray each other... Mm, this I know. I have finally found peace of mind... So always, forever, eternally... remain by my side.
I've found you~
If you wish to use my powers, you must first tell me why.
I knew... you'd think twice about doing that.
Were you looking for me? I am willing to lend you my power – provided that you promise not to hide anything from me.
Greater power... but at what price?
The red dots on the radar... have all been eliminated.
If you believe in your fleet, we'll work our hardest to meet your expectations!
Statistics aren't important, it's how you take advantage of them.
Hermes-class aircraft carrier – Hermes, Hull Number 95!
Hold on! Our fleet has come back from commission. Let's see what they've earned.
Have you fallen to the forces of darkness, Commander...? I'll have to defeat you then!
What's up, Commander? Interested in duels? Don't worry, we'll start from the beginning, I'll teach you! The most important thing is spirit!
Interests in anything besides dueling? Hmm... I've never thought about it. Will you show me something new, Commander?
Mmm... Commander, I decided to engrave your portrait on the back of my cards. That way you're always with me!

If two duelists fall in love, Commander, they can undertake more duels together! They also must truly understand each other... I think that requirement is already fulfilled for us... so... shall we try?
Gotcha! Your dueling was hot out there!
You're back. Now it's time to duel!
I won't surrender. My turn... Let me go!
You've got new mail, Commander. I wonder if it's a request for a duel!
It is my wish to duel with Houshou|In each plane and every card resides a soul. |It's my turn!Victory aside, I also want to bring happiness to everyone.
Missions are like challenges, Commander. Let us challenge ourselves to even greater heights.
Rewards' is a good of a word as "duel". Let's see what you've got!

I am called Hermes, I was the second aircraft carrier to be ever built. 
 The only carrier to be sunk by the Sakura Empire? Can't do much about stuff like that. But if I ever get the chance, I want to duel that first carrier.
This feeling is……! The bonds formed between Commander and I here shall open up a brand new future, a path of brilliance! It’s our turn, draw!
It's my turn!
What, you want to duel?
Hmm.... If the Commander is interested, I'll properly reward you each time you win.
Glory to the cards, my soul to the duel d... I mean, the flight deck! I am Hermes. Commander, give me your orders!
The new me now can move to even greater heights with my deck!
When the stars gather in one place, our bonds will illuminate a new future!
Hangar, gate open!
For a true duelist, there are no accidents, Commander.
Our glory coalesces into the bonds that forge a bright new future! Let's rev it up! Hermes, retrofit complete!
My path to victory does not end here!
I've been waiting. The cards... no... my burning soul told me you'd returned.
No one is truly undefeatable... If you give up now, you were never worthy of being my Commander.
There is something present in the mail beyond what you can see with your eyes. That is: friendship.

Houshou is strong. And now I know. That strength comes from her kindness.|Your spirit is a great weapon, and an even greater weakness. No matter where you are, you must not forget that.|Centaur taught me how to make this. Try it. I'm showing you that I'm more than just a duelist.
That's the wind... Commander, follow my wake!
Our glory coalesces into the bonds that forge a bright new future! Let's rev it up! Hermes, retrofit complete!
Hatred, no matter how deep it runs, will always be weak.
The enemy's been detected~
I really admire the head of the Royal Maid, Miss Belfast... She can do anything and has a strong will to boot... I hope I can become like her one day.
Dido-class light cruiser – Hermione (HMS Hermione.)
Commander, let's put our work on hold and go to greet the team that's just returned from commissions.
Commander, why are you so stubborn...
Doesn't Dido worry a bit... too much? She works so hard, and I know you don't hate her, but... please, watch over her some more, Commander.
Commander, are you working overtime today? Then I'll bring over some coffee. ...Um, it's not a bother, you know? After all, being by your side no matter what is a Royal Maid's duty.

Commander, if it doesn't bother you, would you mind leaving your laundry to me? Washing our clothes together saves time, but more than that, I want you to personally feel how great your clothes feel after being hand-washed by the Royal Maids♪
Whew... I've finished cleaning the room. Next... Oh, welcome back. I'll prepare your meal right now, so please wait a moment, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Hmhm~♪ The room's all cleaned, time for... Oh, welcome back, Commander. I'll prepare your meal right away, so please wait a bit longer~

voiceline.line: Commander. For the time being, you're forbidden from doing more work, okay? You need to make sure to take a break from now and then.
It seems I let my guard down...
Good morning, Commander. Did you sleep well?
voiceline.oath: Good morning, Commander. Hehe, you were sleeping so soundly, I couldn't bear to wake you up. Let's do our best today~

voiceline.line: Oh my, what a failure...
Is this mail for you, Commander...? I apologize. I'll leave it here.

It's not good to strain yourself by overworking. How about splashing some water on your face to refresh yourself?|It seems like the price for this ingredient has gone up... Commander, from now on, we'll have fewer dishes that use this.|Commander, watching you easily handle your work makes me feel happy... I wonder why?
voiceline.oath: Commander, please come over here and lie on your side. I'll give you a wonderful Royal Navy-style massage~ Hehe.|nil|This feeling of doing work with you, by your side... It feels really great. Yep~♪

voiceline.line: Commander, the more you don't deal with your work now, the more you'll have to deal with later.
This mission's reward is quite sizeable. Congratulations, Commander!

I'm Hermione, a Dido-class ship belonging to the Royal Navy. In the past... I chased after Bismarck and participated in anti-submarine warfare in Sardegna... Besides that, there's nothing worth mentioning. Commander, do you have any questions?

You'd like for me to stay by your side, forever...? Of course, Commander. Taking care of you is my job, after all. Ah, would this be what's called a "confession"...? Yes, of course. Commander, I'll be in your care, from now, 'til the end of time.
I hope this hits~
A fizzy drink? ...What am I going to do with you? I suppose you can have just one bottle, all right?
voiceline.oath: A fizzy drink? ...I guess it can't be helped. Just one more, alright?

voiceline.line: Commander, it's good to pay attention to the time and place when doing something like this, you know?
voiceline.oath: Good grief, you never change...

voiceline.line: Good day. I am Hermione, from the Royal Maids. I'm delighted to make your acquaintance, Commander.
My, have I gotten stronger?
I'm sure Commander will be elated~
Commander... Even ships can get sick. Please, make sure to take care of yourself, alright?
My, what brings you here, Commander? Are you feeling unwell? That's no good... Why don't you come sit over here first? I'll start by taking your temperature...
Commander, please wait there for a moment. I'm examining someone else right now...
Hm? Commander, what brings you back here...? Umm, are you here to be... inspected?

Gosh, Commander... If you pretend to be sick, even I'm going to get mad at you!|Commander, don't you think this dress is a bit too small for me...? Um... I just feel like it doesn't fit me...|Commander, please make sure that you pay attention to your own health. After all, I can't attend to you around the clock.
Commander, let me perform an examination on you. Please come here and lie down on your side.
Are we... playing doctor?
My, what brings you here, Commander? Are you feeling unwell? That's no good... Why don't you come sit over here first? I'll start by taking your temperature...
Actually... I bought this swimsuit back when it was on sale. I'm relieved that you like it...
Commander, I've brought the chair. If you don't want to get in the water, feel free to sit here. ...Hm, me? Of course, I will remain by your side.
I've prepared a cool, refreshing drink for you. Please enjoy.
Commander, please leave work at the office, and relax to your heart's content today.

These waves feel so nice~ Why don't you dip your feet in too, Commander? ...Hm? A big wave is... Eek!|Overexposure to the sun isn't good for your skin. Why don't we move somewhere else in a little bit?|A nap? Y-yes! Please take your time and relax to your heart's content. If something happens, hm... don't worry, I'll make sure you wake up when that happens.
Wow, the sea is so pretty~ ...Hmm? I'm even prettier than the sea...? Jeez, Commander... Don't get all sappy on me now.
Commander, I've brought the chair. If you don't want to get in the water, feel free to sit here. ...Hm, me? Of course, I will remain by your side.
I changed into slightly more formal attire in preparation for us having afternoon tea together. Do you think... it doesn't suit me well...?
Would you care for some afternoon tea, Commander? Heehee~ This is one of my little hobbies when I'm not performing my maid duties.
Before you continue with your work, please enjoy a delicious slice of cake and unwind a little~
I've finished brewing the tea. Commander, do be careful, as it is very hot.

A while ago, Miss Belfast recommended these delicious and economical snacks. Commander, are they to your liking?|The first thing that comes to mind when one speaks of "elegance" must surely be Miss Illustrious or Miss Hood. Oh, you'd include me as well? Hehe, I'm honoured~|Commander, I see you've finally managed to relax a bit. I suppose inviting you for afternoon tea turned out to be very fruitful after all~
Hm? You'd like another serving of tea? Sure, here you go~ Please let me know if there's anything you want~
Would you care for some afternoon tea, Commander? Heehee~ This is one of my little hobbies when I'm not performing my maid duties.
My fellow Royal Maids drew inspiration from the Dragon Empery's traditional attire when crafting these clothes. I do hope you like them.
How are you feeling, Commander? Hehe, I'm not wearing my usual nurse's gown right now, but I suppose this isn't much different~
The commission team has brought back some quality herbs! I propose that we have some herb tea to celebrate.
There has to be a cure for you out there somewhere... You're not beyond saving yet, I know it!

Commander, how are you feeling today? I won't be giving you any medicine, but since food and medicine have the same root, I'll make sure to prepare some nutritious meals that you're sure to enjoy. Please leave it to me~♪
Breathing in these herbal fragrances is quite good for you. Commander, please feel free to relax.
New mail has arrived. Did they procure the ingredients I asked for?

It is often said that the best medicine is bitter, but I tried to make mine as sweet as possible to suit your tastes.|I wonder what kinds of effects these herbs have... I should ask Dido later.|I am quite proficient at following recipes and preparing ingredients. They're skills I often use as part of my work with the Royal Maids.
Might you be... checking my pulse?
Commander...
How are you feeling, Commander? Hehe, I'm not wearing my usual nurse's gown right now, but I suppose this isn't much different~
Heheh~ Hibiki is super strong~! If you don't believe me, just take a look at this~♪
Everyone in the 6th DesDiv is super unique! There's Ikazuchi, Inazuma, and we even have Akatsuki the ninja! I love everyone! Ehehe~
Type III Akatsuki-class destroyer number two – Hibiki.
Ah, that's right, the commission fleet seems to have returned? Should I go with you to welcome them back?
Commander, it seems like the only way to get you to open your eyes is to get a bit rough... *sigh*...
I've been making Akatsuki worried all this time. I have to apologize to her properly, as well as thank her.
Akatsuki, you've been pretty gung-ho about getting the 6th DesDiv back together... Well, the name's not that important as long as we're all together. That's what I think anyway~

Ah, that reminds me! Commander, have you been taking care of yourself properly? We'd be in serious trouble if you got sick and collapsed or something... Well, even if that happened to you, Hibiki would tenderly nurse you back to health~♪
Commander, why don't you tell me your story? I'm really interested! ...Why? No particular reason~ Haven't we exhausted all the other topics already? Ehehe~
Good work out there~ Well, having that said, you still have a lot of stuff that needs to be done... Ahaha...
I won't let it end like this!
Commander, did you just pop in~? All righty... Let's both get some good work done today!
Awww... Looks like I'll have to go back to port for repairs...
Mail? Show me as well! Show me!
Verniy...? It has a nostalgic ring to it... |I'm so glad that we can all be together again~♪ |If you don't need me for anything, I'm going to go play with Ikazuchi and Inazuma~
We sure have all sorts of different missions, huh... Don't sweat it though! I'll help you out!
Missionnnn... complete! ...Hey, Commander, you should get pumped up too!

I'm Hibiki, from the 6th DesDiv~♪ I fought in many battles with my friends, and even saw the end of things. That's good and all, but... having to go in for repairs at that time was a bit awkward... Ahaha...
I've been waiting so long for this! Ehehe~ I love you, Commander! ...Ah, look at you getting all bashful~ But my turn's not over yet. I love love love you~! Ehehe~
Trust in me!
Yo! Did you call me, Commander?
Ah~! Commander, I bet you did that on purpose just now!
Nihihi~ We finally meet at last, Commander! The name's Hibiki! Don't you forget it!
So this is that "leveling up" thing that Ikazuchi mentioned? Nihihi~
Heheh~ I'll be taking that gold star~!
Well, um, y'see, sorry to keep you all waiting for so long. I do feel kinda bad about it, but since we're all here, let's cheer up and put the past behind us! That's right, look forward! Ehehe~!

New Year's finally comes to port! I, Hibiki of the 6th DesDiv, will be marking my new arrival in my New Year's attire! Commander, don't you dare change the channel - you've gotta watch my every move~!
Want to know more about oni horn? Or this golden badge here?
Good work~ Even though it's the New Year's season, there's still a mountain of work to get through, isn't there~? Looks like I won't get to sleep the day away after all, *sniff*~
Commander, you haven't started working yet?

Akatsuki, you went all the way to the South Pole to look for me?! W-well, I certainly didn't expect that... |Just like me, Fubuki seems to also like being the center of attention. But for whatever reason, only she keeps getting herself into weird situations. Why is that? |This brisk weather is nothing compared to the cold of the Northern Parliament! Huh? I'm comparing it to the wrong thing?
You couldn't control yourself because I looked too delicious? Commander, you beast~

New Year's finally comes to port! I, Hibiki of the 6th DesDiv, will be marking my new arrival in my New Year's attire! Commander, don't you dare change the channel - you've gotta watch my every move~!
Hehe, shall we go enjoy the festivities?
Hehe~ Which do you prefer: matcha, or black tea?
Kongou-class fast battleship number two – Hiei.
Welcome back, everyone. Hopefully, none of you encountered any suspicious people?
What a pity...
Ehehe~ Commander, is there something on your mind?
That Kirishima... She's actually quite the popular one...
Being able to see everyone's smiles at the banquet makes all the hard work and preparation worth it.
Commander, after tonight's banquet... will you be free? Hehe, please look forward to it~
Welcome back. The tea has just been brewed to the right temperature.
Commander... It's too early to give up just yet!
There is nothing more relaxing than a banquet following a battle... By the way, Commander, I'm free after this...
Was I bested...?
Are all of these new letters? Thank you for your hard work.

*Sigh*... Whenever Kirishima comes to a banquet, all those kids that tag along with her usually end up making a mess of things... |When it comes to warfare, wisdom and courage are equally important. We can't count on another miracle if we discard proper planning and rely on blind courage. |Commander, I'll be able to protect you, no matter the situation. Hehe, I am called an "Imperial Ship" because I have that capacity after all~♪
Let's finish while we still have the momentum!
Hehe, shall we celebrate by holding a banquet tonight?

I am Hiei, the first Kongou-class battleship born in the Land of the Rising Sun. As an Imperial Ship, I witnessed the growth of our mighty fleet, and led our forces into the Battle of the Solomon Sea. Commander, have you finished your preparations? The banquet is about to begin.
So this means... "We'll always be forever?" Thank you very much. I'll gladly accept it - however... If anything was to happen to us, I hope that you would consider yourself first...
Be swept away by the raging waves!
I can take you anywhere the ocean reaches.
Hehe. Commander, have you not gotten enough sleep yet?
I am the Imperial Ship Hiei, second of the Kongou-class, reporting for duty. Commander, where shall we go next?
Today's breeze feels more pleasant than usual.
It was no big deal~
Which pillow would you prefer? The soft one, the hard one, or... perhaps you'd like to use my thighs? Hehe~
Look how late it is... Commander, shall we embark on a dreamy voyage together?
Adequate rest is important for improving your performance. Commander, I've prepared your pillow. Tonight... enjoy the best sleep of your life~

Hehe, it seems like we'll be able to have a pajama party banquet. How about it, Commander? Would you like to join? |Good night, Commander. Don't worry, I'll wake you up when the time is right. |Ah, the plum blossoms shimmering under the moonlight... Commander, shall we go watch the petals together?
Commander, the moon is beautiful tonight. Wouldn't you rather take in the beauty of the night sky instead of staring at me?
Hehe~ Someone seems quite energetic tonight, Commander.
Look how late it is... Commander, shall we embark on a dreamy voyage together?
I never expected this Spring Banquet to take on a life of its own... By the looks of things, everyone prefers it when the atmosphere is a bit livelier. Hehe~

I have to admit, these qipaos from the Dragon Empery are quite elegant... I might sound arrogant saying this, but I feel like this outfit really brings out my charm. Hehe, wouldn't you agree, Commander?
Putting your nose to the grindstone is commendable, but you should also know when to take it easy, Commander.
Commander, you came at just the right time. The banquet is about to begin.

Commander, make sure you remember to have your closing speech ready. All right? |You'd like... a red envelope as well? Normally, aren't you supposed to be giving out red envelopes to us? Heehee~ |During these times, it's best to just put aside your work and enjoy the festivities.
Sake...? Hehe, since it's a special occasion, I wouldn't mind sharing a cup with you~

I have to admit, these qipaos from the Dragon Empery are quite elegant... I might sound arrogant saying this, but I feel like this outfit really brings out my charm. Hehe, wouldn't you agree, Commander?
Did my sand castle capture your interest? This was only possible because of the clement weather, after all~
We're headed for the white sands of the beach today. We all could use a breather every now and then, so let's just enjoy the sea breeze today. Hehe~
Have you been enjoying your time here? Hehe~ If you get thirsty, please help yourself to this water.
Commander, is this scenery to your liking? The blue skies and seas, and the merriment of friends frolicking on the beach...

A seaside picnic might not be as lavish as the banquets I usually hold, but I am confident in my abilities to throw the best event possible~ Hehe, don't worry, some girls from the Eagle Union are helping me out. |The seagulls are flying into the distance. I wonder if they're splitting apart or reuniting... Hehe~|Oh my, staying under this scorching sun indeed seems bad for my skin... Commander, would you be so kind as to help me apply the sunscreen?
Commander, perhaps the sea breeze will help you come to your senses?
We're headed for the white sands of the beach today. We all could use a breather every now and then, so let's just enjoy the sea breeze today. Hehe~
Hmph! I shan't lose to the likes of you!
Why are you staring at me? ...is my sword too heavy? I- I can take care of myself! It's none of your business!
Fast Battleship, second ship of the Kongou-class Hiei.
Commission complete. I shall go to receive them.
Kongou! I- I never want to see this Commander again in my life!
I can do it myself. You go do something else, Commander.
Hrm... that's not right... Um.... Umm.... Commander? Can you help me with the parts I don't understand?
Can I prepare the next party? Really!? I won't let you down!
What did you think of my party, Commander? Did you have fun? Hehe, well, the next one is going to be even better, so you definitely have to come, okay?
That was a hard-fought sortie... Now then, I didn't make any mistakes, did I?
Hiei never leaves a job unfinished!
Good da- agh! Wahh... I hit myself with my sword.
....urk.... 'tis- 'tis but a trifle! A single defeat! Doesn't bother me at all...
New mail... don't tell me... it's a summons!?

Make merry? I'd love to! Where are we- oh, no. Now isn't the time for such things!|My sisters went to a place called "Royal" to study aboard... abroad? Study abroad. Hmph! I bet you don't even know what abroad is!|If you keep staring at me, I'm going to hit you with this! And it's going to hurt!
Completing a mission is a glorious thing.
Puff out your chest when receiving such honors!
Once my big sister Kongou comes back, we're going to shock the world! Until then, I need to work hard to become a leader worthy of her! But.... courtly etiquette is really hard.....
Surprised, aren't you? Hiei prepared this party just for you! After all, today is a very important day for me, because... welll... you're very important to me! There, I said it...
D- disappear with the waves!
Do you have anything that needs doing? I must test myself yet!
Shameless pig!
Commander? When I grow up, I’m going to serve the strongest lord in the world! Oh... but for now, I don’t mind if you help me sharpen my skills.
Hiei won't let you down!
Such a victory goes without saying, 'tis but a trifle.
Quick, let's get started! Come forth, my planes!
I'd rather you pay attention to the others. ...If you're going to keep idling around here...
I'm getting all fired up! The name's Hiryuu, Hiryuu from the 2nd CarDiv. As a member of this fleet, I'll obey your orders. I do hope that you are qualified to lead us.
It's good to count your blessings for the fortune of having plenty in the present moment. One day, it'll just be a wistful memory.
Leave me alone.
Right now, I'm merely a soldier. I simply follow your directives, and that's all there is to it.
On the battlefield, even a moment's hesitation can invite total destruction. Thinking about nothing other than how to defeat the enemy - that's my fighting style.

Would you keep challenging strong foes you have no chance of defeating? ...For the sake of those you wish to protect? Since it's you, I can see that you've given it plenty of thought. I support that sentiment.

This unwavering conviction, that if it's you, there will be a way... Hmm, I guess I've still got a naive side to me... It's nothing. Commander, as your blade, I will continue to pledge myself to your service.
Don't worry about me. Simply stay focused on what it is you need to do.
Guide my blade. Where do my enemies lie?
Sister... I'm sorry...
Please take this, Commander. It's your mail.

Enterprise? Whether as a rival or an ally, there's no doubt that she's an existence to be respected.|Hanafuda...? Now's not the time to be indulging in entertainment.|My usual training regimen isn't designed to show off my skills, but rather to protect my allies and defeat my enemies. Am I mistaken?
These are all just trifling matters...
Though they're all just trifling matters, they're still missions proper. I'll report back to you when I finish receiving the rewards.
I'm the aircraft carrier, Hiryuu. ...Right now, I am naught but a single soldier. That's all you need to know about me.

This is... the proof of your oath... I understand. If you will continue to value me as your blade, I will not turn my back to you. ...Though, my comparatively uncomely and unpleasant self will give you a hard time. Hehehe.
I'm all fired up!
If you have something to say, just spit it out. If you fuss over it too much, you're just going to end up not saying anything.
Hah?! ...Hmph! ...Next time, I'll assault you back with my blade.
I'm getting all fired up! The name's Hiryuu, Hiryuu from the 2nd CarDiv. As a member of this fleet, I'll obey your orders. I do hope that you are qualified to lead us.
...What a shame.
Such a small victory is not worth celebrating...
Victory goes the one who strikes first! Planes, take off!
Isn’t this pose... super cool?
Aircraft carrier, Hiryuu.
Commander, your commission fleet should be back.
Haa! (Her fist stops next to your face) Stay away from me.
Since I am always thinking about combat, the other girls keep saying that I’m not feminine at all. So, um... that’s what I’m trying to improve here.
About acting more feminine... do you think Souryuu is more attractive because of her cold demeanor? Oh, and her ankles are amazing. It would be great if I could become like her.
Hmm, feels like nothing has changed. But at least Commander sees me as a woman now. Whenever I’m around you, my heart skips a beat, just like Souryuu described. Is this... girly enough?

Umm, Even though I didn't feel like anything changed.... At least the Commander has accepted to look me as a woman, When I'm by the Commander's side, I also have those girly feelings that my sis mentioned before, is that.... enough?
Here are the combat logs. Let's start reviewing the battle..
Don't be afraid of gunfire!
Eh? Ah! Commander! Watch out!!
Win some, lose some. It's only normal.
Mail! Eh, it’s dangerous to throw them around like airplanes? Fine...
All systems go! Ready to sortie at any time.|Is it strange... that I find Souryuu’s ankle to be elegant?|Commander, if you’re bored, how about we spar?
A mission, huh? I’m looking forward to any kind of challenge.

Heyyy♪ Commander, I'm looking pretty hot tonight, huh?

This one's Enty's, this one's Yorktown's, this one's Northampton's, this one's... oh, it's yours, Commander! Exactly one bottle. Pretty nice, huh?|So I have to dress up like this for the party? Aren't you worried I'm gonna be a fish out of water in there?|I'm not expecting anyone to call me the belle of the ball tonight. Not while everyone else is dressed up all pretty-like. What? You think I give up too easily?
Is this dress gonna make you fall in love with me all over again? Ahahaha!
Turns out I'm pretty different from my sisters, huh...?
Congratulations! You did it, Commander! Now let's pop the champagne and celebrate! It's party time!
You're gonna regret looking down on Hornet big time!
Cheese sure is good stuff~ By the way, Commander, do you like Sardegna-style pizza or Eagle Union-style pizza better? ...Me? It's all good to me, hahaha!
Mmmmm... Nothing beats pizza straight outta the oven! Here, Commander, wanna give it a try? We're gonna have to recommend this to Enty next time!
I also ordered some for the girls who'll be coming back from their commission. I'll swing by the dorms later, so you help out as well, Commander!
Here, have some cola! I helped myself to a few bottles from Georgia's stash~ She's got plenty, she won't even notice they're gone!
If you can't decide what to order, get a bit of everything! Just kiddin'~♪

Want something to drink? Cola? Or maybe some oolong tea? What'll it be?|Hey, Hammann, don't just waste food like that! I, I'll help you out! ...Commander, I'm gonna need another stomach over here!|That Zuikaku, only ordering boneless wings... Eh? Bring the green chili sauce? ...Ah! Not a bad idea...!
Hey, say "ahh"~ Just kidding, ahaha~♪
W-wait... Whah?!
Mmmmm... Nothing beats pizza straight outta the oven! Here, Commander, wanna give it a try? We're gonna have to recommend this to Enty next time!
I'm not very skilled in real combat... but I shall not betray your expectations!
You're like a kid sometimes, Commander... Come over here~
Aircraft carrier, Houshou.
Commander, your girls have returned from commission. I'll welcome them back now, but you should hurry over as well.
Is something the matter, Commander?
Want to take a nap, Commander?

I look a bit like a courtesan? Hehe~ Well then, mister, it seems like tonight shall be our one and only night together. Let us feel the warmth of our embrace, then let the memories fade to nothing. How does that sound?

A prominent person once praised my beauty, but to be honest, I am not so sure about myself. But if Commander was to acknowledge me, perhaps I could find my confidence. So... Commander, am I beautiful?

Commander, the moon is beautiful tonight, isn't it? I've prepared some drinks... would you like to stargaze together? I wouldn't do this for anyone else - this is a special service just for you, my dear.
Good work, Commander! Would you like dinner? A bath? Or perhaps... a drink first? Hehe~!
Looks like I can't afford to take it easy just yet.
Commander, have you eaten yet? No? Let me make something for you. You can't head to work without first preparing your body and mind!
I'm so sorry, Commander...
Commander, there's mail for you!

Having long legs isn't necessarily a good thing. A high center of mass makes it easy to tip over...|Commander, I prepared some snacks for us. Do you want to relax for a while?|It's amazing to see how much my younger sisters have accomplished, but sometimes it makes me a bit sad to see everything they've gone through...
You've got new missions, Commander. Care for a challenge this time?
Commander is sure forgetful, always needing my reminder just to claim the rewards.

I guess you could say that I was the first aircraft carrier ever in the world. You could call me the eldest sister, or mother, of them all! Feel free to consult with me whenever you'd like, Commander. I'm always here for you.
My dream is to one day settle down with the person I love and open a small bar somewhere... Now, it doesn't seem like my dream is so distant anymore. Right, my dear?
It's time for a feast!
Are you looking for me, Commander?
Ahh! ... Commander, that's naughty. You can't touch me there.
Ah, it's the Commander... My name is Houshou, and I'll be in your care from now on. Please leave the children of the fleet in my care. I won't let you down!
Now I can help you even more, Commander!
Commander, will this be enough?

skins.name: The Dream of the Autumn Pillow

voiceline.line: While everyone slips into sweet dreams from the night's festivities, the sound of gossamer sliding off of smooth skin reaches your ears... Hehe, would you like to spend this night under the stars with me, Master~?
At least for tonight, I wish you and I to pursue the happiness of being together... |nil|Master, what do you think of your Tanabata present? Are~ you~ satisfied~?
Hehe... Master, if your heart races, then it's my victory~
The ephemeral autumn is but a fleeting dream

While everyone slips into sweet dreams from the night's festivities, the sound of gossamer sliding off of smooth skin reaches your ears... Hehe, would you like to spend this night under the stars with me, Master~?
Tadah! Another day, another energy-packed departure!
Am I a light cruiser or a heavy cruiser? You sure like to ponder over weird stuff, Commander~
Northampton-class Heavy Cruiser – Houston, Hull Number CA-30!
Mister rocket and mister plane are friends yet again~... Hm? Commander, a commission's been completed!
You're no fun at all, Commander...
Exeter is a good person at heart, but all she talks about is glory and royalty and stuff. Boooring!
Bang! Ratatatata! ... Whew, today's been a lot of fun! I really love playing with you, Commander~
Houston, you've got a problem... Commander, whenever I see you, I get so anxious I can't even speak properly... What should I do...
Commander, how about we just relax today instead of going out to play? I... I have something I want to tell you, so listen up, okay?
Hehe~ Fighting's what a soldier does, right!
Oh no, our score is falling behind...
I get to play with the commander again today! Yahoo~!
Ooow... My head's spinning... I think I bumped into something even harder than me...
Commander, Commander! There's mail for you!
Commander, sometimes you're a little preachy, so just chill out~|I had such an exciting time in Surabaya!|Come on, Commander, let's play!
Co~man~der~! You've still got some unfinished missions!
Don't forget to claim your rewards!

Hiya! I'm Houston, fifth ship of the Northampton-class! I received a Medal of Honor from the President for facing off against an entire Sakura Empire squadron in the Battle of the Java Sea and the Battle of Sunda Strait, all on my own! I'm really proud of it~!
Thank you, Commander~ I love you~! Hehe, you don't need to be so serious about! Come on, let's go somewhere and play!
Houston, in perfect condition!
Ah, my brain's stopped working...
Gosh, Commander... you're a real weirdo... aren't you!

Hiya! I'm Houston, fifth ship of the Northampton-class. I single-handedly took on Sakura Empire reinforcements in the Battle of the Sunda Strait! I hope I'll get to play with you every day from now on! Yahoo~!
Whoosh! Houston's breaking through the first escape velocity!
Yaaay! C'mon, praise me!
Heheh, there'll be no mercy for you!
To your friends, show no cowardice; to your foes, show no mercy – that is my creed. Hehehe~
King George V-class battleship – Howe (HMS Howe.)
Do you need someone to escort the commission team home? I'm quite the experienced escort, I'll have you know.
A kind deed to others is a kind deed to yourself – or so I was naive enough to believe...
"Shape the world into God's vision" – if there is a God, what is his ideal world? It can't be one of perpetual war, that's for sure.
Are you tired, Commander? Under the weather, perhaps? Heh, well, a nice cookie can fix that. Just eat one of these and you'll be right back to normal.
Come visit the dorm next time we're having cookies, Commander. We'd all love to have you, and I especially want to spend some quality time with you.
Bah, being indirect is just not like me. I adore you, Commander. Both as the leader of the fleet, and as my beloved special someone. I wish to know... do you adore me as well?
voiceline.oath: Hehehe, let's plan for our next date, love. Speaking of which, I've heard of a place with famously delicious cookies. How does that sound?

voiceline.line: Nicely done out there. If you've got the energy to spare, perhaps you could write an after-battle report?
voiceline.oath: Splendid work, love. Have a cookie and get some rest, then we'll start on the after-battle report.

voiceline.line: I can't... falter now!
How nice to see you. Now, let's get to work on today's tasks.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back. Can I keep you company until the night arrives, love?

voiceline.line: Next time... victory will be ours.
We've received what looks to be mail addressed to you.

Wales and York are lovely ladies. At times, however, I struggle to keep up with their thought processes.|George has always been good to me. She often treats me to a cookie or two... But I wish she'd stop treating me like I'm still a child.|If you have a hard time making friends with an eccentric person, my advice is this: bake some cookies, and offer to share with them.
voiceline.oath: My sisters can be rather headstrong at times. If they give you any trouble, you can turn to me, love.|nil|It seems my cookies were adored, but my performance failed to garner any reactions...

voiceline.line: Oh, missions? Are there any I can help with?
A mission's done. I can take care of claiming the rewards, no problem.

Prior to my being sent to the Pacific, I always worked side by side with George. But aside from the one time we escorted our Sardegnian friends, I suppose I don't have too many notable feats to my name.

Thank you for your sincerity, Commander. I will gladly be yours. I won't ask of you to share all your joys and sorrows with me, as I'm more than happy with just being by your side. Ah, that didn't sound like what I would say, did it? Well, hehehe~
My aim shall not waver!
Do save the massage for later. I'm not tired yet.
voiceline.oath: You'd like a massage? It would be my pleasure.

voiceline.line: Umm... What are you doing?
voiceline.oath: I can see why you'd do that. Hehehe~

voiceline.line: It's a pleasure meeting you, Commander. I'm Howe of the King George V-class. I hope we can build a healthy relationship.
Phew... I'll return your gesture with valour on the battlefield, Commander.
Heheh, I'm in top shape today!
Is this the place with the famously delicious cookies? Could we order some right away? I must taste them for myself!
Sorry to keep you waiting, but now I'm ready to– Commander? What's the matter? It'll get dark soon if you keep standing around like that.
Well done on that sortie. Let's proceed with our plan, shall we?
Glad you could make it, love. Now, as for our plan today... Oh, should I not have made a plan ahead of time?
I hope misfortune befalls you.

Wales taught me the dos and don'ts of dating. Though enlightening, her advice seemed purposed for winning an ordinary girl's hand... So perhaps it's better intended for you, Commander?|Peckish, are you? Then you can have this cookie George gave me.|This dress is quite comfortable, actually. It's no trouble for me to walk a little longer.
Have a seat if you need to rest, love.
Hm? Is there something on my dress?
Sorry to keep you waiting, but now I'm ready to– Commander? What's the matter? It'll get dark soon if you keep standing around like that.
Swift and graceful, I advance!
Oh, who will come to my rescue? George? Or perhaps... you, love?
"Please, Master, save meee." ...Ugh, I can't get into the role. What sort of tone should I be aiming for, love?
I'm curious what the Royal Maids mean when they say they "service" you... Heheh. Would you mind enlightening me after this rehearsal, love?
Splendid work. I would offer you a treat, but as you can see, my hands are tied...
"Masteeer, please untie meeee"... Hmm...

Goodness... These cookie props are so enticing they're distracting me...|How do you think Belfast would respond if I walked up to her and said, "I'm joining the Royal Maids starting today"?|Memorising my lines is simple enough. Reciting them is another matter, though... How does Wales do it so effortlessly?
I'll bake you your favourite pastry later, love.
...Master?
"Please, Master, save meee." ...Ugh, I can't get into the role. What sort of tone should I be aiming for, love?

Thanks for your patience, love. I've looked forward to this evening's party for a long, long time. Hopefully George, York, and company won't laugh at me after how much effort I've put into this ensemble... What do you think of it, Commander?
nil|nil|nil
...I won't let you get away.
Commander, I'm pretty proud of my trophies... Would you like to take a look?
H-class destroyer – Hunter (H35)
You can never be too prepared.
...... (Hunter's companion barks at you)
Is there... a hunting ground around here?
There is no prey a hunter cannot take down. Any failure should be attributed to a lack of sufficient preparation.
Commander, what would you like to eat tonight? I'll go catch some of whatever you want.
When this war ends, I want to go hunting with you, Commander. ...Yes, just the two of us.
Commander, what's our next target?
The prey this time... is pretty tough...
Commander. How about we go hunting?
The hunter can become the hunted at any point...
Here's your mail. Is there any information on what we should hunt next?

This guy over here? He's my treasured companion.|I don't dislike Hardy. It's just that she tends to be annoying when she's around.|These clothes...? Commander, you don't have to copy my dress when we go hunting.
What's the bounty this time...?
What? You want me to sound the horn of victory...?
Royal Navy H-class destroyer, Hunter. I was taken down by Iron Blood destroyers in the battle of Narvik. It's nothing new for a hunter to end up being eaten by their prey...
A hunter should always stalk his prey, but... having a base... no, a "home"... doesn't sound bad at all.
You'll only suffer more the more you struggle.
This isn't a hunting rifle. It's a torpedo tube.
[New Target: The Commander. Target: Locked-on.]
Hello, Commander. I'm Hunter... Was there something else I was supposed to say...?
Hm, I guess I'll go for some bigger prey next time...
It's easy as long as I think of the enemy as my prey...
Speak your name! I'm not going to cut down some nameless rat!
Want to practice combat techniques with me, Commander?
Second ship of the Ise-class battleships, Hyuuga.
Mmm, well done!
My sword has no eyes, Commander. Watch yourself.
B-big sis... do you have to cling to me every time you drink?
Ehehe... Commander, you look so cute after a few drinks~
Neither Ise nor I have any problems with exploding turrets.
Commander, let's have a duel! Don't worry, I won't use my weapon this time... You might actually stand a chance that way, right?
Done with warmups? Alright...
Phew... Wouldn't you agree that it's better to train from dusk until dawn instead of from dawn to dusk?
Ise... Sister...
Is this your stuff? Make sure to keep it in a safe place next time.
Ise, please clean your room every now and then...|It sure would be nice to meet Hatsushimo here.|Though the Age of Aviation has come, it still isn't the Age of Aviation Battleships.
Commander, we'd be better off just not doing any pointless missions.
Commander, drinking a beer with a raw egg is just wrong... All you need is beer. Pure beer!

Hyuuga, second ship of the Ise-class, reporting in. Like my sister, I don't have many actual achievements. Then again, the same goes for most of us Sakura Empire battleships. That includes Na-whatever and Ya-whatever. It has nothing to do with our designs or capabilities! ...Hmph. Make fun of me all you want, Commander, but I'll show you what I'm made of.
You should keep this kind of thing in your mind only... Seriously... how will people look at me if I wear this... Hehe... hehe... hehe!
Twelve main guns... FIRE!!
A veteran swordsman should be able to detect her opponent's energy before they get too close... I still have a long way to go...
Commander, let's spar. If you win, I'll let you touch me as much as you'd like.
I'm the little sister of my stupid big sister... Ah! That doesn't mean that I'm a stupid little sister, alright?! Anyways, I'm Hyuuga. Nice to meet you.
Now my main gun sounds even better when it fires!
Phew... Let's work a bit harder!
Aviation battleship Hyuuga, sporting new powers, reporting in! Rest easy, Commander, I'll show you my true post-retrofit power!
Artillery training and aviation training... Guess that's the whole package.
Hey, please help me out with my training today!

Though battleships have seen better times, I will not give up!|Ise's still behaving like she always has... *Sigh*...|It takes a lot of skill to use planes right... I oughta ask for tips from someone with experience.
Main guns: ready! Fire at will!
*Gasp*...! I couldn't sense your presence until you touched me.
Prepared to pay for what you just did? You don't stand the shadow of a chance against me.
Aviation battleship Hyuuga, sporting new powers, reporting in! Rest easy, Commander, I'll show you my true post-retrofit power!
Let's give it our best shot.
There's only so many things a regular submarine can do. To turn the war around, we need more wings in the air.
Type A Mod. 2 cruiser submarine – I-13.
Hey, Commander, a commission should be done by now.
You just don't understand me either, do you, Commander?
Welcome to my room, Commander. I've got books on aircraft lying around if you want to read those. Oh, and please be careful around the model plane on the shelf over there.
You think I'm weird, do you? Heheh, maybe I am... Just remember: there are only so many things a regular submarine can do. That's something I learned during my short time in service.
I've gotten closer to the carrier's aircraft now, and it's all thanks to you. I've never been this happy before in my life. Thank you, Commander!
I want to repay you somehow for everything you've done for me, Commander. I'll do anything you want! If I can help you, you can then help me back.
Nice job on that last mission, Commander.
I guess this is all a submarine can do...
Welcome back, Commander. The skies are ever blue!
It's not good enough to be an ordinary submarine...
Commander, my Seiran has arrived with mail.

Don't get the wrong idea about me, Commander. I do love aircraft, but that doesn't mean I hate myself for being a submarine.|The sea is the color of the sky. And the sky is the same color as me!|There's the Type 97 and Type 99, the Suisei, Tenzan, Ryuusei, Saiun, and of course, my Seiran. I know everything there is to know about aircraft!
Remember to give those missions a look, okay, Commander?
Commander, my Seiran just came back with the mission rewards.

I'm I-13, formally known as the Type A Mod. 2 cruiser submarine model thirteen. Some people call me the fifth of the Type A model, but I was really just an upgraded model that could store Seirans. Sounds cool, doesn't it? Well, sadly, I didn't achieve much of note...
A... Hellcat? An Avenger? Even a Hurricane, and all these other planes?! You... went out and borrowed them all just for me? Oh, Commander... I love you so much I can't even think straight...!
Here it comes... Everything I'm capable of!
I'm okay with lending you my Seiran, but it's veeeeery expensive! Break it, and I'll be really angry, okay?
Don't make me pepper you with my Seiran's machine guns.
Hi, Commander. I'm the aviation submarine I-13. My hobbies include aircraft and gazing up at the sky! Also, this is my friend, my Seiran. I'm glad to meet you.
Maybe I can fit a few more Seirans once I get stronger?
This victory will be a great help to our other fleets.
Let's go! We're hunting big game!
You want something from me, don't you? ... Well, even if you don't...
Kaidai Type VIa submarine – I-168.
Marvelous work, everybody! ... Wonder if they found any rare stuff...
I hate scum like you. Don't come near me ever again.
Hmph! Doubt me all you want, but I'm THE Sakura Empire submarine that sank an important carrier. Now, get on your knees and worship me.
Tooru! I told you to quit tickling me with your Type A! ... Wait a sec, you're not Tooru!
Ever since I sank Yorktown in the war, I've been getting occasional angry glances from Hammann... B-but aren't we all friends now? I mean hey, even Yorktown herself says she's let go of it!
Hmph! If you prefer girls who are honest about their feelings, why not hook up with someone more honest than me? ... WHAT?! Hammann is NOT more honest with her feelings than me!
W-what the hell?!
Nicely done. Now sit down and relax.
You're very late! ... A submarine such as myself is extremely patient, but that doesn't mean you can keep me waiting for this long...
(Blub blub blub...)
A letter for you. Do check it later! ... I wonder if there are any for me...
I'm bored... Entertain me, Commander!|I'm tired... I like it better in the ocean...|Hammann? If she wants to berate me then she can go ahead and try! I'll turn the tables on her!
A mission...? Hmph! I'll show you how it's done! Now listen veeery carefully♪
You've done well! Here's your reward.
I am the submarine I-168. In the war, I avenged Hiryuu by taking out Yorktown and Hammann. Besides that... well... I really tried... but wasn't able to sink any other ships...
F-finally you decided to open up to me... You did right to choose me... Ehehe... W-what's that mean?! YOU'RE the one not being honest here!
Sink for me!
Don't touch me for no reason! ... It's a massage? O-okay... Continue...
Eeek?! W-what do you want?!
I'm I-168, but do call me Iroha. I expect you to know how to handle an extraordinary and decorated vessel such as myself!
All right! I've become even stronger!
I DID IT! You see that? Did you see it?!
I'm in a good mood, so I'll sink you with just a single shot!
Fried squid! Dango! Candied apples! Om nom nom... *Cough cough*! N-need water...!
I look different from usual? That's obvious, isn't it... All right, all right, I was just giving you a hard time. We're at a festival, so we might as well enjoy ourselves!

I just love festivals! You have my permission to take a break today♪ ... It's the other way around?|G-going around town every now and then isn't so bad, I guess...|Hammann can't tie her yukata's sash on her own either... W-what's so funny?! Hardly anyone can tie that thing on their own!
I look different from usual? That's obvious, isn't it... All right, all right, I was just giving you a hard time. We're at a festival, so we might as well enjoy ourselves!
W-woohoo?
I'll give it my best shot~
Did you want to see me? Hehehe~ That makes me super happy~
Type B1 cruiser submarine – I-19.
Are you gonna welcome back the commission team? I wanna go with you! Surely I can come along?
It's all because I'm not trying hard enough, isn't it...
Enemies? I won't let any get away~ I'll beat the heck outta each and every one of 'em!
Would you like... a massage? A shoulder rub? Or maybe you want to use my thighs as a pillow? Hehehe~
Do you think I'm cute? ... Hehehe~ C'mon, say it one more time~
I can't be without you anymore... You can't be without me either, right? Say it, c'mon~ Hehehe~
Nice work~ Maybe I should give you a massage... Mmh, how is it? Am I good? Hehehe~
I-it'll take more than this to scare me!
Commander! I've been waiting sooooo long for you!
Oww, it hurts... I wanna go back to the Commander...
Your mail? I already brought it here! See? Aren't I smart~?
I made hot tea for you! I'm so great, aren't I?|I went through your paperwork! Hehehe~ Maybe you could pat me on the head as a reward~|*Giggle*... What are you looking at~?
A mission? I can help! I'll give it 100%~
I've brought the mission rewards~ Give me your praise, Commander~
Destroyers, carriers, battleships, I'll sink 'em all with one shot~! Hey, Commander, aren't I amazing? I am, right?
From now on, you'll always be mine~ I wanna hear your praise, and I wanna make lots and lots of dear memories with you~
I'll work super duuuuper hard~!
Do you want me to help you relax?
Hehehe~ I don't mind at all, as long as you praise me~
I'm I-19! Commaaandeeer! I-19's been waiting so, so long for you~!
You can praise me more~
Now the Commander will hopefully praise me... Hehehe~
I should make some friends? But I don't need any~! You're the only person I need!
Aww, do I have to go to school? ... Oh, Commander! Are you here to see me off?
School's so boring... I'd rather be by your side, Commander~ Hehehe~
Mail? I hope it's not an angry letter from some teacher...
Eek! The wind nearly... Hmm? Were you trying to sneak a peek~?|Commander, help me with my extra lessons...|Do you like my outfit, Commander? Is it cute? Hehehe~
Hehehe~ Do you wanna walk to and from school with me?
No touching until everyone else has gone home...
Aww, do I have to go to school? ... Oh, Commander! Are you here to see me off?
Sleeping while cuddling Mr. Torpedo is the best~ Ehehe~
So sleepy... Hey, Commandeeer? Do you wanna nap with me and my torpedo?
Mr. Torpedo, the Commader's back... Zzz...
Zzz... I want to keep sleeping...
Are you my new pillow? Zzz...
A red one, a yellow one, a green one... there are sooo many pillows~|Commander, do you want to try cuddling Mr. Torpedo? It'll feel really good~|Zzz... Don't take Mr. Torpedo away...
Missions? Sure, after I wake up~
Geez, I'm not a body pillow...
Don't you think I'm way more cuddlable than Mr. Torpedo? Ehehe~
So sleepy... Hey, Commandeeer? Do you wanna nap with me and my torpedo?
Does this outfit excite you? Hehehe~ You can stare all you want, you know~
I thought I'd try on this bunny costume! Hehehe, do you like it? If you think it's cute, I wanna hear you say it~
Well done, Commander~ I've been waiting for you here this whole time! Hehehe~ Aren't I great?
I'm here to serve you for the whole day! Just tell me if there's anything you want me to do~

Here! A glass of hot milk for you! Aren't I super duper great?|Commander, which do you like better, bunnies or cats? Hehehe~|Hmm, there's a lot of girls dressed like bunnies right now... I'll try to be your most favorite one!
I picked up a few massage techniques! Hehehe~ Want me to try them on you, Commander?
It feels a little weird, doing this in a bunny outfit...
I thought I'd try on this bunny costume! Hehehe, do you like it? If you think it's cute, I wanna hear you say it~
Sometimes, you've got to stand out!
Sorry to bother you when you're busy, Commander, but could you please help me test the capabilities of my seaplane?
Type B1 cruiser submarine – I-25.
Everyone in the commission fleet has returned safely. Hmm... should I reward them with some homemade chocolate?
Though I am very sorry that it has come to this, I must once again remind you that your poor work ethic has already affected the fleet.
Commander, thank you for coming to see me today. Because of you, I'll have some extra spring in my step. Hehe~
...Is Commander really not coming today..? I'm going to die of loneliness... ... C-Commander?! Did you hear me just now??

Commander, sorry to call you out all of a sudden, but I've just been so lonely... I'm quite bold, you say? Ehehe... Well, you know, I did have a bit of experience getting... tangled up with the enemy back then. Want to hear more about it?
Ahhn... Commander, you've come to see me again... Today... today, you won't leave my side this time, right? Commander, if you stay with me, I'll never be lonely ever again!
Judging by your grin, Commander, you must've had a resounding victory. Hehe, why don't you come here and let me massage your shoulders?
Now, this is a bit of a sticky situation...
Mmh... Welcome back, Commander. While you were gone, I finished compiling all the reports. Here you go~
Is everyone safe?
New mail keeps piling up... Commander, you should hurry up and start getting through these...

Where I'm from, we always offer our respects for the food in front of us before each meal. It's a custom that helps us be at ease. |I hope my sister hasn't been causing too much trouble for you. She's a little ball of energy... there's no way I can keep up with her... |Commander... Commander...? Are you still asleep? I'm getting a bit worried...
There are still some missions that need to be completed. Commander, let's finish them together.
These are the fruits of everyone's efforts. Make sure to receive them with pride.

I'm the Type-B class cruiser submarine, I-25. I'm at my best when it comes to reconnaissance and disrupting shipping routes. I've also been in some... pretty daring operations. Hehe~ Commander, you can count on me.
This is the proof of our oath to each other, Commander... Thank you so much! Finally, I've found my happiness! I'm so glad... we'll get to spend all our days together like this from now on! Ehehe~♪
Now's our time to attack!
Haah... I'm being filled to the brim with your energy, Commander...
Commander, do you... like this kind of sensation...?
Phew... I finally found you! Commander, I'm I-25. I hope that I can be a big help to you. Anyway, it's nice meeting you~
Hehe... Thank you for helping me become even more reliable, Commander~
Heehee, from now on, just leave it to me~
Which subjects am I good at? I'd say I'm pretty decent at all of them. Ehehe, I did say you can leave everything to me.
Hi there, Commander. Oh, this outfit? I'll be wearing it to school today. By the way, did you want to come sit in on my class?
Uuhh... the whole time during class, I was thinking about when you'd come back, Commander... Looks like I-26 is going to make fun of me again...
D-deep sea fish, attack! Umm, uh... that's not how it works...? I don't seem to be very good at this...

Coral reefs are breathtakingly beautiful, Commander. If you ever want to see for yourself, just let me know. |This might sound strange coming from me, but forest fires are a very serious matter. There will be dire consequences if you don't take that to heart. Just ask the girls of the Eagle Union. |There's nothing wrong with I-19, right... The next time I-26 calls everyone to play, I'll go check on her.
Haah... as long as you're by my side, I feel safe and sound.
Woahh... Commander...
Hi there, Commander. Oh, this outfit? I'll be wearing it to school today. By the way, did you want to come sit in on my class?
I need to be a bit more graceful... both in celebration and in combat...!
"S-Secret Technique: Dragon Dance!" ...Ungh, I can't do this after all... Commander, could you please have my sister do this instead...?
Commander, Happy Lunar New Year. Would you like some sweet wine to celebrate? Oh, be careful not to drink too much~
Please... rub my ears as well...
Haah... haah... Here, this is for you~ I let the wine get to my head a little. Hehe~
Uhh... C-Commander, are you done making your rounds yet? ...Haah... thanks for filling me up with your energy today...

Thank you, everyone, for preparing all this Spring Festival food. Right, time to dig in... Ah, um, is it okay to start eating?|The Manjuus and Meowfficers are also busy preparing for the Spring Festival... Thanks for all the hard work~♪|If it's going to take a while to make your rounds, go get my sister instead... Actually, wait, can I come with you?
Commander, I've gotten enough of your energy... Hm, you want to load me up in advance? Mm... Okay!
M-my sister's going to get jealous...
Commander, Happy Lunar New Year. Would you like some sweet wine to celebrate? Oh, be careful not to drink too much~
Who might be our lucky girl today~?
Tans are a sign of good health! So why not come with me and sunbathe a bit?
Type B1 cruiser submarine – I-26.
A commission's done! Put me on the team for the next one! Disrupting trade is what I do best! Hehehe~
Commander? Never mind, must've been the wind. Hahaha!
Commence dive! Target spotted! Fire torpedoes! Kaboooom! See? It's pretty easy! Why don't you give it a try too?
Commander, wanna see which of us can hold their breath longest? The winner gets a massage from the loser! How's that sound?
I wonder when you'll notice that... um... that... your suit has a button loose! What were you expecting me to say? Hehehe~
Hey, let me borrow your shoulders... Jumpity! Hehehe~ Light as a feather, right? Bring me to the office, if you will!
Huh? Commander, I think your hairline's starting to recede... Ahahaha! I'm just kidding with you!
Ahaha... This might be bad...
Jumpity! ... Hehe~ Did I spook you, Commander?
Oh, shoot... I messed up...
What about your mail? It was past the deadline, so I disposed of it... Juuust kidding! Here you go, read it~

"What's up with my ears"? Hm? Do you wanna feel them?|Sorting paperwork... Ugh, so boring... Hey, why don't we play beach volleyball instead?|Maybe I should go for a swim~ Oh, I know! Commander, wanna have a swimming competition to see who's faster? Hehehe~
A new mission's arrived! Phew, this'll be a good chance to move around a bit!
When I see those ships coming in with our rewards, my heart shakes with the impulse to sink them... Just kidding~! I'd never do that! Hahaha, let's check out what we got!

Question! Which Sakura Empire submarine was the first to sink an Eagle Union merchant ship? You guessed it, this clever little cutie I-26 did! ... What happened after that, you ask? Let's leave the past behind us and focus on the present! *Giggle*

I was wondering when this day would come, but I never would've thought it'd be today... I feel so happy that I could swim 100 laps around the port! Yeah! In fact, let's go swimming right now, together!
Fooound you!
Hm? Need any help doing your warm-ups?
What are you fantasizing about? C'mon, tell me~ Hehehe~
Submarine I-26 has arrived to be your roommate from now on! Hehehe~ Let me guess: you've really been looking forward to meeting me, right?
I wish someone would enhance my figure, too...
Surprise attack: executed flawlessly!
School's just boring compared to the ocean... Like, there's tons of undiscovered fish species and monsters down at the bottom of the ocean! I wish I could see how they look~
Many secrets lie at the bottom of the ocean! Commander, let's go looking for them next time! It'll be like a field trip~ Heheh!
We've finally got recess, and yet you still go on sorties... Great work~!
Innsmouth! ... Hehe~ Did I spook you, Commander? Don't worry, this is just a stuffed toy!

Big fish eat regular fish. Regular fish eat small fish. Hang on... what do small fish eat, again...?|If you were an anglerfish, you could work late at night without having to turn on the lights!|It's not easy to swim without a swimsuit~ Baww...
You should give this anglerfish plushie a hug! It's really soft and cuddly!
Haven't I told you I'm not a fish?!
Many secrets lie at the bottom of the ocean! Commander, let's go looking for them next time! It'll be like a field trip~ Heheh!
Ugh... I always feel like there's something uncomfortable sticking out of my hair. Commander, can you help brush my hair?
Commander, are you also waiting for the fireworks to start? There's still some time, so let's have a little chat!
Commander, I'm always causing trouble for you, so... you won't mind if I cause a bit more trouble for you on this special day, right? Ehehe~ Commander, you're the best!
Commander, you're not allowed to leave me behind and sneak off to the fireworks first, got it?
Commander, are you awake? You totally missed the fireworks! Ahaha... Just kidding! It's still early.
nil|nil|nil
It's fine to take a nap if you'd like. I'll wake you up before the fireworks start.
Eek! Commander, don't try to take advantage of the fact that I can't move around very well!
Commander, are you also waiting for the fireworks to start? There's still some time, so let's have a little chat!
They didn't find me, right...?
Eep?! Oh, C-Commander... did you need something?
Type B3 Mod. 2 cruiser submarine – I-56.
What's the commission of the composition team... Umm, I mean, the composition of the...
Leave... Leave me alone...
If you don't want to get caught up in bothersome things, it's probably better to be like thin air and not stand out...
Everyone in the fleet gets along so well... Ehe... hehehe... Um, it's nothing... l-leave me alone...
From time to time, my thoughts slip out when I'm muttering to myself... D-don't read too much into it...
Commander, sorry I haven't come to see you recently... It's just that... I've been thinking about you like crazy, and I can't stop it... It's so embarrassing...
Today's sortie... went well then?
L-Looks like I've drawn too much attention...
Eep?! C-Commander... it's fine to not greet me...
Time to slink away quietly...
Make sure to go through your mail carefully...

Commander, you're always dealing with so many people every day... Amazing... I-I'd never be able to do that... |Commander, being together with you is peaceful and quiet... I can calm down and think about lots of things... |Being athletic like 58 and 19.... err, I mean, 26... would be nice... Eek?! C-Commander? I-I didn't say anything!!
Commander, these... these are mission delegations, right...?
*gasp*! Oh no... I spaced out while tallying the mission rewards...
I am the 2nd ship of the Type-B Mod. 2 cruiser submarines, I-56. The most noteworthy thing about me... is that I did nothing noteworthy... But there wasn't much I could do at that point anyway...
Am... am I still fantasizing? Mmhm... probably, yup... Commander, give my cheeks a good pinch...!
Y-you leave me no choice...!
Commander, what's the matter? Ah, umm... was I muttering something weird to myself again?!
Eek?! C-Commander... this is just like in that book...?! Ah, um, forget I said that! Sorry...
I've been found... I... I'm I-56... Um, if there are any missions I can do by myself, could I get those?
Um... th-thanks...
Next time... I hope I don't get MVP...
I hope this doesn't get in the way of my school attendance...
The other kids often post all kinds of pictures onto social media from their phones... Commander, you can also take a look.
School... is pretty nice. I can quietly stay in this corner and mind my own business...
Commander, I just got out of school... Um, want to head back together?

At school, you can see a completely different side of people. It can be pretty interesting... |I've received invitations from several clubs before... but I still prefer to watch others from a distance. |Don't worry, Commander. I'm enjoying my time at school.
New text message...? Um, Commander, new missions have been posted.
... What's the matter, Commander? Oh, I was just watching that couple over there walking to school together...
School... is pretty nice. I can quietly stay in this corner and mind my own business...
I'll let the rest of you handle the anti-sub.
I love the serenity of the night. Nobody ever notices my presence.
Type-B Mod 2 cruiser submarine – I-58.
I wonder what's going on up there on the surface... Ah, Commander, your commission fleet has returned.
Does this fleet exist only to wage war...?
Now that we're all on the same team, I'm going to have to learn to work with Indianapolis... but that sister of hers, bleh... Ugh, maybe I'll just go for a swim instead...
"A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step?" Hmm... I suppose I can start by saying hello to her...
Although we can't become close friends that easily, at least we're making some progress... I suppose time will take care of the rest. Commander, thank you so much for your help. As a reward... *kiss*
It's hard to let go of the past... but Commander, you've rewritten everyone's futures, to one where we can all move forward together. Commander, I can't be prouder of the fact that I fell for you.
Commander, are the conditions of the waters suitable for me to carry out my activities?
Seems that I'm being targeted...
Commander, submarines will die if you take them out of the water. I-I was just kidding...
I've been found, huh... Next time, I've got to be sneakier...
Commander, there's new mail... Ah, sorry, I just left the water so I got it wet...

It's not like I'll die if I'm taken out of the ocean, but I definitely prefer being in it. *blub blub* |Commander, when it comes to swimming, which stroke is your favorite? Crawl? Butterfly? Breaststroke? |There are a lot of miraculous things in the ocean. Want to go on a dive with me and experience it for yourself?
New missions? Is there something that I can do?
These mission rewards... there's nothing that can be brought underwater...

Type-B Mod 2 cruiser submarine, I-58. Yup, that's me. I was born towards the end of the war, and participated in several missions. Before the end of things, I managed to sink Indianapolis. Even though it was a great achievement, it's not like it ultimately made a difference...

Commander, I'm sure that you will be able to create that world... where everyone can smile from the bottom of their heart... As for me, I can't think of anything happier than being with you right now.
Can you predict where I'm going to attack from?
It's important to warm up before diving. Commander, let's do some exercises together.
I mean... I'll admit they're on the small side... but that makes it more hydrodynamic!
I-58, reporting in. I usually like hanging out in the water by the docks, so you know where to look if you need me~
Mhm, my body feels lighter.
Is that all you surface-lubbers are made of?
The battlefield is callous... Ibuki, advancing!
Milord, w-welcome... I wasn't able to prepare much for your arrival... but would you like some tea?
Heavy cruiser – Ibuki.
Milord, the comm... Um, whatever these are called. Yes, they're done now.
Had I known I would have to serve a person like you, I never would have manifested during this era...
I would also enjoy a life of sitting atop the mountains, watching the clouds pass through the sky. But my current life here isn't so bad either.
I'm cool, you say...? If anything, I am somewhat jealous of how everyone can always have a smile on their faces... In contrast, I simply do not know how to express my emotions...
After spending a lot of time with everyone else, I've experienced firsthand how difficult it can be to express my emotions clearly... such as joy... and love...
The mugwort on Mount Ibuki is said to symbolize love that burns quietly... F-For example, right now, Milord... can you feel Ibuki's heart?
Milord, if you are ever injured, please allow Ibuki to treat you with this mugwort liniment. There's still a lot left.
A fight with our backs to the wall? ... Exactly what I wanted!
Milord, you must be tired.
Ugh... I must increase my training multifold.
Milord, your mail... Huh? You'd like me to read it? B-but that's embarrassing...

Spending time alone with Milord... somehow... makes my heart pound... |Milord, if you have no further orders for me, may I go over there to meditate? |In order to hone my swordsmanship, I practice my strokes a thousand times every day... Don't worry, Milord, I already finished while you were gone.
We seem to have new missions. Would you like Ibuki to accompany you?
Milord, there's a big pile of stuff over there... Um, are those the rewards then?

Milord, are you interested in me...? Mm... this Ibuki, who was never born, and has no history or accomplishments to speak of... Um, my hobby is poetry, and I'm skilled in swordsmanship! Are you satisfied with that? Um, also, I'm not very good around people...
I never knew that having my feelings be reciprocated could be so overwhelmingly joyful... Milord, p-please don't look at me... I'm so happy that... my face must look strange...
The pinnacle of Ibuki... resides in this single strike!
You'd like me to put on a show? S-Sorry... in front of other people... I can't...
Clear the mind, and purify the six roots... Eek! Mi, Milord...
Was it your voice that beckoned me from my timeless slumber? This lowly Ibuki, though still in training, shall be yours to use as you see fit.
Is this... the sensation of getting stronger? Thank you!
My skills are but party tricks, unworthy of such praise.
I'll have to thank Houshou for this lovely kimono...
Milord, it's starting to snow... If it suits you, please take shelter under Ibuki's umbrella.
