The winter in my timeless slumber was silent and cold. But here, at Milord's side, I feel only warmth... Milord, would you... take my hand?
The snow is coming down outside... Milord, let me get an extra sweater for you.
Milord, shall we go outside together?

Achoo! ...I'm cute when I sneeze? D- don't make fun of me...|This is... real snow... beautiful...|Aren't there some big festivals in the wintertime? I guess you could say... I'm a little interested... only a little!
Is there someplace you'd like to go, Milord? Of course I'll accompany you.
Um, Milord, your hands are cold...
Milord, it's starting to snow... If it suits you, please take shelter under Ibuki's umbrella.
These foreign beverages and teas have quite a distinctive flavor...
This is my first time wearing Western clothes... Um, Milord! Does this outfit... suit Ibuki well...?
Milord, please try this cake. It's fluffy, sweet, and delicious.
I am unsure how I should conduct myself at a "banquet..." Milord, may I just follow you?

There are so many things at this banquet that I simply do not understand... Ah, please don't get the wrong idea... I merely realized that there is much for me to learn still. |Actually, it was Miss Seattle who invited me here... She's quite a charismatic person. |Though I prefer my outings to be a bit more... introspective, I don't mind the camaraderie and joyfulness here.
Milord, it feels nice when the wind gently strokes my cheeks.
D-do these clothes not suit me after all?
This is my first time wearing Western clothes... Um, Milord! Does this outfit... suit Ibuki well...?
Hmm, I'm a lot more outgoing than usual? Maybe the festive atmosphere is rubbing off on me. Milord, do you think... I'm acting strange...?
The Dragon Empery's "Spring Festival" is... filled with fun, liveliness, and pure jubilation. I can feel my true feelings welling up... Maybe, an environment like this would suit me pretty well...
The warm glow of the lanterns and the vivid, red decorations... it's all so beautiful...

Milord, Ibuki will be performing a sword dance at the Spring Festival banquet tonight... Um, it's my first time performing in front of everyone, so I'm a bit nervous... |Milord, Miss Akashi seems to be selling firecrackers. I heard they are a bit like fireworks... Huh? They are firecrackers, right? |Milord, those things hanging on the walls are "fai chun," right? I see, there's something written in them... I wonder what it means...
Around this time, the cold begins to recede. Soon, spring shall arrive... I see, so this is why people hang "fai chun" on the walls...
The Dragon Empery's "Spring Festival" is... filled with fun, liveliness, and pure jubilation. I can feel my true feelings welling up... Maybe, an environment like this would suit me pretty well...
Milord, I'll protect you!
Milord, is the tea I prepared to your liking?
I'm glad you've returned, Milord. I've changed my attire in order to better carry out your order–for us to "relax together." Now then... could you please instruct me on how to proceed?
Milord, I've prepared your tea. Phew... Even though we're spending all this time together doing nothing, I... still feel fulfilled. Mm, this overflowing emotion... Milord, is this what "love" is...?
Milord...?
*Yaaawn*... Milord, please relax and make yourself at home.
Milord, you have new mail. Um... Shall I read it aloud for you?
nil|Milord, I shall now continue my meditation... Oh, y-you'd like to talk to me?|Milord, could you please arrange some work for me? I'm... feeling a little fidgety...
Milord, what would you have me do...?
Milord?! H-have I done something to displease you...?
I'm glad you've returned, Milord. I've changed my attire in order to better carry out your order–for us to "relax together." Now then... could you please instruct me on how to proceed?
Alright...! Let's go all-out!
A change of clothes for the commander, the menus for tomorrow's meals... Oh, Commander. When did you get here? ...Don't mind me, I'm just doing some daily preparations~♪
I-class destroyer – Icarus.
Commander, would you like me to go greet the commissions team in your stead?
...If you keep this up, I'll be the only one left who's willing to keep looking after you, Commander...
Commander, I've sworn to protect you and everyone else at the port. I'll use all my might to destroy anything that dares to hurt you!

Commander, haven't you been working a bit too hard recently? You need to make sure to get some rest when you can... If you fly too close to the sun, your wings will melt, and you'll fall down, you know? ...Huh? What am I saying...?
Mm... The more I stay by your side, the more I want to do your work in your stead... Do you think I'm getting a bit too attached to you...?
"You, who are like the sun, make me feel your warmth just by being there. You, who are like the sun, make me afraid of being swallowed by your warmth." Commander, can I come... a bit closer to you?
voiceline.oath: "You, who are like the sun..." No, that's not quite it. If I were to say what you are really like... Maybe a space heater? Warm to be around, without the danger of being burned... Look, even if I'm sticking to you this closely, I'm still not burned! Hehe~

voiceline.line: Hehehe. You know, this feels kind of nice.
voiceline.oath: Hehe~ Commander, your kindness puts me at ease.

voiceline.line: Welcome back, Commander. I cleaned up the room while you were away. ...N-no, there's no need to praise me. It really wasn't a big deal!
My torpedoes still aren't ready... I can hold out for a bit longer...!
Commander, did you just arrive? Hehe. There are documents on your desk. I'll have your tea ready in just a moment, so please get started on your work.
voiceline.oath: Oh, Commander. Did you just get here? I've prepared the schedule and documents on your desk, along with a glass of lemon water. It's got plenty of vitamins in it, so I hope you'll do your best!

voiceline.line: If only I could have shot another volley of torpedoes...
I've finished sorting out the new mail! Should I bring it over?

Commander, please let me know when you head out! Whether it's an umbrella or a coat, I'll be sure to have it ready for you.|Eskimo looks like she wants some attention... Commander, I'll do something about her, so please focus on your work. ...That's right, I can call Abercrombie over!|I guess destroyers really have their limits... If only I had bigger guns or torpedoes... Oh, I was just talking to myself. Please don't mind me!
voiceline.extra: Here Commander, your lunch! Ah, but you can't be a picky eater!|Wow, Hood is gorgeous as always... Hey Commander, you should follow her example too and act more gracefully!|Whenever I play hide-and-seek, I usually find everyone intuitively... Perhaps I'm better at it than I thought?

voiceline.line: There's a new mission. Let's do our best!
The mission's been completed! How wonderful!

My history as a ship...? I escorted Hood and Warspite, and also participated in anti-submarine missions... Basically, I've been here and there and done this and that. I guess you could say I have quite a bit of experience? That being the case, feel free to call upon me, whether in battle or otherwise!
Just as I've become unable to part with you, have you come to feel the same way about me? I'm so happy! From now on, I'll be sure... to ask you for lots of things♪
Loading complete... Let's go!
Was there something you wanted me to do?
voiceline.oath: I'm right over here~ Please let me know if you need anything!

voiceline.line: I-I'm not sure if we should be doing this...
voiceline.oath: If you're g-going to do something like this, shouldn't we go elsewhere...?

voiceline.line: Well met, Commander. I am Icarus, I-class destroyer from the Royal Navy. I specialize in escort and anti-submarine operations. I look forward to working with you.
Mmh~ One step closer to achieving overwhelming firepower... Err, I mean, I'll be more useful to the commander!
We won! It's all thanks to you, Commander!
I've already prepared your changes of clothing and daily necessities in advance. Make sure you don't neglect your health while I'm away participating in this exercise, alright?

This is a special exercise for our on-site medical facilities! Well, that's what they said anyway, but isn't this kind of weird...? I feel like I'd rather be taking care of others, not the other way around...
I wonder if... I should just let the Royal Maids clean your room instead...
Commander, did you come by to check up on me? Though I might look like a patient, I'm actually perfectly fine~

Looking out the window of this hospital room at the scenery is making me oddly emotional...|These bandages and this IV are just here for practice. They're not the real deal, you know?|It's hard to move around properly in this... I'm sure there will be an impact on my firepower, too...
Even in this situation, I'm sure there is something that I can do for you, Commander.
C-Commander? We're in the medical facility, you know...

This is a special exercise for our on-site medical facilities! Well, that's what they said anyway, but isn't this kind of weird...? I feel like I'd rather be taking care of others, not the other way around...
No matter how many times I see it, it never gets old... It's simply amazing that we're able to create amazing sets like this at the Port.
"Let's go explore the ocean together! What special things will we be able to find today~?" Hehe, how's that, Commander?
Commander, how would you like to join me in the shoot? I think I'd get more fired up if we're in the same shot... Hehe~
The manjuus and I are all ready to go! You can start taking pictures whenever you're ready.

So this is what the submarine girls see while they battle... Hehe, the scenery down here is amazing.|This swimsuit fits me nice and tight. It's so easy to move around in it!|Oh, I caught you spacing out, Commander. I had the manjuus take a picture as proof, too. Why don't you take a look? Heehee~
W-We're still in the middle of the shoot, Commander!
"Let's go explore the ocean together! What special things will we be able to find today~?" Hehe, how's that, Commander?
I cleaned your room earlier, and was pleasantly surprised to see that it was well-organized. Great work not leaving documents strewn about, Commander~
I hope your work's going well, Commander! I've been here playing with these kitties since finishing my duties. Here, I brewed some fresh tea to help you recharge~
Welcome back, Commander. How about a break? I've prepared some cake for you. I do hope it's to your liking.
What a good little kitty cat you are~ Hold still, let me get that itch for you~ Same goes for you, Commander. Let me know if you've ever got an itch, I'll take care of it for you~

Commander, it's time to eat. I put my all into the preparations! I... went too overboard? E-Err...|Comparing me to the Royal Maids is like comparing night and day. There's no way I'd be able to measure up to true professionals.|I think I understand your daily schedule now, Commander. These are part of the duties of a maid, aren't they?
Commander? It seems you really enjoy touching people. Let's go tell everyone about this interest of yours!
Is this... also part of the duties of a maid?
I hope your work's going well, Commander! I've been here playing with these kitties since finishing my duties. Here, I brewed some fresh tea to help you recharge~
I see! So all we need to do is press that auto button in the top left and we'll be fine!
If you bow deep and beg for it, I'll make your wishes basically come true! ... It didn't work? Um, well... that's because you haven't wished hard enough yet!
Type III Akatsuki-class destroyer number three - Akatsuki.
If you let a completed commission just sit there, does it gain any "interest"?
I see! This means that if I just let myself get washed away by the ocean then I can come back home...
Commander, if there's ever anything you don't understand, just ask me. After all, I've used up more oil than you ever will in your life.

It's my birthday tomorrow. Have you gotten a gift for me yet? You didn't know it was my birthday? Ah, well... see that pendant over there? Buy it and give it to someone you like, I'm sure they'll be delighted!

Commander! I found a sweet way to make a ton of money! Um, it says "if you invest 10,000 coins then I can recruit 2 more people for my startup, and you'll see a monthly 30% profit",stuff like that... But what's a "startup"...?
I see! This thing making my heart race is called "love"! Alright, I understand. That means...! W-wha...? I feel so lightheaded... It feels like the world's spinning around me... Is this "love" too?
Times like these call for fine wine and good food! Hard work shouldn't go unnoticed and all that! Hm? Where do we get it from? From the dorm! There's plenty of it there!
I see! You just "logged in" didn't you? Human language sure is profound...
I see...! Times like these you should P2GSOE2PTG4U! Pay to get someone else to play the game for you! Or you can just let me handle it instead!
I see! This is that... thingy! The thing you need to bring with you to be let into that one chocolate factory!

Almost as fast as Shimakaze? So, the wind is faster than thunder and lighting?|I see! So Inazuma-chan landed the "First Strike" in the World War!|I see! So if I stay in the shipyard all the time I'll become a "Phoenix"! Yep, I'd be a... "Thunder Phoenix"...?
You haven't finished the mission? ... That sounds about as bad as not finishing your job.
Come on! I'm the commander's secretary, but I can't claim rewards on his behalf?! What are the people in charge thinking!

I'm Ikazuchi, an Akatsuki-class destroyer. I may not look like it, but I'm a Sakura Empire veteran. Even Yamato calls me... um, what was I called again? Anyways, it was something like that! You can count on me to do my job! Also, see that LIKE button? Give it a good tap and make sure to subscribe to my channel!
Just gotta write my name here, right? ... Um, I don't think I get it... Inazuma-chan, care to explain this? ... "After you sign it, you'll belong to the commander forever"? Okay, got it!
I see! This is the power that two sisters have!
I see! This is one of those ordinary "greeting" things, right?
Uh, umm... is this what I think it is? I know full well the meaning of w-what you did! I-I see...
I am Ikazuchi…I’m simply not very talkative...I think you’ll be seeing a lot more of me in the future, Commander.
I'd rather have my "ratings","likes",and "gimme" stats enhanced instead!
I see! Now this is what you should expect of someone as "prestigious" as me! Er, or was it "pretentious"...?
If it's inevitable, then hopefully the Commander will only take a small bite…. no, wrong! It’s, it’s probably better if Ikazuchi can be spared just this one time!
Ikazuchi, Ikazuchi has been transformed into tea! What should we do! Inazuma and Ikazuchi will get slurped up by the Commander!

Ikazuchi, Ikazuchi still have a lot of anime to catch up on, Commander. At least let Ikazuchi finish the season she’s watching! Pretty please! | It smells so, so good… Ikazuchi just can’t take it anymore and wants to have a bite. | That being the case! What would Ikazuchi be like in another world… then?
C-Commander, Ikazuchi is falling off from the plate, whoaaa—
Ha… So it turns out that the Commander already knew Ikazuchi is Ikazuchi...
Ikazuchi, Ikazuchi has been transformed into tea! What should we do! Inazuma and Ikazuchi will get slurped up by the Commander!
Inazuma and I have been to a lot of festivals together, but this would be the first time that I've gone with you, Commander. Isn't this totally like a date?
nil|nil|nil
Commander! If you get the Inazuma DLC, you'll have a full set of wings!
I'm the fairy of thunder that shatters the night to herald the dawn! I see, I see! That is a good backstory! Commander, want to head to the party together?
Going straight from grinding EXP to grinding at the party, huh? I'd expect nothing less of you, Commander!
Commander, finally decided to "log in," huh? Wanna join the party?

I've brought a bunch of mouth-watering strawberries! Commander, wanna try one?|We thought Akatsuki had gotten lost again, but Hibiki seems to have bumped into her. I see, I see, so that's what we call a "random encounter!"|Don't you think this tooty manjuu is a bit annoying? ...You don't even see it, Commander?
How am I supposed to fly with only one wing? ...Well, even if I had two, it probably still wouldn't work out!
I'm the fairy of thunder that shatters the night to herald the dawn! I see, I see! That is a good backstory! Commander, want to head to the party together?
Why cause unnecessary conflict?
Could you help me pick up that handkerchief...? I'd lose my balance if I try to pick it up myself...
Illustrious-class aircraft carrier – Illustrious, Hull Number 87!
The light shall disperses the fog of darkness. Oh? The girls are back!
Not even my light can reach the darkness within your heart?
Commander, what do you find most important in a girl? Seriously, could you look me in the eyes when we're speaking?
Commander, while I'm like this, I take a special liking towards suprise night attacks. Seriously, I didn't mean it like that, but is the Commander into things like that?
Commander... do you want to try... a soft landing?
No matter what you ask of me, Commander, I'll accept it... So, Commander, please tell me how you feel about me.
Feeling tired? Relax for a while. How about a massage?
Don't panic, Commander. I'm here!
Greetings, Commander. I've tidied up a bit here. What do you think?
Let's retreat, lest I lose my life...
Here's your mail, Commander! Should I open it for you?

Have you seen where did I put my planes? Oh? Right in front of me? Sorry, something blocked my line of sight.| Commander... can you feel my heartbeat through the palm of your hand?|Commander, why are you always staring at me? Am I that pretty?
Commander, it's no good to leave missions unfinished.
Don't forget to collect your rewards, Commander!
Greetings, Commander. I am the armored aircraft carrier Illustrious. I may seem gentle, but I have quite the temper. I single-handedly bullied the Italian fleet during the raid at Taranto.
Even though light should be shared equally among us all, it's fine for you to have a bit more. After all, I've received something important from the Commander as well.
Holy light, grant me power!
It's as though... I've received your recognition, Commander. I feel so relieved.
Seriously, Commander, you're like a little kid.
Greetings, Commander! Aircraft carrier Illustrious reporting in! I pray that you will bring love and peace to this world. May the light be with you.
This way we can radiate our brilliance even further.
The light shines upon our land of triumph.
Sun kissed skin, scrumptious snacks and delicious black tea. It’s as if both my mind and body have been rejuvenated— Commander, care to join me for some leisurely chit-chat?

Commander, how does it taste? Today’s scones are Edinburgh’s signature dish. | Commander, black tea is supposed to be sipped~ At the very least, pay attention not to spill your drink. | Compared to the glaring sunset, I prefer this bright and gentle sunlight, what about you Commander?
Commander, you can’t act this way… at the tea party.
Sun kissed skin, scrumptious snacks and delicious black tea. It’s as if both my mind and body have been rejuvenated— Commander, care to join me for some leisurely chit-chat?
I always feel my heart racing when I wear a different outfit in front of you, Commander~
An invitation to the ball? Hehe, I would be honored to go... as long as you don't decline, Commander~
Good day, Commander. Are you ready to attend the ball?
As dance partners, we should hold hands like this... Commander, can you feel my warmth? |nil|The orchestra has started playing~ Commander, would you like to dance with me?
Did you want to talk, Commander? I'll always be here to listen to you~
Commander, being proud about doing something inappropriate doesn't make it any less inappropriate.
An invitation to the ball? Hehe, I would be honored to go... as long as you don't decline, Commander~
This is my first time wearing such exotic fashion, hehe~. Commander, if you like how I look, how about showing me off a little~?
Good work out there, Commander. I've prepared some authentic incense for you. Why don't we close our eyes for a bit and uplift our spirits~
Greetings, Commander. Sorry for taking so long, but fixing my clothes took quite a bit of time... I'm not late, am I?

I look like a princess from a foreign country? Hehe, you're making me blush... |Commander, it is only because of you that we are able to experience so many different cultures. Being able to be at your side is my greatest pleasure~ |Commander, can I lean against you and rest for a while? This time, I want to listen to your heartbeat~
This is my first time wearing such exotic fashion, hehe~. Commander, if you like how I look, how about showing me off a little~?
This festival may be a foreign custom to many of us here, but I think it's delightful we get to enjoy it nonetheless. And it's all thanks to your efforts, Commander. Hehe.
It is my honour to get to wear another faction's garments. However... this traditional Dragon Empery dress feels rather tight around the chest area...
You're looking well. What good news have you brought Illustrious today?
How do you do, Commander? May this splendid holiday wash away all your worries.

All these Iris flowers are not just for showy decoration, they make for some aromatherapy as well. Hehe.|These Dragon Empery decorations all have a certain... unique charm to them, don't they?|Commander, you absolutely must try the Empyreal cuisine the Royal Maids prepared. I've heard even Her Majesty praised the flavour. Hehehe.
Is there something you would like to do with me?
Just this once, on this special day, I'll indulge your childishness~ Hehehe.
It is my honour to get to wear another faction's garments. However... this traditional Dragon Empery dress feels rather tight around the chest area...

skins.name: Morning Star of Love and Hope

voiceline.line: I'll always be with you no matter where you go, Commander!
The end of sorrow, the beginning of happiness, and the desire for eternity.
Tired, Commander? Why not take a rest? Eh, on my lap? It can't be helped I guess.
Greetings, Commander. Did you have a good rest?
When will true peace come to these waters?|Commander, my heart is beating so fast. Can you feel it?|You're always number one in my heart, Commander.
Just whisper in my ear if you have anything to say~! *giggles*
I'm not opposed to intimacy, every now and then~!
The end of sorrow, the beginning of happiness, and the desire for eternity.
And now, a song of peace――
One, two, one two, Ah... Thank you, Commander. I'm not sure why I just can't keep my balance...
I am the newest addition to the Muse System, Illustrious. Through my songs, I shall spread the light of love and peace— Don't you think that's a wonderful thing?
It seems the commission team has returned. I wonder if they have the material for Victorious's clothes...?
I do hope my song can return you to normal, Commander...

To prepare for my idol activities, I borrowed some selections from Formidable's music collection. I find it rather noisy, but powerful, in a way that shakes my ears and in fact my whole body... Is that not right?
At the Commander's request, I referenced a song by Comet and the girls. The gentle melody and soothing voices made me truly understand how idols can make people smile.
I've been practicing with the other girls. I find I can sing gently, or energetically, and even smoothly... and it's all thanks to you, Commander. Hehehe.
May my radiance touch you, Commander, and carry from the stage my song and dance of peace and love.
♪~Ooh, welcome back, Commander. Can you give our new song a listen?
We can't let the light go out...!
Good day, Commander. What will we be practicing today?
It seems the power of song alone was not enough...
Reading fan letters is so delightful. What about your mail, Commander?

What if we had a little tea party after our next practice?|When one watches Tashkent and the girls dance so vivaciously, it makes one's heart pound. Hehehe.|The theme of my costume is "the starry cosmos," isn't that romantic? How delightful. Hehe.
Dido prepared this list of tasks for us. Do take a look at them, Commander.
Mission accomplisheed. Look over the rewards and... what's next on the schedule?
I am the name ship of the Illustrious-class armored carriers... Oh, should I call myself "Idol Illustrious" now? I lack experience, but I will do what I must for the sake of peace.
I can feel your support, and your hope for me... And I see your eyes full of happiness as you look upon the stage, and upon me, Commander. Hehehe.
I will bring the light to you in song.
Are we practicing for handshake events? All right, thank you very much, Commander.
Commander, do remember to maintain decorum when touching an idol.
I am the newest addition to the Muse System, Illustrious. Through my songs, I shall spread the light of love and peace— Don't you think that's a wonderful thing?
It's not just about the shining image, it's also about conveying one's voice.
Our stage is brilliant and dazzling. Hehe~
Gaze upon Sardegna's splendor – MY splendor!
Need something? Come back in 3 hours after I've had my bath. But, if it's urgent, join me in the bathtub and we'll discuss it.
voiceline.oath: Whew, nothing beats a good bath... Huh? What do you mean "what's with the towel"? I just got out of the bath, that's what?

voiceline.line: Aircraft carrier – Impero.
The commission team's back. Go give them my regards.
voiceline.oath: The commission team's back. I'll go bid them a splendrous ret– Eh, forget it. You're up, Commander.

voiceline.line: Get out of my sight. I've no need for a snake like you.
There needn't be a reason why I'm brilliant. Brilliance is inherent, self-apparent, and unmistakable for anything else. Veneto said that, so yeah.
Have you finally decided to pledge your loyalty to me? ...Hm? I suppose you are a brilliant Commander, but I am also brilliant. How about we swear an oath of mutual loyalty, then?
I could do nothing – not even lift a finger – and I'd still contribute to Sardegna. To serve you, however, I have to put in real work.
I did a task for you. It was sloppy, but I'm not used to doing work, so cut me some slack. Nobody's born knowing how to work, are they? My point is... Exactly. I appreciate the compliment.
voiceline.oath: We don't have to do anything today. You heard me – you can be like me and just not do anything productive. And if you do something wild, I'll let it slide.

voiceline.line: ...You really like playing with my hair, huh?
voiceline.oath: Mhh... That's nice. Do it again.

voiceline.line: You've returned. Now where's my thank-you for getting up to bid you welcome back?
voiceline.oath: You've returned. I got you something to snack on. How nice of me, right? You may thank me with a headpat.

voiceline.line: If I must exercise my brilliance, so be it...!
Evening. *yawn*... I'm going to sleep. Wake me when it's sortie o'clock.
voiceline.oath: Evening... You're not tired right before work? Darn, I was hoping we could nap together.

voiceline.line: They caught wind of my spaghetti planes? I see... Sorry. This is my fault.
voiceline.oath: I can't let the Commander see me like this... I'm supposed to be brilliant...

voiceline.line: Seems the wind brought this letter straight to your desk. Oh, you saw me bring it in? Welp.
voiceline.oath: A carrier pigeon... I wish I could fly like a bird. A rigging upgrade might make that possible.

voiceline.line: Is Veneto still up? She has this splendrous aura when she's awake. It's dazzling, genuinely.|The only things I need in life are bread and my smartphone. Wait, Oxy-cola too. Oh, and warm baths...|You could build a slide outside the office window that leads to my dorm room for quick access. Great idea, right?
voiceline.extra: Littorio! Is dinner ready yet? Don't forget I'm brilliant. I'll starve to death if you take too long.|Need some help with that? ...You can do it on your own? Geesh, soon there'll be nothing left for me to do.|It's nice being a carrier. I don't need to get my hands dirty, all I have to do is pilot my planes. I'm so brilliant for being able to fight on my own.

voiceline.line: Missions, hmm? Completing them is key to furthering Sardegna's splendor.
voiceline.oath: Missions, hmm? Completing them is key to promoting your brilliance and Sardegna's splendor.

voiceline.line: Mission complete, at the cost of nearly all my precious energy... Take it from here.
voiceline.oath: Brought you the mission rewards...! Oof! They're a lot heavier than I expected.

voiceline.line: I'm Impero, fourth ship of the Vittorio Veneto class. Kneel and pledge your loyalty to me, now. Why? Because I'm brilliant, so I deserve special treatment.

Hm? Is this a ring? You want to marry me? I should probably tell Veneto about this first... Oh, I can do that later? All right, good. I love being free of responsibility because I'm so brilliant. I'll leave the formalities to you, Commander.
Kneel before me!
Ready to kneel before me yet?
voiceline.oath: Is dinner ready?! ...Not yet, huh...

voiceline.line: ...Sleazebag.
voiceline.oath: ...I love when you do this♡

voiceline.line: I'm Impero of the Vittorio Veneto class. Introduction over – now back to sleep... By the way, I'm brilliant. So you don't need to boss me around... Just give me my space and we'll be good. Night.
*yawn*...
Daring to pick a fight with the brilliant Impero isn't heroic. It's just foolish.
voiceline.oath: I'm brilliant, aren't I? Yeah, I am... Hehehe.

voiceline.line: Do you like reading too, Commander? ...Yeah, I do, 'cause I dream of the comfy stories I read. Do you?
Seems school uniforms are all the hype. Veneto picked this one out for me. What are you dressed as, Commander? A teacher? A classmate?
Ah, you're back. You hungry? I'm kind of famished, so let's hit the cafeteria in a few.
Evening. Here's what I'm doing to further Sardegna's splendor today... Zzz...

Bookmarks are a genius invention. They save me the effort of remembering how far into a book I am.|Zzz... Oops, I nodded off. If you wanna borrow a book, go ahead. Anyway... *yawn*... Hang on, what page was I on again?|It's practically impossible to stay awake in class. But you manage, Commander. Keep on being a brilliant student.
These mission rewards let me read a few minutes more. Brilliant.
You here to return a book, or...?
...Mgh. Hm? Huh?
Seems school uniforms are all the hype. Veneto picked this one out for me. What are you dressed as, Commander? A teacher? A classmate?
Now I can read another three pages. Awesome.
Hm... Huh?! We've been ambushed!
Commander... it seems you're always holed up in your room...
Type III Akatsuki-class destroyer number four - Akatsuki.
Commander... your "gasoline" and "resources" have arrived.
Commander, no matter what you may become, I will always be with you.
Commander, I will assist you.
A shared sorrow is one made half, and shared joy is one made double. So please feel free to talk to me about anything.
Commander, no matter where you go, I will always be with you. ... However... I don't think I can... leave the boundaries of this screen...
Commander, it's terrible for your body eat junk food all the time. How about cooking your own food once in a while? Hm? Don't worry, I'll taste test it together with you!
Welcome back, Commander. Even if you didn't "acquire new characters",I will always be here.
Is that... you, Commander? I can't believe you're logging in at this time of day... shouldn't you be doing something else?
Phew... Commander... you're very good at running away...
You have mailophobia? ... You don't have to be scared, I'm here with you.
Commander, your biggest flaw is how kind you are.|Naka... she's helped me quite a lot...|"Salvaging" is my specialty!
If you leave your missions unfinished forever... then you'll end up having to do this bad thing called "overtime".
This month's bonus pay won't be postponed into the next month.

I am... the Sakura Empire's Akatsuki-class type III destroyer, Inazuma. As the youngest of my class, I participated in a lot of battles in the World War. But I prefer escorts, transports, and rescues over combat. ... Commander? Would you like to have your head patted too?
Commander... please feel at ease. I would never abandon you. Even if you've had enough and run away, I will always, always be waiting here for you.
If only everyone were here with us...
Commander... could you pat my head?
Commander... there's no medicine that can fix you.
Are you the commander...? You don't seem very reliable... Ah, sorry, my self-introduction. My name is... Inazuma.
Phew... I'm glad that didn't hurt as much as I thought.
... I'M the MVP? ... Is this fleet... doing okay?
Mr. Commander, after you swallowed Inazuma up... you must be ready to sortie.

It doesn’t matter if Inazuma becomes Mr. Commander's dessert… but if Inazuma cannot be found, Mr. Commander will feel so devastated, perhaps he won’t be able to command the fleet… so… please! Please convey Inazuma's heartfelt wish to Mr. Commander——
...Inazuma’s heartfelt wish, has it been communicated? …Mr. Commander...
Are you hungry… Mr. Commander? |Are you trying to find Inazuma, Mr. Commander? Inazuma is right in front of you. |Mr. Commander, you’re always so gentle...
Mr. Commander, are we starting this… please accept all of Inazuma, both the good and the bad—
Mr. Commander, have you heard Inazuma’s heartfelt words? You’re really amazing Mr. Commander!

It doesn’t matter if Inazuma becomes Mr. Commander's dessert… but if Inazuma cannot be found, Mr. Commander will feel so devastated, perhaps he won’t be able to command the fleet… so… please! Please convey Inazuma's heartfelt wish to Mr. Commander——
Commander, you didn't just buy these clothes for me because Ikazuchi asked you to, right? It doesn't bother me. Not one bit...
I usually go to festivals with Ikazuchi, but this would be my first time going with you. Hmm? Where should we visit first?

Commander, I know I'm super cute and all, but you'll develop social anxiety if you constantly cling to me and ignore everyone else. Since I'm also super responsible, you should go to the festival and enjoy the company of others.
Prioritizing work over Inazuma... Commander, you sure are a workaholic.
I was beginning to think that you forgot about our plans, Commander.

Commander, I'd like some taiyaki. Is that okay? |It feels unexpectedly nice to walk around without my shoes... Commander, why don't you try it too? |Commander, you can go check out everyone's yukatas if you'd like. I'll look around by myself first.
Commander, no matter how much you poke me, I won't have any Live2D.
I usually go to festivals with Ikazuchi, but this would be my first time going with you. Hmm? Where should we visit first?
If you combine both of our wings, there might not be much room left on the screen... Why don't you edit it in and see for yourself, Commander?
I'm the fairy of lightning that illuminates the stars in the night sky... So that's what we're going with, huh. Commander, will you accompany me to the party?
Whether you are fighting, taking care of commissions, or just checking daily missions, I will always be waiting for you here.
Commander, I'm glad you haven't forgotten the promise you made with me and Ikazuchi.

Akatsuki said she wanted to join us so we can have a 6th DesDiv get-together at the party, but she seems to have gotten lost on the way... I hope Hibiki is able to find her.|"The moon is beautiful tonight" is supposed to be a pretty famous line, right? Eh... How'd you already know about it, Ikazuchi?|Ikazuchi seems to have brought you some strawberries. Judging from your expression, I'm... supposed to bring you blueberries?
Commander, shall I bring you something to eat or drink?
I'm the fairy of lightning that illuminates the stars in the night sky... So that's what we're going with, huh. Commander, will you accompany me to the party?
Stay focused and be on your guard!
I'm prepared to battle at nighttime, if necessary.
Independence-class light aircraft carrier – Independence, Hull Number CVL-22.
The goods from that commission have arrived. Saves us time having to carry it by hand.
Allow me to be blunt: what the hell is wrong with you?
You're curious how nighttime carrier battles look? Got it. I'll inform you next time there's one on the exercise schedule.
A CVL might never rival an ordinary CV in terms of sheer power, but... I just want you to recognize what I'm capable of.
Isn't there something you want to tell me? Be it combat-related, or anything else. Why do I ask? Because I want to know what sort of place I have in your heart.

"There are some things you can't express through words"...? I don't follow. If you don't tell people how you feel, how would they know? For instance, how would you be able to guess that I love you if I didn't say it directly?
Should we draft a plan for the next operation?
How many... How many chances at victory do we have left?
Today's training and routine missions are progressing smoothly, Commander. You can rest easy.
Retreating is a legitimate tactic...
I've brought your mail. Give it a read.

Should I call Cleveland... "Cleve"? Or do I keep it simple?|I will take on that task you assigned me with the highest priority, Commander.|I'm apparently terrible at reading between the lines... So please, Commander: whenever you have something to say, tell it to me straight.
A new mission has come in. Let's get it done ASAP.
We've got to stay diligent even after all our missions are complete.

I was initially to be the fifth Cleveland-class cruiser, but got remodeled into a light aircraft carrier due to the skyrocketing need for additional carriers. Thanks to the new capabilities this gave me, I flourished in battle and achieved victory together with my allies.

It's thanks to our fateful encounter at the crossroads of life that I found the place where I belong... Was that... a weird way to put it? Umm, well, you know what I mean. I just can't find the right words... In any case, I'm happy to be together with you!
Target locked!
Yes? Do you need something?
Go to the Admiralty and explain yourself. Right now.
I'm Independence, light carrier. Don't worry about that "light" part, and just hand those missions over to me.
How about we set up a naval exercise right away?
Never underestimate a CVL's capabilities.
Yeah, it should be fine to leave my pet in the dorm... I think?
So this is my new school, huh? Hmm... gotta put my stuff down first before checking in with the teacher.
Now, what's our next subject?
Living in a dorm means I don't have to worry about being late for school.
Join a club? Maybe I should... Hmm... Actually, I'm good.|Both studies and missions require your full, undivided attention.|Ugh... This collar is too tight... Why are you staring, Commander?
Do you not get what this paragraph means? Let me have a look.
...Go to the staff room and explain yourself.
So this is my new school, huh? Hmm... gotta put my stuff down first before checking in with the teacher.
I won by making use of the things I learned. That's all there's to it!
Forcing you to help me make all these decisions is a little embarrassing... but thanks for bearing with me. You've been a great help.

Hmm... Isn't this one a bit too garish? Mm... What if we pair it with a necklace or some sort of purse? ...Commander, your thoughts? C'mon, don't just stare at me, give me something to work with here...
Oh, Commander, did you pick something out for tonight's ball yet? If not, why don't we stop by one of the shops en route?
There are a lot of really stunning goods here, but the price tags on some of these are also very "stunning"... Wh-why don't we start by looking through the more cost-effective stuff first...

I also chose a getup for my partner here... Hehe, doesn't it give off "gentlemanly" vibes?|Ahaha, seems like this store also sells wigs. Commander, want to try some on?|Makeup? Uh, I'm not well-versed in that stuff, so I guess I'll pick up a little bit of everything. I'll try asking around for help after we get back!
You want me to try these shoes on? Um, s-sure. Just give me a moment.

Hmm... Isn't this one a bit too garish? Mm... What if we pair it with a necklace or some sort of purse? ...Commander, your thoughts? C'mon, don't just stare at me, give me something to work with here...
Saratoga and Lexington do stretches on the regular, giving them great dexterity for aircraft carriers. They really live up to their rep as idols. Good examples of hard work paying off, too.
Whew... A bit of stretching helps keep the body flexible. Hm? I'm in loungewear, what about it? I'd appreciate it if you wouldn't stare too much, though...
Feel like doing some stretches with me? I could use a hand with a couple of moves, like the forward bend for instance.
Your health suffers if you don't move your muscles enough. Keep an eye on your posture in the office so you don't develop a hunchback, Commander.

Who's the most dexterous among the Cleveland class? If I had to guess... Columbia. She does ballet, you know.|Even the most basic of stretches qualify as exercise. Though I'll admit, it's not very rigorous exercise.|Long Island claims mastering yoga gives you the power to breathe fire and extend your arms. I don't buy that idea, though.
Yeah, that's it. Push on my back and hold it like that.
I appreciate your help with the pushes, but now you're just pushing your luck.
Whew... A bit of stretching helps keep the body flexible. Hm? I'm in loungewear, what about it? I'd appreciate it if you wouldn't stare too much, though...
Who put this crane game here? "Supplied by Akashi, nya"...? That's what it says on the back?
Just need to feed it a coin, then operate the crane with the joystick... Oh! I got one! That was easier than I expected.

I got a prize on my first try, so I tried it a few more times... but the crane wouldn't move like I wanted it to, and loosened up as soon as it grabbed something. What a failure. I thought I'd try again, only to find out I was all out of coins.
Commander, do you want to take a shot at this manjuu crane game?

By the way, have you seen my pet eagle? Do you think he flew off somewhere? ...Wait, he's not in the crane game, is he?!|Apparently, if you bang on a machine hard enough, you might get lucky and get a prize for free. Though it's more likely to get you in trouble than anything else.|I've heard there's a café run by the Sakura Empire nearby. Why don't we stop by there later for a drink?
Here, have some coins. Good luck, Commander!
You ought to get some fresh air to cool that hot head of yours...
Just need to feed it a coin, then operate the crane with the joystick... Oh! I got one! That was easier than I expected.
I am fully accustomed to my new weaponry. My next battles will be legendary in naval history. Okay, maybe not to that extent.
Light carrier Independence reporting. Retrofitting complete. I'm ready to take on harder, more vital missions. Leave anything like that to me.
Commission goods have arrived. I'll help transport them, of course.
You conducted that battle masterfully, Commander. Let's take a moment to roost, then get to work on the post-battle report.
I'm in top condition and ready as always, Commander. Rest easy.

I should probably hang out with my own sisters as much as I hang out with Cleveland...|I've finished all the work you assigned me. Proofread it at your leisure.|Even I, someone who's terrible at inferring people's feelings, can clearly see how passionately Princeton is about her goals.
Are we sortieing? Or is there administrative work to do around the port? Either way, leave it to me.
What the–?!
Light carrier Independence reporting. Retrofitting complete. I'm ready to take on harder, more vital missions. Leave anything like that to me.
Nothing can stand between my wings and the skies!
I'm the captain... Wait, I'm the captain?!
What are you looking at? My skin color has always been light brown, it's not a tan.
Portland-class Heavy Cruiser – Indianapolis, Hull Number CA-35!
... I almost forgot to report it, but... a commission's been completed.
... (It's not clear whether Indianapolis hasn't become aware of you yet or if she simply doesn't care about you.)
... I just have a slow reaction time, that's all, Commander. You don't need to poke me, I'm listening.
My sister's... always talking about how cute I am, but if she'd just focus a little more on herself, I'm sure she'd be popular... That's why I've always felt a little guilty about her...
My sister gives me everything I need, so I'll give her everything she needs, too. Except for you, Commander...
I'm... not as cheerful as my sister, nor do I look as good as her, yet you still chose me... That makes me a little... no... it makes me very happy...
... Is it already over?
... Oops.
...?! When did you get here, Commander? You startled me...
... Something feels wrong... must be that damn I-58.
Here, mail.
If I go away, I guess you'll have to rely on New Mexico.|I wonder why my sister's always looking at me...|To be honest... I can't really have a proper conversation with other people...
Mission unfinished...
I brought the rewards.
... I'm Indianapolis, second ship of the Portland-class. I apologize for any trouble my big sister caused... A nuclear bomb? I'm not sure what that is.
I'm really happy... but I don't know what I should say... So can I just... give you a hug?
...? It's my turn? Got it.
Whew...
... (Indianapolis fixates her eyes on you.)
Yeah? ... Commander, I'm Indianapolis. My nickname is Indy. Hm? A nuclear bomb? What's that?
... I feel the... power surging through me.
Hey... I think we won...
What are you looking at, Commander? ... It looks good on me? Sounds like what my sister would say...
School life... It's nice as long as you and my sister are here... I think...
Is this... my reward for behaving?
... It's time to go home already?
Oh, Commander... If my sister asks, could you tell her I'm not going? Please, it would help...

My sister makes great lunch boxes... but she doesn't need to write "I Love Indy" on them every single time...|I like this plushie Portland gave me... But something about it feels off...|I'm definitely better at science than languages... How do I get better at expressing my feelings?
... What? I'm not sleeping. Haven't I told you that I just have a slower reaction time than others?
School life... It's nice as long as you and my sister are here... I think...
Please, Portland, just say "hi" like a normal person... You don't need to mention me.
Oh. Good evening, Commander. Do you want some steak? It goes great with wine.
It looks like... the party hasn't started yet.
Thanks for fetching the mail, sis... Oh, it's for you, Commander.

Really, I-58? California rolls don't really count as sushi? Huh, that's interesting. Thanks, you learn something new every day...|Here, sis, I got you some food. Now try to pipe down for a little while.|...Oh, right. I forgot, when's the dance? Not yet? All right, I can rest easy then.
My sis could use a dance partner. Who'd make a good candidate?
Oh. Good evening, Commander. Do you want some steak? It goes great with wine.
M-me, flagship? Sounds like a pain in the... Err, it's nothing! I'll do it!
voiceline.oath: If it's for your sake, I suppose I can put in a bit more effort...

voiceline.line: My Illustrious-class sisters are all outstanding. Should you run into any problems, they would be more than glad to help... Me? Um, well, I suppose I wouldn't mind offering you some advice...
voiceline.oath: Should you run into any problems... You should come to me first, not my sisters... Y-yeah, I think I'm fine with that...

voiceline.line: Illustrious-class aircraft carrier – Indomitable.
The commission team has returned. I shall await your return, so you should go greet them soon.
voiceline.oath: The commission fleet seems to have come back. Hurry up and go– Err, I mean, let's go greet them together.

voiceline.line: *sigh*... I knew I shouldn't have gotten my hopes up...
Commander, are you busy right now? Oh, wow... You look totally lost in your work... Ahem, well then, I suppose I should leave you to it.
My hobbies? Hmm... Honestly, I haven't given it much thought up until this point. Let's see... what I like isn't so much finding things to do, but rather finding ways of not doing anything.

You should learn how to relax every once in a while precisely because you're always working so hard. Learning how to clear your mind and let go isn't as easy as it sounds. But don't worry if you can't do it right away, Commander. Hehe, I'll show you exactly how to do it next time~

Hehe, I see you're also slack– Err, I mean, nourishing your body and soul. That pleases me greatly. Alright, let's continue practicing the art of clearing our minds on a regular basis! As for where to conduct the lessons... how about in my room?
voiceline.oath: Let's see, the next things to do on our date are... chilling together indoors, leisurely enjoying some tea, then quietly arrange some flowers. Hm? You want to go outside? I, I think our schedule's already pretty packed. Look, every time we go outside on a date, my legs get all puffy the next day...

voiceline.line: Hyah?! Gosh, how rude of you to interrupt my daydreaming!
Commander, congratulations on a most excellent sortie. Of course I wasn't doing nothing. I was praying for your success with all my might.
voiceline.oath: I pray for the Commander's safe return... Ow, ow, ow... Who thought prayer could be such a painful thing... Oh my, is that you, Commander?

voiceline.line: If this drags on, I'll seriously be in trouble...
Good morning, Commander. Ehh? You're going to start working already? Why not get into the zone first by, say, opening up the window and basking in the breeze?
voiceline.oath: Good day, Commander. Umm, uhh... M-maybe there's something I can help you out with?

voiceline.line: Seems like I'll be in the docks for a good while... Well, don't threaten me with a good time, I suppose.
voiceline.oath: Don't worry, I'm the type of girl who can bounce right back after a little nap.

voiceline.line: New mail? Are we being told to go on vacation? Huh, what do you mean that's not possible?

Oh my, an invitation to a tea party? ...Though, I think I'll pass. Keeping up airs is soooo tiring.|Sleep revitalizes the body, daydreaming revitalizes the mind, and strolling refreshes one's mood. I'll have you know, all forms of relaxation serve a purpose, and are DEFINITELY not slacking off.|*Yaaawn*... Can't get motivated right now... Huh, work? I've already finished all of it.
voiceline.extra: Commander, did you want to go to the tea party? Um, in that case... Ugh, why is this so hard...|Did you sleep well yesterday? If you're tired, you might want to take a little nap or go on a stroll outside first. I'll accompany you~|Formidable won't let any of our other sisters see her cheeky side, but she's a lot more open around me for whatever reason... Well, there's not a whole lot we have in common anyway. Her taste in music is a bit... too noisy for my tastes.

voiceline.line: New missions, huh... Should be no problem at all for someone as experienced as you, right?
That's another mission taken care of! Hehe, you're pretty good at this, Commander.
As the fourth member of the Illustrious class, of course I'd be somewhat different from my sisters... Hey, I'm talking about hangar capacity here, not service history or repair length.

An oath ceremony? That sounds like something that could turn into a real pain in the ass... I'm not saying there's anything wrong with you, Commander. I mean, a ceremony is just for show, so it shouldn't matter if... Wh-why are you making me say something so embarrassing anyway?! Anyway, we're done here, so I'll be heading back!
Maybe I should start to get serious...
Did you need something? Though, it'd be great if you didn't...
voiceline.oath: I'm serious. Y-you can come see me even if you don't have any problems...

voiceline.line: Double my vacation time, buy me some sweets, and I'll keep this a secret. Hehe, not such a bad deal, right?
voiceline.oath: You're such a bully...

voiceline.line: I am the fourth ship of the Illustrious class, armored carrier Indomitable. *Yawn*... I seem to be getting a bit drowsy... Would you mind if we continued this later?
I've gotten stronger, but... maybe I shouldn't let anyone know that.
I'm the MVP? I wonder if I shouldn't have tried so hard...
voiceline.oath: MVP, huh... Darn it, now I'm going to have to rest up to get my motivation back!

voiceline.line: Knowing how to brew tea is one of the essentials for the Royal Maids, no? Well, that's something even I can do. Though only once a day, no more than that.
*Sigh*... I thought changing into maid attire would break up the monotony, but just getting into these clothes has tired me out... Oh, Commander? You came at a good time. Shall we slack off together?
The Royal Maids are always carrying all sorts of yummy snacks back and forth... I wonder how they can control themselves.
Welcome back, Master~♪ All righty, that's all my maid-motivation used up...

What jobs am I capable of doing? Let's see... Oh, I can warm up the bed for you before you go to sleep?|Now that I think about it, considering how capable you are as a commander, doing a maid's job should hardly be considered work, right? Maybe I'll have you take over the rest of my maid duties... Ahaha, well, it was worth a shot...|I'm sure someone with THIS many maids would live an absolutely blessed lifestyle... Ugh, it's making me jealous the more I think about it...
Are you trying to give me a massage? My shoulders were just starting to feel a bit stiff, so massage away~
I'm going to tell my sisters, you know?
*Sigh*... I thought changing into maid attire would break up the monotony, but just getting into these clothes has tired me out... Oh, Commander? You came at a good time. Shall we slack off together?
Full module calibration complete. I'm loaded and ready for battle!
Breaking stuff is easy. Making stuff is not.
Allen M. Sumner-class destroyer – Ingraham, Hull Number DD-694.
Commission complete. Any parts you don't need? Send 'em my way.
I'd love to unscrew your thick skull and have a look at what's inside.
Even minor flaws impact the quality of a product. You want high-end equipment? Make sure it's perfectly calibrated.
Hey, Cooper, I finished that "morph item" you asked about... No, Allen! Stop plastering stickers all over my stuff!
Yo, Commander, I scrounged up some spare parts and made you this steel medal on my day off. C'mere, I'll attach it to your uniform... Pfft! Looks pretty good on you!
Listen, if you ever need something, just hit me up. Scratch that, uhh... You can hit me up anytime, for any reason. I just feel kinda lonely without you, you know? Ahem... Anyway!
This hairpin? It's made from a repurposed binder clip. Is that so weird?
My hunch was right – this thing really is a millimeter off... Oh, hey there, Commander. Just who I was looking for. Could you have a look at this?
Oh, crap! That's gonna be a pain to repair!
You're late, Commander. I oughta build you an alarm clock that keeps ringing no matter what you do.
I've gotta do thorough rigging maintenance when I get back!
Mail, eh... I could give your mailbox a makeover, if you want.

Yo, Commander, you mind if I do some tinkering in here? Don't wanna disturb you, is all... All righty, I'll take that as a "yes."|Why am I wearing just one stocking? Uhh, because I forgot to put the other one on. What does it matter, anyway? Clothes are just a bother.|There's a loose screw under the bookcase... No biggie, I'll get it myself. And don't you dare try to sneak a dirty peek in while I'm doing it.
New missions, huh? Ugh. I don't wanna get off my butt...
Need a pen to write the mission complete papers? Here, you can borrow mine.

Thought about it some more, but I really don't have much else to tell you. On another note, wanna see the Allen M. Sumner-class miniature I made? Main battery, AA guns, even depth charges, it's all there. See?

Here I thought you were dense, but I guess I was wrong. Oh yeah, I made this ring for you. It's no promise ring, but I still want you to have it... This thing's special to me, so don't even think about having me remake it for you.
Nothing personal!
Keep the touching to a minimum, thanks.
This is your dirty-deeds-hand, huh? I'm gonna keep you armlocked until you say you're sorry.
I'm Ingraham, Eagle Union destroyer. Not much else to tell you, honestly... Anyhoo, good to meet you.
Rigging upgrades, huh? Keep them coming, thanks.
Sweet! My rigging's perfectly tuned!
Your job's simple. All you need to do is drink what I serve you and give feedback on the taste, mouthfeel, et cetera.

Hmm... Could use a little more sweetness, and a splash of the secret ingredient... Oh, you're here? Great. I appoint you as my first dedicated taste-tester, Commander. We're gonna come up with some novel and fresh drinks, you and I!
Commission complete. Let's see if they brought back anything I can use...
Once I've perfected this recipe, I'll give you a gold taste-tester medal for your efforts.
You're on time for once! That means you're due for a reward. I'll make your drink doubly sweet.

All I asked Allen for was some label paper, and instead she dumped a billion different stickers on me...|No, Cooper, that stuff's got alcohol in it. Put it back where you found it.|Yeah, Allen made me wear this getup when she found out I'll be handling the bar counter... That said, I guess I don't really mind it.
Hey! Wow... Hope you like your lemonade with 30 times more lemon juice.

Hmm... Could use a little more sweetness, and a splash of the secret ingredient... Oh, you're here? Great. I appoint you as my first dedicated taste-tester, Commander. We're gonna come up with some novel and fresh drinks, you and I!
Flight preparations complete! Attack squadrons, roll out!
One should always go all out, no matter the enemy... Having that said, there are various practical reasons why that isn't always possible...
voiceline.oath: No matter how strong the enemy, I have absolute confidence that you will be able to draw out my full power! Come on, add me to the next sortie roster!

voiceline.line: Essex-class aircraft carrier – Intrepid, Hull Number CV-11.
Commission completed, resources received~! Hehe, way to go, Commander. You know exactly how important logistics are to our fleet operations!
Commander, the way you're acting now makes you no different from a coward!
The great symbol of fearlessness is none other than I – Intrepid! Don't you forget that!

Oh, Commander! This– yeowwwch! Who decided it was a good idea to leave a trolley here?! Jeez, why does this always happen to me...Ah, um, nevermind, I'm fine! More importantly, when do I get to sortie?
During my free time, I like to read, watch movies, or stargaze. Oh, by the way, I got a movie ticket from Casablanca. Why don't we go watch it?

The stars in the night sky are distant. So distant that even with all the courage in the world, the effort it would take to reach them is unfathomable... However, all it takes to catch the commander in front of me is.... this! Hehe, isn't that right?
voiceline.oath: Gotcha, Commander! Heheh, even if these hands will never be able to hold the stars in the sky, at least I can have you~ Just kidding. In any case, wanna go watch a movie? Naturally, we'll be holding hands, hehe~

voiceline.line: Wooahh?! You're messing up my hair?!
Phew, I'm back! Oh, you need a battle report, repair and resupply overviews, and a mission debriefing? Sure, five minutes should be enough, right? After that, send me back out there!
voiceline.oath: Good work out there, Commander! ...Oww, sorry, I bumped into my own rigging... After all, I always get stoked when I see you! Ahaha...

voiceline.line: Crap, I didn't think there'd be so many of them...
Am I slated to sortie today? If not, hurry up and fix that!
voiceline.oath: Commander, who do you plan on sortieing today? Why don't I offer you some suggestions?

voiceline.line: I have to go to the docks again...? Damnit, why is it always me... Y-you didn't hear anything!
There's new mail... do we have new orders?

Commander, do you like stargazing? Ahaha, it's fine if you aren't really into astronomy. If you're ever interested, just let me know. |Submarines are... quite strong. But I think I might be able to go toe-to-toe with them. |Despite the fact that there are many Essex-class carriers, we all have our good spots, you say? ...Uhh, you're not talking about our ship performance? I've never given much thought to those bothersome things...
voiceline.oath: If you ever fall into the ocean, I'll come to save you, Commander. Just send me your general location, and I'll find you as quick as Mercury and Gemini in the night sky.|Essex is always working hard, but she seems obsessed with how people commend Enterprise's achievements... What do you think of others' assessments, Commander?|Aaahh... I need to stretch... Hey, Commander, is there anything over there that looks like it could get in the way?

voiceline.line: Having trouble with your missions? If you're stumped, why don't you let me try my hand?
voiceline.oath: Having trouble with your missions? Well, let's work on 'em together!

voiceline.line: Mission accomplished! See, there's nothing you can't do if you put your mind to it!
voiceline.oath: Mission accomplished! See, two heads are better than one!

voiceline.line: I'm the third ship of the Essex class, Intrepid! Although my poor luck during the war earned me quite a few unflattering nicknames... Heheh, that's all behind me now! Commander, under your command, I'll show you just how powerful I am!

I didn't expect you to be the one to take the initiative... but I suppose that's fine too. Commander, guess I'll continue to be in your care then! As long as I am with you, I want you to push forward and face the future fearlessly!
Let's get this done!
Want something to drink? Then, how about a martini – shaken, not stirred? Just kidding!
You... *sigh*...I'm way more inclined to beat you to a pulp than to praise you for your bravery.
voiceline.oath: I-I won't give in, no matter how many times you attack!

voiceline.line: "The Fighting I" of the Essex-class, Intrepid, is here! Commander, leave the combat missions to me! I'll bring home victory and glory!
I feel like I can always keep improving! For example, how 'bout giving me a dozen jets?
The crown of victory goes to me, the one who knows no fear!
Nice catch! You've got skill! How about becoming my catcher?
There's been a lot of inter-port meets recently... But before I can join a team with my other Eagle Union colleagues, I've got to up my game first! So, Commander, mind training with me?
Phew, time for a break! Commander, thanks for coming out with me! Feel free to use the equipment however you'd like!
It's not enough to just be a pitcher. I've gotta be a good batter as well! Oh, Bluegill's also out there training. Let's grab her for our practice!
Gah, I gave up a run...

A ponytail really does get in the way, huh... Next time, maybe I'll try putting it up... |Gah! I threw the ball full power and lost control of it... My bad, my bad! |All righty! This one's headed towards the ends of the universe! Wait, how's the catcher gonna get it then...
Woah! I just thought of a new kind of pitch! Commander, let's go try it out!
Even if you brought protection, getting hit by my fastball is gonna hurt like hell~
There's been a lot of inter-port meets recently... But before I can join a team with my other Eagle Union colleagues, I've got to up my game first! So, Commander, mind training with me?
Nobody can return one of my pitches!
Are these guys even worthy of being my opponent?
voiceline.oath: I'll show you just how brightly I can shine!

voiceline.line: You want to come into my room? Hey, don't just casually walk in when I haven't even given you permission!
voiceline.oath: What brings you here this time around? ...You look super tired, so I guess it can't be helped. I'll make a special exception for you this time and let you rest in my room. You should be grateful for my magnanimity!

voiceline.line: Hello, hello~! My name is Iori Minase! It's such a pleasure to meet you! ...Huh? There's no need for me to force myself...? Hey, wait a second, what do you mean by that?!
Oh, it looks like they're back from commissions. I suppose I can go greet them in person.
Oh. So you were here all along?
I'm thirsty... Huh, this orange juice is for me? And it's 100% orange juice to boot! You've got sense!
I have a close friend who's been with me all the way since my childhood. Isn't that right, Bunny-bun?
I wonder what I can do to shine more brilliantly on stage...? Sing harder? Make the performance flashier? ...Right, since you're here anyway, I'd like to hear what you think.
The view from here is so gorgeous... Eek! You! Say something if you're there! ...Well, it's fine. Why don't you come sit here and enjoy the view as well?
voiceline.oath: Hey, puff up your chest with pride. You're part of the reason I'm able to shine so brightly over here as well. ...I'll be expecting great things from you in the future as well, Commander! Heehee~♪

voiceline.line: Eek! ...Hey, can you not touch me out of the blue?!
Oh, you're back? Perfect timing, it's time for you to accompany for tea time!
This is nothing I can't handle!
Good morning... Wait, what's with that pathetic look on your face? There's no way you're still half-asleep, right?
voiceline.oath: You're finally here! You've got some nerve, making me wait like this!

voiceline.line: I, Iori Minase... lost? I'll take some more lessons, and I swear I won't lose next time!
There's some mail for you. Since I've gone out of my way to let you know, go and check it ASAP!

This office isn't bad at all. Still, when compared to my room, it needs work.|"Manjuus" refers to those round birdies at the port, it seems. I thought everyone was referring to the snack.|Do you really think you have time to rest? Can't you see the mountain of work piled up in front of you?
voiceline.extra: How dare you leave me to be bored! Wait a second, don't just fall asleep on me! You're supposed to be talking with me!|The port canteen has so many kinds of food from all over the world, including ones I've never seen. It almost feels like I've just gone on a trip to many different countries!|I'd sure love to be drinking some orange juice right now~♪ ... Hey, stop complaining and get me some!

voiceline.line: You still have work left to do? Hurry up and get it done!
voiceline.oath: You're still not done? I wouldn't mind lending you a hand... you know?

voiceline.line: You're finally done. Though, considering the amount, it's only to be expected.
voiceline.oath: Finally done with your work? I have to admit, you do deserve some praise every now and then.

voiceline.line: My name is Iori Minase! My goal? Of course it's becoming a top idol♪ You should feel honored every second you're in the presence of the super idol, Iori! Heehee♪
You've come to understand me quite well, haven't you. If you take your eyes off of my brilliant presence in the future, I'll never forgive you!
Make sure you keep your eyes on me!
Can I help you? Don't just stare blankly, answer me!
Eek! ...Where do you think you're touching!
voiceline.oath: Wh...What are you doing, you complete horndog! You absolute pervert!

voiceline.line: Hello, hello~! My name is Iori Minase! It's such a pleasure to meet you! ...Huh? There's no need for me to force myself...? Hey, wait a second, what do you mean by that?!
That's pretty good. I guess I can thank you for this.
How naive of you to think that you'd be a match for me!
voiceline.oath: Behold the true might of the super idol, Iori! Heehee♪

voiceline.line: In order to create even bigger bubbles... slowly... like this... Eek! Say something if you're there!
Blowing bubbles while sitting on a swing... It might seem a bit childish, but there's nothing wrong with enjoying activities like these every so often.
Eek! ...Hey, can you not touch me out of the blue?!
Since you're back, come keep me company. It's not every day I get to take a vacation. It'd be such a waste not to enjoy it to the fullest!
Oh, it's you. You've come at the perfect time. Get behind me and give me a push!

Spending time here with you all is actually pretty nice. What are we doing next?|Since we're here on vacation, we've just got to try some of the local cuisine. You've done your research, right?|Hey, just because it's vacation doesn't mean you can slack off! Don't you even dream of napping. Come and accompany me to the beach!
Popping the bubbles? I didn't know you had a childish side to you.
Hey, stop that! You creep! Degenerate! Absolute pervert!
Blowing bubbles while sitting on a swing... It might seem a bit childish, but there's nothing wrong with enjoying activities like these every so often.
Finally! My turn to make some noise.
Commander, allow me to show you what real bullet hell looks like!
First ship of the Ise-class battleships, Ise.
Operation Kita was more fun that this!
Are you from the Army?
It'd be wonderful to be able to go stargazing with Hyuuga again.
Compared to that time, life is a lot more vivid and entertaining now. Cheers, Commander!
Commander, I brought some snacks. Why don't we have some drinks tonight?
I could have any number of friends stronger than me, but you Commander... Ahaha! You're an idiot, I'm an idiot! Cheers~!
Tsk... I haven't had a chance to play- Ahem... Commander, I've been guarding our rear just as you asked!
Let's go have a swell time on the seas, Commander!
One... final... bombardment!
Whoo! Just the thing to prop up the corner of the table!

We're fine without fuel. All you need out on the seas is some good food and booze!|What should I call Fusou? Big sister? Senpai?|Ise Shrine? I've seen it from a distance, but they won't let me go in...
I... I'm coming too! Wait for me!
Mmhmmm~! All I need is a beer and a raw egg to wake up. Do you want some too?

Ise, first ship of the Ise-class battleships! I was on perimeter guard when Pearl Harbor was attacked. I was then recalled and remodeled as an aviation battleship. Then I was recalled again... Tsk! Some ships have a long list of battles, but no one was patient enough to wait for me to join in! We're super dreadnought ships... You would think they'd want our help! *Sigh* Anyways, it's great to finally catch up with the main fleet!
Thank you~! I'm going to stay by your side until the end of the end. Why? Because I hate drinking alone!
Super dreadnoughts... open fire!!
What? W-What do you mean an aviation battleship can't fly? Lame!
Commander, you really want to know what it feels like to fly, don't you? Please feel free to climb into my cannon.
I'm the Sakura Empire battleship who fired the last full volley during the war: Ise-Class battleship, Ise!
A flight deck, eh? I wish I could fly...
Ahaha! As a super dreadnought, it's only natural!
Planes: check! Main guns: check! Nobody can stop me now! Let's sortie right now, Commander! I'm fired up and wanna wreak some havoc on the battlefield!
Keep an eye out? My aircraft can do that, easy peasy. I tell ya, these beauts are really handy~
Commander, my guns are gonna rust up if you keep me in port forever.

Damn... Guess aviation battleships can't fly, after all. Kinda let down, honestly...|What? I can't let my aircraft fly around the port whenever I want? Why not?!|Phew... What a nice day! Maybe I'll call over Hyuuga later so we can all go for some drinks. Whaddya say, Commander?
You interested in my flight deck?
Aviation battleships can't fly, but if you want me to send you flying, then I'll grant your wish.
Planes: check! Main guns: check! Nobody can stop me now! Let's sortie right now, Commander! I'm fired up and wanna wreak some havoc on the battlefield!
I will lead the charge into batt... Hey, stop! Wait for me!
One banner, one nation!
Kagerou-class destroyer number twelve – Isokaze.
Our target: the base's docks! We must welcome back the commission team! Giddy-up, General!
Hmph! I'm done playing with you! Hamakaze, Tanikaze, where are you?
How I know so much? Urakaze-sama taught me everything about the warring states! She's really smart! But Hamakaze is still my best friend in the end! Heheheh~
Western Army, attack! Fire on the Eastern Army! Our next move will be... Oh no! Hideaki was lured away! That's unfair, General! Darn, now I'm... *Sob*...
General, let's play a game! Huh?! You've got work to do?! You really do? Do you want me to help? Then how about a massage? ...Hooray! I love you, General!
General, Urakaze-sama seemed angry at me and said I've started being cold to Hamakaze! But I still want to play with you... So come on! Let's go play together with Hamakaze!
You make me proud, General! Hey, uh, listen! I have a report for you! You see...
I will never back down!
General! It's time to charge into battle!
Hamakaze, Hamakaze where are you... You have to save me!
General, I have a letter for you!

General! Come play warring states with me! You can be... Ieyasu! I'll be Mitsunari!|Hamakaze! Tanikaze! Let's depart! We're heading for the capital!|Urakaze-sama, my coat has been torn again... Fix it for me!
General! Put me in charge of the mission! I'll finish it you before you can say "set sail"!
General, our mission rewards are here! How much koku did we receive?

I am Isokaze of DD17! In the past, you see, I've worked with Hamakaze, Urakaze, Tanikaze... oh, and Yukikaze! My service record stands second to none! And that's why you should put me in charge of your missions!
General, if anyone starts being mean to you then tell me. Hamakaze and I will go and get revenge on them for you. We're here for you, because we're all friends!
N-nothing can stop me!
General, give me a piggyback ride! We must charge into the enemy stronghold!
Hahaha, that tickles~!

All units, attaaack! ...Wait a second, where am I?! Oh, I know you! Urakaze-sama said you're... the general! Hmph! I'm Isokaze, the one destined to become a general that will make the whole world tremble in fear!
I am Isokaze, the leader of Destroyer Division 17!
Urakaze-sama, can you see my glorious victory?!
General, I want my red envelope!
General, General, look! It's my New Year's outfit! Urakaze made it for me! Let's play a bunch of Sengoku wargames this year as well!
General, General! Make sure to wake me up for the New Year's shrine visit! Even if I sleep in, make sure to come get me! This year, we definitely need to go together!
General, Happy New Year!

Woah! It's snowing! General, let's call everyone out and have a snowball fight! |Why is everyone so sluggish during the winter? I think playing in the snow is suuuuper fun! |General, General, look! It's a tiger! Rooooaarrr! Ahahaha~
General, what are these? New Year's presents?
Huh? General, I'm not cold~ Ahaha, stop rubbing my belly, it tickles!
General, General, look! It's my New Year's outfit! Urakaze made it for me! Let's play a bunch of Sengoku wargames this year as well!
The first smash hit is coming right up~!

General! I, Isokaze, have done my utmost to prepare the equipment! Now, with Lord Urakaze's presence, our Sengoku☆War-Band is complete! Of course, you are more than welcome to join our ranks, General!
For the General's return, an ode of celebration... Uhh, I was going to practice this song with Urakaze...
General! Let us dedicate our souls to the rehearsal today!

Hamakaze, tutor me~ I was practicing so hard that I forgot to do my homework...|General! What kind of outfit should I wear? A suit of armor? Just a chestplate...?|"Straight to your heart! Love delivered on the spear's tip!" ...How's that, General? Just like an idol, right?
This outfit is so fluttery... Being cute is nice and all, but I want to be badass...

General! I, Isokaze, have done my utmost to prepare the equipment! Now, with Lord Urakaze's presence, our Sengoku☆War-Band is complete! Of course, you are more than welcome to join our ranks, General!
Viiiiictorrrryyyyyy~! As the sun shines, so do I!
Nothing weird is going to pop out, right?
*Cries*... I'm so glad that you're still this gentle with me, Commander...
Second ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers, Isuzu.
The girls have completed their commissions! I hope they didn't bring anything strange back...
Is Commander a demon?
*Cries*... Are ghosts scary because they don't exist in this world?
Ah? A midnight adventure? That... it's not a good idea, is it? No, I'm not afraid!
*Cries*... There definitely was something strange there just now! I already said a midnight adventure was a bad idea!
You... you're going to protect me from anything that appears? You're... you're just making fun of me again, Commander... I'm not blushing! It's just a little hot...
*Cries*... Only you wouldn't pick on me, Commander...
Aaaaaah!!! Commander! Don't scare me like that...
*Cries* ... Are they all demons?
Commander, you've got new mail! I hope there aren't any curses written on them...
Torpedoes are truly frightening...|It feels creepy at night without any lights on, don't you think...?|I've seen plenty of things in this world! You won't scare me so easily.
Commander, I think you've still got a lot of unfinished work to do.
Mission rewards delivered! I wonder if there's anything good...

Sakura Empire, Nagara-class light cruiser, Isuzu, reporting in! I participated in battles at the Lesser Sunda Islands, Solomon Islands, and Guadalcanal. I've fought alongside many famous ships, so you've got to work hard to try and have as good of a reputation as I do!
*Cries*... I hope you aren't messing with me, Commander! I'll never feel scared again, as long as you're with me... Can I trust you, Commander?
I... I'm not scared!
Commander... you're so warm...
Uwa! It's touching me! It's touching me!
Woah! You... you scared me~! Oh, it's you, my Commander! I'm Isuzu... You're not here to pick on me, are you?
Did I... get stronger?
Vi- victory? Commander, how did I do?
A-all those Halloween monsters are just people in costumes, right?! ... There aren't any real ones roaming around, right?!
There's many monsters roaming around during Halloween... B-but I'm not scared, okay?! ... Umm, err, uh... Can I hold your hand?
If only I could board the pumpkin carriage and meet the prince of my... What?! Commander, h-how long have you been here?! D-don't stare at my face! *Sob*...
C-C-C-Commander! Trick or... o-or... I can't do it...!

Monsters aren't real... Monsters aren't real... M-m-monsters aren't real....!|W-w-why do they make even the pumpkins look scary?!|L-l-looks like everyone's enjoying Halloween... I-I-I-I'm not shuddering, okay?!
You make me feel safer than anyone else, Commander...
*Eeek*?! I-I'll turn you into a frog!
There's many monsters roaming around during Halloween... B-but I'm not scared, okay?! ... Umm, err, uh... Can I hold your hand?
My sisters wanted to dress up as Santa Claus and go around handing presents to kids... I didn't go with them because I'm not good with the dark.
Commander? I only came here to help wrap up all the presents for tomorrow, n-not because the fireplace is too cozy and I don't want to get up...

I'm not really sure how Christmas should be celebrated. But just sitting next to you in front of the fireplace like this... is probably fine. Commander, i-it's a bit cold... I'd like to get a little closer...
I was told that this outfit would be good for wearing around the house, but it's a bit too loose... S-stop staring at me already.
Two people sitting in front of the fireplace like this... feels a bit like family.
