It's so cozy right next to the fireplace... There are even fuzzy Manjuus to cuddle~ |Um... Commander, what kind of presents should I give to everyone? |I've already done my research. There are no ghost stories or anything of the sort related to Christmas... R-right, Commander?
Are... you trying to share my body heat?
I knew it! You were trying to take advantage of me!
Commander? I only came here to help wrap up all the presents for tomorrow, n-not because the fireplace is too cozy and I don't want to get up...
I had no idea donning a mascot suit was so demanding... Fubuki used to wear these all the time... That's way too insane...
Wooah! ...I fell down again... But at least it's cooler now... Huh? A photoshoot? Noo, don't take a picture of me~
Mascot outfits are so hard to move around in... It's all dark and stuffy inside... Ugh...
I wasn't trying to spill the juice! ...Sorry...
Haah... I wonder if I should take a little breather... It's so nice and cool...|Card games? N-no way, that'd be way too hard...|
C-Commander, thank goodness you were here this whole time...
Ugh... I knew you'd take advantage of this opportunity to tease me...
Wooah! ...I fell down again... But at least it's cooler now... Huh? A photoshoot? Noo, don't take a picture of me~
Leave the anti-air support to me!
Commander, you've always been so kind to me~ Thank you~
Retrofit complete! ...Umm, Commander? ...Wh-what's the matter? Do I really look that different...?!
The girls in the commission fleet have come back. Hopefully they didn't bring anything weird back with them?
Welcome back, Commander! I used to cuddle up to you after you got back from a sortie? D-did something like that happen? I think my memory's a bit fuzzy~ Aha...haha...
Gyah?! ...Commander, are you trying to scare me on purpose?!

Y-you saw something weird?! Wh-wh-where?! ...Jeez! Don't scare me like that! |Nagara said that I looked cuter before, but I think that's just because she likes to dote on me...!|Kinu seems like the dependable type, but she sometimes gives off really scary vibes... Ugh, I just don't understand her.
I... I'm not afraid anymore!
Commander, did I become a bit more dependable?
I... I'm not scared!
Retrofit complete! ...Umm, Commander? ...Wh-what's the matter? Do I really look that different...?!
All ships, form up! Target: enemies in front!
If you've got time to stare at me then maybe do your work instead.
Battleship – Izumo.
Commission complete. Why don't you go on one yourself, sometime?
You lack what it takes to order me to swing this blade.
This blade is my other half. Casually touch it, and you'll get hurt.
*Sigh*... Why do you always make that miserable face, Commander? It's so miserable that... it makes me want to scold you...
Hey, you've started getting just a bit into shape recently... Hmph, I suppose I'll acknowledge you've worked hard.
The path of my blade is one of constant solitude... or so I thought. Hmph, maybe being with you... isn't so bad after all.
Look who's back. Time's precious, so start reflecting on your last sortie immediately.
P-put out the fire...!
Late, as always. Just how long will you keep me waiting?
Damn... I can... still fight...!
Here's a letter. It's rude to the sender to not read their letter thoroughly. Don't you agree?

A blade requires careful maintenance. Isn't that obvious?|Sisters... eh. The Izumo class consists of just me, so I guess I'm a bit jealous.|Become stronger, Commander. Once you become strong enough to protect everyone... Once that happens, I...
What are you planning to do about these unfinished missions?
Mission complete... Good lord, would you ever have realized it on your own?

I'm battleship Izumo, of the Sakura Empire. I existed as a proposed Yamato-class design, although they didn't construct me... But if you look down me even slightly then prepare to taste one of my main cannon volleys.

You're making that miserable face again. I just can't leave you be, huh... Listen, today is the day I will acknowledge your hard work... or, should I say, your talent! I, battleship Izumo, swear on my blade to walk with you, both in life and death.
Feel the wrath of my blade!
Commander, you don't have the free time to endlessly chat with me.
... I-I'll slice your hand off!
Battleship Izumo, reporting in. Are you the Commander? Sure don't look very reliable... Listen here: do anything to slow me down, and you won't hear the end of it!
My blade grows sharper.
Victory? Of course we won!
I'll remind ya, in case ya forgot...! I'm the battleship Izumo!
My name has connections to classical dancing...? I-I see...
You'd like to see my classical dance? Your tastes are quite refined, Commander... In that case, I'll show you the finest performance in the land!

Dancing and my sword are much alike. Untold hours of learning and practice are for a single moment of brilliance...|Commander, if I really captivate you so... will you be able to finish your work?|Savory delicacies and mature festivities... I say why not enjoy the New Year and let loose for once? Hahahah!
... Drunk? Me? I've only had a few... *Hick*
Commander, are you insinuating you want a swift kick?
You'd like to see my classical dance? Your tastes are quite refined, Commander... In that case, I'll show you the finest performance in the land!
How stunning; how gorgeous – to my eyes, the sight of this battlefield is worth ten thousand ryo.
My heart is utterly unclouded...!
Boss, can you check if these chains are covering my left eye? I'll reposition my arm.
Fiji-class light cruiser – Jamaica.
Boss, the commission team has returned... "Stop posing on the veranda"? U-understood...
Unfortunately, Boss, it seems your Goals differ from mine...
Boss, care for a chat? There seems to be a need for us to Know one another.
An age of justice? That is not what I want. Where there is light, there is dark. Evil cannot be eradicated so easily, Boss.
You end up on the path of Evil if you only focus on your own justice, your own desires. Never let the Darkness out of sight. I'm here with you, Boss.
One needs a Heart of Justice. As long as we have it, no matter what struggles we face, we will surely see our journey to the end. We are Just, therefore... you are never alone, Boss.
I feel Evil wriggling within the depths of my heart... Boss, let's enjoy this Peace while it lasts.
Victory comes to those who are determined! Stand Proud!
Boss, my Eye has seen it... Your necktie is slightly loose.
It's not pain I fear... it's being completely helpless... Ugh!
Boss, you have mail from one of your partners.

Boss, is the "you" that my Eye sees really "you"?|Boss, care to race with me? I will show you what real Lighting looks like.|I feel it. Somewhere in the world, the darkness of night is enveloping something...
Boss, are there any Missions for me to tackle?
Boss, we've received mission rewards. Me? No need. I'm satisfied with Standing here and basking in my sense of accomplishment.

It is I. I, Jamaica, who sabotaged Iron Blood's operation in the Barents Sea; I, who sealed Scharnhorst to her fate: to sink in the Battle of the North Cape. Operation Tungsten? Of course I was there. As was I during the subsequent civil war... As long as Evil continues its march, I will keep fighting... Yes, all my choices were made by Justice itself...
Boss, what we are doing is carving a path through the Wilderness. And being here to walk beside you is the greatest blessing of my life.
The eulogy of life... is the eulogy of Courage!
...Boss, keep your hands to yourself. Otherwise you'll startle me when I'm concentrating.
...Boss, t-this isn't the place for this...
Ugh... my eye is throbbing again... So you're the Boss, huh? The name's Jamaica. All is in the name of Justice...
It's not enough... I need more power...!
Eradicating you fiends is the meaning of Justice.
Boss, if you have time, wanna help me upgrade my bike? I got some sick ideas.
Hey Boss, you talkin' about my sweet bike? Heh, I made it myself by scrounging up parts from Akashi's place. Pretty cool, huh?
I used to consider myself a drifter, a vagabond with no home and no destination. But I learned that I was wrong, Boss. No matter what happens, I'll always come back... to home.
Boss, come take a seat. We're gonna forget all about the the smoke of the battlefield, and feel the wind at our side.
Boss, the weather be fine today. Wanna go for a ride?

When somethin' is on my mind, I just keep on riding until my troubles are left far, far behind... However, it's really easy to get lost. |Boss, when I drive, I like to go fast. When you're sitting behind me, make sure to hold on tight! |Boss, what if I named this bad boy here "Dark Bolt?"
Boss, do you wanna try riding too? Be careful, this guy's got some serious horsepower.
Boss... even though I told you to hold on to me tight, I didn't mean right there...
Hey Boss, you talkin' about my sweet bike? Heh, I made it myself by scrounging up parts from Akashi's place. Pretty cool, huh?
Akashi said she'd give me this bike in exchange for some "marketing." Sooo... Boss, what do you think? Wanna buy one?
Look, Boss, this is the new bike that Akashi sent me. She said she wanted me to be her brand ambassador... Doesn't that job sound badass?
I once thought myself a traveler, with nothing to tie me down, with no real destination... Turns out I was wrong, Boss. I'll always come back to you, no matter what happens.
Boss, the mountains are lovely this time of year. How about it?

This baby's got more horsepower than the other one, even if it's less reliable. She's still a good bike.|Worried about your hair? Well, safety's the most important thing on the road, so you'd better hang on to this helmet.|Boss, would you like to learn about motorcycles? I thought you might. Let's begin with starting the engine. First...
Do you hear it, boss? The rumbling of her engine? She thirsts for the open road. What are you waiting for? Hop on! But don't forget your helmet.
Look, Boss, this is the new bike that Akashi sent me. She said she wanted me to be her brand ambassador... Doesn't that job sound badass?
This seems like a good way to kill time!
Commander, you care so much about me... I'm so very happy!
J-class destroyer ー Javelin, Hull Number F61!
Getting tired? The commissions should be done just around this time. Shall we go to the docks to welcome them back?
Commander, if you don't behave yourself, I am going to start disliking you. You hear me?
...I'm cute? ...Eeeeh~! You're lying, right? Commander, are you trying to trick me again~
I've gotten closer to you now, Commander. Hehehe. But I'm gonna have to work harder~
Commander, you see, I want to be confessed to under the legendary tree like in comics~ and stuff...
Being together with you makes me so happy, Commander~ Ah, I made a boxed meal. Do you want to try some?
Commander, I'm feeling energetic!
Great work, Commander. Do you want a back massage?
Everyone, let's work hard! For the commander's sake!
Welcome back, Commander!
Ugh... I let my guard down...
Hey hey, you've got mail
Let's work hard for the whole day!|Fwa... I don't like to feel nonexistent. I'm gonna strike back~|I'm very lucky!|Commander, Commander, let's play with me~!|Commander... it feels safe by your side~
Commander, Commander, new missions have been issued!
Commander, Commander! Let's go check out the rewards!

Good day, Commander! I'm the J class destroyer Javelin! 
My sisters and I were part of the Narvik battle and the evacuation of Dunkirk! I had a little trouble along the way, but I fought until the very end!

Commander, what's wrong? Your face looks frozen... Eh? ... Wait, my heart isn't ready... what to do, what to do, my hair is messy and I haven't put on any makup or a dress... Commander, wait for me! Definitely wait for me!
Javelin, full power advance~ Yep!
Commander, I'm pumped up!
Kyaa~! Commander, perverted behaviour is bad!
I'm Javelin, Commander. Nice to meet you. Oh ho? You look like you have no idea what to do with a girl of your type being assigned to you!
Hehe, your care is very heart-warming, Commander!
Am I amazing? Oh you shouldn't have~ But, please learn how to do a better job praising me!
Everyone, let's do our best to kick back and relax!
Don't worry, guys~! I've already packed all your favorite foods!
Everyone, hurry up! We rarely get to go out to play, so let's make every minute count! Javelin packed plenty of lunches, so let's have a picnic by the beach!
Commander, you're taking too long!

Commander, the others are rushing us. Let's finish strong, so we can join them on the beach! |Look at all our friends out there! Commander, if you don't mind, I'll go prepare some extra lunches! |Commander, let's make a bunch of unforgettable memories on the beach this year as well!
Commander, your hands are freezing cold! Jeez, it's payback time! Take this! And this!
Commander, if you want to be more popular, you'll have to treat your girls better~
Everyone, hurry up! We rarely get to go out to play, so let's make every minute count! Javelin packed plenty of lunches, so let's have a picnic by the beach!
Our destination is... the beach~!
Commander! Don't you think we all look super cute in these uniforms?
Tada! We’re all wearing the same uniform! It’s super cute, isn’t it? Heehee, I’ll be wearing it the entire time I’m on duty, so make sure to visit!

This job's great and all, but I'd much rather be with you, Commander. Hey! I just had an idea! How about you open your own shop sometime, Commander? Then I can stay by your side forever! What do you think?
Welcome back, Commander. Come in and take a load off~
Ah! Commander! Thanks for coming~ I'm Javelin, I'll be your server today~

Don't hesitate to call me if you need anything~|Z23, remember to smile~ Ayanami, please don't give that death glare to our customers. Laffey, wake up! ....Right then, what can I get for you, sir?|Feel free to drop in any time you need a rest, Commander~
Commander, shhh, don't let them hear. I actually learned a lot of new kitchen tricks working here. How about we go back to your place and I give you a taste~?
Tada! We’re all wearing the same uniform! It’s super cute, isn’t it? Heehee, I’ll be wearing it the entire time I’m on duty, so make sure to visit!
Javelin, full speed ahead!
♪~What kind of lunch should I pack today~
Javelin, advancing very slowly!
Good job out there! Hey, Zed! Save the report for later, and let Commander rest first~!
Welcome back, Commander! Don't I look super cool today? Ehehe~♪

Little Bel and Belfast somehow feel like... mother and child?|Which club should I join...? Cooking club? Knitting club? Nnnh... I just can't decide!|Juneau, are you going shopping with the others later? Aww, let me come too!
Jeez, no lewding! How many times do I have to repeat myself?
Javelin, advancing very slowly!
My usual bear pyjamas are super cute and all, but it's always nice to change into something different! Ehehe~
Laffey, Z23, Ayanami, and Unicorn - are you girls ready? Ehehe~ I'm not planning to lose to any of you today~!
Shoot! I forgot that the others will be coming back any minute now!
Phew... Her Majesty's public bath is truly grand! Commander, next time, let's reserve it for our private use!
I guess I'm still a bit dumbstruck...

Unicorn, your drawings are really good! Ehhhh... you even know how to sculpt?! |This cake is so delicious~ Woah... self control, self control! |Enterprise, did you like the lunch that I made for you? Ehh? You also made your own?! Well then, can I try some of yours?
All righty, I'm ready to deliver a pillow smackdown!
Woah! Commander, how many times have I told you, no lewding!
Laffey, Z23, Ayanami, and Unicorn - are you girls ready? Ehehe~ I'm not planning to lose to any of you today~!
Yaaay! Ehehe, everyone, thank you very much!
Hehe~ Next time, I want all four of us to get on stage and perform together!

"Hello, everyone~! I'm Javelin, the new idol who arrived from the Royal Navy! I hope that my songs will be able to bring a smile to everyone's faces, so please take good care of me!" Hehe, how was that for an introduction, Commander?
Good work, Commander. Here, let me sing you a song~
Hehe, let's turn those frowns upside down and have a great day!
Aww... I promise to do better next time!

Commander, how did I look on stage? Ehehe, I'll work even harder for next time! |Commander, I learned some new dance moves today! Wanna see?|Right now, I can say with confidence that I want to bring a smile to everyone's face. Not just the people around me, but to everyone in the whole wide world! Ehehe~ |Commander!! Hurry, look, I landed another audition! I'm so happy!
Ehehe, since you're so into this, I'll sing another song for you~

"Hello, everyone~! I'm Javelin, the new idol who arrived from the Royal Navy! I hope that my songs will be able to bring a smile to everyone's faces, so please take good care of me!" Hehe, how was that for an introduction, Commander?
I'll show you the power of love!
By the way, Commander, I just remembered how I was making a goofy grin the whole time at our ceremony... Sorry, but I just couldn't help it! At that time, I just felt way too happy!
Today, I must be the happiest girl in the world! Hehe~
Commander, I'll come along with you to welcome everyone back~

On the most important day of my life, I'm wearing the most beautiful wedding dress, and the ring given to me by most cherished person... For me, this is the greatest happiness I could ever experience, Commander~!
Commander, when you come back from battle, does seeing your cute little Javelin lift your spirits? Ehehe~
Commander, I put the mail on your desk!

Commander, even though I already know that you're always looking after me, I'll still get upset if you don't pay attention to me! |Commander, is there anything you'd like Javelin to do? Really? Nothing at all~? |Commander, it's all your fault! I walked into this wall because I couldn't stop daydreaming about you!
Commander, helping you complete your missions is simply the right thing for me to do, eheh!
Commander, make sure to collect the task reward! Please check when you have some time!
Hup! ... Hehe, being in Commander's arms is the most comfortable of all~
Ahhhn~! Ah, Commander... did I make a really "adult" sound just now?!
Today, I must be the happiest girl in the world! Hehe~
Hehe, nothing can overcome the power of love!
Look, I can handle you just fine!
Heavy attack mode prepared, ready to use ultimate firepower! Check out the incredible glow on this new gun!
You look stressed, Commander. Want a quick massage? Or a knee pillow?

Good~ I'll be able to help out with your hard training schedule today! Oh? We can't fire our guns inside? I forgot...|"The wind caresses the sea, starlight rises o'er the horizon. May courage fill my heart. Transform!" What do you think about my new incantation?|I'm going to get stronger and cuter! Just you wait!
Commander, I am pumped up!
That's not going to work, even though you're the Commander!
Heavy attack mode prepared, ready to use ultimate firepower! Check out the incredible glow on this new gun!
Don't bother with courtesy! Just bunch up and come at me!
voiceline.oath: All hail the Vichya Dominion!

voiceline.line: If some dumbass sticks their nose where it doesn't belong, they got only themselves to blame when they're hanging from my cannons.
voiceline.oath: I'm not the kinda girl who goes shopping with Dunkerque and Algérie. But you knew that already, being the person who knows me best, right? On the other hand, I wouldn't mind doing that with you.

voiceline.line: Richelieu-class battleship – Jean Bart.
Guess your rackety team's come back.
voiceline.oath: Guess that merrymaking team's come back.

voiceline.line: Seems you've mistaken a wolf for a dog... Hmph, don't start crying if you get bit cause of it.
Your smile makes me think of her... She's someone I wanna hate, but can't bring myself to.
Stop looking so intimidated. Long as you won't betray me, I won't betray you.
I can't stand hearing those babies cry when you get hurt... So use me as a shield. I don't mind.
It's like the mood eases up when you're with me... I'mma get some rest right here... And don't you leave me...
voiceline.oath: ...Oh, crap, guess I dozed off. How 'bout you take a quick nap too? You could use my lap for a headrest. Take it easy. You and I, we're always by each other's side.

voiceline.line: You finished plundering? Coulda gotten it done in no time if you'd brought me.
voiceline.oath: I mighta once had a big role to play, but with you in command, I just never get to truly act.

voiceline.line: That all ya got?
Go figure... you're busier than I expected. If ya need a hand with something, just gimme a shout.
voiceline.oath: Gimme that, I'm gonna help ya out... Of course I'm gonna assist, I'm your secretary.

voiceline.line: My payback comes with interest... Before long, you'll know how much!
Got some mail for ya. Picked it up on the way here.

The era of battleships is over? Hah, the hell you mean? MY era is just getting started!|Insincere preaching about faith and beliefs is no different from idle sleeptalk.|Idiots just don't ever wisen up, do they... What drives 'em to pray to a made-up being that won't even respond?
voiceline.oath: I ain't letting any new talent outshine me. I am Jean Bart, the Vichya Dominion's most powerful ship and bearer of the sacred Iris' name. This title is my pride, and I will never surrender it.|If you wanna go talk to Richelieu then I could come with ya. We believe in different things, but we're still sisters.|Praying isn't my thing, but wishing is fine by me. 'Cause wishing for the wellbeing of the one you love is what it means to be human.

voiceline.line: A job's a job. Whining won't make it go away.
voiceline.oath: This loot ain't nearly good enough. Not for me, nor for you.

voiceline.line: ... Pish, them's some shabby rewards.
I'm Jean Bart, the battleship. I was named after a certain "renowned" privateer... You what? Never heard of privateers? They're pirates with legal permission to pillage, fighting for a just cause.

The path I walk is an unforgiving, dirt-ridden path where you can't even see the future lying ahead of you. But ya still wanna go with me? ... Hmph, your stupidity amazes me. And for your foolishness, I offer you the rest of my days.
Playtime's over!
Stop trying to hit on me.
voiceline.oath: Look, just don't get too flirty with me...

voiceline.line: ... You better not regret this later.
voiceline.oath: You're really that keen on my body?

voiceline.line: I'm Jean Bart, the Vichya Dominion's last cutting-edge battleship. Guessing you'll be plotting my course from now on... Hmph, I'll see for myself how good a job you'll do.
Feeling great. Wanna give it a shot?
Your endeavors were touching... but when you pick the wrong fight, that's all they'll ever be.
I'm more willing to listen to Dunkerque than a lot of others. She's a lot more in touch with the masses.
The guest of honor shouldn't be wandering around looking for girls drinking alone... Hmph, might as well have a drink while you're here anyway.
A commission fleet has returned? Let's head down to greet them together then. I needed some fresh air anyway.

I loathe red tape, nor do I have any desire to stand here like a flower vase for people to stare at... But I'm doing all of this for you, because you make me feel like it's all worth it. You've committed quite the serious offense, mon amour...
Did you just come back from battle? Here, cheers.
You... look awfully bored, Commander. Hmph, what a coincidence. That makes two of us.
Hmph. Still better than going to that banquet...

Letting go of everything and losing yourself to the merriment of song and dance... that is what a banquet should be about. Not this pompous farce that makes even wine taste bad. |The one thing that this banquet has going for it is the fact that everyone's smiles are genuine and heartfelt... Look, I'm praising you, can't you tell? |Commander, I'm not going to exchange pleasantries with you. C'mon, it's not like we just met for the first time, right?
You still have missions to do even now? ... Need my help?
C'mon, put all that stuff aside and have a drink with me.
Cheers... Hmph. I never asked for the "blessing" of being someone's sister, but I've already gotten used to what that entails.
The guest of honor shouldn't be wandering around looking for girls drinking alone... Hmph, might as well have a drink while you're here anyway.
Mmm... the wind on the battlefield... now that's what I'm used to.
You wanna go lookin' for treasure? There's no damn treasure 'round here. But one day... Hmph, one day, when we've achieved a boring peace, I'll give you a taste of what a real treasure hunt is like.
You damn scalawag... You don't just sneak into someone's hideaway without consequences, ya know. Though, I found this place by pure chance too. Don't go tellin' anyone else about it!
Man... The sun's crazy bright out today... What, you're still here? How long are ya gonna hang around? Hmph, you're real good, both at making me happy AND making me mad, you know that?
Would you stop comin' here right after returning to port? Don't want people catching wind of this place and turning it into a playground.
Don't you go touchin' my stuff without permission! I'll knock ya out cold.

Sorry, but this hammock's only big enough for one of us. Ya wanna relax, get your own. I ain't your personal servant.|Just how much damn work do you have if you're even bringin' it up here...? You just like being with me...? Tsk...|Wha–? Is... Is that Surcouf? The hell... How'd she end up dozing off in here? That girl's a real piece of work.
Ack! Don't put your damn ice-cold soda on me! You're on thin ice, buddy...
You're not the only one who can do whatever ya want just 'cause nobody else will come here. I can, too. Understand?
You damn scalawag... You don't just sneak into someone's hideaway without consequences, ya know. Though, I found this place by pure chance too. Don't go tellin' anyone else about it!

skins.name: First Snow Upon the Cutlass's Edge

voiceline.line: Forward! Quarter them!
Aid with getting dressed? This is nothing compared to a ceremonial Iris dress. Not to mention it suits me better. Don't ya agree?
Bonne année... Or rather, I should say "Happy New Year" here, yes? A year of peace and prosperity passes, and we are here to welcome another... and I must thank you for making that possible.
Not to say I've grown soft, but I have gotten too used to you bein' around. I don't mind it – hell, I like it. I'm all but dependent on you, that's just how important you are to me.
Hmh...
You're back? Seems you've got girls queuein' up to meet you. Me, not so much...
Work, same as always, huh? Tell me if there's anything I oughta know.

Sakura Empire-style badminton? Sounds fun. I'll knock that shuttlecock beyond the horizon!|I hate it when people approach me to either give or get a hug. Never asked for their damn compassion.|Wagashi, for me? Thanks. Dunkerque sure is considerate as always.
What, you wanna see me brandish one of these?
Umph! What now?!
Bonne année... Or rather, I should say "Happy New Year" here, yes? A year of peace and prosperity passes, and we are here to welcome another... and I must thank you for making that possible.
I'm not the type to underestimate anyone.
Brave soldiers, follow my lead!
Jeanne d'Arc... While this name imparts a heavy responsibility, I refuse to run away from it. After all, bearing that burden is my duty.
voiceline.oath: In comparison to someone like me, Cardinal Richelieu... is a true saintess. N-no, I'm not jealous at all.

voiceline.line: Light cruiser – Jeanne d'Arc.
Everyone's returned safely. Praise be to the Lord!
...If you are a demon, I will not hesitate to cut you down with my sword... If if is just that you have strayed from the righteous path, then repent, now!
If thorns block my path, I will clear a way. If flames obstruct my path, I will overcome them. I will not let any obstacle keep me from walking the path of God!
This blade does not exist to be wielded for my sake. I wield this blade for you, my homeland of Iris Libre, and for all in the fleet...
My dream is to lead everyone to victory while bearing a banner. However, victory is something that cannot be achieved alone. For that purpose, I need the help of my allies, and you, Commander.
Commander... The more burdens I bear, the more I cannot allow myself to rest. That's why, for a little bit... just for a little bit... would you lend me your shoulder?
The flames of war have yet to be extinguished. It's time to redouble our efforts.
voiceline.oath: One who is bestowed the Iris' power must always be humble. We must take care to not let ourselves be swayed by the outcome of a single battle, Commander.

voiceline.line: The situation is dire... Everyone, stay in formation!
May the port be ever blessed with our Lord's grace.
voiceline.oath: Commander, may God's blessings be upon you.

voiceline.line: No, I can't stop here...
Commander, you've received some mail. Please look through it.

Saint Michael, I beseech you – please tell me what I should do next...|My name, my weapons, and my rigging. All are testament to my conviction.|If you're tired, you should rest. Battles should not compose your entire existence.
voiceline.oath: As you always have done, please, continue to protect everyone in the Iris Libre, the port, and the Commander...!|...E-eh? Commander's documents... Oh no... How could I make such a mistake!|If you're tired, you should get some rest. If you don't rest, then I can't rest peacefully, either... After all, it'd be inconceivable for the secretary ship to rest before the Commander! A-anyway, please get some rest first.

voiceline.line: Commander, there must still be some unfinished business you need to attend to.
There is more value to mission than just the rewards.

Even though I had previously been a training cruiser in charge of raising excellent warriors, I am now standing at the front lines for my country with sword in hand. I pledge my all for my beloved homeland!

This is... how you feel...? I'm so happy. I also treasure you the most, Commander. Um, you see... I'm not really sure what we're supposed to do together, but... first, would you like to try being pampered by me, Commander?
The Lord's blessings upon the Iris Libre!
Is there something bothering you?
voiceline.oath: I-it sparkles, so please don't touch it too much.

voiceline.line: I-is this what you're into, Commander?
voiceline.oath: D-don't touch me there!

voiceline.line: If you are familiar with the name I have been entrusted with, then you should also understand my noble calling. Jeanne d'Arc of Iris Libre is now under your command.
My burning spirit, become my strength!
This still isn't enough to fulfill our duty... No. Everyone, you've all done great!
To think that there was such a wonderful movie set at the port... What a surprise.
"O chosen hero, I bestow this sword upon you so that you may clear any obstacles in your path..." Commander, how did that sound?
Commander, shall we get started? I'm all ready.

I know you told me to rest when we take breaks, but... my, how should I put it... I'm really enjoying this work!|There's a dream I have from time to time... I dream of what it would be like to cruise freely about the sea, using only my divine powers to do so, though I as a ship do not deserve such freedom.|Com...mander. Commander. Is something the matter? You've been zoning out while looking at me. By the way, I require your assistance. Would you please come over here?
When we wrap up this job, do I want to go to the beach? Yes! I'd love to go to the beach with you!
"O chosen hero, I bestow this sword upon you so that you may clear any obstacles in your path..." Commander, how did that sound?
Now is not the time for me to be scared... L-let's give them a beating!
I-is there anything we can do together, Commander...?
Fletcher-class destroyer - Jenkins, Hull Number DD-447!
That supply fleet... Isn't the enemy this time around, right...?
U-um... Please stop staring at me...!
I'm a bit of a scaredy cat... and I'm always afraid to tell people what I really think...
C-Commander... I'm feeling a little troubled...
How about we have some tea together after lunch... N-n-not like a date or anything like that...!
C-Commander, I want to tell you something... U-um, if you hold me in your arms, then I could say it... C-could you do that for me?
Good work, Commander. Is there anything I can help you with? Huh? There isn't...?
D-do remember the secret word? ... P-phew... Then it's really you, Commander...
*Pant*... *Pant*... T-the enemy hasn't caught up yet, have they?!
Commander, you've got new mail. Would you like me to check it for you?

There are actually some obvious differences between us Fletcher sisters.|M-my heart beats so quickly... whenever I'm in front of you, Commander...|It really is a wonder... that all of us who ended up spread across the world could reunite here...
Commander, I-I think you still have a few unfinished missions.
Commander, I-I think you still have a few rewards you haven't collected yet.

I-I'm Jenkins, DD-447, one of the earliest Fletcher-class ships built. Truth be told, I'm actually not good at combat at all... I barely helped out at Kula Gulf or Kolombangara... Anyways... That's my story~!
You want to be with me forever and ever? As long as you're okay with it... then of course I'll be with you! D-do you... f-feel the same, Commander?
I-if you don't run away now then I'll have to get serious!
C-Commander, would you like to... um... have lunch together sometime?
C-Commander?! U-um, I-I-I don't believe you should be doing this...
Y-you're the commander?... Hello, I'm Jenkins, a Fletcher-class destroyer... U-um, could you take me back with you?
If only I was a little more brave...
Whew... I was so nervous I thought my heart was going to burst... H-hooray for victory!
I won't hand these important presents over... Hah!
I wonder if Radford would be happy to wake up to an apple in her present box... M-Maybe I should give her some candy, after all...?
Commander, g-good evening...? Right now, I'm bringing presents to Radford and the others...? Could you give me a hand? Th-thank you... Um, your present.. this apple, do you want it?
You're working so hard even though it's Christmas Eve... Commander... You all... Good job...!
The code word... do you remember it? I'm so glad... Commander, Merry Christmas!

Santa would be wearing a Santa hat and a beard like I am, right?|Nicholas is acting just the same as she would on any other day, even though it's Christmas...|It's a shooting star! If you make a wish upon it before it disappears...! Uh, you want to know what I wished for...? I-It's a secret!
You know... It's okay to come a b-bit closer...?
C--Commander... N-Not in the dark like this... Ah...
Commander, g-good evening...? Right now, I'm bringing presents to Radford and the others...? Could you give me a hand? Th-thank you... Um, your present.. this apple, do you want it?
We must face our enemies seriously, no matter who they are.
Do you need anything? Or are you just here to chat?
J-class destroyer – Jersey (F72.)
Commander, a commission is done. You haven't forgotten about it, have you?
You are a halfhearted and lousy individual.
Commander, while we're not that familiar with each other, I wouldn't take issue with having tea and chatting with you.
There is one thing I want to set straight with you; I'm not foul-mouthed, I simply say what's on my mind. For instance... do you have a thing for little children?
But that's all right. You may fancy me if you like, but if you don't, then it's... not *not* a problem...
Commander, I'm a straightforward person, and I'd like my partner to be as well. So be open-hearted and simply say what's on your mind. In return, I will be sincere with you as well.
Don't overexert yourself after returning from the battlefield. Relax.
Do you know how long you've kept me waiting, Commander? What's the meaning of this?
Ugh... You will pay dearly for staining my dress! Know this!
Your mail, Commander. Don't forget to read it.

I hate it when others underestimate me because of my size!|No one knows what's on a person's mind if they don't say it aloud. I do not like people who are roundabout.|I wish you would compliment me for being honest, rather than for being "cute." Not that I mind compliments like that.
Stop pretending like you haven't seen the new missions and get them done already.
Commander, our rewards have arrived. Well done, I say.

I'm Jersey, of the J class. While I have neither noble blood nor a particularly outstanding combat record, my personality is what it is, so spare me your complaints. What happened in Malta was just a slipup. But, admittedly, mistakes are mistakes. That much I know.

Now that I think about it, we've been so straightforward that we've not even done anything romantic... But now at least we know each other better than anyone else. I say we let romance into our lives starting today.
Now's not the time to be taking it easy!
What, you want to nuzzle against my lap? You can keep your fantasies in your dreams where they belong.
C-Commander?! I-I-I appreciate your straightforwardness, but now isn't the time...
Are you the Commander? My name is Jersey, and don't you forget it.
I will not let your efforts go to waste.
This is the might of the J class! Regret your own carelessness!
Remember to mind your safety, even when you're fighting.
I don't want any harm to come to Janus. Please take good care of her, and don't try to take advantage of her kindness.
voiceline.oath: Commander, do you keep a diary by any chance? See, I was thinking I'd do like Janus and record my day-to-day thoughts, and... No, you may absolutely not read it. You'll just have to live with that, I'm afraid.

voiceline.line: J-class destroyer – Jervis.
The commission's done. Make sure to wash your hands after carrying things, or else our next meeting might be in the infirmary.
voiceline.oath: Is that all of the commission supplies? All right, now it's time to wash your hands. Go on – put them forth and I'll show you how it's done.

voiceline.line: I cannot comprehend people who do bad things yet act like all is right with the world... Yes, people such as you, Commander.
Mhm, that should do it. Please be more careful next time. Oh, Commander? As you can see, I've just finished my treatment. Are you feeling unwell, or... just slacking off again?
Try not to get yourself hurt when you're out on sortie. It's going to be a huge headache for me if you end up bedridden.

Of course, it falls upon me to look after you should you get injured... And while that's rather troublesome, for some reason, I do find that prospect quite appealing... I wonder if I'm coming down with some weird illness myself...
I wonder if there's a cure for my selfishness... Hey, Commander, what reason might one have to develop feelings for her patient? Hm? You want me to tell you? ...As if, you prat.
voiceline.oath: Could you come see me again later today? ...No, not for a checkup, but rather for a d-da– Look, you already know what I'm talking about. If you're interested, then just say it, please... Y-you idiot...

voiceline.line: What are you doing, may I ask?
voiceline.oath: You just can't resist doing perverted things, can you?

voiceline.line: Welcome back–– Oh my, you have some scratches on you. You shouldn't be so careless as to put yourself in danger... I'll treat you right now, so please stay still.
voiceline.oath: Look at you – you got hurt again! I'll have to use antiseptic. It's going to sting, but you have only yourself to blame for that.

voiceline.line: Nothing some emergency treatment can't fix!
I wonder if it is an acceptable thing to keep your secretary waiting like this.
voiceline.oath: Making a girl wait for you isn't good manners, Commander.

voiceline.line: Let's withdraw. Phew... I'm glad we were able to rescue everyone in time.
New mail has arrived. If you miss any response deadlines, I can't help you with that.
voiceline.oath: You've received a new letter. Unless you have more urgent business, I advise you read it now.

voiceline.line: Your nose is practically buried in your paperwork. If you don't want to live in a blurry world, I'd advise you to be mindful of your posture.|When treating people, the emphasis should always be on the "people" part. Administering the port operates on the same principle. Though it's fine to be absorbed in your work, try not to neglect the people around you.|Did Janus say anything weird to you lately? ...Nevermind. She's a kind-hearted girl, but sometimes acts without thinking. It can be a bit of a pain sometimes...
voiceline.extra: Please try to curb your bad habits for the sake of your health. I'll keep an eye on you for however long it takes until all traces of them are gone.

voiceline.line: Leaving work unfinished is like allowing an illness to go untreated. By the time things get unmanageable, it may already be too late. *sigh*... Why do people choose to be so irresponsible anyway?
voiceline.oath: You have a bunch of unfinished missions. Remember what I... *sigh*... Reminding you about everything has become a habit of mine.

voiceline.line: Mission complete. Don't forget to look back on your work to see if there's room for improvement.
voiceline.oath: Oh, you completed a mission? Nicely done. You've proven your ability to commit to your duties.

voiceline.line: I am Jervis, J-class destroyer. I participated in several operations with the Royal Navy. If you are inclined to sum up my service as "lucky"... I suppose I don't mind. It's normal for people to become fixated on what stands out most to them, no?

Seeing as how you aren't a complete plank, I suppose I can give you an answer. Taking care of you isn't something I can't handle... Huh? You want me to say "I love you?" Y-you idiot... Maybe we can save that for next time...
Careful now.
...Let me see your hand. Good, there's nothing wrong with it.
Surely you're not going to say that was an "accident," are you?
voiceline.oath: You idiot...

voiceline.line: I am Jervis, J-class destroyer of the Royal Navy, and my duty is to assist the injured. You seem to be in pretty good shape, Commander, so my services probably aren't needed? I'll be taking my leave for now.
I do wonder if you're improving yourself while everyone else is getting stronger.
Is anyone injured? Please allow me to administer some basic treatment.
voiceline.oath: The best type of victory is one without casualties.

voiceline.line: I'm helping out because the Maid Team is somewhat understaffed right now. What about my outfit...? Is there something wrong about wearing maid attire while performing maid duties?
Phew... That about does it. Next on the agenda is... Huh, Commander? What are you doing here?

As a maid, I am able to take care of you even when you are not ill, yes? ...Not that I care though. I'm not interested in becoming your maid; it was merely a thought experiment... Yes, nothing more than that.
Since you have nothing better to do, why don't you lend a hand and help me hang up the rest of these sheets? Surely you didn't come here just to watch me work?
I thought a certain someone came here to slack off, but turns out they had spare time and wanted to help out, huh... I guess there's nothing stopping you.

Janus went to participate in the "Maid Experience Day." A real hard worker, I tell you. If she runs into any problems, won't you quietly lend her a hand? ...But, don't bring me up at all.|Are you seriously going to stay here until lunch? I'm telling you now, I only cook for my patients. If you're fine with that, you're free to do as you please.|Huh?! Why'd the wind suddenly kick up...?! Phew, that was a close one... Maybe I should just have you keep an eye on this for me? Just in case~
I'll be fine. I can still reach. More importantly, where have your eyes been wandering?
Seems like the sheets aren't the only things that need cleaning. Let's put that dirty mind of yours through the wash too.
Phew... That about does it. Next on the agenda is... Huh, Commander? What are you doing here?
All ships, charge forward!
For the next operation, we need to allocate resources, and... Yes? Ah, help yourself, Commander.
Sendai-class No. 2 light cruiser, Jintsuu.
Stop daydreaming! Commissions have returned!
You might as well just leave the fleet management to me.
I was a flagship before, but now I'm just a common warrior. Please treat me the same as you would the others.
Commander, it's okay to respect my opinions, but please have confidence in your own judgment. I wouldn't be standing by your side if I didn't believe in you.

Commander, why do you think those famous generals of the past were willing to bow to their superiors? Was it the limit of their abilities, or was it devotion to their leaders? In my case, perhaps a bit of both.
Real leaders will always stick to their guns, no matter who opposes them. You can tell if their methods are correct by seeing who is willing to follow them. For example... me...
Books cannot teach you everything. Some things can only be picked up through live combat. What do you think, Commander?
Commander, how you spend your time off-duty is no business of mine. Once you arrive, however, please do your work properly.
All ships, retreat! Do not make meaningless sacrifices.
Commander! It's important to respond to messages promptly!

If being cautious is considered cowardice, then shouldn't being brave also be considered recklessness?|There is no single solution for everything. Only through comparison, practice, and even failure, can one find their own correct answer.|Even if others don't understand my actions, I'll always do what I think is right... Even if you don't understand, Commander.
Your new missions have been sorted. Please take a look.
Rewards are here... Hmm? Don't worry. I'm just thinking about how to make our fleet more efficient.

I'm Sendaii-class ship No. 2, Flagship of the Second Torpedo Squadron, Jintsuu. People have criticized me for being a coward, but I proved myself in the Battle of Kolombangara. Let me show you the glory of the Second Torpedo Squadron once more.
Deciding on the best course of action before acting cautiously has always been my creed. I can now say with confidence that choosing you, Commander, was the correct decision.
I've been waiting for this moment!
What's the matter? I'm just thinking about how to manage the fleet.
You've got more guts than I expected, Commander. Do you have the heart to face the consequences, though?

The battlefield can change at any second. Think rationally and act cautiously so that you may never be defeated in battle. Commander, have you been able to achieve this? Flagship of the Second Torpedo Squadron, Jintsuu, reporting for duty.
Should we consider advancing deeper into enemy territory?
Is that it?
I said I was taking a vacation, but even out here on the beach, I'm still thinking about the affairs of the fleet... I really am a workaholic, aren't I?
Hmm? Is it unusual? Hah. Even I require a change of pace to clear my mind every so often. Commander, why don't you come out and get some fresh air as well?
Here, iced coconut water. Please have some.
After we finish work today, how about taking a break on the beach?

If you relax too much, you'll become undisciplined. If you're too uptight, you'll only find yourself out of breath. |Every year when it is swimsuit season, I can't help but to be envious of Sendai... Commander, I'm not being negligent in my exercise, am I? |Commander, your mind has wandered off onto the beach, hasn't it? It’s written all over your face.
Commander, you're concerned about it too, right? My tail is so conspicuous in this swimsuit...
You can't concentrate on your work when I'm wearing a swimsuit, right? Hehe, just consider this a test of will then.
Hmm? Is it unusual? Hah. Even I require a change of pace to clear my mind every so often. Commander, why don't you come out and get some fresh air as well?
Everyone, get ready! ... Press forward!
Commander, do you have any tactics you'd like to discuss with me? If you'd like... we can also just sit down and have a chat.
Since I've gotten used to living with you, Commander, I've decided to be more laid-back after receiving my remodel. My dance? Hehe... I can't show that to just anyone so easily.
Did you sleep well, Commander? Do you need any help with fleet administration?

Sometimes it's hard to prove to others that what you believe is right. Commander, let's do our best together!|Every now and then, I get a bit jealous of Sendai and how straightforward she is...|Even though some people may think that cautiousness is a sign of weakness, I'll be happy as long as our fleet truly understands me...
Rewards have been issued! Want to see something interesting now that we can take it easy?
There's nothing wrong with wanting to see me dance... I'll show you, but only if you work seriously first!
Commander, please do not mistake my cautiousness for tolerance.
Since I've gotten used to living with you, Commander, I've decided to be more laid-back after receiving my remodel. My dance? Hehe... I can't show that to just anyone so easily.
I can always work harder for the fleet!
I only gave the orders, the real credit goes to the fleet!
Everyone... look after yourselves... and watch out for those mean submarines...
The... old injury to my foot? Well... my foot's still a bit stiff, but I won't ever let myself drag everyone else down...!
Atlanta-class light cruiser – Juneau, Hull Number CL-52!
Umm... Commander... there's a commission that's been completed...
Don't come near me! ...Sorry, I think you're a little scary, Commander...
I... often have nightmares about five brothers whose faces are all blurred, and they tell me to come with them... It's really scary...
Commander, can I go to bed with you again tonight? ... I feel very safe when I sleep next to you...
I'm not afraid of having nightmares anymore... b-but can I still sleep together with you, Commander...?

Now when I dream about those five brothers... I can see their faces clearly, and they bless me with their smiles... But somehow it was so sad it almost made me cry... *Tearful sobbing*... Can I really live happily together with you, Commander? It's not just a dream, right...?
I'm really hoping this war will end soon... Once it's over, let's all go someplace together...
C-Commander... I'll always be w-waiting for you here...
That hurts! ... I can't feel my left foot... Someone come save me....!
Commander... excuse me... here's your mail...
*Eek* Commander?! Y-you scared me...|I want to be brave... But it's really hard...|Commander, have I annoyed you in any way...?
What? A mission? I don't mind as long as we aren't fighting submarines...
I don't need any rewards... just being here with everyone is enough for me...

I-I'm Juneau, an Atlanta-class anti-aircraft cruiser... Because I have high anti-air capabilities, I was assigned to a Task Force, but I'm actually scared of getting shot... Unfortunately I couldn't make it back home from Espiritu Santo...
...Mhm, I have faith in you, Commander... I told the people in my dreams that I've found happiness and would do my best to live on for their sake as well... I'm truly... truly happy right now...
Me too! I-I'll give it my best shot!
Pl... please be gentle... I'm very susceptible to pain...
Mmh... *Whimper*...
I-I'm Juneau... I'm a cruiser... I'm scared of pain... *Sob* And I'm scared of you, Commander...!
I'll... try to work harder...!
Phew... I almost got hit... *Sob*... I don't care about being the MVP... I'm just trying my best so I can come home in one piece...
For your sake, Commander, I'll try the very best I can!
(Whispers) Commander, does... does this count as a medical check up?
J-class destroyer ー Juno, Hull Number F46!
Commander, the girls who went out for commissions have returned
Commander, have you come to dislike me...?
I am happy being next to you, Commander...
I haven't accomplished anything huge up to this point, but it won't be a problem dealing with your surroundings, Commander!
I was called 'Yuno' before but, I'm not going to feel jealous you know? I'm happy just by being next to you, Commander.
This crown? It's just a decoration. But if I'm Princess Juno, will... will you be my prince?
Commander, is there anything I can do?
Commander, welcome back! I've already prepared the documents for use today.
This isn't good... after all...
Commander, Commander, there's new mail. Please check it!
Uh, that... it looks like Jersey wants to play with me...|What! ...Pasta...? Th-There's none. Can I decline?|Commander, is there something I can do?
New missions huh... But it's fine if you don't want to do them, right Commander?
I wonder what the rewards are... They must be nice!

I'm the 4th ship of J class, Juno. Ow... My body isn't fine, so I have some small troubles, and I can't get used to fighting... But for Commander, I will work hard! So please don't be cold to me, alright?
My dream... is to be your bride, Commander. Is it alright to treat this ring as your promise to me...?
Um... That... Juno, giving her all!
Ah, that's...
Eh... C-Commander, please don't... look at that spot...
Greetings, Commander. My name is Juno. Leave escort to me... I'll do my best!
With this, I've become of greater use to you, Commander!
I didn't cause anyone any trouble, did I?
An in-inspection, now...? Um... I had a little too much to eat at the festival... Awawa! N-nevermind!
I love the bustle of a Sakura festival! Commander, care to try some of Akashi's takoyaki? I've heard their taste is out of this world!
Commander, being able to wear beautiful clothes like this and visiting the temple with you makes me feel like the happiest girl in the world... Hehe~
I already checked your schedule - there aren't any particularly important missions today! Hehe, now you can enjoy the summer festival without any worries, Commander!

Umm, next time, we should invite Javelin to the festival... I'm sure she'll make things even more lively. |This festival has reminded me of how wonderful the Sakura Empire is. My chest tightens whenever I think about you, Commander. Why is that?
I asked my sister about it, and she said that this feeling is called "love." It feels a bit painful, but it also makes me very happy.
Good work, Commander~! Why not take a break... and play with me!
Ehehe... I have a feeling something good will happen today!
Uu... I let my guard down...
There's new mail! I wonder who it is?
La~ la~ la~ When is the next battle?|Is.. is there a storm coming?|Boring~ boring! How do you expect me to stay quiet?
Mission~ Mission~ It's time to make some money~!
Mission complete! Hurry up, let's collect those rewards!

I am the second ship of the Königsberg-class light cruisers, Karlsruhe! I participated in battles as the flagship of an Iron Blood torpedo squadron. I hate cold weather, storms, and that pesky Truant...
I feel happy whenever I think about you, but I miss you whenever I can't see you. Overall, I'm still glad that I fell in love with you!
I have a feeling this one's gonna hit!
Nyahaha! That tickles!
Nya? Why do I feel so hot where you touched me...?
Hi, it's me, Karlsruhe! Please take good care of me, Commander.
I've found the strength to continue exploring afar.
Eh? I won?
Königsberg-class light cruiser – Karlsruhe.
Commander, let's put our best foot forward and work hard today!
nil|I'll give any storm a good thrashing! Hyaah! |Commander, are you interested in me? Ehehe, us Königsberg sisters are famous for our good looks~!
Did you call? If you want to play, I'm down any time!
Commander, take a look at my new rigging! Doesn't it look all shiny and strong? Now, I feel like I can weather any storm... probably!
Anti-air combat... commencing!
My weapon? ...Hyah! Eh? I look really cool? D-don't say that, I barely know how to use it...
voiceline.oath: ♪～Commander, do you like Western-style Sakura confections? I'll currently deciding on what to pack you for lunch, ehehe~

voiceline.line: Munition ship – Kashino.
The commission team has returned safely. Let's go greet them. Having that said, I'm used to being in their position though, not the other way around~
voiceline.oath: I'll help bring back the supplies from the commission fleet! Commander, please look after our hardworking girls!

voiceline.line: I can bring you all the supplies in the world, but you don't seem to be capable of using them well...
My rigging is a bit different from that of the other girls. Want to learn more...? Mm, why don't you come take a seat on my deck then?
I often play with the little destroyers. Like this... I put one on each shoulder and pretend like I'm some giant monster or robot... Yes, it's quite fun~♪
Commander, if you're tired, why not take a bath? Afterwards, if you enjoy some fresh milk, you'll be sure to feel— C-Commander?? What's wrong? Should I take you to the infirmary...?
Phew... Ah, Commander, are you feeling better now? I've brought iced milk, sweets, and everyone's well-wishes. Ehehe~ If you'd like me to wash your back again, just let me know.
voiceline.oath: Ahh~ That feels so good... Commander, thank you so much. I really appreciate the massage... Now, it's my turn to do all sorts of things for you, right? Ehehe~♪

voiceline.line: Oh...! S-sorry, did I hit you with my tail...?
Phew... Oh, Commander, welcome back. I just finished stashing the supplies that the others brought back into the warehouse. The inventory? Um... please give me a moment.
It's just a scratch... Don't worry, I can keep going!
Welcome back, Commander. Is there anything I can transport... Err, I mean, is there anything I can help you with...?
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander. Is there something I can help you with today?

voiceline.line: Ugh... It's hard for me to keep up with the actual warships...
There's a letter on this pile of supplies...? Oh, it's addressed to you, Commander. Here you go.

1, 2, 3... Commander, the supplies you've given me to transport are all accounted for. Hm? It's all right, you don't have to get everyone to help me carry it. It's not very heavy...|♪~ Commander, I brought you your tea. Adding a bit of milk will give it a Royal Navy flair... how about it?|Commander, how about decorating your window with a windchime? Enjoying a refreshing breeze while enjoying this delicate sound will surely make you feel better~
voiceline.oath: You want to take me to the hot springs on our next day off? Really?! I'm so happy to hear that!|Milky Manjuu...? Are you talking about that drink that used to be popular? I can make it if you'd like.|...Mm... Nnh... S-sorry, this sometimes happen when I listen to the windchimes... Zzz...

voiceline.line: Do you still have missions to complete? Please be mindful of the deadlines.
Mission complete~ That's one fewer thing to worry about.

My name is Kashino. My favorite hobby is relaxing in the hot springs, and my weight and height are... Ack, that's not what I'm supposed to be saying! Excuse me... Um, I was the ship that was created to transport the Yamato-class's 40cm Type 94 gun, but I also participated in various transport missions before finally being sunk by a submarine... Hmm, is that good enough...?
As a munition ship, I may not be very useful in combat. However, as long as you believe in me and cherish me... I'll try to be as useful as I can in other ways...! Mhm!
I've brought the supplies!
Am I carrying main guns again? ...Ah, sorry, I spaced out a bit...
Eek?! Commander?!
voiceline.oath: Oh my... C-Commander...

voiceline.line: Well met, Commander. I am Kashino, munition ship of the Sakura Empire. Hmm... I may be a rather peculiar ship, but... if there's anything I can help with, please entrust it to me... is that acceptable?
Hmm... Was I supposed to feel different...?
This sense of elation is rather mysterious... Mm...
voiceline.oath: The munitions I brought paid off~♪

voiceline.line: If there's anything lacking about these hot springs, it's the fact that this place is too small... If you're not careful, it's easy to slip or to bump into various things...
Ack... Owww... My apologies, Commander, I seem to have slipped on something... At times, it's hard to notice things I'm about to step on... Ugh...
I've kept the fresh milk in the fridge back there. After you've finished bathing, please feel free to help yourself~
Commander, are you enjoying the water? Yes, I love the hot springs here~
Oww... My luck isn't so good today...
By the way, Commander, there was a letter for you... Sorry, I forgot to report it earlier...

Phew... That feels so good... My shoulders aren't stiff anymore~ Commander, thank you for telling me about this place~ |M-my swimsuit, um... Commander's going to see... Erm, please disregard that!|A nice bottle of milk after a refreshing soak really hits the spot~ Let's get another bottle later~♪ ...Um, I knocked the first one over when I slipped earlier...
Shall I... wash your back for you?
Th-they're pretty heavy, right...?
Ack... Owww... My apologies, Commander, I seem to have slipped on something... At times, it's hard to notice things I'm about to step on... Ugh...
Foo, let's do our best?
Kasumi can see lots of things that others can't, like Foo here, for example. Kasumi saw that Foo was all alone, so we became friends.
Asashio-class destroyer number 10 – Kasumi.
"The commission team has been waiting for Commander for a long, long time." ...That's what Foo told me.
Don't be sad, Commander. Kasumi will be your friend.
Foo can't handle being around lots of people, so Kasumi also dislikes crowded places...
Commander, Foo and Kasumi will always stay by yourside, because you're our friend.
Commander, do you want to watch a movie with Kasumi? Kasumi likes movies with lots of friends that look like Foo... Let's watch one together?
Foo will chase away all the bad guys that Commander cannot see. Kasumi will also protect you. We'll always be together...
Foo, Commander's back. Commander, your tea.
Kasumi... is very strong when she gets serious!
Hello, Commander. Foo, say hi to Commander too, okay?
Foo, make sure to... protect the others.
It'd be nice if Foo could get the mail...

Foo is my good friend. We're always together. |Kasumi... gets tired easily... Commander, your chest is really comfortable. |Foo is always scared around Shiranui... Commander, is there no way to help Foo not be afraid of her will-o'-the-wisps...?
Foo told me... that there are still missions left, and that Commander should stop slacking off...
"Mission complete~ Good job, Commander, Kasumi will give you a reward" ...Foo, what are you saying...
I'm Kasumi, from the Asashio-class. During Operation Rei-go, my friends and I did our best to complete our missions. Without them, I would not have been able to accomplish anything alone.

Commander, you've given me the most precious gift. That's why I'll give it my all to become the person most precious to you. ...Foo, what's the matter? I have to act more lovey-dovey? Um, then... *kiss*... Like that?
Let's do our best, everyone.
Commander, would you like to talk to Foo?
Commander, Foo is biting you.
I'm Kasumi. Commander, are you my friend?
Foo, is Kasumi any different...?
Foo, we did it.
There's still a lot of the mochi Shiranui brought over... Commander, do you want some?
Warm and comforting clothes... Warm and comforting red bean soup... Ahh, I love New Year's.
Foo, you want to eat some mochi too? ...I'm not sure that's possible, sorry.
Commander, Happy New Year's. Would you like... some piping hot red bean soup?

The mochi inside red bean soup... is delicious and fun to play with. Seconds, please~♪ |Miss Ghost, would you like to be friends with Foo? ...Huh? You aren't really a ghost? |I hope a new horror movie comes out during New Year's. Commander, I'd like to watch one with you.
Commander, want some mochi? Say ahhn~
Warm and comforting clothes... Warm and comforting red bean soup... Ahh, I love New Year's.
My bag is unzipped? Must be one of Foo's pranks. It's definitely not because Kasumi left in a hurry.
Kasumi and Foo are excited about the new semester. Are you too, Commander?
You're giving a speech at the opening ceremony? I wonder what you'll talk about...
You're right on time, Commander. Just like Foo and Kasumi.
Foo follows Kasumi everywhere, to and from school, and even in class.|There are will-o'-the-wisps around port... Maybe Foo can befriend them.|I wish Foo could help me with my homework.
I dropped something? Thanks for telling me, Commander.
Commander, Foo is jabbing at you.
Kasumi and Foo are excited about the new semester. Are you too, Commander?
Kasumi is here, so Foo is never lonely. And Kasumi has lots of friends, so everything is good.
Kasumi thinks that her outfit has gotten a bit breezier. Foo said the same thing.
Welcome back, Commander. Kasumi brewed some tea. Have a cup.
Hello. Foo and Kasumi have been waiting for you.

Kasumi wants to help people. Foo does, too. We're gonna try to be as helpful as we can.|Kasumi has more energy than before. If you feel tired, just sit next to Kasumi and rest.|Shiranui became a friend, so Foo isn't scared of her anymore.
Foo said, "I wish I could talk to the commander too."
Kasumi thinks that her outfit has gotten a bit breezier. Foo said the same thing.
Teehee~ It's my time to shine. Let's get it done, everyone!
You call it the "Sakura Empire"? Somehow, it feels really familiar to me. Teehee~
Are you the Owner of the port? The "Commander"? Hello. My name is Kasumi, I'll be staying here for the foreseeable future. I hope we can both get along on friendly terms.
Everyone working together to complete a commission... Yep, what a concept.
Commander... I'm more than angry with you at this point. Reflect on your poor behavior.
These shipgirls also have sisters, I see... Both younger and older ones... Oh, sorry, I just had a random thought. Nothing to worry about.
I see the Sakura Empire has its own disciples of ninjutsu... Hm? You wish to see mine? Err, I'm afraid... I can't do that. You aren't meant to openly show them to people.
My favorite food? Hmm... I suppose strawberry mille-feuilles. You don't think that's... childish, do you? I always worry that people will think that about me...

Um, Commander... Do you have a moment? I read my fortune today, and there's a so-called "destiny spot" in port. Could we... visit it, together? Oh, thank you so much! I'm sure fate has a surprise in store for us. Teehee~
Can I, um, help you?
I'm still learning how to use this so-called "rigging," but I try my best to do my part! Please put me on the next sortie, so I can prove myself.
I'm not down for the count... just yet!
Is it time to get to work, Commander? I will be right here, so tell me if you need anything.
Mgh... How could this happen...
Oh, there's new mail. Do you think it could be from your family, Commander?

Excuse me, but... what's a secretary supposed to do? My knowledge is bit spotty when it comes to these things...|You can see the sea from mostly anywhere here at the port. The scenery is truly gorgeous!|According to my fortune, today's destiny spot should be somewhere over...
A new mission has come in. I could... give you a hand with it, if you'd so like?
Mission completed. That leaves us one less thing to worry about. Right, Commander?
I wonder how everyone's doing back at the Venus Islands... Oh, shoot! I'm supposed to be assisting you, and here I am letting my thoughts drift. My apologies, Commander.

I can't believe you're offering something this precious to me... Teehee, I truly was destined to be at this port. Listen, um... I assume you don't mind, but I want stay here for a while longer. Teehee~
This is it! My chance!
How can I help, Commander?
Would you PLEASE show some self-restraint?!
Are you the Owner of the port? The "Commander"? Hello. My name is Kasumi, I'll be staying here for the foreseeable future. I hope we can both get along on friendly terms.
I feel more powerful... Thank you for that, Commander. Teehee~
Let's keep this up! Teehee~
Um, Commander... Could you please not stare at me... because... it's a bit embarrassing...
I was amazed to see the port had such a scenic place as this... Truly, you can't go without taking this view in. Right, Commander?
You would think shipgirls are excellent swimmers, since they do so much battle at sea... But perhaps that isn't necessarily the case?
Are you here for some relaxation as well, Commander? Have yourself a nice, prolonged break from all that paperwork you're used to.

What's your favorite drink, Commander? I'm partial to the... iced café au lait, I suppose.|Commander, are you good at swimming? I'm just curious to see how fast your breaststroke is!|There's nothing... off about my swimsuit, is there?
We're taking photos? Well, I'm a bit camera shy, but... okay. How's this pose? Should I stay like this?
Please... No funny business, okay?
I was amazed to see the port had such a scenic place as this... Truly, you can't go without taking this view in. Right, Commander?
Harrumph! With me at helm, victory is already assured!
If you want to keep me company so badly... Well, I just happened to not have anyone to talk to, so you'll have to make do! In any case, let me start by telling you about my favorite kind of azalea––
Unryuu-class aircraft carrier – Katsuragi.
The commission rewards are in~ I'm only responsible for informing you though, you'll have to carry the goods yourself~♪
This simply won't do, Commander... I had no idea that the esteemed leader, the shining beacon of the fleet... would be such a decadent individual!
How many times have I had to explain this to you before? I can do everything that an aircraft carrier is supposed to do, but I can't do anything outside of that because that's just what I used to be!

Oh, Commander, what are you trying to do? Checking on that packed warehouse? Or just heading out for a stroll? Ah! Don't tell me... you're going on date with someone?! ...Hey, are you listening to me?

Commander! I happened to discover something amazing! Tomorrow is a holiday, and there aren't many days like it, and by pure "coincidence," neither you or I have anything to do! So basically, I was thinking, what could the two of us do on such a rare and special day when we have nothing else to do? Haah, there are too many possibilities~!

You know how in those books, if there's someone on your mind, it normally goes something like "your face gets all red and you can't find the words to say?" But, like, in my case, I just can't stop talking at all... Ah! I get it now! I'm not the one who's nervous, you are! ...Hey, are you listening to me?
voiceline.oath: Commander, how has work been recently? Are you doing well? And how did you like that cake? Oh, and do you know where you want to go for next weekend's date? ...Hehe, every time I see you, I just can't stop myself~ But first of all, I'll have you answer each and every one of my questions~♪

voiceline.line: You think you can mess with my heart just by patting my head? How naive! ...If you remember to keep it up 365 days of the year, maybe you'll have a shot.
voiceline.oath: Uhhh... So, how far are we into those 365 days? Well, seeing how I can't remember, let's start over from day one.

voiceline.line: Ohh, you're back! So like, something totally weird happened while you were gone. A little bird got lost inside the office and it was really hard for us to guide it back out~ Your place seems to be really popular with the birdies–– Hey, are you listening?
Are you really going to let your all-important aircraft carrier get hit like this?!
Hello there, Commander! Today's workload is looking a bit heavy and I wonder if we might have to do some overtime but I'm sure if we get right down to business we'll be able to finish– Commander??
voiceline.oath: Good mooorning, Commander! So, I have good news and bad news for you today. The bad news is, you've got a ton of work lined up. The good news is, I'm willing to help out! Do you understand the importance of this?

voiceline.line: We lost?! Even though I did everything I could?! Ugh... How could things have gone so wrong??
New mail has arrived! Now then, is it something important? Perhaps, a mission notice? Or maybe...? Darn it, hurry up and open it up already~

Skip bombing? I must admit, it was quite an imaginative tactic. The Eagle Union was even able to give one as cute and strong as me a headache! Ahahaha!|If you're tired, just let me handle the paperwork. Nobody would notice the difference if I forged your signature... Ah, uh, that was obviously just a joke!|I left half a cake for you on your desk. Why only half, you ask? Well, that's because... I already ate the other half! Ahahaha!
voiceline.oath: nil|One document, two documents, three documents... What am I doing? Seeing how there's nothing for me to do at the moment, I thought I'd count your files to pass the time!|Commander, I brought two different flavors of cake this time! You choose the one you want first, and I'll take the other one! Of course, we could also share them half-and-half!

voiceline.line: Hrrrrmm... Don't tell me you still have unfinished missions lying around?

Quite satisfactory! With such abundant rewards, you'll be able to further expand your scope of work and have even more missions assigned to you! But... Hehe, are you able to shoulder that immense workload?

Let's give you some tips for how to get along with a cute and cheerful girl: First, you'd better not find any of her conversations boring! Second, don't make her do any lame chores like carrying stuff around! Finally, ask nicely, don't try to boss her around! All right, that's it for the first lesson, but there will be more in the future... Hey, are you listening?!

You keep squirming away from me but today I'll make sure you absolutely listen to every single word. Got it? Good! Ahem! I, Katsuragi, am bound by oath to you, and swear to always be at your side through joy or hardship! ...Mm, excellent. Now, it's your turn to repeat that back to me!
Pay close attention to this!
What's the matter? Oh, you need me for something? Well, seeing how earnestly you're beseeching my aid, I have no choice but to at least consider it~
voiceline.oath: So tell me, what is this super important, ultra difficult mission that you cannot entrust to anyone but Katsuragi?

voiceline.line: Heheh, I know you don't have the gumption to–– W-wait, stop that! Y-y-y-you're going to have to take responsibility at this rate, don't you know?!
voiceline.oath: Hwaah?! D-don't you know that you need to give me time to prepare myself before doing stuff like that? *blush*

voiceline.line: Hello there, Commander! I'm the Unryuu-class aircraft carrier, Katsuragi. I'm not just a carrier, I'm a full-fledged aircraft carrier, meaning that I can do everything that an aircraft carrier is supposed to do! I'm not telling ya what I don't like, but as for hobbies, I've got a whole buncha those~ For example... (1 minute later) ...So yeah! Hey, Commander, are you still listening?
Mhm, that's more like it! I'll offer you some words of praise for recognizing my worth!
Oh~hohoho~ How could you absolute nobodies hope to win against the might of a true aircraft carrier such as myself~
voiceline.oath: Oh~ho~ho! With you commanding from the rear, victory was all but assured!

voiceline.line: You came here looking for someone to talk to, right? I suppose I can keep you company then, but you should make sure you go around and deepen your bonds with everyone else too! ...Except Junyou, watch out for that one!

It's– summer– festival– time–!! Uhh, well, maybe it's a bit too late for a "summer" festival, so maybe a regular festival is fine? Well, the important thing is that you have lots of fun, Commander! Because I sure as heck will!
Woohoo, you're back, Commander! Bring any goodies back for me and the girls? I'm already so excited I can't calm down!

Hellooooo, Commander! Are we starting work today with some of that festive spirit? I didn't just bring my festive spirit with me today, I came ready with the whole package, outfit and all! I'll be happy as long as you can feel that holiday cheer~!

When the fireworks climb high into the sky and go "kaboom," I can feel my excitement doing the very same thing! Ahahaha!|Commander, are you totally into my getup? You are, aren't you! Aha, I totally knew it! Come and feast your eyes all you want then~♪|nil
Missions? Can't you let it rest for a day and just enjoy the day off??

Excellent! With these earnings, we'll be able to eat as much as we want... Well yeah, I know that! We need to share with everyone else too! ...B-but, I'd be really happy if you treated me to a little something... Please?

It's– summer– festival– time–!! Uhh, well, maybe it's a bit too late for a "summer" festival, so maybe a regular festival is fine? Well, the important thing is that you have lots of fun, Commander! Because I sure as heck will!
Victory is mine! That's how a real carrier does things, duh!
War... war never changes.
I like fishing. When fishing, you can just clear your mind and not think about anything.
Shiratsuyu-class destroyer number nine – Kawakaze.
A commission's done. Don't forget to read the report.
In the end, you're just someone who can't exceed my expectations, Commander.
In war, there is no right or wrong, no beauty or ugliness. This is true for both ally and enemy.
Have you not experienced war, too? Then why do you still believe in fairy tales like justice, love, or harmony...?
I abhor the stupidity and naïveté of those who refuse to face reality and continue shouting about their hopes and dreams. But you're not like that... are you?
"Your dreams will come true if you don't give up on them"... Hmph, what a trite answer. But, if that's what you say...
What happens when the battle ends? The next one begins, that's all.
This pain... isn't enough to distract me!
Just another uneventful day.
I'm still... afloat. If that's good or bad, who can say...
Mail for you. Me? Not a fan of the stuff...

Shells are weapons to silence one's enemies with. That's all they are, no matter how you sugarcoat it.|If there's something you're wondering, ask Jintsuu. I'm... if I must say, I'd say I'm more like Sendai.|Pretty cheerful gang you've got going with this fleet...
New mission's appeared. ... What? Do I have to make small talk with you?
Mission rewards are here. Let's see if they were worth the time. But first, accept them.

I'm Kawakaze, 3rd ship of the improved Shiratsuyu class, or simply the Umikaze class. Destroyer Division 24 comprised of my sisters and me during the war. Ah, Solomon... True, it is a place of many memories. The Iron Bottom Sound, Northampton, and the last thing I remember...
I'm astonished that I'm doing this with you... We've been together so long that your wishful thinking has rubbed off on me... And for doing so, you'll take responsibility, won't you...?
Relax. I will end this in an instant.
How I feel about secretary work? Work is work, I don't have any preferences. Secretary or not, I don't care.
... Now you've really done it...
The name's Kawakaze of the Shiratsuyu class. I have no intention of becoming your friend. Spare me your introduction.
Getting stronger... feels okay.
The Solomon Islands... they call for me...
Mhm. Lightweight clothing makes it easier to fight. Thanks, Commander... "It looks cute on me"? W-well, thanks...
Today might actually be an eventful day.

On the battlefield, you swing your weapon and defeat the enemy, no more. Thinking about other things comes after the battle.|Sendai, how about we have a match? As for our spectators... I suppose we could ask Jintsuu and the Commander.|Seems having some cheerful people by your side might not be so bad.
