Do you like kendo, too? I'll work you to the bone to make you good at it. ... Huh? You don't wanna do it?
Phew... I was considering chopping off your hand, had you gone any further.
Mhm. Lightweight clothing makes it easier to fight. Thanks, Commander... "It looks cute on me"? W-well, thanks...
I fight... for the one I love!
I want you to pay Lady Nagato a visit from time to time. There's little I can do to ease her loneliness, but I believe that you can. Don't you worry, I know you'll still come to see me as well.
This must be the dream you've awaited so eagerly... Of course, I vowed to be with you to the end of our days. I shall take my rightful place beside you and your wishful thinking. We are... together.
"Your dreams will come true if you don't give up on them." They will, so let us make them real. I swear it to you upon all my being.
What is it?
When the fighting ends, I will always be here waiting for you. Put your mind at rest.
Today is another day devoid of change. But nothing needs to change if I can happily remain by your side.

The same sword that takes lives can also save them. It is my goal to become that: a sword that protects.|You must not fixate on only either brains or brawn. The ideal leader is both wise and strong. Ahahah, here I am, paraphrasing Naka.|You've got a cheerful gang going with this fleet. And you are a part of it, Commander.
You have new missions. Shall we have a casual discourse while you review them?
Mission rewards are here. Hopefully, they'll have been worth our efforts.
How I feel about secretary work? Work is work, that is all. I will gladly do anything for you.
It's humiliating to watch the other girls get ahead of me...
This must be the dream you've awaited so eagerly... Of course, I vowed to be with you until the end of our days. I shall take my rightful place beside you and your ideals. We are... together.
The Commander, Lady Nagato, and all my friends depend on me. I cannot afford to lose now.
We can win this... Right?
I like being alone in my own room. What exactly do I do in my free time? ...I'm not telling you.
voiceline.oath: First, close the door... Thanks. Now please listen, Commander. I've been practicing a lot.

voiceline.line: Yuugumo-class destroyer number three – Kazagumo.
The commission team's back. Don't forget to say hi to them... Me? Uhh, I think I'll stay right here.
I guess we're all fated to be alone. You, me, and everyone else...
You want to be friends with me? Okay, but if I find out you're planning something bad... then I'll never talk to you again.
You're not a bad person, so we can be friends... Do I wish I had more friends? I'm... not gonna tell you.

There have been rumors of this girl with long hair and skin as pale as a ghost's who appears out of nowhere at port... In fact, I think she's right behind you, Commander... What do you mean that's not gonna fool you? Well, I thought I'd just spook you a little...
You're fun to be with, Commander. A lot of fun. In fact, you're my best friend... Hehehe~ I wanna always be with you. Always.
I'm not a pet, so don't treat me like one...
Good going, Commander... You heard a strange noise just now? Uhh... I'm sure it was just your imagination.
voiceline.oath: You still wanna hear me play, even if I'm not good at it? But I'd rather not. Not when others are around...

voiceline.line: Watch beneath the waves...
*Yawn*... Oh. You scared away the birdies, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Hello, Commander. Let's have a good day today.

voiceline.line: Ugh. I'm really out of it today...
Mail for the commander? Okay birdies, go fetch... No, please don't fight over who gets to do it.

Could you not stare at me like that, Commander? I can't focus like this...|You're on duty, so no chit-chatting with me allowed, okay? ...I mean, if you feel really lonely, then maybe...|I like the satisfying toot-toot noise that recorders make... Do you wanna hear it? It'll have to be later, not now...
voiceline.oath: Try to focus on your work. Unlike me, you can concentrate even when someone's staring at you, right? Hehehe~|Are you feeling a little lonely? Hehehe~|nil
voiceline.extra: Oh right, I have to go give Kinugasa her lunch box. I'll be back in a minute, Commander.

voiceline.line: Look at all these unfinished missions... You should really do something about them.
Mission complete. Wonder if I'll get a reward for my efforts...

Kazagumo, Yuugumo-class destroyer number 3. I served the 10th Destroyer Squadron, mostly running transport missions and naval evacuations. These little birdies are my friends. My hobbies? I'm not telling you.
I think... this is when you promise to never leave me. First you say it, then it's my turn... Hehehe~ Thank you. I love you.
I wanna get this over with...
Commander... What are you up to? (Kazagumo throws you a suspicious look.)
voiceline.oath: Commander... What are you up to? (Kazagumo throws you a considerate look.)

voiceline.line: You'll be cursed for this...

Kazagumo, Yuugumo-class, reporting for duty. I hope I'll be able to get along well with everyone else here... Commander, you're not cooking up some dastardly plan, are you? You look rather questionable...
Thanks, Commander.
It'd be great if we could keep winning...
I've practiced some more. I'll play you a song, if you'll listen... On second thought, maybe I won't.
Toot~♪ Oh, Commander, did you hear me practicing my recorder? Umm, I'd appreciate it if you didn't tell the others.
Welcome back, Commander. You didn't bring company... did you? Okay, good. I don't want others to hear how not-good I am at the recorder...
Zzz... What is it, Commander...? Me? The breeze was just too nice and I fell asleep...

Weird... I played pretty well just a moment ago, but now I can't do it...|The name of the song I just played? I'm not gonna tell you right now. After I've mastered it, all right?|You're so nice, hanging out with me even after school... I'm not taking up your time, am I?
I'll make you proud, Commander!
Ugh... I lost track of the tempo because of that... Thanks, meanie.
Oh... Seriously, Commander? You're messing up my melody.
Toot~♪ Oh, Commander, did you hear me practicing my recorder? Umm, I'd appreciate it if you didn't tell the others.
I'm glad we won. Hehehe.
Let's show the enemies our true strength!
Errr, Graciously overlook my poor armour and firepower, please!
Kent-class heavy cruiser - Kent, Hull Number 54!
Good! Your commission team has successfully returned!
I'm disappointed... We don't make a good team at all.
Commander, Let's play a game! No, it's not a catchphrase. I can change it anytime! Anyways, Let's play! Let's Play!
Hey, Commander! Ah, nothing, nothing... Just keep doing you work. I'm happy just looking at you, Commander.
Staring...? Ah, it's nothing. I'm just wondering why you're so good looking, Commander. I'll never get tired of staring at you!
Commander! Commander! Want to guess how many layers of armor I'm wearing? If you get it right, you get a prize! If you don't, then you'll have to count the layers yourself...!
Welcome! I'm still full of energy!
Yo, Commander, let's go do something together!
Ouch... Contestant Ken has been eliminated
Warning! Radar indicates a paper plane folded with the new mail closing in at high speed!
I forgot that Tigre isn't around...|Commander, do you wanna race against me?|I think I've seen ships from the Far East before... They look really strong!
Hmmm, a new mission, want to take a stab at it?
Mission rewards! Let's take a look!
I'm both one of the first County-class cruisers and the first ship of the Kent-class. Pretty impressive, right? Stuff like Armour can be made up with good motivation and a fighting spirit! Right?
Oh wow! Thanks, Commander! But something this important needs to be kept in a safe place. I can't afford to lose it.....
Contestant Kent is sprinting!
Yoohoo~ Want to play, Commander?
Oh... Commander... You big pervert...
Hey Commander! I'm Kent! How do you do? Good? Bad? Doesn't matter. Things will be better now that I'm here!
Woah! Contestant Kent has become stronger!
Yeah! Contestant Kent is number one!
There's no ice I cannot break through!
voiceline.oath: Just have to fight... Everything will go fine!

voiceline.line: Are you free, Commander? Do you wanna... hang out?
voiceline.oath: Are you free, Commander? I could... kill some time. Are you fine with hanging out?

voiceline.line: Project 48-class destroyer – Kiev
Our commission comrades are back. Seeing all their smiling faces makes me envious...
voiceline.oath: Our commission comrades are back. They told me about some interesting things they saw... Do you wanna know, Commander?

voiceline.line: Am I the cause of your sadness? Would you cheer up if I simply... disappeared?
Do you think I'm cold? Or unapproachable? That's something I want to change about myself, but I don't know how...
More people are willing to talk to me than before... I think that's thanks to you, Commander. Thank you.
I've made many new friends with your help... But you're my first, and still closest friend. I want to get even closer to you. Are you fine with that?
Whenever we're apart, or whenever you're about to leave, my heart aches like it's being torn in two... I want to always, always be with you. Will you stay with me?
voiceline.oath: I want to be the only one for you. Of all the girls close to you, I want to be your most faithful one. When you look at all of us, I want to be the only one you really see... That's fine, right?

voiceline.line: I love it when you pet me. I need more... Please?
Commander! Oh, uhh... I know you're safe and sound, I just wanted to see you again as soon as possible... That's fine, right?
voiceline.oath: You're back by my side again... Phew. Now I feel fine.

voiceline.line: I'll stop at nothing for the Commander...!
Commander, umm... Is it fine if I wait for you outside the office next time, too?
voiceline.oath: I will always be right here, waiting for you, Commander. You're fine with that, I hope?

voiceline.line: Abandoning my comrades to save myself... I refuse to do that!
voiceline.oath: Please never leave me behind. I promise I will keep you safe.

voiceline.line: There's mail for you. I think it's important. Are you fine with me fetching it?

Huff, puff... There... Ah, I just thought I'd write something on the window.|I'll show no mercy to anyone that tries to harm you. Assisting you and protecting you are one and the same to me.|Growing flowers are way beyond me. The only plants I can be trusted with are cacti... They can survive even if you neglect them.
voiceline.extra: Huff, puff... There... I wrote your name and mine in the fog on the window. This looks fine, right?|I never wanna become a cactus. If I could grow in spite of neglect, then I worry people would actually abandon me...

voiceline.line: This mission sounds tough... Can you handle it, Commander?
voiceline.oath: New missions... They're not so tough when I have you.

voiceline.line: Someone should claim these mission rewards... Is it fine if I do it?
voiceline.oath: Are you... gonna go claim the mission rewards? Would it be fine if I went with you?

voiceline.line: My name is Kiev. I was to be a Project 48-class destroyer, but I was never born for a number of reasons... I'm glad to have you as my first-ever Commander.
To think I'm taking an oath with the one I love... I'm overjoyed, blissful, warm inside, thawing like snow under the sun into a puddle... Commander, is it fine if I... melt in your arms?
We're fighting on MY terms now!
I wanna come closer... Is that fine?
My chest feels... so warm...
voiceline.oath: Umm... (*blushes*)

voiceline.line: I'm Kiev, Project 48-class destroyer of the Northern Parliament. From now on, I'll be assisting you with all manner of things, Commander... W-was that, umm, a good enough introduction?
We can't forego routine maintenance and upgrades. Right?
All foes are down. Commander, did I, um... do alright?
...They've caught on to us? Then I'll fight head-on!
My black clothes let me blend in, but my silver hair does the opposite... The net result is that I stand out.
Seeing you here puts me at ease. I know this stakeout will go smoothly as long as you're here. Mhm, all is fine.
Commander! Where've you been? We should stick together, since it's easy to get lost in here. Is that fine with you?
Everything is in order. Ready to set off, Commander?

There's no one suspicious in sight... But we must keep our eyes peeled.|I feel safe when I'm with you, and I don't wanna leave your side... It's fine if we stick together, right?|Wonder how it's going for the others. Kronshtadt said to maintain radio silence, which... I'm fine with, since you're here.
Hold hands? Okay. Is this fine?
Commander... Not in public, please...
Seeing you here puts me at ease. I know this stakeout will go smoothly as long as you're here. Mhm, all is fine.
All foes are down. Nobody spotted me. Job well done, right?
Let's duke it out, fair and square!
voiceline.oath: Come here! Let's fight to the last ship sailing!

voiceline.line: Obviously I like being on the center stage with my massive cannons. Performance aside, their size alone boosts morale while intimidating the enemy. You get what I mean, Commander?
Kii-class battleship – Kii.
That last commission was kinda mediocre... Still, they deserve a congratulatory moment. Want to come with me?
I'm so tired of bosses that can't handle their subordinates, like you.
You okay, Commander? You've had this tired, stiff look on you for a while now... You're not getting rusty like Suruga, are you?
Thought as much. I'll help you with your training, then! Come on, out of your room and into the fresh outdoors for some jogging! And later, we'll do some sparring!

There's no fun in knocking a battle out of the park if nobody's there to witness it. Anyway, once this work is done, I'll go train with Hyuuga. After that, you, I, and Suruga will go for a drink with Ise! Sound good to you?
People say you can push yourself harder if it's to protect someone. Then for everyone's sake, I, Kii, shall become the strongest battleship... Pfft, yeah right! Hahahahah!
I reckon we'll garner more fame by winning battles than by wasting time in port, don't you agree?
These guys are tougher than I expected!
Look who's finally clocked in, hahahah! My trigger finger's gotten itchy, so let's get on with a sortie already!
voiceline.oath: Look who's arrived early. Now then, where are we going on a sortie today?

voiceline.line: Dammit... Not enough firepower for the job, huh?
A letter, eh? If it's an open duel, then I accept their challenge! Oh, no duel, huh...

Tell me if anyone starts picking on you. I'll put them in their place! And I mean it, for the most part, you hear?|Mmghh! I'm feeling stiff after standing up for so long... What's up, Commander? Why are you blushing? ...My bra's coming off?|Hey, Suruga! What do you say to going drinking with me and the gang once work is done? Figures, always so antisocial... When people invite you, you should go with it!
voiceline.oath: nil|nil|Say, how about a little drink after the working day is done? Although since my drinking pals are coming along, I guess we'll have more than just a little! Hahahahah!

voiceline.line: A new mission? If it's about turning hostiles to scrap, I'll get it done!
We're wrapping up these missions nicely! Great!

I am part of the Eighty-Eight Fleet Program: first ship of the Kii-class battleships, Kii. In short, I never got a chance to shine during the war because reasons... But now I have, and I'm going to use it to its fullest! If you have anything that needs doing, just say the word, Commander!

I mean, we don't need to go that far. We're already dearly important to one another, aren't we? ...Don't worry, I'll still accept it! And of course, I'll keep on keeping you safe, just like I always have!
Let's give 'em a dazzling show!
Something on your mind? I might be able to help you with it.
"Friendly friskiness," is it? Hmm... Sure, I guess?
voiceline.oath: Physical contact doesn't normally bother me, but you clearly did that on purpose!

voiceline.line: Battleship Kii, reporting for duty! Is it true that I'd be able to fight without holding back over here? Heh, good stuff! I look forward to what the future has in store, and you should keep your eyes on me as well!
Let's see how strong I've really gotten. Send me into battle!
Victory's ours. Heheh, now that was refreshing all right.
voiceline.oath: Now this is a victory I want the whole world to see! Hahahahah!

voiceline.line: Hey Suruga, let's go somewhere– Come on, don't be all "I like it indoors" and "I'd rather not draw attention," just come out and enjoy the summer with us!
Refreshing drinks, delicious food, warm sunshine... and a pool to beat the heat? Heh, isn't this the essence of summer?
Whoa, this drink is really good. Want a taste, Commander? Hehehe~
There you are, at last. Want to get something to eat, if you're hungry? Like dumplings, or a rice ball, or something.

Akashi sure got that vending machine and stall set up quick... She's ingenious, but only when there's money to be made...|Why the hesitation? It's just a pool. Nothing wrong with just swimming together with me, is there?|Really looks like Amagi, Akagi, and all the rest are enjoying the summer. All thanks to you, Commander. You should be proud.
Want to head to that other area? I'll come with you.
Refreshing drinks, delicious food, warm sunshine... and a pool to beat the heat? Heh, isn't this the essence of summer?
Prepare to meet the enemies.
Just what are you looking at? You ought to hurry up and return to your post.
Fletcher-class Destroyer - Kimberly (DD-521)
Commander, a commission has finished.
The incompetent will be weeded out by time. You are no exception.

As long as we keep on winning, will we be able to bring an end to the war? Rather than searching for the answer to that question, it would be more practical to focus on winning the battles ahead of us.
"What do I plan to do after the war is over?" Hmm... I've never given this much thought, nor have I wanted to. However, why did you bring it up all of a sudden?
Recently, I had a strange dream. I dreamt that I wasn't on the battlefield, but instead taking a walk along the port, hand-in-hand with someone close to me... Wh-what's so funny?

After discussing things with my sisters a bit, I realized that if the war actually ended, I wouldn't know how to do anything else... Eh, you'd stay with me and teach me yourself... so there would be no problem? E-ehhh?
What is... the meaning of this?
I see you've returned at the scheduled time, Commander. However, you can't afford to take it easy just yet.
Damage confirmed, continuing combat.
Being punctual is a good habit to have, so please keep it up.
Strategic retreat...
Commander, there's mail for you.

If you are tired, please take a break. If you were to collapse, the command chain would follow suit. |For me, no matter where I am, or what I am called, I will continue to fight on as long as I live. |I was born for battle and died for peace. Other than this fact, I won't dwell on anything else.
As a commander, it is only fitting that you complete these tasks.
Mission complete. However, your work doesn't end there.
I am the Fletcher-class destroyer Kimberly. I am normally tasked with escort and anti-submarine duties, so should the need arise, please do not hesitate to deploy me.

S-so this is a promise ring... Really, I never could have imagined that this would happen to me... However, I'm truly, truly happy, from the bottom of my heart. Is this... the "love" that my sisters were talking about? Hey... don't laugh!
Let's put this needless battle to an end!
What tasks are there?
Do you want to pay a visit to the court martial?
I am the Fletcher-class destroyer, Kimberly. From today onward, I will be one of your subordinates. Pleased to meet you.
Strengthening combat effectiveness is also an important link when it comes to battle.
This is a fine example of tactical synergy. Let's keep it up.
There are many differences between the Eagle Union and the Dragon Empery, but the one thing that doesn't change no matter where you are is everyone's desire for a better future.
While wearing clothes from the Dragon Empery, I can't help but reminisce about those days... Hehe, Commander, do you prefer me in Empery-style clothes, or Union-style clothes?
When I'm with you, I feel energized and my productivity goes through the roof. Perhaps... this is your magic spell? Hehe~
C-Commander, the buns are going to get messed up...
Every time I return to port, I feel a wave of relief wash over me. Is this what "home" is?
There is a proverb from the Dragon Empery: "A day's plans begin in the morning." Even if it's not the morning though, don't you think it's important to start off on the right foot, Commander?

My friends from the Dragon Empery told me about a lot of fascinating legends! Commander, do you want to hear them too? |Recently, I tried to learn the bamboo flute. Commander, want to give it a listen? |Ugh... calligraphy is really difficult...
If you put things off for tomorrow, you'll find that there's always another tomorrow. That's why you shouldn't put off today's missions for tomorrow.
Mission complete. Commander, want to take a break?
There's still a lot of work left to do... but don't worry, Commander! Let's knock it out together!
Commander... you could go to jail for this, you know?
When I change into clothes from the Dragon Empery, I can't help but to reminisce about the time I spent there... Commander, which style of clothes do you prefer - Union, or Empery?
Let us go forth and plant our banners!
My standing within the Royal Family? Hmm... If I had to draw a comparison, I'd say "Knight Commander" would be the most fitting... Hahaha...
King George V-class battleship – King George V.
There's some commotion by the port...? Oh, it seems to just be the commission team returning.
I favor those of character, and those who can cook. Commander, you are neither.
By the way, Commander, are you a good cook? Hmm? Despite my appearances, I've spent many hours honing my skills to sate my own appetite.
How's that, commander? Are you impressed by my cooking abilities? Here, have as much you desire. Seeing you enjoy my food pleases me.
Commander, so you're learning how to cook? Hmm, colour me impressed. I look forward to trying the dish that you're making for me.

My greatest hobbies in life are food and fighting. While I am more than capable of fighting alone, dining by myself is quite difficult and lonesome. To be able to find someone who can share both of these things with me is truly a joyous thing.
Commander, did you thoroughly enjoy the battle?
Hmph, how interesting!
Commander, did you already partake of supper?
Do not be demoralized. Neither victory nor defeat are decided by a single battle.
A letter, huh? Now then, is this a challenge, or a love letter?

Commander, this fleet only functions because of you. Don't get sloppy on us. |Wales and Yorkie? It's a bit of a shame that they don't act more like cute little sisters, but I am glad that they have strong personalities. |In my eyes, there is no leader in this world more worthy of my loyalty than Her Majesty, Queen Elizabeth. Does that make sense to you, Commander? |The Royals' cuisine is all bland? Hogwash. That's just an unfortunate stereotype.
New missions, eh? It would be ideal if we got something a bit more challenging.
Supper tastes best after the day's missions are all complete. Wouldn't you agree, Commander?

The nameship of the King George V-class battleships is none other than me. I served as flagship for my country, leading the fleet into numerous battles including the fateful encounter with Bismarck. After getting a brief taste of that thrill, I have been craving to cross swords with her once again... But I digress - is there anything else you'd like to know about me?
They say that "the quickest way to one's heart is through their stomach," but you've managed to win over both at once. Commander, shall we share all our meals together from now on?
The glory of the sun that never sets shall not fade!
Why do I have a mountain of snacks before me? Isn't it obvious? One cannot move on an empty stomach.
Ohh? I wasn't aware that you possessed such audacity, Commander.
So this is my new battlefield. Ahh, how I've long awaited this... By the way, are you my commander? You are in the presence of King George V – do use me well.
Hmm... I suddenly feel like having a lavish feast.
Make no mistakes. I shall ensure both victory and the safety of all my comrades.
Hmm...? These clothes seem a bit too tight. Commander, mind helping me loosen up the zipper in the back?
Sorry to keep you waiting, Commander... I don't get to wear a dress very often, so it took me a bit longer. Let's get going, then. Remember, you'll be the lead tonight. Haha~
Commander, let's call it a day after this commission is finished. Everyone has a right to enjoy the banquet.
Commander, if we don't hurry, all the food is going to get cold.
Take my hand, Commander. I'm still not used to walking around in this dress.
An invitation to the ball? Hehe, want to go together, Commander?

Ugh... I'm expected to act more proper when I'm wearing formal attire. Can't even go around trying all the different delicacies, what a drag... |We are able to enjoy a jubilant night like this because of all the hard work we've put in. Commander, let's make the most of it. |Hmm... Yorkie and Wales are going at it again. Commander, excuse me. It's rare that the three of us get to have a sisterly reunion.
Issuing tasks during our banquet...? Those folks sure know how to ruin the mood.
Let's use these rewards to decorate the venue.
It seems... that Belfast and Hood are already attending to Her Majesty. Looks like we'll be free to enjoy ourselves, Commander.
Sorry to keep you waiting, Commander... I don't get to wear a dress very often, so it took me a bit longer. Let's get going, then. Remember, you'll be the lead tonight. Haha~
Bad luck, friends. You chose the wrong day to get in my way.
Just bring it on already!
You're welcome to inspect the other stuff, but you'd be best off not casually touching my demonic raiments.
Nagara-class light cruiser number five – Kinu.
The commission team must be getting impatient from waiting.
Cowards shall never control a demon.
You may look like someone who is too gentle to hurt a fly, yet you have control over this entire port. I'm a little interested in you.
I've heard that Yuubari is responsible for developing new equipment. If possible, could you ask her to upgrade my equipment? For example, starting with my torpedoes...

How about letting me treat you to a couple cups of sake tonight? Hah, don't worry, I just want to have a normal chat. Having a heart-to-heart over some fine spirits... what greater comfort in life is there?
I feel like I can entrust myself to you. Is this where the demon finally finds her home...? Commander, if I was to become the blade you wield, how would you use it?
Don't go around touching my head.
You look like you're in a good mood. Are you the type that gets motivated the more you work?
Ahaha! Now you shall witness the form of a true demon!
Hurry up and make today's plans.
Even I have become obsolete...?
I've already highlighted the important parts for you, Commander.

Somebody I can't stand? I guess that'd be Nagara. She's the– Whuah, Nagara?! W-Wait, don't get any closer! MMPH, URMMMPHHH!|A new model of oxygen torpedo...? I say, do get me one of those. I promise I'll draw out every bit of its power. |My cloak's pretty cool? Heh~ you think so too, huh? ...Hey, stop trying to slack off!
Don't forget about your missions. A soldier must fulfill the orders of their superiors.
Accept these rewards. You've earned this privilege.

I am the Nagara-class light cruiser, Kinu. My name derives from Kinugawa, meaning "furious and violent like a demon's wrath." I live up to my name, but trust me - that is not something that you would want to see.
Commander, you are the worthy one who has conquered a demon. Let us commemorate today's vow, and aim for greater strength together.
Don't even think about running!
You want to duel me? Don't worry, I'll give you a handicap.
Really? Are you trying to get me mad?
I'm Kinu. If you want this demon to do your bidding, then you'd better show me what you're capable of!
I won't be able to test whether or not this strengthening worked outside of live combat.
Make an enemy of me, and your defeat is already ensured.
What Takao is doing can't be considered a club activity... No, I didn't mean anything by it. I just do what I like.
Grr! What are you here for? Speak up. ...Oh, you just wanted to take a tour of the club activities? Sorry 'bout that, I don't like getting disturbed in the middle of this kind of training.
Calligraphy and swordsmanship both hone the body and the mind. Commander, how'd these words come out?
Just finished my daily practice swings. Time to get back to work.
You've received a lot of New Year's greetings, Commander. Remember to take a look at them.

Unless you are a genius, you can never depart from the fundamentals. Even if you are a genius, you cannot afford to neglect the fundamentals either. That is the nature of swordsmanship. |Prince of Wales and Repulse, huh? ...Hmph. I'd never call them cowards. |Isuzu clearly is also an oni, but she's somehow afraid of ghosts. Me...? Guh, I suppose I can't deny that...!
These little manjuu hardly make for good sparring partners. How about taking their place?
Grr! What are you here for? Speak up. ...Oh, you just wanted to take a tour of the club activities? Sorry 'bout that, I don't like getting disturbed in the middle of this kind of training.
Sorry, but these riggings are the real deal.
Come! I will determine whether your hand is good enough or not!
Eyes on your cards, idiot. This is not a staring competition... Wh-what? Are you hoping to unnerve me or something?
Well? I've still got one card in my hand. If you want to win, then show me everything you've got! I will not have you disrespect me just for wearing a silly costume!
Give me a minute, I need to put on makeup... Just need to do like Isuzu showed me... There! I'm all ready now.
Dammit! You've ruined my tights and skirt!

Hey! Don't let any submarines near the wine! That goes for you too, Commander.|What...? No, I'm not "cute!" I don't consider that a compliment!|Cheaters can go to hell! Play fair, or don't play at all! Right, Commander?
You'd be an idiot to underestimate the demon.
S-so my costume is just that seductive, huh?
Well? I've still got one card in my hand. If you want to win, then show me everything you've got! I will not have you disrespect me just for wearing a silly costume!
That's it? I've still got the demon card in my hand!
This is a true oni's wrath!
My oni mask? Ah, it's on the other side now. With my self-evident power, there is no need to flaunt such things.
Retrofit complete... Look forward to commanding the might of the demon ascended. I shall not disappoint you!

This time, I won't resign myself to obsolescence!|Darn that Aoba... With how she's always absent-mindedly flitting about, what is she going to do when she ends up in actual danger? |This mantle was specifically made for me. See, look here, and here as well... Gah! ...Ahem! Sorry, I got carried away. I just wanted to make sure you knew.
If you want to spar with me, you'd better think thrice. One slip of the hand, and it won't be just a flesh wound that we're dealing with.
Ugh... I'm still a woman, you know! Have you no sense of decency?!
Retrofit complete... Look forward to commanding the might of the demon ascended. I shall not disappoint you!
Everyone! Stay alert, protect yourself, and don't be reckless!
Health comes first!
Second ship of the Aoba-class heavy cruisers, Kinugasa.
Commander, since you didn't go yourself, you should at least welcome back the girls who worked hard on the commission!
It's not like I care what you do...
Did you clean your room, Commander? Did you lock the door? Have you forgotten anything?
Don't be too hard on my sister... She actually has a lot of guilt buried in her heart.
I don't really like lecturing people... but I've gotten used to lecturing my sister, and you don't seem to mind. Eh? You actually it? Then... I guess I'll keep it up...
Aoba is always so impatient! But she's my big sis, and she's very important to me. Just like you, Commander. You're precious to me as well!
Commander, it's important to balance work and rest. Since you just got back, why not take a quick break?
Don't panic. Get into formation!
Welcome back, Commander! Did you get enough to eat? If you're still hungry, I can cook something for you!
We need to call a meeting and review this performance...
Commander, do I have to tell you to check your mail every single time?
Did you rest well, Commander? Health comes first!|I'm not sure if Aoba is getting enough rest... Please make sure to check up on her!|Work hard, play hard! That's the secret to a happy life!
Commander, work will only pile up if you keep putting it off!
Commander, leaving your rewards there won't make them grow.

Good day, I'm Kinugasa! I was in the 6th Fleet with my sister Aoba before it was disbanded. We fought together in many battles, like Wake Island, the Coral Sea, and the Solomon Islands. I'm not as lucky as her though... Anyways, Commander, try not to overwork yourself! Rest is important too!
Jeez, Commander. Your sleeves and collar are messy as always, even for such an important occasion. I'll lecture you later~ let's carry on with the ceremony!
Commander, did you also come to wind down with some light stretching?
Please take a seat, Commander. We're going to discuss fleet discipline.
Pleased to meet you! I'm Kinugasa. Have you been eating and sleeping well,  Commander? Don't be like my big sis... Speaking of which, is she also here by any chance?
Being wasteful is no good, Commander.
Everyone, don't let your guard down just because we won!
My cannons will decide this battle!
Kongou brought me some tea. How about we drink it together?
Kongou-class fast battleship number four – Kirishima.
You're knee-deep in paperwork... Want some help?
Well, guess even you have problems you won't tell others about...
Hiei manages to always stay calm, no matter the situation...
Haruna and I are twins, but to me she feels more like an annoying little sister.
You know, my big sisters are both really brilliant. That's why I have to work so hard not to hold them back... You think I'm brilliant, too? Hahahah, I'm happy to receive your approval.

There'll be a dance at a party Hiei is organizing, so... could you be my dance partner? I mulled over it a bit, but you're really my only choice... Huh? Normally, it's the man who asks his partner for a dance? Ahahah, right, how stupid of me...
You're doing good work out there, Commander. For the next battle, what do you say about bringing me along?
This is it... The beginning of the end!
Commander, is there anything I can help with?
Being able to meet one's demise in a battle of firepower might not be so unfortunate...
You have mail. You must be really popular, Commander.
Searchlights? Ahahahah... The battlefield is no stage.|Why I wear this mask? Hahah, think you can guess why?|Kongou, allow me to help... What? Y-you don't want any help, huh...
Hum, hum. What should I take home with me as a souvenir...
Those girls seem exhausted from their commission. Let's go and carry them back to the dormitory.
I am Kirishima, the youngest of the Kongou-class fast battleships. I once bombarded Henderson Field and that battleship South Dakota. Searchlights... and Type 3 Shells? ... Aha, hahaha...
I-I never would've expected an attack from you... Well, this is embarrassing... *A-ahem*! Then, to return the favor... Commander, whenever you need a dance partner, I'll be yours.
I see your weakness!
Were you starting to feel lonely, Commander?
I'm right here, Commander. Face your partner square on if you're going to do that. Ahahah, look at you~ Now it's you who's embarrassed.
I'm Kirishima, the fast battleship! Now, Commander, there's a long road ahead of us, and we should walk down it together!
I wonder what'll become of me if these improvements continue...
When I use all my power, this is only natural.
It's after-school cannon time!
Commander, how about we go flower-viewing later after school?
Commander, enjoying school life is all fine and well, but we must not forget our duty... That said, what missions are waiting for us today?
I made some sweets for my classmates. Let's hand them out together later.
Commander, your necktie is crooked. Want me to straighten it out for you?
"Mailing" seems to have gotten pretty popular at school lately. Thanks to that, I've gotten pretty good at writing.
nil|Commander, if there's anything troubling you, you can always tell me.|I haven't picked a club to join yet... The Archery Club? That actually sounds pretty good... Huh? I'm "not suited for that"?
Commander, enjoying school life is all fine and well, but we must not forget our duty... That said, what missions are waiting for us today?
Seriously, you'll only ever find looks like this in fashion mags. It's an Eagle Union thing, according to Kongou...

Being in front of my sisters in this outfit is one thing, but it really is embarrassing to be wearing it in front of you, Commander. Um... ahem! What do you think? Since you're here, want to walk down to the beach together?
Geesh, just standing around in this outfit draws a ton of attention... Maybe I should just change back into my regular clothes...
C-Commander... awfully convenient timing there...

Hey, Commander, could you support me for a sec? ... Phew, it'll take some time to get used to these high heels.|A group photo? Sure thing. Hey, you suggested it, don't shy away from the camera. Okay, say "cheese!"|Need a break, Commander? All right, then let's head to Hiei's place and ask her to make us some tasty grub.
You think it looks good on me? ... Sounds more like you're just poking fun at me for your own amusement.
C-Commander, this outfit really bothers me... so could you p-p-please stop...

Being in front of my sisters in this outfit is one thing, but it really is embarrassing to be wearing it in front of you, Commander. Um... ahem! What do you think? Since you're here, want to walk down to the beach together?
Don't bring a knife to a gunfight! ...Well, don't bring a gun to a showdown between main batteries either~
"Commander, bad luck for you, but you're just going to become another notch on my blade." Haha, just kidding, it's a joke! So, what do you think? My New Year's attire is pretty snazzy, isn't it?
You like my new hairstyle? When'd you notice?
Glad you're back, Commander. How are you feeling? Want to come with me to the store? I heard there might be a year-end sale going on.
It's not like every day can be a holiday, so let's reap the rewards of our achievements!

South Dakota... is like a rampaging oni when she gets into a brawl... But, I won't lose out to her either~ |Ninja? Nah, I was just doing that because I thought it looked cool. We have actual ninjas in the fleet, and I wouldn't want to get on their bad side, y'know. |See, there's no issue with me showing my face here. After all, I'm with this commander here who is even more popular than me. Ahaha!
Naww, I'm not like Hyuuga and Ise. I won't ask you to spar with me. Hahaha!
Oho~? So, what are you going to do next? If you're all out of moves, then it's my turn to counterattack.
"Commander, bad luck for you, but you're just going to become another notch on my blade." Haha, just kidding, it's a joke! So, what do you think? My New Year's attire is pretty snazzy, isn't it?
Aren't you bored, sitting by the side and only watching? You can join me if you want. I've got spare brushes and paper.

The Lunar New Year is known for its hustle and bustle, but it's nice to just sit down with a brush and take in the smell of ink. Hey Commander, got any words you'd want to see rendered in calligraphy?
Oh, Commander! Great timing! I just finished my latest piece. Care to give it a look?

I think Hiei used to paint... I should ask her for some good drawing tips.|These ones I'm painting now are for my sisters. Do you wanna tag along with me when I hand them over later?|Dang, I'm almost out of ink... Do you reckon Akashi sells ink at her store?
Hmm... What should I paint next...
Would you knock it off? I can't paint like this! We'll have time later, so just have a cup of tea and be patient.
The Lunar New Year is known for its hustle and bustle, but it's nice to just sit down with a brush and take in the smell of ink. Hey Commander, got any words you want to see rendered in calligraphy?
To arms, comrades!
Neither fate nor evil can hamper our ambitions!
Kirov-Class cruiser—Kirov
A commission has been completed. We must head out and greet the returnees. Our comrades deserve recognition for their efforts.
It pains me to say, but I no longer consider you my comrade.
Never let but's or if's misguide you, Comrade Commander. You alone decide what is right and true.
Splendid, Comrade Commander. You've chosen a path of your own. Now follow it and see where it takes you!
I will always watch over you. Should you ever lose your way, I will be the hand that shoves you back on the right path. Only look ahead, never stop advancing!

To fight not just for your motherland but also for your soulmate, that is what love is... I understand it now. Passion is the fuel of my fighting spirit. And as long as I have you, nothing is impossible!
Well fought, Comrade Commander! Your valor warrants the front page spot in the port's newspaper!
voiceline.oath: One's individual leadership abilities are hardly as important as the will to stand side-by-side with one's comrades. In this regard, you have excelled without a doubt.

voiceline.line: No! I am far, far from finished!
Good to see you again, Comrade Commander! Let us once more set out to teach our enemy the meaning of unity and solidarity.
voiceline.oath: What's on the itinerary today? If there's anything that requires me to uplift the spirits of our comrades, I'm all in!

voiceline.line: Gah...! I cannot and will not succumb until our ambitions have been realized!
You have mail. Read it through at once. The more comrades, the better. Always.

The strong must always march onward. Holding the line is what the weak do.|Glory is what sustains and strengthens us, and is what will leave our mark on history.|I march onward in the name of a tomorrow where everyone is safe and smiling.
voiceline.extra: ...Having that said, it isn't inconceivable that war devolves into attrition. In such cases, we must be able to adapt to changes...|Let me tell you this— never underestimate the eyes and ears of the Northern Parliament!

voiceline.line: It is time to embark on a mission, Comrade Commander.
I knew you would pull through for us, Comrade Commander! Here are the rewards.

Salutations, Comrade Commander. I am Kirov. My appearance, rigging, and class are all unimportant in the greater scheme of our ambitions. What matters is that we work together to achieve a future of red glory.

Only a fool chooses between protecting either the world or their lover. There is but one correct answer: protecting them both. We have both the will and the means to do just that. Come, Comrade Commander, let us march onwards!
Hear me! I am Kirov!
Lead the way, Comrade Commander.
This is no time for this sort of depravity, Comrade Commander.
voiceline.oath: Hmm... I would like you to be a bit more mindful of the rules.

voiceline.line: I am the child of a union between our unprecedented country and a free spirit! Now, Comrade Commander, let us achieve great things together!
This strength will further our cause!
Our advance will stop for nothing and nobody!
We relax only so we can march even further. Do not get too comfortable now, Comrade Commander.
Comrade Commander, you've come at a good time. I've recently taken a liking to this blend of coffee. Want some as well? No need to be shy.
Here, taste my signature blend of coffee. It has a dash of vodka to keep you on your toes.
Don't be nervous. Make yourself at home and relax.

Hmm, I should find a way to improve my special blend somehow...|Drinking coffee in tandem with listening to music is the most effective way to combat drowsiness. Let us start with a song that kindles your fighting spirit!|The weather is splendid today. Perfect for some outdoor exercise. ...Change my outfit? All I need put on is a pair of shoes.
You want to talk about coffee? I know countless facts and trivia about it. Go on, ask me something.
Use your energy for more productive things, Comrade Commander.
Comrade Commander, you've come at a good time. I've recently taken a liking to this blend of coffee. Want some as well? No need to be shy.
Drop your weapons!
How should I punish these naughty fellas... What, I'm just having them help me out a little. How 'bout coming by to get some exercise as well, Commander?
Halt! You have nowhere left to run!! ...Well done, Comrade Commander, what a thrilling chase we had on our hands! What, you think I'm well-suited for this job? You tease too much, bahaha!
Comrade Commander, you've done well in leading our efforts. Our streets are much safer as a result.
Bystreye! Yet more enemies of the Revolution lurk in the shadows!

Wanna take this thing out for a spin, Comrade Commander? Oh, but not right now though. Gotta make some special adjustments first before you can ride it.|Tallinn, Kirov reporting. I'll be there shortly. Now, Comrade Commander, come with us.|Did Kronshtadt flank our mark already? She sure loves doing the flashy stuff...
Comrade Commander, a new mission has arrived. I'll let you decide when to start.
Come on, hold on tight! We're about to blow this joint!
Halt! You have nowhere left to run!! ...Well done, Comrade Commander, what a thrilling chase we had on our hands! What, you think I'm well-suited for this job? You tease too much, bahaha!
Keep your eyes on the greater goal! Do not let our comrades' sacrifices blind you with rage!
Planes... get away from me...!
I'm jealous of Mutsuki...
Mutsuki-class destroyer number two – Kisaragi.
The older girls have returned... They look so happy...
*Crying*... Commander is going to eat me...
Commander... you won't eat me, right...?
I... sank the fastest of all Mutsuki-class destroyers... I'm scared of strangers... but I also want to make new friends...
All the older girls in this fleet are so nice... You're nice to me too, Commander, so I like this place...
Can I stay here forever? If a big bad wolf or planes come here, will you protect me from them, Commander?
W-well done, Commander!
Eek! You scared me... I thought a wolf was coming...
*Sob*... I don't taste good...
Commander, you've got mail... Sounds nice...
Being alone with strangers... is so scary...|I wanna play with the other girls in the Thirtieth Destroyer Division...|Commander, I hope I haven't caused you any trouble by staying here...
Commander... W-we have new missions...
Commander, the rewards... I can't carry them...
I'm Kisaragi of the Mutsuki-class. I'm always with Mutsuki... I hate planes and Wake Island... I just want to be together with everyone...
I'm Kisaragi... I'll try my best, even if I'm not strong at all... Because... I love everyone...
Mutsuki, help me...
Eek! Commander... please don't touch me without warning...
Eek...! That feels... a little weird...
Com... man... der? Hi, I'm Kisaragi... Uh, umm, uh... I don't taste good, so please don't eat me...
Can I save everyone now...?
U-um, I'm sorry!
I'm... gonna do my best!
Uh... umm... Commander, is Kisaragi's new outfit... p-pretty? This year, um... Kisaragi wants to work real hard too!
Woah!! C-commander! Um, welcome yack!
I also... want to play with everyone else... |It's a new year... I've gotta try hard to make... um, make ten new friends! |Y-Yuudachi, can I also... join the snow fight?
Commander... let's have some snacks together?
Uh... umm... Commander, is Kisaragi's new outfit... p-pretty? This year, um... Kisaragi wants to work real hard too!
Everyone is really nice to me... Th-that makes me happy, but I can't depend on them forever... I think...
Kisaragi... retrofitting complete... I want to be able to help everyone out more...
I can give you a back massage, Commander!
Um, C-Commander... W-welcome back...
Mutsuki gave me this candy... Commander, w-would you like to have some...?|Commander, have I... gotten just a little braver...?|Commander, is there anything I can do to... help you...?
Eep! Commander...! Wh-what is it...?
Eek?! C-Commander, that's naughty...!
Kisaragi... retrofitting complete... I want to be able to help everyone out more...
The enemy’s movements... are clear as day! Everyone, follow me!
Those who lead upon the battlefield must also carry their own blade... Worry not, this one is not heavy at all.
Destroyer – Kitakaze.
The commission fleet must have returned with a lot of goodies. Commander, you should take a look.
Commander, if you continue to squander your talents, then one day...
Hmm, you’re curious about the little one...? Very well, perhaps I will give you a demonstration when I get the chance.
My sisters always give me lots of candy whenever they see me. I, I suppose I can share them with you, Commander...
I’m not... good with the dark. I, Kitakaze, shall slowly follow behind you!
*yawn*.... I am getting a bit sleepy... and the Commander probably won’t ignore that... Indeed, the Commander would probably carry me back to bed... My intuition is seldom wrong... Hehe...
Good work, Commander. Please leave the rest of the work to me. I shall not disappoint you.
It’s not wise to swim against the current... but we have no choice now!
Commander, you’ve come. I am currently training this little one. Indeed, I must teach it to stand like a general.
Impossible... h-how did I miscalculate...?
Let’s check the mail. I have a feeling that something good has happened...!

My Akizuki-class sisters have always taken good care of me. I, Kitakaze, swear to meet their expectations, and will work hard to protect everyone. |I prefer strategizing and leading from the rear over fighting in the frontlines... B-but I’m perfectly capable of fighting head on. |True power comes from the strength of one’s convictions. It would behoove you to not underestimate my abilities!
Shape up, Commander. You can’t afford to just leave these missions sitting there.
Effort is rewarded in kind. Given how hard you’ve worked, Commander, your rewards won’t be disappointing.

Lead ship of the Super Akizuki-class... That is I, Kitakaze. During the war, I was not able to display my prowess upon the battlefield, but it is not too late to do so here. Bear witness to my agility as well as the strengths of my armaments.

My mind is at peace whenever I am by your side, Commander... so can I always keep you company? Can we pinky swear on it then? My sisters told me... that this is enough to form a vow with a person of integrity.
My single strike shall seal your fate!
Being small has its advantages... Heheh. For example, don’t even try to hit me in a game of dodgeball!
Hmm... The responsibility of cleaning up your conduct weighs heavily upon me, but... please cease your crass behavior.
Indeed, the preparations are complete... Now that I, Kitakaze, shall be assisting you with your operational command, you can now sleep more soundly at night, Commander. Heheh!
Even after gaining power, I, Kitakaze, shall keep a clear head.
A single victory is nothing to be proud of. Let us prepare for the next battle.
All the preparations are now complete... Commander, let us sally forth and conquer these festival grounds! ...But before that, can we get something to eat first?
nil|nil|nil
I-I'm supposed to give orders?! ... Whuah?! C-come on, everyone!
Ugh... C-could you please not stare so much...?
Yuugumo-class destroyer number eight – Kiyonami.
The commission team just returned to port. Umm... I think we should go check on them...
Everyone's been saying the Commander is a mean person... Commander, is that really true...?
Why do I like to hide behind you...? Umm, that's because... I feel more comfortable with you leading the way, Commander...
Ugh... It's so scary at night... Commander, w-when it gets late, could you pretty please lead me to the dorm...?
I have many more fluffy friends than just Hoppy... Commander, would you like to come visit my House of Fluffs sometime later...?
I'm not scared of the dark or planes when I'm with you, Commander... W-would you mind if, from now on, I walked ahead of you, rather than behind you...?
Well done on the last sortie, Commander... W-would you like to pet Hoppy? I-it's really comforting to stroke his fluffy fur...
I-I'm not going to give up!
Welcome back, Commander... Come on, Hoppy, say hi to the Commander.
Ugh... S-stay away...!
Your mail has arrived! Let's take a look at it, Commander!

I feel safe around Yuugure. I enjoy playing and having sleepovers with her. I wish I had more friends like her...|Oh no, a-another air raid?! ... Commander, please don't scare me like that!|I'm always doing my best, trying to catch up to everyone... S-so please, don't ever leave me behind, okay...?
We still have quite a few missions to complete... Commander, can you do it...?
A mission... Yes, it seems a mission has been completed! You're quite the go-getter, Commander...

I'm Kiyonami, the eighth Yuugumo-class destroyer... I had improved anti-air capabilities, but neither Yuugure nor I could really deal with things in the air... Ugh... If only I'd done a better job back then... B-but even so, I did achieve a couple of things! Wh-what I'm getting at is that I'll do the best job I can...!

Will we really be able to be together forever from now on...? That's great...! N-now, I learned from Yuugure that... the next thing I should do is close my eyes and wait for you to do something, right? O-okay!
W-we will do this together, Hoppy!
Hoppy is cute, isn't he? Ehehe~ He's always there with me when I go to bed.
I-I'm not sure why you're doing this... B-but please stop, it tickles, Commander...!
Yuugumo-class destroyer Kiyonami, r-reporting for duty... And this is my friend, Hoppy... I-it's nice to meet you! ... Ugh...
Hoppy and I think we got a little stronger...
I-I got... first place? Y-you're... not just joking, right...?
I'm not sure what wrapping paper to use for my presents... Ummhh... Could you help me pick out a good one, Commander...?
S-sorry to keep you waiting... Yuugure and I picked out this outfit together. She said it "looked very Christmassy," but it doesn't look weird, right? ... Ugh...
Well done on the last sortie. W-would you like a snack? I have gingerbread cookies and Christmas cake...
M-Merry Christmas, Commander! Phew... I think I said that right!

I'm spending Christmas with Yuugure and some friends. D-do you want to be there with us too, Commander...?|I've gotten presents for everyone I know. Th-that includes you, of course, Commander!|All these warm lights at Christmas make me feel at ease... I wish it was Christmas all year round...
Sometimes... Hoppy is on his own, but we always go to bed together at night.
Y-you'll make my hood come undone... Ugh...
S-sorry to keep you waiting... Yuugure and I picked out this outfit together. She said it "looked very Christmassy," but it doesn't look weird, right? ... Ugh...
I'll show you the power of an intelligent super A.I.!
Oh, are you here to subscribe to my channel, Commander? Huh? Just here to check on me? Well, while you're here, it's a good idea to subscribe anyway! Right?
HAI DOMO! Kizuna AI here! Are you the commander I've heard rumors about? It's a pleasure to meet and work with you!
Oh, it looks like the commission team is back! I'm gonna go give them some welcome back kisses!
Fakkyu!
Since I'm here, I might as well shoot a video! Oh, good timing, Commander! Could you help me out with something?
Now we add sound effects, plus some subtitles... Wow, you're a fast learner, Commander. Keep at it and before long you'll be able to make even better videos!
What's the matter, Commander? You came up with a new project? Let's have a look... Whoah! This is great! I think you might be a genius!
I think I can create even better content working together with you! I'll probably be here for a while... so, how about making your YouTube debut with me?!
Nice work, Commander! When you have time, please help me record a video!
No, no, no, no! Akashi-chan, HEAL MEEEEEEE!
Oh, welcome back, Commander! I just uploaded a new video. Check it out while you're at sea!
That one didn't count! It's the next one that'll matter!
We've received mail! Maybe it's a work inquiry for me!

You're so cute, Laffey! Come here, my little contrarian, I wanna play! Let me give you a big hug!|Don't run away, Bulin! Hold on just a sec! I need just a tiny little Limit Break from you!|I have this job because I want to connect with people all over the world, but what got you into your job, Commander?
A new mission has appeared. I'll help you out, so let's get to it!
Our rewards are here! It's important to have capital, so let's accept it right away!

Hello! I'm Kizuna AI! I've somehow ended up in the world of Azur Lane, a game I've been streaming... But, like always, I'll do my best while following the VTuber mindset of "making a living doing what you like" here too!
With this, we've signed a contract! I can't even think of how life would be without you anymore. Please, support me now and forever and eveeeer!
Kizunaaaaa beeeaaam!
Commander, I won't say anything mean, so please stop trying to remove my headband. Not even I know what will happen to this place if you do!
I'm sorry to say, but it's not me you're touching, just the screen.
HAI DOMO! Kizuna AI here! Are you the commander I've heard rumors about? It's a pleasure to meet and work with you!
Installation complete! Combat plugins added! I've powered up!
Just let this intelligent super A.I. handle it, and everything will be a walk in the park!
The fireworks are just getting started! TA~ MAYA~!!
Yukatas are freakin' awesome! Even though I can't even feel the heat because I'm a hologram, I somehow feel breezier just by wearing this!
The clothes from the Sakura Empire are so stylish! Commander, since it's a rare occasion, let's go take a look around! Ah, of course, don't forget to run the reel~♪
I'd like to spend some more time at the festival, but it's about time for the commission fleet to return. Come on, let's head back!
Good work out there~! Want to head down to the Bon Festival with Izumo and the others once you catch your breath?
My yukata got all messed up!?
Jeez, Commander~! This isn't just "sorry I'm late" levels of tardiness anymore! If you showed up any later, I would've just left without you! Fine, let's head to the festival right away!

Ahhh~ those candied apples look so good! But, I don't think I'm able to eat... Huh? Wait, if I'm here, then maybe... Ah- Yuudachi-chan already ate them all!? |If I'm already wearing a Sakura-style outfit, I also should match it with a set of animal ears! Benson-chan, lend me yoooours~! |I have to admit though, it's really hard to move around in a yukata... That's right! Prinz-chan, teach me the secret to fighting in this outfit~!
Slowly stockpiling resources through missions is fine and all, but wouldn't it be better to open a stall at the festival and strike it rich? Let's talk it over with Akashi-chan!
Mission complete! Let's take these funds over to the festival and have a blast~!
If you think you can make a girl happy just by patting her head, you'd be wrong! Don't go around doing this stuff with everyone, got it?
The clothes from the Sakura Empire are so stylish! Commander, since it's a rare occasion, let's go take a look around! Ah, of course, don't forget to run the reel~♪
All units, battle formations!
The only value of war is the peace that follows it. I implore you to never forget this.
Kongou-class fast battleship number one – Kongou.
Phew... time to take a break. Commander, does black tea suit you?
You do not deserve victory!
Commander, please be at ease, for victory shall soon come.
Will Zuikaku be fine on her own...? Mm... I'll watch her from here. From this distance, she probably won't notice me...
I've heard that people are most likely to reveal their sentiments at twilight... I wonder if you're also like this?
That Hiei, trying to throw a party again tonight... Commander, do you have time to keep me company there?
Good work out there. Were you able to achieve your tactical goals?
Now is the time to make our comeback!
Have you had enough rest? The fleet now awaits your orders.
Please rest at ease. This situation can still be salvaged.
Adjust your strategies in accordance with the new information.

No way in hell a battleship like me is going to get taken out by some flimsy torpedo! |Come! Let's destroy our enemies, pass through that measly canal, and return to the land where I was born! |I take myself too seriously? No, you take yourself too lightly! |Horns? Oh, these things? They're just decorations on the hat. I wouldn't look much like a member of the Sakura Empire without them, right?
Do I need to go do it myself?
Excellent! We're one step closer towards our ultimate victory.
Nameship of the Fast Battleships, flagship of the 7th Combined Fleet, and the last Sakura capital ship to be laid down overseas - that is me, Kongou!
Since you've put so much effort into pursuing me so passionately, it is only fitting that I give you the proper respect. Come, you've earned my hand.
Press the attack!
Wh-what is it!? An emergency!?
Hey you, don't tell me you've been subjecting my sisters to such depravity as well!?
I am Kongou, lead ship of the Kongou-class battlecruisers. I shall illuminate the path that leads to victory!
Phew... another trump card to add to my hand.
To be victorious is to be elegant!
Such a tasteless rabble!
We must fully live in the present, whether during work or during leisure - this is my mantra. Commander, shall we go for an outing together?
Good work in your sorties today. If you're hungry, I don't mind splitting my dango with you.
Commander, are you well rested? There are still many hours to go.

Commander, a break is not a break if you're constantly thinking about work. Besides, don't you think it's rude to be so preoccupied when you're supposed to be spending time with me? |I'm used to always going out with my sisters, so to be able to spend time with you outside is rather novel for me. |Commander, when the weather gets a bit warmer, why don't we go enjoy the cherry blossoms with my sisters?
You're awestruck by my beauty? Hehe, something as obvious as that needs not even be said~
You... perhaps you're going to need a remedial course in basic etiquette.
We must fully live in the present, whether during work or during leisure - this is my mantra. Commander, shall we go for an outing together?
This operating system is the fruit of Akashi and the others' hard work. Would you like to try it out... Actually, I guess it's best if you don't. Hehehe.
"Celebrity Endorsement of the Port Medical Facilities"... Hehehe, you've made a wise decision picking me. Commander, I can leave the ad shoot to you, right?
Have you rested enough? Let's get back to work, as gracefully as always.

This syringe filled with Manjuu plushies is an advertising prop, but isn't it quite adorable? Hehe~♪|In a way, saving lives directly like this feels more fulfilling than fighting enemies on the battlefield.|Good work completing your duties, Commander. Would you like to get checked up? After all, I am a nurse right now. Hehe~♪
Oh? Would a different pose be better?
It seems like you need some more intense treatment, Commander...
"Celebrity Endorsement of the Port Medical Facilities"... Hehehe, you've made a wise decision picking me. Commander, I can leave the ad shoot to you, right?
I excel in both theory and practice!
Walking with you and taking in the scenery is quite pleasant, actually. Say, how about showing me that vantage point with an apparently exquisite view Hiei spoke of earlier?
It would be a shame to pass on this lovely weather, Commander. Why have a dull commute by train when you can enjoy a leisurely bicycle ride in the sunlight, hm? Heehee♪
It appears the commission team has returned. Shall we treat them to the tea I bought from the school canteen?

There is a number of school-related romantic things I hope to try at least once. For instance, walking home with my beloved, or making a lunch box and savouring it together... Oh, silly me, I've already done those! Heehee♪
Splendid work. I'd imagine Haruna went off to see her clubmates... As for me? I suppose I'm doing the same this very moment, my fellow going-straight-home clubmate.
Have you had a good rest, Commander? You've got a long day of school and office work ahead of you.

This outing has reaffirmed to me the reason why we fight – to restore peace to all the world.|Kirishima made this charm in her home economics class. It's quite well-made, don't you think?|It seems the manjuus fell asleep. Heehee, seeing their adorable at-rest faces somehow makes me think of my sisters.
The fruits of missions form the foundation of victory, as someone wise once said.
Oh, do I have a petal caught in my hair?
Excuse me, have you even considered how you're going to explain yourself to the Morals Committee?
It would be a shame to pass on this lovely weather, Commander. Why have a dull commute by train when you can enjoy a leisurely bicycle ride in the sunlight, hm? Heehee♪
Ah, the tailwind of victory. The very definition of envigorating, is it not?
Comrades! We march towards victory, heads held high!
My comrades should be contacting me soon. Let me open my– Huh? Don't move! ...Comrade?! Don't you know to knock before you enter? ...You already knocked? Oh. I see...
voiceline.oath: I just received a call from my comrades. It was all good news. I'll send you the important details later, Comrade.

voiceline.line: Project 69-class cruiser – Kronshtadt
So, the commission team has returned. Exactly when the report said they would.
If you hope to gain my trust, you're putting in quite a lackluster effort, Comrade.

So, I did some research into your past before coming here, Comrade... Oh, please. You can infer what I found based on the fact I'm conversing with you right now and addressing you with the word "Comrade."
One person can only do so much alone. I have my comrades to thank for having made it this far. Likewise, Comrade, if you need my assistance, I'm absolutely willing to give it.

I have no issue giving something greater than intel to those I consider as trustworthy as you, Comrade. But, by accepting it, you may be inviting danger into your life. Are you prepared for that, hmm?

Our relationship goes beyond mere "trust," as I'm sure you know, Comrade. So, ahem... Allow me to give you something purer, more intense, and unquestionably greater than my trust – my love! ...Wh-why are you laughing?!
voiceline.oath: Take this transceiver. It connects to a highly secure channel no one but you and me knows about. Use it whenever I'm not around and you need help, have something on your mind, want to go on a date, or just have a chat. I'll be there for you anytime, anywhere!

voiceline.line: Comrade, what are you... "Returning my efforts with intimacy?" I, I see... You've quite the straightforward methodology. I'll be doing the same the next time.
Huh?! ...Oh, it's just you. You put yourself in great danger by suddenly approaching me from behind. At least call out to me first... Don't be ridiculous! You didn't startle me!
voiceline.oath: Ah, Comrade? There's no reason to fear for your safety just over saying hello. By now I've grown used to you approaching me from behind. Ahahah!

voiceline.line: Do not panic! Focus! Focus!
Morning, Comrade. I always warmly welcome one who practices punctuality. Hmm? The workday hasn't begun yet?
voiceline.oath: Good to see you, Comrade. I've been waiting for you. Th-the reason I waited here was, uh... so nobody would spy on me. That's it.

voiceline.line: It's all my fault this happened! Dammit... I apologize for my poor judgment!
voiceline.oath: Dammit, I must've gone overboard...

voiceline.line: You have a new message. Read it, and I'll dispose of the letter aftewards, if it's of a confidential nature. I'll ensure there's no trace left of it.

I left a note on your desk with a summary of all of today's tasks, Comrade. What? You can't read my handwriting? Fine, then I'll read it out for you. Let's see... This says...|Who am I making such frequent calls to, you ask? Be patient – you'll learn in due time.|I never repeat something I've explained before. The more information is repeated, the greater the risk of leaks... Hmm? You didn't catch that? Okay, as I was saying...|Strange... My transceiver isn't working. How am I supposed to contact my comrades now? Screw it, brute force it is... Gah! It burst into smoke!|What's essential during stealth missions is that you leave no trace. What this means is: before you go in, cannons booming, you should first create an even bigger boom to distract from– Huh? That's not how you do it?
voiceline.extra: You struggle to read my handwriting? Well, if even you can't parse it, that means it's a well-encrypted message. Ahahahah!|Thanks, Rossiya. I'll put this screw back where it... Wait, where did you find this?|My peers? Hmh, it pains me to admit, but this port is home to a number of people one cut above me when it comes to espionage.

voiceline.line: I've compiled a list of all available missions. Strike them through one by one as you complete them, Comrade.
voiceline.oath: I've compiled all the pertinent mission info. Get out there and knock them out of the park!

voiceline.line: Your efficiency in completing missions is quite admirable, Comrade... Goodness, you completed another just as I said that!
voiceline.oath: Mission complete. It delights me to see you giving it your all.

voiceline.line: I'm Kronshtadt of the Project 69 cruiser designation. Bravery alone does not win battles – gathering intel while denying your enemy it does. And, just as your fleet's power is not to be underestimated, neither is mine. Understood?
Oaths and ceremonies? I've no need for such grand wastes of time. We have but one thing to do once you've slid on this ring. Close your eyes, Comrade, and forever memorize what I am about to do!
I've found your weakness!
If you need my assistance, just come forth and ask for it, Comrade.
I will not tolerate you – or anyone else – mistreating me... Stop that, right now!
voiceline.oath: Y-your boldness is a league above even mine...

voiceline.line: I'm Kronshtadt, Northern Parliament cruiser. Firepower isn't my only merit – I have many more than that. I'm sure you'll discover them for yourself as we clash with our enemies, Comrade.
Who could pass on more firepower, am I right?
Hahah! Victory is determined not by random chance, but by a cascade of certainties.
voiceline.oath: Our victory wasn't a stroke of luck – it was a certainty, thanks to Comrade Commander.

voiceline.line: They've taken Manjuu hostages? God dammit, then we've no other choice... Squad, prepare to storm the building!
Listen up, assholes! We have you surrounded! I'm Kronshtadt, squad leader of the Northern Parliament Special Forces! You have only one option: come out with your hands in the air and surrender!
The perimeter has been secured, Comrade. Should I brief you on the situation, or do you want to see for yourself?

What's wrong with using indiscreet methods as means to an end? I quite like how much simpler this job is than information warfare.|It was a smart move to set up a barricade. This way, Kirov's squad can catch any suspects that try to flee the scene.|Copy that... Arkhangelsk is on the move. It won't be long before this is over.
You turn the megaphone on with this button. Want to try it, Comrade?
Well, well. Time to test how sturdy these handcuffs are... by trying them on you. Heehee...
Listen up, assholes! We have you surrounded! I'm Kronshtadt, squad leader of the Northern Parliament Special Forces! You have only one option: come out with your hands in the air and surrender!
Arrest the suspects! Move!
Enemies spotted! Guess we're rollin' up our sleeves and squarin' off!
Yo, Commander! Hang out with me, now! Oh, is that a lollipop for me? 'Kay, some other time then! Nom!
Mogami-class heavy cruiser number four – Kumano.
Commission team's back, yo. Don't got time for rhymes, but let's go!
You're lame, you know that? Not tryin' to be mean, or anything, just saying. Listen, I've got a couple ideas for how to unlamify you.
Commandeeeeer, I'm boooored, let's do somethiiiing. Yeah, it's candy, so what? Not like I'll turn into a lardo from a single– Hey, oww!
Commandeeeer, I'm lonelyyyy. We can do whatever, just hang out with meeee. "Find someone else?" Wow, rude much? I wanna hang with you! C'mooon!
You'll finally hang with me? Hell yeah! Wish you would've just said so from the beginning! Anyway, where we goin'? Y'know, just the two of us~♡
Y-you really like me?! Really, huh... Thing is, I actually love you, Commander... Seriously, though! I do!
You gonna review that last battle? Aight, cool, go ahead. Wait, I'm the one who's gotta do it?
I'll return to port if it's the last thing I do!
There you are, Commander! Nice, nice! So, what's up today? We hangin' out together? Just work? Figures...
Payback's-a comin', ya hear?!
You've got a new DM– Err, I mean, new mail! And don't go ghosting whoever sent it!

Huh? Me takin' the battle seriously surprised you? Well, yeah, I get serious when the situation demands it.|So, Commander, what kinda girls do ya like? Wait, lemme guess, I'm your type, aren't I? Ahah!|Soooo bored... Hey, could ya get Suzuya up in this place? I wanna chat with her about my next shopping trip.
Ugh, missions? You're probs better off hittin' up Suzuya...
Sooo tireeed... Oh, crap! Hey, unclaimed mission rewards! C'mon, man!

Name's Kumano, Mogami-class heavy cruiser! Back in the war, I was Cruiser Division 7, workin' my ass off! Shame about what happened at the island in you-know-where, though... Welp, no point crying over spilt milk. Just gotta do better this time.

Uhh, "I take you, to have and to hold, from this day forward"... How'd the rest go? Agh, screw it, it's too long and I'm makin' a fool of myself in front of everyone! You don't mind if we bail and go straight to our room, right, darling?
It's ass-whoopin' time!
Well, well! Caught you admirin', Commander! Hehehe, you don't gotta act innocent. If you wanna stare, stare all ya want!
Weeeell, someone's feeling frisky, huh? Totes fine with me. Go on, touch me 'till you're content~♡
Bam! Heavy cruiser, Kumano, ready for action~! Commander, pleased to meetcha~!
Sweet! This'll get me more time in the limelight, yeah?
MVP, baybee! Hell yeah! Give it up for Kumano!
This is too revealing? Meh, not really~? I've seen submarines wearing more risqué stuff than this.
It's time for Kumano's sexy swimsuit debut~! Just kidding~☆ Hey Commander, just where~ are~ you~ staring~? Ahaha~♡
Yo, Commandeeer, how'd ya like my bikini? Come closer if ya need a better look~ Yeah, you bet I'm tryin' to hit on you.

Commandeeeer, what're you up to? Get over here already, c'mooon!|I wanna see Mogami in a bikini! Don't you? I do, at least! And you? Same, right?|Phew, I'm tired! Commandeeeer, massage my feet and shoulders! ...Err, I didn't ask you to massage THOSE!
Candy? Nuh-uh, this is mine, and I ain't givin' it away! Hahahah!
Hah, I knew this would catch your eye! You're like a little kid~
It's time for Kumano's sexy swimsuit debut~! Just kidding~☆ Hey Commander, just where~ are~ you~ staring~? Ahaha~♡
Now I'm PISSED! I'm gonna beat the crap outta you!
Aw, for real?! You lucked out and chose the best possible card! Hrmm... Hang on, are you cheating, Commander? You ALWAYS pick out the good cards!
Now it's your turn, Commander! Which one's it gonna be~? You suuuure you wanna pick this card? ...I hear you, Suzuya! Stop tellin' the Commander what the cards are!
Ahah~ Back where we left off, Commander! So, which card are you gonna pick?
Psst, Suzuya! Commander's here! Hahah! Let's see you try to beat me this time, man!
Hungry, Suzuya? Wanna order home delivery?|Whatcha lookin' at, Commander? You more interested in me than the cards, or what?|Taking your sweet time, huh. Mmh... Meh... *yaaawn*...
Ahah! Is that your final answer?
You jelly, Suzuya? 'Cause you sure look it! Haha~
Now it's your turn, Commander! Which one's it gonna be~? You suuuure you wanna pick this card? ...I hear you, Suzuya! Stop tellin' the Commander what the cards are!
Naught but death awaits those who oppose my master.
Your Grace... Please don't stare at me so...
Kagerou-class destroyer number three – Kuroshio.
Your Grace, the fleet you dispatched on commission has returned as scheduled.
... Your orders?
A true ninja has no need of emotion. She needs only her master's will to execute.
While I struggle with Your Grace's concepts of "communication" and "games," still... I... can't say I dislike them.
Your Grace, I beg your pardon. Recently I find myself distracted from the mission, thinking again and again about Your Grace's "communication." Please, you must punish me...

So this is an "emotion"... before such things I had no problem keeping a clear head, but even now it seems not so wicked... Yes, this "emotion" drives a powerful need to stand by Your Grace's side, and it grows ever stronger.
Your Grace, are you tired? Is there any way I can be of assistance to you?
Your Grace, welcome home.
Your Grace, it is time to retreat. I will cover your withdrawal.
Your Grace, a letter has arrived.

Hm...? Your Grace? Did you want me to say something?|I am not sure what to say... But I would be happy to listen to anything Your Grace wishes to impart.|The flower in my hair? It was a gift from Oyashio. Oyashio, she's... very colorful.
Your Grace, a new mission has been issued.
Your Grace, mission rewards have been issued. Inspect them at your leisure.

Third ship of the Kagerou-class, Kuroshio. As part of the 2nd Fleet and Destroyer Division 15, I joined in the Battle of the Java Sea, operations in the South Pacific, the Third Battle of the Solomon Islands, and other engagements until I was sunk during a transport mission. ... I will not let that happen again. I will commit all of my resources to ensure that I am of service to Your Grace.

I once thought that absolute devotion to the mission was all there was to being a ninja, but I have learned so much from you, Commander... I, Kuroshio, from this point forward, am no longer your shadow alone, Commander, I am now your partner. And we will stand together until the end of our days.
Secret Technique - Heavenly Purification!
Kuroshio, awaiting orders.
As this body belongs to Your Grace, please do with it as you will... Nnng... Aaaah...
Third ship of the Kagerou-class, Kuroshio reporting in... I am here to carry out my master's will.
I stand ready to execute your will.
I am Your Grace's shadow. I have no need of glory or acclaim.
Enemy fleet spotted! Prepare torpedoes!
Commander, what kind of data are you looking for?
Königsberg-class light cruiser, Köln.
Your fleet has returned from their commission. Should I join you for the inspection?
Workplace harassment is a crime, Commander...
Is there anything that I can help with? Please let me know.
I'm so glad that you are an approachable superior. I can't really handle short-tempered people.
To... to prevent you from harassing my sisters... I-I will... (blushes)
