J-jeez... Am I really the only one who can rein you in, Commander? Just let me handle all your affairs, private or public. Wh-what? I'm not trying to make you my property!
Good work, Commander. The next thing on the agenda is...
Welcome back, Commander. Here is today's schedule. Please look it over.
Ugh... I failed again. P-please don't dismantle me...
There's new mail for you, Commander. Please take a look.

Ah... We went over budget again this month...|Königsberg, stop teasing the Commander! Be careful or you might just awaken some weird fetish of his...|Karlsruhe, Commander is very busy right now. Can't you stop bothering him and just play by yourself?
New missions have been posted. Shall I add them to today's schedule?
Mission complete! Shall I take an inventory of the rewards?

I'm the third ship of the Königsberg-class light cruisers, Köln. Our slender bodies are something that we're all very proud of.
I once circumnavigated the world, and participated in operations in the Baltic Sea and North Sea. You can count on me for any type of operations, defense or assault!
With this... I can get much closer to Commander! A-ahem... it's nothing! Thank you, Commander, I won't let you down.
Yes, the time is now!
Eh? New instructions, Commander?
Commander... You realize that harrassing one's subordinates is despicable, right?
You seem like a wise Commander. I'm Köln. Please rest assured and let me take care of your work.
Commander, you're a very kind person... for taking care of your subordinates.
Phew... This performance... should be acceptable?
Data aside, if there's anything else you'd like to know, please don't hesitate to ask.
Hmm... I feel like I can work even more efficiently than before. Commander, please rest assured, I will never betray your expectations.
Today's task list. I've taken the liberty of sorting them in order of priority. Please review them.

Detailed planning ensured the efficient completion of one's work. Commander, next on the list is――|Such desk work demands a quiet and peaceful atmosphere. Well, I suppose that means I should hope my sisters don't come barging in...|Commander, what would you say to coming by the Tactical Classroom to observe some lessons in your free time?
Don't you have more important things to be doing than staring at me or chatting with me?
...From time to time, one should consider the rumors spreading around the port about oneself, Commander...
Hmm... I feel like I can work even more efficiently than before. Commander, please rest assured, I will never betray your expectations.
It's time to see what we learned from our training... and make our enemies tremble before us!
Remember, it’s unwise to place too much faith into the numbers.
Königsberg class light cruiser, Königsberg.
The girls have returned from commissions. Please welcome them back in a timely manner.
Alright, time for me to punish you.
Hey! What were you trying to do? Don't be shy... just tell me.
And I thought you were a good child, Commander... I guess you can still be trained... Hehe...
Hmm? I do you like you very much, in many different ways... I'm going to teach you all kinds of things from now on... Hehe...
To train someone, the trainer must also give the trainee some love, otherwise... Yes, Commander, I love you. Come, let's continue. What should we try next?
Good work, Commander. Let’s quickly review the previous battle.
Now then, let us begin today’s training.
Tsk... Do we still not have enough anti-air?
Remember to read new mail as soon as possible. It’s rude to make people wait.

Making an expression like that... are you after some of big sister’s rough affection?|You should never ask about a woman’s age, Commander.|Whipping doesn’t actually hurt that much once you’re used to it. Want to give it a go?
Let's see what mission is up next.
Oh? Mission complete? Well done, Commander. Don't forget to collect your rewards!

I'm the first ship of the Königsberg-class light cruisers, Königsberg. I began serving in the Iron Blood Navy a long time ago.
I've participated in far more training and transporting missions than actual combat, so feel free to refer to me as your teacher. Understood?
Commander, you’re the best! The best what? Pet? Companion? Or maybe... lover~?
Hmm, do you want some lessons from me too?
Oh? You seem fairly energetic today. Let's do some more training.
Oh my? That’s not how you do it. Should I teach you the proper way to touch a girl?
So you’re the commander? You have such a cute face! Hehe... let big sister take "good care" of you from now on~
I think I get the hang of it! Commander, come with me for a second!
Hmph, so that’s all they amounted to.
Keep it together, me! I can pull through with just my own powers...!
This book lists hundreds upon hundreds of powerful spells... In my imagination, that is. It's just a regular old book of fairy-tales. No, really, that's all.
Le Hardi-class destroyer – L'Opiniâtre.
Our commission teams sure make magic happen.
I wonder if there's a chant that'll turn you invisible...
Do you believe in magic, Commander?
Watch this coin closely, Commander. Left... right... left... right... Yes, you're feeling veeery sleepy... Oh. I suppose my hypnosis didn't quite work on you...
Please give me your hand, Commander. Okay, now put it over mine, like this... Wait, why isn't this working? The book said I'd be able to see into your mind if I do this...
You know, I always get so worked-up and feel my heart race just by being near you, Commander... Have you cast a sort of spell on me?
voiceline.oath: Now that I think about it, whenever I'm around you, Commander, my heart always feels fluttery and I can't calm down... Wait, could this be... the Magic of Love?!

voiceline.line: Well done, Commander. Would you like a soft drink, rather than a spell, to reinvigorate with?
I refuse to admit defeat so soon! B-but how am I going to win?!
I knew you'd be back right about now, Commander. Hm? Oh, well... I made that prediction based on your day-to-day activity.
If only I had a spell that could protect us all...!
I present to you this mail brought by hand; no levitation spell used. Here you go.

Let me tell you... Miss Dunkerque's sweets are truly magical.|Poke. Hm? Oh, don't mind me. I just got a sudden urge to poke you with my wand. Pokey-poke.|If someone told you they'd grant you one wish, what would you ask for, Commander?
Do I have a spell that automatically completes missions...? Sadly, I don't. Please do your best, Commander~
I wonder if there's a way to increase our mission rewards...

I saw many things during the war, though my construction never finished. But now I get to lead a new life as a part of this fleet... This is a gift from the magic realm... or rather, a gift from destiny.
I had never even dreamed of partaking in a ceremony as sacred as this... Commander, I promise to treasure this feeling and remain beside you, forever and ever.
Attaque!
Feeling tired, Commander? Then would you like me to cast an awakening "spell" over your head with my wand?
Please stay where you are. I must go look for a spell that'll turn you into a rabbit.
I'm the destroyer L'Opiniâtre, a so-called "magician" from Iris Libre. It's a pleasure meeting you. Umm, actually, please forget the "magician" part.
It would be nice to have a spell that does my training on my behalf.
Hm? We won? I'm happy to know that my efforts led to this victory.
It is undignified to stare so much at a maiden's swimsuit. B-besides, it's really embarrassing...
It is said that the summertime sea holds an extraordinary enchantment over people... but the only supernatural thing I'm feeling is this accursed heat... Am I missing something?
Everyone was saying how they wanted to head to the beach because of how hot it is, but it doesn't seem any cooler out here... Ugh...
Jeez, how'd my glasses end up in the sand... Um, where's my handkerchief... ah, there it is! Oh, Commander, when did you get here?

If only there was a spell to make it cool down... maybe something to blot out the sun? Hehe, just kidding. A cold drink will suffice. Commander, what would you like? |The sheer number of people gathered here... is this the mystical allure of the summertime beach? |Commander, have you seen Temeraire? ...She's playing beach volleyball with the others? Hehe, I see she's as full of energy as ever.
Commander... you didn't get heatstroke, did you?
Do you want to be turned into a starfish?
It is said that the summertime sea holds an extraordinary enchantment over people... but the only supernatural thing I'm feeling is this accursed heat... Am I missing something?
I'm lookin' for a fun time... Gimme one!
You lookin' to have some fun? You mean with me, or my weapon?
voiceline.oath: You wanna know about "that" work? How do I say this... Let's just call it the "Inquisition?" What it means is... Hmm, I really can't tell you after all~♪

voiceline.line: La Galissonnière-class light cruiser – La Galissonnière.
Commission team's back, eh? Cool, then I'll go say hi since I've got nothing better to do.
If you wanna quit being a commander, I could refer you to a decent new job.
Lookin' to be a boring day like any other...
I've got some of Dunkerque's handmade mousse cake! Here, have a slice. Nah, nah, don't thank me, thank the girl who made it!
Sure, we ships fire our guns and torpedoes all day, but it's fun to just have a chat about weapons now and then. Hit me up for that sometime, Commander! You seem like a cool person!
My opinion on you? Hmm, to tell you the truth, I kinda like you. You wanna hang out and do something fun sometime? I mean, we already have fun every day, but still!
Sorry, nobody's permitted to enter the office while the Commander is out... Oh, hey, Commander! Obviously you can come on in!
voiceline.oath: There's not too much of "that" kind of work to do at this port, huh... Well, as long as the Iris girls are safe and sound here, then I can have fun without worrying about anything! Hehehe!

voiceline.line: Hell yeah! More of that! This is getting fun!
Finally! You're back! I thought I was gonna rust up from boredom while you were gone. Gimme a task, any task, and I'll do it.
voiceline.oath: What are we doing today? Why don't you gimme something to do before I turn to rust?

voiceline.line: Oops, I've been beaten... Just let me fight another time!
Here, letter for you. Better read it now, 'cause it's not my problem if you lose it.

Just sitting in the office, boooored out of my mind while the Commander goes ham on a ton of paperwork. *siiigh*...|If the goal's to beat the enemy, then what's wrong with me bashing them with my rigging? I swear, you fuss over the strangest stuff, Commander.|Can't say I'm keen on planning stuff... It's like, you make a plan, but it always changes, y'know?
voiceline.oath: nil|♪～Hey Commander, can you help me check if I sharpened this enough? I'm always afraid that I missed a spot or something...|Gotta say, I still prefer working under Jean Bart rather than Algérie. Y'know, it's that whole "don't worry about anything other than slaughtering your enemies" kind of feeling...

voiceline.line: These missions are a pain? Well, sorry to hear that? I can't exactly do 'em for you, y'know.
You finished a mission? Cool, that's quicker than I expected. Maybe I underestimated you, Commander.

I was assigned to Vichya's "High Seas Force" back during the war, I think? Don't think I ever set sail though, due to fuel shortages... Y'know what? You're probably gonna get a quicker rundown if you just ask Dunkerque.
You're just the kind of person I love, Commander! Hahahah! From now on, if anyone tries to mess with you, I'm gonna deal with 'em!
Disappear!
Touch me all you want! As long as you don't mind getting hurt.
Listen, unlike a certain someone from the Templar Knights, "dirty work" is my specialty... Wanna know more?
voiceline.oath: Hm? Hmmmmm? ...Mmm... Well, whatever~♪

voiceline.line: Vichya, Sardegna, Iron Blood... and now this place? Ah well, doesn't matter to me 'long as I get to have a good time. Anyway, I'm La Galissonnière from the Vichya Dominion. Nice meetin' you!
Makes me look back on my days in Brest...
Ahaha! Now that was a lot of fun!
I'll throw the swim ring at you if you get close to drowning. Relax, knowin' you, I'm sure you'll catch it!
Summertime means pool time! Oh, hey, Commander. What are you waiting for? Come over and let's have fun!
Could you throw me that ball, Commander? Merci~
I'm not gonna swim all day, so I'll just skip the warm-ups. Should be no biggie!

We don't really NEED to swim just 'cause we've got a pool, do we? Nothing wrong with just dipping our toes, you know.|Over here, Commander! Ka-splash! Ahahahah! Feelin' refreshed now?|Hmm... Feels a little weird, not having my hands full with something...
Whoa there, trying to startle me? Sadly for you, I saw that coming from miles away~
Ahahah. So you wanna practice holding your breath, is that it, Commander?
Summertime means pool time! Oh, hey, Commander. What are you waiting for? Come over and let's have fun!
I dig the design of this Dragon Empery outfit. Uh, that's NOT an invitation for you to ogle me all you want, okay?
Happy New Year, again! So, you wanna try sharing this "cross-cupped wine?" What, it's not a drinking game? Welp, I guess I've still got a whole ton to learn about the Dragon Empery's customs~
You can feel the festival spirit everywhere you look! Isn't that nice?
You're leaving me out in the dust here, Commander! I'll die from sheer boredom if you won't hang out with me!

Got any red envelopes for me, Commander? Talk about lame, there's just money inside... I expected something that's like, more novel, and now I'm disappointed!|Get together with the extended family over New Year's, hang up fai chun decorations, aaand... what's left? Courtesy calls? Take me along, Commander! I won't embarrass you, pinky promise!|I know! Let's meet up and do festive stuff with Dunkerque!
What's up? You thinkin' about finally introducing me to your family?
Watch it, or you'll make it come off!
Happy New Year, again! So, you wanna try sharing this "cross-cupped wine?" What, it's not a drinking game? Welp, I guess I've still got a whole ton to learn about the Dragon Empery's customs~

skins.name: Black Cat of All Hallows' Eve

voiceline.line: Sure are a lot of cat lovers around here. Algérie, Richelieu... Are you one too, Commander?
If you ignore me, I'll use my black cat magic to turn you into a pumpkin! Is that Halloweeny enough? Ahahaha! I'm just messing! C'mon, let's go do somethin' fun tonight, Commander!
Trick or treat! ...Only kids go trick-or-treating? Who cares! Shut up and gimme candy!
You're back? Thought up a good spooky trick yet?

Uhh, Commander? If you're just gonna sit around, then I'll find someone else to hang out with.|Let's see what candy we're giving out! Hmm... You mind settin' this, this, and some of this aside just for me?|Putting on a costume and scaring people sounds pretty fun... So that's what Halloween's all about, huh? Makes my costume choice seem kinda out-of-place though...
Am I supposed to go "meeoow?"
This lingerie won't stop me from gettin' my hands dirty if I need to, y'know.
If you ignore me, I'll use my black cat magic to turn you into a pumpkin! Is that Halloweeny enough? Ahahaha! I'm just messing! C'mon, let's go do somethin' fun tonight, Commander!
Deactivating self-imposed limiter...
Will you still come see me even if I grow out of this body?
Benson-class destroyer - Laffey, Hull Number DD-459!
I was actually wondering whether you'd remember it or not, but a commission has been completed, Commander.
Zzzzzzz...
*Yawns* Commander, want to take a nap with me?
I thought you were a bit boring at first, Commander... But now that I've been thinking about it, I'm not really motivated about anything other than fighting, so we might be a decent match...
I'm used to being alone... But I think I like it better when you're with me, Commander... Mmm... Zzzzzz...
I've been thinking... If you'd been there back then, I might have been able to take down Hiei... But if she comes after you now, then this time I won't let her go...
Mmh... Stop shaking me, Commander...
I've returned from the mission. Regrouping with original unit.
This isn't good enough... I used to be much better...
Did you have a good rest, Commander? I'm full of energy. Probably.
Mmm... We lost... They weren't so easy were they?
Commander, your mail...

Commander, don't you think we should plant some flowers?|Since you're ignoring me, I might as well... *yawns*... get some sleep.|Yes? This is what I look like when I'm happy.|I'm not trying to make you pay attention to me. Nope, not at all...|I'm not trying to get you to play with me. Nope, probably not...|Commander... am I... scary?
Looks like we've still got a few missions to do...
Mhm, we got some rewards.
I'm the much anticipated Benson-class destroyer, Laffey, who performed excellently during the Third Battle of the Solomon Sea. Battleship? What's that?
I thought I wouldn't mind becoming a demon again if it was for you, Commander… But since you've taken such good care of me, I guess my chance for that is gone… Have I disappointed you, Commander?
Condition: green... Let's go.
Are you tired, Commander?
Are you... a pervert, Commander...?
Benson-class destroyer, Laffey, awaiting your orders... Commander, these ears aren't real... you don't need to stare at them...
Mm... Back to sleep for me...
Mm... That was okay.
It's hard to move around...
Don't drag me around... I'm tired after my walk with the dog, Commander...
Mmph... The waistline is too high... and a little too tight... The sleeves are too breezy cause they're so big... It's not like I wanted to change clothes, but... what do you think, Commander?
I look cute in it? Then I guess... I'll keep it on a little longer.
Want a candied apple, Commander? I got it from Ayanami. Here.|I hope... I'll have lots of good naps... this whole year.|Commander, my friends are calling for me... so I'm gonna go play with them.
Winter... makes me so sleepy...
Commander, you pervert...
Mmph... The waistline is too high... and a little too tight... The sleeves are too breezy cause they're so big... It's not like I wanted to change clothes, but... what do you think, Commander?
New Year... and Lunar New Year... are different? I don't really get it... Although, any day with good food and lots of sleep... is a good day. Mhm.
"Have a happy New Year. Let's pray for everyone's good luck"... Is that enough...? *Yawn*, I'm tired... Can I go home now and take a nap...?
You know the crackles and pops firecrackers make after you light the fuse... *Ughh*... Those are so noisy...
The Commander's still not back. I might just fall asleep here... Zzzzz...

I'm wearing limited-edition Lunar New Year bunny ears and bunny slippers... do you like them? I like them.|I think Zed is interested in old Lunar New Year folklore...|Sitting on top of this tree makes me feel like I'm going to blossom, too...
I totally don't feel like leaning against your shoulder, Commander. Nope, not at all...
Commander, are you having weird thoughts again...?
"Have a happy New Year. Let's pray for everyone's good luck"... Is that enough...? *Yawn*, I'm tired... Can I go home now and take a nap...?
So like, I go like this? And then I say the line? Uh... "such biiig thankieees~, siiir~" was that it? Feels like Javelin's shtick.
I'm done changing... how is it? Today, I’m supposed to call you "valued guest?" Um... I don’t really get it...
Turns out working sucks way more than I ever imagined, but... seeing the Commander's face in a whole new light like this... makes me happy.
*Snore....* huh? There's a customer? Ok...
Welcome, Comma– valued guest. That was close. Almost messed it up....

I fell asleep and Z23 yelled at me... Z23 sucks...|This job is really hard... but spending time with everyone isn't so bad...|I'm working so hard, there's no way I can fail... but I am kinda sleepy. What should I do...?
Smile? ...like this? I don't get it...
Commander, are you a perverted customer?
I'm done changing... how is it? Today, I’m supposed to call you "valued guest?" Um... I don’t really get it...
Commander, being able to have a picnic with you and the others makes Laffey very happy... Seeing everyone getting along well also makes Laffey very happy...
Commander, ahhn... Umm, Commander, Laffey does not need to be fed... Rather, Laffey should be the one feeding you...
Commander, do you like Laffey's bunny ears?
Commander, what's your favorite snack? Laffey is fine with anything...
...Laffey might have overeaten.

We packed too many lunchboxes... Commander, help us finish them. |The bunny from the Northern Parliament gave this drink to me. She said it's best enjoyed loudly. *hic* |The sun's nice and warm... and it's making me sleepy... Commander, let's take a nap together... |Yuudachi has been going around eating all the meat... Ayanami, watch out... |Commander, poke poke... Food coma...?
Commander, no grabbing food with your hands...
Commander, ahhn... Umm, Commander, Laffey does not need to be fed... Rather, Laffey should be the one feeding you...
*glug* *glug*... Victory deserves an Oxy-Cola, phew...
Benson was also there when Javelin asked me to become an idol... When I saw the glint in her eye, I knew things weren't going to end well...

"Laffey came from Planet Bunny..." Umm, I forgot that line Benson told me to say... In any case, everyone, please give me lots of support... Actually, just a little support is fine... Uhh, I have to do it again with more motivation?
I feel like I'm supposed to be doing something right now... but I can't remember what. Commander, want to take a nap with me?
*Yawn*... Another day of idol activities...
Nnh... Can't get motivated after all all...

All these lessons and rehearsals... What a pain... Can I just put on a show where I sleep while standing up? |Even though Benson said that Laffey would do the entire Planet Bunny proud by becoming an idol, it honestly sounds like a pain in the bun. However, the outfit she made for me is really cute... so maybe I can put in some effort for her sake. |I'm done with today's lessons... they were unexpectedly fun. |...I think I got some fanmail? Mm, it makes me a little happy..
Commander, Laffey seems to be getting better at singing, because I can stand still now...

"Laffey came from Planet Bunny..." Umm, I forgot that line Benson told me to say... In any case, everyone, please give me lots of support... Actually, just a little support is fine... Uhh, I have to do it again with more motivation?
Laffey... has reached her limit. A short break is needed... Zzzzz...
Yaaawn... Laffey's cleaning her room, Commander... If you don't wanna help then just find a place to sit... Anyway, back to cleaning... Zzz...
Laffey is tired... and will now lie down...
Zzzzz... Commander, why are you here...?

Commander, poke poke. Let's hurry up and finish work... Laffey won't sleep either...|Laffey likes how comfy this pillow is. Mm, bring it over here...|Nap Club? ...Laffey often takes naps with Nicholas, but... I don't think we're a club...
You lech... How about you do the cleaning?
Yaaawn... Laffey's cleaning her room, Commander... If you don't wanna help then just find a place to sit... Anyway, back to cleaning... Zzz...
It's only because of everyone's hard work... Zzzzz...
Defeat the enemy, and then go back to sleep...
Commander... you love me for who I am inside, not my body? Laffey doesn't understand the complicated stuff, but that means you'll always stay with me?
Laffey seems to have changed a bit... Commander, do you like how Laffey is now?.
Commander... let's go welcome back the commission team together.
Laffey feels very happy when she is at your side, Commander. So, can you always stay with Laffey?
Commander, do you like Laffey's bunny ears?
Commander, Laffey will become stronger for your sake. That is why more sleep is required... zzz...
As long as Commander is waiting for me, I will not fall.
Laffey has not been waiting for Commander to come back this entire time... Nnh, probably.
Sorry... for making you worry...
Commander, Laffey wants to see what's in those letters. You don't mind, right?

Mm... Laffey is getting sleepy. Commander's lap feels nice, so I'll sleep here... |Laffey gets a disease that makes her fall asleep when she's not with Commander. I'm not lying, it's true... |Even if Commander is staring at another girl, Laffey won't get upset at all. Mm, I really won't. Get. Upset. At. All. |Commander, if you pamper Laffey so much, she will turn into a Yayanami. |No matter how tough things get, Laffey will always return to Commander's side... Because we made a vow...
Mission complete. For the reward, Laffey wants... a hug from Commander.
Commander, did you also contract the disease that makes you fall asleep if you leave Laffey's side?
Laffey... has almost gotten used to Commander's lechery...
Laffey seems to have changed a bit... Commander, do you like how Laffey is now?
Javelin, Ayanami, Z23… they are good friends. I miss them all dearly and I want to be with them.
Laffey, retrofit complete. I feel a rush of motivation and I will work harder in the future, probably... Hey, Commander, be serious now, stop touching my ears...
Laffey is... super excited now——
I... can still fight.

I’m not making a pose to win praise from my Commander, emm, of course not. | But keeping this pose is... so tiresome... Commander, your lap, I want to take a nap on it Zzzzzz | Everyone has been saying that I look more handsome now, but my essence remains unchanged, is that a compliment?
Emm... umm... uh-oh, I fell asleep while standing.
Laffey, retrofit complete. I feel a rush of motivation and I will work harder in the future, probably... Hey, Commander, be serious now, stop touching my ears...
All targets annihilated... Zzz... Commander, I feel sleepy now.
This is the chance to show me what you learned. Do it properly!
Commander, you're staring at me... Are you ready to answer my questions?
Langley-class aicraft carrier ー Langley, Hull Number CV-1!
The girls on the commission field trip have returned. Now, go and check their progress.
I never thought that there would be a student I cannot teach... It seems better for me to quit...
What are you doing, sleeping in the job?! Take you tutoring seriously!
You seem to be getting better at this- Eh? It's thanks to me? Ah, well... y-you're welcome...
There's nothing more for me to teach you-- What? Teach you about myself? Y-You idiot!... Ugh

I, Ms. Langley, do not mix personal and work lives! If you think that I'll give you special treatment just because of our relationship, you are sorely mistaken! ... B-but in private, I'm fine with that!
Commander, where are you heading? It's time for a reflection meeting
Commander, I'll assist you with your work the best I can!
*sobs* ... I'm not qualified as a teacher... Maybe I should go back to transporting coal...
Check your mail periodically. It's a good habit!

Commander! ~Hey, you could've done better than this. Why are you not serious about this...?|At this rate nothing about the fleet will change! Get yourself together, Commander!|Commander? Are you listening? I'm gonna throw the chalk at you~! I hate people who don't listen to me! Hmph!
Erhmm... Have you finished your homework today?
The reward for diligence has been delivered. Keep it up for next time!

Ahem! I am the Eagle Union's first, I repeat, the first aircraft carrier, Langley! I do not think highly of my own fighting ability, but I've put out numerous outstanding pilots! The Eagle Union's aircraft carrier begins with me, I say!

I was concerned about whether Commander takes good care of himself before...so from now on, teacher Langley will also correct issues of your personal life; Don't even think about running away, Commander~
Commander, pay close attention to my moves!
Please do not treat me like a child~! I am a teacher! TEA-CHER!
*phone call* Hello, is this the military police? Yes, it's the same place and the same person...
I've been newly assigned to assist you. Name's Langley. You listening? I am going to fix what's wrong with you, and put you on the right track to running a fleet.
Even when you become stronger, never forget about why you had to in the first place.
Got it, everyone? Maintain this pace, alright?
Commander, if you run into a mental problem, you have to solve it on your own. Staring at me won't help you.
Listen carefully or I'll step on you!

If we make a little progress each day, we'll be sure to achieve great results one day|This fleet feels different from when I first came. With your hard work, Commander, we can do anything.|We have to punish naughty children. Don't you agree, Commander?
I will answer any question you have for me. However, is that really alright for you, Commander?
Listen to what I say, or I'll have to step on you!
The blade that protects the Vichya Dominion advances!
voiceline.oath: The heart of the Iris continues through me!

voiceline.line: *Yawn*... Sleepy... I wanna go roll around in bed... Zzzzz... Geh?! Wh-what is it?!
voiceline.oath: Roll, roll, rolling around... Commander, wanna join me?

voiceline.line: Le Fantasque-class destroyer – Le Malin.
The others have returned. Let's hurry and greet them.
voiceline.oath: The others have come back. Let's hurry up and welcome them back. Come on~!

voiceline.line: ...... (Le Malin seems to have fallen asleep)
Destroyer Le Malin is both your secretary and the blade that protects the Vichya Dominion. Please give me your orders.
I, I did say that I was ready to take your orders at any time, but... there's just too much work after all...... Tired... Can't work anymore... Please let me go on leave...
I, I can go home early today because I did such a good job...? Woah... Woohoo! Now I can head back and go to sleep! ...S-sorry, I got a bit excited there...
Commander, t-today, can we leave work a bit earlier? ...It's not because I'm tired! Um, I was thinking... if you wanted to go on a date or something...
voiceline.oath: I do want... to go on a date, but I always get tired when we go to some faraway place... W-we should just go on a date at the dorms! Right?

voiceline.line: I steeped this tea just the way Triomphant taught me. ...So you knew, huh? Indeed, it's just a normal cup of tea. Please enjoy it.
voiceline.oath: Le Triomphant taught me how to make this tea... Look, I did it normally this time. No idea if it tastes any good though...

voiceline.line: So strong...!
Destroyer, Le Malin, is ready to take your orders at any time... *yaawnn*...
voiceline.oath: Destroyer, Le Malin... *yawn*... ready to sortie at... *yaawn*... Can't do this... Too sleepy...

voiceline.line: I won't admit defeat... I haven't lost yet!!
voiceline.oath: Le Triomphant... Commander... I'm sorry!

voiceline.line: This letter's for you, Commander... Is there nothing for me?

Without firepower, speed alone is not enough to defeat the enemy. That goes without saying. |So bored... maybe it's time to quit... Gah! I didn't say anything!|Dunkerque's handmade sweets... Guhehe... Ah, I mustn't! I'm still at work...!
voiceline.oath: nil|I didn't really do anything, but I still worked hard anyway... Yeah, go me~!|Hungry... Wanna eat Dunkerque's sweets... If I push through this, I'll be able to slack off later...Wh-what a pain...

voiceline.line: We have new orders, Commander.
voiceline.oath: We have new orders. They're addressed to you, Commander.

voiceline.line: Commander, rewards incoming from above.
voiceline.oath: Commander, the mission rewards are here!

voiceline.line: I am Le Malin, Le Fantasque-class destroyer of the Vichya Dominion. I once fought alongside my friends of the 8th Light Division in Brest. After that, Le Triomphant went down a different path... Well, we don't hold it against each other.
As the blade that protects the Vichya Dominion, I, Le Malin, swear to defend you and offer you my eternal love. Um... this is really tiring... Commander, let's head back already...
Begone!!
Being elegant... isn't worth the effort... Geh?! Wh-what do you want?!
Hyah?! Wh-what are you doing?!
I am the mirage that chases the waves, the poisoned blade that protects the Vichya Dominion. Super Destroyer, Le Malin, is yours to command.
It wouldn't be right if I didn't work even harder.
I've eliminated those who would stand in our way.
voiceline.oath: The elegant arts of the Le Fantasque class... knows no equal!

voiceline.line: Witness the power of the Le Fantasque class!
Morning, Commander~ Mm, the Sabbath is the day of rest, so I shall not budge from my sacred charge even if you were to call Triomphant over. I solemnly swear to do absolutely nothing today.
I really can't get any work done today after all... I just want to head back and relax already...

Tired... Don't wanna work... Commander, don't call for me even if you have something that needs doing...|Ahem! Commander, I brought coffee! N-no way! How'd you figure out that I slipped cold medication into it...?!|I don't wanna do any more work todayyy... Commander, let's hurry up and take a break already~! Right! Now!
Hyah?! ...Jeez, what are you doing! Just when I was about to fall asleep...
Morning, Commander~ Mm, the Sabbath is the day of rest, so I shall not budge from my sacred charge even if you were to call Triomphant over. I solemnly swear to do absolutely nothing today.
Extermination complete...... Wait, didn't I say I wasn't going to do anything today?!
This hammock feels pretty nice, but I can't roll around... A tactical failure...
I must commend you for being able to find my secret base, Commander... but unfortunately for you, I refuse to return to the office today. Just... *yawn*...let me spend the whole day sleeping here...
Eh? It's already time to go home...? Geh! It's already evening! Hmm?! I can't move my legs because I overslept... Commander, help me...
The commander's out there working hard, but here I am... Zzz...
Commander... Ice creammm...
So hot...... Why must we sortie in this kind of weather?!

Too bad you can't turn into an air conditioner, Commander... Otherwise, I'd cling to you all day... Zzzzzz...|In any case, Le Malin will now go take a most elegant nap. Don't bother me even if there's something that needs doing... and save me some Cola and snacks... Zzzzzz...|Who's that over there? ...Le Terrible?! C-c-c-commander! Hide me! If that girl finds me, I'm not gonna be able to sleep the day away!
A new mission? Don't wanna... Th-there's ice cream in it for me? F-fine, I'll do it!
Swim? Hehehe, not to brag or anything, but I'll show you the most elegant way to float!
I'm too slovenly...? Meh, haven't you already known that for ages~?
I must commend you for being able to find my secret base, Commander... but unfortunately for you, I refuse to return to the office today. Just... *yawn*...let me spend the whole day sleeping here...
Commander... Let's hurry back and turn on the air conditioning...
This outfit is nice and smooth... Perfect for rolling around, right?
Zzz... zzz... Huh? Commander? I was in the middle of a nap... Oh, this outfit? It's cool, comfy, and cute. If you don't need anything from me, I'm going back to sleep...
The commission fleet's back? Y'know, I don't think I should be going outside, looking like this and all... So, you can go by yourself, Commander!
Today's "scheduled break time" is still in effect for a few more hours. In other words... Please do it yourself.
Welcome back. Sure, let's keep it casual... I don't care either way, hehe...
I wouldn't have signed up if I knew this was going to happen...

Le Triomphant is looking for me? Y-you're just trying to scare me! I d-don't believe that at all!|This outfit is great for rolling around on the comfy couch... It'd be a waste to not take a nap... Zzzzz...|It's time for a lunch break! ...What do you mean there's still more work to do? Let's just push it back to tomorrow...
Huh...? Do you need something...?
Gwaaah?! Wh-where do you think you're touching! That scared me...
Zzz... zzz... Huh? Commander? I was in the middle of a nap... Oh, this outfit? It's cool, comfy, and cute. If you don't need anything from me, I'm going back to sleep...
We won? ...Let's head back and go to sleep~
Harken! Hear my prayer!
I didn't really want to do this, but I'll see this idol mission through. I will bring the elegance of the Iris to the world stage.
voiceline.oath: At times like these, you gotta throw your hands in the air like you don't care, and turn around... Zzzzzz... Wh-wh-wh-what is it?! Eh? I fell asleep?

voiceline.line: I am the Iris's shining sword, Le Malin. As the shimmering idol who chases the waves, may your souls be healed by my songs of prayer.
The commission fleet has returned... Phew! That means I get to chill!
voiceline.oath: The commission fleet has returned. Uh, yeah, that's what Béarn told me.

voiceline.line: This... must be carte blanche to loaf around as much as I want...
I am the dazzling Iris idol, Le Malin— Now, provide me the most elegant of instructions!

Lessons, offers, training, and rehearsals... There's too much stuff to do... I can't deal with this anymore! I'm gonna pass out at this rate... Just looking at the schedule is making me want to crawl back into bed... Maybe I should do just that today~

Haah, haah... How's that? My performance was pretty on-spot, wasn't it? If you think so, let me take a break already! All right, I'll be heading off! Or, uhh, if you could prepare some tasty snacks for me...
Commander, on my day off, promise you'll take me on a date? I mean, uhh, sorry, I'll just head back to... Huh? Really?! Yaay! I can't wait to loaf around together— Ah, ahem... First, this concert...!
Huh...? What is it?
Good work out there. Would you like to enjoy a most elegant cup of tea?
voiceline.oath: Tired... Why are performances so draining... I just wanna go to sleep today...

voiceline.line: There's no way I could dance like Émile...!
Good morning. What will today's lesson be?
voiceline.oath: Good morning. Um, today... there are no lessons planned, right...?

voiceline.line: There's no time for regrets...!
It's work-related. Look it over please.
voiceline.oath: ... (Am I imagining things, or is the work piling up the more I do it...?)

voiceline.line: An "idol" is something that people worship and exalt. As the word suggests, we mustn't do anything that would shorten that distance.|Jean Bart told me to just enjoy myself, but... the expectant gazes of Le Triomphant and Richelieu... it burns!|That little girl from the Royal Navy.. . Not only does she act all innocent, she also sings about "prayer." Hehe, as if I'd let her steal my thunder~
voiceline.oath: Idols shouldn't get too close to their fans, right? So that means I don't have to do these autograph events either. Sweet~♪|If I just stay awake through this lesson, I'll get to enjoy Dunkerque's sweets afterwards... Focus, focus!|Graf Spee wants to rehearse with me? Uh... O-of course I have no issues with that?

voiceline.line: We got a job offer... Hopefully we can take care of it quickly and efficiently...
voiceline.oath: Uh, so today's offers are... Ah, wait, nobody said you had to go and accept ALL of them!

voiceline.line: F-finally, that's taken care of... Now all that remains is the collect the reward, elegantly...
voiceline.oath: Too tired... can't do this anymore... Lemme go to sleep after you look over the rewards!

voiceline.line: I am the Le Fantasque-class destroyer, Le Malin, reporting for duty. Heheh... Just watch, I'll do an amazing job on this idol mission. J-just to be clear, it's not like I was looking forward to this!

The fact that I'm standing upon this shining stage right now is due to all the support from you and my friends. Now, place that ring upon my finger, and may our vow preserve this radiance forevermore!
Light, heed me!
Thanks for always cheering me on~
voiceline.oath: Ahh~ Yeah, yeah, that's the spot. Keep massaging right there~

voiceline.line: Hwuh?! Wh-what are you doing?!
voiceline.oath: Too tired... I'm gonna die... Ahhh... Waaah...

voiceline.line: I am the Iris's shining sword, Le Malin. As the shimmering idol who chases the waves, may your souls be healed by my songs of prayer.
The Iris's miracle manifests here!
Long live the glory of the Iris! Rejoice! Weep!
voiceline.oath: Long live the glory of the Iris! Rejoice! Weep! ...Wait, I don't need an encore!

voiceline.line: Warm-up exercises are all done! I'm setting out~!
To be honest, I'm a little jealous of Forbin. Back then, we both weren't able to move, but she made more of the situation than me...
L'Adroit-class destroyer – Le Mars.
Everyone's back! I'm gonna run down to greet them! Be right back!
Woah, Commander... I, I think I'll be training solo today!
To be an outstanding knight, it's not enough to just have the strength to protect others. You must also become wise through learning! But... I always start dozing off when I'm studying... *yawn*
Commander, you'll help me study? Yay! Thank you so much! I'll be sure to... Huuhh? Wait, I have to memorize all this?! S-sorry, I have a stomachache!
I think I'm starting to get it, but maybe not... But, I'm so glad that you're patient enough to teach a dummy like me. Thank you, Commander!
Even though I still don't quite understand this stuff, there is one thing that's certain - when it comes to learning things about you, Commander, I function twice as well!
Commander, you've gotta sweat to burn off fat!
It's just a flesh wound! I'll tough it out!
Commander, you finally made it! What's on the training regimen today?
Merdé! Time to retreat!
Mail's here~! I already brought it all with me, ehehe~

Commander, I'll teach you some stretches for those long days!|Being a commander sure is tough, isn't it? Having to micromanage this and that... My head would start spinning... |Studying just isn't my strong suit... I obviously can read all these words, but they just don't make any sense to me when put together...
We're not done with the missions quite yet. Let me handle the errands!
Mission complete! Huh...? I still have to tally the rewards?
Back then, I wasn't able to fulfill my duties, but... Commander, this time, I'll show you what I'm capable of!
Um... I haven't learned what I'm supposed to do at a place like this yet... Ah, um! In any case, p-please continue to take good care of me in the future!
Time to do this~!
My shoulders were starting to get stiff too... Thanks a ton, Commander!
Th-this place also needs a massage? Um... it feels a little strange...
Eh? Who are you... Ah! Right, you're the Commander! I'm the L'Adroit-class destroyer, Le Mars! A pleasure meetin' you!
I grow stronger yet again! Thanks, Commander!
I'm in first place...? Très bien! Ehehe~!
This is no simple inner tube, Commander. It also doubles as "ammunition storage" for my water gun! How 'bout it? Wanna taste my waterpower~?
It's summer~! Summer is here, Commander! Let's head down to the beach to play! I'll show you why I'm feared in water gun fights!
Ehehe, Commander, are you done with work for the day? Let's get going then! ...Huh? Where to? The beach, of course!
Commander, summer is finally here, so why such a long face~? Let's enjoy some fun in the sun on the beach~♪

Commander, wanna share a watermelon? |Just because it's hot doesn't mean you should stay cooped up underneath the air conditioner all day. Let's play outside~!|Commander, you should also get a tan! That way, we'll match~♪ Ehehe~!
Sunscreen? I don't need that~!
C-Commander... that place doesn't need any sunscreen...
It's summer~! Summer is here, Commander! Let's head down to the beach to play! I'll show you why I'm feared in water gun fights!
If you underestimate me just because I'm lightly equipped, I'll gladly teach you a lesson~!
School life is all about running track under the warm sun, am I right!?
Hey! Over here! Hehe. I didn't expect to run into you at school, Commander. What are you doing here?
Uh oh... I can't get anything in this book to stick in my head...
I'll be bringing the heat at school today!

Commander, you should get us some more phys ed classes! I mean... exercise is really important!|Listening to music is a real good way to calm your mind when you wanna relax! Let's listen together, Commander.|Huh? Forbin's heading this way with a pile of notebooks? Um, is there a good hiding place around here—
The wind doesn't scare me!
I don't need a massage right now...
Hey! Over here! Hehe. I didn't expect to run into you at school, Commander. What are you doing here?
They do these crazy flips and spins in the movies, right? ...So what'd you think, Commander? I sure wish mine could look that good...
Commander, thanks for coming to pick me up! I don't often get the chance to wear formal clothes, though it is a little hard to move around... Oh, but I can deal with it!
You seem pretty worn-out, Commander. Let's do some cool-down stretches! Maybe some mild exercise will make you feel better!
Good morning, Commander! What kind of work will we start with today?

I can't do this... Reading books about etiquette puts me right to sleep... Huh? You're willing to be my practice partner? That'd be a huge help!|By the way, Commander, have you seen Forbin? ...Even though she's a total lightweight, she keeps trying to push herself... Ugh, I'm getting a bad feeling about this...|Phew... I finally managed to finish making my rounds... I was so nervous my body was stiff as a rock, but you looked like you were totally in your element... That's amazing, I tell you!
Um, this is how you're supposed to hold the champagne, right?
Um, is this also a part of my training...?
Commander, thanks for coming to pick me up! I don't often get the chance to wear formal clothes, though it is a little hard to move around... Oh, but I can deal with it!
It's probably because I got a good warm-up in. Hehe~
Commander, are you that desperate to see my gallant form as I unload all my cannons and torpedo tubes? Ehehe, what am I going to do with you~
Retro~ fit~ com~ plete! The new and improved Le Mars is at your service~!
Welcome back, Commander! Shall we plan our next sortie?
My torpedoes and cannons are locked and loaded! Commander, I'm ready to sortie at any time!

Hehe! Commander, is this victory pose cool? I saw it in an anime! |Commission or sortie, I'm ready to do anything! With how strong I am now, I won't let you down, Commander! |Is there something that needs doing? I'll be happy to shoulder even a little bit of your burdens.
Hehe, how about I be the one to give you a shoulder massage this time?
Retro~ fit~ com~ plete! The new and improved Le Mars is at your service~!
Now, for a victory pose! ...Hey! Wait for meeee!
What is it that you are fighting for?
voiceline.oath: Accept your divine punishment!

voiceline.line: I have no interest in fighting pointless battles, but there seem to be some individuals here who place excessive pride in their speed... Of course, I was more than glad to put them in their place. More importantly, I made quite a few friends in the process. Not too bad, right?
Le Fantasque-class large destroyer - Le Terrible.
Coins, oil, and supplies... I wonder if the rewards for this commission will also be abundant.
If you wish to make a confession, better to turn to the Cardinal rather than to me.
You're here neither for prayers nor confessions? I see. In that case, I'll also have to find something else to do to pass the time... Hmm, hmm...

You'd like to have a chat? Let's see then... Between life, freedom, and love, which is most important to you, Commander? Hehe, don't be alarmed that I suddenly sprang that question on you. I simply wanted to see how you'd react~
Now then, moving on to the next question. Commander, do you prefer to be bound by someone else, or would you rather be the one doing the binding? Hehe, assume there are no other options~

If I was to cross the threshold of death's door one day, would you pull me back–– Hmm, I suppose that question's a bit too easy. I'm not trying to toy around with you, I simply wanted to hear how you feel. Heheh~
voiceline.oath: Commander, have some spare time to have a chat? No no, I didn't have anything special in mind. You know, I get anxious if I don't get to see your face for even a day. Whether you're having a good day or a not-so-good day, I just want to see more of you~

voiceline.line: Please refrain from touching my hat.
Here are the materials you've requested, as well as the tea and light meal. Please note that the tea may be a bit hot. Hmm? It's cooled down?
The Holy Iris will protect us!
My, you seem to be in high spirits today, Commander. Do you have any orders for me?
voiceline.oath: You look to be in high spirits today. So, what do you need me to do next?

voiceline.line: The warriors of Iris Libre must not falter.
Commander, if you're unable to locate your mail... it's because I've already brought it over here. Heh heh~♪

That little incident I had with Le Malin? Yes, I've already apologized to her, but her mind seemed to be on something else...|My, Commander, look at you over there with that derpy face–– Ahem, what I meant was, it's not good to slack off. You should try to learn a thing or two from Le Triomphant.|Those who seek to spread the wings of hope are too often shackled by trivial matters. Commander, do you have the ambition to break your chains?
voiceline.extra: A tea party with my sisters? ...I don't know about that... H-hey, it's not that I don't want to go... But what if the tea is too hot...|If you have a mission that requires speed, just leave it to me. That's one of my fortes, after all.|Want to head to somewhere high up after you're done with work? I'd like to understand... what it feels like to be a bird, soaring freely through the skies.

voiceline.line: Commander, have you come across a mission so difficult that it's even making you furrow your brow? ...My my, I see~♪ Ahem, I mean, I would be more than glad to lend my assistance, should you desire it––
Are you sure you're able to sort out all these rewards yourself, Commander? Heh heh... Perhaps you could look for another person to work with you~?
voiceline.oath: The mission rewards are right here. Heh heh~ I love the way you look when you're pushing yourself to the limit~♪

voiceline.line: As a part of the 10th Scout Division of the Brest Fleet, I carried out escort missions as well as participated in the withdrawal from Strasbourg. As one who served the Iris Orthodoxy, I was finally shown the light of victory. Ah, how blessed I must be.

Sorry to make you buy a ring for me, but I can't deny these feelings any longer–– Heh, heheh... Ahahaha~♪ Yes, with this sacred ritual, no longer will I be teasing you. Indeed, from now on, I pledge myself to you, fully and forever.
Bloom forth, hallowed Iris!
You may pray to the Holy Iris, or offer me a confession in person. Speak your piece.
voiceline.oath: If you could talk to me about your concerns, Commander, I'd be really happy~♪

voiceline.line: I do say, Commander, how generous of you to reveal your weaknesses to me one after another~
voiceline.oath: This... is also one of my weaknesses.

voiceline.line: I am Le Terrible, the elegant large destroyer who protects the teachings of Iris Libre. I have come in pursuit of your ideals. Commander, please show me the reason for which you fight.
To claim to be the strongest... is not something that should be stated haphazardly. Don't you agree, Commander?
voiceline.oath: Ahaha! Thanks to you, Commander, I feel even stronger.

voiceline.line: Do not deny yourself the pride that you righteously deserve. The path to victory has been paved by God, but it is you who shall lead us down that path, Commander.
voiceline.oath: How's that? Look what I, in all my grace and elegance, have done in your name.

voiceline.line: Well then... I guess I'll fight...
Le Malin, Le Triomphant... We'll be together forever...... Zzzzz...
Zzz... Commander...? Sorry... for showing you this unsightly side of mine... I'm just, not a morning person... Zzzzz...
Our commission went wonderfully... I saw that in my dream...
Zzzzz
Zzzzz
Zzzzz
Zzzzz
Commander's derpy face... Ehehe... I've always wanted to see this... Just let me rest a while... at your side... Zzzzz...
Zzzz... Black tea... should be left until it's a bit cooler than room temperature...
Le Malin... It's time to get to work... Make sure you don't drag the Commander down... Zzzzz...
I knew it, I'm just not good enough... Unlike some of those Eagle Union destroyers...
Please remember... to check your mail...

Le Triomphant... You're not the most photogenic sleeper...|Commander... Give me another couple hours... And then...|Nooo, I'm going to get pranked... Ehehe... I won't hold it against you though, so please...
The missions... We haven't finished them all yet...
We have mission rewards... waiting for us...
But if you could stop at scribbling on my face... that'd be nice...
Nngh... Mmh...
Zzz... Commander...? Sorry... for showing you this unsightly side of mine... I'm just, not a morning person... Zzzzz...
It'd be nice... if I could get stronger after waking up...
*Yawn*... I'm still a bit sleepy... I can't even properly savor the aftertaste of victory like this... Zzzzz...
For someone not accustomed to strenuous exercise such as myself, I prefer to let the ocean's waves rock me back and forth.
How goes your day, Commander? Hehe, are you looking for my clever sister, Le Malin? If so, you would do well to search somewhere less... popular~♪
Oh, it appears the commission fleet has returned.
Splendidly done. Would you like to hold a tea party by the beachside, Commander? Indeed, something with ice would be nice~♪
Is the sun a bit too oppressive for your liking, Commander? If so, you would do well to find some shade, as my clever sister has done.
Commander, if you're talking about the mail, I think Le Malin has it... Hehe~♪

Miss Ark Royal? Hmm, you're asking if she comes across as helpful or troublesome? Perhaps a bit of both, I must say...|The Cardinal plans to go surfing? Commander, I think you should keep an eye on her.|If a big wave comes... Hmm... Uhh... That's probably not going to bode well for me...
If you find it too hot, why not take off another layer~? Hehe~♪
My, oh my~♪
How goes your day, Commander? Hehe, are you looking for my clever sister, Le Malin? If so, you would do well to search somewhere less... popular~♪
In the name of Iris Libre, let us break their lines!
If you have any questions, feel free to ask away. I will respond to each one.
Le Fantasque-class destroyer – Le Triomphant.
Why don't you let me handle the next one? I'll get it done the fastest.
So... I guess this is the kind of person that you are, Commander...
Don't you think Noblesse Oblige is an elegant idea?
In order to realize their ideals and ambitions, even family members may part ways and eventually meet each other on the battlefield... It's so tragic...
Familiarity with hardship and suffering cultivates an appreciation of life and death. At least that's what I think...
Commander, as long as we're together, I feel like I can easily overcome any adversity... that's what I truly believe.
That was a hard-fought battle, Commander. Would you like to have a cup of tea before you resume work?
The outcome... still isn't set in stone!
My, I see you've returned? What shall your orders be today? I am ready to accept any assignment - commission or sortie!
Sometimes... things like this can happen as well...
It feels nice to be celebrated by someone you don't know, doesn't it?

My sword and shield? Oh, they stop feeling heavy after a while. Well, I also am quite strong. |If I was with my sisters at that time... would things have happened differently...?|Whether someone is friend or foe... is not something set in stone.
New missions have been issued.
Commander, here are the fruits of your labor.

I am Le Triomphant, a Le Fantasque-class Destroyer from Iris Libre. It is an honor to meet you. My sisters and I were in the 8th Light Division before the fateful Battle of Jutland. After that, our paths diverged...
Finally... this day has come at last... Commander, you truly are my fated partner. I, Le Triomphant, willingly offer you my sword, my shield, and my body.
Pour la liberté!
Commander, you'll be missing out if you treat me and my sisters as regular destroyers.
Eek! To think that you're even faster than the Le Fantasque class... you're not one to be taken lightly, Commander.

Oh my, Commander, what a pleasure it is to meet you. I am Le Triomphant, an elegant large destroyer from Iris Libre, yours to command. The power of the Le Fantasque-class shall exceed your wildest fantasies.
I feel strength rippling from my sword and shield... Commander, thank you.
You'll find that the speed of the Le Fantasque-class is not easily matched!
Anyways, let's keep charging forward!
Everyone here is so nice... but, there are some who seem hard to strike up a conversation with...
Le Hardi-class destroyer – Le Téméraire.
Commander, I'm going to go welcome back the girls who are coming back from their commissions!
Commander, you're not going to have any friends left!
I'm gonna take a stroll around the port today~♪ Maybe I can make some new friends!
I have a play date with my friends today! Commander, want to join us?
Commander, even though I've made a lot of friends, you're... something special. That's because I'm happiest when I'm with you!
A relationship more important than friendship... lovers? But, I don't know what it means to be lovers... Huh? Just do what we always do?
Welcome back! I put the documents back on the shelves for you! ...Huh? You still wanted to check those?
H-huh? Where am I?!
Vas-y! Come on, the day's work is only beginning!
Ehh? I lost...?
Mail's here! I already opened it for you!

I made friends from several different camps yesterday! Ehehe~♪ |Ah, those are the girls I played with yesterday! Commander, I'm going to get up for a bit! |If everyone all got along, then we wouldn't have any wars!
We still have missions left! Let's knock them out in one go!
Yay, the mission rewards are here! Huh...? We still have to check them?
I am the Le Hardi-class destroyer, Le Téméraire! I was never completed during that war, but I'm really happy that I can be with all of you now!
I'm not sure what this "marriage" thing is all about, but surely it means that we'll always be together from now on! Mmhm! I'll always be at your side, Commander!
CHAAARGE~!
Ahahaha! That tickles!
W-wait, I'm not emotionally prepared yet!
I've finally found you! Commander, it's a pleasure to meet you! Um, my name...? Ah! I'm Le Téméraire, a Le Hardi-class destroyer from Iris Libre!
I've gotten stronger!
Heheh~ Did you see me just now?
Commander, what do you think about my choice of swimsuit...? Ah, by the way, I also picked out Opiniâtre's swimsuit!
Commander, I've finished changing into my swimsuit! Heheh~ let's head down to the beach and enjoy ourselves as much as we can!
I had a great time today! Ehehe~♪ But you know, it'd be nice to have some alone time with you, Commander... Hey, umm, can I... lean against your shoulder...?
Commander, aren't you hot...? Mm! Here, have an ice pop!
Heyyy! Commander! I'm over here~!

Today's the day of the big beach volleyball meet! My friends and I are aiming for the top spot!|Opiniâtre, are you busy practicing your "magic" again? Since we came all the way out here, you might as well have some fun... |Huh, a crab? ...Ehh?? It was just right there... Where'd it run off to?
Huh? We're getting work on our day off?
The sea is refreshing and feels great! Commander, you should come on in as well!
Awawawa! Th-the strings are coming loose...!
Commander, I've finished changing into my swimsuit! Heheh~ let's head down to the beach and enjoy ourselves as much as we can!
I got this lollipop from Mutsuki earlier! Oh, and keep it a secret from Dunkerque, okay? I'm hoping she'll make one for me later~
How do I look? These pajamas are super cute, aren't they? Ehehe, I really like this one! It even matches with Opiniâtre's!
Welcome back, Commander! Watch out, Manjuu plushie coming at you! Hehehe~ Smells nice, doesn't it?
Nighty night, Commander! ...It's not time to sleep yet, though! Feeling cheated? Hehehe~

I can't sleep now, there's still tons of stuff I wanna do before bed. No staying up late allowed? Aww... Fine, then I'll lie down right now!|Today was so much fun! I bet tomorrow will be even more fun, Commander!|Hang on, where's my Manjuu plushie gone? Oh! It was hiding in the pillow!
This Manjuu plushie is so squishy! It feels super comfy to cuddle with!
Th-th-th-that's not something you should be squishing...!
How do I look? These pajamas are super cute, aren't they? Ehehe, I really like this one! It even matches with Opiniâtre's!
Let's go, everyone. Be careful not to get hurt!
Mmm. I'll leave it to you then, Commander.
Leander-class light cruiser – Leander, Hull Number 75!
Commander, the commissions are done.
Being unable to judge your distance with others is problematic, Commander.
Oh, Commander, you're like a child. I can't leave you alone~
I'm thinking of taking a walk, but I don't have a companion... Commander, want to take a walk with me?
We were distant sisters in the home country, so I'm happy now that we get to fight together in the same fleet. All of it is thanks to you, Commander.
Thanks to you, Commander, the others have gotten along better every day... Right. What kind of gift do you want, Commander?
Good work, commander. Is there anything I can help with?
Oh my, Commander. Please take care of me today as well.
I've caused you trouble...
Commander, you've got new mail~!
Commander, are you tired? Do you want to lay on my thighs?|The place I used to live in was very warm|Aiiiiiiiiieeei!!!... Oh my... it's you, Commander-- Geez, you surprised me...
Commander, there are still unfinished missions.
Commander, please take the rewards
I am the Leander class light cruiser, Leander. Me and my sister Achilles had worked hard around different countries. Please tell me about the things that I need to improve on. I'll do my best.
Always be by your side... is it? I understand. If it's alright, I'll happily stay by your side~
Mmh... just the right spot!
Hmm? Is there anything I can do for you, Commander?
Sometimes... I have to endure things I don't like, huh...
Good day to you. I am Leander class' light cruiser, Leander. Actually, I have some differences from my sisters. Do you want to know what they are?
I'm gonna work a little harder
This victory belongs to everyone!
Mhm, Commander, it's fine to ask things of me every once in a while.
Greetings, Commander. I hope I can ask for your continued guidance. ... Hm? Oh dear... I'm Leander, don't you recognise me?
nil|Though I miss the place where I used to live, the presence of the four seasons here makes it feel like home.|Compared to me, my sisters have much more colourful personalities... *Sigh*...
Commander?! Have I made some sort of mistake?!
Commander~! This is inappropriate behaviour!
Greetings, Commander. I hope I can ask for your continued guidance. ... Hm? Oh dear... I'm Leander, don't you recognise me?
Ahh~! I'm so nervous I could faint...
C-commander... Please don't stare at me...

Leipzig-class light cruiser, Leipzig.
Can be built after unlocking
Ah, Commander! Fishy told me that the girls have returned from their commission...
Stay... stay away...!
Commander, y-you called for me? Ah... a d-d-date??! ... (faints)
I won't faint anymore after I've gotten used to it... Also, Commander, being with you... makes me really happy.
For the longest time, only Fishy would keep me company. Commander... for you to accept me... I'm so happy!
Fishy... you're on lookout duty... I've got something very important to tell Commander... Don't let anyone in...
Commander's aroma is so calming...
Wel... welcome back, Commander. I've arranged your documents...
Wah... I'll be bitten... It's scary! I'm not going!
Commander, Fishy brought in some new mail...
Eek! I think I saw something...|I'll... I'll try my best!|Commander... is there anything else I can help with?
Commander... you've been assigned new missions...
Ah- Wah! Commander, your rewards have arrived...

Um... I'm... Leipzig, the first ship of the Leipzig-class...
One time, I collided with Eugen because of some thick fog... I hope she doesn't still hate me...
I'm so glad that you returned my feelings, Commander. I'll do my best... not to faint in front of you anymore.
Uu... Help me, Fishy...
Is this training for learning how to not faint? I'll.. see what I can do...
Uuu... I really won't be able to move like this... what should I do?
Co- Commander... I'm Leipzig. I black out frequently due to malnutrition, but... I'll do my best to finish the tasks assigned to me...
Th-thanks for your concern, Commander!
I feel stronger with Commander around...
I'm still a bit nervous, but... I'll do my best!
Commander... Um, could you look at the pamphlet instead of at me...?
Commander, ah, um... We have all new items on the menu, and they're on sale for a limited time only... P-please give them a try! Phew... Th-thank goodness, I managed to not flub it...
Did Fishy go to welcome the commission fleet back...?
Err, umm... If you're ready, I'd be glad to take your order, Commander... I'd like to know more about your tastes, and what you like... Th-that's okay, isn't it?
Commander, you must be tired from your battle! Um... Why don't you come in and relax for a bit?
W-welcome home, Master! ...Um, w-would you like to take a look at our menu?
I'm so sorry, Commander... I, I'll do better next time!
The mail's here. Thank you, Miss Eugen!

What happened to Fishy? Um, I asked Miss Eugen to take care of it...|Eat well, rest well, and... then you'll never be defeated in battle, right...?|Commander, um, are you sure you're okay with me? Someone else will take over the shift soon according to the schedule...
Do you need me to get you another menu...?
...You'll be okay, Leipzig... You'll be okay!!
Commander, ah, um... We have all new items on the menu, and they're on sale for a limited time only... P-please give them a try! Phew... Th-thank goodness, I managed to not flub it...
It's all because everyone was with me... including you too, Commander!
I'm pretty nervous... but I'll do my best!
Fishy looks a bit intimidating, but he's really kind! ... Well... I might be the only one he's kind to... Sorry...
I feel like Fishy is a lot more capable than before, but I don't feel much different... M-maybe Fishy was the one to get a retrofit instead of me?!
Commander, would you mind if I took Fishy with us on a walk to the harbor? The commission team returned, and I want to go greet them.
Phew... Commander, I, I organized your files!
I'm so sorry, Commander... I-I'll try harder next time!

You're right, a nutritious diet is important... Do you have any... um, yummy recommendations...?|Despite how Fishy looks, he really does have his own thoughts and feelings. But it seems I'm the only person who understands what he says...|It's okay, Fishy. Commander is just a little busy right now...
C-Commander...! Commandeeeer! Don't forget your missions!
Commander, Fishy brought us the mission rewards. Thank you, Fishy~
Unghh... Get a grip, me! I can't faint now...!
Eek! I-I managed to not faint...! Thank you, Commander!
I feel like Fishy is a lot more capable than before, but I don't feel much different... M-maybe Fishy was the one to get a retrofit instead of me?!
You won't get away!
My dream is to one day be as pretty as my sis, St. Louis!
Brooklyn-class light cruiser – Helena (CL-50)
Commander, big sis told me before that nobody likes tardy people.
Commander, it's no fun being with you... I-I'm leaving!
Jeez, Commander, how many times have I told you not to just barge into a girl's room?! ... Huh?
Commander, this hairstyle is really popular right now. Um, I still think I prefer this other one though better though... Which do you prefer?
Before, it was always big sis who helped me style my hair and put on makeup. But now, you're here to help me too! Ehehe, thank you, Commander~♪
I wonder why... my heart always flutters when you help me do my hair... It's totally different from when big sis does it... Hopefully, I'm not sick or something...
Commander, do you have time to help comb my hair?
Wh-what should I do, what should I do?!
C-Commander... I haven't decided on how to do my hair yet, so please don't come barging in...
*sniffle* Waaah... Commander, they're bullying me...
Huh... there's new mail? Commander, would you mind getting it yourself? I'm... having a bit of a bad hair day...

Big sis is just like a model, always changing into all kinds of clothes... B-but, if everyone thinks her clothes are cute, it's probably not too bad... |Huh? Who's that blonde-haired boy always surrounded by everyone? Um, I... I'm not particularly interested or anything... |Commander, do I look cute today?
Commander, what do you think about the idea of wearing this hairstyle out to a mission?
The mission rewards are here? Good job, Commander!

I'm the Brooklyn-class light cruiser, Helena. I'm good at anti-air, and I like dressing up. Even though I seem to have come to a weird place, my big sis, St. Louis, taught me that a proper lady must remain calm at all times. You don't seem to be a shady person, so I guess I'll be your care.
Big sis always told me that an "Oath" was the proof of a deep bond... In other words, Commander and I are going to always get along and be together forever, right? Ehehe, I'm so glad~!
Cuteness... is justice!
Commander, um... look, a bunny~
Commander, all the girls will hate you if you do stuff like this!
How should I do my hair today~? Huh? Wh-who are you? Why are you in my room? Huh? This isn't my room...? Eh? Ehhhh...?!
Commander, I'll help rub your back~!
Heehee, I am the cutest after all~
Everyone! Let's claim victory for our Commander!
Aww, your frown has curled your brows. You have your share of hard work too, Commander...
Lexington-class aircraft carrier ー Lexington, Hull Number CV-2!
Oh my~ The girls of the commission team have returned
Oh dear, you are mistaken if you think I'm going to accept everything you do.
Being an idol is a job that brings smiles to everyone. Of course, that includes you too, Commander. *giggles*
Recently, whenever I dream about the Coral Sea, you are there, Commander. It somehow makes me feel safe. I wonder why~
Commander, wanna try becoming my manager? You're capable and you know me, and I can't think of you as anything short of dependable~

A solo live show? Oh, I haven't had plans for that yet. But if someone were to give me a ring as a present, maybe I'll host that kind of show every day. And the audience is only a single person, you see~
Oh, something's on your face. I'll wipe it off, so don't move~
Maybe it's time to cheer everyone up with my song~
Oh my~ Where are you heading, Commander? Don't worry. As long as I'm around, even the high flying crane won't get away
Oh my~ we can't keep up with their pace. Should we retreat for now?
A new mail has arrived. If your hands are full then perhaps I should reply it for you~

I'm not as lively as my younger sister, though I'm confident in my own charms. What do you think~|Oh my, where is Saratoga hiding? She's such a handful...|My eyes are gorgeous? Well, for an idol, my eyes have to look like this~
Oh Commander, there are still missions that have yet to be completed~
Carrier planes, bring the mission rewards to the Commander

Oh my~ I am aircraft carrier Lexington. 
I'm gentle? That's because I'm everyone's older sister~ That means you are a cute junior too! 
I feel assured since I've seen Saratoga working hard. Please give some attention to her as well
Oh, oh my oh my~ I was wondering how long I would have to wait for you, Commander~ *giggles* Well then, the private live show ticket has been sold out~ The show goes-- forever~
Go forth, carrier planes!
Commander, you seem like a hapless little brother~
Oh goodness, are you unsatisfied with being the younger brother?
Good day, Mr. Commander~ I am Lexington. I heard that my name was from the first battlefield of the War for Independance. As an idol, I think I need to have a big heart. Don't you agree?
*giggles* I suddenly feel like singing. Wanna listen?
*giggles* Lady Lex is not really a title of mine~
Hehe… sometimes you can completely change the way people see you with just a simple change in attire. Don't you agree, Commander~? Don’t worry, I'm still your Lexington~

In the Dragon Empery, the New Year symbolizes joy and reuniting with family. Commander, just being together with you and all the children in the port right now, counts as a "family reunion," doesn't it? Hehe~
A well-fought battle, Commander. Why don't you come try my Lexington-style East-West fusion cooking?
Welcome back, Commander. Are you well acquainted with the customs of the Dragon Empery? Then, why don't you tell me a bit about their New Year? I'm quite curious~

An idol will change her outfits and dresses several times during a performance, each one bringing forth a different character... As long as I can bring smiles to everyone's faces, I will be happy. |nil|Wearing this outfit seems to have gotten the children all fired up~ Hehe, Commander, don't you think this outfit brings out my domestic side?
Commander, do you like my dress that much? Should we ask the Empery girls to tailor an outfit for you as well?
Hehe… sometimes you can completely change the way people see you with just a simple change in attire. Don't you agree, Commander~? Don’t worry, I'm still your Lexington~
Hehe, new outfits do bring new joys with them after all~
We're headed for the ocean! Chaaaaarge!!
The skies don't just belong to the planes, but to clouds and stars as well!
Atlanta-class light cruiser – San Diego (CL-53)
...?! Commander, my Sandy Senses are tingling! There's someone waiting at the port!
Don't feel bad, Commander, it's not your fault that you're dumber than San Diego.
The key to happiness is to not worry about the stuff you don't get. Isn't that right, Commander?
What should I do if there's stuff that I can't stop worrying about though...? Ah! Got it! That's what Commander is there for!
No matter what kind of stuff I ask you, you always have an answer... Commander, are you actually pretty smart?!
As long as you're here, Commander, I'll know where to turn to whenever I have any problems! Hehe, I love how you know everything, Commander!
Commander, were you trying to play hide-and-seek with me?
Hey, guys, why so serious??
Yo, Commander! There's a lot of paper lying around here, so let's fold some paper airplanes and see whose fly the farthest!
Huhhh? Isn't that the way back home?
Commander, you always get so much mail... Next time, I'll write you a letter too!

My sisters always told me to ask if there's anything I don't understand. But, what if I still don't get it? |Hrmmm... Is there some way to get everyone to know about how awesome I am? |Ehhh? Commander, doesn't it get boring sitting there all day?
I'm gonna finish up all these missions in one fell swoop!
Sooooo many rewards! Well? I'm pretty helpful, aren't I?
I'm the third ship of the Atlanta-class light cruisers, San Diego! I'm aiming to become the fleet's number one Super☆Star!
What's this shiny, loopy thing? I'm supposed to put it on my finger? Ooh, it's so pretty! Hehe, I guess I'll keep it on then!
Got it! It's about time we get serious~!
Awright! It's my turn to be it! One, two, skip a few... Ninety-nine, a hundred! Here I come, Commander!
Commander, you jerk!
San Diego, making her shining debut! She shoots, she scores~ Yaay! Hehe, only a genius like me could come up with a one-of-a-kind intro like that!
Eehhh? Is this stuff really going to be useful?
Did you see that? Just now?! I'm freakin' awesome!
I'm the flagship! Everyone, lesgooooo~!
Now that I'm here, Maestrale's gonna make a whole lotta friends! ...Oh, right, Commander! Are you getting along with my sis?
voiceline.oath: My sister and I both like you a lot, Commander! We love you! Ehehe~ Commander, do you love us as well?

voiceline.line: Maestrale-class destroyer – Libeccio.
Commission complete! Duuuuude, look at the loot!
Knock knock! Yeah, I'm gonna keep thwacking you around until you behave!
I wish I could get Maestrale some more friends! Commander, got any ideas?
Commander, I'm here to play! You're not busy right now, right? Ehehe, after all, Maestrale made this... silly-bus for me? In any case, it seems right!
Ehhh... Spend more time with me, Commander! What do I even want to do...? I don't care! Anything!
Commander! I'm here to play again! I don't care what you're doing! I'm gonna cling to you today no matter what! Heh~ heh~!
Hold your horsies, Commander! Lemme take my hat off first... Now, pat me!
Commander, look! Lookie lookie at what I found! It's the teabags that my sis always uses to make you tea! I wanna try it too!
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander! Hey, teach me something! Maestrale told me I should learn something that can help you out!

voiceline.line: Woah! An enemy ambush!
Ciao! Commander, let's give it our all today as well!
voiceline.oath: Ciao! Commander, let's dial it up to 11 today as well! Woohoo~!

voiceline.line: Starting emergency rescue procedures! Commander, make sure you keep me safe!
Mail time! Mail time! Whooooo~!

Maestrale's super good at organizing documents, isn't she? When I try to do it, they just end up messier and messier~|My hair's silver on the outside and blue on the inside! Beautiful, isn't it?|Commander, look over here! Kapow! Whew, a direct hit~! Ahaha!
voiceline.oath: I did my best to help you organize your documents! Ehehe! Commander, what should I do next?|Behold the Eternal Light of Sardegna! ...Uhh, what color is an eternal light, and how do you hold it? ...I wonder if Veneto will tell me...|Commander, throw the ball over here! Woohoo! Let's continue our anti-air exercises!

voiceline.line: It's mission time! All I have to do is check off the box next to 'em, right... Of course that was a joke!
The mission rewards huh... I may or may not have helped myself to a little when Maestrale wasn't looking... Ehehe~
During that war, I was the pride and joy of the Sardegna Empire, Libeccio! ...Eh, I was the first of my sisters to retire? Booo! Commander, why do you have to rub salt in the wound!
What a beautiful ring! If I put this on, it means that I'll be able to cling to you as much as I want, right? It's a promise!
Let's have some fun over here~!
Hey, what's the matter? Did something happen~?
voiceline.oath: Commander, is my sister doing alright?

voiceline.line: Smooth and flat, huh? Just like my big sis!
Ciao! The name's Libeccio! It's a pleasure to meet you, Commander! Let's be real good friends from here on out!
Such powerrrr! Time to show off to Maestrale!
The MVP is all mine! Commander, gimme a reward!
How the heck do you make a sand castle? Like this? Or maybe... like this...? Gaaaah! I give up!
Libeccio's heading towards the sea! Commander, let's go to where all the excitement is!
Yes, pat me to your heart's content!
Glub... Blub...! Blehhh, it's so salty... My kickboard flipped over in the blink of an eye... I guess I really shouldn't head out until the waves calm down a little!
One, two three, four... All righty, I'm all done warming up! Time to head down into the water~!

Sailor Libeccio, ready to head out! Captain da Recco, when do we begin the timber-shivering?|How can I get Maestrale to join us in the fun and games? ...Hmm, take some beautiful conch shells over to her?|Commander, look at that! So many footprints in the sand along the beach... Huuuh?! Th-they got washed away just like that...
Get on, Commander! We're going on a field trip!
Commander, what kind of game is this~?
Libeccio's heading towards the sea! Commander, let's go to where all the excitement is!
