It's a maid's duty to remove her Master's obstacles!
To perform a curtsy, a lady puts her feet across each other like— Forgive me, I failed to do it...
Edinburgh-class light cruiser – Belfast.
Master, the ladies have returned from their commission and are waiting for you.
You are more troublesome than a kitchen stain, Master.
There are so many ships here... Master, does "commander" refer to an incredibly wealthy person who owns a shipyard?
Do I feel nervous? Well, Master is a nice person, and none of the ladies here are merchant ships, so I have nothing to be nervous about.
I now completely understand how you think, Master... Umm, is this what's known as "empathy"? No, perhaps it's just overly easy to understand you, Master...
Master, do you think I will be a lady worthy of you, when I grow up?
Are you hungry, Master? I'm feeling quite peckish. Shall we eat together?
Master, perhaps it would be a good idea to retreat...?
Master, would you like some tea?
A lady must be elegant, even in defeat... *Sob*...
Master, would you like me to leave this letter here...?
You'd like whiskey and coffee... Umm, d-do you not drink tea...?|Master, is there anything you would like me to do?|Master, neglecting your commander duties is a big no-no!
Master, should you really let all these mission documents pile up...?
The mission rewards are here. If I prove to be of service to you, will I receive rewards too?

I am Belfast, born in Harland and Wolff. Yes, the same place as the Titanic. I actually have an older sister. She hasn't taken care of me very much, however... Umm, that's all I was going to say. Master, what type of person are you?
Does this mean you "approve of me"? Thank you, Master. However... if I wear this ring, people may get the wrong idea about you... P-perhaps you should think this through more thoroughly?
Dear enemies, this is going to be a liiiittle bit painful.
Master, you'll end up a failure if you rely on others too often. Sometimes, you must— Mmh, you leave me no choice. I-I won't help you next time, okay...?
Don't worry, Master. Even if you go to prison, I will still bring you your meals.

My Master is also a commander... Umm, so the commander is a captain of a ship? I don't quite understand, but... I will stay here for a while if you don't mind. I am Belfast, maid-in-training. It is a pleasure to serve you.
I'm not quite used to fighting, but please have faith in me.
This isn't... anything to brag about. Isn't that right, Master?
This is for you!
Owner! Squeeeeze! Giving you huggles makes me all sleepy... *yawn*... Zzzzz...
voiceline.oath: Owner! Squeeeeze! Are you free right meow? I could make some yummy sweets for you!

voiceline.line: Heavy cruiser – Cheshire.
The commission team has come back, Owner!
I loved you, Owner, I really did...
I'm gonna make lots of yummy sweets for mew, Owner♪ ...Wait, what was step one again? I forgot...
Do I start with the salt or the sugar? Or do I mix the batter? Oh, and then there's the juicy fruits Drake gave me! What do mew think, Owner?
Aww... You were right, Owner. You can't make good sweets by mixing random stuff together... But I'm not gonna give up! I'll make something yummy eventually, you'll see!
Lookie, Owner! I made this cookie with the help of my friends! ...Huh? Why is it moving? Oh, oopsie! This isn't a cookie, it's a manjuu! Sorry I got them mixed up, Owner!
Try on this kitty ear headband, Owner! Come on, have a go!
Owner! It's fine if you forget to bring me a gift, but you can't forget to give me huggles!
voiceline.oath: Owner! Mew came back early just to see me! It's good I left the office early to see mew too!

voiceline.line: I'm not giving up!
Owneeeeer! Mrreow~ Mmhh, you're so warm♪
voiceline.oath: Owneeeeer! Mrreow~ Mmhh~ Owner? Wakey wakey, Owner! Your favourite kitten is here!

voiceline.line: Do we fight back meow, before they catch on? No?
There's mail for you! I wish I could read it, but I don't know most of these words...
Hey, Bel! Show me how to make good sweets!|You think I'm cute as a kitten? Heehee, you're making me blush, Owner♪|Drake! Please buy me a gift on your next trip! Something sweet would be nice!
voiceline.extra: Now time for the whipped cream... Oh nooo! Help, Owner! I spilled cream on the floor!|When you get busy with work, I do as well! ...Wait, how does that work?|I've got a pack of orange juice for you, Owner! Give it a taste – it's great! I got it from the vending machine outside Akashi's store!

voiceline.line: You're amazing, Owner! You can do all these missions that are too much for me!
Don't stop meow, Owner! Go get your rewards, then it's time for the next mission!
I'm Cheshire, the heavy cruiser! I'll do my best to be helpful to mew, Owner! I dunno exactly what I'm gonna do, but I'll do it well! Whee~♡
Wowie, a present! ...It's a ring? Ah, I get it, you wanna trade with me! Okey-dokey! In return, you geeet... Yup, you get me! Huggles♪
Have some cannon fire, too!
What do you have for me, Owner?
voiceline.oath: Owner...?

voiceline.line: Here's another one for you, Owner!
voiceline.oath: Huh? What is it, Owner?

voiceline.line: Owneeeeer! Meeeow! Squeeze! Cuddle! Sniff! Heehee~ Here, you can have this as thanks for letting me give you the lovey-dovey cuddly-wuddly!
Thanks, Owner♪ Have this in return!
Look, Owner! I won♪
Enterprise, engaging! ...Woah! My hat...!
Vestal gets way too worked up when I get even the tiniest of scratches... It's really not that big of a deal...
voiceline.oath: Calm down, Enterprise... Keep steady and don't let the pot explode... Commander? Umm, I'm trying to learn how to cook like Vestal... Woooahh?!

voiceline.line: Yorktown-class aircraft carrier – Enterprise, Hull Number CV-6.
Commission complete! If we get enough supplies, the fight on the front lines will get that much easier!
Perhaps... You're the one who requires more learning, Commander...?
Commander, please help me train today as well! Remember what I said last time, no going easy on me!
Why do I want to become the strongest shipgirl? So that I can protect my friends, defeat our enemies, and put an end to this war. That's why!
Yorktown, Vestal, and Saratoga are all very nice to me... Wait, that's no good! What am I going to do if everyone tries to coddle me? Commander, you alone have to be strict with me!

The hero in the story who protected everyone... ended up lonely and forgotten, right? But I have you, Commander, so everything will be okay! Someday... even if my mission has come to an end, will you still be there by my side? Will we still be able to play together?
voiceline.oath: The stars shining in the night sky... Is that the place we're aiming to go to one day? I just know that the two of us can make that dream come true! Even if we have to defeat as many enemies as stars in the sky, we'll overcome anything!

voiceline.line: Okay, that's enough! If you pat my head any more, I'm not going to grow any taller!
Commander, how was my performance just now? Is there anything, anything I could do better?
This... is nothing I can't handle!
Commander, what will you teach me today?
voiceline.oath: All right, today's another day to be the best that I can be! Commander, I'll be counting on you as well!

voiceline.line: I lost... S-so frustrating...!
Commander, I brought the mail!

"Grey Ghost?" ...That's supposed to be me...? That sounds pretty awesome!|Yorktown, Hornet, and me... I just know we'll become great carriers for the Eagle Union!|I'm working hard in all sorts of things outside of battle! ...B-but lemons are out of the question!
voiceline.extra: I have to grow up faster just like Grimmy... so I can become "Big E" sooner... Wait, what do you mean that's not how it works?|Managing the fleet is super hard! Commander, can you show me how it's done?

voiceline.line: A new mission? Yes, let's get ready... Huh? It's just for you?
Mission complete! It's an honor to be of help to you, Commander!

No matter how strong the enemy is, no matter how bad things get, fight with everything you have, and seize victory - that's the motto I strive for! As long as I keep working to get stronger, I know I'll be able to do it!
Does this mean... you're proud of my achievements? ...But, I still have so much to learn... Until I become a true hero, you have to stay by my side!
You're finished!
D-did you have advice for me? Ah, please share it with me!
voiceline.oath: Commander, your advice has been super helpful! Um, do you also teach stuff to the other girls as well...?

voiceline.line: Huh...? I'm not sure I understand this order, Commander...
Hello, Commander. I am Enterprise, aircraft carrier from the Eagle Union. I want to learn as much as I can here to be a stronger warrior... Commander, will you help me?
One step closer to becoming the strongest!
Yay, I got number one again!
Bad guys that disturb the peace will be dealt with, like this!
Illustrious is steady in her steps!
Illustrious-class aircraft carrier – Illustrious, Hull Number 87.
Everyone has come back from their commission. I'll have to hurry to bring the refreshments out to them!
Were my prayers for love and peace not even enough to reach the person closest by my side...?
Commander, for the sake of love and peace, you mustn't quarrel with others, all right?
Ah, Commander, wait a second... Here, use my handkerchief... Ehehe, there are some cake crumbs stuck on the corner of your mouth~
I heard that sitting down to talk with someone can help relieve your worries. Commander, if there's anything bothering you, I'd be glad to hear you out.

Commander, you seem to not be feeling well... Are you tired from working too much? Hm... Ah, Commander, here... *pat pat* What a sweet child~ I heard this will help you not be tired... right? Ehehe, don't you feel better already?
Good job, Commander. Would you like Illustrious to give you a back massage?
For the sake of love and peace, I must not be scared!
Good day, Commander. I helped organize a little bit based upon how you had things before. How does everything look?
For the sake of a world of love and peace, next time... you won't get away!
Commander, there's mail for you. Umm, where did I put it... Oh, there it is! Here!

My planes? They're right here. Ehehe, everyone's so well-behaved. |Commander, I'll be there for you any time you're feeling lonely.|What an even more wonderful world it would be if everyone could understand each other.
Commander, are you worried about the unfinished missions? Is there anything I can help you with?
Mission complete! Thanks to your efforts, we'll be able to further spread the light of love and peace!
I am the world's first armoured aircraft carrier, ehehe. One day, I'll do my best for the glory of the Royal Navy!

S-so this is a promise ring... such an important thing, for me...? Ehehe, thank you so much! I may still be immature, but I will work hard to become the person of your dreams. No, I'm sure I'll be able to do it~♪
Holy light, pummel our enemies in the name of love and peace!
Commander's hand is so big... much bigger than mine...
Is this some sort of new game...?
Good day to you, Commander. I am Illustrious of the Royal Navy. We'll spread the holy light of love and peace all across the ocean, right~♪
With this, I'll be able to further spread the light of love and peace...
We're one step closer to a world of love and peace.
I'm giving it my all!
When I look at Hipper, I tend to get the feeling that I'm more mature than she is... Is it just me? Look, Hipper's getting all sulky again♪
voiceline.oath: I was out to console Hipper, but now you're jealous of her? Hehe, you're both so high maintenance.

voiceline.line: Admiral Hipper-class heavy cruiser – Prinz Eugen
Looks like they're done with commissions. I wonder if they'll take me with them if I ask nicely...
Sigh... what an absolute disappointment.
Commander, got anything to spill about the recent mission? I mean, it's been pretty boring only reading books these days. So, has anything interesting happened?
The Commander was still working when I got up from my nap. I wonder if they're getting enough rest... Well, it doesn't look that bad at least.
If nobody told you to stop working, you'd just keep working without rest, so I'll let you know when it's snack time. Got it? I want you to take a break, and I also want to eat some snacks.

Thank you for telling me all these interesting stories. One day, I want to head out to the huge ocean, and see all kinds of sights. Of course, you'll be with me when I do, won't you? ...Hehehe, I'm looking forward to it.
Treating me like a child... I see. Then come at me with all you've got.
Commander, don't you think it's about time for snack time? Hehehe, keep it coming.
voiceline.oath: What is it? You look ravenous, as if you want something more than just a snack. What, I'm just making fun of you♪

voiceline.line: It's not over yet...!
Good morning. Good luck with your work. I'll be here reading a book until you finish.
voiceline.oath: Oh, already done with work? Then how about you play with me instead of reading a book?

voiceline.line: So this is what defeat tastes like... Don't expect this to happen next time...!
There's some new mail. Make sure to check on it before you end up forgetting.

Alright, all that's left to do is put my finger on my lips like this... Tehehe, seeing your expression made putting this pose on completely worth it.|I can't wait until the day I can set sail with my friends... I mean, it's boring, spending all day stuck in here...|I don't get what people find tasty about alcohol. Even smelling the stuff makes me feel all dizzy.
voiceline.extra: Mein Schatz... My Darling~ I felt it was fitting to use grown-up words for my dear grown-up Commander. Hehe, what are you blushing so much for.|It's not boring at all being in this place when I'm together with you... That's how I've come to feel.|What do you mean, I should get over it and force it down, Hipper you dummy. It's over... my head is spinning...

voiceline.line: Here's a new mission. Let me know when you want some help.
voiceline.oath: I was free, so I took care of part of the mission for you.

voiceline.line: You're sharing the reward with me? Thank you.
I'm Prinz Eugen, third ship of the Admiral Hipper class. I like to read books all day since I'm still too young to go outdoors much. Uhh, I don't like beer... Is there anything else you wanna know?

Do you really need to ask me about my response when you should know what it is already? "The promised future I'd like to fulfill with you..." ...I can't hear you. Come on, speak louder! Even louder than that!
Hehe, seems like a good time to use this.
Whew... That shower left me feeling super refreshed... Yawn... Commander? Did you want to take a nap together?
voiceline.oath: Mmn, isn't it a bit early... Let me sleep in a bit longer... Zzz

voiceline.line: This is what people mean when they say, "You can't judge a book by its cover." Hehehe~
voiceline.oath: So is this how adults play together? Hehehe~

voiceline.line: Are you the Commander? I'm Prinz Eugen, Iron Blood heavy cruiser. Let's shake hands and be friends~ I'm looking forward to having a lot of fun. Heehee~
That felt nice. I'll expect more from you next time.
This doesn't feel half bad. Teehee☆
voiceline.oath: It wasn't a big deal for me.

voiceline.line: Royal Navy, search and destroy!
There are many things that I do not understand in the Codex of the Royal Knights! Commander, can you offer me any guidance?
voiceline.oath: Commander, today's reading is not on the Royal Knights? Aww... Well, if you recommend it, I'll gladly read it!

voiceline.line: Renown-Class Battlecruiser - HMS Renown
Commander! The commission fleet will return to port in ten minutes! Please... Wait, did I get the time wrong...?
Commander, please get your act together! Renown shall not abandon you!
I mustn't neglect my training or my studies... I'll do my utmost each day so that I may become a proper knight. Commander, do you want to follow this path as well?
Work is important, but taking breaks is also important! Coming from a Royal Knight, you're overworking yourself! After you finish this, please make sure to get some rest!
Commander, why did the knights in that book betray their own king? Renown is nothing like those knights! I would never betray you even if it cost me my life!
So, Commander, is it fine for Renown to always stay here? Being close to you gives me strength, and above else, my love for you is absolute! ...Huh? Did I say something weird...?
Myahh?! Wh-what are you doing?!
You're not too bad, Commander... If Renown also works harder, will she be able to... be like you one day?
voiceline.oath: Leave the preparations to Belfast, and the combat reports to me! Such are the duties of the maid and the knight, yes!

voiceline.line: Renown shall break your lines!
Commander, Renown is awaiting your orders! Please issue today's commands!
voiceline.oath: Commander, Renown has free time today and is standing by! Please give me your orders! ...Something other than "go play," please!

voiceline.line: My apologies, Commander...
This one's for you, Commander. This one's also for you... and this one too...

As long as Renown is here, no harm shall befall you, Commander! |The serious and dedicated Little Renown is cute? I see, I'll be sure to pass on the message to... wait, what? |It's not just you. Everyone here at port is truly amazing... I must redouble my efforts...!
voiceline.oath: I'm not... sleepy... at all... Commander, I'll... protect you... Zzz... My eyes...|I'm really cute? ...Um, Commander, I'm glad to receive your praise, but I'd rather be complimented on my abilities rather than my looks!|nil

voiceline.line: Commander, please allow Renown to handle the missions! H-huh? Commander, you're doing them all yourself?!
Heave-ho... C-Commander, the m-mission rewards are... wooooahhhh!!

I am the battlecruiser Renown, and I was training in Govan before coming here! Being able to weigh anchor ahead of schedule is a testament to my strength... Indeed! I will do my utmost to live up to everyone's expectations!

A promise ring? I know about this! Um, "I pledge to defend the weak and act with valor..." Oh, all I have to do is read this? Well then... "through thick and thin, we shall share our pain and willingly give love eternal." ...Commander, does that sound right?
The enemy shall never see my back turned!
Candy? I'll have you know, Commander... Renown has no use for such things!
voiceline.oath: Renown has no need for a sugar rush at this time... B-but, maybe just one piece of candy...!

voiceline.line: Commander! That's in violation of Royal etiquette!
The Renown-class battlecruiser Renown has come to join your ranks! My stature may be small, but my desire to succeed is great!
For the Commander's sake, I'm ready... to become stronger!
I've done it...! Wait, no! The books clearly teach that it is foolish to gloat over a single victory! Self control... self control...!
Did the enemy wander here by mistake? That's too bad for them.
That Veneto, she's not half bad for a fleet flagship... However, if she wants to move forward, she must learn from me. Hahahaha!
Rejoice, Commander! For you have gained an indomitable ally in Littorio, but more importantly... let's put a smile on that cute face of yours.
You need not worry, Commander. For as long as I am here, your commission rewards will be superb.
I apologize, Commander. I only wanted to push you in the right direction, but it seems that all I did was impede your progress...
You want my autograph? I will give you it for free, as a special favor... Just kidding. Hahaha!
Be more confident in yourself, Commander. To serve as the commander of Littorio means that have earned the trust of the most glorious ship in all the world. Aren't you proud?

Commander, I must admit that you have the qualities to become as glorious as me. That is a wonderful thing, for though I have always wanted a partner to journey with, none were capable of it until now.
When you give to the world, the world gives back to you. So put your mind at ease. Pursue the object of your desire and grab hold of it. Because I, Littorio, deem you worthy.
Rejoice, Commander, for I am here to bid your return welcome.
Don't give in yet, Pugliese system!
Waiting is tedious, but waiting for you is anything but, Commander.
Defeated? No, we are simply not victorious yet.
It appears there are more letters addressed to me than to you.

There are two kinds of people in the world: those who are Littorio, and those who are not.|Isn't it lamentable, Commander? There are so many places in the world that yearn for light, but there is but one Littorio.|There is no denying that, though battleships once ruled the seas, aircraft have ushered in the beginning of a new era. This is a fact that not even I can refute.
Commander, there is value to be found in all missions, so they should be carried out in earnest. Am I wrong?
Contact your superiors for me. Tell them these paltry rewards do not satisfy me.

I am Littorio, Vittorio Veneto-class battleship number two; the Mediterranean's mightiest battleship. During the war, I strutted about the ocean as if it was my garden, and that shall not change even now. Now, let us strike fear into the hearts of our enemies, Commander!

I simply cannot understand. I was convinced that nobody would be worthy of placing this ring upon me, yet here you are before my eyes, having captured my very heart... Tell me, Commander, how did you successfully win me over?
Arrivederci!
Chasing after others is a novel and interesting experience, is it not?
Commander, it's understandable that you would fall for me... but... this is not the time nor place for debauchery.
Rejoice, Commander! For you have gained an indomitable ally in Littorio, but more importantly... let's put a smile on that cute face of yours.
Your ability to see my true potential proves that your perception is superb.
Trying to oppose me was your greatest mistake.
Veneto? Don't expect much from her... No, I don't mean her swimsuit. She's the type that would spend the entire day building a sand Colosseum.
A visit to the beach with me? Then you must try your hardest to stand out. Otherwise the eyes of the world will be on me alone.
Heheh, I say you deserve some "eye candy." Interested, Commander?
I see you've returned, Commander. Hmph, today my glory shines brighter than even the sun.

There are two kinds of people in the world: those who are bewitched by Littorio's swimsuit, and those who are not. Which one are you, Commander?|The Mediterranean Sea is thing of beauty in summer, but this sea surpasses it in sheer bustle. I prefer this one; it lets my glamor reach the hearts and minds of many more.|What? That damned Veneto is going to play beach volleyball?! ... I must help her, to ensure the Sardegna Empire's glory remains unsullied...
Donning swimwear to display one's glamor for all to see – isn't it fantastic, Commander?
A visit to the beach with me? Then you must try your hardest to stand out. Otherwise the eyes of the world will be on me alone.

As proud as we are of our wonderful Sardegnian thermae, and as befittingly charming it is when Veneto conducts foreign relations from them, the fact remains that diplomacy should be left to the pros. Wouldn't you agree?
Welcome to Littorio's personal suite. Are you here to issue me a challenge of who can romance the most girls? Hahahah, I'm joking of course! There'd be no fun in a game I would win every single time.

Commander... you are an unlabeled bottle of fine riserva with more charm than meets the eye – your taste enchanting, maddening, and making one possessive over you. And I – Littorio – am no exception, tesoro mio.
Let us have a grand toast to the triumphant return of our hero. Alla salute!
None but you are permitted to keep me waiting, Commander.

Now, who will be the lucky recipient of Littorio's rose this time? Oh, but of course, Commander. If you want it, maybe you'll get it?|There are two kinds of parties in the world: those with Littorio in attendance, and those without.|I personally picked out all the various furnishings in here. It is no exaggeration to call this suite "La Littorio" itself. How do you like the sound of that, Commander?
To be frank, I've been to so many parties that I've grown a bit tired of them. Let's do something interesting for a change, shall we, Commander?
Welcome to Littorio's personal suite. Are you here to issue me a challenge of who can romance the most girls? Hahahah, I'm joking of course! There'd be no fun in a game I would win every single time.
As a leader, part of my duty to my people is to make the decisions that lead to tranquil days where everyone may rest easy.
Hello there. You'll have to forgive the loungewear; I have scarcely any reason to wear extravagant clothes in my private space away from the public eye.
Look who's back. Hang up your coat and make yourself at home. Then I can get comfortable too.
You certainly took your sweet time... It's not every day I let a person see the casual side of me, you know.

Come on now, stop and smell the roses. Care for a cup of cappuccino? Actually, no, it would keep you awake through naptime.|Hmm? Tired, are we, Commander? A bath in the thermae would rejuvenate you splendidly. I could go for one myself, in fact.|Veneto is a tad too formal, wouldn't you agree? She really ought to do like me and take time to unwind more often.
My cardigan is made of woven silk. You can appreciate its quality just from touching it, no?
When put before a stunning treasure, few could be satisfied with only watching from afar.
Hello there. You'll have to forgive the loungewear; I have scarcely any reason to wear extravagant clothes in my private space away from the public eye.
Everyone, please be mindful of yourselves. Do not get hurt if possible!
What's the matter? Your Excellency, what are you looking at so seriously?
London-class heavy cruiser – London, Hull Number 69!
Yes, the commission is done on time. Let's verify the results, shall we?
Your Excellency, please go elsewhere for your time. I shall handle everything here.
Your Excellency, a moment please. There's a bit of a problem here... Mmm, yes!... Is there anything you need?
Your Excellency, would you like to have tea together? If you're not done with your work yet, then please tend to it first. Of course, I will be with you.
A date? If your Excellency can finish all the work for the coming days, then there's no reason for me to refuse. How about it? Do you want to make the effort?

Please stay still! I had already told you to dress yourself properly. And your hair... You can be far too casual with your appearance at times, your Excellency... Yes, that should do. Where do we go for our date?
Good work. I'll handle the official matters, so please go have some hot red tea.
There seems to be a slight miscalculation...
Good day to you, your Excellency. I shall accompany you for today as well.
...I shouldn't be showing you manners when it comes to this.
Your new mail is right over here. Please confirm it.

Your Excellency... have you seen Amethyst? I've been searching for her.|The Arctic was very cold. I still feel like i'm getting a cold from there...|My, this is a fine day. Erm, well... I thought it's a good time for a conversation...
Do your best to finish your missions today.
I've already made a list of the rewards. Please take a look at them when you have a moment.

I am the lead ship of London class , London. I was a member of the First Cruising Fleet, and fought battles in North Atlantic and Pacific waters. Your Excellency, rest assured and leave the missions to me!

Thank you, please leave it there. More than that, look at this, Your Excellency... Surprised? Hehe. With our relationship, you should know why I'm not saying anything about this~ But, now that this is the occasion, let me handle the meal for today, with lots of what we like to eat.
Well then, I'm gonna try harder as well.
Bodily contact is... No, I don't mind. I'm just not used to it.
Pl... please don't do such an improper thing!

First ship of the London class, London. Member of the First Cruising Fleet, while also having took part in battles of North Atlantic and Pacific missions. If there's a mission, rest assured and let me handle it!
I'm glad, but please mind the allocation of resources.
Being praised by your Excellency is the greatest honor to me.
I can always change back to my old outfit, but to be frank, I've always looked forward to being able to wear something like this. Your Excellency, would you like me to get changed?
Um... Your Excellency, could you please stop staring at me like you don't recognise me? I didn't think that I'd get a new look for my retrofit, either... But, don't you think it's rather cute?

I feel like my mood has been changing since I got my new outfit. Your Excellency, would you like to go for some dessert in a little bit? |Your Excellency, please do not forget the fact that I am still your secretary ship. Now, please focus and get back to your work! |Your Excellency, did you know that Sussex said that this outfit looks really pretty? You don't hear words of praise from her often, hehe~
What am I going to do with you... Well then, Your Excellency, please rest for a while. I'll prepare the snacks.
Um... Your Excellency, could you please stop staring at me like you don't recognise me? I didn't think that I'd get a new look for my retrofit, either... But, don't you think it's rather cute?
Ehehe, let's party~ I'm gonna scare you to the point you're spilling fuel!
Can't see me... can't see me... can't see me...
Long Island-class escort carrier – Long Island, Hull Number CVE-1!
The girls who went out on commission aren't back yet~ Not yet~ ...Ah, they're back now!
Commander... He can't see me... He can't see me...
*ears covered* Ghosts do not talk~~~
The right answer is... BOO! Hahahahaah I Scared you! ... Ehhh... Commander, you suck at playing along...
Hehehe, Long Island the ghost has 'accidentally' possessed Commander, and cannot leave ever again~ Now Commander has no choice but to spend his every day life like this!
That said, if I am really a ghost possessing Commander, I would have to be with you all the time. During meals, during naps, when going to the bathr... Wha! Too embarrassing!
Com~man~der~ No one has returned yet~
Roooaar! ... Hehehe, were you shocked? I'm like a ghost that's going to haunt you every day!
No... No way... Could they possibly have seen me?!
Long Island used [Switcheroo] on Commander's mail! I am amazing!

Russian roulette~ candy time~ Pick the one~ with wasabi inside~|Let's drink together, eh? Cheeers~ Bfft! So bitter... I ended up drinking what the Commander is supposed to drink!|Commander~ Do my sleeves~ look like those of a ghost~?
Commander~ there's a new mission~ Once you are done~ let's sleep?
Sneaky... sneaky... Apply glue to Commander's rewards...
Hehehe, I am Long Island. Eagle Union's first escort carrier~ Using cute little planes to protect merchant ships, as well as sea lanes... That is my job~
Contract established~! With this, Long Island has officially become the ghost possessing Commander~! ...But what I do will not change... Ehehe~
Phew... I almost flashed everyone...
Commander, you dummy~! There's glue here~! ...Wh-What?! I'm stuck?! What do I do?!
Wh- what you touched isn't me! What you touched... is...a... a ghost!
Hehe, I'm Long Island~ Hello, Commander. Actually, I have another name. Do you want to know?
Long Island's... EXP points... have been increased!
Hehehe~ Look at them! They don't even know what hit them!
Commander, can I just chill out back here?
That get up is the usual Long Island wearing her public face~ ... Want some potato chips?
Everyone's favorite and talked-about Long Island, actually has another hidden secret...
Commander~ intruding into a person's room is against the law! I-I'm reporting you!
You found out my secret, Commander... Oh well! Please don't tell anyone else, ok?
Are you free, Commander? Wanna play a game then? We can make plastic models too if you want.
Commander, my room is not a game store~ Oh, you just want to play with me? F...Fine! I just bought a newly launched title. Wanna play it together?
We need more co-op games, as well as tools... Eeeh, I don't wanna go outside~ Commander, for the sake of the future of the adorable Long Island~ Please buy this list up!
Good work out there, Commander. Time to relax~ Here you go, you're now Player 2
Ah, Long Island has become... Tired Island...

Commander, don’t bother me, I’m really busy right now. Busy with what? Games! All of these stuipid friggin backlogged games!|Commander, I brought a bunch of snacks~ Should I give you some?|Commander, do you like High Grade or Magical Grade stuff? I even got Powerful Grade stuff too!
Everyone's favorite and talked-about Long Island, actually has another hidden secret...
It being Halloween and me being a ghost, I went around trying to scare people, but it was too much work so I gave up and just went back to NEET it up in my room instead.
"Tune in everyone, Gamer Girl L.I. is about to begin her spooky Halloween special stream~" ...Well, that should do it for my channel intro... Hmm, wonder how many viewers I'll get~
It's easy to get burnt out when you do nothing but game streams... Oh, I know! Let's assemble a scale model instead next stream!
Commandeeeer! Come help out with my streaming setup~ Hehehe, come on~ I'll give you all the snacks you can eat in return~
Oh no, my viewership is going down!

Hm? This message is from "Prancing_dragon_warrior," who says: "L.I., please impart more of your pro gamer knowledge to me!" Uhh, sure, I guess. We can do a viewer co-op stream later.|Someone's at the door? Commandeeeer! Grab some of the snacks by the bed and give them to whoever's knocking~|If I can make this streaming thing pay then I'll be able to buy new games without it killing my wallet! You should give it a try too, Commander~
Tired after all that work, Commander? Here, have one of my cushions~
Y-you're gonna get me demonetized!
"Tune in everyone, Gamer Girl L.I. is about to begin her spooky Halloween special stream~" ...Well, that should do it for my channel intro... Hmm, wonder how many viewers I'll get~
Hmm? This outfit is more refreshing so, no issues!
Commander~ I am Long Island~ I've changed? Ghosts don't cha... Huh? I seemed to have become a little more alive!

You know, Long Island the ghost has become boring... Now, I am Long Island the Jiangshi, jumping zombie!|Ehehe~ Commander, are you looking for your gaming handheld?|Com~man~der~! Huh? You really fell asleep? Hehehe~ What kind of pranks should I pull?
Lunch together? I need to finish assembling my plastic model, so, apologies, Commander!
I am a ghost~! ...Still, it's not good to touch ghosts out of a whim!
Commander~ I am Long Island~ I've changed? Ghosts don't cha... Huh? I seemed to have become a little more alive!
Ugh... What did I do to deserve this big-ass responsibility...
voiceline.oath: This is my chance to shine! ...But I don't need to take it.

voiceline.line: Could you NOT call me without a reason? ...You know what, on second thought... If you're bored, chat with me.
voiceline.oath: Need something? Wait... Now's a bad time. I've got urgent business. By that I mean: chat with me!

voiceline.line: Derfflinger-class battlecruiser – Lützow.
The commission team is back. We don't have to go out and meet them, do we?
Ugh... I hate this place. I hate this place so much.
Don't feel like doing a dang thing today... Hey, Commander, what do you do to get through the day when you've got no energy?
You follow a schedule? It's all about getting into habits, huh... I getcha. Can you show me what yours is like?
Can't you, you know, ignore a schedule if there's a ton of work on it? ...No? A schedule sounds pretty awful then. Just do like me and do whatever you want~
Hey, Commander, how about we run away together? ...I'm just kidding with you. Don't get all worked up. All I want is for you to forget all your troubles when we're alone together~
I'm not sleepy. That was just a li'l yawn... *yaaawn*...
You're back! It's kinda boring when you're not around.
Nuh-uh, I don't feel a thing!
G'morning. Hey, can I sit down a li'l longer? This chair is just too comfy.
voiceline.oath: G'morning. What I'm putting in the paper shredder? Just your schedule for today. We're gonna have a good time instead♪

voiceline.line: Welp, we lost... This blows. I'm heading home.
Here's your mail. No need to thank me, I just picked it up on the way.

Why won't you let me sleep in the office? Because that interferes with your work? Huh... And that's a bad thing?|Hey, show me what you're working on... It's just a bunch of random charts and numbers. 'Kay, have it back.|If you can't find me in the office, I'm likely out and about somewhere. Don't worry, I'll be back before you know it. Probably.
voiceline.extra: Since I can't sleep in your office, I'll do it in your private quarters instead. Or is that also a no-go? Heheh, if it is, just say it♪|Need a hand there? All right. I could help you with... not much, it seems. I'll just take a nap instead.|What I'm doing? Looking 'round for places we can go to on a date. Ooh, this looks promising! Let's go there the next time you're free.

voiceline.line: A mission? Miss me with that. You'll be fine on your own anyway.
Mission complete. Why're you giving me that look? You're the one who got it done, not me.
Hey, I'm Iron Blood battlecruiser Lützow. I was part of the High Seas Fleet, and... I forgot what I was gonna say. Eh, whatever, I'll probably remember after I've had a nap.
Carefree as I am, we're stuck together now~ Stuck together by means of this ring, anyway. You're the only person I'll take orders from, and I expect you to do me a few favors in return~
I guess maybe I'll try.
You wanna hug this fella? Go ahead. Only a quickie though, okay?
Geesh, you're more daring than I took you for. Imagine that.
voiceline.oath: Mrmh, mmh... Heehee, payback!

voiceline.line: *yawn*... Hm? Who are you? Can you point me to the Commander? ...YOU'RE the Commander? Heehee, all right, saves me the effort of looking for you. I'm Lützow, Iron Blood battlecruiser. Since we're done here, I'm gonna take my leave~
Hm? Am I stronger now? Doesn't feel like it, honestly.
Zzz... Ahh, I'm so sleepy. Is the battle over yet?
voiceline.oath: *yaaawn*... We're finished here, Commander. Let's move on.

voiceline.line: This looks kinda like a ball dress, doesn't it? So make like at a ball and ask me for a dance. Whether I accept or not hinges on your ability to persuade, though~
"Have you come to accept your fate, human? Heehee~" ...Don't just stand there, Commander. Say something!
Gaze into my eyes, Commander... Yeah, the script says I have you under my spell, so just keep gazing~ By the way, vampires drink blood through the neck, right? 'Cause I want a taste~ Nom♪
You're under my complete control, and will always come back to me... Heehee, I call this plot device "the curse of Dracula's Castle."
Welcome back, Commander. Now where's my crimson elixir? As in, my daily glass of wine~

Garlic? Crosses? Those don't work on me... Those are meant to repel a vampire? Well then, I'm throwing those weaknesses right out the window.|Seydlitz, the key to acting is to fully immerse yourself in your role. You don't have to think about it too hard.|Hrmph. I'm trying my absolute best here, and you're not even looking, Commander... I'll just have to MAKE you pay attention!
Aww, come ooon. I'm comfy right where I am – don't make me get up.
When a human feels bliss, that's when their blood tastes sweetest♪
"Have you come to accept your fate, human? Heehee~" ...Don't just stand there, Commander. Say something!
You brought this upon yourselves, opponents. Why must you make me spill blood?
As the flagship... I've got to boost everyone's morale... Roar...!
voiceline.oath: Everyone, p-please do your best...!

voiceline.line: If only Libeccio was here... I wouldn't have to agonize over how to talk to the commander...
voiceline.oath: I really l-like talking to you, Commander... Even though I'm usually the one answering questions, but... I'd actually like to get to know more about you......

voiceline.line: Maestrale-class destroyer – Maestrale.
A commission has been completed. The dockhead is looking rather crowded...
Keep your distance from me! Shoo, shoo...!!
Libeccio, please don't bother the commander in the middle of work hours... Here, I'll make a syllabus of the times when the commander is available. Mm, that should be right... hopefully.
Commander... Please look over this. It's a table of our recent mission earnings... I hope it can be of help to you...
...Commander? Why'd you come all the way... t-to talk to me? Um, right now, I'm a bit... err, I mean, yes, I'm available! I'm available, but I can't... Sorry...!
Um, Commander, please take this...! Libeccio told me that if there ever was something I'd never be able to say... to put it down in a picture book! P-please take a look...!
Wh-what's going on...?
How to make tea... Um, take the teabag and steep it in hot water... Commander, p-please let it sit for a few minutes...
voiceline.oath: Welcome back. I've been studying how to make tea from the Royal Maids. Oh, but keep it a secret from Libeccio, okay...?

voiceline.line: What should I do...? What should I do?!
Greetings, greetings... G-good morning to you, Commander...
voiceline.oath: Good day... Th-there's no need to be so formal? I, I see... th-thanks then...

voiceline.line: I've been defeated... What should I be saying...?
The mail, where'd I put the mail...? Phew, I almost forgot it after all the time I spent organizing it...

What do I think of Libeccio? ...She's my precious little sister. She can be a bit of a klutz at times though, ehehe...|The documents I was just working on are over here, and the already-finished ones are here... Ah, it's not that I couldn't find them, I just thought it'd be more efficient to remind myself out loud... S-sorry... *blushes*|Commander, you must be tired... Ahh, just thinking about it makes me nervous...
voiceline.oath: L-Libeccio isn't here today, so... Commander, how about we go somewhere t-together?!|The mission supplies are over here, the reward list is over here, and the ring box that Commander gave me is... Oh... *blushes*|nil

voiceline.line: Are you going to... continue working on your high-priority missions? Err, I mean... let, let me help you!
Mission complete. Umm, should I go help you confirm the rewards after all...?

I am the name ship of the Maestrale-class destroyers, Maestrale. During that war, I remember hitting a naval mine and having to return to port for repairs... The rest of my history? Umm, I, I don't think there's anything else...
Wh-what should I be saying during a wedding ceremony? ...Um, I don't need to say anything at all? Well then... *kiss* Th-that's fine too, right...?
N-now it's my turn!
D-did I say something inappropriate?
voiceline.oath: Commander, need a hand?

voiceline.line: ...Wh-what is the meaning of this?!
voiceline.oath: Ehehe... Commander...

voiceline.line: Now lift the rim of your skirt and bow... Ahem! I'm Maestrale, d-destroyer from the Sardegna Empire. Greetings to you and your fleet, Commander. I hope I did that right...
Shelling, torpedoes, and reloading... I must becoming stronger in all aspects...
My thoughts about getting MVP? ......Uh, umm, it's nice...?
voiceline.oath: We did it! Commander, thank you very much! *nods*

voiceline.line: Though I'm not able to build the Colosseum like Lady Veneto can, when it comes to the Leaning Tower, a cathedral, or a basilica... Um, I can kind of get the rough shape down!
It's way too crowded on the beach... I'd much rather be– Oh, Commander? Are you not good with crowded places either...?
Commander, did you come all the way here to see me? Th-thanks for your concern...
Greetings, greetings... Err, umm, Commander, w-want to sit down?

Veneto's Colosseum is truly spectacular... I wish I could fill in the other half...|Libeccio, stop trying to drag me around.. You can go hang out with the commander instead.|The letters I etch into the sand are immediately washed away by the waves. I see, this is what they mean when they say "write your worries on the beach"...
Commander, did you want to get buried in the sand just like these manjuu? I'll see what I can do then...
P-please stop that...!
It's way too crowded on the beach... I'd much rather be– Oh, Commander? Are you not good with crowded places either...?
Go get 'em! Follow my lead!
Why do I run like that? Ah, well, I was inspired by a comic I read. Makes me look pretty badass, doesn't it?
voiceline.oath: Too slow, Commander! Hahaha! To be fair, keepin' up with my pace ain't easy. I can teach you a way to run faster, if you're interested.

voiceline.line: M-class light cruiser – Magdeburg
Heads up, Commander! Commish team's back, so you know what that means!
You're pissin' me off to no end. Either sort yourself out, or leave me the hell alone!
Swamped with work, I'm guessin'? Need a hand? Fighting's not all I'm good for – I can do simple paperwork too, y'know.
To what do I owe this cuppa joe? ...The paperwork I did earlier? Ahahah, thanks! I'll have just a dash of milk.
Let's not think in terms of favors-for-favors and just help each other out when we need it, like homies do! Nice and simple that way, too!
Nobody matches my wavelength better than you. You and I, we're the OTP... Oh, guess that also makes us the port's number one power couple!
voiceline.oath: Now that we've gone from homies to like, hand-holding homies, I don't know where to take things from here... "Don't worry about it?" Yeah, guess you're right! We got to this point by just going with the flow, so let's stick to that!

voiceline.line: Huh? The hell are you doin'?
voiceline.oath: Huh? Uhh... Guess I don't mind...

voiceline.line: Sweet, you're back. Run into any tough foes out there?
voiceline.oath: Good, you're back! I won't even have to lift a finger if you keep this performance up! Ahahaha!

voiceline.line: I take hits like this for breakfast! Try harder!
Aw yeah, I'm feelin' it today! Let's knock out all the paperwork in one go!
voiceline.oath: Oh yeah, I'm in the zone! So, what are we doin' today, buddy?

voiceline.line: Welp, guess this one's fubared. My bad...
New mail, yo! You really oughta make it a habit to check your mailbox.

Hooh! Hah! And just for good measure... Whupah! Suddenly felt like doing a backflip, that's all. Hope I didn't startle ya there.|If I catch you slackin', your forehead's getting a whackin'. Relaaaax, I'll be gentle.|I just want the next chapter of this comic I'm reading to come out! But it's a weekly release, so all I can do is wait...
voiceline.extra: Commander, why don't ya try a somersault for yourself? Don't be scared now, I'll catch you to make sure you don't get hurt.|You slackin' again? Heheh, well, that's a forehead-flicking right there! ...Oh, crap, did I overdo it? Sorry, buddy. I'll go easy on ya next time.|nil

voiceline.line: Guess what – new missions just dropped. We doin' 'em, or?
voiceline.oath: Every new mission's a new challenge! C'mon, let's get it done!

voiceline.line: Mission complete! You gonna do the math for my share of the rewards next? Hahah.

I'm Magdeburg, Iron Blood light cruiser. Don't got much of a record to boast about, but meh, what matters is the fact I'm here right now. If you need a problem fixed or someone's ass kicked, hit me up!

Honestly, I didn't plan for this at all... I doubt I've even got the kind of charm you deserve. No, no, I'm not turnin' you down! I absolutely love you, it's just... Well... Ahh, to hell with it! I can't find the right words!
Open up for a knuckle sandwich! ...Err, I mean a cannon volley!
You wanna bump fists? Aight! Bam!
voiceline.oath: Brofist coming at you! Intercept! Hahahaha!

voiceline.line: I'll choose to believe that was just an accident...
voiceline.oath: Hm? Whuh...? I can't put my finger on what I'm feeling here...

voiceline.line: Yo! Iron Blood light cruiser Magdeburg here! Gimme a fistbump to celebrate us becomin' homies! Wait, uhh... Got these metal gauntlets on, so go easy for your own sake.
Send me into battle and we'll find out if I really got stronger or not!
Hell yeah! This calls for a victory somersault!
First thing's first – these meddlesome assholes have got to go!
You being a cute li'l cat doesn't change the fact you've been naughty. Learned your lesson yet? Good, then don't let that happen again.
You little...! Look what a damn mess you made! And I'm the one who's gotta clean it up now! ...Oh. Perfect timing, Commander. Could use a hand with the floor here, after what this little turd did.
Commish team has returned? Ah, crap! I'd better put on some coffee, quick!

First these li'l cats make a mess of the place, then I'm forced to lecture 'em on it. Pain in my ass... Ahem. Listen... If I ever end up doing something similar to these guys... would you try to... N-nah, never mind I said anything!
I'm trying to clean here, dammit!
Your battle's already over, while there's no end in sight to mine... *sigh*...
Wish I could say "I'll be right with you!" but I've got this mess to deal with... Ugh, this sucks ass.
Aw damn. I blew it...
Left your mail on the desk. Don't forget to read it.

Okay, cats can be kinda cute when they're behaving... But that's how they getcha! You let your guard down, and that's when they strike!|Ulrich, come gimme a hand here... Whaddya mean no way?! Just 'cause they refuse to play with you?!|I don't mind helping 'round the café, but I never signed up to clean messes like this... I figured cats would be, y'know, cute and docile...
Commander and I are leavin' to take care of a new mission. You cats better behave while we're out!
Whew... That's that mission done. Now to focus on this again...
You're gonna help me out? Great, thanks!
What, you trying to get me to grab you by the neck like this cat here?
You little...! Look what a damn mess you made! And I'm the one who's gotta clean it up now! ...Oh. Perfect timing, Commander. Could use a hand with the floor here, after what this little turd did.
Victory is meowrs! ...N-no! Slip of the tongue, that's all...
Onwards, girls! Holy is the war that we wage!
Do you understand, Lord Commander? The Cardinal herself is with us in this war. Therefore, it's a holy war! You should feel honored to be part of it!
voiceline.oath: You went shopping with Algérie?! N-no, I'm not envious in the slightest, not at all! ...Though I wish you'd have taken me along...

voiceline.line: Vauquelin-class destroyer – Maillé Brézé.
The commission team hath returned! Heheh. The rewards would've been greater if you'd entrusted the job to a Templar Knight like me...
We both have goals to work towards! I'll strive to be a full Templar Knight, and thou should strive to be a half-decent commander!
I may still be a way's off from full knighthood, but I would still give my life for our holy crusade! Give me orders, and I will execute them, Lord Commander!
Lord Commander, if you ever feel anxious before a battle, simply put your hands together and pray, like... "Iris, watch over our souls," and you'll be fine!

It's not enough to protect just my Iris comrades. I must fight for all my friends here at port too... Oh, the burden on my shoulders doth grow ever bigger... Cardinal, Lord Commander, how will I carry this weight...?
If we share the burden of protecting everyone, then we can manage this feat together! The Cardinal told me that! On my sword, I vow to work harder than ever!
voiceline.oath: Lord Commander! When is the next sortie? I must know so I can prepare for our holy battle, and also to relax and repose! Most of all, I'd love to spend a day off together with you~

voiceline.line: Stunning hair ornament, am I right?
Exemplary work, Lord Commander! Although I guess it would have been a cakewalk for the Cardinal!
voiceline.oath: Outstanding performance, Lord Commander! If you brought gifts for the Cardinal, I may deliver them for you!

voiceline.line: I cannot and will not succumb...!
Sound the trumpets, for I am here! ...Ah, morning salutations, Lord Commander!
voiceline.oath: Good morning, Lord Commander! Early as always, I see! Hehehe~

voiceline.line: Th-thou may crush my body, but my spirit will live on...! Wait, that doesn't sound right...
New mail... The information inside is sure to be of paramount significance!

Our next battle is important, and I will not neglect my training in preparation for it!|Vauquelin! Thou must eat thy veggies! ...G-green peppers, however... Yes, it's a bad vegetable! Thou may pass on that one!|The Cardinal herself will be spectating our next exercise?! Oh goodness, oh dear... I must practice more!
voiceline.extra: I will protect you with my life, as your sworn knight, Lord Commander! Hehehe~|Mayhaps I should ask Émile for dancing lessons... N-nothing! Just thinking out loud!|Anything you require, I can do no problem! Simply give the order, Lord Commander!

voiceline.line: What about these unfinished missions? You'd better do them before the Cardinal scoldeth you.
Mission complete! It's time to reap the rewards, Lord Commander!
I am Maillé Brézé, Vauquelin-class destroyer! I am renowned for my ability to escort, patrol, transport, and to fight off submarines! ...Ultimately, though, it didn't save me from sinking... Aww...
To whom do I deliver this ring, Lord Commander? ...I-it's for me?! You're serious?! I-I accept. I just worried for a bit whether you truly wanted me...
Feel my holy might!
It won't be long before I'm dubbed a full-fledged Templar Knight!
Are you that enamored by my sheer magnificence?
voiceline.oath: Is this... what falling in love feels like?!

voiceline.line: Destroyer Maillé Brézé, Templar Knight of the Iris Libre, has arrived! Thou there, plebeian, thou may now sleep soundly knowing I'll defend thy lanes! ...What? Y-you're the Lord Commander?! F-f-forgive my grave disrespect just now!
Another step on my journey to full knighthood!
There you have it! That was a display of a Templar Knight's might!
voiceline.oath: We did it! We are victorious, Lord Commander! Hehehe! The Cardinal will surely honor me for this!

voiceline.line: Those things in the dark were just... Manjuus? N-n-no, impossible! Those little creatures could never frighten me so!
H-h-halt, intruder! Thou art intruding in the domain of an Iris Libre Templar Knight, a crime punishable by... Eek! I'm begging you, spare my life! ...It's you, Lord Commander?!
I can't t-take this anymore!
You're back! You're finally back! I was sooooo scared, Lord Commandeeeer...!
Wh-what is it, Lord Commander? As you see, I'm simply guarding my room...
G-g-go check your mail, right now!

Why am I afraid of monsters under the bed...? I-I-I'm not!|Eek! I heard a weird noise coming from outside! I'm sure of it! Help meeee, Lord Commander!|It's times like these when I envy Tartu so much...!
I-I was merely pretending to be spooked!
Could you stay here until I fall asleep...?
H-h-halt, intruder! Thou art intruding in the domain of an Iris Libre Templar Knight, a crime punishable by... Eek! I'm begging you, spare my life! ...It's you, Lord Commander?!
S-see?! No monster can scare me as long as I have the Iris' protection!
Don't get in my way.
voiceline.oath: Für den Kommandant!

voiceline.line: Achievements? ...Let's start racking them up today.
voiceline.oath: Commander, are you satisfied with my battle record? I see, that's good.

voiceline.line: Light cruiser – Mainz.
The girls who went on commissions are returning. I'll be leaving my seat for a bit.
To think that my first commander would be this pathetic... How depressing.
Because I was born into this world, I shall accomplish something. Otherwise, I wouldn't be able to face those who designed me.
If I am lacking in actual battle experience, there is nothing to do but humbly accumulate more. Commander, I won't mince words - please send me out on more battles.
At one point I fought to prove myself. However, I now fight for your sake. I want to prove to everyone else that you are a sufficiently reliable person.
Commander, I recognize you as the first and last commander I swear my loyalty to... But that's not all. You are the only one I've ever thought I wanted to get closer to.
My equipment needs maintenance, too.
Ugh, to think that my equipment wouldn't work...?!
Make sure that the wait was worth my time, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Here's some fresh coffee. I've made it to your taste.

voiceline.line: Hm. I'll consider this as valuable practical experience.
There's new mail. There's no way you've forgotten, right?
voiceline.oath: You've got new mail. Leave the rest to me.

voiceline.line: What do you think you're doing! Adding milk to coffee is nothing short of blasphemy! The same goes for sugar!!!|I can't believe it... though this room is so large, it doesn't even have a coffee maker...!|If only I were constructed in the Great War instead of being incarnated in this form, I wonder how much I would have been able to do... I guess thinking about it doesn't help.
voiceline.oath: Commander, I've acquired some coffee beans. Allow me to make you some fresh coffee. I'd like for you to experience the joy of coffee for yourself.|nil|I'm grateful that I was able to incarnate into this era. To tell you the truth, it's because I have such a wonderful Commander like you.

voiceline.line: Are you going to neglect all the missions?
voiceline.oath: Commander, I beg you, please don't forget about the missions after your break.

voiceline.line: How long... are you planning on ignoring the mission rewards?
voiceline.oath: I'll be going to get the mission rewards...

voiceline.line: Light cruiser, Mainz. There were plans for me to succeed the Admiral Hipper class, but due to circumstances, I've incarnated in this form. You get the rest without me telling you, right?
My existence is no longer just about battle. My life and fate have already been tied to yours. My beloved Commander, I henceforth pledge my heart to you for the rest of eternity.
Now's the time! Begin firing!
What's wrong? Do you want me to comfort you?
voiceline.oath: Commander, I'm right here by your side. And I always will be.

voiceline.line: Perfect. I can finish testing my guns by firing them at you.
voiceline.oath: *cough*, Commander, please hold yourself back!

voiceline.line: Light cruiser, Mainz. You'll be my first Commander. Hmph. Don't you dare disappoint me.
Hm. Let's test this out in a real battle.
An expected outcome, given that I am here.
Hehehe~ Now it's my turn to take command!
You've heard I've only been on transport missions? No, I-I've totally fought before too!
Yuugumo-class destroyer number five – Makinami.
If you don't take commissions seriously then you'll be in serious trouble!
Hmph. ...Leave me alone.
It'd be a shame to not go out and play on a sunny day like this! Right? Let's head out~
Oww... I tripped again... Can you give me a piggyback ride back home, Commander...?
Fine... I'll start looking where I'm going and not run and jump so much... Doesn't it get boring for you, always walking like that...?
I-is this a bride carry?! H-hehehe... But I still think I prefer your piggyback rides...
Do you want to do my hair...?
The team has returned! Hehehe~ Welcome back, everyone~
C-could we retreat?!
C'mon, stop being so blue and be positively positive!
All we can do is place our hopes on the next one...
Hey, Commander... Can you read what's written in this letter for me...?
Kongou-san and Haruna-san were so nice to me... You should be too, Commander!|Doing Tokyo Express runs... wasn't any fun at all...|Night battles are what Desron 2 do better than anyone else!
Oh, we've got another mission...
Heeey! A commission's done!

I'm Makinami, I belonged to Destroyer Division 31. Serving as Kongou-san's and Haruna-san's escort, I helped in tons of battles in the Pacific! ...Hehehe~ I gave the Eagle Union a real beating in the Battle of Tassafaronga!
If you ever get hurt, I promise I'll carry YOU back home! So can you give me a piggyback ride now? Hehehe~
Here's a present from me~!
Umm, Commander... I'm not slacking off on pur... Eeek?!
Commander, why are you suddenly glomping me?!
I'm Makinami, the Yuugumo-class destroyer! I surfed the waves to come here! I'll be counting on you, Commander!
Heh heh~ I feel stronger!
I'm just the best ship ever~
I was running earlier and tripped on something... But Hamakaze helped me back up, and now I feel fine!
All right, everything looks good! I'm super excited and my batteries are fully charged! I'm heading out~!
Oh right, it's almost time for class! I'm gonna need my notepad... Wait, huh? Where'd it go?
Hey, listen! I've heard there are these cool legendary things at school! Let's go check if they're true or not!

Oh, it's Haruna! Hey, Harunaaaaa! Let's head to the classroom together~|Hey, I know! We can trade snacks with each other, Commander! Lemme see what you brought for lunch~!|Huh? You don't have any evening plans? In that case... Let's come up with something to do!
You're gonna give me extra lessons, Commander? Hehe~ That sounds like fun!
W-wait, is this... Th-that "student and teacher" thing...?!
All right, everything looks good! I'm super excited and my batteries are fully charged! I'm heading out~!
I wonder what kind of prank I should pull~
voiceline.oath: Captain Mami is here to lead the charge~!

voiceline.line: You want to know more about me~? If you play with me, I'll show~ it~ all~!
voiceline.oath: Go go, Commander! Get the combo there! ...Yay~! We finished the game! Commander, you're not half bad~

voiceline.line: Nihihi~♪ I'm the idol, Mami Futami! You'll get to feast your eyes on how alluring Mami is, so look forward to it, Commander~!
Good job returning safely! To the victor go the spoils!
Wowow, even though I had the Commander pull for me, I didn't get a single Rare character!
Oh, Commander! Have you seen Ami around? Hmm. We had promised to eat pudding together though...
Save me, Commander! I got caught pulling a prank, and now I'm getting chased around! Let me hide over here for a bit~!
I saw a really tasty pudding at the store earlier~! Oh, I sure want to eat some with the Commander~ ...Huh, you're going to buy some? That's the Commander for ya♪
Gotta be careful so I don't wake them up... quietly... Woah, you were awake? ...I-I'm not playing a prank on you, I was just trying to drape a blanket over you! Believe me, Commander!
voiceline.oath: Commander, I'm here to pick you up! You promised to play games with me and the others today, right~? Come on, let's go~! ...Oh, and can we stop by the store on the way there?

voiceline.line: What is it? Do you want to play games with me, Commander?
Welcome back, Commander! Hey hey, isn't it snack time yet~?
This is the part where I show off my true power...
Commander, are you still asleep? If you don't get up soon, I'm gonna doodle all over your face~
voiceline.oath: Good mornin', Commander! Take a good look! Don't I look absolutely dazzling today~?

voiceline.line: Uegh! This wasn't in the job description~! Hurry up and retreat!
Looks like there's a letter for you? I wonder if it's a love letter from someone~

There are so many people at the port that I can show my pose off to! If I train like this, I'll be able to become sexier in no time♪|Hey Commander, are you dozing off? Heh, I guess I'll use this opportunity to put some 'special' pictures on their desk...|Hiya Commander! Hm? What am I doing with this package? Hehehe~ Expect great things☆
voiceline.extra: Commander~! Take a look at this pose! Don't I look totally alluring? It's going right to your head, isn't it~?|Hey hey hey~ Let's go to the canteen together, Commander! I'll treat you to a ton of tasty food!|So this is the Commander's office~! Nihihi~ It's time for the bombshell treasure hunter, Mami, to hunt for treasure...

voiceline.line: Commander... let's finish work quickly and get it over with, yeah?
voiceline.oath: It looks like you've still got some work left to do. Let's get it over with! I'll cheer you on from the sidelines~

voiceline.line: Yay! We're done, Commander~! Now, let's go back and play games together!
voiceline.oath: To the Commander who worked extra hard, extra headpats!

voiceline.line: The name's Mami Futami. Ami's my twin. When we do our hair the same way, we look exactly alike~! You think I'm actually Ami and not Mami? Ehehe~ Who knows~♪
Commander! I'm so very terri-bully thankful that you always play with me~! The mature, alluring Mami, will continue to work hard in the future, so please look forward to it~♪
Mature allure, full blast~☆
Oh, Commander! If you're free, come play with me~!
Commander, has my mature allure made you fall head over hells for me~?
voiceline.oath: No matter how enchanted you might be by my beauty, you can't do that, Commander!

voiceline.line: Nihihi~♪ I'm the idol, Mami Futami! You'll get to feast your eyes on how alluring Mami is, so look forward to it, Commander~!
Don'tcha think I leveled up my mature allure stat~?
Yay, I won~! Let's see, what are the drops this time around~?
voiceline.oath: Did you become bedazzled by my mature allure?

voiceline.line: Why is my yukata knee-length? Well, that's to bewitch everyone with my alluring legs, of course... Huh, it has no effect on you? Come on Commander, no need to lie~
Woah~! They're starting to send up the huge fireworks! ...Hey, Commander, just where are you looking? Did Mami's alluring yukata make you go crazy with desire~?
Wow, I'm so tired~ I sure wish I was drinking some nice, cold ramune right now~ (Glance)
Commander, you're such a slowpoke! We'll be hitting up every stall, so hurry hurry♪

Let's see who's better at cork gun shooting first! Then when I win, you can buy me some takoyaki~♪|Don't die on me now, we're heading to the next stall~♪ Today, we're having fun 'til we drop~!|Goldfish scooping, huh... Commander, does the store at the port sell aquariums?
You look hot, Commander. I'll do you a favor and cool you off with my fan! Take this, and that~!
Fufufu~ Looks like the Commander can't win against the summer heat either~
Woah~! They're starting to send up the huge fireworks! ...Hey, Commander, just where are you looking? Did Mami's alluring yukata make you go crazy with desire~?
Tiiiime to get serial!
Why follow the stupidly serial boss-and-subordinate template, am I right? Hehehe, let's just hang out and be friends!
voiceline.oath: Commander, you've *gotta* read this great book... It's on administration and philosophy, what about it?

voiceline.line: Omaha-class light cruiser – Marblehead, Hull Number CL-12.
Commander, I figure a commission should be done by now. Hm? Nah, I've just got a good mental clock~
You're uncool as heck, Commander. I'mma hit up Concord and hang with her instead...
This here picture I've got? Ah, that average-looking girl used to be me. Whatevs, let's put that aside and go have some fun~!
I'm not really shy about my past as an ordinary girl. What's then is then, what's now is now, y'know? I think my new look better expresses who I am~ So anyway, as I was saying...
I guess it's like, you lose sight of what's fun when you go super-serial all-work-and-no-play, you get me? I'm having tons of fun now, and wouldn't go back to my dorky self even if you told me to.
I dunno if you're into girls like me, but *I'm* into commanders like *you*, so~ What do you say we get closer each other? Let's get the ball rolling with a date~
Commander, you feelin' hungry? I got some cake, fresh outta the oven.
Guess I've gotta crank up the serial factor...!
Libra's horoscope for today promises... super good luck.
voiceline.oath: Your horoscope for today promises... mega good luck!

voiceline.line: I have to investigate into what went wrong this battle... Oh, uh, never mind I said anything!
Guess this is new mail or something... Right, I'll just pretend I never saw it.

Yo, Commander, I promised Memphis I'd color her nails in 2 hours! That's gonna take about an hour to do, so if you've got work for me then you might wanna give it now.|Let's see... Hey, Commander~ See this? I don't really get what this part says, but somethin' about it looks off.|Put the seal there, check the numbers, make a report... Hm? Oh, I'm not up to anything special! You're just imagining things, probably!
voiceline.oath: Yo, Commander, the port's 7 mysteries are some seriously interesting stuff. Let's go check one out the next time you're off duty~|Maybe I'm a bit garish, but don't underestimate my smarts! Lemme see what part you're stuck on~|nil

voiceline.line: Once this mission's done, could you go get the milk tea I ordered? And not too much sugar, thanks.
You, uh, one of those super-achievers, Commander? I'm... I-I'm kinda sorta into people like that.
I'm Marblehead, your average Omaha-class girl. I went like, all over the globe during the war, and stuff like that. Anyhoo, let's be buds and just chill, 'kay?
I totally knew it, we're like, made for each other~ I looked into your personal preferences ages ago, so yeah~ All right, you wanna come with me and have some fun again today?
Try *this* on for size!
Commander, I'm trying to take a selfie here, so could you move?
voiceline.oath: Come a little closer, Commander. I'mma take a picture of you~

voiceline.line: Whuah?! Commander, that's *really* creepy, okay?
voiceline.oath: Smokin' bod I've got, am I right? Heehee!

voiceline.line: Sup. Name's Marblehead. Are you the Commander? Ahah☆ I dig your style. Hehehe, let's hang out sometime!
Huh. You fancy a girl like me?
Smile for the camera, Commander~ I need a selfie to preserve this moment~
I started reading up on building muscle for future reference, and man there's a lot to learn~

After trying out a whole bunch of activities, I settled on joinin' the boxing club in the end. Everyone wants to exercise now and then, right? Come along, Commander, and we'll have a fun workout together~
We could have a workout date someday~ Like a "let your fists do the talking" kinda thing, or something like that~ Be a darling, Commander, and take my loving blows~
Good going out there. You want a sip of my electrolyte-rich sports drink?
All right, Commander, let's start with some warmups~

Let's leave our boring work and social troubles behind and focus only on workin' out~|I need a break... All right, time to check out the MME tournament on TV~|Commander, you seen Omaha 'round here? I bet she's off gorging herself on snacks in secret. Don't let her get away with it~!
Sooo, Commander, when we're working out... who're your eyes on~?
Using the fat around your chest for softening impacts... kinda actually works?!

After trying out a whole bunch of activities, I settled on joinin' the boxing club in the end. Everyone wants to exercise now and then, right? Come along, Commander, and we'll have a fun workout together~
Hmm... The snow's falling at a rate of 3cm per second, so assuming no wind, tomorrow's forecast should be something like... Oh, Commander? Just talkin' to myself!
Whoa! Talk about a stunning view! You like, totally all the best spots in the city, Commander~ Hehe, okay, so... Merry Christmas!
The commission gals are back~ You wanna go out and meet up with 'em, or...?
Sup, Commander. Oof, real chilly out there, huh? Then c'mere and I'll warm you up~
Hey Commander, you ready to get? "To get what"? To get to work, man! Hehehe~

You think Santa Claus is real, Commander? Me, I think he's like, basically real. Because, y'know, there's all these people wearing legit Santa costumes in stores and stuff. Hahaha.|If Miss Raleigh were in my shoes here, she'd totes be blushing to her ears.|Wanna draw something with me, Commander? Y'know, like, exhaling on the window and making shapes with your finger~
Feeling chilly? You can come closer if you wanna~
Winter makes you wanna snuggle up, doesn't it~?
Whoa! Talk about a stunning view! You like, totally know all the best spots in the city, Commander~ Hehe, okay, so... Merry Christmas!
This victory's almost as lit as this view!
Why am I wearing Dragon Empery clothes? Because there's a Dragon Empery celebration today, duh~ Now if you don't mind, I'm gonna have myself a mooncake.
The annual moon gazing festival's upon us again~ Ah, so you know a thing or two about the Mid-Autumn Festival, Commander? Then I reckon you know what we're doing tonight, right~? ♡
Thanks for this sweet gift you brought back~ I'm gonna go show it to Memphis~
Let's see the prediction for Leos born today... Hmm, clearly something's wrong with my calculations here...

Yo, this mooncake bussin'! Concord would love this little sugar bomb! I'll grab one and bring– Hm? This one's extra salty?|You know the myth about rabbits on the moon? Bet those rabbits can jump, like, a mile up in zero-gravity.|I don't mind you gawkin' at me, but you'll wanna gawk at the sky too. Full moons only come once a month, you know!
Man, this view is awesome~
Whoa! Careful, or I might fall, Commander!
The annual moon gazing festival's upon us again~ Ah, so you know a thing or two about the Mid-Autumn Festival, Commander? Then I reckon you know what we're doing tonight, right~? ♡
Soldiers, weigh anchor! For the glory of Sardegna!
I don't mind you acting as my own Rustichello. In fact, I adore having someone who chronicles my life. Oh, but please do omit my mistakes!
Battleship – Marco Polo.
The commission team has returned. Take it from me, you really ought to venture out with them to see the sights of the world more often.
If not for your position, I would've sent you away to... Never you mind. Hmph!
Oh? You're approaching me? Instead of keeping me at arm's length, you wish to get to know me? Then by all means... Hehehe!
You possess insight and views superior to those of commonplace boors. But, as it stands, you could use some more... well, ambition.
You command a whole fleet of ships, and you don't even try to use them to spread the Empire's– I mean, your own glory? It truly baffles me.
You! What is the deal with you? I never said you should "spread the glory of Marco Polo's name!" You... You... You're too ambitious for your own good!
I believe the secretary should have the power to issue commands. Only while you're away, of course.
Danger is an opportunity! Have at you!
So you've come prepared to sacrifice a portion of your time on this mortal coil in the name of productivity? Magnificent!
You wretches... I will inflict this humiliation back at you a hundred times over!
A letter of surrender from our enemies? Then allow me to establish our terms.

All things of value are bound to fall into someone's hands, sooner or later. Better it be yours than someone else's.|The golden Dragon Empery... I have countless stories of it to share if you'll only lend me an ear!|Looking at the map... This port is unbelievably small. Has the thought of expanding it never crossed your mind?
New missions? Be magnificent and get them done in a jiffy, okay? Chop-chop.
You've finished those chores? Magnificent! Now we can focus on more important matters.
I am Marco Polo, Sardegnian battleship. Compare me with Veneto if you so wish, but just for the record: I could do her job much better. Ohohoho!
A woman with great aspirations doesn't let commitments bind her. But... for you, I'll make an exception. And don't you dare vanish on me until your ambitions are realized!
Bow before my might!
For what have I been summoned?
Tsk! Such boorish behavior...

I hope you know what you're in for, now that you've awoken me. Hehehe... You look to be a commander of valor and culture. Magnificent! I am Marco Polo. Now, come! Our first order of business is to spread the Sardegna Empire's glory through the world!
The greater one's strength, the more privileges one is entitled to. You know this, yes? Magnificent!
They're surrendering already? So... We won? What pathetic adversaries we have.
I've been told many desire to be in a position where they can give you hands-on assistance – like a maid does. Which is to say: I am envied by everyone around me. Hehehe, hehehehe~
Me? Serve as your maid? Oho! That's more like it, Commander! How magnificent and ambitious of you! ...Only temporarily? And you're content with that?
The commission team has returned. Someone must receive them, but who?
Where, oh where is my master who refuses to delegate work to a maid? Here, I've taken these duties upon myself in your stead.
Hm-hm~♪ Have you no orders for your maid? You're hardly the authoritative master I'd imagined.
I've left your letter right over there. It's as easy to reach as possibly can be.

Interested to learn a trick, Anchorage? Watch this card... Tadah! It's gone! Oh, silly Commander. A magician never reveals her secrets.|I wonder how many maids our port has... And of them, how many are assigned to the Commander's office and personal quarters... Stop it, Marco! There's no point in pondering that question!|Is it not a maid's duty to issue a slap on the wrist when her master procrastinates? Hehehe! How magnificent that you understand!
You've been given new missions. Fascinating how announcing that is part of a maid's duties...
Routine tasks, making meals, greeting guests, filing paperwork, hatching plans, doing battle... I can perform anything you require!
Hwaaah?!
Me? Serve as your maid? Oho! That's more like it, Commander! How magnificent and ambitious of you! ...Only temporarily? And you're content with that?
Acting on the Commander's behalf, I raise a toast to this victory!
Heheh, let the red rose of blood bloom forth!
Commander, what are we doing next?
Hello! Oh... What am I supposed to call you? "Commander"? Got it! My name is Marie Rose. Just call me Marie, okay? I'm counting on your support, Commander!
Wow, there's so much stuff! Did you bring all of that back yourselves? Amazing!
I hate you, I hate you, I hate you! If you keep this up, I'll only hate you even more!
Wow, this place is huge... Lady Helena isn't here, so I feel a bit uneasy... No no, I'm an adult! I won't be shaken by something like this!
There are so many amazing maids in the port! But I won't let them outdo me!
Today I was invited to a tea party by girls from the Royal Navy, and we had a bunch of yummy princess cake! Heheh, I'm so happy to have made friends here!
I have a ton of fun being around you, Commander~ I'd love it if we could hang out more! ...Next time you're free, let's watch some horror movies together~
Geez, please don't treat me like a little kid!
Oh, Commander! ...Ahem. Welcome back, Commander. You did a good job. Heheh~
I won't lose!
Oh hello, Commander! Let's do our best today!
I lost... What should I do, Commander...
Commander, it looks like there's some new mail waiting for you!

Yaaaaawn... I've gotten a bit sleepy...|Commander, do you feel tired? I can give you a massage!|Oh, Commander must be busy... Then I'll go play with Honoka first before coming back to help you! ...Ehh, I can't?
Commander, there are still missions that haven't been completed! You didn't forget, did you?
Mission complete! Am I a big help, Commander?
I'm the favorite servant of Lady Helena Douglas, head of DOATEC. I can clean, do laundry, cook, be a bodyguard, you name it, I can do it!
Heheh~ I've received something special from you~ I feel the same as you, Commander. Heheh, all of our memories together are precious treasures to me!
I'll show you my real power!
Commander, did you need something?
Where do you think you're touching me?!
Hello! Oh... What am I supposed to call you? "Commander"? Got it! My name is Marie Rose. Just call me Marie, okay? I'm counting on your support, Commander!
Commander, do you feel like I've matured a bit?
Commander, did you see how useful I was?

skins.name: Devilish Servant Against the Splashing Waves
