voiceline.line: A photoshoot? That's fine with me! I'd like to take a lot of wonderful pictures! ...But, I'm not going to strike any weird poses, got it?
Hmm, this swimsuit is pretty cute, but isn't it a bit childish? ...In any case, if you like it, then it's all good!
Welcome back, Commander! Oh, I'm cooling down a bit right now~ It's quite hot out, after all~
Ehh... This is no fun... Oh, Commander! Heheh~ Won't you come play with me?

Commander, you're always heading out to sea, aren't you? I'm a bit jealous... Eh? I'm right, but it's probably different from what I think?|Heheh, I'll always win when it comes to beach volleyball!|The feeling of the waves on my skin is so nice... Commander, you should come and have a dip too!
Your hands feel so nice and cool~
Ah! Not there!
Hmm, this swimsuit is pretty cute, but isn't it a bit childish? ...In any case, if you like it, then it's all good!
Dear opponents, do NOT disappoint me!
Celebration? Honor? Nothing else except for battles will draw my attention.
Colorado class battleship— Maryland, hull number BB-46
Even though commissions are an important part of the war, but I'm just not interested in them.
A saying that I recently heard from my sister, “Never protest your loyalty to the weak”.
I don't know who granted us the title of BIG SEVEN. But if those two keep mentioning it non-stop, then the title should have some special meaning to it.
The war cannot be won by a single person. Without true sisters fighting alongside you and a reliable backline supporting you, no matter how strong you are, your defeat is inevitable!
Not all problems can be solved by fighting? Well, I don't really believe that... but you always seem to find a way to solve things. After all, you are my favorite Commander.
Look into my eyes, as my most trusted companions, is it even necessary to use words to express the feelings I have for you in my heart?
Sigh, staying in port is so boring...
Now, this is a fun battle!
I think I smell gunpowder, has the battle started already? Pfft... turns out it was only Vestal cooking.
If only Oklahoma was here...
When writing a reply back, should I carry an anti-aircraft gun with me...
Fighting beside my sisters is the happiest thing in the world! |I hate foul play, only fair duels are real battles! |Working? ...I don’t know much about that, I’ll just do whatever you tell me to do.
If I don’t complete the mission, then I can’t get a battle star.
Mission rewards... Darn, what a waste of time.

Eagle Union Colorado class battleship, ship no. 2 “Maryland”. As one of the BIG SEVEN, I often attended various celebrations. I escaped the attack on Pearl Harbor from behind Oklahoma. After undergoing retrofit, I successfully completed counter strike attacks on the Sakura Empire Navy. I participated in Operation Magic Carpet and received a total of seven battle stars. Commander, I just saw gunfire over there...oh, nevermind it was the sunset.
You really treasure these strange rings, do you? ...But since it's your decision, I'll go with it! From now on, I will protect you!
No matter how many times it takes, I will sink you again!
Commander, are we going into battle?
Commander, our fighting power is not in that area of expertise.
I am Maryland, a member of the BIG SEVEN. “Fighting Mary”, yes, that's what they call me! I heard there are many battles ahead. I look forward to them all!
I really wanna try to shoot a volley from my main gun right now…
Haha! This is just the appetizer before the main course!
Pretty tough, aren't you? You won't cry if I hit you, will you?
Tell me when you're done inspecting.
South Dakota-class battleship – Massachusetts, Hull Number BB-59.
... Oh, look. They've brought so much back. I'll go help them out.
Your body is weak, Commander. Are you eating properly?
How to get stronger? Uhh, do some push-ups? ... Not working for you?
Seeing you challenging yourself with things you can't do is... interesting. It makes me want to explore my own limits, too.
I like how cool you look when you're pushing yourself hard... but overdoing it isn't good. I'll force you to rest if I have to.
I don't have any dreams. But I have the power to grant them. Commander, do you have a dream for me to grant one day?
You're back... Did you get hurt? If anyone pokes fun at you, we can talk about it.
... So you want me to get serious?
For lunch, I'll make... Oh, Commander, are you going for a stroll?
Sorry, I got distracted...
I'll leave your letter here. Check it later.

... You know, I actually like this hair color. It's like that of a bald eagle, isn't it?|You think my jacket is strange? This way I can feel the breeze hit my skin when out at sea, though... I love it.|People that impressed me? Umm... when I was in Casablanca, I fought a battleship who held out a long time even with just a single turret... I'd like to fight her again in her finished state.
So many missions waiting on us...
Ah, the rewards have arrived... Seems we can afford beef for dinner tonight.

I guess I'm the most normal ship in my class. I earned 11 battle stars, which is less than South Dakota did. "I hardly suffered any damage"? That's cause I never fought anyone strong enough... Here's hoping that I'll get to fight as hard as my sister did back then.
Umm, yeah... I already know what you want to do and want to say... Because I love you too, Commander.
This one's really heavy.
You want someone to pamper you? ... You want ME to?
... If you'd move your body more, you'd have fewer weird thoughts.
Hm? Ah... my turn to speak. I'm Massachusetts. I'm just a regular old South Dakota-class you can find anywhere... So, yeah, I hope we can... get along.
I feel a bit different...
It's over already? But I was just warming up... Aren't there any other enemies left?
Tell me what you think when you're done looking. Else I'm not letting you leave.
Hey... Is this outfit that strange to you? Thought it looks just like what my sister's wearing... so what are you staring at? I don't get you at all...
Makeup is tricky stuff... I don't know how everyone else does it.
My... plans for the party? We could go listen to Dakota play the piano.

Where's Jean Bart gone? I wanted to show her how I look.|Seems everyone's enjoying the party. Hope Dakota and Alabama are too. Me? I'm having tons of fun.|You want something, Commander? I'm gonna go get a drink. I could get one for you too if you want.
Oh, rewards have come in. Good stuff.
I shouldn't lift this flap? Why not?
Are you getting more weird thoughts because of my outfit?
Hey... Is this outfit that strange to you? Thought it looks just like what my sister's wearing... so what are you staring at? I don't get you at all...
Fighting while trying not to get my dress dirty... Kinda fun.
I-I'll try to stay where the Commander can protect me!
Everyone has someone they want to protect... So don't protect just me, okay, Commander?
M-class destroyer – Matchless (G52.)
I hope I can go on a safe transport mission together with you, Commander...
I should've known... You can't possibly protect me...
My name might make me seem invincible, but that's not true at all. Don't mistake me for a Main Fleet ship just because of my name!
Duke of York is tough, cool, and... Hehe~ She must make you jealous, too~
The feelings I have for you, and the feelings you have for me... Which of the two is more passionate?
Physical scars heal over time, but mental scars never go away. So, please, don't make my heart ache!
I like it better when you're here, it makes me feel at ease...
You look sad, Commander... Let's try this... Hehe~ Feel better?
S-someone, help meeee!
I'll go and get your mail~!

You know flattery won't get you anywhere with me, right?|Oh dear, it's getting cold again... Commander, can you lend me your coat when we leave port?|I hope I can just stay as your secretary forever... Hm? What? I didn't say anything!
I-I'm scared... I want to stay with you...
You look so awesome from behind, Commander!

I'm Matchless, a Royal Navy M-class destroyer! After my escort missions in the Arctic, I was in the Battle of the North Cape, and then I helped escort Queen Mary! My name makes me sound powerful, but in reality, I'm totally helpless!
Aww... I'm so happy... Thank you... Commander, I may not be able to protect you, but I'll do everything I can to protect your smile and warm your heart! Please, Commander, be happy!
Okay! Now close your eyes~!
Can I just stay with you forever, Commander?
Because of that... I'm subtracting a few points off your record~!
We meet at last, Commander! I am Matchless, an M-class Destroyer! Ah, although my name is "Matchless," I'm actually very weak. Ehe~ Commander, will you protect me?
Maybe you got stronger too, Commander?
Time for a photo~! C'mon, let's take a picture!
Commander, the super-luxurious ice cream crepes you bought are soooo good! Thanks! ...That's right, you should try some too. Come on, don't be shy, open up~
Ah, Commander, over here! Hm, you're going to take care of all the plans for today's date? In that case, I look forward to seeing just how suave you can be! Hehe~
Commander, stick out your arms~ Yeah, just like that! Huuug! Hehe~ ...Hm? It's hard to hold that posture? None of my business~ You should be able to endure it for my sake, right~?
Commander, today, you're going to be escorting me full-time. You'll lose points if you let your attention wander~
Oh you, Commander, you're going to lose points for keeping a girl waiting! Hehe, just kidding! I arrived a bit too early~

If some questionable individuals suddenly showed up, you'd be there to protect me, right? |Hmm... it feels like someone is always staring at me... is it just my imagination?|Haven't decided on where to go yet? That's totally fine, I'm happy to just have you here.
Commander, you're in charge of all the bags! Do your best for me, all right~?
Commander, I'm going to give you a big fat zero on today's performance.
Ah, Commander, over here! Hm, you're going to take care of all the plans for today's date? In that case, I look forward to seeing just how suave you can be! Hehe~
Don't do anything too dangerous, okay?
I wonder how my sisters are doing... I'm worried about them...
Kamikaze-class destroyer number four – Matsukaze.
The commission team is back, Commander. It's not nice to keep them waiting!
Sigh... Where did I go wrong with you...
If you don't have anything to do, you should tidy things up. Organization is fundamental to leading a good life.
Yeah... I'm pretty bad with electronics... You should teach me how to properly use them, Commander!
Lately when I'm alone, I've been asking myself "is the commander taking care of himself?," "is he eating enough?," "does he think about me?"... Ahh, never mind that last one!
You just need to focus on your goals and I'll handle all the minor details. I'm happy to help you with anything, not just combat or missions~!
You must be tired after that last battle... Don't overexert yourself, come here and lie down.
You can't fight on an empty stomach, Commander! I made lots and lots of food, so eat to your heart's content!
Ugh... I'll be fine, just make a break for it, everyone...
Letter for you, Commander! Want me to read it out loud?

This thing I've got? It's what's known as a ladle. Yeah, if it was a little smaller you could even serve tea with it.|This place is lacking in greenery... We should put some potted plants in here, Commander~!|Ahhh, the smell of laundry hung out to dry in the sun~ Isn't it great?
Are you doing your duty properly, Commander? I'm here if you need me.
You've done great, Commander. Bravo, bravo!

I'm the Kamikaze-class destroyer Matsukaze! I was in Destroyer Division 5 along with my sisters. We're a little outdated compared to something like the Mutsuki-class, but we won't let any newer classes beat us when it comes to combat or escorts! ...Sigh... I wonder how Asakaze's team will fare without me...
You're saying you want to take a lifelong vow with me? Eheheh, sure~ Then I, Matsukaze, swear to always, always look after you!
Don't you dare try to hurt my commander!
Yeah? Are you feeling tired? Then wait just a moment, I've finished making some snacks!
Eek?! ...Commander, sit right over there! You need to be scolded!
This is the fleet everyone's in, right? Seems pretty rowdy~ I'm Matsukaze! Nice meeting you!
Thanks! You could have saved caring about me for later, though.
Heheh, you'll have a really bad time if you underestimate a veteran!
I doubt this fan will be of any use when it gets cold...
There we go... My fan is too big, and I'm not used to carrying it around yet... Ah, right, come here for a sec, Commander~ I'll fan you with some cool air~ Come on now, no need to be shy~
Welcome back, Commander! How are you? Hungry? Then have a seat, I'll go get you something to eat!

I think this thing will be handy for drying clothes or futons out in the sun! Mhm, I think I'll test it right now!|Commander, look! There's a big "matsu" written on my fan! Mhm, I have to say I'm quite fond of it~!|Umm... have you heard about "work-life balance"? It's bad to rest too much, but it's not good to work too much either.
Hm? Are you hungry? Or do you want me to fan you?
There we go... My fan is too big, and I'm not used to carrying it around yet... Ah, right, come here for a sec, Commander~ I'll fan you with some cool air~ Come on now, no need to be shy~
Lets finish this quick before I get hungry!
Umm... Why are you always watching me do my warm-ups? Do you like watching me sweat?

Gridley-class destroyer, Maury, Hull Number DD-401
Unlock build after receiving
I need to get some exercise... Commander, a commission just got completed, so could you send me out on the next one?
Sorry, I've got some training to do, so I gotta go!
Commander, is it really okay for you to sit around all day? Get outside and do some sports!
Want me to teach you how to run faster, Commander? There's quite a lot to it, actually.
I feel like I can run even farther when I'm next to you, Commander. What an incredible feeling!
Commander, how about going on a jog with me? I want to share the beautiful scenery I find with you.
Rest now so that we can sprint faster later!
Commander, want to do some warm-ups with me?
... I need to get back before everyone starts worrying about me.
You've got new mail. It's about that celebratory party, isn't it?

Commander, want to work out a bit? Sitting for so long is terrible for your body!|I thought we were going for some long distance trip at Wake Island again.|I swear it wasn't my tummy making that noise!
You've still got some missions to finish up, Commander! Put your back into it, it's the final stretch!
Phew~ I'm exhausted... Save some Oxy-cola for me when the rewards arrive!

I'm Maury, the fourth ship of the Gridley-class destroyer squadron. Although I'm the youngest of my class, I'm also the fastest short-distance Union ship! I'm prone to getting hungry a lot? Well, they say that light meals make you live longer, don't they?
No matter how fast I run, I can't escape my feelings for you, Commander...
Faster... Faster...!
Are you helping me recover? ... Thank you...
...!! Hey! There's a line you shouldn't cross when giving massages.
You can just call me Maury. As a track athlete, I hold the Union's speed record, reaching a maximum speed of 42.8 knots. Just don't make me run a marathon...
Not enough... I can still go faster...!
Like I said, those guys can't keep up with me!
Shall I tear them apart...?
Would you stop staring at me like that? I can't promise my sword won't come your way...
Third ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Maya.
Looks like...the comission is finished.
If you get too close to me, I’ll cut you down
Didn’t I already tell you? Don’t talk to me if you don’t have any business.
I said don’t talk to me if-... You want to know more about me? Fine... as you wish.
Commander, you sure are a strange person. I’ve never felt anything like this before... but it’s not all that bad. Hey, care to have a little chat with me?
My dream is to one day conquer the sky and everything beneath it. When that day comes, would you still remain by my side?
Combat operations over... Seems like we didn't encounter any worthy opponents today... again...
Hmph. Retreat? How laughable.
Commander, you want someone like me to keep you company today as well? What a strange person...
... It hurts... No, don't mind me.
There's mail for you, Commander.

We were doomed to stray from the path of righteousness the moment we took up arms. Commander, we can never become heroes.|The South, Solomon Island, Leyte Gulf, and now this sea... Nothing ever changes...|Being by Yamato is like a warm embrace that melts away my worries... I sometimes long for that feeling... N-no, it’s not Iike that! I may have said that but, not in that way! But if I put it that way...
Another mission... another battle.
Mission complete... Can I go back now?

Maya, third ship of the Takao-class. My little sister and I are twins, but we're a good bit younger than our older sisters... Feel free to leave both the enemies in the sky and on the sea to me. You'll need to deal with those underwater yourself. And one final reminder: don't get too close to me or you might get hurt!

I’m not very good at expressing my emotions... but despite that, you’ve never left my side. As long as you’re willing to call for me, I will be able to continue fighting. Commander... I don’t want to let go of your hand.
Perish by my blade!
Commander, you’re getting on my nerves.
Stand still over there. I want to practice my swordsmanship.
I'm Maya, the one who will tear open the sky. You're the Commander...? Don't get too close... You might get hurt!
Strength may breed sin, but for now, we have no other choice.
I shall slay anything that stands in my way, whether ghost or god!
We have to fight? Guess I couldn't avoid it forever...
Sorry, can we keep it brief? I need a new popsicle.
Gridley-class destroyer - McCall, Hull Number DD-400!
...Oh, everyone's back. I'll go get some popsicles.
(McCall continues licking her popsicle and acts like she didn't notice you.)
I heard those Sakura Empire girls sit around and drink tea all afternoon. I'd like to try that some day!
Tips for daydreaming? Empty your mind and don't think about anything. Don't forget about your popsicle before it melts, though...
Want a taste of my popsicle, Commander? Ah, yeah, it'd be like an indirect kiss, but that's fine... Anyway, can I daydream for a bit and lean on your back?
I used to hope that my days of just eating popsicles and daydreaming would go on forever. But after meeting you, Commander, I think I might have been wrong...
It's kinda hot in here, got anything to help me cool down?
Commander, can't I just sit around here for today instead?
Whoa, I got so scared I dropped my popsicle...
*Sigh* There's no end to all this mail...
We all get along around here, don't you think? Care for a popsicle?|Ahh... Hawaii was so hot. I felt like I was melting...|... Ah! Oh no! My popsicle melted.
Missions, huh? Whatever happens, happens.
Help me pack up these rewards... Hey, can we have them sent to my house?
I'm McCall, third ship of the Gridley-class. There isn't much special about me, except that I've lived as long as my big sisters. I'm just relieved know that they're doing well.
My life's changed ever since I met you, Commander... I'm sure we'll get to do many new things together. But there's one thing I hope won't ever change: that I'll be together with you...
Let's finish this before my popsicle melts!
... Are you trying to encourage me?
Ah, it's so hot...
Hello, Commander. Just call me McCall. I like to sleep, daydream, and eat popsicles. Please assign me somewhere peaceful, will you?
Hm... It's nothing special.
"Slay the enemy while your blade is still warm"... Is that true for popsicles as well? Oh, it melted...
Let's go! I want to see everyone at their best!
If you intend to keep me by your side, you'd better carefully observe my every move!
Omaha-class light cruiser – Memphis, Hull Number CL-13.
The commission fleet has returned. Don't forget to check the performance records later.
Hmph. If it's about me ignoring you, you brought this upon yourself!
Next, I'll handle the paperwork and review the training plans. Commander, make sure to check my work properly. Don't slow me down, got it?
Who can blame you for being so captivated by me? Very well, I'll allow you to gawk a bit longer.
Sidling up to me this closely... Are you trying to smell my hair? Hehe, how is it? Does it remind you of the sea breeze?
You feel uneasy when I'm not around? Don't worry, I'll always be here to escort you. As a matter of fact, you should make sure to always be around me.
Hehe, not bad. But don't get too cocky. There are still many trials ahead of us.
We can't afford to be careless!
Commander, you sure took your time getting here. Come on, let's set sail. Can you keep up with me?
To think that I would lose... how unsightly!
Please go get the mail. I expect some good news.

Capturing everyone's attention with my brilliant performance at Naval Reviews - that's the way I like to do things. |Because of my hectic schedule, I never got much time to relax back in port... But that's fine, someone like me ought to be busy, wouldn't you agree~? |You want me to bring you back a souvenir next time? Should you really be asking that while you still have work to do?
If there are any missions left, take care of them right away. Don't procrastinate... Hey, I'm talking to you, Commander!
You've earned these rewards. Take a look when you have time.
I am the Omaha-class light cruiser, Memphis. I've hosted some very famous people, as well as served as flagship of the fleet in the Royal front. Make sure you carefully observe my every move!
Do you feel honored? You've managed to earn my recognition. From here on out, I'll have high expectations for you, so don't let me down~
Leave the escort duties to me!
Hm? You'd like to see me while I'm training? Very well... you'd better burn this into your eyes!
If you don't unhand me this instant, I'll make you regret it~
Hmm, so you're the commander here? Don't worry, I'll carry out my duties as an escort ship. But first, you'll have to meet my standards!
I wonder if I'll be even better at my escort duties now?
Hmph! Did you witness that? That's the glory that only I can bring to bear~
Oh my, do I really look so unusual in this outfit? I want to be able to enjoy my day off as well, you know? Hehe, don't you think it feels nice to just sit back and take in the ocean breeze?
The view here is gorgeous! Oh, you're back, Commander? The picture I just took? Heheh, I'll show you later.
Morning. There's a nice wind blowing today. Perfect for a cruise, wouldn't you say?

Phew... Let's hope this will be a relaxing day... Hey, Commander, you know what "work hard, play hard" means, right?|My pictures? I wouldn't say I put the pros to shame, but I am experienced. Don't go underestimating my ability.|Brooklyn and I sometimes go out on day trips. Unlike me though, she just refuses to relax even on vacation days... Or rather, we each relax in very different ways, I suppose.
Training? Hello, do you not understand what it means to be on vacation?
Eek! Wh-what was that for?!
Oh my, do I really look so unusual in this outfit? I want to be able to enjoy my day off as well, you know? Hehe, don't you think it feels nice to just sit back and take in the ocean breeze?
Have a taste of a witch's power!
Commander, are you here to trick-or-treat? Here, I got this candy from Abercrombie.
We have to work hard if we want to play hard, isn't that right, Commander? Are you ready for our happy Halloween?
Everyone has a different way of enjoying Halloween. Hehe, that's how it should be~
Commander, you came at just the right time~! Shall we go carve the jack-o'-lanterns together? Just make sure you keep up with my high standards!

I'll let you handle giving candy out to the trick-or-treaters, Commander~ Me? Hehe, of course I'm going to go bring back more candy~ |I'm a witch now, so if you're not on your best behavior, I'll turn you into a critter~ Hehe, just kidding! |Look, a witch and her broomstick are always paired together. I won't hear your objections!
Commander, you'd like to sit on the broom with me? I suppose you can... but it's not my problem if you fall off, okay?
... I should just boot you off the broomstick and be done with it!
We have to work hard if we want to play hard, isn't that right, Commander? Are you ready for our happy Halloween?
This? Just a doodle, nothing of note... Please, would you stop trying to peek?
Oh, what a wonderful breeze. Maybe the windows ought always to be open during class... Commander? What are you standing around for? There's a vacant seat right here for you.
Come on, get up, Marblehead! Ugh... I told her not to pull an all-nighter to conduct experiments, and she does it anyway.
Fashionably late, I see. Had you turned up a moment later, I would've gone home for the day.

Omaha! Don't you think the amount of snacks in your desk drawers is a little excessive?|Let's see what's new on Juustagram... Concord's posted a new sweets review. That's worth a read.|I love sitting by the window. You get a great view of the schoolyard, and have ready access to a cool breeze.
You'd like to see my notes? Sure thing, just– H-hey! I didn't say you could flip through it as you see fit!
Go to the faculty office to receive your due punishment. Now!
Oh, what a wonderful breeze. Maybe the windows ought always to be open during class... Commander? What are you standing around for? There's a vacant seat right here for you.
You're in the Commander's way. Disappear.
Yeah, Commander? ...I'm perfectly fine. Right as rain even. There's no need to worry about me.
I'm Memphis. You may not know me, but I know you and I know you well. Don't you worry, I'm not a threat – you can trust me. Today I assume the role of your right hand and bodyguard.
Seeing as the commission team's back, we'd better get going... You know the drill, Commander.
No matter what form you may take, I will always support you. That's my sworn duty.
What shall I start with today? Draft the next operation? A commission? A sortie? Whatever the case, I'll do a good job. Just give me the order, like always.
I found this yesterday while I was out shopping. Thought it'd make for a nice gift, so here you go. Well? Do you feel happy? As happy as I was when I got a special gift from you?
Do you feel like the satisfaction of completing a mission diminishes with each one, Commander? ...Sorry, that was an odd question. Let's get back to work.
I'll do everything in my ability to assist you, Commander. Exactly the same as yesterday. The same place, the same work, the same you and I... I hope tomorrow will be no different.
Nice work. Want a soda? Don't say it – I already know which ones you like... Heehee, I know you inside and out, remember?
I've taken damage... but it's still within acceptable limits!
Here's your schedule for today. Let's get some good work done, like we always have.
We can still trial and error our way to success, Commander. Everything's just fine – chin up and cheer up.
There's a letter for you... Huh, you look happy. So it's good news, I assume?

My way of handling documents is awfully similar to yours? Huh... I'd simply chalk that up to coincidence.|The port is running smoothly, our resources are well-distributed, and our personnel is deployed in strategic positions... Everything's going swimmingly.|Our synergy is so perfect it's like we can read each other's minds. I'd say we were born to work together, don't you think?
HQ sent us a new mission. I added it to your schedule.
Mission complete. All in a day's work.
I'm Memphis, Omaha-class light cruiser. I doubt this brief introduction will make you well-acquainted with me, but I promise you this – I will always stand with you, come hell or high water.
I haven't felt an emotion this strongly in who knows how long... Thank you, Commander. Supposing I one day forget what this passion feels like, you'll remind me, won't you?
Unknown variables... are to be purged immediately!
Yeah? Uh, is something the matter?
Aww, feeling lonely, Commander? ...It's a small comfort knowing you have moments like that too...
I'm Memphis. You may not know me, but I know you and I know you well. Don't you worry, I'm not a threat – you can trust me. Today I assume the role of your right hand and bodyguard.
I feel the power... Thanks.
Look at that, we won. Hm? I am happy about this, even if I don't look like it.
I don't want to lose any friends today!
Commander? If there's anything you want me to do, please let me know. I love helping out.
Third ship of Asashio class destroyers, Michishio.
Commander, shouldn't we go out to meet the girls you sent out on commission? It's about time for them to be getting back.
I don't think I can be friends with you, Commander...

Comrade Commander, if you want people to like you, you've gotta be an interesting person yourself! In other words, what you need is a dose of inspiration!
Ahaha... Comrade Commander, we're already friends, right? So, uh, when they come to collect debts, could you... Hey, wait, why are you running!

Comrade Commander, I thought you were a real hardass, but turns out, you're actually quite interesting! You have quite a lot of ideas of your own... and most importantly, you don't chew me out when I mess up! Hahaha!
All right, I finally understand now! I've finally reached a conclusion as to why I'm always thinking about you! So here's my hypothesis: I'm in love with you! Hehe, does that sound right?
I can't control my overflowing inspiration! Even though you just came back, I can't...
Looks like it's time for me to get serious!
Comrade Commander, you came at just the right time! I just had a flash of inspiration and came up with a new strategy! Come test it out with me!
Woah, woah, time out! I'm not ready to retreat yet! Waaah!
Ah, um... Just give me a minute to come up with an explanation as to what I'm doing in this room full of mail...

Gangut...? Err, I mean, Comrade Gangut? Hmm, she kind of scares me... |My fighting spirit, just like my inspiration, is unbreakable! That's right, I'll stand back up again! |When I mess up, I make sure to apologize profusely! That way, everyone will forgive me... hopefully.
Comrade Commander, wait until you hear about the latest idea I got! Hey, wait, don't run away!
Long live the rewards! Err, so, where's my share?
I'm the Project 38 destroyer, Minsk. I fought in the Great War alongside my sisters! Comrade Commander, expect great things from my inspiration... and my hard work!
This means we've signed off a lifelong contract! Comrade Commander, we'll always be together from here on out! Don't worry, don't worry, I'll be gentle!
It's my turn! Fiiire!
Hm? Did you stumble into your own inspiration, Comrade Commander?
Eh...?! Is this revenge for something I did?!
Ура! How's that, what'd ya think? Huh? Where I'm from, they said you're supposed to surprise the people you're greeting! What, I'm the one being welcomed?! Sorry, I mixed something up!
Woahh! I'm getting inspired again!
How's that? My power is surging! That's right, don't get jealous!
Fools, dance for your overlord~♪
You've violated the Minsk Protocol, comrade! Therefore, the sentence appropriate for you is imprisonment! Until when? Obviously, until your jailor is satisfied~♪

Congratulations, Comrade Commander, you've completed your sentence~ Well, even without your sentence, I'll still be supervising you for the rest of your life. After all, your next sentence is "staying with Minsk forever!"
Prisoner, exercise time is over! Hurry up and get back into the office!
Entrust your faith with god, and entrust your body with me! That's right, you're in my jail now!

If you try to escape again, I'll slap more time onto your sentence? Huh? You weren't given a sentence in the first place? Eh, don't sweat the details~ |Hehe, you think you can stage a jailbreak? I'd like to see you try, Comrade Commander! |When I'm not patrolling, I'm writing reports... this jailor business is super boring! Hey, one of you prisoners, write the reports for me!
Heheh~ Do you want to get tased that badly~?
Congratulations, you've earned yourself a one-way ticket to a Siberian potato-digging trip! Sign right here, and enjoy~!
You've violated the Minsk Protocol, comrade! Therefore, the sentence appropriate for you is imprisonment! Until when? Obviously, until your jailor is satisfied~♪
Aaaaall right! When you do something, you gotta do it right!
I get these weird vibes from this port and the shipgirls that live here... But most of all, I get them from you, Commander. Oh, I'm just messing with you! Ahaha!

It's nice to meet you! From what I've heard, you're the "Commander," right? I'm Misaki. I have experience with various part-time jobs, so... I'm confident that I can be of help to you all. Let's do our best!
The commission team's returned! I wonder if they brought back some sweets~
This port might be an interesting place, but you? You're not very dependable... I guess the responsibility for whipping you into shape falls on me, the part-timer~
So, I can drash across the ocean if I put this rigging on? The wonders of technology, huh!
Everyone looks extraordinary when fighting, but I guess they're really just normal girls when they're not. I've even found some friends who like comic books, heheh.
Apparently, there's a two-for-one deal at the store for bubble milk tea right now! Two might be a bit too much for me, though... Commander, if you're free, do you want to go with me?
Commander, let's go to the dessert store~ Afterward, we can take a stroll together! I want to learn more about this place! And then, after that... um... Well, let's just get going!
Hey, um... This feels odd to me...
Oh, Commander, nice work on that last battle! Now, how about a short break?
This is just the beginning!
Commander, hurry up~ Let's get to work, shall we?
We lost... I can't believe it...
Commander, you've got mail. Come take a look!

If you've got nothing else for me to do, I'm gonna head off to my part-time job... wait, I guess this is one, too...?|Mm~ I could go for some sweets right about now. Maybe a crêpe or something...|My sister might be scary at times, but she's a nice person at heart! ...Though, she might be a bit on the overprotective side...
Commander, you've got new missions! Don't we get rewards for completing them?
Mission complete! Commander, don't forget to give me my share of the rewards! Oh, I'm just pulling your leg! Ahaha!

You want me to introduce myself? I'm Misaki, and my hobbies include scuba diving, stargazing, and... reading comics, I guess. Also, I really like mango vanilla crêpes and bubble milk tea! Oh, right, and... be nice to my sister, Nagisa!

Ever since I've arrived at this place, you've taken such good care for me. I can't believe that I'm about to receive something this precious from you... Thank you, Commander! I'll work even harder for you!
Keep your eyes on me!
Yeees? Did you call for me, Commander?
Wah?! Geez, I'll be really angry if you do that again!

It's nice to meet you! From what I've heard, you're the "Commander," right? I'm Misaki. I have experience with various part-time jobs, so... I'm confident that I can be of help to you all. Let's do our best!
What do you think? Can you feel my growth?
We won! Woohoo, a V for victory!
Commander, did you ask my sister to participate in some photoshoots too? Hehe~ She might act all mean on the outside, but she'll do whatever you need as long as you don't ask for something risqué~
A photoshoot? That'd be similar to what I did before coming here, but... um, this swimsuit is a bit much... Commander, is this what you're into? Geez... It's so embarrassing...
Yaaawn~ ...Oh, did I fall asleep? Sorry, the sofa was just too comfy...
We're doing another shoot today? I don't mind, but...

After the shoot, wanna go grab some bubble milk tea? All right, no backsies!|Commander, are you taking some photos of the other girls as well? Let me have a look~|Commander, if you could go on a trip, where would you go?
G-geez, you're making me blush...
N-no, you can't! It's too embarrassing...
A photoshoot? That'd be similar to what I did before coming here, but... um, this swimsuit is a bit much... Commander, is this what you're into? Geez... It's so embarrassing...
Fighting is a drag... but losing is an even bigger drag!
Not saying anything makes you look cool? Figures... you would believe something like that.
Mogami-class Heavy Cruiser no. 1 - Mogami
You're going to go greet the commission fleet? I'll just stay here, so I don't end up ramming into someone.
Well, a hapless fellow like me was bound to get stuck with a hapless commander...
You must really have some strange hobbies, to want to associate with hapless folks like me. Oh well, if it's just talking... I suppose I can entertain you...
My horn, huh... Well, I don't really mind, but... it kind of sticks out, doesn't it? I don't really like the attention... *sigh*...
I already know that Mikuma and Nachi don't hold anything against me, but I can't forgive myself... *sigh*... Huh? My horn is cute?! ...I-idiot...
Um... Commander, uh... maybe, umm, since you said you liked it... would you like to try... t-touching it?
Everyone made it back safely. Isn't that enough?
Have I spread my misfortune to everyone...?
Welcome back. Huh? You want me to say it with more emotion? Sorry, chief. Not sure I can help with that one.
So this is what I'm made of...
I picked up the mail. Can I leave it here?

I wonder what Mikuma is doing right now... Well, I suppose there's nothing to worry about. She's not like me, after all... |Are you sure you want me to be your secretary? Just about anybody else would be better for the job. I'm serious... I'm not just saying that to avoid work. |Perhaps I should get Nachi to teach me how to be a little more cheerful... crap, hope nobody heard that...
I finished organizing the task list. Even I couldn't mess something like this up... probably.
I'll go pick up the mission rewards. Commander, you can just stay put and keep working.

I am Mogami, nameship of the Mogami-class... on paper, anyway. After what happened to Mikuma and Nachi at Midway, I have no right to call myself that anymore... In any case, feel free to hand me your work, but just don't expect much.
Are you sure you won't regret choosing someone like me? If you say so... I suppose I can put in a bit more effort for our sake... A-anyway, please take care of me...
I won't fail this time!
You don't have to remind me, I'll get the work done.
Eek!! Commander, are you seriously interested in someone like me...?
Mogami, reporting for duty... Don't worry too much about me, just leave me be and I'll find my own place to crash.
Thanks... What's the matter? Am I not allowed to express gratitude?
First place, huh. Got a problem with it?
There are people waiting for me... so I refuse to lose!
I look even cooler now when I don't say anything? Whatever... have it your way...

Are you sure this is a retrofit and not some weird hazing ritual? I look... Well, I suppose I do feel stronger. Guess I'll try to work a bit harder. Wouldn't hurt for you to look forward to it a little.
Commander, you're back. Huh? I just happen to remember what your footsteps sound like.

Recently, Mikuma has been telling me that I have more self-esteem... Not sure about that one though, I don't think I've really changed... |Secretary ship duties? Well, I still think I'm not really cut out for it compared to the others... but if it's what you want, I'll keep doing it. |Commander, be honest. What do you think about my new outfit after the retrofit? Um... if you like it, I suppose we can keep it like this...
Maybe I should go practice using this naginata or something...

Are you sure this is a retrofit and not some weird hazing ritual? I look... Well, I suppose I do feel stronger. Guess I'll try to work a bit harder. Wouldn't hurt for you to look forward to it a little.
Depend on me! I will make sure this fleet returns home without as much as a scratch!
You are the one and only being who matters to me... Until I met you, there was nary a single soul who believed in me.
Battleship – Monarch.
I wonder what efforts it took to materialise me... Hmph, regardless, I will see to it they are repaid in double.
Are you saying that I am inferior to them?!
I only survived in that dark world by believing that I am excellence itself, and thus irreplaceable...
Love needs no repayment. No matter how much the Royal Family neglects me, my loyalty to them is unwavering.
So, they can still laugh together... Perhaps I wasn't discarded for nought, then... I have never felt this way before.
Commander, to me, you are the most special, most dear person in existence. You always have, and always will be...
That was a marvellous welcome. Hmph, were I the only one returning, would anyone welcome me at all...?
If Wales were me, she would probably have sunk long ago.
Splendid; you're back. I, Monarch, am superior to the likes of Wales and York. Wouldn't you agree, Commander?
Am I... being discarded yet again?
You've received mail regarding the war. You would do best to check it.

Wales and York... I despise them for bereaving me of my existence, but I cannot resent them for succeeding me.|A younger sister? If I have one, her name would be... Prince of Wales... That has a rather nice ring to it.|I will make the world understand how foolish it was not to choose me.
Let me handle this mission. I shall prove my excellence!
For as long as I exist, it isn't over. I am excellence itself, therefore I must exist.
I am the battleship named Monarch, one of the rejected King George V-class designs. Hmph, though I was once forgotten, now I live and breathe...
Even if the world no longer needs me, you will always need me. That is more than enough for me... Hahah, perhaps I was materialised with the sole purpose of meeting you. Even if so... I am happy.
Not even the Queen's orders can subdue me!
Is my presence needed, Commander?
Do not fall victim to those degenerate habits of theirs.
We meet for the first time. I am the battleship Monarch. Hmph, once I was discarded, but now I am needed; how ironic... Is this how low the Royal Navy has sunk?
Hmph, sure enough, I am the most excellent of the King George V class.
Heed my words: depend on me! I will always win!
Allow me to demonstrate the elegance with which a lady of the Royal Navy comports herself.
Stand up straight and puff out your chest, Commander. You're the only one I deign to— You're not sure where to look? Well, why not look me in the eyes then?
Hmph. One's outfit is merely superficial. True nobility must come from within. Don't you agree, Commander?
Don't just stand there gawking, Commander. There remains much to be done today.
nil|Shall I teach you the Royal Navy's courtly dances?|Such splendid dress is normally reserved for special occasions. But for me, every day I exist is a day to be celebrated.
You like this dress, do you? Hmph, I see you've learned the art of empty flattery from Wales. But nonetheless... thank you...
I admire your bravery. Now would you rather I stab or trample you? Or would you prefer to taste a volley from my guns?
Hmph. One's outfit is merely superficial. True nobility must come from within. Don't you agree, Commander?
"Paint our jubilant memories of this festival into history"? Hmph, she's as grandiloquent as ever, isn't she?

So, an Eastern outfit this time... Hmph. My nobility is evident regardless of what I wear. However, since you prepared this outfit especially for me, it would be unbecoming of me to not express my gratitude. Thank you.
This festival comes but once a year. I shan't let you waste it working yourself to death. Come, let me handle that. The fleet will survive you taking a break.

Tsk, Wales, must you always pester me with this Eastern Radiance chinoiserie? I'll learn about their customs myself, without you.|A New Year's wish? Naturally, I wish to prove you were right to choose me. That isn't going to change.|Though I am a proud lady of the Royal Navy, I find myself deeply moved to have this chance to experience a festival from an exotic culture.
You desire my company? You should have said so.
Have you been afflicted with Wales's vile proclivities? Commander?

So, an Eastern outfit this time... Hmph. My nobility is evident regardless of what I wear. However, since you prepared this outfit especially for me, it would be unbecoming of me to not express my gratitude. Thank you.
Heheh, I'm the wild card in this battle!
High-stakes gamble are once-a-day only! You'll have to wait until tomorrow to give the wheel another spin, Commander.
Are you the one in charge here? The "Commander"? I'm Monica, the dealer! Well, dealer-in-training. I know it's sudden, but would you care to gamble with me? The stakes will, of course, be high!
A commission team has returned! It was a gamble, but those lucky girls won!
You can't give up after losing just one single bet, Commander. Life, as we all know, is one big series of wins and losses!
This one time, I saw someone do a "straight up" bet with all their chips. You just have to admire the moxie it takes to bet against Lady Luck like that!
Heheh, let me show you this dealing method I learned a while back, Commander!
Are you the type that's easily influenced by pretty girls, Commander? That's not good! You need be focused at all times, or you won't win.
I really do like gambling with you, Commander. Win or lose, it's lots of fun! That's your biggest charm point, in fact. Heheh!
Heheh. Is there something the matter?
Way to go, Commander. Here, a glass of water. Heheh, a dealer needs to keep an eye on the player, don't you know?
Calm down, Monica! Focus!
Greetings, Commander. What do you say to... a small bet before starting work?
Dammiiiiit! Next time, I swear it... Next time!
Don't forget your mail now, Commander!

Which do you prefer, Commander? Skill-based card games, or luck-based roulette?|You can wager more than just chips. Like an afternoon teatime, for instance. The loser provides the tea and biscuits!|Something... on your mind? I could offer you some insight, if you'd like. Assuming you win this next bet, that is!
Hey, Commander, you've got unfinished business! Let's wrap things up so we can gamble!
Mission done on time and with flying colors. You might have it in you to be a casino manager, Commander!
Why do I want to be a dealer? Because it's cool! Why else? Dealer distribute cards with so much style, and they've got such solid poker faces!
Huh? You're giving THIS to ME? Can I really have it? Talk about the bet of a lifetime... Heheh, I'll call your wager! Or would you rather I raise it?
I see through your tricks!
This next gamble wiiiill... have to wait until our work is finished!
Th-there's no sleight of hand going on here!
Are you the one in charge here? The "Commander"? I'm Monica, the dealer! Well, dealer-in-training. I know it's sudden, but would you care to gamble with me? The stakes will, of course, be high!
The house advantage grows ever so slightly!
Heheh! There are no backsies in gambling!
"You want my fortune, do ya? Beat me in cards, and it's all yours, kid!" ...That's how they do those huge gambles in movies, right? Heheh!
"Welcome to Monica's Fantabulous Casino! Where you can have your every whim satisfied!" ...Oh, that doesn't sound very casino-managery? Heheh!
Are you having a good time, Commander? At the Fantabulous Casino, chips come free of charge! If you ever run out, do come see me!
Welcome, Commander! Enjoy your stay at the Fantabulous Casino! Here are your chips for the day.

Would you like a nice, cold beverage? It'll clear your head, I can promise you that!|Be it at work or at the tables, you always need a clear head and a poker face! Those so happen to be my special skills!|Don't you think it's interesting how, even though the odds are the same for everyone, if there are winners, there must be losers too?|I see you blushing there, Commander. Heheh, eyes on the prize!
You've run out of chips? Now, that just won't do! Here you are. Spend them wisely, okay?
A slave to temptation, are we? Heheh, you'll have to fix that if you want any favors from Lady Luck!
"Welcome to Monica's Fantabulous Casino! Where you can have your every whim satisfied!" ...Oh, that doesn't sound very casino-managery? Heheh!
Knights of the Sea, onwards!
Big sis! ... Oh, it's you. Need something?
Cleveland-class light cruiser – Montpelier, hull number CL-57.
A commission's done. Aren't you gonna welcome the team back?
Guess my big sis can't tell good and bad people apart...
I don't get why my big sis chose you. But I trust her intuition.
My big sis is... strong, cool, has a golden smile, and she could probably beat anyone in a fight... I want to be like her one day.
I used to think commanding was just about giving orders from a comfy room while sounding like a bigshot... But after seeing it for myself, now I understand. You have a tough job, Commander.
I don't just blindly listen to everything my big sis says. I listen because she's always right... And I finally get why she chose you. It's because you're outstanding.
Well done. You should get some rest.
Big sis told me... to never give up!
So, you're back. I'll take my leave, then. It's too crowded in here for me.
Big sis... I'm sorry... I've stained the reputation of the Knights of the Sea...
I left your mail over here.

How can I be more like Cleveland... "Smile"? ... That might not be possible...|I don't get along with anyone but my sisters. As for you, Commander... I'll try.|Commander, I'm curious: when my sister's doing secretary work, what's she like?
Commander, we've got a mission. Time's money... get going already.
Rewards, eh... Guess this is part of my job. I'll go get them.

Listen, the Cleveland-class were the most powerful cruisers the Eagle Union had in the war. You should show more respect for my big sis. ... Me? I was in the battles of Midway, Augusta Bay, and a few others. I guess I did okay.
Big sis told me to follow my heart. Which is why I'm here: to follow my heart. Are you following yours, Commander?
You're an eyesore. Disappear!
... Huh? If you've no need of me, don't call for me.
G-gotta put up with it... This is obviously a test of the trust I have for my big sis...!
You're a commander? You don't... look reliable. But my big sis works for you... I've no choice, then. Montpelier, reporting for duty. I don't really care whether you give me orders or not.
I'm one step closer to my big sis...!
This is how victory feels... Not bad.
The Sakura Empire's New Year's celebration is... a bit different from my expectations.
So this is Sakura-style New Year's attire... If Cleve was also interested in this... Hm? Commander, were you watching? Um, well, Happy New Year's.

Spending the end of the year with you isn't so bad... You really still want to see me dance in this outfit? Hmm... I'm probably a bit rusty, but let's just consider it a rehearsal for when I'm doing this for Cleve.

The sleeves on this outfit are long and heavy... and this, uh... dress? It's really hard to move around in. Don't they find this cumbersome? |If Cleve was to wear this outfit... Hmm, I can't picture it after all. |My New Year's wish...? I'd like to get a bit closer with Cleve, I suppose...
...You'd like to see me dance in this outfit? Commander, you're as prone to flights of fancy as always.
Everyone is hard at work preparing for New Year's... but what in the world is going on inside that head of yours?
So this is Sakura-style New Year's attire... If Cleve was also interested in this... Hm? Commander, were you watching? Um, well, Happy New Year's.
This set really is expertly made. It shocked me when I first laid eyes on it.
As unreliable as you are, I didn't think you'd be too scared to approach a movie prop... You're just "admiring it from a distance?" ...Fair enough.
Time to go back to the party? All right. Give me a moment to come down.
"Welcome back, darling." ...This feels wrong. Doesn't fit the scene.

I'm only wearing this dress because big sis told me to. It's the total opposite of the clothes I'm used to wearing... Hm? That's not the point of this all?|Change my pose? Okay. How's this? ...I have no clue what you think is so funny about this. Guess it doesn't matter as long as big sis is enjoying herself...|Wanna sit next to me? This thing is built to handle several people.
No thanks. I can get down on my own. The set isn't a hard climb or anything, I'm just not used to wearing this dress.
Are you that keen to taste the power of darkness?
As unreliable as you are, I didn't think you'd be too scared to approach a movie prop... You're just "admiring it from a distance?" ...Fair enough.
"Kneel to the power of darkness!" ...Is it cooler to recite this line from the script?
N-not another battle...
voiceline.oath: Mr. Bear, charge!

voiceline.line: This little guy is my friend, Mr. Bear. Umm... he's equipped with a lot of equipment. Take this right hand, for example... Wait, you can't aim at the Commander!
voiceline.oath: With this gel applied, Mr. Bear should be able to move just fine at sea as well... No way, he's nowhere near fast enough... Commander, what do you think I should do...?

voiceline.line: Fletcher-class destroyer – Morrison, Hull Number DD-560.
A commission has been completed. Umm, if you need any help, I don't mind...
voiceline.oath: The commissions have been completed. Umm, Commander, let's go and greet everyone together...!

voiceline.line: Just like I thought, things are better without me around...
Commander, umm... to tell the truth, there's something I... i-it's nothing... forget I said anything...
Commander, are you curious about Mr. Bear? T-Then, I'll introduce him to you.
Commander, um, could I have a bit of your time...? I wanted to get your input on what kinds of things I could do to improve upon Mr. Bear's specs...
Commander, am I helpful to you? I'm not a bother, am I? ...Mm, every time I hear your words of reassurance, I can relax a bit... Thank you very much, Commander.
Mr. Bear...? Oh, Commander... I don't think Mr. Bear meant to hit you, Commander...
Commander, umm... I don't know if these will be of any use, but... (Morrison hands you some files)
voiceline.oath: Great work, Commander! Please let me handle the reports...!

voiceline.line: Mr. Bear, save me...!
Commander, ah, um, n-never mind...
voiceline.oath: Commander, um, would it be okay for me to stay by your side today?

voiceline.line: Oww... Ugh, I want to go back to port...
Mr. Bear, bring the mail over to the Commander.

I'd really like to get my hands on a few sets of the Iron Blood's rigging... Heh, hehehe...|Y-yes, you called? ...You didn't...? I'm sorry...|It's sunny out today... Though, it's not like sunny days are always good either.
voiceline.oath: nil|D-Did you call for me...? Yes! Leave whatever it is to me...!|It's sunny today. Sunny days are nice, aren't they? ...Yes!
voiceline.extra: In this operation, I can't let myself be a burden to either Mr. Bear or the Commander... Isn't that right, Birmingham?

voiceline.line: Commander, if you need any help completing the missions, I don't mind...
You completed the missions? That means that I'm free for the time being, right?
voiceline.oath: All done with the missions? Let's take a little break then...

voiceline.line: I'm the Fletcher-class destroyer, Morrison. I participated in anti-submarine warfare and rescue missions with my allies... If there's anything you want me to do... I-I should be able to do it.

Phew... I've worked hard to prepare myself for this moment, so it's okay. Commander, if it's you, I'm okay with it...! Breathe in... Breathe out... C-C-Commander, u-u-um, I-I-I've finished preparing my heart! I-I'll be in your care!
Does anyone need any help?
Mr. Bear, why don't you greet the Commander? Yes, normally, just like this... P-please keep your paws to yourself!
voiceline.oath: Um, if there's anything I can help with... J-just let me know... okay?

voiceline.line: M-Mr. Bear is on a rampage?!
voiceline.oath: Ah, um, I'm so sorry... Mr. Bear is very sensitive to sudden movements, and he'll spring up to defend me...

voiceline.line: Phew... Finally got here in one piece... Ah, um, are you the commander? My name is Morrison. Yes, the Fletcher-class Morrison with way too many sisters...
I really don't think you need to go that far for someone like me...
Whew... That should give me a bit of leeway...
voiceline.oath: I should use this chance to perform some maintenance on Mr. Bear... Alright, done!

voiceline.line: Benson told me all about the ins and outs of Planet Bunny... Huh? Is something amiss?
Zzz... Commander? S-sorry, I fell asleep for a bit... Uh, umm, what would you like me to do...?
M-my ears are going to fall off...
Commander, would you like some tea...?
It's a bit embarrassing, but... it's surprisingly comfortable...
Mr. Bear, take the mail to the Commander... Oh, Mr. Bear isn't here right now...

I wonder if I should take Stanly's advice and turn Mr. Bear into "Rabbit Mode"...|I'm so jealous of all the people that get to wear cute clothes... Y-you think I'm cute, too...?|I-it's spicy? Was it Thatcher? No, it could have been Kalk...
C-can I take a nap yet...?
Commander, um, please show some self-restraint...
Zzz... Commander? S-sorry, I fell asleep for a bit... Uh, umm, what would you like me to do...?
Can I leave once we're done here?
voiceline.oath: I will crush you... No matter what!

voiceline.line: Didn't I tell you I'm a kaiju user when I first arrived here? What else do you need to know?
voiceline.oath: How old am I? Well... 5,000 years... Yeah...

voiceline.line: Kaiju Eugenicist, Mujina. I suppose I'm a battleship now. Just asking to be sure... There are no kaiju in your world, correct?
Seems the commission team is back. Mind if I sit this one out?
I don't know what I was expecting from a world without kaijus...
Good god, I'm hungry. I'd kill for a hot stew or something... Know any good restaurants, Commander?
What is my goal in this new place...? Right now, I honestly don't know. I'll figure it out one day.
You're glad to have someone helpful like me around? I see... I don't think I've done much, but all right.
What's my purpose in this world? The answer to that should become clearer as I fight alongside the shipgirls.
voiceline.oath: Oh, time to sortie soon? Take me with you. You'll want a battleship like me... Yeah, that'll be great.

voiceline.line: What?! A kaiju?! ...Oh. Never mind then.
Ah, you're back. That means my work here is done. Can I return to my room now?
Not yet! I'm not done yet!
Ah, you've come. What's on the schedule today?
voiceline.oath: Good morning. Still feeling tired? You should go wash your face.

voiceline.line: We lost... But we should be able to do better next time.
Your mail's here. You should probably go take a look.

You sure have a lot of leisure facilities here. Do you also have a pool or hot spring, by any chance? It's been ages since I went to one...|Riggings... Machines... Robots... Oh, nothing, just thinking aloud. Be back soon, I'm going for a walk.|Sleeping on the job when you've got so much left to do? My advice: get up and put your nose to the grindstone.
voiceline.extra: You poor overworked soul... Do you need a hand? I've got nothing better to do right now.|I like how lax this coat is. Although, it's not so great in winter.|Say, Commander, do you wanna watch a movie I borrowed from a friend? ...What's it about? Fairly sure it involves crabs one way or another.

voiceline.line: Oh, Commander, I saw you still had some unfinished missions on your desk. Are you sure you don't have somewhere else to be?
voiceline.oath: These missions still aren't done? Let's get to it then. I'll assist you.

voiceline.line: Well done. The fruits of your labor are waiting for you. Don't forget to claim them.
voiceline.oath: Outstanding job on that mission. Get cozy and I'll make you something to eat.

voiceline.line: I'm Mujina, kaiju user. In my home world, I was a Kaiju Eugenicist. Now, I fight alongside those I considered my enemies... What a bizarre twist of fate.
In my home world, I couldn't imagine what I'd do if kaijus disappeared... But after spending some time with you, I think I know what I'd do now. Thank you, Commander.
I'll handle this!|Instance Domination!
Instance Domination! ...Doesn't work on Sirens, I suppose.
Um... What are you doing?
Kaiju Eugenicist, Mujina. I suppose I'm a battleship now. Just asking to be sure... There are no kaiju in your world, correct?
Whew... That's really invigorating.
All done over here. Now it's time to... What? We aren't finished yet?
voiceline.oath: Interesting. I'm a little wiser than I was a minute ago.

voiceline.line: It's nice to wear something a bit different from usual, though it's making me feel slightly nerv– Ah! What a strong breeze...
You've come as well, Commander? In that case, let's accompany each other back while watching the gingko leaves fall.
These gingko leaves are so gorgeous. Autumn is in the air, quite literally.
Ah, Commander. Why are you out so early in the morning?

Could we sit for a minute? Ahh, it's so relaxing being next to you. Makes me... sleepy... Zzz...|Got time to spare, Commander? Then we could go somewhere before we head home.|I got these freshly-baked baguettes at a store just earlier. They smell so good... I can't wait to get home and eat them.
Hm? We should take some time to rest? Sure. Let's check out that café over there.
D-do you do this to everyone, or...?!
You've come as well, Commander? In that case, let's accompany each other back while watching the gingko leaves fall.
I have to work hard for Commander today as well~
Commander, please let me know if there's anything you need me for.
Fletcher-class Destroyer - Mullany (DD-528)
Commander, a commission has been finished!
Cooking for someone you don't like is suffering...
Commander, what are your interests? My hobby is cooking - though sometimes weird stuff come out, it usually tastes pretty good anyway. Mhm!
My cooking would be perfect if I stopped trying to study weird things? Well, that's a darn shame! If you ask me, the element of surprise is the most important spice!
Commander, are you keeping up with your schedule? If you feel like you can't manage everything alone, please let me handle your domestic affairs~
You feel bad for always imposing on me? It's fine, it's fine! I'm happiest when I can be of use to the one I care about~ so feel free to rely on me even more from now on!
Being treated like a kid... feels a bit weird... ahaha...
Commander, good work~ Would you like to have a meal? I kept your food warm.
Oh no...
Commander, have you eaten? Should I prepare something for you?
Commander, I'm sorry...
Commander, there's mail for you. Don't forget to read it!

Aww... I thought I followed the recipe perfectly, so how did it turn out like this...? |Commander, make sure to strike the right balance between work and leisure! It's not good to be lazy or overworked~ |Commander, do your best! Believe in yourself, you're the greatest!
Work hard to finish your missions, Commander~
Mission rewards, huh... Should I also prepare something for you, Commander?

The Fletcher-class is pretty big, so it's not strange that you haven't heard of me. Though I had my fair share of dangerous moments, I managed to return peacefully. Right after that, I even went to live the Dragon Empery for a while! Is that why you think I look a bit bigger? Who knows~
Commander, would you like me to keep cooking for you every day, even after a long, long time? Hm, you'd like there to be fewer weird dishes? Hehe, I guess I can manage that~
I'm ready to go!
Uhh... the black smoke coming from that side of the kitchen? Ahaha... ha... I have no idea what you're talking about~
C-Commander... so you're also interested in the racy stuff...
Hello Commander, I am the Fletcher-class destroyer, Mullany. From today onwards, we'll be spending a lot of time together. Please take good care of me!
Ah! An inspiration for my new recipe!
I'm number one? Um... as long as I can be of help to you, I'll be happy...

After studying abroad in the Dragon Empery and being exposed to their history and culture, I've learned to be a bit calmer. However, I'm still the same person as before... as you can probably tell from my cooking...
What's with the weird look, Commander? Ah, I got this outfit while studying abroad in the Dragon Empery. Umm... does it suit me?
Cooking for someone else... is a whole different experience. Cooking for you? Hm, I'd say that's a bit of a heart-racing sensation, hehe~
Commander, are you... interested in my new hairstyle?
Would you like to have some soup dumplings?
nil|nil|nil
Today's business is best done today, Commander.
The elegance of ladies from the Empery, walking with their parasols opened, is a sight to behold. So, I picked up a few things from them - want to see?
C-Commander, some self-restraint, please...
What's with the weird look, Commander? Ah, I got this outfit while studying abroad in the Dragon Empery. Umm... does it suit me?
The things I learned in the Dragon Empery came in handy.
You'd better not underestimate me! It's time to take this battle by storm!
My figure and my height are both childlike? B-bug off! I'm a mature adult, and I'm amazing too! Commander, I'll make you understand how amazing I am soon enough!
I am the mastermind magician, Murasaki Shion! Come and be bewitched by my mature, seductive outfit!
The commission fleet has returned! I'll go help check and sort the supplies!
Aaahh! The broadcast is still going?! I already said "see you later," so why is this thing still on? I don't get it!
I challenge you to a game of Othello! You know, this is my specialty, so you'd better watch out~ Heheh~!
"Shion's Growth Plan...?" In other words, you're going to buy gifts for me? H-hey! I don't want kids' toys!
Broadcasts drain a lot of MP, but as long as you're here, Commander, I can feel it regenerating super quickly! It's a miracle, I tell you!
Commander, since you're always basking in my genius aura, maybe you'll become a genius too! Let's continue to work hard together, and put on even more amazing broadcasts!
Hehe, everyone praises me by saying stuff like "You're amazing," or "You're so smart!" But you know, I'd like to hear some more creative praise~
Welcome back, Commander! Even if I'm wearing white, I'm still the same genius magician! Want to see my magic? Well then, prepare yourself!
Owwww.. I'm a genius... so I won't let this overwhelm me!
Good morning, Commander! With my new look, I'll captivate everyone's hearts, both at home and on the high seas~!
Neeeeee! That's too bad... But because I'm a genius, I'm allowed to mess up every now and then... right...?
Huh, is there mail for me...? Oh, Commander, it's for you. Here, take it and open it up~

Neee neee! Don't you think these anchor and bridge hair accessories are super cute?!|Heheh~ Did my outfit catch your eye? Pretty sexy, isn't it? Of course it's my favorite~|Heheh~ In order to captivate everyone's hearts, I have to change up my image!
You feel uneasy whenever you have incomplete missions...? Hehe, cheer up, Commander, I'll help you get everything done.
Heheh~ I really bailed you out, didn't I? Since we finished our missions early, let's get our rewards early as well!
There's not a single enemy out there that can withstand the black magic of Shion, the genius magician! I'll show you how it's done! You ought to rely on me more~!
Commander, you've finally fallen for my charms! From now on, please continue to support me in my endeavors! Commander, there are so many fun and exciting things that I want to share with you!
If I get serious, the whole world's going to explode!
Gotta put my hands next to my hat and smile~! Hehe, do you think I might be cut out to be an idol...?
Wooahh... Wh-wh-what is this all of a sudden...?! You surprised me…
I am the mastermind magician, Murasaki Shion! Come and be bewitched by my mature, seductive outfit!
Woah~ My black magic has deepened!
An expected outcome, that's right!

I'm showing too much skin? Ahah~ So you were totally seduced by my charms, Commander~ I see, I see! Perceiving hidden truths is a quality of a genius, as one would expect of a genius magician such as myself!
Here comes Murasaki Shion, Hololive's famous virtual magician! This world will bear witness to my brilliance!
Welcome back, Commander! Come take a look at my expert gameplay! My game sense is unrivalled after all!
Good morning, Commander! Feast your eyes upon my charms today as well! However~ Don't make me read any weird lines!!

An endless broadcast... A studio that I can't leave... That won't happen to me if I become secretary, right?!|Zzz... I'm not sleepy~ Gah! What time is it?! Nothing's happening, right?|Your stares are too conspicuous! But I understand what you're thinking! You're marvelling at how alluring I am!
Ex----plosion!!
My hat is sentient! It'll move if I wiggle my eyebrows! Heheh, aren't I amazing?
Here comes Murasaki Shion, Hololive's famous virtual magician! This world will bear witness to my brilliance!
I'll open fire on the enemy~
How do you like my tails? They're super fluffy and feel nice in your hands~ By the way, I made them myself♪
Omaha-class light cruiser – Murmansk
The team has come back~ Should we offer them a few warming shots of vodka?
Is there something wrong? I'm worried about you...
I might not have many special skills to boast about, but I'll do my best to live up to your hopes~
Oops, sorry, I lost track of time while chatting with a friend, and I forgot I was meeting with you today... Did I make you feel sad? I'm really sorry.
Hmmhm~♪ Once I start chatting with you, it's really hard to stop~ Is that a problem for you, in regards to work? Aww, that's a shame...
Today is my watch-only day, but tomorrow we can chat to our heart's content. This should fix our little time-schedule problem~ ...It doesn't make much difference in the end? Oh, I see...
Good to see you back~ I've left a refreshing drink and a juicy tangerine on your desk~
Aww, these tails took a lot of work to make...
Good morning. Sorry that I'm late, I ran into a friend along the way and stopped to have a chat.
voiceline.oath: Good morning! I managed to make it on time today. Teehee~♪

voiceline.line: We lost the battle... I'm sorry for messing up...
You have new mail~
Are we going on a rescue mission today? I really love helping people~|Pirouette and a spin~ To my right is a fox, and a bunny to the left~♪|Whew... Hmm~♪ Staaare... Aha!
voiceline.extra: A friend told me a while ago that being around me feels warming sometimes, and chilling other times... Umm, that's not really a good thing, is it?|Staaare... Hey~♡ You're really good-looking, Commander~♪

voiceline.line: You've still got missions~ Would you like me to pester you about them the next time you forget?
Mission complete~ Now let's tackle another job while we're in high spirits~

I'm the light cruiser Murmansk. In terms of my history, I used to be an Omaha-class cruiser, doing rescue and escort missions. Then after becoming part of the Northern Parliament, I took part in some training missions~
Taking this oath means we will share an eternal bond, right~? Wonderful! Then from this day forward, I promise I will see you every day, without it causing you any trouble~
Vperod~!
Hmmhm~♪ Oh, do you want to chat? Why, sure thing!
Ummm, I've got just a teensy qualm about you touching me this way...
voiceline.oath: Gosh, your hand feels so warm~

voiceline.line: Zdravstuvuyte, Comrade~ I'm the Omaha-class light cruiser, Milwaukee, reporting for duty~ Oh, did I slip up? ...Ahaha, sure did. I'm Murmansk, from the Northern Parliament. It's a pleasure to meet you~
I've gotten stronger~
We won~! Fighting comes naturally to me~
I'm spending the whole day lazing around indoors, so I don't really need to get dressed~ You can change into loungewear too if you want, Commander~
...Achoo! Uhh, good morning... Snow? Yeah, it is snowing today... Woah, it's really coming down hard... Ahaha~
Welcome back~! A warm beverage would be perfect right now~ Like vodka, perhaps?
Oh gosh! Silly me, I need to focus...!
Mrmm... *yaaawn*... Good morning... Sho shleepy...

Have you seen my favorite pillow? It's "just down pillow"...?|Apparently, Pamiat Merkuria likes lazing around too~ I find that surprising, but also kind of unsurprising at the same time...|Whew... I can't help but admire how well everyone's holding up in this snowy weather~
You won't find any tails down there today~
...Achoo! Uhh, good morning... Snow? Yeah, it is snowing today... Woah, it's really coming down hard... Ahaha~
Easy as porridge in the morning~
How-dee-doooo! I'm gonna shoot yooou!
Is it fun to hang out with me, Commander? ...Ah, sorry, never mind that.
M-class destroyer – Musketeer (G86.)
Wooow! Look at those mission rewards! We could fill a bathtub with all this oil!
Come on... Return to your former self, Commander...
No matter what life throws at you, always be optimistic, happy, and positive! You just gotta be!
I always have tons of fun hanging out with you!
We should all forget our worries and live to have fun! Don't you think so too, Commander?
So much has happened since we first met... But I haven't changed a bit!
Take a gander at my new marching act, Commander! Relax, I'm only using blanks this time!
Morning, Commander! Nice weather today! Click, click... bang! I'm not sure why, but I'm always brimming with energy!
Time to make a sneaky exit~♫
Heehee~! See? I told you something nice would happen today!

Something nice is gonna happen today~ That's what I'm feeling!|Why am I always smiling? Hehehe, because I've been having so much fun ever since I came here!|The injuries I've sustained from combat? Hehehe, they don't hurt at all.
Finish them all in one go!
Hehehe~ It's just human instinct to smile at the sight of money! Yeah, that's it! Smile, Commander~!
I'm the Royal Navy M-class destroyer Musketeer! I was in the Battle of the North Cape! Commander, little Musketeer is gonna shoot straight through your dreary heart with a bang bang!
Thank you, Commander! This is the best thing I've ever gotten! Hey, tell me: have I given you some good memories, too?
Locked and loaded~! Ready to fire!
Hehehe~! You've reloaded me with energy!
It's not like I *dislike* it, but... Yeah, I actually don't dislike it!
I am the M-class Destroyer, Musketeer! Hehe... I knew something good was going to happen today~ Commander, can you point me to where the port is? Here? Or over here?!
Take aim~! Fire! Bang!
I'm gonna punch a hole straight through your heart~! Heheh, I've always wanted to say that!
Combined Fleet! Uhh... move out!
Commander, help me inspect my third turret!
Nagato-class battleship number two – Mutsu.
Commander, some people just came back to the port!
Commander... Just, why?
Ever since Nagato and I were at Hashira Island, I've wondered... Why is the sky blue? Why can birds fly? Why do we fight? ... There are so many things I wonder...
I know some things you're happier if you don't know about, but... I still want to know! Besides, aren't there lots of things you're happier if you do know about them?
Commander, can we play? Umm, if you've got work to do, I can come back later. I have so much to ask, and also so, sooo much I wanna tell you!
What I wanted to ask was... umm... do you like me? Are my questions annoying? And... Oh, right! I wanted to say that I love you, and I love all the friends I've made here!
Hold still, Commander! I'm gonna perform an exorcism on you!
I want to protect my friends!
Oh, hi, Commander! Something I don't understand happened while you were away! Why do... (Mutsu began asking a series of questions.)
Commander, it feels like my third turret's gonna...
This must be "mail"... I'll write a "mail" to you, so send me a "reply" later!
Why do we need to write like this? Is it wrong to do it this way? Why?|I saw something interesting outside! Can I go check it out?|I wonder where those ants are heading... I wanna find out!
Commander, what's this mission about? ... What about this one?
Commander? I put the mission rewards on my turret and brought them here! But don't wake up Mr. Kitty!

I'm Mutsu, second ship of the Nagato class! Nagato and I used to swap back and forth between being the Combined Fleet's flagship! Later on, Yamato took on the role, though! Isn't it amazing how much there is to see in the world~? My third turret? Uh... I think it'll be okay this time.
So this means we'll be together as one? That's amazing! It really does feel like I'm together with you when I look at this ring! Why's that?
Mr. Kitty, hang on tight! I'm gonna get serious!
Ahahaha~! That tickles, Commander~! Ahahaha~
Commander, why are you touching me? What's the meaning behind it?
Hello, I'm Mutsu! Nagato's little sister! Um, are you a commander? Why? How do you become a commander? Is it cool to be one? Tell me, I wanna know!
I'll give it all I've got!
Commander, look! I saw a really pretty fish just now! What kind of fish was it?
Nothing can stop us! Chaaaarge!
Commander, both now and back during the Warring States Period, why do people fight...?

Commander, check it out! "Nothing can stop me!" Urakaze made it for me! Now I can play warring states with her! Heheh, you should know I'm a force to be reckoned with! Can't you come play with us? Why?
Commander, I read in a book that having stuff is important in war! Remember to frequently claim your rewards!
Great work on the expedition, Commander!
Commander, let's play Warring States!
Commander, you have new mail! Is it a report from Mitsu-what's-his-name?

Commander, why is it that Nagato wants to play with us, but won't say it? Come along, let's invite her to play!|Commander, hey, listen, I know about this massive castle tower! Let's go exploring inside it together!|Commander, Commander! Tell me more stories about the Warring States Period!
Commander, how many koku are the mission rewards worth? And what is a koku?
Hiyaaah! ... Hmm, Commander, how do I learn to look cool while swinging my sword like Takao?

Commander, check it out! "Nothing can stop me!" Urakaze made it for me! Now I can play warring states with her! Heheh, you should know I'm a force to be reckoned with! Can't you come play with us? Why not?
Commander, when I imagine I'm an amazing general, my battles somehow get way easier! Why's that?
Ah! Those are the meanies who steal people's candy!
Candy is the best snack!
Mutsuki-class destroyer number one – Mutsuki.
Comainder! The older girls are back! I wonder if they brought me any candy?
Where's Kisaragi... I miss her...
Both candies look tasty... I can't choose a single one... Help me pick, Commander!
Comaindeeeer! Let's play together! What should we play? You pick, Comainder!
Comainder! Let's play house! You'll be daddy and I'll be mommy!
"Hey! Did you go out to meet that woman again today? ... Are you still trying to hide it from me?! You... you reek of adultery!" ... Huh? I saw it on TV! ... What does it mean? I dunno!
I'll take some candy while the comainder's still... Oh!
You want some candy too, Comainder? You're not getting any of mine!
*Sob*... Comainder...
Comainder, you have mail! If you want it you'll have to give me candy!

Co... main... der? I can't pronounce that... "Mommy" and "daddy" are easier to pronounce!|First apple, then mango... next time I'll buy one that tastes like strawberry!|One, two, three, four... I forgot... six... after that comes... eleven! Then nineteen! I did it!
Mish... shun? What's that? Is that a candy?
Rewards, rewards~! Candy, candy~!
