I'm Mutsuki, I'm in the "Thirtieth Destroyer Division," and I'm the oldest Mutsuki-class ship! There are newer ships, but I'm strong! I love candy! I hate Stu... Um... I can't pronounce that... Stookuhs? I hate those!
Prow... miss? Does that mean we're close friends? Hm... Okay! Comainder, I'll give you some candy! That makes us close friends!
I'll show you how powerful candy is~!
I won't give you my candy, even if you are the comainder!
Comainder, that tickles!
Co... main... der? Are you like my mommy or daddy? Hm? Ah, it's Commander! This my candy, I'm not giving you any!
Will you give me more candy now? ... You won't?!
We won~!
Commander, Merry Christmas~! I am on my best behavior today as well! Uuu... when is Santa Claus going to come? I'm sleepy...
Santa... Claus...? Ah! I know this person!
Christmas presents? Mutsuki wants candy!
Commander...?
Commander, Merry Christmas~! I am on my best behavior today as well! Uuu... when is Santa Claus going to come? I'm sleepy...
Chocolate bananas and taiyaki~ are all delicious~ but compared to candy...? Let's call it a draw~
Comainder, I put on my yukata just like you said! Ehehe, you should take me to the festival so I can get lots and lots of candy!
Ahh! If we don't hurry to the festival, all the candy will be gone!

The fireworks are so pretty~ Comainder, can we put on fireworks every day? |Comainder, I want this candy! Um, I want that one too! |The prize for goldfish scooping is a special flavor candy?! Comainder, let's go do that right now!
Aww... my scooper broke again... goldfish scooping is so hard! Comainder, come help!
The candy's going to fall out!
Comainder, I put on my yukata just like you said! Ehehe, you should take me to the festival so I can get lots and lots of candy!
I heard that if I go around telling people "Happy New Year," I can get lots of goodies! Ehehe, I hope they'll give me a bunch of candy!
nil|nil|nil
This one's for Kisaragi... this one's for the Comainder... this one's for me... Okay, that's everything!
Comainder, I'm done retrofitting! Have some candy! Hm? You're always nice to me, so I'm giving you some candy!
Comainder, what candy do you want today? I have all kinds!

Co-main-der! Comain-der! Comainder! Hehehe~ I just wanted to say your name!|What candy do you like, Comainder? I'll bring more of it next time!|Comainder, let's call Kisaragi over so we can play house together!
Comainder, you want candy, too? Here!
Comainder, I'm done retrofitting! Have some candy! Hm? You're always nice to me, so I'm giving you some candy!
Let's see the fruits of my daily training! All guns, open fire!
Commander, acquiring intel is the first step to victory.
First ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Myoukou.
Commission complete! Is everyone putting forward their best effort?
Stop slacking off, Commander!

It is not unusual for a weaker force to defeat a stronger one in a naval battle. Victory or defeat is often decided by good judgment and split-second decision making. We must be thorough in our training in order to cultivate these abilities.
Commander, remember to take breaks as needed. Your efficiency will be worse if you run out of stamina... Lap... pillow? It's fine by me... but will it really help you recover faster?
I saw your light on, so I came to check on you. I had no idea you'd still be awake; even being a workaholic should have its limits! Come on, I'm not leaving until you fall asleep.
Commander, I've finished processing those files. It's the end of the day, so why don't we grab dinner together? ... ... How's it taste?
... Please do this kind of thing to destroyers, not me...
This method of relaxing is inefficient. Why not try some of my specially-made energy drink?
Would you like some homemade pancakes, Commander?
It's all because I neglected my daily training... Everyone, I'm sorry...
New mail has arrived! Is this the latest training manual?

If I get another chance... I'd like to pet Hatsukaze's head again.|I've put on weight?! Commander... there are some things that even you shouldn't say.|Bergall?! Phew... you were talking about someone else.
Commander, please don't hesitate to ask for help!
Don't call it a day after finishing just one mission!

I am Myoukou, of the Sakura Empire's Myoukou-class heavy cruisers. I participated in both the glorious victory of the Java Sea and the humiliating defeat at Leyte Gulf. Afterwards, I was struck by a torpedo and pursued by submarines. In the end, I could only watch from the South as my nation surrendered. It is hard to say whether that was fortune or misfortune. Anyways, Commander, you can always talk to me if something is on your mind.
Commander, your body is no longer just yours alone. Make sure you take care of yourself properly... for me, okay?
Burn this final sight into your memory!
I'm supervising the destroyers' training right now. Please save it for later if it's not an emergency.
... Commander, have some self-respect...
I am, Myoukou, first ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers. Commander, is there anything I can help you with?
I won't let such a small improvement get to my head.
This victory was made possible by everyone's efforts, not just my own!
Hmph. Another bunch of blind idiots.
What is it? Do you want to be my lackey?
Second ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Nachi.
Mmhmm. It's important to work hard! Well, unless you're me!
I wasn't talking to you!
Commander, you're going to be unpopular forever if you don't pay attention to your appearance.
Hard work? Not at all. A genius like me doesn't need to work hard. I get stronger just by breathing.
Huh? Commander? What are you doing at the training area so late? You were worried about me? I-I was just taking a walk because I was bored. You heard cannon fire? Th-that was...
I can't be honest with myself... because I can't stand the thought of people seeing me work hard... except for you, Commander. No matter who I become, surely you would...
Good work. However, you won't be able to catch up to me with even ten times the effort!
I-I'm not training.. I'm just... being lazy and laughing at the other girls as they work up a sweat.
Damn it... just what went wrong?
You want your mail? Only if you beg me nicely~

My sisters in the Fifth Fleet? I miss them a bit... err, just once in a blue moon!|Ghosts on the training ground? W-what are you, a kid? Who'd believe something like that?|Salt Lake City? I'm going to show her that Lady Luck doesn't bless the same person forever!
Only an idiot would be unable to complete such an easy mission.
Heheh, looks like you couldn't have done this mission without me!

I am Nachi, second ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers. Though I said second ship, I am no "little sister". I fought my way all around the Pacific, and served as flagship multiple times. I am greatest heavy cruiser - bear witness to my elegance and power!
I know I have a hard time being honest with myself, but... I'll try my best to make you the happiest person in the world! I swear my name on it!
Kneel before my cannons!
Commander, are you feeling lonely? I just happen to have more spare time than I know what to do with~
I-idiot... you're that fascinated with me? At least tell me in advance...
I'm Nachi, the first post-treaty heavy cruiser from the Sakura Empire. My design is the very definition of perfection! I'll be in your care from here on out!
I'm even more flawless than before!
Hehe, this is only normal, of course.
I'm the flagship? All right, just leave it to me!
I give off warm and fuzzy vibes? Ehehe, I've heard that from the others as well~ It's a little embarrassing... Nuh uh, I don't mind at all. I'm really glad to hear it!
Yuugumo-class destroyer number four – Naganami.
Commander, everyone in the commission fleet has come home. I'm sure they're all tired, so I'll go give them a warm hug!
Commander, if there's anything bothering you, please let me know. I'll be waiting for you... as long as it takes...
Everyone in the Mutsuki class is super fluffy and cute! Being at this port makes me so happy~!
My tail is warm and fluffy, but Wakaba's is shinier in comparison... Hatsushimo's is slender, and Shimakaze's is tiny... Um, there are all different sorts!

Oyashio taught me a little trick! If I remember properly, it goes a little like... this! This circle on your forehead is supposed to make you luckier when it comes to your love life, and also helps you become happier!
Still not enough good fortune in your life? ...You leave me no other choice then! Even if you have bad luck, there's a way to compensate for it! I just have to pass it to you directly... Mmwah~
Commander, good job in battle! Hurry, come sit over here~ I'm going to give your shoulders a nice rub!
My friends are still fighting, so I can't afford to go down here!
Welcome back, Commander! Um, Naganami will always be waiting for you right here! That's because, well... I'm happiest when I'm by your side!
I'll have to work much harder if I want to become an ideal flagship...
Commander, new mail has arrived. Here, I brought it for you. Maybe someone brought good tidings!

Jintsuu is always so knowledgeable and reliable... I wish I could be just like her... |Commander, can you let me be flagship next time? I'll work even harder, for the sake of everyone's happiness! |Lately, everyone has been circulating rumors that hugging me or cuddling my tail has healing properties, like coming out of a bath. They're even saying that it can cure colds... There's no way that's true, right?!
I can probably help out with transport missions, but as for other tasks... By the way, Commander, I see you tackling all sorts of different missions every day! That's really amazing!
Mission complete! Great work today! Come, come, don't be shy – come rest on this big fluffy pillow!

I'm Naganami, fourth ship of the Yuugumo class. During the War, I was primarily involved in transport operations, but I did participate in some large-scale operations and even served as flagship. Any hardship on the battlefield can be overcome as long as you believe in one another... I just know it!

Um... Commander, I thought we had grown a lot closer, but this still feels a bit awkward... Wh-what should I do? ...Ah! Commander, try hugging my tail! I'm sure its warmth and fluffiness will help you loosen up! Mhm!
Try this torpedo strike on for size!
I'm more than just a ball of fluff, you know? Look, it's my smile and my ability to bring warmth to others that counts~
C-Commander, it's still work hoursss...

So this place is the port? Huh... Oh, Commander! I'm the fourth ship of the Yuugumo class, Naganami. It's a pleasure to finally meet you! Um... what's my selling point... Love! I love you, and everyone else as well!
The feeling of warmth and safety... this is what it feels like to get stronger... Commander, thank you very much!
I didn't even realize I got MVP... But, this was only possible because of everyone's hard work!
I want to be a maid who can bring happiness to everyone! ...I'm going to have to work even harder to make that happen...
Akashi pushed me into getting this outfit, saying that it would surely make you happy, but... What do you think...?
Commander, your entire body is radiating happiness – I can smell it! Huh? You want to try smelling my happiness? Um, in that case, come a bit closer... Even closer...
Commander... Um, I mean, Master! Welcome back! Whether you want to enjoy some refreshments, or take a nap on my tail... either way is fine!
I'll do my best to bring happiness to everyone at port, Commander! Just believe that one day, this place will be filled with happiness!

This is the first time I've made sweets by hand. Commander, how are they? You'd like to have some more? Of course! I'll make them for you right away! |Let's emulate the Royal Maids and form the Maids of the 2nd Torpedo Squadron! What do you think, commander? |"Just spotting Naganami immediately causes one's mood to improve?" ...More weird rumors are circulating again... But if you believe that, Commander... Hehehe, I guess I'll believe it too!
Being able to go about business as usual in this kind of outfit is no easy feat... Real maids are truly something...
Commander, at least let me set the tray down first! Eek! It's going to fall!
Akashi pushed me into getting this outfit, saying that it would surely make you happy, but... What do you think...?
I, I'll do my best...!
You feel a sense of relief when you see me? I'm not quite sure what you mean by that, but I'm glad that you're happy...
There's still some time before the banquet begins, and I'm afraid I'm feeling a little sleepy... W-would you mind if I took a nap? Thank you...
Commander, our friends have returned from their commission. Sh-should we head down to welcome them back?
Commander, are you happy? ...I don't mean like in general, but... like, when we're together... Um... As for me, when it's just the two of us, I feel amazingly happy...♡
Do you like it when I massage your back with my feet like this, Commander? ...Not in that sense? I see... I don't really get it though...
Commander, did you come just to see me...? Ohh, for the first thing I see when I wake up to be you... I must be dreaming...!
We've got new mail. I'm sure it's good news.

My tail is fluffy and warm, and you can even use it as a blanket... At least, that's what Oyashio and the others keep saying. Would you like to give it a try, Commander?|Commander, whenever I gaze at you, whenever I talk to you, I feel so at ease that I could go to sleep... Hm? You feel the same way about me?|This outfit feels a bit tight around the chest... Um, Commander, p-please don't stare at me so much...
Commander, your missions are of utmost importance... Mm, so I'll wait for you right here...
Great job on finishing your mission, Commander! Um, ahem! Don't you want to cuddle up with my big, fluffy tail...?
It's not time for the party yet...? Then, um, let's stay like this for a bit longer...
*pant* *pant*...
There's still some time before the banquet begins, and I'm afraid I'm feeling a little sleepy... W-would you mind if I took a nap? Thank you...

skins.name: Nestling Up for the Long Nights

voiceline.line: It's time for me to get serious...!
The sound of my voice puts you at ease? Th-that's great... it was worth practicing ahead of time!
I wanted to help you relieve some stress, so I thought I would read some folk tales to you... When I mentioned that, Akashi suggested these clothes to me... Wh-what do you think?
Commander, the girls are back from their commissions! I'll head out to greet them!
Commander, good work! I'm ready for you as well. Well then, um, let's get started. Ahem... A long, long time ago...
Tonight, I'll be putting all my heart into reading, all for your sake!
Oh, there's some new mail for us! ...I wonder if it's the storybooks I had ordered.

...The end. Commander, for the next story, should I try speaking in a softer voice... Huh? Commander? Looks like you've already fallen asleep, hehe.|I wanted to surprise you, so I'll be reading one of my personal favorites to you today. If there's something you want to listen to next time, please let me know, and I'll have it ready!|nil
No more~ No matter how much you want to keep listening to the story, you need to prioritize your missions first!
You've finished your missions! Good job with them. Since you held tight and worked hard to complete them, I've prepared lots of rewards for you~
You want me to read the next story? S-sure, I'd love to!
I-I'm going to lose my place...!
I wanted to help you relieve some stress, so I thought I would read some folk tales to you... When I mentioned that, Akashi suggested these clothes to me... Wh-what do you think?
Who is the enemy this time?
What kind of girl do you like, Commander? Hehe. Oh yeah?
First ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers, Nagara.
Commissions? That's part of my job too.
Come on, Commander, cheer up~!
Hmm... What should I cook for my little sisters tonight?
Commander? Oh, nothing. I just wanted to say hi!
An escort? That's my specialty. And this time? Ah, going to port with you, undercover?!
Yesterday, I saw a side of my sisters that I hadn't seen before... Commander, do you want to see a side of me you haven't before? Hm... what should I do?
It's great to see that you returned safe and sound, Commander~!
Hey, hey~ Commander, were you daydreaming again?
*Cries* Commander, let's retreat...
Hehe, Commander~! You've got new mail~!
You need to change clothes after getting soaked... Hey, do you want to borrow mine?|It's great that Abukuma is finally making friends, but...|Commander~ Your face is so~ cute~!
If it's just taking a break once in a while, I think I can let that go.
Wow, finished already? Well done, Commander!

I'm the first ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers from the Sakura Empire. I took part in various battles in the Solomon Seas and in the center Pacific. During Midway, I took over Akagi's role as flagship after she sank and then coordinated our retreat. In the end, though, I too met the fate of being sunk by a submarine...
... Hey~ Commander, are you ready? Okay, I'm closing my eyes...
Hehe, are you ready?
Have you run into any trouble, Commander?
Sometimes I really don't understand what you're trying to do, Commander...
Eheh, I'm Nagara. Commader, have you been anticipating my arrival?
Oxygen Torpedoes.....I want.......
I hope every battle goes as well as this one did~!
Commander, how do you plan on spending your Spring Festival? Me? ...Well, chilling in my room with a cup of tea sounds pretty good, or reading a book, or rolling around. Ehehe~
Good evening, Commander. This room...? Ah, it's a special Dragon Empery-themed set I bought from Akashi's. It looks pretty snazzy and was on sale, so I picked it up. Ehehe~

Whispering to you while cleaning your ear like this... kind of makes it seem like we're a couple, doesn't it? Hehe, forget I said anything. All right, all done. You can stay here and chat a bit more if you'd like~?
Look, Commander, the tea stalk is floating upright. I'm sure something good is going to happen today~
Commander, want some tea?

Commander, have you seen Kinu? I told her I'd clean her ears, but she sure bailed quick... Seriously, what's wrong with cleaning your sister's ears...?|Commander, you know, Abukuma started having tea with me, and will even let me clean her ears! Ehehe, th
Commander, want me to clean your ears too? Sure, come here then~ *pat* *pat*
Jeez, Commander, don't blame me if I poke a hole in your eardrum~
Good evening, Commander. This room...? Ah, it's a special Dragon Empery-themed set I bought from Akashi's. It looks pretty snazzy and was on sale, so I picked it up. Ehehe~
Yet another... tragic battle.
Everyone's faces are full of laughter here... I think I am rather fond of this place!
Nagato-class battleship number one – Nagato.
The commission fleet has returned... H-Hey, I managed to remember the time. Have you no words of praise for me?
Your wish... is to repeat the errors of the past once more? Very well... I see...
What do you require of me? Hmm? I am not doing anything in particular. After I handed the work to Yamato, there is little to do except fight.

I should spend more time with the others? Even if I tried to do that, I would not know how to behave, and they would be afraid of me all the same... Hey, what are you doing... why are you taking off my riggings?!
I see! I am less intimidating with my riggings taken off. I certainly do feel lighter... but why does it feel like I've lost something... like when I appointed Yamato to take over as flagship?

It is enough to be treasured by one person? Since you were the one who brought me out... I shall have you take responsibility... that is, umm, in other words, I command you to... treasure me... if that is acceptable?
I have never had to welcome anyone before. Perhaps I shall do so by firing my cannons?
The decisive battle is upon us!
Welcome ba... oww, I bit my tongue...
Ugh... I have failed once again...
What is this piece of paper? "Mail?" I see, it's mail. Shall I read it?

I despise wars, but... at that time, the choice was not mine to make... |Those who speak lightly of war... do you think they are prepared to face the consequences of their actions? |I shall never forget the smiles on the faces of those people who were saved from calamity. That is the reason why I fight.
Is it acceptable to arrange the itinerary in this manner? I do not quite understand how to do it yet...
The mission rewards... Ngh...! Phew... is it acceptable to leave them here?

I am the manifestation of the soul of the Sakura Empire, the pride and glory of her warrior spirit. As a Big Seven, I am also the symbol of an era. Open your eyes and bask in my radiance... You may stop basking now, I'm getting a bit sleepy...
When I cross the river after the war ends, what awaits me is not a searing white light that engulfs everything, but rather, your warm embrace... There is nothing more that I could ask for...
I am called Nagato... Nagato of the Sakura Empire!
...! N-No one has ever dared to lay hands on me in such a manner...
... H-How uncouth!
I am called Nagato, flagship of the Sakura Empire's Combined Fleet. Are you the one known as the Commander? I shall bear witness to whether or not you have the ability to unite this world.
I hope... to be able to welcome the day when we can all beat our swords into plowshares...
Impudent fools... why did they have to provoke me?
Commander, what are you going to do on your next day off? I-I would not mind hearing you out.
I shall be hosting the commander today. Manjuus, I beseech you to help me look my best. I am... *yawn* a bit sleepy... Urghh... what is that ruckus out there? C-Commander! When did you arrive?
I-I'm only doing this because... I'm prepared to entrust everything to you, Commander! ...I won't let you take back your word now! I a-absolutely will not allow it!
Commander, do you hunger? Then do partake of this dango.
*yawn* Oh... Commander? I desire a few more minutes of respite... Good night...

Good timing. I require your assistance in locating my lost clothes... Just so you know, I did not misplace them because I was playing around, understood?! |I sometimes envy Mutsu... Even though I have my freedom now, unlike when I was placed upon a pedestal and worshipped, I can't be carefree like her... |Commander, you should come visit me more often if you're not busy. Though Mutsu and Kawakaze keep me company, this place is still too spacious for my tastes.
Commander, did you plan to invite me out? ... Very well. Our interests happen to be in concordance.
I shall be hosting the commander today. Manjuus, I beseech you to help me look my best. I am... *yawn* a bit sleepy... Urghh... what is that ruckus out there? C-Commander! When did you arrive?
Th-there's no need to be in a hurry to go outside, right...? It's spacious, quiet, and warm here... and you are authorized to pat my fluffy friend.
Perfect, you have arrived. As long as you are here, the usual moon-watching will prove to be much more enjoyable... Why don't you stay here today and rest for a while?
C-Commander, I, um... "th-the moon is beautiful tonight...!" Gyaaah...! It's way too embarrassing... there's no way I could say that...
Kawakaze, prepare a cushion for the Commander. It would be inappropriate for only me to be comfortable.
What do you plan to do today? Do call upon me if you need my help.

The moon can be freely enjoyed throughout the year, but there are few opportunities for the two of us to gaze at the moon together... |Mutsu? Let her go out and play. Unlike Kawakaze, she has no awareness of her surroundings... Ah, b-but don't let her hear I said that!|Moon-viewing sake? This has indeed been quite popular, but I... Ah, f-forget it! If you want to drink, then treat yourself! ...after all, I'm not allowed to...
Do you wish to comment upon my attire? Hehe, don't underestimate the skill of the Sakura Empire's craftspeople!
Wh-what are you doing?!
Perfect, you have arrived. As long as you are here, the usual moon-watching will prove to be much more enjoyable... Why don't you stay here today and rest for a while?
Prostrate yourself before the might of the Sakura Empire!
I heard that it is custom to play a "sport" at this kind of event, involving throwing pillows at others. Heheh, then I shall put the might of the Big Seven on display!
I heard that it is custom to play a "sport" at this kind of event, involving throwing pillows at others. Heheh, then I shall put the might of the Big Seven on display!
Mm, the ingredients have been successfully purchased. I know not what delicacies can be made from these, but I am looking forward to the results!
I have been informed that the things known as "party games" are quite enjoyable in the company of others. Will you instruct me on how to play them...?

I've been so looking forward to sharing a dinner table with everyone else! ...Y-you should join us as well!|I can't help but to feel like... being so carefree will hinder my work...|Phew... Being able to play with everyone s a lot of fun, but... I am a bit jealous of Mutsu's boundless energy.
A mock pillow fight? Very well, allow me to demonstrate the Big Seven's... Ack! Mutsu, don't start throwing things before I've finished talking!
Hehehe... You alone shall be the target of my pillow barrages.
I heard that it is custom to play a "sport" at this kind of event, involving throwing pillows at others. Heheh, then I shall put the might of the Big Seven on display!
For the sake of our futures!
I am able to smile from the bottom of my heart when I am here. Yes, I am very fond of this place!
It may be presumptuous of me, but please take care of me from now on... Is that acceptable? S-Somehow, it feels a little embarrassing... Ahaha...
A commission has been completed. Shall we take this opportunity to take a walk around the port?

My name is Nagato. Not the Nagato of the Sakura Empire, but of you only. Because you were the one who reached out to me and pulled me from the depths of my loneliness, I wish to always stay by your side. You... won't reject me, right?
Waiting for a beloved person to come back... is a thing of joy as well, hehe...
You are the only one who has the nerve to keep me waiting.
My familiars helped bring the mail in. Ehehe, they seem to have taken a liking to you.

I shall fight on! At long last I have discovered, what it is that I fight for! |I shall never forget... the warmth of the hands that pulled me out from the shackles of my armaments... |What will the future hold in store...? For the first time in my life, I want to know the answer.
I have arranged the tasks in accordance with your instructions.
I never knew that being touched like this... could bring me so much joy...
Uuhh... p-please, not right there...
It may be presumptuous of me, but please take care of me from now on... Is that acceptable? S-Somehow, it feels a little embarrassing... Ahaha...
St-stay back! My Peepsy's made to keep you meanies in check!
"For whom does Peepsy toll"?
Mutsuki-class destroyer number eight – Nagatsuki.
Commissions look fun! I wanna do one too!
*Yawn*... I'm bored... Commandeeer! I'm gonna set off Peepsy if you don't do something fun with me!
Heeheehee~ You're not a dangerous stranger, so don't worry about Peepsy, Commander! ... You AREN'T dangerous, right...?
The story of the boy who cried wolf...? Teehee, maybe I should set off Peepsy's alarm to show you that I'm not just all bark and no bite~!
Waaahhh! I'm sorryyy... But you won't get angry at me since you're a nice and caring commander, right...?
I shouldn't play around with my Peepsy? Hmm... I'll think about it, if you play with me instead! Teehee~
Hi, Commander! Where's my strawberry ice cream? Wha–? But didn't I tell you to get some?!
Oh nooo! I hope they didn't bruise me!
Teehee! What fun things will we do today, Commander?
Waahhh...! Peepsy's nothing more than an alarm...!
Heeheehee~ Your mail is gonna be gone one day if you don't empty your mailbox!

When I take this ring, stick my finger through it, and pull as hard as I can... It makes a really loud noise, like when a torpedo goes kaboom!|My service history? I helped Naka when she was in trouble! I think...|Commander, how do you say this word? "Try-yumf"? I dunno what that means, but I think I can do that by setting off Peepsy!
Commander, work harder so I can live a more "lugshurious" life!
Wow, these rewards are "fenomennel"! ... Huh?! I'm not getting any?!

I'm the "eiff" Mutsuki-class destroyer, Nagatsuki! I did a lot of "protikshin" and "trainsport" missions, and fought hard in the Battle of "Coola Golf"! It's true! ... What's on my backpack? Heh-heh-heh, it's my secret weapon against dangerous strangers, its name is Peepsy!
Is this shiny ring... for me? ... You'll take over Peepsy's role and protect me? Wow, that makes me feel super duper happy! Can I set off Peepsy to celebrate this?
Show them what you're made of, Peepsy!
Teehee~ Commander, do you wanna find out what it takes for me to set off Peepsy's alarm?
Eeeep...! I knew you're a dangerous stranger! Hear Peepsy roar!
You're the Commander? You look a bit suspicious, but... you don't seem dangerous anyhow. The name's Nagatsuki! Heh, if you underestimate me, you're gonna regret it!
I'm feeling super excited!
W-we won...? Myahahah! You see that? Nagatsuki is all-powerful!
Sure I'm wearing a maid costume, but I can't do any maid work with these kitty paw gloves on! Sooorry♪
Nagatsuki the kitty maid is at your service~ Do your best to not fall madly in love with my cute looks~! Hehe~
Grr, that Royal Navy maid Belfast is always working... I'm gonna quit being a maid. Hehehe!
Welcome back, Master♪ Oh, you wanna hear that again? Sure, but first I want strawberry ice cream!

I still have Peepsy with me~! I've just hidden it somewhere!|What do maids even do...? Oh, I know! Commander, I'm thirsty! I want some tea! Hehehe!|My kitty paws are really nice and soft. Don't you wanna feel them? Here you go! Kitty paws to the face!
You really like maids, huh~ But just so you know, Peepsy's gonna go off if you keep poking me!
I totally forgot I can't set off Peepsy with these kitty paw gloves oooon!
Nagatsuki the kitty maid is at your service~ Do your best to not fall madly in love with my cute looks~! Hehe~
If I have to do it, I'll do it properly. I just have to drive them away, right?
I can't believe there are so many girls at this port... You must have tricked them into coming here, didn't you?!

Are you the person who led Misaki to this port? You go by the name... "Commander"? Hmm... I don't know how you sweet-talked her into it, but you're not fooling me. The moment you do anything strange... you better be on guard! My name? It's Nagisa. You... silly dog!
Hey, you have girls back from a commission waiting for you out there. You silly dog.
I'm taking Misaki back. Farewell.
Not just Misaki, but all of these other girls too... You dirty dog, what kind of devious schemes are you up to?!
If Misaki's having fun, it's fine, but... the moment you do anything weird, you'll regret it!
Eh, you're saying you saw me talking to the sea? Oh, I'm a theater actor, so I was practicing... wait, you were spying on me?! You... You dirty dog!
Thanks for taking care of Misaki... I may have been wrong about you. You know, thinking that you were evil, and all. So... I'll watch you for a bit longer. That's fine, isn't it? You silly dog.
Nice job in battle, you silly dog. But there's still a lot left for you to do, isn't there?
Oh no... At this rate...
Welcome back, Commander. ...You're quite the hard worker. Like a sled dog.
It's all your fault, you silly dog...
Here's some mail. Are you going senile? I can't believe you neglected it until I told you.

Hey, you silly dog. This is a gift from someone. Apparently, there are some soufflé pancakes inside, too... I-I didn't say anything! Don't forget about it later!|You're quite a hard worker, which I'd say is good... Even for a lowly dog...|Hey, is there anything I can help you with? ...Don't take this the wrong way, I'm just doing this for leverage against you.
Looks like there are still missions you haven't completed. Are you planning on doing them now, you silly dog?
You did this many missions on your own? My opinion of you has slightly improved... you silly dog.

Like I said the first time we met, I'm Misaki's sister, Nagisa. What I like most are soufflé pancakes, and what I hate most are green peppers. Do anything weird to Misaki, and I'll never forgive you for it, you dirty dog.

I-I understand your feelings! Geez, I'm not stupid like you are... My answer? D-don't you know without me telling you?! Like I always say, you're so slow, you silly dog! ...Hehe, I'll treasure this, you dog~
Say your prayers!
Wh-what do you think you're doing, you dirty dog?!
I guess... you really are an incorrigible dirty dog...

Are you the person who led Misaki to this port? You go by the name... "Commander"? Hmm... I don't know how you sweet-talked her into it, but you're not fooling me. The moment you do anything strange... you better be on guard! My name? It's Nagisa. You... silly dog!
Thank you... What? What's the problem with me saying "thanks" once in a while?!
Whew, I'm a bit tired... I wonder if I overexerted myself.
A photoshoot? Outdoors, like this? Fine... But no indecent photos, you hear? ...Excuse me?! Those aren't allowed, indoors or outdoors, you pervert!
Whew! The wind feels great! ...What are you staring at me like that for, you silly dog? You're the one who said you wanted to go to the beach, remember? To start with, how about... we take a stroll?
You worked hard that battle. Of course I'll praise you every once in a while... I-I didn't say anything, you silly dog!
You finally came? ...It's nothing. I was just wondering if you had forgotten our promise to go to the beach together.

I can't believe how many girls there are, playing around in their swimsuits... Hold on a sec, is this the reason you came to the beach on your day off? You dirty dog!|How long are you going to stare, you dirty dog... I'm c-cute? I don't need your cheap pickup lines!|Let me take a look at the pictures you have of Misaki. If I spot any weird ones... then you're really in for it!
Eek! What are you touching me for?!
Are you in heat? ...You dirty dog!
Whew! The wind feels great! ...What are you staring at me like that for, you silly dog? You're the one who said you wanted to go to the beach, remember? To start with, how about... we take a stroll?
My sisters, please look forward to my performance in battle!
voiceline.oath: Commander, look forward to my success!

voiceline.line: Commander, would you like to study together with me?
Sendai-class light cruiser number three – Naka.
I think a commission has been completed. We should go and say thanks to the returning team!
My sisters chose you because you just let them mess around without being scolded? How strange...

What I do on my days off? Well, I get up and do morning training, I read for an hour, I do target practice for 2 hours, and then... Basically, I make full use of my vacation days! I have to work really hard to become stronger, you know?
What are my hobbies? ...I don't really have one in particular. But I enjoy reading and training... Oh, would you like to train together with me? Heheheh~
Hmm, I feel a little guilty over always making you come with me... Is there anything you'd like to do? We'll do it together, of course!
Huh? Are you saying you've been waiting for a chance to go on a date too? Heheh, in that case~ Why don't we do it, Commander?
voiceline.oath: Heheh~ Commander, have you decided where to go for today's date? If you haven't made up your mind, I'll make the decision for you~

voiceline.line: There's nothing better than getting to come back home. Wouldn't you agree, Commander?
voiceline.oath: I'll always be waiting for you right here, Commander!

voiceline.line: Everyone, stay calm! Let's change our strategy!
Welcome back, Commander! I'll try to be the best secretary you've ever had!
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander! Today, let's continue to pursue excellence in the ways of the pen and the sword!

voiceline.line: Oh no! Commander, we should retreat immediately! Jintsuu said we shouldn't make meaningless sacrifices!
Commander, I have mail for you. I picked it up on the way back from my training.

If it looks like there's nothing for me to do, would you mind if I did a little training on my own? I won't get in the way of your work!|Jintsuu is wise, Sendai is strong... but I'll work my way towards both brains and brawn! ...Ahahah, though I'm not sure if I can actually do it.|If you're tired, would you like me to give you a good relaxation tip? I actually know quite a lot about it~
voiceline.oath: Commander, if there's nothing I can help you with, why don't we divide and conquer? It'll be easier that way!|nil|Commander, if you're feeling tired, I'll help you relax and feel good! That's not what you taught me? Ehehe... just sit back and enjoy it!

voiceline.line: I reorganized the mission list for you! Here, please choose one!
You've cleared another mission! You're so brilliant, Commander! I'll need to work just as hard!

I'm Naka, Sendai-class light cruiser number three! Due to certain circumstances, my construction was delayed, I was redeployed to place after place, and my service record as the flagship of Desron 4 isn't much to brag about... but that's okay! I'll still work my butt off to try to surpass my sisters!
You can stare as much as you'd like. Hehehe~ From now on I will use my brains and brawn to serve you, my sweetheart whom I love so much!
I'm really powerful, you know!
Hum hum~♪ Oh, sorry, am I disturbing you in the middle of work...?
voiceline.oath: Hum hum~♪ What do you think, Commander? I have a natural talent for singing, don't I?

voiceline.line: Eek! ...Please, Commander, try to stay focused on your work while in the office!
Nice to meet you, Commander! I'm the light cruiser Naka! My sisters are better known than me, but I swear that one day I'll be even more famous than them!
With your support I can work even harder!
Compared to my goal of surpassing my sisters, this is no big deal at all!
voiceline.oath: Am I one step closer to catching up to my sisters?

voiceline.line: I heard that surfing is a great way to sharpen your motor skills, especially your sense of balance! C'mon, let's give it a try!
Ahaha! Another big one's coming~! Phew~ that felt amazing~! Ah, Commander, let's hit the waves together, shall we?
Surfing is pretty fun once you get the hang of it, right? What do you think, Commander? Wanna go on a surf date with me?
There's no way to keep this tail from getting in the way when I'm swimming, huh... Wait! I'm sure Sendai knows a way around it!
We've gotta warm up before hitting the waves! C'mon, Commander, don't keep me waiting!
C-Commander?! We just got a message in a bottle!

Sendai, how'd you split that watermelon blindfolded...?! Th-that was so cool...! |I'm sure Jintsuu will be writing some report like "The Status of the Waves and Water in this Sea Region" after our vacation is over. Hahaha! |It sure feels nice to just float around and let the waves sweep you away~
Eh? Jintsuu, you even brought the mission documents along?
Hehe, Commander~ Did you just offer to give me a massage~?
Commander... if you do this kind of stuff on the beach, all the girls will hate you, you know?
Ahaha! Another big one's coming~! Phew~ that felt amazing~! Ah, Commander, let's hit the waves together, shall we?
Tis time to display my might! Karm, Sherry, onwards to victory!
It appears there is another who goes by the name of "demon" here. It is my hope to meet with them!
Be cheery, for here's Nakiri! Ay am Nakiri Ayame, Hololive's virtual demon! Ay have come from the great beyond with my accompanying spirits!
Ay wouldn't mind trying this "commission" task... Ah, it seems the commission team is back. Ay shall go assist them!
Ay must speak like a puppy as punishment for losing! Now... Woof…
Now then! Another world, another place with people to play pranks with my will-o'-wisps on! ... What? You're tolerant of pranks, Commander?!
Sorry, Ay am easily amused! But as the saying goes, "she who laughs much is blessed with luck." Which means soon everyone will start to like me!
Get up~! Get up~! Ay said GET UP! If you insist on snoozing... then Ay am leaving!
Commander, does alcohol tickle your tastes? If so, care for a drink with me? Oh no, Ay simply want to reward you for your diligence. There's no particular emotion behind it. Probably…
Do not touch my horns on a whim!
Nakirificent work, Commander! Ay have prepared us a light meal. Heheh, aren't Ay attentive? You may partake with me in the eating of it. Mmh, delicious!
Ack! Karm, Sherry, beware…
Ay must deepen my bond with humanity now after my arrival in this world! And you must watch my stream today!
Ay am defeated... More training is necessary... Wait, no it's not!
Hmm-hmmhm~♪ Mail has arrived, Commander! Ay have brought it for you~
Does all of humanity view you as a celebrated individual, Commander?|Don't gaze upon me so intently!|With you and your followers for company, of course Ay am not lonely!
Ay shall relieve humanity of its stressful workload! Ergo, Ay shall lend a hand in completing missions!
Mission completed! 'Tis a praiseworthy accomplishment, Commander!
What an unexpected joy that this place allows me to brandish all my power! Were I to take my blades, Rasetsu and Asura, and unsheathe them…
Today you shall listen to my singing till the end! The final song is for you, Commander – 'tis my unending Love in Circulation for you! Let us begin!
Demon Cutter Asura-Rakshasa!
Hm? My swords? The red one is Asura, and this is Rakshasa. Aren't they cool?
Some believe my surname "Nakiri" originates from the phrase "cut the hand that pats"... Surely you wishn't to find out if that is truly the case, Commander?
Be cheery, for here's Nakiri! Ay am Nakiri Ayame, Hololive's virtual demon! Ay have come from the great beyond with my accompanying spirits!
Power... surging within me! What a truly strange world this is!
A flawless victory for me!
Ay am afraid to swing my swords around looking like this... so Ay shall fight with you using my will-o'-wisps!
Be cheery, for here's Nakiri~! Ay am not used to this outfit and am a little embarrassed... But Ay am Nakiri Ayame, Hololive's virtual demon!
Welcome back! Ay haven't merely been frolicking around. Ay was just about to commence a stream in this swimwear!
Ay have waited for you! The ocean floor is where our next battlefield lies!

Umm, Commander? Would you not stare at me so much?|Many say Ay am easily amused, but that doesn't... Pfft, ahahahahah! Commander! Don't expressly try to make me laugh like this! Hahahahah!|My appearance may have changed, but my skill in battle has not!
Tis a swimsuit with a cute design and feel, you say? Quite so, quite so~ More praise wouldn't be undue!
Be cheery, for here's Nakiri~! Ay am not used to this outfit and am a little embarrassed... But Ay am Nakiri Ayame, Hololive's virtual demon!
Don't underestimate a high-school girl!
voiceline.oath: Let's go all out~!

voiceline.line: Yo, Commander! Got some juicy gossip for me? Like, any news on who's into who~?
voiceline.oath: So, Commander, you definitely have someone you're crushin' on, right? ...Seriously, you don't? C'mon, don't be like that. Just between the two of us, I swear I won't tell anyone?

voiceline.line: Heyyo, it's Namiko! Uhh, wait, is this that whole getting-reincarnated-in-another-world thing that's been super popular? ...It's not, huh. Well, in any case, nice to meet you!
Great job out there, everyone! Wow, that's an equally impressive haul of rewards!
H-hey, need something from me?
Look, look, Commander! Doesn't this parfait look absolutely wild? The girls here recommended this amazing place to me!
Commander, you on Juustagram as well? If so, gimme your ID so I can follow you~!
Hey Commander, got some free time? There's a new set meal at the canteen that looks totally god-tier. Wanna join me?
You'd like some tea? You could've gotten black tea at the club... Huh, you're not talking about that? Well, we can always throw a big tea party with the others next time!
voiceline.oath: Oh, Commander! You'd better not forget to come to the next tea party! Heh heh, I swear I'll show you why I'm awesome!

voiceline.line: Heh~ heh. Got me on your mind~?
Welcome back! Let's hurry on over to the café~
As if I'd let you stop me here!
sup, Commander, good morning! Just barely beat the bell, huh?
voiceline.oath: Huh, you're pretty early today. Did something good happen?

voiceline.line: Stop! Time out! I give up, so stop firing at meeee!
A letter addressed to the Commander... No, no... No matter how juicy it looks, I can't just go through somebody else's mail...

Huh, that's weird... I thought we were supposed to meet over here... Oh, Commander, have you seen Hass and Rikka?|Woah! That's a crazy amount of paperwork you've got on your desk, Commander. Your job's pretty rough, isn't it?|Huh, so this academy offers different classes for different ship types? That's pretty neat, but I'm not exactly the studious–– Ehh? Commander, where are you taking me?!
voiceline.extra: Oy, Commander, wake up! Do you really have time to laze around when you still have so much work left?|Hm? Need me to help with your work? Sure, but you owe me juice afterwards~|The girls here are all such pearls, you know that? I promised to go on vacation with them the next time we have time off. I'm really looking forward to it~

voiceline.line: You still have work you haven't finished, right? Shouldn't you go take care of it first?
voiceline.oath: Huh? You're still not done with work? I'll lend a hand, so let's tackle this one step at a time.

voiceline.line: Great job, Commander! You're all done with work!
voiceline.oath: We're finally done! Now, go get me that can of juice you promised!

voiceline.line: Hey, it's Namiko. In my original world, I went to the same high school as Hass and the others. I was also in the Tea Ceremony Club... Wh-what do you mean that's hard to believe? Sit over there, right now. I'll show you not to judge a book by its cover!

At first, I seriously had no clue what this port was all about, or what shipgirls were. But thanks to you, I'm having a blast here. I look forward to living it up over here, being the best heavy cruiser that I can be!
Let's take 'em out in one shot!
Ooh, you even have your own social media-looking thing over here. Woah, this shop's sweets look freakin' amazing. Commander, wanna come with?
Nope! No touching! Hands off!
voiceline.oath: W-w-w-wait a minute! Do you have any idea what you're doing?!

voiceline.line: Heyyo, it's Namiko! Uhh, wait, is this that whole getting-reincarnated-in-another-world thing that's been super popular? ...It's not, huh. Well, in any case, nice to meet you!
All right, now I'm all fired up! Thanks a bunch!
Booyah! Pretty badass, aren't I?
voiceline.oath: That attack... was TOTALLY BADASS!

voiceline.line: Curious about what's in my bag? Commander, you should know better than to ask that to a lady. Well, it's pretty much just my wallet?
Woo, you're here! So, how was it? This meeting spot was pretty easy to find, right? Welp, let's get going then!
This mural... I swear I've seen it somewhere before. Mm, yeah, I'm sure of it...
Commander, I've been waiting for you! Got any plans on where we're going today?

Is this... some kind of PC? I thought I saw something like it over at Rikka's place on several occasions.|Commander, I'm feeling a bit peckish... Huh? You're gonna treat me? Thanks a bunch!|Woah! Why's there an empty spray can lying around here? Thanks for the heads up, Commander, I nearly tripped and fell...
Wh-why are you acting all nervous? It's not like this is your f-first date or anything... Huh? It is?!
J-just because there aren't a lot of people around... doesn't mean you can do that...!
Woo, you're here! So, how was it? This meeting spot was pretty easy to find, right? Welp, let's get going then!
Hah hah haah! Behold the power of a mad genius high school girl!
Hey now! You should at least say sorry if you're gonna stare like that. I'm a girl, after all, mind your manners. Or at least tell me I'm pretty!
I'm the lovely high school girl affiliated with Hololive, Natsuiro Matsuri!! I love singing and having all kinds of lively conversations with people, so make sure to keep your eyes on me!
The commission girls are back, Commander! Let's go do an ambush interview!
Then you're giving me all the cute girls?
Doing cheer takes a lot of strength. Hey Commander, come train with me~
Do you like a sweet, pure voice? Well then... Hehe, pretty neat, huh? I'm pretty good at doing voices~
Commander, we're finally alone together. You should give me a pet name, right? How about "Nacchan?" Or just "Matsuri-chan?" ... "Natsuniki"? Wh- what's that supposed to mean?!
Thanks for collaborating with me, Commander! Next time I'll come up with something even cooler. Great work, Commander!
Kitty ear mode: on. Don't they look soft?
And one and two and spin! Whew... I'm working hard today~ I'm dripping sweat all over~ Hey, welcome back, Commander, did you wanna train with me?
Almost there? Don't worry, I can still hold it in a little longer~
Good morning, Commander! Let's get hype! But don't get any funny ideas - I'm a pure Vtuber after all!
Waaaah! How could a genius like me be defeated…
Oh, mail for you, Commander. You're more popular than I thought.

Just what are you looking at, Commander~ I guess I'm just that gorgeous, huh?|There's sooooo many cute girls in this world! I love it!|Commander! Hm? Are you doing an endurance stream too?|DD? Oh yeah~ I'm a DD, in all kinds of ways. Are you a DD, Commander?
Give a mission, take a mission... Commander, it's only 8 o'clock. Buck up and get to cleaning!
Woweeee that's a lot of mission rewards! Hehe, let's have yakiniku tonight!
I'm Hololive's official cleaner, Natsuiro Matsuri! I'm on the cheer team, so let me handle all the cheering! And you can't slack off either, Commander!
Commander, you've given me so much encouragement and support. Now I want you to give me lots of smiles!
Here, we, go! Get 'em!
Sniff sniff... Sniff Sniff... Where the cute girls at...?
Waaaahhh! Raising your hand against Matsuri is absolutely forbidden!
I'm the lovely high school girl affiliated with Hololive, Natsuiro Matsuri!! I love singing and having all kinds of lively conversations with people, so make sure to keep your eyes on me!
Yeah~! I feel stronger! Sick!
Matsuri will be taking this MVP~☆
Feels nice and soft, huh? Hehee. You finally get how pretty I am, Commander? Here, I'll pose for you, so take a bunch of pictures~
I'm the lovely high school girl, now in her extra-pure pajamas, Natsuiro Matsuri! Hey hey, Commander, what do you think? Surprised? Don't gawk at me too much~
Now I got animal ears just like Fubuki! How about it? Wanna give 'em a feel~?
Commander, you're just in time~ Hehee, Matsuri's got a special treat for you, check it! (She's lightly patting her thigh)
Yaaaawn... Morning already? Gimme five more minutes... Uuunngg... I gotta sober up! I got a lot of great stuff to be pumped for today! Commander, you gotta perk up too!

I can't just stay in my room all day...? Fine, let's go! Huuh? I can't go out like this?|I wanna do a pajama party stream with everybody! That's like the best way to get close to people, right?|Commander, you're thinking I'm twice as cute as I was before, aren't you? Hehe, it just struck you, huh? No, you're seeing clearly~|Crunchy on the outside, soft on the inside, bite sized... Man, I love fried prawntheras~!
I'm the lovely high school girl, now in her extra-pure pajamas, Natsuiro Matsuri! Hey hey, Commander, what do you think? Surprised? Don't gawk at me too much~
I, I've found the enemy!
voiceline.oath: Commander! I've spotted enemies!

voiceline.line: Submarines were born in an attempt to imitate the nautilus. When you look at things that way, the ideas for a lot of inventions were derived from animals.
voiceline.oath: I'm so glad for all the things I've learned in my time with you, Commander.

voiceline.line: Narwhal-class submarine-Nautilus, Hull number SS-168.
Hehe, I took a little sneak peek, and there's a lot of goodies.
Commander, you're going to become even more of a loner at this rate...
Ugh... I'm so sorry, Commander. I didn't do it on purpose... I was just trying to follow you for a little longer...
Umm, I'm not a stalker. I'm not trying to make a hobby out of sneaking up on people either... It's just that, I like being with you, Commander... so I end up following you around... Ehehe.
Commander, are you, um, going on a walk right now? You always go around this time to catch a breather. I know this from experience, hehe.
Commander, you're taking a different route than normal today... Oh, um, you wanted to go somewhere a bit more private for the two of us? I, I see! O-of course I'd be glad to accompany you! Hehe~
Nautilus is not a small animal...
voiceline.oath: Thank you for the headpat. Hehehe~

voiceline.line: Hauu! ...Commander, it's not your fault, so please don't apologize. I wasn't standing behind the door on purpose...
voiceline.oath: Th-thank you for always being so considerate, but I've stopped standing behind the door now. You don't have to worry about that anymore.

voiceline.line: W-woah! Crash dive!
Good morning, Commander. I popped out of nowhere again? Actually, I've been behind you this whole time.
What should I do if everyone mistakes me for an enemy...?
Commander, did you get the new mail? Phew, thank goodness...

I wish I could dive deeper and get to know the secrets of the sea...|Commander, want to try writing a message-in-a-bottle? Someone across the ocean might read it one day.|Commander? Oh, um, it's nothing. I was just wondering if you noticed me or not...
voiceline.extra: I'm sure there's lots of things waiting to be discovered under the sea. Right, Commander?|The aquarium was so much fun! ...Huh? You'd like to visit it again? Sure, I'd love to go with you!|Um, Commander... I'm right here, in case you didn't notice... Oh, you did?

voiceline.line: Commander, you seem to have quite a few missions still. I'd like to be of use to you in some way...
We're all done with the mission... Huh? I was a great help to you?

I'm Nautilus, Narwhal-class submarine – Ah, um, not that "Captain Nemo." During that war, my friends shot at me by mistake, and I managed to do something incredible without realizing it... Overall, I think ended up being quite useful to everyone...
Ehehe, Commander, if you like me that much... O-of course I'd be glad to remain with you forever~♪
Mm, now's my chance!
Th-that tickles...
voiceline.oath: Hehehe... What is it, Commander?

voiceline.line: Y-you're acting awfully suspicious...
voiceline.oath: This doesn't feel right, Commander... Y-you didn't mean to do that?

voiceline.line: Nice to meet you, Commander. I'm Nautilus from the Eagle Union... Um, did I scare you? A-actually, I've been following you this whole time, so I thought you already noticed me...
I hope... my torpedo doesn't end up being a dud again...
Huh? I'm the MVP? How'd that happen?
Bunny suits are made to imitate bunnies. If you like bunny girls, that means you also like bunnies, right? Um, it doesn't work like that?
Phew~ Standing for a long time really wears you out... Hwah?! Commander, when'd you get there? Um, if you'd like, would you like to come exercise with me?
Um, Commander, I'm not standing behind the door, so you don't have to be that careful.
Commander, I'm over here. (*whispers*) I, I was noticed, right...

Commander, your coffee's already gone cold. Huh, I forgot to remind you earlier....?|The Almanac of Marine Life was really interesting. I really want to see all those mysterious creatures in person.|I'm really good at hide-and-seek. When I was playing with Dace, I managed to stay hidden 'til the very end! Teehee~
Huh? My earrings are on crooked?
Phew~ Standing for a long time really wears you out... Hwah?! Commander, when'd you get there? Um, if you'd like, would you like to come exercise with me?
I expect everyone to do their duty.
What are you staring at?! Keep it up and I'll gouge your eyes out!
Nelson-class battleship – Nelson, Hull Number 28!
Com-man-der! Did you forget about the returning commissions again?
I... don't even know what to tell you anymore... *Sigh*...
They let the likes of you be a commander? What a joke. Listen up! To be a commander, you must first... (One hour later)... Got it? Then work harder.
Just with results like these you want me to... You did all this yourself? Don't laugh! I suppose I can make an exception and admit that you did well this time. Hmph!
What are you looking at? I do approve of people who take of their work seriously. Besides, in the beginning I just thought you were unreliable, I never said you weren't serious!
Go out on a date? Well... It's not as if I won't, as long as you keep on working hard then...
Have you witnessed the might of the Royal Navy?
Hmph, this is nothing!
Hmph. Are you done lazing around? I sorted out your documents, so I'm hoping you'll get some things done.
To humiliate me like this... I'll get you back!
I picked up your mail while I was out on my walk. Read it and be thankful.

Experience from what's known as "failure"? Only a loser would say something like that!|I'm not just talking about you, but those who wave around empty words of "friendship" and "efforts" do not belong here.|One should only do work one is capable of. You still don't have what it takes to be entrusted with important tasks... Keep honing your skills.
Why are you daydreaming if there are still missions to complete?
Are you trying to make me get the rewards for you? I'll give you 10 seconds to do it yourself! 1, 2...

If you don't know who I am, go back to the naval academy and start over. I have no need of a commander who doesn't know me. ... You're calling me slow?! Huh?! That's brave of you to say... Stand still, I'll launch some knowledge into your head with my cannons!

Stand straight and puff your chest. You are the one I have chosen to spend the rest of my life with. This is something you should be proud of! ... Of course, to be chosen by you, is my honor... I'm not arrogant anymore? ... W-why, you... Do you want me to beat you up that badly?!
You're making a big mistake if you think I'm going to underestimate our enemies!
Are you trying to get a taste of my cannons?!
Off to the bottom of Trafalgar with you, Com-man-der!
You're the commander? You don't look very capable to me, though. I'm Nelson. I'll be following your orders, for now.
I suppose I should show a little appreciation for you; nice work.
Hmph. Enemies like these aren't even worth the time.
I wasn't really planning on dressing up at all. I was just a little curious, so... I-it looks good on me? ... T-thanks... Hey, don't get carried away!
This costume... *Sigh*, whatever. It's Halloween, so some kind of entertainment is to be expected. But listen here: I'm not dressing up because I WANT to participate, okay?!
W-what are you gawking at?! What's so weird about my costume?!
I'll overlook your slacking at least for Halloween. But when this day is over, you don't get to slack off any more!

Stop taking pictures, Rodney! I don't want people to see me like this...!|I guess it's okay to have fun with everyone like this sometimes... What? Did I say something funny?|What are you standing around for? It's a holiday; don't you have better things to do?
If you try anything weird at all... then you'll be in a world of pain!
Do you wanna end up like this pumpkin?!
This costume... *Sigh*, whatever. It's Halloween, so some kind of entertainment is to be expected. But listen here: I'm not dressing up because I WANT to participate, okay?!

Rodney's with Colorado's group – they went to the shooting gallery. We can check that out, if you want... M-me, get lost among the crowd? Like that would ever happen! Especially when, you know, we're holding hands...
Hey, are you even enjoying yourself? At least pretend to have fun when I went out of my way to invite you, or else I'm going to lose sleep over this! ...Look behind me? What are you– Oh...!
A commission should be completed by now? Y-yeah, I know! I don't need you to remind me!
You'll have to shape up if you want to go out with me. Firstly, you... Look, I've told you a dozen times by now! This is not a date, you're just giving me a guided tour around the festival grounds!
You just witnessed the might of the Royal Navy! ...Ack! Y-you did NOT just see me trip! Got it?
Make this day count, you hear? Y-you should know how to celebrate a holiday. You're not THAT stupid...

Look, those girls are dancing. Heehee, they seem to be having fun. That's the "Awa Dance," if I remember right.|I will compliment the Sakura Empire on its impressive craftsmanship. Just look at their blue dyes and this tailor-made yukata.|These fireworks are gorgeous... You are looking at them, right? I don't want to stand here and watch them all alone... N-no, I don't mean that the way you think!
That's quite a few missions. Shouldn't you entrust some of these to other people?
I tasked the manjuus with collecting those rewards because I don't want you to leave... N-no, I didn't mean it like that!
(Mgh... This sash feels far too tight, even compared to my regular uniform... Never thought a yukata would compress my breasts...)
Hey, are you even enjoying yourself? At least pretend to have fun when I went out of my way to invite you, or else I'm going to lose sleep over this! ...Look behind me? What are you– Oh...!
So this is a battlefield? Ahaha... how interesting.
Want to know about this? It's called a trident. Don't you think it's cool?
Light cruiser – Neptune.
Commander, I shall temporarily grant you permission to leave my side so that you may greet the girls who have returned from commissions.
Commander, did you know how high my expectations were for you at first? What a shame, for you shall now never know.
Commander, I have a question. If in the future you were given the option to sacrifice me for world peace, what would you choose?
The correct answer is - to do everything in your power to prevent that situation from occurring in the first place. Heehee~ Commander, if you wish to woo me, you will have to use your brain more~
Having that said, I believe that a truly intelligent person knows how to rely on others when appropriate. Ah, that's right~ Commander, would you feed me some cake?

Commander, have you planned where we're going to go for our date? If you have picked out an outfit for me, why don't you help me put it on? Eh~? "Why don't I wear it myself?" Silly, that's what love is all about~ L.O.V.E~♡
You've done well to return home safe and sound.
I seem to have underestimated the battlefield...
That simply will not do, Commander, keeping me waiting all this time~
I shall not repeat this mistake again.
Commander, there's mail for you. Hmm? I didn't do anything in particular~

Unlike the other girls, this is my "maiden voyage" onto the battlefield. I wish to confirm for myself what this oft-touted "difference in experience" looks like. |Commander, if you get on your knees and beg, "Please, Mistress Neptune," perhaps there would be a chance for something nice to happen? |Commander, if you wish to taste my freshly-baked cake, then please first brew your finest tea~
Commander, I see you have allowed your unfinished missions to pile up. I am not very fond of lazy people, you know?
Commander, what do you hope to gain through not collecting the mission rewards? Perchance you are waiting for me to remind you?

My background? Ehehe, I am the large light cruiser who only existed on paper, Neptune, so it is understandable that you have never heard of me before. Though I have yet to step onto the battlefield, my abilities are top notch... allow me to prove that to you in live combat~

"You are my world?" Did you think you could fool me with such flattery? Ehehe... well, I suppose there's a chance that I would let you fool me~ But first, you would have to repeat it ten times, nay, a hundred times~
I have no intention of getting friendly with the enemy~
You would like to challenge me to a game? Very well. Do not expect me to hold back though, hehe~♪
That simply will not do, Commander. You cannot seek to gain my attention that way.
Who am I? I am the Royal Navy's large light cruiser, Neptune. I shall see to it that you will never forget my name~♪ Yes, pleased to be of service~♪
As expected!
Ehehe~ As a special service, I shall allow you to praise me more~♪
How uncouth, spoiling the mood like this...
My daily routine is nothing but missions and sorties, so it’s nice to be able to get dressed up and have a good time. Hehe~
Hehe~ I usually let the other girls have all the glory, but even I must sometimes give you something to remember me by. Merry Christmas, Commander~
Commander, Merry Christmas~ ♪
Commander, why don’t you take a guess which box I put your mail into~?

Commander, if you kneel in front of me and beg, you might just get something very nice in return~ Hehe~ |Commander, did you already forget? If you want a present from me, you must first give me something that I’d be satisfied with~ |Since joining the fleet, I’ve made a lot of friends. Especially Shropshire — she’s both a good friend and a good rival.
Commander, would you help me out with these presents that I prepared for Seattle’s party? They’re going to be for everyone~
Hehe~ I usually let the other girls have all the glory, but even I must sometimes give you something to remember me by. Merry Christmas, Commander~
That should wrap things up. Commander, let’s continue our party~
Witness the might of a protagonist!
It's so embarrassing when people stare at me like that.
Heya! My name's Neptune! Nice to meet you!
Hey! Everyone's back! Shouldn't we head out and welcome them?
Huh? What was that? I can't hear you, I've got bananas stuck in my ears.
Going out for some exercise every now and then isn't so bad! Hey, Commander! What do you say we go for a walk together next time?
I've got an idea! Commander, you should visit Planeptune sometime! I'm sure everyone would love to meet you!
Commander obtained! Now we're gonna play some games together! Listen: you're not getting any sleep tonight.
What should we play today? How about "who's-their-crush"? Hmm, your crush... that's gotta be me! Heheh, spot on, aren't I?
Oh, the pudding is calling out to me...! We gotta get back home!
Nep?! It's not time to panic just yet!
Welcome back! Let's give it all we've got, nep!
We regret to inform you that Neppy has been defeated.
You have new mail! Now's not the time for pudding!
Heheh! How's my rigging look? It's all so Azur Laney! Looks good on me, don'tcha think?|Nep nep♪ Nep nep♪ Nep nep neppynep♪|I'm hungry... Go get me some pudding, Commander!
Me, do some missions? I'll help if you give me 5 servings of pudding, how's that? ...I'm just kidding! Let's get out there and finish it!
Mission completed! Rewards obtained!
I'm the protiest of protagonists, Neptune! I'm the CPU of a country called Planeptune. What's a CPU? It's a long story, so I'll tell you another time.

Tell you the truth, I was nervous when I first came to this world, but now after meeting you and becoming your special someone... I'm happy from the bottom of my heart that I came here. So, here's hoping for a bright future together!
I'll nep up your face!
Ahahah! That tickles! Stop it, will you!
Hey! You can't do that, Commander!
Heya! My name's Neptune! Nice to meet you!
Chala-la-la-laaaa!
Justice will always win! Just kidding...
How lively! Allow me to join in the fun!
At times like these, I tend to like your mindfulness...
Nevada-class battleship – Nevada, Hull Number BB-36!
Commander, the commissions have returned without issue. Make sure to comlement them for their efforts!
I'm a bit disappointed in you...
I'm quite confident in my own luck. Want to gamble a bit?
Commander, Oklahoma told me about a nice shop around here. Wanna have a look? ... Hey, stop standing there like a pole! Let's go
If you like someone, just say it up front. What use is there to hide it? ...It's just not like you at all, Commander!
The idea behind priority defenses? That is to protect our most important areas... What, you want to know how important they are? W-well, if it's you...
If you're tired, you can always rest on my shoulders. Don't be embarrassed. Come on!
Hey, get your spirits up!
Tsk, wait and see how I take you on next time!
Yo~ Commander! A message!

Gambling? I'm not usually interested, but I'll give it a shot with you if you're up for it!|Commander, go do what you want while you're still young!|Bantry Bay Squadron? I just missed my chance, you see...
As soldiers, completing missions is our divine duty.
Mission rewards have been delivered!

Yo! I'm the big sister of the Nevada-class battleships, Nevada! I served in both the Atlantic and Pacific fleets. The President was once on board me, I've changed kidneys, carried two atomic bombs, and even cleared out an entire battlefield!
Oh you... what are you doing, getting so bold at a time like this? Have you never considered the time and place for such an important thing? Hmph. yeah yeah. I'm not saying no, so bring it.
You are still way off!
Who knew you were a people person?
Are you that interested in my 'priority defenses'?
Are you the commander, young man? I'm Nevada. I'll be working with you from here on out.
Mmm, not a bad feeling!
Ha, you think you can beat me with such weak firepower and defences?
As long I am here, there's no way we can lose!
Commander, want to go horseback riding together? It doesn't matter if you don't know how, just hang on to my waist!
Heh, with this, I won't be outperformed by those fancy greenhorn battleships. Young'un, from now on, just leave everything to Nevada here!
Young'un, want to experience a bridal carry for yourself?
Nevada, always ready for your orders!

That Oklahoma, she's ain't so wet behind the ears anymore. Soon she's gonna be all independent. |Though fighting can't eliminate every problem in the world, it certainly can eliminate most of those who would cause problems. |Commander, I've got your back, so you can keep charging forward!
So, you fancy a dance with the devil? As you can see, I'm ready to up the ante. Young'un, what are you going to wager?
Commander, can I... change my wager?
Heh, with this, I won't be outperformed by those fancy greenhorn battleships. Young'un, from now on, just leave everything to Nevada here!
Your offenses are weak, your defenses are feeble! Your reactions are slow, and your movements are sluggish! Come back when you've trained more!
Everyone, Level 1 combat readiness! Set sail!
voiceline.oath: Honey's looking my way~! Let's do this!

voiceline.line: Thanks for finishing the equipment inspection. All systems nominal! ...Oh my, you seem to be unable to take your eyes off me~ Not that it bothers me though? Besides, don'tcha like this sort of stuff?
voiceline.oath: ♪~What am I staring at so intently? You of course, honey. You're always ogling me up and down, so what's wrong with me also being mesmerized by you? Hehe~♡

voiceline.line: Iowa-class battleship – New Jersey, Hull Number BB-62.
Your commission fleet's back. Are your words of praise not the best reward you can give them? Hehe~♪
Ah, so you're the kind of person who makes girls cry. Yeah, you'd better feel bad about it.

We'll only get in each other's way if we keep an ambivalent relationship. Say, don'tcha think getting touchy-feely might help break the ice? ...Just kidding~ See, you're already not as nervous~ Hehehe~♪
Look at that, you're already starting to chat me up. So, what's on your mind today? Something a bit more technical? Small talk about daily life? ...Oh, you want me to choose?

My my, look who's all run down today... I knew it, you've been overworking yourself. C'mere, lie down here and let me take care of you. Yeah, my thighs make for a pretty good pillow substitute huh? Don'tcha just love this kind of stuff~?

Commander, would you prefer I take the lead, or would you rather do it? Hold up~ I'll see for myself when the time is right, so there's no need for you to answer in words. After all, don'tcha just love being toyed with~?
Done having your fun yet? Hehe, now it's my turn~♪ Take a seat!
Wanna check the battle results~♪ Yeah? Who do you wanna start with? Oh, you'll do it yourself? I'll listen in while enjoying some ice cream over here.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back from your sortie! Wanna celebrate the occasion with a kiss? ...Yeah, yeah, I know, I'll get started on the report~♪

voiceline.line: I know just the thing to turn this situation around!
Glad you made it. Do you already have a plan for what you wanna do? And how do I factor into those plans?
voiceline.oath: Hey there, honey~♪ What are we going to do today?

voiceline.line: Unbelievable... I'm actually getting cornered?! ...I'm not gonna be able to sleep 'til I figure out how to set things straight!
You've got new mail. Heh, dont'cha just love the anticipation~?

Iowa versus Yamato, huh? A real classic. Don'tcha just love that kind of stuff?|I go for the fruity stuff~ green apple, orange, and soda water. As for coffee... Not my favorite, I guess?|How much stuff should I be doing as your secretary? ...Lemme think, how does 40% sound? If I did everything, wouldn't that make me the commander? Heh.|About that matter... I must admit that you have a point, Commander. How about taking my suggestion next time though?|It's now the age of carriers? ...Dunno about that. If carriers are able to evolve, what's to say that battleships can't also evolve?|They call me Big J or the Black Dragon of the Eagle Union! ...What, got a problem with talking myself up a bit?
voiceline.oath: Might be fun scrapping with Yamato and Musashi. Honey, who do you think would win?|Honey, I love you and all, but you can't cut in line, okay? Especially when it's my ice cream that's coming out. If you're that thirsty, I have some juice for you.|nil|nil|nil|nil|
voiceline.extra: A job well done, hooney~ You're totally amazing. All right, let's get started on the next job~

voiceline.line: Did you already accept this mission? Sounds good, let's take care of it together.
Since we already got the hard stuff out of the way, why not take a little break? It's gonna be pretty easy to prioritize whatever is left~

I am battleship New Jersey, the indomitable Black Dragon of the Eagle Union. When I say "indomitable," I'm not just tooting my own horn, hehe~♪ If you knew more about me, you'd know exactly what I'm talking about.

Commander, I can already hear everything you're thinking. As long as you're fine with it, I don't have any objections~ After all, I still owe you a proper confession, don't I? Hehe, don'tcha think that's what mutual love is supposed to look like?
Fire control, I'm counting on you!
I'll take any work-related requests, but anything outside of that... won't come cheap. Just kidding~♪
voiceline.oath: I was just looking for you, honey~ See, there's something I'd like you to buy for me... pretty please?

voiceline.line: Commander, don'tcha just love being put on the defensive? In more ways than one~♪
voiceline.oath: I know, you absolutely love this kind of stuff, dontcha~ Ahaha~♪

voiceline.line: The indomitable Black Dragon of the Eagle Union is none other than me, New Jersey! You're about to witness true power! Haha, just messing~♪ Don'tcha just love flashy introductions?
Some say that the age of battleships is over. They haven't met the Iowa class.
Course: steady! Objective: completed! Enemies who can stop us: none! Heheh, don'tcha love it when things go smoothly?
Can't take your eyes off me, huh? Nothing wrong with that though~ Just who do you think I am? Ahaha~♪
One, two, jump! Woah, think I nailed it this time~♪ So, how many points would you give me for that? Naturally, a perfect 100, right? Don'tcha just love it when things go smoothly?
Shouldn't you be staring at those reports instead of at me? Alright, fine by me. Take a good look at this jump and spin. Oh, you liked that a whole lot, huh?

Hey, you over there, you're blocking the view! Jeez, I was hoping to treat you to the best seats in the house, Commander.|nil|Keep the spotlight on me! That's right, keep your eyes on the red-hot dance of the Black Dragon, New Jersey!|Being a superstar sure is exciting, isn't it? After all... I didn't come all the way from Planet Bunny for nothing! ...Err, that didn't come across right...|Of course, this dance is something I'd only show you and my closest friends, hehe~|nil
Roar forth, dragonfire! Ahaha!
Your honest feedback, please! Tell me what you really think, okay?
I never said you couldn't touch, but... try to mind the time and place, yeah?
One, two, jump! Woah, think I nailed it this time~♪ So, how many points would you give me for that? Naturally, a perfect 100, right? Don'tcha just love it when things go smoothly?
I'll bring victory to you, Commander!
A rigging inspection? Hehe, go ahead, Commander.
Heavy cruiser New Orleans, reporting in. Hehe, you'll be sure to receive a medal for finding me. Anyway... Do you have any urgent tasks for me?
The commission girls are back. Have you decided on what to give them yet?
You're like a little kid, Commander.
Weapons are extensions of our own bodies. They need regular care, too.
What do I do off-duty? Hmm. I hang out with my sisters, I go fishing, I take naps... Things like that.
I like it when you ask me for help. It's... soothing, in a way. Hehehe, maybe that's a strange thing to say.
If you ever need help, or want someone to talk to, just say my name. I'll always be there to support you, Commander.
Even my sisters haven't touched me like that. Hehehe~
I held the fort while you were away on your sortie. Here's a list of things you should review.
I can't go down as long as they can't hit me...!
Welcome back, Commander. I'm counting on you today.
Neither will alone... nor strength alone... is enough.
You've got new mail. I've added "check the mailbox" to today's task list.

Being focused is a good thing, but overworking yourself will only burn you out in the end.|I suppose rigging rocket boosters are still a way's off... Oh, just talking to myself.|My sisters are all very eccentric. Hehe, rest assured, they're good people all the same.
You've still not finished these missions, Commander. Do you need my assistance?
I compiled a list of all the mission rewards. Have a look.

I'm New Orleans, nameship of my class. I used to fight for the Eagle Union. I had a frighteningly close call once in a battle, but fortunately, I lived to see another day. But the past is the past – treat me no different from how you would anyone else in the fleet.
Is this your proposal? Or are you asking for more help than ever? Hehe, whichever it is, I'll oblige. As long as you want to be with me, I'll do everything you ask of me, Commander.
Lock on... Fire!
Whether you want close contact, or hand-to-hand combat, I'll oblige.
Hehehe. You wouldn't stand a chance against me in a real fight.
Heavy cruiser New Orleans, reporting in. Hehe, you'll be sure to receive a medal for finding me. Anyway... Do you have any urgent tasks for me?
You think I can handle this power? Thank you. I'll trust you.
War is about always thinking two or three steps ahead of the enemy.
I could've sworn that stuffed toy's eyes flashed red just now... Hmm... Maybe I've had too much.
To your prestige, and to your continued victories, Commander. Hehe, I do find myself in the mood for rum tonight. Care to keep me company for a while?
