Ah, welcome back. I was just drinking and watching TV while you were out. I might get more than just tipsy tonight... Hehehe~

Thank you, Javelin. Deliver this bottle to Wichita. It's very valuable. Hehe~|On a random note, why does San Francisco call you "pudding"? Is it because you're so sweet, perhaps? Hehehe~|Lexington is indeed a very good friend to me, though her sister can be a piece of work... Ahahaha.
Don't worry, I would never spike your drink~
Commander... You're unexpectedly needy, aren't you?
To your prestige, and to your continued victories, Commander. Hehe, I do find myself in the mood for rum tonight. Care to keep me company for a while?
Hehe, a victory sweetens the taste.
Such a lovely day. Let's get this pointless fighting over with quickly.
You'll have to get a bit closer if you want to share this umbrella.
Southampton-class light cruiser – Newcastle (HMS Newcastle.)
A familiar scent rolls in on the sea breeze... the girls are back. Shall we head out to greet them together?
I have trouble keeping people at a distance. I apologize if this has caused any misunderstandings between us.
Rest assured. I will perform my duties to your expectations.
The weather report says rain today. Do bring an umbrella if you need to go out.
Your smile reminds me of the wind in my hometown... it's that warm, westerly breeze. Hehehe.
If you take your eyes off me, you never know when I might take up my umbrella... and fly away with the wind♪
Welcome home. Let me take your coat... You're unharmed, thank goodness.
Phew... It's a good thing I bought that insurance.
Would you rather have a cup of coffee, a spot of tea, or a splash of pale ale before work?
I've brought such trouble upon you once again... what a dreadful shame.
Mail for you... Do you think perhaps it's from me?

While I may not have as many battle commendations as my younger sisters, I'm confident none of them know how to enjoy life quite like I do.|I'm no good at these cat and mouse games. Sigh... Why don't you just have a seat and we'll talk like normal people...?|Everyone comes into this world with all kinds of hopes and dreams... But not everyone will lead a life full of adventure and surprises.
It's work that must be done, but we can do it at your pace.
Hard work is not always well rewarded... But it seems this time at least, luck was on our side.

I am Newcastle of the Southampton subclass of Town-class light cruisers. While my record is one of the longest, I also somehow had the most free time... It would be nice if I could make it to retirement safely this time as well.

...It's remarkable how you've turned this ordinary, quiet life into something so unforgettable... Aah... I feel like my heart is about to beat out of my chest with happiness and satisfaction. How will I ever be the same again...?
Glory to the ordinary, the commonplace!
It's like... a couple of small animals playing with each other. Hehe!
...You like my soft bits so much, do you? Now then, what if I were to give you a nice, soft, satisfying embrace?
I thought I had gotten lost, but how fortunate that I ran into you. I am the Town-class light cruiser, Newcastle. Thank you for looking after my sisters.
Mmm... feels so warm.
This victory drink is a bit strong for me... I think I'd better hand it off to you.
There are always interesting things happening here at the port. I can feel my quiet, ordinary life slipping farther and farther away... Of course, that's not to say this lifestyle is all that bad.
This outfit makes me stand out a bit too much... But, as long as it makes you happy, I'm just as pleased.
Are you tired after all that...? Then let me service you with a powerful healing hug.
I've prepared a barley tea for you today. Now then, steel yourself, and give the day's work all you've got.

Do we have time to call up my sisters to join us for some teppanyaki?|It's nice I can push all the maid work onto my sisters, but spending the whole day reading a book by myself is a tad dull...|I've heard summertime is when you see a certain type of rose blooming... But I'm not sure if our port has that particular rose?
It's what it is... But if you keep at this, my outfit is going to get ruined...
If it's the outfit you're interested in... Sigh... I suppose it's too late to stop you at this point?
This outfit makes me stand out a bit too much... But, as long as it makes you happy, I'm just as pleased.
Let's get the senseless violence over with, and then have ourselves a picnic.
I've got an all new outfit here. Does it please you...? Hehe, seeing you all giddy like that is going to rub off on me as well.
Welcome home. Would you like dinner, a bath, or would you like... A nice, soft hug?

My quiet, peaceful life has been riled like these waves, and you need to take responsibility for that.|...All your staring at me is quite a big hindrance to my work. If you have something you need from me, maybe you could wait until I'm finished?|Looking to the future has never been one of my skills... Do you think you could take care of this one for me?
In the interests of fairness, I think I should be toying with you next time?
...Don't you think you'll regret it if you keep going?
I've got an all new outfit here. Does it please you...? Hehe, seeing you all giddy like that is going to rub off on me as well.
... We came here to win... right?
Zzzz... Oh, C-Commander? Are you gonna say that I've been slacking off too much and now I have to sortie?!
Fletcher-class destroyer – Nicholas, Hull Number DD-449!
The commission team is back... I'm heading back now too...
I'm never leaving my room... Never!
I'm not sleepy... I just can't open my eyes.
C-Commander, if you're free, then how about coming to my room and playing some games...?
If I always stay in my room then I won't get to see you much, Commander... Hmm, what should I do...
*Yawns*... Well, if I stay in your room, I can look at you and sleep at the same time, Commander...
W-welcome back, Commander! ... Hey, listen, can I leave already?
I'm different from you, Commander. I'd prefer to just stay here and not go anywhere else...
I-I really should've never left the base...
We invented email for a reason...
Sakura Empire torpedoes... that's scary stuff...|Commander, how about you learn from Helena and just leave me to my own devices?|I really don't feel like training... not at all...
It's not like we HAVE to finish our missions... right?
Commander, since we're done for now, do you think I could...

I'm Nicholas, DD-449... Although my hull number is at the bottom of the list, I was actually the first Fletcher-class to be commissioned and launched... I mainly provided fire support, and... I contributed to the sinking of Jintsuu and the rescue of Helena, but I don't have much else noteworthy to my name... If there is nothing else you want to know, can I go back?
*Groans*... How long is this ceremony going to last... I want to go back and sleep... Don't you agree, Commander?
I wanna go home...
I'm not sleeping... Zzzz...
S-stop it...
I'm Nicholas, the first Fletcher-class ship to be launched... I'd rather stay at the base than head out to battle... You don't mind, right?
Woooow...
Guess I'm the MVP... That's unusual.
I need to control my sleepiness when treating people on the battlefield. *Yawn*... I'm working on it...

I love doing relief missions as a nurse... I don't need to go outside or take part in any training, I just need to look after injured people... What about treating them? No worries, they just need to rest and they'll get better.
Medical staff are valuable and should stay in the back... Frontline duty? That stuff is Vestal's job...
Here's your health record, Commander...

This syringe contains Radford's sweetie candy... It won't hurt... You won't feel a thing...|You don't feel so good, do you? Don't worry about me, just stay in bed and rest...|Some of my patients can be pretty problematic... That's when I just dump them on Vestal...
Do you want an "injection"...?
You must have suddenly gotten very sick...

I love doing relief missions as a nurse... I don't need to go outside or take part in any training, I just need to look after injured people... What about treating them? No worries, they just need to rest and they'll get better.
Huh? I don't get the day off on Christmas? ... Fine, give me five more minutes... Just five more minutes... Zzzzz...
Merry Christmas, Commander... I'm your present, probably... Would you mind closing the lid for me so I can sleep a bit more... Zzz...
I didn't intend to doze off in here, but seeing your face first thing in the morning is pretty nice... Merry Christmas, Commander...
You tired, Commander? Here, borrow half my pillow...
... *Yawn*... Good morning, Commander...

What I want for Christmas...? Don't really care, as long as I can get enough sleep...|Going out on an errand? Have fun... You want me to come with you? I don't wanna...|Helena, wanna take a nap together? It's really snug inside this box...
Commander, come check which one of these boxes contains the mission rewards... I forgot which it was...
Don't shake me, Commander... Zzzzz...
Merry Christmas, Commander... I'm your present, probably... Would you mind closing the lid for me so I can sleep a bit more... Zzz...
This swimsuit is a bit tight... Speaking of which, why am I even wearing a swimsuit anyway? I don't plan on swimming... Oh well. Too late now.
Commander, did you also come to play in the pool? ...Me? Fletcher said I have to help clean up because I was slacking off... Mm, watch your step~
It's too hot to do anything in the summer... Huh? You'd like to go somewhere? ...Well, in that case, maybe I can consider it...
Commander, you're all sweaty. Want to take a shower then relax in the pool?
The beach is too far... The pool's good enough.

There are too many of us in the Fletcher class. Fletcher even made groups to stagger when we come to the pool... Not that it matters to me. I just plop on a sofa and sleep...|I really want to finish here so I can go back to sleep... *yawn*...|Hmm, since I can't go back to sleep... How about this, Commander, why don't we float around like we're dead?
My hairstyle? It's too hot, so I asked Helena to tie it up into a bun for me... What, do you like it?
Commander, did you also come to play in the pool? ...Me? Fletcher said I have to help clean up because I was slacking off... Mm, watch your step~
Not only does she sell chocolate, she even wraps it up... Akashi's shop sure is convenient...
Commander, because you kept your promise and came... here's some chocolate, and a letter for you. Please read it later. No, it's not that big of a deal... Just a little embarrassing...
Commander... stay with me a bit longer~
Just the two of us, all alone... Mm, we can talk about anything you'd like.

Sleepy... Gonna put the desks together to make a bed...|Commander, since you accepted my chocolate, can I expect a reward...?|I also brought the chocolate that Helena prepared for you. Make sure to treasure it, okay?
Commander, stop moving around... Let me get a little closer... Zzzzz...
Commander, because you kept your promise and came... here's some chocolate, and a letter for you. Please read it later. No, it's not that big of a deal... Just a little embarrassing...
You can let me handle all the work you don't have to go outdoors for...
Commander, what month is it...? I think I overslept a bit... am I taller than I was before? *Yawn*... Gotta be because I slept the whole time...

These torpedoes... could work as a half-decent pillow replacement.|It's not like I sleep all day EVERY day... But that's not to say I like moving around when awake...|Nicholas has a dream... A dream of becoming a statue...
S-s-s-still awake, okay?!
Y-you jerk...
Commander, what month is it...? I think I overslept a bit... am I taller than I was before? *Yawn*... Gotta be because I slept the whole time...
Captain da Recco, setting sail!
This course is a no-go because there's no resupply point along it? Okay, then how about this one? ...Also a no-go; ocean currents are too strong? Stop being such a darn naysayer, Commander!
voiceline.oath: This course will get us caught in a storm? And this one will get us shipwrecked? Dangit, why?! I thought I had it all planned out...

voiceline.line: Navigatori-class destroyer – Nicoloso da Recco.
A commission's been completed! What do you say we try a different course for the next one?
voiceline.oath: A commission's been completed! It ain't easy, plotting new courses all the time.

voiceline.line: I'm going on a voyage! Without you! Buh-bye!
Ahoy, Commander! Today's a perfect day to go on a voyage! First, we just have to plot a course!
By Neptune's name! Look, Commander, there's an uncharted area on our map! Who knows what secrets it holds! We should go there on our next voyage!
"If you help me out enough, I'll consider taking that route"? Whoa, you mean it?! Sign me up as your assistant!

We've got a date coming up, you and I! Since I am the veteran navigator here, I'll do the course plotting... I mean, itinerary planning! ...You wanna do that yourself? Hmm... All right, I'll leave it to you!
voiceline.oath: I've worked out a course for our date! It goes to a nice, kinda remote little corner of the sea! Now it's your job to find some souvenirs for everyone!

voiceline.line: Ow! Don't pull on my hairband!
Let's see, where should I plot a course to next...
voiceline.oath: Hmm, where should I plot a course to next... Any suggestions, Commander?

voiceline.line: Oops!
Ahoy! Good to see you again, Commander! Let's have a look at today's cruising plans!
voiceline.oath: Ahoy-ahoy, Commander! Did you know? It's a perfect day for a voyage! Let's go on one right now!

voiceline.line: Err, what? Did I take us on the wrong course?
New mail's come in! Maybe it's got info on the latest course developments?

Commander, got any maps lying around? I'm not gonna mess with them, I just wanna draw some lines, plot a few courses, that sorta stuff!|Hey, could I have a look at your medal collection? I'm just curious which and how many you have!|Why does everyone just take the same exact route over and over? There's so, so much ocean to see out there!
voiceline.oath: I bought a new map! ...No, I paid for it myself, out of my own pocket. Making maps is what I do for a hobby!||Nice medal collection, Commander! I've gotta show these to my Sardegnian friends!|nil

voiceline.line: Get those missions done, on the double! I'll be stuck idling in port forever otherwise!
Mission complete! Can we go on a voyage now? What do you mean?! I thought we had a deal!

I'm a navigator, and let me tell you, I'm phenomenal! I fought hard alongside lots of my friends, and even made it through the war in one piece. My run-in with Force Q though, that was just blind luck!
What's it mean to "link our hearts"? Will I know where you are when I'm out at sea, without even using a compass? Ahaha! If only it were so easy, am I right?
Wind direction accounted for! Fireeee!
Will you check out the course I plotted after I finish this work? Sweet! I'll have it done in no time!
I may be short, but I'm stacked! Bada bing!
The port's newest arrival, that's-a me! Fun-sized navigator Nicoloso da Recco salutes you, Commander! Andiamo, towards uncharted waters!
To the horizon and beyond!
That's that annoying bunch dealt with! Now we can explore in peace!
Be sure to stop by later, Commander! We'll split a melon and each have a slice!

I know this one! It's that Sakura Empire watermelon-smashing game! Just put the melon over there, Commander! ...Relax, it'll be fine! Have some faith in my navigator's intuition! Ready? Then let's go!
Ahoy! Wanna join my sister here under the sand?
The weather's perfect for a voyage, but Captain da Recco's seaside funtime takes precedence! Come on over and we'll play a game, Commander!

Oh, I've gotta put on a blindfold too? No problem! I'll still nail that watermelon! Just make sure it stays in place!|I remember hearing the Dragon Empery's got something similar to this, just with a rock instead of a melon!|Remember to stay hydrated! Just because you're near the ocean doesn't mean you won't get thirsty!
Wanna pick up a bat and try for yourself?
Oh shoot! Watch out – airborne bat!

I know this one! It's that Sakura Empire watermelon-smashing game! Just put the melon over there, Commander! ...Relax, it'll be fine! Have some faith in my navigator's intuition! Ready? Then let's go!

Welcome back. Oh... I know you're thirsty, but the tea's a bit hot. Take care not to burn yourself.
It's good to see you. How should we start the day off?

You still haven't taken a sip yet. Is it too hot? ...Are you perhaps bad with hot things?|It's not like I'm opposed to going into battle as a warship, but... I'd really like to save people as well. Much like Hamakaze's always done.|The Manjuus' teapot is astonishingly authentic. I don't see any problems with adding one to the Office for daily use, either. Hehe.
There's really no reason to push yourself to get some work done today. It's a precious day off, so why don't you enjoy it for a change?
Sigh... Of course you would do that.
Whew... Oh, are you cold by any chance? I have some hot tea for you if you'd like. If you want someone to chat with, I'd be glad to keep you company.
2nd DesRon, sallying forth!
The snacks Agano asked for... Commander's documents... and then there's Jintsuu's... Phew... Things ended up real busy...
Why don't you unwind for a bit before you start reflecting on the day's happenings? I'm sure it'll be far more efficient that way.
What's the matter?
Phew... Now then, let's prepare ourselves for the work ahead of us.

What is there to drink... Maybe some tea or coffee? ...No, I mustn't. Too much caffeine will interfere with my sleep.|Even on my off days, I always end up working anyway... Maybe I'm also a workaholic, just like the Commander...|This feels just like tutoring the little destroyers. Hehe~
Hm? Oh, my apologies. I didn't realize you were calling for me.
Why don't we focus on work for now?
Why don't you unwind for a bit before you start reflecting on the day's happenings? I'm sure it'll be far more efficient that way.
Welcom...?! What are you doing here? Wait, don't leave—I was just surprised, that's all... Well, what would you like to order?
The fleet's back from completing commissions. Make sure you greet them properly before coming back here, Commander.
Ahem. "How's your order, Master?" ...Too emotionless? Then, how about, "How's your order, Master~♪"? ...Hey! Are you taking me for a fool?!
Welcome back. Sometimes, I don't really get how I should be treating you while in this outfit... Oh, it's the same for you? That's a relief.
Did you want me to call you "Master?" Understood... Master.

If you're lost on what to order, how about I surprise you?|I guess pigtails really do make you look considerably younger... I hate to admit it, but it's just like Agano said.|Personally prepared meals aren't part of the service provided by the café, so I leave the cooking to the manjuus, but... if you insist, I wouldn't mind doing it for you.
Please, take your time.
R-reflect on your conduct...!
Welcom...?! What are you doing here? Wait, don't leave—I was just surprised, that's all... Well, what would you like to order?
Second Torpedo Squadron, heading out...!
Agano did say that it's important to have a certain degree of flashiness, but... isn't this carriage just overkill? Well, if you think it's apropos, I'm fine with it too. Hehe.

Receiving everyone's blessings is truly a deeply moving experience. But for now, let's set everything else aside and partake of our sweet bliss. After all, you're not just a spectator anymore – we're in this ride together, hehe~
Next up is welcoming back everyone from the commission team, right? Let's get going.
My face... is all red? That's probably... because of how tightly you're holding me. Don't you ever get tired of me? ...I love you, hehe~
What's up?
Welcome back. Hehe. To be honest, my feet are a bit sore. Do you think it was bad for me to wait here for you like a princess?
You said you'd be the one to escort me today, did you not? Here, take my hand... Mhm.
Here's the mail. You know, I was thinking it'd be nice if you'd write me some... Err, n-nevermind...

I'm pretty thirsty... Maybe some tea or coffee... Wait, I shouldn't. I won't be able to sleep if I drink too much. ...Oh, the same is true for you?|What should we start off with today? ...Don't always make it about work. Isn't it about time you let me do something nice for you?|You look like you're having a hard time... If there's anything bothering me, I can hear you out, you know? If I made a face like that, Agano wouldn't let me hear the end of it... Hehe.
Still getting overwhelmed by work, huh? ...Hmph, you're as clumsy as ever. Guess I'll come help too.
Mission accomplished. Why don't you leave the rest to me and take a break?
Hm? Oh, sorry. I didn't realize you called...

Receiving everyone's blessings is truly a deeply moving experience. But for now, let's set everything else aside and partake of our sweet bliss. After all, you're not just a spectator anymore – we're in this ride together, hehe~
I'm perfectly calm. Aren't you the one excited over the victory?
I can't fall asleep now...!
The Leyte Gulf? I don't remember very much of it...
Kagerou-class destroyer number fifteen -  Nowaki.
Someone's come back... Is it lunchtime now...?
... I can't sleep with you next to me...
Movies? They aren't really my thing...
Maikaze... I promise I'll help you this time...!
I tried too hard to be brave in Leyte Gulf... In the end I couldn't save anyone...
Zzz... Commander... It's fine to take some time off and nap every now... and then... Zzz...
Commander... *Yawn*... Today's weather is perfect for a nap...
W-what's going on?!
Zzz... Fiiine, I'll get up in a second... The sun... is so warm... Zzz...
Where... am I? Who's shooting at me?
I don't really need a bedtime story...
If only I'd tried harder when I was in Truk...|I like this place, I don't need to hurt any of my allies here...|Arashi... Yukikaze... We're all together again in my dreams...
A-a mission? I hope it won't be difficult...
Your rewards won't disappear even if you don't collect them... I think...

I'm Nowaki, a Kagerou-class destroyer. Luck? Kure and Sasebo ships have that, us Maizuru ships do not. I was unable to save Maikaze in Truk, but when I was in the Leyte Gulf I came running to Chikuma's rescue. In the end I couldn't save everyone... but in my dreams we're all still together...
This is... proof of a sisterly bond?! Commander, you want to be my sister? ... I've got it all wrong?! But that's what Maikaze-chan told me...
O, furious storm!
Huh, what? Commander...? *Giggle*... *Yawn*...
*Giggle*... You're like Maikaze-chan, Commander...
This place is... Huh? Are you the commander?! Ahem! Destroyer Nowaki, reporting in!
Zzz... Huh? It's over already?
Hm? I'M the MVP?! What a lucky day!
Disrupting my vacation like this... I hope you're ready for what's coming. Hehehe.
Well, well. What shall I do for amusement now... Have you any good ideas?
Oh? You don't seem to fear me... Who might you be? ...I see, so it is you who rules over this place. Then I shall call you "Commander." I am Nyotengu. You would do best to keep me entertained, hehe.
Your subordinates are calling for you. You shouldn't keep a woman waiting for long.
You... You are a boring human...
One year for a human is no time at all to a Tengu. ...However, that does not mean I have no interest in the world of you humans.
This port abounds with curious "take-knowledge-ease." Commander, might I ask for a tour? Hehehe, you know quite a bit, don't you?
No matter where I go, humans seem to love festivals and feasts just the same. Ah-ha-ha... That's right, I love them too♥
Oh, we're on a "date"? It seems I was taking you far too lightly, hehehe. Well, what kinds of events should I look forward to?
I-it tickles a bit...
After battle comes official duties, it seems. You must be suffering, so I shall lend you a hand.
The battle is just starting, is it not?
Just arriving, Commander? Heheh, you will show me around the port, won't you?
To corner me like so... One must always be on their guard...
"May-ull"? I am most curious as to where it came from.

In order to fly, humans created airplanes... I wonder how the view from within one is?|I'd like to drink some tea while snacking on some manjuu... Not those little ones you have here, mind you. Ah-haha.|There is a strange presence within the ranks of the Sakura Empire. Hehehe, interesting, how very interesting...
There are still duties left for you to do. What a forgetful one, hehehe.
You seem to have completed your tasks. Hehehe, are you tired? Go ahead and rest awhile.
I am undoubtedly a tengu. Oh? If you have any doubts, why not confirm it with those eyes and hands? Ah-haha...♥

To think you'd try to detain me in the world of man, what inconceivable rubbish... Ah-ha-ha, that was merely a joke. My vacation is still in its youth. I shall stay by your side for the moment's passing♥
Haha, what a trifle you are!
Are you planning on checking my body yourself? Hehe, how daring.
Hehe, you shouldn't...♥
Oh? You don't seem to fear me... Who might you be? ...I see, so it is you who rules over this place. Then I shall call you "Commander." I am Nyotengu. You would do best to keep me entertained, hehe.
Haha, that's not enough. Give me more...♥
It's over already? How unsatisfying.
Your port is quite fine. With hot springs and beaches, there are plenty a wonderful place to choose... This looks to be quite the auspicious vacation, indeed, ah-haha.
Oho! To think there was a place with this much class... Not bad! I shall hereby be enjoying my hot springs vacation right here, hehehe.
You, leaving me alone like this... Come take the place of this monkey, hurry in to the bath.
What are you doing, standing there like a fool? Don't hold back, come closer... to my side.

More than me, you seem to be the one direly in need of a vacation.|Hehehe, Commander, won't you join me for a drink under these beautiful, crimson leaves?|What are you looking at? If there's something that interests you... shouldn't you take a closer look? Ah-haha.
Hehe, I wouldn't mind it if you... came closer.
Hehehe, what an incorrigible fool...❤
Oho! To think there was a place with this much class... Not bad! I shall hereby be enjoying my hot springs vacation right here, hehehe.
Everyone, p-please exercise your own judgment...?
voiceline.oath: Commander, your orders please...!

voiceline.line: Why are you here by yourself, Commander? ...W-were you perhaps waiting for everyone else to leave...?! Oh, you weren't?
Leipzig-class light cruiser – Nürnberg.
A commission has been completed. You should know what to do without me reminding you, right?
You... really are an eyesore...
I wonder if Leipzig fell down somewhere... Commander, let's go look for her... I mean, would you like to come with me?
You want me to teach you how to make Brötchen? I don't mind, but I must warn you that I have high standards... Wait, are you perhaps using this as an excuse to get closer to me...?!
Commander, we've been spending more and more time together recently... Ugh, you really were planning something weird after all... At this rate, I... I'll be... Fine with it...?

Now that I think about it more, Commander, you haven't tried doing anything weird to me. If anything, you've treated me really nicely and it's somehow reassuring to be with you... Even if you tried to have your way with me, I don't think I'd... Wh-wh-wh-what am I saying?! P-please forget I ever said anything...!
Eek?! Suddenly touching my head like that... Commander, you're thinking of doing something weird, aren't you...?! Am, am I wrong?
voiceline.oath: Hyah?! H-how many times have I told you not to suddenly pat my head! You're going to give me weird ideas... Hwaaah?! I, I didn't say anything!!

voiceline.line: I know you're tired from your sortie, Commander, but please hang in there a bit longer for everyone else's sake... I mean, if you could...
Ah... Oww...
It is time to begin working. C-Commander, please give it your all...!
voiceline.oath: Come on, Commander, let's do our best in service of the fleet today! I'll be right there at your side!

voiceline.line: How could this happen... It surely must've been my fault... I'm so sorry...
You have new mail, Commander. I hope it's not a glitter bomb...

Commander, do you like Brötchen? I see... Th-then, if work goes well, I... I'll make some for you!|I wonder if there's anything that can be done about Leipzig always collapsing... Ph-physical exercises, you say? Commander, are you planning to do something weird to Leipzig?!|Am I being too hard on you? What should I do... If I was to make you upset with me... W-well, I'm sure it's fine, since you're probably thinking up all kinds of weird things right now...!
voiceline.oath: The brötchen...? No, it's not ready yet! I don't care who it is, you'll have to wait two more minutes!|nil|Slacking off again? Looks like I'll have to give you some p-punishment... Hauu...

voiceline.line: There's a new mission, Commander. Did you get the previous one sorted out yet?
Did you finish all your missions? As expected of the commander...

Though I received many modifications during the war, I never was able to put any of it to good use... But, there aren't many ships in the Iron Blood with longer service histories than me? I, I can't even believe it myself...
I, I know already... I'll do whatever you say... so please don't look at me! It's embarrassing... So embarrassing that it's driving me crazy... I, I wish this would end already! ...Hauu...
P-please don't get back up!
Are... are you trying to condition me to be less cautious by touching me...?!
voiceline.oath: Ngh... This is just... accidental contact... There's no deeper meaning to this...!

voiceline.line: Aaah?! Wh-what are you doing all of a sudden, Commander?!
I am the second ship of the Leipzig-class, Nürnberg. Starting today, I shall serve you to the best of my abilities... Is that acceptable?
I hope all this hard work pays off...
Huh? I'm number one? That's rather... unexpected, isn't it?
voiceline.oath: I'm number one! Ehehe... Wh-what's wrong with gloating every now and then?!

voiceline.line: Hmm... Commander, can you come help me pick out a good souvenir for everyone back in the Iron Blood?
Since you so readily accepted my invitation to go on a vacation together, you must be planning to... Ahh, what I meant is, we can leave at any time if you're ready...!
Commander, please hang in there a bit longer. Let's take a break after we get to the next destination.
Commander, let's head out if you've already finished getting ready? There are lots of places I'd like to go today.
Commander, why don't we write a postcard as well?

I wish Leipzig was here as well... Well, she's never been good with crowded places though...|I never knew the Sakura Empire's food was this delicious... Yeah, I'll have to ask my friends how to make these.|The Sakura Empire's traditional outfits are so beautiful... Eek?! Commander?! Where were you staring at just now?!
Y-you want to hold my hand?! ...Are you sure it's just so we don't get separated...?
Since you so readily accepted my invitation to go on a vacation together, you must be planning to... Ahh, what I meant is, we can leave at any time if you're ready...!
Flee while you still can.
I don't understand. Why are all the people at this base so at ease?
voiceline.oath: I finally understand now. Everyone is at ease because they have faith in you, Commander. It all makes sense.

voiceline.line: Battlecruiser – Odin.
The commission team has returned. Excellent, exactly as was planned.
I am not even disappointed, I simply wonder how someone as lousy as you became a commander in the first place.
Names and titles are no proof of strength, that much is true. But that is fine. As time passes, you learn how futile your concerns are.
Mourn for my fallen comrades? If I were to stop and mourn for every lost soul, I would never win the war.
We make a fine pair, both in the office and the war room. But that can backfire, as I may end up becoming reliant on you...
I do not approve of being reliant on someone. Excessive intimacy is a hindrance in war, clouding one's judgment and forming obstacles to one's plans... Ah, I can't believe what I'm saying...
voiceline.oath: To tell the truth, I blanked out the moment you presented this ring to me. But now, my mind is clear. Whatever obstacles we will come to face, I vow to take them on together with you.

voiceline.line: Commander, we are in all-out war; we cannot afford to rest.
voiceline.oath: You're not a machine capable of working around the clock. Rest if you need to. I will hold the fort in the meanwhile.

voiceline.line: Carry out emergency damage control plan!
Excellent, you're back. Have you finished work our next plan yet, Commander?
voiceline.oath: Excellent, you're back. Shall we begin on our plans for today, Commander?

voiceline.line: Impossible... My plan should have been flawless...!
Mail has arrived. Could it be new intelligence?

One day, I hope to meet the Scharnhorst sisters myself.|Sometimes, things don't go as planned. You must think carefully before committing yourself to anything, Commander.|Don't blame others over things that are out of their control. Nobody can predict the future.
voiceline.oath: nil|Though I object to sudden changes, there are times when one must revise their plans. But rest assured, my pledge to you is set in stone.|Someone made a mistake, did they? If it was excusable, then offer them a pardon. It's meaningless to scold someone over nothing significant.

voiceline.line: You have missions. Leaving them unfinished would be a foolish choice.
Mission successful. Let us get started on the next one, Commander.
I am the battleship Odin. I existed only within the realm of the Iron Blood navy's imagination. Destiny has brought me here to serve under you and assist in the realization of your goals.

Understood. I shall continue to provide assistance for you, whenever– Hey, wait a minute... Th-this isn't what you said would happen! ...No, that's not to say I oppose this! I just wasn't... mentally prepared... What I'm getting at is: give me a moment to think!
You wasted your last chance to turn back!
Yes? Has there been a change of plans?
Y-you will hear from me at the court martial!
voiceline.oath: Not again! Would you stop it with this unsolicited behavior?!

voiceline.line: Are you the one who summoned me here? I am Odin. I hereby take up post as your tactician.
With strength, one can reduce the number of irregularities in a plan.
Victory was ours since before the battle began.
I don't understand. Why are all the people at this base so at ease? ...No, it is simply I who is always trying too hard.
I thought I would never have time to pursue the fine arts, and yet here I am now. Your thoughts, Commander? Eastern as this calligraphy may be, does it not suit the connotations of my name?
To fight is to put one's whole being into something, be that firing volleys on the battlefield or turning a blank canvas into a masterpiece.
It is good to see you again. You ought to dedicate your days off to your own hobbies, Commander.

Gneisenau, enjoyment of the arts will always elude you if you only think in statistics. You stand to learn from Scharnhorst in that regard.|Lord Tirpitz, whereabouts is Lord Bismarck? Forsooth, 'tis reassuring to know that thou knoweth. I shan't inquire further.|Plum trees and snow... This is an unfamiliar, but picturesque sight that I will likely never forget.
Stop it! I am trying to focus here!
I thought I would never have time to pursue the fine arts, and yet here I am now. Your thoughts, Commander? Eastern as this calligraphy may be, does it not suit the connotations of my name?
Enough talk! Have at you!
All you do is loaf around in here... Are you a commander, or a deadbeat?
Kamikaze-class destroyer number six – Oite.
The commission team has returned. I will see to the transport of the goods, and you to its inspection.
I expect no betterment from you. Go on, let your name be irreversibly tarnished.
What do you need from me? Make it quick.
You need an attendant for your outing? Understoo– Wait, why would you need an attendant for a tour of your own port? ...You want to "hang out" with me? What does that mean?

I cannot wrap my head around your need for an attendant when there are no hostiles at the port... Nor do I grasp this "hang out" business! Although I did enjoy our friendly exchange! E-e-end of report!
All your talk of attendants and "hanging out" was just an attempt to seduce me, was it not? N-no, I mean nothing bad by it! Oh, forget it! You toyed with my heart, and now you must o-own up to it!
What the–?! K-k-keep your hands off my ears!
No unauthorized persons entered the office in your absence. End of report.
When push comes to shove, retaliate...!
You came of your own accord. How fortunate... Never you mind. Get to work.
We must start anew at boot camp...
Correspondence has arrived. Don't come nagging later, saying I didn't inform you.

How, I wonder, would one go about making Agano stop touching my ears...|Urgh... Reading so much fine print text has given me a headache. Commander, requesting permission to rest...|I like the quiet of the office, free from the jarring hum of propeller aircraft.
To think a trivial task would have you up-ended like this... If you so insist it's impossible, then I will set an example.
Mission complete. Will you get a move on already and process the rewards?
I served as flagship of Destroyer Division 29 within Destroyer Squadron 6. I performed various escort and transport missions. Leave any tasks of this nature to me. End of report.
I don't know what to do at this ceremony! You insisted on it, so it's your responsibility to g-guide me through it! E-end of report...
Let us finish this!
Whuah! Would you STOP tickling me?
Whuah?! Wh-wh-wha-what has gotten into you, fool?!
I am Kamikaze-class destroyer Oite, assuming my post starting today. I will perform my duties, and anything beyond that I will decide on a case-by-case basis. End of report.
You have my gratitude.
All I did was perform my duty, as I said I would.
Watch closely, Commander. You are about to witness what unyielding focus looks like... What?! I missed again?!
Commander, have you also come to play on the beach? You're telling me to be careful? Hmph, what misfortune could possibly befall me from a game of watermelon splitting... Gwaah?!
Whuah! What are you doing?!
Truly, Kamikaze? You're certain I will become proficient faster if I wear a blindfold?
Oh, to hell with it! I will practice until I can effortlessly split this watermlon!

Are we ready to start yet? ...Commander? Where are you? G-give me the signal, I'm waiting!|Matsukaze made fried noodles! Oh, how mouthwateringly good they are! You ought to taste them for yourself, Commander.|I'm much obliged for the help, Hatakaze! Now watch – I will cleave this watermelon in twain!
Wh-what is it?
What in the name of–?! What is the matter with you?!
Commander, have you also come to play on the beach? You're telling me to be careful? Hmph, what misfortune could possibly befall me from a game of watermelon splitting... Gwaah?!
The essence of the plum tree is best captured with erratic brush strokes... This is quite the elegant ink painting.
Happy New Year to you, Commander. To celebrate the season, I had these garments tailor-made for me, using traditional Dragon Empery clothes as a basis. I don't look... childish, do I?
Whuaah?! I've told you countless times! St-st-stop touching my ears!
Should you think of any good ideas for verses, tell me. I will write them down.

A New Year's poem... "Many riches will grace you soon – I want my new year's gift by noon"... No, this is backwards! I'm at the age where I'm the one who should give the young'uns gifts... Oh, Commander? When did you get back?

"In the ninth year of Yonghe, and the year of the Water Ox..." Bah! The rest of the text is unintelligible to me...|Writing a poem in seven steps? Is there a person on this earth capable of such a feat?|Kamikaze, what should one offer the young'uns as a new year's gift, other than money?
Eep! Y-y-you're doing this on purpose, aren't you?!
Eek?! Y-y-you reprobate! What's the matter with you?!
Happy New Year to you, Commander. To celebrate the season, I had these garments tailor-made for me, using traditional Dragon Empery clothes as a basis. I don't look... childish, do I?
Everyone, listen to my orders and get into formation!
Huh? What are you looking at? Is there something on my face?
Nevada-class battleship – Oklahoma, Hull Number BB-37!
The commissions have been completed. It would be nice if this brings peace.
I wonder if my eyes are lying...
Is the Commander looking at me? Ehehe, I'm so happy!
Commander, want to go on a date with me? I know a lot of good shops around~
Commander, I was smitten at first sight~ Ehehe. There's no particular reason for love. I just like what I like.
Hmm? Ah, Commander. No need to worry about me. I'll be happy as long as I can keep looking at you like this~
Commander, please tell big sis not to worry about me.
Commander~ Please work hard with me today as well~
*Cries*... I need to work even harder!
I've put your mail on the table, Commander~

If I don't do something soon, everyone will laugh about the 'Bantry Bay Squadron' again!|In two years... no, one year, I will surpass my sister for sure!|Commander, I will always listen to your troubles if you have any, you hear?
Let's finish the missions like a speedy swifty!
Don't forget to claim your rewards!
I'm Oklahoma of the Nevada class. I served in both the Atlantic and Pacific fleets... I even bore the duty of engaging in 'friendly' diplomacy!
Ehehe~ Commander, let's go and report to big sis about us right now~
Fire~!
Commander, your hand feels comforting to me...
Whaa?! Geez... My heart wasn't ready for this...
Commander... eh, ah... I'm sorry! I was stunned just by looking at you... Ah, no, no... Nice to meet you! I'm Oklahoma!
Commander, is there any way i can help you with this?
With this, big sis won't have to worry about me! I think.
Thanks a ton, Commander. With my new strength, do you think I've managed to catch up to my sister a little? Ehehe, for your sake, I'll work even harder!
I've already become more independent, so my sister told me that I'll be able to take care of you now! Ehehe~
Howdy, Commander~ Are you doin' well?

Commander, how about we hold a Fleet Problem? I'm pretty good at those~ |Commander, wanna go riding with me? We can both ride the same horse, hehe~ |Hey Commander, you gotta hear this! I just scored a win against my sister! Yaaay~!
Hmm? What's up, Commander? Do you need my help? Sure~ just leave it to me!
Thanks a ton, Commander. With my new strength, do you think I've managed to catch up to my sister a little? Ehehe, for your sake, I'll work even harder!
Commander, it's our victory! V~!
I'm invincible now that I'm full! You can't stop me from fighting until I'm totally exhausted!
M-my belly isn't fat at all, Commander! Ah, don't look at it!
Omaha-class light cruiser – Omaha, Hull Number CL-4!
Don't look at me like that, Commander. I'd take on commissions too if they gave snacks as rewards!
Something to eat? I'm actually full right now. No thanks, Commander.
Hmm? I only like commanders who can actually cook!
Mmph... C-come on, surely you like your girls with a little more meat on them!
Maybe I should lose some weight... What, isn't it normal to try and look good for the person you like? Besides, it's not like I'm really fat or anything!
Commander, from now on, if I don't lose weight, then that's your fault! You have to take responsibility! How? By taking care of me for the rest of your life, of course!
Commander! What should we have first? Breakfast? Or lunch? Or maybe dinner~?
Commander~ Any fun things you want Omaha to do today?
Wait until I come back with a full belly!
You've got mail, Commander! Maybe it's the snacks I ordered yesterday?
Ahh... I'm so hungry...|You don't eat snacks, Commander? How dull your life must be!|Have you eaten yet, Commander? Cause you don't look too great...
Huh? A mission? Let me just finish these chips first...
Feed me, feed me! We'll talk about losing weight tomorrow!
Omaha has arrived! I was born after the first World War, but as a reconnaissance ship, I've got a lifetime's worth of intel in my brain!
Now we have a promise, Commander. You take care of the cooking, and I'll take care of the ea... housework! That way I can eat and still lose weight! I'm so smart!
Oh no! I loaded my guns with snacks instead!
Hm... I'm getting a bit chubby? No! I'll never give up my search for the most delicious food!
You're not "checking if I've gained weight" at all! You're just a big old pervert, Commander~!
Omaha-class cruiser - Omaha! Greetings, Commander! You could say that I'm a fleet veteran~!  Hehe~! So, since this is the first time we meet, shouldn't you celebrate by giving me some sort of gift?
I got stronger, but I also got hungrier at the same time!
Oh yeah! There's no armor my guns can't penetrate!
Take care now so ya'll don't get hurt~
Who's yer favorite girl, Commander? Reckon ya could tell me?
Asashio-class destroyer number two – Ooshio.
Ah, the commission team's back? ...Ain't that nice~ Wish you'd let me go on one too~
I reckoned we'd never be able to understand each other...
Girls are just the cutest darn thing~ And who on earth doesn't like cute things?
Whether they're boys or girls, if they're talented 'n cute, I love 'em all the same~ It's not yer gender that matters, it's what's inside~
Yer a good person, Commander~ Now I get why the fleet believes in ya~ I'll letcha in on a li'l secret: I done fallen for a certain someone... Hehehe~
Hehehe~ Yer the talented and cute person I fell for~ How 'bout you, Commander? Do ya love me too?
Ya made it back in one piece~ Ya ain't injured, are ya...?
We don't gotta force ourselves~
Commander, let's stay focused 'n work hard to make everyone happy~
Ya can't let a small setback getcha feelin' blue~
Got a letter for ya, Commander~ *Giggle*, ain't this a... luve letter?

Yer makin' me jealous of how yer surrounded 'round the clock by such talented girls~|Asashio's a real cutie~ Hehehe~|Commander, if yer bored, why don'tcha call some folks over 'n we can have a tea party?
It's mission time, Commander.
The mission rewards done arrived, Commander~

I'm Ooshio, Asashio-class ship number two~ I served as the flagship of Destroyer Division 8 and did all kindsa things with Asashio, Michishio, 'n Arashio, 'n I was even awarded a few medals~ Then I took some damage 'n Asashio was put in charge, but that's all in the past now. Anyhow, why don'tcha tell me a bit 'bout this fleet?
I love you, 'n you love me too, ain't that just the darndest thing~ Don'tcha agree, Com-man-der? ♡
For the sake of the fleet~
Wonder what I oughta make for desert... Ah, ya want some too, Commander? Aw heck, yer puttin' me in a tight spot~
Oh my, I better tell the others that yer a dangerous one, Commander~
Oh, I found me a talented-lookin' Commander~ "How so"? Cause I saw all them talented-lookin' girls ya got followin' ya~ I'm Ooshio. I'll be countin' on ya'll from now on~
Thanks much~
I done saw how fine ya'll fought~
This costume here's a bit too tight... I oughta get a new one next year...
Merry Christmas~ Commander, we gotta go hand out presents to them destroyers~ You be Santa, I'll be yer reindeer~
Commander, ya got time once we're done handin' out presents? Heheh, cause I've got a special present for you, my sweetheart~ Just don't be too surprised when I show it to ya~
I got presents for all you girls who made it back safely~ There's one for you too, Commander~
Letter for ya, Commander~ Hehe, wouldn't it be nice if it's a thank-you letter from a good girl to Santa?

Oh yeah, whaddya want for Christmas, Commander? I can get it for ya, even if it takes some lookin' 'round.|Christmas is more fun when ya get everyone together 'n throw a big party~|By the end of the year, everyone'll be smilin'~♪ Hehe, it makes me happy, too~
Ain't it more fun if we treat these mission rewards as presents from headquarters?
You wonderin' why I wanna be the one handin' out presents? Cause I wanna see those cute smiles on everyone's faces, ya silly~
Well, fine... Think of it as my Christmas gift to you~♡
Merry Christmas~ Commander, we gotta go hand out presents to them destroyers~ You be Santa, I'll be yer reindeer~
C'mon, ya'll, follow my lead~
Wonder if Asashio's here yet... Not done been abducted by some criminal, has she... Am I just worryin' over nothin', Commander?
Happy anniversary~ Today's a day to enjoy to yer heart's content, ya know? I'm just havin' fun in my own way, checkin' out cute girls from afar~ I appreciate yer concern though, Commander~
Hm...? I've might've fallen for ya again, Commander... You look even more charmin' than usual... What about me? Ya think I'm cuter than usual?
The world is all spinny~ I guess I am pretty drunk... Commander~ What do I oughta do to sober up...?
Fancy a drink, Commander? It's pretty darn nice stuff~ Hehehe, don't be shy now! I might be heckin' drunk, but I won't bite~

Albacore, don't go causin' mischief durin' the party, all right? Commander, I reckon you oughta tell her too.|Michishio 'n Arashio almost love Asashio as much as I do~ That's why we all love havin' tea parties with her. You too, Commander, go become buddy buds with her~|Commander, it ain't nice of ya to check out other girls while yer talkin' to me~! Where are yer manners?
Commander? What're ya starin' at me for...?
Gawsh... Girl has a sip of wine 'n this happens... Yer lucky it's me ya did it to~!
Happy anniversary~ Today's a day to enjoy to yer heart's content, ya know? I'm just havin' fun in my own way, checkin' out cute girls from afar~ I appreciate yer concern though, Commander~
It's nice wearin' a cute dress 'n minglin' with a bunch of cuties~ I don't mind you oglin' me if ya want, Commander.
Should I hang this "fortune" poster here...? Oh, Commander, did ya also want a Spring Festival present from Ooshio here? Just kiddin'~ Hehe, anyway, happy Lunar New Year~
Go on, spend some time with all the cuties 'n have a relaxin' holiday!
Are ya fixin' for some tea, Commander? Then have some brewed usin' tea leaves I got from Yat Sen~

Ain't family get-togethers a tradition 'round this time of year? I'll call over my sisters for a little tea time... No wait, we'll have tangyuan instead! Wanna join us, Commander?|Kasumi, how's about joinin' us for a night out? You can bring Foo and yer friends too, if ya want~|If everyone's happy, then I'm happy too~ You feelin' happy, Commander?
My hair ornament's slid out of place? Aw, thanks, Commander~
Commander, this ain't the place or place for lewdin', all right~?
Should I hang this "fortune" poster here...? Oh, Commander, did ya also want a Spring Festival present from Ooshio here? Just kiddin'~ Hehe, anyway, happy Lunar New Year~
These special-made uniforms're real nice – everyone looks so cute in 'em~ Whole school's a feast for the eyes, ain't it, Commander?
Finally we're through with them mornin' classes~ Commander, would ya fancy havin' lunch with me? Heheh, yer wonderin' what I done made? You'll see for yerself soon 'nuff~
The commission team done returned. Give them hardworkin' girls a treat for their efforts~
For dessert, we'll be havin' some schoolgirl eye candy~ Aww, why ya lookin' bummed out? I know you've always got room for sweeties, hon. Hehehe♪
Oh! I was just wonderin' where ya went. Is that a can of green tea? Much obliged~
How'd ya like my home cookin'? ...Heheh, glad to hear it~ Ya can have as much as ya want.
Ya got a letter, Commander! Heh, do ya want me to leave it in yer shoe locker?

I done made a lunch box for my li'l Asashio too. Stay right here while I go 'n give it to her.|These kitties got such squishy li'l bellies~ Have a feel for yerself, Commander!|What do ya say we invite Michishio 'n Kasumi over for a tea party after our club activities're over?
Do ya wanna feed these li'l kitties, Commander? Heheh~
You tryin' to come on to me, Commander? Ain't you a real skirt chaser~
Finally we're through with them mornin' classes~ Commander, would ya fancy havin' lunch with me? Heheh, yer wonderin' what I done made? You'll see for yerself soon 'nuff~
Just goes to show what teamwork can accomplish~
Come one, come all!
Commander, don't I look ninja-like when I do this with my hands? Ehehe, that's because Kuro taught me~
Kagerou-class destroyer number four – Oyashio.
Commander~ The commission's done.
No matter what you do, Commander, Kuroshio has no problem following you... But I'm not so forgiving. For her sake, Commander, en garde!
Commander, would you like to watch my show? By all means, come on over and take a seat~ The more the merrier, after all!
As a ninja, my sister is always very serious... And since I'm a puppeteer, I always thought it would be nice to make her laugh sometimes. That's kind of a tall order though, ahaha...

Commander, you're awesome. Not only do you know what I'm thinking, but you help me get through to everyone else... One day, I'm going to make Kuroshio laugh, and I know you'll definitely be there to see it!
Commander, I thought it would be great to be as clear-headed as Kuroshio... But there's no way I could. I like Kuroshio, I like you, and I like puppet shows. That's just who I am.
Kuro, why don't you give the Commander a massage? Yes, I think hopping around the shoulders should do the trick?
Commander, how are you today? Would you care to enjoy one of my famous puppet shows? Come on! How about it?
Ugh! Commander! Quickly, take the others and run!
Commander, guess which torpedo has your mail in it? If you're wrong... well, it probably won't blow up♪

Commander, will you come to watch my show when you have free time?|Kuro is my dear friend! Her namesake is obvious, isn't it? My oh so serious big sister!|Of course the strings are a puppetry thing. So why do I put torpedoes on them? Ahaha... Let's call it an old trade secret.
Commander, let's go knock out one of those new missions~ I need to get some new material♪
Commander, the mission rewards are here~ Let me see if there's any props I can use in there♪

I'm the fourth ship of the Kagerou-class, Oyashio. I've always been close with Kuroshio. She can tell you everything you need to know, so just ask her~♪ Oh, unless...? You'd rather I act it out for you?
And so the Commander and Oyashio lived happily ever after for all the rest of their days... Ehehe, even if the audience might get sick of it, I'm hoping the rest of our story is a long, happy comedy♪
The fun has only just begun, right~♪
Commander, isn't it amazing how nurturing Oyashio is? ... Er! I'm talking about the ocean current!
Huh?! Grraagh! ... Oh, Commander, I'm sorry... that's just how we've been trained in this line of work...
My big sister is a ninja, and I'm a puppeteer. Isn't it amazing how diverse our world is~? I'm the fourth ship of the Kagerou-class, Oyashio. And with my puppet Kuro, I will dazzle you, Commander.
Oooh! I just came up with a new idea for a show!
And thus, the Commander led our fleet to another victory! That's the end of this episode!
I'm ready to ram! Let's gooooo!
Believe it or not, but I'm from the same era as Avrora and Mikasa! So, you know what you oughta do as the commander here, don'tcha?
voiceline.oath: You wanna know more about the war I fought so hard in, darling? Heheh! Maybe I should brief you then~ Not that I have to, someone else can tell you of my exploits.

voiceline.line: Bogatyr-class protected cruiser – Pamiat Merkuria.
A commission's been completed! Now gimme your thanks for notifying you!
Scumbag...
This isn't a naval cabin, so why is my room so plain? If I'm to actually live here, you'll need to get some much better interior decor!
*yaaawn*... What's this? Bedsheets and a soft pillow? Wow, how thoughtful of you! Now I can get myself a good nap! Right then... *yawn*... Zzz...
I toss like crazy in my sleep?! Wh-wh-what're you saying?! Were you watching the whole time?! Oh geez, now I'll never be able to get hitched... Now it's your responsibility, Commander♪
Sadly for you, I don't belong to anyone, so you don't get to have me♪ But, if you really, *really* insist, theeen... Hehehe, you get what I'm trying to say, don'tcha?
voiceline.oath: I may look young, but I've got a rich history and a vast repertoire of knowledge, which is how I know your mind like the back of my hand, darling♪ "Wisdom really comes with age"... We're not touching that topic! Ever! That has nothing to do with it, stupid!

voiceline.line: What are you doing? Didn't Mikasa teach you to respect girls with rich histories?
You're back, huh? Then get me something to eat, now! I want some of that "ramen" the Sakura Empire's got!
Oww... Show some dang decency!
Yoohoo, Commander! What task are we starting today with?
voiceline.oath: So, what are we starting the day with, darling? ♪

voiceline.line: Сожаление... And here I thought this fleet was stronger than this...
I'm on letter-giving duty today. You'd *better* appreciate my work♪

Avrora, could you go buy me a new game? Hmm, fine... Then how about the Commander instead? What do you say to that, Commander~?|Secretary work, eh... Like, I'm happy to work hard for you and all, but wouldn't it make you even happier to work hard for me?|It's embarrassing how I'm staring at you constantly? Well, I don't feel embarrassed, so who cares~ Hahah!
voiceline.oath: Secretary work, huh... I'll do it if you can beat me at a game. Although you have any chance of winning anyway♪|Mh...! I think I just strained my back... N-no, I didn't say anything!|nil

voiceline.line: You've got missions. Get 'em done. Me? I've got my hands full with this game.
Mission complete! Haha! I did my share of work, so I'm gonna claim my reward!

I'm Pamiat Merkuria, protected cruiser. I was a bigshot in the Black Sea Fleet during the great war, beating up baddies left and right, and I even fought alongside Avrora in a world war! I'm charismatic, experienced, and cute - all the things YOU aren't!
Hahaha♪ You're giving me a ring, just like that? Just how thirsty are you, Commander? Next time, think it through first. Whatevs, I'm not gonna make you regret your choice♡
Let's smack 'em down!
Ah, "getting personal," are we? Hehehe~ Where do you wanna touch me, huh~?
You really like 'em... *big*, huh? You creep♡
voiceline.oath: You love it when they're big, don'tcha? And I love you

voiceline.line: Yoohoo, Commander! I'm *the* Pamiat Merkuria, light cruiser from the Northern Parliament! Nice meeting you! Do your thing and work your butt off for me♪
I have design limitations, so don't work me like an ox, alright?
Loooosers! Are you that much weaker than me? Or am I just really strong?
Umm... Is it just me, or are these mockup cell bars way too strong? Dangit, I just hope Gangut comes and rescues me soon...
What kinda exercise is this?! Nobody said I'd become a dang showpiece! Come on, get this thing off me, *now*!
Ughh... Why am I here, just to suffer...?
Commander, I know I did wrong, and I'm sorry, so come on... Give me some of that fooood...!
You've got mail. See, I can do work even with just my torpedo boats!

I have a big backlog of games to play... I'd really like to go home and work on it! Please? Please!|Something smells gooood... So what if I had snacks merely 30 minutes ago? I have a needy stomach!|Grrr... I'm on my last dang legs here... Grrrr...
You have new missions! Do them, quick! Trade the rewards for food to fill my stomach!
Urgh...! Don't go touching wherever you want just 'cause I can't move...!
Eep! Wh-whaddya think you're doing?!
What kinda exercise is this?! Nobody said I'd become a dang showpiece! Come on, get this thing off me, NOW!
I don't ever wanna get up from this Manjuu cushion~ Sitting's bad for your health? Well, good thing I have you around to take care of your elderly~♪
Mmmh~ I sure could get used to this life~ Oh, Commander, thanks for being my gofer~♪ Ah, you can leave the cherries right over here!
Oh, you're back. Avrora dropped by and gave me a snack. Want a bite~?
My ramen noodles have gotten all soggy! Ugh!
A letter came in earlier. "Where'd I put it"? Hmm, good question...

Zzz... Fried rice... Garlicky goodness... Hot dogs... Fries... More please... Zzz...|*Rero rero rero rero*... Mmmh! Sour, sweet, and totally delish! Got any more?|Whoa, I got a rare drop! Maybe having you in the room raises my luck stat! Hahaha♡
You want a cherry too, Commander~? Too bad, I'm not gonna share~
What do you think you're doing? Gee, what a perv~♡
Mmmh~ I sure could get used to this life~ Oh, Commander, thanks for being my gofer~♪ Ah, you can leave the cherries right over here!
You thought an old ship couldn't whoop your asses? Loooosers~♪
Cannons locked and loaded! Fireee!
Now with my modernization upgrades, I can give other ships a run for their money! Don'tcha think I deserve a lot more respect for all my potential, experience, and charm~?
My retrofitting is done! Look forward to seeing how both my cuteness and combat potential has been upgraded!
Yoohoo~♪ Remember to keep your nose to the grindstone for adorable old me~
Owww, my back... That proves it, I'm not fit for these exhausting battles!

Oof, my shoulders feel so stiff~! Let me just give my arms a good stretch and shake my butt to get my circulation going~ Oh~? What're you eyeing me for~?|Listen, darling, I could really go for some Dragon Empery-style fried rice! Yeah, you guessed right— go buy me some takeout~♪|nil
I keep it fairly tight, if you know what I mean~
My retrofitting is done! Look forward to seeing how both my cuteness and combat potential have been upgraded!
You thought an old ship couldn't whoop your asses? Loooosers~♪
Shall we go together?
Hmm... You're staring at me so much... Did you happen to want these gloves?
Arethusa-class light cruiser – Penelope.
The commission has been completed, and now I'm supposed to welcome the fleet back... But what comes after that?
voiceline.oath: I will do anything you tell me to. It can be anything.

voiceline.line: Commander... aren't you acting a bit weird?
voiceline.oath: Commander, if this is what you desire, then...

voiceline.line: I shall wait for you here tomorrow as well, just as you instructed, Commander.
If I leave the uncompleted work here, I wonder if eventually, I won't have to do it anymore.
Would you like some of the rosehip tea that Aurora taught me to make? ...It's too sour? Hmm... Maybe I accidentally added vinegar...
No matter how much time passes, I will continue to wait for you here, Commander. No matter what, I'll always wait for you to come back.
Nnh... Are you treating me like a child?
I am glad that you have returned safely, Commander.
I... can still do this!
Commander, are you going on a sortie? I shall stay here and await your return.
voiceline.oath: Commander, are you going on a sortie? ...Mm, I'll always be waiting for you.

voiceline.line: I have been defeated. My sincerest apologies...
Hmm... Ah, I knew I was forgetting something... Um... Right. The mail. Commander, I brought you the mail.

Paperwork, paperwork... Where did I put it again? On that shelf? I can't seem to remember...|Pepperpot? ...Why yes, I do think that food generally tastes better with a healthy pinch of pepper.|I want to get along with U-410. ...Mm, with you here, Commander, I'm sure it will be fine.
voiceline.oath: Paperwork, paperwork... Mm, as you suggested, I put somewhere prominent, so I'll find it soon enough.|nil|Mm, I'm getting along well with U-410. Commander, you should try to befriend her as well... Oh, you already have? I'm glad to hear that.
voiceline.extra: Galatea said that today's lucky colour is blue. ...Don't worry about it? Okay, I won't then. I believe you.

voiceline.line: "Remind the commander if there are any unfinished missions." ...Got it. Commander, you have unfinished missions. What are they about? Umm...
"Remind the commander to collect the rewards for completed missions." ...Got it. Commander, please remember to collect your rewards. What rewards? Umm...

I am Penelope of the Royal Navy, Arethusa-class light cruiser. I participated in a transport mission with Aurora and her companions in the K Fleet. There were difficult times, but I managed to pull through. If only I had noticed her back then...
A promise ring... proof that you always want to stay with me? Mm... But, even without this, as long as you think of me, sometimes call for me, and look at me... that's all I need.
Is this good enough?
...Hm? Is something amiss? I do believe I've been doing everything to your specifications...
voiceline.oath: I will do anything you tell me to. It can be anything.

voiceline.line: Hm...? Commander, what are you doing?
voiceline.oath: Commander, if this is what you desire, then...

voiceline.line: Arethusa-class light cruiser... Penelope, is my name. From now on, I will be your subordinate. I hope that you... can at least remember my name.
Have I become stronger than before?
Commander, I followed your instructions and emerged victorious.
Aurora also gave me this incense burner. It's supposed to be good for recovering from fatigue, so shall we give it a try together?

Aurora chose this outfit for me because... the Spring Festival represents a time of celebration in the Dragon Empery, and red is the color that best symbolizes that. What do you think? Does this outfit... make you feel more festive?
Commander, do you know about the Spring Festival? There are all kinds of interesting stories, and I'd like to hear more about that from you.
Happy Lunar New Year. I'm glad I can see you today.

Haah... Commander, I'm sorry... At this rate, this incense... is going to make me fall asleep... Zzzzz|The broth in the hotpot was as red as my clothes... It was a bit scary at first, but the food ended up being really delicious.|The pattern on this fan was embroidered. I learned how to do it from Yat Sen and the others a while back, but my hands were trembling so much I made a mess of things... Ugh, I wonder how everyone does this so well.
...Hm? Already tired? You can lie down here if you'd like.
...Um, Commander, I don't think... this is any way to conduct yourself.

Aurora chose this outfit for me because... the Spring Festival represents a time of celebration in the Dragon Empery, and red is the color that best symbolizes that. What do you think? Does this outfit... make you feel more festive?
Here, I brought you your order. It's still frozen? Of course...? I never heated it up. Why...? You... never told me to...?
Welcome, welcome. I've been working here as a maid, just as you told me to. Umm... Call for me only when you're ready to order.
"Welcome back, Master. How are Mew today?" What do you think about my greeting...? 'Kay, I'll see you later then.
Did you call? Well, what do you want? ...You still need some more time? Call for me when you've decided.

Here's the menu. Call me if you need me.|No, that's not it? ...What do you mean by that? There's no way for me to know unless you show me...|Sure, here's the pepper mill. How much do you want? ...Oops, I spilled it all...
Did you want some headpats? Sure. Good job, Commander. *pat pat*
Commander, it's fine if you're banned from the store for this, right?
Welcome, welcome. I've been working here as a maid, just as you told me to. Umm... Call for me only when you're ready to order.
Come on, taste my 14-inch guns!
Thanks. This is the first time someone has really cared about me...
voiceline.oath: Have you been getting enough food, Commander? What? Am I not allowed to be concerned for you? How rude of you.

voiceline.line: Pennsylvania-class battleship –  Pennsylvania, Hull Number BB-38!
Commission completed... Not bad. Everyone seems to be growing stronger.
You're such a coward...
You and Arizona can hide behind me. I'll protect you.
You want to stand next to me?... Think carefully now. That is a very hard thing to do.

It's alright if you don't want to push yourself further. You've worked very hard. I thought you were joking, but... How do I say this... I'm used to protecting others... But to meet someone who cares about me really is something else.
Mmm, you've worked so hard. I didn't think that you'd be able to catch up with me... You want a reward? How about a kiss? Or an unforgettable evening? Both are fine with me~!
Having a drink after battle is something else. You want some?
voiceline.oath: Cheers! I'll save the champagne until our next magnificent victory.

voiceline.line: Commander, you know you can always share any thoughts you have with me.
voiceline.oath: Commander, if there's anything I can help with, just say the word.

voiceline.line: I was a fool to have any expectations of your commanding abilities.
Here, I got your mail. Will ya make sure to reply soon?
Your eyes... Why do they look like those of an abandoned puppy?|Can you please not look at me with those hungry eyes?|You don't have the best imagination, do you?
voiceline.oath: There, you deserve a patting. Heheh... Feeling better? You're not a puppy; that's all you're getting for now.|Arizona, I was thinking we could have lunch later. You'll come along, won't you?|Hey...! Downes! Don't throw stuff at me, even if I can catch it in time! I know you won't listen to me, but still...

voiceline.line: I say, have you forgotten a mission?
I left your rewards over there. Don't forget to collect them!
I'm Pennsylvania, lead ship of an improved Nevada class. You can call me "Sister Penn." I really shouldn't brag, but I've sortied on countless successful missions. You can definitely depend on me!

This fleet has turned into a place I can call home... The people I want to protect, and the person who protects me despite being unable to kill a bug, and then the 'me' who becomes so giddy for that person are all here... You idiot *blush*...
Is that the best you've got?
You dont have to get worked up over tiny things, Commander.
voiceline.oath: What can Sister Penn do for you?

voiceline.line: ...!! Hold up, are you alright in the head?
voiceline.oath: Hey...! Why so restless all of a sudden?

voiceline.line: I'm Pennsylvania, lead ship of an improved Nevada class. You can call me "Sister Penn." I've sortied on countless successful missions, so you can be confident in my ability.
You can depend on me.
Tsk...Winning like this is so dull...
I shall trample our enemies underfoot!
You brought lunch? Appreciate it. Be sure to give Arizona something as well.
Halt! Who are you?! ...Oh, it's you, Commander. I briefly mistook you for a spy there. Why are you here? To spectate? Or, God forbid, to gather intel on my army?
Commission completed. It's vital to keep your troops and horses fed and equipped.
All right, so... Are we good? Phew... Scenes on horseback are always so draining.

You falter not even in the presence of a general on her horse... Very good – you'll make an excellent soldier. Together, we will make great conquests!|Are my looks really that exotic to you? Hahah! Your imagination is terribly limited.|While I'm not as good at riding as Chapayev, I'm fairly capable on horseback... You think I'm outstanding, even? Really?
How can Sister Penn help?
Unfortunately for you, this armor is the real deal.
Halt! Who are you?! ...Oh, it's you, Commander. I briefly mistook you for a spy there. Why are you here? To spectate? Or, God forbid, to gather intel on my army?
By my spear, the enemy is sundered!
Against enemies like these it's OK to just use half your strength!
Maintenance? OK, tell me if you notice anything weird.
Pensacola-class Heavy Cruiser – Pensacola, Hull Number CA-24!
Hey, a commission's been completed! ... It's not OK to just ignore those hardworking girls, you hear?
Hey, Commander, this isn't OK at all.
If you have a problem, let me handle it and it'll be OK! I can help you whenever you need it!
Are we going out? OK, I'll let you decide where we're going. I'm fine with going anywhere, so just pick whatever you want!
Are you tired? OK, come over here and lie down. I'll wake you up in an hour! Good night~
You want to try my homemade cooking? OK, don't be shy, request anything you want and I'll make it for you!
How about a massage, Commander? ... OK, just sit down and relax!
Anything you need help with, Commander? I'm OK with helping you out any time!
Damn... This isn't OK at all...
I've got your mail... here! Here you go, Commander.

I've got the same nickname as Enterprise... Pretty cool, huh?|If you're tired, get some rest! Don't push yourself. If you ever want help, don't be shy to ask!|Though I may look like this, I've seen quite a few battles. Wanna hear about them? OK, then let's start from the beginning...
We have a new mission? OK, let's get it done together!
Commander? Don't forget about those rewards!

OKOK, self-introduction time, right? I'm Pensacola, I have a little sister named Salt Lake City… Uh, what else do I even say when introducing myself? I helped out Hornet and Yorktown, but there's not much to say about that… Oh well, anyway, let me handle everything and it'll be OK!
Is this for me? O... wait, hold on a sec! Are you serious? No no, no way in… What I mean is, OK means OK, but… Ahh, screw it! If it's from you then it's totally OK, that's obvious!
Main guns: OK! Armor: OK! We're doing this!
I'm always OK with heading out on a sortie~
H-hey, that's not at all what this gesture means!
Are you the commander of this fleet? Why, I'd say you look pretty reliable! … OKOK, I'm Pensacola, from now on I'll follow your orders. Nice to meet you!
Now it's my turn? OK~
Easy peasy lemon squeezy~
Careful, now. The battlefield is no place to worry about fuel economy.
The big mirror in my room? What about it? If I told you, "I just like mirrors," would that satisfy your curiosity?
voiceline.oath: Okay, fine. I use my mirror for conversation practice... Stop giggling, it's not funny.

voiceline.line: Colossus-class light aircraft carrier – Perseus (HMS Perseus.)
Look, Commander... No, I'm not angry, I was just going to tell you a commission is done.
voiceline.oath: The commission team is back, Commander.

voiceline.line: You really are like a can of rancid surströmming.
I can hear just fine, Commander, so don't go yelling in my ear, thanks...
If you ask me, people should be able to say whatever they want... Oh, hello there, Commander. Just talking to myself.
I'm a total moron... Why am I so rude to the Commander when I just want to be friends... I'm so, so stupid...
How would I describe you? I dunno, I guess like a storm in the middle of a peaceful voyage... No, no, I didn't mean it like that... Sorry, what I meant to say is, um...
voiceline.oath: I've become able to just, you know, talk. Like a normal person. With you and other people, I mean. I owe you thanks for helping me come this far. I love you, Commander. I really do.

voiceline.line: ...Yeah?
One quick battle, and you're knackered already, Commander? You have the stamina of a beached whale.
...I can't afford to mess around, huh.
There's some saying that goes, "the early bird catches the worm." ...If that's true, I guess you'd starve, Commander.
voiceline.oath: There's that saying that goes, "the early bird catches the worm"... Uh, just try not to starve to death, Commander.

voiceline.line: Damn, we lost... Sorry.
You've got mail. Nope, didn't bring it with me. Next time, ask, and I'll consider it.

If you need my help with something, just say it. You do need to try and accomplish it on your own first, though.|Work is like food, in a way; leave it sitting for too long and it goes bad. Just so you know.|I heard Yuubari and Akashi get up to fun experiments in the lab. I kind of wanna see one. Kind of.
voiceline.oath: If you need my help with something, just say it. But first, try to accomplish it on your own. Or don't, that's fine.|Work is like food, they both have an expiry date. So, need any help finishing your food, so to speak?|nil
voiceline.extra: Intrepid, can you see Perseus? No, I mean, the constellation.

voiceline.line: What kind of lazy cat are you, just lounging around all day instead of doing missions?
Those mission rewards will expire if you don't claim them. Maybe.

I'm Perseus, the Colossus-class light aircraft carrier. Sadly, I didn't enter service until the war had ended. Don't have much in the way of a reputation or experience as a result. Still, I'll try to do a good job. All right, is that good enough? *sigh*...
Obviously I don't hate you, Commander. How could I, when I adore talking to you and being patted on the head? L-look, I'm trying to say... I love you. I mean it...
I've got this.
Maybe try finishing your work before you "chat me up" or "interview me" or however you wanna sugarcoat it?
voiceline.oath: So, are you up for a chat?

voiceline.line: You must really want a seat at the naval jailhouse dinner table, huh?
I'm Perseus, from the Royal Navy. You can pronounce it "Per-see-us" if you want though... Well, whatever. Are we done here? Great. Nice meeting you.
Thanks a bunch... Well, yeah, didn't you want a thank-you?
Looks like the enemy will have to, uh, try harder next time.
I'm still learning, but I know how to give injections and stop a haemorrhage in theory. Can I practice my knowledge on you, Commander?
I'm Perseus, I will be your nurse today. Use this button to call for me if you need anything... Yes? Did you need something?
Your health is seriously concerning, Commander. Want me to get you some vitamins?
Honestly, I have no idea what sort of face to put on when pretending to be a nurse.

It's noble to help those in need, but don't go overboard with it. What I'm trying to say is: unless you NEED my help, just make do on your own, Commander.|Now to practice turning a gravely injured person over... You, I'm gonna need you to lie on your back.|Nice new med tech. Commander, I want you to be my guinea pig– Excuse me, I mean, experiment assistant.
You have a healthy look in your eyes, Commander.
You belong in the bed of a jail cell, not of a hospital.
I'm Perseus, I will be your nurse today. Use this button to call for me if you need anything... Yes? Did you need something?
Let me test this tactic on you.
The expression of the passage of time as the hands of a clock ticking—don't you think it's just fascinating?
Graf Zeppelin-class aircraft carrier – Peter Strasser.
The commissions have been completed. Yes, I'll have to praise them for their efficiency considering their station as your subordinates.
Officer, you're not worth my time.
Time is a precious commodity. State what you need me to do as concisely as possible.
Officer, the clock in your bedroom was off by two minutes. ...Oh, there's nothing for you to worry about, I've already taken care of it. You can't use the excuse that your clock is off anymore
Devoting your time to one person is a waste of time. That is, unless you get something worth it in return... Don't you think so too, Officer?
Officer, you'll pay me back for all of the time I've spent for you...? Interesting. Let me check the details first, hehe.
The more complex the machine, the more time it takes to maintain it. All the more for humans. Make sure you don't forget to rest up.
Everything... is still under control.
Did you just get here? Heheh. Make sure you work efficiently on your duties today, as always.
voiceline.oath: Focus solely on your work. I don't want to see my time nor your time squandered.

voiceline.line: Time is far better spent contemplating how to avoid being destroyed, rather than foolhardily charging into destruction again and again.
Officer, there's mail for you. Make sure to check it at your earliest convenience.
