The more precise your plan is, the less time you'll have to waste hesitating on what you need to do. Why not give it a try, Officer?|Heinrich, your documents for your training program are here. Make sure not to forget them next time.|It's so nice to see all of the tasks be completed, just as planned. Hehehe.
voiceline.extra: I don't meant to disturb your train of thought, but do keep an eye on the clock. The next thing on our schedule is less than a minute away.|Kaga fights very much like a beast. I quite like how she looks when doing it.|I consider not just Graf Zeppelin to be my ally, but you as well, Officer. Do you think I would give you my precious time if I didn't?

voiceline.line: Here are the new missions. Instead of rushing to finish everything at once, use your time wisely and plan out your endeavors properly.
I'm glad the rewards for the missions correspond to the amount of time it took to complete them. Hehehe.

I am Aircraft Carrier B, one of the Graf Zeppelin-class carriers that suffered an unfortunate fate, having had my construction halted without ever getting to set sail. But... doesn't the name "Peter Strasser" have a much nicer ring to it than "Aircraft Carrier B"...?

A ceremony to ensure the time I've spent doesn't go to waste... well, since you've said this much, I'll take your words as proof of your vow, Officer. We still haven't spent as much time and emotions on each other we want to after all, right...? Hehehe.
Your time is up!
What is it? You've still got time left until your break ends.
Officer, if this helps raise your efficiency, I don't consider it time wasted.
voiceline.oath: Oh, what a thrill it is to do this with you, Officer. Heheh.

voiceline.line: It is I, the never-completed Graf Zeppelin-class "Aircraft Carrier B," otherwise known as Peter Strasser. There is much for us to do and little time to do it... No time to waste. Let's begin.
Strengthening complete. Yes, it seems as if I've spent my time wisely.
Hah! Took care of them faster than I thought.
The sands of time pile up to become a mountain; The passing of time eventually becomes history. Hehehe, how interesting.

Eugen, you said that this was is a ceremonial outfit from the Sakura Empire? Surprisingly, it does seem to suit me rather well. Oh, I'm supposed to offer my well-wishes for the New Year at this time, yes?
The commissions have been completed. Please leave their reception to me. There's no need for you to waste your time, Officer.
Go take a break, and leave the deliberation to me. It's not yet time for you to make your appearance, Officer.
So you're working over the holidays. How commendable of you.

I hear this is the time of year when New Year's gifts are handed out. Officer, would you rather be the one handing out the gifts or receiving them?|Eugen, Heinrich, there's a limit to how much rucku... teasing you should do.|Graf Zeppelin, why don't you try studying the Sakura Empire's shrines? Even if you don't pay your respects to their gods, the Sakura Empire's amazake seems quite interesting.
The plan already takes the holidays into account. There won't be a problem even if you take some time off to rest, Officer.
Officer, are you telling me that this much is enough for you to not be able to hold back?

Eugen, you said that this was is a ceremonial outfit from the Sakura Empire? Surprisingly, it does seem to suit me rather well. Oh, I'm supposed to offer my well-wishes for the New Year at this time, yes?

skins.name: A Moment Frozen in Pure White

voiceline.line: Come–– The time of our destruction is nigh.
If you have nothing else to do, go read a book. Much can be learned from the experiences of people past—in essence, earning time.
You already know, don't you? Since I spent so much of my precious time changing into a dress for your sake... Heh, I'll be taking plenty of your time in return. Hehehe.
The commissions are complete. I sent Heinrich to go welcome them back. After all, she'd be out of place here.
You need some rejuvenation? Hmm... Should I lend you my lap? Or would you prefer my chest, instead?
I'll have you escort me tonight. Quickly now, come take my hand.
Time waits for no one. Not even for you.

The "Unhulde," you say? ...Officer, keep your eyes on me. I shan't let her steal your attention or your time.|Viersechs, Zeppelin is over there. Hehe, how cute. Don't you think so, too?|I'll bring some drinks over. ...Are you trying to show off? Go make your rounds with the others first.
You have new missions. Hurry up and take care of them.
Hehe. These rewards... Well worth the time spent, right?
...Phew. (whispers) Umm, drinking beer at a party is a bit out of place, isn't it...
How very like you. Hehe♪
You already know, don't you? Since I spent so much of my precious time changing into a dress for your sake... Heh, I'll be taking plenty of your time in return. Hehehe.
Look to the east! It's burning red!
What's the matter, Commander? You look kinda emotionless.
Brooklyn-class light cruiser – Phoenix, Hull Number CL-46!
Commission completed... Hey, isn't it about time you let me head out on one?
Get outta here, coward!

Only those who aren't afraid of death deserve to live! Ahh, don't be afraid Commander, I don't mean that literally! What I meant to say is that it's not about living or dying, it's about what mindset you have!
What's the matter? If you're okay with me then I can give you some advice!
Although I respect that man, you're still you, Commander. As long as you're with me, I'm invincible!
I see. It's no wonder that whenever I'm with you, I'm in such high spirits! I feel like my heart is on fire! This is it, this is love... I've never experienced this before...
Looks like we made it back safe and sound as usual today!
My hand is calling out to me to seize victory!
Hey, Commander! I'll protect you, like I always do!
Tsk, I'll get you for this!
Hey! Commander! Your mail is here!
My motto is: "be the best at everything"!|Is the sun bigger in Argentina?|There's nothing more thrilling than coming back from the verge of death!
How could you fall behind on something as simple as missions?
Looks like our well-deserved rewards have been delivered.

I'm Phoenix. I once escorted a certain important person. Just like a phoenix, no matter what happens to me, I'll always come back from death! Throw all the dangerous missions you've got at me, I won't let you down!
... Thank you. I'll accept it. Also, um... I don't really know how to talk all sweet or flirt or anything like that, but now that you've chosen me, I promise I won't let you down!
Paint the East... in blood...!
It's here, it's here! Want to head out now?
Hey~! Be a gentleman!
Are you the commander? I'm Phoenix. That's right, the legendary phoenix! Do you have what it takes to lead me?
Alright! I've gotten stronger!
Hahah! Aren't there any strong enemies left for me to fight?
Do I get any tasty food for winning?
What are you looking at, Commander?
Ning Hai-class Light Cruser, Ping Hai
Commander, Commander! Big sister said that I have to tell you whenever a commission is finished.
Commander... are you one of those "bad guys" that big sister talks about?
Big sister always says that we are too poor to have food in the pot, but every time I open the lid, there’s always food in there! What’s the deal with that?
Big sister said I shouldn’t be alone with Commander... is it because she wants the buns all for herself? Then, I shall come visit Commander more often from now on!
Big sister told me that finding someone who can feed me is more important than finding someone I like. Since I like Commander and get plenty of food, there shouldn’t be any problems.
I will be satisfied as long as I can be with Commander all the time, and just see my sister every now and then. Hmm? Big Sister would cry? Why?
Whenever big sister is tired, the only way to make her happy is by giving her steamed buns. Do you want some, Commander?
I'm hungry...
Commander, have you eaten yet? You can’t work on an empty stomach.
Big sister, where are you?
Big sister says that checking the mail in a timely manner is a common courtesy! Commander, want to read these?

Socks? Big sister said we should spend less money, so we share one pair together...|Kung Fu? Big sister said we could earn some Coins by performing on the street, so I learned that too...|Pandas? On our heads? They're also sisters!
Big sister says that missions won’t complete themselves if I’m daydreaming. Does that mean they will if I practice kung fu?
So many rewards, Commander! Can we trade them for buns?

I'm Ning Hai, the first ship of the Ning Hai-class. Big sister told me to say this when I was introducing myself. Ah? I'm Ping Hai? That's right! Then... I'm Ping Hai, the first ship of the Ning Hai-class... I'm wrong again? This is so confusing...
Does this mean that I should only listen to Commander from now on instead of my big sister? ...Make my own decision? Hm... then, I shall listen to both of you.
Hi-ya! Kung fu!
Commander, do you also want a hug? I hug my big sister all the time.
Big sister told me to beat up any bad guys that I come across. But what is a bad guy?
Commander? Big sister told me that commanders who can’t even put food on the table are no good. Can you support yourself? ...Then, how about me?
I'm... hungry!
Number one? Does that taste good?
Will you give me food if we win this? Pretty please?
Big sister and I got lost on on this strange island and saw some weird stuff... What was weird about it? Look, it was really weird, that's all!
Shaved ice is better than steamed buns, fireworks are prettier than shaved ice, and more precious than fireworks is...
B-big sister, where are we...? And where is everyone...? Eek! I-I think I just heard something... Oh, right, this place is uninhabited.

Liquor chocolates? Wait, no, big sister! You shouldn't eat those...!|Big sister told me the dining table is a battlefield of its own, so I'm gonna stay on my guard!|Aww... I wanna ride on the Commander's shoulders too...
D-don't stare at me like that... Fine, I'll give you a third of my ice cream... Ugh, okay, half! But no more than that!
Shaved ice is better than steamed buns, fireworks are prettier than shaved ice, and more precious than fireworks is...
Fried noodles! Grilled fish! Ice cream!
Hey Commander, I wanna have croquettes today!
Commander, happy Mid-Autumn Festival! I have mooncakes, pomegranates, and osmanthus cakes... Mm... This holiday is the best!

Om nom... Hey, Commander, what flavor of mooncake do you like?|Just so you know, Commander, I'm an unrivaled champion at hammering mooncake!|The sweet osmanthus cakes my sister made smell delicious. You want one, Commander?
Happy Mid-Autumn Festival! Do you wanna make a traditional lantern, Commander?
I feel like I could hop all the way up to the moon in this outfit...
Commander, happy Mid-Autumn Festival! I have mooncakes, pomegranates, and osmanthus cakes... Mm... This holiday is the best!
I think big sister really likes her idol outfit.

Big sister says that even though we have some money now, we still have to save as much as we can. Um... Anyway, I'm the younger "Dragon Sister," Ping Hai. Erm... I'm kind of hungry. Do you maybe have something to eat?
Commander, can I go with you to welcome everyone home?
Being an idol with my big sister is so much fun. And it's been a really long time since I've seen her so happy... but I'd be even happier with you, Commander.
Commander, are you here for my show?
Big sister, my clothes ripped... sew them for me...
Commander, can you help me reply to all this fan mail? I can't do it all by myself...

Big sister says all I need to do is be myself up on stage, but the truth is I don't know how to be myself unless she tells me...|Commander, do you think I should try doing kung fu up on stage? Like this.. hiyaa!|I think everybody really likes Baobao. Let me do a show with Baobao next time!
Big sister says more offers means more money...
They gave me so much good stuff to eat. I love it!
Commander, you want to get up on stage with me?
I think I'm wearing it right?

Big sister says that even though we have some money now, we still have to save as much as we can. Um... Anyway, I'm the younger "Dragon Sister," Ping Hai. Erm... I'm kind of hungry. Do you maybe have something to eat?
Big sister made a stupidly jam-packed schedule. Just looking at it makes me sleepy... But there's apparently lots of tasty food by the tourist attractions, so I'm coming along!
The Sakura Empire has lots of delicious food that I've never tried before! Yeah! It's a great place!
Commander, I wanna eat some tempura!
Commander, I wanna try the Sakura Empire's take on ramen!

Big sister said this is a prize vacation, so we can't try out all the local restaurants... What even is a "prize vacation"?|Big sister looks thrilled to get to enjoy a vacation! Seeing her smile, and getting to eat so much good food, has me feeling thrilled too!|Let go of my jacket, big sister~! I've not finished my food yet! Give it a try you too, it's really yummy!
There's so much tasty food I want to try!
The goal of our vacation? Mine is to try *all* of the Sakura Empire's yummiest food!
The Sakura Empire has lots of delicious food that I've never tried before! Yeah! It's a great place!
Just like Ning Hai's, me and the girls made my cake with love. It's a chao ji da strawberry cake... I wonder how many days it would take for me to eat by myself...? Hehehe.
There's always a lot of delicious food at these parties! But, my sister said I'm not allowed to have any cake until everyone's gotten their slice... Baobao, let's be on our best behavior!
I'm... so hungry... Maybe just a little bite... No! Ning Hai told me not to!
Here's your cake. Eat up. Ning Hai is passing out blueberry cake, but I've got strawberry.

Baobao, where do I bring the next slice...?|There's going to be so much good stuff at the party... Commander, they have to have some baozi, don't they?!|Ning Hai always says I need to make more friends... But really I have so many friends already!
Ning Hai told me to pass out my cake without bothering the Commander!
Mm. I've known for a long time, my sister and I are very different in that department.
There's always a lot of delicious food at these parties! But, my sister said I'm not allowed to have any cake until everyone's gotten their slice... Baobao, let's be on our best behavior!
Commander, let's take these pandas back to port! ...We're not allowed? Aww...
Cheese! That came out looking good! Hehehe~ I'm really glad to be a part of this charity event for nature, along with you and my sister! Baobao is really glad too!
I'm gonna take a bunch of pics of these cute pandas and show them to people around the port!
Big sister told me to look after these pandas! Does that mean I should play with them?
Look at the camera! I'm gonna take a group photo!|Do you wanna pet the pandas too, Commander?|Eat lots, Baobao! Then you'll grow up to be as big as your buddy!
I'm not allowed to feed them baozi? Okay, I'll keep that in mind...
Cheese! That came out looking good! Hehehe~ I'm really glad to be a part of this charity event for nature, along with you and my sister! Baobao is really glad too!
Hi~ya! Hmm... this feels... nothing special. Baobao looks happy though... Never mind, Commander, Ping Hai is hungry!

My sister bought another pair of socks again, but then gave them to me... Could it be that she actually wants to wear them? |Baobao, stop jumping onto Commander's head to practice shadowboxing... |You want me to stop doing high kicks? Why though?
Commander, why are you putting my sister and I on opposite sides of the door? Huh? Exorcism?
Hi~ya! Hmm... this feels... nothing special. Baobao looks happy though... Never mind, Commander, Ping Hai is hungry!
Commander, I want to eat something yummy when I get back!
The small fry never seem to learn their place.
My Zara is always so gentle and lovely, I just can't take my eyes off her.
Zara-class heavy cruiser – Pola.
The commission fleet has returned. All your girls are such hard workers.
A commander that acts in this manner is in need of some "re-education."
My gentle and compassionate Zara simply doesn't know how to say no to others. I wonder, what should I do...
Commander, focus on what you need to do. I'll take care of any annoying little obstacles in your way.
So, between Zara and me, who do you like better? Well... you wouldn't know the answer to that unless you tried, right~? Hehe~♡
Because you're so kind, I worry about you too, just like with Zara. But... because of your kindness, we also know that we can entrust you with our futures.
Welcome back, Commander. Bring back any juicy gossip for me?
My turret won't move? Why... at a time like this...?
Hehe, you sure took your sweet time. The fleet exercises are about to start without you~
My mantle's all dirty now. What a shame...
Commander, there's mail for you from the Naval HQ. You might miss some important information if you drag your feet~

All these "conventions" and "treaties"... Things that do not consider the feelings of actual people should disappear from this world.|A true fighter does not fear any danger. I won't back down even in the face of a heavy storm.|The feeling of being enveloped by a searchlight... makes me a bit uneasy.
You've got to stay motivated and finish your work... Or, were you expecting me to give you some "motivation?"
All done with the missions, huh? That's what I want to see. ...I haven't forgotten about the reward. Mind waiting there for a bit? Hehe~

I'm the fourth ship of the Zara-class heavy cruisers, Pola. My sisters and I have stronger armor rarely seen on heavy cruisers, which gives us an advantage in artillery battles. In terms of my abilities to serve as flagship... I might be a bit more suitable than Zara?
Commander, once you've become my chosen partner, you must be prepared to be bound with me for a lifetime. Are you willing to sign this "contract" with me?
Let's have a little bit of fun~
My rapier is not simply for show, you know.
You surely didn't do the same kind of stuff to Zara, right?
I'm Pola, heavy cruiser from Sardegna. And you're the commander of this fleet? I see. Well, don't let me down, okay? Hehe~
Oh? Some interesting developments.
MVP? Why, that's only natural. Enemies of this caliber aren't even worthy of staining my mantle.
Commander, you're not satisfied with this game being for your eyes only, right? Hehe~ In that case... You can be the referee as well. Any objections, Zara?
Zara, how dastardly of you to spike the ball at such a time– Eek?! Commander?! Why are you in a place like that?
Commander, don't expect me to save your life even if you're drowning~ ...Oh, Zara already taught you to swim? Hmph... Lucky you.
I do say, if you want to watch the game from over there, don't come crying to me when you get hit by a stray ball. Got it?
Damn it... I'll remember this!

...Isn't this swimsuit... a bit too tight...?|This obstinate starfish... C-Commander, come give me a hand here... Eek?!|Littorio, how about a 2v2? Heheh, though having Veneto on your team would be too much of a handicap, so how about I lend you the commander?
What are you staring at? Hehe, spit it out already... Just what were you thinking about?
Jeez, Commander... I know you're the impatient type, but are you sure you want to suffer the same fate as this manjuu?
Zara, how dastardly of you to spike the ball at such a time– Eek?! Commander?! Why are you in a place like that?
Much easier than a match against Zara. Heheh~
Have faith in my orders! They will lead you to victory!
Look, I know most people would panic if they were suddenly told to manage every last facet of a fleet, but I'm one of those few who have what it takes... Right?
voiceline.oath: As you know, I have a laundry list of errands I must run for my friends, so I'll be unable to give you my attention for some time... Please, I just messing with you! I'd never leave you out in the cold!

voiceline.line: Capitani Romani-class ship – Pompeo Magno.
Commission supplies have arrived! Allow me the honor of processing them!
You're a terrible Commander, but if I can produce results in spite of you, people will think I'm really talented! There's always a silver lining, I tell you!

I've accepted a plethora of errands and consultations with other girls today. Soon I will be the talk of the port, and every– What do you mean this schedule is infeasible? Don't you know? Nothing is impossible for me!

You came at just the right time, Commander! You see, um... Thing is, I could use a lot of help. I simply don't have enough time to run all those errands I promised to... I know, I know, but you'd be helping everyone out, not just me!

Phew... Without your help, I would've fled the port out of sheer shame before nightfall, fated to forever roam some cold corner of the ocean... Truly, I thank you from the bottom of my heart, Commander!

Now I get it! I can earn more recognition if I focus on you, plus then I won't have to worry about breaking promises. So with that in mind, will you let me take care of all your problems whenever they arise? ...I'm begging on my knees here, please don't turn me down.
voiceline.oath: Hey! You know that place popular with couples I brought up the other day? Don't say the name, it's on the tip of my tongue! It's... Hrmmm... Sigh, I can't remember... But you know what? You can make the first move and decide where we'll go for once. Hehehe~

voiceline.line: My cap is NOT just for show!
Dammit... I've barely gotten anything done while the Commander was out... This is gonna reflect so badly on me... Ahem! Commander! Welcome back!
No big deal! I can keep going!
Welcome back, Commander! I am ready to begin my secretarial duties and take on work from you!
voiceline.oath: Welcome back to the office, Commander! Your secretary and sweetheart is ready to take on any work you can throw at her!

voiceline.line: We're defeated... My dignity has been destroyed and the fleet's reputation will plummet, dooming it to fade into obscurity... Oh, err, I didn't say anything!
voiceline.oath: We're defeated... My dignity has been crushed... Commander, take me someplace far away where we can be alone...

voiceline.line: Your trusty secretary brings you new mail, right on schedule!

Hmm, how should I process these documents... It's okay, I know what I'm doing, Commander! Seriously, just let me handle it!|I'm going out for a while, Commander! When you've got a schedule as packed as Captain Pompey's, you can't afford to sit around on your butt all day!|If I do a bad job here, the Commander's gonna make me resign and then ostracize me... Uh, I didn't say anything! Just dealing with a minor problem here! Y-yeah, that's all!
voiceline.extra: Hey, Commander, some girls were asking for help earlier. Should we go see what's up? ...N-no, I'm definitely not craving more recognition! Helping people benefits us both!|...Wait a sec! If the Commander stays this immersed in work, I'll soon be cast aside and deprived of affection... Uh, it's nothing! I was just thinking we should go on a date! To, you know, deepen our bonds and stuff! Please?!

voiceline.line: I'll take care of all these new missions, Commander! ...Wh-what's with that look? Wait... You're signaling that you doubt my ability, aren't you?!
Mission complete! ...And unsurprisingly, I could've never accomplished it alone... Ahaha...

I'm Pompeo Magno of the Capitani Romani-class from the Sardegna Empire! My speed and firepower make me suited for any kind of mission, and what I lack in protection I more than make up for with agility!

Just as the capital wasn't built in one day, it takes time for people to form close bonds. Okay, I know that's an odd example! Basically, what I'm saying is: I'll make a concentrated effort to spend quality time with you so we'll become better acquainted! Otherwise I'll feel like you wasted this ring on me!
Nothing is impossible for Captain Pompey!
When you need my help, just grab my hand and hold it tight!
voiceline.oath: When you need comforting, just hold my hand! Heheh!

voiceline.line: I-I-I am NOT some easy girl!
voiceline.oath: Wait, I'm still not ready for this! ...No, I mean, I'm just saying... I've never done it before, but I'll figure it out somehow!

voiceline.line: Captain Pompey the Great has arrived at port! ...Err! Ahem! Good day to you, Commander! I am Pompeo Magno of the Sardegna Empire! Assign any and all work to me and I'll have it done in the blink of an eye!
The greater your ability, the more responsibilities you deserve!
Captain Pompey the Great has once more led her allies to a spectacular victory!
voiceline.oath: Captain Pompey the Great – and her great Commander – have once more led their allies to victory!

voiceline.line: If I'd known the Commander would find me like this, I would've hid under the piano top before I dozed off... Err, nothing! Just talking to myself!
*yawn*... Nothing's impossible when you've got Captain Pompey... Hmm? Commander? Wait, I fell asleep? Seems I did... Drat, I forgot what I even came here for...
The commission team brought back new components, and there are way too many to sort through... But that's okay! I like a challenge!
What's with the kiddy treatment?!
Zzz... I've gotta finish all the errands I took on before the Commander gets back... Zzz...
Hi, Commander! I'm fully rested, as you can see. So, it's time to go looking for people who need a hand and do them some favors!
I'm dead tired... Commander, lower the top for me... I need a break from real life right now...
New mail? Might be our performance evaluation... C-come here and let me have a look at it!

Remember to get the literature Impero asked for... and the picture books for Maestrale and Libeccio... and to buy soda for Archerfish... Zzz...|Do you know how to play the piano, Commander? Err, this is just a model piano. The keys don't work.|I remember now! Someone asked me to reorganize this place! And since you're already here, you should help me– I mean, help all of us by tidying up with me!
There are new missions? Okay, I'll note that down and sort those out later!
Mission complete! ...And I've not even gotten started on them yet... Wait, did you finish ALL the missions before I could attempt them?!
Wait, stop! There's not enough room for both of us!
For the last time, there's not enough room for both of us! PLEASE get it into your head!
*yawn*... Nothing's impossible when you've got Captain Pompey... Hmm? Commander? Wait, I fell asleep? Seems I did... Drat, I forgot what I even came here for...
Victory! ...Wait, I just realized, we played for fun and still won!
... Indy... Ah, that's not it... Everyone, follow me!
Hey, Commander, please hear me out! My little sister is super duper cute!
Portland-class Heavy Cruiser – Portland, Hull Number CA-33!
Commander, can I pair up with Indy for the next commission? I'll show you some cute pictures of her later!
Don't interrupt me when I'm fantasizing about Indy!
Indy's soooooo cute!
Commander, do you want to see some photos of Indy when she was little? I'll show them to you even if you say no!

Commander, where's that photo of Indy eating a watermelon? Ah, thank you! And the one where she's hugging a body pillow? Ah, that's where it was, thank you~! Before I knew it, you've actually gotten more familiar with my Indy collection than I have~
... Kids? Let me think... I want them to look like Indy, and... I want ten! Let's say ten to start with! ... Huh?! Aahh! Just what are you making me say~?!
Commander, I left an Indy plushie here, have you seen it?
Hey, Commander, please hear me out! My little sister is super cute!
Dammit... I can't let my little sister see me like this!
I brought your mail, Commander~! What? Even I can do my job right every now and then!
Come on, Commander, let's head out already. Indy doesn't like people who slack around!|My little sister is just so lovely~|Would you like to see my special Indy mags?
If I don't do these missions properly then I can't show myself to my little sister.
Commander, can I use the rewards to buy snacks for Indy?

I'm Portland, Indy's big sister~! Do it again, properly this time? Aww... If only they'd have called us the Indianapolis-class, rather than the Portland-class... 
I have 16 battle stars and I've participated in a few big operations too, but who cares about me? Why don't we just talk about my little sister instead?
It seems you and I are always appreciating just how cute Indy is, Commander... But to me, Indy still always comes first! This is the one thing I'm not giving up!
Aahh, Indy is sooo cute... Hey, could you stop interrupting me?
Commander, Commander, please hear me out! Indy's like, sooo soft! Want to touch her together with me?
Whoa! ... Not even Indy has touched me like that before!

Nice to meet you, Commander. I'm Portland, Indy's big sister. I've participated in the battles of the Coral Sea, Midway, Guadalcanal and Santa Cruz Islands. Hm? Who's Indy? Why, it's a nickname for my dear little sister, Indianapolis!
Now I can do some more of this and some more of that to Indy!
My cute little Indy~ Look! Aren't I amazing~?
Commander, look, look! This is my handmade Indy plushie! Isn't it utterly adorable?! It's the magnum opus of my work in the Arts & Crafts Club!
When Indy's dyed rose red from the setting sun on the way back from school... ahhh, she's so cuuuuuute! Don't you want to see how she looks too, Commander?!
Oh, Commander, have you seen Indy? I want to dress her in some super adorable clothes I made~ Guhehehe~

Commander, why don't we go for lunch? Of course, my dear Indy will be there too!|Whether on the way to school, in class, or heading home, I'm always with Indy... School life is the best thing EVER!|I bet you'd make a good teacher, Commander... So, please, take pictures of Indy from every angle during class! Later, I'll trade you for regular pictures of her!
You think Indy's suuuuper cute too, right? She really is! If you want, I'll let you cuddle with my Indy plushie just a bit!
Eek?! Be careful, Commander! I nearly pricked myself with my needle!
Commander, look, look! This is my handmade Indy plushie! Isn't it utterly adorable?! It's the magnum opus of my work in the Arts & Crafts Club!
Commander, did you know? Indy is thiiiiiiis cute!
Nice to meet you, I'm Indianaportland! ... Hm? Who's Indy? She's my precious little sister, and my most beloved...

Commander, you're not getting away anymore! Come here, I'm gonna tell you all about my special Indy mags! Today's the day that I'll fully drill Indy's appeal into your head!|I didn't miss any major battles, you say? Well... if I'd have missed any of Indy's cute moments then I'd regret it so much I'd want to cry!|...! *Gasp* My Indy Cuteness Sensor is going off! Commander, you'll have to excuse me for a bit!
Nice to meet you, I'm Indianaportland! ... Hm? Who's Indy? She's my precious little sister, and my most beloved...
Courage is necessary for success… All ships, fire!
voiceline.oath: For the glory of Her Majesty and the Commander!

voiceline.line: Fate can be easily derailed, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Should I prepare a snack for you? I'm not skilled enough to be able to boast to others like George does, but my cooking won't disappoint, either.

voiceline.line: King George V-class battleship – Prince of Wales, Hull Number 53!
The commissions are complete, it is your duty to welcome them back.
voiceline.oath: Commissions have been completed. Let's go greet the girls together.

voiceline.line: Keep your distance. You are not qualified to command me...
I heard that my current name was chosen because my original one could bring misfortune, but... judging by how things turned out... it seems I'm unable to escape my fate...
You never know how many plans, hopes, and efforts would sink into the sea with you, Commander. So try not to die too easily.
Fighting fair and square is my motto. I wish it could be the same when it comes to my own feelings. So... can you stay with me a bit longer? I have something important to tell you, Commander...
I had a dream, a dream of that time which makes me feel hopeless even now... But when I open my eyes and see you by my side, it feels like life... like life isn't so bad after all...
voiceline.oath: Love based on pretense is a vile thing. I give myself to you as I am, and I accept you for who you are. No matter how many mistakes you make, I can overlook them all, because my eyes are cloudy with tears of happiness. That's what lovers do, after all.

voiceline.line: Sometimes victories come down to nothing but luck. Don't get too full of yourself, Commander.
voiceline.oath: A toast to our victory. Never forget that you are the reason that everyone can enjoy this peace for yet another day.

voiceline.line: Get up! We're going to go look for a fight!
Welcome back. Shall we have tea before getting back to work?
voiceline.oath: Managing the fleet is complicated and difficult. If there's anything I can help out with, let me know.

voiceline.line: A horse may stumble even though he has four legs. Let's try again next time.
voiceline.oath: A light heart lives long. Don't be too hard on yourself.

voiceline.line: You have a new message, Commander.

Expensive isn't always better, but it's your job to maximize our combat capability, Commander.|I don't want to suffer the pain of losing my comrades again...|Would you like to have some tea? I have also prepared some sandwiches. By the way, I am a fan of pickles.
voiceline.oath: nil|Repulse, Vampire, and Hood, and Eugen and Bismarck... It seems there'll be no risk of boredom while I'm by your side.|I'm used to taking care of Her Highness' needs, so it's perfectly fine for you to make absurd requests from time to time. On top of that, I'll flawlessly complete your request and make you fall in love with me all over again... Hehe, how does that sound?

voiceline.line: Commander, it's time to put you to the test.
Rewards received! You performed beautifully.

I'm the second ship of the King George V-class battleships, the Prince of Wales. I once escorted the Prime Minister to sign the Atlantic Charter. Making my mark in the history books of weaponry? Hmph, how dare you mention that in front of me.

To me, the ritual isn't as important as the fact that you're the person that I've accepted... However, receiving something like this still makes me happy. Thank you, Commander... I'll keep this with me forever!
It's a showdown!
Let's have chat, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Is it already time for the tea party?

voiceline.line: You know what doing this means right? *Smiles*
voiceline.oath: You know exactly what this means, right? Hehe.

voiceline.line: You're the Commander? Very well. I, Prince of Wales, shall let you witness my true strength.
Let's not repeat failure again...
The taste of victory is always sweet.
Regardless of the time and situation, to ignore a fair maiden is most ungentlemanly.
I'm not a big fan of beach volleyball, but Hood begged me... I swear, that girl! She just can't get enough of the sun! You've got to cheer for me!
I'll welcome the girls home from commission. Take a rest if you're really tired.
Love with you is like priceless treasure. I wouldn't trade even an entire kingdom for it!
I know it's tempting to eat ice cream during the summer, Commander, but don't eat too much otherwise you'll get a stomachache!
To  truly experience the charm of all things, first one must sincerely love them. Commander, the same goes for girls too.
New mail? Hood, stop staring at me. They aren't for me!

How's my swimsuit, Commander? Haha, let me teach you how to compliment a girl in this kind of situation.|Commander, leave all the admin stuff to me. Everyone else is waiting for you on the beach!|Hood, you should get some sun once in a while too, you know.
Fear not for dangers and obstacles, leap over challenges, and charge towards your goals. This is how unprecedented accomplishments are achieved!
Good work, Commander! How about a massage? People tell me I've got the best technique.
Yamashiro looked pretty depressed after she lost the ball game... Commander, why don't you go and comfort her?
Do you need me to teach you how to properly treat girls?
Although I don't really want in on the beachball game, but it was a request from Hood....That sun-loving girl. Don't forget to cheer for me!
I can't die happy until I see Prinz Eugen with a true and honest smile on her face.
I've been wearing Royal attire my whole life, so a change in pace doesn't seem bad. Oh, Commander, good timing. Can you explain to me how to celebrate the New Year here?
Since it's the New Year, it would be sad if there was nobody to greet the girls returning from commissions. Don't you think so, Commander?
To be able to experience a new culture like this, and spend the New Year peacefully... is like a dream come true. Commander, it's all thanks to you. As expected of the one I chose.

Commander, are you cold? You can borrow my coat if you'd like. Ah, don't worry about me, I'm fine. |Learning about the customs of the other nations is quite interesting. I feel like I get along better with the Sakura girls now. |I miss my black tea a bit, but I suppose "when in Rome, do as the Romans do." I guess I should fully enjoy the culture of the Sakura Empire.
You're still hammering away at those missions even during the New Year? You sure are hard-working, Commander.
Why are you staring at me? I'm... suave? Hehe, I suppose I should take that as a compliment.
I've been wearing Royal attire my whole life, so a change in pace doesn't seem bad. Oh, Commander, good timing. Can you explain to me how to celebrate the New Year here?
While destiny tends to fly off the rails pretty often, flying off the course during a match would be a major accident. Commander, be careful while you watch the match.
Oh, Commander. Worry not. Since I've been given this job, I will see through it until the end. Besides, it's been a while since I've gotten this fired up. Haha!
Let's put on a performance to be remembered – for the sake of your victory.
Oh, you're back. Did you run into any of my sisters on the way here?

The Manjuus drive these things... Sure, it's a mystery how they're able to turn the steering wheel, but I'm more curious about how they're able to step on the accelerator...|Whether in a match or in a battle, a machine's or ship's capability isn't everything. Depending on the driver's skill or the commander's directions, the course of the match or battle can be completely reversed. Hehe, that's exactly what makes betting fun.|These clothes make eating quite difficult... Oh, I give up. Commander, you can have the rest of my sandwich.
Does something about this outfit bother you?
Heh, I won't let you go any further.
Oh, Commander. Worry not. Since I've been given this job, I will see through it until the end. Besides, it's been a while since I've gotten this fired up. Haha!
Go forth... No. Let's put the lessons we've learned into practice!
Did you need something? Oh, it's fine. I wasn't doing anything special, just sorta letting my mind wander.
voiceline.oath: Commander, did you watch Saratoga's exercise? Not that it's any different from the usual, but it's always truly amazing how creative she can get!

voiceline.line: Independence-class light aircraft carrier – Princeton (CVL-23.)
Heading out to greet the commission team? I'll go with you.
Honestly, I'd rather have Saratoga be the one giving me directions.
You wanted to have a chat over some tea? Pl-please, just a moment... Umm, I need to tidy up the room a bit, so I'd appreciate it if you could give me half an hour or so...

Ahem! So you were asking about my hobbies? I like to read books and... study Saratoga's battle style. In terms of combat prowess, I sincerely believe that Saratoga is in a class of her own, and wouldn't lose even to Enterprise herself.

Do you understand what I mean? Even though Saratoga's usually a perky, high-spirited kind of girl, she's always looking out for others, even in battle. I've personally been saved by her many times. There's also how... Commander? Oh no, you fell asleep...

Commander, why do you have a picture of Saratoga? You picked it up from the floor?! Nooo! I can't believe I've screwed up so royally... You see, this is from my collection... Please keep this a secret from everyone else, I beg you!
voiceline.oath: All right, we'll now start our meeting to review and discuss Saratoga's battle style! There will be another one right after to appreciate her newest single! Commander, make sure to keep me company until the end!

voiceline.line: You look pretty tired. Here's a towel.
voiceline.oath: You look exhausted... Hold still, I'll wipe that sweat off your brow.

voiceline.line: I won't let history repeat itself!
You're finally here. Did you rest well?
voiceline.oath: I'm so happy to see you again. Let's get stuff done!

voiceline.line: Still out of Saratoga's league...
Your mail? I'll go get it, so just stay there and focus on your work.

Sara? ...S-Saratoga is someone I admire very much. I wouldn't dare call her by her nickname.|Montpelier is a close friend of mine. It's not because we were both members of the Cleveland class, but because we both have someone we really look up to in our lives.|Feel free to give me as much work as you need. It's part of a secretary ship's duties, so don't fret it.
voiceline.oath: Wow... I can't believe Saratoga called me Princey... Today must be my lucky day.|Montpelier's sister, Cleveland, is truly... a fascinating person. There are plenty of things I can learn from her as well.|Feel free to entrust me with as much work as you need me to. After all, we've both sworn to work hard to become like Saratoga... no?

voiceline.line: We've been assigned new missions? Let's give them a look.
Mission rewards... My heart's dancing with glee.

Second ship of the Independence class, Princeton, at your service. I was originally laid down as the seventh ship in the Cleveland class, Tallahassee. I fought a lot alongside Saratoga in the war, and though I was able to learn much from her, I wasn't able to make it through the Battle of Leyte Gulf... It'd be an honor to fight by her side once again.

I'm so lackluster compared to Saratoga, so why would you...? Err, not that I'm turning you down! If anything, I'd be willing to go through thick and thin with you, as long as you're fine with someone like me... Yes, let's be together!
Just like Saratoga would!
What, do you think I'm too inexpressive? I was wondering if that's why it's like you're always trying to make me laugh.
voiceline.oath: I don't mind you trying to get me to laugh, but these pranks are a bit... W-wait, was this Saratoga's idea all along?!

voiceline.line: Have you never tried a knuckle sandwich before? How about a taste of mine... Hyah!
voiceline.oath: Geez, that was very naughty of you. *pat pat*

voiceline.line: I'm Princeton, Independence class. Tallahassee? I don't mind if you want to call me that.
Not bad at all. Appreciate it, Commander.
Looking good. Let's press on.
I got this collector's edition of "Saratoga: Beautiful Summer Days" from Gridley. Looking at Saratoga enjoying the summer with everyone else makes me wish I could join her...
Commander, are you also here to swim? ...Ah, this here? I brought it with me to the ocean to get some practice in.
If you stay out while the sun's blazing... you're going to get heatstroke. Make sure not to let the sun cook you for too long.
Have you done your stretches yet? You don't want to get cramps because you rushed into the ocean unprepared.

Hehehe. With this, I'll be able to improve my sense of balance and my physical strength at the same time. Would you like to give this a try as well?|...It really will be a problem if my hair gets all messy from this. Um, Commander... do you think you could tie it down for me?|Independence and the others are calling for me? ...All right, I'll go.
You want to get on? I-it's not that I don't want you to, but...
W-wait a second! If you move too suddenly, it'll capsize... Wah?!
Commander, are you also here to swim? ...Ah, this here? I brought it with me to the ocean to get some practice in.
According to Saratoga, what I should be doing in this situation is... Wah?! Commander?!! I wasn't up to anything at all!
You're finally here? ...Ah, well, I only just got here as well, so don't worry about it. Anyway, shall we get going?
Commander, where have you been all this... a premium Saratoga plushie?! W-Where in the world did you find this masterpiece!!!
I heard there's a famous candy store around these parts. W-Why don't we stop by there first?

Commander, what's your favorite flavor of ice cream? ...Oh, umm, it's just for reference...|Saratoga told me this outfit looks fine on me, but I wonder I really do look presentable in such cute clothing...|A shooting game? Alright, I'll show you how much I've improved thanks to Saratoga's special training sessions! Oh... it's a bit embarrassing to get all pumped up by myself...
You want... to hold hands? ...W-Well, that's not a bad idea... Even though this isn't a big deal, why is my heart pounding so furiously...
Y-You did that on purpose, didn't you?!
You're finally here? ...Ah, well, I only just got here as well, so don't worry about it. Anyway, shall we get going?
Ho-kay! Warm-ups done, now let's do this thing!
Why're you always staring off in the distance, Commander? Got something on your mind? Maybe I can help you with it.
voiceline.oath: Yeah, hey... Hmm... Huh? Me? I'm as carefree as can be. What about you? Something you wanna get off your chest?

voiceline.line: P-class armored ship – Prinz Adalbert
Hello? A commission's done. The girls brought back a ton of stuff, so I helped them out with it.
You're such a lame-ass... I'm gonna go hang with someone else.
Let's start by checking out the depot. There's bound to be peeps there who need a hand or just wanna hang out.

Heya, Commander, I got those documents you asked for... Took longer than you expected? Yeah, uhh... I ran into Magdeburg and went jogging with her, then Heinrich and I played with Eisen, and after that... Yeah, I kinda lost track of time...

Seeing other people happy makes me happy too~ That's why I love both helping people and hanging out with 'em equally. Other girls have said we're the same in that regard, you and I. You just love seeing people happy too, right?
Sooo, how 'bout say we look around for people in need of a helping hand? There ain't no problem we can't solve together. And if nobody needs help, we can just hang out instead.
voiceline.oath: You down to hang out with me today? Ah, right, you've got work... Tell you what, I'll help you with it. First order of business: putting a smile on your face~

voiceline.line: Huh? I don't recall doing anything to earn a headpat, but okay.
Ever thought about setting up an outdoors office space, Commander? The warm sunshine and fresh air's waiting for you outside!
voiceline.oath: I'm gonna open the window and get some fresh air in here. C'mon! Breathe in, breathe out!

voiceline.line: My comeback is-a coming in round two!
Come on. Time to get motivated, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Howdy. Finished charging your batteries? I can help if you still need more energy.

voiceline.line: Retreating already? Guess I'll do the same...
Yo, your mailbox is full. Want me to empty it for you?

This hourglass is real neat. Let's reset it and watch the sand go again. And again... Welp, that got old fast. Now 'scuse me while I go rummage through your desk for other cool gadgets.|Sheesh, that's a crazy amount of paperwork on your desk. Wait, can't we just feed 'em to the shredder and be done with it? ...No? Fine, I won't do it then.|Don't you ever feel fed up, doing the same task for hours at a time? I'd give up after like, thirty minutes.|You know how Heinrich nicknamed her rigging "Eisen"? I'm thinking about naming mine too.
voiceline.extra: Man, your desk is just loaded with neat stuff. Hehehe, ain't never a dull moment in your office~|I'm like a human shredder, tearing paperwork you don't wanna do into ribbons... Hmm. You sure you can still manage with this amount?|It's not so bad doing the same task all day when you've got someone to vibe with~|Heard Strasser sat Heinrich down and made her read a book for once. Maybe I should find something to read before bedtime.

voiceline.line: The mission list grows ever longer... I say we just put it through the paper shredder, honestly.
Hey, Commander, the mission rewards are piling up at the pier.

Heya, I'm P-class armored cruiser Prinz Adalbert. All P-class ships are a force to be reckoned with, at least according to Heinrich. So yeah, if you need some nasties taken care of, just gimme a call~
Does this mean we're like, super duper besties? ...Even more than that? Huh... Super duper ultra mega besties then? Let's go with that, and promise each other we'll always be together~
Adalbert, coming at ya!
Mind helping out with my training, Commander?
You can't go 'round doing this to girls, Commander.
voiceline.oath: You've really got a, uh, keen interest in women's bodies.

voiceline.line: Made it safely to port! Time to have a look around. Question is, where to start... Hm? Are you the Commander? All right. 'ello, nice to meet you, and all that jazz. See you around~
Woo! Yeah! Feeling stronger already!
K.O.! The enemies are all down for the count!
How'd I end up here, lying down on the counter...? Think I closed up shop then got all sleepy... *yawn*... Truth be told... I'm still pretty sleepy.
Zzz... Huh? Did I doze off? I just meant to rest my eyes for a sec after closing up, but look how long I slept... Hang on, why are you still here, Commander?
Those girls you sent out are back? I'll whip up some drinks for them later.
We're meant to be closed for the day, but I'm all ears if you've got any requests~
Welcome, Commander! It's kind of odd saying "welcome" when I'm lying down, but hey.
Mail always finds its way to you wherever you go, huh?

Taking orders, moving dishes, and cleaning tables, that's this job in a nutshell. Never gets boring as long as you do 'em in rotation!|Honestly, not a fan of the liquor menu. All the drinks on there make my head spin...|Earlier today, I was caught gawking at my coworkers while they were mixing drinks. I was so distracted that Bismarck herself called me out for it.
We've still got missions to do! See? You do need my help~
Finished a mission, huh? I say you've earned yourself a drink.
I'm no marionette, ya hear!
This stuff won't fly during open hours, ya hear?
Zzz... Huh? Did I doze off? I just meant to rest my eyes for a sec after closing up, but look how long I slept... Hang on, why are you still here, Commander?
All ships, open fire!
Hmm? Check up? Vielen Dank~
Admiral Hipper-class Heavy Cruiser, Prinz Eugen
Commission completed? Let's see if there is anything interesting to report.
Mind getting out of my sight? You're a bit of an eyesore.
... I don't smile enough? Commander... care to see if you can make me?
Commander~ I love you. Just kidding. Did your heart skip a beat?
Ich liebe dich~ is this a joke or the truth? Why don't you decide for yourself~
... Why did I laugh? Because it's funny to see you look so confused, Commander... This smile is truly from the bottom of my heart!
Commander, won't you shower and relax with me for a while?
Ahhh... how interesting!
Hmm~ What is it? How would you like me to train you today?
Hehehe... now you've done it...
There's new mail. Hehe~
If you overwork yourself too much... you ~ will ~ die.|Lucky ship? Are you mocking me?|Operation Rheinübung? Looking back, that was how it all began for me.
Missions... aren't there any interesting ones?
Commander, the rewards. My portion? Not interested~
I am Prinz Eugen, the miracle of the Third Reich and the third ship of the Admiral Hipper-class heavy cruisers. I will survive any battle, no matter how fierce. Luck? You sure have some guts.
So this is the answer you're giving me? What shall I do? What a dense commander. I have long stopped being the empty person I was before. Did you forget that you were the one who changed me?
It's not enough. I. Want. MORE!
Have you finished having your fun?
Now then, it's my turn to have a taste of you.
Hmm... so you're the Commander? How long can you keep me amused? I'm looking forward to it.
This feeling... isn't half bad.
*Yawns* ... Battleships? Nothing but small fry.
Woah! I got a pretty dark tan after playing with Wales all day...
Relaxing on a float, gently licking my lips... is this really the most popular photo pose for the beach? Wales, you’re not teasing me again, are you?
Commander, I am practicing my smile. Someone said it looks unnatural, but what do you think?
More mail? Any from Hipper or Bismarck? Ah, they're all for you, Commander... How boring...

Wales, someone is going to break your hand again if you keep messing with Bismarck! I won't plead for you this time...|Despite her devil-may-care attitude, Wales is actually quite reliable. In fact, she helps me all the time, even though we were once enemies...|I went and told Hipper about our beach day, and all she said was, 'Why do I need to be jealous about your thin, lewd, and non-combat-ready swimming suit?' Haha, that's so like her!
Commander, have you seen Wales? That rascal, she ditched me again!
There are a lot of good things about Wales, but please avoid picking up her bad habits.
Relaxing on a float, gently licking my lips... is this really the most popular photo pose for the beach? Wales, you’re not teasing me again, are you?
Frohes neues Jahr~ This is how we say we say "Happy New Year" in the Iron Blood.
So this is the Sakura Empire's New Year? Hehe, how interesting~ Commander, since it's the New Year, why don't you put aside all those papers and have a drink with me?
Ahh, Commander, wel~come~ home~
New Year's greetings, huh? Aren't you the popular one~

Commander~ let's have a drink~ and two more drinks~ ahh... let's keep going~ |Hey Commander, why don't we call everyone over and drink together~ |The Sakura Empire's sake is truly delicious~ Next time, why don't we ask those stingy girls to let us try some liquor from the Eastern Radiance~
Commander, did the rewards have any tasty drinks?
You want to drink this? Not~ gonna~ share~
So this is the Sakura Empire's New Year? Hehe, how interesting~ Commander, since it's the New Year, why don't you put aside all those papers and have a drink with me?
Tsk... These fools need to learn how to read a room.
Hehe... Commander, that's quite the scandalous expression you've got there... Are you sure you're not drunk, with how red your face is~?
... Huh? Commander, is that you? Me, drunk? No way... *hic*... If I was, Commander, then what are you planning to do to me? Hehe...
Come on, don't be so tense. Just let go and relax.
Commander, did you come to have a drink?

Compared to those other stuffy, teetotaling banquets, something a bit more... liberated like this one is much more enjoyable. Don't you agree, Commander? |So, what do you like about me? My personality... or my body? If you lie, I'll make you take a shot~ |The Sakura Empire's liquors certainly have a distinctive flavor, but when a girl wants to cut loose, it's gotta be one of the classics~
Pfft... You're just too cute when you act all bashful but still can't resist trying to ogle me, ahaha~!
You~ lewd~ beast~ Ahahaha~!
... Huh? Commander, is that you? Me, drunk? No way... *hic*... If I was, Commander, then what are you planning to do to me? Hehe...
Viel Glück~ Are you having a good time, Commander? Just know that the only person I'm cheering for... is you~
Commissions completed. Hehe, don't you want to go check up on them together?
Make sure you clean every last bit. ...Hehe, I'm talking about the machine, of course.
Commander, you're working pretty hard. Hehehe, take care not to wear yourself out~♪
So this is what happens when you let your guard down...

Here, let's pop a bottle to practice uncorking the celebratory champagne~ What's wrong, Commander? Are you not going to drink?|Heinrich wants to compete in the race? How very like her... Wait a second, does she even know how to drive?|Why don't you try getting changed into something too, Hipper? You know the Commander's secretly looking forward to it, right? ...If you want, I'll even lend you the outfit I'm wearing.
Just like that~♡
Viel Glück~ Are you having a good time, Commander? Just know that the only person I'm cheering for... is you~
I'm the MVP? Hehehe, what did you expect?
Way to ruin the mood...!
Would you like me to call you something else? Hmm, how about "mein Schatz♡"—Well? Hehehe♪
Guten Abend~ So, what do you think? Pretty great view, right? Hehe, I was talking about the night scenery outside, you know~?
Let's celebrate the wonderful outing we had together, Commander~ It'd be such a waste to not drink one more glass... hmm? Is something wrong? Cat got your tongue?
"Welcome back. What'll be your order?" Is that what you were expecting? Heehee.

Hehe. What are you all nervous for? Why don't you sit down at the counter? Here's the wine I recommend.|You know, when we ran into Hipper the other day on our day out, she started sulking and turned beet-red the moment she saw your face. I wonder why? Heehee.|It's customary to pour wine into a wine glass, but I'd like to try a different container. I wonder how I'd make a cocktail out of it.
Though I doubt the rewards can beat this moment, shouldn't you go pick them up anyway?
Hehehe, don't be in such a hurry. The night has only just begun♡
Guten Abend~ So, what do you think? Pretty great view, right? Hehe, I was talking about the night scenery outside, you know~?
Everything is sweeter with a bit of beer. Ehehe~
In Ironblood, we also use animal nicknames to call our lovers, like teddy bear or little bunny or something else. So Commander, do you want me to call you teddy bear or little bunny?
If fate brought us together, then it has my thanks… I look forward to our future together~
Commander, the bathtub has been filled with hot water, so who goes first, or…?
Commander, you did not happen to peek at other girls while on the way here, right? ~~
Receiving a lot of mails….after all, you're the Commander, a really popular one, huh.

Ugh... my body suddenly feels so weak... I’d only recover if you give me a kiss, Commander. | Don’t overstretch yourself at work ~ otherwise… my loneliness will drive me to tease you.| I feel so lucky right now --- why you ask? Take--a--guess, dear?
All these missions….you pick Commander...I’m ready for them all~
I know what’s on your mind, Commander...but we need to focus on work right now.
If fate brought us together, then it has my thanks… I look forward to our future together~
Let 'em have it, girls! Los! Los!
What's a good way to make Eisen look less threatening... Hmm, maybe some cute stickers would do the trick?
voiceline.oath: Whoa, whoa, you need to hold still, Eisen! Otherwise I'll mess up the sticker placement! Hey, Commander, gimme a hand here~!

voiceline.line: P-class armored ship – Prinz Heinrich.
The commission team's back! Put me on the next one, please? Come on, coach!
voiceline.oath: I sent the commission team off to the dorm! You said I could I do that, remember?

voiceline.line: I don't know what made you this way, but if nobody else is gonna fix you, then I will! Just shut up and grab hold of my hand!
A past free of regrets paves the way for the future! Wow, that makes me sound super sophisticated! Hahahah! Am I right, Eisen? Right, Commander?
I just love listening to people talk about their history. Wish I had one... If I did, what'd it be like? I'm having fun just imagining it!
Tell me more about yourself, Commander! Tell me what it's like to lead a fleet, or some funny mistake you've made! Come on, tell me, I wanna know!
You down to go on another date today? When? Sometime later, I guess? Where? We'll cross that bridge when we get to it! No point in planning everything in advance! C'mon, with me!
Woo!
Sortieing sounds a heck of a lot more fun than rusting away in port, don'tcha think? Take me out on the next one, come on!
voiceline.oath: All right, so, you either have to send me on a sortie, or hang out with me! Time to choose, Commander!

voiceline.line: I'm not done for just yet!
Welcome back! Let's get fired up and do this thing! Hahahah!
voiceline.oath: Welcome back! Let's get this show on the road, Commander!

voiceline.line: Wait, we lost? How the heck?!
Bad Eisen! Stop munching on the mail! The Commander will get in trouble!

My gut tells me the papers you're looking for are right here! ...Aww, I was wrong?|There's plenty girls in other factions who don't have a history, huh! I thought it was just an Iron Blood thing.|Sure, Peter gives me a lot of flak, but honestly, I dunno how I'd manage to get anything done! Hahahah!
voiceline.oath: What have we here? The paperwork you're looking for? Hahahah, see? I told you you could count on my intuition!|Whoa, it's like a party in here! What're you all chatting about? "What if I'd actually been built"? Hey, as long as I could still come see you, I'm fine with any kind of past~|Come at me then, Miss Spiritual Leader! Let's see if you're hot stuff or not! ...Oh, it's a video game rivalry thing.

voiceline.line: A new mission? Say no more! I'll kerpow all the enemies to kingdom come!
So much paperwork and signing-off just for finishing one mission... My soul's boutta leave my body... Anyway, here's the rewards...
voiceline.oath: You're a meanie, making me do this office work which I'm no good at! ...We'll go claim the rewards together in just a bit? Fine, I'll hang in there for now...

voiceline.line: An introduction? You got it! My name's Prinz Heinrich, I'm a P-class armored ship. What else is there... Hmmmm... Eisen! Hey, Eisen, any ideas what to tell the Commander?
Hmm, I think you're supposed to follow the ring up with something else... Oh, now I remember what! *kiss*... Hahahah! I'm so glad to be with you, Commander!
My intuition tells me to just do it!
Mmmhh! Aahhh... Don't you ever get restless, working as much as you do, Commander? Get up and we'll take a jog down the hall!
voiceline.oath: I see you yawning there, Commander. What do you say to taking a refreshing little stroll outside?

voiceline.line: Stop RIGHT there! This is where I draw the line!
voiceline.oath: Whuah?! Geesh, Commander, I know who you are, okay?

voiceline.line: Hello there, Commander~! I'm the P-class armored ship, Prinz Heinrich. My little friend here is called Eisen... Hey, Eisen! Introduce yourself to the commander normally... Wait, how many times have I told you not to chew on others' clothes?!
I feel the powah!
Sweet victory! Not to mention MVP! Hahahah!
Where Eisen's gone? It's New Year's after all, so I let him out to play. He's a good boy! He won't harm anyone.
Phew... Changing into these clothes took quite a long time~ So, how does it look? A fine mixing of different cultures, wouldn't you agree? Ahaha, Happy New Year, Commander!
Apparently, you're meant to yell "tamaya" when they launch the fireworks! Dunno why that is, but sounds fun! ...What? That's only in the summer?
I've heard the Sakura Empire has loads of fun New Year customs! We've got to check 'em out together, Commander!

Strasser gave me an envelope with cash inside! She said it's a Sakura Empire and Dragon Empery tradition! Commander, you gimme one too~|Let's crank it up to eleven for New Year's! Even Spee's out there having fun with the gang!|Can't we leave all the office work for later and get dressed for a snowball fight? I promised Lebe I'd come!
You in the mood for an outdoor stroll? Hahahah, I'll be just fine in the cold, don't worry.
Hey! Hold it right there! I'm gonna doodle on your face as payback for that!
Phew... Changing into these clothes took quite a long time~ So, how does it look? A fine mixing of different cultures, wouldn't you agree? Ahaha, Happy New Year, Commander!
Purin~! Don't stop until they kneel and cry!
Staring at me all day won't turn you into an expert!
Prototype Bulin MKII. Can be used to limit break all Super Rare ships.
Yaaaay~! Commander! The girls who went out on a commission have come back! Let's drill something to celebrate!
You're pretty amazing to have gotten on my bad side! But I won't get angry just to appease you! Haha! Enjoy your emptiness!
My sister is so dumb. When people talk about our colors, it's not about our hair, it's about ra... rari... ah, now I remember! Reality TV!

I'll let you in on a little secret. My little sister keeps telling people that she's smarter than me. But truth is, she's dumber! I try to be nice and let her feel good about herself, like a big sister should. Ha!
Whee~! I'm flying! So~ high! Hey, don't move! You'll have to catch me if I fall!
You're not an average commander if you managed to conquer my heart. But I won't be shy or blush! Instead I'll give you a growl! Graaaah!
Let's run around and relax! Purin~!
Righty tighty, Lefty loosey, Stay calm and Purin on!
So why am I on the battlefield anyway, purin?!
Purin! Secret skill: Drill Translation!
Purin~! It's so big in here! There's so much room to run around!|Oh right, it's not my job to just run around, is it? Purin~!|Purin~? I'm too loud? Hmph, who cares what you think!
Purin~! The next mission has been chosen for you!
I'm just heading out to fetch your rewards, purin! I promise I won't break them!
Hahaha! It's your lucky day now that you've met me! We can purin together from this day forward! What for? To make everyone stronger, obviously! How do you purin? Like this! Purin~! Purin~!
As a simple Bulin, I'm meant to just help strengthen your other ships... But you gave me this ring... You're a strange one! I like you! Come, let's raise our hands together and say purin~ purin~!
My drill is the drill that will pierce the heavens!
Purin~ You can't catch me!
Purin~ purin~! (Prototype Bulin MKII continues to spin faster)
Purin~! The herald of good fortune has arrived! Are you ready? Raise your hands and follow me... Purin~ purin~!
[Cannot be enhanced]
Purin~! I'm the strongest!
I will destroy every last one of them.
If you're so interested in me, why don't you come closer?
I am Purple Heart, the CPU of Planeptune. And you must be the commander. I will follow your orders from now.
The commission team has returned. Should I offer them some assistance?
I never thought you would disappoint me this badly...
Such nice weather today. Do you know of any places in this world worth visiting?
Oh, it's you. You came at just the right time. There's a stage I can't clear in this game and I was hoping you could help me with it.
I don't know why but recently I've been unable to concentrate when I'm playing games with you. Is this what it feels like to... Just to make sure you'll have to play with me some more!
I've grown accustomed to this world, and it's all thanks to you. So, grab my hand and come with me! I say we go on a date for a little while.
That was a splendid workout. How about some time to take a break?
I am Purple Heart and I will not be looked down on!
Welcome back. Shall we sortie? Do some exercise battles? Or perhaps... have some pudding?
Everyone else ends up suffering just because I'm so powerless...
It seems some mail addressed to you has arrived. You should read it now before you forget to.

I am relieved everyone here is so kind. I will have no issue fighting with all my strength.|I could really use something to drink... Would there happen to be any custard pudding around here?|Oh, Commander? Could you tell me something I should know about your world?
Missions, huh... It seems the things a commander and a CPU do are not so different.
Mission completed. I'm curious about what rewards we'll receive.
I'm Purple Heart, the CPU of Planeptune. People always tell me they're amazed by how different I am in HDD form. How rude. This form is exhausting to be in, so I don't transform unless I have to.

I see the time has finally come. I'd grown so tired of waiting! Do you understand what giving this to me means? It means you will be my partner in gaming from this day onward. I'm looking forward to it, Commander.
Feel the power of a CPU!
Ahh...! Listen, if you want my attention then you could just ask for it.
You're awfully assertive, I see. Do keep the time and place in mind, though.
I am Purple Heart, the CPU of Planeptune. You must be the commander. I will follow your orders from now on.
To protect the commander and everyone I know... I have to become even stronger.
It's only natural we'd win.
Oh, Commander? Won't you join me in a short conversation? I'll tell you things about Planeptune. Oh, and I'm eagerly awaiting the day you come to Planeptune for a visit.
nil|nil|nil
Witness the might of a super-dreadnought!
Peasant! Who permitted you to peak?! I-I have not prepared myself yet...
Queen Elizabeth-class battleship - Queen Elizabeth, Hull Number 00!
The subjects tasked with a commission have returned. Go at once and see if they brought me a tribute!
You useless servant! I will have you relieved of your post!
Work hard for the great Elizabeth!
I'm sitting here for just a moment because I like the mood! Don't start getting any strange ideas!

H-hmph! You have been slightly exceeding in your duty, thus I will make an exception and promote you to captain of the Royal Guard! When I call for you, you will come hither immediately! Understood? Immediately! Swiftly! At maximum speed!
Hey, can't you just leave your work to your underlings? How can you be a proper consort if you aren't always by my side?! I-I would be so lonely...
A fine display, I shall be benevolent and permit you to rest.
Why are you spacing out?! Hurry! Get them!
Despicable, to have me wait on you for so long!
How despicable! To have brought shame to the great Elizabeth! You better remember this!
I have no interest in the contents of your mail... Mmh...
Being petite is a noble characteristic, understand?|You're saying I bumped into you? That's because you didn't make way for the Queen!|Do not touch my belly, it's rude!
Hurry and finish the mission! Do not skip your work!
Kneel before me and accept your mission rewards!
I am the super-dreadnought of the Royal Navy. Make sure to remember my name! My military achievements? I let my subjects take care of those kind of things. I simply need to watch them do their work!

Finally you have arrived before me. Foolish servant! Just how long did you intend to make me wait?! ...But I acknowledge your endeavors. Come here, I am giving you permission to take my hand! Yes! From now on I will always be with you!
Kneel before the Queen!
Please do not touch our noble body so casually
W-wait... You fool, what are you doing?! I-I'll sentence you to death!
Are you the commander? You are still 100,000 years too early to command me! Well, I shall be generous and give you a chance... From this day on, you will be one of my faithful servants!
I have no need to get any stronger! But... well, if you're going through to effort of doing it, then...
Piece of cake! There are no mistakes in my actions!
We shall allow you to bask in our splendor! ... Now out with your praise already! Lowly servant!

Hah haah! You're a lucky servant this evening! We shall allow you to accompany us to the party! ... B-but it's not like I chose you because I like you! I just... Yes! I just sort of chose randomly! Got it?!

So as not to embarrass me at the party, you need to practice your dancing! Y-you could practice with m-... You don't want to bother me?! B-b-but it really wouldn't be much trouble!|It is a servant's duty to clear the way for the Queen, are we clear?!|Bel! Is everything ready for the party? N-not that I'm excited about it or anything! I'm just supervising my maids!
Hm, hmph! ... Considering the lengths to which you went for this party, we shall overlook your boorishness for now. Be grateful for your queen's leniency! Lowly servant!
Aie! Warspite!! Level your fifteen-inch guns at this insolent servant! Off with its heeaaaaaad!!

Hah haah! You're a lucky servant this evening! We shall allow you to accompany us to the party! ... B-but it's not like I chose you because I like you! I just... Yes! I just sort of chose randomly! Got it?!
This is the Queen's stage!
Now this is a stage worthy of our majesty! You are not to leave our sight, servant! Let your passions burn for me!
How improper!
Fine work. As a reward, you may have this portrait of me. Keep it well!
Hah hah! Spread the word, servant! Let all be dazzled by our splendour!

"Grovel before me, servant!" ...Hm? It feels a bit different from usual...?|Like so...? Is this cuter? Very good then, well done, Matchless. My servant will be blown away!|A maid idol...? What is it Bel and Gloucester have been teaching you?
An offer for me? W- well, it is a Queen's duty to hear out the commoners...
I've included a favour in your rewards. Show me your gratitude!
Encore? Heh heh. I could give you a few more!
Watch your hands, servant! Or it's the oubliette for you!
Now this is a stage worthy of our majesty! You are not to leave our sight, servant! Let your passions burn for me!
Valiant, spread word of our victory far and wide!
Servant, do advise me on these "club activities." I have heard much commotion about "idols" or something like that...
Hehe, behold the new outfit that I had Akashi make for me! Impressive, no? Prostrate yourself before the elegant charm of my school uniform, servant~♪
Mathematics, check. History, check... Physical Education? Pass! A noble like me playing basketball with commoners? Unthinkable!
Your Queen has arrived! Do make way, my subjects!
Time to check my locker~♪ ...Hm, a note from Newcastle? Um... "Already cleaned for you." ...Oh, I see.

Bel, where's my cake...? Servant, take Neptune with you and make yourself useful!|Warspite, how fares the tea party plans with Nagato and the others? Have George and the knights deliver the invites to them!|"Field trip?" Let us make our way to Sardegna! Have Veneto regale us with the most exquisite banquet!
Did you go buy candy from the student store? Heh, even a noble such as myself must learn the tastes of commoners.
Hehe, behold the new outfit that I had Akashi make for me! Impressive, no? Prostrate yourself before the elegant charm of my school uniform, servant~♪
Ehehe, why it's only natural, of course! Nothing like that self-proclaimed "spiritual leader!"

skins.name: Crown Jewel of the Royal Navy

voiceline.line: Fight for your queen!
"Be not enchanted by dreams of silver and gold. There are yet many ways to earn your coin." ...Well said, Warspite.

Did I hear that you're supposed to give out red envelopes during the Dragon Empery's New Year? This is a fine chance to display the magnanimity of the Queen of the Royal Navy! ...Don't just run off with your gift! Spread the word of my glory, my servant!
You've done well. This red envelope is your reward!
You are to check your mail at once...! And I do not mean this red envelope!

Servant, bright us some of that Dragon Empery tea! We wish to compare it with Edinburgh's black brew!|Heh heh, you doubt the wealth of a queen? Just you wait for the next Royal Banquet!|It seems different places have different customs for New Year's gifts, eh? Hmph, no matter. So long as you carry on as a good servant, we may reward you at any time!
You have our permission to collect this New Year's gift!
Watch your hands, servant! I curse you to lose your wallet!

Did I hear that you're supposed to give out red envelopes during the Dragon Empery's New Year? This is a fine chance to display the magnanimity of the Queen of the Royal Navy! ...Don't just run off with your gift! Spread the word of my glory, my servant!
You're not my master! I'm your master!

Warspite, what in the world is all this... The Maid Team has to sift through all this paperwork?! I'm tired already... I wish I never mentioned wanting to experience what it's like to be a maid... And you, stop staring and help me already, servant!
Nothing beats Edinburgh's hand-brewed black tea! Wouldn't you agree, my servant?
I shall check the mail in your stead, my servant! ...Hmm, I wonder what this says...

Warspite, what's taking you so long? ...What do you mean you can't move around easily in a skirt?!|Being a maid is no easier than carrying out public duties... So come help me already, you lowly servant!|Bel, come clean up around the office! Heheh, any job that someone as noble as me carries out becomes a noble endeavor in turn!
Hurry up and take care of the missions, you lowly servant!
Excellent, the rewards are here! Warspite, take these over to my servant!
Do you also do this to the girls in the Maid Team...?

Warspite, what in the world is all this... The Maid Team has to sift through all this paperwork?! I'm tired already... I wish I never mentioned wanting to experience what it's like to be a maid... And you, stop staring and help me already, servant!
I've been assigned a task, so I have to do my best!
Being stared at like this... is really embarrassing...
New Orleans-class heavy cruiser – Quincy, hull number CA-39.
The commission fleet is back. Should I help bring the supplies in? Okay, leave it to me!
Even if you're this kind of person, I won't give up on trying to help you! Probably...
Do you need me for something? I'm currently helping the others carry some supplies.
Hurting others is more painful than being hurt yourself... Huh? Doesn't everyone feel that way?
Why do I like helping others so much? Well, it's because we can only build a brighter future if we all work together.
Commander, when I'm with you, I can only think of how much I want to do something for you, how much I want to help you, and how much I want to become your strength...
Good work today, Commander. Welcome back!
I-I'm just getting started!
Commander, is there something I can help with...?
*Ugh*... Is this the best I could do?
Commander, I've finished arranging the mail.

Commander, this is r-really... e-embarrassing... |Um, sorry... I'm not really sure how to turn people down... Besides, isn't it good to make others happy...? |I'll have you know that I've turned down plenty of requests before! For example... uhh... umm, I can't think of any right now...
Commander, we have new missions. I'll help you out as well.
Yay, the mission rewards are here~! *Hngh*...! *Pant*... Commander? I can't lift these by myself, can you come lend a hand?
I am Quincy, the New Orleans-class heavy cruiser. I'm not fond of fighting... It'd be better if everyone could help each other out...

Eh? You'd like me to always stay by your side? Um, actually... I want to rely on you, and be relied upon. I want to understand what you're thinking, and I want to... be with you forever... *Whimper*... This is embarrassing...
Why must we hurt each other...
I'm not used to this whole "physical contact" thing, but if it's a request from the Commander, then...
C-commander... e-even I can get mad!
C-Commander... Pleased to meet you... I'm the New Orleans-class heavy cruiser, Quincy. Um, since we're going to be living together from now on, is there anything I can help you with?
Hopefully I've gotten a tiny bit stronger...
I-I did it!
I'll just stay here and help watch everyone's belongings. Uh... I'm really not very good with exercise...
Everyone's so cheerful and energetic... Commander, um, if you're tired, want to rest here with me?
Would you like to have some cold drinks? Be careful not to have too many at once, or you might get a brain freeze~
Commander, everyone's waiting for you~
It feels like... everyone is staring at me when I wear a swimsuit... It's so embarrassing... |Beverages? Don't worry, I came prepared. |Listening to the sounds of the sea really puts me at ease...
Is... is someone in trouble?
*Whimper*... Could you please not do stuff like this in front of everyone...?
