Everyone's so cheerful and energetic... Commander, um, if you're tired, want to rest here with me?
No need to thank me! Good things are meant to be shared. I'm not gonna hog all of my candy!
Commander, do you appreciate something sweet every now and then? Here, take whatever you like.
Fletcher-class Destroyer - Radford, Hull Number DD-446!
Hey, Commander! How about we exchange all our commission rewards for candy instead?
I'm never giving you any more candy ever again!
I feel like my famous sisters always make me seem a bit... insignificant. Oh well, I guess there's nothing wrong with that.
Hey, Commander, that candy you gave me the other day was really good. Where'd you get it?
Have you ever tried making your own candy? It's fun! Here, try some of mine!
I made some chocolate just for you, Commander! Will you take it?
C-Commander! Did you manage to snatch any candy from the enemies? ... They didn't have any?!
If my hunch is right, Commander's candy should be... Huh? Hey! There's nothing here!
My... my sweets...
New mail! It's not another pamphlet about how sugar is bad for your health, is it?

You really can't take the Sakura Empire's destroyer squadrons lightly!|If only everyone had lifetime supplies of candy, there wouldn't ever be another war!|Commander, why don't we fire candy at the enemy instead of explosives?
Now is not the time for candy... Ha! I'd never say that!
This will get rid of some of the shame from Kolombangara... (Munch)

I'm Radford, DD-446, part of the Fletcher-class! Hmm... and... even though I didn't do that well in the Kula Gulf and Kolombangara, I tried my best! Anyways, the only thing that matters at the end of the day is candy!
Does this mean I'm the sweetest candy in the world to you, Commander? ... Okay, so... I guess that means I'll be your lollipop from now on?
Lollipops! Want one?
(Munches)... Hmm, what's up?
Hmpf! If you keep this up then I won't let you come to my room and eat candy anymore!
I'm Radford, a Fletcher-class destroyer. Want a lollipop, Commander?
Don't worry, my teeth are perfect!
The taste of victory... Hmph, it's not as sweet as candy!
You know what'd be some really sweet magic? Being able to turn all the ammunition in this world into candy! Everyone would be too busy enjoying candy, and there'd be world peace!
Commander, the sweet magic within my tome lets me turn things into candy! Hehe, that sounds pretty convincing— ...Eh, Commander? Wh-when'd you get here?!
Commander, want some bubblegum? I've got strawberry, orange, and grape!
Halloween is the time of year to stuff yourself silly with candy! Eh? That's wrong?

Nicholas, stop sleeping already. If you're that sleepy, why not eat some candy for a nice sugar rush?|This piece of candy right here will make you braver! Jenkins, step right up and test your courage!|Commander, you're going to get pranked if you don't have enough candy to give out! Fine, looks like I'll have to give you some of mine!
I've still got plenty of candy here, Commander. Don't be shy, just ask if you want me to give you some more!
Hmph! As punishment, I'm withholding half of your candy supply today!
Commander, the sweet magic within my tome lets me turn things into candy! Hehe, that sounds pretty convincing— ...Eh, Commander? Wh-when'd you get here?!
Please pay attention, everyone! This is a good chance to get some real combat experience~
Make sure you ask me any questions if you're lost before we head out!
Omaha-class light cruiser – Raleigh, Hull Number CL-7!
It's almost time, Commander. I'll go ahead and welcome the girls back from their commission.
I'm not a kid, okay!
Commander, mature people like you need to pay attention on the job.
You want to know more about me? Hmm... you may be the first person to treat me like an equal. I'm happy about that, I suppose.
You've been taking it pretty easy recently, Commander... *Sigh*... I guess some of the blame is mine to share... It's hard to be strict with someone I like...
You're calling me 'professor' in such an... interesting way when we're alone. Are you expecting to receive private lessons? You're just like a little kid, Commander...
You did quite well, Commander!
Hello, Commander. I've been waiting for you. Oh my, look at the time! Shouldn't we start the training now?
Phew... That was close... I nearly...
Your mail has been sorted. Remember to read your messages thoroughly, please!
Shall we begin our training, Commander?|For a beginner, every bit of training is very important~!|My name is Raleigh, not... that! Also, don't forget the "Ms."!
Commander, please don't forget about your unfinished missions!
Please don't forget to claim your mission rewards.
I'm the training officer of the Omaha-class fleet - Raleigh. I'm going to be very strict with anyone who won't listen to what I say!
To receive something so precious from a student... I should be ashamed to call myself a professional mentor... But you make me...
Let me show you some textbook maneuvers.
Please don't tug me like that... I'm not a kid!
I'm not immune to getting angry, you know... Co-man-der!
I'm Raleigh, the Omaha-class light cruiser. Please sign this contract here... There we go. I'm hoping we'll make a good team from now on, Commander.
Now I can properly mentor you, Commander.
You can't use the same trick on me twice!
Everyone, the one with the lowest results will get extra lessons~~

D-don't look at me inappropriatly! And do your work properly! 
--Y-Y-You were just looking at my bridge?! ...Ahaha...
Ranger-class aircraft carrier ー Ranger, Hull Number CV-4!
Mr. Commander~ You forgot to check the results. You might see the girls become angry at you.
Maybe I should quit teaching...
Why are kids today thinking about weird things all the time...!
Commander, you are a capable child if you are put into action. I feel a little happy.
T-T-Teacher-student relationships?!! I've never thought about such things; I've never even read those kinds of books before. I totally, totally never look forward to that!
Commander, you're really helpless without me. S-so... I-I'm... I'm holding you back for another year!
Have you finished your homework? Alright. Then as promised, I'll give you a reward~
Can I conduct combat operations since the weather is so nice today, Commander?
I can't let you see me like this, Commander.....
You've got mail. Do you want me to hold your hand through teaching you how to reply? AAH! Not literally!

What I teach besides fighting is human se... I-I mean... physical education!|The Sakura Empire? ...Uh, Uhhh... I- I don't know enough to teach you about that!|If you don't listen to what I say, I'll punish you!
Finish your missions properly. Otherwise, there will be catch up lessons!
The compensation... is nothing major, but it's not good to neglect it either.

I'm Ranger, the first purpose-built aircraft carrier of the Eagle Union. During my service in the Atlantic, I was part of various missions functioning as the largest carrier in the area. While I'm a carrier... please don't have weird expectations of me! For your sake, I don't want to disappoint you!
*cries*... Receiving such a precious thing from a student, and getting so happy to the point of shedding tears... I, Ranger, am a failure as an educator...
Ranger, striking!
Hwaa!? Commander... S...Stop... is what you want me to say?!
D-don't tell anyone about this! You'll embarrass me!

I'm the Eagle Union's first purpose-built carrier, Ranger! I was stationed in the Atlantic, where I mainly served as an escort to convoys and aircraft carriers. Specialty teaching? T-that's not what I was sent here for, b-but… if you insist…  --I can do it...
I, Ms. Ranger, am going to teach you some more things
Commander, you must not become worn out quickly like the enemy-- Oh no... not like that!
Everyone, it's time to put what you learned to use!
C-Commander?! I-I-Is my bridge, really that beautiful?
I didn't realize I could still become more powerful! I'll work harder from here on out to teach everyone how to fight!
Commander, you've grown but you haven't changed much. Alright, here's your reward~
This child seems fine... This one is recovering well... Ah, welcome back, Commander!

A weapon may be powerful, but if it can't be used properly, it won't be completely effective. It is the teacher's job to teach you how to use them! Physical education? I-I'll teach that again!|I've only improved a few times before, and they were just small enhancements. Now that everyone is stronger, I can start getting some work done.|Commander? I believe in you, so I'm letting you study on your own while I work on my planes. I'll get angry if you avoid your study this time, alright?
Yeah yeah, Commander is totally not good without a Teacher here... Yup, can't help it~
Commander, can you help a teacher out here a little?... Eeek! ....Really?...
The modernization that had never happened has finally been completed! From now on, I, Ms. Ranger, will continue to teach as well~
If you engage in some special training with me, you'll withstand fatigue for a longer time, Commander! ...Eh? Why are you looking at me like that?
Just leave the planes to me!
Commander, I'm in a bit of a pickle... I can't get any of the parts for my costume at Akashi's shop... I guess I'll just have to make them myself... Hrm...
Atlanta-class light cruiser – Reno, Hull Number CL-96.
The commission came back. You want to go out and see them?
They say you should never meet your heroes. Now I know why... Sigh...
Commander, you're looking at my superhero gadgets! This is my Ibranium shield, this is my Chiropterang, and this here's my Worpher Belt... Cool, huh? You name it, I've got it, Commander.
There was a time when I was training really hard to become a superhero... But these huge things got in the way of my dreams... the flat girls don't know how good they have it...

I may have given up my training, but I still love watching sports. Oh, but even more than sports, I love watching superhero shows...! But now that my real hero is here, Commander, maybe I'm good on that front.

They say "with great power comes great responsibility," but superheroes need some downtime too, just like warships. Sometimes I just gotta be a regular girl, and you're no different. Let's do something fun sometime.
Good fight out there, Commander. Here's a towel and a drink... Hm? Isn't this what a sidekick does?
I could do this all day!
Commander, today we do our best to save the world. like always!
They say it's always darkest before the dawn... Mm. We'll try harder next time.
Mail for you, Commander. Is it a fan letter?

You looking at my gear, Commander? If you press this here, it shoots out a light like bzzzzew! And if you press this one, it goes like kshaw ksshhew. And then this one's like...|Commander, I'm in a bind... Well, I guess it's not really that big a deal. It's just, I wasn't able to get this premium figure I've been wanting...|Woooww.... Hm? Oh, was I bothering you? I was just basking in the amazing feeling of a sidekick watching her hero work up close~
We got a lot to do... But I'm sure you can knock it out easy peasy, Commander!
That's my Commander! You always get the best rewards!

I'm Reno, an Atlanta-class cruiser of the later Oakland subclass. We've got souped up anti-air power compared to the regular Atlanta-class. We only saw the last bits of the war, but we still fought hard. But I feel really bad about Princeton... Nnng, it's fine! We can do it!

So like, from now on I'm more than just your sidekick. I gotta learn how to be a partner to you too, for the rest of your life... I don't really know how to do that ♪ so you'll just have to speak up and tell me what to do~
I am Reno！
I'm doing good work...? Oooh! My hero complimented me! Of course my face is gonna turn bright red!
You think they're big too? They really get in the way...

You're the Commander? Ahh, I've always wanted to meet you! I mean, aren't people like you basically heroes trying to save the world? Which kind of makes me your sidekick, right? Oh, I'm Reno, part of the Oakland class! It's a pleasure!
Hah ha! I'm the Commander's sidekick!
Yeah! The good guys always win!
Craven was supposed to be cheer squad leader on account of she's older, but she ended up asking me to do it... I can't let her down. I gotta cheer hard!
This really is a huge clash of all the biggest names from all the factions. It's one exciting match after another! I gotta cheer my hardest too. Eagle Union, go get 'em!
Commander, you're just in time. The next match is about to start~
Commander, I got a great view of the games from here. Come watch with me~

Ah, it's half time. That means we better get out there and cheer! Everybody ready? Let's get their blood pumping!|None of the other factions have serious cheerleaders like me or Craven. But I won't underestimate the ones they came up with either... I can't let them beat me~|Look at them out there on the field, shining like superheroes as they fight for victory... being a cheerleader sure is amazing!
Commander, it's time to get your rewards, everyone's waiting for you to attend the ceremony~
Huh, you brought me water, Commander? Woaaahhh, no way...! Nng, my hero brought me water... I couldn't be happier...
Commander, people can see...
This really is a huge clash of all the biggest names from all the factions. It's one exciting match after another! I gotta cheer my hardest too. Eagle Union, go get 'em!
It was really hard to find a swimsuit that would fit my bust... Luckily, I was able to find this swimsuit at the last minute! It fits my chest perfectly, but... my poor hips are chafing... Ow...

"Superhero spin-off! The superhero who saved the world is enjoying a hard-earned vacation on the afternoon beach with the sidekick!" ... Hehe, Commander, a tagline like that sounds pretty cool, doesn't it?
Commander, are you in Sleep Mode? Then please, rest well! ...You don't have to worry about me. I've already rested for a bit, and I was thinking about heading out to make my rounds anyway!
*Click!* Welcome back, Commander! Heehee~ I couldn't stop myself from taking a picture of my beloved hero enjoying the beach!

Looks like everyone's pumped up for the beach volleyball tournament! If only my... weren't so big. They make it hard to move around...|Oh yeah. How dashing does My Hero look when swimming? Do you zoom by others while going at 100 miles per hour? Hehehe~| If you compete in the tournament, I'll cheer you on with all I've got! Go! Go! Come on! You can do it! M-Y-H-E-R-O!
If it isn't coconut milk! Is it okay to accept such a precious gift? ...Hehe. I'm absolutely elated to receive a precious present from my hero!
Woah?! I-If you touch it like that, it's going to snap!!

"Superhero spin-off! The superhero who saved the world is enjoying a hard-earned vacation on the afternoon beach with the sidekick!" ... Hehe, Commander, a tagline like that sounds pretty cool, doesn't it?
Reno, tired of seeing her commander fighting all alone, assumed an alter ego and joined the commander in the battle against the forces of evil! Pretty cool origin story, wouldn't you say?
Come on in, Commander! Don't you recognize me? I'm Reno Bunnino – cutesy bunny girl by day, villain-vanquishing superhero by night! Pretty neat concept, am I right?
When Reno Bunnino's beloved commander comes home to roost, that's her time to shine.
What can I get you, Commander?

So I was telling everyone about Reno Bunnino, and for whatever reason, North Carolina was super keen to hear it... Not like that's a bad thing. More friends is always good!|Hungry, Commander? Vestal taught me a handful of recipes. I could cook something up for you.|Y'know, I think this Reno Bunnino's thing really gonna take off. I'm counting on you to facilitate that, Commander.
This gauntlet I'm always wearing? Oh, uh, I've not made my Reno Bunnino tool belt just yet, so I'm making do with this for now.
If you're doing what I think you are... Yeah, sorry, there aren't many clothes my size.
Come on in, Commander! Don't you recognize me? I'm Reno Bunnino – cutesy bunny girl by day, villain-vanquishing superhero by night! Pretty neat concept, am I right?

"An unforeseen accident causes panic at the festival! That's when our plain-clothed superhero rises up to the task!" That'd be such a fun scenario! Although, obviously we'd all much prefer to have a peaceful holiday.
Check this out, Commander! Hehehe, I added a little firework launcher to my superhero gadgets. Cool, huh? ...Your interest lies more in my new look? But... the firework...
I've got a red envelope for you, Commander! Here you are! ...Hm? This is backwards? Usually you're the one giving these out?
Happy Spring Festival, Commander! The port looks great with all these paper lanterns decorating it! They give it this novel, cultured vibe. You know what I mean?

Hehe, check this out! Doesn't this outfit... kinda make me look like one of the Dragon Empery's wandering recluses?|Want me to show you my micro-firework again? Hehe, I'd be right happy to♪|Sorry, Ayanami. All my gadgets can do is shoot these little sparks. They can't fire real fireworks, lasers, or anything like that.
You wanna hold hands? Sure thing! Ah, wait, this one's still a bit hot! The other one!
Whaaa?! You're not supposed to lift this flap!
Check this out, Commander! Hehehe, I added a little firework launcher to my superhero gadgets. Cool, huh? ...Your interest lies more in my new look? But... the firework...
Enemy fleet in sight! All ships, fire at will!
All systems functioning properly. Do not worry, Commander.
Renown-class battlecruiser - Renown
The girls who went out on a commission have arrived. Please, let me go in their stead next time, Commander. I... don't like being on the receiving end of things.
Commander, you cannot continue like this.
Love letter? How does one love something like a letter? People love all sorts of things, but that one I cannot understand.
Commander, you always ask me to accompany you for walks. Is something bothering you?
... Why would you arrange candles in a heart on the beach? And then... why did you cry when I said "aren't you afraid of the fire being extinguished by the wind"?
Don't worry, I'm not that dense. Next time I will bring a cap and cover up the candles for you. Then you can tell me what is truly on your mind.
I will review this operation's performance and report back to you as soon as I can.
Speed is the best defense!
Commander, please give me your orders.
...I am sorry, Commander... I failed to live up to your expectations.
If you have time, please look over the mail.

No instructions, Commander? So we're using the, 'wait and see' strategy...?|My propeller? Hood bumped into me one day, and before I reacted I received this in apology.|What? You think Renown is cute...? Well, on her behalf, I give you my tha... Wait, what?!
Commander, we still have missions to complete!
Please, claim the mission rewards!

I am Renown, Battlecruiser of the Royal Fleet of the Royal Navy. I have experienced issues in both great wars, and have countless accomplishments for which I am proud. No matter what orders you give me, Commander, it is my duty to carry them out with all of my strength!

Wait, Commander... Let... let me find some candles...and make a heart... and some covers to prevent them from being blown out.... t-t-then I'll... Please... don't look at me! I must be making a very strange face right now!
Renown! Full speed ahead!
... It's a bit strange... Only you have ever done this to me, Commander...
...!! Commander! I do not intend to resist... but still...
Renown, Battlecruiser of the Royal Fleet of the Royal Navy, at your service. My guns shall aim where your sword points, Commander.
Your will is the source of my power.
Enemy fleet eliminated. Mission complete.
Vaporize anything that moves into ash!
Hi, Commander! I changed into something a little easier to move around in~
Renown-class battlecruiser - Repulse
You've made me stay with you inside, so, as your punishment, you'll have to accompany me to check up on the completed commissions. Let's go!
It's kinda boring being here with you... I'm heading out for a while!
It's so boring indoors! Being outdoors is so much better... Commander, don't you feel bad sitting around all day? Let's go out and get some fresh air!
My sister always says I'm too impatient, but I can't be bothered thinking everything through. Besides, you're always around, so I'll leave all the thinking to you, Commander!
Com~man~der! Gotcha! Hmm? I'm too close? Hey, what's the problem with that~ Anyway, come and play with me~!
You know, Commander, I am a girl after all. I'm not so crazy I'd defencelessly cling to someone I don't like. It's about time you noticed...
You can't rest right after reaching port! Go exercise more!
Hello, Commander! Let's go beat the heck out of our enemies!
Ahh, the enemy was so persistent that I'm starving now... There's no way we could've won like this...
Deliverygirl Repulse has arrived with your mail!
Hey! Com~man~der~! Let's get some exercise~!|You look strong, Commander. Want to spar sometime?|Huh? You think I'm impatient?
Missions! Missions! More missions!
Yes! Our rewards are here!

I'm Repulse, a Renown-class battlecruiser. I may not look like much, but I've been tons of places with the higher-ups! Though I prefer going out on my own! "Repairs"? Ahahaha, I'm hoping you won't keep me locked up indoors every day, Commander...
Huh?! You're happy with me? I'm not as elegant as some other royal girls, and I don't dress all that great... But when it comes to my feelings for you, I rank second to none!
Ready... fire!
Huh? I thought you'd be into softer girls than me...
Whoah! S-stop… You're awful! I'm a girl, you know!

I'm Repulse, a Renown-class battlecruiser. I participated in the pursuit of Bismarck, but we couldn't catch up to her. Ever since then I've been a part of Force Z... I don't ever want to see a torpedo again...
Commander, want to go take a stroll out to sea? I'll protect you!
Hooray! We won! Quick, decisive victories are my favourite.
Everyone, follow my lead!
voiceline.oath: I bear no grudges against you, but... Let the battle begin!

voiceline.line: You're not looking all too great... Is something on your mind? If there's something troubling you, please feel free to open up to me. It's not good to bottle things up inside...
R-class battleship – Revenge.
The girls are back from their commissions. Shall we go greet them together, Your Excellency?
Please, don't give in to despair! If you just reform yourself, there will surely be a day when you are accepted by everyone!
U-umm... Your Excellency, regarding the time I bumped into you when we first met... Are you truly alright? ...Should we get your body checked?

Protecting the weak is the duty of us Royal Knights—Uhh, I'm not saying that you're weak, Your Excellency. Though, when we're on the battlefield, you're definitely on the side of "having to be protected"...

Your Excellency, you always work so tirelessly for our sake... You really should try to make some time for yourself. When you do, I'll stroke your hair, and cheer you up, telling you things like, "Good work, Commander, you've done such a good job~"

Your Excellency, not only are you the most important person in this port, but you are also the most important person in my life. That's why your safety is paramount to me—whether here, or on the battlefield... I'll make sure to protect you with all I've got.
voiceline.oath: Your Excellency, I do not consider you to be weak—and as such, I don't protect you as a member of the Royal Knights, but as a woman who loves you. That is my simple wish, that which makes me happiest... O-of course, I plan on protecting you as a subordinate as well...

voiceline.line: Um, excuse me...
I'm relieved that you were able to make it back safely. For now, please get some rest.
voiceline.oath: I'm so relieved that you're alright... Thank goodness... I really wanted to be out there to make sure you were safe, you know? Ehe♪

voiceline.line: I won't back down... Hah!
Good morning, Your Excellency. Is there anything I can help out with today?
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Your Excellency. Hehehe, after seeing your face, I can't help but feel like today's going to be a great day.

voiceline.line: I guess I shouldn't have forced things so hard...
There is mail addressed to you, Your Excellency! Should I bring it to you right now?
voiceline.oath: Whew... I brought the mail over, Your Excellency.

voiceline.line: Eek?! I apologize, I didn't notice the papers on the table... I'll get to them right away!|Not so long ago, I accidentally bumped into a destroyer while hurrying along... I'm glad that neither of us were hurt, but...|If you spend too long working, your neck and shoulders are bound to become stiff. H-how about I give you a nice massage to help you loosen up?
voiceline.extra: That battleship from the Northern Parliament... is truly knowledgeable of the etiquettes of the Royal Navy. I am truly impressed.|If you're feeling tired, how about taking a rest for a bit? I shall be protecting Your Excellency by your side, so you need not worry.

voiceline.line: Is there a new mission? Please let me know any time if you would like my assistance.
Allow me to retrieve our rewards for the missions we've completed! ...Oh, I need to check the list first...?

I am Revenge, lead ship of the Royal Navy's Revenge-class battleships. I partook in the Jutland campaign, but since I participated mostly in escort missions afterward, I wasn't able to see too much action in that great war... I'm sorry... you must be disappointed to hear this.

*pant* *pant*... I heard you needed something from me, so I ran here as fast as I could... Wait—this is... a ring? N-no way, I-I-I-I'm sorry! This is so sudden, I don't know what to say... B-but, gladly! Of course!
I shall protect the Commander and my allies!
Did something urgent come up? Then, put it over there... Y-you just want to chat for a bit...? I'm sorry for jumping to conclusions...
voiceline.oath: So you want to chat? ...I-I apologize! You need something done immediately, don't you?

voiceline.line: That's a discourteous thing to do to a lady. Don't you agree, Your Excellency?
voiceline.oath: At least w-wait until we get somewhere else to do that...

voiceline.line: ...Woah?! S-sincerest apologies, I wasn't watching where I was going... Oh, you're the Commander? S-splendid! Battleship Revenge of the Royal Navy, at your service!
Thank you very much. I'll make sure to live up to your expectations.
Alright, let's keep this up!
voiceline.oath: I don't enjoy fighting, but... I'm doing this to protect those I care about!

voiceline.line: The Royal Maids and the Royal Knights both work hard to protect our allies. Volunteering like this renews my sense of purpose.
Hrmm... *sigh*... Looks like I bungled this one too... I sure hope the Commander doesn't see me like th– Hwuh?! C-Commander? P-please give me a moment! I'll straighten this out right away... Waaah!!
*pant* *pant*... Phew... I can't believe I'm getting this tired from just cleaning... Your Excellency... Why don't you also take a short break?
Welcome back, Your Excellency. As you can see, I'm currently in the middle of cleaning...
I can't believe I failed again... Waah...

Leave this to me... Eek! Your Excellency, I apologize... It wasn't on purpose, I swear!|The office is all tied up, the documents are organized as well... Alright! Both the Commander and Her Highness should be pleased with the results!|Your Excellency, I've learned how to brew proper black tea and make cookies from the Royal Maids... I-if there's a chance in the future, I'd like to...
I, I'm fine. Something like this is nothing a maid can't handle... Especially for a Maid-Knight like me!
H-how should I serve you at a time like this...
Hrmm... *sigh*... Looks like I bungled this one too... I sure hope the Commander doesn't see me like th– Hwuh?! C-Commander? P-please give me a moment! I'll straighten this out right away... Waaah!!
Fighting on the battlefield is so much easier than being a maid...
All ships, prepare for combat! For liberty and glory! Aux armes, marchons!
Place your faith in me. Follow my lead. Offer up your prayers. Seek the Lord. Only then will the path of God be opened...
voiceline.oath: I meet with Jean Bart every once in a while. We don't talk much, and simply focus on whatever we're doing at the moment. Even so, I feel like we understand each other very well. It's something to be happy about.

voiceline.line: Richelieu-class battleship – Richelieu.
I'd like to report that the commissions have been safely completed, and that fleet operations are running smoothly. You've done a good job, Commander.
Those who refuse to stop marching shall face the path of ruin... Make sure you keep that in mind.

The one you are talking to was once despisingly called many things: the calamity that brought on war, the fearsome Cardinal, and the maniac possessed by religious fervor. I ask of you: when you look at me, what do you see in me?

Commander, please have a seat. What would you like to drink? ...There's no need to be on guard. Even someone like me lives an ordinary life when not on duty or performing religious rites. A person cannot live on faith alone. Sometimes, you just need a drink or two. Hehe.
You've come by again. Haven't you been getting too friendly with me? ...Just kidding. I'm truly grateful to have another person that I can chat casually with. I hope that you feel the same way, too.

The feeling of distance between people is an interesting thing indeed. A superior officer and their subordinate. The leader of a fleet and the highest post of the organization. A warship and... Hehe. For the time being, let's let the others continue misunderstanding our relationship, okay?
voiceline.oath: Whether you or I care more for the other is inconsequential. I feel more than happy enough just feeling our close bond together like this. Thank you for always being by my side.

voiceline.line: May Heaven confer upon you its blessings.
Mission complete. The fleet has safely returned to the port. Good work, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back. Thanks to you, everyone's safe and sound. I'm truly grateful.

voiceline.line: There is... still hope...!
Bonjour, Commander. Please relax and drink this tea while I carry out my morning prayers.
voiceline.oath: Bonjour, Commander. Please relax and enjoy this tea while I finish my morning prayers.

voiceline.line: Is this... also a trial from Heaven...?
Letters are blessings from other people.

I believe that any obstacle can be overcome with fervent faith and untiring efforts.|Those round little creatures... If I recall correctly, Algérie told me they're called "Meowfficers."|Have I met the Royal Navy yet? Yes. I hope to deepen our bond, so I'm bringing some wine to the next tea party.|Please make use of my precious allies, the Iris Templar Knights, at your discretion. After all, one of their missions is to fight for peace.|The relationship between those from the Eagle Union and those from the Iris Libre is a bit... Well, I get the feeling that Jean Bart would get along with them just fine, though.
voiceline.oath: The practice of faith is not an easy path to walk. Discipline is required for enlightenment, and the path is sometimes accompanied by suffering and even self-sacrifice. | Commander, I have a question. Is there a way to get these "Meowfficers" to like me as much as they like being cuddled by you? |nil| Please, do not forget. The warriors from Vichya are also Iris Libre's brethren.

voiceline.line: Missions may be called a kind of trial. If you take them on with the proper attitude, there is no need to worry.
The reward for those who work hard is Heaven's grace. Let us accept it gratefully.

I am Richelieu, the lead ship of the Richelieu class. During my history as a ship, I lived through good times and bad times, and I also witnessed the rise and fall of my homeland... This time, I hope to protect all that is dear to me up until the end. Together with this fleet, I strive for liberty and peace...
As the one who guides Iris Libre, I cannot make an oath solely to you. However, I vow to protect and support you for as long as I live. This, I vow, on the holy name of Iris...
Accept your divine judgment!
Please listen to our prayers closely, Commander.
voiceline.oath: It's time for worship. Please wait here patiently.

voiceline.line: If nothing else, your audacity is commendable.
voiceline.oath: If you would like to touch me, I would prefer it if you took a different approach.

voiceline.line: I am Richelieu, Cardinal of Iris Libre. If you too will fight for freedom and faith, then I shall bring you victory, Commander.
At times, might is needed to guide others on the right path. I give you my thanks.
May the wandering souls drifting about the battlefield find eternal peace and salvation... Amen...

Iris' teachings do not go as far as to forbid its followers from spreading their wings. Let us enjoy today with everyone to our heart's content. Consider this as yet another of Heaven's many blessings.
This swimsuit... Yes, the one Émile picked out for me, seems a bit skimpy... I didn't think she'd be the type to trick me into wearing something like this, but... Commander, where are you looking?
We have a really good view from up here. I can even see a commission group starting to return out there.

Walking together on the beach like this while basking our ears in the sounds of the sea... Agréable. Hehehe, this is quite a rare experience. Commander ... Thanks for being with me. I'll cherish this moment.
I don't wish for my absence to become a burden on you, Commander. If there's anything I can help with, please let me know.
Scenery that calms the heart... Commander, you've got good taste.

Commander, I'll be heading to the beach for a bit. ... Hehe. Indeed, this is a bit different from how I am usually. Would you like to come along with me? | Frozen treats are most effective against hot and humid weather like this... Shall we ask Dunkerque to prepare some more next time? | Jean Bart... Perhaps it's better to spend some more time with her... Sigh... |nil|nil
My... Where are you taking me, Commander?
If you know what's good for you, I wouldn't assume that a girl is defenseless just because she's in a swimsuit.
This swimsuit... Yes, the one Émile picked out for me, seems a bit skimpy... I didn't think she'd be the type to trick me into wearing something like this, but... Commander, where are you looking?
Believe, atone, and pray. Seek a new day... that you may grasp hold of your happiness, and the road to the light.

Commander, I wish you a Happy New Year. May you avail yourself of the period of repose that follows the culmination of the year's duties. I pray that you and everyone else may receive the blessing of the Heavens.
It seems the commissions team made it back safely. This counts as good fortune, doesn't it?

Settle down. Let us pray together. If I listen to your prayers and you listen to mine, you will come to understand that we are heading toward the same goal. Let us walk toward the light. You and I, together...
Please calm down and ponder what we should do. I'll be waiting right over here.
It looks like you went out to take a glimpse of the morning sun. I look forward to being in your company today, Commander.
So this is what the Sakura Empire's New Year's greeting cards look like... How interesting. Hehehe.

nil|nil|What these fortunes tell may be your fate. Even so, is it not mankind's strength to overcome fate?|Shh. Lower your voice. I'm trying to get this one to warm up to Jean Bart.|Béarn, is it already time? ...Yes, I made a promise earlier to visit the shrine with everyone else. How would you like to come with us?
You'd like to sit by my side? Up we go... Good kitty... Alright, here you go, Commander.
Is this a greeting... for the New Year?

Commander, I wish you a Happy New Year. May you avail yourself of the period of repose that follows the culmination of the year's duties. I pray that you and everyone else may receive the blessing of the Heavens.
Alrighty, let's do some warm-ups!
Commander, do you need anything? You can always chat with me if you're free.
Omaha-class light cruiser - Richmond, Hull Number CL-9!
Commander, you can stare at me all day if you want, but just know that a commission has been completed.
Seems like I have to find another place...
I've been to a lot of places, but this is the first time I've ever seen a fleet with girls from all around the world. This is so interesting!
Commander~ I only just joined this fleet and there's still plenty I don't know yet. So, could I ask you to accompany me on a short walk?
This fleet is great! And you're awesome too, Commander! Let me tell you about myself... First thing: after that World War just before this one, I was...
Commander, I've seen a lot during my time in this world, but there's still one thing I haven't experienced yet since I don't have a partner...
You look so cool coming right off the battlefield, Commander!
Commander, did you do anything interesting while you were away for so long? You should bring me along next time~!
Oh no, we lost... Well that sucks~
Commander, I checked the mail box and brought your mail along with my own~
Commander, you've got something on your lips... Got it!|I'd love to be able to see everyone from all over the world~!|Lots of my sisters have survived through this war. Impressive, right?
♪Mission here, mission there♪ Being a commander is so much work. Let me help you!
Teehee~ Our rewards have arrived, Commander! ... Or would you rather get a passionate hug from me instead?

I'm Richmond of the Omaha-class. Because I'm an old model, I was mainly tasked with things like escorts and transport. Although my performance is nothing to brag about, you can say that I've seen a lot of action! Feel free to ask me anything whenever you have questions~!

That's right, I was talking about love! ... And the things that follow! I've never met a suitable candidate, at least until I met you~! When I accept this, it'll mean you agree to be my partner as well, right~?
Let me show you what a difference experience makes!
Do you like getting physical too, Commander?
Com~man~der~
Hi! Are you the commander? That's great~! I'm Richmond. Hit me up whenever you feel like~!
Teehee~ This feels good~
Teamwork makes the dream work! Yay!
I've got to do this as well!
voiceline.oath: This time, it's my turn to fight.

voiceline.line: What's the matter, Commander? Eh, you wanted some coffee? Um, what's gotten into you... Well, come on in, I guess...
voiceline.oath: Your coffee, Commander. Thanks for waiting so patiently. How does it taste?

voiceline.line: Um, my name is Rikka Takarada. I'm still a bit confused about what's going on, but... I guess for the time being, I'm in good hands.
Oh, the girls are back. Hang on, I'll go greet them.
Ah... Um...
Ugh, I bought the wrong flavor of soda... Oh hey, Commander. Were you thirsty by any chance?
Hum hum~♪ Oh, good morning, Commander. Hehe, yeah, I'm in a pretty good mood...
Oh hey, Commander, there you are... I've been looking for you. Here, you dropped this pen outside your office earlier today.
At first, I was confused about the whole fighting-in-another-world thing, but I think I've gotten the hang of it. I owe it to everyone here, as well as to you...
voiceline.oath: Back then, I wasn't able to fight the enemy head-on. But this time, I have the power to help others. Now, I swear to fight for you and everyone else.

voiceline.line: Um... Did you need me?
Good job out there. Want me to whip up a latte to help you relax?
I might've slipped up... but I can still do this!
Oh, good morning. You're unusually early today.
voiceline.oath: Y'know, It sure feels weird not having to go to school in the morning...

voiceline.line: No way, I messed up?! Hurry up and retreat, everyone!
Huh, there's something in the mailbox addressed to you, Commander... People still send letters this day and age?

Huh. There's even a school over here... I'm sure you learn different stuff, but it's pretty neat how similar our worlds are.|Huh? Where'd Namiko and Hass wander off to? Jeez... I came all the way from the other side of port to look for them...|Oh, Commander, have you seen Akane? I thought we were going to hang out and all...
voiceline.extra: Excuse me... Oh, huh. You're asleep already? Work must've been tough. I'll be waiting here until you wake up.|The shops here really have everything. I wish we had something like this back where I'm from.|This PC's not turning on? Hm, let's check if it's plugged in... (*thump*) What's wrong? Why do you look like you saw a ghost?

voiceline.line: You're still not done yet? Fine, fine... Just let me know if there's anything I can help with.
voiceline.oath: Please continue working. I'll brew something for you to drink, so stay focused until the very end.

voiceline.line: Good job. Looks like our rewards are in too, so make sure you don't lose track of it.
voiceline.oath: Well done. Since you worked so hard, why not take a little break?

voiceline.line: My name is Rikka Takarada. My family runs a pawn shop with a café, where I sometimes help out. At least I know how to brew coffee properly.

When I first landed in this world, confused and lost, everyone here extended their hospitality to me. Especially you, Commander. I hope you'll continue to do everything you can to keep this place special.
There's... something even I can do...!
Huh, you need help with work? I was going to head to the shop, but... Well, fine, I guess. What'd you need?
Just so you know, that's called sexual harassment.
voiceline.oath: Whaaa?! What's the meaning of this?!

voiceline.line: Um, my name is Rikka Takarada. I'm still a bit confused about what's going on, but... I guess for the time being, I'm in good hands.
Huh, so I'm capable of doing stuff like this too... Thanks, Commander.
Phew... I somehow managed to pull through.
voiceline.oath: Thank goodness... Everyone's safe and sound.

voiceline.line: A brand new look, a long train ride... All that's missing is a partner to keep me company. Yeah, as if...
The train still isn't here yet? ...Oh, what a coincidence to see you here, Commander. Where were you headed?
Here, Commander. Do you prefer juice or tea?
Mm-hmm~ What lovely weather. Wonder where I should go today~

I've got nothing else to do 'til the train arrives... Oh, that's right. The other day, I went to play with some of the girls back at the port...|Huh, look at all the pigeons gathering around. Well, I guess that's one way to beat the heat...|I wonder where I'll end up if I take this train to the end of the line. Well, being in a different world and all that makes me curious...
Hum hum~♪ Oh, it looks like the train is finally about to arrive.
Wh-what do you think you're trying to do in public?! There's no way you'd normally be able to get away with this!
The train still isn't here yet? ...Oh, what a coincidence to see you here, Commander. Where were you headed?
Everyone, let's stay sharp!
voiceline.oath: My preliminary investigation was right on the mark!

voiceline.line: It's important you closely read an idol's bio to grasp all her strengths. Take all the time you need.
voiceline.oath: You'd like to get to know me better? My bio should have all the essential information, but okay... What do you want to know?

voiceline.line: Pleased to meet you. My name is Ritsuko Akizuki. I was wondering what was going to happen to me when I suddenly got blown away, but... In any case, I'm pleased to make your acquaintance!
Those girls are back from their commission. Hellooo? It's time to get up and welcome them back, Commander!
What about our last concert could we improve on...? Oh, excuse me, but I don't have the time right now.
Ah, Commander! Just who I was looking for. Do you have a full-length mirror anywhere? I could really use one for dance rehearsal.
Well done today, Commander. You're keeping yourself busy as always. Say, do you need help with something? I've got some spare time right now.
Your job description has a lot in common with that of a producer's. I feel I could learn new things by watching you, actually... Would you mind letting me do that, when you have time?
I've learned so much and gained experience I never would've otherwise by watching you work. I feel my horizons have expanded to the point I can come up with novel new strategies!
voiceline.oath: You fell asleep again, didn't you, Commander? Now, now, it's time to get up. Actually... Seeing as you've been swamped with work recently, I guess I'll let you off the hook this once.

voiceline.line: Goodness gracious, your hair is even messier than mine, Commander. Please, for your own sake, pay a little more attention to your appearance!
Good to see you back, Commander. Take a moment to relax before our next task.
I'm not giving up until it's over...!
Let's have a look at our schedule and see what we have to do today, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Good morning. Have you had breakfast yet? You can't live life without basic routines!

voiceline.line: I suppose this means my prediction was wrong... I'll have to fix the kinks in the system!
There's new mail for you. Best to read it now, before you forget.

Oops. Sorry for spacing out, Commander. I'm juggling several things at once right now...|It's good we all came here together, but that means things are as hectic as ever... Hey! Ami! Mami! Get back here! What are those shovels for?!|If we spruce up our choreography a bit, it should take our performance to the next level. Let's do it! We'll rehearse it for our next show!
voiceline.extra: Are you feeling worn out, Commander? You should get some rest, in that case. We all need breaks sometimes.|This port is home to girls from all kinds of places, huh? Every time I talk to them, I feel my perspective of the world grow.|Having a hard time there, Commander? I could help, if you want. Don't worry, I know what to do. I've done plenty of office work before.

voiceline.line: There's still work left for us to do! Chop-chop! Let's wrap it up quick!
voiceline.oath: There's still work to be done. I'll assist you, so let's get right to it.

voiceline.line: Great! You've finished that task. Don't forget to claim the rewards.
voiceline.oath: Wow! You're quite the diligent one, Commander.

voiceline.line: My name's Ritsuko Akizuki. I always give everything my best shot! And that includes working as an idol at this port. On a related note... Wow, you have a lot of shipgirls with potential starpower!
The things I've learned here will prove invaluable for my career, moving forward. So, allow me to say it once again: Thank you for everything, Commander!
It's showtime!
You need a hand with your work? Of course! I'll make sure everything comes out looking flawless!
Commander! Your time is better spent on doing work than doing... that!
voiceline.oath: Eek! What do you think you're doing, Commander?! You need to learn some decency. Sit down so I can lecture you.

voiceline.line: Pleased to meet you. My name is Ritsuko Akizuki. I was wondering what was going to happen to me when I suddenly got blown away, but... In any case, I'm pleased to make your acquaintance!
Steady progress! Everything is going exactly according to plan!
We've completed the job. Just as I predicted!
voiceline.oath: It's all thanks to me? Please, you're giving me way too much credit!

voiceline.line: It's important to stay hydrated and replenish your electrolytes when exercising in the heat. Otherwise you could get a heatstroke!
Sorry, what? A paddle showdown? Commander, please... You play that in a kimono, not a yutaka. But if you insist... If I win, you're buying me an ice cream!
How about we take a quick break? And no, before you ask: I'm NOT conceding the match. We'll pick up where we left off after I've had some water!
Good morning. Just give me a moment while I roll up my futon... Wait, I said wait! You can't come in yet!

Exercising? Indoors? In the middle of summer? I mean... It's better than doing it under the sweltering sun, but not by a lot...|The ventilation in here actually isn't half-bad. You just part the sliding doors and it gets almost as cool as an air-conditioned room... Okay, maybe that's an exaggeration...|Are you all right? You look like you're about to pass out. Knowing you, you're probably pushing yourself too hard. Here, take this sports drink.
Check out this serve! ...Heheh! Another point to me! It's still not too late to give up, Commander!
Eek! H-hey! It's not okay to do that stuff in the heat of the game!
Sorry, what? A paddle showdown? Commander, please... You play that in a kimono, not a yutaka. But if you insist... If I win, you're buying me an ice cream!
Mmm... I'm looking forward to everyone finishing their work too~!
Need me to explain the details?
Nelson-class battleship – Rodney, Hull Number 29!
Hehe, Commander. The girls are back from commission!
Even I'm a bit disappointed...
The weather is pretty nice. Want to take a walk, Commander? Let's relax and chat for a while. What do you think?
Commander sure is gentle, always slowing down to match my pace when we're taking walks... I'm moved by details like this.
Not respecting the chain of command can mean big trouble, it has happened before……Of course it's ok for us since we're so close~

Commander, want to have dinner together tonight? I'll make your favorite dish... Hmm? it's not a holiday or something like that... I just thought of it just now... If you want, Commander, we can do it every night~.
Let me make a cup of tea~
Can I increase my firepower?
Ah, Commander, you're back! I was just tidying up the documents, please have a look.
I can still fight... but we should probably retreat, for now...
I've brought your new mail, Commander.
I'm here to help you with anything you need.|If the Commander doesn't mind, please allow me to keep you company!|Commander, if you keep slacking off, even I will get angry.
Commander, shall we complete our new mission?
Here are your mission rewards. Let's take a look!

I'm Nelson's little sister, Rodney! Um... us sisters are pretty famous right?
 Erm, you've heard that my fighting style is unbefitting of my appearance? Well well, Commander, such rumors are, of course, false~
Everyday I spend with the Commander is a special day, I hope days like these will last forever.
There's no need to be polite when dealing with enemies.
What is it?
Please don't do this in the command room...
Hello, I'm Rodney. I shall be in your care from this day forward.
I hope you're looking forward to my performance from here on out!
Hmm, I think I accidentally wasted a lot of ammunition...
Don't be shy, Commander~ Come on, come on over here~ How do you feel? Are my hands too cold?
Although it's a gift from the Commander, it's still embarrassing to wear this....Commander, do you think you could teach me how to swim?
It's so hot... I can't imagine doing any work! Commander, how about we take a cold shower together??
Beach volleyball? But I finally got a chance to be intimate with you...I'll PASS~|I'll love whatever gifts you give me!|I'm wiped out. So much swimming! Commander... can you carry me home?
Commander, could you put some sunscreen on my back?
How's that? The feeling of a bona-fide Big Seven
Even if it's the Commander's gift, wearing it is pretty embarrassing. Commander, want to teach me how to swim?
It is time for me to carry out my duties once more!
Perhaps I should hold up a fan like this? ...Like this? *click* Oh, great advice, Commander! Akashi said that changed the mood of the shoot completely, ehehe.

Miss Akashi, shall I look at the camera next? Understood. Oh, Commander, I did not expect you to grace us with your presence here as well! Yes, the photoshoot is proceeding smoothly. By the way, is there a favorite pose you'd like to see?
Welcome back. What you're smelling right now is the fragrance of Dragon Empery tea... Yes, my friends here recommended it to me.
I was delighted just to have you stop by, but I can't believe you even brought me refreshments... How about I pour you a cup of tea as well?

It's my first time wearing clothes like these, so I'm trying to figure out the perfect way to show off my legs... Commander? Hehe, have you been enchanted?|You're worried that I might be feeling cold? Well... how about you check by holding my hand?|Long photoshoots really are quite tiring... Commander, how about going for some coffee together after we wrap this up?
Thank you so much for helping me put this fur on!
We're still not done with the photoshoot~ Hehe~♪

Miss Akashi, shall I look at the camera next? Understood. Oh, Commander, I did not expect you to grace us with your presence here as well! Yes, the photoshoot is proceeding smoothly. By the way, is there a favorite pose you'd like to see?
I'll have to check on our inventory of ammo when we get back.
I have paperwork, practice, and dinner to see to today. The more burdens I can take off your mind, the happier it makes me~
I never imagined that this dreamlike situation would come to pass... Commander, have you also been looking forward to sharing this moment with me? Hehe~
Care to have dinner with me tonight, Commander? I know all your favourite dishes~
Well strategised, Commander. Wait just a minute while I go brew some tea.
My heart is at rest when I see you happy, Commander~

Every day with you is a day worth celebrating... Hmm, phrases like these feel rather cheesy, so I'll keep them to a minimum. Knowing you, you already know how I feel, Commander.|Each minute you slack off is one less minute of the day we'll have together. Please try to stay focused, for both our sakes.|Commander, do you have any plans for the next naval holiday? If not... we could go on a date somewhere. What do you say?
I've read that physical intimacy deepens a relationship the more you do it~
Please, let's put this on hold until we're alone, all right?
I never imagined that this dreamlike situation would come to pass... Commander, have you also been looking forward to sharing this moment with me? Hehe~
That's why you shouldn't underestimate a Big 7!
*Giggle*... You saw me, and now you're trying to flee...? Do you really think you can flee from ME?!
Commander, do you have any interests outside of work? If you're okay with it, why don't we relax together?
Heavy cruiser – Roon.
Those commission girls must work really hard... Okay, everyone line up~ I'm going to give each of you a hug~
Commander... YOU WILL PAY!
How I'm faring at the base? Perfectly fine. Although... isn't it a little too peaceful here...?
It is our destiny to kill one another on the battlefield... So, wouldn't you say it's normal to revel in the killing just a little bit?
Ahhh... The feeling of tearing apart enemies with gunfire... and breaking them into a million little pieces... I can't get enough of it... You know how I feel, don't you, Commander?
*Giggle*, I get more fulfillment from being with you than from killing enemies on the battlefield... Is this the power of love? But then...
I want to pummel some enemies, too~ *Giggle*... The more of them you sink, the more you prove your worth, after all~
You dare hurt me...? YOU WILL PAY!
This place is so peaceful. Everyone's so nice, too...
Aww... Did we fall prey to an ambush...?
It's not any bad news, is it?

Every time I see something beautiful get squashed on the battlefield, I just... Aahhh...|I want to do something to soothe your mind. But... what should I do...|What my hobby is? Perhaps something like "granting sweet release"?
What might this next mission be? I'm getting a little excited.
Let's give our all on the next mission, too.

I am Roon, the Iron Blood cruiser. In a far-off world, I never existed beyond the drawing board... But that aside, I've seen it, Commander... Deep within your heart, there's something that resembles me...

Thank you so much. But listen, I finally understand now. What filled the void in my heart wasn't slaughter on the battlefield or love, it was the hatred known as "envy"... Commander, I love you just as much as I deeply, deeply, DEEPLY hate those other girls... THEY WILL PAY!
Don't…look down on me!!
Please open your mouth, Commander... *Giggle*, do you like it? Have I gotten better at cooking?
Hm? Do you want a hug, too? Okay~
I never thought I'd end up here... Hello, I am Roon. I don't know this place very well, so could I ask you to give me a tour?
Thank you for that, Commander.
Not only did you not sink yourselves upon seeing me, you even forced me to sink you myself... YOU WILL PAY!
You're just in time, I needed to blow off a little steam!
Did my dress catch your attention, Commander? ... But when I think about you looking at the other girls' dresses, I just...
Such a delightful party with our wonderful friends in this peaceful harbor... It's wonderful, really... But, it's all so boring...
Hah hah... it's not often we have a party. Let's enjoy ourselves, Commander.

When you see something so perfect and beautiful, don't you just feel the urge to... crush it?|Commander, I picked out this dress specifically for the occasion. Don't you feel like it... completes you?| All this merriment is making me nauseous... Commander, can you let me sortie when we get back?
Are you having a good time, Commander? ... Me? Oh I'm just happy to see you~
Commander... I think you can get closer than that...
Such a delightful party with our wonderful friends in this peaceful harbor... It's wonderful, really... But, it's all so boring...
Hehehe... That was another lovely "banquet."
How DARE you ruin my special moment with the Commander!
Mainz's favorite coffee is a nice party drink, though I think I still prefer Iron Blood beer. What do you prefer, Commander?
It's so nice getting away from the bustling party hall and being alone with you, Commander. I'm eager to see what we'll do now as your idea of a... "break"~
I can see the commission team all the way from up here. Well? Are you heading out to greet them?

Ah, so this is what you meant by "a break." It certainly is a cure for boredom, and I am happy to have some alone time with you, buuut... (I know you're trying to keep me in check, and you're going to pay for that♥)
Welcome back! Let's give you a nice, waaarm hug♪
Good timing, actually – the party was starting to bore me. Thanks for pulling me out, Commander~

While I like vistas as much as the next person, I'm awfully fed up with the port's scenery at this point. Battlefields differ in that regard... Ahh... I'll never tire of seeing them.|Heehee~ Don't you worry, I'm not going anywhere. Why would I, when it's you who brought me here?|Since we have access to a piano, could you help me work on my singing? I'm starting to feel restless from sitting around for too long... Heehee~
Oh, you're back already? Then please, come here and let your heart be soothed♪
Go on – we're all alone here~♥
It's so nice getting away from the bustling party hall and being alone with you, Commander. I'm eager to see what we'll do now as your idea of a... "break"~
Heehee... Now that's what I'd call a good "break"~
You stand in our way...? Then you will suffer!
Everyone is enjoying these idol activities, but aren't you forgetting about our weapons? I shouldn't worry about them...?
Heavy cruiser Roon, reporting for idol activities and associated experimental equipment testing. Today, we fight not with fire and sword, but with the power of song.
The commission girls are back. Would you like to try, Commander? Line up for hugs, everyone~
Would you like to be my "enemy," Commander...? Hehehe... hehehehehehe...!!!
Everyone is working so hard at this idol business, for your sake~ Me? Of course I am~ My smile and my joy, it's all for you, Commander... Hehehe♪
I feel a certain emptiness after working at this idol thing for a while... Maybe it's the combat... could it be because I can't sink as many as I used to...?
Knowing that the Commander is watching me sing brings some fulfillment to my empty heart. Maybe... as you give me your time, you also give me your life... is that the feeling?
I thought slaughtering my enemies was the only way to make me feel better, but you taught me another way, Commander. I never thought you'd be able to change me. You really must... pay for that♡
Headpats, is it~?
Well fought. I got you a little something to eat, just as a way of saying thanks for all the training~
You're in the way... and you will pay!
Commander, what am I doing today? Orders please.
Hm... I still think we should be fighting with conventional weapons.
You've got mail~ I wonder what's inside?

First I heal everyone with my soothing song, then I shred them with its power. Hehehe, I know how it works.|That Sakura girl, she's fragile; she can't take many hits... What can I do to help her?|I must pour my heart into my song... I may not be very good, but I'll try my best.
A combat mission? Yes! I'd love to join~
You've been working just as hard as me. Good job, Commander~

I am Iron Blood Cruiser Roon. I'm currently equipped with special "Muse System" rather than my usual loadout. It's definitely "special," but it is combat ready, and I can't wait to tear something apart with it. Thank you for this, Commander.

"Something too perfect and beautiful to destroy."――I never knew my concert could be so great. I want to perform more, to shine more, to take more and more of your time, Commander... until it runs out♪ Hehehe...
Get out of my way...!
You want a hug? Sure, any time~
Let's enjoy some "intimacy" a little later~
Heavy cruiser Roon, reporting for idol activities and associated experimental equipment testing. Today, we fight not with fire and sword, but with the power of song.
There is something intruiging about using sound as a weapon~
Oooh this feeling... when I tear them to pieces...!
Show them no mercy!
Peace is something worth protecting at any cost.
Aircraft carrier Ark Royal, at your service. I hereby vow to lend you my strength for as long as you harbour honourable ambitions!
Our companions risked much to bring back those resources. They deserve acknowledgement. Let us go see them, Commander.
Let me offer a word of advice, if you'll even listen: turn around and leave while you still can, Commander.
You need someone to escort the little destroyers, do you? I can certainly do it, but I could just as well do any other mission. I'm ready to sortie at all times.
A ship who's lost her way is fated to go under. The same is true for people. Do you have the strength to keep yourself on the right course, Commander?
Your outstanding expertise and determination are truly awe-inspiring. I have no doubt you can lead this fleet to places nobody would've expected.
Put your mind to rest, Commander. Wherever your destination may be, I will follow you to it. Be they towering waves or colossal icebergs, whatever obstacles we encounter, I will tear them down!
Have no fear. I am always ready for orders!
I will not be defeated!
Ready to face another day? Splendid!
Don't bet on all future battles ending in your safe escape.
You've received a new letter? Best to read it now, then. Do not live in ignorance of the latest happenings.

One should protect their loved ones, that is abundantly clear. In the case of the little destroyers, even more so.|My strengths lie in outranging the opponent. But, of course, I am no slouch in close-range combat either.|Developing new tactics for the fleet, are you? Do you need my expertise?
One of your most important duties is to accomplish the missions assigned to you. Don't forget that, Commander.
A mission's been completed. Excellent.
We are both soldiers, you and I. We fight to protect our loved ones. Whatever desolate wastes the streams of fate carry you to, never forget your duty.
Is this for me? Ah... I understand. Then on this day, I vow to follow wherever you go. I'm eager to see what awaits us at the end. Hahaha!
You cannot escape me!
I see no resolve in your eyes! Shape up! ...There, that's better. Hahaha.
This is not the time nor place for this kind of behaviour...
Aircraft carrier Ark Royal, at your service. I hereby vow to lend you my strength for as long as you harbour honourable ambitions!
I need to become stronger to protect what I must!
Flee to the ends of the world if you so want, I will still hunt you down!
I've been pent up for a while. You'd better believe I'm going to give you a piece of my mind!

I learned the power of submarines firsthand in that great war. While it's too late to turn back now, I can't help but wonder how I would be perceived if I hadn't been remodeled into an aircraft carrier.
Ryuuhou-class light aircraft carrier – Ryuuhou.
The commissions have been completed. I shall go ahead and greet them first. ...I hope their bounty is plentiful.
Commander, for some reason, you seem really unapproachable...
The sea of the Sakura Empire is nostalgic, but I also have murky and mixed feelings about it... No, that's got nothing to do with me right now. Focus, focus.
Commander, are you interested in things like commendations or admonishments? ...N-No, it's nothing. I was just curious...
I take pride in the honor I have earned with my two hands. And that honor becomes fuel for further progress. ...Th-Thus, Commander, I implore you to send me out on sorties more often!

Commander, because I have been by your side, I have been able to demonstrate my true ability. Thus, would it be okay to be my true self when I am beside you...? M-My true self usually leaks out quite often? I-Is that so?!
Good work, Commander. Let's take a short break. ...But you shouldn't rest for too long, because we're going to review some battles right after this!
Ugh, at a time like this...!
You have kept me waiting... No, it's nothing. I can deal with this.
voiceline.oath: You've kept me waiting this whole time... Commander, have you not eaten yet? Sh-shall I prepare something for you?

voiceline.line: I-I shall let you win just this once!
A letter has arrived. I'm curious about its contents... Are you not?

Looking after submarines is really rough... Th-This is from personal experience, so please believe me! | It's in my personality to not care what humans may think about me. This is the attitude that us warships ought to have as warriors.|From time to time, I become envious of the standard carriers... If only... I could be as strong as them...
voiceline.oath: nil|Commander, wouldn't it be best to ask for others' opinions every once in a while? I'm not the jealous type, you know.|I pledged to bring you victory, so please sortie me more often! ...I, I also want to attain victory for my own sake as well!

voiceline.line: A new mission... If it's a directive from the top brass, let's take care of it right away.
voiceline.oath: Hurry up and finish the new missions. Otherwise, people will say that I'm not carrying out my duties as secretary ship.

voiceline.line: We were able to handle the mission flawlessly thanks to your hard work, Commander.

While I was able to set sail many times during my time both as a submarine tender and as a light carrier, in the end, I was unable to take even a single step away from port... No, nothing will happen if I just sit around like this. As I have stated many times, I, Ryuuhou, will bring you victory!
I, Ryuuhou, vow to be at your side, through thick and thin... W-Well then, from now on, I will not hide any part of myself from you, so prepare yourself... okay?
Victory is in my grasp...!
Commander, are you able to fathom this majestic outfit that impeccably balances both beauty and dignity?
Wicked thoughts, begone!

Remodeled Taigei-class Submarine Tender, Zuihou-class Light Carrier Ryuuhou, reporting for duty. I will strive to bring you victory, Commander! Yes, this time, I won't be held back by failures on my path to victory!
I'm truly grateful for your kindness, Commander.
Unperturbed by both victory and defeat. This is my pride as a member of the Sakura Empire... hehe!
voiceline.oath: Fantastic! We won!! ...What is it?! Am I not allowed to be proud of our accomplishments?

voiceline.line: Full force ahead for the Commander's victory!
I control my carrier-based planes with this charm... A carrier cannot fight a foe face-to-face after all. This katana is merely a last resort.
Commander, everyone seems to be busy with end-of-year preparations. If there is anything I can do to help, please let me know.
You can leave the purification to me if Fusou and Yamashiro are both busy, all right? After all, I happen to be quite knowledgeable about that subject.
Good work, Commander. Please allow me to prepare the hamaya!

The thing about Junyou is... Well, Commander, if something's bothering you, you can consult me, you know? | Because I'm in Shigure's debt, I cook her some food from time to time. She's really a good girl, even if she doesn't always act like one. | Commander, would you like to write an Ema? Even if your wishes don't get fulfilled, it's still great to just be able to write down your thoughts.
Hehe... Commander, are you here to enjoy some sweet sake as well? Don't worry, you won't get drunk...
...W-What are you planning...?
Commander, everyone seems to be busy with end-of-year preparations. If there is anything I can do to help, please let me know.
Now, count up your sins!
Milord, we cannot survive unless we fight!
Ryuujou-class Light Carrier - Ryuujou
Worldly things are of little significance! The only things that matter are spirit and resilience!
No matter where you are, the top brass is all the same...
Milord, when it comes to war, victory is more important than good or evil!
Commander, feel free to rely on me as you please. Should you will it, I will execute any command.
Commander, did you prepare this meal for me by yourself? In that case, I'll be more than glad to dig in! Mm... thanks for the food! Eh? You'll continue to cook for me when I come back!?
Just being able to see your face before I sortie fills me to the brim with energy and makes me feel like I can't lose to anyone!
Don't break formation even when we head back to port! The glory of the Sakura Empire is in its meticulousness!
My life is burning bright!
A day off? Milord, my week only consists of Monday, Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, and Friday!
Ugh... my body is all beat up...
A telegram? Oh, it's not a combat report from Headquarters. I suppose there might be some value to reading it then.

Odango... these delicacies will cause my heart to waver, so... Um, I suppose I can reward myself a little.... Mmmh! So delicious! |When you're stressed out, you should go watch the fish swimming around peacefully in the aquarium. I'm not sure why, but it always calms me down. |I fight for a just cause! No matter who stands before me, I swear to give it my all!
A new mission is here! Whether it's combat or training, let's knock it out at the speed of sound!
The mission rewards are here! A bagel? Is this a snack for me? Thank you, Milord. Well then, let's move out!

I am Ryuujou of the Sakura Empire, a seasoned warrior who has served in the First through Fourth Carrier Divisions, and participated in campaigns in the Phillipines, East Indies, Aleutian Islands, and Guadalcanal. I don't look the part...? Th-that must be because of that one incident at Iwate that stunted my growth! Milord, just you wait. I'll show you the extent of my capabilities!
From now on, no matter what perils we might face, I will protect you with everything I have! Even if I sink to the bottom of the ocean, I will not permit any harm to come to you!
As long as I am here, nothing shall stand in my way!
Milord, please be careful. I am just as top-heavy as Illustrious.
Eek!!! Oh, it wasn't Saratoga after all. However, you seem to be even more mischievous than she is.
Milord, I am called Ryuujou, a ranger from the Land of the Rising Sun! I shall lay down my seven lives to mete out justice in your name!
Thank you very much, Milord! Shall we go run a lap to test my new strength?
Despair... shall be your final destination!
It's good to always be ready for battle, but this isn't... so bad either, wouldn't you agree, Milord?
*yawn*... Finally, a good night's rest... Now, to pick up where I left off on that RPG... M-m-m-milord, why are you here?! I wasn't slacking off or anything, I w-w-was just... Ughh....
These games and snacks are a sort of trial for me! Rest assured, Milord! My devotion will not be swayed by the likes of these items!
Splendid work, Milord! If you so like, come take it easy with me!
*yawn*... O-one moment! I'll get myself in order!

I cannot believe how addictive this technological marvel of a game console can be...! B-but that's not to say it has no merits whatsoever! After all, if we could settle wars through these games, nobody would have to get hurt!|nil|C-can we really allow foodstuffs as devilishly tempting as these deep-fried chips of potato to exist in our society?!
Zzzzz... Milord?! Are we being attacked?! ...I lowered my guard and fell asleep? Forgive me for this shameful display!
*yawn*... Finally, a good night's rest... Now, to pick up where I left off on that RPG... M-m-m-milord, why are you here?! I wasn't slacking off or anything, I w-w-was just... Ughh....
Milord! C-could you please consider rewarding me with some potato chips?
The character I've created is a brave and honorable samurai, much like myself!
All right! Steady! Steadyyy! Gottem! Hahahah! Now I'll– M-Milord?! I-I'm just, umm... enjoying an after-school break!
Through this game, I've deepened my bond with my friends, and made fun memories with you, Milord... I-I won't deny it came at some cost to my discipline, but even so, I am glad I got into this game!
I always strive to do my best, be it with video games or whatever else! My ambition is to be like the legendary L.I.!
You came at a time most opportune, Milord! I would like you to join me for this Master Rank quest!
A new electronic message? Could it be an invite to a party?

Yes! I dug up a rare material! Haha! It's true what they say about you bringing luck, Milord!|It's so convenient, being able to play a game anywhere you want, whenever you want... But I must have discipline! I must not let myself fall for temptation!|My homework? Rest assured, Milord, I completed it some time ago, as one should!
Do you wish to go on a hunt with me, Milord? Let me move over... There. Please, join me on the bench!
Whuah! Oh no... Milord, your action just led to my death. Why did you have to do that?
All right! Steady! Steadyyy! Gottem! Hahahah! Now I'll– M-Milord?! I-I'm just, umm... enjoying an after-school break!
Quest complete! And without using any continues, too!
You shall all be purged equally!
Commander, have you come here to offer your prayers to God?
Heavy cruiser – Saint Louis.
Commander, my sisters in arms have returned from their commission.
My sisters in arms here may be righteous, but not you. Prepare to face divine punishment, sinner.
So this is the land that I was promised... Tell me, will this place be Sodom, or Canaan?
I see my sisters in arms smile every day as if without a worry in the world. Perhaps this is their Canaan...

I feel like I have earned the acceptance of the fleet. However, is this truly the land that I was promised? ... No, I do not mean to cast doubt upon anyone. I merely feel that... I may yet have a deeper purpose.
I finally understand now, Commander. What I experience now is the same as my sisters in arms - nay, perhaps even more fulfilling. Being a part of this fleet, by your side... is truly my Canaan.
Suffering is the brand of a warrior. Everyone, I'm proud of you for making it through.
This too... is God's trial...!
Bonjour, Commander. Please instruct me, what should we do next?
My Lord, why have you abandoned me...
Commander, does it not matter if these letters remain unopened?

Commander, your time should not be squandered here. Leave the chores to me. |If there are any disputes within our ranks, allow me to handle the arbitration. That is my specialty. |Just winning the battle alone is enough to satisfy me, but you, Commander, ought to look far beyond that.
Commander, it may not be the will of God, but you do have new missions issued from headquarters.
While rewards may certainly be nice... I have no interest in them.

Because ruination befell my homeland, I was returned to nothingness before I was born. As I am now, I am but an illusion, a manifestation of an ideal. But as long as you continue to lead my way, I shall in return clear all obstacles standing before yours.

This I do swear. Your joy is my will, your victory is my glory, and the place that I can call home, is by your side... Blessed be the Lord who has brought me together with you - my commander, my love, and... my light.
God's love is boundless.
I fight so that there may be peace. That is the single role that I can play.
Commander, your self-respect...

It is an honor to meet you at last - my prophet, my leader. I am Saint Louis, brought to your side by God's will. As long as it is justice that guides your hand, then this humble spear shall be yours to wield.
For the sake of the role that we all must play...
Ashes to ashes, dust to dust...
I have no serious objections to sitting up here, but... there is one thing I cannot figure out. Are you perhaps deriving pleasure from seeing me up here like this?

With all due respect, Commander, this finery and this throne are not fit for one such as myself. Despite the hallowed name I have inherited, I am nothing more than a warrior. —However, if such an arrangement pleases you, then I shall hold my objections.

As a servant of God, there is no need for vanity— Having that said, as the recipient of your love, you are free to make any arrangements that please you. After all, great and permissive is God's love.
I would much rather wield my spear upon the seas of battle than sit up here like a statue, Commander.
Commander, making me sit up here waiting for you by myself is a tribulation in its own right.

So I've managed to capture your gaze? Your eyes are... Nevermind, it doesn't bother me.|My arbitration is needed? ...Very well, please excuse me for a moment. I will make sure to hear them out.|As the one guiding this fleet forward... Commander, you are the one best suited to this throne.
My weapon is always within reach. Should you will it, I am ready to sortie at any time.

With all due respect, Commander, this finery and this throne are not fit for one such as myself. Despite the hallowed name I have inherited, I am nothing more than a warrior. —However, if such an arrangement pleases you, then I shall hold my objections.
Be cleansed in the Iris's light!
Let us also give our utmost this coming year, as to not squander the preparations everyone has painstakingly made.

Commander, regarding your next appointment... Ah, hard work is one of the highest virtues of the Iris's holy knights. On weekdays or vacations, in knights' armor or the Dragon Empery's attire, there can be no pause to my prayer, my training, or my duties as the administrator of your will.
Commander, our comrades-in-arms have returned from their commission. Let us take over their responsibilities so that they may enjoy the Spring Festival.
God witnesses all your deeds. The trials you endure today will surely bear fruit in the future.
Bonjour, Commander. Please determine the duty you would like to fulfill first today.

The Dragon Empery's Spring Festival... the celebration of a new year seems quintessential to all. Please rest well after completing your work.|La Galissonnière... seems to be thoroughly enjoying this holiday. Rather, that girl seems to be able to find enjoyment in just about anything.
