Quite broad-minded of her.|The greatest joy is to be able to have a life of peace. If everyone can act in accordance with God's will, then there would be no need for justicars.
Here are today's assignments. Let's work together to finish them quickly.
A-ahem!

Commander, regarding your next appointment... Ah, hard work is one of the highest virtues of the Iris's holy knights. On weekdays or vacations, in knights' armor or the Dragon Empery's attire, there can be no pause to my prayer, my training, or my duties as the administrator of your will.
Those aren't allies up ahead. Ready all weapons!
Sometimes good things happen when you're just coasting across the sea.
Pensacola-class Heavy Cruiser – Salt Lake City, Hull Number CA-25!
Whew, those girls went out on a commission in this blazing heat? They even completed it, too. Must be awful out there~
Commander, that look in your eyes kinda creeps me out...
Helena, could you go find something interesting with that radar of yours? Wait... that's San Diego? Great, let's go play in the water together!
Commander, don't you ever get bored of lying around on the beach? Why don't we play some beach volleyball? Sun burn? No worries, Pensacola has already rubbed me down with sunscreen.
You can always rest on my lap if you get tired, Commander. Don't worry, I won't play any tricks on you. ... Hm? I've always been this kind to you!

Welcome back, Commander! I was just about to finish drying your laundry. I cleaned up the books and other stuff that was lying around. How's it look? The tidiest it's ever been, right? And dinner will be... Hm? Why am I doing all this? Well, you know... just preparing for what comes later!
Your hand feels just like Pensacola's...
Oh man, my skin is on fire... Sorry, Vestal, think I could ask for a spa treatment from you?
Commander, want to go swimming together?
Wuah! I'm out of armor-piercing shells... damn!
New mail for you. Oh my, is this a love letter? ... Hmm... Okay, now where's the trashcan?
If you don't know how to swim then I can teach you, Commander.|Shell Kiska Island? Ahaha... that'd be a new experience for me.|Enterprise is too strict. Please don't be like her, Commander.
Who cares about missions, let's party!
Can we go join the party now?

I'm Salt Lake City, second ship of the Pensacola-class. That's right, I'm a genuine heavy cruiser. My armor's thin because of that treaty thing, but my firepower holds up. Although, I participated in lots of battles in the Pacific and survived to the end of it, so maybe armor isn't that important. The battle of Attu Island? Luck is a power of sorts too, you know? ... No, no, I'm not arguing. Anyway, do you really want me to wear as much as Laffey does?

It's a promise, Commander! Every day from now on you'll hang out with me and do the stuff I enjoy. Like surfing, beach volleyball, and... scuba diving, I guess? Of course, I'll hang out with you and do all the stuff you enjoy, too~!
The best defense is a good offense!
Oh, it's you, Commander. I thought it was Pensacola...
Hey, don't do the same stuff Pensacola does...
Commander, I'm Salt Lake City, a heavy cruiser! You think I'm exposing too much? Well, I gotta keep a close eye on my waist, you know?
Us pretty girls need to take care to maintain our good looks.
This time it wasn't just all luck!
Full speed ahead! ... Ah, that was close... I almost tripped...
What's so interesting about this stuff? Let's go play instead~!
Atlanta-class Light Cruiser – San Diego, Hull Number CL-53!
Commander, Commander! I think a commission's been completed!
Don't come near me! Your stupidity is contagious!
C'mon, Commander! Don't think too much, let's play!
C'mon, Commander, let's have a race! Winner treats the loser to a snack!
You often say mean stuff about me, but in reality you're actually having fun, aren't you~?
I used to not really think about anything, but now all I can think about is you, Commander! ... Not that much has changed, though!
Commander, let's go get something duh-licious to eat!
They're actually trying to fight us?!
Hey, Commander, let's have an exciting water gun fight!
Huh? Who's this? Where am I...? How did I lose?!
Commander, new mail for you! Creases? N-no, I totally wasn't making paper planes out of your mail, okay?!

Apparently people come looking for me after they've planted apple seeds... am I some kind of harvest god or something?!|Battle stars? Are they really that amazing? I thought everyone had some?|Come on, get motivated, now! Sit around like this and you'll go dumb!
Bring on the missions, no matter how many there are!
Co-man-der! Look, look! We got some rewards!

I'm San Diego! I've heard I'm second only to Enterprise for the most stars earned! ... I don't really know what a "star" is, but it sounds cool! What is it, Commander? ... A-merry-car? Is that some kind of secret code?
Commander, I'm not dumb, I can tell that one's a fake! ...Huh? It's real?! Then does that mean... you're serious about this...?
I'm not sure what's going on, but let's do it~!
Hey, what are you looking for?
Hey, not so fast you pervert!
Hello~! I'm San Diego, the cruiser who earned the most stars in World War 2! Hehe, that's it for my introduction! I'm just too good!
It feels like I got a little smarter!
I was just getting warmed up... Why are they surrendering already?
Merry Christmas! Super idol San Diego, making her dazzling debut! Commander, you must come to my performance! ...Venue?! What's that?

That's strange, why's the microphone cord getting shorter and shorter? |I don't really get it, but if I work hard, it'll be A-O-K! |Commander, wanna sing a few songs as well? Ehehe, here, here! Wooaahh! (CRASH) W-who tripped me?
The smartest person is the one who is the happiest! Ehehe, that's why San Diego is the smartest!
Merry Christmas! Super idol San Diego, making her dazzling debut! Commander, you must come to my performance! ...Venue?! What's that?
San Diego, moving out! Go, go, go!
Is my June bride look just the bestest or what!
Commander, with the power of your love, San Diego is sure to become number one in this port! ...Number one in what? I'm not really sure myself, but I'll definitely make it happen!
It's kinda weird, but I get this feeling like thinking of you makes me grow stronger, Commander! Wait, doesn't that mean I'm gonna change eventually? Nope! 'Cause I'm gonna be your number one!
Welcome back, Commander! Your sweetie San Diego's been waiting for you!
I've already finished today's work and did it all in a flash! Now c'mon, it's time to have fun!

So, Commander! You mind having tonight's dinner microwaved? Is the bath at 50 degrees all cool with you? Don't answer, 'cause San Diego went and did it all already!|Man, San Juan's such a worrywart~ I'll be just fine, 'cause I've got you, Commander! Everything's gonna be right as rain!|I'll cheerlead for you, Commander! Hip, hip, hooray! One, two, three! Whoop-de-doo!
Feel my Commander-smartifying sparkly beam!
Whoa, whoa, whoa!
Commander, with the power of your love, San Diego is sure to become number one in this port! ...Number one in what? I'm not really sure myself, but I'll definitely make it happen!
Woohoo! San Diego's number one!
Heheh~☆ I have no idea what just happened, but I feel like I've gotten super strong! Commander, can you see my sparkly aura~?
Hokay, let's do this, Commander! ... Huh? You just got done?!
Hey, Commander! Let Super-Smart Sandy handle all your work for today! It'll be done before you can say "no thanks"!
Let's have a race, Commander! I'll be both your opponent and the referee!|Lalala la la~! Sing along with me, Sara!|You look bummed out, Commander~ How about we turn that frown right upside down?
Can you feel my smartifying sparkly aura too, Commander~?
Heheh~☆ I have no idea what just happened, but I feel like I've gotten super strong! Commander, can you see my sparkly aura~?
On my command!
♪ Bat outta hell~ Gets another roll~ Mess with San Fran~ Get a hole in your skull~ ♪
New Orleans-class heavy cruiser – San Francisco, Hull Number CA-38.
Welcome the commission team back? Naw, that's outta my pay grade. Now, if I get to meet some chill people, then we're talkin'!
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, commission team! Puddin' is just over there, waitin' for you all!

voiceline.line: Maybe you'll regret your jackassery if I tie you up and throw ya into the sea, eh, Puddin'?
Puddin' is a hella cute name, don'tcha think? Feels way more legit than just callin' you "commander" like everyone else.
Oh boy, what to do today~? Maybe I'll get up to some fun hijinks before Puddin' catches on to what I'm doing~

Right, time to have a taste of this little puddin'~ Mm-mmh, where should I start with you? So many options! ...What? I'm just talkin' about this serving of strawberry puddin'. Get your mind outta the gutter! Hahaha~
Good goin' today~ Let's grab something to eat and hang out! Ahahah, c'mon, don't be scared! Grab my hand and let's go!
voiceline.oath: Hey, Puddin', what do you say we retake our vows? ...Hahaha! Look at you, gettin' all flustered! Why so serious? Ahaha~

voiceline.line: What, you trying to spook me? Really, huh? Then you better watch for surprises from now on when you're out walkin' at night, Puddin'~
A wild Puddin' appeared! Now let's see if you're gonna work hard or hardly work!
voiceline.oath: Good going, Puddin'! C'mere and chew the fat with me! Kick back now, worry about the consequences later!

voiceline.line: Aw crap! They're targetting me!
ello, Puddin'! Gimme a smile! Now a high five! I see you're kicking ass at work today, so... hasta la vista baybay~!
voiceline.oath: 'ello, Puddin'! Gimme a smile! Now a high five! And just to get your engines revving early... a kiss! Ahaha~

voiceline.line: Don't get bummed out~ I'll win twice as hard for you next time!
Seems you've got new mail. I'm hella beat right now, so fetch it yourself.
voiceline.oath: Mail for you, with a little extra something from me to go with it, Puddin'~

voiceline.line: Someone been bullyin' you, Juneau? Just tell me who, and me and my bat will go teach 'em a hard lesson!|Man, the dorm's exterior is hella drab. I could fix it up with a splash of paint, y'know.|You busy, Puddin'? Busyyyy? Helloooo? Damn, guess you're hella in the zone. Don't you get bored sittin' in here all day?|Why do I call you Puddin'? 'Cause it's fun, so why not? Haha~
voiceline.extra: Someone been bullyin' you too, Puddin'? Gimme their name, now! Nobody gets to bully you but me! JK, JK~|I'll do some work after I'm done painting. If you see me not workin', that means I'm still busy.|Whoever touched my puddin' will have hell to pay! Nah, not you, I mean my literal puddin'!

voiceline.line: This mission? Looks like a cakewalk to me. It's all yours, Puddin'.
Rewards, eh? They're all yours, Puddin'! Rewards are a crutch, I don't need 'em!

I'm San Francisco, the legendary New Orleans-class heavy cruiser! I made it through the war alive by clobberin' suckers left and right! Now I just wanna do my own thing, chilling, kickin' it, that kind of stuff!
Ugh, I hate ceremonies... I'll do what you say just this once. But after that, you'll be takin' orders from me, got it? Also, FYI, when I get the Puddin' munchies, it'll take a lot to calm my hunger~
Let's make some noise! Hahahaha!
Sup? Something goin' on? Or is that your way of saying "let's hang out"? ...You wouldn't deadass poke a girl for no reason, would ya?
All right then, let's clobber some decency into you! ...Just messin', but don't do that again, 'kay?
Sup, Commander! The name's San Francisco! ...Huh, joining the fleet's supposed to be fun? Anything in it for me? Just askin' for curiosity's sake~ Oh, by the way, I'm calling ya Puddin' from now on~
Whew... It's a start~
Dusted and done! Those chumps never stood a chance, Puddin'.
Jazz, rock 'n' roll, or whatever else, you name it and we'll play it!
Music! Lights! Refreshments! We're all set! Welcome to San Francisco's party! Enjoy yourself!
ello, Puddin'~
You didn't bail on me to go have fun on your own... right? No? All good then~
Welcome to my place, Puddin'! Don't be shy now, get hella jiggy with it!

C'mon, Minneapolis! Forget about hunting for a minute and just drink!|Have yourself some snacks before I decide to eat 'em all, Puddin'.|nil|Listen, Puddin', I need party activity ideas! Do we play a game, or put something on?
You already wasted, Puddin'? Tsk, tsk. That's not gonna fly~
Okay, you've had WAY too much to drink.
Music! Lights! Refreshments! We're all set! Welcome to San Francisco's party! Come and enjoy yourself!
Now that's a clean victory! Lemme see a big smile, c'mon! Ahaha!
I'll keep the skies clear for you! Everyone, forward!
I set the trap just like the book said, but why haven't I caught anything yet? That's strange...
Atlanta-class light cruiser – San Juan, Hull Number CL-54.
The resources from the commission have been delivered. Commander, why don't you... Umm, I'll go check on them.
I thought this might happen, but... I won't give up!
The fleet is gonna lose faith in you if you keep spacing out like that. Commander, get your head in the game!
Um, I know I can be a little hard on you, Commander. But you get what I mean, don't you? ... Commander?

Commander, I always thought you wouldn't like me... and I'm glad that isn't true! B-but, how do we take our relationship to the next level? Wh-what are we supposed to do? I... I don't know about these things...

Um, I was thinking, if you have time, could we go out on a da... date? I know it's my fault for being so hard on you all the time, so I'm trying to make it up to you... Whatever I need to do to take us to the next level, I'll do it... Okay!?
Welcome back, Commander! ... D-did it go okay?
I-it's just a scratch! I can keep going...!
Clock's ticking! We gotta get to work— Oh, come on! Here, let me straighten your collar. You're a mess!
Agh...! Go! I'll cover your retreat!
I got your mail for you. Don't forget to check it.

Commander... are you daydreaming again?|Supporting a carrier group is just watching the skies all day. I wish supporting you was as easy...|My sisters haven't been causing you any trouble, have they? Oh, thank goodness...
How do you still have unfinished missions? Well, since you're hopeless without me, I suppose I can help you out...
Mission complete! Feels pretty nice to be done, huh?

Commander, you'll end up gettin' hurt if you approach me without warning.
You got a damn death wish? You askin' me to knock some sense into that skull of yours? Izzat it, huh?!
You're a commander? I don't need one... But maybe we were fated to meet, or something. Guess you've got me to look after too, now. The name's Sendai. Don't forget it.
I'll become stronger, then I'll...!
Heh. Won't even need to replace my bandages.
Sorry to say, but this is where you'll all die!
Yeah? Oh, I'm working on my sortie pose. When goin' to war, you need a war pose, y'know?
Hmh. Guess I won't be needin' these bandages anymore. Commander, how about we find out how strong I've gotten... by having you take one of my punches?
Nice work. Want some sweets? You can have some of mine. They're all stuff I personally like, though.
Sorry to say... but I can't afford to be defeated here!
You're back, huh? Focus on your work. Gimme a shout when it's time to sortie.

Violence is the only solution I know of for my problems. That's why I envy you and Jintsuu sometimes.|Whenever I try to be like Jintsuu and use logic to solve problems, I usually end up using my fists anyway. I dunno why, either...|Hardships don't get under my skin, but I'm scared that I'll one day lose my way...
Hold still, Commander. We're pals, so I'll only hit you with 80% of my full strength!
Hmh. Guess I won't be needin' these bandages anymore. Commander, how about we find out how strong I've gotten... by having you take one of my punches?
Where'd I put my bandages... Oh, right, don't need 'em anymore... Totally forgot.
Achtung! Reduce them to scrap!
Commandant, I do understand our mission at this port, but I hope to one day move up and fight for humanity's– Forgive me, I should have held my tongue.
voiceline.oath: Commandant, you need not be concerned about me. I am being myself, as one is obliged to be.

voiceline.line: Battlecruiser – Seydlitz.
The commission team has returned to port! Commandant, please have a look!
This is all because I'm a worthless maggot... Commandant, I beg for your forgiveness!
If you'll forgive my audacity, I have a request. Commandant, please give me more orders! I will do anything you require of me!
I have complete faith in your decisions. Except... the worry that my service isn't all you hoped for lingers in the back of my mind. But, rest assured, it will not hinder me in combat!
Spend my day off however I want...? While that does sound nice, I'm not sure what I want to do is good in your eyes, Commandant... But if that's your order, I will follow it!
Y-you wish to go on a date? With me, of all people? ...Forgive me, I should not question an order from you, Commandant! I will make every step towards ensuring a thoroughly enjoyable date!
voiceline.oath: Good lord... I should've prepared better before asking you on a date... Oh, no, nothing's wrong! I-it's just... Your immediate "yes" made my heart flutter in surprise, Commandant!

voiceline.line: Salute! What are your orders?
voiceline.oath: Look, you don't– Ahem. Commandant, I'd rather you treated me as a soldier, not as a lady!

voiceline.line: A salute to your return, Commandant! Phew... I take it your battle was an honorable one, as always?
voiceline.oath: I sensed you may be thirsty, so I went ahead and made tea! W-would you like a cup?

voiceline.line: Miladies! Take cover behind me!
Salute! I put my faith in your guidance as always, Commandant!
voiceline.oath: As always, I aim to please you today, Commandant! ...I-if I inconvenience you in any way, please do inform me.

voiceline.line: I failed by not following my orders... What a disgrace!
voiceline.oath: Commandant! Miladies! Please make your escape while I hold the line!

voiceline.line: Salute! I've brought your newly-arrived letter!

Lützow! Stop that before you distract the Commandant! ...Well, Commandant, I do believe getting distracted is a bad thing...|I've no grand ambitions of being hailed as a hero. My heart's only desire is to serve you faithfully, Commandant.|People who doubt their comrades deserve to be shunned. If they must doubt anyone, it should be themselves.
voiceline.extra: Please assign me a task, Commandant! ...Y-you've already finished all your work? Oh, I see...|Commandant, suppose I were to behave less like a soldier and more like a regular woman... Would you prefer that?|You're very kind, Commandant, being willing to give ear to my opinions. Meanwhile, I feel I don't even deserve to have opinions...

voiceline.line: You have unfinished missions, Commandant! It may be wisest to do the newest ones first.
voiceline.oath: Commandant! Please advise which mission I should start with!

voiceline.line: You have received mission rewards! Whew... I'm glad it went off without a hitch. Outstanding work, Commandant.
I am Seydlitz, Iron Blood battlecruiser! My tenacity is my pride, my conquests are my glory, and executing your orders is my mission! I await your orders, Commandant!

While I am overjoyed by your offer of marriage, I'm worried if my answer won't be to your– No! Of course I'm not turning you down! What I mean is, I don't know whether to say "gladly," or "I love you." You may decide if you'd like, Commandant!
You will not sink me! I won't allow it!
Salute! Your orders, Commandant!
voiceline.oath: I'll gladly listen if you wish to confide in me!

voiceline.line: C-Commandant?!
voiceline.oath: W-well, if I'm your type, then I suppose... Pardon, it's nothing, Commandant!

voiceline.line: Salute, Commandant! Iron Blood battlecruiser Seydlitz reporting in! Inexperienced though I may be, as of today I am proud to serve this port in the pursuit of honor and glory!
You've made me stronger, Commandant! You have my thanks!
Commandant, your in-person commanding was a thing to behold! Frankly, however, I don't believe I can say the same of my own performance...
voiceline.oath: Thank you for this high honor! This victory goes to my comrades and the Commandant!

voiceline.line: Die, monsters! You don't belong in this world!
Once the fighting ends, so does the role of a vampire hunter... Is that truly what I, or rather, the power within me, wants?
There it is – Dracula's Castle, brought into this world by chaos itself... On my honor, I swear I will put an end to the divine bloodline!
A castle of this size must have numerous ways in and out. Commandant, we should take this route if you're in a hurry.
It's time to breach the castle, Commandant. I shall lead the way!
I have your new letter right here, Commandant.

I've got you now, Lützow! Say your prayers, for it's time you paid for the Commandant's lost productivity!|I'm more than just a shipgirl, I'm now the blade that cuts down all evil. This duty, granted unto me, shall be carried out!|You'd like meat for dinner today? Certainly. The question is, how do we procure meat out here...
We know not what beasts lurk in the shadows... Mgh...
Such frightening armor... Eek!
There it is – Dracula's Castle, brought into this world by chaos itself... On my honor, I swear I will put an end to the divine bloodline!
Salute! Oh, dammit, I dropped the bounty... Apologies. I will clearly need to practice my posing...
Turn bow to the wind! We shall teach them the importance of freedom!
I strictly follow the principle of divulging nothing to outsiders, but giving full disclosure to my superior officers.
Essex-class aircraft carrier – Shangri-La, Hull Number CV-38.
A commission has been completed. Shall go and we receive the returning team?
You've been added to my confidential informee blacklist, Commander. Do keep that in mind.
Starting today, I will take notes on everything related to you, Commander.
Commander, no matter how pressed for time you may be, eating junk food will only impact your health negatively. Please, I urge you to have this more healthy sandwich I made.
*sigh*, I've asked you time and time again to be more health-conscious... Please, have this cup of saffron tea. It's good for you.
Did you know that the saffron flower symbolizes joy in floriography? To me, writing your biography, fighting by your side, and personally looking after you... That is the greatest joy of my life.
My hair ornaments? They're a gift from Yat Sen; she said they go well with my name.
The fleet has returned to port. Let us hold a tactical debriefing once everyone has had some time to rest.
Put out the fire! Please, hurry!
Welcome back, Commander. I recorded all the noteworthy events that took place while you were gone. Would you care to read about them?
This wasn't... supposed to happen!
You've received new mail. If you're short on time, you could consider having me read it out for you.

Are you curious about these butterflies? Bugwatching is one of my hobbies, actually. I brought these darlings with me from Panama.|Anti-sub warfare? I'd love to try my hand at it, should the opportunity arise. Who knows, I may be surprisingly talented!|Ensuring you stay in good health is part of my job, Commander. I sincerely urge you to be careful so as to not overwork yourself.
We've received a mission from headquarters. I made note of it in our task list.
A mission has been completed. I wonder what our reward will be. Perhaps an unmanned recon aircraft?

My name, Shangri-La, has its origins in a famous operation from the war. Being an Essex-class, I've been all over the world and got to record a myriad of things and events in my notebook. This, to me, is my source of pride.

I'd love to write down my feelings without a moment's delay, but a more important task is at hand: holding you in a close embrace. I, Shangri-La, will forever be with you, following you to the mystical land at the end of your journey.
Weather the storm and fight with all your might!
Which story would you like to hear, Commander? The one about the undiscovered haven, or the wonderland beyond the horizon?
Did you just perform a health examination on me?
CV-38, Shangri-La, has arrived. I'd like to share the stories in this notebook with you someday... but first, let's concentrate on the task at hand.
Thank you. I will repay your generosity with greater glory in battle.
Shangri-La will forever be out of reach to the likes of you.
This shawl you gave me is really cozy. Hehe, let's huddle up like this... There, now we share the warmth.
Commander, welcome to my "Utopia." Here, you can find my prized collection. Now, where should we start our detailed tour?
*yawn*... Oh, was I dozing off just now? Sorry for that, Commander. I just feel so relaxed when I'm with you... But thanks for lending me your shoulder to rest on. Hehehe~
Did you come across a new specimen I could add to my collection, Commander? Hehehe~
Welcome back, Commander. Let's warm you up with a nice, hot drink. Would you like coffee or hot cocoa?

If the opportunity presents itself, I might just host my own exhibit. Perhaps I could call it... "Caracal"?|I wouldn't mind sharing some of my prized specimens with you, Commander. You'd take good care of them, wouldn't you?|*click*! Nice, a fine new addition to my photo collection. I name it... "Fleet Commander, in Profile." Hehehe~
Would you like to learn how to pin a specimen, Commander?
Both specimens and girls alike must be treated delicately. Understood, Commander?
Commander, welcome to my "Utopia." Here, you can find my prized collection. Now, where should we start our detailed tour?
One needs knowledge to write a story. Knowledge on ships, on people, and on the world as a whole. Say, Commander, has anyone ever told you, "Read a book or two"? Hehehe~
This specimen looks to be fairly ancient... You could watch from behind me, or you could join me for an up-close examination; we can enjoy our time here however you wish.
What are your thoughts on this specimen, Commander? Hehe, would you say it befits your glory?

It seems I can only make notes and sketches as there's no photography allowed here... I'm a little annoyed by that.|Wait, Intrepid! Don't run around recklessly! Good grief... Could you please go help her out, Commander?|Though not as old as these fossils, there have been relics found that indicate saffron was being cultivated during the Bronze Age. Incidentally, would you care for some tea if you're thirsty, Commander?
Ah, I believe a theory recently surfaced, claiming that dinosaurs were feathery, not scaly. But what do you think, Commander?
Should I respond like a dinosaur and go, "Graaawr!" for you? Hehehe~
This specimen looks to be fairly ancient... You could watch from behind me, or you could join me for an up-close examination; we can enjoy our time here however you wish.
"Garbage" will pile up if you don't "clean" it up...
Hmm? "Cleaning" things up with a gun falls perfectly within a maid's normal line of duty, Master.
Sheffield-class Light Cruiser - HMS Sheffield
Master, does the sound of my gun not remind you of something? Perhaps, something like the commission fleet that you've kept waiting?
I see, Master, you are remarkably similar to a pest, morphologically. The world is full of mysteries.

I understand, Master. You've finally awakened to the realisation that you are an oversized lump of non-combustible rubbish, and your psyche is screaming for me to grant you the sweet release of... Just kidding, please wait while I make tea for you.
To facilitate ease of reading, I took the liberty of organising and re-categorising all the books on your shelf. Please check the results.
I should learn... from Belfast's example? A maid should serve her master wholeheartedly without asking for anything in return. In contrast, that one is quite greedy... but, I am a bit envious...
Master, are you troubled by the way I talk and act toward you? If so, you must understand that is the way I express my love, my beloved Master. Yes, it's true.
Good work, Master. There is still some work for you to take care of. Please do your best.
So, you pests have a few tricks up your sleeves...
Please mind your step, Master... Right there... is where I just mopped.
Master, please assign me to the rear...
Master, I've already sorted your mail.

"Master, I love you." Please believe me, I put at least 30% emotion into those words. |Master, if you wish to take a nap, please tell me ahead of time. I will make sure you don't oversleep, with this gun. |Belfast dotes on you too much, Master. At this rate, I'm afraid that you will turn into a useless lump of driftwood.
Please entrust all "cleaning" tasks to me.
Master, do you plan to give all the mission rewards to me?

I am the Town-class light cruiser, Sheffield. I've basically only fought against Iron Blood, having witnessed the demise of Scharnhorst, and participated in the hunt for Bismarck and Tirpitz. However, I underwent repairs throughout the end of the Second Great War and was unable to sortie. If there's nothing else you'd like to know, I would like to head back now.

Upon the name of Virgin Mary I pledge, may the hammer of love be dropped upon those that would harm my master... Master? U-um, I wasn't doing anything in particular. You must have heard me wrong. Anyway, let's get this absolutely mortifying ceremony over with as soon as possible...
Do you hear that? The ringing of your death knell.
Pest- I mean, Master, what requests do you have? I beg your pardon, that was a slip of the tongue.
I do hope you have this same kind of strong spirit on the battlefield.
Ah... I thought you were a vermin, so I fired on instinct... You're my new Master? Excuse me. I am a member of the Royal Maids, Light Cruiser Sheffield. I am yours to command.
Hmm... this feels a bit of all right. Thank you, Master.
Are you satisfied with these results, Master?
Let's hurry up and get this over with. The night wanes.
Maid by day, and secret agent by night? Hmm, that does fit the Royal style. Unfortunately for you, it's just your imagination.
... Did you find out about my undercover identity? You leave me no choice. Master, I cannot allow you to leave this room... Of course I'm jesting, it's merely a hobby.
Master, what kinds of missions are we to carry out tonight?
Master, what do you plan to exchange for this all-important piece of mail?

The slumbering city, silent and dark, inexplicably makes me feel at ease... |Master, it is not incomprehensible that you would desire some excitement in your life, but please focus on the work at hand. |Do not let your guard down for even a second, and always be ready to fight. From this point, a secret agent and a maid are quite similar. Huh? Maids don't have to fight? Master, your jests are quite rich.
Master, you don't have to come all the way up to get me. It's going to be a pain to get you back down safely.
Out of respect for your bravery, I shall reserve this special bullet just for you.
... Did you find out about my undercover identity? You leave me no choice. Master, I cannot allow you to leave this room... Of course I'm jesting, it's merely a hobby.
Regardless of the occasion, there is always time to take out the trash.
Swiftsure, don’t stay in your room while the festival is going on. Go out there and socialise with the others. Of course it's worth the effort...
The Sakura Empire's summer festivals... they're quite noisy. It will be difficult to keep things clean with so many people around... Despite that, I'm still having a good time. Is there a problem?
Do you need something?

Not a bad selection of fireworks. I thought that I had nothing to see since I've had to put on so many opulent displays of pyrotechnics for Her Majesty's enjoyment, but I feel like these are pretty tasteful.
So this is where you were, Master. I was afraid that you had gotten lost and almost mobilised the entire Maid Team. What exactly were you doing?

So this is cotton candy... Mmf.. It's very sweet... Nn... What are you waiting for? |Master, what do you think about this festival? If you're enjoying it, perhaps we can go to a similar Western-style event next time. |Southampton, why did you run off to the festival when you're supposed to be on duty? Ugh... What am I going to do with you...
This outfit is quite breezy. I will have to thank Ms. Victorious on behalf of the Maid Team.
I keep a gun with me at all times.
The Sakura Empire's summer festivals... they're quite noisy. It will be difficult to keep things clean with so many people around... Despite that, I'm still having a good time. Is there a problem?
Don't worry, I've hidden my gun. If anything happens, I will protect you.

The fact that you're asking your own maid to be your partner at the ball shows a concerning lack of gumption as a human being... However, if you go and make a fool of yourself, it will reflect poorly upon my standing as a maid. Therefore, I have no choice but to accompany you.
Your enthusiasm for this party is understandable, but please do not forget about the commissions.
Master, I do hope you haven't forgotten that there is still a party to attend... How hopeless you are. Allow me to tidy up your appearance.
There is no need for panic, Master. I've become quite accustomed to your lack of punctuality.

Making your maid be your partner is a difficult request that falls outside normal lines of business. As fair compensation, please bring me a cake later.|As your partner, I will naturally draw plenty of unwanted attention. I must steel myself mentally.|I can see other members of the Maid Team going about their business... What a strange fetish you have, Master, to make someone who should be working behind the scenes take center stage...
You'd like to escort me? Normally, I'd decline because that'd be embarrassing, but... you'd look so wretched that I simply have no choice but to accept.
Master, please do not get carried away in your excitement.

The fact that you're asking your own maid to be your partner at the ball shows a concerning lack of gumption as a human being... However, if you go and make a fool of yourself, it will reflect poorly upon my standing as a maid. Therefore, I have no choice but to accompany you.
I shall defeat our foes in one fell swoop.
Why am I braving this dungeon with you, you ask? Well, I don't believe any other party would take it on with a master less capable than a mere maid.

Allow me to warn you ahead of time, Master. I will not come to your rescue if you spring another trap, so please mind your step henceforth... Just kidding. It is a maid's duty to aid her master, after all.
The commission team has returned. May I suggest that you contact them?

(As long as we're in this dungeon, I have the Master all to myself. I would ordinarily be insubordinate to ask for this exclusivity, but if the Master so desires it...) Oh, not at all. I have no desire to remain here for as long as possible.
Welcome back, Master. It surprises me to see you on the frontlines. While it's true you're helpless in a battle, your mere presence does inspire courage.
It is good to see you, Master. Please let me know when you've chosen an infiltration route.
You have received a letter. Now is the most opportune time to read it, Master.

Have you truly had ample rest, Master? Considering your stamina, I sincerely cannot fathom a scenario wherein we reach the end of this dungeon together.|*sigh*... As much as I wish I could use my firearms to "take out the trash," doing so would entail wreaking havoc on the stage dressing.|To think we must crawl through ventilation shafts. How revolting... Oh, it's nothing. Please, Master, lead the way – I insist.
You have received a new quest, Master. I pray it's nothing that will put you in danger.
Your quest rewards have come in. Please put them to good use.
Please, allow me to protect you, Master. You will make this more difficult for me if you suffer an injury.
Is this how you would portray a monster?

Allow me to warn you ahead of time, Master. I will not come to your rescue if you spring another trap, so please mind your step henceforth... Just kidding. It is a maid's duty to aid her master, after all.
It pleases me to know you can be of some use during these dark times as well, Master.
I will "clean up" the pests that seek to disrupt this concert.
Call you Producer? No thank you, Master works just fine for me. Or... would you prefer to be called a "pest?"
I am Sheffield, from the Royal Maids. I will explain how this transpired to you, so please stop looking like the world has turned upside down.
Do I need to pre-record a gunshot to remind you? ...A commission fleet has returned.
To prevent harm from befalling the other members, I shall first eliminate you.
I've had to suspend maid duties due to my idol unit activities. I will make up for lost time after this is done.
I'm playing very well? Master, you are able to follow in my footsteps as well... as long as you dedicate yourself to practicing every day.

I used to think that doing maid work would make other jobs seem trivial in comparison, but reality certainly had a very different message for me... If you dare tell anyone else about what I just said to you, I'll have to sew your lips together... Just kidding, don't take it that seriously.
The girl who you like is not the maid or the shining star, but "Sheffield?" ...A stale confession, but thank you. I'll remember that.
Ah, Master, welcome back~ You heard a weird voice, you say? It must've been your imagination.
I still have a contingency plan.
I finished cleaning up the office before I have to head off for lessons. I'd appreciate it if you don't mess it up while I'm gone.
This failure was due to my incompetence. Sincerest apologies.
There's new mail. I'll make sure to respond to the fanmail.

I heard that there are some folks out there who get aroused from being abused by their favorite idol... I'll never understand. |Defeating enemies with song? Utterly unrealistic, but might make for an interesting school project. |To be honest, I'm a bit jealous of Belfast. Her talents are boundless, beyond just being a maid.
A new offer? I shall prepare myself then.
So these are the royalties? I'm sure the other members will be pleased.
Town-class light cruiser, Sheffield. I am currently serving as an idol at Her Majesty's request. Do you have a problem with that?
No matter what I am, I will always love you with all my heart and soul, my Master. ...I wasn't being facetious. Really.
May my song bring you eternal rest...
I may not have my gun with me, but you would still be wise to mind your conduct.
Surely you're aware of the consequences for doing such things to an idol?
I am Sheffield, from the Royal Maids. I will explain how this transpired to you, so please stop looking like the world has turned upside down.
I shall commit myself fully regardless of the workplace.
The concert went well.
Let's give a warm welcome to our foolish enemies~!
Stupid Commander! Look at me again and I'll bite you!
Shiratsuyu-class destroyer number two -  Shigure.
Hm? Guess it's time. Heheh, I don't even need to actually head out, for as long as I'm in the fleet, bountiful rewards are guaranteed♪
I curse you with bad luck! You idiot!
You want good luck? It's not something you can just get.
Luck comes when you least expect it, you know? For example, like this! (Shigure jumps) ... Commander, maybe you caught a glimpse of my underwear just now~?
Getting pranked by me is a lucky thing on its own, you dunce♪ Although I do like that about you.
Heheh, silly Commander, you can rely on me as much as you want. I'll do anything you want~! As long as you love me like this, I'm yours♪
*Laughs* Guess who's back~!
We're gonna lose? That can't be~!
Commander! You're late! Go get ready~ I've been waiting for you.
N... Not bad... You'd better remember this!
I brought you your mail~ Now guess which hand I'm holding it with♪
It's so peaceful... How about we play a game of luck?|The gods seem to really love me, so hurry up and shower me with compliments♪|You don't look too good. How about a torpedo to cheer you up?
Huh? Work? Geez, it's ALWAYS about work...
*Tsk*... If it weren't for the rewards then who'd bother with these jobs...

I'm Shigure, ship number 2 of the Shiratsuyu-class. I worked pretty hard in the First Fleet before I was reassigned to the Second Fleet and participated in the fated Battle of Leyte Gulf... I was the sole survivor, but I'll never forget the bravery everyone showed in that battle... Yamashiro... Fusou... how I miss you...
You just can't be left alone, Commander... Worry not, I will stay by your side and take care of you forever♪
I am Shigure of Sasebo! Watch closely!
Stop touching me! Don't blame me if something blows up!
Commander, let's play a game. I'll give you 5 minutes and if you haven't been caught by the police at that point then I'll withdraw my report~

I'm Shigure, a Shiratsuyu-class destroyer. I don't wanna brag, but I've got the Goddess of Luck watching over me~ Heheh, it's about time people acknowledged that luck is also a part of one's strength♪
Mhm, making me stronger is a smart decision.
That was a good fight, considering how they suck♪
Oxygen torpedoes: prepare for simultaneous launch!
You thought I wouldn't bite you just because you complimented my swimsuit? *Hiss*
Stupid Commander, I'm not a damn submarine! Do you wanna get hit in the face with an oxygen torpedo?

I'll just absorb some seawater with my tail, and then... Pow! Oh dear~ You're totally drenched, Commander~|Yamashiro gave me this little rose! If you thought I'd give it to you, think again!|Yamashiro, just ignore that stupid Commander, come play beach volleyball with me!
Don't touch my ears, I'm ticklish there!
Wahh! You scared off the fish I'd caught with my tail! Commander, you idiot!
Stupid Commander, I'm not a damn submarine! Do you wanna get hit in the face with an oxygen torpedo?
Yamashiro warned me not to pull any weird tricks, and she's treating me like I don't know that already... If anything, she's the one we should worry about...
Oh my. Commander, you must be pretty lucky to bump into me here, hehe~ Since you're here, you can have the privilege of being my escort tonight. Now, be grateful~♪
I guess I have to always be with you to make sure an idiot like you doesn't get lost♪ Heheh, this beneficiary of Lady Luck will never lose sight of you♪
H-hey! Don't you leave me hanging over here!
You came at a good time, Commander! This is where the highlight of the party begins!
What's with that spinning gaze of yours? I'm right over here!|What the hell, Yuudachi! At least try to mind your table manners!|There'll be a raffle? Hmph, this time I'll defeat that stupid Yukikaze!
Look at how you're blushing, Commander! Have you fallen head over heels for me? Heheheh~
Eek! Y-you moronic commander! Pay attention to your footwork!
Oh my. Commander, you must be pretty lucky to bump into me here, hehe~ Since you're here, you can have the privilege of being my escort tonight. Now, be grateful~♪
Watch and be stunned by my greatness!
My chocolate is so unique you can't replicate it just by watching me! So gaze in marvel at me all you want! Heheh♪

All right, that should be good... Hey, stupid Commander standing around aimlessly. Yeah, you. Stick your hand out. You're gonna be the first person to get MY chocolate, so I'd better see some tears of gratitude.
Whuh?! Who?! ...Don't startle me by covering my eyes like that! Stupid Commander!
With your chocolate out of the way, now it's time to make chocolate for my sisters! And yes, you're gonna help out with it!
A letter? Give it a look right this moment.

Now to give it a good stir, then... Ahh! My apron's come undone!|Yup! My chocolate has the benefit of negating bad luck! It's because I make it so rarely!|Hmm, wonder if this tastes fine... Commander, open your mouth wide! ...Ugh, not THAT wide!
Well, well! You want more, don't you, Com-man-der? ♪
Don't act like you're a hotshot just 'cause you got chocolate from me! Stupid Commander!

All right, that should be good... Hey, stupid Commander standing around aimlessly. Yeah, you. Stick your hand out. You're gonna be the first person to get MY chocolate, so I'd better see some tears of gratitude.
Here's proof that I'm the real lucky ship!
You're gonna see what the mighty Shigure's really made of!
What are you looking at? Well, you big idiot?
Heheh~ Retrofitting the mighty Shigure proves that you are quite perceptive! Aren't you glad that you get to rely on me more, you lucky idiot of a commander~♪
What are you doing?! Don't lump me together with that dumb Yukikaze!
Heheh~! You don't need to hope for it, you can count on the mighty Shigure being there when you return, Commander♪
So what are we doing today? Trying your luck against mine? Very well~ Since you insist, even though you know you're gonna lose, dummy♪

I'll head over and help you out later, Yamashiro! Oh, and I'll bring the Commander too, 'cause why not!|Shiratsuyu really got lost again? You can never get any rest with that girl around... Come on, Commander, we're going looking for her.|Aren't my nails super cute? Hah hah hah! By the by, I'm the one always painting Yuudachi's nails and making them look pretty! Now tell Shigure how awesome she is♪
Stupid Commander, what are you waiting for? The mission rewards are here now!
Heheh~! Well, well, what do you think you're doing? Com-man-der?
Because the mighty Shigure is such a benevolent girl, all I've done is report what you did. Hahaha! Time to see how long you can evade capture♪
Heheh~ Retrofitting the mighty Shigure proves that you are quite perceptive! Aren't you glad that you get to rely on me more, you lucky idiot of a commander~♪
Shall I assume command? Understood! I won't disappoint you!
voiceline.oath: In the event we lose, please don't take it out on me!

voiceline.line: Houshou's carrot cake is just divine! I hope to taste it again sometime.
voiceline.oath: To protect what's dear, what matters isn't the weapon in your hands, but the will in your heart. Wouldn't you say that's true?

voiceline.line: Shimakaze-class destroyer – Shimakaze.
Hmm... Commission teams don't run into ambushes out at sea, do they...?
voiceline.oath: I've confirmed the commission team's safe return to port! A peaceful journey is always best!

voiceline.line: If you manage to right all your wrongs, then maybe you'll earn my forgiveness!
I am THE strongest destroyer! Or, so I'd like to think. But to truly become the strongest, I'll have to hone myself through my training and sorties!
People often say I'm too hasty, but isn't swift decision-making supposed to be a good thing? Plus, if you don't fight with all you've got, it could come back to haunt you! Hehehe!

Commander, what things motivate you to keep fighting? I'm just asking out of curiosity. Whatever they are, I will fight for them alongside you! ...Yes, I know, I swear not to get ahead of myself this time!

Could we go somewhere together after finishing our work today? B-because, well, we hardly get any time for ourselves during office hours... Okay, look! I'm saying I want some alone time with you, Commander! Would you... oblige?
voiceline.oath: Sweetheart? I'd love to have dinner with you after work, then go shopping together. I wish we'd have more time for ourselves, even if I'd always want more of it. Hehehe~ Got to make the most of what we can get, though, right?

voiceline.line: Mweeehhh... Please, d-don't touch my ears! It makes me shooo weak... Aaaahh...
voiceline.oath: Mweeehhh...

voiceline.line: W-welcome back, Commander! ...No, it's nothing, really! I was just wondering when you'd return...
voiceline.oath: W-welcome back, Commander! I was wondering when you'd return.

voiceline.line: Don't die on me now, engines... Please hang in there!
Commander, you're not the type to dilly-dally around, are you? That makes two of us! We'd better begin our work for the day!
voiceline.oath: Good morning, my sweetheart! Hehehe♡ Time for your morning kiss, just... Oh, sorry, we're at work! As you were, Commander!

voiceline.line: I-I'll reflect upon my errors...
Apropos of nothing, I think you should check your latest mail.

My rigging calibration checks out. I'm fully prepared to sortie at your command!|My shoes? They're quite special. In fact, these shoes are what allow me to go faster than everyone else! Ha-hah!|The Sakura Empire is home to many sword-wielding shipgirls... If I ever get the chance, I'd love to borrow and swing someone else's sword for myself.|Any two people can come to an understanding as long they're both willing to listen! That's what I've always believed!
voiceline.extra: My rigging is in tip-top condition! I feel like I could take on the world today!|I'm not THE fastest – I just happen to be the fastest ship! After all, one should not ever outrun humility.|Long-range torpedo strikes are my specialty, but... I don't suppose there is any way this fleet can leverage that.

voiceline.line: Aha! I spy with my little eye incomplete missions! Full speed ahead for those rewards! Right, Commander?
Mission completed! Quick, let's check what rewards we've earned!
voiceline.oath: Mission completed! I went ahead and brought you the rewards!

voiceline.line: I'm Shimakaze, the sole Shimakaze-class destroyer! I boast the highest speed and best torpedo capabilities of all fleet destroyers – a pivotal part of any torpedo squadron! No type of operation is beyond my capabilities! Ha-hah!

What is THIS?! Wasn't this meant to be an emergency mission briefing?! Wait, what's this ring...? I fell for it, hook, line, and sinker! But why trick me into coming? I would've agreed to it if you'd just told the truth!
Maybe I should turn this into one of my secret moves!
Huh? Have I done something incorrectly?
voiceline.oath: How can I be of assistance, Commander?

voiceline.line: Eek! What has gotten into you?! If I didn't know any better, I'd think... Well, just this once, I'll turn a blind eye to it.
voiceline.oath: At least you didn't touch my ears. The outcome wouldn't have been worksafe... Ugh...

voiceline.line: I am Shimakaze, the world's one and only Shimakaze-class destroyer! You must be the commander! Let us join forces and work towards our goals, together!
I can become even faster... even stronger!
All right! Another first-place finish!
voiceline.oath: The Shimakaze Fleet can make even the impossible happen!

voiceline.line: I'm truly in my element in this outfit!
Commander! Why not play a round of Shipgirl Bounty Hunter? There are many nice prizes you can win!
Hippity hoppity! Grab a glass and have a sippity! Whew, I must say, this outfit was tricky to get into. Still, you made an exquisite pick, Commander!
Outstanding work! I will provide tonight's entertainment act! As soon as I come up with something entertaining... Hmm...
I'm positively brimming with energy! Tonight, let us "party hard," Commander!

Abukuma invited me to go fishing with her! So, I'm going out to meet– Y-you think it's best if I change clothes first?|Suruga! You should try a bunny girl costume too! ...Y-you wouldn't be caught dead in one? Isn't that a little extreme, even for an aversion?!|These frills fit around my ears perfectly! Which is good, because I'd become lethargic if they were too tight...
Would you like a refill, Commander?
There being no danger of skirt-flipping doesn't make this tolerable behavior!
Hippity hoppity! Grab a glass and have a sippity! Whew, I must say, this outfit was tricky to get into. Still, you made an exquisite pick, Commander!
I'm the fastest, strongest destroyer... And that's a fact!
Though fate has been written, I shall fight until my soul's duty has been fulfilled...
Mmh... True strength can shatter the chains of fate... or is this but the moon's reflection within the water... Mm...
Yamato-class ship number three – Shinano.
Mmmm... The girls on commission are returning now... 'twould behoove you to forget them not...
From here, this one sees not any light...
To carry the burden of great expectations, yet unable to demonstrate the power to meet them... Such is fate's mockery of this one's existence...
To see destiny, yet to be unable to change it; or to be ignorant to the turning of fate... Which is the greater misfortune?

Long has this one dreamt... Tragic dreams that one wishes to never recall... Blissful dreams from which one hopes to never wake from... Even reality itself seems like just another dream.. Commander, is this truly reality, or yet another illusion?
I once lamented my inability to shift the hand of fate... But now, and forever... as long as you are here...
Aah... My ears are sensitive...
Nnnh... Your safe return... pleases me...
...I shall not retreat...
Nnnh... You have returned. Long, eternal, has this one's wait been...
Apologies... I have failed to meet your expectations...
Dismiss not the letters bearing distant thoughts...

Even the most beautiful flower is transient, to be scattered into the wind... But, 'tis better to bloom for but a moment than to wither eternally upon the vine.|Do you wish to rest within this one's bosom? ...Yes, just as the little destroyers do...|I would like to experience all this port has to offer... should it be possible...|I have left the report here... Hmm... There are many errors? ...'twould seem that hasty deadlines are not this one's strong suit...|Vrooom... Zzzzzz... Oh... Did I hit you by mistake? ...Sincerest apologies...
This task... can it be completed in time...?
As long as you are here, there is nothing that cannot be accomplished...

I am called Shinano, aircraft carrier of the Sakura Empire. I was to stand beside Yamato during that war, yet in the end... Alas, there is impermanence in all things, and nothing became of this one's life... May your guidance lead my fate to a different outcome...
The memories forged at this port... have brought me great joy... Alas, from now on... I shall cherish my time with you through fates both joyful and painful... through weal and woe alike...
Your fate... has been sealed...
Mmmm... Hm? ...I dozed off again? ...Sincerest apologies...
You musn't... Not there... Nnh...

This sensation... is that of reality... Was it you who awoke this one from her long slumber? Such is the inevitability of fate... Please allow Shinano, third ship of the Yamato-class, to guide you forward upon the right path.
May this not end in futility...
Is this... my power...?
Through the sojourn of the stars through the sky, through the waxing and waning of moons, fate remains immutable... In contrast, mortal dreams and realities alike seem like fleeting illusions...
The moonlight dims beneath hazy clouds, and the lights of the night sky begin to shine... The moon, and this sake, are both intoxicating... Will you not enjoy this fine evening with me...?
*sigh*... Sincerest apologies for this unsightly display... The destroyer children were playing around and made a mess of my tail... How embarrassing...
The shimmering of the countless stars, the dancing lights of the banquet... This night... has only just begin... Zzzzz...

Being able to enjoy tonight's banquet thusly... fills one with apprehension that this... may be yet another dream...|Though I have long been the plaything of fate, it still allowed me to meet you... How strange and whimsical a thing it must be...|Western spirits are a new experience for this one... Even this trifling amount... has already... gone to my head...
Beauteous is the moon tonight... Are you in agreement...?
The moonlight dims beneath hazy clouds, and the lights of the night sky begin to shine... The moon, and this sake, are both intoxicating... Will you not enjoy this fine evening with me...?
Gamers leader Shirakami Fubuki, setting sail~!
I'm a normal, wholesome, cute Vtuber~ I'm a bit shy but... Eh, you can't tell? Well, that's because I just like to talk to people~!
We meet at last! I'm Hololive's virtual fox, Shirakami Fubuki! Commander, now that you've called me, we're gonna have a foxin' good time! Now then, let's get to work!
Wow, everyone did a great job! Look at that huge haul! I'm going to go help them out~!
Commander, you really suck at this, huh... Oh well~ I'll help you out. Let's clear this stage together!
Ah, look at this, Commander! It's the tea I've always wanted to try! I just happened to find it here! Want to share some with me?
Woah, we really stayed up late chatting, didn't we... But doing this every once in a while is pretty fun. Right, Commander~♫
Commander, thanks for supporting me all this time! All right, we're going to throw a barbecue party tonight! Maybe I should... invite Kawakaze as well~
I've grown to really like this place. Of course, I feel the same way about you, Commander!
Uwaah~ Ahaha, p-please have mercy~ My ears are really ticklish~
Yo~ Looks like you're doing fine, Commander... Well then, rest up a bit and come have some tea~
Ah, waitwaitwait! ... Isn't this bad?!
Commander, welcome back! I've prepared some delicious tea for you! C'mon, let's set out together~♫
Nya! Isn't this difficulty setting a bit strange, nya?!
Ah, wait, the mail's here... Ohh, this one's addressed to you, Commander~ Maybe I'll let the others read it~

Hum~ hum~ Ack! Um, I wasn't slacking off!|The tea is really delicious today as well! Shall we enjoy some together? I can make the perfect cup of tea now!|The Fubuki-class Fubuki sure has a fluffy tail... I want to floof it!!|Heheh~ Commander, don't I look awesome in this outfit?
We have a lot of missions to get through... But don't worry, I'll help you out~!
Here are the mission rewards. Shall we start on the next one?
I'm the leader of Hololive Gamers, Shirakami Fubuki! In this world, I am destroyer Shirakami Fubuki!
Thank you so much, Commander! I'll keep striving to improve for your sake, so please continue to look after me as well! Of course, you've also worked hard as well. Good job, good job!
Cooooooooorrnnnn!
Commander, do you need my help with something?
Commander! My tail is really sensitive, so don't just go around touching it!
We meet at last! I'm Hololive's virtual fox, Shirakami Fubuki! Commander, now that you've called me, we're gonna have a foxin' good time! Now then, let's get to work!
Right, right! That's the feeling of getting stronger~!
As the leader of Hololive Gamers, stuff like this is a piece of cake!
Since I went through all the effort of putting a swimsuit on, why don't we head down into the water? Woahh... that's not what I meant! I just wanted to help out a little with the exercises…
Tada~! It's your favorite Shirakami Fubuki, Hololive Summer version! Commander, pleased to be your fox!
I'm okay with putting on my swimsuit and going out with you every once in a while, Commander, as a special treat. But only sometimes.
It's not a trip to the ocean without... swimsuits! The summery, slightly liberated version of Fubuki is here~!

*stare*... Commander, are you ogling me...? That's no good!|I see a lot of my friends in swimsuits as well. Looks like over here, you can play on the beach all year long.|It's a little embarrassing.. so please stop staring at me so much.
You're not allowed to touch right there either!
Tada~! It's your favorite Shirakami Fubuki, Hololive Summer version! Commander, pleased to be your fox!
Allow me to show you all my combat techniques...
... Touch me in the wrong way and you will die.
Kagerou-class destroyer number two -  Shiranui.
I waited 1 whole minute for you, yet you did not realize that a commission had been completed… It really is true, you are a big fool who cannot do anything if I am not around.
There exists no cure for your stupidity...
I am the polar opposite of Kagerou… If she is light then I am shadow. Commander? Yes, of course, you are a big fool. I do not hate her, but who knows if I hate you…?

I will come in the dead of night and devour you soul… I said, and you actually believed it? It was in fact my embers that chased away so many pests, and yet you thought I would harm you? You tremendous fool…
What an idiotic, troublesome commander you are, wishing to make everyone happy… I simply cannot let your stupidity go unsupervised.
*Sigh*... Would it not have been better if I could have been your guardian angel instead… Then I could always intervene… I mean, "protect" you when need be.
You may stare all you wish, but it will not make me start floating...
Could one say "long time no see," perhaps...?
Curses upon you all…
You seem to have "mail"… I should not have to help you with this too...
Floating…|I am bad at dealing with hotheads.|You're standing beside me because I have a "cooling aura"…? Are you an idiot?
It seems we have a new mission… However, I do not care either way.
"Rewards" have arrived… Ah, do not task me with collecting them, you may do it yourself.

I am the Kagerou-class... or rather, the second ship of the Shiranui-class, Shiranui. People mistakenly think my name refers to ghosts, but it is merely the name of a natural phenomena. I personally prefer to think of my appearance as a "cosplay"... That aside, I humbly ask for your kind treatment, you idio... my dear Commander.

*Sigh*… I never imagined a ghost could be brought here. Are you really just as foolish as you appear, Commander? Or have you seen too many of these strange so called "movies"? … Oh well, there is nothing wrong with this, so I shall keep your gift secure.
O, will-o'-wisps, join me for this strike...
Enjoying yourself, are you?
You have a thing for ghosts? You really are something...
I am Shiranui, the second ship of the Kagerou-class... I humbly ask for your kind treatment, Commander.
You certainly are a big fool, spending such precious resources on me…
I never imaged they would be this weak…
Commander, did you come to help out? To thank you, I shall offer you a 20-percent discount on these mooncakes...
Mooncake Merchant

I heard that in the Dragon Empery, the Mid-Autumn Festival is a time to be reunited with your loved ones. Commander, are you going to go watch the moon with your favorite girl? ... You want to go with me? Saying that won't get you anywhere... Fine, Commander, as a token of my appreciation, I'll give you a 50% discount.
That dumb Akashi, why'd she have to go and order so many of these... when am I going to be able to clear out this stock...?
Happy Mid-Autumn Festival... I hope I said that right...?

Lotus seed mooncakes, osmanthus mooncakes, five-nut mooncakes... If it sells well, it's a good mooncake, wouldn't you agree?|These sky lanterns look just like the full moon tonight. Commander, would you like one? |These mooncakes are one hundred percent authentic, unlike the tech p... Err, I didn't say anything.
Commander, you'll have to pay for anything that you touch.
Commander, why don't you calm down with a nice cup of tea...? Poured on top of your head, that is.

I see a chance... to capitalize on the Dragon Empery's famous mooncakes... Commander, would you like to have a taste of the Moon Palace's delicacies? If you buy them in bulk, I'll give you a special discount.
My will-o'-wisps burn stronger than before... *Giggle*, this is the power of money... I'm merely jesting, of course.
If you have this much money remaining... then you may visit me and spend it with confidence... A discount, you say...? Of course... Someday, I shall give you one...
Gawking won't earn you a... *Groan*... Then just for beverages, I could give you... F-fifty percent off.

Commander, you can make up for quality with quantity. Believe in yourself and pursue your dreams...|Work diligently and you will only be a fool by your appearance.|I take my work both as a secretary and shopkeeper seriously... If I feel like it... I could offer you a 5% discount.
Yes, yes, your wish has been heard. Please make your way yonder to amuse yourself with my will-o'-wisps.
Groping a shopkeeper like this... is surely not a turn-on of yours...?
If you have this much money remaining... then you may visit me and spend it with confidence... A discount, you say...? Of course... Someday, I shall give you one...
L-l-l-look out, get out of the way! My breaks aren't working!
Commander, what are you looking at? Hm? Come on, tell me...
Shiratsuyu-class destroyer number one -  Shiratsuyu.
Commander, while I was lost just earlier, I ran into some girls who'd just completed a commission...
Huh...? I got lost and ended up next to the commander... I'd better run...
Huh? Commander? Thank goodness~ I thought I'd gotten lost again... You saw me leave and come back here 5 times? *Giggles* Then today's a surprisingly lucky day~
Huh...? Commander? I realized a while back that I'm always by your side, did you cast some kind of magic on me?
*Whimper*... Commander, you're being mean... I thought I'd do something to you in return~ So I'll let you hug me...

Commander, recently whenever I see you I've wanted to tell you something, and I try to catch up to you, but then I forget what I wanted to say... It has to be something important... But what could it be...
Commander, you didn't get lost out there? Wooow!
Huh? So this is where you were, Commander... *Giggles*
Gah... ow ow... what in the world hit me...?
Commander, there's mail!

Commander, did you see my torpedo? ... It went off somewhere suddenly.|Weird... lately I seem to forget what I'm forgetting... What am I gonna do...|*Yawn*... So tired... I hope the commander isn't looking... so I'll sleep for a bit longer...
We've got a job to do! This time I won't forget!
Commander, I brought... Huh, what's this in my hand?

I'm the first ship of the Shiratsuyu-class, but I was meant to be part of the Hatsuharu-class... Anyway, where am I? Why am I introducing myself...? I don't really know... But I hope I can be of service.
Ah! Now I remember what I wanted to say! But... you said it first... even though I wanted to be the first to say it...
Huh? Where are we? Oh no, it's the enemy!
*Yawn*... I get so tired when people touch me...
Whua... it feels weird when you touch me like that...

Um, I'm Shiratsuyu, the first ship of the Shiratsuyu-class... Hello, Commander. My name is Shiratsuyu... Huh? I just said that? Hm... I don't know how to get back home, so I guess I'll stay here. I hope I can be of service.
Huh... Commander, where are we? My body feels so warm...
All ships, open fire! Wa... wait... we've already won?
H-here they come... Your order, and your cutesy dutesy maid... Whoaahh! I'm sorry! Look out!
*Sob*... I messed up again...
Commander, have you seen my torpedo...? Standing on it...? Wait... Oh noooo!|nil|Are you hungry, Commander? Umm, I have a sandwich... strawberry cake, and some coffee, if you want...
Whooahhh! ... Gosh, that was too close... Thanks, Commander...
Eek! C-Commander! Look out!
H-here they come... Your order, and your cutesy dutesy maid... Whoaahh! I'm sorry! Look out!
I have a little experience with leading a fleet, but...
Why does everyone want to touch my ears? What's so special about them...?
Special Type I-class destroyer number two – Shirayuki.
Sounds like the commission team has returned to port. I heard their footsteps.
I, I don't want to hear your noise...
I've not heard anything suspicious today... And that's a good thing.
I don't like crowds. All the noise they make gives me headaches... I much prefer quiet places.
We could share an umbrella on a rainy day, go for a walk, and just listen to the sound of the raindrops... Hm? Did I say something out loud just now?
Can I snuggle you up for a minute? Thanks... I can hear your heart going ba-thump, ba-thump. It's really soothing~
Eep?! S-stop it, that tickles...
*clap* *clap*... I'm glad you're back. Let's have some tea together.
This doesn't look promising...
I see, so that's how your footsteps sound... I'll commit it to memory.
They beat us... I'll cover our retreat!
Here's your letter. You should read it before it becomes old news.

I like the scritchy-scratchy noise paper makes when you write on it. It's relaxing.|Fubuki's always bursting with energy whenever I see her. I'm honestly impressed with her...|A carrot? Uhh, no thanks? What do you think I am? A rabbit?
More new missions... Ugh... Could I call over Fubuki for some extra help?
That noise... Sounds like our rewards are here.
I'm Shirayuki, Fubuki-class destroyer number 2. I served Destroyer Squadron 3 during the war, and... that's pretty much all I have to say. I'll make myself useful to you and the rest of the fleet.
Is your heart racing, Commander? That's okay, because mine is too. Hehehe~ So, do you promise to always, always be with me? You're not going to regret it? Great! Then we're wed now!
I'm... not afraid to bite...!
Is there something you want to talk about, Commander?
Wh-what do you think you're doing?!
Fubuki-class number two, Shirayuki. I'm a bit quieter than my elder sister... Mm, pleased to meet you.
Motivation overclocked! ...Is what Fubuki would say, I bet.
It's over? Phew... Looks like everyone's okay, too.
Today it's my turn to look after the bunnies. No, I said "look after," not "be looked after by."
Whoa now! There's enough food for everyone, so don't fight over it! ...Commander? Don't just stand there, give me a hand, please!
Come here, little bunny. There, that's a good girl... Phew. Finally got them all to settle down.
I recognize that sound. It's you, Commander! Heheh. I know it by heart.

Maybe I should also bring some hay along with the carrots... No, Fubuki! You can't feed that stuff to a bunny!|I guess the ears really are the first thing people go for when they see a bunny... No, I'm talking about bunnies, not me!|Oh, to be a happy rabbit, spending my days eating, sleeping, and playing with humans...
There's a lot you have to keep in mind when playing with a bunny. For starters...
R-rally, bunnies! Bite the commander!
Whoa now! There's enough food for everyone, so don't fight over it! ...Commander? Don't just stand there, give me a hand, please!
Sisters, charge! Let's show 'em who's the star o' this show!
Ahh~ the folks always tell me, I'm gonna be a real beauty when I grow up~
First ship of the Shouhou-class aircraft carriers, Shouhou.
A commission's all wrapped up~! Let's go welcome everyone back!
Commander treats me like a li'l kid too... Yer makin' me sad...
My children are all Shikigami - easy to store, but a pain to maintain! Y'all came at the right time - maintenance!
I have no regrets 'bout what happened at the Coral Sea. I read we oughta accept our failures, else we won't learn from our mistakes! Eh? You think I'm amazin'?
Commander, how do I become mature real fast? ...I'm fine as I am now? Really? But I'm always thinkin' I rely too much on you and my sisters...
Mm... I got it now. Relyin' on others ain't such a bad thing! I won't be all jittery about growin' up faster now... Havin' that said though~ Commander, can I rely on ye even more now?
Need a rest? How 'bout I give your back a nice thumpin'?
I'll protect ya even if it means puttin' my own life at risk, Commander!
How could I lose to those guys?
Commander! The mail's right above ya~

Ah, Commander, I'm ready to give it my all t'day as well! Let's go stick it to those bad guys!|My big sis and Kaga are always lookin' after me, but one day, I wanna be more independent!|Commander, the weather's real swell today! What's with the gloomy mug? Let's play together!
Commander, there's new missions here!
I brought the mission rewards!

I'm Shouhou, first ship o' the Shouhou-class! 
The luck's a bit poor, but they ain't a thing I can do 'bout that.

Eh? Commander, are y'sure this is going to the right girl? Someone as immature as me? ... I see, I've earned yer respect and recognition... Commander, from here on out, I'll do my best, so please continue to care for me!
It's show time, y'all!
I don't really mind, but you shouldn't be doin' that to others.
Nnh... Stuff like this... is better saved for night~
Commander, Shouhou's the name. I don't have a lotta firepower or planes like those regular carriers, but there's plenty o' stuff I can do that they can't! A real pleasure to meet ya!
I'm a li'l closer to becomin' an adult!
I've got the God o' Fortune by my side! Of course I'm gonna win!
Pumpkin Fleet, sortie!
Waaaah! My candy! Candy is spillin’ everywhere! ...Wh-why are y’all chasin’ me? Commander, help me catch the pumpkin!
Trick or treat!|Hehe, I’m a real beaut, aren’t I?|All these crazy pumpkins... whose sorcery is this?
Commander, it’s Halloween! Halloween!!
Commander, don’t! Nooo!! Those pumpkins will chase after anythin’ that touches them! Ahh!!
Waaaah! My candy! Candy is spillin’ everywhere! ...Wh-why are y’all chasin’ me? Commander, help me catch the pumpkin!
Don't look so sad... I'll keep growing. I'm sure of it!
Commander, how do I look now that I've grown up? Are ya fallin' in love with me already? Mhm, ye definitely are~
Sis... sisters...
Commander, gimme a chance to prove myself!|Why does everyone treat me like a kid when I'm already all grown up?|Grown-ups need to play, too! Won't you play with me, Com~man~der?
Commander, do ye like my Shikigami? They ain't the bitin' type, I swear!
I feel like I've definitely matured some! Commander, what do ya think?
Commander, how do I look now that I've grown up? Are ya fallin' in love with me already? Mhm, ye definitely are~
The perfected aircraft carrier, Shoukaku, setting sail!
The melody of my flute is a requiem for the dead. Shall I play it for you?
First ship of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, Shoukaku.
This is all required to carry out the Circle Five Plan.
I think I just saw a future in which you were cut down by Akagi, Commander.
My sister Zuikaku and I held on for two years during the darkest of times. If only our senpai could have worked a little bit harder.
Do I hold a grudge against the First and Second Carrier Divisions? Of course~ For them to leave us behind like that, wouldn’t anyone complain in that situation?
Those senpai are so sly! Just when I was about to overtake them, they went somewhere I could never reach! How unfair!
Commander, could you lend me your shoulder? Sometimes, even I want to simply clear my mind and rest. When I get like that, can I depend on you to be by my side?
The girls have returned safely to port, just like the Fifth Carrier Division always does.
Pump water to the other side! Hurry!
Intelligence is said to be a woman’s virtue, but that often puts me at odds with those senpai of mine. How troublesome~
Hiryuu-senpai may be willing to fight until the bitter end, but... that’s not my style. What a shame~
We’ve got mail from HQ, they told us to carry out the Decisive Battle Doctrine. Heh, just kidding~!

To always be dealing with those senpai from the First Carrier Division... Commander, you must have a really strong liver.|Though our relationship was once one of victim and perpetrator, I look forward to working with you, Lexington.|Zuikaku, if you keep causing trouble for our Eagle Union colleagues, you’ll only get tempura for dinner tonight~
Let me take a look the mission... It’s not the Coral Sea? That’s too bad~
We’re not going to carry out our plans of attrition warfare? Tch~

I am Shoukaku, the flagship of the Fifth Carrier Division. Because my super smart senpai went and got themselves all killed, I had to carry the flag of the Sakura Empire’s carrier divisions. Though I was more accomplished than them, for whatever reason, I was always considered weaker. Maybe it was due to my "lack of grace and speed" during my final moments... With that said, allow me to reintroduce myself. I am Shoukaku, the punching bag of the Sakura Empire. Please take care of me from now on~
The melody of my flute is like a flowing river, requiring an inspiration that usually can only be found atop a mountain. Just being by your side, however, inspires me even more.
This is the privilege of being the elder sister!
Commander, would you like to hear me play my flute?
Commander, come and indulge yourself in Shoukaku's tenderness.
As the flagship of the Fifth Carrier Division, I, Shoukaku, shall do my best to become as good as those esteemed senpai in the First Carrier Division, or something... *giggles* That was on purpose~
Now, I can protect Zuikaku better!
The Glory of the 5th Carrier Divison is here! *giggles*

skins.name: The Crane that Dances With the Wind

voiceline.line: All flowers must wither, all leaves must fall, and all dances must end... But right now, forget about all that and lose yourself in the moment.
I prepared this outfit just for the occasion, so... Commander, you're not going to disappoint me, are you? Hehe~♪
If I became a crane that danced with the wind, my safe harbor for when my wings become weary... would surely be by your side, Commander.
Because it's a special occasion, I'll call a one-day truce with those seniors of mine~♪
I wonder how you plan on asking me out to the banquet, Commander~ I'm looking forward to it, just a little. Hehe~♪
The flowers scatter in the wind...
I hear a little tune that's not coming from the banquet... What could it be~?

Zuikaku, you're being too nervous. Just do what your sister tells you to. First, relax, just relax... |Before the banquet begins, shall we practice one more time? |Who will be the star of tonight's show? Will it be me... or us? Hehe~♪
Don't worry, Commander, all you have to do is follow my steps slowly~
Just what are you doing, Commander? Please keep your eyes on mine when we're dancing~
I prepared this outfit just for the occasion, so... Commander, you're not going to disappoint me, are you? Hehe~♪
Zuikaku... She seems to be having difficulty adjusting to this kind of work. Commander, would you be able to look after her?
Hehe, this kind of work is a simple matter for me. Commander, please look forward to my performance~
Phew... Why don't we take advantage of the break to rest a bit?
Doesn't the breeze today feel quite pleasant~?

This kind of work isn't so bad once you get used to it. Hehe~ |Commander, after I finish my work over here, would you take me out for a ride? Oh, and Zuikaku too, right~?|Oh my, Akagi and Kaga couldn't make it today? What a pity~ I wish they could see the face you're making right now, Commander~
My hair's a bit messed up? Oh, thanks for the reminder, Commander.
You're welcome to sink into my warmth, but you'll have to wait until after work~
Hehe, this kind of work is a simple matter for me. Commander, please look forward to my performance~
I do not mind, but I really have to bring victory to Commander~
You appear to have time, Commander~
London-class heavy cruiser – Shropshire, Hull Number 73!
Commander? Staring at me is one thing, but you should also look out for the commission team. They have returned, you know?
Commander, you're in the way. Move aside, move aside
Do you need something? I'm concentrating on work right now, so spare me the sweet talk~
Commander, you are a good man and you have a prospective future. But after I think about it calmly, now is just not the time. I'm sorry!
You are my type, Commander, but there are no specific reasons for me to like you so... I'm sorry!
Please mind the time, place and mood when you do this, so I'm sorry! ... Ah! I don't mind the amount of times you confess to me~
You were dashing, Commander! I have to put in effort as well... Hmm, how about I heal your damaged heart from the battlefield, with my junior wiles?
Oh dear, this is bad!
Ah, have you come back, Commander? I was just about to go to your place~
Commander, clumsy girls have their charms as well, wouldn't you say? Heh-hey~
Commander, you have new mail~ Is it a love letter? It's a love letter, isn't it? Open it, open it!

I am a little nervous when I am alone with you, Commander, but since you are alone I'm fu... fully calm myself~|Com~man~der~ Help me~ Please, you are the only one I can count on~|Did you know, Commander? Sometimes, making small mistakes can make one seem cuter~
