A new mission... If you finish it properly, I will re-evaluate you right away~
The rewards have been distributed~ Or could it be~ that you want a reward from me?

The youngest of London class, and sent abroad away from my sisters. That is me~ Ah, it's not that I particularly wanted your sympathy, but if you give me a little bit of attention, I'll give you high points for that! ... Acting cute? Oh shush, I was being serious you know~
I'm sorry... is what you thought I was going to say? Well Commander, from now on, my life is your life~
Ganbara Knight!
If you don't do your work properly, even I will show an angry face for it. Com~man~der?
Ah! Commander, this is inappropriate!
London class' youngest, Shropshire, reporting for duty~ I've been told that I am air-headed and gullible, so I'll be giving you some problems~ Well then, my time awaits~
It's alright to not become stronger. I'm fine as long as I can be of use to Commander~
You need not shower me with praises. Pay attention to others as well~
Maybe I'll fight for real this time~
Look, Commander, I won't level up just from you staring at me.
Sims-class destroyer - Sims, Hull Number DD-409!
A commission will be finished in five minutes~! *grins devilishly*
Wait a bit... I'm just tidying up... I won't play any more tricks on you, Commander. Are you happy now?
Oh? You fell in love with me at first sight, Commander? I don't fancy anyone who is that shallow...
You don't seem to be too angry about my pranks these days... It's making me feel a bit lonely. Hm? No, I'm not trying to be cocky!
C'mon, why are you pulling on my cheeks... I was faking my smile? No, that was a sincere smile! Couldn't you tell?
Let's flip a coin, Commander. If it's heads, you have to say "I love Sims" once... Wait! Ah, you caught me. It's heads on both sides!
I'm heading out to take a bath, Commander... Want to join me? Heehee~!
Welcome back, Commander... Hmm? No, I didn't see who hid your stuff.
I would rather have stayed home and pranked the commander...
Someone's sent you a love letter! ... Oh, never mind, I read it wrong!
You know, I've got a little sister called Morris. She's just so fun to tease~|Try to find out how many surprises I've got in store for you, Commander!|Come on, let's play! Ahaha! Tickle tickle!
Don't forget your missions while you're dealing with my pranks!
Oh, these are rewards~ I was just about to throw them away~

I'm Sims, the name ship of the Sims-class. 
Commander... don't even think about mentioning the Battle of the Coral Sea in front of me. It instinctively makes me want to pull pranks on people~
What is it, Commander? ... Close my eyes? Haha, are you trying to get back at me for my pranks? Okay then... *Closes her eyes* You're so dumb, thinking you can... H-huh...? Is this what I...
Hehe, dodge this!
Don't you find this hobby of yours a bit strange...?
... You'd better be ready when you're going to sleep tonight, Commander!
So you're the commander... I'm Sims, the name ship of the Sims class of destroyers. Hehe, nice to meet you!
Hehe, thanks~!
Aww, you were so close to beating us~ Heehee~!
Hey, Commander~ You look like you're free, so let's play a game.
Y'know, Commander~ No matter how nice you are to me, I'm still going to prank you~ Oh, but if you want my help with pranking others, I'll consider it~ Heehee~
Well done, Commander~ Hmm? I'm not pulling any pranks today! Even I know there's a time and place for everything~ Heeheehee~
Commander, would you rather have an ultra-spicy or ultra-salty cake~?

That thing when you think you've been pranked even though I haven't actually done anything is a prank of sorts, too~|Hmm... You've gotten too used to my old bag of tricks, so it's time to come up with some new ones! ... Whoops, sorry~ First, I'll need to finish all this work~|Hey, Commander~ Don't you agree Hammann's reaction when she got pranked was just hilarious?
Ahahahahaha! That tickles! Stop it, Commander! Okay, I'm sorry! I'm sorry for pranking you! Ahahahahaha!
Y'know, Commander~ No matter how nice you are to me, I'm still going to prank you~ Oh, but if you want my help with pranking others, I'll consider it~ Heehee~
Let us bring victory and glory to our honourable Master!

My honourable Master, what would you like to learn more about today? Literature and culture? Logistics and strategy? The fine arts? Or, perhaps, you are more interested in more... carnal knowledge...?
Dido-class light cruiser – Sirius.
My honourable Master, I have information regarding the results of a commission, so please relocate to the sofa and get in a relaxing position.
...I implore you to be more honourable, my slightly disappointing Master.
I take honour in my service to you, Master. However, should you find my service unsatisfactory in any way compared to the Head Maid, I kindly ask of you to tell me.
To me, there is nothing more honourable than to have the privilege of serving you, my honourable Master.
If you find my embrace to be relieving, then I would gladly do so again at your command, my honourable Master.
I ask of you to stand proud and illuminate all the world with your glorious image, my honourable Master...!
It is good to see you return. There is tea and a light meal prepared for you. And, if you'll pardon my initiative, I have also prepared a creep... a crêpe. Would you like to have it now?
As the Masters maid, I shall not be defeated!
It is good to see you return, my honourable Master.
How shameful... My honourable Master, it seems I have made a mess of myself. Please give this naughty maid her due punishment.
My honourable Master, the mail is here.

"Cleaning"...? If it is combat you are referring to, then I vow to meet all expectations you set for me, my honourable Master.|Regardless of what may ever happen, I shall always accompany you, my honourable Master.|Achieving a balanced diet is essential for one's health. Therefore, although my cooking skill may be unsatisfactory to you, please do not forgo the meals I prepare, my honourable Master.
A mission of this magnitude is inconsequential. Isn't that correct, my honourable Master?
My honourable Master, the mission rewards have arrived.

I am Sirius, the 5th ship in the 2nd group of the Royal Navy's Dido-class of light cruisers. I participated in Operation Pedestal in the past, but now I serve as a Royal Maid and have the privilege of fighting for my honourable Master.
Oh, the bliss of getting to make this wondrous vow... Please, close your eyes for this unseemly maid and permit her to feel your warmth... My honourable Master...
My honourable Master, please grant me strength!
Please refrain from intimate contact while others can see us, my honourable Master.
If you wish for me to service you tonight, then... M-my apologies! I made a rather careless assumption...
It is an honour to meet you. I am Sirius of the Royal Maids, here to assume the position. Henceforth, Master, I shall serve you to protect your glory and your beliefs.
My honourable Master, I shall become even more gorgeous for you.
My honourable Master, I have cleared the path so that you may move forward.
No matter what clothing I wear, I am still your maid and live only to fulfill your expectations, my honourable Master.
My dear, I changed into the new outfit as per your request. I would be most grateful were you to offer me words of praise, Master.

Whether it's under the swirling lights of the ballroom stage, or in the smoke and explosions of the battlefield, there will never be anything more radiant than you in my eyes. My honourable Master, please allow me to gaze upon you and be at your side, always...
There is no greater happiness than your safe return, Master. Would you like to gather everyone to have tea?

Every single maid dreams of being able to stand beside her master in such a dress... Please forgive me for my presumptuousness... |This dress seems ill-suited for combat... but since it is your wish, Master, I shall humbly carry out your will. |This necklaces suits me well...? Thank you for praising this unworthy maid, my honourable Master.
Oh, my Master who has intoxicated me with passions so, it is an honour to have been chosen as your dance partner.
My dear, I changed into the new outfit as per your request. I would be most grateful were you to offer me words of praise, Master.

Worry not, for I have come prepared for every occasion. Food, drinks, magazines, sunscreen, contingency combat armaments, life-saving equipment, and... a cat? Why are you here? ...Oh, umm, I was just talking to myself!
I've received ample advice from my colleagues in the Maid Team regarding swimwear etiquette. My honourable Master, are you pleased with my appearance?
No matter where we are, I shall do my utmost to keep you safe. My honourable Master, simply enjoy yourself, however you please.

My honourable Master, why are you staring at me so intently? Did this humble maid err somewhere?! ...I'm overthinking things...? |Swimming? If... if you wouldn't mind teaching me... Um, sorry, a lowly maid has no right to request your valuable time... |My honourable Master, are you tired? Something to rest on...? ...Um, if you wouldn't mind, then... feel free to use my body...!
My honourable Master, allow me to protect you from the sun.
Understood. If you would like to see me in a bikini, then... Is, is that so? I'm terribly sorry... I prematurely jumped to conclusions yet again.
I've received ample advice from my colleagues in the Maid Team regarding swimwear etiquette. My honourable Master, are you pleased with my appearance?
I made some Dragon Empery dishes, however they turned out quite... Pl-Please, do not be concerned! *This* year, I vow to make delectable food that shall suit the honourable Master's palate!
I have heard it is part of a maid's duties to dress to her honourable Master's liking over the holidays. Would this outfit happen to... satisfy the honourable Master's wishes?
My outfit is unsafe to wear in windy weather? Are you concerned with my wellbeing and would not want me catching a cold? Oh, honourable Master, your thoughtfulness humbles me!
Happy Lunar New Year, honourable Master. I have made a cup of tea for you.

My honourable Master, if you'll forgive my asking, have you eaten any unusually shaped, unstuffed gyoza? ...P-Pardon me, I was merely wondering...|This naughty maid is deeply obliged to have the privilege of spending the holidays with her honourable Master.|nil
My perceptive Master, would there happen to be dust clinging to my dress...?
If you wish me to service you in these Dragon Empery garments, then... Oh, my apologies! I've made yet another careless assumption...
I have heard it is part of a maid's duties to dress to her honourable Master's liking over the holidays. Would this outfit happen to... satisfy the honourable Master's wishes?
Let's get warmed up!
Baltimore...? Oh, Commander... I didn't notice you because I was training.
Fletcher-class destroyer – Smalley , Hull Number DD-565.
The commission fleet has returned. Commander, want to race me to the piers?
Do whatever you want. I'm going back to training. See you.
Commander, how about getting some exercise?
Commander, want to go buy some workout equipment on our next day off? Using it properly will get you better results!
Commander, I see you also appreciate the feeling of making gains. Mhm, we really do understand each other.
It'd be fun to have someone who looks out after you and helps you out... Commander, let's get stronger together!
Here's a towel. Use it to wipe off your sweat.
Should've worked out harder...
Commander, can I train in your office?
Well, that's awkward...
New mail? I'll get it for you. Give me 10, no, 8 seconds.

Commander, I'll show you some exercises. You can even do these while sitting down. Not moving around is bad for your health. |There are very few restrictions to what you can do in kickboxing. However, it's not very useful in naval combat... so that's why it's just a hobby. |I want to spar with the battleships. They all seem strong.
Using missions to test your worth? I like that idea.
The feeling of testing my abilities is far better than any reward.
Fletcher-class destroyer, Smalley. I did radar pickets, patrols, rescues, diplomatic functions, and basically a bit of everything. My hobbies...? Do I really have to repeat what I said before?

Don't worry, Commander. We've worked hard together all this time, so I can guess what you're thinking. I understand your feelings... but I'm not sure how I should respond... Um, of course! If you're fine with me, I'd love to!
Dodge this if you can!
Commander, want me to show you the ropes? It's good for self-defense.
Eat my... roundhouse kick!
Destroyer Smalley, reporting in. Interests: kickboxing.
Thank you. My body feels lighter.
Hmm, not bad.
I can help everyone out and get some training in at the same time. This is the kind of work that I like.
I am the courier of the night. In other words, it's my job to bring stuff straight to you, Commander. Here you go, this jack-o-lantern is for you.
Candy? Forget it, eating too much of that junk will just erase all your gains... Fine, just one...
Let's use this jack-o-lantern to decorate your office. I'm putting it right here.

Rumors of wasabi-flavored candy? Never heard of it. I'm just the delivery witch. |Ghosts and monsters? If they exist, line 'em up and I'll knock 'em down. |My broom? Who needs to fly when you can just run faster.
Is there anything you'd like me to deliver?
...! Witch uppercut!
I am the courier of the night. In other words, it's my job to bring stuff straight to you, Commander. Here you go, this jack-o-lantern is for you.
Now we shall all find out whose equipment is superior!
voiceline.oath: Brutes like you deserve brutish answers – punches!

voiceline.line: Dust is a mechanic's mortal enemy! But, I have managed to prevent its spread by cleaning every nook and cranny of my workshop daily! My foresight is impeccable! Mwah-ha-ha-haah!
voiceline.oath: WHAT?! Dust is upon us! Comrade, open the window at once! Or else your screens will be ruined!

voiceline.line: Project 7U-class destroyer – Soobrazitelny
Commission supplies! Let's see what we have... Hmm, this steel container looks strong... I could find some use for it! Hah-ha-haah!
Others can fix your machines when they break, but only you can make up for the mistakes you've made, Comrade!

In contrast to the beauty of Mother Nature, the beauty of machinery lies in its unique status as the culmination of millennia of humanity's technological development! That is why I'm so in love with it all!
Hmgh! Hurmph! ...What am I up to? Working on my rigging, obviously. Don't worry about the parts rough around the edges – I'll just sandpaper those down later! Ahh-ha-ha-haah!

Would you be interested in building a small device, Comrade? I don't mean rigging repair tools, I mean something practical you yourself could use! Of course, you'll have a genius to teach you every step of the process!

It's true I talk about machinery all day, and yes, I build and tinker day in and day out, but that doesn't mean I'm a mechaphile or that I want to date a robot... Y-you see what I'm getting at, right?!
voiceline.oath: You needn't worry, Comrade! I may be obsessed with machinery, but I could never forget about you, my dear lover! On that note, why don't we go on a date to that toy store which opened just today? It supposedly has tons of mechanical toys on offer!

voiceline.line: Being a genius mechanic, I of course made these safety goggles myself! They provide flawless eye protection while I'm building!
Exemplary work, everyone! Is anyone in need of rigging repairs, by any chance? I'll fix and improve it so it works as good as new – guaranteed!
voiceline.oath: Allow me to fix up your escort ship, Comrade! While I'm at it, do you want any new additions? Like a massage chair, for instance.

voiceline.line: Th-th-this is mechanically impossible!
Splendid – you're back, Comrade! ...What's that noise you're hearing? Oh, it's nothing! I'm just giving your office machinery some ingenious upgrades!
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Comrade! Oh, mind your step around the components on the floor! Without really thinking, I turned your office into a second workshop. Hah-ha-ha-haah!

voiceline.line: How come I've stopped moving?! Come on, rigging! Why aren't you working?!
New mail has arrived! ...WHAAAT?! The parts I ordered are STILL in transit?!

Strain your ears and listen closely! The rotations of the bearings, the tension in the levers, the rigging's rhythmic ticking! The beat of an enchanting machine!|Plastic? Absolutely NOT! Who in their right mind would make components out of a material with zero reliability compared to metal?!|Clean though your office may seem at a glance, I can tell there is dust hidden all over! It's time to do some cleaning, Comrade!
voiceline.extra: The grinding of gears, the whizzing of a propeller, the ringing that tickles my heart... Whuh?! Hey! What are you touching me for, Comrade?!|Another one of plastic's shortcomings is the difficulty in fixing it. How so? Well, if I were to WHACK it, it would simply break – unlike metal.|Comrade! What are your thoughts on the Soobrazitelny-brand Automatic Door Closer? Now you'll never need to close the door manually again! I'll fix the frame damage caused during installation later!

voiceline.line: We've received new missions! Listen, Comrade - they may look hard, but that's no excuse to put them off!
voiceline.oath: We have new missions! Comrade! With me by your side, you have nothing to fear!

voiceline.line: Whew! That's that mission completed! All thanks to my peerless genius! Hah-ha-haah!
voiceline.oath: With your commanding and my ingenuity, we could finish these missions with our eyes closed!

voiceline.line: I am Storozhevoy-class destroyer Soobrazitelny, present mechanical mastermind and former member of the Black Sea Fleet! I've survived battles against numerous relentless adversaries, all through my sheer ingenuity and just a hint of luck!

My prediction was spot-on – I knew you'd make the first move! Heheheh! I love you too, Comrade! One might say... My love for you is as strong as the hardest steel! ...Maybe that analogy doesn't make sense, but you know what I'm trying to say! Hahahah!
Prepare to be blown away!
Don't be shy! Pet it to your heart's content! ...What? You weren't talking about my rigging?
voiceline.oath: Whereas metal is tough and sleek, your touch is soft and calming.

voiceline.line: Th-this is no way to treat a girl...!
voiceline.oath: Fweh?!

voiceline.line: Ahh-ha-ha-haah! Comrade! I am Soobrazitelny, the Northern Parliament's genius mechanic! Look no further than me for all matters related to machinery!
Rigging upgrade: complete! My genius knows no bounds! Hah-hah-haah!
Ahh-ha-ha-haah! Dispatching you cretins was as easy as tightening a screw!
voiceline.oath: Success! Hoh-ha-ha-hah! Victory for the galaxy-brained mechanic!

voiceline.line: Go forth, my Mechajuu minions!
Nuoooo! I spilled your cup of coffee, Comrade! This is bad! Terrible, even!
Yes, these data and results are quite interesting... Though they mean nothing to me! I am a genius mechanic, not an analyst! Ahh-ha-ha-haah!
Welcome back, hun~♡ Could you give me a hand with this experiment? ......That cold stare of yours is hurting my feelings.
What is it, Mechajuu? ...Ah, Commander! I've been waiting for your arrival!

Quite the useful fish tank we have here... Or, is it technically an aquarium? I confuse the two sometimes...|This outfit makes me look both intelligent and sexy at the same time. What an ingenious combination! Mwah-ha-ha-haah!|The screen went black again! So be it... Hurmph! Owwww! I forgot I'm not wearing my regular gloves!
Has anything got you stumped? I can give you a lesson – assuming it's within my sphere!
Mhaahh♡ I-I told you, I won't do anything crazy!
Yes, these data and results are quite interesting... Though they mean nothing to me! I am a genius mechanic, not an analyst! Ahh-ha-ha-haah!
Time to gather data! ...Um, what exactly am I meant to do?
I had hoped to avoid meaningless battles...
If this data can be of some use to you...
Aircraft carrier, Souryuu.
The commission team has returned to port on time. Inspecting results.
Please do your work.
What is it, Commander? You want to learn how to play Hanafuda? I don't mind teaching you if you're actually interested... This is Matsu, which means pine... This is Ume, which means plum...
My past? There isn't much worth mentioning, but if you're interested, I can tell you while we play...
I’ve lost track of time playing Hanafuda with Commander... Now that I think about it, weren’t you just using it as an excuse to approach me back then?
We started with Hanafuda, and shall continue with Hanafuda. If you win the next round, I shall do anything you ask.
You have a mountain of paperwork to sort through, but you should get some rest first...
Commander, please calm down.
Commander, your documents are ready. Please take a look when you have a moment.
Impatience is unbecoming. We must reflect on our mistakes upon returning.
Commander, new mail is here.
Commander, why are you daydreaming? Please, get to work!|Take your missions seriously! Don't get distracted so easily.|All air units, lock onto the Commander and get ready to unleash your bombs!
Please complete the missions as soon as possible.
Here is the mission reward list. Please double-check that you have received everything.
I am the first regular aircraft carrier of the Sakura Empire. As such, I served as the prototype for later carrier designs. Please... just don’t mention Midway.
Commander, where did you sneak off to with the base’s funds this time? ... A gift for me? Don’t think you can - Eh? A-ahem... just this time, I will let you off the hook.
Pig! Deer! Butterfly!
Commander... please refrain from disturbing people who are working.
You...! Do you want me to cut off your hands?
My name is Souryuu. Commander, from now on, please request my permission in writing before doing anything weird.
I shall repay you with my actions.
Do not make light of an elite aircraft carrier.
I tried wearing something a bit different from usual, but I'm not sure it suits me... Commander, what do you think?
Even though it's the New Year, there is still no shortage of work left to do.

Teaching the children how to write New Years' cards is unexpectedly fun. Just reading their innocent thoughts is enough to heal me. |Commander, I'm not some demonic taskmaster... As long as the work gets done, I don't really mind if you set some time aside to relax. |Commander, would you like to go visit the shrine with me?
Commander, there are some plans for the New Year here. Would you please take a look?
Commander, this outfit was not tailored for the purpose of satisfying your depravity.
I tried wearing something a bit different from usual, but I'm not sure it suits me... Commander, what do you think?
That's why I've been saying... even though it's the New Year, you can't afford to take it too easy.
I may be in the Morals Committee, but that doesn't mean I want to become a fusspot.
I am Souryuu of the Morals Committee. Our goal is to maintain public decency, increase student motivation, and... *Ahem*! Anyway, please allow me to oversee the school's moral codes!
She welcomed back the commission team, just like always... She is at the point of her life where she wants to spread her wings and be free...
I think Hiryuu is in her rebellious age... She won't wear the clothes I picked out for her, and she won't walk to school with me... As her sister, it's making me feel a little bummed out.

Please don't joke like that. My disciplined, respectful, dependable, good-mannered, and very well-raised little sister would never end up as a dirty delinquent!|Hiryuu's in her rebellious age... *Sigh*... Perhaps it's best to leave her alone for a while...|I have my planes monitoring every nook and cranny of the school. I recommend you don't do anything that would oppose school conduct.
I've been talking to Hiryuu less, yet her mood hasn't improved at all... S-she's not going to run away from home, is she?!
All planes, prepare for takeoff! No, wait, prepare to strike!
I am Souryuu of the Morals Committee. Our goal is to maintain public decency, increase student motivation, and... *Ahem*! Anyway, please allow me to oversee the school's moral codes!
No matter what situations may arise, you must always trust your judgment, Commander.
If I can become stronger through this... Commander, what are you staring at? Don't you still have work to do?
It seems like you no longer require around-the-clock supervision, Commander... However! Do not assume this is a free pass to slack off!
Welcome back, Commander. Here are the documents that I have prepared for you. Please make sure to finish them.

Have you finished your work? If not, please redouble your efforts. |You were spacing out again, weren't you? Heh, you can't hide anything from me. |Hiryuu hasn't been her usual self recently. I wonder what's amiss? It's making me worried...
Are you tired? In that case, please take a break. I shall handle the remaining work.
... Judgment shall be exacted upon you when work is over. Prepare yourself.
If I can become stronger through this... Commander, what are you staring at? Don't you still have work to do?
Let's finish this quickly.
Can you take pride in the duties you've fulfilled as commander? If you cannot say "yes," then you must reflect upon yourself.
I am Souryuu of the Sakura Empire's 2nd CarDiv. Let's skip the formalities and get to work right away.
The commission supplies have arrived at port. Examine them thoroughly and take stock of all costs, gains, and losses.
When danger approaches, don't wait until you regret it. It'll be too late by then.
In the future, your carelessness will become a fatal flaw in the face of a fearsome foe. If you cannot be strict and resolute with yourself, then I shall do it for you.
Hanafuda? That's a word I haven't heard in a while... If you're interested, I don't mind playing a round with you after work.
You're using hanafuda as an excuse to get closer to me, right? Hehe... sure, let's go for another round. In the meantime, I'll explain to you where you fall short.

You are now able to calmly and rationally devise a solution even in the face of the most desperate and critical situations. However, I'll continue to keep an eye on you, so don't let your guard down, alright?
Why don't we reflect upon the battle? It may be troublesome, but well worth the effort.
Calm down and look for an opening to break through–
Commander, now that you're here, let's cut to the chase. Here are the documents that need your attention.
We don't have much time left...
There's new mail, I left it on your desk. If it's from Hiryuu, I would've shown it to you directly.

Hiryuu... She's off training alone again, and she's still as strict on herself as ever. Commander, don't you think you should learn from her example and cultivate a bit more self-discipline?|The past cannot be changed. All that matters is that we live in the present.|Spacing out again? Haven't I already told you? Not a single one of your actions escapes my gaze.
It is your duty as commander to complete your missions. Go forth.
Here are your mission rewards– You can go take a break and leave the rest to me.
I am Souryuu of the 2nd CarDiv. I shall look after you so that you may become an exemplary commander.
How unlike you to get so flustered. –Wait, this is... I see, I get it now. Hehe, why are you worried then? My answer... has been set in stone long ago, yes?
I have no time to waste!
I'd like to believe that you have a good reason to call for me...
*sigh*... There's no cure for you, is there...
I am Souryuu of the Sakura Empire's 2nd CarDiv. Let's skip the formalities and get to work right away.
My strength has increased? I appreciate your effort.
A quick and decisive victory. Exactly what we needed.
Come at me with all you got!
South Dakota, standing by 24/7, Commander.
South Dakota-class battleship –  South Dakota, Hull Number BB-57!
The commission teams are back... If it is necessary, send me off as well.
... I shall follow your orders.
Your will is my command, Commander.
I exist to help you achieve your goals, Commander. Other than that, I have no real value... A skirt? I've never worn something so fluffy before.
Another way to live other than fighting? I... do not know what to do, Commander. I have always lived like this... Can you teach me?
So this is your perspective, Commander... I choose how I live, was what you said... This time, I fight not for my duty, but for the sake of your smile, Commander.
Good fight out there, Commander.
I won't hold back now...!
Commander, your orders please.
I am sorry, Commander... It's a shame...!
There's new mail, Commander.

In the darkness, my will was tempered. I fear nothing.|As long as I am of use to Commander, I am fine with handing my credit over to others.|Those who stand as Commander's enemies, are enemies all the same.
Commander, please do not forget about completing the missions.
Commander, the mission rewards have arrived.

Battleship of Eagle Union, South Dakota. When it comes to battlefields, I wish for you to not leave my side. I will protect you, Commander. 'The Strongest Shield'? Vain titles are worthless. There's meaning only in being useful.
I feel warm when you're by my side, Commander. Your goals bring me the drive to fight. I become happy when I hear your words... I once offered you my shields. From now on... I give you my heart.
This is your stop!
I'm ready to move out anytime.
If this is what you want to do...
I am South Dakota, Commander. I shall become your shield and protect you from all cannon fire.
My shields have become stronger
Partial victories aren't worth celebrating, Commander.
Aurora asked me to perform with her... I guess it can't hurt to try.

Massachusetts suggested I learn something useful that's unrelated to combat, so I started playing the piano... It seemed impossible at first, but after actually trying it, I've developed a pretty good feel for it.
Without you, I doubt I would've ever come to understand what splendor this world holds, or started playing the piano either... Commander, I'd like to play you a song that's important to me.
Everyone's back safe and sound. Now I can resume practicing with peace of mind.
What song should I play for you today...

I can't get used to this flimsy dress. I'd rather wear my regular clothes...|My cat goes for the keyboard when I'm not playing... Do you want to practice the piano too, kitty?|We can express so much through music. I suppose that's fitting for someone bad at expressing their feelings like I am.
Music and instruments are simply hobbies. We ought to prioritize our missions, Commander.

Massachusetts suggested I learn something useful that's unrelated to combat, so I started playing the piano... It seemed impossible at first, but after actually trying it, I've developed a pretty good feel for it.
W-wait a tick! Don't go charging on ahead like that!
Naturally, I rather enjoy being a knight more than a maid. Losing myself in this music is such a delight. Commander, you simply must try it as well!
Southampton-class light cruiser – Southampton.
Must we go meet the commission team? Very well. Let's head straight back for a rest afterwards. Hehe~
You know, Commander, if you keep pushing me like this I'm going to break.
Commander, have you devoted yourself to the fleet once again today?
Commander, you need not work yourself so hard, you know? Why not let, say... One of my maid sisters take some of your workload... Hmm?
It's not like everything needs to be done one hundred percent perfectly all the time. Just take it easy. It's good enough for government work. You need to cut loose more often.
Commander, if you don't know how to relax, just let me be your guide. Hm? What will I do? Erm, well, wait a tick and let me think! Ehehehe~
Commander, your office is much bigger than I expected... You know, this would be the perfect place to play hooky for a bit...
Aieeee! Pl-please settle down!
Oho! Commander, let us combine forces to finish the day's work as soon as possible!
Aieeee! L-let us beat a hasty retreat!
Who's the letter from this time?

Commander, why don't we put a nice old phonograph right there in your office?|The maids would be running ragged right about now... I am terribly unsuited to that sort of work.|Honour guard? Bite your tongue! I am a Royal Knight under the command of King George V!
A mission, is it...? There's still a bit of time until the deadline. I think we can worry about it later... don't you? Hehehe.
The mission rewards came in! Now there's no rush, but you'd better not forget to collect them.
I am the name ship of the Southampton-class. During the war, I was the only one of my sisters to be sunk. How lucky of me... Ugh. Let's not speak of such unpleasant memories...

Now, I know marriage is a solemn and serious ritual, but don't worry, I'm not going to stand on ceremony with you, Commander! Indeed, I have only one request: that whenever I wish to see you, Commander, you be there for me ♪
I do what I must!
Are you tired? Well then let's lie down for a nap, shall we?
I-I'm not a maid! ... Err, rather, you can't do that to a maid either!
Good day, Mast- ahem! My name is Southampton. Let me know if there's anything I might do for you. Oh and, not to be a bother, but is there a space here where I can make tea and enjoy some music?
I've grown stronger! But I do hope you won't increase my workload. Hehehe.
We have seized the day! Yaay!
Dressing up all Sakura style has me feeling like I want to listen to some Sakura music. Ehehe.

Hello there~! Royal Knight Southampton is reporting for duty in a Sakura-style outfit! Hehe, don't you have something to tell me about my new look, like how cute it is? Come on, don't be shy. Speak up~
What do you say we do a bit of New Year's rearranging in the office here, make it a little easier to faff abo... Ahem, easier to polish off those official duties. Hehe.
Commander, Happy New Year! Now it's off to the shrine for a special blessing, isn't it? Heheh, easy does it then.

I think this here is the "Demon Breaker Arrow," isn't it? Seems to be some kind of warding charm... brilliant!|I got one of those omikuji fortunes for you at the shrine, Commander. Let's see, what does it say...?|I find myself wanting to dive into all the girls' festivals now~ What delightful holiday do we have next? I'm so excited!
Commander, come do the shrine business with me! Let's see, I think the Sakura girls did it something like this... you put your hands together, don't you?

Hello there~! Royal Knight Southampton is reporting for duty in a Sakura-style outfit! Hehe, don't you have something to tell me about my new look, like how cute it is? Come on, don't be shy. Speak up~
Do you get how it feels to kick back and let loose to some heavenly music now? Ehehe.

Good day, Comm—Err, I guess it's "Master?" Ugh, I do prefer calling you Commander though... Anyway, I've been practicing the violin to help create better atmosphere around the shop. Did you come here because you were captivated by the sound of my music?
Good work, Commander. Y-you want to know what I've been up to...? Well... I've been slacking off for a bit, ehehe. Please keep it a secret from the others!
Commander, since you're here, take a seat and relax! Sip on some tea and enjoy some good music~!

I mean, this is something all the Royal Maids can do. Even I've learned most of the skills necessary for being a maid.|I thought it'd be nice if we didn't have to play music live, but Her Majesty demanded that we provide live music for her at the venue...|Commander, have any song requests? It's a special treat from me. O-oh, but... nothing too difficult, please!
An encore? Alright. Here's a special song, just for you~
Eek?! I played off pitch because of you, Commander!

Good day, Comm—Err, I guess it's "Master?" Ugh, I do prefer calling you Commander though... Anyway, I've been practicing the violin to help create better atmosphere around the shop. Did you come here because you were captivated by the sound of my music?
Crush the enemy! Break their spirits, then their bones!
If excellency is what you seek from the Sovetsky Soyuz class, I am your best and only true option!
Sovestsky Soyuz-class battleship - Sovetskaya Belorussiya.
Interested in a bet, Comrade? Do you think the commission team has returned with bountiful rewards, or few at all?
voiceline.oath: What, you wanna bet on whether or not our commission fleet is bringing back a big haul? Nah, no need for that. We pretty much know the outcome already.

voiceline.line: I don't care. You are absolutely nothing to me. Just stay out of my way.
How about a bet, Comrade? Do you think your job will only be accomplished thanks to my help, or regardless of it?

Oh, so you don't mind losing a bet if it means you get my help? I see. Well, regardless, it doesn't matter who wins a bet made on the spur of the moment. Now, what do you need assistance with, Comrade?

If you ever tire of managing the fleet and planning battles, I will take over for you. You can rest easy, knowing I will bring you good reports on the daily. Although, knowing your devotion to your job, I doubt you'd ever delegate it to get some rest.

You don't mince your words, do you? I will say I do prefer a forthright confession of love over beating around the bush. Standing at the top of the world, gazing at the horizon, with you by my side – I like the sound of that. Ahahaha!
Your little hand gestures have no effect on me.
Do not be so lenient with the enemy next time, Comrade.
voiceline.oath: There is no harm in prolonging the suffering of our foes, but do not forget the reason why we are here, Comrade.

voiceline.line: The battle is still under our control!
Aha! I knew you'd be back right at this hour, Comrade! Rossiya doubted my intuition.
voiceline.oath: You've come, Comrade. As punctual as always.

voiceline.line: Everyone makes mistakes, I suppose...
A letter? I welcome correspondence, assuming it is an enthralling read.
voiceline.oath: Letters, huh? Let's take a look... Wouldn't want to miss out on anything juicy.

voiceline.line: It's much more entertaining to lure your foes into a trap one at a time than to crush them all at once. Am I right?|Seems it's all quiet on the western front... Don't you have any palpitating news?|There is no greater pleasure than decimating your enemy with minimal losses. Wouldn't you agree?
voiceline.extra: That's checkmate. Hey hey, throwing in the towel already? What, you're making it seem like I'm bullying you or something~|The port sure is peaceful... just as it should be. Violence should have no place outside the battlefield.

voiceline.line: Comrade, sure we should not allow the glorious advance of our fleet to be delayed by such trifling missions.
Fantastic. With HQ's missions complete, we can finally continue with our own plan.
voiceline.oath: All right. After we finish these missions, you should go back to pursuing your own ambitions.

voiceline.line: My sisters and I were devised as part of Project 23, but we never saw the light of day, much less fought in the war... But on the other hand, it would've been ludicrous to sail into battle equipped with second-rate armaments. Now though, I would be content with just getting to perform at full capacity under your command, Comrade.

You hope this ring will forever connect me with you, do you? Then I believe it will, because I believe in you. Only you are capable of standing at the top of the world together with me. Do not let me down, Comrade.
Cease your pointless struggling!
Let me guess, you are simply poking me for your own amusement, and not because you need something done. Am I wrong?
You chose the most depraved of ways to prove you have guts, Comrade.
voiceline.oath: Hey, hey... I didn't call you here to make you all hot and bothered.

voiceline.line: Comrade, are you sure you're ready to have me under your command? Very well! Let us join hands and lay waste to our enemies — using my methods, of course!
We will curb the enemy with our superior firepower! Hahaha!
This comes as no surprise. All I did was nudge those fools toward the annihilation they so desired.
There's no point in betting on a sure outcome! Onwards!
What's your favorite book, Comrade? I'm asking out of curiosity, and to have something to recommend to Soyuz and Rossiya.
To pass the time by proactively reading, or by passively enjoying the company of others... Ah, good morning, Comrade, I've been expecting you. Hahaha!
I see you've all returned in one piece. Your reputation has further improved as a result.
Take it easy. There are many ways to kill time. Just pick one which feels sound.

Anyone's life can be enriched by having many diverse interests. Even I enjoy the odd girly hobby or two.|Oh please, don't toot your own horn, Comrade. I know several destroyers who read advanced literature too.|I need to get up and move around a bit. My joints start aching if I sit down for too long.
What, did my revealing outfit cause you a lapse of judgment?
To pass the time by proactively reading, or by passively enjoying the company of others... Ah, good morning, Comrade, I've been expecting you. Hahaha!
Commence bombardment! We will bury them!
Is that you, Comrade Commander...? I'm afraid the office is a bit messy. But we must make sacrifices to achieve our goals.
voiceline.oath: This port has such abundance. That leaves me one core duty. I must bring emotional enrichment to your life.

voiceline.line: Sovetsky Soyuz-class battleship – Sovetskaya Rossiya.
Military commissions? They are part of the logistical aspect of proper fleet management.
This negative attitude is unacceptable. You must be forcibly reeducated.
Your fleet must be an iron curtain... Hm, it's a metaphorical expression... My meaning is that I hope to see this fleet stand united, just like our Northern Parliament.
Comrade Commander, what is this? You wish to deepen your relationship with me as an individual, not a representative of the Northern Parliament? Well, such subjective decisions are acceptable.

Mm, this food is well made... Comrade Commander, thank you for serving me this meal, but I have to wonder, is this more than simple social etiquette? C- could you have some ulterior motive for this charm offensive?

Gah, well done...! I have no choice but to place the pride of the Northern Parliament on the line and face defeat at the hands of Comrade Commander's charm offensive! Now then, Comrade Commander, you face the full power of my love offensive!
Rest. And tell me now of what glorious victory you have won, or how you turn defeat to our advantage.
voiceline.oath: Comrade Commander, please eat this. Think nothing of it. Call it a personal supplement.

voiceline.line: It's not fatal damage...!
Comrade Commander, you are late. You must not forget your proletarian values.
Gah, how humiliating... to think a material defect would surface at a time like this...!
Mail. Comrade Commander, you must read it quickly before the next one comes bringing another letter.

A report I submitted went missing? Pardon my negligence. I'll make it up, so... please don't tell the others about this matter. |I hope that you can command from a global perspective. After all, the responsibility on your shoulders is much greater than just that of an individual. |When I was inspecting my rigging, I noticed a few more screws than last time... Hm, an unexpected "increase in resource allocation?" That's a good thing, right? |Your tactics are too conservative! As long as it has not been sunk, it can repaired, learned from, strengthened, and optimized... Continuing this cycle is the best way of fighting.
voiceline.oath: I need only focus my attentions on battle? That is a reasonable decision... But does it mean my clerical skills did not pass muster?|nil|nil

voiceline.line: We have a mission. I will handle the clerical work. You must be clear to focus on your duties as a commander.
Hm? Something missing from the reward manifest...? It should be generally correct...

I am Sovetskaya Rossiya, of Project 23. I was part of a strategic plan during the war, but for several reasons never came to be. I see though that I can prove my value here in this fleet with a series of decisive victories.

So long as I draw breath, I labor to carry out my mission. Not only as a member of this fleet, but also in service of the bonds you have forged... This is not a product of rational thinking alone, but also a decision born of my subjective opinion.
Blow them away!
You want to deepen our camaraderie? Very good, let us start by making a firm handshake part of our regular routine.
voiceline.oath: Comrade Commander, today's handshake. Mmm. Let us properly follow proper protocols today.

voiceline.line: This is not polite behavior.
voiceline.oath: Is this what the Iris would call a "breach of etiquette?"

voiceline.line: I am called "Sovetskaya Rossiya," and as the mightiest of all the Northern Parliament's battleships, I am her ultimate weapon. I will press onward to eliminate all obstacles that stand between you and the Revolution.
An excellent strengthening. The next one should be so good.
Kill confirmed. You cannot stop the Northern Parliament... You cannot stop our righteous liberation!
Freeze! Comply!
What is the most efficient way to dispose of... Ooh? I mean the refuse. Spare me that look of concern.
"Situation normal in all sectors of the facility..." Oh, it is you. I was just giving Minsk the daily report. Do you have something?
Facility inspection, watch patrol, and observations conducted in accordance with regulations. Everything running smoothly.

You find me more reliable than Gangut...? I am glad you see my value, but I find that a very low bar to clear.|This is all in service of a greater cause. The girls have fully committed their labor. You need not trouble yourself.|Document classification protocols...? I was trying to find the required materials, but seem to have created a bit of a mess in the process...
Now, your hand... For today's handshake. I am not going to clap you in irons. Relax.
Hmph. Do you want to be handcuffed?
"Situation normal in all sectors of the facility..." Oh, it is you. I was just giving Minsk the daily report. Do you have something?
I'm fully charged, bulin! Let's show them what a real bulin's made of!
If ever in doubt, just tell me to bonk it with my hammer, bulin!
Specialized Bulin Custom MKIII. Can be used to Limit Break all Ultra Rare ships.
Bulin! The commission team has returned with boatloads of rewards!
You've lost your way, but don't give up! Pull yourself together, bulin!
The other bulins are only one color, but I'm the whole rainbow! Which can only mean one thing: that I'm the strongest of the bunch, bulin!
As thanks for always hanging with me, I'll let you borrow my Kitty Kabam Hammer for an hour, bulin! But don't use it for any mean stuff, okay?
Are you sure you aren't hanging out with me too much, Commander? If this keeps up, the port will be in ruins soon, bulin!
I was made to upgrade fleets, nothing more, and yet you're being so kind to me... I love you, Commander! Let me give you a special type of bonk, bulin! Hm? You'd rather not?
Bulin? My gear and I both need to recharge, bulin!
Oh heck! My health bar is glowing red, bulin!
Commander, it's hammer time! You'll get super strong, bulin!
My batteries are out... My Kitty Kabam Hammer was never made for battle, bulin!
Is it true that more mail comes in when I go "bulin"?

Sleepy, bulin? Then I'll charge you right up! I just need to plug in my... What? That doesn't work, bulin?|You might get a surprise when you collect 1 of each bulin! But I dunno what the surprise would even be!|My Kitty Kabam Hammer goes glimmer-glammer, sparkely sparkle, whooshy-kablam! Check it out, bulin!
A new mission? A good bonk with my hammer should finish it, bulin!
Look here! Smash that Collect All button, bulin!
A wrench, a drill, and a hammer... Wait a sec! Is there some kind of pattern here, bulin?!
Woohoo! This shiny ring is proof of our love bond, bulin! Watch this! I'm gonna whack it to infinity with my hammer! ...Never, ever whack the ring? Okay then, bulin!
My hammer is the hammer that will bring down the stars, bulin!
This bad boy is my "raison d'etre"! Be careful with it, or you'll get hurt, bulin!
Oh nooooooo! I'm gonna overload, bulin!
Bulin~! Aren't you amazed? Standing before you is the legendary secret unlockable character of the Bulin family, none other than me! Rejoice, for you have been blessed with supremely good RNG, bulin!
Glad you asked, but I can't be enhanced, bulin!
My Kitty Kabam Hammer is the strongest around, bulin!
Commander... I'll work hard not to disappoint you!
Ah! D-don't touch me anywhere weird, okay...
Fletcher-class destroyer - Spence, Hull Number DD-512!
The girls are back! I'm so jealous of how awesome they all are!
You're a bit scary, Commander...
Woah! Commander... You scared me...
My big sister said... that I can trust you, Commander...
C-C-Commander, can I come stay with you when it's storming outside? I'm terrified of thunder!
C-C-Commander... I just watched a film in which two people really liked each other... but they couldn't be together in the end... We'll be together forever, right?
You're back in one piece, Commander... Thank the lord!
C-Commander... N-no, I wasn't waiting that long!
I-I'm so scared!
C-Commander... You've got mail...
Commander, it's so warm here! I think I can relax like this...|Thatcher's over there! She's making me anxious~!|Ausburne isn't like Thatcher at all... She actually helps me when I need it!
Commander... You haven't finished all of your missions...
Remember to claim... that... reward...

I'm... Spence from the Little Beavers. I took part in the Great Marianas Turkey Shoot with my younger sisters. Oh no! A h-h-hurricane is coming... Sorry, Commander, I forget everything when I get nervous!
So you like me too, Commander? W-w-w-what will I do now... I'm so happy that I can't stop crying...!
I-I-I'll try my best!
I'm sorry that I don't live up to your expectations, Commander...
Eeek~! Um... W-what am I supposed to...
Huh...? C-C-C-Commander... Hello... Spence h-has been wanting to talk to you... b-but didn't have the courage to...
U-u-umm... I'll try to work harder now!
Whew, that wasn't easy...
Did you hear that? That was the sound of the Winds of Fortune!
Unlike those Sakura Empire ships, I don't bring any misfortune to my allies. Probably… I hope…
Brooklyn-class Light Cruiser – St. Louis, Hull Number CL-49!
Hmm... Okay, I'll go greet the returning commission team with these clothes.
At least spare Helena...
Things might have gone differently at Kolombangara, had Helena been there...
Want me to help you clean your office, Commander? ... You don't!?
Hehe~ I know about all the secret things you have hidden in your room, Commander~!
Whew… Cleaning is always such a pain… Hey, why don't we go on a date somewhere, Commander?
Always remember: "the feud chair is unpredictable"… Hmm, I heard that from someone, but who…?
Hehe... my luck is second to none!
Luck never stays with one person for too long, Commander. We should make the best use of it while we still have it.
Today is not my lucky day…
New mail? It must be good news!
What are you looking at, Commander?|Helena, your SG radar can't detect underwater threats.|Arizona, even if you'll never forget what happened that day, you shouldn't let it wear you down so much.
Hey, Commander, you should prepare yourself for a real surprise.
Hehe... You're so spoiled, Commander... Okay, before you go and collect those rewards, you can stay here for a while and rest if you want.

I'm St. Louis, Helena's big sister. I got my nickname, Lucky Lou, from getting through the attack on Pearl Harbor unscathed. After that, however, my missions didn't go all that well. I guess luck really does come and go after all...
Oh dear, why are you giving me a present all of a sudden... Ah, I see, it's one of these... Okay, could I ask you to put it on my finger for me, Commander?
Lucky Lou!
You get good luck if you touch me? I've never heard of that before.
This isn't something you should do outside, Co-man-der~
Hello, I'm St. Louis, but I'm called Lucky Lou. Hey, Commander, don't you think it's your lucky day, finding me like this?
Luck comes and goes. You can't depend on in it forever.
Hehe~ That wasn't all thanks to luck.
What do you think of this foreign dress, Commander? *Giggle* ...Perhaps it's rekindled something within you?

How I wish I could bring this chair with me on sorties... Helena, could you help upgrade my rigging?|I am Lucky Lou. I may not look like it, but I actually have experience with fortune-telling.|Brr... It's actually a bit cold... Commander, could you come a little closer and... share your body heat with me?
Oh, do you mean I've put it on wrong? Have I really...?
What do you think of this foreign dress, Commander? *Giggle* ...Perhaps it's rekindled something within you?
The Sakura Empire's clothes are just so refined. Ahaha... Aren't you cold standing out there, Commander? Sit down with me and have a drink.
Hmm... seems it'll keep snowing for a while. Why don't you stay for the night, Commander? ...Oh? I was thinking we could share some drinks, but perhaps you had something else in mind? Ahahah♡
Welcome back. I've put on the heater for you. Oh, me? I'd like to stay here and enjoy the snow a little longer.
You should drink a little something to warm yourself up before getting to work.

A "hatsumode," huh... Do you have any wishes to make, Commander? It so happens I don't, so you can have my wish.|Not to say the Eagle Union's new year celebrations are lonesome, but the Sakura Empire's and Eastern Radiance definitely celebrate New Year's with more festivity. And I like festivities.|Oh, Commander, if you're hoping to get me drunk... well, it depends on how much you yourself can drink. Ahahah~
Are we heading out? Ahah, then let me get out my umbrella. Hey, come closer, otherwise you'll get snow on your clothes.
The Sakura Empire's clothes are just so refined. Ahaha... Aren't you cold standing out there, Commander? Sit down with me and have a drink.
Hehehe, you thought I'd drive in these high heels? It's certainly not impossible, but I'd rather use the other pair of shoes I have inside.
Oh my, what a good little commander you've been, waiting here all this time for me. Hop in~ Did you think you would be driving? Hehe, you shouldn't underestimate me~
As much as I like parties, I like being alone with you even more, Commander... Maybe we could sneak out and go for a drive together? But probably not~ Hehehe~
Do you have everything, Commander? We're not driving back if you forgot to bring something.
The view here is lovely~ Let's pull over for a moment to take in the winds of good luck.
Helena messaged me, saying the party's starting soon. Check your mail, then let's hurry on back to the venue.

Oh dear, was that... Jamaica? Hehehe... Fasten your seatbelt, Commander. This'll be a bit of a wild ride.|You want to use my car? You can, of course, but promise me one thing in return: take Honolulu on a nice trip.|Whew... Finally we've arrived at the party. Now, Commander, wait here for thirty minutes while I reapply my makeup. Relax, I'm just joking! Hehehe~
You have an urgent mission? I'll wait another five minutes for you, then.
Oh, you went and claimed those mission rewards? You could've taken your time if you wanted. Hehehe~
Let's see here... Ah, thanks, Commander. Hehehe, you're getting quite good at this.
Oh my, what a good little commander you've been, waiting here all this time for me. Hop in~ Did you think you would be driving? Hehe, you shouldn't underestimate me~
Combat mode, activate! Set sail!
What are you staring at? I'm not going to transform...
Fletcher-class destroyer - Stanly , Hull Number DD-478.
Next time you're sending a commission, let Stanly handle the escort duty!
Stanly is now operating in disappointment mode! Hmph!
Stanly's in happy mode today – I can take on any task with a spring in my step!
The other members of the Little Beaver Squad are fun to hang out with, but I still have the best time when I'm with you, Commander!
As long as I'm with you, my happiness gauge will continue to fill up! So, Commander, please stay and play with me for a while.
Warning, Stanly has entered the "will self-destruct if not within a 3-meter radius of Commander" mode... I-I'm serious! So, I'm going to make sure I'm never separated from you, heehee~
Yo... When'd you get back, Commander? Stanly's rest mode still needs a while to run its course.
C-convert to defense mode!
Stanly has entered work mode! By the way, it doesn't last very long.
Crap, gotta switch to retreat mode pronto!
There's a news update! Don't say I didn't tell you!

Commander, join me in becoming a hero of justice... Bahaha! Just kidding! |Commander, are you still in work mode? Jeez, don't keep me waiting much longer... |Commander, your hair sure is funny! Let's give it a good twirl~!
I wish I had some mode that would let me skip the daily grind...
Whoa! The rewards are here! Commander, let's go take a look!

In the past, I've escorted many of my allies, and served in the Battle of Empress Augusta Bay as a member of the Little Beaver Squadron. As long as I'm in my serious mode, I'm really reliable in both day and night battles.
Commander, your hand, please... Good, connection complete! From now on, we will be able to communicate telepathically! Heehee, do you feel how happy I am?
Attack! Attack!
Self-defense mode activating... Bahaha, you should've seen your face!
Sorry to disappoint, but I don't have a hot and bothered mode.

Good morning, Commander. I'm Stanly, a destroyer from the Eagle Union. I will follow your every order to bring you victory... Pffft! Bahaha! S-Sorry, this whole "serious introduction" thing totally cramps my style, haha!
Strengthening complete! I'm gonna reward myself to a little rest and relaxation!
Heheh! MVP belongs to me!
All right, since I've gotta take this flagship thing seriously... Let 'em have it, girls!
Here to chillax and hang out, eh, Commander?
voiceline.oath: Got something you need from me? Sure, just say the word and you got it. Not a whole lot going on anyway, so maybe I'll do you a little favor~

voiceline.line: Fletcher-class destroyer – Stephen Potter, Hull Number DD-538.
A commission's been completed. Just throwing that out there before I forget.
Yeah, no, I'll find someplace less boring to hang out. Hit me up only if you've got business with me.
You need help with something? I've got a bazillion sisters, why not try asking them first?

Hm? Why do I always just sit and stare when you take me in as the secretary? Becaaaause... you never explicitly ask for help? If you need something done, just like, tell me? I'm not the most attentive person in the universe, so sorry for that.

It's getting harder and harder to tune you out of my mind... No, I don't mean that in reference to like, work, my free time, or whatever... I mean you, Commander. I'll just keep my eyes on you for now.

Well yeah, I've thought about love before? It's not alien to me. Although thinking about it drains too much brainpower and just makes me sleepy in the end. I'd rather just be with you, Commander, and figure it out over time.
Okay, now I think I get why some girls have headpat addictions.
Hum-hmmhm~♪ Oh, welcome back.
All right, no more messing around...
Welcome to the circle of hell known as "the office." Relax, I'll lend a hand if the cauldron gets too hot for you.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back to the little bit o' heaven known as "the office." Of course, heaven is wherever I am, right?

voiceline.line: Crap. I went too easy on 'em...
Kind of curious who sent that unread letter on your desk.

Dang, you caught me spacing out at work. ...Oh? Maybe you didn't after all? Cool. I'll just get back to doing it then.|Hey, how about a bit of jazz? Chill, I'm just getting up to put a song on. I'm not gonna bail on you or anything.|Mind if I borrow your coat, Commander? Thanks. This will work great as a blanket.
voiceline.extra: Listening to music really puts you in that efficient state. Oh, I was talking about gaming. I'm fallin' asleep over here at work anyway, so what's the harm in enjoying some beats?|Commander's jacket... *sniff, sniff*... Great, nice and clean. Go, me!

voiceline.line: Hey, a new mission! Oh, whoops... I guess we've both gotta actually do work now that I've said that.
voiceline.oath: We've got new missions! Gotta do this stuff sooner or later, so why not get it outta the way now?

voiceline.line: Finished a mission, huh? Cool, then let's take ten to veg out.

My record's got the usual destroyer stuff. You know, did anti-air duty, hunted a submarine, and went on the odd rescue mission. So basically, I can do anything a destroyer should be able to, just don't expect me to singlehandedly save the day like some superhero.
It's gonna be so tiring, dealing with the responsibilities that come with getting hitched... Just saying, that's all. Hehe, I can handle a bit of fatigue as long as I've got you, sweetheart.
Let's get this over with.
You want some gum? 'Kay. Mint or orange flavor?
Whoa! Talk about a blunt-ass approach...
Fletcher-class Stephen Potter here. You've probably met a million of my sisters already, so I'll spare you my life story. See you around.
Welp, guess the Slacker Council has to disband for the day.
Cool beans. I wasn't trying to style on 'em, but I'll take any commendations I'll get.
voiceline.oath: Meh. Can't afford to let you down, and all that jazz.

voiceline.line: I've got bunny pajamas on top of a bunny girl costume. That's double the bunny right there.
Welcome to my private retreat, where you can skip work and veg out all you want. And by "skip work" I mean "enjoy your regularly scheduled day off." Anyway, make yourself at home, Commander.
It's only human to want to touch the bun, I guess.
Oh, there's that collector's edition I ordered. What to do with these stickers... Guess I'll put 'em somewhere.
Heya. Wanna play a game? Mobile, console, or tabletop?
Oh, new mail. Let's see here... Figures. This one's for you, Commander.

Meowfficer plushes, Manjuu hand puppets... I never realized how much weird stuff I've amassed over the years.|I invited Laffey over, thinking she'd be fun to chill with. Turns out she's just a sleep junkie, like Nicholas. |Yeah, the place is a mess, but I'm used to it. It's way too much work to tidy up, so let's not.
You want a bubblegum kiss? Sure. I've got plenty of flavors you can choose from.
I'm starting to think this outfit is a bit too inviting...
Welcome to my private retreat, where you can skip work and veg out all you want. And by "skip work" I mean "enjoy your regularly scheduled day off." Anyway, make yourself at home, Commander.
Stremitelny, setting sail!
Everyone in the Northern Parliament likes calling each other "comrade." Comrade Commander! I'm Comrade Stremitelny! ...Buuuut, that's a heck of a mouthful, so I'm just gonna call you Commander!
Gnevny-class destroyer - Stremitelny.
I'll go greet the friends coming back from their commission! ...I'm not going to throw snowballs at them!
I hate you! Stay away! One step closer and I'm gonna pummel you with snowballs!
My snowballs are gentle! There are no rocks or bits of ice inside, only softness!
Secret technique! Snow down the back of your neck! That oughta freshen you back up, or so Minsk said! ...Um, Commander... You're not upset, are you?
Are you cold, Commander? C'mere! Come stick your hands here where it's nice and fluffy! ...Hehe, aren't I super nice?
Come build snowmen with me, Commander! You'll make one, I'll make one, and then we can have them hold hands, just like we're doing now! Ehehe~
Geh, you meanie! You're gonna make my hat come off!
My sisters said that I'm not allowed to drink vodka because that stuff melts snowballs or something... Uhh, somehow that doesn't sound quite right...
I hate airplanes! Shoo, go away!
Hurry up and come play in the snow with me!
Ehhhhh?! How could I lose?!
Your mail's here! Catch~! ...Eh, I'm not allowed to throw it...?

Chang Chun and I were looking into a way to retrofit our naval guns into snowball launchers. Eh, that's not allowed..?|Why am I called Snezhok? Well, it means "Little Snowball," and I'm a little cutie who likes snowballs.|During the winter, you can have snowball fights, build snowmen, and wear fuzzy clothing! Winter's the best!
Commander, are you letting your missions pile up like snow on the branches?
Mission complete! Wooooohoo~!
So, I'm Stremitelny of the Gnevny class. My friends and I did some escort missions as well as coastal support operations! Commander, if there's anything I can help with, just say the word!
Hauuu... My face is burning hot, like I'm gonna melt for real! But... if I can melt right into your heart like this... that wouldn't be half bad. Ehehe~
Behold my might!
Do you like playing with snowballs too?
Now I'm angry! Take this! And this! And this!

Way! Too! Slow! Why'd it take you so long to find me?! That's right! I'm Stremitelny of the Gnevny class, but you can also call me by my nickname, Snezhok! Anyway, here's a snowball to commemorate our meeting, catch~!
Snowball fight or gunfight, I feel like I can't lose!
Hehe, victory! Commander, I want a prize!
Pamiat Merkuria is way above my skill level... Oh, I know! Commander, practice with me so I can get better!
It sucks not being able to play in the snow... Oh well! I'll play some games instead! Commander, let's play something fun together!
The commission team's back. Uh-huh... Okay, okay! I'll do it next time, I promise, just go and greet them this time for me! Please!
*yaaawn*... Hm? What time is it? Eh, guess I'll boot up the console and play something... Wait, no! I've gotta get eady for work!
Whoa! When'd you come in here, Commander? Never mind, let's just play video games!

Whew, I'm tired! I'm gonna put on my sleep mask and catch some z's! ...Dang, not happening?|Rekordny! An Shan! I know you've got games in your room! You can try to hide your power level, but you're also a gamer, aren't you?|I learned a ton of gaming trivia from Pamiat Merkuria!
O-one more round! If you win this one, then I'll get up and do work!
It sucks not being able to play in the snow... Oh well! I'll play some games instead! Commander, let's play something fun together!
The enemies look quite strong...
My post-retrofit performance is very impressive!
Kent-class heavy cruiser - Suffolk, Hull Number 55!
That cloud looks like cotton candy... hmm? Ah, Commander. The commission team is back~!
... The sky is so blue...
Hmm, clear skies, so a great day to scout out the waters~ Do you want to come with me, Commander?
Reconnaissance is a very important task! Huh, I'm losing focus? W-what are you saying? I'm just o-observing the weather...
My big sisters are so strong, if only I could be of more help to them... Huh? I'm doing a good job as well? Hehehe... I received a compliment~
Even though it's nice to receive compliments, I am much happier just being able to support you the best I can, Commander.... Why is that?
Good work, Commander! Care for a cup of tea?
Commander, you're back! Me? I'm looking at the clouds.
*Cries*... If only I had paid more attention...
Commander... hm... what did I want to say... Ah, right! New mail for you!

My greatest accomplishments were done just watching the waves like this.|Commander, want to watch the clouds with me? I bet we'll see some wonderful things!|Don't look at me like that, I've been to plenty of places before!
The weather sure is nice... Oh? Commander! You've got some new missions.
Commander! How can you also be so forgetful and forget to collect your rewards?
I'm the fifth ship of the Kent-class. Although I look like this, I can still pull it off when it counts. During the Battle of the Denmark Strait, I basically saved the day!
Hmph, the Commander has finally noticed that under all that hazziness there is brilliance to be found! From now on I can be as lazy as I want. ... Huh? I can't?
What a beautiful seagull...
... C-Commander?
... Ah! Commander! If you were here you should have said something.
Where am I...? Ah, excuse me! Do you kno....Oh! You're the commander? This is great! I'm Suffolk, I finally found you!
Now I can protect myself even if I get lost again!
That cloud looks like a.... Oh? We won?
Now I can do more than ever before!
Whew... At long last, after all that hard work, I get to wear this uniform as well. Even though all I did was... Huh? Lead by example? Be a role model? I don't get it...
Hum~hum~hum~ Let's plant some flowers~ Oh! Commander, the commission team has returned!

This skirt is so long.... One of these days I'll space out and trip on it....|Commander, I found an interesting flower, do you want to water it with me?|Commander, did you know? After my retrofit, my radar became super strong! Huh? Then keep working? I'm... I'm sorry...
Commander, let me pour you some tea. Oh, oh, oh! Be careful!
Whew... At long last, after all that hard work, I get to wear this uniform as well. Even though all I did was... Huh? Lead by example? Be a role model? I don't get it...
Let's fakkin' do this! Grraaaaagghh!
Are you here to play a game, Commander? I was just about to start streaming one, actually! Would you like to play it with me?
HAI DOMO! Virtual Gamer Kizuna AI here! Don't worry, Commander, I've played AL a whole bunch before! ... Wait, I've become a ship now?!
The commission team is back. Start another one immediately! We don't want to waste time!
AAAaaaaAAAAAaaaaaAAAAAAHHH!!!111!eleven!!
It's not easy to be a streamer. I try as hard as possible, but people still call me a noob... What should I do to get better?
Huh? Stream a horror game? No, I don't want to... I really, really, really don't want to!
Damn it all! Why are my horror game streams so popular?! I have you to thank for suggesting it, but... please suggest a less scary game next time!
You're such a good game explainer, Commander! You know about all sorts of games, and nobody will call me a noob A.I. with you by my side! ... I'm counting on you, Commander!
Great performance, Commander! Huh? You want a lap pillow? ... Fine, fine. Inazuma babies you too much. Whatever, go ahead and let your guard down. Inazuma, do the next one for me.
Oh, crap...
You haven't forgotten about the monthly check in, right? That'd be a real noob move!
Okay, I'm getting ticked off now! I'm not forgetting this, ever!
Hey, we've got mail! Maybe it's a present from the publishers!

Maybe I'll host the Kizuna AI Cup here! Ayanami and Long Island said they'd be down, so why not be our 4th player, Commander?|Being a genius but in reality playing like a total noob is suffering...|Whoosh! What do you think about this pose I learned from Jamaica? Don't I look cool?
Mission located! Let's do tons of them so we'll earn a boatload of money!
Mission complete! Let's see what we got! Hm? What's up, Ikazuchi? You what? Secretaries can't collect mission rewards?!
My hair? Heheh, I'm virtual so I can change my hair's length whenever I want. How else do you think I look this cool while I'm fraggin' out? I'm the super gamer version of Kizuna AI! Check it!
You got this ring just for me, didn't you? I'm so happy! Er! Actually, I meant I'm really grateful! ... I can't wait to hear you talk about games every day from now on! And thanks for all your help!
Here I go! Ba-biiiing!
You wanna play a round with me? Certainly! I accept your challenge! My skill should not be underestimated!
Commander, do you know what a "headshot" is? Mind if I perform one on you?
HAI DOMO! Virtual Gamer Kizuna AI here! Don't worry, Commander, I've played AL a whole bunch before! ... Wait, I've become a ship now?!
Technically, I am an aimbot!
A winner is me! I'm the MVP!
They're just slightly bigger targets! On y va!
Commander, why don't we design a flag for the fleet? Let's make it look like the Iris Libre flag~
Cruiser submarine – Surcouf.
Commander, a commission's been completed~ I'll go check if they found anything neato♪
Oh, Commander, could you get back to work? I have more fun when you're not around.
So apparently, I'm named after a big-shot pirate! Some say that's pretty cool, but I'm not a fan of those guys, so I don't really care.
Salut~! Wanna go have some fun, Commander? Let's take a walk around town, go shopping, then fall asleep in a grass field~
Commander, I've found a fantastic napping place, and I'll tell you where it is. Oh, and don't tell anyone else, okay? Let's keep it a secret between just the two of us♪
*Giggle* Aren't we practically made for each other? It's not every day you find people as closely in synch as we are~ Say, isn't it time we become a couple now?
Commander, did you bring anything for me?
I promised the Commander I'd fight and give it all I've got!
Salut~ Good morning, Commander~
Oops, we lost... Commander, think we should flee?
Commander, you've got new mail! ... Huh? No, I didn't bring it with me. I'm just saying you should go get it~

You appointed me as your secretary because you were so enamored with my gorgeous body, weren't you? Spot on, aren't I~? Don't be so shy, I won't get upset with you~♪|You sure are hard at work, Commander... I'll join you and help out! Although what am I supposed to help with...|Commander, have you seen my darling Passepartout? Ah, that's what I call my floatplane. He's my BFF~
Okay, let's see what rewards we got today!
Ooh! I found something nice amongst the rewards♪

Submarine Surcouf of Iris Libre, that's who I am. "Cruiser submarine"? Ah, are you talking about my gorgeous body which matches that of a cruiser~? Well, my firepower matches that of a cruiser, too! I bump into people quite a lot, but don't worry about that. Hahaha♪
So, you wanna chain Surcouf to your side with this ring? Jeez, aren't you greedy~ But, since it's you... I might be fine with it♪
*Giggle* Think you can dodge this?
Eat a lot, sleep a lot, fight a lot! And everything else is your responsibility♪ I think I can dig this way of life~
Commander, if you wanna fondle 'em, just say so first~

Salut~! I am Surcouf! "What's a ship with the physique of a cruiser doing with submarine equipment"? Hey! You've got it all wrong! My looks may be deceiving, but I'm a fully qualified submarine! Anyhoo, it's nice meeting you~
Bien joué, Commander!
*Yawn*... Winning makes me sleepy, somehow... Mmh...
This scooter really is fantastic! A good buy for a good price~ Lucky me♪
Hmm? Commander, are you shopping as well? If so, why don't you come along and take a look around? ... Huh? Of course you can't climb on. That'd be illegal.
Here, Commander. You drive and I'll hold onto you from behind like this~ Mmm, now it feels like we're a real couple~ I've always wanted to try it out myself♪
Commander, are you ready? Then we're off to the next stop~

Commander, you can give me puppy-dog eyes all you want, but I won't share my ice cream... F-fine, just one lick, got it? |My twin-gun turrets are also on vacation today! Gotta work hard and play hard! |Uhh, I don't think I'll bring the puppy with me next time... He's way too jumpy and almost even fell off the scooter once...
Oh, you finally noticed, Commander! That's right, I put my hair up just for today's ride! This is your only chance to see it like this.
I can't believe you. You almost made me drop my ice cream!
Hmm? Commander, are you shopping as well? If so, why don't you come along and take a look around? ... Huh? Of course you can't climb on. That'd be illegal.
Sure, I go in the water all the time since I'm a submarine, but it's nice to just relax by the beach every now and then! *yaaaawn*... A girl needs her vacation time, you know~
Mmmh~ Bonjour, Commander~ Nothing feels better than the waves lapping at your skin~ Oh, Commander, why don't you come lie down and experience it for yourself?
Welcome back, Comma– Whuah! Geesh, that last wave was huge! You could've warned me that it was coming! Hmph!
Hey, Commander, done anything fun lately? I wanna know!

Hey, Commander! Just lie on your back and I'll cover you with sand~|Go get the camera, Commander! I wanna take a photo of this.|Passepartout, could you get me some sunscreen? Oh, and Commander, would you mind rubbing it on for me?
You're head over heels for my gorgeous body, aren't you? Heheh, stare all you want, because I don't mind♡
Mmmh~ Bonjour, Commander~ Nothing feels better than the waves lapping at your skin~ Oh, Commander, why don't you come lie down and experience it for yourself?
The Suruga Fleet w-will not disappoint...!
voiceline.oath: I don't want to do this... but you leave me no choice!

voiceline.line: I've noticed those Priority ships are strikingly individualis– Pardon, I mean they have striking personalities. Not that I'm jealous, or anything of the sort.
voiceline.oath: I've said it time and time again: I'm not fit to be the joint exercise flagship or for any other prominent position! Why won't they listen when I say I'd screw it up horribly?! ...C-Commander?! Oh, ahh...

voiceline.line: Kii-class battleship – Suruga.
The commission team has returned. Shall we set out to greet them?
*Sigh*... I set myself up for disappointment by expecting any decent treatment... Can I at least ask you to not go too hard on me?
I hope to leverage my meager secretary abilities for the betterment of the fleet. I'm always ready for your orders, Commander.
P-please! Offer your concern to other girls instead of me! You really don't need to constantly check how I'm doing just because I'm serving as your secretary!
Look, I do appreciate your concern, but you saying that in front of everyone is embarrassing! Could you not put me on the spot like that again? That'd be great!

*Sigh*...! People have their eyes glued to me wherever I go now, thanks to you... There are plenty of other ways to express your love without embarrassing me, you know! Please, Commander, I'd rather not deal with that again!
voiceline.oath: You know everything about me, from my horns to my personality. Since we're so intimate, I suppose it's needless to tell you... Actually, there's one thing I want to tell you: I will NOT go along with your flirting when we're in the office!

voiceline.line: I hope my horns were left alone... Phew, they were... Err, no! Never mind I said anything!
voiceline.oath: Headpats, headpatty pat, patty patty head, heady heady pat pat~ Ahahah!

voiceline.line: Nicely done out there. Please don't mind me, go ahead and take some time to relax.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back. As much as I want you to be successful, I'm just as happy with everything staying the way it is.

voiceline.line: Oh, for crying out loud! Just my luck!
Let's focus our attention on our work today. Don't be afraid to ask for my help, should you need it.
voiceline.oath: Don't be afraid to ask for my help if you need it. It is, after all, a secretary's job to support her Commander.

voiceline.line: Whatever, it's done and over now... Look, I don't want everyone to see this!
It appears you have new mail. I'll confirm it on your behalf.

I believe I'm better suited for a desk job where I can analyze data and draft new plans. The reason being my strengths lie in quickly reading, memorizing, and writing documents.|Reckless hotheads and I don't get along particularly well. So I've learned first-hand through bad experiences with a certain someone... That is not to say I hate those kinds of people, however.|I'm deeply grateful that you've elected me as your secretary.
