However, I would absolutely welcome the addition of more people to the office, as we're rather short-staffed with just me here.|I'm not a fan of battling, but if anyone picks a fight with me, then a fight they'll get. We were made to wage war, and so that is our responsibility.|Life is so peaceful at this port. For that, we can thank the many girls here who I don't hold as much as a candle to.
voiceline.oath: Too much work to process? We all know what a tough job it is to command a fleet. So please, let me give you some assistance.|We are who we are now thanks to you, Commander. And while not everyone respects you, they are grateful for what you do. You really should be proud of yourself for that. I-I feel more for you than just respect, though!|I don't mind fading into the background when I'm with my friends, but when I'm with you, I want everyone to see it. Heheh, in a friendly way, of course.|Once the war has ended, then we can discuss everything we'll do once the war ends. For now, we must focus all our efforts on fighting to eventually achieve peace.

voiceline.line: I'd like to suggest completing these missions. It is your job to do as the commander, after all.
voiceline.oath: Let's see here... I think you should review these missions.

voiceline.line: I've brought the mission rewards with me. Phew...
voiceline.oath: Bingo, this looks great. Commander, we've received stellar rewards!

voiceline.line: I am Suruga, Kii-class battleship number three. I sadly wasn't constructed in time for that infamous war... It seems some threads of fate have led me to join this fleet, one I shall devote all my soul to. It is my pleasure to serve you.

You have bizarre tastes in women, Commander... Anyway, this doesn't come as a shock to me; I've known for a long time that your feelings for me are sincere. I, Suruga, hereby accept your oath of love.
I'm gonna smash you to pieces!
I will do as you order me to, Commander.
Whuah?! What are you doing...?!
voiceline.oath: Hahah, I know how much you enjoy doing lewd things like this.

voiceline.line: Battleship Suruga, reporting for duty. It would seem that some threads of fate connect me to this port... No, don't mind my rambling. Please disregard that.
It's meaningless to fight if you cannot win. As such, a few enhancements may prove necessary.
Fools! I've– I mean, we've won!
I'm not much of a drinker, but I should at least have a little bit of social sake. What will you have, Commander? I could get you something alcohol-free right away.
Good morning, Commander. Everyone else seems to be dressed up on this day of celebration, so this shouldn't be a problem, right?
Y-you don't need to stare at me...
I owe my thanks to the girls who prepared this outfit for me. It'll help me get through the holidays without personally standing out. ...It'll have the opposite effect? Huh?!
Good morning, Commander. What do you say we take this day off and relax?

You got this, Team Red! Mop the floor with those Team White clowns! ...Do you want to stay and watch TV with me, Commander? This match is definitely worth watching.|I always end up oversleeping on the day after the holiday's over... *Sigh*... Me dropping the ball when it really matters is not funny at all.|"Treasure every moment of peace you get," as someone once said. We're only simple "people", after all.
I hardly ever get the chance to put this outfit on. Aren't you glad to see me wearing it, Commander? Hahaha~
Good morning, Commander. Everyone else seems to be dressed up on this day of celebration, so this shouldn't be a problem, right?
Stupid Shimakaze... Why hasn't she showed up? She's the one who asked me for supplemental lessons...
Oh. Fancy meeting you here... Walk to school together? Uh, sure! I know the way, so please just follow me.
It's good to see you again. Now, if you'll excuse me, I have reports to read through.
If you need my help, please inform me. For what it's worth, paperwork is one of my strong suits.
You've got mail. Maybe next time I'll get Shimakaze to deliver it to you.

You should probably not drink on the clock. You're meeting with Kii later today, remember?|I'm a study machine when tests are coming up. Hehehe~ Also, did you know? It's harder to get all questions wrong than to get them all right.|I'll draw unwanted attention if I do too good, so I should get this question wrong on purp– Err, nope, I didn't say anything!
A-at least give me a heads-up first!
Oh. Fancy meeting you here... Walk to school together? Uh, sure! I know the way, so please just follow me.
Yeah! That's proof my strength means something!
Where's Kii gone off to? Actually, knowing her, she's spending Christmas drinking with her friends and having a great time. Me, I have better things to do than get drunk! Hehe.
This should do it. With how unremarkable my present is, I doubt it'll make any waves when the... Ack! Commander?! Why are you here?!
Let me just... There, all set. Ah, welcome back, Commander.
I've left your present under the tree... Did you prepare a present for me as well?

Shimakaze! Go get all the destroyers' presents and leave them under the tree!|After a year of hard work, Christmas is finally upon us! And soon it'll be New Year's too! Whew.|Would you like an oversized sock? You can use it when you want a bigger present. Hehe.
Try to keep an eye out so our presents don't get lost amid all the rewards.
No sneak-peeking at what's inside!
This should do it. With how unremarkable my present is, I doubt it'll make any waves when the... Ack! Commander?! Why are you here?!
For the sake of not bringing shame upon the fleet, let us fight!
Shropshire can be quite a handful to deal with... But, I suppose since she's the type of person who won't ever let herself draw the short straw, you should just let her be.
London-class heavy cruiser – Sussex.
And that should be time... Commander, the commission team should be returning any moment now.
London is too much of a people-pleaser, and all her coddling seems to have turned you into mush.
The way London always has that smile plastered on her face no matter who she's around just rubs me the wrong way.
London is the type of person who would easily be deceived by a bad person, but still continue to smile despite knowing that... Jeez, just why does she have to have that kind of personality...

*sigh*... What's more, when I went to bring this up with her, she just gave me a pat on the head and said, "Thanks, Sussex, but it'll be alright." So, nothing changed at all... Good grief, why do people have to be so difficult...?
At least I'll feel at ease leaving London in your care... No, you'll have to become even more distinguished, to the point that I won't be able to look away from you... huh? What did I just say...?
There's a lot to report still, but for now, good work.
Everyone, tighten the formation!
Are you ready to begin working? Don't come running to me if you find out later that you're missing something.
This was due to my failure as a leader. Don't blame yourselves, everyone.
Please do not forget to check your mail.

Excessive kindness can become poison. One must be strict when the situation calls for it. |If you have time to gawk at me, you should get your work done first. After you finish, then you can, um... |... If you're tired, get some rest. I'm not saying this for your sake - it's simply better if you're ready to give it your all when the situation calls for it.
Before acting, one must first consider the most efficient way of getting things done - you haven't forgotten, right?
So these are the mission rewards! Commander, you're quite the capable one~

Other than the coastal defence battle in the Mediterranean Sea and that one naval battle up north, I pretty much carried out all my missions normally... Well, there was that one time I needed serious repairs... b-but anyway! Since I'm here, I'll continue to put my best foot forward. Commander, I expect the same from you!

At first, I was strict with you only because I wanted to ease the burden on my sister... but gradually, I began to hope that you would become the most distinguished person in my life... As of now, you've already become that person...
Let's make this shot count!
Commander, your collar is messed up. And your hair too... Hold still, I'll fix it for you.
Commander, sit right there! Good grief... I'll have to re-teach you some basic manners...!
So you're the Commander? Hmph! Let's make one thing clear: I'm not easygoing like my sister, London. I'll expect you to have your act together!
Thank you. I'll continue to work hard on the next mission.
Don't think that winning is the only thing that matters. There are still many things I could have done better.

London's complaining about how she doesn't want to wear her swimsuit again because it's "too revealing" ...*sigh*. She could probably benefit from learning to think more positively about herself, like Shropshire does.
What are you spacing out for? Have you not gotten tired of staring at all the swimsuits yet? Good grief... Are you able to help set up the parasol or the beach chairs at least?
Commander, when you go welcome the commission fleet back, can you take this plate of ice-cold watermelon with you? It's a little courtesy from me.
How many times have I already told you, Commander? Finish your missions first before taking time off.
Commander, how's your work coming along? If I find out that you've snuck out here... Hehe~

People aren't changing into swimsuits just for your viewing pleasure... Got it? |You should watch yourself around Shropshire. That girl develops a variety of... how should I say this? ...Bad habits during the summer? |Hm? It's nothing. When we're at the beach, you can do whatever you want. *sigh*... It's just that... looking at your mug makes me really uneasy for some reason...
A mission? I'll also come with you... That's my job as secretary after all!
Did you buy this ice cream for me...? Th-thanks...
Commander, are you also interested in surfing? Hehe, I'll teach you the basics.
You just won't learn your lesson...!
What are you spacing out for? Have you not gotten tired of staring at all the swimsuits yet? Good grief... Are you able to help set up the parasol or the beach chairs at least?
The Royal Navy will prevail! Onwards!
Miss Renown, do please let the Maids handle banquet security... the Commander is already here Honestly, how are we supposed to start the party without you?!
What are you staring at me for? I'm just the same as any of the others... Y-you have a few more hands to shake? Of course...
"If you want a d-drink, you can enjoy it like this..." That Ajax, how could she do something so wasteful...? I... What am I doing...?! Commander...?!
N-now that we're through with battle, perhaps we could relax a... No, we have to focus on the party for now!
How is your work coming along? Keep faffing about like that and you'll be putting in overtime!

That Ajax, she's going to do that to the Commander again... I have to do something about her... Ah, it's nothing!|How long are you going to stare at me like that? Don't you have anything better to do?|My sister London is here... Phew, looks like I don't need to worry. I mean, it's London, there was never anything to worry about in the first place.
Commander, look how crooked this is. You really must pay more attention to your formalwear... Right, there we are.
W-wait! Commander?! Eek...?!
What are you staring at me for? I'm just the same as any of the others... Y-you have a few more hands to shake? Of course...
May the odds ever be in your favor! Go forth!
When my friends are counting on me, I can feel power surging within me that makes me feel like I can do anything!
voiceline.oath: Thanks, Commander! You were a great help! ...What's the matter? Are you the kind of person that gets really hyped up after being complimented?

voiceline.line: Akizuki-class destroyer number three – Suzutsuki.
The commission fleet has returned! Lemme take home the extras!
Commander, you're gonna make me hate you...
I may come across as a braggart, but that's because I'm pretty reliable! "Oh, Suzutsuki, you saved me! I don't know what I would've done without you!" Yeah, I get that a lot~
Commander, you can rely on me as well! ...What?! You think you can one-up me...?!
Hmm... What would I like the commander to do for me? ...Make tea? Pack my lunch? Carry me back to the dorms after I fall asleep? ...Th-th-that's way too embarrassing!
Commander, get over here! Hup~ ...Mmhmm, that's much cozier. Now it feels more like I'm relying on you, doesn't it? See, you'll also have to take good care of me from now on~ Just kidding~♪ Ahaha!
voiceline.oath: I love being in your arms, Commander~ Ahh, I could roll around forever~ ...Wh-who's there?! ...D-d-do you need something from Suzutsuki?! ......Forget what you just saw, all right?! Seriously!

voiceline.line: Look, fluffy and super pattable, right? ...Hey, I'm talking about Pooky, not my ears!
voiceline.oath: Commander, you can rub my ears if you want~

voiceline.line: Team A is directly under my command. Teams B and C will follow the plan, and then... Oh, Commander, when'd you get back?
voiceline.oath: Suzutsuki is unsinkable, and therefore, Commander is also undefeatable! ...Anyway, I know you'll come back safely no matter where you go! Welcome home~!

voiceline.line: The real fight's only getting started!
Welcome back! ...Got any new jobs? I'm down for anything!
voiceline.oath: Welcome back! Wanna make out instead of doing work today? Haha, just kidding~ ......Eh, you serious?!

voiceline.line: Guh... No matter what, we all have to make it back safely...!
Huh? The envelope got torn? ...Ahaha... Sorry 'bout that, must've been Pooky...

"The invincible Suzutsuki is here! Your attacks shall not put a scratch on me!" How'd that sound? Hya hah!|Ahaha! You'd rather sit atop Commander's head instead of mine? Very well, go forth! Oh, but no pranks though!|Commander, you sure have a lot of work, don't you~ Look, Isokaze, Urakaze, being a warlord or a general is a lot of hard work. A better job would be to become Commander's retainers!
voiceline.extra: Lady Mutsu, this is what you do with the sword... and this is how you wave the flag... Got it? Now you have everything you need for our mock Sengoku battles!|Pooky, what do you want to eat today? ...Ah! Jeez, now Pooky's attached to you now because you keep feeding him, Commander!|nil

voiceline.line: A tough mission, huh? Lemme take a look, maybe I can help out!
Mission complete! Commander, don't forget about the rewards!
voiceline.oath: Mission complete! As for my payment, just let me to lie in your lap for a bit!

voiceline.line: I'm Suzutsuki, Akizuki-class destroyer. I was a member of the 61st DesDiv along with Akizuki and Hatsuzuki, and escorted Musashi and participated in Noshiro's rescue mission! Not a shabby record, right? I had a close call at the Battle of Bou-no-Misaki when I got hit by two torpedoes, but I managed to survive until the end!
Ahahaha... Being in a situation like this is quite nerve-racking, isn't it? ...I thought I had mentally prepared myself... Commander, you c-can handle the rest... right...?
Suzutsuki, defending her friends!
This marking on my right cheek? You haven't heard of it, Commander? It's the latest fashion trend! Here, I'll draw one on for you!
C-Commander! Jeez, there are some things that you shouldn't be doing!
Ahaha, Pooky, listen up, we're gonna live here from now on! Uhh... Third ship of the Akizuki-class, Suzutsuki, reporting in! I'll be the one to protect my comrades and you, Commander! Just kidding~♪
Give me more power, so that I may protect everyone!
The enemy general’s head is mine~! Just kidding, ahaha~♪
I'm pretty refreshing and cool, right? Just like my name suggests~
Commander, over here! We're about to start without you! Ahaha, what would you like to do, Commander? Beach volleyball? Sandcastle building? We can also go relax in the water if you'd like!
Phew... Playing by the beach is super fun, but after all the commotion, I could use some relaxation... Yup, I'm gonna lie down right here! Mm... Yeah, just stay put like that. Hehe~
Not enough people for a game of beach volleyball? All right! I'll go play some watermelon splitting with Georgia first!
Commander, time out! Look, the others have already started playing without you~ Fine, fine... I shall be the one to accompany you then!

Do we have enough people to build a sand castle? Great, count me in as well! Wait, Commander, hold on!|Pooky likes coming to the sea as well, isn't that right~? Ah, careful not to fall into the water!|Agano's not here? That's too bad, I was looking forward to playing with her... Commander, why do you look so relieved? Hm? It's just my imagination?
Woah?! ...Oh, it's you, Commander, you surprised me... Hibiki shoved a crab in my face earlier and it gave me a nasty pinch...
Jeez, Commander! What are you doing in front of this many people?!
Commander, over here! We're about to start without you! Ahaha, what would you like to do, Commander? Beach volleyball? Sandcastle building? We can also go relax in the water if you'd like!
You ready, Pooky? Let's— go!
These markings are the proof of my battle scars as a warrior... they're not just doodles! Ugh... I swear, I'll be back for revenge after I train some more!
I, Akizuki-class destroyer, Suzutsuki, shall not allow you to pass through these arches! Hwuh?! I missed the return again...!
The girls from the commission fleet are back! Darn it, I wish Hatsushimo could come with me!
Happy New Year, Commander!
Suzutsuki, now reading the contents of your mail out loud!

Aaahhhhh!! Jean Bart, you don't have to shank every shuttlecock out of existence!|Pooky, I got some sunflower seeds from Hanazuki! Here, come and eat your fill~ Grow big and strong and scare the heck out of the commander~ Ahaha!|I can't sit still during the New Year! After all, there are so many things going on that only happen during this time of year!
Commander, make sure the matches continue smoothly!
I, Akizuki-class destroyer, Suzutsuki, shall not allow you to pass through these arches! Hwuh?! I missed the return again...!
I won't run away again... I swear it!
Commander? Oh, I'm just preparing for the next lecture at the auditorium. Please don't worry about me, and continue your work as normal.
Mogami-class heavy cruiser number three – Suzuya.
The commission team has returned to port. What's next? Shall I go with you to greet them?
Mogami may often fail to recognize her own worth, but more and more people are starting to see how little you're worth.
Would you like to learn more about the Mogami class? Very well, I'll be glad to explain everything from the top. Which one of us would you like to hear about first?
You're... most interested in Suzuya? Of course, I'd be glad to give you the details... but just explaining things wouldn't be enough, right...?
...There's no point hiding it. I already know how you feel about me. Just shut up and... give in to your feelings already!
Ahh... Commander, your gaze is so passionate... so I can finally tell you... I've always admired you... Huh?! What's this? I feel all fluttery...!
We must apply what we've learned to future battles. Shall I prioritize writing the report first?
As if this... would be enough to make me turn back!
Welcome back, Commander. Which job should we take on first?
Ugh... I guess that's it...
The mail has arrived. There's something for you, Commander... Ah...

Commander is looking at... N-nothing, don't worry about it!|Kumano, please don't make trouble for Mogami, all right? She's going to get a stomachache again...|We're sometimes called the Suzuya class, but I still prefer being called the Mogami class. We all fought together during that war after all..
I've arranged the status of our current missions. Please look over them.
The mission rewards have arrived. That is good news.

I am Suzuya, third ship of the Mogami class. During that war, I fought alongside Mogami as a member of CruDiv 7. My last battle left me with a bit of regret... but I've been given a new beginning on this battlefield, and I'll fight alongside my new companions with a fresh outlook. I look forward to working with you.
(whispers) Commander, when this ritual is over... you know what's next, right? Don't worry. I'll treat you better than anyone else. Isn't that right, darling~♡
It's time to get serious...!
Commander... where do you think you're looking? Don't think I wouldn't notice... I could feel your gaze boring into me... Am I right?
Nnh... So this is what you were after from the very beginning... I knew it all along. I've always known, this entire time... Ehehehe~♡
I am Suzuya, Mogami-class heavy cruiser. I place myself under your command from this day forward.
My abilities have been enhanced. Well done.
Congratulations. Eh, I'm the MVP...? Th-thank you very much...
All ships, forward...! Form up on me!
Um, sorry I made such a mess... Sheffield tried to teach me how to clean, but I'm a lot worse at it than I expected... Ahaha...
I am Swiftsure, a light cruiser of the Royal Navy... If it is not too much for one such as myself to ask, I would like to support your fleet in whatever way I can.
Commander, the commission is nearly complete. If you head out now, you should be able to meet them as they return.
Someone like me deserves a Commander like this...
Commander, do you have something for me? I can handle anything... Oh, but only if you're okay with me...
Fiji is always telling me to smile more. Is she right? Oh... Sorry, I must be boring you with this...
The Commander told me to help Jamaica fix up her bike. Hehehe, it turned out to be a lot more fun than I thought... Oh, Commander, sorry... about that... just now...

I think I'd probably be better off being all cool like Sheffield than trying to smile all the time like Fiji... Right? If I every so often let slip a smile that could catch the Commander's eye... Oh, um, forget everything I said just now!
Excellent work. I've prepared a report for you. Take a moment to look it over.
I have to get the others to safety, at least...!
Good morning. Here is your work for the day... *Sigh*...
Sorry. If only I had tried harder...
Commander, you have new mail. Oh, I've been checking about once per hour. So I don't think I've... no, I haven't missed any.

Commander, let's work as hard as we ever do, eh?|Commander, do you think a Lady of the Royal Navy should be more elegant? Not like the maids, I mean Fiji and Jamaica... They stand out quite a bit... is that alright?|I envy the Knight Commander. If only I could comport myself so... Sorry about that. Forget I said anything.
Commander, I've finished sorting out these tasks. Do look them over.
Commander, I've finished tallying up the mission rewards. Do look them over.

I am Swiftsure, of the Royal Navy. I joined towards the end of the war, but with it winding down and fate taking some odd twists and turns, I wasn't able to perform as expected. If it pleases you, I will serve the fleet with everything I have. Oh, but if it doesn't, you need not worry about me...
I'm really sorry about all this. Are you honestly okay with someone like me...? The way I am...? Umm, if you're alright with me, then I'll gladly be your partner! Commander, thank you so much!
Get the timing right... I should be able to do this!
As your secretary ship, I am responsibile for everything in all of the reports.
Commander, um... I think fleet regulations call this kind of thing "inappropriate..."
I am Swiftsure, a light cruiser of the Royal Navy... If it is not too much for one such as myself to ask, I would like to support your fleet in whatever way I can.
Swiftsure, swiftly and surely, everyone is counting on you...!
Um, I... really tried...
Unicorn, this is how you do this problem... Oh sorry, Commander, I'm currently helping the others study. Please make yourself feel at home.
Commander, why are you here...? Me? Yes, as you can see, I'm still studying... I figured that acquiring knowledge would be the best way to make up for my lack of experience on the actual battlefield.
Good morning. Here is the outline for today's course. Please make sure to review it.
Commander, you have new mail. I've instructed the Manjuus to help fetch the mail for me even when I can't do it myself, so worry not.

Fiji, don't you know that studying is good for you? Come on, Commander, care to back me up on this one? |While I have served as a flagship before, that has nothing to do with what's going on now. I have to be humble and learn from everyone. |I often see Edinburgh in the library. She's always grumbling about what's going on in the maid team or something...
I look cute when wearing glasses...? Err... Um, that wasn't my intention...
Commander, I d-don't think you should be doing this at school... Ahh!
Commander, why are you here...? Me? Yes, as you can see, I'm still studying... I figured that acquiring knowledge would be the best way to make up for my lack of experience on the actual battlefield.
Hmm, what should we do next? Why don't we see if there's anyone who needs help...? Just sitting here idly somehow doesn't feel quite right...

I agreed to try on this outfit, but... I know these fancy outfits don't suit me... H-huh, I look gorgeous?! ...Thank you very much. Even if you're just trying to make me feel better, I appreciate it...

I just made a snowman with the others... Huh? Did you want to see it, Commander? Um, in that case... Oh, right! That snowman already got knocked down and remade into something else! You shouldn't look at the one I made...
Happy Lunar New Year, Commander. Why don't you set aside your work today and take some time off?

Um, are you redecorating the office? Do you need me to help?|I got some red envelopes as gifts from my seniors in the fleet. Ahaha... I'm not sure how I feel about this...|Commander, the more free time everyone else has, the less free time you seem to― Um, oh my...
If you're cold, p-please... feel free to use my shawl.
C-Commander... What if someone sees us...?!

I agreed to try on this outfit, but... I know these fancy outfits don't suit me... H-huh, I look gorgeous?! ...Thank you very much. Even if you're just trying to make me feel better, I appreciate it...
Take a deep breath, Swiftsure... Everyone, please commence attack on the enemy!
So I need to put this headband on... I wonder what kind of hairstyle would be good? Um, let's tie my hair up like this... Actually, maybe twintails would be better instead?
W-welcome! ...Ugh, I'm still way too nervous... Ah, um! H-how may I serve you today, Commander...?
Welcome back, Commander. If... If you'd like, please enjoy this refreshing beverage...
Commander, what will your first order be?
Commander, there's new mail for you. I apologize, but I didn't have the time to check its contents beforehand. If it's alright with you, I'd like to check the contents with you, right now...!

Commander, is something wrong? ...Is this outfit really too stimulating, like Sheffield said it was...? Or... is it actually too conservative, like Fiji said it was...?|Everyone acts much more freely when they're at the beach. Do you think I should do the same? A-Alright, I'll give it a try... Y-Yo!|When I'm helping Neptune, I feel like a completely different person. ...Oh. What would you like to have, Commander?
Um... This outfit really is quite embarrassing...
...Eek! C-Commander...!
W-welcome! ...Ugh, I'm still way too nervous... Ah, um! H-how may I serve you today, Commander...?
L-live combat... I have to do my best...
Fu Shun just asked me to tell her about the Philadelphia Experiment. Commander, would you like me to tell you about it too?
An Shan-class destroyer No. 4 - Tai Yuan (104)
Eek! Someone came back... Oh, An Shan, I'm fine...
An Shan, I... I'm a bit scared...
Comm... Commander? Um, sorry, Chang Chun needs me for something right now!
Commander, other than my sisters, you're my first friend. S-so, um, whatever you do, please do not get inside Fu Shun's home-made missile!
Commander, are you in here? Eh? I'm not just walking around.. Um, I just got a little lonely... and wanted to see your face...
Commander... even though I'm immature, I will work harder. So, um... please wait for me... Y-you'll be waiting for me to surpass my sisters? Th-thank you!
I can finally settle down. W-wait... Fu Shun, where are you dragging me off to?
Eh...? U-um... what should I do...
H-hey, Commander. I was too absorbed in reading that I lost track of the time...
Um... as expected, I still have a long way to go...
C-commander, there's new mail. Perhaps Fu Shun should... um, never mind...

F-Frank Knox? I don't want to run into her again... |An Shan is so hardworking... When can I be of help to her? |What am I reading right now? "Miscellaneous Morsels from Youyang." Chang Chun gave it to me...
This mission... looks quite difficult. Will we be able to do it?
D-does this mean I've matured a little?

Um... I'm Tai Yuan, fourth ship of the An Shan-class and a first-generation member of the Dragon Empery's "Four Unbreakables." I originally was named "Ji Lin." My sisters and I were the mainstay of the Empery's navy for decades, serving in many operations and helping rebuild the strength of the navy. The "Nuclear Physics Hypothesis" is a very interesting book... It would be nice if my sisters liked it too...
Thanks, Commander... Even though I'm still not very reliable, from now on, you can count on me!
Let the heavens focus our minds, so we can adapt to any situation!
Commander, what kind of books do you like to read?
W-w-woah... C-commander, please don't do that...
I... I'm Tai Yuan, a destroyer. Commander, have you seen my sisters?
U-um... it's still a bit scary...
Um... is this good enough?

Commander, did you know? The Dragon Empery has an ancient legend about the monster known as the "Nian." During the Spring Festival, every household will hang up couplets and set off firecrackers to ward it off.

O-on behalf of the An Shan class, we wish a prosperous, happy, and healthy new year to Commander, and to everyone here at port... Umm... even though I made this outfit, I feel a bit embarrassed wearing it... Eh? It looks good on me? Um... th-thank you...
During the Spring Festival, relatives will all gather to celebrate a reunion. Th-this year, I'd like to have a reunion with my sisters and you, Commander... is that okay?
Ah, Commander, welcome back... I'm making a lantern... Would you mind helping me hang it up?
Fu Shun gets really excited around the Spring Festival, and will even drag Chang Chun and me around...

F-Fu Shun, it... it's dangerous to take apart firecrackers like that... Eh? You're doing an experiment? |This year's couplet... Um, Commander, can you help me brainstorm ideas? |Chang Chun, it's a once-in-a-year occasion, it's not good to stay inside your room all day...
I made this outfit myself. My sisters all said it looks good, ehehe...
C-commander... if you keep messing around, someone's going to get mad!

O-on behalf of the An Shan class, we wish a prosperous, happy, and healthy new year to Commander, and to everyone here at port... Umm... even though I made this outfit, I feel a bit embarrassed wearing it... Eh? It looks good on me? Um... th-thank you...
I'll tear down everything and everyone that stands between me and my Commander! AHAHAHAHA!
I belong to you, my Commander, body and soul...
Taihou-class aircraft carrier – Taihou.
Commission complete... But if you ordered it, my Commander, I would clear all of them for you... I must mean so much to my Commander.
Those insects... Just a second, my Commander, I need to do something about these impudent little insects...
I know everything, EVERYTHING there is to know about you, my Commander~ In fact, my Commander is my entire world.
... That gift she gave you? Oh, I threw that out. Why wouldn't I? Only my things belong on your desk~
You forgot your coat? Well isn't my Commander forgetful... Don't worry about it, I'll go get your coat for you. Huh? The key to your quarters? Hehehe, you can keep it. Taihou has her ways.

The bed and toiletries in your quarters? Of course they're mine. I should have thought of this before~ If you don't want me going in and out of your room all the time, we should just be sleeping together. Hehehe... please be gentle with me.
Mission accomplished! And let me say how fantastic you looked on the battlefield.
For my Commander, I have to win...!
Would you like to take a bath with me? Maybe you'd like to taste me? Orrr~ would you like to do it with me...? Ahahaha!
Why aren't you dead... why won't you all just DIE?!
My Commander, you've got mail~ I licked it very tho-rough-ly. It's safe.

Hehehe, I would pull the moon from the sky for you, if you wanted it, my Commander.|You like small ones, my Commander? Then I'm off to cull the big ones, hehehe...|My Commander, you know you can never EVER lie to me. Or else...
There's a new mission. Can we go?
Mission complete~ Want to go get the rewards?

I'm a state-of-the-art aircraft carrier with extra reinforced armor. Just look at my flight deck and enclosed hangar. Amazing, aren't they? Hmm? What's this about carrying capacity and firefighting systems? Never mind that... Tell me, what do you think of my... body?

It's finally on my finger! You know, I would have thrown this ring out long ago if it didn't have my name on it. Hehehe. Oh? How did I know about it? I tollld you, I know EVERYTHING about my Commander. And from now on I'm going to love EVERYTHING about you too~
Now you can die happy, ahaha...
Touch me more!
If you touch any other girls like this, I might have to punish you, my Commander.
This heat, and this throbbing... We meet at last, my dear Commander! I am Taihou, unworthy as I am, at your service♡
Ahaha, now I can serve my Commander even better...
I dedicate this victory to my Commander!
Are you the ones distracting my Commander from the party?
Oh, how I envy you, kitty. If I were you, my Commander could hold me tight and never let go.
You're taking so long to dress yourself, my Commander. Are you struggling to find something to match my dress? Hehe, it doesn't matter what you wear, you're always perfect to me♡
Come, my Commander, this party is a perfect opportunity to proclaim our love to everyone, to let them all know that we belong only to one another.
My Commander, let me clean up the few remaining insects troubling you.
I've been waiting for you, my Commander.

My Commander, you just stole a glance at another girl, didn't you?|My Commander, if I were to drink a little too much, do you think you could take me home?|My Commander, it's safe for you to attack me when no one's around~
My Commander, how would you like to go for a stroll somewhere private?
Yesss, that's it, my Commander, give all your love and attention to Taihou alone...
You're taking so long to dress yourself, my Commander. Are you struggling to find something to match my dress? Hehe, it doesn't matter what you wear, you're always perfect to me♡
This is what happens when you get between me and my Commander!
I wanted to borrow an Empyreal dress from Master Yat Sen, but it turns out we're not the same size~ So what could I do? I made it myself♡

Hehehe, I let Christmas and New Year's slip right by me, that I might use the Dragon Empery's Lunar New Year to capture my Commander's attentions... Oh, My Commander, won't you please enjoy the show I've prepared for you❤
I offer you a song of joy ♡ my Commander ♪
My Commander, do tell me what song I might serenade you with?

For you, my Commander, I could face any challenge...! Oh, but that little gremlin from the Eagle Union... something must be done...|If I can only keep my Commander's gaze fixed on me for just a little bit longer, all my efforts will have paid off~|If only I could become like the women in those stories... those Empyreal romances Master Yat Sen spoke of~
Did you enjoy my performance...? Oh, my Commander~ My efforts, seeking out Master Yat Sen, the study, the practice, all that hard work... it was truly worth it~!

Hehehe, I let Christmas and New Year's slip right by me, that I might use the Dragon Empery's Lunar New Year to capture my Commander's attentions... Oh, My Commander, won't you please enjoy the show I've prepared for you♡
Would my Commander like to race? I would be happy to take care of the other racers to make sure you win first place... Oh... But why not?
Do I make a nice race queen, my Commander...? Hehe. With these proportions, and my fantastic outfit~♡ The others couldn't hope to compare with me!
My Commander, would you like a picture of me? Oh, not for promotional purposes, just for your "personal use..." Hehehe♡

I don't care about prideful things like which carrier group I'm in. All that matters is that I'm willing to do anything for you, my Commander♡|I could wait here for you forever, my Commander. But of course I would be happier to be at your side~ If you would let me... Oh, even if you don't want me to, I could still be at your side anytime♡|Hehehe, the "race queen" is another of the Sakura Empire's great inventions~ Save your wonder, my Commander. Just keep your eyes fixed on Taihou♡
I am here just to model for you, my Commander~
Hehe♡ My Commander~
Do I make a nice race queen, my Commander...? Hehe. With these proportions, and my fantastic outfit~♡ The others couldn't hope to compare with me!
Ahahaha! Nothing will remain of you!

My Commander~ Do you like the location that I've chosen~? We have the entire evening to ourselves, free from the disturbance of anyone else...! Ahhh, my heart is throbbing even more vigorously than the ocean's waves~♡
A commission has been completed~ There's no need to go welcome them back. After all, I already saw them back to their dorms~♪
My Commander~ I'll have you accompany me all day, just as you promised~♡ Is there any place you'd like to go or anything you'd like to do? As long as we're together, anything is fine~♡ Ehehehe...
C-Commander?! Ahhn, I can't believe you'd even treat me as a child~ ...Ehehe~♡
My Commander~ Are you having fun with your pest extermination? Please do enjoy yourself thoroughly, and leave the paperwork that comes after to me~♡
This pure white dress was crafted by yours truly. Now, my Commander, we can be together forever...! Ahhh, my Commander~♡
My Commander, please do not leave my side...!!

The defenses around your bedchamber are complete, my Commander. Nobody will be allowed to intrude on our love nest~♡|This sound... Albacore?! N-n-n-no way, it couldn't be! My Commander, tell me you're jesting!|Is something the matter, Commander? If you are unable to collect your thoughts outside, perhaps I can take you to somewhere a bit more private~
Yes, new missions. I already know all about it~♡
My Commander, I shall fetch you everything you desire~ After all, there is no way I'd possibly burden you with such menial tasks~♡
I belong only to you, my Commander~♡

My Commander~ Do you like the location that I've chosen~? We have the entire evening to ourselves, free from the disturbance of anyone else...! Ahhh, my heart is throbbing even more vigorously than the ocean's waves~♡
Surrender to my charms!
I would rather have been a solo act, but I still need to learn more about idols, and my Commander asked me to join the group... So for now, I bide my time... Hehehe♡
With these clothes, and upon this stage... Ahaha... Ahahaha... Fate has ordained that my Commander shall fall for me here... Commander, please listen to the song of my love until the very end~♡
Commander, won't you go pick up the commission team...? I have a feeling that little Union girl is going to jump out and scare me if I go...
Are you telling me I can't be an idol...?!
To sing and dance for someone other than my Commander is...No, I just need to think of it another way. The idols are all for my Commander, only for my Commander. It's perfect...!
Commander♡ My shoulders are sore from all my training~ Could you take me back to my room...? Actually, I think I'd rather rest in your room for a while, my Commander.
Commander♡ I brought you my official idol merch. Of course, it's not something you could buy in a store, it's "special," just for you... Are you wondering what's "special" about it? Hehehe♪
I have no interest in dazzling the people with my performance. But if my Commander wants to see me like that... Hehehehe♪ I'll do anything for you~
C- Commander?! Ooh, you're treating me like a child now... hehehehe♡
My Commander♡ Are you here to watch me practice?
My Commander is watching...!
Commander~ What would you like me to do today?
Grrgh, miserable insects...!
A fan letter...? Who else should I talk to but my Commander?

Hmph! This dance has some very difficult moves... I'll have to practice a lot more to give my best performance to my Commander!|That Iron Blood girl's "healing" business that's all over her promotional materials... that's all fake, isn't it?|My Commander♡ suddenly came to watch me practice... I feel like I could take on the world~!
For the sake of my Commander, I can endure... no, I will gladly take any offer!
Hehehe, I've grown even more powerful from this job...!
Sakura Empire armored carrier Taihou, reporting in to test the experimental "Muse System..." hehehe♡ My Commander need only ask and I will give anything, even my very life~
Commander♡ What do you think of my new stage? And my outfit...? I will dazzle you over and over and over again with my beauty until you can't stand it anymore~ Ahahahahahaa!
We'll have to get rid of these pests♪
Hehehe♪ It seems this pose is powerful enough to draw my Commander's eye♡
Hehehe, it may be a scandal, but I don't care♡
With these clothes, and upon this stage... Ahaha... Ahahaha... Fate has ordained that my Commander shall fall for me here... Commander, please listen to the song of my love until the very end~♡
I can't wait to show my Commander the results of my special training~
Ahahahaha! Bow down before the power of my love!
Please leave combat to me. I shall not shame my title of being "The Strongest!"
Small strokes fell great oaks, constant drops pierce through rock. Those who train through the most humdrum of days shall seize victory in the most critical of moments. That is my belief.
First ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Takao.
Your fleet has returned from commission. Want to welcome them back?
A sword has no eyes. It would be wise to avoid approaching me casually.
Do you need anything? If not, I'm going back to work.
It might be pretty nice to just set aside my duties and have a relaxing conversation with you every once in a while, Commander.
Recently, I haven't been able to keep my composure during training.. Just from thinking about you, my form becomes sloppy. If I am like this, would you still want to keep me by your side?
No matter how badly I'm injured, I will make sure to always return to your side. So... Commander, could you always stay with me as well?
I'm glad that you came back safe and sound.
Be still as water...!
Takao standing by. What are your orders?
I was careless... I definitely will not fail next time!
Commander, there's new mail. Shall I bring it for you?

Even back in port, we must not lower our guard. Danger lurks around every corner.|Commander, not even you could withstand my blade.|Daily refinement means to continually strive towards your goals. Commander, may your focus never falter.
New tasks have been assigned - would you like to confirm them?
Mission accomplished! Are we going to collect the rewards?

I am Takao, first ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers. I may not look like it, but I have already crossed through countless battlefields. Please place your faith in my firepower and armor, and be at ease.
For you to acknowledge me like this, Commander, is the greatest honor. From now on, this blade shall serve only you. Please continue to treat me kindly.
Swift death unto evil!
E-enemies?! Oh... It was you, Commander? Apologies - my eyesight isn't the best.
Kyaa! You scared me... how shameless!
Are you the Commander? Please allow this lowly Takao to offer you what little strength she has.
Power... flows through my blade!
Hm... Once again, I've cut a worthless object.
I may have lost to Miss Saratoga in sandcastle building, but I shall redeem myself in beach volleyball.
Commander, even I’ll get embarrassed if you keep staring at me like that... Eh? Why did I bring a volleyball? Did you not order me to bring it?
Good work, Commander. ...What? Miss Saratoga is going to join Team Royal during the beach volleyball tournament? I see... a chance for payback has come!
Of course I can sympathize with the others. In this kind of heat, it is important to get some rest. However, we mustn’t neglect our training!

Miss Saratoga wants to challenge me? Fine. Swimming, volleyball... just name it. I’ll take her on.|Atago, did you bring my sunglasses?|Relax, Commander. I didn’t bring this kendo sword to hit you with. It’s because I heard that someone from the Royal Navy is going to be here. Heh, just kidding. It’s because Atago is scared of ghosts~
The younger girls are all so energetic... Commander, did you know you can tell their age by when they were launched?
Don’t touch me! I’m working on a sand castle... it has to be at least 70% bigger than Sara’s!
Commander, even I’ll get embarrassed if you keep staring at me like that... Eh? Why did I bring a volleyball? Did you not order me to bring it?
Oh no, the ink... Commander, don't step on the paper!
Calligraphy is also a form of self-cultivation, so I am instructing the children... Commander, would you also like to join?
Commander, welcome back. Pardon me for making a mess; I'll clean it up right away.

Qipao? Atago picked it out, saying you like this kind of outfit. How is it? |What? "Fortune" is the only thing that needs to be written? I thought I could write whatever I wanted... |Commander, can I try writing your name next? Hm? No particular reason... I just felt like it.
It would be great if I could really bring "Fortune" to Commander and everyone else with my calligraphy.
Commander?! I-I won't be able to write like this...!
Calligraphy is also a form of self-cultivation, so I am instructing the children... Commander, would you also like to join?
I'll show you why they call me the "School's Strongest!"
A balanced school life is a part of the responsibilites here. Surely, I will develop valuable and translatable skills through the process of going to school.
Hmm... school life, huh? It's a fairly fresh experience for me. Would it be fine to pin my hair up like this? What do you think, Commander?
Woah! C-Commander? When did you get here? I-I'm sorry, I'm still not ready yet...

Commander, even if you're at school, you can't slack off too much! |What clubs am I interested in joining... I wonder if there's a kendo club... |This uniform was supposed to fit, so why is it so tight... C-Commander?! What are you staring at!?
This Woofy strap here? Atago gave it to me and said it'd help me look less uptight. Jeez, I'm not uptight at all...
Hmm... school life, huh? It's a fairly fresh experience for me. Would it be fine to pin my hair up like this? What do you think, Commander?
Phew... I suppose that's a good warm up.
I will give my all to fulfill any task I've been assigned... B-but, Commander, could you not stare at me so much? It's a bit... embarrassing...
Ugh... S-such shameless attire... If not for Atago saying that it would benefit me to experience different things...! It looks good on me?! I, I see...
F-finally, you're back... With so many people staring at me, I was so hoping that you'd come back soon...
Sitting in this same pose is rather tiring, but this is also part of my training. After all, improving my flexibility should not be something that goes to waste...

The flashes from the camera are a bit too bright, but worry not about me. Commander, I shall face down each and every challenge before me. |I should try to maintain my smile at times like these? If you say so... then I shall do as you advised to the utmost of my ability. |Commander, would you mind holding onto my parasol for a bit? I need to fix my hair accessory...
I should change my pose to make it easier to take pictures? V-very well... Ugh... Th-this is too embarrassing after all...!
I, I'm still working right now...!
Ugh... S-such shameless attire... If not for Atago saying that it would benefit me to experience different things...! It looks good on me?! I, I see...
Calm your spirit and dedicate yourself to the task... I want to believe that this is part of my training!
Will any of you be able to stop me today?
I brought my katana with me in this wedding dress. It's just hiding somewhere that you cannot see.
Commander, I've been undertaking countless bride training sessions in order to prepare for this day. As your bride, I won't let you down.
As someone who only lives for training, I'm really happy and lucky to be able to find and bond with you, Commander.
I'm slowly getting used to waiting for your inevitable return.
Commander, come and try my cooking.
I just received a new mail.

I think that each and every day we spend together is a blessing. | After today's training, I will replenish our food supply... am I... a good wife? N-nothing.|Atago said that my expressions have been softened recently, heehee, that's because now I smile whenever I think of you.
Commander, don't get sloppy during the mission.
Mission complete... I feel so happy after seeing the Commander's efforts.
Commander, please focus on the work... or are you purposely teasing me just to see my troubled face?
C-Commander, we are still in the office...
Commander, I've been undertaking countless bride training sessions in order to prepare for this day. As your bride, I won't let you down.
Imbeciles! Stop the pointless struggling and surrender!

No matter how many of my cannons are disabled, even should I get turned into a floating turret, as long as I am still able to fight, I shall fight until my last breath. That is my duty and my obligation.
Heavy cruiser - Tallinn.
Your job now is to go and show your gratitude to the returning commission team. Do it well and in a timely fashion.
Use your head before ordering me around. If you can't even do that much, then I won't lift a finger for you.
If you want me to follow your orders, then prove yourself a capable commander first. I can handle myself if you can't.
Don't like my scoldings? Then do better! You're not about to tell me you actually ENJOY being scolded, I hope.
I'm surprised you've actually taken my scoldings to heart. Hehe, hahaha... Since you like it when I tell you what to do, I'll be more exact from now on.

Are you sure you're fit to be a commander, considering how you take orders from your secretary? Don't worry, I'll keep telling you what to do so you can keep your job. I've started enjoying it, actually. Hehehe~
Wha...?! Keep your hands off my head!
Good work out there. Keep it up.
voiceline.oath: Do you really think this is all it takes to satisfy everyone? Exactly. Let that annoyance motivate you to do better.

voiceline.line: Urgh... What kind of monsters are they?!
You're astonishingly late. Did you want me to discipline you that badly?
voiceline.oath: Hats off to you for clocking in on time. See? You can do it if you just try. Hehehe.

voiceline.line: ...Tsk, all because of some small mistakes...
A letter has come in. I wonder who sent it...

Focus on your work. ...What, you need a break? If you've got the energy to complain, you've got the energy to work.|How do Tashkent and Murmansk manage to fit in with the others so well... What? Nothing important. Focus on your work.|I think I'll have a beer after work. Vodka? No thanks. I'll pass.
voiceline.oath: Have you checked out that report yet? ...If you've got time to make excuses, you've got time to do your job.|nil|nil
voiceline.extra: Maybe I should put a collar on you, like Chapayev suggested... What? Nothing important. Focus on your work.|Do your job well, and you'll be rewarded. Use your head and think up something good, then I'll see what I can do. Hehehe~

voiceline.line: It is imperative that missions be completed. This was true during my time in the Iron Blood, and is still true now.
Hello? Confirm the mission rewards. Don't keep us waiting forever.

I'm Tallinn, Northern Parliament heavy cruiser, formerly known as Lützow under the Iron Blood. I fought in the war under the name of Petropavlovsk as well. In the end, I never did get to unleash my full potential, but I trust your commanding to make good use of me.
All you need to do is sign this document, and I'll take care of everything else. Now to put on the ring and make it official with a kiss... So, how did my lips feel? Hehe~♪
Fire all cannons! Don't stop shooting!
What do you need? Don't even think about making me do grunt work just because I'm your secretary.
voiceline.oath: You're in need of some guidance, aren't you?

voiceline.line: Ngh...?! Now you've done it...
voiceline.oath: Hehehe. You know what? I'll let you have your fun for once.

voiceline.line: The name's Tallinn, heavy cruiser from the Northern Parliament. Don't expect me to blindly take orders from you just because you're the commander. Use that head of yours to think things through first, then we'll talk.
Just as it should be.
Look at that, we won. Victory comes naturally if you just follow what you trained for.
Commanding the fleet isn't your only job. You've also got to live up to everyone's expectations, and keep going no matter how tough things get. I'll be there to make sure you do.
What, you've never seen the inside of a shipgirl's room? It's not like you're here on official business, so stop standing around already. Find a place to sit and relax.
Good work out there. Get some rest, you've earned it.
Make yourself at home. I don't like being uptight all the time.

Hipper and I surprisingly have much in common. I like talking about food and guitars with her.|Kirov has a thing for barging into my room and ask me to go drinking with her... Still, I'll take that over the antics of Gangut and the rest.|Care for a hot beer? If you want a little spice added to it, let me know.
I suppose now's a good time for a nap... *yawn*...
Hnngh?! You're pushing your luck...!
What, you've never seen the inside of a shipgirl's room? It's not like you're here on official business, so stop standing around already. Find a place to sit and relax.
Hmph. I'll just have to teach you how pointless it is to struggle.
Always work at flank speed – the momentum you build up will keep you going. If you ever forget that, I'll remind you as many times as it takes.
You've reached the Bureau of Investigation... Oh boy, another case. Commander, finish up your paperwork ASAP. We've got witnesses to interview.
It's your duty as the Commander to show your gratitude to a returning commission team. Go on, don't keep them waiting.
Wow, you solved that one quick. Keep it up.
You're cutting it very close here. Five minutes early to everything – that's something you should practice.
...Tsk. You little rats!

This case is going to be a pain... It may be time to ask Chapayev for assistance.|Look, little Manjuu, I can't understand you through your sobbing. Take a deep breath, calm yourself, and then speak.|Well done, Commander. Care to go for a drink? I know a place that specializes in mulled beer.
Missions and inquiries alike deserve our undivided attention. Wherever you are, this still rings true.
You've completed a mission, now go claim your rewards. Chop-chop, we're on the clock here.
What is it? I already told you – you're not ready to be a phone operator.
Huh...?! Now you're really asking for it...
You've reached the Bureau of Investigation... Oh boy, another case. Commander, finish up your paperwork ASAP. We've got witnesses to interview.
We won. Given enough training, victory is par for the course.
Destroyer Division 17, setting sail! Huh? Did I get something wrong...?
Midway? I believe we won that battle... O-or am I wrong again?!
Kagerou-class destroyer number fourteen – Tanikaze.
A team has returned to base, Commander.
It's you... *Stares angrily*
I still don't know very much about you, Commander.
Usually valley winds are only there during noon, but I'm always here!
Hehe~ You're wide open for attack! Poke~
When I'm with you, it feels like time flows faster. Do you feel the same thing, Commander?
Wah! Welcome back!
I'm right here if you need me.
What could I have done better...
The winds have brought you new mail.
Hamakaze-chan, you need to ease up a little! Pokey-poke~|Y-Yukikaze's coming here? W-we should be able to get along... Hopefully...|I always feel at ease when you're here with me, Commander.
The mission isn't finished yet, Commander.
I knew you could do it, Commander.

I'm Tanikaze, Kagerou-class destroyer number fourteen. I served as the flagship of Destroyer Division 17. There were a lot of aircraft in the Battle of Midway, but I hardly got bombed at all. Hamakaze-chan and I sunk a certain ship in the Kula Gulf... Hehehe~
Ahh... Th-thank you so much... I-I happily accept. Um... uh, well, I-I... love you too, Commander! I-I'm so embarrassed...
Now's it's my turn!
Wah! I wish you'd stop poking my cheek like that... Mmph...
Please, don't poke anything but my cheek!
I am Tanikaze, the winds have carried me from valleys to mountaintops... Commander, will you take me home?
It's really windy today...
Did I do well enough to satisfy you, Commander?
Are my sisters over there?
Would you like to go to the beach with us, Commander? I want to build sandcastles with everyone!
The butterfly flew... Huh? Where did it...? Hamakaze? Hamakaze?! Huh? Where are Urakaze and Isokaze? Where did...? We said we'd all go to the beach, so where did they go...?
Commander, are you ready to go to the beach?
Commander, do you know where my sisters are? We promised we'd go to the beach, together...

Ugh... I want to invite Yukikaze, but... she's hard to approach...|Commander, are my life jacket and float ring in order?|We're going to the beach... so Isokaze shouldn't ask me to play warring states with her, hopefully...
The butterfly flew... Huh? Where did it...? Hamakaze? Hamakaze?! Huh? Where are Urakaze and Isokaze? Where did...? We said we'd all go to the beach, so where did they go...?
Ugh... I was just trying to get to the beach...
I am Tanikaze, the winds have carried me from valleys to mountaintops... Oh wow, a b-butterfly?! It really is a butterfly! Is this for me? Thank you, Commander!
I really wonder... What might Urakaze-chan and Isokaze-chan be doing right now...|Something good is going to happen today, Commander.|You're a very warmhearted person, Commander.
Wah! This time I'll poke you in return! Poke! Poke poke~!
Ah, I see! It's my turn now! Poke poke... Scratch scratch... Can I nap while you give me a piggyback, Commander? ...Zzzzz....
I am Tanikaze, the winds have carried me from valleys to mountaintops... Oh wow, a b-butterfly?! It really is a butterfly! Is this for me? Thank you, Commander!
Focus, focus...!
The motherly Dunkerque, the elegant Algérie, and Lady Richelieu... They all represent the pinnacles of womanhood. I must strive to be more like them.
Vauquelin-class destroyer – Tartu.
The commission has been completed. Sorry, Commander, I forgot to tell you...
Commander, please be quiet. I can't even hear my own thoughts over your ruckus...

Ow...! Ugh, where did that tree branch come from... Oh, Commander, good morning. I'm... Mm, I'm fine. I just got lost in my thoughts while I was walking. Don't worry, this kind of stuff happens all the time.
Listen up, me, if I keep overthinking everything, I won't notice what's going on around me... and then won't be able to become a mature and compassionate woman...

Commander, you're always trying to follow my pace during conversations... Thank you. However, if I end talking to myself, feel free to snap me out of it. I won't get angry or embarrassed if it's you...
Nowadays, when I think about you, I end up even deeper in thought than ever... Ah! I'm so sorry... Just now, I...
voiceline.oath: It's fine to always be thinking about you? In that case....... Huh? Didn't you just say it was fine...? I sometimes feel like I could just daydream about you forever...

voiceline.line: Hmm... What would be the optimal way to welcome back the Commander...
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander. Would you like me to give you a massage?

voiceline.line: ...Eep! I've got to stay focused...
Commander, good day...... Oh, I was deep in thought about why you hadn't shown up yet...
voiceline.oath: Hello, Commander. Ah, um... I was just thinking about what to make for you to eat...

voiceline.line: Hmm... I knew I should have aimed a bit more to the left on that last shot... Oh, I'm sorry... I should be retreating right now...!
Ah, um... Right, Commander, I came to bring you the mail.

Commander, do you think I can grow up to become a mature, caring woman like Dunkerque? |Vauquelin, about the donuts last time... Oh, you already heard about that? ...Sorry, I must have gotten lost in my thoughts again... |Vauquelin is really athletic. Getting tired from exercising, resting, and getting hungry... Oh, sorry, I started thinking about Dunkerque's sweets...
voiceline.oath: Commander, about that donut from earlier... Oh, I already asked you about it? ...Sorry, I was caught up thinking about other things and forgot...|Commander, would you like to read as well? I have lots of recommendations for you.|nil

voiceline.line: How should we spend the rewards from last time... Oh, we have new missions?
Mission complete. Should I arrange the report based upon priority, completion time, payout, or... Mmm...

I am Tartu of the Vichya Dominion. During the war, I was assigned to the Mediterranean and joined the fight against the Royal Navy. At Toulon, the others and I were... No, I can't get caught up about the past. The important thing is what's now in front of us! That's what Vauquelin would say, hehe.
Commander, do you like me as I am now? I also... like you a lot, but it feels like you're always looking after me... I'll do my best to grow up into someone who can look after you, Commander...!
The right thing to do in this situation is... this!
Commander, regarding what you asked me earlier... Eh? You've already taken care of it? I, I see...
According to the book Vauquelin recommended me, what I should do in this situation is... gather the evidence, and... detain the offender?
voiceline.oath: ...Eek! Ah, I'm sorry, I got too absorbed into thinking about you...

voiceline.line: Good day, Commander. I'm Tartu of the Vauquelin-class. ...Huh? Oh, I'm so sorry, I got caught up in thinking about how large the port is...
I feel like... I've become stronger.
......Oh, sorry, who got MVP again? Oh, it was me?
voiceline.oath: Who's the MVP? Um... Why's everyone looking at me...?

voiceline.line: I won't get washed away...!
The book I last read took place on the beach, if I remember properly... It was a murder mystery on the beach, right?
Oh, Commander, good day. Would you like some ice cream?
Oh, speaking of letters... I'm so sorry, Commander, I got engrossed in our conversation and totally forgot...

McCall from the Eagle Union and Suffolk from the Royal Navy seem to get along really well. The two of them are pretty funny, hehe. |Vauquelin, I'm not going into the water. I'll just spend a nice, peaceful day on the beach like this. |Commander, aren't you going to change into a swimsuit? ...Um, I'm slightly curious, just a little...
Commander, what's wrong? The ice cream? ...Hyaa?!

Commander, you're not going to get into the water? ...Ah, I'm fine right here. To tell you the truth, I once got washed away by the waves, and then got laughed at by Vauquelin... so I'm perfectly fine right here.
I could really go for one of Dunkerque's donuts right about now...
Let's beat them to a pulp! Ура!
Did you come to watch me practice? ...So, are you staying or what?
Tashkent-class destroyer – Tashkent.
Dear comrade, did you forget about the commissions? Are you dumb? Even I remembered.
Stay away from me, moron.
Do you need me for anything, dear comrade? I'm busy, so make it quick... Oh, is that so...? You just wanted to play? Well, I suppose I have some time to burn, so...

With a nickname like "the Blue Cruiser," you'd expect me to be someone who's cute and well-behaved right? People are always disillusioned as all hell after meeting me... and, well, I can't blame them. What do you think, dear comrade?
I'm just a normal girl. I don't want special treatment or anything. The same goes for you, dear comrade, I'm sure of it...

I don't really know anyone here, but everyone seems to genuinely like me. That's even after knowing what kind of person I am, so I want to be better. Of course I feel the same way about you, dear comrade. After all, I like you!
Welcome back. ...Tea? Nah, I have vodka though.
I won't concede defeat!
Is it that fun staring at Tashkent? ...Is that so? Well, do as you please.
Curses! Tashkent can still fight!
I brought the mail. You don't have to thank me for it or anything.

I was born in Sardegna, so I'm quite familiar with their cuisine. Well, it's not like it matters if the people here like that kind of food. |Why is so g'damn hot here? Dear comrade, go turn the air conditioning on for me?♡ |How strange... It's not like I make any effort to be friendly or sociable, so why do people end up liking me more? Hey, do you know why that might be, dear comrade?
Missions? Is there anything that looks interesting?
Mission rewards, huh... Lemme take a look. So...? Is there any food?

I'm Tashkent, flotilla leader destroyer from the Northern Parliament. There are three other... actually, nevermind. I'm called the "Blue Cruiser" because of my Sardegna-style construction. Of course, I'm a destroyer, and I have nothing against that. I'll put up results just like I did during the Battle of Sevastopol, so look forward to it.
So, this was the important thing you were telling me about? ...Sure, I'll take it. ...What, didn't I already tell you before that I like you? So, nothing wrong with us getting married, right?
I'll have you witness my true power!
What is it? Oh, you have work for me? Is that so... Fine, I'll take care of it.
Eh...? What are you trying to do? Are the puffy balls on my outfit that interesting?
I'm Tashkent. Some call me the Blue Cruiser. Another comrade who wants to woo me? It's just about recruitment...? I see. What a hopeless fellow you are.
It's my turn to fight? ...Is that so? Fine, I'll do it.
Ура! Did you witness my true power!
Dear comrade, how long are you going to keep me like this? ...Is that so... Ehh? Forever?!
...*Sigh*, I never thought I'd get captured by these little guys... Dear comrade, does Tashkent really have to play along with this?
You can't lift the mission rewards? ...Is that so? What a wimp. Here, I'll do it for you. I can leave it over here, right?
Welcome back. We're all throwing a big party tonight. ...I'm not lying! I'm going to invite everyone from the Northern Parliament over!
Dear comrade, do you really think you can keep me bound like this? ...Is that so? Naive fool. Hehe~

I knew there was something... wrong about that chocolate... I never thought this would happen to me... my head's still spinning... |When I was talking to Zara, she said I look more appealing in this outfit. So... what do you think, dear comrade? |I'm not like Avrora. I can't drink at all... Ah, wait, I'm not talking about vodka!
Wait, I'm not okay with this role reversal! I should be the one touching you, dear comrade!
...*Sigh*, I never thought I'd get captured by these little guys... Dear comrade, does Tashkent really have to play along with this?
Heheh, not a bad display of power, right?
I look really "dangerous" right now? What's so dangerous about me...? I think... you're the dangerous one, dear comrade.
Urrk... Who dares disturb Tashkent's slumber? ...Oh, it's you, dear comrade? Um, in that case... I can always get more rest later. Is something the matter?
Zara's crew brought me some snacks from Sardegna. Would you like some, dear comrade?
I'm still a bit sleepy, but if you insist on playing with me, dear comrade... perhaps I can spare some time for you.
Zzz... So tired...
Dear comrade, do you like stuffed animals too? ...Um, here. You can have this bear.|Why do so many people want to play with me? I just want to stay indoors and slack...|
Button up...? ...Tell you what, dear comrade. How about you come here and help me?
You're messing my clothes up even more...
Urrk... Who dares disturb Tashkent's slumber? ...Oh, it's you, dear comrade? Um, in that case... I can always get more rest later. Is something the matter?
Ура! Let's get this show on the road!
I've always been good at dancing, and I trust that my vocal skills won't disappoint either... Still worried about me, dear comrade? ...So, you're too much of a worrywart. I can handle this.
Dear comrade, what do you think about this outfit? Is that so... I went out of my way to become an idol and that's your reaction? Hmph, I'll rock your socks off soon enough.
The commission has been completed. Even if I'm an idol, I can't neglect my normal line of duty.
I can do this by myself... I don't need your help.
Are you looking forward to my idol debut? Is that so... Well, considering this is an armament test and whatnot, I guess I can put in a little effort.
Dear comrade, are you concerned about our teamwork? Heh, there's no need for concern. This kind of cooperation is second nature to us girls from the Northern Parliament.
It really is hard to express our individuality while performing as a group... Even though my dear comrade was concerned, I still... Oh, what is it? Did you come to help me...?
Dear comrade, what do you think of me now? ...Is that so. Look, I've taken lessons with the others and performed on stage. You don't need to worry about me anymore, for real this time. Hehe~♪
Are you seriously giving me the kiddie treatment? Hmph!
Cola and tea, chocolate milk, juice, and vodka... Everyone's back all right... Dear comrade, what would you like?
My dear comrade is watching me...!
Dear comrade, please go over our daily itinerary with us.
Were we out of step? But why...?
Looks like work from the agency. Dear comrade, let's look it over before showing it to Baltimore's group?

The other experimental ships all have instruments? Is that so? I don't plan on losing to anyone, no matter who they might be.|That Albacore really is something... She's got ideas for everything from costumes to choreography.|It's hard to keep your dance steps in sync... If you're just singing, you can pretty much hear how things are going. But if you're focused on dancing, you can't always be looking at the others.
Dear comrade, there's work to do. Come on, let's get to it.
That should wrap things up! You did pretty well!
I'm Tashkent, destroyer from the Northern Parliament, and now an idol participating in the experimental Muse System. I'll show you the tenacity of the Northern Parliament.

Heheh~ You're still too naive, dear comrade. There's no way I'd be satisfied with just being one star in a constellation. I'll shine the brightest of them all! That's why you shouldn't take your eyes off me even for a second~♪
Don't even think about looking away!
Chocolate for me? Is that so... Thanks for the support, dear comrade.
D-dear comrade?!
How do you like my outfit, dear comrade? ...Is that so? After all of Tashkent's work to become an idol, that's how you react? Hmph. Just you wait. My next concert will rock your socks off.
Guess it's time to get serious. Hehe.
This victory is a testament to my abilities, not just that of the Muse System!
March through the gates of hell! May our image be burned into the eyes of our enemies!
You can look all you want. Just don't forget about your job.
Tennessee-class battleship –  Tennessee, Hull Number BB-43!
The commission team is back? Allow me to show how they should really be handled.
You really are helpless...
My motto is, 'survival of the fittest'
Commander, you are still too weak. Come and train with me, and I will turn you into a proper Commander!
You're looking good these days. Hmm? Ah, not to worry. I've always stuck around with you. I don't want all the training to be in vain, after all.

I'm used to your pace now after all this time. I've yet to get used to staying in a room all day... If anything happens to me because of this, it's all on you. Don't tell me you're gonna dodge the issue.
When is the next sortie?
Commander, it's time to roll!
Yes. Yes! This is the kind of challenge I'm looking for!
Commander, you've got new mail

Commander! If you don't sortie, I'll bring the girls and head to new waters myself!|I totally cannot comprehend why you're so easygoing...|The secret to getting a better figure?... Cease with such jokes.
Hurry and take care of the missions, will you?
Your rewards are here, Commander.

I am the new type of battleship, Tennessee. In terms of combat, my waterline protection and hull armor have been upgraded, and my fire control systems have improved my fighting capabilities further. Commander, your orders?
If I take this, it means I'm yours forever? Fine, but on one condition; I want none of that 'You'll get hurt if you're in the battlefield' crap. I need some action every now and then!
Witness true firepower!
Mm... 'Cute' doesn't quite fit me.
I'm not a 'Clear' target like in a game!
You're the Commander? Hmm... Looks like you have potential. I'm motivated enough to help with your dreams. Ah, that reminds me, I am Tennessee. Got it memorized?
Like a full score and then some... Not bad.
This kind of battle is quite good
Even Terror... is getting terrified...
Your eyes look just like those weirdo' eyes, Commander...
Erebus-class monitor – Terror, Hull Number I03!
Commander, commissions are finished... You know, I lost my hand during a commission. It took everyone quite some time to help me find it...
Terror is terrified of you, Commander.
Aren't you afraid of me, Commander? My body feels cold... I am always depressed... I always feel.... like a corpse.
I remember my sister being with me, ever since the very first time I opened my eyes... She's always been there for me. She's my only family...
It's warm next to my sister, it's warm next to the Commander too... I feel like I just got a new family member... I'm so happy...
Commander... please touch my heart... It has never beaten this fast... it has never been this hot... This is all... because of you, Commander...
Rub my head, Commander...
Terror... is getting terrified...
Commander... I've been wanting to talk... to you... about...
*Cries*... I'll try to hold out until you tow me back to port, Commander...
A letter... Would anyone write a letter to me?
Commander, could you put away those peas? And the lawnmower……|Is is that weird for me to have a 'heart'?|Commander……are you……a wind player?
How about some missions for exercise...? Otherwise my knee may break again...
*coo, coo*~! Commander, I've got your rewards...

I'm the second ship of the Erebus-class monitors.
The Abercrombie-class ships are no match for me and my sister... We spent a lot of time in the Dardanelles strait. Bombardment missions... piece of cake.
Times like these, should I laugh, or should I cry? I'm... I'm not really sure... but Terror knows... I know I've never been this happy before...
... Sink.
Can you feel... my warmth?
*Stares...*
Monitor ship... Terror... Abercrombie-class ships are no match for me and my sister... We spent a lot of time in the Dardanelles strait. Bombardment missions... piece of cake.
I feel as if my body... is much more agile now.
Commander, I... I worked really hard. I didn't cause you any trouble, did I?
"From the depths of Sheol, I emerge from eternal slumber to claim your soul" ... This line sounds like something my sister would say.
I have to dress up as a ghost for Halloween, but I'm not very good at making complicated costumes... Is something like this okay?
Trick-or-treating? I'm a little excited...
Boo! Scaring people... it's done like this, right?

I wanted to spend some time with my sister, but she doesn't seem to be interested in Halloween...|Today, everyone will be dressed up as monsters and witches, so I will fit in with them...|Children will ask for candy from adults... but Terror is no longer a child- Eh? Candy, for me? Thank you...
Commander's hand... is nice and warm...
If you keep touching, the bandages are going to come lose...
I have to dress up as a ghost for Halloween, but I'm not very good at making complicated costumes... Is something like this okay?
I missed the Turkey Shoot last time, but this battle is mine!
Don't touch my radar! It's our most effective weapon against the enemy during the night!
Fletcher-class destroyer - Thatcher, Hull Number DD-514!
Another commission complete! I sure hope the girls didn't run into any kamikazes.
You're so boring now, Commander...
You're still upset about that prank? You're no fun!
Commander, I want to always be able to play tricks on you, but... Do you hate me for that?
What would you do if I told you I liked you? Hehe, I'm just joking~!
Close your eyes, Commander~... *Kiss* Did you feel that? That wasn't me... Okay, it was!
Good work, Commander! Want me to help you relax? Don't worry, I won't play any tricks on you~!
What tricks should we play on the other girls today, Commander? Heehee~!
Damn it! My prank failed! Ahh, Spence, get outta the way, I'll end up bumping into you!
You've got new mail! I-I'm not hiding it this time!
Commander, don't just stand there, come play with me!|Hahaha, look! Spence's reactions are so hilarious!|Since I don't know when I'll do something wrong, I'll just go ahead and apologize now.
The game isn't over yet. Don't be lazy!
I'll take these rewards off your hands if you don't want them, Commander!
I'm Thatcher from the Little Beavers. I'm named after Rear Admiral Henry K. Thatcher. Awesome, right? Aren't you surprised?
Just so you know: you're totally wrong if you think my pranks will end just because I got this ring! My pranks are an expression of love. So, I'm expecting you to take~ good~ care~ of~ me~!
How's this~?
I know what it is you really want to touch, weirdo!
Hoho? You wanna touch me there again?
Hi there, Commander! I'm Thatcher. Want to play a game with me?
Aha! I came up with a new prank!
Pranking Tactics: super effective!
Adequate preparation is half the battle.
All troubles that occur either have a reason or a trigger. Unless there are innocents tangled up in the problem, it's best to lay low and wait.
Helgoland-class battleship – Thüringen.
The girls have returned from their commissions. I'm sure the morale of the girls at the port will go up if you go out and greet them personally.
I'll serve my duties as your subordinate, but don't expect me to be all smiles while doing so.

Nobody, not even I, can meddle with your thoughts. Of course, due to our differences in standing, values, and information, I may disagree with you from time to time. But I will never disparage your authority over me.
I might not approve of all of your decisions, but I do admire your resolution. You are exactly as a commander should be.
Commander, how are your plans looking today? ...Ah, I'm not talking about work, but about your personal matters. Frankly, I simply wished to invite you to tea if we both happened to be free.

Maybe because we have good chemistry together, but I feel very comfortable being around you, whether for work or for personal matters. Even if we disagree on something, we come to understand each other's positions very quickly. I hope we can continue getting along just as well as we have.
