Good work out there. Will you take a break? Or are you planning on getting right back to another mission? Either way, I'll be here for you.
voiceline.oath: Good work out there. Will you take a break, or are you planning on getting back to work? Either way, I've made arrangements for whatever you choose.

voiceline.line: You're quite skilled, but I won't fall that easily!
Hm, I'm glad to see that you're as chipper as ever. Keep it up.
voiceline.oath: Hm, I'm glad to see that you're as chipper as ever. You look like you're ready to take on the world today.

voiceline.line: I'll be back with some payback. Nobody likes to stay a loser.
Here's some mail. I'd like you to check on them as soon as possible... Later, you say? Well, I don't think there's anything urgent here, so that sounds fine with me.

Be more confident with your opinions and openly state your opinions. If anyone dares to boo you down, I'll teach them something about manners.|Mm... I'll have to disagree on this. Of course, your word goes, but would you mind hearing my thoughts out first?|What's wrong? Got something against being watched? Ahaha, you don't have to be all tense. I wasn't keeping watch over you, I just wanted to observe your response.
voiceline.extra: I don't make any pointless remarks when you're making decisions. Previously, it was because of my respect for you, but now... it's because my heart can't help but trust in all you do.|I've collected a list of good locations for the two of us, just as you directed me to... While I'm aware that this isn't a date and that you just wanted to make your rounds, I'm... not opposed to it being a date as well.|nil|

voiceline.line: A new mission? I think it's a good idea to get started on it right now, but you're the Commander. I'll follow your plans.
Mission complete. I'll let you decide who you want to send to pick up the rewards.

Didn't I tell you I was the Iron Blood battleship Thüringen when we first met each other? You want to know more about me? Everything, even? Ahaha, then let's look for a nice place where we can sit and talk. I'll tell you everything, starting from my time in the High Seas Fleet.

This kind of proposal works best when our feelings are reciprocal—basically, we accept each other as partners. When we have differing opinions, as long as we work together, hand-in-hand, we can overcome any obstacle that stands in our path! Ahaha!
This is it!
The things I tell you are merely suggestions to you. Ultimately, you call the shots here.
voiceline.oath: You consider my opinions very important? Thank you very much for trusting in me. But the same goes for me.

voiceline.line: Hmph! This is payback for your insolent behavior. There's no need for me to continue being a doormat for you.
voiceline.oath: I'll let you off this once. Make sure to hold yourself back next time.

voiceline.line: It is a pleasure, Commander. I'm Thüringen, battleship of the Iron Blood. Before I formally sign on, there's one thing I want to ask – what role, exactly, do you have in mind for me? Hahah! No, I'm not testing you, I simply want a grasp of your moral compass.
Hmm. Much obliged.
Seems we've taken far less damage than I'd anticipated. How fortuitous.
This set is unbelievably big... Ahaha, there's no way I'd have any complaints. However, I definitely want the girl who prepared this set to experience what cleaning this humongous space feels like.
You, mop the floor. You, take care of the windows. Once that's done... Ah, Commander. Excuse us, we're in the middle of cleaning the area. If you have need of me, I must ask you to wait.
Nice work. I was just about to take a break myself. Would you like me to help you with anything?
Welcome back, Commander. I'd like to warn you—the floor is wet, so please be careful.

Speaking of which, what is this set even used for... well, I guess it's fine. It's not something for me to worry about.|That poor-looking Royal Maid taught me how to clean things up... Ahaha, it's not the kind of cleaning that you're thinking about, just regular cleaning.|Lützow, I'm not telling you not to play with the manjuu, but make sure you carry those things to Akashi once you're done, you hear?
Though you shouldn't be helping me clean... if you insist, there's no way I'd turn you down.
You, mop the floor. You, take care of the windows. Once that's done... Ah, Commander. Excuse us, we're in the middle of cleaning the area. If you have need of me, I must ask you to wait.
Stick to the plan!
Sigh... The last exercise revealed a lot of problems... Commander?! Please, could you please knock before entering a lady's room?
voiceline.oath: Commander? I'll get the door for you... Oh, it's already unlocked? Uhh, I see...

voiceline.line: Essex-class aircraft carrier – Ticonderoga, Hull Number CV-14.
The commissions team is back. We should go and greet them right away.
It seems I won't be able to save the Commander with my efforts alone...
You're going to head out on patrol? Then... wrap your arm around mine, just like this~ Oh, do you dislike me, Commander? Or... are you worried about the other girls' reactions?
There are many excellent allies here at the port. I... I'll have to work hard, won't I~♪
For some reason, it seems there are some strange rumors about the two of us floating about... Just as planned? ...Commander!
I'm not particularly noteworthy as a warship, and it might be a while until I can truly stand by your side as your equal... Even so, are you really fine with me? Can I really stay at your side?
voiceline.oath: Good work, Commander. Did you need anything? A date...? Why yes, of course! As long as you're fine with me... Err, no, I'll be taking the lead today, so come with me... H-huh? You don't mean right now?

voiceline.line: Good work on the operation, Commander. Give me your arm... Good, there we go. Hehe, doesn't it feel nice? Let all the fatigue dissipate, just like that!
voiceline.oath: Good job out there, Commander. Huhh, you want to see my arm? Sure–ahhn?! Th-that felt amazing...!

voiceline.line: Hard to port! Watch out for fire!
Oh my, you don't look that great... How about I do something special for you? What, you ask? Hehe, why don't you try imagining what it might be?
voiceline.oath: Commander, you seem to be in perfect condition today~ Want me to do "something nice" for you? O-okay, okay.

voiceline.line: Where did we go wrong...
There's some mail for you, Commander. You should check them as soon as possible. After all, it'd be a disaster if you overlooked something.

What's on the moon, you wonder? A rabbit? Aliens? Hehe. Whatever it is, I'd like to see it for myself one day.|If you're tired, you can snuggle up to me and rest for a bit. Oh, would you rather have a lap pillow instead? Well, if someone walks in on us, I'll leave the explanations to you~ Hehe.|The files are organized, and the Commander's schedule is ready... Phew... I should be fine.
voiceline.extra: I love going stargazing with Intrepid. Really, it's surprising how much our interests align.|There there, Commander~ You've done such a good job, haven''t you~ Of course, I have too~♪|Commander, are those documents good to go? Oh, I mean the ones I gave you earlier. I was worried I might have made a mistake or two.

voiceline.line: You still haven't completed the new missions? Hmm... Well, it's fine for now. Just take care of them at your own pace.
Great job completing those missions! You're quite something, Commander!

The sixth ship in the Essex-class, and the first in the class to have a long hull. I was once called "Hancock," but in the end, I was renamed to "Ticonderoga" in commemoration of the great war. That's about it.

Huh?! Uh, umm... What am I supposed to say in response to your proposal...? Uhh... You're really giving this to me? Ahh, I'm sorry, I'm just so happy that my heart is about to explode and I don't know what to do and ahh...
Let's show off the fruits of our labor!
You shouldn't slack off, Commander. Oh my, am I the distracting you from your work? Heheh, just kidding~♪
My, are you sure you want to be doing this? I think I saw Aoba or someone passing by with a camera earlier.
Hi there~ I'm Ticonderoga, the newest arrival at your port. Hmm, you look just as friendly as they said you'd be~ Thank goodness. So, how about a hug to start us off on the right foot? Hehe~
I've gotten even stronger... Great!
Oh, we won. It's because you were by our side, Commander.
No matter how many times I practice, when it comes time for the performance, I can't help but get nervous... Maybe I'm not really cut out for this...
It's showtime! The stage is all set for the performance! Let's enjoy this perfect evening together, Commander~!
Are you down in the dumps? Well, how about I cheer you up with a little show? ...A magic trick, perhaps?
I guess we didn't rehearse enough...

Forget about work for the time being and keep your eyes on the excitement, Commander~♪|And the lucky volunteer is... the Commander! Here, no need to feel embarrassed! Come up onstage and join in on the fun~♪|Next up, the Essex's air show! Feast your eyes on the performance!
Commander, did you want to come up on stage as well?
Oh? Commander, everyone's looking at us, you know?
It's showtime! The stage is all set for the performance! Let's enjoy this perfect evening together, Commander~!
I hope you'll all come back for more! ...Hehe, just kidding~♪
Commander, I shall fight for your sake.
Choose your enemies carefully, Commander.
Bismarck-class battleship, Tirpitz.
The commission seems to be complete... Next time, why don't you let me go? I'm a little curious.
In the end... are you just another incompetent fool, unable to command me?
I have already grown used to the cold solitude of the North. At this point, it's natural for me to have no expectations.
Those who have nothing to lose also have nothing to fear... But is this kind of bravery really anything to be proud of?
The worst feeling in the world is not knowing whether to continue waiting or to give up hope. Commander, are you someone worth waiting for?
Ahh... I see. I thought I was used to the cold and embraced it, but that was just because I had forgotten the joy of human interaction and the warmth of being with someone... But now I remember...
Commander, you should show your face on the battlefield more often. If you stay behind your desk for too long, you may one day forget the meaning of life.
No one would protect those who asked for their own destruction.
Once you get used to waiting, you lose sight of what you were waiting for.
So this is... the frustration that comes from failure and fear.
More mail for you... Ah, I'm envious.

Big sister... Now that you mention it, I think I might actually have one... Ah... I've already started to forget.|Can you comprehend how it feels to watch the battlefield from afar, unable to do anything but lament the cruelty of war?|Strategic reasons? I was installed with cannons... but they were never meant to be fired. Ironic, isn't it?
Finish your missions properly. Perhaps you will one day realize the joy of having any purpose at all.
Mission rewards... how nice.

It's a bit hot... Ah, sorry. I am Tirpitz. Because I was stuck in the north by myself for so long, people suddenly started calling me the "Lone Queen of the North." If you think it's a good nickname, then you do not fully understand... how soulless those words are.
Ahh... so this is the warmth of one's beating heart... It's melting the cold and despair remaining within me. Danke sehr, Commander. The "Queen of the North" is no longer alone.
Checkmate.
Are you cold?
I'll think of how to deal with you later.
I was imprisoned in the north for so long, unable to return home, and now you want me to follow you? ...Very well. It is up to you to show me the world.
If you have no opponents, all the might in the world is meaningless.
So this... is the taste of victory.
Commander, enjoy yourself to the fullest. Our hard-fought battles are for the sake of peaceful moments like these... and our hard-earned breaks provide us with will to keep fighting.
Summer... In the past, it was always just a hot and stifling season... But now...? Doesn't my outfit tell the whole story? Let's get going, there's bound to be a lot of people on the beach.
Commander, there's no need to rush yourself. There is meaning in simply waiting for you.

As long as you're by my side, even looking off into the horizon is meaningful. |Some of my colleagues seem to mistake me for some unapproachable ice queen... Perhaps playing beach volleyball with them would help... |The sunset and the beach at night are wonderful views. When you're done with work, want to accompany me for a walk along the shore?
Even I can't get fired up about doing missions during the summer... because it's too hot...
It's a bit stuffy... Commander, would you mind turning up the air conditioner?
Even though it's summer... there are still some things you shouldn't do...
In the past, I never saw summer as more than a hot and humid slog... But now? My outfit probably says it all... Let's go, everyone's already waiting for us at the beach.
Truthfully, I still have a hard time conversing with Bismarck... But at least now, time is on our side. There will be plenty of things for us to talk about in the future, wouldn't you agree?
I bet Bismarck must've been thinking about how to invite me to the party, but ended up asking you to do it, Commander. Hehe... Let's get going soon. It's best not to keep her waiting.
Commander, it seems like another commission has been completed. Go ahead and take care of it; I'll be waiting for you right here.
Commander, do you wish to know how I feel about Bismarck?
So you've come, Commander. Don't be anxious, the night is still young.
We're getting all these requests to dance with you, Commander. Maybe I should put in one as well?

In the past, the word "sister" meant nothing to me. But the moment I laid eyes on her, I knew in my heart... Yes, she is indeed my sister. |Behold, she basks in everyone's adoring gaze as they orbit around her upon the resplendent firmament of the stage, as if she is the center of the universe... But you and I both know, that is not where she wants to be. |Waiting for her to find us instead of taking the initiative to find her might be a bit of my nasty streak showing, but I'm still the little sister here. I have that right, don't I?
Do we have new missions? Don't worry, Bismarck won't mind waiting a bit longer.
Commander, we don't have too many of these banquets, so don't get too anxious about work. Let's have something to eat first.
I bet Bismarck must've been thinking about how to invite me to the party, but ended up asking you to do it, Commander. Hehe... Let's get going soon. It's best not to keep her waiting.
If she was here... how would she have fought this battle?

skins.name: Seasonal Pine and the Frost Flower

voiceline.line: My Sakura Empire friends told me that the pine tree is like an anchor point for the gods. Much like what you are to me, Commander... Oh, just talking to myself. Hahah.

They have a peculiar way of wishing a happy New Year in the Sakura Empire. In line with their traditions, I've put on this new outfit. I hope it doesn't... look strange on me. ...You like it? I see... That being the case, I'll keep wearing it for the time
I waited for you, Commander. Now let us go and wish everyone a happy New Year, before aircraft come chasing after us.

I must give my regards to my sister... But how I should face her, I do not know. Could you come with me, Commander?|Alabama proposed playing a type of badminton enjoyed around New Year's. I suppose that could be fun. ...The loser will have ink rubbed on their face? On second thought, I will pass.|I've long been used to the cold, but sometimes, I find myself reaching out towards the warmth... Commander, can I... come a little closer?
It feels warm... A nice change of pace.
*sigh*... Could you please mind your manners in public?

They have a peculiar way of wishing a happy New Year in the Sakura Empire. In line with their traditions, I've put on this new outfit. I hope it doesn't... look strange on me. ...You like it? I see... That being the case, I'll keep wearing it for the time

skins.name: A Vase for the Frost Flower

voiceline.line: It's all right, I just got here myself. I will say, it's strangely reassuring to know I'm not the only one nervous on this day.
nil|nil|nil
Those aren't ally ships! ... That must mean they're enemies, right?
Next time, how about I invite Her Majesty Elizabeth and we livestream a horror game together? It sounds exciting, I'm pumped~
Hey Commander, it's nice to meet you~! I'm Tokino Sora, a virtual idol affiliated with Hololive! I'll do my absolute best here like I always do! I'll be in your care, so cheer me on, Commander!
All of you on the Commission Team,  great work!
I-I need to speak up…
I heard that this world has "Horror games" too! Sigh, I wish Friendo A were here so we could play... ah, Friendo A is my best friend. She's tiny, but she's a super reliable girl!
It seems like this world also has soo soooo many things that I need to study. But I... will never give up! Can't stop, won't stop~
I... have no confidence that I'm properly being a reliable mentor... but when I look at you trying so hard, I can't help but think to myself that I can't let myself be so beaten down!
Having come to this world with everyone, and meeting with Commander... there has been a lot of trouble here and there, but now, here I am cheering everyone on with you! It makes me really happy!
We sure did our bestest today, huh~? You did well, who's a good Commander? You are~.
I absolutely can't stop, won't stop!
Welcome back, Commander! Let's do our best today, as always!
At times like this, let's let out a roar and calm down!
I wonder where in the world this letter came from?

The little'uns at the port... I think they're called "Meowfficers"? They're soooo cute!|I heard there are live stages in this world too! It'd be sooo nice if I could put on a show with everyone else sometime...|I've tried changing into all sorts of clothes, but this look sho is the best after all! It helps me relax, but... I sure wish I had sleeves!
Let's do our best and finish all the Missions, one by one! It's the final stretch!
We're done with the mission! Yaaay~!

I'm Tokino Sora, a virtual idol affiliated with Hololive! Ah, I guess I'd be Aircraft Carrier Tokino Sora here. I'm still inexperienced as an aircraft carrier, but please support me with all your energy!

Commander, I can do my best in this world because I'm with you. That's why all I can think is that I'd be happy if I could be make you feel even a bit better with my unending support...! Hehe... once again, I'll be in your care!
For bad kids who don't listen... take this!
Did something unpleasant happen? If you're alright with me, I'm willing to lend you an ear, or two, so relax~.
Commander, what's wrong? Whenever you're tired, I'll heal you right back up~
Hey Commander, it's nice to meet you~! I'm Tokino Sora, a virtual idol affiliated with Hololive! I'll do my absolute best here like I always do! I'll be in your care, so cheer me on, Commander!
Careful that you don't scratch anything! Let's goooo!
I can't stop, won't stop!
Beach volleyball...? I wonder if I can do it... You sure you don't want to 1v1 me with a horror game instead?
"Hello, my friends! I hope you're well~! This is Sora, on site at a beach in a slightly different world!" Beach visits just feel so invigorating, don't they? On another note, I can't swim…
Welcome back, Commander~ Would you like to relax on the beach again today?
My buddy "Monkfish liver" came with me~|Commander, I did my best to make you a lunchbox, but... how does it taste?|*Staaare* If it's a staring contest with Commander, there's no way I'll lose!
To think that Commander would do something like that to me... You're naughty! Bad Commander!
"Hello, my friends! I hope you're well~! This is Sora, on site at a beach in a slightly different world!" Beach visits just feel so invigorating, don't they? On another note, I can't swim...
Do whatever, it doesn't matter, I just wanna get this over with quick...
Wh-why are you looking at me...?
Brin-class submarine – Torricelli.
The commission team's back? I couldn't care less... You're gonna go see them? I-I'll tag along then...
You're even edgier than I am... Hehehe...
Like I said, don't worry about me... I'm right here, out of sight, out of mind... Hehehehe...
Yuubari said thanks? I just gave her an idea for a c-cannon modification, that's all... Now she wants my help with it, too? Uhh, I'm gonna pass...
Commander, can I come a step c-closer? Hehe, hehehehe... Your hand feels so nice and warm... Hehe...
I'm glad I have somone as d-diligent and charitable like you to count on... Hehehe... Y-you want me to give you a hand sometimes? I-I'll try...
voiceline.oath: Thanks for everything you do, Commander... Hehehehe... Tell you what, I-I'll make you dinner today... Mushroom marinade, mushroom risotto, and my own mushroom special... Hehehehe....

voiceline.line: Ooohh... Ahh, hehehe... M-more...
I know this scent... When I smell it, it means you've come b-back... Hehe, hehehehe...
I wanna get out of the water...
Ehh?! C-could you not pop in out of the blue like that... It scares me...
I-I'm resurfacing and going back...
There's mail for you. I've made sure nobody's read it but me... Hehe, hehehe...

You're awful busy today, Commander... You want my help? Umm... I-I'll think about it...|It's safe and quiet under the surface... I'd love to have you down there with me... Hehe, hehehehe...|Could you... c-close the curtains, please? The sunlight... it burns...
voiceline.oath: I sorted all your paperwork, Commander... Hehehe... C-could I get a "thank you," please...?|nil|I love the dark... Hehehe... It hides you from people who'd judge you...
voiceline.extra: Could I c-come with you on mission briefings? I am your secretary, after all... Hehehe...♡|Helping out with prototype equipment is such a chore... Ugh...

voiceline.line: Missions? Ugh, I hate missions... Could we just pretend they don't exist...
voiceline.oath: Another mission? O-okay...

voiceline.line: Leave the mission rewards alone for too long and shrooms might start growing on them... Hehe, hehehehe...

I'm Brin-class submarine Torricelli... Just remember my name, and I'll be happy... My battle with the Royal Navy? It taught me a lesson about what happens when you underestimate your enemies... Hehehehe...
Hehe, hehehe... Now you're obliged to provide for me forever... That was j-just a joke... So, what comes next...?
Stealthily...
Mine don't hold a candle to the massive mounds of some other girls... Hehe, hehehe... Sorry if that disappoints you, Commander...
I guess this means I've c-caught your interest...
voiceline.oath: Oh, Commander... Hehe, hehehe...♡

voiceline.line: You've gotta be the commander... My name is T-Torricelli, here to claim this room for myself... Don't worry about me, I'll just be sitting in some quiet corner... Hehe, hehehehe...
My guns could use an upgrade too...
Can I come up now? Okay, I-I'm heading back now... Hehe, hehehehe...
voiceline.oath: Hehe, hehehehe... S-say something good about me...

voiceline.line: I'll trade you this shell for a coconut, Commander... Hehe, hehehehe... You have only to g-gain from this deal, don't you see? Hehehe...
Hehe, hehehehe... We have this little c-corner of the beach all to ourselves... Now, what should we do first... Hehehehe...
Back already? Hehe... I'm not alone in being a bad swimmer... Hehehehe...
Eep! H-how do you keep appearing out of nowhere...

Don't be scared, little turtle... I won't hurt you, I just wanna watch... Hehe, hehehehe...|I need this straw hat to protect me, or else the sunlight would melt me...|A letter in a bottle? The ocean currents must've brought it here... Hehe, it's the plight of a poor girl who'll never be real... Hehe, hehehehe...
You're not p-planning something, are you...? Hehehe...
Good thing it's j-just us two here... Hehe, hehehehe...
Hehe, hehehehe... We have this little c-corner of the beach all to ourselves... Now, what should we do first... Hehehehe...
Hah, my rampage is soon to begin!
I hate the phrase, "it's how it's always been done." The same mistakes will forever be repeated as long as fools keep spouting it.
voiceline.oath: *Sigh*, that damn commander... If I'm not careful, then Kaga's going to... But wait, even Amagi isn't to be overlooked... Huh?! When'd you get there?!

voiceline.line: Tosa-class battleship number one – Tosa.
You don't expect me to announce when a commission team returns, do you?
voiceline.oath: A commission team has returned. It would seem I've grown used to announcing this.

voiceline.line: Weaklings belong behind the shorelines. I have no business with someone who cannot handle even a tidal wave.
You are brave, lowering your guard around someone that could take your life at any moment. You say it's because you trust me? Hahahah. Trust. A fine word that is.
You are an odd one, remaining unfazed in the presence of the Sakura Empire's ships. Still, I do enjoy exchanging stories with you. What have you in store for me today?

When I am alone, I let no rules or regulations restrain me; I push my will through. However, when you are present, I feel compelled to follow the rules and act with prudence. You are really something else, Commander.

Your ambitions and dreams are of no concern to me, but I know that you need me. Which, I admit, is also true in reverse. Our fates are intertwined, and we cannot afford to lose one another... Hahahah, isn't that right?
voiceline.oath: Lest you forget, no matter how great your ambitions may be, you are but a vulnerable human. If you are ever in danger, you must take cover and protect yourself. If misfortune befalling you strips me of my reason to move forward, I will hunt you down through the depths of hell or the pinnacles of heaven. Don't think you can escape from me, ahahaha!

voiceline.line: Did you see anything extraordinary on your expedition? You may find it inconsequential, but I am curious to know what you encountered.
voiceline.oath: Why don't you tell me about something interesting that happened out there? I like hearing about that stuff.

voiceline.line: Hahaha... Battles fraught with suspense are always the most interesting!
Give me an engaging task, should you find one, Commander.
voiceline.oath: All right, hurry up and get to work. I'll find something to do.

voiceline.line: Gah, so even I overestimate my abilities at times...
A letter, eh? I would be grateful if even a third of the information in it is credible.
voiceline.oath: Mail? If it's a reassignment request, I'd just rip it up.

voiceline.line: Brute force – the most primitive, but also most effective approach. That said, I much prefer fighting with words over swords.|I do not shy away from using any trick required to achieve my goals. I would rather that than play by the rules and end up at the bottom of the sea.|Stay behind if you cannot fight. The weak should know their place from the strong – this is the belief my sister holds.|I am neither as forward-thinking as Amagi, nor as short-fused as my sister. What? What's incorrect? The part about my sister, or my description of myself?
voiceline.oath: Commander, you seem to be dealing with Amagi's bootlicker pretty well... Heh, actually, my sister's even harder to handle. Be grateful that you have me.|As ships, our purpose is to connect the hearts of mankind as well as the ocean's routes. No matter what shape we might take, that will always hold true. Even if we were born for the sake of war, that will always hold true.|Privacy...? As someone who is strong, isn't it only natural to protect someone who is weak such as you, wherever and whenever?

voiceline.line: A leader chooses their mission, not the other way around. You should take this principle to heart, Commander.
voiceline.oath: Missions? Let me see them.

voiceline.line: A mission has been completed, has it? Then don't loiter around, go and claim the rewards at once.
voiceline.oath: Oh, was that the mission completion notification? How was the payment?

voiceline.line: I am Tosa, the first Tosa-class battleship. My construction began long ago, but its completion never came... I have been an aircraft carrier, a battleship, a weapons testbed, and a target; they worked and reworked me to the bone. But now I am here, in this form, and I will not disappoint you.

Simply being given life in this world would've been enough for me, but now I've even been given a partner to spend said life with... Hmph, life is a long and arduous road, and I am happy that I get to walk it with you.
Bear witness to who reigns supreme!
Seeing as you have time to kill, why not practice your swordplay with me?
voiceline.oath: You want to cross swords with me? We could, but... It would be a dull match if I don't go all-out, but then you are bound to suffer grave injuries... Hmm, what to do...

voiceline.line: Acting on a momentary impulse can have deadly repercussions. I do hope you're not getting any outlandish ideas.
voiceline.oath: Do not let your hand waver. Be more bold if you so wish. Hahaha!

voiceline.line: I am the nameship of the Tosa-class battleships, Tosa. I only serve those who I deem worthy. As for you... Well, I do not believe in making hasty judgments. For the time being, let me first assess your abilities.
You have an eye for talent, Commander.
It's over already? Hmph, I expected more from them.
You should avoid swimming too much as you're so sickly, Amagi. How tragic it is, a ship such as you being so frail...
An inspection? ...You're awfully gung-ho about your work considering how hot it is outside... Surely you wouldn't have some sort of ulterior motive?
My sister is still on the way here? Hmph, then I will prepare you some food.
Whew... It's nice to get to play freely, but I must take heed of all the extra attention this swimsuit draws to me...

The shrine maiden and her sister, frolicking in the water... A rare sight to be had.|We could play a round of go if you are bored. I want a new opponent after playing against only my sister for so long.|You're in need of a snack? Sorry, I only just got these from my sister. That said... we could exchange side dishes, I suppose...
Try this with my sister instead. Actually, don't; it would likely backfire on you...
An inspection? ...You're awfully gung-ho about your work considering how hot it is outside... Surely you wouldn't have some sort of ulterior motive?
Come on, everyone! We are born winners!
voiceline.oath: We all believe in you, Commander!

voiceline.line: Umm... What was I doing just now? Do you have any ideas, Commander...?
voiceline.oath: I was just about to go buy the ingredients for tonight's dinner. I'm impressed you remembered, Commander! Heheh, I should work on remembering things better myself~

voiceline.line: Trento-class heavy cruiser – Trento.
The commission team is back, safe and sound. May I head out to receive them?
voiceline.oath: The commission team has returned. Remember to check the rewards list!

voiceline.line: Don't give up, Commander! If you just make amends for your mistakes, nobody's going to abandon you!
I much prefer complimenting and congratulating people over scolding and blaming them~
Please have some of this stamina-recovering coffee! ... Oh, does it taste bad? Let me try... Eww?! I might have mistook salt for sugar...
Are you having troubles of any kind? Could you share them with me? Telling others what's on your mind can be a great help~
As long as you need me, I accept you for who you are, Commander. No matter what happens, I'll always be here for you~ See? Everything's all right~
voiceline.oath: You've shown how much you need me, so as promised, I wholly accept you for who you are~ Hehehe~ You have nothing to worry about, sweetie. You're doing really, really good~

voiceline.line: You're amazing, Commander! Bringing home another victory for the team~
voiceline.oath: Awesome work bringing everyone back safe and sound~ Keep it up, sweetie!

voiceline.line: This doesn't look very promising...
Right on time~ Way to go, Commander~!
voiceline.oath: You've clocked in right on time again! Way to go, Commander~ I'll shower you in more love and support after you finish your job~

voiceline.line: It's okay, it's okay! This isn't anybody's fault!
Please don't forget to check your new mail!
voiceline.oath: You have new mail~ Just be careful not to fold the envelope, okay?

voiceline.line: You've already finished all the paperwork? That's great~!|Tea blends, let's see... Hmm, would any Royal girls take issue with this mix? Yeah, they might...|Looks like I'll get to enjoy both the Dragon Empery's AND the Sakura Empire's cuisine at this port~ That's wonderful~
voiceline.extra: You've already finished all the paperwork? That's great~! Then I say we go have lunch with Trieste~|Ah, you're going for a stroll around the pier in a while? Do you want me to come with you?|How about taking a little break and doing something fun? We can doodle with crayons, play with toy blocks, or maybe even do a round of musical chairs... Hehehe~

voiceline.line: If we push on just a little more, we can take on a new mission!
Yup, yup, mission complete! Keep it up, Commander~!

I am the nameship of the Trento class, but if you count the days since our launches, Trieste has a longer service record. Speaking of which, I had a little incident on my launch day... but I still carried out my missions as a member of the Sardegnian fleet~

I thought I was prepared for this, but now with the ring on my finger, I feel so unbelievably happy~ With all my heart, thank you, Commander. Ehehe, we'll always be with each other now, so if anything ever happens, please let me know!
Let's go, everyone!
I've heard that hugs help people relax~ Shall we test that theory, Commander?
voiceline.oath: Here you go~ And don't forget: you're doing a great job, Commander~

voiceline.line: That's naughty, Commander! You'll be unpopular with the girls if you keep doing stuff like this.
voiceline.oath: Okey-dokey, let's cuddle all you want! ...Wait, this isn't exactly what I had in mind...

voiceline.line: I am Trento, first heavy cruiser of the Sardegna Empire, here to help out. I'll support everyone in my own special little way, so please do look forward to that, Commander♪
Please take good care of the others as well, okay?
Very well done, everyone! I'm so glad we won~!
voiceline.oath: Great job, everyone! Including you of course, Commander! You're my superstar~

voiceline.line: I might get sunburnt? Ah, you're right, I should be more careful... Commander, would you mind helping me apply the sunscreen?
The summer's scorching heat is alleviated by the ocean~ Commander, why don't you set aside your worries and... cut loose a bit~?
It must have been difficult fighting in this heat~ Mmhmm, good job out there~
Commander? Did you doze off to the sound of the waves just now? Ahah, don't worry~ There's plenty of time, so you should enjoy your nap~

Commander, would you like to try this sundae? Here, say "ahh~" Very good, very good~ |Playing in the water seems like a lot of fun. Commander, shall we join them as well? |The rhythm of the waves is quite hypnotic... Commander, if you want to take a nap, just come lie down over here and let me take good care of you~
If there's anything you want me to do, just speak up~ Don't be shy~
Being at the beach always makes people more easygoing... I suppose I'll forgive you today~
The summer's scorching heat is alleviated by the ocean~ Commander, why don't you set aside your worries and... cut loose a bit~?
Everyone do your part, or else I'm giving you detention!
Why are you here and not in your office, working? Shoo with you. You're still on duty.
voiceline.oath: I'm fine with giving you a lap pillow, but I won't pamper you like Trento does... Y-you meant I'D rest on YOUR lap? Well, I suppose I... No, never mind! Come on, here you go!

voiceline.line: Trento-class heavy cruiser – Trieste.
The commission team has come back. Phew... I'm glad they're okay.
Are you happy now? Sigh... I'm going to fix you. You WILL learn some damn discipline.
No time to rest, Commander. You've done your job, but not the assignment I gave you. Start on it now, or you'll fall behind.
Done with your job? Okay. Have a nice dinner, then treat yourself to a bath. You'll feel as good as new after a hard day's work, trust me.
That sortie sure took its toll on you. You should probably take some time to rest. Rework today's timetable as needed and I'll relay the changes to the others... Huh? You want me to rest with you?
I don't need to rest, though. Why do you want me to stick around? I suppose I could monitor to ensure you are getting enough rest... Okay, hang on, I'll be there in a moment!
voiceline.oath: You've got food on your face. I thought you could at least eat properly, but I suppose you're a child, hmm? Remember to drink your water, too... Clean it with a kiss? I-I suppose I could...

voiceline.line: I'll check through the after-action report. In the meantime, reflect on your battle with the girls. Go on, get to it.
voiceline.oath: The girls are waiting for you. This isn't the time to chit-chat with me – go talk to them. Yes, of course, I'll spend some quality time with you later.

voiceline.line: Well, this is a conundrum...
Right on time. It's good to know you're punctual. Try to be here the same time tomorrow.
voiceline.oath: Finished your morning preparations? I sure hope so. Please don't make the others shoulder your burdens.

voiceline.line: This is all on me for being too damn lenient!
Best to read your mail now before you forget about it.

I'll schedule the resupply shipment. Better I do it than trust an underachiever to produce good results.|You made an error in this paragraph. Fix it yourself – it's tiring enough just pointing out mistakes. Don't make me dump more assignments on you.|People put pineapple on pizza?! That's disgusting! That's a war crime against Sardegnian cuisine!
voiceline.extra: How's our food supply looking... Wait, what? We're nearly out of food?! Commander, remedy this at once before we have a famine on our hands!|This paragraph is... error-free, it seems. Nicely done. It's things like this which prove that you're capable of running this place.|Since you'll be spectating tomorrow's exercise, is there something you'd like for a boxed lunch? Let me know before the end of today.

voiceline.line: Keep your nose to the grindstone. These missions won't finish themselves. Do a good job and I'll treat you to a home-cooked meal.
voiceline.oath: Pick a mission to do first, then set out to complete it. Do a good job and I'll... Hmm, well, I'll set aside a day for a date with you.

voiceline.line: You've done well. Here you are, as promised. It's a good thing I wrote that down.
voiceline.oath: Well, well... You did it. So, how about that date? I did say I would, didn't I?

voiceline.line: I'm Trieste, second ship of the Trento class. I saw action in the Mediterranean and was to become a carrier, but... Never mind. Forget what I just said.

I figured you were dying to tell me something... Huh? Did you arrange all this to propose to me? You're sure this isn't some mistake? S-s-so this ring is for ME?! Have you had these feelings for me all along? That... makes me so happy! I just...
Keep an eye on your surroundings!
Need a break, do you? Fair enough. I suggest doing some stretches.
voiceline.oath: Do I need a hand? Not at all, I'm plenty capable of handling this.
Oh my. Go on...♡

voiceline.line: I am Trieste, Trento-class heavy cruiser number two. My job is to help you with your work. Now, would you stop gawking and get back to it?
A smart move on your part.
Now do you get why I'm so strict, Commander? It's because discipline begets victory.
voiceline.oath: I want to claim some credit for this victory... but no, this one's all thanks to you, Commander. Well done.

voiceline.line: It's perfectly normal to wear uniforms at school... Can you handle it though, Commander? You look worked up for some reason.
Oh my, are you done with your errands already? Surely, you didn't skip work just to eat lunch with... Ah, sorry for doubting you. Alright, let's go. Trento is waiting for us.
I think the commission team is back. Down there – isn't that them?
This selection of dishes should work for half a year without feeling too samey. Tomorrow I think I'll... Oh, welcome back, Commander. I was just thinking out loud about our boxed lunches.

I don't know how to approach you when I wear this uniform. Do I treat you as an upperclassman? Should I address you differently, or like normal?|What's for lunch today? You'll have to see for yourself. I'll tell you this: it's a dish both you and Trento like.|How do you hope to spend the prime of your life, Commander? Making great memories to look back on, and the like?
Don't neglect your missions. You're keeping me and Trento waiting.
You're THAT eager to have lunch with me? What am I to do with you...
Yup, I really don't know how to approach you...
Oh my, are you done with your errands already? Surely, you didn't skip work just to eat lunch with... Ah, sorry for doubting you. Alright, let's go. Trento is waiting for us.
My boat torpedoes are ready!
You know about those Union girls who call themselves "Solomon Knights" or something? Well, it has a nice ring to it... All righty, Commander, I'm an "Undersea Knight" from now on, got it?
Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine – U-101.
The commission fleet is back? All righty, I'll go pick 'em up!
I'm going for a ride! Tschüss~
When I put in my headphones and rev the engines, I can outrun all my worries. Lemme tell you, Commander, it's one hell of a feeling.
Y'know, I really want to have an all-out race with the other factions' subs. I just know it's gonna get my blood pumping! How about it, Commander, wanna do me a favor?
Commander, hurry up and hop on! There's a school of incredibly rare and beautiful fish passing by today! Who knows how long we'd have to wait if we missed this opportunity!
Commander, look who's back! Hehe, seems like you've fallen in love with Great Shark, huh? All right, get on. Today, I'm going to show you a real special place!
Commander, want me to drop you off at the dorm so you can get some rest?
Looks like I've gotta pick up the pace...!
Commander, just hit me up next time and I'll give you a ride, okay?
Couldn't get out of the way in time...
Hello! Your local courier U-101 has new mail for you~ Hahaha!

Ah, Commander, wait just a sec. I've gotta finish fine-tuning Great Shark. We can go afterwards. |Great Shark is land-capable, you know. Well, just not as fast. Don't ask why it works that way! |What kind of music do you like to listen to on trips, Commander? Have any recommendations?
You have a new task? Want me to take you to where you need to go?
Commander, I've brought the rewards!

I'm U-101, one of the Iron Blood's 7th U-Boat Flotilla. I took part in four wolfpack operations. You could say that disrupting the enemy supply lines is my specialty - I even received a Knight's Cross! My hobby is going on long rides with Great Shark. Commander, wanna come with me?
Don't worry, Commander. As long as you're somewhere Great Shark can get to, call me any time. I swear I'll come for you!
All boat torpedoes, launch!
Hop on, Commander, and make sure to hold on to my waist tight! It won't be my fault if you fall off~
...Commander?! Sic 'em, Great Shark!
Hey! You! That commander over there! How 'bout coming for a ride on my Great Shark? I'll show you a real thrillin' time!
I feel the need for speed!
Booyah! Number one!
It feels nice to kick back and enjoy some good music!
Commander, welcome to the school band! Why'd I join the band? The reason's simple – there's no Motorbike Club at school, haha! Just kidding~! Actually, I'm quite fond of music as well, heh.
It's pretty far from here to the piers. Commander, how about we take Great Shark out for a spin?
I don't know why, but when it's just the two of us in the band room, my chest starts fluttering like I'm sick... but I'm so glad... Aghh!! I'm gonna go take Great Shark out for a spin!
Good work out there, Commander. Let's put on something chill~
Commander, let's put on some music!

Commander, I recently started learning the trombone, hehe. I'm not very good at it, but it's still pretty interesting. Wanna listen~? |If I was able to play this thing underwater, I'd be able to perform for the fishes! Too bad, though... Guess I'll have to settle for the fish in the aquarium!|Even though we U-boats hang out together regularly, studying together at school feels rather special!
Commander, there's a ton of homework today.
Commander, I'm all done with my homework. Let's go for a ride!
Commander, how about becoming the band conductor?
Woah! I almost smashed this over your head...
Commander, welcome to the school band! Why'd I join the band? The reason's simple – there's no Motorbike Club at school, haha! Just kidding~! Actually, I'm quite fond of music as well, heh.
I'm a shaaaark. Raaaawr.
I'm not a garlic bulb, I'm a shaaaark. Fear meeee. Raaaawr.
Iron Blood Type IXB submarine – U-110.
Commander, someone's come back to pooort.
Why won't you play with me...
You mean my Enigma machine doesn't have any use anymore? Okey-dokey, then let's play a game of decipheriiiing.
Believe it or not, this hairstyle was born with meeeee. Mhm, I'm a shaaaark. Raaaawr!
Bulldog's really smart. Playing with her is fun. Next time, you should come play with us tooooo.
The Commander is my friend. I'll give you some of my codebooks. That way it'll be fine even if I forget mine. Yup-yup.
Commander, your office is so booooring.
U-110's awesoooome. I'm not giving uuuuup.
Commander, did you bring swirly-whirly candies?
Codebooks, where are my codebooks... Goodie, they're safe...
I'll take care of your encrypted maaaail.
Codebooks, codebooks... Oops, I forgot them in the dorm.|Commander, let's plaaaaay. Leeeeetttt'ssss plaaaaaayyyy.|I got lectured for pretending to be a shark... But I still had fun.
Commander, once your mission's doooone, let's plaaaaay.
Rawr! I've brought the mission rewaaaaards.

I'm U-110, Iron Blood Type IXB submarine, and I'm really good at commerce raiding. The Enigma machine I've got in my backpack is awesome. I'm awesome too, I just left my codebooks and charts behind...
Commander is so nice to me. I love you. U-110's gonna bite anyone who messes with you. U-110's scaaaryyy. Raaaaaawr!
Raaaawr!
Commander, I'll give you a swirly-whirly if you play with meeee.
Nom! (U-110 bit your finger.)
Raaaawr. U-110 is a shaaaark. Fear meeee. Mess with me and I'll bite yooouuu.
U-110's super scaryyyyy.
Raaaawr. U-110 scared the enemies awaaaay.
This hat is not a bulb of garlic, but a shark. A scary shaaaark. Raaawr.
Whenever I play games with Bulldog, I always end up losing. Frustratinggg. That's why... I'll study hard. One day, I'll winnnn.
Commander, why does everyone like flicking U-110's hair?
Commander, let's go to school together?
U-110 has learned a new codebreaking method. Want me to try it on the mail?

U-110 learned from school that there are actually many kinds of Enigma machines... School is coooool. |Raaaawr, raaaawr, raaaawr! Amazon said I can't rawr at school, so U-110 will rawr when hanging out with Commander. |Bulldog says it's no fun to play with U-110, but she always plays with U-110 anyway. What a nice girl.
The homework is strong... but U-110 is stronger. That's why I'll finish it all.
Commander, U-110 has defeated the homework. I'm strooong!
Hm, this outfit is very cute, and U-110 likes it a lot. However, it makes me not scary. That makes me a cute shark. Raaaawr.
Whenever I play games with Bulldog, I always end up losing. Frustratinggg. That's why... I'll study hard. One day, I'll winnnn.
Look at these flowers in my hair. No, they're noooot garlic flowers.
I have to wear beautiful clothes to a party, or so Bulldog said. So, I had everyone help me pick out beautiful clothes. Commander, I'm beautiful, right? Eh... cute?
I can't be a shark in this dress... But my friends here are still shaaarks. Raaaawr.
Are you waiting on U-110 too, Commander?
I've hidden the codebooks. They're not getting them this time.|I put on these wings. I've become a flying shark. Raaawr.|Why wasn't my invitation encrypted? Everyone knows I like decrypting stuff...
Bulldog gave me swirly-whirlieeees. Want one, Commander?
I have to wear beautiful clothes to a party, or so Bulldog said. So, I had everyone help me pick out beautiful clothes. Commander, I'm beautiful, right? Eh... cute?
U-boats don't mess around on the staaage.
I'm garniiished, not garliiic. Hrmph... Raaawr!
The horned idol U-110 splashes onto the staaage. I'll sing all the baddies to obliviooon. I'm scaaary. Raaawr. Raaawr♪

I dropped my lyrics sheet... But I still have my codebooks, so we're fine. ...We're not fine?|"Hear the terrifying melody of the Lord of Sharkness, ruler of the dark abyss. Raaawr." ...It loses all its scare factor when I go raaawr? Raaawr...|You and me, let's do a song battle, Albacooore. ...Nobody can hear you sing underwater, dummy.
After our recital is done, I wanna play a gaaame.
Rawr! I brought you some supplieees.
If you don't behave, you'll get munched ooon.
Munch! (U-110's baby sharks bit you.)
The horned idol U-110 splashes onto the staaage. I'll sing all the baddies to obliviooon. I'm scaaary. Raaawr. Raaawr♪
I lost to Bulldog again... Commander, it's time for special trainiiing. We'll doodle her face into oblivion.
Commander, happy new yeeear. I'm no bunny, I'm a shaaark. Not a cute shark, but a crimson, scaaary shark. Raaawr.
Let's build a snowman. Or a shiver of snowshaaarks. ...There's no such thing as a snowshark?
New Year's is a lucky daaay. I'll get lots of swirly-whirlieees. Do you have any, Commander?

Everyone's talking about their year-first dreams... I dreamed I turned into a big shark. Raaawr.|I've got you a New Year's card with encrypted teeext. I can decipher it for yooou.|Bulldog drew the art on my paddle. She's a really good artist.
I'm no bunny, I'm a shaaark. A scary shark that'll bite yooou. Raaawr.
Commander, happy new yeeear. I'm no bunny, I'm a shaaark. Not a cute shark, but a crimson, scaaary shark. Raaawr.
Now's my time to shine!
The manual for this industrial-grade AC says... Hmm. Let's just skip to pushing this big red button... Oh no, what's happening?! How do I turn it off?!
voiceline.oath: Okay, so... I'm meant to press this blue button instead of the red one on the AC... Achoo! Aww, dang it... I pressed the red one without even thinking about it!

voiceline.line: Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine – U-1206
The commission team is back! I'll go say hi!
You'll have to become a saint if you want my forgiveness! To start with... Lemme think... Okay, first of all, you've gotta get on everyone's good side.
I don't understand this instruction manual! But that's okay, I'll just go with my gut until I figure it out!
If only I had a button that autocompleted one day's work. If I did, I'd press it for you every single day... No, don't be greedy, Commander! One press a day is all you'd get!
Remember how you said we'd do something together next time you're free? You don't? Hrmph... You definitely did, though! Whatever, we're doing it now! We're going surfing!
Commander, would you mind if we did... everything together? You know, working, eating, swimming, napping... Everything! Please? ...Wahoo!
voiceline.oath: Commander! Do you have time right now? Then come play with me! I remember you saying you would! Oh, we're gonna have so, sooo much fun later!

voiceline.line: There's no button on my forehead, so stop that!
voiceline.oath: Hehehe, I like this!

voiceline.line: Welcome back, Commander! Hmm... Wouldn't it be nice if we could just push a button to open your office door remotely?
voiceline.oath: Open sesame! Kidding~ I'll just open the door like normal for you!

voiceline.line: Ow, ow, ow! Stop hitting me!
Hi, Commander! What are we doing today? I'm fired up and ready to do some work!
voiceline.oath: Hey, Commander! We're gonna hang out again after work is over, remember that!

voiceline.line: Oh fudge! I'm gonna push the emergency resurface button! They're not watching me, are they?!
You've got new mail! I'll open it for y– Oh... I guess should've asked you for permission first...
voiceline.oath: You've got new mail! I'll open it for y– Phew. I nearly did it again... Here you are! Your unopened mail!

voiceline.line: Can I push this button? ...No? What about this one? Also no? Laaame...|Oh, someone's at the door! Hello? Who is it? ...Huh? There's nobody here? Maybe I was just hearing things...|Your documents are printed and good to go! ...The cover and back are swapped around? Oops, uh... I'll go look for the manual...
voiceline.extra: I've got an idea! Hehehe, lemme just push this button... There we go! Fan's on now! Enjoy that cool air!|nil|Your documents are printed and good to go! I made sure to read the instructions this time! ...Agh, the text is on both sides of the paper! How'd this happen?!

voiceline.line: Oh geez, so many missions... I'll help you with them so we have more time to play later! Let's go!
I heard you finished a mission! That means more time for us to hang out, right? Hehehe~

You've heard about Iron Blood's wolfpacks, right? Guess what: I'm a wolf, too! Or I was, until the day I had a little accident... Wait, no, forget I even said that! I'm still a deadly predator! Keep your expectations high for me!
Hehehe~ I'm so happy right now I can't even think straight! I could just fall right into your arms! You make me feel like the happiest girl in the world! Hehehehe~
Fire torpedoes! ...Oops, wrong button! There!
Out of things to do, Commander? Then it's time to have fun with me!
voiceline.oath: It's always you touching me! Let me touch you for once!

voiceline.line: Huh? Are you having dirty thoughts right now?
voiceline.oath: Hehehe~ Don't be shy~

voiceline.line: Commander! Yeah, you! Get back here! You're supposed to greet me! Listen up, I'm the Iron Blood submarine U-1206, and I'll be serving here starting today! And don't forget next time!
My intuition just got keener!
We did it! Wait, shouldn't I get some sort of prize for being the MVP?
voiceline.oath: Victory! Hehehe! We did it, Commander!

voiceline.line: Is this a soda fountain? Guess I just press the button to make drinks come out! Clickity! ...Oh shoot! I forgot to put a cup down first!
Welcome! Oh, Hey, Commander! Heheh, so how do you like my maid getup? Looks pretty nice, if I do say so myself!
The commission girls are back in port! I'll start prepping some drinks!
Hehehe~ Wouldn't you say I deserve a tip for my top-tier service?
Welcome inside, Commander! Will it be coffee or milk tea? Or maybe... a little pick-me-up?

Elbe! Need a hand with serving all these drinks? I'll help!|We're offering a special deal: one-on-one chat time with a maid! Completely free of charge!|The service button? Sure, I'll press it right– Wait, I'm dumb! That means a customer's calling for me!
I hope you're not trying to ogle me like a perv!
It's NOT okay to wanna do p-pervy stuff to maids!
Welcome! Oh, Hey, Commander! Heheh, so how do you like my maid getup? Looks pretty nice, if I do say so myself!
Wanna hazard a guess where I'll appear from~?
My rigging's got bits that'll hurt ya, so watch yourself if ya wanna feel it.
Iron Blood Type IXA submarine – U-37.
Commission team's back? I'll go greet 'em! Better that than be bored to death in this office!
Miss me with your lame ass! Laterrr!
So here's the dorm, here's the academy, and here's the office... Gotcha. Now I've got a pretty good idea of where everything is!
Check out my massive rigging, it's big enough for two people! Hop on and I'll take ya some place far away!
When ya go on missions in remote oceans, ya gotta live with being alone for days in a row... But I've got this photo of you in your sleep to help stave off the loneliness! Heheh~

Sometimes I just wanna be right beside you, sometimes I just wanna hide and watch ya struggle to find me. Y'know, I think I'm in love! You made me feel this way, and you'll own up to it, won'tcha? Hehehe~
The deep sea hunter's back, baby! Didn't score any prey, but I just caught me an slacking commander! Heheh!
Oh crap! Might be time to dive back down and hide...
Oh, hey! I'm going out, so call if ya need somethin'! Gonna go for a dive!
Well damn. Better luck next hunt, huh...
Look at that, new mail! Wonder if it's from across the pond.

Can't I get a free pass if just say the paperwork's up and vanished? No? Figures.|They say teamwork makes the dream work! So let's round up some more peeps to do this paperwork!|Touch my tail without warning, and I'll whip your ass with the tail end of my rigging! ...Hey, I'm kidding! Hahahahah!
New mission, huh? I'm on it! ...What? We're not disruptin' cargo lanes?
Mission's been completed! Guess I didn't have much to do with it though... Lame.

Difference between us Type IX's and the Type VII's is that we're bigger and can go farther! We hide where they'll least expect us... then BAM! Torpedo 'em to smithereens! ...The what in Hudson Bay? They just made that up for that movie! The real me was still alive and kickin'!
I knew this day was comin', but I'm still feeling all giddy! Thank you for this, my lazy but adorable Commander! I'll always be with you from this day onward!
You ain't gettin' through me!
How d'ya like my glossy, wet skin~?
You got a kink for submarines or somethin', Commander? Well, well...
I'm the hunter that prances across the open seas, U-37! ...Huh? Is the commander here always this spaced out? Well, I've given you my name already, so catch ya later~!
Now that's a nice boost to my swimming skills!
We are so throwin' a party when we get back!
Now then, my dear visitor, I would like to play for you a little song... Heheh, go figure, I'm good at this whole mimicry thing!

Now then, please lend your ears to this song I shall offer you... Wait, Commander, are you spacing out again? Even though I went through all this trouble to learn this song from my friends in the Sakura fleet... Please pay attention, okay? I'm starting ov
Playing music's a way for you to express your feelings... I, uh, might still only be able to play beginner songs, but... you feel the emotion in 'em, right?
All right, I'm goin' out to– Oh crap, oh no! ...Phew, thanks, Commander. Nearly tripped right there... Mad respect to the Sakura Empire girls who can walk around in this stuff like it's nothing...
Hey! Happy New Year, Commander! Lessee here... Just tryin' to think of a fitting New Year's song...

These clothes keep slippin' off... Annoying for me, but just the way you like it, am I right~? Heheh~|My U-boat buds agreed to play this thing called "hanetsuki"! U-110 sure seems excited about it... Hang on, can I even play in these tight clothes?|An electric guitar would really be more my style, y'know? Would kinda clash with this getup, though. Ahah.
Hehehe~ I've got pretty slick skin if I do say so myself.
Whoa there, lost all self-control, have ya, Commander~?

Now then, please lend your ears to this song I shall offer you... Wait, Commander, are you spacing out again? Even though I went through all this trouble to learn this song from my friends in the Sakura fleet... Please pay attention, okay? I'm starting over...
There's nothing to worry about. Just take it easy.
I think it's good for a submarine to act a bit more mysterious. Wouldn't you agree, Commander?
Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine – U-410.
The commission team has come back in one piece. That's nice to see.
I just don't know what to do with inconsiderate jerks like you.
A submarine must be slippery, elusive. You know, an unknown threat lurking beneath the surface. Hehehe...
Patience is the most valuable trait a submarine can have. What lengths would you go, how long would you wait for someone dear to you, Commander? Hehehe~
I've got someone on the hook. What do I mean by that? You'll have to wait to find out. That's part of what being patient is about.
Why don't we start dating, Commander? ...What's this out of the blue? I've taken my sweet time preparing, and this is the time to strike! Hehehe, now give yourself to me~♡
Haste makes waste. Take it easy, yeah?
No more playing nice...!
Oh, you're back. Ready to start chipping away at this mountain of paperwork?
There's no turning this battle around... We should probably retreat.
Letting your mail pile up just to read through it all at once might feel rewarding, but it's not very productive.

Sauerkraut juice is a great pick-me-up. Give it a try and see for yourself.|Penelope? Oh right, she works here too. Take good care of her, you hear?|You can't figure out what that report says? Let me see... What, I'm too close to you? Hmm... Well, my bad~
Do you find it thrilling to put off your missions until the last minute?
Accomplishing a mission can be the reward in and of itself. Receiving tangible things is a nice bonus, though.

For an Iron Blood "wolf," I don't have much to boast about. I went on a few patrols and the odd rescue mission, but that's about it... I just wish my career would've ended out at sea instead of docked at port.
Ooh, I see you've been preparing something of your own. So, have you made your mind? You'll live the rest of your days happily with me? ...Great, then we're all set♪
Watch your back~
Just give me the signal when you wanna slack off. Hehehe~
Are you saying you find my body "too good to pass up?"
Formally, I'm the Type VIIC submarine U-410. But you, Commander, can call me whatever resonates with your heart. You heard that right: just let your heart decide. Hehehe~
Bolstering your combat abilities is always a good move.
You'll need to do better than that, my surface ship friends.
Can't think of a good present? Hmm. Might I suggest a handwritten letter? I think that gets your feelings across pretty well.

Happy Lunar New Year. Have you cooked up a scheme for this year's festival? Hehehe~ I'm of course talking about giving out New Year's gifts and hanging up decorations. I've devised a master plan of my own.
Take it nice and easy. No point stressing out on a holiday.
While there's no huge stack of paperwork awaiting you, there's no shortage of other things we need to do.

We were playing hide-and-seek earlier, and get this: U-81 hid herself inside a snowman. That girl is on a completely different level.|I wonder what Penelope's up to... I might just go and check.|It's really hard to hang these up on my own. Would you let me ride your shoulders, Commander?
Is this your idea of a New Year's gift?
Whoa there. A little too excited from all the festivities, aren't we?

Happy Lunar New Year. Have you cooked up a scheme for this year's festival? Hehehe~ I'm of course talking about giving out New Year's gifts and hanging up decorations. I've devised a master plan of my own.
This is where you'll all sleep!
Are you sending me out? I can handle it by myself.
Iron Blood Type VIIB submarine – U-47.
Looks like the commission team is back... There's a lot of them. I don't want to go...
Give me some space.
Your office is very quiet. I like it here.
So like, I can't really help with your work at all... But you'll let me stay here... You don't mind?
I can visit anytime I want? Thanks... But... For some reason, I feel like I can't really relax here... I'm always on edge...

I've spent thousands of hours swimming through the dark depths of the ocean... But lately all I can think about when I'm out on a mission is the warmth and light of your office... I think... I think I need to be with you, Commander.
So many people here now... It's so loud...
You can't be serious.
Oh. You're back.
So this is how it ends...
New report is in... I hope the enemy doesn't crack our codes...
Enemies nearby? Welp...|If you need someone to patrol, I'm good to go anytime.|Such a quiet office... I approve.
There's another mission...
Rewards are in... You don't want to see them?
I'm U-47. I went behind enemy lines at Scapa Flow and sunk Royal Oak. I'm going to go out, sink the enemy, and come back. Just like I did then.
I'm meant for more than just voyaging through the cold, dark oceans. My place is here, at the port, by your side... When I'm with you, even just sitting in silence, I feel... happy.
Auf Wiedersehen...
Inspecting my equipment?
You looking to take a nap at the bottom of Scapa Flow?
Type VIIB submarine, U-47. I don't like crowds... If that's all, I'll be in my room.
Enhancing... sounds good.
That's how it goes.
It's not really my style to go out with anybody... But I'm worried about getting lost if I'm alone... Commander, you got plans today?
I haven't seen much of the world on land... Commander, want to explore it with me?
Under the sea or up on land, it doesn't really matter... As long as you're with me, it's beautiful.
Phew... The view up here on land isn't as bad as I thought.
Ah, you're here. Me...? Pretty much the same. I just got back.
Mail? ... Is it that postcard we sent?
Nearsighted? No... there are no lenses in them.|If you're thirsty... You can have half.|My outfit? My friends picked it out for me. I don't usually think about that stuff...
I don't know my way around on land, so... You're my guide.
How about I take you on a trip to the bottom of the sea? It's really pretty down there too.
I haven't seen much of the world on land... Commander, want to explore it with me?
Another sortie? I'll be right out. ...It's fine, I can go dressed like this.
Sigh... I'd much rather be in a nice, quiet place like this over the din and clamor of the venue... Wouldn't you agree, Commander? I see. Well, come sit here then.
It's nice to be left alone, but the feeling I get when I'm with you... it feels almost addictive.
They're looking for me? Tell them to stop worrying. I'm fine.
...You found me. Of course.

I'm a little more talkative now? Huh... I just find I have more to talk about with you.|The party...? I wouldn't know what to do with myself out there.|I'm always stuck with a bunch of noisy girls: U-73, U-81, U-101... But even though I like it quiet, I really don't mind them that much.
Here's to you, for taking good care of me.
Should I sober you up?
Sigh... I'd much rather be in a nice, quiet place like this over the din and clamor of the venue... Wouldn't you agree, Commander? I see. Well, come sit here then.
Why the outfit? It's our theme, I guess. Isn't this what maids wear?
Coming through! Steer clear! Oh, it's you, Commander. Talk to you later – I've got coffee to deliver.
Commission rewards, huh... Sorry, can't fit those in my backpack.
Wanna hang after my shift's over? I'm thinking we could, uhh, go somewhere and unwind. Dunno where yet... Open for suggestions.
Check out the Iron Blood's shop when you're craving pastries. It's laid-back and comfy... (Plus you'll get to see me...)
Welcome back, Master... You'd like to talk? About what?
Need to hurry back...!
Is this... an order? Oh, it's just new mail for you.

If that's all, then I'm off for another delivery. It's nice, working solo.|Hey, um... You okay, Icarus? Sorry, I didn't mean to scare you...|Here, our phone number. Call us and we'll deliver to your office in 1 minute or less.
I see new delivery missions have come in.
That's... a lot of mission rewards.
This coffee is for the patrons. I'll brew some for you later.
No more service from me today, then.
Coming through! Steer clear! Oh, it's you, Commander. Talk to you later – I've got coffee to deliver.
I'm done cleaning, I guess.
Hope this will end quietly again...
"It is I, U-47, servant of the Mistress"... Okay, that's pretty cringe to say out loud...
An empty study with a cushy couch. The perfect place to relax. Whew... Go ahead and read a book if you want, Commander. If that'll be all then I'm gonna take a nap.
Our commission team is back. Go say hi to them for me. Oh, and don't tell anyone I'm here.
I read this love story featuring a vampire and a human. It was actually pretty good. If you're free, we could read it together.
Heya, Commander. You tired? I can get up if you need to lie down.
Mgh... Did they find me? Oh, it's just you. Welcome back, Commander.
Overextended, huh... Figures.
The bats outside the window are screeching again... Oh, they've brought a letter.

I'm so not cut out for the role of a vampire's servant. Chilling in a corner is more my thing...|You interested in this tome on vampire myths, Commander? ...What about me? Meh.|U-73, why are you coming up to me with this weird potion? ...Garlic juice? Thing is, I'm not a real vampire, so...
Another mission just came in? ...Five more minutes, then I'll do it.
Rewards from a mission just arrived. Want me to have a look?
I can help, as long as it's nothing too crazy.
You're just asking for a bite to the neck.
An empty study with a cushy couch. The perfect place to relax. Whew... Go ahead and read a book if you want, Commander. If that'll be all then I'm gonna take a nap.
Better head home now before dawn breaks.
Oh boy, here we go! Listen up, folks! It's lunchtime!
Hehe, been oglin' me for some time, haven'tcha, Commander? I noticed ages ago!
Iron Blood Type IXC submarine – U-522.
Commission team's back safe and sound~ Let's go check out those rewards.
Sure can't count on you, huh, Commander. Guess that's cute in a way, though?
You want a fun hunt, ya need good chums, else it's not happening~
Hey, you're pretty chill~ I'm feelin' like this is the start of a good relationship~
Commander, your cunning plans won't work on me. Cause 9 times outta 10, I know just what you're thinking.
I think we oughta get to know each other more intimately~ Whaddya say, Com-man-der? Ahahahah! Look at you, blushing! Oh, that's hilarious!
Mumph... Oh, you're back? Want some corned beef?
You're not half-bad...
Always happy to see ya, Commander. Today's lookin' like it'll be fun.
Oopsie... Guess I messed up a calculation...
Commander, got news for ya from headquarters~

This tail connector's not just for show. When plugged into my rigging: bam, gives me perfect control.|When I'm fighting, you can stare at me to your heart's content, y'know? Hehehe~|I just LOVE seeing my enemies squirming about, trying to get away from my attacks~ Ahahahah~!
Ya figure we got any new missions, possibly involving hunting?
Commander, check out this mound of rewards we got~!

I'm U-522, Type IXC sub, from the glorious 2nd U-boat Flotilla. You need long-distance commerce raiding, I'm your girl. Anti-sub escorts do put me in one helluva pickle, though. Anyways, keep those eyes peeled for my combat performance~
I'm kinda worried about your future, what with how dang easy it is to read you, Commander~ But it's cool, I'll always be with you, so do keep counting on me, 'kay? Ahahahah~
Victory blitz!
You feelin' like some hide and seek? I'm game. I always win, y'see.
Tail - no touch! Bad Commander! That's my sensitive spot!
Hmm... you're the commander 'round here, eh? I'm U-522, Iron Blood submarine, reporting for duty. Anyhoo, heard this here port's like a party. I'm eager to join in on it. Heheheh~
Sehr gut!
That's all? Laaaame. I wanna have more fun~
There is no escape!
Grrryyeeaaaargh! Come at mee!! Haaaah... haaaah... sometimes I get stuck in war mode and need to calm myself down. Ahahahahaa!
Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine – U-556.
The girls are back from commission! Should we go greet them?
Please don't make that face again... okay?
Lord Bismarck! I'm here to play! Oh, huh...?
Commander, you wanna see how I dive? Heh heh, Lord Bismarck said it looked pretty good. I'm proud of myself too.
Waaahh! Why won't Lord Bismarck hug me? She said I'm too childish! ... Hey, do you wanna sub in for her, Commander? — Eheheh, you really understand me!
Commander, you and Lord Bismarck are the most important people to me! Without you, I would lose all will to fight... so if you could stay with me forever, that would make me happy...
Commander, I took out a whole bunch of books while you were gone and I kiiinda forgot where they go... Erm, sorry... Eheheheh...
D-don't lose control at a time like this!
Welcome back! Don't you feel super pumped on a day like this?
I won't fail like I did before... never again!
Beepbeepbeep! U-556 has received new information!
Commander, if you don't play with me I'm just going to go find Lord Bismarck|Commander, let's go swimming! Don't worry, I'll keep you safe!|Commander, sitting too long is bad for your health!
Ugh, there's still a mission to do.
Mission complete! So can we go play now?
I swore an oath to Neptune himself, that I would protect Lord Bismarck from danger, no matter where she encountered it! ... But there are still some things I can't handle by myself. Ahahaha...
I hereby declare before Neptune that I will protect the Commander, no matter the place, no matter the challenge! ... Heh heh. I believe you'll find I'm more reliable than you think, Commander!
Too late!
Come on, Commander. Can we go play with Lord Bismarck?
Hey! Commander, don't run away!
Ahoy! Type VIIC submarine U-556 here! This is my home port, no question! Oh, right, is Lord Bismarck here?
The open sea. I have arrived!
Ha-haa! Nike stands with us!
Hey, Commander, can we go check out the kitchen? ... Oh, they're really busy in there? I guess we better not get in their way...
It's me, U-556, all prettied up! Eheheheh, we're gonna have lots of fun at this party, Commander! Come on, let's go!
Awww, it's lights out after the party? But I'm not done playing. ... Hey, Commander, won't you play with me a bit more? Eheheh~ I love you, Commander!
Where are you always running off to, Commander? Come play with me!
I've heard parties are suuuuuuuuuuper fun! I can't wait!!

Don't give me that face, kitty. Here, look, it's my finger. It's over here! ... Now it's over here!|Commander, have you seen Lord Bismarck? Can we go look for her?|Om nom nom. Delicious! This is really good! Here, Commander, try some!
Where should we go next?
Hmph! Don't think you're gonna get away with that!
It's me, U-556, all prettied up! Eheheheh, we're gonna have lots of fun at this party, Commander! Come on, let's go!
I hope I don't mess this up...
Pennies are said to bring good luck, so I saved a bunch in my piggybank... but that didn't seem to do much for me...
Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine – U-557.
Commander... a commission's done, by the looks of it.
It's just my luck to run into a commander like you...
You need something, Commander?
You wanna be friends with me? But I'm a bad luck magnet, and that might be annoying for... Nnh, why are you patting me on the head all of a sudden...
My true feelings are the most important...? I... want to be of service to you... because you're always so nice to me...
I always thought it'd be best if I stayed away from people so my bad luck doesn't bother them. But you want to stay with me regardless... That makes me so happy... I love you... Commander.
Commander, you made it back safely! Thank goodness...
How unfortunate...
Commander, nothing bad happened to you before you got here, right?
Sigh... I'm used to it...
Commander, mail for you.

I've only heard about "The First Fun Time" from my predecessors... I wasn't around for it.|When you're a bad luck magnet, you probably shouldn't get close to people. That way, you won't cause them trouble...|I'll try to be the best secretary I can. It's the one thing... I don't want to fail at...
Commander, I'm pretty sure we've got new missions... Probably, I think...
Here are the mission rewards, Commander.

I'm U-557, Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine... I went on four sorties during the war, sinking six merchant ships plus Galatea. The day after I sank her, an allied ship mistook me for a Royal Navy ship and collided with me... I had a few accidents before that too, so maybe I'm just cursed with bad luck...
The most fortunate time in my whole life was when first I met you, Commander... If we're together, I'm sure I'll be able to gain some more luck. I'm kind of... excited about that.
Let's hope these hit their target...
What is it, Commander...? Wait, don't tell me... I've messed up again...?
What... was that... It felt weird...
Type VIIC submarine, U-557, reporting in. I'm a bad luck magnet, so feel free to forget about and ignore me... As far as missions go... I'll give them my best shot.
Maybe this'll improve my luck too...
Victory... Is this what they mean by "the tides turning"?
The leader of wolfpacks, that's me!
Now, now, Commander, don't stress over everything~ I'm sure it'll all go fine.
Iron Blood Type VIIB submarine – U-73.
Commission complete! Great job, everyone!
Uh... My friends are waiting for me, so sorry, gotta scamper.
Oh? Finally managed to catch a break, Commander? Then let's go for a quick stroll, shall we?
The wild U-73 approaches quietly, waiting for her chance, and then POUNCES! ... Hahaha, I caught you, Commander!
I suppose you've fallen for me at last? Then stay by my side forever, Commander!
True, I can't guarantee I'll be speedy when I dive... but no matter what, you'll be mine, Commander! Especially your heart! Hahah!
Good to see you! Let me handle things for you while you get some rest~
Mein Leben! Better perform emergency maneuvers...
Howdy-do, Commander! Welcome back! I'm all good to go and ready to sortie! Just give me the order.
Oh nooo...! Ahaha... How the heck could we lose...
Mail's just arrived~ Oh, do you want me to read it on your behalf?

When you're underwater all day, sometimes you just wanna resurface and smash through the waves! ... Hey, Commander, wanna go for a quick dive in the ocean?|I'd rather be diving in the ocean and feeling the thrill of being near the enemy than stuck at port staring into space all day...|Isn't it fun to hear what's on somebody's mind and help them with it? ... Maybe I ought to open a psychiatric booth. Anyway, Reichspfennig for your thoughts, Commander?
So, we've got a mission. Let's do it together, Commander!
With my support, we could finish these missions with our eyes closed!
I'm U-73, the Iron Blood submarine that completed lots of missions and served as the leader of several wolfpacks!
Ahah, I didn't think this would happen so fast, but now you're a part of me! Relax, just let me handle everything for you! I'll take care of you for the rest of your life~
Wolfsrudeltaktik, commence!
What is it? Got something I could help with? C'mon, tell me something.
Uh-huh. So, Commander, how many gut-punch torpedoes do you want for dessert?
U-73 of the Iron Blood, reporting for duty! If there's anything that needs doing, just leave it to me!
Now my shots will be even more on point! Heh heh~
Heheh! Did you see how strong I am?
Time for an experiment on you numskulls!
It's time for science class with U-73! Now, Commander, let's try out an exhilarating and positively fascinating experiment!
Now we add some of this, then– Whuah! Don't surprise me like that, Commander! You nearly just caused an accident!

Now we raise the heat slightly, then... Oh, God! I-it's on fire!|Experiments necessitate preciseness. Being even one 100th of a milliliter off affects the result!|The glamor of this lab coat drew me to the science room! ... Huh? This ISN'T a lab coat? Aha, ahahahaha...
Hey, Commander? No intimacy right now, okay? I'm fine-tuning this compound, you see...
You wanna be the target of my experimental fuel-powered torpedoes?
It's time for science class with U-73! Now, Commander, let's try out an exhilarating and positively fascinating experiment!
Looks like I've found the ingredients for my concoction!
Decided I'd try on this Dragon Empery dress, in light of the season! Does it look good on me? Hehehe~
