In today's chemistry lesson, we'll learn how to make a warming cup of tea and an optional concoction to enhance its flavor! Will you do the honor of taste-testing it, Commander?
You wanna learn the formula? Sure thing! First you mix the contents of these beakers, then... Wait, are your hands shaking? Hahaha! Come on, it'll be fine – I'm right here!

And for the last step, we raise the heat a few degrees. See, brewing tea is like doing science – it takes precision.|Might it be possible to make tea from a chemical concoction? Hmm... It wouldn't really feel like tea if you made it that way... So that's tricky...|You think I seem more ladylike than usual? Heh! That's exactly what I set out to do!
You'd like a refill? Coming right up!
Seems you desire a "special" kind of concoction, huh.
In today's chemistry lesson, we'll learn how to make a warming cup of tea and an optional concoction to enhance its flavor! Will you do the honor of taste-testing it, Commander?
Quietly... sneakily... infiltrating the battlefield...
Booooom! Did I scare ya there, Commander?
Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine – U-81.
Hmm? Commission team's back. Mind if I go greet 'em? I could use a quick dip in the harbor.
Enttäuscht...
Heheh, I love hide-and-seek! It's also my specialty!
Not to brag, but I have a pretty stunning service record. Go on, let me hear your applause!
Hmm? Found me again, huh. You've been finding me a lot lately...
I just realized something big. That your bed is ridiculously warm! I'm gonna sleep with you from now o... What? Did I say something strange?
Here's a towel, Commander. Wipe that sweat off.
Dammit... I'm gonna have to dive real deep...
So you're finally back, huh. I thought I was gonna die of boredom.
Damn... The Commander will avenge me for this!
Isn't it nice having a letter waiting for you when you come back to port~?

I'm gonna go check around the office for places to hide. Hehehe...|Adjust firing parameters... check the compass and scales... Clank, clunk... *Giggle*...|How about a game of hide-and-seek, Commander?
Commander, you've got a new mission.
The mission rewards are here! If you don't want 'em then I'll just help myself!

I'm U-81, Type VIIC submarine of the Iron Blood Navy. I have a ton of sisters who can be pretty unruly sometimes! ... Also, I have the sinking of Ark Royal under my belt! She's a weird woman... I can't properly explain what makes her weird, though...
This... must be what "getting hitched" means! Hehehe~ I'm happy, but also kinda embarrassed... O-of course, I love you very much, Commander!
Angle looks good! Fireeee!
Bombers?! Aaaahhhh! Commander, there are some things you just can't joke about!
Whoah?! I warned you about doing that, Commander! My torpedoes almost just went off...
Heheh, now I too have a commander! I'm U-81, I love playing hide-and-seek. If you can't find me, just shout "U-81, I admit defeat!" and I'll probably come out of hiding.
Feels like I've gotten more dexterous!
Now you know the power of U-boats!
*Ugh*... I figured this bulky dress would be hard to move in... Huh? I look pretty? Aha, ahaha... You're makin' me blush...
S-some people told me a serenade is a perfect love song... so I did some practice. Y-y-you wanna hear it? Whuah! Just don't laugh if it sounds bad!
I'm right here, Commander. ... Not hiding for once? Well, it's not like I can! Nobody could play hide-and-seek in this gaudy frickin' dress...
You're LATE, Commander! Just how long are you gonna keep me waiting?!

This isn't wine, it's a soft drink! Don't believe me? Then have a sip for yourself! C'mon!|Err, you wanna dance with me...? B-b-b-but I have no idea how to dance...|This here kitty is my personal butler! Whaddya think? Is that awesome or what?
You wanna hear me play the piano? Errm... I-in a bit, so just hold on a few...!
Hey! You did that on purpose, didn't you?!
*Ugh*... I figured this bulky dress would be hard to move in... Huh? I look pretty? Aha, ahaha... You're makin' me blush...
Time to get huntin'!
voiceline.oath: I'm goin' straight for the kill!

voiceline.line: Yeah, what? You fancy how a U-boat in her off time looks?
voiceline.oath: Hm-hmm-hm♪... What? This is how I always look. The hell are ya getting all prude for?

voiceline.line: Iron Blood Type VIIC submarine – U-96.
The commission team's back. Good thing those sheep didn't get eaten by wolves, eh.
You know where you belong? In a shark's stomach. Meh, whatever.
During most my missions I'm honestly just bored out of my mind and pray I find somethin' worth my time. If you ever feel bored, go hit up some of the U-boats at port.

If ya think U-boat combat is that fascinating, you could always come with me on the next sortie. Oh wait, you can't stay underwater all that long, can ya? Then how's about I teach you how to dive like a pro?
You can get onto my rigging while I'm surfaced, can'tcha? Don't worry, I ain't gonna just dump ya in the middle of the ocean. So, how's that sound? Wanna ride with me?

Someday I wanna take you with me on a trip across the sea, just the two of us. We could write a journal as we go and make a book or even movie out of it... Actually, that'd be weird, so let's not. But as long as we make some fond memories, I'm happy.
Lemme see that map, Commander... All right, cool... 'Kay, so the spot I marked would be perfect for an ambush next sortie. If ya need it done, just hit me up.
voiceline.oath: You got the map, Commander? No, not that, THIS one. You don't get it? It's the route we'll be taking for our date.

voiceline.line: Should probably retreat while I still can, I guess!
Look who's early. Here I was hoping to see you panicking over being late.
voiceline.oath: Oh, there you are. You're the only person who's capable of making me clock in this early, ya know that?

voiceline.line: Whatever. Next time's gonna be much better.
That mailbox is gonna get full sooner or later. And don't say I didn't warn ya.
voiceline.oath: If ya don't wanna dig through your mailbox, I could do it for ya.

voiceline.line: It's not the foes you can see that you should fear, it's the ones you can't see. Like us U-boats, for instance...|Step one: dive. Step two: wait. While we U-boats can hold our breaths for ages, sometimes I just like goin' for a leisurely swim.|"The Oak-Leaves Patrol"... Heheh, that's got a nice ring to it. Still, all we really did was make a pack and go huntin' for targets.
voiceline.oath: Foes you can't see aren't so scary if ya got friends to watch your back. Yeah, like those surface ship buddies of yours.|nil|nil
voiceline.extra: Ahahaha, Lebe's getting schooled by Thiele again! Ah, and if ya ever want me to school you, I could do that.|Mix together some lemon juice, coffee, and rum, and ya get... Hold up, are you seriously considering drinking this? It ain't really meant for consumption, though...

voiceline.line: What's this? Still got unfinished missions, do we?
So, what is it? Need someone to fetch ya those rewards?
voiceline.oath: Mission rewards, comin' through. Nah, I fetched 'em just 'cause I felt like doing it.

voiceline.line: The name's U-96, Iron Blood Type VIIC U-boat, part of the 7th U-boat Flotilla. I made some real juicy contributions over my 11 patrols in the war. Never did fare well against aircraft, though... But don't let that worry ya, Commander. I'm still an ace, and I ain't never gonna let ya down.
You got me, I'll give ya that much... But I've still got the chance to strike back. Close your eyes! ...Mwah! Heheh, hit ya right in the heart with that one, didn't I?
Jetzt!
Did ya need something, or?
voiceline.oath: Ya need somethin'? Let's hear it then.

voiceline.line: What? You seriously like touching me here?
voiceline.oath: Mgh... Ohh...

voiceline.line: Sup. I'm U-96, Type VIIC U-boat and member of the famous Vorwärts wolfpack. Hehe, I'll have you drowning in reports of my success soon enough.
Oh man, I can't wait for the next sortie.
Now do ya see what an ace is capable of?
voiceline.oath: I told you, remember? "Swimming in reports of my success," and I delivered. Mwah!

voiceline.line: This getup's real comfy and easy to move around in. Plus, I'm in my own room, and it's not like it matters if you see.
Nice timing. I just finished an intense battle. The result...? Of course I won. What? Did you want to have a match against me?
Right, so, I just read up on this new strat. You should help me practice it!
The snacks and drinks are on the side. Go ahead, help yourself to whatever you want. No need to be polite.
A new notification?! Oh, it's just your mail. I thought I was getting a challenge from L.I. or something.

If you wanna beat me, go practice for a few years and then come back, Warrior from the Land of the Rising Sun. Ahaha~|Um... wait a sec, I think I heard some weird noise. Don't tell me U-81's bunch snuck into my room again while playing hide-and-seek...|I'm a pretty big fan of the Dragon Sisters, y'know? How should I put it... They work hard, and you can't ever hate 'em. Isn't that right?
How about another match? All right! There's gonna be a punishment for the loser~
Nice timing. I just finished an intense battle. The result...? Of course I won. What? Did you want to have a match against me?
...Tsk. This ammo is wasted on you lot!
voiceline.oath: I'll mow all of you down!

voiceline.line: If you want peace of mind, just don't bother worrying about anyone else. We may be born into this world, but our keels and souls aren't at the mercy of others.
voiceline.oath: What's wrong? Did something happen? You're not acting like yourself... Trust in others like you trust in me, that's how you'll put those girls at ease. Of course, the same goes for me.

voiceline.line: H-class battleship – Ulrich von Hutten
The fleet's returned from their commissions. Hurry up and decide whether you or I go and greet them.
voiceline.oath: Looks like the fleet is back after their commissions. Don't you want to look at their beaming smiles?

voiceline.line: You sowed these seeds yourself. It's your mess to clean up, not mine.
Trust is like a poison—once it enters your body, it destroys you. The only way to protect yourself is to be wary of others.
Working for you is not the same as trusting you. The fact that you can command so many people... Or rather, be adored by so many, means you of all people should understand.
You spineless fool who doesn't even know how to doubt others... I've come to realize that you've spread deeper and deeper through me, just like a poison. Tsk... I'll return the favor, mark my words.

I told you I'd return the favor. Yep, I'll suck the poison out of you before it has a chance to spread throughout your body. This is my duty... my responsibility, for the person who did the same for me. But maybe I'm already too late? Hehehe...
voiceline.oath: Stay still. Don't wander away. I can't leave the one I absolutely adore alone. If someone actually tried to tear the two of us apart... Hehehe... Let's just say, I'd tell them to eat shit.

voiceline.line: Hmph. You don't make any damn sense.
voiceline.oath: Does being pampered like this irritate you?

voiceline.line: Everyone made it back, huh? Not bad.
voiceline.oath: Are you alright? ...I don't doubt my ability to take care of my subordinates' safety, but I can't help but worry about you... Tell me, are you really alright?

voiceline.line: If you don't plan on dying here, then focus up!
You're here. See that massive pile of paperwork on your desk? The two of us will be spending lots of quality time here until that's taken care of.
voiceline.oath: You finally showed up... but you're not needed anymore. Hehehe. Don't just stand there in shock, guess what I did for you.

voiceline.line: I'll back off since we lost, but don't count on it happening again.
voiceline.oath: I was able to bring everyone back... safely.

voiceline.line: There's some mail. Looks like it contains confidential information... I see.
voiceline.oath: Here's some mail for you. I broke the seals for you, is that alright?

voiceline.line: You want to know more about my rigging? Sure, I can move it like I want to, but there are times when it's pretty troublesome.|The Mysteries of the Port? Just leave it as it is. That's the only way it'll continue to keep your curiosity piqued, isn't it.|Think for yourself... Though you can't live selfishly, you need to live for the sake of something you really desire. That way, even if you die, it won't be in vain.|It might be a surprise for you, but I do have hobbies I enjoy. And it's not like I become a different person when I do.
voiceline.extra: Even though you do so well when I pamper you, you refuse to be pampered when you're not doing well... Hmph. You're just like those little kitties in the most peculiar ways...|If you're really dying to find out what's behind the Mysteries of the Port, I won't stop you. I'll even accompany you. It'll be a good way of spending time with you.|Focus more on myself? It seems like you don't understand. It's because I'm focusing on myself that I do all these things for you.|When you neglect your health, think about the people who would be sad if you collapsed. I, for one, don't want to feel sad.

voiceline.line: Missions, huh? Whether we do them or not is up to you. That is your freedom.
voiceline.oath: There's a new mission. I did the parts I could help out with. I'll leave the rest to you.

voiceline.line: The rewards have arrived. Kick back and enjoy the moment. You're going to miss out on it if you don't, and all that'll be left is emptiness.
voiceline.oath: Mission complete. Feeling a bit tired? Let's take a break until you've recovered enough energy.

voiceline.line: My name is Ulrich von Hutten. So long as you call me that, that is who I am. A name is nothing more than that.

Embrace it, drown in it... Just as you put the curse of trust on me, I'll place it on you. Trust... Let the poison called affection consume you. Become just like me. Don't you know? You and I are already one.
Get lost, you're in the way.
If you've got something to say, spit it out. I'll hear you out.
voiceline.oath: This is how our relationship together is. I don't know why you're getting all flustered about it at this point...

voiceline.line: I'm not sure whether I should praise you or teach you your place...
voiceline.oath: Do you want to find out which of us has less self-restraint?

voiceline.line: I am Ulrich von Hutten, the symbol of the Iron Blood's hopes and regrets. Whether my arrival is a cause for celebration or for despair is up to you to decide. I shall respond in kind.
In order to create a peaceful world where power is not needed, what you need is power. How paradoxical... Oh, don't mind me.
...Piss off, weaklings. Just thinking about the amount of ammo I've wasted on you sorry lot makes me want to vomit.
voiceline.oath: I want you to tell me whether you're satisfied with my performance or not.

voiceline.line: *sigh* Do you really have to bother me during my break? ...It's a joke, no need to take it so seriously. I was looking for someone to kill some time with anyway.
The little'uns really like when you do this to them.
*Glug, glug* ...Ahh, that hits the spot. Tsk, it's already empty... Sorry, mind grabbing me another can?
What's going on with you today? Spill it.
Tsk, they got me...

I really need to head back, but the little'un just... *sigh* what a pain in the ass.|The fan outside is so frickin' loud, but I really need my alone time... Huh? Who put these damn stickers here...?|You already know what I'll do to people who start shit inside, don't you? ...Yep. I'll give them their one warning.|I'm not really worried about Elbe causing trouble. Surprisingly, she knows when to stop. ...Well, at least she's not my main source of worry.
So, you accept a mission and then immediately begin procrastinating...? What a piece of work you are. Want me to do the same thing to you?
"Welcome back, Master. May I take your order?" ...You happy with that?
Tsk... Again with that shit just 'cuz we're here? What a pain in the ass...
*sigh* Do you really have to bother me during my break? ...It's a joke, no need to take it so seriously. I was looking for someone to kill some time with anyway.
Looks like things worked out just fine.
Fair winds, good visibility... Mhm!
Commander... Um, I'm afraid I'm not very good with physical contact...
voiceline.oath: Um, Commander, I think... I can handle a bit more of the touchy-feely stuff...!

voiceline.line: Shiratsuyu-class destroyer number seven – Umikaze.
The commission fleet seems to have brought back a lot of rewards. Shall I help you bring them in?
Commander, I'm so sorry I wasn't able to help you...
I don't mind feeding seagulls, or petting cute little animals... So why can I not handle being touched by the commander... *sigh*...
Commander, um... would you like to go feed the seagulls with me? ...Yay! Here, let me give you some bread... Uh oh, I'm sorry! It fell...
Commander, if it's not too much to ask, could you please take my hand? I'd like to try to get used to being touched, so... please don't let go no matter what! I, I'll endure it all!!
Thanks to your help, I've become a lot better at the touchy-feely stuff... Um, if it's not too much to ask, could you continue to "practice" it with me...?
voiceline.oath: Commander, I hope you'll allow me to hug you... H-hup! Umm... Somehow, I thin k I'm getting too sleepy to... get any practice out of this... Zzz...

voiceline.line: Eek?! P-please stop that...
voiceline.oath: Ah, um... it's okay to do more of that head-patting thing...

voiceline.line: Commander... Ehehe, to tell the truth, I was really wondering when you would come back...
voiceline.oath: Commander, welcome back. Here are your documents, as well as some light snacks and drinks for you to enjoy... If there is anything else you need, please call for me right away.

voiceline.line: I can... hold on a bit longer...!
Good morning, Commander. I hope that I was able to adequately prepare today's schedule. Is there anything else I can help you with...?
voiceline.oath: Good morning, Commander. I hope that I will be able to be of use to you today!

voiceline.line: Don't worry about me... More importantly, are the others safe...?
Commander, I left the new mail on your desk.

Commander, shall I open the window? You'll feel a lot fresher if it's nice and breezy, right?|Please don't interrupt Yamakaze and Kawakaze's work... Um, if you want someone to play with, use me instead...|I wonder if any seagulls will show up if we put some crumbs out by the window... Ehehe...
voiceline.oath: Commander, could you open the window? Ahh... The sea breeze is just right, refreshing but not blowing the documents away...|Yamakaze, if you want to play with Commander, please wait a bit... H-huh? I'm not trying to monopolize Commander...!|nil

voiceline.line: Commander, um... Might there be anything I can help with?
Mission complete! I'm so glad that I was able to be of help to you, Commander...!
"Revised Shiratsuyu-class"... Yes, my sisters and I were called that. During that war, the four of us formed the 24th DesDiv... My memories from back then weren't all rainbows and sunshine though...
Um, it's terribly embarrassing still, but... I finally managed to put the ring on...! Um... Commander... please allow me to stay at your side forever...!
I'll try to be helpful!
Um, excuse me...! You're getting... a bit too touchy-feely...
voiceline.oath: Ah, um, it's alright! I'm already used to your touch...!

voiceline.line: *sniffle* ...Commander...
voiceline.oath: Ermm... Is this also a part of my training"...?

voiceline.line: I am the revised Shiratsuyu-class destroyer, Umikaze. Commander, I hope I will be able to support you and your fleet to the fullest of my abilities... I d-do hope we'll get along!
Thank you for always looking after me...!
Ehehe... It was only made possible by everyone else's hard work...
voiceline.oath: Even one such as myself was able to obtain victory!

voiceline.line: Was I able to bring you even the slightest bit of therapeutic benefit, Commander?
What's the matter, Commander? Oh, this outfit? ...Um, I heard that this outfit would bring you therapeutic benefits and hoped to try it on... Wh-what do you think? Does it feel therapeutic to you?
Commander, would you like a shoulder massage? Ah, um, this level of contact is fine! I appreciate the courtesy!
Commander, today's your day off, so you don't have to work so hard, alright?
Um... The socks are on a bit tight...|Yamakaze gave me some sweets. Would you like some, Commander?|A lot more of these bunnies look just like me, clad in black... Why is that, Commander?
I, I'm not sure I can handle this kind of touching...
P-please don't bully me...
What's the matter, Commander? Oh, this outfit? ...Um, I heard that this outfit would bring you therapeutic benefits and hoped to try it on... Wh-what do you think? Does it feel therapeutic to you?
Leave the rear support to me... I'll... do my best...!
Big brother... do you want to know more about me?
Aircraft carrier – Unicorn, Hull Number I72!
The big sisters out for commission have come back... Big brother... will you greet them?
Big brother, you're the worst...
This over here is Yuni. Yuni the Unicorn... is my friend... Ehehe
When things become dangerous, Yuni will protect me-- It won't be dangerous because you are here, big brother? Ehehe. You are like my knight...
I've been working hard, you know? ...Supporting big sister... taking on missions... transporting things... Am I a good girl? Am I a helping hand, big brother?
Big brother... can I be selfish before you? Can I have you pamper me...? I, Unicorn... am actually not a good girl... Is that alright as well?
Big brother... is Unicorn a good girl...?
The fleet... returned safely... Good work, big brother. My lap is... alright, you know?
Big brother... that hurts...
Welcome back, big brother... Are we going to sortie for today as well?
Outside is... so scary... Can I go back...?
Shall we... check your mail?

Desstroy Moad'? There is no such thing...|Yuni's horn... cannot transform, you know?|'Entee'...? I have no idea what you are talking about, big brother...|Will I, Unicorn, grow up to be just like big sister Illustrious one day?
Don't forget about... your missions...
Don't miss... your rewards...

Royal Navy's... support carrier... I am Unicorn... I was born to support my big sister Illustrious... Later, I went to support other big sisters... but everyone treated me nicely. I worked hard in lots of different ways, you know? ...It would be nice if I become a little dependable... Ehehe, I'll work harder, big brother
This... precious thing... Are you really giving it to me? I, Unicorn... will work hard... That's because... I like big brother a lot!
Unicorn... will do her best!
Ehehe... Big brother... that tickles...
If it's you, big brother... it's alright...
I... I am... The Royal Navy's... Unicorn. ...Commander, can... can I call you... big brother?
Did ...Unicorn become more mature....Onii-chan?
Was I... of great help to you, big brother?
Unicorn... is now a songstress... *giggles* Unicorn's song has reached Onii-chan's heart.

Onii-chan, does a fancy dress like this look weird on me?|Yuni has grown up too *giggles*!|'Listen to my song!' Am I acting like a songstress? *giggles*|Sister Illustrious... do I seem more mature to you now...?
Hehe... Onii-chan, do you want to listen to my song?
I have... become a songstress~ ehehe... It would be nice if my song can reach Onii-chan...
B-big brother... please don't stare at Unicorn so much... Uuu...
Big brother... this present is for you... I hope you'll like it... Eh? Just seeing me in this outfit is the best gift? Ohh~ b-big brother...!

These are called "Spring couplets." The big sisters from the Eastern Radiance taught Unicorn how to write this, ehehe~ |"Firecrackers" seem to be a specialty of the Eastern Radiance... Ah, this one is just a prop. It won't go off... |Big brother... Has Unicorn grown a bit bigger?
Big brother... this present is for you... I hope you'll like it... Eh? Just seeing me in this outfit is the best gift? Ohh~ b-big brother...!
Ah, big brother, you're here... Ehehe, I only just got here as well. Um... shall we go then? I kind of... want to go to the amusement park...

Before coming on this date... there was a lot I wanted to say to you, big brother... But now I don't think I need to... because I already know what you're thinking... and what you're feeling. Big brother, do you also know mine?
There's no need to be in a hurry, okay? Unicorn will always wait for you, big brother.
Big brother, there are a lot of rides that Unicorn wants to go on, together.

Big brother, when we're riding the roller coaster, is it okay to hold your hand? |Ferris wheel... recommended for couples, eh? Ah, b-big brother! It's nothing...! |The carousel... it's so pretty... Huh? Big brother, I can... sit with you?
Big brother, if you have some important business, you can go ahead and take care of that first... Unicorn will be waiting for big brother, always...
Big brother, being able to spend time together at an amusement park... and hold hands like this... makes it seem like we're lovers, ehehe...
B-big brother... there are a lot of people here...
Ah, big brother, you're here... Ehehe, I only just got here as well. Um... shall we go then? I kind of... want to go to the amusement park...
A grab bag? Is that Unicorn's present...? Th-Thank you! I wonder what's in it... Ehehe, this is so much fun♪
So this is a "kimono" from the Sakura Empire... Changing into it is difficult but... if you like it, then Unicorn is happy!
About my hair... Big Sis Illustrious did it for me. Is it cute...? Ehehe.
Happy... New Year! This year, I can spend New Years with you... Ehehe.

I heard that, by decorating the arrow that acts as a charm against evil spirits, even bad luck is warded off. |Yuni, you changed into New Years' clothes too? Ehehe |A decorated pineapple in front of a mirror cake? ...The Sakura Empire's New Year is really interesting...
Big brother, are you coming with me to visit the shrine?
So this is a "kimono" from the Sakura Empire... Changing into it is difficult but... if you like it, then Unicorn is happy!
It's all thanks to yours, and Illustrious's, and everyone else's support that I can get up onstage and sing!
So I'm... an "idol" now... I'm not sure how well I'll do... But I'll give it my all...!
I'm a little nervous, but... with you by my side, Big Brother, I know I can do it...
You came to watch me practice, Big Brother...? I'm so glad!
I hope my song gets through to everyone...|I'm like... an angel? That's, a b-bit much...|Yuni will stay with me, right? Take the mic for me... Thank you, Yuni♪
You're the only audience I need, Big Brother! I'll... always sing my best for you!
So I'm... an "idol" now... I'm not sure how well I'll do... But I'll give it my all...!
Unicorn is very healthy. She won't get an upset tummy...
Oh, big brother... Unicorn is reading right now. Mm, yeah, while eating ice cream... Big brother, want to have a bite?
Shhh... Please don't wake Yuni up, big brother...
Big brother... are you here to read with Unicorn? Yay, I'm so happy...

Mmmh~ The ice cream is so cold... but so yummy...|Big brother... what flavor of ice cream do you like better, vanilla... or strawberry?|Illustrious gave me this storybook... Mm, some of these stories are still hard to understand though...
Unicorn won't catch a cold~ She also has this blanket over here...
Noo... the ice cream's going to drip onto the pages...
Oh, big brother... Unicorn is reading right now. Mm, yeah, while eating ice cream... Big brother, want to have a bite?
Big brother... you truly understand me.
This is... an important outfit for an important ceremony... yes! Unicorn and Yuni are both ready for this! Big brother... how do I look?
I can do it... for you, big brother...!
Big brother! Eheheh... I'll always be here waiting for you to come back.
Nng... I have to... be strong... for big brother...
The mail...! Yuni got it for us~

Um, big brother... I've been working really hard lately, so... Do you think maybe, when we have a day off... We could go out together?|Yuni and I got matching outfits... ehehehe...|I've been learning to cook from some of the older Royal Navy girls... Ehehe. I can't wait to surprise you. Oh! I guess you won't be surprised, since I just told you... Hm...|Even when I become an elegant lady like Illustrious... can I still stay with you all the time, big brother...?
A mission... Can I help with it?
Wow... that's a lot of rewards. Good job, big brother.
Big brother, can I hold your hand a bit longer...?
This is... an important outfit for an important ceremony... yes! Unicorn and Yuni are both ready for this! Big brother... how do I look?
Unicorn got to help big brother...! Ehehe...
Unicorn... can now fight alongside everyone else!
Illustrious said that Unicorn grew a little bigger... Do you think that's true? Ehehe...
Unicorn has finished her retrofit... Now she can do more for you and her friends!
The friends in the commission fleet have returned... Big brother, can you take me with you?
You're also very nice, big brother... Ehehe~♪
Ehehe, Yuni also wanted to tell you "Welcome back," big brother.
Welcome back, big brother... Are you going out today as well? Unicorn and Yuni are ready to come with you...
Unicorn... will protect everyone!

Yuni has become big and strong, so Unicorn has to do her best too!|Unicorn's new rigging seems... to be giving off light... Do you want to take a closer look?|Unicorn wants to be just like you, not just on the battlefield, but in all kinds of other ways as well! She will do her best!|If you get tired, you can rest in Unicorn's lap... (Ehehe, I really want to see big brother's sleeping face...)
Can Unicorn help... with your mission?
Ehehe, there are so many rewards that not even Yuni can carry them all~
Big brother... You can also rely more on Unicorn, you know?
Bad big brother... Ehehe, bad~♪
Unicorn has finished her retrofit... Now she can do more for you and her friends!
Unicorn... was able to be of help!
I don't know what I'm doing, but I'm doing it, buli!
Buli? Buli? Where are we? What are we gonna do here?
Universal Bulin. Can be used to limit break all ships of Elite rarity or below.
Buli! The girls are back!
Wahh~! Commander is a big, big dummy!
My big sis can apparently only strengthen one color. I can strengthen a bunch! Which means... that I'm more powerful than her? Wow! I'm stronger than her, buli!
Bulin is happy that she can help everyone get stronger, but she enjoys playing with you too, Commander! Bulin can help strengthen you... Aww, why not?
I'm not meant for combat, yet you use me anyway, so being the more sensible Bulin, I need to thank you! I guess it's just because we're too cute...? *Kyah~* I might be in love~!
My heart races whenever I see you, Commander! I could dismantle the entire dock for you! Could this be... my inner fire? Buli!
Buli! Look, I'm full of energy!
If I swing this wrench hard enough, I could poke a hole in the office floor, buli!
Huh? Am I... no good in battle, buli?
Something strange just popped outta me, buli...
Us Bulins are pretty awesome, buli!|Is there nothing for Bulin to do? Really? Then let's go play! Wheee!|Commander, let's go dig for some treasure, buli~!
Buli? What's the mission?
Rewards... Can I eat them, buli?
They say I'm just like my sister, but we're actually in charge of different colors... What's a color? Sounds yummy!
Bulin has been caught~ Ahh, I'm blushing so much! What will I do! Let's buy some new toys and celebrate!
My wrench is the wrench that will pierce the earth!
Buli? Do you want to be bulified?
Buli? ... ... Buli?
Buli? Seems like I can help make your fleet stronger, buli!
[Cannot be enhanced]
Buli? Could it be that... I'm super strong?!
Witness the power of my new rigging, bulin!
That green cat said something about this new equipment being "experimental," bulin. Not sure what that means, but since it looks like my sis, it must be super strong!
Bulin? Did I just get an upgrade?! Now I can fight too, bulin!
Are you not letting me sortie because I'm too OP, bulin?
Bulin?! I'm in trouble, bulin!
I want to try out some experimental equipment here in your office, bulin!
Ehh? I thought I was supposed to be stronger, bulin?

This bulibulin has become even strongerer, bulin!|Even though I look a bit like my sis now, she's still the only one in charge of super rares, bulin~ |I never get tired! But, Commander, you seem to get tired all the time... does that mean you're weak, bulin?
Within my equipment is the power to end all creation!
Bulin? Commander, did you wanna learn how to bulin?
Bulin! I'm about to activate my skill all over you!
Bulin? Did I just get an upgrade? Now, I can fight too, bulin!
(I can't believe it... Even with my newfound powers, there's no way to undergo enhancement...)
Bulin! I've successfully buli buli'd the enemies!
Muahaha, all ships… set sail!
O you mean this family emblem? I designed this myself, plus the clothes. I won’t accept any other comments except for “its cute”.
The 11th Destroyer of Kagerou class — Urakaze
The commission fleet has returned, did you forget?
Stay away from me, stupidity is contagious.
My fan? Its military issue, not some ordinary fan. It’s used by Admirals, so don’t underestimate me… hehehe. Hmm? I said nothing.

Hamakaze and Tanikaze are both so whimsical and wandering around. Those girls sure don’t have the temperment of being in the Navy. They still need to lean on me, being their big sister. Such a headache...
Actually, even though I don’t care that much and I have confidence in myself, for the sake of asking… do you think I’m independent enough?
What, I just asked offhandedly, you sure are opinionated… forget it. I’ll still listen to what you got to say. Just you wait, one day I’ll impress you.
You’ve worked hard today, please get some rest.
Such a tactical mistake...
So slow, are you like a turtle who’s stumbled onto the battlefield?
Damn, give me… victory. Win or lose, that’s the way of life in the Navy.
You’ve got mail… hmm? You read it, I didn’t really focus on what was written, don’t mind me.

That Hamakaze girl, as my little sister she always acts superior to Tanikaze, even more than I do, darn… | If only we discovered Tusk, then Kongou-sama would not… sigh, forget it, what’s important is the present |Official documents? Let me see… hmm… ahh I see I see...
I’ve organized all the missions… say what, you want me to clear them as well?!
The mission rewards have been confirmed, I’ll leave the labor work of transporting it here to you.

The 17th Destroyer fleet have been together for most of the time, and we participated in all sorts of sorties and operations for almost the entirety of the war. In the end I was with Kongou-sama as we both made our last stand… to the end. So I don’t care about those little things.
Commander, you’ve finally realized my greatness. To be frank… my ears are not twitching. I’m not that happy, shut up, let’s continue the ceremony!
The time has come!
Don’t poke me unstoppingly, are you a monkey?
This type of things should not be tolerated, right? In that case, die...
So it turns out to be you, are you the Commander of the 17th Destroyer fleet from today onwards? You seem so ordinary. I am Kagerou class Urakaze, show me what you got, Commander.
Thank you… my ears are twitching? Impossible, I’m not that happy at all.
We won… naturally, what’s there to gloat about?
You should know that I designed this outfit just by seeing the family crest here. Do you think it looks good?
Before you raise a fuss about it, let me just tell you this - the concept of "Christmas" already existed during the Sengoku period, so there's nothing weird about putting on a Christmas outfit!
Look here, Christmas nowadays is a holiday that you celebrate with those who are important to you. You came here knowing that, didn't you? Me? I... don't particularly object...
Merry Christmas. I suppose I'll let you take it easy today.
Another greeting card for you... Curse you, what a normie.

Isokaze, stop frolicking around like a little kid, and don't pull on me either! Ugh... what am I going to do with you? |I still have to prepare presents for the three stooges... Jeez, can't they be a bit more considerate towards their big sis normally? Oh well, I suppose that's how it should be. |It's snowing... Hmm? It's not like I particularly want to play in the snow or anything, but if you want to so badly, I suppose I can tag along.
Santa Claus? ... Hmph, I graduated from that fairy tale long ago.
Before you raise a fuss about it, let me just tell you this - the concept of "Christmas" already existed during the Sengoku period, so there's nothing weird about putting on a Christmas outfit!
Let us do like rock stars do and turn it up to eleven!
Of course they had music during the Sengoku period! ...But they didn't have rock bands? Listen, it's called "getting with the times."
Ugh... Even though we finally got all our gear, we still need more band members... Commander! Stop complaining and come hither! From now on, you're a member of the Sengoku Shredders!
What? Was I wrong? Hm... It's been quite some time since Tanikaze said she'd go receive the commission team... Hope nothing has happened to her...
Do we have any potential new band members? ...What? Nobody has even applied? Grrr... I suppose there's no point in getting mad at you for it, though...
Enough dilly-dallying! It's time to get on with today's rehearsal!

Hamakaze said she won't join because it would "impact her academic performance"... Hmph! She doesn't know what she's missing out on!|A band logo? Yes, and we'll use my family crest as the motif, of course!|If you're going to rest, find something durable to sit on... I'm not "showing concern," just giving you instructions!
Being a general is no excuse to skip out on rehears– Ahem! I mean missions.
You've brought the missions rewards? Splendid, Isokaze! I'll see to it you receive a castle for your efforts!
Go on. Read the score and play the song like I taught you.
Ugh... Even though we finally got all our gear, we still need more band members... Commander! Stop complaining and come hither! From now on, you're a member of the Sengoku Shredders!
Blue skies, blue sea, daba-dee...
Whenever I ask Kinu if I can borrow her cute mask... she just tells me no way in heck...
Special Type I-class destroyer number 10 – Uranami.
The commission team's back. Oooh, riiight, you already knew that.
Laaaaaame.
I keep a collection of cute pets. Stop by again and I'll show you my axofrostl and swolejuu.
The massive Meowfficer's super fluffy... I mean, ripped. Built like a fridge!
I'd love to hear some of Prof Commander's interesting little trivia. Tell me something about ghosts.
Commander, when I'm with you it feels like I'm a fish in water, a bee that found honey, a ticking time bomb of joy that goes BOOOOM! ...Something in that ballpark, basically.
Welcome back, tweety-doo. That's what a Manjuu would say. Yup-yup...
I'm super scared right now.
Could you give me the go-ahead to play now?
Time to scamper. Don't wanna be left behind.
Whoosh, here comes a letter. Aaaand there it is.

Uranami rhymes with rural mommy. Doodle-loo, nothing better to dooo.|Help friends in need, defeat enemies with speed. That's my little motto.|When I tell folks about the things I like, they all look super weirded out, then they strangerzone me. But oh well.
One super serving of missions with a diet soda, coming right up.
Nice work on that serving of missions, Commander. You want more, help yourself.
I'm the Type I... No wait, Type II... Last try: middle-of-the-pack destroyer, Uranami. My friends and I in Destroyer Division 19 worked really hard. Okay, serious question: what Type am I, exactly?
Promise ring. So glitteryyyy. Can I just keep it on forever? Hehehe... I super love you, Commander.
Nibble on this!
Something bothering you upstairs, Commander?
Whoopeeee.
What am I doing here? ...Hmmm? You're adopting me? Aaaaall righty. You lead-a-dee, I'll follow-a-loo.
Done enhancy-pantsing yet? C'mawn, I wanna play.
I'm awesome... Or so they say. But why?
Commander, come ski with me... Yeah, bring the Manjuus too...!
It's snowing...! I've finished rallying the forces... so let us advance!
The best thing about winter... is skiing in the snow!
Today, I will transform into a snow bunny! |The snow is so sparkly and soft... it's very fun. |You shouldn't underestimate me~ I've been practicing this whole time.
Eep?! Commander, your hands are cold...
My outfit is thick, therefore wholesome...
It's snowing...! I've finished rallying the forces... so let us advance!
So… can we run?
Commander, bad news! There’s a cockroach, please help me get rid of it!
The fourth ship of Mutsuki class destroyer — Uzuki
Alert Commander, my sisters sneaked out without permission and I just saw them return! Huh, it was for a commission? O that’s right!
Ack, the Commander is here, run!
Commander, c-can you please help me look for something?
Commander, quickly come help me~ I’ve lost something again!
Commander~~ Kisaragi sis and Mutsuki sis are all bffs. I don’t care, I want to hug you, Commander!
Commander~~ What should I do, all I think about is you, am I sick?!
Oh no, Commander! I wanted to help sort out your paperwork, but now they’re all blown out of the window by this sudden gust of wind!
Ahhh, where’d you go Commander? I was scared all by myself!
Sigh, Commander, I want to go home...
Commander, a new batch of mail has successfully flown out! What should I do?

Although submarines are terrifying, but I’m not afraid of airplanes! |Oh no, Commander, my torpedo is missing!! Hmm, it’s behind me? |Commander!! Just now when I ran over to you, the flower vase fell to the ground, was it haunted?
Commander, incoming mission! I already tossed away any mission where we may encounter submarines!
We suddenly received a lot of things, Commander. Could it be explosives?! O, it’s only rewards...

I’m Uzuki from the 30th Destroyer Division. Hmm… where is everyone... I'm good at both defense and offense. What’s more, I am the most hard-working destroyer among my sisters. Hey Commander, while I was introducing myself, I seem to have lost my card!
Wahahaha, I made it just in time, Commander?! So, so it is me, right? It must be me, right?! If it is me, then you will not be wrong by picking me, Commander!
Oops, I think I timed it wrong!
Wahahaha, incoming submarine!! … huh? It’s the Commander.
Commander, how come after telling my sisters what you did, they all came rushing over to you?
Sooo, are you the Commander? I am Uzuki. You were looking for me, right? You sure it's me, right?! If I’m mistaken, that’ll be awkward…
Commander, I don’t think I’ve gotten smarter at all, what should I do!
Eh?! First place goes to me, is this ok?
Commander, I had a dream. Everyone was playing together hand-in-hand, and nobody was fighting! It was really fun!
*yawn* ... Kisaragi, Mutsuki, let's take a nap together... Commander? Do you want to join too?
Urgh... the alarm clock... is freakin' annoying... Ah, wait! It's the commission timer! Commander!
Good job, Commander... Zzzzz...
*yawn* ...Is it morning already?
Mail? Oh, I stuffed it under the pillow and forgot about it...!

It's no good that Commander does all the work while I sleep... I'll also help... Zzzzzz...|Commander, want to play house? Yes, these are plushies of Mutsuki and Kisaragi! |Commander, come here if you're tired! You can have half the pillow!
Commander, I'm coming with you on your mission! Don't leave me behind...!
Mission rewards~! Is there candy?
Ehehe~ Commander, your hand is so warm! Commander, sing me a lullaby~
*yawn* ... Kisaragi, Mutsuki, let's take a nap together... Commander? Do you want to join too?
Heed my command! Forward!

Look, isn't Elizabeth acting a bit too spoiled? And Warspite and the others are totally enabling that. I knew I should have been the one in charge... Huhh? I'm more or less the same...? Wh-what did you say?!
Queen Elizabeth-class battleship – Valiant (HMS Valiant.)
Heheh, it seems that the commission team has been doing well. Do send them my best regards in my stead.
I had great expectations for you...
Good, you came. If you have no other work to do, play me in a game of chess.
Y-you're better than I expected... F-fine, I won't go easy on you next time...!
H-hold up! Chess is like a real-world exercise, so you have to consider all the various external factors! Th-that's right! That last match was a fake! A fluke! Doesn't count! Cancelled! Got it?!

As my subordinate, you should be considerate of your superior... I mean, sh-shouldn't you let me win at least once? I've lost to you so many times that I barely even have the confidence to play chess anymore... A-anyway! Lose to me! Just once! It can even be on purpose! This is an order, got it?
voiceline.oath: I don't care if I win or lose... A-after all, what's more important is that I get to be with you, right...? You agree?! ...W-well then, let's have a rematch!

voiceline.line: Wh-what are you doing?!
My attendant, how fares the combat situation? Do tell me in detail.
voiceline.oath: My assistant, how fares the war situation? N-nothing out of the ordinary, hopefully?

voiceline.line: H-hey, hurry up and do something about this...!
It's about time! Now, show me today's itinerary!
voiceline.oath: You're here! Good timing, let's go over today's itinerary!

voiceline.line: Ugh... H-how is this possible...
Tsk... Why is all the mail for you...

So thirsty... Ahem. My attendant, do tell the Maid Team to brew me some black tea. Hmm, on second thought... that'd take too long. You can do it for me, can't you?|Charisma is the most important facet of a leader! To be charismatic is to command dignity, to imbue your every word with gravitas! Ahem... did you get all that?|Snack time?! ...Ahem! A proper leader must know how to balance their work with their life. Please do not forget that.
voiceline.oath: Hey, what's taking so long? ...The black tea still isn't ready? I'm already used to the flavor of your tea, so don't keep me waiting too long...|Charisma might be important, but what people truly flock to is your talent and sincerity.|nil

voiceline.line: I'll leave this these trifling quests to you.
Even the most trivial quests at least deserve some rewards.

Queen Elizabeth-class battleship, Valiant. Hehe, this fleet is known from Jutland to the Far East for its heroic majesty, and I am the reason for that! Now, Commander, you shall become my assistant so that you may prove your worth as a subordinate.

Well done! You've gained my recognition as my trustiest spear in the arsenal! To reward you for your continued loyalty, I shall allow you to stay at my side and bask in my charisma! May this ring be a symbol of our bond~♪
Everything dances within the palm of my hand!
Speak your mind, my attendant. You have my ear.
voiceline.oath: Huh? What is it? Are you even listening to me?

voiceline.line: What's the meaning of this?! Grrr... As a charismatic, generous, and VERY patient person, I will forgive you just this once!
To be Valiant is to be me. Remember this face, for it is the face of a fleet leader! ...Speaking of faces, who are you? The Commander? Very well! I shall treat you as my personal servant!
Not bad, my attendant~ Do you want a reward?
A heroic battle commanded elegantly by the Commander— now this is the kind of flawless victory that befits me.
Hey you, don't tell me you're actually enjoying being taken care of like this?! Grr... How unfair! How about this, next time, I'll be the patient, and you'll attend to my every whim!

Hehe~ As this medical facility training is crucially important, a charismatic leader such as myself would be best suited to instruct everyone on– Wait a moment, what's with this outfit?! You there, explain the meaning of this at once!
I brought water for you. Make sure you drink plenty if you want to stay healthy... That's right, eight cups a day!
It's about time! ...Wait, just kidding! You're supposed to be the patient, right? How about you stop walking around so much? Get back in bed this instant!

Don't get any weird ideas. I'm only pouring tea for you because you're the patient!|When we're not training for this exercise, how about a game of chess? I already brought the board. I'll set it up, so just wait in bed!|As a patient, so you're supposed to listen to the nurse! Mm... Besides, shouldn't you already be heeding my every instruction? You're my attendant after all...|You're my patient today! Heheh, be grateful that you're now under the care of the charismatic nurse, Valiant, and heed my every command! ...It, it's not like I'm into this or anything, so don't expect me to do this every single time!|It's time to get your blood drawn, so stick your arm out! ...Geh... I can't handle this stuff like Vampire does...
What's the matter? Are you going to die if I don't take care of you~?
...I, I'm only overlooking this because you're the patient!

Hehe~ As this medical facility training is crucially important, a charismatic leader such as myself would be best suited to instruct everyone on– Wait a moment, what's with this outfit?! You there, explain the meaning of this at once!
O~ho~ho! With my regal display of wisdom and fortune, I have finally secured the Crown from Elizabeth's grasp! Heheh~ before you is the victor of the War of the Roses!
Why the astonished look on your face? You heard me correctly! On this day, I am not merely Valiant, I am the regal and royal Queen Valiant!
Today, I feel like the world is mine~ Oh, you're back, my attendant? You may enjoy my cooking as a reward!
Do you remember how you are to address me today? Yes, "Your Majesty, Queen Valiant!" Make sure you do not forget this!

Elizabeth lost a bet with me. Now, she has to surrender the Crown to me for a day, and do whatever I tell her to~♪|See to it that I, Queen Valiant, am the center of all attention at tonight's party! Huh? Don't overdo it...? I, I know that!|Are you well-versed in ballroom dancing? Hrmm... It's decided! You shall be my dance partner tonight!
H-how dare you lay your hands on Queen Valiant!
Hwah?! ...Ahem! I'm feeling extra charismatic today, so I will forgive your transgression for today!
Why the astonished look on your face? You heard me correctly! On this day, I am not merely Valiant, I am the regal and royal Queen Valiant!
Oh ho ho ho! Let the banquet begin!
What? Dost thou have strange thoughts concerning destroyers?
V-class destroyer ー Vampire, Hull Number D68!
A lady approaches on the horizon? Is there wine in thier coffers?
Hmph. Licking my feet is suitable for foolish humans.
What is it? Thou wills to see mine garmets that greatly? Hehe, then I tell you, today's color is~ black~
Since thou are so allured by me, are thou perhaps a pervert? A beast. Seeking respite? More excuses? Lo, I've seen what's under thine bed and read them all
Do not get gammy with me! ...It is not that I hate you, but a lady must show her restraint! I-I now want to drink wine! Hurry up and fetch some to me!
This be a strange feeling... What? Is it unnatural for a vampire to love a human? A noble human cannot refuse a lady's advances, right? Isn't that so? It is, right?
Art thou treating me as a child? ... It tickles~ Wh-what? Over already?
Bathtime! Dinner! ...Huh? Where's the wine again?
Tsk. I need more blood!
Perhaps thou wish to inquire what color I adorn myself with today?
Ugh... I hate planes! I, Vampire, will not die!
New postage? What secrets does this envelope contain?
I'm bored... There is nothing to do after the lights are out|Hey, hey~ How about let's do something exciting?|The Pacific is calm on this night? Well, that's not the case, I think?
Missions. One wonders if thou art a workaholic. What? I hast emark on a journey as well?
Phew... Finally, bedrest. I do wonder what the rewards can be~

What is the knowledge you seek? ...I am the first V class destroyer of the royal family, the honorable Vampire. I was in escort and patrol missions, and I hath also witnessed the sinking of many allies... I will not fail come next time! Let us fight until the end, and drink the blood of our enemies dry together!
Hmhm. Thou art insincere... So be it. Receive mine sweet blood, and be prepared to receive Eloi's most blessed of blessings~
Give me your blood and fear!
Where art thou touching? It is much better over there ...Done already? Hehehe, such a half-heart~
Eh... You idiot! Pervert!
I am V class' destroyer, Vampire. Thine blood looks delectable! --That said, thou doth fancy to stare at mine spots, do you not?
Perhaps I've grown a little bigger here --What? Are thou implying nothing has changed?
Beholdeth my power! What! There's no wine among the rewards?!
Commander, where art thee looking? ...! I-it's only because the dress is tight-fitting!
What dost thee think of my new dress? Like it? Or love it~? Eheh~ 'tis written all over thy face. Next is... w-wait! I haven't put on my stockings yet!

Dost thee have plans for tonight? Ehehe, I do~ I plan to cling to thee all night so thee cannot go anywhere~ |My favourite meal? Ehehe, obviously the one after I have blown out the candles~ |I wish to do fun things~ with the person I like~
Commander, dost thee enjoy touching me? "My skin is smooth and fair?" Ehehe, I love thy sweet-talking~
Ehehe, Commander is a pervert who only I could love~
What dost thee think of my new dress? Like it? Or love it~? Eheh~ 'tis written all over thy face. Next is... w-wait! I haven't put on my stockings yet!
This nurse won't be saving any enemies' lives~
Commander, dost thou long for my meticulous care~?
Commander, I am now a nurse, so thou hast no choice but to give me thy blood~! Hehe, just kidding~!
Everyone from the commission fleet has returned! Perhaps I should check if anyone is injured.
Dumb Commander, stop acting all smug and come let me inspect thee for injuries!

Commander, take thy wildest guess~ Am I really wearing anything underneath~? |Commander, thou hast been hard at work for so long~ Come hither and allow me to help thee unwind~ |Seducing and taking care of thee are but two sides of the same coin! How does this big dummy not understand that?
I just wanted to inspect thy body a little, but turns out thou art surprisingly healthy~
Eek! I-I'm an angel in white, you know? Pervert!
Commander, I am now a nurse, so thou hast no choice but to give me thy blood~! Hehe, just kidding~!
If anyone is hurt, please come see me for emergency bandaging~
A Sakura-style yukata? What's that? For one like myself, only finery like this fits the occasion~
Commander, thou promised to go to the festival with me, right? If thou forgot, I shall have to give thee a nibble upon the neck, ehehe~
Commissions? Go forth, but do not keep me waiting too long~

Hehe, the Sakura Empire sure has a lot of interesting things. I just learned this profound phrase: "The moon is beautiful, isn't it?" But for me, thou art far more beautiful than the moon... I can't help but to want to... taste thee~
Commander, art thou prepared to play with me until I'm satisfied?

Nnh... Commander, how is this goldfish so hard to scoop? Hurry and help me! |Hmm... these "yukata" things are more interesting than I had thought. I will have to try wearing one next time. |Commander, there appears to be something interesting over there. But I can't see... lift me onto thy shoulders?
For one like myself, the night hath only begun. Thou art not allowed to be sleepy yet~
Commander, thou promised to go to the festival with me, right? If thou forgot, I shall have to give thee a nibble upon the neck, ehehe~
Let the performance of darkness begin!
What kind of song would suit me best? ...And don't just say "rock." Give me something both cute and cool, befitting my image~♪
Feast thine eyes upon Vampire's idol attire... is it not exquisite? Heheh, now thy gaze shall be fixed upon my performance alone~♪
Commissions? Go forth. But don't keep me waiting too long, understood?
Good job on thy operation~♪ I am rather tired from my lessons as well, so perhaps it's time to relax in the bath? What wert thou thinking of just now?
What color am I wearing today... Well, maybe there's no need to guess~? Hehe~♪

The key to being a good idol is motivation. That's why the most important thing is to have fun~♪ Wouldst thou not agree?|"Hey darling~♪ Vampire can be thy per~ so~ nal~ idol~♡" Ehehe~|Even Warspite is an idol now? Huh, never would've imagined...
I got an offer! Quickly, come look~♪
This... counts as fanservice, right?
Feast thine eyes upon Vampire's idol attire... is it not exquisite? Heheh, now thy gaze shall be fixed upon my performance alone~♪
Let's celebrate with bl— Err, with wine and song~♪
Come! Raise thine glass to our love!
We're finally alone together~ Darling~
Those who fall in love with vampires are bound to suffer seven times more than their infatuation. After all, love is a poison which leads to death.
Oh my darling~ Let us go and greet the maiden's upon thier return~
I cannot possibly have enough of the time I spend with thee, Commander~ Once thou art done taking thine bath, will thou listen to what I say?
Darling, what's the souvenir? A test? Could it be a fine wine, or maybe chocolates from a land over yonder?
Darling~ Where shall we date on this eve?
You want the mail? Then exchange sweet love letters with me~

Cleaning is no task for a vampire! We can be lazy every once and a while!|I'm bored... Mine darling, how about a date?|Doth thou beseech the color of mine garmets today? Were thou not the one who dressed me on the morn~
Rather than missions, am I not more important?
Mission complete! Next up, dating time~
Are you elevating your love for me?
Aww~ What are you doing?
Flowers and salute fire for my love!
Come! Let's settle this, fair and square!
voiceline.oath: Yes! YES! It's my time to shine!

voiceline.line: Loyalty reverberates through my blade, glory booms through my barrels! Behold, the light of my royal sabre! ...Ugh, that's so cringeworthy! Although it does sound cool... C-Commander?!
voiceline.oath: See? This is an unassuming flat – unlike Lady Formidable's place. A knight's residence should be orderly and free of– Don't go digging through my shelves!

voiceline.line: Battleship – Vanguard.
The commission team is back. Let's head out to receive them, Commander.
voiceline.oath: The commission team's back. Let's head out to meet them. And while we're at it, let us sortie!

voiceline.line: *sigh*... If you're not suited for the job, just admit it so we can find a replacement. Stop acting tough, it just makes you look pathetic.
So, what's on the schedule for today? ...You'll be working overtime filing paperwork? I'm sorry to hear that. Be that as it may, you will be present during today's exercise, right?
While yes, I am a palace guard, that doesn't mean I should be stuck in port. Won't you let me sortie already? *sigh*... I'm going mad. The stress is killing me...

What? You're working overtime AGAIN? I understand it has to be done, but this is a bit ridiculous... I won't force you to order a sortie, but please, can't you make one happen somehow? ...You can? Brilliant!
Mmmmh! That was refreshing! Thanks, Commander – I really needed that! It's days like these that make serving as a palace guard worth it. Now, you who guides my sword, what is your next order?
voiceline.oath: *sigh*... I have no idea how you've put up with this job for so long, Commander. Let me tell you a good way to vent some stress. You go out at sea for an exercise, and... A-a date?! Wh-wh-why are you bringing THAT up all of a sudden?!

voiceline.line: Yes? How can I help?
voiceline.oath: If you want to pat my head... then I guess that's fine.

voiceline.line: The Commander has returned! Ladies, arrange for repairs and a debriefing! Commander, get some rest – I'll take it from here.
Tsk... What a persistent bunch!
The Commander has arrived! Ladies, at attention! ...Now, let's get to work, shall we?
voiceline.oath: Ah, there you are. Yeah, yeah, I'm here with you. That's my duty as your secretary and guard... But truth be told, I do it just because I want to.

voiceline.line: Tsk. You'll pay for this, you hear?! ...No, I'm fine. Take the others and retreat, quickly.
voiceline.oath: You picked the wrong fight. Try harder next time if you don't want to make fools of yourselves.

voiceline.line: I've brought you a letter. Give it a read, Commander.

You may rest assured, King George. If Her Majesty and the Commander so desire, I will gladly be the spearhead that sunders the enemy line.|Is that Bismarck over there? Gracious, this will be quite awkward...|The port seems to be all in order, and I can confidently say you're as well-guarded as can be!|Pardon my bluntness, but Royal cuisine is total shite. Sure, different people like different things, but something's wrong if even I as a native think it's rubbish.|Here's your programme for today, Commander! ...Damn, that's at the same time as the show I want to watch... N-no, just talking to myself!
voiceline.extra: A sortie is an opportunity for me to flourish! The glory is nice too, but I think we can all agree the best part is showing the world what we're made of!|Being as graceful as Lady Hood would be a huge undertaking... M-mind you, I'm not saying it would be impossible!|Royal breakfast is all right, that much I'll personally vouch for! If you're curious to try it, I'm willing to cook it myself!|If you need some enemies sent to the scrapyard, take me out of the dock and send me on a sortie! Preferably with Lady Victorious – she and I would likely get along!|What? There's a package for me? ...Look, I can explain... It's nothing noteworthy, really... Just, you know, some cute comics.

voiceline.line: Word of a new mission has come in. Have a look, Commander.
voiceline.oath: A new mission's come– Oh god, this one's going to be a pain.

voiceline.line: Mission complete. *sigh*... I should've checked on it sooner.

I am Vanguard, the battleship that was launched after the end of the war. My sword is yours – may it bring glory to your port. Also, if I may make a request... please do NOT call my weapons "old-fashioned."

By this ring, my sword and my life now belongs to you, 'til the end of time! ...All righty, do you mind if I tone down the formality a bit? I mean, what's the point in being super serious 'round the clock?
This is a knight's swordsmanship!
voiceline.oath: This... This move is too cringeworthy to name, so forget it!

voiceline.line: My duty as a palace guard is to aid and protect you at all times.
voiceline.oath: Whatever you need done, give me the honour. A knight is always ready to serve.

voiceline.line: Thank you for ceasing your inappropriate behaviour right at... *gasp*! Do you have a death wish?
voiceline.oath: I-I'm not some idiot who'll admit to liking this, no way...

voiceline.line: I am Vanguard, palace guard of the Royal Knights! I hereby pledge to you my sword, and the full extent of my loyalty! May glory be yours, and God save the Queen!
My sword's purpose is to bring glory to the Royal Navy – and to you, Commander!
Hoorah! Victory is mine! May the Commander's name and mine alike go down in history! ...Oops! I didn't mean to say that aloud!
voiceline.oath: Behold! My royal sabreee! ...Wait, what? They're all gone? Oh god, I can feel everyone's cringing at me!

voiceline.line: Why do you insist on having me as a maid? I can hardly cook and I'm terrible at cleaning. Wait... Don't tell me maids are your kink...

"Please let me know if you need anything, Master"... I'm starting to think you're making me wear this as a sick joke. The reason being, I am obviously NOT fit to be a Royal Maid... Even if I do adore their uniforms...
The commission team has returned to port. I shall accompany you to them.

How would you evaluate my performance as a maid? Ill-suited though I am for this job, I can still accomplish any task you can throw at me... Y-you want me to keep doing this? You know, I really feel like you just enjoy watching me suffer!
A salute for the Commander's return! By the way, bring me along for the next sortie, would you?
The Commander has arrived! ...I know that's not what a maid would say, but it's not like I could pull it off anyway...
This sucks... I told you I wasn't cut out for this.

While Royal Maids also participate in battle, their approach differs greatly from us knights. The only way I can put it is... they hold back too much?|Yes, Master? ..."Getting the hang of this," eh... Are you making fun of me?|I alone get to protect you, my honourable Commander. No one will take this privilege from me!|nil|I have both secretary AND maid work to do... *sigh*... Will I ever get to sortie again?
You have a new mission, Master. Please review it.
As you say. Your wish is my command.
Compare me to any of the other maids and I'll destroy you.

"Please let me know if you need anything, Master"... I'm starting to think you're making me wear this as a sick joke. The reason being, I am obviously NOT fit to be a Royal Maid... Even if I do adore their uniforms...
I beat the crap out of them with grace and elegance! Hahah!
Witness the true might of a LARGE destroyer!
Oh gosh! D-don't just appear outta nowhere, Commander... You'll scare people.
Vauquelin-class destroyer – Vauquelin.
A commission's complete! Just F-Y-I! So yeah, let's go receive the returning team.
voiceline.oath: Commission... commmmplete! Yaayyy!! Commander, you don't have to follow along!

voiceline.line: You know, I've learned something, Commander. People who can't introspect probably won't make many friends...
I got one of Miss Dunkerque's cakes! Oh boy, which one is it today? Think you could guess, Commander?

Something that's bothered me lately? Well, Tartu asked me for advice on becoming more ladylike, so I thoughtlessly recommended this detective novel I've been reading, and she apparently got hooked on reading it... It feels like that was a mistake, you know?

Whether I'm actually dumb or not doesn't matter, but sometimes I like pretending to be stupid. Then when I do something smart, people are gonna be like, "Whoa, you're a genius, Vauquelin!" That's how it goes! I mean... it does, right?

Plus, when you're playing dumb, you don't need to use your brain! It's refreshing to just not think about anything! Thus, when you enjoy yourself, others will, too! You should give it a try sometime, Commander!
voiceline.oath: Allll righty, what carefree adventures are we going to have today? ...Woahh?! Commander, why are you hugging me so suddenly? I, I don't mind if you want to fool around, but what if someone sees us... Ahhn?!

voiceline.line: Ahehehehehehe~
For all your hard work, you deserve a headpat... Whuah! Spare me that expression of yours!
voiceline.oath: Commander, as a reward, I'll give you a headpat! ...Ahaha, you don't need to act all bashful!

voiceline.line: Stay calm and wait for the right time...!
So, Commander, didn't you promise you'd return with snacks for me? Uhh, what? We never made any promise like that?
voiceline.oath: Hmm... So this is the commanderly feeling of sitting atop the commander's throne... Woahh?! When'd you get here?!

voiceline.line: Huh? You're asking for my opinion on what went wrong? Dunno, that's your job to find out, Commander!
Mail? Oh, I'll go get it then!

You look bored and in need of some relief, Commander. Perchance you would fancy a showcase of my lancing skill– Oh gosh, careful! You'll get hurt!|Can I ask you a favor, Commander? Well, I was hoping you could, uhh... leave out the bell peppers from my dinner tonight...|Aah, so it's like that, huh. I understand everything now. Let me take it on... NOT!
voiceline.oath: Let me show you the spear dance that puts even the knights to shame! ...Commander, do you really have to hide under the desk? I won't hurt you... Ah! Look out! |Let's throw out all those yucky vegetables! Yeah, all of them! Including yours too!|nil

voiceline.line: A mission, you say? Hehehe! Finally, it's my time to shine!
Holy cow! Look, Commander! We got a huge bounty for that mission! O-oh, it's nothing out of the ordinary?
voiceline.oath: Commander, we've got a boatload of rewards... No, an entire mountainload! Way more than usual!

voiceline.line: (I wanna give a cool self-introduction, but I don't have many exploits to my name... I did escort Dunkerque and Algérie, though that's not much...) Long story short: I'm Vauquelin from the Vichya Dominion! I've got more potential than you can imagine! C-cool, am I right?

Holy smokes... You really meant that thing the other day about getting married?! Well, not to say I took it as a joke, or didn't believe you, or anything... Uhh, I mean... Y-you get what I'm trying to say, right...?
I'm strong as heck! Probably!
What's up? Need me to do you a favor?
You're making me a bit uncomfortable, Commander...
voiceline.oath: Th-this is a bit embarrassing...

voiceline.line: Tadaah! Nameship of the Vauquelin-class large destroyers, Vauquelin, has arrived in style! Hey, what's so funny? I may not look strong, but I am! Um, probably!
You're not gonna... dump additional work on me now, are you?
MVP! This calls for a celebratory cool pose... Uhh, why's everyone giving me funny looks?
voiceline.oath: Number one! Clap, clap, everyone! Heheh, I'm super strong, after all!

voiceline.line: Tartu's not gonna get washed away by a stray wave, I hope... Yeah, figured as much...
Commandeeer! What are you doing? It's our day off! Turn the work part of your brain off and just have fun! C'mon, let's enjoy ourselves on the beach!

Everyone's looking so cute~! Woo~! Hm? I'M looking cute too...? W-woo~!|Isn't it great to just forget about work and have a good time~? But, uh, what's up with that Royal Knight over there? She's casually playing around too, even though she's still on duty...|Beach barbeque! Heck yeah! I'd love to grill some vegetables, but I'd rather someone else does the bell peppers!
Teehee~ Well? How do you like my swimsuit~? Yeah, I know, I'm flat in a few places...
I know I don't hold a candle to Tartu, but... Wait, what do you think you're doing?!
Commandeeer! What are you doing? It's our day off! Turn the work part of your brain off and just have fun! C'mon, let's enjoy ourselves on the beach!
Let us play a requiem! ...Hang on, that sounds familiar...
Wow, rude much, Commander and Tartu? Way to fall asleep during my performance! ...I mean, technically I wasn't personally performing... But still!
Yes, the strings... I can hear the celebratory melody... Now, follow my lead and we'll take this song to greater– Oh, Commander? What's all this, you ask? Uhh... You know... Ahahaha...
Check it out! Your favorite Vauquelin, now in a fancy dress! Also, good luck at work, Commander!
So yeah, I'm thinking it's time for me to scoot! Phew... Good thing I picked a non-cumbersome dress...

Gotta swing in rhythm to the music, like... Oh, Commander! Guess what? I've been getting tons of compliments on my conducting skills! Hehehe~!|Right-o! Now'd be a good time for a relaxing song! ...Wake up, Commander! You're sleeping on the job!|
Got any requests? Like a song, or food, or even a thrilling chat with yours truly? Hehehe~
Bet you were imagining these were Tartu's knockers. Hmph.
Yes, the strings... I can hear the celebratory melody... Now, follow my lead and we'll take this song to greater– Oh, Commander? What's all this, you ask? Uhh... You know... Ahahaha...
First place! Let's hear a victory song for me! Wait a sec... Where'd my orchestra go?
Commander, are you prepared for this?
Ohoho, do you have business with me?
My name is Vert, I am the CPU of Leanbox. I'm very good at first-person shooters, so please let me handle all combat-related matters!
It seems everyone was able to make it back. Let us give them a warm welcome.
Could I just return home to Leanbox?
Would you like to play an MMO together with me? Yes, of course I will assist you with everything you need to know!
I would like to hold a meetup for fellow MMO enthusiasts today! Surely you will be part of it, Commander? I will move forward under the premise that you and I will be in attendance.
May I ask you for some advice, Commander? There's a person who I've recently grown quite fond of, but I don't know how I should approach him... On second thought, never mind I said anything!
Being with you warms my heart, like a hot cup of tea. And just as I love tea, I love you. I want this moment in time to last forever, but perhaps that makes me sound selfish...?
Thank you for your hard work. Now it is time for some tea.
It is just as I thought; the enemy is no match for me.
Good day. I was just about to brew some tea. Would you like to have some together with me, Commander?
So this is how defeat feels... I see. That battle was so enjoyable that it made my heart race.
It would appear mail has arrived. I suggest that you check for it regularly.

Ohoho, I will watch over you, Commander. You may rest assured and know that I can guarantee your safety.|Ohhh?! Tell me, what is that girl's name?! Please, I beg you, let me make her my little sister!|I feel completely overjoyed that there are so many cute little girls here.
Even just 5 minutes is plenty of time for you to finish a mission, no?
Mission completed! Let us go collect our rewards!

My name is Vert, I am the CPU of Leanbox. My favorite things are tea, video games, and my adorable little sisters! ...Hm? I have no little sisters, you say? If I view someone as my little sister then they ARE my little sister!
So you wish to drink my tea till death do us apart, I see...? That makes me so happy. I will gladly make tea to just your liking, my commander... no, my sweetheart.
Witness the glorious power of Leanbox's CPU!
Ohoho, you're quite the mischief-maker, aren't you?
If you don't treat women delicately then they will grow tired of you very fast.
My name is Vert, I am the CPU of Leanbox. I'm very good at first-person shooters, so please let me handle all combat-related matters!
I shall set my sights even higher.
There is no entry for "defeat" in my lexicon.
I'm very happy to have become everyone's repair ship
Commander, I'm leaving the resupply of medical drugs and equipment to you
Repair ship ー Vestal, Hull Number AR-4!
The girls of the commission team have returned. I wonder if they got injured...
Commander, as punishment for angering me, this injection will be painful
That reminds me. Commander, have you been paying attention to your health? I'm in charge of it? I don't mind, but please take care of it yourself, alright?
Yes, yes~ It seems you're too reliant on me recently~ Well, I'm happy that I'm so trusted, but Commander, you might become totally useless at this rate...

Hmm...  As a guardian angel, I have to treat everyone equally, so I can't just take care of you, Commander. However, personally speaking, I cannot say I can't provide you some extra~ spe~cial~ ser~vice~
This is what a personal doctor is like...! 24-7 full-time care, and taking care of your well being! --Eh? That's too much? Is that so...
Commander, please tell me if you are hurt
Oh no! I have to treat the injuries!
I, Vestal, am always ready to heal wounded people
I will not abandon everyone. Let's all return together.
Commander, there are new mails

Commander, if you keep daydreaming, I'll leave you alone and go play with Enterprise!|Commander, have you checked your fleet's condition before sending them out?|Has Enterprise been eating properly? I'm really worried...
Commander... um... I think we should check the missions one more time...
Your mission rewards are here~!

I am the one in charge of maintenance, Vestal. I was tasked to look after Enterprise exclusively, so if there's anything up, please say the word. But if you underestimate me just because I'm a 'support', you'll have another thing coming, you know?
Hahaha, now you'll never be able to reject my nursing, Commander~ What are you getting embarrassed for~ It's alright to leave everything to me, you know?
Yeah yeah, it's time for repairs~
Wh-why is my heart beating faster...
Ah, no...I-It's so embarassing...
Greetings, Commander. I am repair ship Vestal. I worked exclusively for Enterprise. I'm happy if everyone is healthy~
It's so good that I can take better care of everyone now~
Don't worry. With me, the fighting damages can be repaired.
The sea breeze is so refreshing, isn't it~
Although summer is a vacation period for many, Doctor Vestal is in all year round♪
Listen, everyone~! Playing by the beach is fun, but please keep safety in mind! If you begin to feel ill, come see me~!
I think those girls are starting to develop tans from going on so many commissions.
As your personal doctor, I will always be by your side, ready to– Hm? Doctors don't usually dress like this? Aha~ It's fine though, isn't it~? I want to go on a date with you, after all~
Commander, please don't forget to change clothes once we get back home. Otherwise, you may catch a cold from wearing wet clothes.
Commander, please be aware of the risk of heatstroke when at the beach.

I'll stay here and watch over everyone, so you go on ahead into the ocean, Commander~ Now, now, don't be disappointed, you can enjoy yourself on my behalf~|Commander, would you like me to apply some sunscreen to your skin? There's no need to be hesitant, I'm actually quite good at it~|Enterprise, South Dakota, it's all right to have a showdown, but don't drag others into it~
Commander, I'm thinking about giving you the "Hygiene in Summer" mission~
You want to go in the ocean with me...? Hmm, I suppose I should accept your invitation and take a quick dip. But just a quick one, okay~?
Listen, everyone~! Playing by the beach is fun, but please keep safety in mind! If you begin to feel ill, come see me~!
Sigh, all that cannons and gunpowder can do is make is war even uglier...
In both love and war, one should be brave~ So, be brave, and if you need support, I shall be there!
Illustrious-class aircraft carrier – Victorious.
Stop loafing around! I promised the commission team that I'd use my planes to photograph the moment they entered the port!
I'm fed up~! I'll knock you out stone cold!
You know about me from the Battle of Trafalgar? Umm, aren't you thinking of somebody else? Please, Commander~ Who you're thinking of is totally unrelated to me.
My part in the pursuit of Bismarck and Operation Tungsten? I was just in the mood to help, I wasn't at all trying to earn any honours.
I'm not in such a great mood... Are you free, Commander? Great! Then let me dress you in something fabulous! Seeing beautiful things makes me feel better, you see!
I wonder what the future you will be like, Commander~ Of course, I already quite like the way you are right now. ...Goodness, you're blushing ear to ear. How utterly adorable you are~
To celebrate your victory, why not wear this olive wreath? I'm certain it'll suit you.
Oh dear, I've let my guard down.
The quiet sea, the cool sea breeze... Even in this moment, the birth of new, beautiful things blesses us.
Remaining dignified even in defeat: this is how one should lose a battle!
Handwritten letters are so much better than typed ones. Don't you think it's interesting how you can deduce the author's emotions based on their handwriting, Commander?

War is ugly. And this olive wreath is the symbol of peace and beauty.|Tirpitz, if you won't come out and have fun with me then I'll bomb your room again!|I don't like violence, but using it is often the quickest solution to many problems...
Only I have the privilege of being selfish. Don't even think about pushing missions onto me.
Fine, but just this one time! I won't help you with your missions a second time!
I'm Victorious, Illustrious-class aircraft carrier number two! From the Atlantic Ocean to the Indian Ocean, and even the Pacific... where the ocean breeze goes, I follow!
