Don't think too hard about it. Just follow my lead at your own pace. ...Come on, this is a day to celebrate, don't be so nervous~ From this day on, you'd better work hard to always please me!
O beautiful world, sing to me a song!
When you feel down, I also do. Come on, you have someone as beautiful as me beside you, so why not be happy?
Y-you just did "that," didn't you?! B-by "that," I mean...
I am the one called Victorious, Aircraft Carrier of the Royal Navy. Yes, sing my name as you herald the coming of the symbol of victory. As long as I am here, our endeavours shall be smooth!
Words are not needed to praise me! It's not people's words that touch the heart, it's their actions!
When my foes have been this thoroughly defeated... not even I, the symbol of victory, can truly be glad.
Since you messed up the day off I was so looking forward to, I'm going to have to punish you!
Do you need advice from the beautiful Victorious? Whether it's fashion tips or relationship trouble, you can ask me anything~!
Hum~ dee dum♪~ I'm all dressed up, and my hair is perfect! Commander, I'm ready to go! Don't keep me waiting on a holiday!
Phew, is the battle finally over? As I said, let's go out and have some fun!
Way! Too! Slow! Commander, what does your schedule look like today? Hurry up and finish so you can take me shopping!

Rest is for the sake of being able to work better! Therefore, set aside that work and come play with me~! |Tirpitz, come and play with me~ I won't do anything to you~! |Stay in tip-top condition so you can work hard and play hard! That's my motto~!
This outfit is surprisingly warm... Even in this kind of weather, I don't feel cold at all!
Hum~ dee dum♪~ I'm all dressed up, and my hair is perfect! Commander, I'm ready to go! Don't keep me waiting on a holiday!
Let's teach them a harsh lesson!

A few words of advice from me: Invitations should be sent early, the venue should be grandiose, the programme should be discussed with everyone, and your attire should be flamboyant — just like mine~♪
Are you preparing to hold an event for the port? Hehe, sounds like you could use my help. Don't worry, with someone as beautiful as me around, anything you do will surely be blessed with success!
As a celebration of victory, why not decorate your office with this red New Year poster? Isn't it about time for a change in atmosphere?
♪~ What should we start off with today?

Having trouble deciding? If I was in your position, I'd just circle everything, then figure out the specifics later.|Unicorn, what kind of outfit would you like for next time? I'll make it for you~|I'll have an eye out for you, so if you need me for anything, just call~
If you have any questions about your mission, you can always ask me. I'll be glad to give you my advice.
I shall guide you until the rewards are secure in your hands— so, why don't you hurry up and do that?
I added a slight twist to my outfit this time. Can you spot what it is~?
Y-you put your work down just to do something like this?!
Are you preparing to hold an event for the port? Hehe, sounds like you could use my help. Don't worry, with someone as beautiful as me around, anything you do will surely be blessed with success!
A beautiful victory — now this is elegance~ Hehe~♪
Wanna go swim together?
Wanna space out and stare at the clouds?
New Orleans-class heavy cruiser – Vincennes, hull number CA-44.
The commission fleet's back... Looks like spacing out time is over...
Commander?! How dangerous...
Quincy is always busy helping other people, so she never has time to space out with me...
Commander... you're sure nice to everyone...
You don't act the same towards everyone? Then how come whenever you look at me, your face is always so gentle... Why is that?

Now I like to observe your expressions instead of watching the clouds... Commander, your face when you're having fun, when you're worried, when you're in a pinch, or when you're surprised... they're all so interesting...
Welcome back, Commander. There are some interesting-looking clouds in the sky today...
I... I can still keep fighting! Probably...
Commander's sleeping face... cute...
Commander, we should run...
Looks like there's new mail... but it's too far away... Don't wanna go...

Because my sisters like to take care of everything for me, my primary responsibility is spacing out. |My sisters gave me way too many snacks... Commander, wanna help me out? |So bored... Commander, let's do something together... like spacing out...
Surely... it wouldn't hurt to skip a few of these missions...
Commander, why don't you let me take a nap as a reward instead...?
I'm Vincennes, New Orleans-class heavy cruiser number 7. I've been to lots of places and given it my all in many battles... The last one I remember was at Savo Island...
Even though being with my sisters is already a lot of fun, as long as you're with me, I feel like we'll have even more fun! So, let's continue getting along!
It's time to get serioush...!
Commander... can you guess what I'm thinking right now?
Woah?! Commander, what are you doing?!
I'm Vincennes of the New Orleans-class... Commander, don't you want to take me home?
What's the point... of getting stronger anyway?
V is for victory!
I like dreaming. There are no missions... or fighting... or sorrows...
Zzz... sho comfy... Huh? Commyander...?
Zzzzz... Zzzz...
Don't wanna get up...
In my dreams, everyone can play together happily... |Zzz... the donut monster... is gonna catch me... zzz... |Mr. Meowy got so big... zzz...
Astoria... don't shake me please... Zzz...
Zzz... Ahh... donut monster... not right there... Commander, save meee... zzz....
Zzz... sho comfy... Huh? Commyander...?
A photo op? Sure... Lemme make a pose~
Off to school we go~ Being punctual makes me a good girl~
Is the next class starting?

What did I learn in class? Dunno... the clouds outside looked really neat... |I saw a black cat on the way to school this morning... Wonder if it's some kind of omen? |Why isn't there some class just for spacing out...
Are you here to sit in, Commander?
Nyahh! Th-this is a violation of school rules!
Off to school we go~ Being punctual makes me a good girl~
Rest easy knowing I won't let you down, Commander!
Anything GB can help you with? I'm the oldest among my siblings and can do absolutely anything! Go on, let's hear it!
Alfredo Oriani-class destroyer – Vincenzo Gioberti.
The commission team has returned!
Sadly, there's no cure for your chronic hopelessness, Commander.
Hmm... I wonder how long it'll be before I become a fine lady like Veneto...
I was born in the historic port of Livorno, a dreamy city on the gorgeous Sardegnian west coast! You should visit it with me if you ever get the chance, Commander!
You only find my floundering endearing and cute because you make me flounder so much! ...Th-th-that said, I'm perfectly fine with being called c-cute...
If you and I had met under different circumstances, like as classmates... then maybe we'd be in a typical romantic relationship... J-just thinking out loud, that's all!
H-hey! I've grown out of headpats! They don't work on me, nuh-uh!
How about a victory hug for everyone? Would that make me seem more mature?
Oh no! Deploy smokescreens!
It's the start of a lively day! Keep at it, Commander! I-I'd better get ready for work too!
Dangit... You won't discourage me so easily!
Here, I brought your mail, Commander.

S-Simoom isn't around here, is she? Ahem! Not to imply I'm afraid of her, my question simply stems from a sincere desire for amity and courtliness.|Oh goodness! Seriously, could you not pull weird faces while I'm trying to work?|Commander, would you care for a delectable dessert? I personally recommend tiramisu!
Hm? New mission directives? But I'm not ready yet... Oh, they're not for me?
Mission completed. Now where's the rewards report?

I'm Vincenzo Gioberti, the second Alfredo Oriani-class destroyer. I stood shoulder-to-shoulder with valiant cruisers in many battles across– Huh? That's not quite right? Okay, my completion was a bit behind, but I was second to be launched among my siblings, so I do qualify as a bona fide big sister!

You want to... get engaged with me?! B-b-b-but I...! Calm down, GB! Don't get too excited, be cool and graceful like a big sister and respond with grazia! Okay, now... I say, Commander, would you be a darling and put the ring on my finger?
I'm going all-out!
Huh? I've not done anything weird, have I?
Whuah?! You're a real creep, Commander...
I am Vincenzo Gioberti of Sardegna! ...Eh, my name's hard to remember? ...Hmm, how about just "GB" then? That's a bit easier, right?
One step closer to blooming into a gorgeous signorina!
Hehe, easy as pizza pie! Err, I mean... Of course, just as expected! Nothing to get excited over!
You may drink to your heart's content today! Worry not, just put it on my tab! ...Huh? The drinks were free to begin with?
"To refuse a fair signorina's invitation would be most uncouth"... Hehe~ Now, Commander, would you like to partake in some refreshments? Rest assured, they're all non-alcoholic♪
I'm a signorina – I do of course understand if you're too busy for pleasantries, Commander. Having said that... You should at least tell me before you go out, all right?
A refill, if you would, Manjuu waiter! Likewise for the Commander's glass, please! Now let me just... Hup... Ugh, these bar stools are sure are tall...

This "for adults only" drink has gott my attention... Could I at least have a taste?|Commander, as this is an informal gathering, you are free to say whatever you please! I am a grown lady, and I can handle it!|We have some lovely tiramisu resting on the counter, Libeccio! Call over Maestrale and we'll all savor it together!
Fare un brindisi! Indeed, this is how a signorina raises a toast.
You'll never receive another party invitation from me again!
"To refuse a fair signorina's invitation would be most uncouth"... Hehe~ Now, Commander, would you like to partake in some refreshments? Rest assured, they're all non-alcoholic♪
Eternal Flagship Vittorio Veneto, sallying forth!
voiceline.oath: Now, let us proceed according to the commander's plans.

voiceline.line: This may be unbecoming fo me to say, but nevertheless... It would delight me if you would use one of our baths. It would let you fully appreciate the splendor of our Empire.
Vittorio Veneto-class battleship – Vittorio Veneto.
Were my tortellini to your tastes? I must make more to give to the returning commission team, you see.
voiceline.oath: Could you give this a taste? ...Oh dear, I might have used too much salt. I thought the commission team might prefer stronger seasoning.

voiceline.line: It seems I must reassess the Empire's future...
I never would've thought one day I'd sit down for teatime with Illustrious of all people. Fate is truly a strange thing, I suppose.
Strenuous efforts on everyone's part will be necessary to spread the Empire's splendor across the world. That includes you, of course, Commander. Heehee~
I see not only my Sardegnian friends, but all members of the fleet, beaming with joy. How you managed this feat, I don't know, but it fascinates me to no end.
I have gained many things in our time together – power, allies, and peace of mind. Please, Commander, I'm dying to know – what is it you desire from me in return? I can offer anything you seek...
I have lunch planned later with ladies from the Royal Navy. Are you interested in joining us, Commander?
voiceline.oath: I have dinner planned for later this evening. I hope you'll join me at the table, Commander.

voiceline.line: You hope to defeat me? With attacks this lackluster?
May I offer you some succulent tea and a biscuit before you start your work for the day?
voiceline.oath: Oh, I suppose it's time for work. Allow me just a moment to tidy things up.

voiceline.line: The enemy overpowering you by sheer force is the most easily acceptable reason for a defeat...
May I offer a bit of advice? Choose your friends carefully.
voiceline.oath: Is this letter from your friend? Ah. Heehee. I'm sure your friends are all lovely people.

voiceline.line: The power of a cannon cannot be gauged by its caliber alone. Any who underestimate my 15-inch battery will pay dearly for their misjudgment.|I joined this fleet for two reasons – to achieve world peace, of course, and to further the Empire's influence. The latter of which I would like your assistance with, Commander.|Allow me to be curt, Commander. If you had the power to crush your opposition, would you still choose the path of passive deterrence? Would you choose a fleet in being?
voiceline.extra: Self-care is important. When you're out on a sortie, don't you wish you could come back to a warm bath every day? ...Not exactly?|You and Littorio are similar in a certain way. Namely, your tendency to rely on me for help~|I'm able to use my abilities to their fullest thanks to all my reliable friends around me. Please, send me out on more missions, Commander.

voiceline.line: Allow me to give you a reminder, Commander. You are in your right to delegate missions to me, your secretary.
Heehee. I think I know what you're thinking, Commander. "These missions are a cakewalk."

Expectations of me were high already at my birth, when I inherited the flag following a horrific night. Ultimately, I failed to lead my loyal friends to victory... My past isn't all that bright, is it? But that is why I have high hopes in you, Commander.
Do you comprehend the significance of this vow? Our futures are henceforth interconnected. I would normally not have accepted your proposal so easily, but your sheer passion won me over. Heehee.
Witness the Empire's prowess!
Even I – the flagship of the Empire's fleet – enjoy leisure breaks from time to time. There will always come some downtime, no matter how tirelessly one works.
voiceline.oath: You really should take occasional breaks and empty your mind instead of working tirelessly all the time, Commander. You'll lead a fuller life if you do. Heehee~

voiceline.line: Let it be known that this sort of behavior is abjectly inappropriate, no matter your motive for it.
voiceline.oath: I do not condone this, but since you're so insistent... Ohoho.

voiceline.line: It's a pleasure to meet you, Commander. I am Vittorio Veneto, Eternal Flagship of the Sardegna Empire. Forgive me if I sound discourteous, but are you confident in your ability to command me?
A most wise decision, Commander.
Sardegna's hope, faith, and love shall be felt all across the world's seas, with our fleet as its emissaries.
voiceline.oath: Now they know the Empire's splendor, and the firmness of our resolves. And you made it possible, Commander.

voiceline.line: A shipgirl gazing out at the sea from atop a ship... It sounds almost like the setup for a joke! I'll have to tell Littorio about it later. Hehehe~
Nngh, haah... It's awfully sunny today... How long was I asleep, Commander? Oh, it's already lunchtime? In that case, I'll get started on some food. Would you like something as well?
Would you care to sunbathe with me? It's delightfully pleasant, I assure you.
Basking in the sunlight, feeling the sea breeze, and listening to the sound of the waves... Ahh, it's wonderful to have a relaxing day off.

Only when you take the time to recline can you truly take in the beauty of the vast, blue sea. One day, we will have finally reclaimed it in its entirety. Won't we, Commander?|Are you going fishing, Commander? I see, then if you don't mind, I will take my leave for a while. I'd like to finish building my sand Colosseum.|Please do come and spectate our beach volleyball game later in the evening, Commander. If luck is on our side, you may get to see us go up against the Royal Navy's team.
Littorio said I am terrible at photography and now she prohibits me from using the camera. Why, I've never heard something so rude before... Commander, would you ask her to let me take a picture?
Commander? I'm still awake, for your information.
Nngh, haah... It's awfully sunny today... How long was I asleep, Commander? Oh, it's already lunchtime? In that case, I'll get started on some food. Would you like something as well?
I'll do my best to offer air support!
In case of an emergency... Um, I mean, you can always rely on me, emergency or not!
voiceline.oath: My greatest contribution to this fleet isn't on the battlefield - but rather, through courage, companionship, and love! Heh heh, sounds pretty cool, doesn't it?

voiceline.line: Project 72-class aircraft carrier – Volga
The commission fleet has returned! I'll go take lunchboxes out to them~
A nice person doesn't cause trouble for their friends, got it?
You can't have an unhealthy lifestyle, okay? I know you're busy, but nothing is more important than your health.
Commander~ Want some vodka? Oh, you can't drink during work hours, huh... Well, just let me know when you're done here~♪
Hey, why don't you treat yourself to something nice today? Hmm, if I had to pick out a reward for my hardworking Commander... What do you think it'd be? Hehe~
So you want me to reward you with a headpat? Sure, I can do that~ Yes, yes, who's a good Commander? Now, come lie down over here~ You can fall right asleep if you want~♪
voiceline.oath: Commander, what would you like for din– Huh, it's already done? No way, I spent all day coming up with a special recipe... *nom*... Woah, delicious! Um, Commander, c-could I please have some more?

voiceline.line: W-wait, I'm supposed to be the big sister here, right? I, I'm sure of it!
Commander, thanks for your hard work~ Operation debriefing? Let's leave that for later and have some food with the others first?
voiceline.oath: Back from the operation already? *nom*... Mmhmm, sho, who'sh the MVP this time?

voiceline.line: The final victory... will be ours!
I'll do my best today as well~ Hehe, Commander, that goes for you and the other girls too. Let's all work hard together~♪
voiceline.oath: *Yawn*... Commander, did you sleep well? I was having a nice nap just now as well... Zzz...

voiceline.line: So this is defeat... But, the final victory will eventually be ours!
You've got a letter~ Wouldn't it be nice if your friends are inviting you to do something fun?

Arkhangelsk, can I bring vodka to the next tea party? Ehh, I can't? Aww...|Hum hum~♪ It's fun thinking about what I want for dinner while cleaning your office~ Oh right, Commander, do you have any recipes you'd like to share with me?|Heh heh~ I might not look it, but I sure pack a punch on the battlefield! ...Huh? The "might not look it" part is unnecessary?
voiceline.extra: Kiev said the lunch I made for her was funny-tasting... But how could that be? Ugh... Commander, what did you think?|Having a proper outlet for stress is a trick that'll go a long way, whether in work, leisure, or life itself... Well, assuming you want a long life, that is~|If you're heading out for battle, you can call on me! Heh heh, after all, I have a great reputation for being reliable, right?

voiceline.line: We've got new missions, huh? Try to pace yourself and not overdo it, Commander.
Owwie... I tripped while bringing the mission rewards over... Commander, would you mind lending me a hand? Ehehe, thank you very much~
voiceline.oath: Good, good, you sure did a great job out there~ I'll bring the rewards over to the depot... Huh? It's dangerous, so it's better to stick together...?

voiceline.line: I'm here, I'm here! My introduction, right? I'm Volga, Northern Parliament aircraft carrier. Named after our homeland's life-giving river, I'll do everything I can to support our friends, from sea or sky! Just make sure to be extra nice to me, Commander~♪
I'm here, Commander! What's wrong? ...Huh? Umm, this ring... It's for me? Really? W-won't the other girls be jealous though? ...Ehehe, this makes me so happy, it really does... *sniffles*
Now's the time to give it our all!
I'm coming~ Did you need something from me?
voiceline.oath: I'm here, Commander! What do you need~?

voiceline.line: If that's how you feel about me, then... Huh? It was an accident??
voiceline.oath: Ehehe, if you're really that into me, then what can I say~

voiceline.line: You don't look so good... Have you been eating properly lately? And how about your sleep? Hmm... Maybe it has something to do with emotional stress, or relationship problems? ...Oh. My name's Volga, Volga of the Northern Parliament. Oh my, did I really forget to introduce myself until now?
I'm a REAL aircraft carrier, after all~
Our march forward is unstoppable! We shall endure, no matter what, until the final victory is ours!
All right, I've got myself some conclusive evidence this time. Please loop around that way. After that... Oh, before I forget, take this in case you get hungry~
Volga here. I'm currently tracking an important witness. *gurgle* ...Is my stomach rumbling because this AR game requires so much stamina? Ugh, lost track of the witness just now...
Shh, I'm in the middle of a mission!
(*grumble*) You heard something just now? Uh... I'm sure it was just your imagination! Yeah, nothing at all!
Do I turn left or right at this next juncture... Oh, hey there, Commander! If you haven't eaten yet, take this– ...Uhh, oh! Right, I've got to focus!

Belorussiya told me that the bar there serves really good drinks... Oh, yeah, focus, focus!|The time it takes to get from here to the next stakeout point is... Commander, hold on tight!|Kirov should be lying in ambush on the other side... All right, this is where I show you what I'm made of!
Now we wait... Ugh, my cover's been blown... There goes the mission...
Ahhhn?! W-wait, now's not a very good time...
Volga here. I'm currently tracking an important witness. *gurgle* ...Is my stomach rumbling because this AR game requires so much stamina? Ugh, lost track of the witness just now...
We'll show you how amazing we are!
Comb it~ Make it slick~ *Giggle*~ I gotta take good care of my tail every day~
Hatsuharu-class destroyer number three – Wakaba.
I wanna roll around in the mission reward pile and make a resource angel... Oops, I just said that out loud...
Hehe~♪ That's the stuff~
Hatsuharu, you need to be more confident! I'm sure everything will be okay!
I'm so glad we became friends, Commander!
Umm, uhh, Commander, what kind of girls do you like...? I-I don't mean anything special by that... Nope, nothing special!
Whenever I sneak in a look at you, it always feels like you look back... I'm not just... imagining things... am I?
Great work ou... Hey, stop! Didn't I tell you to quit staring at my tail so much~?!
Commander, good mo... *Eek*?! Didn't I tell you to quit fluffing my tail?!
Oh nooo...
Hey, who wrote this? Maybe it's from...

Spring is the best season!|I heard that yesterday, you... *Giggle*, it's not like I love gossip or anything, okay? I've just got pretty big years, you know? That's all~|I bet you wanna fluff my tail, don't you, Commander?
A new mission has shown up, Commander!
Our battle isn't finished yet!

I'm Wakaba, third ship of the Hatsuharu-class~ Just like my big sisters, my name has a connection to spring~ That time Hatsushimo rammed into me? It was pretty awful because she's just so cute... Yep! Cute! I'll bring her along next time!
I'm so glad we're together, Commander... *Whimper*... I-I'm not crying! It's just that... I'm so happy that I can't hold my feelings back... I'll work even harder for you from now on!
Squeak, squeak, squeak!
Commander, you need to focus on your work.
You're gonna ruffle up my tail...
Howdy-ho! Good morning, Commander! I'm Wakaba, third ship of the Hatsuharu-class~! Huh? It's not morning? Look, don't fuss over all the details~!
*Giggle*~ That's the ticket~
Commander! How'd I do? How'd I do?!
Even if I'm busy giving out presents, I have to keep my tail in good condition~
Yaho~ Good morning, Commander! For a limited time only, Wakaba Claus will be delivering Christmas presents! Huh? My bag? Aaahhh! C-Commander, help me pick everything up!
Good morning, Commander! Mind helping me look for a missing Christmas present? I somehow ended up short one...

There's nothing wrong with winter. It just means that spring is right around the corner. Hehe~!|My ears are just as sharp on Christmas! Hehe, Commander, want to help me listen in on what everyone wants for their present? |Since I'm in a festive mood, I wouldn't mind letting you pet my tail~
Commander, you have to focus on your work. Just like I have to focus on delivering these presents—
Hey, don't use this as an excuse to rub my tail!
Yaho~ Good morning, Commander! For a limited time only, Wakaba Claus will be delivering Christmas presents! Huh? My bag? Aaahhh! C-Commander, help me pick everything up!
Sunshine is so good~ I love the sun! I wish I could sleep away the whole afternoon in the sunlight!
Hmmgh! Oh yeah... Ah, there you are, Commander! Care to join me? Come bask in the afternoon sunshine, it feels great!
*yawn*... What time is it? Wait, what?! Then I'm gonna be late for class!
Heheh! My tail's smooth as a baby's bottom today!

I've heard a bunch of neat rumors around school! You curious to hear some, Commander?|Hatsuharu's starting to make new friends! I bet she'll be a social butterfly in no time~|I wonder if any nuts have fallen from this tree... Come have a look with me, Commander!
Heheh! I can handle a ton of sunshine!
No! You'll make my tail all ruffly!
Hmmgh! Oh yeah... Ah, there you are, Commander! Care to join me? Come bask in the afternoon sunshine, it feels great!
I would never let the commander's enemies escape!
Don't be blinded by statistics. Victory depends on far more!
Queen Elizabeth-class battleship - Warspite, Hull Number 03!
Commissions? I suppose I do miss running around on errands... Let's go. We need to welcome back those hard workers!
Would you please not act like we're close...
Commander, want to hear about the history of the Royal Navy? Maybe I should tell you something about the generals who used to accompany me.
I'm not very elegant? I'm sorry that I'm not like Hood or the others... No... I'm not talking about my body...

How do I put this... I'm considered to be one of the older girls, yet my body is like this... It might be unbecoming of one my age to compete with the younger girls, but I wanted to at least be attractive to you… What is a lady meant to do…
Well, enough of that. I'm Warspite, the one who spites war. Hmph! However, whosoever tries to take the Commander away from me will first have to face my cannons!
Whew, not a bad fight. Let's rest for a while.
So this is how harsh the battlefield can be.
As long as I'm here, we can deal with any enemy, no matter how far they are.
My damage control isn't functioning?! I've lost control of my steering wheel as well! Why now, at such a critical moment?!
You've got mail, Commander!

Your orders are absolute, Commander. They shall be my highest priority.|This grand old lady can run faster without a skirt. Want to race with me?|If you make fun of me one more time, you'll be eating my 15 inch shells!
Accept your new mission and then get ready to head out, Commander!
Missions give out rewards once you complete them. Don't forget that!

Elizabeth-class fast battleship, Warspite, reporting in. I hold the record for the longest ranged hit on a moving target. I've come close to being defeated quite a few times, but I managed to cheat death every time. This must be my fate.
Finally the day has come! It looks like my efforts were not in vain... Let's go, Commander, I'm prepared for this. Officers, draw swords!
Belli dura despicio!
Body contact...? I don't hate it...
Just so you understand, I'm definitely not that sort of, erm...
Greetings, I'm Warspite. I hold the record for the longest ranged hit on a moving target. Surprised? I'm smaller than you thought? Looks like we need to have a long talk...
Battlefield, I'm coming for you.
Don't be confined by the so-called "limits". It is indeed possible to be unsinkable!
The wreath that goes on Her Majesty's door... Hmm, Belfast told me that the best way to make it is with seashells! Commander, let's head out to sea to collect some!
This year, I am in charge of delivering presents to the children of the Royal Navy. Let's get going once I finish decorating this Christmas tree!

Apologies, Commander, it seems like our Christmas together was a bit unromantic. You... enjoyed it just fine? Heh, you're always like this... Well, at least, let us enjoy the rest of the night together while the bells of the Holy Night toll.
Good. Since you are here, I can proceed to my next battleground - the important mission of delivering these gifts!
Even warriors need to rest. Since it's a holiday, you shouldn't be too uptight either.

Commander, do you want a present as well? If you really want one that badly, it's not like I can't give you one... |Hmm... what present should I pick out for Her Majesty? It can't be too expensive or too cheap, and it can't be too exotic or too ordinary. What exactly can I get her? |If I'm delivering Christmas presents, it's only natural to go through the chimney... Eh? Wouldn't that make me seem suspicious?
Commander, while you're out delegating missions, mind helping me deliver this present to one of the kids along the way?
Commander, come help me decorate this Christmas tree - I'm not tall enough to reach... W-wait, who gave you permission to pick me up?!
This year, I am in charge of delivering presents to the children of the Royal Navy. Let's get going once I finish decorating this Christmas tree!
I'm going to win, even in a skirt!
Don't let my name fool you. Warspite is ready to fight, whenever and wherever, even onstage.
We have the finest equipment. Now to turn in a performance worthy of Her Majesty's beauty... Behold, the Royal Stage!
The day's schedule is in your hands.
If I were just a little faster...!

I'm no idol... Yes, idols are nothing like me... Hm...|What do you think of this outfit? It was made with input from the Royal Knights. Should be different from the others'.|Her Majesty is certainly all in at the moment, but I'm worried she may suddenly lose interest...
A gig request...? Maybe you'd better give this to Illustrious...
Rewards. I never thought Cesare would be sending them.
Are you fixing my equipment?
Is it time to call the police?
We have the finest equipment. Now to turn in a performance worthy of Her Majesty's beauty... Behold, the Royal Stage!
(Did I take it too far...?)
Warspite, retrofitting complete. Mm, I rather like this feeling of being rejuvenated... Now, Commander, let us make our way towards new battlegrounds!
My range extends even farther. Commander, send me out to fight, won't you?

It is my duty as your secretary ship to counsel you, Commander. I won't hesitate to speak my mind if you make a poor decision.|Survival is the key to becoming a stronger person.|Battle is the fire that feeds one's growth. And so I fight with all that I have, in every conflict.
Commander, if you have something to say, just come out and say it. I'm happy to listen.
My important parts haven't grown at all...? Seems like someone wants to taste my high-angle mounts...
Warspite, retrofitting complete. Mm, I rather like this feeling of being rejuvenated... Now, Commander, let us make our way towards new battlegrounds!
Ok, let’s work out. (Snickers)
Hmm, you want to know how well I fight?
North Carolina class battleship— Washington, hull number BB-56.
Your memory can’t be worse than mine, right? The commission fleet has returned, won’t you go greet them?
You are too weak, it’s no fun playing with you, go practice some more.
What must I do to possess a good smile... think about the things I like? If so, I feel very happy even at the thought of winning against South Dakota... muahahaha...
No, no, that’s not right. If we do it this way, won’t it end much the same like in the past? … Don’t try so hard? You sometimes say stuff like that… Hmm? That was a good smile from me just now?
Lately, my smile has become more natural? Emm, huh (scratches head), I was recently trying to find a new hobby. While I was searching, I realized that being with you is not so bad… (whispers)

I couldn’t help but smile when I saw you, this is the first time that I’m feeling this way... although, I also have other feelings rushing towards me. I suddenly want to see your expression when you are bullied by me—— Commander, stay with me for a while. (Laughs)
I’m glad that you didn’t get hurt—— What?! I don’t have feelings for you!
I won't let go of victories to my enemies!
Welcome back... how does my smile look? (Forcibly smiles)
Oh, I will not forget you!
Hey, your mail.

My smile looks beautiful? You jerk... oops, keep smiling, keep smiling. Thank you for your compliments. | Hey, that rigid South Dakota is still the same. Commander, you see, I am cuter than her. | A true measurement of friendship is their actions and not their words, I don’t like people who are rhetorical in nature.
A new mission? Haha, now my blood is boiling.
Go grab the reward yourself, I’m not interested.

North Carolina class ship no. 2. I am Washington! The thing I like to do the most is to destroy my enemies. Recently, I am practicing on my smile. —— Battle record? I don’t really show off with such things, all in all, how’s my smile?
Wait wait! We’re doing “that”, right? Is this your new way of teasing me!... Damn, you bastard, I’m not sure if I should cry or laugh about this...
Out of my way. I'm ready to fight!
Don’t touch me as if you’re trying to be intimate with me.
...You wish to die? (Smiles)
Hello, Commander, I am Washington... my sister told me that I cannot be so rough once I join the fleet, so I am practicing my smile. Darn, why must I listen to her...
It feels so good to become stronger.
Sure enough, I am happiest when all the foes are annihilated~
We've got this in the bag, easily.
Huh. Guess I can't help but crack a smile after having some good grub and a bit of liquor... Meaning, I don't gotta practice smiling anymore!
Sup, Commander? ...Looking good? I don't think this outfit's anything special... You better not be trying to cozy up to me, or I'll knock your teeth out!
Crap, the commission team must be... Oh, you remembered? Full marks, Commander.

Heheh, so then South Dakota and I just... Hang on, I feel like I'm talking to myself here! C'mon, tell me a funny story or something! I've smiled like you asked me to, so keep up your end of the deal...
Back safe and sound. Thank goodness... Uh, no? I-I wasn't... talking about you...
Wipe that stupid grin off your face. I know exactly what you're thinking! I am NOT gonna dress up like my sister today!

W-welcome back, dear♪ ...Doesn't hit the same. How does North Carolina do it?|South Dakota's on the piano, huh. I ain't got her level of finesse, so don't go comparing me to her... Wish I could play like that.|Remember our deal, Commander – I'm coming along when you go around greeting people, got it?
We've got a new mission. It'll do nicely as an after-dinner workout.
You claimed the rewards yet? ...Oh please, like I give a damn about that!
Breaktime already? All right, take a load off.
What the–?! Are you drunk out of your mind?!
Sup, Commander? ...Looking good? I don't think this outfit's anything special... You better not be trying to cozy up to me, or I'll knock your teeth out!
Now this is something worth celebrating! Am I right?
Let me give you a taste of my Wasp battle style!
Limbs... cams... stabilisers... hmm? Commander, do you require something? I'm quite busy with the inspection, so do as you like~
Wasp class aircraft carrier- Wasp, hull number CV-7.
The commission fleet has returned, that’s good to hear. I also want to head out... Co-man-der~
If you don’t want to get shot by me, then just stay away...

I like natural but in actuality use a compound bow? Commander, you are stereotyping, this is called going with the times! And the use of a compound bow actually has a long history to it. You can listen to me tell you it all, in ancient times...

Someone saw a ghost on the roof last night? Hahaha, that was probably me practicing outdoors~ It’s very comfortable at night, no one bothers you, and you’re surrounded by stars. Commander, you want to come try?
Commander, let me teach you archery. At night, we can practice together. If you get tired, then we can stargaze. How does that sound?
Archery, combat techniques, and… that sea of stars night, this is all I have. Commander, are you willing to accept me as who I am?
Commander, what do you think, the outdoors is more comfortable, right?
Commander, remember to knock before you open the door next time. Otherwise, I can’t guarantee that I won’t accidentally shoot you...
Umm... it seems that today’s status is not very good...
Commander, did you get the letter I just shot to you from outside?

Commander, where are you looking at, I am above you. Hahaha, indoor climbing is quite interesting~ | It’s said that the archers of Sakura Empire is totally different from mine. So I really want to see it. | Commander, if there’s nothing I can help with then I’ll go out and exercise?
Commander, we have a new mission. You can give me an errand or a target. But please no paperwork~
Commander, come over here and take your rewards from the mission~ It’s too heavy for me to shoot it at you...

I am Wasp class carrier, Wasp~! The first thing I did was go on missions in the Atlantic, and I also supported the Royal Navy. Later on, when in the thick of things in the Pacific theater, I was sent to support my Yorktown sisters. But in the end, I didn’t help quite as much. After all, I was most afraid of torpedoes...
Is this your answer, Commander? … hehehe, I am so very happy! Then—— “I am willing to give everything to you, my dearest Commander”—— Wow, I’m so shy,  i-isn’t this awkward?
Who said a wasp can only sting once?
Zipper? Hehe, please don’t mind me. This is just more convenient for me to move around~
Commander, say the word, where do you NOT want to get shot at? I’ll try to avoid it~
Hmm? So you are the so-called Commander? Ok... if there is enough room in your fleet, then is it alright for me join you~
Oh, my physical strength has grown stronger, it's time to customize my bow.
Hehe, I am very good, right?
Keep calm and persevere. Victory will surely come to us.
Commander, are you free? Do you have time to help me practice with my planes?
Aircraft carrier – Weser.
The commissions team is back? We shouldn't leave them waiting there like that... Should I go ahead and greet them first?
Commander, I've got one word of advice for you. If your condition isn't great, make sure to take a break and sleep soundly. It won't do to have everyone else see you in bad shape.
The battlefield is a place where the unexpected occurs. If you simply insist on following the orders given to you by the higher-ups, you'll never be able to achieve victory.
Peter is quite brilliant, but she can also be quite dreary. I wish she'd loosen up about time and planning and all, and learn to just have fun sometimes.
I believe that the way we live isn't influenced by our environment, but rather the choices we've made. That's why I've always lived by my own tempo. What do you think about the way I live my life?
Have you matched your stride to my tempo, or have I matched mine to meet yours? Putting all that aside, you know, having you by my side makes me feel comfortable and relaxed. Hehe.
Being a commander truly takes a surprising amount of work... How about taking a quick breather right about now?
It's not yet time to panic.
Before you hurry off to do your work, why not first take a seat and enjoy a cup of coffee?
Ugh... I wonder if I'm still not used to my planes...
There's some mail for you. If it's nothing urgent, just read them later.

The Iron Blood doesn't have as many aircraft carriers as the other factions, so I can't help but worry that we'll be at a disadvantage during practice exercises.|The Unsinkable Battleship...? Oh, I know who you're talking about. I wonder if I'll ever be able to meet my renowned predecessor, Seydlitz, at some point?|Hipper, Eugen... I can't believe I'm able to fight by their side like this. It's all thanks to you, Commander.
New missions? There's no need to hurry. We can check them after you finish whatever you're doing right now.
Mission complete. Don't worry, it's not like the rewards will run off somewhere. You just need to make sure to collect them later.

Whether as the 4th ship of the Admiral Hipper class, Seydlitz, or as the escort carrier, Weser, I was never completed over the entirety of that war. ...Over here, I should have more than enough time to do everything I've always wanted to do. That way, I'll be able to bury my regrets, one by one.

This ceremony... Surely you didn't have to be in such a rush? It's not like I'll run off somewhere or forget our promises together. Or... is it that you don't have any faith in me? Hehe, I'm just messing with you. For the future everlasting, I'll be yours, Commander.
The time has come!
If you're tired, just set everything else aside and get some rest. I'll wake you up if somebody comes around.
Your spirited enthusiasm... You might want to change the way you convey it.
Heavy cruiser, Seydlitz... Rather, escort carrier Weser, has arrived. You're wondering why I have two names? Don't be in such a rush... I'll be sure to teach you later, slowly.
It looks like I'll get to use some more powerful equipment. Thanks, Commander.
Victory, just as I expected.
Sit down and relax. Have some rich tea, or read a nice book to ease off.

I've been waiting for you, Comander. As per my sister's recommendation, I've put on this Sakura Empire kimono. It was very tricky to get into, I might add... That aside, how do I look? ...Good enough, I hope?
Welcome back. Give me a moment to put in a bookmark.
Have you already decided what we'll do today? If not, take your time. The goddess of time is a patient one.

The Sakura Empire's New Year's banquet? I'd love to go, but... Eugen, can you promise you won't get drunk out of your mind again?|Cozy winter sunsets really make you drowsy... I just take a short nap... Zzz...|On New Year's Eve, you're meant to put work on hold, relax, and take in the start of a new year. You should do exactly that, Commander.
Oh, we're going to a Sakura Empire shrine for New Year's? Heheh. I'm looking forward to the memories we'll make today.
Okay, you've proven just how tenacious you are. Now, could you stop it already?

I've been waiting for you, Comander. As per my sister's recommendation, I've put on this Sakura Empire kimono. It was very tricky to get into, I might add... That aside, how do I look? ...Good enough, I hope?
This dress took just about forever to pick out. Judging from your reaction though, I can see that it wasn't time wasted, hehe.
Ah, I've kept you waiting. I do apologize that it took so long to get changed into this outfit. Now, Commander, won't you come show me your chivalry and escort me down these stairs?
How about doing something else for a change of pace? Just let me know if you want to spend some time together, whether it's inside the banquet hall or outside.
There's still plenty of time until the party ends. If there's anything you wanted to do with me, then go ahead, Commander.

Even though we've toasted over so many drinks already, I can't believe that you're still so lively. I might have underestimated you a bit, Commander.|As my lovely knight in shining armor, Commander, don't you think you should be asking your princess for a dance?|The girls of the Iron Blood are calling for me. Come greet them with me, Commander.
Are you getting bored? Want to head out to enjoy the breeze together?
That is not a chivalrous way to conduct yourself.
Ah, I've kept you waiting. I do apologize that it took so long to get changed into this outfit. Now, Commander, won't you come show me your chivalry and escort me down these stairs?
The humiliation I once suffered... I'll repay you double!
Do not doubt my combat performance, Commander.
Colorado class battleship— West Virginia, hull number BB-48.
The commission fleet is really efficient. I hope the Commander can learn a thing or two about efficiency.
Commander's laziness is almost beyond my bottom line.
I was once seriously injured, but then I was greatly enhanced during the process for my repairs…
I’m proud of my BIG SEVEN title. But aircraft carriers seem to be replacing us battleships in naval battles. I am losing myself in all this confusion: this strength that I possess... what is it for?

After joining your fleet, the answer to my question has been gradually answered... This power of mine is destined to protect everyone including you, Commander. My strength still has its value, even if I'm no longer the heroine of the battlefield.

Commander, you have become someone who can completely take charge on the battlefield. At last, my powers have found a worthy partner... What? A love confession? Don't you trick me to say that, you fool——
What a peaceful port, it reminds me of Hawaii before the war.
Getting hit by a torpedo... it feels bad.
You’re late... the exercise has already begun, hurry!
I don't want to recall the humiliation I suffered on that day...!
Could these be letters from my sisters?

The combat exercise didn’t go well… Is the Commander being lazy again? |I will never forget the humiliation I suffered on that day. |On the night of the Surigao Strait, I witnessed the last moments of the Sakura Empire fleet... They truly are a worthy opponent...
Carrying out missions is an important part of enhancing the strength of the fleet.
The mission was nicely executed, good one.

During a "Naval Holiday", my sisters and I were honored amongst the world's strongest battleships. We were granted the high-profile title of - BIG SEVEN. Although times are changing, the three of us still have the strength to fight any enemy fleet in a decisive battle, please don't forget that.
You’ve decided to perform a pledge ritual with me? Commander really made a bold decision... In that case, I will not let your expectation down. I'll guard you until the very end.
Have a taste of my 406mm guns!
This should be... a friendly gesture I suppose.
Commander, it seems you’re rather close to getting lectured by me.
It’s finally my time to show my strength... Under the guidance of fate, the third ship of Colorado class, West Virginia, reporting in.
It seems the Spokane Cup this year will still be mine.
Have you seen this? This is the inevitably tragic ending of those who dare challenge the BIG SEVEN.
Don't think you can go home just like this!
What do you want?
I'm White Heart, the guardian CPU of Lowee. Pleased to meet you. I'm gonna give you a taste of a CPU's power!
A commission team has returned. Why don't we welcome them back?
I don't want to see your sorry mug at all!
Oi, where are you looking, you bastard? You don't need to answer, I already know! ...You think I'm cute? Flattery isn't going to get you anywhere.
Even though you're an unreliable commander, I still have some expectations for you.
Yo, Commander! Next time, let's go out somewhere! By the way, you have no right to refuse.
Don't worry, I'll always be at your side. I'm not sure why but, I always feel like my chest is hot and overflowing with power.
That was a pretty good battle, wasn't it? Let's keep it up just like this.
You little shits are making me mad!
So damn slow... Ugh. How long are you gonna keep me waiting?
If you hold me back again... I'll end you.
Yo, the mail's here. Hurry up and take a look.
How long do I have to keep waiting here? My tech is gonna go obsolete at this rate.|Am I angry? ... It's just how I talk, don't worry about it.|Don't worry. I'll protect you.
Hurry up and take care of these missions.
Hell yeah! Rewards are here!
I'm the CPU of Lowee, White Heart. I have two little sisters. Although they are mischievous prankers and a handful to look after, they're still very cute. Next time, why don't we all play together?
This is... for me? Are you for real? I see... so you are. Understood, I'll accept your feelings. I'll become even stronger, so I can continue to be your shield!
I'm gonna beat you into tatters!
You'd better grit your teeth.
Ugh... I won't forgive you!
I'm White Heart, the guardian CPU of Lowee. Pleased to meet you. I'm gonna give you a taste of a CPU's power!
I'll become even stronger!
Did I hold back too much?
B-bastard! Where are you looking? I bet you're thinking I look like a kid! Eh....? They're just right? If Commander says something like that... I don't know how to react...
nil|nil|nil
All units, fire at will!
Relish in the power of a true heavy cruiser!

Wichita-class heavy cruiser – Wichita, Hull Number CA-45! 
Unlock build after receiving
Hm? Looks like a commission's been completed... Hmph, a few commissions are easy pickings for our mighty fleet.
Hmph, it seems I made the wrong decision... by relying on someone as useless as you...
My dream is to conquer the world! What happens after I've done that? Hmph, who cares about that!
You're curious about my whip? Well, I bought it on a whim long ago, but it's been surprisingly useful. Particularly when I'm pointing at a map.

Though it may be a little late, I really wanted to thank you for putting up with my selfishness and staying with me... Will you continue doing so? Hah! That's just that what I wanted to hear, Commander!

Listen, Commander. I was just joking about it at first, but if we join forces, we might just be able to conquer the entire ocean! Since what's mine is yours, there won't be any need to split everything equally, am I right?
Good work, Commander. You should rest as well.
How about unveiling what secret plan you have in store for me?
You've returned. You really kept me waiting. Get ready to depart.
Now this is interesting. Hmph, fall back!
I'm entrusting the mail to you.
Torpedoes? Far too weak!|Look! Our conquest extends to the ends of this blue sea!|There exists no problem that a shot from my huge cannons cannot resolve!
A new mission? Read it out loud for me.
You're giving ME a reward?!
I am the one and only fearless general of the seas, Lady Wichita! Even carriers would be crushed beneath my feet, if I wanted to end them myself. That's why, Commander, I'll be expecting much of you.

I see you as my best friend... No, I'm not planning on treating you as my best friend... Hold on, let me think for a moment. No, that doesn't mean I'm turning you down... Just give me some time to ready my heart for this...
This shot will be it for you!
What is it, want to have a go with me?
Are you trying to get a taste of my whip?
You're the commander? Very well. Starting today you will be my adviser. You will devote your time to helping me conquer the seas!
With this kind of power...!
Hah! These weaklings are no match for me!
You want to play, do you? Come here!
Mannerisms, etiquette, dress codes... Hmph. This is all more convoluted than naval battles, that's for sure. Still, I agreed to participate, so I mustn't act like a total simpleton.
It's about time you showed up, Commander. Now, show me some spirit! As my lieutenant, don't do anything slovenly that would incur the mockery of others! Very well, let's move out!
That level of workout is nothing you can't handle. Right, Commander?
What took you so long, Commander?

What are you looking at? You want a drink, huh? Why didn't you just say so right away?|Even the world's best warrior would succumb to exhaustion if they never stopped fighting. Everyone needs time off for recreation, you know? So enjoy yourself tonight.|Not going to lie, St. Louis's car looked really slick. I'm considering asking for the keys and taking it for a spin later.
Hey! You nearly put your hand on my shoulder there... Try to avoid doing that in public at the very least.
It's about time you showed up, Commander. Now, show me some spirit! As my lieutenant, don't do anything slovenly that would incur the mockery of others! Very well, let's move out!
Hah! Pathetic. Can't they send someone who'll put up a fight?
Darkness may unnerve people, but you need some well-placed lighting to truly frighten them. So, tell me, Commander: have any ideas for setting up a Halloween scene?
Tonight I am not a renowned naval general, I am a feared commander of witches! And you... Yes, you're not my lieutenant, you are my arcane familiar!
My fangs and ears look very realistic? Of course they do. I had them specially procured just for this holiday.
The curtain rises on All Hallows' Eve! Commander, we're leaving!

Ghosts? Goblins? Hah! On this night, they too are under my control! Hahahaha!|Trick-or-treaters? It's your job to deal with those. Wouldn't want to risk petrifying any children with my terrific costume.|Raising the brim of my witch hat to reveal my razor-sharp fangs – now that's what I'm talking about!
Come, familiar. Get up on the pumpkin and take in the Halloween spirit.
Desperate to once more taste the sting of my whip, are we?
Tonight I am not a renowned naval general, I am a feared commander of witches! And you... Yes, you're not my lieutenant, you are my arcane familiar!
Woo! Follow my lead!
Hehe~ You wanna play with me, Commander?
voiceline.oath: Heehee~ I love playing games with you, Commander~

voiceline.line: Shiratsuyu-class destroyer number eight – Yamakaze.
Commander! Our commission buddies brought back heaps of good stuff!
voiceline.oath: Commander! Our commission buddies brought back more goodies! I'll go give 'em a hand!

voiceline.line: Grrrrr! (Yamakaze is wary of you.)
When those mean Meowfficers gang up on me, I scare them off with a roar!
Commander, Commander! I wanna play with you! We could call over Umikaze and Kawakaze, too!
Could we please go to the zoo, Commander? I wanna listen to the cries seagulls, and bears, and dolphins!
You're always so nice to me, so I'm gonna be nice back! If any baddies show up, I'll send them scurrying back to mama! ...Huh? You'll protect ME instead? But... why?
voiceline.oath: Commander! I'm here to play another game! Hehehe~ Whatever we do together, it's always so much fun! Oh, here, Umikaze shared some snacks with me! You can have aaaall of them!

voiceline.line: Rooooar!
You're back? Here, the seat's all yours!
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander! Wanna sit? Heehee... You'll have to play with me first if you wanna take this spot!

voiceline.line: Owwieee...
Woooo! I'm pumped and ready to do some work!
voiceline.oath: My motivation tanks are at max! Gimme a "let's go," Commander!

voiceline.line: Bwaahh! Get me outta here!
I've got your mail right here, Commander!

If you don't play with me right now, I'm gonna roar at you! Fine... Rooooar!|Hey, Kawakaze! Have some fun for once and come play with me and Umikaze!|Being lazy is super lame, Commander! Come on, you've gotta work!
voiceline.oath: I'll promise to stop scaring you, but in exchange I wanna play with you more often!|nil|nil
voiceline.extra: Umikaze! I've got a bag full of breadcrumbs! Wanna go feed some seagulls?

voiceline.line: New missions have come in! Let me at 'em!
Mission complete! Do I get a share of the loot?
I was the flagship of DesDiv 24 during the war! Impressive, right? Oh, and don't get me confused for Arashi!
Woohooooo! I feel I could explode with how happy I am! Not literally, obviously~ Commander, I love you so much!
Onwards! Go! Go!
Do you wanna play knock-out boxing?
voiceline.oath: What are we gonna do this time? More knock-out boxing? Sumo wrestling?

voiceline.line: Argh! I'll turn you into red paste!
voiceline.oath: I caught youuuu~♪

voiceline.line: Roooaar! Shiratsuyu-class destroyer Yamakaze is here! ...So, um, I'm looking for this "Commander" person. Any idea where they might be? ...Oh! That's you, huh?
Woohoo!
We won! Hip, hip! Hooray!
I'm gonna surprise everyone with a jaw-dropping trick at the banquet venue! But first I need to come up with a total jaw-dropper... Hmm...
Voilà! Don't go anywhere, Commander! My magic show will start in just a sec! To start with, let's hear a roar! Roooaar!
Commander! Can I borrow your seat for a sec again? Just one second, I promise!
I'm prepped and ready for my big trick! Woo!
Presto! I've magically retrieved your mail!

White doves should be part of any good magician's act!|Watch closely! I'm now going to make this flower dis– What the?! Why'd it turn into a handkerchief?!|Heehee! This trick's definitely going to stun Umikaze and Kawakaze... Stop it, Commander! No peeking!
Come over here, Commander! I'm gonna show you my coin trick~
Woah! Stop trying to figure out my tricks!
Voilà! Don't go anywhere, Commander! My magic show will start in just a sec! To start with, let's hear a roar! Roooaar!
Everyone, go~! Waaah?! My guns fired on accident!
Milord, you smell really nice~
Second ship of the Fusou-class battleships, Yamashiro.
Milord, the girls have returned from commissions!
You're so boring, Milord. I don't want to play with you anymore.
Milord, come play with me! Ah... I forgot to bring stuff to play with... what should we do?
I love my sister, but she's a bit too quiet sometimes. Milord, I like spending time with you more because you'll play with me!
Your Majesty, do you know this mask? It's a fox mask used in Kagura. Hehe, I'm actually about to practice my Kagura dance now. Do you want to watch?

I know how hard my big sister works, so for her sake, I know that I should allow myself to be happy. That way, I can share my happiness with her. Now that you are here, Milord, I think I'll finally be able to do that. I feel so happy every time I see you!
Welcome back, Milord, I made you some tea... Woah! Watch out!
Milord, milord! What shall we do today?
Uu... Sister... where are you? *sobs*
Milord! Milord! Your mail is here!

Milord, Milord! Waah~! ...Thank you, milord. I have always tipped over easily, but I am used to it now.|Milord, do you want to jog with me? I want to become a little faster.|The vase in the hallway broke... It wasn't me, I swear! It just jumped off right as I walked past it...
Milord! New missions!
Milord, milord! I've brought the rewards... Oops!

Um... I'm big sister Fusou's little sister, Yamashiro! Neither of us have really had good fortune since we were born, but I've grown up well thanks to big sis! Please don't judge me by my looks... I was once the flagship of the Combined Fleet! Planes...? What are those? Can I eat them?
Milord? You're going to give this to me? ...Even though I am slow-footed and far from perfect? Milord, you are far too kind. I love you too.
Ammo storage looks good... Alright!
Milord... that tickles!
Woah! Watch out, Milord! I'm about to fire my main gun!
Woah! It's Milord! Milord in person! Um... I'm Yamahi-, Yamashiro! I am pleased to make your acquaintance.
I've gotten stronger... I think!
Milord, did you see that? Did you?
Milord, I heard that koi streamers can bring good fortune, so I brought some with me~
It’s just not summer without beach volleyball! Ah... Milord, you’re not playing? But I went through all this effort to pick out a swimsuit...
Milord is back! Ugh... it’s so hot! The fan is even blowing hot air!
Milord, Milord! Would you help me practice volleyball? It’d be too embarrassing if I let Cygnet beat me...

Hawawa! The volleyball is coming my yay! When I stand next to Shigure, I always seem to get hit by things...|Ugh... I still can’t light this fire. Stand back, Milord, I’m going to try using my cannons!|Fusou tied this bell to my tail so I don’t have to worry about getting bitten by fish when I’m napping at sea... She’s so nice!
Ah, Milord! I’m trying to find the best spot to watch fireworks! Want to join me?
Woah...! Milord, next time, say "hi" to me first! I almost rammed my main gun right into you!
It’s just not summer without beach volleyball! Ah... Milord, you’re not playing? But I went through all this effort to pick out a swimsuit...
Merry Christmas! Milord, milord, how do I look? Is my Christmas outfit pretty? Ehehe~ Big sis also praised me today!

I sprained my ankle on accident... Uuu... Milord, can you help me massage it? |Milord, milord, when it's New Years... will you come see my sister and me perform Kagura? |Woah... Milord, milord, it's a snowy Christmas!
Merry Christmas! I've already wrapped up a lot of presents! Milord, would you like to pick one out?
Milord... that's not the spot I sprained!
Merry Christmas! Milord, milord, how do I look? Is my Christmas outfit pretty? Ehehe~ Big sis also praised me today!
Banquets are a lot of fun! Next time, we should have a Sakura-style banquet and invite everyone from the other camps!
Fusou told me that I have to wear a Western-style dress to the banquet, so she got one for me! Milord, Milord, isn't this dress pretty?
Milord, Milord, you've done so much for me, so is there anything I can do for you...? Whatever you want, I-I'll do it!
Heheh~♪ Going to a banquet with Milord... Hawawa?! Milord, how long have you been standing there?

Milord, Milord, what's this? And this? There are so many things I haven't experienced before, my head's spinning! |Milord, are you sure you'd like to take someone like me to the banquet...? I won't make you look bad, right? |Shigure, don't do anything weird at the banquet. You'll bother the others!
Milord, Milord, I hear that there will be dancing at the banquet! Would it be okay for me to dance with you?
M-Milord! It's going to be troublesome if everyone sees us!
Fusou told me that I have to wear a Western-style dress to the banquet, so she got one for me! Milord, Milord, isn't this dress pretty?
Combat clerk, sortieing! Th-that's what I'm supposed to say, right?!
I asked Fusou to prepare this outfit for me! Ehehe, Fubuki and I are going to work hard together!
Milord, Milord, welcome to the store! Yamashiro is a sales clerk today! Mhm, I'll do my best!
Thank you for your patronage! Awawa... I forgot to give back the change! I, I'm so sorry...
Milord! Akashi told me to help her out by being a sales clerk today! What do you think about my outfit? Err, huh? It looks funny...?

Milord, we have new goodies! Want to take a look? ~☆ |Fubuki, why are you wearing that... I mean, it's cute, but... Maybe it's best not to think too much about it! Mhm! |Shigure, are you shopping with Yuudachi and the others today? Jeez, you should bring Nowaki with you once in a while...
Um, Milord, I can't give you a discount on that.
Milord, you also think this outfit is super cute, right?
Milord, Milord, welcome to the store! Yamashiro is a sales clerk today! Mhm, I'll do my best!
Ehehe... If I bottle up some of the fresh air here, everyone back at port will get to experience the atmosphere here as well!
Woah, even the air tastes totally different at this vacation spot! Milord, Milord, um, Akashi asked me to bottle up some of the air here for her! Want to give me a hand?
Milord, Milord, if you're tired, why not take a little break under that umbrella?
The beach here isn't quite like the one back at the port, but it's totally beautiful! Ehehe, I'm so glad I got to go on a vacation with you, Milord!

Look, Milord, someone's surfing over there!|How are we supposed to bring all these bottles back to port? ...Milord, I'm sure you'll think up an idea!|There are tons of fun places other than the beach? Mmhmm, I'll gladly accompany you, Milord!
Waah! ...I'm so sorry, Milord, I just swung a bottle at you, didn't I...?
Woah, even the air tastes totally different at this vacation spot! Milord, Milord, um, Akashi asked me to bottle up some of the air here for her! Want to give me a hand?
Milord, Milord, my friends from the other camps taught me all kinds of neat stuff! To thank them, I also taught them about some of our traditional games!
Uwaah! M-Milord?! I'm so, so sorry... You didn't get hurt, did you? Um... This is my school uniform. Fusou tailored it for me, hehe~ ... Awawa! I should head off to class now! See you later!
Good work, Milord! Let's go up to the roof to eat lunch together~
Milord, here's your bento~ I made it myself!

Milord, Milord! I want to start a Miko Club at school to help people better understand the work that Fusou and I do! Um, but right now, we still haven't recruited enough members... |Milord, I only learned this recently, but ship magazines are really complex... Um, I'll study harder, so that nothing bad will happen to mine again! School is so much fun! I wish Fusou could be here with us as well... But, um, wouldn't it make more sense for her to be a teacher?
It was so romantic when I bumped into Commander when I turned around the corner... Maybe next time, I'll wait there on purpose... Eek! Ah, um, you didn't hear anything!
Uwaah! M-Milord?! I'm so, so sorry... You didn't get hurt, did you? Um... This is my school uniform. Fusou tailored it for me, hehe~ ... Awawa! I should head off to class now! See you later!
Milord, how was my Kaguya dance? Fusou taught me this dance to help get rid of bad luck!
Milord, Milord, I've finished changing! What do you think? Do you like Yamashiro's new outfit?
Milord, I love you more than anything else! Being with you is so fun and joyous! I want to stay together with you forever and ever, Milord!
Milord, Milord, come rest here for a while! Yamashiro will give you a massage... hup!
Milord, welcome back... Wooooah! Ehehe... I've lost track of the number of times you've had to catch me~
Milord, let me help clean your ears! |Milord, when spring comes around, let's go view the cherry blossoms! |Milord, want to take a nap in Yamashiro's lap?
Milord, I want to touch you as well! *Rub rub~ pat pat~*!
Milord, you can get lovey-dovey with Yamashiro all you want! Mmhmm!
Milord, Milord, I've finished changing! What do you think? Do you like Yamashiro's new outfit?
Milord~ Was I able to be of use to you?
Milord! I can do anything now~ bombardment or aerial strikes! So, the thing is, you can totally count on me, much much more, Milord! Milord~!
Milord... Milord... please save me!

If I can be of use to you, Milord, I'll do anything...|Milord! Milord! I think I've gotten faster! Did you notice? Uu... I'll... try harder...|With my flying friends around, I won't need to light fires with my main cannons to cook anymore~!
Milord! Milord! Did you know? I used new bath salts last night~!
Ahh!! Milord, watch out! My seaplanes are going to run into you!!
Milord! I can do anything now~ bombardment or aerial strikes! So, the thing is, you can totally count on me, much much more, Milord! Milord~!
Show them the fruits of your training~ Hehehe~
You look bored, Milord. Was your training perhaps too easy?

Are you this fleet's Commander, Milord? I see. You have great potential, but your skills need some refinement. I wonder what's the best way to train you... You'll see soon enough – stay alert until then!
Taking on commissions is a form of training. Milord, please mix up your commission rosters so everyone gets a turn!
I know you can hear me, Milord. Come out of hiding and own up to your mistakes like a decent person!
Do you wish to strengthen your fleet, Milord? Then allow me to be of service! I know the way to draw out latent potential!
Why does at least one girl always call it quits partway through our training? And why do you always stick up for the quitters, Milord? The whole fleet will stagnate if people keep dropping out...

I'll admit, I've been too strict with those girls... No, no, please don't say that. I understand why you feel that way. Those girls can stop if they wish, but your training, Milord, will stay as rigorous as ever!

Astounding, Milord! You've seen through your most rigorous training yet! With someone like you, maybe my bad luck won't be such a... N-no, I didn't say anything! Anyway, the next session will be arduous – please give it your all!
Trai-ning♪ Trai-ning♪ Let me think about what I'm gonna drill into your head today~♪
Aww, just my luck...
I've sorted your documents and made you green tea. Strap in, Milord – it's going to be a long day!
What went wrong? Please don't tell me one of you wasn't even trying...
Milord, I suggest you read your new mail when you have the time.

You mustn't let your mind wander while on the clock, Milord. Also, I've brought new paperwork for you!|Life is awfully laid-back at this port... Your girls will never grow into fine soldiers in this environment!|Oh no! The vase! ...Phew! That was a close one... Through my training, I've developed the reflexes to react quickly to imminent mishaps like this!
New missions have come in. Knowing you, you'll breeze through them!
Oh, you've completed a mission? Then you should get yourself a cup of tea and enjoy a break!
I'm battleship Yamashiro, Fusou's sister. I've learned a lot through my training, and I'd happily impart that knowledge to you. Would you like to learn, Milord?

Is this... proof of your adoration, Milord? Oh, I feel truly blessed! Henceforth, please allow me to assist by taking on more and more work, or anything else you want done! I promise I'll be of great use!
Keep going, don't let up already!
Does anyone here wish to become stronger? Step forth and let me train you!
Milord... Fondling me without warning is a punitive deed. The punishment is quite severe, I'll say.

Are you this fleet's Commander, Milord? I see. You have great potential, but your skills need some refinement. I wonder what's the best way to train you... You'll see soon enough – stay alert until then!
I'm afraid this isn't nearly enough power. I need more...
With enough rigorous training, victory becomes almost a certainty. Isn't that right, Milord?
Ancestors... Yat Sen shall now do her part as well.
Is there anything else you would like to know about me, Commander?
Cruiser, Yat Sen.
The girls have already returned from commission. Aren't we going to greet them?
Commander... You don't seem to be the one I've been waiting for...
Commander... Could you be... *that* person?
I am overjoyed to be able to return to your side once more, Commander.
My past? Those... are stories for your ears only, Commander.
When I look at your face, I sometimes forget to breathe... What a strange sensation.
I am no longer the crybaby that I once was.
Ahh, home is such a warm place.
I have already witnessed true hell.
We meet again, Commander. Do not worry, I shall stay by your side as promised.
Give up? Why would I do that? I am not the same fragile Yat Sen as before.
The mail? It's on your desk, Commander.

Ning Hai's steamed buns? Mm... they still have the same nostalgic flavor.|Only by remembering the lessons of the past can we move towards a brighter future.|Sometimes, I miss those days when I used to train together with all my sisters...
New missions have been assigned! I have finished preparations and am awaiting your orders.
Mission rewards counted and ready for your review... me? No, there's nothing I want...
Yat Sen of the First Fleet of the Dragon Empery, reporting in. I heard that my sisters have already arrived. This time, I promise that I will not leave your side.
This... is the power of our bond? Every moment we are together is like a dream, one that I am afraid of waking up from. No... it is no matter. From now on, I shall always be by your side.
It ends now!
What's wrong? Please don't have any strange expectations of me.
To do such a thing to a woman... Surely Commander is prepared to suffer the consequences.
This is the moment I have long waited for... I am Yat Sen, from the First Fleet of the Dragon Empery. Please allow me to be at your service once more.
If only I was able to become this strong sooner, then perhaps...
As the wind blows anew, I can feel my presence once more.
As long as you're with me, there's nothing that Yat Sen cannot do.
Commander, thank you for waiting for me. Though I am unworthy of this honor, thank you so much...
Even if we are to be separated, our hearts will always beat as one. Do you feel the same way about me, my dear? Hehe~
Awaiting the return of a loved one... is a warm feeling.

For us to walk hand in hand until we become old... is my greatest wish. |I am now able to move forward without doubts... and it's all thanks to you, dear. |I never realized it before, but being by your side like this, watching Ping Hai and Ning Hai grow, and seeing the merriment of the other Dragon Empery children... makes me see that I am truly blessed.
Is something the matter, dear? Yat Sen is always there for you. Yes, no matter what.
P-Please don't be so hasty, dear... at least, wait until we get back to our room...
Commander, thank you for waiting for me. Though I am unworthy of this honor, thank you so much...
Purge all evil. Become as a stalwart blade.

Going by launch date, one could say that I am actually Chao Ho's older sister... But alas, since she wants that role so badly, she can have it. Besides, being the "little sister" comes with perks of its own. Hehe~♪
Chao Ho-class protected cruiser – Ying Swei.
The expedition fleet is back. Don't forget to reward all our hardworking friends.
...I have nothing to say to you.
Chao Ho should be doing her usual training just about now. Commander, why don't we go take a little field trip? Hehe~

Chao Ho has been complaining to you that I've been pushing my chores onto her, hasn't she? Don't listen to her. I've just been instructing my little sister, who has stubbornly been running away from her responsibilities, about the realities of being an adult. Hehe~
"Whenever I'm with the commander, I get all excited and can't figure out why... but, but..." Oh, ahem... I'd appreciate it if you could act like I was just talking to myself.

There are a lot of things I'd like to say to you, but whenever I'm in front of you, it's like the words just won't come out... I'm afraid I'll have to write my feelings out for you, so please don't laugh.
voiceline.oath: Though I no longer communicate with you through writing, I feel like we understand each other much better now. Please continue to share your feelings with me, be they amorous or anxious.

voiceline.line: If you mess up my hair, I'll have you style it for me for a week starting tomorrow, you hear?
voiceline.oath: I like the way you stroke my hair, ehehe~♡ ...Ah, no, I didn't say anything.

voiceline.line: I'm sure there are a lot of things you're dying to tell me. But that can wait until after you've rested up.
We will not, cannot, back down here...!
The ever-industrious commander, right on time today. Hey... have you seriously never thought about playing hooky?
voiceline.oath: We've got a lot of work to do today. Thanks in advance for your cooperation. ...Hehe, don't even think about slacking off~

voiceline.line: Do I not have enough power... to stop the enemy's advance?
You've got new mail... You know, stone-cold printed text doesn't have that same human touch as something handwritten.

Chao Ho, if you want to be seen as the big sister, you're going to have to do things yourself instead of relying on the commander. Heehee~♪|Reminder from Ying Swei~ You've had your head in the clouds for a while~|Are you interested in the Four Treasures of the Study? I'd be glad to instruct you. Hehe, not to boast, but I'm quite confident in my abilities.
voiceline.extra: Commander, in your times of need, please also call upon Chao Ho, not just me.|I've brought you a most sophisticated cup of lapsang souchong tea, hehe~

voiceline.line: Commander, we've got new missions. If Chao Ho was here, I'm sure she'd be nagging you to kingdom come. Hehe~
Mission complete. Now, if I could just enjoy a meal, soak in the bath, and then get into bed... that would be the life. Hehe~

I am the second ship of the Chao Ho-class protected cruisers, Ying Swei. I'm also Chao Ho's sister. By the way, if you see the two of us bickering, don't be alarmed. It's nothing more than our way of expressing affection for one another. Hehe~♪
Ink does not fade with the passage of time... I wrote my feelings down with the hope that they also may never fade. I now offer these words to you, along with myself.
We shall never fade away...!
If you're tired, you should go ahead and rest. Collapsing due to overwork is inefficient.
Wouldn't it be a great time for me to tell everyone how much of a pervert you are? If you want me to reconsider, you'll have to make me a little promise first. Hehe~
It is a pleasure to meet you, Commander. I am the elder of the Chao Ho sisters, Ying Swei. Hmm, Chao Ho said that she's the big sister? Hmm, I guess you're not as gullible as she is. Hehe~♪
Indeed. You must be strong if you wish to protect what is dear to you.
I'll wait until I get back before declaring victory.

Chao Ho thinks up the couplets, and I write them down. Don't you think we make a good team? Besides, seeing Chao Ho's brows furrow in thought is super cute... Anyway, let's think up some lines together later.
Happy New Year, Commander. I've come to deliver you blessings for this coming year... Next, you're going to ask for a red envelope, right? Hehe, just teasing~
In the warm spring breeze, snow melts and life blooms anew. Spring is the season of life.
The warmth of spring often lulls many into oversleeping... But, Commander, it seems like you're accustomed to waking up early?

Miss Yat Sen, I'll help you prepare the food for tonight's reunion dinner. What about the fish? I'll start it up if you'd like.|I never thought I'd be able to enjoy the company of my sister and all our friends like this... Yes, it's all thanks to you, Commander.|Fu Shun, if you throw any more firecrackers into the pond... I'll change your seat to be right next to that lotus~♪
Since it's the Spring Festival, how about taking a break?
The excitement of the festival seems to have gone to your head. Hehe~
Happy New Year, Commander. I've come to deliver you blessings for this coming year... Next, you're going to ask for a red envelope, right? Hehe, just teasing~
A~ job~ well~ done~♪ ...Hehe, did you like that?
Be careful. Try to stay close to me.
There is little I can do on my own. So, please, if I can assist in any way, don't be afraid to ask. I will help you.
Akizuki-class destroyer number ten – Yoizuki.
A commission has been completed. Splendid work.
I would prefer it if you'd stay away from me.
Hm? I seem cold and distant to you? I've heard that from Harutsuki before... Oh, bother...
I know that I can't always be by Harutsuki's side to help when she feels nervous. Yet, my body always acts on its own accord...
You don't require my help, yet you keep me waiting by your side... Why is that? I don't quite understand...
A "date"? What does that mean? ... It means we'll play together? Certainly, if that's what you wish. ... Why are you smiling? You're quite strange...
You must be tired. Should I prepare tea while you rest for a while, Commander?
You have returned, Commander. I have already sorted all your documents.
They tricked us... Everyone, retreat! I will watch your backs...!
Commander, I have left your mail here.

Why I help people? I feel I should; therefore I do it... Is that strange?|Some have mistaken me for a light cruiser... I wonder why... I don't look like one...|"Forcing myself"? Not at all. If I were, my help would only have the opposite effect.
We have received a mission. Is it something I may take care of?
I have brought the mission rewards. These should be all of them.
I am the Akizuki-class destroyer Yoizuki. I specialize in anti-air combat. If you ever have any problems, please tell me. I will solve them quickly for you.

This is how you've felt about me, Commander...? I've been slow to catch on, haven't I... But, do not worry, I pledge myself to you. I swear to always protect you, do exactly as you wish, and never again leave your side.
Critical hit!
Do you feel tired? Shall I give you a shoulder massage?
Commander, are you asking for a beating?
I'm honored to meet you, Commander. I have come to assist you. From now on, I can help you with your work whenever needed.
This feels rather nice.
We have everyone to thank for this victory.
