I received a good luck charm from Harutsuki... It's nice when someone offers you their blessings.
It's my turn? Hold on... Umm, could you please not stare at me like that? It's... making me feel uncomfortable.
Will you enter with me for the three-legged race? Don't worry, we're unbeatable as a pair.
All the entrants are strong candidates... I'll need to exert myself for the next event, too.
I registered for several sporting events. I must give it my all so I won't slow down my teammates...

Harutsuki, slow down and match your pace with mine... One, two! One two!|It's quite hot today, Commander. I brought a drink with me... I drank a little from it, but... would you like to have some?|Ugh... My hair is being annoying... Harutsuki's not here, either... Excuse me, Commander, could you give me a hand?
Commander, I'm completely soaked in sweat... You probably shouldn't touch me.
Are you taking advantage of me at a time like this? Are you mentally prepared for what comes next, Commander?
It's my turn? Hold on... Umm, could you please not stare at me like that? It's... making me feel uncomfortable.
The noise of the firecrackers is said to repel a monster called the "Nian." As for why this monster only appears during Lunar New Year's, I'm not quite sure...
Mmh... Happy New Year. I'm working on hooking my friends up with these firecrackers... The bun I'm eating? I received it as a thank-you for my efforts.
I'm aware that setting off firecrackers is an important Dragon Empery tradition. That said... This many firecrackers may be excessive.
Is there anything I can help you with, Commander? You seem busy as ever, even during the Lunar New Year, so...

Yat Sen's dim sum is wonderful. I'm particularly fond of this meat bun she made.|If lighting firecrackers sounds too frightening, would you like to light a firework instead?|Make a fai chun? Sorry, such things are beyond my means. You may wish to ask Hanazuki or Suzutsuki instead.
Don't worry, it's not very heavy. I'm capable of carrying it.
Perhaps the noise of the firecrackers can dispel your sinful thoughts too?
Mmh... Happy New Year. I'm working on hooking my friends up with these firecrackers... The bun I'm eating? I received it as a thank-you for my efforts.
Time to earn your paycheck, Commander.
You're free to regard me as a tool – a means to exert your power. Heehee. I don't mind.
voiceline.oath: Before you state your business, I'd like to ask a question. Are you here to speak with Yorck, the subordinate, or me, your wife in marriage?

voiceline.line: Roon-class armored cruiser – Yorck.
Those girls have returned from their commission. You commanded them wisely. Heehee.
Heehee. You may be a worthless, hopeless imbecile, but I still have use for you.
Kindly tell me if there's something you want me to do. Likewise, I'll suggest new things I can do as I come up with them.
There are certain things only you can do, so try not to become too dependent on me. Having said that... I wouldn't refuse if you offered to become my puppet.
You really have a charismatic aura that draws people in. It's why you're deserving of my loyalty... or should I say, my love. Heehee.

Isn't it high time you picked the location of our next date? You are the Commander, your job is to lead us shipgirls. Or would you rather I gave you a list of candidate locations, as per usual? ...W-well? Which will it be?
Welcome back. Next time you bring me on a sortie, please make it as good as the one just now was.
voiceline.oath: Tenacious and brave in the face of incoming attacks... I see. There's always so much to learn from your strategies.

voiceline.line: Seems like covering our rear is my only strong suit.
Excuse me for being so early, heehee. Now, show me that leadership of yours and make me happy.
voiceline.oath: Ah, you're right on time, as you said you would be. I do fancy a person true to their word. Heehee.

voiceline.line: How unfortunate... If only we had more backbone.
There's a letter for you. The most I can do is hand it to you, sadly. Heehee.

Spee, if it's friends you want, I can be yours. We'll have so much fun together. Heehee♪|That I serve someone is all that matters, not whom I serve. It could just as well be Emden as it could be you. Though admittedly, very few are able to command me.|You look strapped for work, which I'm quite happy about. The more things I do for you, the easier your job becomes. Isn't that the best arrangement one could want?
voiceline.extra: nil|nil|nil|You want me to call you something else? I'm fine with either "Commander" or "Leader." "Master" is on the table too, if that's your thing.

voiceline.line: It's of no concern to me if some missions sit and gather dust, but what's your plan for them, Commander?
Letting the mission rewards pile up to collect them all in one fell swoop once is more satisfying, don't you agree?
I'm Yorck, Iron Blood cruiser. While I've hardly a single feat to boast about, I have many strengths I can offer you. It's your choice whether or not to accept them, though♪

From planning the ceremony to sending out invitations, you left it all to me. Do I take that to mean you're ready to be mine? Say it, then. "I take Yorck to have and to hold from this day forward." Let me hear that resolve, that desire of yours♥
Hope you like being chopped to pieces. Heehee♪
Hmm? Are you trying to chat me up, or issue an order?
voiceline.oath: You're requesting my aid without even realizing it, aren't you? Heehee.

voiceline.line: Oh, I see... You want the same done to you, hmm♥
voiceline.oath: You know, I think I like it when you somewhat force yourself onto me. Heehee♥

voiceline.line: The name's Yorck – I'm a cruiser. As of today, I'm in your hands. State your orders, and I will make my goals and desires one and the same as your directives. A wonderful arrangement, no? Heehee.
Why, you... I must say, I'm pleasantly surprised. Heehee.
What will you do next? Keep advancing, or call it quits and pull back?
voiceline.oath: After all the faith you've put in me, this is the least I can do.

voiceline.line: There shall be left no trace of your existence.
Acting as though I control you is surprisingly enjoyable. Thank you for this one night of indulgence, Commander.
"Foolish, pitiable creature. Kneel before your Goddess!" Heehee! Hahahah, ahahahaha♥ You're the Commander, silly. You don't need to play along unless you want to.
Oh my. You've returned with a small navy's worth of glory. That's my Commander.
Your office chair pales in comparison to my throne. Don't you want to sit on it for yourself?

Let's put Deutschland to the test and see who compels the most people... No, I meant between her and you, Commander.|A vampire hunter, you say? I wonder whether Seydlitz could make it all the way here without your aid.|nil
Should it not be you who decides what to do, not me?
Oh. Oh my...
"Foolish, pitiable creature. Kneel before your Goddess!" Heehee! Hahahah, ahahahaha♥ You're the Commander, silly. You don't need to play along unless you want to.
You expected anything different? Victory is par for the course when you're a Goddess.
Submit to the power of the Force!
Feel free to admire the manifestation of my Force, though this is just the tip of the iceberg
York-class heavy cruiser - York, Hull Number 90!
The wheels of Fate spineths once more and we move yet closer to Elysium.
The attraction of my Force has diminished… Could that be because ultimately you were nothing more than a Faker…?
I can feel the Force guiding our paths. Care to try out this new potion for me?
… The attraction of our Friendship grows ever greater! Come, hold my hand, and let us commune!
This feeling.....Unmistakably, as long as you're by my side, I can unleash unlimited amounts of power. Is this the power born of our connected hearts, Love?
I cannot control the explosions in my heart…! Come, hold me tight and we shall join forces and defeat our foes… Eek!
It is necessary to rest after a battle. Come, have a drink and relax.
This is a trial of fate…!
Back from your training? Come, Fate is calling for us.
Guh.... This is the Nightmare of Suda Bay!
This... may be a communication from the Unknown.

This a special drink I've made, come, drink it and leave not even a drop!|The Force may be essential, but one mustn't drown in its power.|If battles are my destined Fortune then may they be even more fierce.
The Tribulation calls to us.
Tribulations are not solely a quest for strength, but also the rewards along with it. Don't forget.
The nameship of the York-class heavy cruisers? That is merely an alias... One day I will conquer the Nightmare of Suda Bay, and become the Master of fate itself.
The time of the Promise descends upon us. O, Commander, take my hand and let us mend this world!
Magic Gun - Armageddon!
The flow of the Force, can you feel it?
Bodily contact holds no significance at all to such a noble soul… Aahh!
If you were able to find me then you are also a user of the Force, no? I'm York, the the magic-wielding York-class heavy cruiser. Let us fight against Fortune together.
I can feel it, the Force courses through my body!
Be engulfed by darkness!

The figure that suddenly showed up inside empty classrooms turned out to just be Eldridge. The mysterious stack of books in the library was nothing more than a Misdirection left by the Occult Club. And, the legends of the Ace who cloned herself to lead every sports club to victory; well, she was actually that incredible... But the Mastermind still hasn't appeared. Has my Investigation been misguided?

The school has recently been consumed by a series of Mysteries... there must be some Mastermind lurking behind the scenes. Yes, another Tribulation awaits me! I shall part the veil and reveal all Truths!
Without delving further into the Zone, we will not be able to uncover the Truth. Luckily, with you here, I will be able to enter realms normally inaccessible to me!
Now then, let us begin today's Investigation! The Mastermind will fall into our trap sooner or later!

Eyepatch? Nay. This is a tool that is necessary to seal off a portion of my Force. |Difficult Words, annoying Formulae... Curses, will I be defeated by these things before I am able to reveal the Truth?! |Exeter struggles with her Tests on a daily basis, but that is for the best. The true Tribulations are mine alone to bear.
Until all Truths are revealed and the Mastermind's identity is brought to light, I cannot relent!
Eeek! Just now, could it be... There's no doubt about it. The Mastermind took over your body to issue me a Warning!

The school has recently been consumed by a series of Mysteries... there must be some Mastermind lurking behind the scenes. Yes, another Tribulation awaits me! I shall part the veil and reveal all Truths!
Jamaica, Z36... Through this arduous battle, I have met many companions who also see through the veil. Now, I am no longer alone in my Rebellion against Fate!
O Unfathomable King of the slumbering depths, hear the call of my Force and step into this world through the Azur Gate! ...Huh, Commander? Why did you show up?
Ohhhhh... The bastions of white sand were instantly reoriginated by the waves... such is the might of the Unfathomable Force!
You're back? Then let us continue. This time, the Unfathomable will respond to our summons!
The messenger has returned from the depths. Could it be a message from the Unfathomable?

So, the first summoning failed. Such are the tribulations exacted by the Unfathomable. But I shall not capitulate so easily!|What's the matter, Commander...? Ah, could it be... the Unfathomable has left a clue upon my body?! |Bloody hell, if not for the fact that my Force is nullified by the slumbering depths' domain, I could delve even deeper in the search for Truth!
Excellent, let us combine our Force and channel it into this magic circle.
Ahh! ...No, can it be, your mind has been corrupted by the Unfathomable?
O Unfathomable King of the slumbering depths, hear the call of my Force and step into this world through the Azur Gate! ...Huh, Commander? Why did you show up?
Shall we strengthen our oath? Then take this Soul String and connect it to my spirit! Excellent! Our bonds have grown even– Hm? What's the matter, Commander?
Whoa... Is this my Uniform for the ceremony known as the Oath of Purity? Hohoho... This must be fate. Join me, Commander, and we shall make the world right once more!
I'd presumed the ceremony would bring my Heart's explosions under control, but it instead only made them worse... Commander, you must hold me tight now, lest the Force swallow me whole! ...Oh, gosh!
There you are, my Soulmate! Please have a seat and drink from my special bonding potion!
Welcome back! I knew you were coming from the moment the Soul String began to fluctuate!
Ahh... I tumble into the Nightmare's maws...

The string that connects us is as strong as steel, Commander!|Is the Soul String on too tight? Then let me make just... Ahem! What you feel is simply the Pressure of our bond, exerted at the moment of connection!|If fate compels us to fight, then fight I will, with all my body and soul!
We've received new Commands from up above. Together, we shall carry them out!
We've accomplished another Command! Can you feel the surge of Force?
I feel your Essence of Love flowing into me!
Mgh...! Commander... I can't take much more Force... Eek!
Whoa... Is this my Uniform for the ceremony known as the Oath of Purity? Hohoho... This must be fate. Join me, Commander, and we shall make the world right once more!
If the Force means something, it means having the will to always fight! And I will fight until I've overcome my destiny!
This is no mere Upgrade, this is an Awakening! I will alter the course of fate itself!
I can hear the voice of Fate distinctly calling for me... Is this a new skill I've acquired...?!
For us to meet in this place, at this hour... There is no mistaking it; this is fate!

I can feel the Force's power coursing through my body!|I am a genius! I've perfected the Formula... Oh, Commander, good timing! I'd like you to taste this special concoction of mine!|Once I feared the Nightmare of Suda Bay... but now, I shall prove that I can overcome it!
Now, grasp my hand firmly! ... Could you feel my enhanced Force?
W-wait! Continue, and my Force will swallow you whole– Eek!
This is no mere Upgrade, this is an Awakening! I will alter the course of fate itself!
Let's search for the light!
It's alright if you don't remember me...
Yorktown-class aircraft carrier ー Yorktown, Hull Number CV-5!
What's wrong, little eagle? So, the commission team has returned? Commander, let us greet them.
So you truly will leave me one day...
I want to maintain the current superior-subordinate relationship, Commander... Don't mind me...
Commander, you're weird... Even though I don't want to experience more painful departures, you keep stepping into my heart...
Can I believe in you, Commander...? I mean, can I believe in myself this time...? I want... to try...
Yes. I believe in you, Commander, as well as myself and the present day... The light beyond the darkness... I think I've finally found it
You're not hurt... That's good
The light is still far away...
Greetings, Commander. If there's a problem, please leave it to me.
Please retreat first, Commander.
My eagle got the mail. Please read it carefully.

This eagle really likes being with me, but is it alright for me to feed it...?|Commander, please do not confuse 42 with 24, no matter what|If there's time, maybe you should spend it with my younger sisters... I'm fine on my own
Your new missions have been organized, Commander.
The mission rewards have been delivered. Please check them.

Lead ship of the Yorktown class aircraft carriers, Yorktown. 
Abandoned...? It wasn't their fault, but I do not have the courage to reach out for light from that darkness. Will you leave me, Commander? Or will you guide me by my hand...?

I had fallen into the darkness. It was you, Commander who gave me light and a helping hand which pulled me out of it. That's why this time, I, Yorktown, will give you my name. The name that shoulders the burden of liberty and peace...
For the sake of freedom...!
Commander, what happened?
Are you truly prepared to leave your mark on someone like me?
I am the lead ship of Yorktown class aircraft carriers, Yorktown. My name comes from the Siege of Yorktown... You know? In the Revolutionary War. Neutrality...? That's just a pre-war courtesy.
Thanks...
If victory can bring peace, then I...!
Uhhh, where am I?
Come to think of it, Enterprise did tell me not to drink the blue stuff like A MILLION TIMES. But like, what's the dig beal, Commander?
Hey, Commander, are you lost? How about a drink? ... Huh? Drunk? Me? Oh, Commander, you're such a card. This is just grape juice... isn't it?
You wanna sneak off to the harbor? Ugh, I TOLD you already, Commander, I'm *hic* not as think as you drunk I am!
I mean, it's only natural for a good couple to be a little clingy, right? After all I've been through, I'm WAY too shy to make the first move. So that means YOU have to do it. Got it?
I'm not letting you leave until YOU have a drink with me, Commander.
Urk. I feel... a little sick...
You're late, Commander. You know what THAT means. One penalty drink!
I, I have a feeling... like all the clout I had as a big sister is COMPLETELY GONE... after tonight...
You can't go off with someone else until you finish drinking with ME, Commander!

Enterprise is a good girl. So's Hornet. And Hammann. They all found their PLACE in this fleet. But me? The big sister? I'm HAPPY for them. And a teeeensy bit lonely.|You know, Commander, looking back, I have some regrets. Like if I knew you were THIS good? I'd've been more HONEST with myself.|Oh! Is that my cute little Hammann?! When did you get so BIG?! ...Oh, you're the Commander, aren't you? Have you seen Hammann?
Now now, Commander, I'll be mad at you if you ditch these assignments.
Here's to a mission accomplished! CHEERS!
Hey, Commander, you wanna hear some EMBARRASSING stories about Enterprise and Hornet? Oh, you'd rather hear mine? Hehe, THAT can be arranged.
OH! Commander, at least buy me a drink first!
Hey, Commander, are you lost? How about a drink? ... Huh? Drunk? Me? Oh, Commander, you're such a card. This is just grape juice... isn't it?
OOPSIE! What was that I just said in front of EVERYONE...?
For our ideals...!
The cathedral, the Holy Well, and... Commander, where's the next spot again?

Across seven steps, in a tower atop a hill, you'll find the king's resting place... Hehe. Will you come with me to Utopia, Commander? I'm joking, of course, but I am very glad we could make this journey together.
What's the matter, my friend? I see, the commission team has returned? I'll let Hornet know.
My true utopia... is the port that Enterprise and the others can call home. If there's ever a place that can bring me eternal peace... I'd think that it would be by your side, Commander.
Commander, how about taking a photo right here?
Freedom... will never be extinguished...!

What kind of souvenir do you think Hammann would like? ...A warding stone...?|George is quite knowledgeable isn't she? Quite befitting of a Royal Knight, I'd say. Commander, why don't you tell me a bit about this place too?|I quite like it here. All the places we visit have quite a unique atmosphere, whether in Iris Libre or in the Eagle Union... Hehe.
New mission notifications? Why don't you let Hood handle it?
The mission rewards have arrived. I'm excited to see what we got.
Am I... good enough for you?

Across seven steps, in a tower atop a hill, you'll find the king's resting place... Hehe. Will you come with me to Utopia, Commander? I'm joking, of course, but I am very glad we could make this journey together.
The purpose of my wings are to guide us towards peace––
If you're done saying your prayers, come at me!
Feast your eyes upon the heroic majesty of Yukikaze the Great!
Kagerou-class Destroyer no. 8 - Yukikaze
Woof! Are you sure that barking increases the likelihood of getting a better reward...?
You are not worthy of the luck of Yukikaze the Great~

Santa Claus? Are you dumb? There's no way something like that could... Huh? There's going to be coal in my stockings this year? W-wait! Let's discuss this! I'm sure there's some possibility that Santa is real!

You'd like to go to an amusement park with Yukikaze the Great? Hmph! There's no way that I'd do something so childish... Ahh! W-wait, let's talk this over! I'm sure there's some fun to be had at an amusement park!

You want to go out with me? Hmph! There's no way the elegant and beautiful Yukikaze would just accept the advances of any random person... W-wait!! Are you seriously going to leave before I have a chance to collect my thoughts?!

A wedding dress? So, have you finally started thinking about your eternity of servitude to Yukikaze the Great? Well, you have good taste... Huh? This is for someone else? W-wait... wait... please, I know I'm not perfect, but... Huh? A friend's wedding ceremony? You big jerk!!!
Eep! That scared me... Huh? None of your business!
You were only able to return safely because of my luck, so be thankful!
Hmph! Witness the true power of Yukikaze the Great!
You've finally returned! Now, get to work for Yukikaze the Great!
Hmph. I don't want anyone finding out that I lost, so I'm letting you go this time!
Here's your mail... Grrrr, even more popular than me...

Wa ha ha! Yukikaze the Great is invincible! |If you beg me like that, I have no choice but to lend you my aid! |Eheh~ Hmph. Yukikaze the Great is only giving you the time of day because she's in a good mood! |Look at that face of yours~ It's only because of me, Yukikaze the Great! |You thought I wouldn't come over? Hmph! Unlike you, Yukikaze the Great is mature and would never do something so childish!
How naïve, Commander! You still have tasks left to do!
Let's take a little peek... Wh-what am I doing? N-not peeking, of course... I just wanted to check the rewards in advance!

Listen up! I'm the noble, lucky, invincible, magni... magnici... the 8th ship of the Kagerou-class, Yukikaze the Great! What the heck... that word's so hard to pronounce... Ahem! Anyway, I shall be your lucky star from now on, so be grateful! Wa ha ha!
Since you asked so earnestly, Yukikaze the Great shall grant you a favor and allow you to carry her! Come on, what are you waiting for? It's a once in a lifetime opportunity!
I am Yukikaze the Great!
Phew... that was scary... Huh? I didn't say anything!
What are... you doing... nngh!? Go die!!
Hehehe~ As a reward for making it this far, the lucky Yukikaze the Great shall join you! You should feel honored!
So you've noticed Yukikaze's greatness? You have good eyes~
Losers should hurry up and scram! Wa ha ha!
You thought this was just a regular swing set, but behold! Torpedo tubes!
Even though this dress perfectly suits Yukikaze the Great, it makes it hard to play on the swings... Urgh... what should I do?!

Wa ha ha! My "universal-as-long-as-there-is-a-ceiling" swing set is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Want to give it a try? Too~ bad~! This seat is reserved only for the noble and elegant Yukikaze!
Commander, good timing! I shall allow you to help push my swing!

Ahh, I can feel Commander's longing gazes... but alas! This swing set is for Yukikaze the Great, and no one else! Wa ha ha! Am I not downright evil? |My gothic dress? Heheh~ You might think I've gotten tired of hearing it, but... I shall allow you to praise the beauty of Yukikaze the Great! Haha! |Swinging around too much shakes around your brain and makes you stupid...? And the only way to fix it is to stay in one spot and work? Really?! Um, I suppose... it can't be helped then...
Yes, yes! That's right, Commander, put your back into it! Wa ha haaaahh!! I'm flyingggg~!
Funyaaaagh! Th-that scared me half to death!! Dumb Commander, go die already!

Wa ha ha! My "universal-as-long-as-there-is-a-ceiling" swing set is finally complete! Commander, are you jealous? Want to give it a try? Too~ bad~! This seat is reserved only for the noble and elegant Yukikaze!
If you think Yukikaze the Great is simply here for fun and games, you'd be dead wrong!

Zzzz... Fwah! Did I doze off just now...?! ...It's probably because I had to stay up all night helping Mullany with her cooking... how the heck did such a simple recipe turn into that massive project?!

Wa ha ha~! Did your heart skip a beat from seeing the charming Yukikaze? Hmph... Well, looks like the Dragon Empery girls are setting off firecrackers... let's go join them! Here, make sure to hold on to my hand!
Heheh~ As long as the lucky Yukikaze is at your side, everything's going to be smooth sailing this year!

Is it snowing?! Hooray! Now I can play in the... A-ahem! Commander, why don't we go enjoy the scenery together? |That Chang Chun girl gave me some special-looking firecrackers. They look pretty neat, so can we set them off right now? Ehh?! I can't...? |Happy New Year! In the Dragon Empery, it doesn't count as a new year 'til this time rolls around! Of course Yukikaze the Wise would know that~♪
Hmm... Let's finish the work first, then play later.
Ehh?! Y-You're going to give me New Year's money?!

Wa ha ha~! Did your heart skip a beat from seeing the charming Yukikaze? Hmph... Well, looks like the Dragon Empery girls are setting off firecrackers... let's go join them! Here, make sure to hold on to my hand!
Commander, I want to rub against you every time I see you... Ehehe~ so comfy~♪
This outfit is sooo cute~ ehehe... Ack!! *cough* *cough*! Ahem! From now on, you are the faithful companion of Yukikaze the Great! As such, you will not be permitted to leave my side, understood?
A commission has been finished! Make haste to welcome the others back, then promptly return to my side!

Hey, hey! When are we going? ...Of course, the date I talked about before! Yukikaze the Great shall be responsible for having as much fun as possible, and the rest of the responsibilities shall be yours! You can take care of it, right? ...Mhm! Ehehe~ I love you~
There's mail for you! Wait... W-w-wait a second! Are you cheating on me?

As long as Yukikaze the Great is at your side, bad luck and whatnot shall be banished forever! |Spend as much time with Yukikaze the Great as you please! After all, you are the one who I have chosen! |For our next date, you shall take me to view the cherry blossoms~♪ (Ahh, I'm so glad I'll get to go on another date~ ehehe~)
Still have missions left? Fear not. Yukikaze the Great shall lend you her aid!
Behold all the mission rewards! Heh, roughly half of this bounty was due to the efforts of Yukikaze the Great!
Ehehe~ Commander, your rub-rub feels so nice~♪
The Great and M-Mature Yukikaze h-has long been accustomed to these kinds of things! Ah.... ahhn...
This outfit is sooo cute~ ehehe... Ack!! *cough* *cough*! Ahem! From now on, you are the faithful companion of Yukikaze the Great! As such, you will not be permitted to leave my side, understood?
Access Mode! ...Oops. Force of habit.
voiceline.oath: Enemy fleet incoming... Ready up, everyone!

voiceline.line: You want to get to know me? Just... ask about me and I'll answer, I guess.
voiceline.oath: Welcome back, Commander. You said you had something to ask me? Then let's sit down and talk.

voiceline.line: Hello, my name is Yume Minami. I've ended up in this world for whatever reason. I'll do my best to contribute to the fleet as a heavy cruiser.
Oh, looks like the commission team's come back.
Look, I... I'm sorry.
Enemies incoming, Commander? ...No, not at all? Then why'd you come to see me?
What is it this time? Hey, wait... That's one of my plushes. Thanks for bringing it to me, Commander.
Every place has its own rules and restrictions. Sometimes, though, you need to break the rules to do what's right... You know what I mean?
While I'm still getting used to living here, I wanna do anything I can to help... I'll keep fighting the good fight, even if I slip up along the way.
voiceline.oath: Hey, can you come see during break time? I want to really familiarize myself with this place, and I was hoping you could show me around...

voiceline.line: Hey, wait! ...Achoo!
Good to see you again, Commander. You should take a quick break before the battle.
I'm doing fine...!
Hello and good morning. What are we practicing today?
voiceline.oath: Surely the Commander isn't going to be late to work, right...

voiceline.line: Okay, this is so not good... We've gotta get out of here, guys!
There's a letter for you. I left it on your table. Try to read it as soon as you can.

I've heard the Sirens pose a great threat to your world. Seems there's no such thing as a world without conflict...|What's with these big baby chicks, Commander? ...You call them "manjuus"? Huh. I guess that kind of fits...|Hum-hum, hmm...♪ Wait, was I humming just now?
voiceline.extra: Hum-hum, hmm...♪ Oh, welcome back, Commander. Sheesh, that's a huge pile of paperwork you've got. Need a hand with those?|Hey, a ring-and-string puzzle... I'm not great at puzzles or anything, but I've solved one like this before.|I'm usually uncomfortable in places with lots of people, but with how friendly all the shipgirls here are, I think I'll slowly fit in...

voiceline.line: I think, uhh... we should try to wrap up these last few missions.
voiceline.oath: We still have missions to do. If I can help with them in any way, just let me know.

voiceline.line: Another mission completed, eh? Now excuse me, I'm taking a quick break.
voiceline.oath: Mission completed. Great job, Commander.

voiceline.line: I'm Yume Minami, freshman at Fujiyokidai High. In my home universe, I fought kaijus, and in this one, I sink hostile ships out on the open sea... Go figure. Anyway, I'll do everything I can as best as I can.
There'll no doubt be tons of struggles for me to deal with, but I'll tackle them with all I've got. I hope you'll stick with me throughout it all, Commander.
Something Beam!
Access Mode: Dyna Wing! ...Welp. I suppose my rigging only looks like it. Oh man, I'm going to be so late to the meetup...
Seriously...?
voiceline.oath: Umm, what are you trying to tell me...?

voiceline.line: Hello, my name is Yume Minami. I've ended up in this world for whatever reason. I'll do my best to contribute to the fleet as a heavy cruiser.
I won't fall behind.
Phew... I managed.
voiceline.oath: We were able to come together as one, right?

skins.name: A Dream Upon an Open Windowsill

voiceline.line: I wonder what these flowers are called... Do you know by any chance, Commander?
How lovely. From here, you can see across the entire port, as well as the shimmering ocean... Oh, Commander, here to enjoy the view with me?
Great job out there, Commander. I saw you return from up here.
What a bright morning... Here's hoping today will be a good day.

Everyone's playing outside... Maybe I should ask if I can join them. Would you introduce me, Commander?|Whoa, careful there. You might bump your head on the ceiling if you don't watch out.|The view from up here would make for a great photo... But with how bright it is, it might not look so good on camera.
I'm thinking it's time to get down... Could you give me a hand? Thanks a bunch.
C-could you not start feeling me up, please?! Ugh...
How lovely. From here, you can see across the entire port, as well as the shimmering ocean... Oh, Commander, here to enjoy the view with me?
I'd like to wait a bit more and see what the situation is like...
voiceline.oath: I can feel the power flowing through me...

voiceline.line: Sometimes, I feel like I'm not quite myself... That must be my other Self...
voiceline.oath: My Self is a very good girl. I'm sure that you'll be able to get along with her just as well as you do with me. Hehe~

voiceline.line: Nagara-class light cruiser number four – Yura.
The girls are back from commissions. If you require assistance, shall my Self accompany you?
I wonder if the fortune that foretold "calamity" was referring to you...
Commander, if there's nothing for me to do, I'll be heading to the shrine behind the mountain to help out.
You want to know more about my Self? Well, she's also a part of me... Mm, if I were to put it simply, she's kind of like my familiar.

Your fortune said that bad luck would follow you around, so I, along with Abukuma and the others, made a protective charm that will ward off evil. Please be careful, and always carry this around with you.
Whenever I think of you, I always worry that something bad might have happened to you. Please, stay with my Self's... no, my side. That way, I won't have to worry.
voiceline.oath: Just as my Self stays by my side and protects me, I would like to stay by your side and protect you. At your side, always... Hehehe~♪

voiceline.line: Would you like to touch my horns?
voiceline.oath: Heehee~

voiceline.line: It's good to see you, welcome back. I apologize, for I don't really know where to put these papers...
We should get back into formation.
Commander, um... good job making your way over here.
voiceline.oath: Commander, um... it's great to see you again!

voiceline.line: It might be better to withdraw first...
voiceline.oath: I must thank my Self for protecting us... Oh, is everyone safe?

voiceline.line: Shall my Self read it aloud for you?

Commander, if you're concerned that the tea is too hot... Um, should I blow on it for you?|Abukuma, I don't think that "only eating and sleeping" is a healthy lifestyle. I'm wrong about that? Well...|The destroyers are... well, they're always so full of energy and zipping about, that it's honestly a bit hard to keep pace with them...|Even when we can't see her, my Self is always by my side.|You want to know more about my Self? Do I think she has some kind of special connection with the meaning of my name...? I sometimes wonder myself.
voiceline.extra: Were you helping Kinu out with her training? Ehe... Would you mind if I came over to watch?|If you would ever like to see my Self, please let me know. I really love having conversations with her.|If you're ever worried that you're being possessed by something, do let me know. I'm fairly confident in my ability to exorcise spirits.|I pulled a lucky fortune while at the shrine earlier today. I'm sure something good is going to happen soon!

voiceline.line: Oh, Commander, I really think you shouldn't be neglecting these missions...
Oh, speaking of which... I haven't told you to receive the mission rewards yet... have I?

I am the Nagara-class light cruiser, Yura. In a certain great war, I was the flagship of the Fourth Torpedo Squadron for a short period of time. I might have taken my leave earlier than my sister ships in that war, but this time, I swear that my Self will remain until the bitter end.
Oh, to think that I'd be able to become your betrothed, Commander. ...Is this truly alright? Hehe, I'm so happy that I lost my composure... Thank you.
Safety first.
Did you need something from me?
voiceline.oath: Um... did you need something from me?

voiceline.line: I have no choice but to become your wife now, Commander. Hehe~
voiceline.oath: My, aren't you quite the prankster?

voiceline.line: Um... Would you happen to know where the Commander might be? My name is Yura, and I have just arrived here today. Are you the Commander? Um, do you have a signed note or certificate that corroborates that?
Oh, I feel something awakening inside me...
My Self played a big role as well. I'll have to thank her for her help.
voiceline.oath: You shouldn't underestimate my Self's power or the Commander's tactics.

voiceline.line: I'll seduce you, alright. Hehe.
When I'm wearing these clothes, I feel like I'm going to be exorcised... What do you think about them, Commander?
Uh... I think these clothes are a bit too much... Commander, I... don't look out of place in these, do I...?
The wings are slipping off... Is there a mirror somewhere...?
Commander, um... W-welcome...?

A succubus is a being that tempts people in their dreams... I-I'd never do anything like that!|Isuzu, it's me, Yura! I'm not a ghost, you don't need to be afraid of me!|I don't know if today is a day of celebration, but everyone seems to be more lively than usual. I wonder if the Commander will be all right dealing with them...|It seems that thou are doing well. Hehe. Commander, do you perhaps prefer my Self to me?
Oh, did you need something?
Maybe you were the real succubus all along. Hehe.
Uh... I think these clothes are a bit too much... Commander, I... don't look out of place in these, do I...?
Combat trial for new equipment... begin!
Be they canisters or weaponry, my developments in them are the latest!
Yuubari-class light cruiser – Yuubari.
A commission is done! Hmm, I wonder if they brought us gifts...
Master, could you just stay away from me?
Master, what's on your mind when you stare at me? Hohoho, I'm rather perceptive, I'll have you know!
I much prefer staying in the port than going on sorties. This is my home; by the blue seas, beneath the warm and dazzling sunlight... *Yawn*... Mmhh... Zzzz...
What girls are your type, Master? Someone like me? You know, my type is people like you, Master~
Do you want to nap with me, Master? Take this, it is my favorite pillow. Perhaps if you sleep on it, you will see me in your dreams. And if you do... Hehehe♪
Data collection complete. Now we shall use it to improve our gear.
Oww... No issue, as long as my equipment is fine...
With you by my side, Master, I have nothing to fear...!
Dear me! ... Once I'm done developing new gear, I won't lose like this again!
Hmm, this mail seems questionable... Master, I urge you to open it!
*Yawn*...|Melon bread? I'm extraordinarily curious as to how it tastes...|The Gatos are terrifying... Why are such frightening submarines named after a catshark?
You have incomplete missions... Hmm, it appears the results of my research will not be of any use...
Master, I believe it is time for a nap once you've finished your missions.

I am Yuubari, Sakura Empire Yuubari-class light cruiser. I was developed under the constraints of a naval treaty, but this conversely allowed me to utilize a great number of new technologies. I served as the flagship of a Destroyer Squadron in the Pacific War. Hmm... I will need many oxygen torpedoes if I am to research them...
I'm overjoyed♪ Starting today, every day when you wake up, the first thing you'll see in the morning is me~! Hehehe♪
Feel the power of my advanced weapons!
Your hand is so warm and gentle, Master~
Mmh... ugh... gah... stop, or I will bite!
I am light cruiser Yuubari. You say we've met before, Master? Hmm... b-but that's not possible... I don't have any sisters after all...
Hmm... It seems to be a bit too tight in here...
Surely by now, you've begun to understand the importance of developing new gear, Master?
Akashi is really enthusiastic about helping my research, but it feels like she has some ulterior motives...
I've finally finished developing my new equipment! Since we still have time, let's go and try it out in live combat right now, Master!
Hehe, looks like the data collection went well this time too.
Master, are you here to help me gather data today?
Hmm... Looks like I haven't upgraded my equipment enough...

Research always comes with failure... but with your support, Master, all these difficulties will pass! |Nnh... I'm a bit tired... Can I rest here for a while? |The way I am now, I won't be afraid even if I run into a Gato-class, probably...
Master, you have to remember to get some rest, all right?
Augh... I'm going to smack you!
I've finally finished developing my new equipment! Since we still have time, let's go and try it out in live combat right now, Master!
Master, have you realized the importance of having modernized equipment?
Awoo! I'm not gonna go easy on you all!
Woof? ... What?
Shiratsuyu-class destroyer number four -  Yuudachi.
Commander, a commission's been... A compliment's good enough, so stop patting my head!
Hmph! (Yuudachi ignored you.)
Got any food?!
"Grr! Who will I bite today?" How's that? Awfully violent, right? ... Good, now my sisters will stop telling me I'm like a dog outside of battle!
My sisters are still laughing at me and it's your fault! What are you gonna do to fix it? I won't let you off the hook with... *Giggle*... with just a... *Giggle*... headpat...

Commander, rub my belly… Huh? I've heard you should show your belly button when you're apologizing to someone... Next time I mess up I'll let you rub my belly, so don't get angry at me... Th-that tickles, ahahaha!
Commander, Commander, wanna eat something together?
I'll show you what the Nightmare of Solomon looks like!
Ugh, Commander... "Shake paws"?! Are you making fun of me?!
Damn it, I can't believe… I lost…
Hey, mail for you. Is it a challenge for me? I won't lose!

Commander, seriously, stop throwing that frisbee at me. I'm not a dog~!|*Sniff sniff* I smell meat! Where is it?! Tell me right now!|It's so boring when I don't get to fight... Commander, wanna have a go? Let's do it!
Another new mission? You adults sure are a pain...
Commander, Commander, hurry up and check the rewards to see if there are any snacks!
I'm Yuudachi! People call me the "Mad Dog of Solomon"! Heheh, I sound pretty strong, don't I? I'd never lose in a brawl! Hm? It's snack time? Commander, tell me where those snacks are!
Pro... mise? What's that? You mean from now you'll always pat my head, never get angry when I screw up, and let me eat tons of tasty food?! Hell yeah, I'm in!
Turn to junk floating in the Solomon Sea!
Grr... Stop treating me like a kid.
Grr… I'll stuff you into guns and send you off to space, you damn molester!
I'm Yuudachi, fourth ship of the Shiratsuyu-class. I'll tell you this right now: I'm pretty loud at night, so brace yourself.
Commander, take me out to the sea already. I really wanna test out my guns~
Missions involving breaking stuff are my specialty!
Snowball fights are my specialty as well!
It's cold? It doesn't feel cold at all to me!
Come out of your office, Commander! You'll become lazy if you huddle up next to the heater all day! Let's go out and play in the snow!
The hell you looking so sad for, Commander? C'mon, let's roll around in the snow together!

It's too warm in here, it's making me sleepy... Mmmh... Commander... meat... so yummy...|Woof! Focus fire on the commander! Victory shall be mine!|Gotta eat hotpot during winter, right? Hotpot? Let's make some hotpot!
Shiratsuyu, Shigure, let's have a snowball fight!
Come out of your office, Commander! You'll become lazy if you huddle up next to the heater all day! Let's go out and play in the snow!
Commander, look, these are my spoils of war! Ahh, I'm so glad that there's so much delicious meat to chow down on at the banquet!
Commander, look at me, look at me! What do you think of my new outfit? If you like it, wanna give it a feel?
Even though I had a ton of fun and ate a ton of yummy food tonight, nothing beats being at your side! Ehehe, Commander, play with me a bit more~
Awoooo! This skewer is so yummy! Nnh? Commander, want a bite? Here's a piece for you!
I heard there's gonna be a ton of meat at the banquet! I can't wait any longer!

Erm, where'd Shigure go... I bet she went off to have one of her dumb contests with Yukikaze again! |I heard there's also going to be a ball tonight. Commander, how do you dance? |Be careful not to get my clothes dirty? Mhm, I already know! I really like this outfit too, so I'll take good care of it!
Ehehe... Commander, are you taking me to get more delicious meat, or to have even more fun?
Commander! I'm gonna get super mad!
Commander, look at me, look at me! What do you think of my new outfit? If you like it, wanna give it a feel?
A letter to Santa? Hell yeah, I'll write one too! "One huge cut of steak, thanks"... Bam, perfect!
Christmas! The day Santa Claus drops by and leaves presents, right? Hell yeah, I'm pumped! Aren't you pumped too, Commander?
I saw you, Commander! You were stuffing the stockings with presents last night! Which can only mean... you're buddies with Santa Claus! Hehehe, I really love you, Commander!
Before we go to bed, we gotta hang our stockings by the fireplace! Man, I can't wait for tomorrow morning! Heheh!
Hop onto my sleigh and we'll go for a ride, Commander!

Check it out, this outfit's real easy to move in! Useful in a fight, too... Huh? No fighting? Dammit...|Commander! Squeeze! ...See, Agano told me something nice would happen if I cradled your head like this! So, this "nice thing," what is it?|Well... Since I pulled the sleigh last time, now it's your turn to do it, Commander!
Woof? Playtime? Playtime!
Christmas! The day Santa Claus drops by and leaves presents, right? Hell yeah, I'm pumped! Aren't you pumped too, Commander?
*Woof*! I won't let you lay a finger on the Commander!
I dunno why, but wearing this makes me feel like I'm always by your side!
Look, Commander! Isn't this kimono thing all, like, red and white and cool? I dig it! ... But what occasion is it for?
Commander, the commission team's back! ... Where's my headpat? C'mon, I want one!
I don't get complicated stuff, but I know that I love you, Commander! Anyone who dares to try messing with you will first have to argue with my cannons!
You shredded my cherished clothes... Now you've made me MAD!
Commander! Heheheh~! I knew it was you just from the way you smell!
Commander... It's impossible to fight while wearing this stuff...
Commander, here's your mail! Hope I didn't get the wrong letter...

Commander, you busy? If not, can we play? We can play whatever you want!|Oh yeah, I tried making some food for you the other day, but I ended up wrecking the kitchen...|When there's nobody to fight, just gazing at you keeps boredom away... Doesn't keep sleepiness away, though...
Commander! Did I do something praiseworthy?! Heheheh~! Pat me, c'mon!
Look, Commander! Isn't this kimono thing all, like, red and white and cool? I dig it! ... But what occasion is it for?
I'm gonna mess you up!
Shake? S-sure... Wait, the heck are you making me do?!
Woof...? Am I imagining it, or did you get shorter, Commander? Unless... it's me who's gotten bigger? Seriously?! Nobody told me retrofitting makes you taller!
Commission team just got back, Commander! ...Now, where's my headpat? Don't be stingy now!
Need a drink? No problem! Gonna go buy a slab of steak while I'm at it!
I'm starving here, man... Gimme a steak before we set out! C'mon!

Shigure's still keepin' her rivalry with Yukikaze going... What's the point messing with the same person all the time?|Oh yeah, it's snack time! What we having today, Commander? C'mon, tell me!|Just watching Nowaki and Laffey makes me wanna doze off... Aw, crap! Nuh-uh, not sleepy in the least!
Stop treating me like a kid already! Look how big I've grown!
Woof?!
Woof...? Am I imagining it, or did you get shorter, Commander? Unless... it's me who's gotten bigger? Seriously?! Nobody told me retrofitting makes you taller!
Victory's mine! Gimme a victory rub, Commander! I deserve a reward!
Everyone, follow the battle plan!
Umm... exactly what do I need to do, to be able to see my sister again?
voiceline.oath: I'm so glad we finally can be together, Ariake! All that time I spent worrying about when I'd be able to see you seems like a distant illusion now…

voiceline.line: Sixth ship of Hatsuharu class Destroyer— Yuugure
The commission is now complete! Lord Commander, would you like to try and build a new ship? Perhaps this time...
Lord Commander, regarding tomorrow’s task— yes, I wish to confirm it all at once...
Sister Hatsuharu treats me gently, as if I'm her real little sister... but...
Ahh, it’s the Lord Commander! Why do I have smoke covered all over me? I’m not sure, I was trying to make coke pancakes.
Ahh, it’s the Lord Commander! Eh, no it’s not. I didn’t mean to disappear like that... sorry, my mind simply wandered...
A cool breeze is blowing, the whispers of the wind chimes in the gallery. Feels like a return to summer times with my sister... but, only this time it’s the Lord Commander sitting beside me.
...Hmm? Is someone there? Sister, is that you? …Sorry, I was dreaming just now...
Lord Commander, you’ve worked hard today.
Hmm… I have to bother Akashi again...
Lord Commander, here is your tea, cake and the latest mail.

Rumor has it that we would be able to finish our mission before the pot of tea that we brew got cold? Eh, is this wine? | Even if there is only the slimmest of hope, as long as you persevere, one day you will make it a reality. | Is Hiyou coming? She has a mischievous look about her, I’m a little worried.
Let’s brew a pot of tea first before we start our mission.
It would be great if our rewards can be confirmed as soon as the mission is completed.

Second ship of Ariake class Destroyer, Yuugure. A lot of people thinks that my sister and I are Hatsuharu class, but they are mistaken. My sister and I participated in many battles in the South Pacific. We helped protect the 4th and 5th Carrier Divisions. We were greatly taken care of by Akashi. This time...I will stay by my sister’s side until the very end.
Lord Commander... before my sister arrives, can I count on you? I can? Thank you... I will take care of the Commander and spend my entire life with you.
For one day when we will eventually reunite...
Eh... yes, I’m listening.
Lord Commander, what are you doing!
Ariake class Destroyer Yuugure. I am open to your guidance, Lord Commander—— Hatsuharu? No, please do remember I'm Ariake class. This is something I won't back down from!
If only I could’ve been a little faster, perhaps Hiei sister...
...Victory? If only my sister is able to see it...
voiceline.oath: Ariake, did you see that?

voiceline.line: Commander, Belfast taught me a lot about being a maid! ... But if Ariake saw me now, she'd probably be... shocked.
"I, Yuugure the maid, shall dedicate myself to Ariake, my sister, and you, Commander!"... Eek?! M-my skirt...!
I baked a Royal Navy-style cake! I'm certain this time it'll be a hit!
A maid's job is to provide service and relieve people. ... Commander, do you find my service to be relieving?
Welcome back. I was going to hide my tail and ears, but Shoukaku told me I look cuter this way... B-but saying "meow, meow~" is too embarrassing for me...
Welcome back, Commander. I've left your juice over here. As for the resources... I'm still sorting them... I'm sorry...
I asked Maya to take a picture of me and send it to Ariake, and she did!

Edinburgh taught me a lot as well... She seemed to make a number of mistakes, but I still appreciate her kindness!|nil|As soon as Mikasa saw me, she yelled "Scandalous! Taisho-era servitors would never wear skirts this frilly!"... Even though I wasn't born in the Taisho-era...
Phew... I'm done sorting the resources... Now for the next task...
... Commander, please don't do such things to me!
"I, Yuugure the maid, shall dedicate myself to Ariake, my sister, and you, Commander!"... Eek?! M-my skirt...!
"T-this glorious victory i-is in my Master's name!" ... *Whimper*... I can't deliver lines like these...
The Dragon Empery's New Year celebrations and new outfits are sure to lift everyone's spirits~ My sister will probably love this new dress as well. What do you think, Commander?
My New Year's wish, huh? Um... if I had to say, it'd probably be to celebrate even more New Years with Commander and my sister...
Welcome back, Commander. I'm about to go wish my sister a happy new year, as is customary in the Dragon Empery... Would you like to come with me?
I'll leave the mail that just arrived over here. I wonder if my sister sent me a greeting card?

Do they eat New Year's rice cake in the Dragon Empery as well? Perhaps they just eat whatever they feel like eating. |A red envelope from you? Please don't forget to give one to my sister as well. |Commander, our dreams will come true this year... right? N-no, I'm sure they will!
I have to tell my sister about all the customs I learned from the Dragon Empery!
The Dragon Empery's New Year celebrations and new outfits are sure to lift everyone's spirits~ My sister will probably love this new dress as well. What do you think, Commander?
When a girl wears a different outfit, your impression of her changes, doesn't it? I hope they can make a different outfit for Ariake, too...
I finished changing, Commander. This dress is very pretty, but... isn't it missing something up top?
Commander, thank you for keeping me company until the party... C-could you take my hand and join me for a dance, like you would with an adult...?
What's the matter...? "Am I nervous"? I-I'm fine... I think... It's just a bit embarrassing to show myself wearing these clothes to others...
Excellent work. I know the party is about to begin, but it's okay to rest a little... and have a snack before we head out.
I've heard parties are "a world of fun for adults." C-Commander, could you accompany me to this "world of fun for adults"...?

It's beautiful when flower petals flicker in the wind, but also a little sad, in a way... Do you know what I mean, Commander?|I-I'm fine with just juice! ... Ah, thank you!|I feel like maybe I should bring back some sweets for Ariake... Huh? Am I not allowed to...?
Once I've grown a little more, I'll be able to keep my composure even in places like these.
I finished changing, Commander. This dress is very pretty, but... isn't it missing something up top?
I hope Ariake will like this Daruma doll...
Woah... These stalls have all sorts of amazing things~ Commander, will you help me pick a gift out for Ariake? Hm, let's see... How about this Daruma doll?
Commander, want to try on this fox mask? ...Yes, it looks great on you~
Commander, if we don't hurry up, everything will be sold out.

This looks pretty interesting, but so does this... Ah, but, which do you think is better, Commander?|Huh? Ariake? I'm currently looking after Shiratsuyu. After all, someone has to keep an eye on her, right?|A lucky bag lottery draw, huh? I wonder if Shigure is going to try her hand...
Eh, my tail...? I, I'll be careful!
Commander, everyone's looking at us!
Woah... These stalls have all sorts of amazing things~ Commander, will you help me pick a gift out for Ariake? Hm, let's see... How about this Daruma doll?
Here you go, Commander. Um, your tea! It's Ariake's favorite kind, but I do not know if it will be to your liking or not...
Ariake-class destroyer, Yuugure, has completed retrofitting. Ehehe, from now on... Ariake and I will be in your care once more, Commander.
A commission has been completed. Commander, please make sure to stockpile our resources for construction.
The gentle sea breeze, the warm sunlight, and the sound of waves upon the beach... Every day here at port is filled with happiness, because I can be together with both you and Ariake...
Welcome back, Commander. I'm preparing tea for Ariake, so please wait a moment for me to bring you yours.

I feel like I've gotten a little taller after my retrofit... and it makes Ariake seem shorter in comparison... Ugh...|(whispers) Hatsushimo, you'll trouble Commander if you do that! ...I-I wasn't saying anything!|Wakaba, Commander, I have some walnut daifuku for you. Um, huh...? You don't need the wrapping...?
Ariake-class destroyer, Yuugure, has completed retrofitting. Ehehe, from now on... Ariake and I will be in your care once more, Commander.
Hiei, this time... I swear...!
Ariake, Commander, I did it! Mhm... I really won!
Ride the wind and break the waves! Feuer!
Fast and strong, that's me!
Type 1934-class destroyer, Z1 Leberecht Maass.
A commission has been completed. Straighten up, you have to greet the hardworking girls with your best smile.
How disappointing, Commander. You’re no fun at all.
What’s up, Commander? Are you enjoying your everyday life with me? I sure am.
Life is short, Commander, and I want to live life on the edge. If you are going to be my partner, you have to keep up. Now, let’s see that smile!
Even if the world was coming to an end, I have nothing to fear. As long as you are at my side, I can continue to laugh.
Now that I think about it, the apocalypse is often associated with wild romances, or couples who cling to each other until the bitter end. Commander, why don’t we become as Adam and Eve?
Nice expression you've got there. Wasn't that battle simply exhilarating?
What are you all afraid of?
Come, let us brawl!
Not bad, fellas...
Hey, you have new mail. Don’t drop it!
Let's see who can do this paperwork faster~!|My full name is Leberecht Maass, but you can call me Z1.|Do your best, Commander. I'll always be by your side~!
We have a new mission. How about we take it on together?
Our teamwork is unbeatable! Let’s go check out those mission rewards.

I’m not like the other so-called "big sisters." I am Z1, the eldest of all Iron Blood destroyers, and bear countless resposibilities upon my shoulders. Rest assured, Commander, because the invincible Z1 is at your side.
Once you are with someone, you can no longer only think to take care of yourself. Though I can no longer cry or laugh to my heart’s desire, I do not regret becoming yours at all, Commander.
Follow me to glory!
Don’t be so wishy-washy if you’re greeting someone.
You want some "hard love," is that it?
Rejoice, Commander! Allow me, Z1, to handle all your problems from now on!
Hah, this feels pretty good!
Hah hah hah! The great Z1 is unrivaled!
Bringing weapons to school is merely for self-defense purposes. There are always some bold fool who wishes to taunt Z1-sama!
Because she’s the Z1, her results will of course be NO.1! Hehe, no matter where she goes, Z1-sama will always be the best!

The homework was finished in a flash, hehe, naturally for my Z1-sama! |I did not break classroom rules! It’s just that the teacher is too boring, I recommend to everyone that I should teach the class, then... |Hehehe, stuff written on books may not always be correct!
Naturally, only the Commander can be called my most desirable partner!
People say when your head is pointed by a gun, your brain starts spinning. Commander, care to have a try?
Because she’s the Z1, her results will of course be NO.1! Hehe, no matter where she goes, Z1-sama will always be the best!
Heheh~ The mighty Z1 can get even stronger and faster!
Hmm... So this is a retrofit, huh? Not bad! Rejoice once more, Commander, for no task or enemy is too daunting for the new and improved Z1!
You're finally here! Come on, I want to start brawling already!

Even my work productivity has doubled! Commander, can you even keep up with me~? |Viersechs, if you want a name, let me choose a great one for you: "Iron Blood Warrior Princess, Ritter der Walküre!" ...H-huh? You don't like it?! |Commander, do you feel like you can't get anything done without me? Ahahaha~!
Commander, I can't have you being this listless! Allow the great Z1 to pump you up!
Hmm... So this is a retrofit, huh? Not bad! Rejoice once more, Commander, for no task or enemy is too daunting for the new and improved Z1!
I'm rooting for you, everyone!
Okay, Commander! Let's see aaaa... SMILE!
Type 1936 destroyer – Z18, Hans Lüdemann.
The commission team's done~ Shouldn't you go greet them?
It doesn't look like my smile will reach your heart, Commander...
People feel sad and anxious when they lose, right? That's why I'll be there to cheer them up!
A smile is always good, but when cruelty makes someone smile... it's kind of creepy...
Has my smile reached your heart, Commander? My smile belongs to everyone, but I can smile a little more just for you~
Your smile has reached MY heart, Commander! It makes me feel so warm and happy!
Nice work~! Replenish your energy with these snacks and my smile~
This might not be so good...
Welcome back, Commander~ Have you smiled yet today?
I'll always smile, even when defeated~!
Commander, mail for you~ But first, give me a smile~

Everyone from Iron Blood are either obsessed with war or say a bunch of stuff that doesn't make sense... and my mission is to make them all smile!|I prescribe a smile to anyone who's feeling afraid~|I believe that, deep down, there's a smile in everyone's hearts! Anyone can smile once they know that!
Commander, there's a new mission! Let's get to it~!
Way to go, Commander! We got so many rewards from that~
I'm the second Type 1936 destroyer, Z18~! You can call me Hans, although it sounds a little boyish... Hm? I'm really different from other Iron Blood girls? Heheh, a smile makes all the difference~
There's no higher praise for my smile than this~ Ehehe, just like always, I will smile for everyone in the fleet, and for you too, Commander!
My smile will reach even the enemy!
Do you need anything from me?
You can't do whatever you want just because I'm smiling! Hmph!
Nice to meet you, I'm Z18! I'm the girl whose smile will reach everyone's hearts~
Now my smile can reach the hearts of more people!
Gimme a smile, everyone~
All ships, at the ready! Aim for the enemy fleet ahead! Feuer!
Any inquiries, Commander?
Type 1936-class destroyer, Z19 Hermann Künne.
Is it finally time for you to play with me?
Zero points for you, Commander!
No matter what skill you have, I'm sure there's a place for it.
Commander, if I get MVP in the next battle, would you take me to a water park on your next day off?
Commander, as long as I can see you, my mind is at ease even if you aren't doing anything in particular. Is this what it means to be reliant?

*yawns* Commander, why haven't you gone back to your room yet? You're sorry for waking me up? No, it's okay... but I only have this single bed here... You want to see how long my fingers are? Why not turn on the lights... Fuehhh?!
Could you play with me for a while, Commander? Oh.. you're tired? I guess rest is pretty important too...
Commander, skipping breakfast is bad for your body. I've prepared some cereal and toast for you; if you don't mind, would you like to eat together?
Ugh... Mission... failed. Commander, I'm terribly sorry.
There's new mail, Commander. Surely there's a commendation from the higher-ups!
I must be more strict with myself now that I'm your secretary.|Commander, if you're free, would you like to play with me?|Commander, I prepared some watermelon for you. Open your mouth~ aah~
Ah, it's already time to get back to work. Commander, let's go complete some missions.
Commander, the missions were done perfectly this time! Full marks!

I am the Iron Blood Navy's Z-class 1936-Type destroyer, Hermann Künne.  I participated in Operation Weserübung, and met my end during the fierce engagements at Narvik. Things will be different this time around!
Can I really have this? Thank you very much... I'll do my best to be a worthy partner!
This is the result of all my hard work!
Commander, your orders?
Please don't pick me up... I'm way too old for that...
Z19 Hermann Künne, reporting for duty! Commander, I'm prepared to fight until the very end!
Am I one step closer to being an adult?
Z23! This time, I got a perfect score!
Be wary of ambushes and try not to overextend yourselves.
Commander, I have a question, do you have a thing for making others dress up in fancy clothes?
Type 1934-class destroyer – Z2 Georg Thiele.
The commission team has returned. Naturally, we should greet and praise them for their hard work. I can accompany you, if need be.
I don't mind being near you, but I'm afraid that Lebe does.
Is there anything you wish to know about Lebe, Commander? Oh, you're more interested in me? You're quite the curious one. Please give me a minute to think.
You want to make small talk again? Why? You should know that the only answers I ever offer are nods and affirmations. Could it be that you actually like canned responses like that?
You are a commander with many strange ideas, but that may just be the perfect fit for a person with Lebe for an arm like me.
Commander, if you wish to take our relationship to the next level, simply keep being yourself; say what you want to, and do what you want to. That is all I need from you.
I've put together an after-action report, as you ordered. Please have a look.
My magazine is flooding... which is quite bad.
Commander, I have a question: why do you always arrive later than me?
I'll cover everyone. I'm quite good at these things, owing to Lebe's help. You may rest easy.
You have mail. I propose that you open and read it as soon as possible. You are prone to forgetting about it, otherwise.

Commander, please try not to be as reckless as Lebe. It would be annoying to have to knock you out, and I don't particularly like getting physical with a superior officer.|I'll bring you a fresh batch of paperwork if you have nothing better to do. I hope you're ready.|This little one is Lebe. Yes, you heard that correctly; this is Lebe. Isn't she cute?
We've received new missions. I organized them to give you a solid overview. You're welcome.
I'll obey if you order me to claim the mission rewards, but my opinion of you will worsen. Is that an acceptable tradeoff to you?

I am Georg Thiele, otherwise known as Z2, a Type 1934 destroyer built as an experiment. I was to make quick work of adversaries using my excellent mobility, or at least that was the plan... I'd rather not elaborate. Please forget I said that.

So this is marriage. I never thought I'd form an unbreakable bond with someone... What was that? I'm blushing? Umm... could you please take a photo of me right now? I've never seen myself red in the face before.
I can still go faster. Just a bit more.
Oh, absolutely, I agree wholeheartedly. Now, what's our next task?
Among all actions that take bravery, this would, in my honest opinion, be the worst kind.
I am Z2, Georg Thiele, awaiting your orders. However, if your orders are flawed, please allow me to reconsider them. May our relationship be productive.
Won't I develop some sort of flaw if I get even stronger?
There are countless examples of seizing defeat from the jaws of victory. Let us not underestimate our foes.
You'd like to know how I spend my free time? Your inquisitiveness truly boggles the mind, Commander.
Commander, I do wonder if your order to "come dressed in new clothes" was simply your way of saying "I want to see you in a casual outfit." No matter the case, I'm happy to oblige.
Are you having trouble breaking the ice, Commander? Then allow me to ask the question on your mind. Would you like to go somewhere with me?
Welcome back. Please forgive me for greeting you with such an inhospitable look. It is not acceptable behavior on my part. Wait just a moment, please. I will massage my face into a better expression.

Hm? Are you staring at me in hopes of making me initiate conversation? Apologies, but I'm afraid that won't happen.|Do I have any other expressions? A better question is: do you deserve a different expression? ...I'm joking, of course. I'm just too lazy to make any other face. That is all.|Take this opportunity to go outside and take a breather, Commander. I mean, you won't be completing all this work any time soon anyway.
A stroll through the city? I fear we'd be mistaken for a couple, so I must kindly decline.
Allow me to reiterate: Lebe does bite if provoked.
Commander, I do wonder if your order to "come dressed in new clothes" was simply your way of saying "I want to see you in a casual outfit." No matter the case, I'm happy to oblige.
When we're together like this... Yes, it does undeniably look like a "date."

Being able to see you all flabbergasted makes changing into this outfit worth it. Are you going to keep standing there like a scarecrow? Come over here~ Who knows, we might even be able to see the fireworks from this spot.
Good work on your sortie. Would you like to recharge with some sweets? For the time being, I set these aside for your enjoyment.
Commander, keeping young maidens waiting isn't something you should be proud of.

Lebe, I know festivals are fun, but I think you're having a bit too much fun...|"A carp becoming a dragon?" ...Lebe, do you want me to teach you what that means?|Festivals, delicious food, and wondrous scenery... Yes, I finally understand the miraculous "summer" that my Sakura Empire friends spoke of.
If you wanted to talk to me, wouldn't it be better if you at least had a topic in mind? Heh.
Commander, I'm not going to accept an excuse as flimsy as "I needed to fix your clothes."

Being able to see you all flabbergasted makes changing into this outfit worth it. Are you going to keep standing there like a scarecrow? Come over here~ Who knows, we might even be able to see the fireworks from this spot.
I'm the flagship? Fine by me! Everyone, follow me!
I'll make all your concerns go "poof!" How's that, Commander? Feel better?
Type 1936-class destroyer, Z20 Karl Galster.
Ah, our friends have returned! Let's go welcome them back!
The moment I saw you, all the fatigue from running kicked in at once. I'm out, time to rest!
As long as you keep running, you'll leave behind all your hardship and anxiety. Commander, come find me any time you're feeling down.
What's wrong? Something bugging you? I promise you'll feel better if we go run a marathon together!
If you never tell others how you feel about them, they'll never understand. You get that, right?
You idiot... All right, stop blushing and stammering. I like you. So, do you feel the same way about me?
Good job! Let's go find some place to relax.
Commander, up for a jog?
Oof... even I mess up sometimes... just sometimes~
A letter for you, eh? I don't think I should be the one to open your mail.

Commander, let me teach you the right way to breathe while running. It's good for both attacking and retreating!|As long as I'm in a good mood, I can enjoy any scenery!|Protschny? Don't call me by that name!
Let's prepare for the celebrations before we start~
Marathon, marathon! I'll definitely take first place this time.

I am Z20 Karl Galster, Iron Blood Z-class 1936-Type destroyer, the sole survivor of the Z17 type destroyers. After being being handed over to the Northern Union, I was renamed "прочный." Being separated from my sisters and living alone sure was rough...
Say, I heard there's a tradition in the East where couples will drink with their arms intertwined. Haha, come on, Commander! Don't be shy!
Gotta smile during battle as well!
Hmm? You want to go on a run with me?
Hehe, how do you like my curves?
Z20, Karl Galster, reporting in! Where's my welcoming party?
Ahaha, I'm feeling even better!
Hahaa! Piece of cake!
Come on everyone, let's give it our all!
Is there something on my face? Stop staring at me!
Type 1936-class destroyer, Z21 Wilheim Heidkamp.
Good work, everyone! Except the one who's always goofing off in port... *ahem*
I'm having a bad day... Just stay away from me!
I'll fight to protect my sisters... Not you!
What kind of stuff do I like? Why should I tell you? Well, I guess those macaroons we had yesterday were pretty good.
I'm not following you! We just happened to be going in the same direction! Where am I going...? Why... why should I tell you?!
Is there anything you'd like to tell me, Commander? Eh... nothing? I-i-idiot!
G-good work. Hmph!
Commander, you're back! Eh...? It's... it's not like I actually care!
Ugh... I... I'll remember this!
There's mail for... help you open it? I... I guess I can do that, reluctantly of course...

You should be more careful if you want me to be your flagship... Don't misunderstand, I'm not actually worried about you.|I'm staying beside you, but only because its my duty as secretary ship!|If you're really tired, I suppose you could rest on my lap for a while...
You're still not going to work? ...You prefer staying with me? You... you're doing this on purpose, aren't you?
I-I suppose you deserve a little bit of praise... but only for your hard work.
I am Z21, Iron Blood Navy Z-class 1936-Type destroyer. I was the flagship during Operation Weserübung, but was sunk by HMS Courageous. I won't lose next time!
Since you're being so sincere, I'll... accept... reluctantly! But that doesn't... it doesn't mean that I've agreed to anything yet... Ah, alright, don't leave. Yes, I agree!
Combat will be no problem, as long as we put in a little effort.
Didn't we agree that you'd give me a heads up before poking me?
Ah! What... what are you doing? One more time and I'll really get mad!
I am Z21, Narvik Z-class destroyer flagship, Wilheim Heidkamp! Since you worked so hard to find me, I suppose I'll have to follow you home.
Thanks... for nothing! I didn't say anything!
Well, I suppose you did contribute a little bit...
Let’s go! It’s time to reap the rewards of our hard work!
If you have the time to stare at me, shouldn’t you go back to your studies? Even I... can get embarrassed...
Type 1936A destroyer, Z23.
It’s about time! Please put aside your work, and check on the results of your commissions.
Commander, can you not bother me when I’m trying to study?
Studying is important! A wise man once said, "knowledge is power." ... France is bacon? Jeez... just what is going through that head of yours?
You’re a bit tired? Very well, getting rest is important. You want a lap pillow? I guess it’s fine... just for a little while...
Commander, why are you staring at me? You think I’m pretty when I look serious? I-idiot! Go do your own work...

Commander, did you know that the higher you stand, the further you can see, but also the lonelier you will be? I hope that you can rise to great heights one day, but still be as happy then as you are now.
I’m not the kind of girl who you can fool with just a few headpats. Get back to work, Commander.
We still have so much to review about the previous battle...
I've got to find a way out of this mess...
There's still quite a lot to be done today. No procrastinating!
*sobs* ... No, I mustn’t cry...
There’s mail for you, Commander. You sure are popular.

Don’t worry, Commander. The fact that you care about me is enough.|I wonder if there’s something I can do for you, Commander. You seem tired lately, so maybe a massage would be good?|See, Commander? You can do it if you set your mind to it!|Huh? What am I in charge of? A-ahaha... I, uh... forgot...|Headpat? You mean like this...?
Completing missions is a great way to hone your skills. Don't ever forget that!
Commander, the mission rewards have arrived.

I’m Z23, the eldest sister of the 1936A-class destroyers. Unlike my sisters before me, who all had a namesake, my younger sisters and I only had a serial code for our names. It might be a little cold and impersonal, but I believe it’s also more convenient. So please, feel free to call me Z23.
This is the proof that Commander acknowledges me... Understood. From now on, I shall stay by your side and work hard to ensure that your life is happy and upstanding.
Take this!
If you’re free, why not help with some paperwork?
This isn’t something a commander should be doing...

Guten Tag, Commander.
I am Z23. Let’s study hard together and aim for the top!
Commander, I hope that we'll improve, together!
Battles are like exams. Earning MVP is like getting the top score on a test.
Have you memorized this? This part's going to show up on the test. If you don't pass, you'll...
This is going to be on the exam! If you don't take thorough notes, I am going to punish you!
What we analyzed earlier sure came in handy!

Commander, do you remember the naval intelligence I explained to you earlier? ... I'm asking you a question here... |Afterwards, let's get something to eat. It's on me. Consider it a reward for all your hard work today. |Commander, pain is temporary. Victory is forever.
If there's a part you don't understand, speak up and ask.
P-playing pranks on your instructor is prohibited! *blushes*
This is going to be on the exam! If you don't take thorough notes, I am going to punish you!
Be it ballgames or combat, I won't let anyone beat me!
Y-you were too enraptured by my swimsuit to keep track of the ball?! Come on, please focus, Commander! Geez...
Haiyaaah! It's up to you, Ayanami! Oh, Commander! Are you actually keeping score? We might not be having a serious match, but that's no excuse for you to stand around and do nothing.
What a great day for exercise it is today, Commander!
Darn... I need more practice...

Javelin's boxed lunches look really good! I should ask her to teach me how to make them like she does!|Laffey? Laffey! Wake up! Good grief, how do you manage to fall asleep while playing volleyball?!|Another year, another unforgettable visit to the beach! Right, Commander?
Oops! Look out, Commander...! Oh, nice catch. Sorry about that, I bounced the ball at an odd angle...
Wh-what do you think you're doing?!
Haiyaaah! It's up to you, Ayanami! Oh, Commander! Are you actually keeping score? We might not be having a serious match, but that's no excuse for you to stand around and do nothing.
Ugh... how am I supposed to keep smiling all day long? My jaw's gone stiff already...
Welcome! A table for one today? Um... Commander, my smile doesn’t look stiff... right?
*Sigh* Being a waitress is a brutal job... but, there are some upsides. Hehe, Commander, what do you think...? Does my smile look a bit more natural now?
Please, have a look at today's specials, Commander.
Ah... Commander, please come in!

Commander, it's not polite to stare... oh! Smiling, I'm smiling... *cough cough*! What can I get for you?|So if you order this set, you can choose from one of these, or these. Not a bad deal, eh?|Hmm... I should really take this opportunity to learn some new recipes. Oh, sorry, this is your menu~
Commander, you can't just chat with me while I'm on duty. I've got work to do.
Commander, if you get in my way again I'll have to ask you to leave!
Welcome! A table for one today? Um... Commander, my smile doesn’t look stiff... right?
I've been smiling a lot more lately? ... Well, that's because you've gotten so much more respectable.
Oh, good evening, Commander. I was just looking for Javelin and the others... Say, would you like to keep me company for a bit?
Erm, well, Commander! I don't usually think about things like this but, you know, tonight, I'm wondering, Commander, when I'm all dressed up like this, do you think I'm... well... pretty?
Commander, you don't mind if I cut a bit loose today, do you?
Are you enjoying the party, Commander?
What can I do? ... I don't want to get my dress dirty.
Look how many invitations you've gotten, Commander. Aren't you popular? Hehehe.

When I see everyone's smiling faces, I can't help but think about all the hard work that got us here. How about you, Commander?|The four of us: Laffey, Javelin, Ayanami, and I... Who would have thought we'd all become such good friends?|Champagne? Oh, heavens no, Commander! This is just sparkling orange juice.
Just for today, Commander, I don't mind you putting off your missions for a while.
This is... exactly what I'd expect from my Commander.
D-D-Dance?! ... Oh my, I never thought it might come to this... Commander, can you teach me how to do it...?
Oh, good evening, Commander. I was just looking for Javelin and the others... Say, would you like to keep me company for a bit?
I'm doing splendidly today.
Eugen is going around teasing and feeling up the café employees again... Ugh, it's giving me an upset stomach...
Hi, welcome! How may I serve y– It's you, Commander?! Err, well, I'm working as a trainee at this Sakura Empire-style café, you see... What do you think of this outfit?
Many of the Sakura Empire's sweets are made through steaming... That's very interesting.
What would you like to order, Commander?
Thanks for the help, Zweifunf! Here, Commander, a letter for you!

Hatsuharu looks extremely nervous... Maybe there's a way to soothe her...|What's up, Yuugure? The kettle? Oh shoot! I totally forgot!|Please try to keep quiet in the store! Why do Yuudachi and her friends always need to cause such a commotion...
More tea, you say? Coming right up!
