Please, don't try to imitate Eugen's bad behavior!
Hi, welcome! How may I serve y– It's you, Commander?! Err, well, I'm working as a trainee at this Sakura Empire-style café, you see... What do you think of this outfit?
Whether as an idol or as a warship, I'll be the best I can be!
I don't mind balancing my work as both a manager and as an idol. As a matter of fact, I think I might actually be well suited to it.
Jeez... Javelin's got what it takes, but I'm really concerned about Laffey and Ayanami. Oh well, I guess it's up to me to manage them... Commander, please don't forget to support me too.
Commander, seeing you work so hard like this makes me realize, I can't slack off either!
If you're going to do something, you've got to do it right! I'm aiming for the top!
Phew... I'll have to work even harder.

I just remembered, Laffey has an audition today... so where is she?! ...Gaaaah!! Sorry, I have something to attend to!|...Recently, more and more girls have been asking me to become their manager. Jeez, I have my own idol activities to take care of!|Commander, I have no objections to your laissez-faire approach towards management, but don't lose sight of our responsibilities. |Commander, I'm heading off to lessons, so don't forget to finish your missions!
Commander, which area should I improve on next?
Jeez... Javelin's got what it takes, but I'm really concerned about Laffey and Ayanami. Oh well, I guess it's up to me to manage them... Commander, please don't forget to support me too.
Phew... Nothing calms the mind like enjoying a nice book... Commander, want to join me?
Commander, please help hold onto the ladder. I've almost got the book... Just a little more... All right... C-Commander?! Please don't look up!
I'll handle sorting the books! I like doing it, not to mention I'm also good at it!
Might it be an order form? I'll check it in a moment!

Miss Ranger, what book are you looking for? ...Huh? Are you all right? Should I help find it for you? |Ah, go ahead and put that book inside that cardboard box. I'll take it over to Shiranui later.|Laffey and Javelin don't seem to read much... Mhm, Ayanami and I will see if we can pick out some books that would be helpful to them.
Woaaahhh! Commander, please keep the ladder steady!
Commander?! You mustn't do that!
Commander, please help hold onto the ladder. I've almost got the book... Just a little more... All right... C-Commander?! Please don't look up!
Commander, I can't concentrate on my reading if you're staring at me like that! Gosh...
Whew... Sorry to keep you waiting. I was having a hard time deciding which outfit to wear... Ah, um... how do I look?

Commander, no matter what destination you're aiming for, I'll be with you every step of the way, whether you're at the summit or just setting out, through both joys and disappointments. Mhm, you'll never be alone again, I swear it.
Mm... there really was a lot to consider on that last operation... but most importantly, I'm glad you're safe, Commander.
Commander, did you make sure to eat the meal I made for you? Mmhmm, good, good~
I-I'm all right... but I'll have to train more after we get back...

Commander, I'll be here reading, so just call my name if something happens. I have to study hard so that I can keep up with you!|You look so cool and hardworking like that... Uh, ahem! Disregard that! A-anyway, would you like a light snack?|How to help the Commander work more efficiently and comfortably... Hmm, it'll be quite the challenge, but well worth it!
Yes, yes, I know I look cute in this outfit, so hurry up and get back to work! Jeez, what am I to do with you, Commander...
Wait, if you're going to do this kind of stuff, at least save it for after work! Even if I like... I mean, err, d-disregard what I just said!
Whew... Sorry to keep you waiting. I was having a hard time deciding which outfit to wear... Ah, um... how do I look?
Instructor, how many points did my combat performance score? ...Heheh, just kidding~
Ok, just little bit more and the retrofit will be complete... let’s go find Javelin and play with them—— Hey, *points*, it’s the Commander?! *Cough*, great timing, here are some documents...
My efficiency should be upgraded along with my performance. Paperwork, battle plans... I can handle them all! Commander, be prepared, we’ll be very busy~
Commander, look alive, let’s make a greater effort on our attacks.
nil|nil|| Once we complete today’s mission, then come back and confirm our schedule for sorties over the next few days, there are still many things left to do.
Commander, are you prepared to work in a lockdown environment?
My efficiency should be upgraded along with my performance. Paperwork, battle plans... I can handle them all! Commander, be prepared, we’ll be very busy~
Well done, let’s keep this up, everyone!
I'm SO returning these kitties to Akashi... Although, I'd feel really guilty if I did that... Ugh, what's a girl to do...
*sigh*... Taking care of Meowfficers is more work than you'd think... They're awfully needy for support units. Commander, make absolute sure you don't turn out like them.
Don't forget to keep your dorms nice and stocked up... Just like these kitties...
How tiring... I should go take a break now. I'll have to check if Z26 and the others did their homework later...

Hey, Z28! Stop treating the Meowfficers like pets! Look, I know they seem like pets in more ways than one!|Javelin and her friends aren't too keen about coffee. Heh, that proves that they're still just kids.|So that's where you're hiding! Gotcha! ...What? I'm totally not wasting time playing hide-and-seek with the U-boats!
Commander, would you like something to drink?
Wh-what are you trying to do?!
*sigh*... Taking care of Meowfficers is more work than you'd think... They're awfully needy for support units. Commander, make absolute sure you don't turn out like them.
Whether in battles or in missions or in studies, diligence begets success!
Let us begin the festival of blood and iron!
A mortal that does not tremble before my visage? How strange... I thought I did my best to look absolutely hellish... I wonder why...
voiceline.oath: ...Hmph! (Strikes pose) Ahahaha! How's this? Terrifying, yeah? Does it make your knees weak? ...Hmm, I see. Judging from reaction, it still needs some work...

voiceline.line: Type 1936A "Narvik class" destroyer – Z24.
Commission rewards? I have no interest in mortal trinkets... But oh! If there's any black chocolate or black forest cake, you must bring it to me, mortal!
Do you know the fate of mortals who have fallen to such depths of depravity?
Hrmm... Those planes circling overhead are like flies... annoying and won't go away... Don't you agree?
Nothing in existence can stand before me without succumbing to abject terror... or so I thought. Why aren't you afraid of me!
Are you offering this black forest cake to me? Ehe... Ehehehe... Very well, human. Here, ahhhn... What are you spacing out for? Hurry up and feed me already!
Now that you've learned to fear and respect me, mortal, I shall give you the privilege of forming a physical pact with me! Come! ......Hug! It's a hug! Do I have to spell it for you, you fool?!
Impudent mortal, how dare you wantonly touch my head... W-wait, don't stop, please~
It's about damn time, human. Tired, so I'm gonna rest. Don't bother me unless it's urgent, or you have dark chocolate.
voiceline.oath: Good, human, you've returned. I'm tired... Hey, don't run away! Come hither and give me a back rub!

voiceline.line: Can I destroy everything yet...?!
Do you have any idea what time it is? This is why I can't stand you lazy mortals... Get back to work already!
voiceline.oath: You've got some guts to keep me waiting, foolish mortal! I have been toiling away at being an excellent secretary ship!

voiceline.line: *pant*... *pant*... I don't have to hold back anymore, right? I'll destroy everything... every last bit of it...!!!
Insight from the Abyss itself... Guhuhu...

Black is the mark of my infernal nobility— yes, black coffee, dark chocolate, and black forest cake... are all things within my domain! Surely even human scum such as you recognizes this~♪|Aaaahhhhh... I'm sooooo booooored... Shall I teach the next person who walks through these doors the meaning of true fear? ...No good? Tsk... |The ways of the mortal realm have no bearing upon me! Therefore, Zed, I have no need for this "homework" stuff. Oww! F-fine, I get it, so stop chewing me out!|You... forgot to bring the offerings? ...Looks like I will have to teach you about the fragility of human life.
voiceline.extra: Hurry up and finish your work already, you fool! Stop... slacking... off... or I'll scratch you!|Studying...? Wh-why do I have to stoop to doing the same stuff as Z25 and the others? Don't wanna! Stop throwing homework at me!

voiceline.line: Missions? Hurry up and get those unsightly things out of my sight, mortal.
The time of reaping seems to have come once more. Isn't that right, human~?
After Z23, the 1936-class destroyers no longer were given actual names... Why?! Why can't I have a cool and easy-to-remember name like Lebe or Thiele...?!
You seek to form a contract with me, mortal? Ehehehe... very well! I shall reward you for your bravery! From now on, you shall serve me!
Kneel before me! Ahahaha!
These massive claws suit my status as an Archfiend, both in terms of appearance and destructive power! Ahahaha!
Surely you already know the fate of those who dare to disrespect me? Foolish mortal...
Tremble, mortal! Before you is the Fiend of the Crimson Darkness, the Avatar of Fear, the Iron Blood destroyer, Z24! All you need to do is grovel at my feet!
Not bad, human scum! My power grows ever greater!
Ahahahaha! Fresh blood and steel, blossom into magnificent fireworks!
voiceline.oath: Ehehehe... Ahahahahaha!

voiceline.line: Even off duty, I cannot remove this claw, as it is a symbol of my dignity! ...What do I do if I need to pick something up? Th-that's your job, you foolish mortal!
Come, human! The rite of festivities is upon us! Come hither, and let us revel in this foreign holiday together!
Are you all rested up? I'll give you the privilege of keeping me entertained today! Consider this your greatest honor, mortal!
I shall reward you with a taste of this black fruit! Open your mouth, foolish mortal!|
Do you want to stay by my side tht badly? Heheh~
Th-there are some things you just shouldn't do! I hope you're ready for some punishment, foolish mortal!
Come, human! The rite of festivities is upon us! Come hither, and let us revel in this foreign holiday together!
Z25, currently searching for enemy ships!
Mr. Anchor, what must I do to become as outstanding as my sister...?
1936A "Narvik" Class Destroyer - Z25
The commission team is already waiting at the harbor. Shall I welcome them back?
Mr. Anchor... I don't want to be here anymore...
Even though I told the commander not to worry, I still worry that I won't be able to meet expectations or adapt to this new environment. Mr. Anchor, will I be able to perform well?
Now, all my peers see me as being dedicated and responsible, and want to sortie or go on commissions with me. Commander also feels more at ease when I am around. Mr. Anchor, I've managed to make it!
Recently, I've become more and more conscious of the commander. When we are together, I simply can't seem to calm down. Mr. Anchor... what should I do...?

Ehehe... Haah, it's still no good. Mr. Anchor, sorry for making you act like the commander and practice with me for so long. I give up... just being like this should be good enough... Eh... w-wait... Commander?
Good work, everyone. Let's use this time to also check the status of all the equipment.
I can hang on a bit longer...
You're right on time. Well then, I should also get fired up.
This battle... I'll have to reflect upon it thoroughly...
New mail has arrived... it would be unfortunate if you glossed over something important!

Z23... is probably engrossed in her studies right now... |Research plans... commission schedule... Ugh... this is no time to be getting sleepy... |This thing here? He- it's really just an ordinary toy!
Don't procrastinate on your missions. Hurry up and get them taken care of!
Mission complete. Well? What are your next plans?
From my sister Z23 forth, we were all assigned code names. However, no matter what I am called or where I am deployed, I shall fulfill my duties!
So, you heard everything that I said to Mr. Anchor.... Ughh, I'm such an idiot! However, I'm really happy that you chose to give this to me. Th-there's no going back on this!
Target acquired!
Zzz.... woah! Sorry, I shouldn't have been daydreaming...
Oooh! ...If that was on purpose, you'd better grit your teeth!
1936-A class destroyer Z25, reporting in. Please be at ease, I shall do my utmost in battle.
Becoming stronger... should allow me to get a little closer to Z23.
Not bad, let's keep this same tempo going!
Mr. Anchor has to sit out in the sun as well, or he will get moldy.
Even at the beach, we cannot afford to be careless! Commander, have you adequately prepared for today's activities?
Commander, which girl are you staring at this time?
Phew... It's been a long time since I've been able to enjoy such a refreshing breeze.

Volleyball? Or how about swimming! I won't lose, no matter what you pick! |Liven up! Don't tell me you're tired already! |It's time to let these Royals witness the tactics and teamwork of the Iron Blood! Heheh~
I'm not tired yet, there's no need for you to massage- Ooh... that feels pretty good...
S-sink!!
Even at the beach, we cannot afford to be careless! Commander, have you adequately prepared for today's activities?
All ships, follow the vanguard's lead! Oh, I guess that means follow me!
I hate snowstorms. One was the reason I got separated from my allies and captured by the enemy...
Type 1936A "Narvik class" destroyer – Z26.
The commission team is back! They've really done it this time... Nono, I mean, they've done a good job!
Commander, you're a failure!
What I do when a foe's aiming at me? Well... I pray that they fire at someone else by accident! If they don't, I pray again that their torpedoes don't hit me!
Commander, you did a great job, like always! Continue to do your best tomorrow as well! ...You can tell that I'm complimenting you right now, no?
Maintaining a good work-life balance is very important! That's why I'll be watching you on your days off to make sure you don't do any work! This is me telling you to get enough rest.
Commander! I was observing your work, and it looks like you can do just fine without my supervision! What a good job you've done. You're stellar! I'm very proud of you.
Commander, here's some coffee! ...S-sugar? Hmm... I wonder if 10 cubes will be enough...
I wonder where Z25 and the others went...
Sorry, but only authorized personnel are allowed into the office... Oh, I guess you're authorized to enter. Welcome back! Let's give it our all!
We ended up losing... I'm really sorry, everyone!
Here's the latest intel! Please give it a look, Commander!

Commander, slacking off is absolutely prohibited! ...You've already finished your work? I-in that case... Well done!|Zed's good at studying, and Lebe's good at sports... so I should aim to... study while playing sports? W-will I manage?|I wonder if Z25's Mr. Anchor is actually alive... I mean, she's always talking to it, so...
New damn missions have co– Err, I mean! Commander, please hurry up and check out the new missions!
A mission has been completed! If Zed were here, she'd say... "Commander, you've done well!"

So you want to hear about my history? Absolutely! As the Iron Blood Type 1936A destroyer, Z26, I escorted Hipper and Scheer, and disrupted shipping with Z25 and the others. While doing so, I was defeated... and that's that!

"I take you, to have and to hold, from this day forward, for better, for worse, for richer, for poorer, in sickness and in health, until death do us part." ...I was able to recite it from memory! Now it's your turn... right?

Continue making your best endeavors! ...Um, I mean, well done, everyone!

When it comes to the Iron Blood, the cool one would have to be Z1. The sexy would definitely be Eugen. As for who is the most idol-like, that would be none other than me, the dancing and singing Ms. 35!
Commander is a bit like the idol of the fleet. Just by being there, you bring hope to everyone. I want to become the same kind of idol!
Now that I think about it... Commander, do you know what a produzent is? It's like the agent for an idol. Commander, if you have time to spare, I'd like you to become my P~

The lead ship of the 1936B-class is none other than me, though there were only three of us to begin with... Why is it here?!

Those who share the seal of the Devilish Idol shall have their fate cosmically bound with mine! That means... I kind of like you! Ehehe~
Gah... Commander, when I'm with you, I can feel endless power welling up from deep within me, even without releasing my seal. Perhaps this is the "love" I have for you, ehehe~♪

Commander, have you seen Fünf? I granted her some of my devilish powers, but then suddenly lost the ability to detect her with my bewitching eyes... Huh? Oh, she's right there? |Nobody can resist the bewitching songs of the Devilish Idol! |Whether it's on the battlefield or on the stage, once I release my sealed powers, nothing can get in my way~!

The stars have rewarded our efforts. Blink and you'll miss the opportunity, Commander!

I am the Bremen-born destroyer Z36, known by many as the Devilish Idol! My friends and I travelled throughout the Baltic Sea, but eventually I was dragged into that deep, black abyss... Hmph. In any case, I'll bring you victory with my powers of bewitchment!

I can feel it... my devilish soul resonating with yours, Commander...! Okay, I've decided! Until the end of time, whether on the battlefield or on the stage, I shall remain by your side, and use my devilish powers for you only! Commander, you'll always stay with me, right?
I'll engrave my devilish powers of bewitchment upon your body!
W-wait! Even if it's you, Commander, I won't let you unwrap- I mean, unseal my powers! No way! Nuu~!
You'll get hexed for casually touching the Devilish Idol's body!
Hm hm~ so you're my Commander? Our meeting must have been ordained by the Fates. By the Iron Blood coursing through my veins, the Devilish Idol Z36 binds herself to your service! Shazam!
My devilish powers of bewitchment... have further awakened within me!
This victory was ordained by the Fates! Yes, that means it was inevitable!
For not fleeing upon seeing my visage, I applaud both your courage and your stupidity.
Z46 is but a codename, not my actual name. For a ship, something like a name should be unimportant, but...
Type 1936C destroyer, Z46
Waiting at the harbor for dispatched ships to return... is something I’ve ever experienced before.
Perhaps what I seek... cannot be found here.
The journey to find a name has lead me to this place.
Friendship, enmity, love, hate... these are things that I have never experienced prior to coming here.

The sea breeze caressing my cheeks, the crashing of waves resounding in my ear. The laughter echoing on the beach, the footprints left in the sand. The rays of summer shimmering overhead, the fluttering sails of ships about to return... What an unforgettable scenery.
To be needed, yearned for, trusted, and loved... "I" am a cloth dyed by your color. My beloved, please bestow a name upon me.
Is the battle over, or has it just begun?
What doesn't kill you only makes you stronger.
This world is so different that from what I was expecting. How interesting!
Go and boast to the world. Be proud that you have bested me even once.
Receiving mail is proof of the expectations and trust that people have in you.

I have experienced neither failure nor suffering. Consequently, I have accomplished nothing.|A name is not merely a label. It is also proof that one exists in this world.|The things I have yet to experience and understand are as numerous as the countless stars in the night sky.
Unknown beings and new acquaintances... let us sally forth to meet them!
Freedom and fortune only favor the hardworking.

Iron Blood Z-class destroyer, 1936-C Type. Four other sister ships were planned for construction, but only Z47 and I were built. I wasn’t even completed by the end of the war, and was scrapped without ever being finished. One day, I hope to be called not as Z46, but by a true name.
My beloved, I have long awaited this day. What name have you decided to bestow upon me?
The unworthy are fated to drown in this world.
Being able to be touched is proof of one’s existence.
If your desire is righteous, then why do your hands tremble?
Are you the one who summoned me? I am... unfortunately, still without a name. You may call me Z46 for now though.
Though this is but a trivial thing, I'll return the favor for your consideration.
Am I too strong? Or are you all too weak?
The tide ebbs and flows, leaving behind an unforgettable summer experience.
The bustling beach, clamoring with waves of joyfulness... experiencing this kind of summer is a first for me, but I don't dislike it...
Have you prepared yourself? Then let us proceed to our next battlefield. This battle shall thusly be dubbed: "Soaking in the Shallows!"
The midsummer seaside is full of the unknown... Let's go explore it together!

The hot summer and the refreshing ice... what a wonderful contradiction. | Trust your instincts and your courage. They will guide you forward. |No matter how many times, I will always believe in your words. I can always trust that you will guide me down the right path.
I truly do exist, and am needed by everyone...
Why... is there hesitation in your eyes?
The bustling beach, clamoring with waves of joyfulness... experiencing this kind of summer is a first for me, but I don't dislike it...
I wish to run as fast as a leopard, and fly to great heights like a soaring bird.
Through the sweat and tears, striving for your goals. Rejoice in victory, sink within defeat... How fascinating, this "sports meet" may be.
Whatever color you may wish to bestow upon my existence – be it black, red, or blue, I shall accept it all. My beloved, please bestow upon me my name, the identity you choose to bless me with.
Steel yourselves for this upcoming battle! Intense fights await, at our next sports meet!

To compete with others and prove your worth, through different means than fighting battles... To be crowned "champion," 'tis a great feeling. |Even in this little academy, there are so many things to do and see... |Whether your sweat is falling on the track, or your words are encouraging others, all of this is an unforgettable experience.
Just a small piece of paper... can create such a profound tie between people... this "scavenger hunt" is more interesting than I thought.
Where are your fingers... Is there really anything worth exploring right there?
Through the sweat and tears, striving for your goals. Rejoice in victory, sink within defeat... How fascinating, this "sports meet" may be.
In front of tens and thousands of adoring fans... I must do my very best.
Countless days and nights of hard work congeal into a single flash of brilliance onstage. Like a shooting star, leaving only a fleeting trail of light—
Dancing beams of light, shimmering on-stage; uplifted voices, joined as one by song... Upon this unknown stage, my heart doth flutter... Yet this sensation, is quite refreshing.
A commission fleet has returned to port. I wish for them to see me as I am now, as a beloved idol.
Anxiety and nervousness gather along with the light upon this stage, and the colors of my heart cannot be concealed... O you who I love, are these feelings reaching you?
The stage is yet another battlefield, where wars are fought not with steel and fire, but with our charm and earnest desire.
As long as your eyes are fixed upon me; Upon this stage I shall sing bravely.
Have my lessons been so insufficient; or are my emotions simply deficient?

The star-lit stage is another world of its own, an ajar door to the unknown that now beckons me...|My dear friend, there is no reason to worry about me. All of this was made possible by Z23, Z35, Graf Spee, Admiral Hipper... We are all connected by the bonds of the Iron Blood.|Take heed of where the other performers and your audience are looking? ...I see. I understand why such a thing is important, but can you explain to me why it is called the "Evil Eye?"
My singing voice... is proof of my existence.
Dancing beams of light, shimmering on-stage; uplifted voices, joined as one by song... Upon this unknown stage, my heart doth flutter... Yet this sensation, is quite refreshing.
Let us sing this song of celebration; For our friends' displays of dedication.

"Jianzhi," the art of breathing life into works of cut paper... is a world beyond my imagination. If these decorations are said to usher in blessings... are they akin to a coat-of-arms or a holy seal?
I have no desire to be a burden upon my peers... Before devoting myself to this craft, I shall continue to observe.
I eagerly await the completion of this next piece... It's as if my soul resonates with this craft.

The festival to herald the arrival of spring is sanguine, filled with joy, fanfare, and deliciousness. None may resist its delights.|Sister of my friend, please wait a bit longer. The preparation process is difficult to control.|After this piece is complete, will you mount it? The more delicate the art, the more strict the protection must be...
Allow me to complete this seal, and it may be of great use to you.
Are you trying to stick something onto me?

"Jianzhi," the art of breathing life into works of cut paper... is a world beyond my imagination. If these decorations are said to usher in blessings... are they akin to a coat-of-arms or a holy seal?
Even Lord Bismarck's statue cannot be cleaned satisfactorily... Too ashamed am I to face my Iron Blood friends, but this war against dust, I shall not suspend.
Cast your eyes upon this bit of dust. As I was entrusted with the cleaning, I shall not allow this dust to remain. Will you also join me in this battle?
Hrmm... The more I clean, the more the dust grows. Will this battle never cease because dust yet remains on my tool's fleece?
Upon my pride, this dust shall know no succor. Hm? Did I say something weird just now?

How does one eradicate something as infinitesimal yet as innumerable as dust? ...It's impossible? That, I cannot accept. To do so would invalidate my very existence.|The process of making things beautiful and pure through cleaning is wonderful indeed. I cannot allow that, and that is why I must eradicate it all.
The manjuus are doing their best to help out. I would appreciate it if you could do the same.
Oh, thank you. I was just thinking I needed a lift to reach that high spot.
Cast your eyes upon this bit of dust. As I was entrusted with the cleaning, I shall not allow this dust to remain. Will you also join me in this battle?

Zara-class heavy cruiser – Zara.

Terrible... There's absolutely nothing about this commander anyone could ever find appealing...

Now that we're finally alone together, was there something you wanted to do, Commander? ... You want me to clean your ears? Well, all right... Come, put your head right here~ And please, try to relax, okay? I'm going to very gently, very slowly, clean your ears♪

Commander, after all this time together, you should already know what I'm thinking before I even open my mouth. Hehe, so who am I thinking about right now? Of course it's you, Commander, that's too easy. Hehehe♪
An exhausting mission, was it? Why not relax with a glass of wine?

Is this mission giving you trouble? Here, let me take a look.
Mission complete! My my, that's quite a big reward there, isn't it? Well done, Commander~

I am the first ship of the Zara class of heavy cruisers, Zara. I was born to be a marine battery, with my magnificent guns and armor plating. I served as the flagship of my squadron, at least until that fateful night...

You really think you can bind me to you with nothing but a cheap little ring? This isn't nearly enough~ ... Hehe, don't give me that face... Haha, I'm only joking~ Don't worry, Commander. I'll be with you forever.
Don't think you can pierce my armor so easily!
You like my sword, Commander? Or could it be... something else you're interested in?
Eeek?! ... Ahem! There is more to me than my armor plating, you know? Maybe you would like a taste of my guns as well?
Ciao. It's a pleasure to meet you, Commander. I'm the heavy cruiser, Zara, and I look forward to bringing victory and glory to your fleet.
Grazie! Now my main guns are an even greater threat to the enemy.
I've brought you victory and glory, just as I promised.
Did you do your stretches? You don't want your legs cramping up in the water.
Phew... It's a perfect day for swimming. Oh my, Commander, did you come to swim too? Or... perhaps you had something else in mind? Ehehe~♪
Legs straight, calves stretched– Ah, welcome back, Commander. I suppose you can tell I've been teaching the others to swim. Would you like me to teach you as well?
Commander, please be careful swimming in the deep end, okay?

Hey, no horseplay in the pool!|I really like swimming, but the submarines and destroyers are always faster... Why is that, Commander...?|Speed is one thing, but I'm quite confident in my stamina. How about it, Commander? Want to try me?
Your eyes are wandering. Hehe, what's on your mind? You can tell me.
Really now, Commander? I understand your eagerness, but there's a time and place, no?
Phew... It's a perfect day for swimming. Oh my, Commander, did you come to swim too? Or... perhaps you had something else in mind? Ehehe~♪
Allow me to show you the true power of planes!
Why are there other Iron Bloods here, and why are they so... big? It's a bit scary...
Aircraft carrier Graf Zeppelin
Hey, I think you have people coming back into the harbor.
Hmph. Stay away from me. I'll find a way home by myself!
What's with that expression? I'm only unable to find my way back home because this place is too big! Hmph, I'm sure you made it that way on purpose, you goon!
You fool, if you wanted my help, you should have asked... Since I'm able to eat delicious cake like this every day... maybe I wouldn't object to staying a little longer!

Hey Commander, what's for dessert today? Huh, it's about going home? Well, um... th-that's right! It will be a while until I'm grown up enough to realize my destiny, so I can probably keep the Iron Blood waiting a bit longer! Hmm, I'm sure they won't be angry!
You turned out to be a pretty good person after all, and everyone here has treated me well... When I grow up to become a mighty carrier, I wouldn't mind coming back to live here~
I didn't expect you to be this capable. Maybe you are worthy of being my commander!
Hm-hmph! Like hell I'd lose!
Where did you suddenly run off to?! Taste my wrath!
It's n-not my fault! I-I just didn't get enough to eat!
Huh, you're missing a piece of mail? R-really...?

*sniffle* ... *sniffle*... Waaah... Why are you still working and ignoring me?! Taste my wrath! |Hmph. No matter how hard you try, I will never yield to you! ...Desserts? Gimme... |Hmm... this should go here... No, no, maybe like this...? Hey! Wh-what are you doing! I didn't ask for your help! |I like high places! That way, I can see really far! |Despair and hatred mean nothing to me! I believe that as long as you don't give up, you can make any dream come true!
Huh? You have to finish your work first. Isn't that common sense?
Look at all the rewards!

I am none other than Graf Zeppelin, the first carrier of the Iron Blood! Heh. Don't be so surprised. The next era of naval warfare will definitely be decided by aircraft, and I will stand as its most brightly shining star! So, let me go back! ...Huh, I can't? ...Taste my wrath!!

I hate you, you big dumb idiot! If you give me something like this, how am I going to say goodbye? Uwahh... *sniffle*... Th-then promise me this... If I ever have to go back, swear that you'll come find me, got it? It's a promise!
Let's end this!
Don't just randomly touch me! Taste my wrath!!
Filthy, taste my wrath!

State your name! And this location! I see now... you’re also one of those goons conspiring against me! I’ll let you know, I am Graf Zeppelin, the one destined to become the first carrier of the Iron Blood! To think that you’d carry me off when I was distracted... taste my wrath!
I-I won't be bribed so easily!
Heheh, planes are the strongest after all!
A never-ending swarm of enemies? I’m already used to it.
That Grey Ghost... I’d like to duel her just once.
Second ship of the Shoukaku-class aircraft carriers, Zuikaku.
If only I had more planes...!
Commander, would you like a taste of the anguish I experienced during the Battle of the Marianas?
Seniors and juniors... they’re all such a pain.
My fate always seems to be entertwined with Lexington’s... Ah~ Commander, please don’t tell Sara I said that. I can’t handle that girl.
Whenever I feel irritated or lost, training always makes me feel at ease. Yes, I’ll definitely get stronger and catch up to that Grey Ghost one day.
Commander, you make me feel just as if I am with Shoukaku. H-huh? That’s not it! I’m not treating you as my sister!
I’ll need you to perform some maintenance on me. Ah, don’t forget about the planes either!
Shoukaku... Is Shoukaku all right?
Where are we going today? Pearl Harbor? Or perhaps the Coral Sea?
Am I going to be sunk... again...?
So? Is it good news or bad news?

Shoukaku is so cute when she’s embarrassed!|Keep fighting until the last arrow is broken! That is what it means to be an elite!|Wait, Grey Ghost, don’t run away just because you won! Let’s have a rematch!
Is it time for a break? Commander, you should come try some of Shoukaku’s cooking!
Hmm... Seems like the situation has taken a turn for the better!

I’m Zuikaku from the Fifth Carrier Divison, though I was assigned to the First Carrier Division at one point. Together with my sister Shoukaku, we became the last two elite carriers of the Sakura Empire. We triumphed in bitter battles against Lexington, Hornet, and even Enterprise. That’s right, I was even able to severely damage the Grey Ghost herself, although she proved to be luckier than me. My service came to an end when Lexington, risen from the dead, sunk me. In the end, I still completed my final mission and sank with no regrets.
E-eh?! Th-this is... I’m not misunderstanding you, right? Then... um, from now on, I’ll be in your care, dar... darling? Waaah! Shoukaku is calling me!
As long as Shoukaku is with me~!
My least favorite food? Turkey, of course.
Commander, Shoukaku’s are larger and softer...
I am Zuikaku, the last elite of the Sakura Empire’s Carrier Divisions. I can only be at my best when I am with my sister Shoukaku.
As a perfected aircraft carrier, I shall not lose to anyone, not even to my seniors or to the Grey Ghost herself.
I am the auspicious crane, after all!
Zuikaku, advancing!
I'm giving off a different vibe from usual? Hehe, I'll take that as a compliment! As a matter of fact, I do like trying on different outfits from time to time for a change of pace.

New Elite 1st CarDiv, Zuikaku, reporting for duty! Ahh, I've always wanted to give such a cool introduction! Shoukaku would definitely make fun of me if she heard it, but I wanted to try it while everyone is in a festive mood... Commander, what'd you think?

As long as there is someone I want to protect, I won't fear the strongest of enemies or the the sting of defeat. No matter how many times I am knocked down, I will always persevere and claw my way back up. No matter what happens, Commander, I will always protect you and Shoukaku.
Phew... I'm in a pretty good mood, but that was still pretty tiring... Commander, can you bring me something to eat?
Commander, how should we begin our work today? Allow me to aid you!
